the बर्फ मुखाग्र  is approximately 60 m high
Ice  formations in the  Titlis glacier cave
A  हिमानी गुफा is a गुफा formed भीतर the  ice of a glacier .
Glacier caves  हैं प्रायः पुकारा बर्फ गुफाएं , लकिन इस पद is properly प्रयुक्त to describe bedrock  caves that contain year-round ice .
In physics , circular motion is a movement of an object along the circumference  of a वृत्त or रोटेशन साथ a गोलाकार  path .
It can be uniform , with constant angular  रेट of रोटेशन ( और निरंतर गति ) , or non-uniform  with a changing rate of rotation .
The rotation  around a फिक्स्ड अक्ष of a three-dimensional  body involves circular motion of its parts .
The equations of  गति describe the गति of the बीच  of mass of a body .
Examples of circular motion include : an  कृत्रिम उपग्रह orbiting the धरती at निरंतर ऊँचाई , a स्टोन जिससे is tied to a रस्सी और is होने  swung in circles , a car turning through a curve in a race track , an electron moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field , and a gear turning inside a mechanism .
चूंकि the ऑब्जेक्ट 's गति वेक्टर is constantly बदलना दिशा , the चलती  object is undergoing acceleration by a centripetal force in the direction of the center of rotation .
Without this acceleration , the object would move in a straight line , according to  न्यूटन 's कानून of गति  .
Apollo Creed is a  fictional अक्षर इससे the रॉकी films , initially portrayed as  the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the World .
He  थी निभाई by कार्ल  Weathers .
Creed had multiple  nicknames , सहित the निपुण of विपत्ति , the किंग of स्टिंग , the नाचना विनाशक , the  Prince of Punch , The One and Only and The Count of Monte Fisto .
Urban legend states that Apollo Creed 's name is  a wordplay on the रसूलों ' पंथ , a बयान  of belief used in Christian churches .
All of  अपोलो 's चैंपियनशिप झगड़े यहूद अनुसूचित  for the 15 round distance .
Championship  झगड़े किया नहीं बदलें इससे 15 rounds to 12  rounds until 1987 .
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red , white ,  और ब्लू trunks ; पंथ थी the पहला man to पहनें उन्हें ( latterly worn by रॉकी बाल्बोआ in the 3rd और 4th किश्तों और आखिरकार by टॉमी `` the यंत्र '' gunn ( टॉमी मॉरिसन  ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he wore red and white , as seen in Rocky II .
Balboa 's signature  रंगों यहूद ब्लैक और gold—colors he प्रयुक्त in  the latest movie .
In the United States , the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States and  पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the नियुक्ति clause in आलेख ii of the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution .
In  जोड to the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य , जिनकी अस्तित्व और कुछ पहलुओं of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार हैं परे the संवैधानिक शक्ति of कॉंग्रेस to alter , अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस  have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal  न्यायधीश ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ शामिल the मुख्य इंसाफ और संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत , सर्किट न्यायाधीशों of the न्यायालयों  of appeals , and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges described thus far are referred to  sometimes as `` आलेख iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी by आलेख iii of  the U.S. Constitution .
In addition , judges of the Court of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार कसरत न्यायिक  power pursuant to Article III .
Other judges serving in the  संघीय न्यायालयों , सहित मजिस्ट्रेट न्यायाधीशों और दिवालियापन न्यायाधीशों , हैं भी sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however ,  they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate , and their power derives from Article I instead .
See  आलेख i और आलेख  III tribunals .
The Beretta 21A Bobcat  is a छोटी pocket-sized semi-automatic पिस्टल designed  by Beretta in Italy .
उत्पादन began in लेट 1984 , solely in the beretta  U.S.A. facility in Accokeek , Maryland .
It is a  further विकास  of the Beretta Model 20 , whose production ended in 1985 .
परिवर्तनीय सार्वभौमिक जीवन बीमे ( प्रायः shortened to  VUL ) is a type of life insurance that builds a cash value .
In a VUL , the cash value can be invested in a wide variety of separate  खाते , समान to परस्पर निधि , और the चुनाव of जिससे  of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner .
The 'variable ' component  in the नाम refers to इस क्षमता to invest in पृथक खाते जिनकी मान vary—they  vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond markets .
The  'universal ' घटक in the नाम refers to the लचीलापन the  owner has in making premium payments .
The premiums can vary from nothing in a given month  up to maximums पारिभाषित by the आतंरिक आय कोड लिये जीवन बीमे  .
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that has fixed premium payments that typically can not be missed without lapsing the policy (  हालांकि एक may कसरत an स्वचालित प्रीमियम ऋण विशेषता , or आत्मसमर्पण dividends to अदा a पूरे  Life premium ) .
Variable universal life is a type of permanent life insurance , because the  मौत लाभ होगा be सशुल्क if the insured मरता कोई समय as long as वहीँ is sufficient  cash value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy .
With most if not all VULs  , नापसंद पूरे जीवन , वहीँ is no endowment आयु ( the आयु at  which the cash value equals the death benefit amount , which for whole life is typically 100 ) .
This is  yet another कुंजी लाभ of vul  over Whole Life .
With a typical whole life policy , the death benefit is limited to the face amount specified  in the नीति , और at endowment आयु , the फेस राशि is सब कि is सशुल्क  out .
Thus with either death or  endowment , the बीमे कम्पनी keeps कोई नकदी मान  built up over the years .
However , some participating whole life policies offer riders which  बताएँ कि कोई dividends सशुल्क on the नीति be प्रयुक्त to खरीदें  `` paid up additions '' to the policy which increase both the cash value and the death benefit over time .
If  निवेश बना in the पृथक खाते out-perform the सामान्य खाता of the बीमे कम्पनी , a उच्चतर rate-of-return  can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life .
The combination over the years of no endowment age  , continually increasing मौत लाभ , और if a ऊँची rate-of-return is अर्जित in the पृथक खाते of a vul नीति , इस could परिणाम in उच्चतर  value to the owner or beneficiary than that of a whole life policy with the same amounts of money paid in as premiums .

A mound of  लड़की स्काउट  cookies .
इस mound contains 74  boxes of cookies
Girl Scout Cookies are  कुकीज़ बेची by लड़की स्काउट of the यूएसए ( gsusa ) as एक of इसके  major fundraisers for local Scout units .
Members of the GSUSA have been selling cookies  चूंकि 1917 to उठाएँ निधि  .
Girls who participate can earn prizes for  उनके प्रयत्न  .
There are also unit  प्रोत्साहन if the ईकाई  as a whole does well .
As of  2007 , बिक्री यहूद अनुमानित at परिचय 200 लाख बाक्स  per year .
विश्वविद्यालयों हॉल
Purdue University , located in West Lafayette , Indiana  , is the फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the six-campus purdue विश्वविद्यालयों  system .
Purdue was founded on May 6 ,  1869 , as a land-grant विश्वविद्यालयों जब the इंडियाना सामान्य सभा , लेने लाभ of the morrill अधिनियम , स्वीकृत a दान of  land and money from Lafayette businessman John Purdue to establish a college of science , technology , and agriculture in his name .
The  पहला वर्ग यहूद आयोजित on सितंबर 16 , 1874 , साथ छह  instructors and 39 students .
Today , Purdue is a member of the Big Ten Conference , and is a well known  world-class शोध संस्था  .
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any university in  इंडियाना as खूब as the चौथी largest अंतरराष्ट्रीय छात्र जनसांख्यिकी of  any university in the United States .
Purdue  offers दोनो undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट कार्यक्रम in over 211 प्रमुख  areas of study , and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula .
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of aviation , having established the first college  क्रेडिट offered in उड़ान प्रशिक्षण , the पहला four-year स्नातक 's उपाधि in विमानन , और the पहला विश्वविद्यालयों विमानक्षेत्र ( purdue विश्वविद्यालयों विमानक्षेत्र ) .
Purdue 's aviation  प्रौद्योगिकी कार्यक्रम remains एक of the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी  aviation-specific programs in the world .
In the mid-20th century , Purdue 's aviation program expanded to encompass  उन्नत spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving वृद्धि to purdue 's उपनाम , पालना of astronauts  .
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts , including  गस grissom ( एक of the असली पारा सात astronauts ) , neil आर्मस्ट्रांग ( the पहला व्यक्ति to चलना on the चंद्रमा ) , और यूजीन cernan  ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ) .
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is  a पद कि loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( भी  known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ) .
Because an  epidermoid गाँठ originates in the epidermis और a पिलर गाँठ originates इससे बाल follicles  , by definition , neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst .
the नाम is regarded as a misnomer as the वसीय  , white , semi-solid material in both of these cyst entities is not sebum , but keratin .
Furthermore , under the  सूक्ष्मदर्शी neither एंटिटी contains  sebaceous glands .
In practice , however  , the शर्तें हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त  interchangeably .
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and are known as  steatocystomas or , if अनेक , as steatocystoma मल्टीप्लेक्स  .
आधुनिक pointe  shoes .
The edge of the toe pad , which is inserted between the foot and toe box  लिये cushioning , can be देखी on the सही पैर  .
A pointe shoe is a type  of जूता worn by बैले  dancers when performing pointe work .
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless and sylph -like and have evolved to enable  नर्तक to नृत्य en pointe ( on the नुस्ख़े of उनके toes ) लिये  extended periods of time .
They are normally worn by female dancers , though male dancers may wear them for unorthodox roles such as the  भद्दा stepsisters in सिंडरेला , नीचे in a midsummer रात्रि 's सपना , or मेन performing as महिलाओं  in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva .
They are manufactured in a variety of colors ,  सबसे commonly in शेड्स of  light pink .
This tablespoon has a  क्षमता of परिचय  15 mL .
measuring spoons
In the US and parts of Canada , a tablespoon is  the largest प्रकार of चमचा प्रयुक्त लिये खाने इससे a कटोरी  .
In the UK , Europe and  सबसे राष्ट्रमंडल देशों , a tablespoon is  a type of large spoon usually used for serving .
In  देशों जहाँ a tablespoon is a सेवारत चमचा , the  nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon .
A  tablespoonful , nominally the क्षमता of एक tablespoon  , is commonly used as a measure of volume in cooking .
It is  abbreviated as t , tb , tbs , tbsp , tblsp  , or tblspn .
The capacity of  ordinary tablespoons is नहीं regulated by विधि और  is subject to considerable variation .
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is approximately 15 mL ; the capacity  of an वास्तविक tablespoon ( डाइनिंग utensil ) सीमाएँ इससे 7  mL to 14 mL .
In Australia one  tablespoon ( मापन ईकाई ) is 20  mL .
Harry Potter is a series of  सात काल्पनिक novels लिखा by the अंग्रेजों लेखक  J. K. Rowling .
The books chronicle the adventures of a wizard ,  हैरी कुम्हार , और उसके मित्रों रोनाल्ड वीज़्ली और हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर , सब of जिसको हैं विद्यार्थी at हॉग्वार्ट्स स्कूल  of Witchcraft and Wizardry .
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort , whose aims are to become  अमर , जीतें the wizarding संसार , subjugate non-magical लोगों , और नष्ट सब those जो स्टैंड in उसके रास्ता , विशेषकर हैरी  Potter .
Since the release of the first novel Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's  स्टोन on 30 जून 1997 ,  the books have gained immense popularity , critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide .
The series has  भी था कुछ share of आलोचना  , including concern for the increasingly dark tone .
, the book  श्रेणी रै बेची परिचय 450 लाख नक़ल , बनाना it the best-selling किताब श्रेणी in  history , and has been translated into 67 languages .
The last four books consecutively set records  as the fastest-selling किताबे  in history .
A series of many genres , including fantasy and coming of age ( with elements of mystery ,  थ्रिलर , एडवेंचर , और रोमांस ) , it रै अनेक सांस्कृतिक meanings  and references .
According to Rowling ,  the प्रमुख थीम is मौत  .
There  हैं भी अनेक अन्य विषयवस्तु in  the series , such as prejudice and corruption .
The initial  प्रमुख प्रकाशक of the किताबे यहूद bloomsbury in the संयुक्त किंगडम और scholastic दबायें  in the United States .
The  किताबे have चूंकि महरूम प्रकाशित  by many publishers worldwide .
The books , with the seventh book split into two parts , have been made into an eight-part film  श्रेणी by warner भाईs. तस्वीरें , the highest-grossing फिल्मी श्रेणी  of all time .
The series also  originated much tie-in merchandise , बनाना the हैरी कुम्हार ब्रांड  worth in excess of $ 15 billion .
Also due to the success of the books and films , Harry Potter has been used for a  थीम पार्क , the wizarding संसार of हैरी कुम्हार in सार्वभौमिक पार्क & रिसॉर्ट 's आइलैंड्स of एडवेंचर  .
rs-68 होने tested at नासा  's Stennis Space Center .
The nearly transparent exhaust is due  to इस इंजन 's exhaust होने ज़्यादातर अतितप्त भाप ( जल वाष्प इससे इसके propellants  , hydrogen and oxygen )
Viking 5C  प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन
A rocket  इंजन , or बस `` प्रक्षेपास्त्र '' , is a जेट इंजन कि उपयोग तभी भंडारित propellant  mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet .
Rocket engines are reaction  इंजन और obtain thrust in accordance साथ न्यूटन  's third law .
Since they need no external material to form their jet , rocket engines can  be प्रयुक्त लिये spacecraft नोदन as खूब as स्थलीय  uses , such as missiles .
Most rocket engines are internal  दहन इंजन , हालांकि non-combusting फ़ॉर्म भी  exist .
Rocket engines as a group have the highest  exhaust गतियाँ , हैं by दूर the lightest , लकिन हैं the तनिक propellant कुशल  of all types of jet engines .
`` ...  baby एक अधिक समय '' is a सोंग  by American recording artist Britney Spears .
It served as Spears 's debut single and title track from  उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो  album , ... Baby One More Time ( 1999 ) .
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin and Rami , `` ... Baby  एक अधिक समय '' थी released on सितंबर 30 , 1998 , by jive रिकॉर्ड  .
बाद रिकॉर्डिंग और sending a डेमो टेप साथ an अप्रयुक्त  song from Toni Braxton , Spears signed a multi-album deal with Jive .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop and  dance-pop सोंग कि refers to a लड़की जो संताप तोड़कर up साथ उसके बॉयफ्रेंड  .
The song received generally  अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों  , who praised its composition .
``  ... baby एक अधिक समय '' attained वैश्विक कामयाबी  , reaching number one in every country it charted .
It  भी प्राप्त numerous certifications around the संसार , और is एक of the  best-selling singles of all time , with over 10 million copies sold .
An accompanying music  वीडियो , निर्देशित by निगेल लंड , portrays स्पीयर्स as a छात्र इससे a कैथोलिक ऊँची स्कूल , जो starts to daydream कि वो is गायन  and dancing around the school , while watching her love interest from afar .
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ) , where  स्पीयर्स 's fictional बेटी is वेश साथ a समान schoolgirl पहनावा जबकि wearing  pink ribbons in her hair .
In  2010 , the म्यूज़िक वीडियो लिये `` ... baby एक अधिक समय  '' was voted the third most influential video in the history of pop music , in a poll held by Jam ! .
Spears has performed `` ... Baby One  अधिक समय '' in a क्रमांक  of live appearances and in all of her concert tours .
It was the  encore of the ... baby एक अधिक समय दौरे ( 1999 ) और सपना भीतर a सपना दौरे ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स  also performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops ! ...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ) , The Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ) , The M+M 's Tour (  2007 ) , the सर्कस अभिनीत britney स्पीयर्स ( 2009 )  , and the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 ) .
`` ... Baby One More  समय '' थी मनोनीत लिये a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन  , and has been included in lists by Blender , Rolling Stone and VH1 .
It has been noted for redefining  the ध्वनि of लेट 1990s म्यूज़िक  .
Spears has  नामित `` ... baby एक अधिक समय '' as एक of  her favorite songs from her career .
It was  भी the फाइनल सोंग to be निभाई on the बीबीसी  's music programme Top of the Pops .
Cholera is an infection in the small intestine caused by  the bacterium vibrio cholerae  .
The main  लक्षण हैं watery अतिसार  and vomiting .
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated by the feces ( waste  उत्पाद ) of an संक्रमित व्यक्ति , सहित एक साथ no apparent लक्षण .
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead  to रैपिड निर्जलीकरण और electrolyte असंतुलन , और मौत  in some cases .
The primary treatment is  मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण चिकित्सा , typically साथ मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण समाधान  , to replace water and electrolytes .
If this  is नहीं tolerated or करता नहीं provide सुधार तेज़ पर्याप्त  , intravenous fluids can also be used .
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those with  कठोर बीमारी to shorten इसके अवधि और गंभीरता  .
विश्वव्यापी , it affects 3–5 लाख  people and causes 100,000–130,000 deaths a year .
Cholera was one of the earliest  infections to be पढ़ाई by epidemiological  methods .
The Picture of  डोरियन धूसर is the तभी प्रकाशित अनोखा by ऑस्कर वाइल्ड , appearing as the सीसे स्टोरी in lippincott  's Monthly Magazine on 20 June 1890 , printed as the July 1890 issue of this magazine .
The magazine 's editors feared the story was indecent as submitted  , so वे censored roughly 500 शब्द , बगैर वाइल्ड 's ज्ञान , पहले  publication .
But even with that , the story was still greeted with outrage by  अंग्रेजों reviewers , कुछ of जिसको सुझाया कि वाइल्ड चाहिए be prosecuted on moral grounds , अग्रणी वाइल्ड to बचाव the अनोखा aggressively in अक्षर to the अंग्रेजों दबायें .
Wilde later revised the story for book  प्रकाशन , बनाना substantial alterations , हटाना विवादास्पद passages , adding नई अध्याय और सहित an aphoristic preface जिससे  has since become famous in its own right .
The amended  संस्करण थी प्रकाशित by  Ward , Lock and Company in April 1891 .
Some scholars  मानना कि वाइल्ड होता आज have चाही us to पढ़ा the  version he originally submitted to Lippincott 's .
The novel tells  of a यंग man नामित डोरियन धूसर , the विषय of a  painting by artist Basil Hallward .
Basil is impressed by Dorian  's सौंदर्य और becomes infatuated साथ उसे , believing उसके सौंदर्य is जिम्मेदार  for a new mode in his art .
Dorian meets Lord Henry Wotton , a  dost of बेसिल 's , और becomes  enthralled by Lord Henry 's world view .
Espousing a new hedonism , Lord Henry suggests the only things worth  pursuing in जीवन हैं सौंदर्य और fulfilment of the होश  .
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade , Dorian (  whimsically ) expresses a ख्वाहिश to बेचें उसके आत्मा to ensure the पोर्ट्रेट  Basil has painted would age rather than he .
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled , and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery , the portrait serves as a reminder of the effect each act has upon  उसके आत्मा , साथ प्रत्येक सिन प्रदर्शित as a disfigurement of उसके रूप , or through  a sign of aging .
The Picture of  डोरियन धूसर is माना a कार्य of क्लासिक गोथिक fiction  with a strong Faustian theme .
Sári Gábor ( born 6  फ़रवरी 1917 ) , ज्ञात as ज़ा ज़ा गैबर ( ) , is a हंगेरियाई -born अमरीकी अभिनेत्री जो acted in supporting भूमिकाएँ in  movies , on Broadway , and occasionally on television .
Gabor was also  a socialite  .
वो began उसके स्टेज करियर in वियना  at age 15 , and was crowned Miss Hungary in 1936 .
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and  became a sought-after अभिनेत्री साथ `` यूरोपीय फ्लेयर और स्टाइल '' , साथ a व्यक्तित्व कि  `` exuded charm and grace '' .
Her  पहला फिल्म भूमिका थी as supporting  actress in Lovely to Look At .
She later acted  in we 're नहीं शादीशुदा !
and played one of her few leading roles in Moulin Rouge ( 1952 ) ,  निर्देशित by जॉन हस्टन , जो वर्णित उसके as a `` विश्वसनीय '' अभिनेत्री  .
Besides her film and television appearances , she is best known for  having नौ पतियों , सहित होटल महारथी कोनराड  Hilton and actor George Sanders .
She once stated , `` Men have  सदा liked me और i have  always liked men .
But I like a mannish man ,  a man जो knows कैसा to बात to और दावत a स्त्री – नहीं  just a man with muscles . ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born  ली jun-fan ; 27 नवम्बर 1940 – 20 जुलाई 1973 ) थी a चाइनीज अमरीकी martial कलाकार , कर्ता , martial  arts instructor , philosopher , and filmmaker .
The founder of Jeet Kune Do , Lee was  the बेटे of cantonese ओपेरा स्टार ली hoi-chuen  .
He is widely considered by commentators , critics , media and other  martial कलाकारों to be एक of the सबसे influential martial  artists of all time , and a pop culture icon of the 20th century .
He is often credited with helping to change the  रास्ता एशियाइ यहूद प्रस्तुत in  American films .
Lee  थी born in चाइनाटाउन , सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 नवम्बर 1940 to अभिभावक इससे हांग काँग और थी उठाया  in Kowloon with his family until his late teens .
He  थी introduced to the फिल्मी उद्योग by उसके  father and appeared in several films as a child actor .
Lee moved to the United States at the age of 18 to receive his higher  शिक्षा , और it थी दौरान इस समय कि he began शिक्षण martial  arts .
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the traditional Hong Kong martial arts film  to a नई स्तर of लोकप्रियता और acclaim , sparking a surge of ब्याज  in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s .
The direction and tone of his films  बदला और बहकावे martial कला और martial कला  films in Hong Kong and the rest of the world .
He is noted for his roles  in पाँच feature-length films : lo वेई 's the बिग boss ( 1971 ) और मुट्ठी of फ़्यूरी ( 1972 ) ; रास्ता of the ड्रैगन ( 1972 ) , निर्देशित और लिखा  by Lee ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 ) , both directed by Robert Clouse .
Lee became an iconic figure  ज्ञात throughout the संसार , विशेषकर among the चाइनीज , as  he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films .
He initially trained in Wing Chun , but later rejected well-defined martial art styles , favouring instead the use of  तकनीकों इससे विभिन्न स्त्रोत , in the स्पिरिट of उसके निजी martial कला दर्शनशास्त्र , जिससे he उतावले जीत kune do ( the रास्ता of the intercepting मुट्ठी )  .
Lee held dual  नागरिकता of हांग काँग और the  United States .
He died in Kowloon  टोंग on 20 जुलाई 1973 at  age 32 .
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , also known as chronic obstructive lung disease (  ठंडा ) , दीर्घकालिक obstructive airway बीमारी ( coad ) , दीर्घकालिक airflow limitation ( कैलोरी ) और दीर्घकालिक obstructive respiratory बीमारी ( cord ) , is the occurrence of दीर्घकालिक ब्रोंकाइटिस or emphysema  , a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time .
This limits airflow to  और इससे the फेफड़े , causing shortness of साँस  ( dyspnea ) .
In clinical practice , COPD is  पारिभाषित by इसके characteristically  low airflow on lung function tests .
In contrast to asthma , this limitation is poorly  reversible और प्रायः gets progressively बदतर over समय  .
COPD is caused by noxious particles or  गैस , सबसे commonly इससे तम्बाकू धूम्रपान , जिससे triggers an असामान्य जलन जवाब in  the lung .
The diagnosis  of copd requires फेफड़ों फलन  tests .
Important management strategies are smoking  cessation , vaccinations , पुनर्वास , और ड्रग  therapy ( often using inhalers ) .
कुछ मरीजों go on to आवश्यकता long-term ऑक्सीजन चिकित्सा  or lung transplantation .
Worldwide , COPD ranked as the  छठे अग्रणी कारण of मौत in  1990 .
It is projected to become the fourth leading cause of death  विश्वव्यापी by 2030 , due to an बढ़ाएँ in धूम्रपान दरों और जनसांख्यिकी  changes in many countries .
COPD is the third leading cause of death in the U.S. ,  और the आर्थिक बोझ of copd in the u.S. in 2007 थी $ 42.6 अरब in  health care costs and lost productivity .
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank ( , ? , ; 12 June 1929early March 1945 ) is one of  the सबसे discussed यहूदी पीड़ितों of the holocaust  .
Her diary has been  the आधार लिये अनेक plays और  films .
Born in the city of Frankfurt  am प्रमुख in वाइमर जर्मनी , वो  lived most of her life in or near Amsterdam , in the Netherlands .
Born a German national , Frank  खोया उसके नागरिकता in  1941 .
She  gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय कीर्ति  posthumously after her diary was published .
It documents her experiences hiding during the German  occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स  in World War II .
The Frank family moved  इससे जर्मनी to एम्सटर्डम in 1933 , the साल the nazis  gained control over Germany .
By the beginning of 1940 , they were trapped in Amsterdam by  the नाजी occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स  .
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942 , the family went into  छुपाना in the छुपा कक्ष of ऐनी 's पिता  , Otto Frank 's , office building .
बाद दो सालो , the  group was betrayed and transported to concentration camps .
Anne Frank  और उसके सिस्टर , margot , यहूद आखिरकार transferred  to the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp , where they died of typhus in March 1945 .
ओटो फ़्रैंक , the तभी उत्तरजीवी of the परिवार , लौटे to एम्सटर्डम बाद  the war to find that Anne 's diary had been saved , and his efforts led to its publication in 1947 .
It was translated from its original Dutch and first  प्रकाशित in अंग्रेज़ी in 1952 as the डायरी of a यंग लड़की .
it रै चूंकि महरूम अनूदित  into many languages .
The diary , which was given to Anne on her 13th  जन्मदिवस , क्रॉनिकल्स उसके जीवन इससे 12 जून  1942 until 1 August 1944 .
Kurt 's  हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967 – April 5 , 1994 ) was an  अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर ,  guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in 1985 and  स्थापित it as भाग of the सिएटल म्यूज़िक झाँकी , having इसके डेब्यू एल्बम ब्लीच released on the  independent record label Sub Pop in 1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the band found breakthrough success with  `` खुश्बू जैसे टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind  ( 1991 ) .
Following the success of Nevermind , Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of  पीढी x , और कोबेन hailed as `` the प्रवक्ता of a पीढी ''  .
Cobain , however , was often uncomfortable and frustrated , believing his message and  कलाकारी दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक , साथ उसके निजी  issues often subject to media attention .
he challenged निर्वाण 's दर्शक  with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ) .
दौरान the पिछला सालो of उसके जीवन , कोबेन struggled साथ  heroin addiction , illness and depression .
He also had difficulty  coping साथ उसके कीर्ति और पब्लिक चित्र , और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी  pressures surrounding himself and his wife , musician Courtney Love .
On April 8 , 1994 ,  कोबेन थी मिला मुर्दे at उसके घर in सिएटल , the शिकार  of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
The circumstances of his death at  आयु 27 have become a टॉपिक of पब्लिक fascination और  debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana , with Cobain as a  songwriter , रै बेची over 25 लाख एल्बम in the u.S. , और over 50 लाख  worldwide .
Radial  इंजन समय और कैम यांत्रिकी  .
Click  लिये पूरा रेज़ोल्यूशन  animation .
Radial engine of a  बाईप्लेन
Master rod ( upright ) ,  स्लेव और balances इससे  a two-row , fourteen-cylinder Pratt & Whitney Twin Wasp
The radial engine is a reciprocating type  आतंरिक दहन इंजन विन्यास in जिससे the सिलेंडर पाइंट outward इससे a सेंट्रल  crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel .
It  resembles a stylized स्टार जब viewed इससे the सामने , और is पुकारा  a `` star engine '' ( German Sternmotor ) in some languages .
The radial configuration was very commonly used in aircraft  इंजन पहले टर्बाइन इंजन became  predominant .
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom , created by  सुसान हैरिस , कि originally aired on एनबीसी इससे सितंबर 13 , 1985 , to  May 9 , 1992 .
Starring Bea Arthur , Betty  श्वेत , rue mcclanahan और estelle getty , the  show centers on four older women sharing a home in Miami , Florida .
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions , in  संघ साथ touchstone टेलीविज़न , और पॉल junger witt , टोनी थामस  , and Harris served as the original executive producers .
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its run and won several awards , including  the प्राइमटाइम एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया कॉमेडी श्रेणी  twice .
it भी जीती तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार  for Best Television Series – Musical or Comedy .
All four stars each received an Emmy Award throughout  the श्रेणी ' चलाएं और था अनेक nominations  .
The series  भी क्रमित among the शीर्ष टेन highest-rated कार्यक्रम  for six out of its seven seasons .
Deepwater drilling is  the प्रक्रम of आयल और गैस खोजी और उत्पादन  in depths of more than 500 feet .
By this definition , there are  लगभग 600 deepwater कुएं in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको  .
It has been economically infeasible for many years  , लकिन साथ उठती आयल कीमतें , अधिक कंपनियाँ हैं निवेश in  this area .
Major companies working in this  सेक्टर शामिल डायमंड offshore , transocean  , and Baker Hughes .
There are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater  खुदाई rigs : semi-submersible  drilling rigs and drillships .
Drilling can also be  performed इससे a fixed-position संस्थापना ऐसे as a फ्लोटिंग spar  ( platform ) or tension-leg platform .
Recent industry analysis has estimated that the total expenditure in  the वैश्विक deepwater अवसंरचना मार्केट होगा पहुँचें $ 145bn  in 2011 .
“Not  सब आयल is accessible on  land or in shallow water .
You can find some oil  जमा दफ्न गहन अंतर्गत the समंदर floor.” ... using सोनिक उपकरण  , oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely to produce oil .
Then they use a mobile  offshore खुदाई ईकाई ( मोदू  ) to dig the initial well .
Some units are converted into production rigs , meaning they  स्विच इससे खुदाई लिये आयल to capturing आयल एकबार it 's मिला  .
Most  of the समय , the आयल कम्पनी होगा बदलें the मोदू  with a more permanent oil production rig to capture oil.” ... The MODU 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's floor to find oil deposits .
The part of the drill that extends  नीचे the डेक और through the  water is called the riser .
The riser allows for drilling fluids to  मूव between the मंजिल और the  rig .
इंजीनियर्स निम्नतर a ड्रिल स्ट्रिंग -- a श्रेणी of पाइप designed  to drill down to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“the विस्तार of deepwater खुदाई is happening  despite accidents in offshore fields ... ”
In 2010 a large explosion  occurred हत्या 11 मजदूर और spilling लाखो of गैलन of आयल into the  Gulf of Mexico while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters .
“ ...  despite the risks , the deepwater खुदाई ट्रेंड is spreading in the भूमध्यसागरीय और बंद the coast  of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling ,  विश्लेषक कह , is continuing ऊँची माँग लिये उर्जा  worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to  फेस the ऊँची risks कि आइये साथ deepwater खुदाई in  order for Americans to continue to carry on their everyday lives .
“The Energy Department recently projected that gulf oil production would expand from its 2011  स्तर of 1.3 लाख barrels a दिन , स्टिल nearly a क्वार्टर of कुल घरेलू  production , to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater drilling affects  the पर्यावरण in दोनो ऋणात्मक और  positive ways .
Although  deepwater खुदाई rarely कल्याणकारी आयल spills it is स्टिल  a hazardous possible outcome .
Oil spills result in oil sinking to the bottom of  the समंदर smothering संयंत्र जीवन leaving मछली बगैर खाना और  shelter to survive .
On the other hand deepwater  खुदाई प्रभाव the पर्यावरण in  a positive ways too .
In time once the deepwater oil well is not in  उपयोग anymore पौधे होगा grow on और around  the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in .
Deepwater drilling also lets us see the  गहराइयों of the समंदर मंजिल कि  are hardly ever seen .
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take  फ़ोटो of विरल मछली कि हैं in वहीँ प्राकृतिक आवास , giving वैज्ञानिक a dekh at पशु वे rarely seen”  ( Chevron Corporation ) . ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an American woman with  जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an  `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its  परखना ( जिससे शामिल  Clinton 's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
फ्रांसिस अल्बर्ट `` फ़्रैंक '' सिनात्रा , , ( दिसम्बर  12 , 1915 – May 14 , 1998 ) was an American singer and film actor .
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey , Sinatra found unprecedented success as a solo  कलाकार इससे the जल्दी to mid-1940s बाद होने हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड  in 1943 .
होने the आइडल of the `` bobby soxers `` , he released उसके पहला  album , The Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946 .
उसके पेशेवर करियर था stalled by the 1950s , लकिन it थी पुनर्जन्म in  1953 after he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity .
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and  released अनेक critically lauded एल्बम ( ऐसे as in the मूत छोटी घंटों , गीतों लिये swingin ' प्रेमियों ! ,  Come Fly with Me , Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ) .
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label , Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding ! , Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim ) , toured internationally , was a founding member of the Rat Pack and  fraternized साथ हस्तियाँ और कूटनीतिज्ञों , सहित जॉन F. कैनेडी  .
Sinatra  turned 50 in 1965 , अंकित the retrospective सितंबर of my सालो , स्ट्रक्चर in the एमी -winning टेलीविज़न  special Frank Sinatra : A Man and His Music , and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way `` .
With sales of his music  dwindling और बाद appearing in अनेक poorly प्राप्त films ,  Sinatra retired for the first time in 1971 .
Two years later , however , he came out of retirement and in  1973 अंकित अनेक एल्बम , स्कोरिंग a शीर्ष 40 hit साथ `` ( थीम इससे ) नई  York , New York `` in 1980 .
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base , he toured both within the United States and internationally  , जबतक a छोटी समय पहले उसके मौत in  1998 .
Sinatra also  forged a अत्यधिक कामयाब करियर  as a film actor .
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953 , he also garnered a  नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये the man साथ the सुनहरी भुजा , और नाजुक acclaim लिये  his performance in The Manchurian Candidate .
He also starred in such musicals as High Society , Pal  जॉय , यारों और डॉल  and On the Town .
Sinatra was  सम्मानित at the कैनेडी बीच honors in 1983 और थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of  Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997 .
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards , including the Grammy Trustees Award ,  ग्रैमी लेजेंड पुरस्कार और the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि  Award .
Sinatra is also one of  world’s best-selling कलाकारों of सब समय , having बेची अधिक  than 150 million copies worldwide .
ठेठ cornhole  board
Cornhole , also known as bean bag toss , corn toss , baggo or bags , is a lawn game in which players take turns throwing corn hole bags at  a उठाया मंच साथ a छेद in the दूर  end .
A bag in the  छेद स्कोर 3 अंक , जबकि एक  on the platform scores 1 point .
Play continues until  a टोली or खिलाड़ी  reaches the score of 21 .
The American Gold Eagle  is an आधिकारिक सुनहरा bullion  coin of the United States .
Authorized under the Gold Bullion Coin Act of 1985 , it was  पहला released by the संयुक्त राज्य मिंट in 1986  .
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that Bikram Choudhury synthesized  इससे परंपरागत hatha योग तकनीकों और popularized शुरूआत in  the early 1970s .
All Bikram Yoga classes  चलाएं लिये 90 मिनट्स और consist of the वही  series of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises .
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a room heated to 105°F ( ≈  40.6°c ) साथ a आर्द्रता of 40 % ,  .
Christopher Michael Massey ( born 26 January 1990  ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता , हास्य और rapper बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये अभिनीत as माइकल barret in निकलोडियन  television series Zoey 101 .
Massey has received many awards and nomination  सहित a यंग कलाकार पुरस्कार और एमी पुरस्कार  nominations .
He is also  ज्ञात लिये appearing in अनेक  commercials in the early 2000s .
A conventional  teaspoon बना of बेदाग स्टील  .
A teaspoon is an item of cutlery and/or a measuring instrument , as well as a  ईकाई of मापन  of volume in some countries and customs .
a फर्न is कोई एक or अधिक of a समूह  of about 12,000 species of plants belonging to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta .
Unlike mosses , they have xylem and  फ्लोएम ( बनाना उन्हें vascular  plants ) .
They have stems  , पत्ते , और जड़ें जैसे अन्य  vascular plants .
Ferns reproduce via spores and have neither seeds  nor पुष्प .
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns , but ferns as defined here ( also called  monilophytes ) शामिल horsetails , whisk ferns , marattioid ferns  , and ophioglossoid ferns .
The term pteridophyte also refers to  ferns और a few अन्य बीजरहित vascular पौधे ( देखिए वर्गीकरण  section below ) .
Ferns first appear in the fossil record 360 million years ago in the Carboniferous but many of the current families and species did not  appear जबतक roughly 145 लाख सालो पहले in the जल्दी cretaceous ( बाद flowering पौधे आए to dominate अनेक environments ) .
Ferns are not of major economic importance , but some are grown or gathered for food , as ornamental plants , for  remediating contaminated soils , और have महरूम the विषय of शोध लिये उनके क्षमता to हटाएँ कुछ रासायनिक प्रदूषक  from the air .
Some are  significant weeds  .
वे भी खेल a भूमिका in mythology  , medicine , and art .
Flat  roofs in इसराईल
Flat  छत in लॉस एंजिल्स
A flat roof is a  प्रकार of covering लिये a भवन  .
In contrast to the more sloped form of roof , a  चपटा छत is आड़ा or  nearly horizontal .
The slope of a roof is properly known as  इसके पिच : roofs जिससे हैं nearly चपटा हैं ज्ञात as low-pitch  roofs ( as the angle of slope increases , so the pitch is said to increase ) .
Any sheet of material used to cover a flat or low-pitched roof is usually  ज्ञात as a झिल्ली और the प्राथमिक purpose of ये झिल्लियों is to waterproof the  roof area .
Materials that cover flat roofs typically allow the water  to चलाएं बंद इससे a पतला inclination or camber into a gutter प्रणाली  .
Water from some flat roofs such as on garden sheds sometimes  बहती freely बंद the किनारे of a छत , हालांकि gutter प्रणालियों हैं of लाभ in  keeping both walls and foundations dry .
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead water directly  onto the मैदान , or बेहतर , into a विशेषकर बना soakaway  .
Gutters on larger roofs usually  सीसे जल into the rainwater नाले प्रणाली of कोई निर्मित up  area .
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to  collect जल in a पूल , प्रायः लिये aesthetic उद्देश्य  , or for rainwater buffering .
चपटा roofs मौजूद सब over the संसार और  each area has its own tradition or preference for materials used .
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and freezing is unlikely to occur , many flat roofs  हैं बस निर्मित of चिनाई or कंक्रीट और इस is शुभ at keeping आउट the ऊष्मा of the सूर्य और सस्ती और  easy to build where timber is not readily available .
In areas where the roof could  become संतृप्त by बरसात और लीक , or जहाँ जल soaked  into the brickwork could freeze to ice and thus lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable .
traditionally सबसे चपटा roofs in the पश्चिमी संसार मेक उपयोग of तारकोल or अधिक प्रायः  tar paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight .
The tar or tarpaper is in turn  covered in बजरी to रखना the सूर्य 's ऊष्मा , uv किरणें और मौसम बंद it और helps protect it इससे  cracking or blistering and degradation .
Roof decking is usually of plywood ,  chipboard or osb फलक ( osb = उन्मुख strand फलक ,  also known as Sterling board ) of around 18mm thickness .
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot  द्रव , heated in a तारकोल केतली , or as चादरें of तारकोल impregnated 'paper ' चिपके bas और sealed साथ at joints by hot तारकोल - एकबार  it has cooled , the gravel is spread evenly over it .
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is  अनभिज्ञता or कमी of मेंटेनेंस जहाँ लोगों or कार्यक्रम कारण the बजरी to be स्थानांतरित or removed इससे the तारकोल or tarpaper waterproofing , यूँ exposing  it to weather and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in .
Tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or  fibre सामग्री soaked or impregnated  in tar .
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise  खड़ा इससे the छत ऐसे as on मुंडेर दीवारें or upstands , tarpaper विसंगतियाँ हैं उत्पादित साथ ठीक बजरी लागू to the hot तारकोल दौरान the प्रक्रम  of manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection .
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the workmanship and training of those  applying it to उपज अधिक or कम कामयाब परिणाम  .
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the cost  of सामग्री खरीदें और लागत of लेटा उन्हें , however the लागत of आधुनिक झिल्लियों ऐसे as epdm रै आइये bas  over recent years to make them more and more affordable .
There are now more firms supplying modern alternatives and there  is generally a growing जागरूकता of उनके प्रदर्शन  and availability .
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then damage often  goes unnoticed लिये long अवधि of समय दौरान जिससे जल penetrates और soaks the अलंकार और कोई  insulation and/or structure beneath it .
This can lead to expensive damage from  the दुर्गन्ध जिससे प्रायः develops और if  left can weaken the roof structure .
There are also various health risks to people and animals  श्वास the सांचे बीजाणुओं : the गंभीरता of इस स्वास्थ्य  risk remains a debated point .
One problem  साथ maintaining चपटा roofs is कि if जल करता घुस the अवरोध covering ( be it परंपरागत  or a modern membrane ) it can travel a long way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be seen .
Thus it  is नहीं आसान to देखिए जहाँ it is टपकती  in order to repair it .
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a  further संग्रहण or puddling of जल in कि क्षेत्रफल और the प्रॉब्लम worsens  .
A CD-ROM ( ) is a  pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क जिससे contains  data .
The name  is an एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट  Disc Read-only memory `` .
Computers can  पढ़ा cd-roms , लकिन can नहीं लिखें  on them .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to  वितरित कंप्यूटर तन्त्र , सहित वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया  applications , though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs ,  पुकारा उन्नत cds , थाम दोनो कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और ऑडियो साथ the latter सक्षम of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी , जबकि  data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow Book is  the तकनीकी मानक कि defines the स्वरूप  of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical specifications for all CD formats , the  पीला किताब , निर्मित by सोनी और फिलिप्स , थी the पहला एक्सटेंशन of  Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It  adapted the स्वरूप  to hold any form of data .
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ) , ( born 31 July 1965 ) , pen name J.  K. रोलिंग , is a अंग्रेजों उपन्यासकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the लेखक of  the Harry Potter fantasy series .
the कुम्हार किताबे have gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान , जीती अनेक  awards , and sold more than 400 million copies .
They have become the best-selling book series in  इतिहास , और महरूम the आधार लिये a श्रेणी of films जिससे रै become the  highest-grossing film series in history .
Rowling had overall approval on the scripts  as खूब as maintaining रचनात्मक कंट्रोल by सेवारत  as a producer on the final instalment .
Born in Yate , Gloucestershire , Rowling was working as a researcher  और दुभाषिया सचिव लिये माफ़ी अंतरराष्ट्रीय जब वो conceived the विचार लिये the हैरी कुम्हार श्रेणी on a विलम्बित ट्रैन इससे  Manchester to London in 1990 .
The seven-year period that followed entailed the  मौत of उसके माँ , तलाक इससे उसके पहला husband और गरीबी जबतक रोलिंग समाप्त the पहला अनोखा in the श्रेणी , हैरी  Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ) .
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the  पिछला , हैरी कुम्हार और the deathly hallows ( 2007 ) —as खूब  as 3 supplements to the series .
In 2012 ,  रोलिंग parted साथ उसके एजेंसी और resumed लिखने  in the form of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership , entitled The Casual Vacancy .
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed for  वयस्कों , the अन्य लिये children younger than the हैरी कुम्हार दर्शक , और वो expects the  latter to be published first .
Rowling has led a `` rags to riches `` life story , in which she  progressed इससे जीना on राज्य लाभ to multi-millionaire औकात भीतर  five years .
She is the United Kingdom 's best-selling  लेखक चूंकि रिकॉर्ड began , साथ बिक्री in excess  of £238m .
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List  अनुमानित रोलिंग 's सौभाग्य at £560 लाख ( $ 798 लाख ) , रैंकिंग उसके as the बारहवीं richest स्त्री in the  United Kingdom .
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of  2007 , और समय पत्रिका नामित उसके as a runner-up लिये इसके 2007 व्यक्ति of the साल , noting  the social , moral , and political inspiration she has given her fans .
In October  2010 , रोलिंग थी नामित the `` सबसे influential स्त्री in ब्रिटेन  '' by leading magazine editors .
She has become a notable philanthropist , supporting such charities as Comic Relief , One Parent Families ,  अनेक काठिन्य समाज of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और lumos ( formerly the children 's ऊँची स्तर  Group ) .
Auburndale is a  नगर in polk काउंटी , फ्लोरिडा  , United States .
The population was 11,032  at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी  .
According to the U.S Census estimates of  2005 , the नगर था  a population of 12,381 .
It is part  of the lakeland – शीत हेवन महानगर  Statistical Area .
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen  इससे कक्षा दौरान expedition 7 of the  International Space Station .
the नजर , eyewall , और surrounding rainbands , विशेषताएँ of  tropical cyclones , are clearly visible in this view from space .
A tropical cyclone is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure center surrounded by a  सर्पिल व्यवस्था of thunderstorms कि उपज दमदार हवाएँ और भारी  rain .
Tropical cyclones  strengthen जब जल काफूर इससे the समंदर is released as the संतृप्त एयर उदय , resulting in संघनन  of water vapor contained in the moist air .
वे हैं fueled by a अलग ऊष्मा यांत्रिकी than अन्य cyclonic windstorms ऐसे  as nor'easters , European windstorms , and polar lows .
The characteristic that separates  तीव्र cyclones इससे अन्य cyclonic प्रणालियों is कि at कोई ऊँचाई in the माहौल , the बीच  of a tropical cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems .
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin of these systems ,  जिससे प्रायः रूप in तीव्र regions of the ग्लोब , और to उनके गठन in  maritime tropical air masses .
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms '  cyclonic प्रकृति , साथ counterclockwise हवा  flow in the Northern Hemisphere and clockwise wind flow in the Southern Hemisphere .
The opposite direction of the  हवा प्रवाह is a परिणाम  of the Coriolis force .
Depending on its  स्थान और शक्ति , a तीव्र चक्रवात is referred to by names ऐसे as hurricane  ( , ) , typhoon ( ) , tropical storm , cyclonic storm , tropical depression , and simply cyclone .
While  तीव्र cyclones can उपज अत्यधिक शक्तिशाली हवाएँ और मूसलाधार बरसात  , they are also able to produce high waves , damaging storm surge , and tornadoes .
They develop over large bodies of warm water , and lose their strength if  वे मूव over जमीन due to increased सतह घर्षण और घाटा of the गरम समंदर as an उर्जा  source .
This is why coastal regions can receive significant  क्षति इससे a तीव्र चक्रवात , जबकि अंतर्देशीय regions हैं अपेक्षाकृत सुरक्षित इससे  receiving strong winds .
Heavy  rains , however , can उपज significant बाढ़ अंतर्देशीय , और तूफ़ान  surges can produce extensive coastal flooding up to from the coastline .
Although their effects on human  populations can be विनाशकारी  , tropical cyclones can relieve drought conditions .
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and  हस्तांतरण it toward शीतोष्ण latitudes , जिससे makes उन्हें  an important part of the global atmospheric circulation mechanism .
as a परिणाम , तीव्र cyclones सहायता to maintain संतुलन in the धरती 's क्षोभमण्डल , और  to maintain a relatively stable and warm temperature worldwide .
Many tropical cyclones develop  जब the वायुमंडलीय शर्तें around a कमजोर disturbance in  the atmosphere are favorable .
The background environment is modulated by climatological cycles and patterns such as the  madden-julian दोलन , el niño-southern दोलन , और the अटलांटिक  multidecadal oscillation .
Others form when other  प्रकार of cyclones acquire तीव्र  characteristics .
Tropical systems are then moved by steering winds in  the क्षोभमण्डल ; if the शर्तें remain अनुकूल , the तीव्र disturbance intensifies  , and can even develop an eye .
On the other end of the spectrum , if the conditions around the  प्रणाली deteriorate or the तीव्र चक्रवात makes landfall , the प्रणाली weakens और आखिरकार  dissipates .
It  is नहीं संभावित to artificially induce the  dissipation of these systems with current technology .
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch , ;  दिसम्बर 9 , 1916 ) is an अमरीकी स्टेज और फिल्मी कर्ता , फिल्मी निर्माता  and author .
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ) , Champion ( 1949 ) , Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ) , The Bad and the  खूबसूरत ( 1952 ) , 20,000 लीग अंतर्गत the समुद्र ( 1954 ) , हवस लिये जीवन ( 1956 ) , राहें of महिमा ( 1957 ) , gunfight at the o.k . corral ( 1957 ) , the वाइकिंग्स ( 1958 ) , स्पार्टाकस ( 1960 ) , निर्जन हैं the वीर ( 1962 ) , सात दिनों in may ( 1964 ) , the नायक of telemark ( 1965  ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ) .
He is No.17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the greatest male American  स्क्रीन महापुरूष of सब समय , बनाना उसे the highest-ranked  living person on the list .
In  1996 , he प्राप्त the अकादमी मानद पुरस्कार `` लिये  50 years as a creative and moral force in the motion picture community . ''
He is one of the last surviving actors from  हॉलीवुड 's `` सुनहरी आयु ''  .
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born May 6 , 1945 ) is an  अमरीकी चट्टान और फेंकें singer-songwriter  , guitarist and pianist .
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist , he performed and recorded as Bob Seger  और the पिछला सुना और bob seger प्रणाली throughout  the 1960s .
By the early 1970s , he had dropped the `` System ''  इससे उसके रिकार्डिंग और जारी to नीयत लिये broader कामयाबी  with other various bands .
In 1973 , he put together The Silver Bullet Band , a group of  detroit-area संगीतकारों , साथ जिसको he became  most successful on the national level with the album Live Bullet , recorded live with the Silver Bullet Band in 1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit , Michigan .
In 1976  , he हासिल a नेशनल ब्रेकआउट साथ  the studio album Night Moves .
On his studio albums , he also  worked extensively साथ the alabama-based मांसपेशी shoals लय खण्ड , जिससे appeared  on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums .
A roots rocker with a classic raspy , shouting voice , Seger wrote and  अंकित गीतों कि dealt साथ प्रेम , महिलाओं , blue-collar विषयवस्तु और थी an exemplar of heartland  rock .
Seger has recorded many hits ,  सहित `` रात्रि चालें , '' `` फेरे the पेज , '' `` we 've मिला tonight , '' `` विरूद्ध the हवा , '' और shakedown कि  was written for Beverly Hills Cop II and `` Like a Rock , '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight . ''
His iconic recording of `` Old  समय चट्टान और फेंकें `` थी नामित एक of the गीतों  of the Century in 2001 .
With a career spanning five decades ,  seger continues to perform  and record today .
Seger was  inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 2004 और the songwriters  Hall of Fame in 2012 .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9 , 1913 – April 22 , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the  संयुक्त राज्य , सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974 , जब he became the तभी अध्यक्ष to इस्तीफा the  office .
Nixon had previously served as  a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटर  from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961 .
निक्सन थी born in  Yorba Linda , California .
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University  स्कूल of विधि in 1937 , returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया  to practice law .
He and his wife ,  पैट निक्सन , स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य लिये the संघीय  government in 1942 .
He  subsequently परोसा in the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी दौरान  World War II .
Nixon was elected in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the  Senate in 1950 .
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss  मामला स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a अग्रणी anti-communist , और  elevated him to national prominence .
He was the running mate  of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी अध्यक्षीय  nominee in the 1952 election .
Nixon served  लिये आठ सालो as वाइस अध्यक्ष  .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign  in 1960 , narrowly खोने to जॉन F. कैनेडी , और खोया a रेस लिये राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in 1962 .
In  1968 , he भागा again लिये the  presidency and was elected .
Although Nixon  initially escalated अमेरिका 's भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध  , he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic  संबंध between the दो राष्ट्र , और he initiated détente और the anti-ballistic मिसाइल सन्धि साथ  the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his  प्रशासन generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred शक्ति इससे  Washington to the states .
Among other things , he launched initiatives to fight  कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ , imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण , enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी स्कूलों  , and established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning  साथ अपोलो 11 , he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त स्पेस खोजी  .
He was  re-elected by a भूस्खलन  in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo , the resignation of his vice president , Spiro  agnew , और a continuing श्रेणी of खुलासे परिचय the वाटरगेट कांड और अन्य misconduct by सदस्यों of  the administration .
The scandal  escalated , costing निक्सन much of उसके राजनैतिक support , और on  August 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office .
After his resignation , he controversially  प्राप्त a pardon जारी by उसके successor , जेराल्ड  Ford .
In retirement , Nixon 's work as an  elder statesman , authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking अनेक  foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate his public image .
He suffered a  debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18  , 1994 , and died four days later at the age of 81 .
{ {  infobox  Senator
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty  caused कड़वा contention between अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट  and Sen. Sumner .
Brady  1869 ]  ]
Sen. Sumner , opposed to American imperialism in  the caribbean और fearful कि annexation होता सीसे to the conquest of the neighboring  black republic of Haiti , became convinced that corruption lay behind the treaty , and that men close to the president shared in the corruption .
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee ,  sen. sumner initially withheld उसके राय on the सन्धि  on January 18 , 1870 .
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information from Assistant Secretary of State , Bancroft  डेविस , कि u.s . नवल जहाजों यहूद होने प्रयुक्त to protect अध्यक्ष báez .
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against  annexation और at sen. sumner’s सुझाव और काफी संभवतः to सहेजें the पार्टी इससे  an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment , the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session .
अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट persisted और भेजा संदेश to कॉंग्रेस in एहसान of annexation  on March 14 , 1870 , and May 31 , 1870 .
In closed session , Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng  कि वहीँ होता be परेशानी साथ the विदेशी नागरिकों , noting the दीर्घकालिक विद्रोह कि took प्लेस on the द्वीप , और the रिस्क कि the  independence of Haiti , recognized by the United States in 1862 , would be lost .
Sumner stated that  ग्रान्ट 's उपयोग of the u.S. नेवी as a प्रोटेक्टोरेट थी  a violation of International law and unconstitutional .
Finally ,  on जून 30 , 1870 the सन्धि थी voted on by the सीनेट और विफल to  gain the required 2/3 majority for treaty passage .
The following day ,  अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट , अहसास गद्दारी by sen. sumner , retaliated  by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley , Ambassador to Britain .
By autumn , Sumner 's personal hostility to the  अध्यक्ष थी पब्लिक ज्ञान , और he blamed the सचिव of राज्य लिये failing  to have resigned , rather than let Grant have his way .
The two men ,  मित्रों जबतक तब , cooled into कड़वा  enemies .
In December , 1870 , still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo  डोमिंगो somehow , sumner दिया a fiercely नाजुक वाक accusing the अध्यक्ष of usurpation  and Babcock of unethical conduct .
Already , President Grant ,  समर्थित by उसके सचिव of राज्य हैमिल्टन मछली , था initiated a अभियान  to depose Sumner from the chairmanship of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee .
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '' , in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt , Sumner had  पराजित ग्रान्ट 's पूरा repeal of the कार्यकाल of दफ्तर अधिनियम , अवरोधित ग्रान्ट 's नामांकन of सिकंदर स्टीवर्ट to u.S. सचिव of राजकोष , और महरूम a  constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go .
Grant  resented sumner 's बड़प्पन  of manner , as well .
Told  एकबार कि sumner किया नहीं मानना in the बाइबल , the अध्यक्ष is supposed  to have said that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it . ''
As the rift  between ग्रान्ट और sumner increased , sumner’s  health began to decline .
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4 , 1871 ,  सीनेटरों संबद्ध साथ अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट , ज्ञात as ‘’new radicals’’ voted  to oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship .
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form of applied ethics or professional  आचार कि examines नैतिक सिद्धान्त और moral or नैतिक  problems that arise in a business environment .
It applies to all  पहलुओं of कारोबार conduct और is प्रासंगिक to  the conduct of individuals and entire organizations .
Business  आचार रै दोनो normative  and descriptive dimensions .
As a corporate practice  और a करियर specialization , the फ़ील्ड is primarily  normative .
Academics attempting to understand  कारोबार बर्ताव employ वर्णनात्मक विधि  .
The range and quantity of  कारोबार नैतिक मुद्दे reflects the बातचीत of profit-maximizing  behavior with non-economic concerns .
Interest in business ethics accelerated dramatically  दौरान the 1980s और 1990s , दोनो भीतर प्रमुख corporations  and within academia .
For example , today most major corporations promote their  प्रतिबद्धता to non-economic मान अंतर्गत headings ऐसे as आचार कोड और सोशल  responsibility charters .
Adam Smith said , `` People of the same trade seldom meet  साथ , भी लिये merriment और diversion , लकिन the वार्तालाप ends in a षड्यंत्र विरूद्ध  the public , or in some contrivance to raise prices . ''
सरकारें उपयोग कानून और regulations to पाइंट कारोबार  behavior in what they perceive to be beneficial directions .
Ethics  implicitly regulates क्षेत्रों और विवरण of  behavior that lie beyond governmental control .
The emergence of large corporations with limited  संबंध और संवेदनशीलता to the समुदायों in जिससे  they operate accelerated the development of formal ethics regimes .
A burn is a type of injury to flesh or skin caused by heat  , विद्युत , रसायन , घर्षण , or विकिरण  .
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( known as superficial or first degree ) or  extend into the deeper स्किन लकिन do नहीं involve the पूरा मोटाई of the स्किन  ( known as partial thickness or second degree ) .
Rarely  सब परतों of the स्किन or deeper ऊतकों , ऐसे as मांसपेशी or अस्थि can be घायल in जिससे  case the burn is either full thickness ( third degree ) or fourth degree .
The treatment required  depends on the गंभीरता of  the burn .
Superficial burns maybe managed with little more than simple pain killers while  प्रमुख burns may आवश्यकता prolonged उपचार in specialized बर्न centers  .
कूलिंग साथ tap जल may सहायता पीड़ा और घटी क्षति however if एक्सपोज़र  is prolonged it may result in low body temperature .
Partial thickness burns may require cleaning with  साबुन और जल followed by dressings  .
Blisters  चाहिए typically  be left unbroken .
Full thickness burns usually require  सर्जिकल उपचार ऐसे as स्किन कलम  and extensive burns often require large amount of intravenous fluids .
The most  आम जटिलताओं of burns हैं  related to infection .
While large burns can be fatal , modern  उपचार विकसित in the पिछला 50 सालो have significantly improved the outcomes  , especially in children and young adults .
Globally about 11 million  लोगों तलाश चिकित्सा उपचार  and 300,000 people die from burns .
In the United States ,  of those admitted to a बर्न बीच , लगभग 4  % die from their injuries .
The long term outcome is  primarily सम्बन्धित to the आकार of बर्न  and the age of the person effected .
The Atlantic Ocean , not  सहित आर्कटिक और  Antarctic regions
This video was taken by the crew of  expedition 29 on फलक the  ISS .
The pass starts from just north-east of the  द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड over the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर to सेंट्रल  Africa , over South Sudan .
The Atlantic  समंदर is the second-largest of the संसार 's oceanic  divisions .
With a total area of about , it covers  लगभग 20 प्रतिशत of the धरती 's सतह और परिचय 29 प्रतिशत of इसके जल  surface area .
The first part of its  नाम refers to एटलस of यूनानी mythology  , making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas '' .
The oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is in The Histories of Herodotus around 450 BC ( Hdt .  1.202.4 ) : अटलांटिस थलैसा ( यूनानी  : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ) .
The term Ethiopic Ocean , derived from Ethiopia , was  लागू to the दक्षिणी अटलांटिक as लेट as the mid-19th सदी  .
Before Europeans discovered other oceans , the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters beyond the  जलसन्धि of जिब्राल्टर कि we अभी जान as the  Atlantic .
The early Greeks believed this  समंदर to be a gigantic नदी encircling the  world .
The Atlantic Ocean  occupies an elongated , s-shaped जलाशय extending longitudinally between  Eurasia and Africa to the east , and the Americas to the west .
As one component of the interconnected global ocean , it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes  माना a समुद्र of the अटलांटिक ) , to the प्रशांत समंदर in the दक्षिणपश्चिम , the  Indian Ocean in the southeast , and the Southern Ocean in the south .
( Other  परिभाषाएं describe the अटलांटिक as extending  southward to Antarctica . )
The equator subdivides it into  the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर और दक्षिण  Atlantic Ocean .
Due to their long-term persistence , and the need for a unique identifier in issuing forecasts and  चेतावनियाँ , तीव्र cyclones और उपोष्ण cyclones हैं दिए names according to नीति ( देखिए तीव्र चक्रवात  naming ) .
The following are lists from which  ये तीव्र और उपोष्ण चक्रवात names हैं  derived .
श्वेत लाइट is dispersed by a प्रिज़्म into  the colors of the optical spectrum .
The visible spectrum is  the portion of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  spectrum that is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye .
इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण in इस दायरा of wavelengths  is called visible light or simply light .
A typical human eye will  respond to wavelengths इससे परिचय 390 to 700  nm .
In  शर्तें of आवृत्ति ,  this corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz .
A light-adapted  नजर generally रै इसके अधिकतम संवेदनशीलता at around 555 nm ( 540 thz ) , in  the green region of the optical spectrum ( see : luminosity function ) .
The  वर्णक्रम करता नहीं , however , contain  all the colors that the human eyes and brain can distinguish .
Unsaturated colors such as  गुलाबी , or जामुनी विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as magenta , हैं अनुपस्थित , लिये उदाहरण , क्युकी वे can  be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths .
रंगों containing तभी एक  wavelength are also called pure colors .
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window `` , the region of the electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम जिससे allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through  the Earth 's atmosphere .
An  उदाहरण of इस घटना is कि साफ एयर scatters  blue light more than red wavelengths , and so the midday sky appears blue .
The optical window is also called the visible window because  it overlaps the इंसान दृश्य जवाब वर्णक्रम  .
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of  the इंसान दृष्टि , as खूब as the मीडियम wavelength ir ( mwir ) खिड़की  and the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them .
Many species can see light with  बारंबारता बाहर the `` दृश्य वर्णक्रम , '' जिससे  is defined in terms of human vision .
Bees and many other insects can  detect पराबैंगनी लाइट , जिससे helps  them find nectar in flowers .
संयंत्र प्रजाति कि निर्भर on कीट परागण may owe reproductive कामयाबी to उनके  appearance in ultraviolet light , rather than how colorful they appear to humans .
पक्षियों , too , can देखिए into the पराबैंगनी ( 300–400  nm ) , and some have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range .
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet range ,  however , can नहीं देखिए रेड लाइट or कोई अन्य reddish  wavelengths .
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at about  590nm , बस पहले the नारंगी wavelengths  start .
Birds ,  however , can देखिए कुछ रेड wavelengths ,  but not as many as humans .
zebras ( or ) हैं अनेक प्रजाति of अफ़्रीकी  equids ( horse family ) united by their distinctive black and white stripes .
Their  धारियाँ आइये in अलग पैटर्न ,  unique to each individual .
They are generally social  पशु कि सजीव in छोटी harems to  large herds .
Unlike their closest  रिश्तेदारों , घोड़े और asses , zebras have never  been truly domesticated .
There  हैं तीन प्रजाति of zebras : the मैदान  zebra , the Grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra .
The plains zebra and the mountain zebra  belong to the subgenus hippotigris , लकिन grévy 's जेब्रा  is the sole species of subgenus Dolichohippus .
The latter resembles an ass , to which  it is closely सम्बन्धित , जबकि the पूर्व दो  are more horse-like .
All three belong  to the genus equus , साथ साथ  other living equids .
The unique stripes of zebras make them one  of the पशु सबसे परिचित  to people .
They occur  in a किस्में of habitats , ऐसे as grasslands , savannas , वुडलैंड्स  , thorny scrublands , mountains , and coastal hills .
However , various anthropogenic factors  have था a कठोर प्रभाव on जेब्रा populations  , in particular hunting for skins and habitat destruction .
Grévy 's zebra and  the पहाड़ जेब्रा हैं endangered  .
While plains zebras are much more plentiful , one subspecies , the quagga , became extinct in the late 19th century – though there is currently a plan , called the Quagga Project , that aims to  नस्ल zebras कि हैं phenotypically समान to the quagga in a प्रक्रम  called breeding back .
Barry White ,  born बैरी यूजीन कार्टर ( – ) , थी an अमरीकी  composer and singer-songwriter .
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass voice and romantic image , White 's greatest success came in the 1970s as a solo singer and with the Love Unlimited Orchestra , crafting  अनेक enduring आत्मा , दुर्गंध , और डिस्को गीतों ऐसे as उसके दो biggest हिट्स , `` तुम 're the पहला , the पिछला , my सबकुछ `` और `` ca n't मिलेंगी पर्याप्त of अपना प्रेम  , Babe . ''
Along with Isaac Hayes ,  श्वेत is माना by allmusic.com  as a pioneer of disco music in the early 1970s .
During the course of his career in the music business , White  हासिल 106 सुनहरा एल्बम विश्वव्यापी , 41 of जिससे भी attained  platinum status .
श्वेत था 20 सुनहरा और 10 प्लेटिनम singles , साथ विश्वव्यापी बिक्री  in excess of 100 million , according to critics Ed Hogan and Wade Kergan .
His influences included Rev . James Cleveland ,  रे चार्ल्स , एरीथा फ्रैंकलिन प्लस motown कलाकारों the supremes , the चार  Tops and Marvin Gaye .
Angelina Jolie ( , born Angelina Jolie Voight ; June 4 ,  1975 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , फिल्मी  director , and screenwriter .
She has received an Academy Award , two Screen  अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार , और तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार , और थी नामित  Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011 .
Jolie  promotes humanitarian कल्याणकारी , और is विख्यात लिये उसके कार्य साथ शरणार्थियों as  a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ) .
She has often been cited as the world 's `` most beautiful  '' स्त्री , a शीर्षक लिये जिससे वो रै प्राप्त substantial  media attention .
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her father Jon  वोइट in lookin ' to मिलेंगी आउट ( 1982 ) , लकिन उसके फिल्मी करियर began in सच्चाई a दशक बाद साथ the  low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ) .
Her first leading role in a major  फिल्मी थी in the cyber-thriller  Hackers ( 1995 ) .
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films George Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ) , and won an  अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the नाटक लड़की , बाधित  ( 1999 ) .
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video  खेल नायिका लारा क्रॉफ्ट in लारा क्रॉफ्ट : मकबरा रेडर ( 2001 ) , और स्थापित  herself among the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ) .
She continued her action star career with Mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005  ) और चाही ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated वाणिज्यिक सफलताओं  to date—and received further critical acclaim for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ) , which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress .
Jolie made her directorial debut with  the wartime नाटक in the जमीन of रक्त और मधु ( 2011  ) .
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller  और बिली bob थॉर्नटन , जोली अभी जीवनदान साथ कर्ता ब्रैड pitt , in a संबंध notable लिये fervent मीडिया ध्यान  .
Jolie and Pitt  have तीन biological children  and three adopted children .
A  प्राकृतिक मेहराब उत्पादित by the अपरदन  of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz , Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock are removed from the Earth 's surface  by exogenetic प्रक्रियाओं  such as wind or water flow , and then transported and deposited in other locations .
While erosion is a natural  प्रक्रम , इंसान क्रियाएँ have increased by 10-40 टाइम्स the रेट at जिससे  erosion is occurring globally .
Excessive erosion causes problems  ऐसे as मरुस्थलीकरण , decreases in agricultural उत्पादकता due to जमीन degradation , sedimentation  of waterways , and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers .
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes of land  degradation ; संयुक्त , वे हैं जिम्मेदार लिये 84 % of degraded acreage , बनाना  excessive erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems .
Industrial agriculture , deforestation , roads ,  anthropogenic जलवायु बदलें और शहरी sprawl हैं amongst the सबसे significant इंसान क्रियाएँ in लिहाज़ to उनके  effect on stimulating erosion .
However , there are many available alternative land use practices that can curtail or limit erosion , such as terrace -building  , no-till कृषि , और revegetation  of denuded soils .
Jersey Shore is an American reality  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी जिससे भागा on एमटीवी  from December 3 , 2009 to December 20 , 2012 in the United States .
The series follows the lives of eight housemates spending  उनके गर्मियाँ at the जर्सी shore in the u.S. राज्य of नई  Jersey .
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold northeast winter to  मियामी बीच , साथ ऋतु 3 returning to the जर्सी shore  .
The fourth season , filmed in  इटली , premiered on अगस्त 4  , 2011 .
The show returned for a fifth  ऋतु , at seaside हाइट्स  on January 5 , 2012 .
The  पांचवां ऋतु finale aired  on March 15 , 2012 .
On March 19 , 2012 ,  एमटीवी पुष्टि कि the श्रेणी होता वापसी  for their sixth season .
On August 30 , 2012 , MTV  घोषित कि the श्रेणी होगा समाप्त बाद the छठे ऋतु , जिससे  premiered on October 4 .
The series  finale aired on दिसम्बर  20 , 2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette , '' portrayals of  italian-american stereotypes , और scrutiny इससे स्थानीय क्युकी the डाल सदस्यों यहूद नहीं निवासियों of  the area .
The series  garnered रिकार्ड दरजा लिये एमटीवी , बनाना it the संजाल 's  most viewed series telecast ever .
The series ' cast have  भी महरूम credited साथ introducing अद्वितीय lexicon  and phrases into American popular culture .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों of शिकागो और the विश्वविद्यालयों of ओक्लाहोमा हैं among the शैक्षणिक  institutions that have had classes or conferences about the show .
In 2010 , the cast of Jersey Shore was named on Barbara Walters  ' 10 सबसे fascinating लोगों सूची , और the श्रेणी रै चूंकि महरूम exported  to dozens of countries worldwide .
There are several remakes of the show in other countries , with two  नियत in the संयुक्त किंगडम ; the खूब ज्ञात geordie  Shore , set in Newcastle upon Tyne , England .
The other is  the घाटियों , the वेल्श  equivalent , which is filmed and set in Cardiff .
The only other official  रीमेक of the दिखाएँ is gandía shore ,  set in Gandía , Spain .
सही
United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the federal  सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित सब waters ( around आइलैंड्स or महाद्वीपीय  tracts ) and all U.S . Naval vessels .
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign  अधिकारों लिये exploring , exploiting , conserving , और  managing its territory .
This extent of  territory is सब the क्षेत्रफल belonging to , और अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन of , the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी ( जिससे शामिल tracts lying  at a distance from the country ) for administrative and other purposes .
The  संयुक्त राज्य कुल territory  includes a subset of political divisions .
The U.S. government is a  सरकारी साथ प्रतिनिधित्व शक्तियां अंतर्गत the संयुक्त  States Constitution .
`` The powers not delegated to the United States by the  संविधान , nor निषिद्ध by it to the राज्य , हैं सुरक्षित to the राज्य क्रमशः  , or to the people '' by the Tenth Amendment .
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a 2003 science fiction action film  निर्देशित by जोनाथन mostow और अभिनीत अर्नाल्ड श्वार्ज़नेगर , उपनाम stahl , क्लेयर  Danes and Kristanna Loken .
It is the second sequel  to the टर्मिनेटर (  1984 ) .
After Skynet fails  to मार सारा connor पहले उसके बेटे is born और to मार जॉन खुद as a चाइल्ड , it भेजना वापस another  Terminator , the T-X , in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible .
This  शामिल जॉन 's भविष्य बीवी , लकिन नहीं जॉन खुद as उसके  whereabouts are unknown to Skynet .
John 's life is placed  in खतरे जब the t-x accidentally पाता  him .
A  cord of  wood
The cord is a unit of  माप of शुष्क आवाज़ प्रयुक्त in कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य  to measure firewood and pulpwood .
A cord is the amount of wood  कि , जब `` क्रमित और खूब stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े हैं लकीर  , parallel , touching and compact ) , occupies a volume of .
This corresponds  to a खूब stacked woodpile ऊँची , long , और गहन ; or  any other arrangement of linear measurements that yields the same volume .
The name cord  संभवतः आता इससे the उपयोग of a cord  or string to measure it .
The , is an 8-bit  हैंडहेल्ड वीडियो खेल यंत्र विकसित और  manufactured by Nintendo .
It was  released in जापानी on , in उत्तर अमेरिका in  , and in Europe on .
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy  लकीर , और थी निर्मित by gunpei yokoi और निन्टेंडो शोध & विकास 1 —the वही स्टाफ जो था designed  the Game & Watch series as well as several popular games for the Nintendo Entertainment System .
Redesigned versions were released in 1996 and 1998 , in the  रूप of खेल लड़के जेब , और खेल लड़के लाइट ( जापानी तभी ) ,  respectively .
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the Game & Watch series introduced in  , और it संयुक्त सुविधाएँ इससे दोनो the निन्टेंडो entertainment प्रणाली और खेल  & Watch .
It was originally  bundled साथ the  puzzle game Tetris .
As part of the fourth  पीढी of गेमिंग , the खेल लड़के competed साथ the sega खेल गियर , atari लिंक्स , और the turboexpress  .
despite ये अन्य technologically श्रेष्ठ हैंडहेल्ड consoles  , the Game Boy was a tremendous success .
The Game  लड़के और इसके successor , the खेल लड़के रंग  , have both combined sold 118.69 million units worldwide .
Upon its release in the United States  , it बेची इसके संपूर्ण शिपमेंट  of one million units within weeks .
The World Trade Center is a complex of  इमारतें अंतर्गत निर्माण in निम्नतर मैनहटन , नई यॉर्क नगर , संयुक्त राज्य , replacing an पहले  complex of seven buildings with the same name on the same site .
The original  संसार व्यापार बीच प्रदर्शित लैंडमार्क जुड़वा मीनारें , जिससे खोली on अप्रैल 4 , 1973 और यहूद  destroyed in the September 11 attacks of 2001 , along with 7 World Trade Center .
the अन्य इमारतें in the जटिल यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त in the हमले  , and their ruins were eventually demolished .
The site is being rebuilt with five new  skyscrapers और a मेमोरियल to those मारे in the  attacks .
, only one skyscraper has been completed ; the  अन्य चार हैं अपेक्षित to be समाप्त  before 2020 .
One World  व्यापार बीच होगा be the सीसे भवन लिये the नई जटिल , reaching अधिक  than 100 stories at its completion .
It became the tallest building in New York  नगर on अप्रैल 30 , 2012 , और is अपेक्षित to be समाप्त by 2013  .
A sixth  मीनार is प्रतीक्षारत पुष्टि  .
At the time of their completion , the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2  संसार व्यापार बीच ( the दक्षिण मीनार ) , ज्ञात collectively as the `` जुड़वा मीनारें '' , यहूद the tallest  buildings in the world .
The other  इमारतें शामिल 3 wtc ( the मैरियट  World Trade Center ) , 4 WTC , 5 WTC , 6 WTC , and 7 WTC .
सब of ये इमारतें यहूद निर्मित  between 1975 and 1985 .
The cost for  the निर्माण थी  $ 400 million ( $ in dollars ) .
The complex was located in the  दिल of नई यॉर्क नगर 's शहर वित्तीय ज़िला  and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space .
The World Trade Center experienced a fire on , 1975 , a  bombing on , 1993 और a डकैती  on , 1998 .
In 1998 , the Port Authority decided to  privatize the संसार व्यापार बीच , पट्टे the इमारतें to  a private company to manage , and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in .
On the morning  of सितंबर 11 , 2001 , al-qaeda -संबद्धd hijackers उड़ाया दो बोइंग 767  jets into the complex , one into each tower , in a coordinated terrorist attack .
After burning for 56 minutes , the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed , followed a  half-hour बाद by the उत्तर मीनार ( 1 ) , साथ the हमले on the संसार व्यापार  Center resulting in 2,753 deaths .
