Falling debris from the towers , combined with fires that the debris  initiated in अनेक surrounding इमारतें , led to the आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब the अन्य इमारतें in the जटिल और caused अनर्थकारी  damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area .
The  प्रक्रम of क्लीनअप और रिकवरी at  the World Trade Center site took eight months .
Over the following years , plans for a  rebuilt संसार व्यापार बीच took  form .
The  पहला नई भवन at the साईट थी 7 संसार  Trade Center , which opened in .
The Lower Manhattan Development  निगम ( lmdc ) , स्थापित in to oversee the पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम , व्यवस्थित  competitions to select a site plan and memorial design .
Memory Foundations ,  designed by डेनियल libeskind ,  was selected as the master plan , but this went through substantial changes in design .
The new  संसार व्यापार बीच जटिल होगा शामिल एक संसार व्यापार बीच  , three other high-rise office towers , and the National September 11 Memorial & Museum .
San  जिबरील kyu
San Bernardino  kyu , साथ mt . सैन gorgonio in the अग्रभूमि और बिग  Bear Lake in the background .
The Transverse Ranges are a group  of पहाड़ सीमाएँ of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , in the प्रशांत coast सीमाएँ physiographic  region in North America .
The Transverse  सीमाएँ शुरू at the दक्षिणी समाप्त of  the California Coast Ranges and lie between Santa Barbara and San Diego counties .
They derive the name Transverse Ranges due to their East-West orientation , making them transverse to the general  north-south अभिविन्यास of सबसे of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's तटीय kyu  .
Periodic table with  इलेक्ट्रॉन शेल
An electron  शेल may be विचार of as an कक्षा  followed by electrons around an atom 's nucleus .
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` K shell '' ) , followed by the `` 2 shell '' (  or `` l शेल '' ) , तब the `` 3 शेल '' ( or `` m शेल '' ) , और so on दूर और दूर इससे  the nucleus .
The shell letters K , L , M , ... , used  in the x-ray संकेतन , हैं वर्णमाला  .
Each shell can contain only a fixed number of electrons : The 1st shell can hold  up to दो electrons , the 2nd शेल can थाम up to आठ electrons , the 3rd शेल can थाम up to 18 , और 4th शेल can थाम up to 32  and so on .
चूंकि electrons हैं electrically आकर्षित  to the nucleus , an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shells only if the more inner shells have already been completely filled by other electrons .
However , this is not a strict requirement :  अणु may have दो or भी तीन अधूरी बाहरी शेल .
(  देखिए madelung नियम लिये  more details . )
लिये an स्पष्टीकरण of क्यों electrons मौजूद in ये शेल  see electron configuration .
The electrons in the outermost  occupied शेल ( or शेल ) determine the रासायनिक गुण of the अणु  ; it is called the valence shell .
Each shell consists of  एक or अधिक subshells , और प्रत्येक subshell  consists of one or more atomic orbitals .
Vickie Lynn Marshall  ( née होगन ; नवम्बर 28 , 1967 – फ़रवरी 8 , 2007  ) , known by her moniker Anna Nicole Smith , was an American model , actress , and television personality .
Smith first gained  लोकप्रियता in प्लेबॉय , बनने the 1993  Playmate of the Year .
She modeled for clothing  कंपनियाँ , सहित अंदाज़ा  jeans and Lane Bryant .
Smith dropped out  of ऊँची स्कूल और थी शादीशुदा  in 1985 .
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business mogul , J.  हावर्ड मार्शल , 62 सालो उसके वरिष्ठ , resulted in अटकलें कि वो शादीशुदा  the octogenarian for his money , which she denied .
Following Marshall 's death ,  स्मिथ began a lengthy विधिक बैटल over a share of उसके  estate .
Her case , Marshall v. Marshall , reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a question of federal  क्षेत्राधिकार , और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन अदालत प्राधिकार ( अभी पुकारा stern  v. Marshall ) .
Smith died on February 8 , 2007 in a Hollywood , Florida hotel  रूम as a परिणाम of an overdose of नुस्खा  drugs .
Within the final six months of her life ,  स्मिथ थी the फ़ोकस of a नवीनीकृत दबायें कवरेज surrounding the मौत of उसके बेटे , डेनियल , और the paternity और कस्टडी  battle over her newborn daughter , Dannielynn .
The is one  denomination of जापानी  yen .
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters  ज्ञात as the `` नई स्क्रिप्ट `` , और यहूद भी minted इससे 1949-1958 using `` old-script  '' Japanese characters .
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when , due to the much  उच्चतर मान of the येन , वे यहूद minted  in gold ) .
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing  आउट of the जल , साथ `` पाँच येन '' लिखा in कांजी ; the वापस is stamped साथ `` जापानी '' और the साल of समस्या  , also in kanji , separated by sprouts of a tree .
The three graphic elements of the coin represent  कृषि और fisheries , the कुंजी तत्व of the  Japanese first-sector economy .
Around a hole ,  वहीँ is a गियर कि represents  industry .
It is the only Japanese coin in  परिसंचरण to कमी अरबी  numerals on either face .
TLC is an American  लड़की समूह जिनकी रंगमंडल spanned r & b , हिप हॉप  , soul , funk , and new jack swing .
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins , rapper Lisa `` Left Eye ''  lopes और सिंगर rozonda `` chilli '' थामस , the समूह मिला unprecedented कामयाबी in the  1990s while also enduring a series of spats with the law , each other , and the group 's record label .
Initially ,  tlc हासिल वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी following the  release of their debut album Ooooooohhh ...
on the tlc टिप , जिससे  sold 6 million copies worldwide .
however , it थी उनके दूसरी एल्बम ,  CrazySexyCool , that catapulted the group to superstar status .
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female  समूह , और आखिरकार बेची 23 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी  .
Five years later , the group released their  तीसरा एल्बम fanmail , जिससे became the समूह 's पहला एल्बम to डेब्यू at क्रमांक एक और  sold more than 11 million copies worldwide .
The  subsequent दौरे following fanmails रिलीज became the उच्चतम grossing दौरे of  all time by a female band .
In  2002 , लिसा `` बाएँ नजर '' lopes died  in a car accident in Honduras .
Seven months later , T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's fourth  एल्बम 3d , जिससे बेची 2 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी , it प्रदर्शित unreleased  vocals from Left Eye .
Billboard magazine  क्रमित tlc as एक of the  greatest musical trios .
Between 1992 and 2003 , the band accumulated ten top ten singles , four  क्रमांक एक singles , चार multi-platinum एल्बम , और चार ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  .
At the end of 1999 , TLC was ranked  as the सातवाँ सबसे कामयाब अधिनियम of the  1990s by Billboard .
In 2008 , the  समूह थी inducted into the सब समय hot 100 कलाकार हॉल of कीर्ति by  the same magazine , at 56th place .
That  साल it थी भी सूचीबद्ध as the # 25 r & b/hip-hop  artist of the preceding 25 years .
TLC has sold more than 65 million records  विश्वव्यापी और वे हैं क्रमित as the दूसरी बेहतरीन selling मादा समूह of सब  time , and the best selling female R & B group of all time .
In 2012 , TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's 100  महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक , होने क्रमित the क्रमांक एक सब लड़की समूह  on that list .
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure film produced  by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी विशेषता एनिमेशन और वितरित  by Walt Disney Pictures .
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics , it is based on the story Tarzan of the Apes by  एडगर राइस बरोज , और is the तभी प्रमुख गति चित्र संस्करण of the स्टोरी टार्ज़न प्रॉपर्टी to be एनिमेटेड  .
Directed by Chris Buck  और केविन लीमा साथ a पटकथा by tab मर्फी , bob tzudiker , और नोनी श्वेत , टार्ज़न सुविधाएँ the आवाज़ें of टोनी goldwyn  , Minnie Driver , Glenn Close , and Rosie O'Donnell with Brian Blessed , Lance Henriksen , Wayne Knight , and Nigel Hawthorne .
It was the last bona fide hit before the Disney slump of the early 2000s grossing $  171,091,819 domestically और $ 448,191,819 विश्वव्यापी , outgrossing इसके पूर्ववर्तियों  Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ) .
At the time of its release , its  उत्पादन बजट of $ 130 लाख बना it the सबसे महंगी एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी बना , जबतक  topped by Disney 's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002 .
It  थी भी the पहला डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता  to open at # 1 since Pocahontas .
This was the last major box  दफ्तर कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी  Renaissance .
Oil Platform P-51 off the Brazilian coast is a  semi-submersible मंच  .
आयल मंच mittelplate  in the North sea
An  आयल मंच , ( offshore मंच or colloquially आयल रिग ) is a विशाल ढांचा साथ सुविधाएं to ड्रिल  wells , to extract and process oil and natural gas , and to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing .
In many cases , the  मंच contains सुविधाएं  to house the workforce as well .
Depending on the  हालातों , the मंच may be फिक्स्ड to the समंदर मंजिल , may  consist of an artificial island , or may float .
Remote  subsea कुएं may भी be कनेक्ट  to a platform by flow lines and by umbilical connections .
These subsea solutions may consist of one or more subsea  कुएं , or of एक or अधिक manifold केंद्रों लिये  multiple wells .
Slaughter is  the हत्या of पशु  , usually that of domestic livestock for food .
The animals most commonly slaughtered for food are cattle , water  भैंस ( लिये बीफ और वील ) , शीप , बकरियों ( लिये मेमने और मटन ) , सूअर ( लिये पोर्क ) , घोड़े  ( for horse meat ) , and fowl , largely chickens , turkeys , and ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ) .
The White House , the president 's  आधिकारिक निवास और बीच of the प्रशासन
Under the United States Constitution ,  the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य is the सिर of राज्य और सिर  of government of the United States .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a  पूरे , the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence  and recognition .
The president is also the  commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां  .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives should the Electoral  कॉलेज असफल to पुरस्कार an निरपेक्ष बहुमत of मत to कोई व्यक्ति  ) .
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951 , no person may  be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice , और no एक जो रै परोसा अधिक than दो सालो of a पद to जिससे किसी  else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death ,  इस्तीफा , or हटाना इससे दफ्तर  of an incumbent President , the Vice President assumes the office .
The President  जरूर be at तनिक 35 सालो of आयु और a  `` natural born '' citizen of the United States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn  into दफ्तर as अध्यक्ष following the अनुसमर्थन of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , जिससे  took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For American leaders before this  अनुसमर्थन , देखिए अध्यक्ष of the महाद्वीपीय  Congress .
The list does not  शामिल कोई एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth amendment  to the United States Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as Grover  क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें और is गिने क्रमबद्धता as दोनो the  22nd and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in  दफ्तर of प्राकृतिक कल्याणकारी ( विलियम हेनरी हैरिसन , zachary टेलर , वारेन G. हार्डिंग , और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट ) , चार यहूद assassinated ( अब्राहम lincoln , जेम्स  A. Garfield , William McKinley , and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first president , was  उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the चुनावी कॉलेज  .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841 ,  और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over बारह  years , but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two terms , and a constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after Harry Truman  , थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of टाइम्स an व्यक्तिगत can be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष  .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president , was  the पहला to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब वर्ग in 1828 बाद सबसे कानून  barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was the first  निर्वाचित बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920  .
इतिहास रिकॉर्ड चार राष्ट्रपतियों – जॉन q एडम्स , रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़ , बेंजामिन  Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office .
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith , and the current  अध्यक्ष , बराक ओबामा , is the पहला अध्यक्ष of अफ़्रीकी descent  .
Several firearms with detachable suppressors , from top  to नीचे : an uzi , an ar-15 , a heckler & koch खासियत रणनीतिक , a beretta  92FS , and a SIG Mosquito .
Bolt  कार्रवाई rimfire राइफल साथ suppressor
AWM-F  स्निपर राइफल साथ संलग्न  suppressor .
A suppressor , sound suppressor , or sound moderator , is a device attached to or part of the barrel of a firearm which reduces the amount of noise , and  प्रायः the राशि of muzzle फ्लैश , उत्पन्न by फायरिंग the हथियार  .
A suppressor can be used both  साथ a firearm और साथ संपीडित  air gun .
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer , this term is a misnomer popularized by  cinematic fiction : the ध्वनि of a प्रक्षेप्य , विशेषकर एक चलती तेज़ than  the speed of sound , through the air can not be eliminated .
Using a suppressor in long  अलहदा शूटिंग ( i.e . वृहद than 300 मीटर ) can lessen , or retard , the रपट at the पल of प्रभाव , और बनाएँ  the impression of silence near the target .
The noise heard near the muzzle as a projectile leaves the barrel ,  हालांकि subdued , is नहीं मूक  at all .
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal  mechanisms to reduce the ध्वनि of फायरिंग by slowing the escaping propellant गैस और sometimes  by reducing the velocity of the bullet .
Early suppressors were created around the beginning of the  20th सदी by अनेक आविष्कारक  .
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not  to be उलझन साथ hiram स्टीवंस कहावत , hiram पर्सी 's पिता , और the आविष्कारक of the कहावत यंत्र गन ) , is credited साथ inventing  and selling the first commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ) .
Maxim gave  उसके यंत्र the trademarked  name Maxim Silencer .
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm  suppressor by कहावत in the जल्दी 20th सदी , using अनेक of the वही तकनीकों to provide quieter-running इंजन ( in अनेक यूरोपीय देशों ऑटोमोबाइल  mufflers are still called silencers ) .
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread use , although it has since fallen out of favor with some , especially  among the firearms उद्योग , होने replaced साथ the अधिक वस्तुतः सटीक पद ध्वनि suppressor or बस suppressor , क्युकी a `` ध्वनि suppressor '' करता नहीं `` खामोशी  '' any weapon , rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging .
Common usage and U.S.  विधान भाषा एहसान the  historically earlier term , silencer .
In U.S. law , the terms `` firearm  मफलर '' और `` firearm silencer '' हैं synonymous  .
Suppressors were regularly used by  एजेंटों of the संयुक्त राज्य दफ्तर of रणनीतिक सेवाएं , जो favored the newly designed  High Standard HDM .22 Long Rifle pistol during World War II .
OSS Director William  जोसेफ `` जंगली विधेयक '' डोनोवन demonstrated the पिस्टल लिये अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt at the White House .
According to OSS  शोध मुख्य स्टेनली लोवेल , डोनोवन ( an बूढ़ा और विश्वसनीय dost  of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office , where Roosevelt was dictating a letter .
While Roosevelt finished his  संदेश , डोनोवन turned उसके वापस और fired टेन गोलियाँ into a sandbag he था brought साथ उसे  , announced what he had done and handed the smoking gun to the astonished president .
The British SOE (  खास परिचालन कार्यपालिका ) welrod हत्या पिस्टल साथ an अभिन्न  suppressor was also used by the American OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War .
Beatrice `` Bea '' Arthur ( May 13 , 1922 – April 25 , 2009 ) was an  अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , comedienne , और सिंगर जिनकी करियर spanned सात दशकों  .
Arthur achieved fame  as the अक्षर maude findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the परिवार और maude  , and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls , winning Emmy Awards for both roles .
A  स्टेज अभिनेत्री दोनो पहले और बाद उसके टेलीविज़न कामयाबी , वो जीती the टोनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Featured Actress in a Musical for her performance as Vera Charles in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ) .
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the Tekken  वीडियो खेल श्रेणी , उत्पादित by डिजिटल frontier और वितरित by asmik इक्का entertainment in संघ साथ  Bandai Entertainment .
The film premiered in North America by Bandai Entertainment on  जुलाई 26 , 2011 , और in ऑस्ट्रेलिया on जुलाई  27 , 2011 in a special exclusive one-off screening .
It  थी released  on September 3 , 2011 in Japan .
The film was released on Blu-ray Disc on  नवम्बर 22 , 2011 लिये यूएसए , और दिसम्बर 1 , 2011  for Japan .
This  फिल्मी थी भी released on dvd on नवम्बर  22 , 2011 ( 2D Version only ) .
The film was additionally included with the PlayStation  3 खेल , tekken संकर , और the निन्टेंडो  3DS title , Tekken 3D : Prime Edition .
For a discussion of nonprofit ,  voluntary पड़ोस वकालत समूह , देखिए पड़ोस  association .
In the United States , a homeowner association is a corporation formed by a real estate  डेवलपर लिये the purpose of विपणन , मैनेजिंग ,  and selling of homes and lots in a residential subdivision .
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in governing the association , while allowing the developer to exit  वित्तीय और विधिक जिम्मेदारी of the संगठन , typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the संघ to the homeowners  after selling off a predetermined number of lots .
Membership in the homeowners association by a residential buyer  is typically a कंडीशन of खरीदें ; a खरीदार is n't दिए an विकल्प to अस्वीकृत  it .
Most homeowner  एसोसिएशन हैं incorporated  , and are subject to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations .
State oversight of homeowner associations is  minimal , और मुख्यतः takes the रूप of  laws which are inconsistent from state to state .
Some states , such as Florida and California , have a large body of homeowner association law  , और कुछ राज्य , ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स , have वस्तुतः  no homeowner association law .
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is common-interest developments ( CIDs ) , a  श्रेणी कि शामिल planned-unit developments of single-family घरों , condominiums , और सहकारी अपार्टमेंट  .
चूंकि 1964 , homeowner एसोसिएशन have become increasingly  common in the USA .
The Community  एसोसिएशन संस्थान व्यापार संघ अनुमानित कि hoas governed 24.8 लाख  American homes and 62 million residents in 2010 .
A prize-winning  lilac-and-white  Silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea pig  जिससे have महरूम विकसित चूंकि इसके domestication ca . 5000  BC .
Breeds vary widely in appearance and purpose , ranging from show breeds with  long , बहती बाल to those in उपयोग as मॉडल जीवों by  science .
From ca . 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532 , selective breeding by indigenous South American  peoples resulted in अनेक किस्में of घरेलू गिनी सूअर , जिससे रूप the आधार लिये कुछ of the आधुनिक घरेलू  breeds .
Early  andean breeds यहूद primarily रखा as agricultural भण्डार  for food , and efforts at improving the Guinea pig as a food source continue to the modern era .
With the export of  गिनी सूअर to यूरोपीय in the 15th सदी , the लक्ष्य in प्रजनन shifted  to focus on the development of appealing pets .
To this end , various  प्रतिस्पर्धी प्रजनन संगठन यहूद संस्थापित  by fanciers .
The American Cavy Breeders Association ,  an adjunct to the अमरीकी खरगोश प्रजनक संघ  , is the governing body in the United States and Canada .
The British  cavy परिषद governs cavy क्लब in the संयुक्त  Kingdom .
Similar organizations  मौजूद in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( ऑस्ट्रेलियाई नेशनल cavy परिषद ) और नई जीलैंड  ( New Zealand Cavy Club ) .
Each club publishes its own Standard of Perfection and determines which breeds  हैं योग्य लिये प्रर्दशित  .
New breeds continue to  emerge in the 21st सदी .
Though there are many breeds of Guinea pig ,  तभी a few breeds हैं commonly मिला on the  show table as pets .
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either found undesirable by breeders or were bred  to be सुखद पालतु regardless of कैसा खूब वे मिलें the नस्ल मानक of पूर्णता  .
The short  बाल , abyssinian , peruvian और sheltie ( उर्फ silkie ) breeds हैं those सबसे अक्सर  seen as pets , and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs .
In addition to their standard form ,  nearly सब breeds आइये in a साटन  variant .
Satins , due to their hollow hair  shafts , possess coats of a खास gloss  and shine .
However , there is  growing प्रमाण कि the जीनों जिम्मेदार लिये the साटन कोट भी can कारण  severe bone problems , including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease .
Showing Satin variations is prohibited  by कुछ cavy प्रजनक ' एसोसिएशन  because of animal welfare reasons .
All cavy breeds have some shared general  मानकों : the सिर प्रोफ़ाइल चाहिए be rounded , साथ विशाल आँखें और  large , smooth ears .
The body  चाहिए be दमदार  and of compact build .
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly  पारिभाषित और thorough  from root to tip .
These standards are best met by long  स्थापित , commonly करवाया breeds , as उनके प्रजनक  have had enough time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities .
The coat colour ideal of good definition and thoroughness is rarely met by other than the smooth coated  breeds , जिससे have था खूब स्थापित , पृथक प्रजनन  lines for different colours .
State  स्कूलों ( भी ज्ञात as पब्लिक स्कूलों or सरकारी स्कूलों ) generally refer to प्राथमिक or द्वितीयक स्कूलों mandated  for or offered to all children without charge paid for , in whole or in part , by taxation .
The term may also refer to  संस्थानों of post-secondary शिक्षा वित्तपोषित , in पूरे or  in part , and overseen by government .
The ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules  जिनकी अनुक्रम is नियंत्रित by the अनुक्रम  of messenger RNA molecules .
This is  जरूरी by सब जीना कोशिकाएं  and associated viruses .
The ribosome ( from ribonucleic acid and the  यूनानी सोम , अर्थ `` देह '' ) is a विशाल और जटिल आणविक यंत्र , मिला भीतर सब जीना  cells , that serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ) .
Ribosomes  कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ in the अनुक्रम निर्दिष्ट  by messenger RNA ( mRNA ) molecules .
Ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small  ribosomal subunit पढ़े the mrna , जबकि the विशाल subunit joins अमीनो acids to रूप a polypeptide  chain .
Each subunit is  रचित of एक or अधिक ribosomal rna ( rrna  ) molecules and a variety of proteins .
The sequence of DNA encoding for a protein may be copied many  टाइम्स into मेसेंजर rna ( mrna ) जंजीरों of a समान  sequence .
Ribosomes can bind to  an mrna कड़ी और उपयोग it as a टेम्पलेट लिये determining the सही अनुक्रम  of amino acids in a particular protein .
Amino acids are selected , collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA  अणुओं ) , जिससे डालें एक भाग of the राइबोसोम और  bind to the messenger RNA chain .
The  संलग्न अमीनो acids हैं तब linked साथ  by another part of the ribosome .
Once the protein is  उत्पादित , it can तब 'fold ' to उपज a विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक  three-dimensional structure .
A ribosome is made from complexes of RNAs and proteins  और is इसलिए a ribonucleoprotein .
Each  राइबोसोम is विभाजित into दो subunits : the छोटी subunit बांधता to the mrna  pattern , while the larger subunit binds to the tRNA and the amino acids .
When  a राइबोसोम finishes पढना an mrna  molecule , these two subunits split apart .
Ribosomes are ribozymes , because the catalytic peptidyl  transferase कार्यकलाप कि कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ is performed by the ribosomal rna  .
Ribosomes from bacteria , archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains  of जीवन on धरती ) differ in उनके आकार , अनुक्रम , ढांचा , और the अनुपात  of protein to RNA .
The differences  in ढांचा allow कुछ एंटीबायोटिक to मार जीवाणु by inhibiting उनके  ribosomes , while leaving human ribosomes unaffected .
In bacteria and archaea , more than one ribosome may move along a  सिंगल mrna कड़ी at एक समय , प्रत्येक `` पढना '' इसके अनुक्रम और producing a सम्बन्धित  protein molecule .
The  ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic कोशिकाएं functionally resemble  many features of those in bacteria , reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria .
Albert  क्लॉड , ईसाई de duve , और जार्ज एमिल palade यहूद jointly  awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine , in 1974 , for the discovery of the ribosomes .
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 was awarded to  venkatraman रामकृष्णन , थामस A. steitz और एडीए E. yonath लिये determining  the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome .
The  सरलीकृत आतंरिक ढांचा  of a chloroplast
Overview  of the calvin साईकिल  and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of  photosynthesis हैं रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ कि बदलें कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और अन्य  compounds into glucose .
ये प्रतिक्रियाएँ occur in the stroma , the fluid-filled  area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes .
These reactions take the  light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और perform further  chemical processes on them .
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions ,  collectively पुकारा the calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation , कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ , और ribulose  1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name  , इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी जब  light is available .
Plants do not carry out  the calvin साईकिल  by night .
They , instead , release sucrose  into the फ्लोएम इससे उनके मंड reserves  .
This process happens when light is available independent of the  दयालु of photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation , c4 कार्बन fixation , और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक रात्रि  and release it by day in order to make this process work .
In mathematics , a  वर्गाकार क्रमांक or पूर्ण वर्गाकार is an पूर्णांक कि is the वर्गाकार of an  integer ; in other words , it is the product of some integer with itself .
For  उदाहरण , 9 is a वर्गाकार  number , since it can be written as .
The usual notation for the formula for the square of a number  is नहीं the उत्पाद , लकिन the समतुल्य घातांक  , usually pronounced as `` squared '' .
the नाम वर्गाकार  number comes from the name of the shape ; see below .
वर्गाकार संख्याएँ  are non-negative .
Another way of saying that a (  non-negative ) क्रमांक is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक , is कि इसके वर्गाकार  roots are again integers .
For example ,  = ±3 , so 9 is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक  .
A positive integer  कि रै no पूर्ण वर्गाकार divisors मगर  1 is called square-free .
For a  non-negative पूर्णांक , the th वर्गाकार क्रमांक  is , with being the zeroth square .
The concept of  वर्गाकार can be विस्तारित to कुछ  other number systems .
If rational numbers are included , then a square  is the अनुपात of दो वर्गाकार integers , और , conversely , the  ratio of two square integers is a square ( e.g. , 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ) .
Starting with 1 ,  वहीँ हैं वर्गाकार संख्याएँ up to और सहित  , where the expression represents the floor of the number .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political  इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कि reflected a भाव of नेशनल purpose और a ख्वाहिश लिये  unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars .
The era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party and an end to the bitter  दलगत विवादों between it और the प्रबल democratic-republican पार्टी दौरान the पहला पार्टी प्रणाली  .
President James  मुनरो endeavored to downplay दलगत संबद्ध in बनाना उसके nominations , साथ the परम लक्ष्य of नेशनल एकता और eliminating पार्टियों  altogether from national politics .
The period is so closely associated with Monroe 's presidency  ( 1817–1825 ) और उसके प्रशासनिक लक्ष्य कि उसके नाम और the era हैं वस्तुतः  synonymous .
The  era of शुभ जज्बात चिह्नित a परिवर्तन in अमरीकी राजनीती साथ the समाप्त of the federalist पार्टी as अमेरिका  began to develop after the War of 1812 .
While America was experiencing growth and prosperity after the war with Britain  , इस era भी marks the पहला उदाहरण of आर्थिक परेशानियों  in the growing United States .
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay , protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of the United States  जटिल the टेंशन between the उत्तर और दक्षिण साथ the coming of the पहला वित्तीय  crisis .
While the term “Era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with  विडंबना क्युकी of the राजनैतिक turmoil , आर्थिक कारकों caused animosity between  the North and South .
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism , as the history of the era was one in which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive ,  विशेषकर among गिरोहों भीतर the मुनरो प्रशासन और the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी .
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell ,  in the बोस्टन federalist समाचारपत्र , columbian centinel , on जुलाई 12 , 1817  , following Monroe 's visit to Boston , Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America .
Mariel  मार्गरेट `` मिया '' hamm ( born कूच 17 , 1972 ) is a रिटायर्ड  American professional soccer player .
Hamm played many  सालो as a आगे लिये the संयुक्त राज्य महिलाओं 's नेशनल सॉकर टोली और थी a founding सदस्य of  the Washington Freedom .
Hamm scored 158 international  लक्ष्य , अधिक than कोई अन्य खिलाड़ी , पुरूष or मादा , in the इतिहास of सॉकर और is the तीसरा सबसे capped  female player in soccer history behind Kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone , appearing in 275 international matches .
Hamm was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the first two times that award was  दिए ( in 2001 और 2002 ) , और is सूचीबद्ध as एक of फीफा  's 125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ) .
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall  of कीर्ति as खूब as the अलबामा खेल हॉल  of Fame and Texas Sports Hall of Fame .
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning in Soccer and Life and appeared in the HBO documentary Dare to Dream :  the स्टोरी of the u.S. महिलाओं 's सॉकर टोली .
वॉशिंगटन पोस्ट columnist माइकल wilbon पुकारा hamm  , `` Perhaps the most important athlete of the last 15 years . ''
Hamm  takes a कोने  kick .
The New York Red  bulls is an अमरीकी पेशेवर सॉकर टोली आधारित in हैरिसन  , New Jersey , representing the New York metropolitan area .
The team  competes in the पूर्वी सम्मेलन of प्रमुख  League Soccer ( MLS ) .
It is one of the ten charter clubs of MLS , having  competed in the लीग चूंकि इसके inception  .
The team was a founding member of MLS ( 1996  ) , लकिन रै गए through अनेक नाम परिवर्तन .
The team was  originally ज्ञात as the नई york/new जर्सी metrostars  through 1997 .
From the  1998 ऋतु through the 2005 ऋतु , the टोली थी  known as the MetroStars .
On March 9 , 2006 , the  टोली थी बेची to रेड सांड gmbh , अग्रणी to  the team 's current name .
They are the only original MLS franchise not to have won any  significant ट्रॉफी ( सहित नियमित ऋतु , playoffs , और नॉकआउट प्रतियोगिता ) चूंकि  inception .
The team 's best  परिणाम in the mls थी the mls कप फाइनल  in 2008 .
In the US Open Cup ,  the metrostars पहुँचे तीन semifinals ( 1997 , 1998 , 2000 ) , पहले reaching उनके पहला  final in 2003 , losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire .
On August 26 , 2000 , the  metros ' क्लिंट mathis नियत an mls रिकार्ड  by scoring five goals in a game against the Dallas Burn .
Some  well-known खिलाड़ी कि have निभाई लिये the टोली शामिल giovanni savarese , टिम हावर्ड , टोनी meola , tab ramos , alexi lalas , क्लिंट mathis ,  Jozy Altidore , Michael Bradley , Claudio Reyna , Eddie Pope , Roberto Donadoni , Lothar Matthäus , Adolfo Valencia , Youri Djorkaeff , Amado Guevara , Juan Pablo Ángel , Thierry Henry , Juninho Pernambucano , Jan Gunnar Solli , Rafael Márquez , and Tim Cahill .
The team has also had well-known coaches , including Carlos Queiroz , Carlos Alberto Parreira , Bora Milutinović , Bob  ब्राडली , mo johnston , ब्रूस एरिना और hans backe  .
Confucianism , Taoism , and Buddhism are one , a painting in  the litang स्टाइल portraying तीन मेन हँस by a नदी स्ट्रीम , 12th  century , Song Dynasty .
estimating the क्रमांक of बौद्धों in the संसार , or in अनेक देशों ,  is difficult due to definitional issues as well as practical problems of enumeration .
To begin with ,  the धार्मिक मान्यताओं , practices , और पहचान of ईस्ट एशियाइ ( जो comprise the बहुमत of the संसार 's बौद्धों  by any measure ) often blend Buddhism with other traditions including Confucianism , the Chinese folk religion , Daoism , Shinto , and Korean shamanism .
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations , or observe a  definite अनुष्ठान of adherence ऐसे as लेने शरण , बनाना it मुश्किल  to accurately estimate the number of practitioners .
An additional challenge is the hostility of several national governments ( often Communist ones such as China or  उत्तर कोरियाई ) to धर्म generally or to buddhism  specifically .
सरकारी नीतियों in ये देशों may प्रोत्साहित the under-reporting or non-reporting of धार्मिक adherence , resulting  in official totals that may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries .
Estimate of the worldwide  बौद्ध जनसांख्यिकी दायरा इससे 350 लाख to over एक अरब , लकिन क्लस्टर  nearer to the first figure .
adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a फिगर  of 397 million .
By major branches , the  संख्याएँ हैं as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism , including  ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism , साथ no कम than 185 लाख adherents , और संभवतः  several times that many ( again , depending on definitional issues ) .
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced  in चीन , दक्षिण कोरियाई , जापानी , ताईवान  , Singapore , and Vietnam .
( 2 ) Theravada  buddhism , साथ no कम than  125 million adherents .
This is the  predominant रूप of buddhism practiced in कंबोडिया ,  Thailand , Laos , Sri Lanka , and Burma .
( 3 ) Vajrayana  buddhism , साथ लगभग 20  million adherents .
This form predominates in the greater  तिब्बती और मंगोलियाई regions , as खूब as in the हिमालय  .
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan , and various territories within  कया is अभी पश्चिमी चीन , वज्रयान is परंपरागत to निश्चित regions of रूस ( e.g . कालमिकिया  , Buryatia ) , India ( e.g . Ladakh , Sikkim ) , and Nepal ( e.g . Khumbu ) .
Vajrayana , also known as  तिब्बती buddhism , is प्रायः conflated साथ तांत्रिक buddhism , लकिन इस is imprecise  , as Shingon and other forms of East Asian Buddhism also practice tantra .
At least 7  देशों ( श्री लंका , थाईलैंड , कंबोडिया , लाओस , बर्मा , भूटान ,  and Mongolia ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities .
Depending on how one calculates Chinese and other  ईस्ट एशियाई adherents , इस फिगर might विस्तार to शामिल  several more countries .
In addition  , buddhism is the राज्य धर्म of कंबोडिया और भूटान , और receives prominent जिक्र  in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka .
In northern India and Nepal , the land where Buddhism  थी born , the धर्म severely अस्वीकृत दौरान the पहला मिलेनियम  .
Whether this decline was due to the Islamic conquest of northern India , or  to अन्य कारकों , remains विवादास्पद  .
See the article  मनाही of buddhism in  India .
James Butler Hickok ( May 27 , 1837 – August 2 , 1876 ) , better  ज्ञात as जंगली विधेयक hickok , थी a लोक नायिका of the अमरीकी  Old West .
His skills as a gunfighter and scout , along with his reputation as a lawman , provided  the आधार लिये उसके कीर्ति , हालांकि कुछ of उसके reported कारनामे  are fictionalized .
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois , Hickok went west at age 18 as a  भगोड़े इससे इंसाफ , पहला working as a stagecoach ड्राइवर , पहले he became a lawman in the frontier  territories of Kansas and Nebraska .
he लड़ा लिये the संघ फौज दौरान the अमरीकी  Civil War , and gained publicity after the war as a scout , marksman , actor , and professional gambler .
Between his  law-enforcement कर्तव्य और जुए , जिससे easily overlapped  , Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts .
He was shot and  मारे जबकि playing पोकर in the nuttal & मन 's सैलून in  Deadwood , Dakota Territory ( now South Dakota ) .
Artist 's conception of  the जिज्ञासा रोवर vaporizing चट्टान  on Mars .
The rover  उतरा on मंगल in अगस्त  2012 .
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle which propels itself across the surface  of the ग्रह मंगल बाद लैंडिंग  .
Rovers have several advantages  over stationary landers : वे जाँचें अधिक territory , वे can be निर्देशित to दिलचस्प सुविधाएँ , वे can प्लेस themselves in  sunny positions to weather winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control .
There have been four  कामयाब robotically संचालित मंगल  rovers .
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory  प्रबंधित the मंगल pathfinder मिशन और  its now inactive Sojourner rover .
It currently manages  the मंगल खोजी रोवर मिशन 's क्रियाशील अवसर रोवर और  inactive Spirit , and , as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission , the Curiosity rover .
A financial audit , or more accurately , an audit of  वित्तीय कथन , is the सत्यापन of the वित्तीय कथन of a विधिक  entity , with a view to express an audit opinion .
The audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable assurance , but not absolute  परख , कि the वित्तीय कथन हैं प्रस्तुत fairly , in सब सामग्री respects , and/or दे a  true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework .
the purpose of an ऑडिट is provide और उद्देश्य स्वतंत्र परिक्षा of the वित्तीय कथन , जिससे increases  the value and credibility of the financial statements produced by management , thus increase user confidence in the financial statement , reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements .
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing  लेखपाल जो हैं विशेषज्ञ in वित्तीय रिपोर्टिंग  .
The financial audit is one  of अनेक परख कृत्यों provided by  accounting firms .
Many organizations separately  employ or hire आतंरिक auditors , जो do नहीं attest to वित्तीय रिपोर्ट्स लकिन फ़ोकस मुख्यतः  on the internal controls of the organization .
External auditors may choose to  प्लेस सीमित रिलायंस on the कार्य of आतंरिक auditors  .
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in  the वित्तीय disclosures बना by an संगठन , इसलिए होता  likely to reduce of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings .
Internationally , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों on auditing ( isa ) जारी by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Auditing and Assurance Standards Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the benchmark for audit process .
Almost all jurisdictions  आवश्यकता auditors to follow the isa or a लोकल विभिन्नता of the  ISA .
Dollar coins  have महरूम minted in the संयुक्त राज्य in सुनहरा  , silver , and base metal versions .
The term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the United States with a face value of one dollar  , हालांकि purists जिद कि a डालर is नहीं चांदी जबतक it contains कुछ  of that metal .
Silver dollars , the first  डालर सिक्का समस्या , यहूद minted शुरूआत  in 1794 .
Gold dollars and gold-colored dollars have also  महरूम उत्पादित by the संयुक्त  States .
The  sacagawea और अध्यक्षीय डॉलर हैं  often referred to as `` golden dollars '' .
In  आधुनिक टाइम्स , डालर सिक्के have नहीं महरूम बहुत लोकप्रिय  in the United States .
Despite efforts by the  सरकारी to प्रचार उनके उपयोग , सबसे अमेरिकी फिलहाल  use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins .
In  सीधा और स्तर उड़ान लिफ्ट  ( L ) equals weight ( W ) .
In a banked  फेरे of 60° , लिफ्ट बराबरी दोगुना  the weight ( L=2W ) .
The  पायलट अनुभवों 2g और a doubled  weight .
The  steeper the बैंको  , the greater the g-forces .
This top-fuel dragster can  accelerate इससे शून्य to in 0.86 सेकेंड  .
This is a horizontal  त्वरण of 5.3 g. संयुक्त साथ the लंबवत g-force in the  stationary case the Pythagorean theorem yields a g force of 5.4 g .
g-force ( with g from gravitational )  is a पद लिये accelerations  felt as weight and measurable by accelerometers .
It is not a  फ़ोर्स , प्रति se , लकिन  a force per unit mass .
Since such a force is perceived as a weight , any g-force can  be वर्णित as a `` वज़न प्रति ईकाई द्रव्यमान '' ( देखिए the पर्याय विशिष्ट  weight ) .
The  g-force त्वरण अधिनियमों as a गुणक of weight-like शक्तियां लिये प्रत्येक ईकाई of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's द्रव्यमान , और ( सहेजें लिये निश्चित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ोर्स  influences ) is the cause of an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall .
This  त्वरण अनुभवी by an ऑब्जेक्ट is due to the वेक्टर योग of  non-gravitational forces acting on an object free to move .
The  accelerations कि हैं नहीं उत्पादित by गम्भीरता हैं termed उचित accelerations , और it  is only these that are measured in g-force units .
They cause  तनावों और strains on वस्तुएँ  .
Because of these strains , large  g-forces may be destructive  .
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a  g-force , भी हालांकि g-forces हैं expressed in multiples  of the acceleration of a standard gravity .
Thus , the standard  गुरुत्वाकर्षक त्वरण at the धरती  's surface produces g-force only indirectly , as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces .
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the  धरती 's सतह is caused by mechanical फ़ोर्स exerted in the upward दिशा  by the ground , keeping the object from going into free-fall .
The upward force from the ground ensures  कि an ऑब्जेक्ट at बाकी on the धरती 's सतह is accelerating सापेक्ष to the free-fall कंडीशन  , which is the path that the object would follow when falling freely toward the Earth 's center .
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial  trajectory अंतर्गत the influence of gravitation-only  , feel no g-force .
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a  freely गिरना लिफ्ट गिरना toward the धरती 's बीच ( in वैक्यूम ) , or  ( to good approximation ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit .
These are  उदाहरण of निर्देशांक त्वरण ( a बदलें  in velocity ) without a sensation of weight .
The experience of  no g-force ( zero-g ) , however it is उत्पादित  , is synonymous with weightlessness .
In the  अनुपस्थिति of गुरुत्वाकर्षक फ़ील्ड , or in दिशानिर्देश at सही कोण to उन्हें , उचित और निर्देशांक  accelerations are the same , and any coordinate acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration .
An example here is a rocket in free space , in which  सरल परिवर्तन in गति हैं  produced by the engines , and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers .
An augur holding a lituus ,  the curved wand प्रायः प्रयुक्त as  a symbol of augury on Roman coins
The augur  थी a पुजारी और आधिकारिक in the शास्त्रीय  world , especially ancient Rome and Etruria .
His main role was to interpret the will of the gods by studying the flight of birds : whether they  हैं उड़ती in समूह or अलोन , कया noises  they make as they fly , direction of flight and what kind of birds they are .
This was  ज्ञात as `` लेने the auspices  . ''
The ceremony and function  of the augur थी सेंट्रल to कोई प्रमुख undertaking in रोमन society—public or  private—including matters of war , commerce , and religion .
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` Who does not know  कि इस नगर थी संस्थापित तभी बाद लेने the auspices , कि सबकुछ in युद्ध और in सलाम  , at home and abroad , was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an affluent community  in southeastern मिशिगन  .
It is  the दूसरी largest नगर in ओकलैंड  County in the U.S. state of Michigan .
Its population  थी 79,740 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
It is part of the upscale northwestern suburbs of  महानगर डेट्रॉयट  and is also northeast of downtown Ann Arbor .
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest cities in the United  राज्य , as खूब as in the राज्य of  Michigan .
In 2010 , the area  क्रमित as the 30th safest नगर in अमेरिका  .
Although the two cities have separate services and addresses , Farmington and Farmington Hills  हैं प्रायः विचार of as the वही जातियाँ  .
Features of the community include a recently renovated downtown , boutiques , a vintage cinema , numerous restaurants , exotic car  dealerships , आर्ट गैलरी , और पब्लिक पार्क सहित  Heritage Park .
There are several historical sites  सहित the longacre हाउस और the राज्यपाल  Warner Mansion .
Both cities are served  by farmington पब्लिक  Schools .
Farmington Hills serves as  a प्रमुख कारोबार बीच  for the greater Detroit area .
present-day छाप  of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town  मुहर (  matrix ) of Náchod from 1570
A seal  is a यंत्र लिये बनाना an छाप in मोम , मिट्टी , पेपर , or कुछ अन्य  medium , including an embossment on paper , and is also the impression thus made .
The original purpose was to authenticate a  दस्तावेज़ , a wrapper लिये एक ऐसे as a आधुनिक लिफाफा , or the कवर  of a container or package holding valuables or other objects .
The sealing process is essentially that of a mould , with the final image represented on the device for  बनाना the छाप by a mirror-image डिज़ाइन ,  incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio .
The seal-making device is also referred to as the  मुहर मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the मुहर छाप ( or , अधिक  rarely , the sealing ) .
If the  छाप is बना purely as a राहत resulting इससे the वृहद दबाव on the पेपर जहाँ the ऊँची भाग of the मेट्रिक्स टच , the मुहर is ज्ञात as a शुष्क  seal ; in all other cases a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used , usually in another color than the paper .
For legal purposes , the definition of a seal  may be विस्तारित to शामिल रबर stamps , or लिखने  specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S . `` ) .
In the United States , the word ``  मुहर '' is sometimes आबंटित to a facsimile of the मुहर डिज़ाइन ( in मोनोक्रोम or रंग ) , जिससे may be प्रयुक्त in a किस्में of contexts सहित  architectural settings , on flags , or on official letterheads .
Thus , for example , the Great Seal of the United States , among other uses , appears on the reverse of the  one-dollar विधेयक ; और अनेक of the seals of the u.S. राज्य appear on उनके संबंधित राज्य ध्वज  .
In Europe , although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as well as on seals , the seal  डिज़ाइन in इसके entirety rarely appears as an emblem  .
The study of  seals is ज्ञात as sigillography  or sphragistics .
Groundhog Day (  पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी : grundsaudaag , murmeltiertag  ) is a day celebrated on February 2 .
According to folklore , if it is cloudy  जब a groundhog emerges इससे इसके burrow on इस दिन , तब वसन्त होगा आइये जल्दी ; if it  is sunny , the groundhog will supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into its burrow , and the winter weather will continue for six more weeks .
Modern customs of the holiday involve celebrations where  जल्दी morning त्यौहार हैं आयोजित to देखें the groundhog उभरते इससे  its burrow .
In southeastern Pennsylvania , Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the  अवकाश साथ fersommlinge , सोशल कार्यक्रम in जिससे खाना is परोसा , भाषणों हैं बना , और एक or अधिक g'spiel ( plays or skits  ) are performed for entertainment .
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the only language spoken at the event ,  और those जो बोलो अंग्रेज़ी अदा a दंड , प्रायः in the रूप of a निकल , dime , or क्वार्टर प्रति  word spoken , with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table .
the largest groundhog दिन जश्न is आयोजित in punxsutawney  , Pennsylvania .
Groundhog  दिन , already a widely पहचाना और लोकप्रिय परंपरा , प्राप्त फैली ध्यान as a परिणाम of the 1993 फिल्मी groundhog दिन , जिससे थी नियत in punxsutawney  , PA ( though filmed primarily in Woodstock , IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil .
High  रेज़ोल्यूशन चित्र of tampa खाड़ी  region
The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate  ( koppen cfa ) , साथ गरम और आर्द्र ग्रीष्म साथ बारंबार thunderstorms और drier सर्दियों साथ जमने  temperatures occurring every 2–3 years .
The area experiences a significant summer wet season , as  nearly two-thirds of the सालाना वर्षण जलप्रपात in  the months of June through September .
The area is listed by the United States Department of Agriculture  ( यूएसडीए ) as होने in hardiness मण्डल 10 , जिससे is परिचय the उत्तरी सीमा of जहाँ  coconut palms and royal palms can be grown .
Highs usually range  between 65 और 95 °f ( 18 और 35  °C ) year round .
Though known for hot summers , Tampa 's official high has never reached 100 °F ( 38 °C ) –  the नगर 's all-time रिकार्ड तापमान is 99 °f ( 37 °c )  .
St.  पीटर्सबर्ग 's all-time रिकार्ड ऊँची is  exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ) .
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and  the गल्फ of मैक्सिको , और much of the नगर of tampa झूठ on  a smaller peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay .
This proximity to large bodies of water both moderates  temperatures और introduces विशाल amounts  of humidity into the atmosphere .
In general , the local communities farthest from the coast have larger temperature ranges ,  दोनो दौरान a सिंगल दिन और throughout the सीज़न of the  year .
A diagram of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम , प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the  range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम is the दायरा of सब संभावित बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation .
The `` electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम '' of an ऑब्जेक्ट रै a अलग अर्थ , और is बजाय the characteristic  distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object .
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम extends इससे नीचे the कम बारंबारता प्रयुक्त लिये आधुनिक रेडियो संचार  to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end , thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself ,  जबकि it is विचार कि the छोटी wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई , हालांकि in principle  the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and  अन्य probing interactions , as तरीके to पढ़ाई और characterize  matter .
In addition , radiation from various parts  of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक अन्य उपयोग लिये संचार और निर्माण  ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his initials , FDR , was the 32nd President of the United States (  1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th सदी , अग्रणी the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान a समय of विश्वव्यापी  economic depression and total war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms , he built a New  सौदे गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932 , as उसके घरेलू नीतियों पारिभाषित अमरीकी उदारतावाद लिये the मध्य  third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme ,  fdr पराजित लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट हूवर in नवम्बर 1932 ,  at the depth of the Great Depression .
Energized by his personal victory  over पोलियो , fdr 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed  to a renewal of the national spirit .
He worked closely  साथ अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री विंस्टन चर्चिल और सोवियत सामान्य  Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt  पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख विधान और जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the नई सौदे —a किस्में of कार्यक्रम designed  to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937 , but then  relapsed into a गहन मंदी  .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any considerable legislation ; it  abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी diminished दौरान संसार  War II .
Most of the regulations on business were ended about  1975–85 , मगर लिये the विनियमन of वॉल गली by the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग , जिससे  still exists .
Along with several  छोटी कार्यक्रम , प्रमुख surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम , जिससे  was created in 1933 , and Social Security , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany , FDR gave strong diplomatic  और वित्तीय support to चीन और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , जबकि बाकी  officially neutral .
His goal was  to मेक अमेरिका the `` आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र  `` which would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March 1941 , Roosevelt , with Congressional approval , provided  lend-lease सहायता to the देशों लड़ विरूद्ध  Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on Japan and Germany after the  जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7 , 1941 , कॉलिंग it a `` तिथि  which will live in infamy `` .
he पर्यवेक्षित the mobilization of the  U.S. economy to support the Allied war effort .
As an active military leader , Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts that  ended in the शिकस्त of the अक्ष शक्तियां और the विकास of the संसार 's पहला  atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment  of 100,000 जापानी अमरीकी नागरिकों  .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % , relief programs largely ended , and the industrial economy  grew rapidly to नई हाइट्स as लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers , और 16  million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the American  राजनैतिक झाँकी नहीं तभी दौरान the बारह सालो of उसके  presidency , but also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated the  realignment of मतदाता कि निर्मित the  Fifth Party System .
FDR 's New Deal  गठबन्धन संयुक्त मजदूर संघ , बिग नगर मशीने  , white ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He also influenced the later creation  of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र और  Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top  तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों , साथ साथ  Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
A liberal Democrat , Roosevelt defined his ideological  स्थिति as `` a छोटी बाएँ  of center . ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics that is  प्रयुक्त to refer to a कमेटी बना up of सदस्यों  of both chambers of a bicameral legislature .
In other contexts , it  refers to a कमेटी साथ सदस्यों इससे अधिक  than one organization .
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the  enumerated शक्तियां of the संघीय सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान ,  it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to permit , prohibit , or otherwise regulate commercial sex , except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most states ,  वेश्यावृति is माना a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी  of public order crime , a crime that disrupts the order of a community .
It was at  एक समय माना  to be a vagrancy crime .
Currently , Nevada is the only state to allow brothel  वेश्यावृति , the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the नेवाडा  Revised Statutes .
Only 8 counties currently  contain क्रियाशील brothels  .
सब फ़ॉर्म of वेश्यावृति हैं illegal in क्लार्क काउंटी ( जिससे contains the लास vegas–paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ) ,  Washoe County ( which contains Reno ) , Carson City , Douglas County , and Lincoln County .
The other counties theoretically allow  वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति , लकिन कुछ  of these counties currently have no active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering , '' and living off of the  proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा विधि , as elsewhere  in the country .
As with other countries , prostitution in the United States  can be विभाजित into तीन व्यापक श्रेणी : गली वेश्यावृति , वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति  , and escort prostitution .
The national flag of the United States of America , often simply referred to as the American flag , consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom )  प्रत्यावर्ती साथ श्वेत , साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ '' ) bearing पचास छोटी , श्वेत  , five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars .
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen  अंग्रेजों colonies कि घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और became the  first states in the Union .
Nicknames for the flag include the `` Stars and Stripes  '' , `` बूढ़ा महिमा `` , और `` the star-spangled  Banner . ''
India is a federal union of states comprising  twenty-eight राज्य और सात संघ  territories .
The states and territories are further  subdivided into जिले  and so on .
congressional जिले लिये the 113th  United States Congress
2010  जनसांख्यिकी change:
बदलें in apportionment of congressional जिले  , starting in 2013 , as a result of the 2010 census .
2000  जनसांख्यिकी  change:
Change in apportionment of  congressional जिले , इससे 2003 to 2013 , as a परिणाम of the  2000 census .
This is a complete list of congressional districts for  प्रतिनिधित्व in the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  .
The quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of districts are determined after  प्रत्येक जनसांख्यिकी , हालांकि in कुछ मामले राज्य have बदला the सीमाएँ  more than once per census .
This list  शामिल the 435 वर्तमान और over 200 obsolete  districts .
For example , since the 2000  जनसांख्यिकी , नेब्रास्का रै था तीन जिले , लकिन it प्रयुक्त  to have as many as six .
In the first decade of the twenty-first century , Texas had 32 districts , but has since  added चार due to reapportionment as a परिणाम of the 2010  census .
Other states have lost  जिले चूंकि the क्रमांक of congressional सीटे रै महरूम  set at 435 by statute .
Also  शामिल यहाँ हैं non-voting delegations : छह वर्तमान  and four obsolete .
The boundaries of districts  प्रायः शिफ़्ट साथ प्रत्येक redistricting  .
Over time , the region and  जनसांख्यिकी represented in a ज़िला can बदलें substantially  .
Furthermore , districts  sometimes retain the वही सीमाएँ जबकि  changing their district numbers .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an  अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter , रिकार्ड निर्माता , अभिनेत्री , और लोकसेवक  .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records  कार्यपालिका टॉमी mottola , कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और शाखित चार लगातार  number one singles on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and  कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ) , म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ) , और मैरी क्रिसमस ( 1994 ) , कैरी  was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` One Sweet Day `` , a duet with Boyz II Men , spent a record  सोलह सप्ताह on शीर्ष of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 , और remains the longest-running number-one सोंग in  U.S. chart history .
दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग of the एल्बम , कैरी began to deviate इससे उसके  R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became evident with the  रिलीज of तितली ( 1997 ) , at जिससे समय कैरी था अलग  from Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 , and signed a  record-breaking $ 100 लाख रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध साथ वर्जिन  Records .
Before the release of her first feature  फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ) , वो suffered a शारीरिक और emotional विश्लेषण और थी hospitalized  for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor reception , she was  खरीदा आउट of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध लिये $ 50 लाख  , which led to a decline in her career .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island  रिकॉर्ड in 2002 , और बाद an unsuccessful काल , लौटे to the शीर्ष of म्यूज़िक  charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We Belong  साथ `` became उसके सबसे कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s , और थी बाद  named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard .
Carey once again ventured into film  साथ a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन  Performance Award '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career  spanning over दो दशकों , कैरी रै बेची अधिक than 200 लाख  records worldwide , making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
in 1998 , वो थी सम्मानित as the संसार  's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards .
Carey was also  नामित the best-selling मादा कलाकार of the  millennium in 2000 .
According to the Recording Industry Association of  अमेरिका , वो is the तीसरा best-selling मादा कलाकार in the संयुक्त  States , with 63.5 million certified albums .
With the release of `` Touch  my देह `` ( 2008 ) , कैरी gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक  one single in the United States , more than any other solo artist .
In 2012 , Carey was ranked second on  vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम महिलाओं  in Music '' .
Aside from her commercial accomplishments , Carey has won five Grammy Awards , 17  संसार म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , 11 अमरीकी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , और 31 बिलबोर्ड म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार  .
referred to as the `` songbird परम् '' by the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड  , she is famed for her five-octave vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
Stratocumulus  stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology , a  बादल is a दृश्य द्रव्यमान of द्रव droplets or frozen crystals बना of जल or विभिन्न रसायन  suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body .
These suspended  अणु हैं भी ज्ञात  as aerosols .
Clouds in Earth 's atmosphere  हैं पढ़ाई in the बादल भौतिकी शाखा of meteorology  .
Two processes , possibly acting together , can lead to air becoming saturated ;  कूलिंग the एयर or adding जल वाष्प to the एयर  .
In  सामान्य , वर्षण होगा पतन to the सतह ; an एक्सेप्शन  is virga , which evaporates before reaching the surface .
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बादल वर्गीकरण प्रणाली is आधारित on the फैक्ट बादल in उनके सबसे मौलिक फ़ॉर्म can  show free-convective upward growth like cumulus , appear in non-convective layered sheets such as stratus , or take the form of thin fibrous wisps , as in the case of cirrus .
Prefixes are used in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in these basic  फ़ॉर्म or to बताएँ मध्य or ऊँची ऊँचाई सीमाएँ .
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers  , cumulo- लिये जटिल highly-convective तूफ़ान बादल , nimbo- लिये मोटा परतदार बादल of कुछ जटिलता कि can उपज मॉडरेट to भारी वर्षण  , alto- for middle clouds , and cirro- for high clouds ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure .
Whether or not a cloud is low , middle  , or ऊँची स्तर depends on कैसा दूर ऊपर the  ground its base forms .
Cloud types with significant  लंबवत extent can रूप in the कम or मध्य ऊँचाई सीमाएँ depending  on the moisture content of the air .
Clouds in the  क्षोभमण्डल have लैटिन names due to the लोकप्रिय अनुकूलन of ल्यूक हावर्ड  's cloud categorization system , which began to spread in popularity during December 1802 .
Synoptic surface weather observations  उपयोग कोड संख्याएँ to रिकार्ड और रपट the प्रकार of tropospheric बादल दृश्य at प्रत्येक अनुसूचित  observation time based on the height and physical appearance of the clouds .
While a majority of clouds form in Earth  's क्षोभमण्डल , वहीँ हैं अवसरों जब बादल  in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed .
These three main layers of the  माहौल जहाँ बादल may be देखी हैं collectively  known as the homosphere .
Above this lies the  thermosphere और exosphere , जिससे साथ मेक up  the heterosphere that marks the transition to outer space .
Clouds have been observed on other planets and moons within the Solar System , but , due to their different  तापमान विशेषताएँ , वे हैं रचित of अन्य substances ऐसे as मिथेन , अमोनिया , और sulfuric  acid .
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S.  राज्य of टेक्सास भीतर the houston–sugar  Land–Baytown metropolitan area .
As of the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी , the जनसांख्यिकी थी  291,309 .
Its county  सीट is galveston  .
League City is the largest city in Galveston County in terms of  जनसांख्यिकी ; url_http between 2000 और 2005 it surpassed  Galveston as the county 's largest city .
galveston काउंटी थी संस्थापित  in 1838 .
nassau
freeport ,  Bahamas
इस is a सूची of शहरों  in the Bahamas .
The following  तालिका सूचियाँ the नगर or कस्बा नाम , the भौगोलिक निर्देशांक , the जनसांख्यिकी  as of the 1990 census , an estimate of the population as of 2009 , and the island name .
The Big Ten Conference , formerly Western Conference and  बिग नौ सम्मेलन , is the oldest  Division I college athletic conference in the United States .
Its twelve member institutions ( which are primarily flagship research universities in their  संबंधित राज्य , well-regarded academically , और साथ अपेक्षाकृत विशाल छात्र नामांकन ) हैं स्तिथ primarily in the  Midwest , stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east .
The conference competes in the NCAA 's Division I ; its football teams compete in the  फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ) , formerly ज्ञात as प्रभाग i-a , the उच्चतम स्तर  of NCAA competition in that sport .
Member schools of the Big Ten ( or , in two cases , their parent university systems )  भी हैं सदस्यों of the कमेटी on संस्थागत सहयोग  , a leading educational and research consortium .
Despite the conference 's name , the Big Ten  दरअसल consists of 12 स्कूलों , following the जोड of the  Pennsylvania State University in 1993 and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011 .
In 2014 , the conference will expand to 14 members with the  परिवर्धन of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड , कॉलेज पार्क और rutgers , the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई जर्सी  .
It  is नहीं to be उलझन साथ the बिग 12 सम्मेलन , जिससे रै तभी टेन  schools and represents a different region of the country .
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in  स्कॉटलैंड using a घट स्टिल आसवन प्रक्रम at a सिंगल  distillery , with malted barley as the only grain ingredient .
As with any Scotch whisky , a single  malt स्कॉच जरूर be आसुत in स्कॉटलैंड और matured in ओक casks in स्कॉटलैंड लिये at तनिक  three years ( most single malts are matured longer ) .
`` Malt '' indicates that the whisky is distilled  इससे a `` malted '' अनाज  .
Several types of grains can  be malted ( लिये उदाहरण , जौ , rye और गेहूं हैं सब दाने जिससे can be malted ) ; however ,  in the case of single malt Scotch , barley is always the only grain used .
``  सिंगल '' indicates कि सब the malts  in the bottle come from a single distillery .
Bottlings containing malt whisky from multiple  distilleries हैं पुकारा `` blended malt  `` .
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ) , the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट of स्कॉच व्हिस्की ) on बोतलों of व्हिस्की कि contained a मिश्रण of दोनो जौ और non-barley अनाज व्हिस्की  , but this is no longer the case .
Under the terminology established by the SWR 2009 , a `` blended malt Scotch whisky '' is a mixture of  सिंगल malt स्कॉच whiskies , नहीं a मिश्रण of malted जौ व्हिस्की और non-barley व्हिस्की ; those  are called `` blended Scotch whisky '' , without the word `` malt '' .
The term `` blended malt ''  replaced `` vatted malt '' प्रयुक्त अंतर्गत the prior लेबलिंग  conventions .
The age statement on a bottle of single  malt स्कॉच is the क्रमांक of सालो the व्हिस्की खर्च  maturing in cask .
As very few whiskies are bottled from a single cask the age  बयान reflects the आयु of the youngest malt  in the mix .
A texture may be  arranged so as to , `` closely दृष्टिकोण the single-object औकात of fused-ensemble timbres , लिये उदाहरण , the खूबसूरत 'northern लाइट्स ' कॉर्ड ... , in a बहुत  interesting distribution of pitches , produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ) , p.166 & 168 ) .
In contrast to more traditional musical textures , sound mass composition `` minimizes  the महत्व of व्यक्तिगत pitches in वरीयता लिये बनावट , timbre  , and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact . ''
Developed from the modernist tone clusters and spread to  orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s और 1960s , sound-mass `` obscures the boundary  between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001 , pp . 326–27 ) .
तकनीकों जिससे may बनाएँ or be प्रयुक्त साथ ध्वनि द्रव्यमान शामिल विस्तारित तकनीकों ऐसे as मूक पीतल or स्ट्रिंग्स  , flutter tonguing , wide vibrato , extreme ranges , and glissandos .
Composers and works include Barbara  kolb , pauline oliveros ' ध्वनि पैटर्न लिये कोरस ( 1961 ) , norma beecroft 's इससे सपनो of  Brass for chorus ( 1963–1964 ) , and Nancy Van de Vate .
Beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in favor of a collective timbre through the use of  गायन और इंस्ट्रूमेंटल क्लस्टर , choral वाक , narrator , और a धो of ध्वनि इससे an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  tape . ''
( ibid  )
A very  जल्दी उदाहरण is the खोलने of jean-féry विद्रोही 's बैले लेस elémens ( 1737–38 ) , जहाँ अराजकता  is represented by a gradually cumulating orchestral cluster of all seven notes of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004 , pp . 52–54 ) .
A later example is the third movement of Ruth Crawford Seeger 's String Quartet 1931 (  nonesuch h-71280 ) जबकि अधिक recently phill niblock 's अनेक ड्रोन आधारित म्यूज़िक  serves as an example .
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with  debussy और edgard varèse प्रायः carefully scored व्यक्तिगत इंस्ट्रूमेंटल भाग so कि वे होता फ्यूज into एक ensemble  timbre or sound mass ( Erickson 1975 , pp . 18 and 21 ) .
Other examples include European `` textural '' compositions of the fifties and sixties  ऐसे as krzysztof penderecki 's threnody to the पीड़ितों of हिरोशिमा ( 1959 ) और györgy ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony  in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ) .
Other composers with works using this  तकनीक शामिल henryk górecki , karel husa , witold lutosławski , kazimierz  Serocki , and Steven Stucky .
Sound mass techniques also appear in  the म्यूज़िक of जार्ज crumb ( anon . n.d. )  .
