विद्यार्थियों in ग्रामीण सूडान  , 2002
A student is a learner , or  किसी जो attends an शैक्षणिक संस्था  .
In some nations , the English term ( or its cognate in another language ) is reserved for those who attend university , while a schoolchild under the age of eighteen is called a pupil in  अंग्रेज़ी ( or an समतुल्य in अन्य भाषाएं ) , हालांकि in the संयुक्त राज्य a व्यक्ति  enrolled in grades K–12 is often called a student .
In its widest use , student is used  लिये anyone जो is सीखना  .
Australia is a continent  comprising मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया , तस्मानिया , नई गिनी , seram , संभवतः  Timor , and neighbouring islands .
The continent is sometimes known in technical contexts by the names Sahul ,  australinea or meganesia , to फर्क it इससे the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई मेनलैंड .
It is the smallest of the seven  परंपरागत महाद्वीपों in the अंग्रेज़ी धारणा  .
New  जीलैंड is नहीं भाग of the महाद्वीप of ऑस्ट्रेलिया , लकिन of the  separate , submerged continent of Zealandia .
Zealandia and Australia are both  भाग of the wider regions ज्ञात as  Australasia and Oceania .
The continent of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by shallow seas which divide it into several  landmasses — the अराफुरा समुद्र और टोरेस जलसन्धि between मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया और  New Guinea , and Bass Strait between mainland Australia and Tasmania .
When sea levels were lower  दौरान the pleistocene बर्फ आयु , सहित the पिछला glacial अधिकतम परिचय 18,000  BC , they were connected by dry land .
During  the पास्ट टेन हजार सालो , उठती समुद्र स्तर overflowed the lowlands और अलग  the continent into today 's low-lying arid to semi-arid mainland and the two mountainous islands of New Guinea and Tasmania .
Geologically , a continent extends to the edge of its continental  शेल्फ , so the now-separate आइलैंड्स हैं माना भाग of  the continent .
Due to the spread of animals , fungi and plants across the single  pleistocene landmass the पृथक lands have a सम्बन्धित biota  .
सेंट्रल पार्क is nearly twice as बिग as the  world 's second-smallest country , Monaco .
Historically its  टंकी यहूद महत्वपूर्ण components of the नगर 's जल सप्लाई  .
Environmental issues in New York City are affected by the city 's size , density , abundant  पब्लिक परिवहन अवसंरचना , और स्थान  at the mouth of the Hudson River .
New York 's population density has  पर्यावरणीय फायदे और  cons .
It facilitates the highest mass  पारगमन उपयोग in the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन  also concentrates pollution .
Gasoline consumption in the city is at the rate the national average was in the 1920s , and  ग्रीनहाउस गैस emissions हैं a भिन्न of the नेशनल औसत , at 7.1 मीट्रिक टन प्रति व्यक्ति प्रति साल , नीचे  San Francisco , at 11.2 metric tons , and the national average , at 24.5 metric tons .
New  यॉर्क नगर खाते लिये तभी 1 % of संयुक्त राज्य ग्रीनहाउस गैस emissions  while housing 2.7 % of its population .
In September 2012 , New York was named the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest City , '' by a Travel+Leisure  readership सर्वेक्षण कि रेटेड the पर्यावरणीय विशेषता of 35 prominent शहरों in the संयुक्त  States .
Atlanta ( , stressed , locally ) is the  पूंजी of और the सबसे populous नगर in the u.S. राज्य  of Georgia , with an estimated 2011 population of 432,427 .
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the Atlanta metropolitan area , home to  5,457,831 लोगों और the नवीं largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल  in the United States .
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton County , and a  छोटी portion of the नगर extends eastward into dekalb  County .
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of two railroad lines , and the city rose from the ashes of  the सिविल युद्ध to become a नेशनल बीच of कॉमर्स  .
In the decades following the  सिविल अधिकारों गति , दौरान जिससे the नगर अर्जित a प्रतिष्ठा as `` too व्यस्त to नफ़रत '' लिये the प्रगतिशील  views of its citizens and leaders , Atlanta attained international prominence .
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of the Southeastern United States ,  via राजमार्ग , रेलरोड , और एयर , साथ hartsfield–jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र होने  the world 's busiest airport since 1998 .
Atlanta  is माना an `` अल्फा ( - ) संसार नगर , '' और , साथ a सकल घरेलू उत्पाद of us $ 270 अरब  , Atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among world cities and sixth in the nation .
Although Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse , dominant  सेक्टर शामिल लोजिस्टिक्स , पेशेवर और कारोबार सेवाएं , मीडिया परिचालन , सरकारी प्रशासन  , and higher education .
Topographically ,  अटलांटा is चिह्नित by रोलिंग  hills and dense tree coverage .
Revitalization of Atlanta 's neighborhoods , initially spurred by the 1996 Olympics , has intensified in  the 21st सदी , altering the नगर 's जनसांख्यिकी , राजनीती  , and culture .
A 1947 propaganda comic book published by the  catechetical गिल्ड शैक्षणिक समाज उठाने the specter of a कम्युनिस्ट  takeover
McCarthyism is the practice of making accusations of disloyalty ,  subversion , or देशद्रोह बगैर उचित लिहाज़ लिये प्रमाण  .
It also means `` the practice of making unfair  दोषारोपण or using अन्यायपूर्ण investigative तकनीकों , विशेषकर in अनुक्रम to सीमित  dissent or political criticism . ''
The term has its origins in the period in the  संयुक्त राज्य ज्ञात as the दूसरी रेड scare , स्थायी roughly इससे 1950 to 1956 और characterized by  heightened fears of communist influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents .
Originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of Republican U.S . Senator Joseph  मैकार्थी of विस्कॉन्सिन , `` mccarthyism '' जल्द took on a broader अर्थ , describing the excesses of समान प्रयत्न  .
The term is also now used more generally to describe reckless , unsubstantiated  आरोपों , as खूब as demagogic हमले on the अक्षर or राष्ट्रभक्ति  of political adversaries .
During the McCarthy era , thousands of Americans were accused of being Communists  or कम्युनिस्ट sympathizers और became the विषय of आक्रामक investigations और questioning पहले सरकारी or  private-industry panels , committees and agencies .
The primary targets of such suspicions were government employees , those in the  entertainment उद्योग , शिक्षक और संघ कार्यकर्ताओं .
Suspicions were often given credence despite inconclusive or questionable evidence , and the level of threat posed by a person  's रियल or supposed वामपंथी एसोसिएशन or मान्यताओं थी प्रायः greatly  exaggerated .
Many people suffered loss of employment and/or destruction of their  करियर ; कुछ भी suffered कारावास  .
Most of these punishments came about through trial  verdicts बाद विकल , कानून कि होता be घोषित असंवैधानिक  , dismissals for reasons later declared illegal or actionable , or extra-legal procedures that would come into general disrepute .
The most famous examples of McCarthyism include the speeches , investigations , and hearings of Senator McCarthy himself ; the Hollywood blacklist , associated with hearings  conducted by the हाउस un-american क्रियाएँ कमेटी ( huac ) ; और the विभिन्न anti-communist क्रियाएँ of the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ) अंतर्गत निदेशक J. एडगर हूवर  .
McCarthyism was a widespread social and  सांस्कृतिक घटना कि प्रभावित सब स्तर of समाज और थी the सोर्स of  a great deal of debate and conflict in the United States .
Napoleon is a fictional character and the  प्रमुख विपक्षी in जार्ज ऑरवेल 's एनिमल  Farm .
While he is at first a  आम फार्म सुअर , he gets rid of स्नोबॉल , another  pig which shares the power .
He then  takes लाभ of the पशु ' uprising  against their masters to eventually become the tyrannical `` President of Animal Farm , '' which he turns into a dictatorship .
वरुण लोगो
The NEPTUNE Canada project is the  world’s पहला regional-scale भाटे समंदर वेधशाला कि  plugs directly into the Internet .
Since December 2009 , it has allowed people to `` surf '' the  seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों चलाएं deep-water प्रयोग इससे लैब्स और विश्वविद्यालयों  around the world .
Along with its  सिस्टर प्रोजेक्ट , शुक्र , वरुण offers  a unique approach to ocean science .
Traditionally , ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry out their research ,  जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट उपयोग a remotely संचालित क्रॉलर  .
The Coronet was a full-size car from Dodge in the 1950s , initially the division 's highest trim  लकीर लकिन , starting in 1955 , the न्यूनतम trim  line .
In the 1960s , the name was  transferred to चकमा 's mid-size  entry .
ARM9 is an ARM  वास्तुकला 32-bit risc cpu परिवार  .
Commonwealth is a traditional  अंग्रेज़ी पद लिये a राजनैतिक जातियाँ  founded for the common good .
historically , it रै sometimes महरूम synonymous  with `` republic `` .
More recently it has been  प्रयुक्त लिये fraternal एसोसिएशन  of some sovereign nations .
Most notably , the Commonwealth of Nations , an  संघ primarily of पूर्व सदस्यों of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य , is प्रायः referred  to as simply `` the Commonwealth '' .
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as  सितंबर 11 , सितंबर 11th , or 9/11 ) यहूद a श्रेणी of चार समन्वित आतंकवादी हमले शुभारम्भ by the  Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York City and the Washington , D.C. area on September 11 , 2001 .
Four passenger airliners were hijacked  by 19 al-qaeda आतंकवादी so वे could be flown into  buildings in suicide attacks .
Two of those planes ,  अमरीकी एयरलाइंस उड़ान 11 और संयुक्त एयरलाइंस उड़ान 175 , यहूद क्रैश into the उत्तर  and South towers , respectively , of the World Trade Center complex in New York City .
Within two hours , both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or  पूरा पतन of सब अन्य इमारतें in the wtc जटिल , as खूब as प्रमुख क्षति  to ten other large surrounding structures .
A third plane , American Airlines Flight 77 , was crashed into the Pentagon ( the  मुख्यालय of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of रक्षा )  , leading to a partial collapse in its western side .
The fourth plane , United  एयरलाइंस उड़ान 93 , थी targeted at the संयुक्त राज्य कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन , d.C.  , but crashed into a field near Shanksville , Pennsylvania , after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers .
in कुल , लगभग 3,000 लोगों died in the हमले  , including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes .
suspicion जल्दी गिरी  on al-Qaeda .
Although the  समूह 's नेता , ओसामा बिन लादेन , initially अस्वीकृत  any involvement , in 2004 he claimed responsibility for the attacks .
Al-Qaeda and bin  लादेन cited u.S. support of इसराईल , the उपस्थिति of u.S. सैनिकों in सऊदी अरब , और प्रतिबंधों  against Iraq as motives for the attacks .
The United States responded to the  हमले by शुभारंभ the युद्ध on आतंक और आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान to depose  the Taliban , which had harbored al-Qaeda .
Many  देशों strengthened उनके anti-terrorism विधान  and expanded law enforcement powers .
Having evaded  कैप्चर लिये सालो , बिन लादेन थी स्तिथ और मारे by u.S. शक्तियां  in May 2011 .
The destruction of the Twin Towers and other  गुण caused गंभीर क्षति to the अर्थव्यवस्था of निम्नतर मैनहटन और  had a significant effect on global markets .
Cleanup of the World Trade Center site was  समाप्त in may 2002 , और the प्रस्तुतीकरण थी repaired  within a year .
Numerous memorials have been constructed , including the  नेशनल सितंबर 11 मेमोरियल & संग्रहालय in नई यॉर्क , the प्रस्तुतीकरण मेमोरियल , और the उड़ान 93 नेशनल मेमोरियल in पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
After a lengthy  विलंब , the एक संसार व्यापार बीच is अपेक्षित to be समाप्त  at Ground Zero in New York City in 2013 .
Crater Lake National Park is a United  राज्य नेशनल पार्क स्तिथ  in southern Oregon .
Established in 1902 , Crater Lake National Park is the fifth oldest national park in the  संयुक्त राज्य और the तभी एक in the राज्य of ऑरेगॉन .
The park encompasses the  caldera of crater झील , a remnant of a नष्ट ज्वालामुखी , माउंट  Mazama , and the surrounding hills and forests .
The lake is deep at its deepest point , which makes it the deepest lake in the United States , the second  deepest in उत्तर अमेरिका और the नवीं deepest in the संसार .
Crater Lake is often referred to as the seventh deepest lake in the world , but this former listing excludes the approximately depth of subglacial Lake Vostok in  अंटार्कटिक , जिससे resides अंतर्गत nearly of बर्फ , और the हाल रपट of a अधिकतम गहराई लिये झील o'higgins /san मार्टिन , स्तिथ on the किनारा of चिली और अर्जेंटीना  .
However , when comparing its average depth of to the average depth of other deep lakes , Crater Lake becomes  the deepest in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध और the तीसरा  deepest in the world .
The impressive average depth of this volcanic lake is due to the nearly symmetrical deep  caldera formed 7,700 सालो पहले दौरान the हिंसक climactic eruptions और subsequent पतन of माउंट mazama और the  relatively moist climate that is typical of the crest of the Cascade Range .
the caldera रिम सीमाएँ  in elevation from .
The United States Geological  सर्वेक्षण benchmarked उन्नयन of the झील सतह  itself is .
This  नेशनल पार्क encompasses  .
crater झील रै no स्ट्रीम बहती  into or out of it .
All water  कि enters the झील is आखिरकार खोया इससे वाष्पीकरण  or subsurface seepage .
the झील 's जल commonly रै a  striking blue hue , and the lake is re-filled entirely from direct precipitation in the form of snow and rain .
The Supreme Court of the  संयुक्त राज्य is the उच्चतम अदालत in  the United States .
It has ultimate ( and largely discretionary ) appellate  क्षेत्राधिकार over सब संघीय न्यायालयों और over राज्य अदालत मामले involving  issues of federal law , and original jurisdiction over a small range of cases .
The Court , which meets in the United States Supreme Court Building in Washington , D.C. , consists of  a मुख्य इंसाफ और आठ संबद्ध justices जो हैं मनोनीत by the अध्यक्ष और पुष्टि by  the United States Senate .
Once appointed , justices have life tenure unless  वे इस्तीफा , रिटायर , or हैं removed बाद  impeachment .
Conroe is the seat of  मोंटगोमरी काउंटी और जलप्रपात  within the metropolitan area .
It is  स्तिथ परिचय उत्तर  of Houston .
As of July 2011 , the  नगर जनसांख्यिकी थी 58,973 , up  from 36,811 in 2000 .
The Book of Mormon is a sacred text of the Latter  दिन संत गति , जिससे adherents मानना contains कृतियाँ of प्राचीन नबियों जो जिया on the अमरीकी महाद्वीप  from approximately 2200 BC to AD 421 .
it थी पहला प्रकाशित in कूच 1830 by जोसेफ स्मिथ as the किताब of mormon : an खाता  Written by the Hand of Mormon upon Plates Taken from the Plates of Nephi .
According to Smith 's account , and also  according to the किताब 's कथा , the किताब of mormon थी originally लिखा in वरना अनजान वर्ण referred to as `` reformed  Egyptian `` engraved on golden plates .
Smith claimed that the last prophet to contribute to the book , a man named Moroni , buried it in a hill in present-day New York and then returned to earth in 1827 as an angel , revealing the  स्थान of the किताब to स्मिथ और instructing उसे to अनुवाद और disseminate it as प्रमाण of the बहाली of मसीह  's true church in the latter days .
The Book of Mormon has a number of original and distinctive doctrinal discussions on subjects such as the fall of Adam and  संध्या , the प्रकृति of the प्रायश्चित , eschatology , मोचन इससे शारीरिक और आध्यात्मिक मौत  , and the organization of the latter-day church .
The pivotal  इवेंट of the किताब is an रूप of यीशु  Christ to the Americas shortly after his resurrection .
The Book of  mormon is the earliest of the अद्वितीय कृतियाँ of the latter दिन संत गति , the denominations of जिससे typically  regard the text not only as scripture but also as a historical record of God 's dealings with the ancient inhabitants of the Americas .
The Book of Mormon is divided into smaller books , titled after the  individuals नामित as प्राथमिक लेखक और , in सबसे संस्करण , विभाजित into अध्याय  and verses .
It is written in English , very  समान to the जल्दी आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी  linguistic style of the King James Version of the Bible , and has since been fully or partially translated into 108 languages .
An enlisted rank ( also known as an enlisted grade or  आयोजिक रेट ) is , in सबसे militaries , कोई रैंक नीचे कि of a commissioned अधिकारी or वारंट  officer .
The term can also be  समावेशी of non-commissioned अधिकारियों  .
In most cases , enlisted service personnel perform jobs specific to  उनके अपना occupational specialty , as opposed to the अधिक generalized कमांड जिम्मेदारियों of commissioned  officers .
`` What a Wonderful World '' is a song written by  bob thiele ( as `` जार्ज डगलस '' ) और जार्ज  David Weiss .
It was first recorded by Louis  आर्मस्ट्रांग और released as a सिंगल  in 1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both  prominent in the म्यूज़िक संसार ( thiele as a निर्माता  and Weiss as a composer/performer ) .
Armstrong 's recording was  inducted in the ग्रैमी हॉल  of Fame in 1999 .
The publishing for this song is controlled by Memory Lane Music Group ,  कार्लिन म्यूज़िक corp. , और कीड़ा म्यूज़िक , inc  .
1908 poster  विज्ञापन gaumont 's ध्वनि films  .
The  chronomégaphone , designed लिये विशाल हॉल  , employed compressed air to amplify the recorded sound .
A sound film is  a गति चित्र साथ synchronized ध्वनि  , or sound technologically coupled to image , as opposed to a silent film .
The first known public exhibition of  प्रक्षिप्त ध्वनि films took प्लेस in पेरिस in 1900 , लकिन दशकों होता pass पहले  sound motion pictures were made commercially practical .
Reliable synchronization was  मुश्किल to achieve साथ the जल्दी sound-on-disc प्रणालियों , और  amplification and recording quality were also inadequate .
नवप्रवर्तनों in sound-on-film led to the पहला वाणिज्यिक स्क्रीनिंग  of short motion pictures using the technology , which took place in 1923 .
The primary steps in the commercialization of sound  सिनेमा यहूद लिया in the mid- to लेट  1920s .
At first , the sound films incorporating synchronized dialogue—known as `` talking  तस्वीरें '' , or `` टॉकीज़ '' —were exclusively शॉर्ट्स ; the earliest feature-length फिल्मों साथ अंकित  sound included only music and effects .
The first feature film originally  प्रस्तुत as a talkie थी the जैज़ सिंगर  , released in October 1927 .
A major hit , it was  बना साथ vitaphone , the अग्रणी  brand of sound-on-disc technology .
sound-on-film , however , होता जल्द become  the standard for talking pictures .
By the early 1930s , the  टॉकीज़ यहूद a वैश्विक  phenomenon .
In the United States ,  वे helped सुरक्षित हॉलीवुड 's स्थिति as एक of the संसार 's सबसे शक्तिशाली cultural/commercial  systems ( see Cinema of the United States ) .
In  यूरोपीय ( और , to a lesser उपाधि , elsewhere ) the नई विकास थी treated साथ  suspicion by many filmmakers and critics , who worried that a focus on dialogue would subvert the unique aesthetic virtues of soundless cinema .
In Japan ,  जहाँ the लोकप्रिय फिल्मी परंपरा एकीकृत  silent movie and live vocal performance , talking pictures were slow to take root .
In India , sound was the transformative element that  led to the रैपिड विस्तार of the स्वदेश 's फिल्मी industry—the सबसे उत्पादक ऐसे  industry in the world since the early 1960s .
African people are natives or  निवासियों of अफ़्रीकी और लोगों of अफ़्रीकी descent  .
The  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार ( commonly ज्ञात as aria म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार or aria पुरस्कार ) is an सालाना श्रेणी of पुरस्कार नाइट्स celebrating the  Australian music industry , put on by the Australian Recording Industry Association ( ARIA ) .
The event has been held annually since 1987 and encompasses the general genre-specific and popular awards ( these are what is usually being referred to as `` the ARIA awards '' ) as well as Fine Arts Awards  और कारीगर पुरस्कार ( आयोजित separately इससे 2004 ) , आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार और aria हॉल of कीर्ति – आयोजित separately इससे 2005 to 2010 लकिन लौटे to the सामान्य रस्म in 2011  .
For 2010  , aria introduced पब्लिक  voted awards for the first time .
Winning , or even being nominated for , an ARIA award results in a lot of media attention on an  कलाकार , और प्रायः increases रिकॉर्डिंग बिक्री several-fold – in 2005 , लिये उदाहरण , बाद बेन ली जीती तीन पुरस्कार  , his album Awake Is the New Sleep jumped from No . 31 to No . 5 in the ARIA Charts , its highest position .
For-profit education ( also  ज्ञात as the शिक्षा सेवाएं उद्योग or मालिकाना शिक्षा ) refers to शैक्षणिक संस्थानों  operated by private , profit -seeking businesses .
There are  तीन प्रकार of for-profit स्कूलों  .
One  प्रकार is ज्ञात as an शैक्षणिक प्रबन्धन संगठन  ( EMO ) , and these are primary and secondary educational institutions .
EMOs work with  स्कूल जिले or चार्टर स्कूलों , using पब्लिक निधि  to finance operations .
The  बहुमत of for-profit स्कूलों in the k–12 सेक्टर in अमेरिका फलन  as EMOs , and have grown in number in the mid-2000s .
The other major category  of for-profit स्कूलों हैं post-secondary संस्थानों जिससे operate as व्यवसायों  , receiving fees from each student they enroll .
A third type of for-profit schools , which is less  प्रचलित in the संयुक्त राज्य , हैं k–12 स्कूलों जिससे operate as  businesses .
emos फलन differently इससे चार्टर स्कूलों निर्मित in अनुक्रम to carry आउट a particular शिक्षण  pedagogy ; most charter schools are mission-oriented , while EMOs and other for-profit institutions are market-oriented .
While  समर्थक argue कि the लाभ motive encourages दक्षता  , this arrangement has also drawn controversy and criticism .
Kevin Carey , director of the education  नीति कार्यक्रम of the नई अमरीकी न्यास कहा in a 2010 कालम in the वृत्तान्त of उच्चतर शिक्षा कि `` for-profits मौजूद in  large part to fix educational market failures left by traditional institutions , and they profit by serving students that public and private nonprofit institutions too often ignore . ''
He also noted that `` There 's  no शक कि the worst for-profits हैं निर्मम exploiting the commodified  college degree .
लकिन वे किया n't commodify  it in the first place . ''
Amendment  xxii in the नेशनल  Archives
The Twenty-second Amendment of the United States  संविधान सेट a पद सीमा लिये चुनाव to the  office of President of the United States .
Congress passed  the amendment on कूच 21 ,  1947 .
It was ratified by the  आवश्यक क्रमांक of राज्य  on February 27 , 1951 .
This is an episode guide for  the दुश्मनी श्रेणी bobobo-bo  Bo-bobo .
This list encompasses every episode , beginning with the original Japanese-language title as they aired on TV Asahi ,  followed by the शीर्षक प्रयुक्त in the अंग्रेज़ी उतावले संस्करण airing in the संयुक्त राज्य on कार्टून  Network .
A short summary will follow , introducing the episode  और referring to कुछ of the ढकोसला , लकिन नहीं giving the पूरा summaries to  the episodes .
All names and some of the references will be  the ones प्रयुक्त इससे the english-language  version to avoid confusion .
