Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch  of 16 sovereign राज्य , ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms , और उनके territories  and dependencies , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and , in some of her  realms , carries the शीर्षक of defender of the आस्था as  part of her full title .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth  became सिर of the राष्ट्रमंडल और महारानी regnant of सात स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम , कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , नई जीलैंड  , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992 , the  क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता  and some realms became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica , Barbados , the  बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी , the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स , तुवालू , संत लूसिया , संत विंसेंट और the grenadines , बेलीज़  , Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her reign of years is currently the second  longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी  Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years .
एलिज़ाबेथ थी born in लंदन और शिक्षित  privately at home .
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his  bhai एडवर्ड viii , इससे जिससे समय वो थी the  heir presumptive .
She began  to undertake पब्लिक कर्तव्य दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , in जिससे  she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947  , वो शादीशुदा प्रिंस फिलिप , ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग , साथ जिसको वो  has four children : Charles , Anne , Andrew , and Edward .
उसके राजतिलक सेवा took प्लेस in  1953 and was the first to be televised .
The Queen 's many  ऐतिहासिक विज़िट और बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of  Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms , such as devolution in the United  किंगडम और the patriation of the कनाडाई संविधान  .
Times of personal  significance have शामिल the births और विवाह of उसके children , the births of उसके grandchildren , the  investiture of the Prince of Wales , and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver , Golden , and Diamond Jubilees in 1977 , 2002 , and 2012 , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern  आयरलैंड , the falklands युद्ध , युद्धों साथ इराकी और the युद्ध  in Afghanistan .
There have been times of  निजी विषाद लिये उसके जिससे शामिल the मौत of उसके पिता at 56 , the हत्या of प्रिंस फिलिप 's ताऊ , रब माउंटबेटन , the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992  ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ) , the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism  of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments , लकिन support  for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high .
christianity is the largest धर्म सूचीबद्ध by australians in  the national census .
In the 2011  जनसांख्यिकी , 61.1 % of australians यहूद  listed as Christian .
Australia has no  आधिकारिक राज्य धर्म और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई संविधान protects  freedom of religion .
The presence of  christianity in ऑस्ट्रेलिया began साथ the आगमन of the पहला बेड़े  of British convicts in 1788 .
The religion  grew to खाता लिये 96.1 % of the नेशनल जनसांख्यिकी  at the time of the Federation of Australia in 1901 .
The Anglican Church of  ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( formerly ज्ञात as the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) remained the largest denomination  until 1986 , when it was surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia .
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance among some sections of the  जनसांख्यिकी have diversified the जनसांख्यिकी of धर्म in ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011 , the largest  denominations यहूद either रोमन कैथोलिक ( 25 % ) or anglican ( 17 % ) , साथ the तीसरा largest denomination होने the 5  % affiliated with the Uniting Church in Australia .
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to churches  जैसे the यूनानी परंपरागत archdiocese of ऑस्ट्रेलिया और वहीँ हैं विशाल और growing पेंटेकोस्टल  groups , such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church .
The  त्यौहार of ईस्टर और क्रिसमस  are public holidays in Australia .
Around a quarter of students attend church schools and Christian organisations are leading  non-government प्रदाताओं of स्वास्थ्य और welfare सेवाएं through संगठनों जैसे  Catholic Health Australia , Anglicare , UnitingCare Australia , the Salvation Army and St Vincent de Paul Society .
Historically significant  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई ईसाइयों have शामिल रेव dr जॉन dunmore लैंग , संत मरियम mackillop , कैथरीन  Helen Spence , Pastor David Unaipon , the Reverend John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls .
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim  कॉस्टेलो बैपटिस्ट मंत्री और वर्तमान सीईओ of संसार दृष्टि ऑस्ट्रेलिया , फ़्रैंक ब्रेनन , जेसुइट इंसान अधिकारों वकील , कार्डिनल जार्ज pell , कैथोलिक archbishop of सिडनी , फिलिप aspinall the वर्तमान anglican primate और archbishop of ब्रिसबेन  , Kevin Rudd , former Labor Prime Minister , and Tony Abbott , leader for the Federal Opposition Liberal Party .
चार्टर बनाना कॉलेजिएट स्कूल  , which became Yale College , October 9 , 1701
Yale University is a  निजी आइवी लीग शोध विश्वविद्यालयों  located in New Haven , Connecticut .
Founded in  1701 in the उपनिवेश of कनेक्टिकट , the विश्वविद्यालयों  is the third-oldest institution of higher education in the United States .
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '' , the institution traces its roots to 17th-century clergymen who  sought to स्थापित a कॉलेज to ट्रैन पादरी और राजनैतिक नेताओ लिये the उपनिवेश  .
In  1718 , the कॉलेज थी renamed `` yale कॉलेज  '' to honor a gift from Elihu Yale , a governor of the British East India Company .
In 1861 , the Graduate School  of कला और sciences became the पहला u.S. संस्था to पुरस्कार the phd . yale became a founding  member of the Association of American Universities in 1900 .
Yale College was transformed , beginning  in the 1930s , through the स्थापना of  residential colleges : 12 now exist and two more are planned .
Yale employs over 1,100 faculty to teach and  सलाह परिचय 5,300 undergraduate और 6,100  graduate and professional students .
Almost all tenured professors teach undergraduate courses , more than  2,000 of जिससे हैं offered annually .
The University 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion  , the second-largest of कोई अकादमिक संस्था  in the world .
Yale 's system of  अधिक than दो दर्जन पुस्तकालयों holds  12.5 million volumes .
49 Nobel Laureates have been affiliated with the  विश्वविद्यालयों as विद्यार्थी , संकाय , और स्टाफ  .
Yale has produced  अनेक notable alumni , सहित पाँच u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों , 19 u.S. परम्  Court Justices , and several foreign heads of state .
At the graduate level , Yale Law School , Yale School  of आर्ट , और yale स्कूल of नाटक हैं consistently क्रमित the शीर्ष  programs in their field .
Yale Law  स्कूल is the सबसे चयनात्मक विधि  school in the United States .
Yale students compete  intercollegiately as the yale bulldogs in the ncaa प्रभाग i आइवी लीग .
The oldest intercollegiate athletic event in the United States is the  yale-harvard  regatta .
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big  sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an खुशबूदार झाड़ी इससे the परिवार asteraceae , जिससे grows  in arid and semi-arid conditions , throughout a range of cold desert , steppe , and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North America .
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is also used for several related members of the genus  artemisia , ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया sagebrush ( artemisia californica  ) .
Big Sagebrush and other Artemisia species are the dominant plants across large portions  of the ग्रेट जलाशय , covering कुछ 422,000 वर्गाकार मील in 11  western U.S. & Canadian states .
It is the  राज्य पुष्प of नेवाडा  .
Sagebrush provides  खाना और आवास लिये a किस्में of प्रजाति , ऐसे as ऋषि grouse , pronghorn  antelope , gray vireo , pygmy rabbit , and mule deer .
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain West of North  america—especially लिये preventing संक्रमण in wounds , stopping आतंरिक bleeding , और treating headaches  and colds .
Chemically , the active medicinal  constituents शामिल camphor , terpenoids  , and tannins .
Several major threats exist to sage brush  ecosystems , सहित इंसान settlements , परिवर्तन to agricultural जमीन , पशुधन चरने , हृदयरोग संयंत्र प्रजाति , wildfires  , and climate change .
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email  सेवा offered by the अमरीकी ढूंढें इंजन कम्पनी याहू  !
It was launched  in 1997 , और , according to comscore , याहू !  Mail is the third-largest web-based email service with 281 million users as of December 2012 .
Currently ,  याहू ! offers तीन  versions of Yahoo ! Mail .
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail Classic ''  continues the उपलब्धता of the असली इंटरफ़ेस introduced  in 1997 .
A version  introduced in 2005 शामिल a नई अजाक्स इंटरफ़ेस , drag-and-drop सुविधाएँ , improved ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता  , keyboard shortcuts , address auto-complete , tabs , and other updated features .
In October 2010 , Yahoo ! released a beta version of Yahoo ! Mail ,  जिससे शामिल सुधार to the  design , performance , search functionality , and Facebook integration .
in may 2011 , बीटा परीक्षण लिये the नई संस्करण रोका , और it became the  default interface for Yahoo ! Mail .
In early 2008 , Yahoo ! began offering unlimited mail storage to its users in  जवाब to heated प्रतियोगिता in the फ़्री web-mail मार्केट  segment .
On June 27 , 2009 ,  याहू ! मेसेंजर थी एकीकृत साथ  Yahoo ! Mail .
Tacoma ( , ) is a mid-sized urban port city and the  काउंटी सीट of पियर्स काउंटी , वॉशिंगटन , संयुक्त  States .
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound , southwest of Seattle , northeast of the  राज्य पूंजी , ओलंपिया , और उत्तरपश्चिम of माउंट rainier नेशनल  Park .
The population was  198,397 , according to the  2010 census .
Tacoma is the second-largest city in the  puget ध्वनि क्षेत्रफल और the  third largest in the state .
Tacoma also serves as the center of business activity for  the दक्षिण ध्वनि प्रदेश , जिससे रै a जनसांख्यिकी of around 1 लाख लोगों  .
Tacoma adopted its name after the nearby Mount  rainier , originally पुकारा माउंट tahoma  .
It is  ज्ञात as the `` नगर of नियति '' क्युकी the क्षेत्रफल थी चुनी to be the  western terminus of the Northern Pacific Railroad in the late 19th century .
The decision of the railroad was  बहकावे by टकोमा 's neighboring deep-water हार्बर , शुरुआत  Bay .
By  connecting the खाड़ी साथ the रेलरोड टकोमा 's motto  became `` When rails meet sails . ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of  टकोमा , a बीच of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार on the प्रशांत coast और वॉशिंगटन  state 's largest port .
Like most central  शहरों , टकोमा suffered a prolonged मनाही  in the mid-20th century as a result of suburbanization and divestment .
Since the 1990s , developments in the downtown  कोर शामिल the विश्वविद्यालयों of वॉशिंगटन टकोमा ; टकोमा कड़ी , the पहला आधुनिक इलेक्ट्रिक  light rail service in the state ; the state 's highest density of art and history museums ; and a restored urban waterfront , the Thea Foss Waterway .
With a long history of  blue-collar मजदूर राजनीती — इससे the रेलरोड मजदूर of the 19th सदी , to the longshoremen of the 20th सदी , to the मजदूर तैयार मजदूर of आज — टकोमा  has long been known for its rough , gritty image .
A song  परिचय टकोमा , `` thrice सब अमरीकी '' , by अमरीकी singer-songwriter और पूर्व निवासी neko मामला , describes  it as `` a dusty old jewel in the South Puget Sound / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down '' .
Tacoma-Pierce  काउंटी रै महरूम नामित एक of  the most livable areas in the country .
Tacoma was  भी recently सूचीबद्ध as the  19th most walkable city in the country .
In contrast , the city is also ranked as the most stressed-out  नगर in the देश in a 2004  survey .
In 2006 , women 's magazine Self named  टकोमा the `` सबसे sexually स्वस्थ नगर ''  in the United States .
In 2012 , The Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest City in America '' , in part because  of the विशाल विविधता of पब्लिक कार्यालयों आयोजित , और वॉशिंगटन राज्य गुजर a  bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry .
Tacoma is famous for  the 1940 पतन of the टकोमा  Narrows Bridge .
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San Diego metropolitan area  , the सातवाँ largest नगर in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , the fourteenth largest नगर in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , and the 77th-largest city in the United States .
The population was  243,916 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Located just from downtown San Diego  और इससे the मैक्सिकन किनारा in the दक्षिण खाड़ी प्रदेश of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल , the नगर is at the  center of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States .
Chula Vista is so named because of its scenic location  between the सैन डिएगो खाड़ी और तटीय पहाड़ foothills  .
संस्थापित in the जल्दी 19th सदी  , fast population growth has recently been observed in the city .
as the दूसरी largest नगर in सैन डिएगो काउंटी , chula विस्टा रै  quickly become a destination popular to many tourists .
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round United States  ओलम्पिक प्रशिक्षण centers और लोकप्रिय पर्यटक गंतव्यों शामिल क्रिकेट बेतार amphitheater , the chula विस्टा मरीना  , and the Chula Vista Nature Center .
Metes and bounds is a system or method of  describing जमीन , रियल प्रॉपर्टी ( in  contrast to personal property ) or real estate .
The system has  महरूम प्रयुक्त in इंग्लैण्ड लिये अनेक सदियां , और is स्टिल  used there in the definition of general boundaries .
By custom , it was applied in the original  तेरह colonies कि became the संयुक्त राज्य , और in अनेक अन्य जमीन jurisdictions आधारित  on English common law .
Typically the system uses physical features of the local geography , along with  दिशानिर्देश और दूरियाँ , to define और describe the सीमाएँ of a पार्सल of  land .
The  सीमाएँ हैं वर्णित in a कार्यशील गद्य स्टाइल , working around the पार्सल in अनुक्रम ,  from a point of beginning , returning back to the same point ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the bounds .
It may  शामिल सन्दर्भ to अन्य adjoining parcels ( और उनके स्वामी  ) , and it , in turn , could also be referred to in later surveys .
At the time the description is compiled , it may have been  चिह्नित on the मैदान साथ स्थाई स्मारक लगाई जहाँ वहीँ यहूद no उपयुक्त प्राकृतिक  monuments .
The term ``  metes '' refers to a boundary पारिभाषित by the मापन of प्रत्येक सीधा चलाएं , निर्दिष्ट by a  distance between the terminal points , and an orientation or direction .
A direction may be  a सरल कम्पास bearing , or a precise  orientation determined by accurate survey methods .
The term `` bounds  '' refers to a अधिक सामान्य boundary वर्णन , ऐसे as साथ a निश्चित  watercourse , a stone wall , an adjoining public road way , or an existing building .
The system is often used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g . farms ) , and political subdivisions ( e.g . town  सीमाएँ ) जहाँ precise परिभाषा is नहीं जरूरी or होता be दूर too महंगी , or previously designated सीमाएँ can be incorporated into  the description .
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English  physicist और गणितज्ञ जो is widely regarded as एक  of the most influential scientists of all time and as a key figure in the scientific revolution .
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica (  `` गणितीय सिद्धान्त of प्राकृतिक दर्शनशास्त्र '' ) , पहला प्रकाशित in 1687 , रखी  the foundations for most of classical mechanics .
Newton also made seminal  योगदान to प्रकाशिकी और साझा क्रेडिट साथ गॉटफ्राइड  Leibniz for the invention of the infinitesimal calculus .
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal  gravitation कि वर्चस्व वैज्ञानिकों ' दृश्य of the शारीरिक ब्रह्मांड लिये the अगला तीन सदियां  .
It also demonstrated that the motion of objects on the Earth  और कि of celestial लाशें could be वर्णित by the वही  principles .
By deriving Kepler 's laws of planetary motion from his mathematical description of  गम्भीरता , न्यूटन removed the पिछला संदेह परिचय the वैध of the  heliocentric model of the cosmos .
न्यूटन निर्मित the पहला व्यावहारिक reflecting दूरदर्शी और विकसित a सिद्धान्त of रंग आधारित on the  observation that a prism decomposes white light into the many colours of the visible spectrum .
He  भी प्रतिपादित an अनुभवजन्य विधि  of cooling and studied the speed of sound .
In addition to his work on the calculus , as a mathematician Newton contributed to the study of power  श्रेणी , generalised the द्विपद प्रमेय to non-integer exponents , और विकसित न्यूटन 's विधि  for approximating the roots of a function .
Newton was a fellow of Trinity College  और the दूसरी lucasian प्राध्यापक of गणित  at the University of Cambridge .
He was a  devout लकिन अपरंपरागत ईसाई और , unusually लिये a सदस्य of the कैम्ब्रिज संकाय , he refused to लो पावन आदेश  in the Church of England , perhaps because he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism .
In addition to his work on the mathematical sciences , Newton also dedicated much of his time to the study  of alchemy और biblical कालक्रम , लकिन सबसे of उसके कार्य in those क्षेत्रों remained  unpublished until long after his death .
In his later life ,  न्यूटन became अध्यक्ष of  the Royal Society .
He  भी परोसा the अंग्रेजों सरकारी as  Warden and Master of the Royal Mint .
प्रोf. वाल्टर lewin explains न्यूटन  's law of gravitation in MIT course 8.01
satellites और projectiles सब  obey Newton 's law of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point  द्रव्यमान in the ब्रह्मांड attracts प्रत्येक अन्य पाइंट द्रव्यमान साथ a फ़ोर्स कि is सीधे आंशिक to the उत्पाद of उनके masses और inversely आंशिक  to the square of the distance between them .
( separately it थी दिखाया कि विशाल spherically सममित masses आकर्षित  and are attracted as if all their mass were concentrated at their centers . )
This is a general physical law derived from  अनुभवजन्य observations by कया न्यूटन  called induction .
It is a part of classical mechanics and was formulated in Newton 's work Philosophiæ  naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` the प्रिन्सिपिया '' ) , पहला प्रकाशित on 5 जुलाई 1687  .
( When Newton 's book was  प्रस्तुत in 1686 to the royal समाज , रॉबर्ट  Hooke made a claim that Newton had obtained the inverse square law from him – see History section below . )
In modern  भाषा , the विधि राज्य the following:
Assuming SI  इकाई , f is measured in newtons ( n ) , m1 और m2 in गामा ( kg ) , r in  meters ( m ) , and the constant G is approximately equal to .
The  मान of the निरंतर g थी पहला accurately संकल्पित इससे the परिणाम of the कैवेंडिश प्रयोग conducted by the अंग्रेजों वैज्ञानिक  Henry Cavendish in 1798 , although Cavendish did not himself calculate a numerical value for G .
This experiment was also the  पहला परीक्षण of न्यूटन 's सिद्धान्त  of gravitation between masses in the laboratory .
It took  प्लेस 111 सालो बाद the प्रकाशन of न्यूटन 's प्रिन्सिपिया और 71 सालो बाद न्यूटन 's मौत  , so none of Newton 's calculations could use the value of G ; instead he could only calculate a force relative to another force .
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of electrical forces  , जिससे is प्रयुक्त to गणना the परिमाण of  electrical force between two charged bodies .
Both are inverse-square laws , in which force is inversely proportional to  the वर्गाकार of the अलहदा  between the bodies .
Coulomb  's विधि रै the उत्पाद of दो आरोप in प्लेस of the उत्पाद of the masses , और the electrostatic  constant in place of the gravitational constant .
Newton 's law has since been superseded by Einstein 's theory of general relativity , but it continues to be used as  an बेहतरीन सन्निकटन of the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता .
Relativity is required only  जब वहीँ is a need लिये चरम परिशुद्धता , or जब dealing साथ gravitation लिये अत्यधिक विशाल और घना वस्तुएँ .
White and red flags , representing Iraqi and  अमरीकी मौतों , बैठना in the ग्रास चतुष्कोण of the घाटी पुस्तकालयों on the corvallis  , Oregon , campus of Oregon State University .
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count  प्रदर्शनी इससे 2008 to 2009 ( नहीं सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती प्रोजेक्ट ) , the ध्वज उद्देश्य to ``  raise awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War . ''
(  may 2008  )
Casualties of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of Iraq ,  और continuing साथ the ensuing occupation of इराकी , as खूब as the क्रियाएँ of the विभिन्न हथियारबंद समूह ऑपरेटिंग in the देश ) have आइये in अनेक  forms , and the accuracy of the information available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly .
The table below  summarizes विभिन्न estimates of  the Iraqi casualty figures .
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational coalition , the death toll is  carefully tracked और अद्यतनीकृत रोज़ , और the names और छायाचित्र of those मारे in  action as well as in accidents have been published widely .
A total of  4,486 u.S. सैनिको यहूद मारे in  Iraq between 2003 and 2012 .
Regarding the Iraqis , however , information on both military and civilian casualties  is दोनो कम precise और कम सतत  .
Estimates of casualty levels are available from  पत्रकारों on the झाँकी , इससे officials of शामिल संगठन , और इससे समूह कि summarize सूचना on incidents  reported in the news media .
The  शब्द `` हताहत `` in इसके सबसे सामान्य  sense includes the injured as well as the dead .
खाते of the क्रमांक of गठबन्धन wounded vary widely , partly क्युकी it is नहीं  obvious what should be counted : should only those injuries serious enough to put a soldier out of commission be included ?
Do illnesses or  चोटों caused by दुर्घटनाओं गिनती , or  should the focus be restricted to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
स्त्रोत using अलग परिभाषाएं may arrive at बहुत  different numbers , and sometimes the precise definition is not clearly specified .
Asalto al  coche ( डकैती of the कोच  ) , by Francisco de Goya
A highwayman was a thief  और brigand जो preyed on travellers  .
This type of outlaw usually travelled and  robbed by घोड़ा , as compared to a footpad  who travelled and robbed on foot .
Mounted robbers were widely  माना to be socially श्रेष्ठ to footpads  .
Such  लुटेरों संचालित in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  and Ireland from the Elizabethan era until the early 19th century .
The word highwayman is first known to be used  in the साल 1617 ; अन्य euphemisms  included `` knights of the road '' and `` gentlemen of the road . ''
Two  शर्तें लागू to 19th-century उत्तर अमरीकी highwaymen  were road agents in some instances for mountain bandits while in other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians .
In  the वही समय काल in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ,  they were known as bushrangers .
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson , Jr. ( born August 14 , 1959 ) is a retired American professional basketball  खिलाड़ी जो निभाई पाइंट गार्ड लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स of the  National Basketball Association ( NBA ) .
After winning championships in high  स्कूल और कॉलेज , जॉनसन थी चयनित पहला overall in the  1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers .
He won a championship and an NBA Finals  सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार in  his rookie season , and won four more championships with the Lakers during the 1980s .
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had contracted HIV , but returned to  खेल in the 1992 all-star खेल , जीतना the all-star mvp पुरस्कार  .
After protests from  उसके fellow खिलाड़ी , he रिटायर्ड again लिये चार सालो , लकिन लौटे in 1996 , at आयु 36 , to खेल 32 खेल  for the Lakers before retiring for the third and final time .
Johnson 's career achievements include three  एनबीए mvp पुरस्कार , नौ एनबीए फाइनल दिखावे , बारह all-star खेल , और टेन all-nba पहला और दूसरी  Team nominations .
He led the league in regular-season assists four times , and is the NBA 's all-time  नेता in औसत assists प्रति खेल ,  at 11.2 .
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream Team ``  , the u.S. बास्केट टोली कि जीती  the Olympic gold medal in 1992 .
After leaving the NBA in 1992 , Johnson formed the Magic Johnson  all-stars , a barnstorming टोली कि travelled around the संसार playing प्रदर्शनी  games .
Johnson was  सम्मानित as एक of the 50 महानतम खिलाड़ी in एनबीए इतिहास in 1996  , and enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame in 2002 .
He was rated the greatest NBA point guard of  सब समय by ईएसपीएन in  2007 .
His friendship and rivalry with Boston Celtics star Larry  बर्ड , जिसको he faced in the 1979 ncaa फाइनल और तीन एनबीए चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी ,  were well documented .
चूंकि उसके रिटायरमेंट , जॉनसन रै महरूम an एडवोकेट लिये hiV/  AIDS prevention and safe sex , as well as an entrepreneur , philanthropist , broadcaster and motivational speaker .
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for several years , and  थी भाग of a समूह कि खरीदा the लॉस एंजिल्स डॉजर्स in 2012  .
Allium  कोशिकाएं in अलग phases  of the cell cycle
The cells of eukaryotes (  बाएँ ) और prokaryotes ( सही  )
The cell is the basic structural , functional  और biological ईकाई of सब ज्ञात जीना  organisms .
It is the  smallest ईकाई of जीवन कि is वर्गीकृत as a जीना बात  ( except virus , which consists only from DNA/RNA covered by protein and lipids ) , and is often called the building block of life .
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed  भीतर a झिल्ली , जिससे contains अनेक biomolecules ऐसे  as proteins and nucleic acids .
Organisms can be classified as unicellular ( consisting of a single cell ; including most bacteria ) or  बहुकोशिकीय ( सहित पौधे और पशु )  .
While the number of cells in plants and animals varies from species to  प्रजाति , इंसानो contain परिचय 100 खरब  ( 1014 ) cells .
Most plant and animal cells are between 1 and 100  micrometres और इसलिए हैं दृश्य तभी अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी  .
The  कोशिका थी खोजा  by Robert Hooke in 1665 .
The cell theory , first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann , states that all organisms are composed of one or  अधिक कोशिकाएं , कि सब कोशिकाएं आइये इससे preexisting कोशिकाएं , कि vital कृत्यों of an सजीव occur भीतर कोशिकाएं , और कि सब कोशिकाएं contain the खानदानी सूचना  necessary for regulating cell functions and for transmitting information to the next generation of cells .
Cells  उभरा on ग्रह धरती at  least 4.0–4.3 billion years ago .
The word cell comes from the  लैटिन गर्भगृह , अर्थ `` छोटी रूम ''  .
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological structure was coined by Robert Hooke in a book he published in 1665  जब he compared the कॉर्क कोशिकाएं he देखी through उसके  microscope to the small rooms monks lived in .
grecian सूत्र is a मेन 's बाल  coloring product in the United States .
Canada and  यूरोपीय previously बैन the उत्पाद क्युकी  of its use of lead acetate .
A motor scooter  's सामने साथ an अव्यवहारिक क्रमांक और किस्में of  headlamps , added for decorative purposes
A headlamp is a lamp  संलग्न to the सामने of a गाडी to  light the road ahead .
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age , spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety  प्रशासन राज्य कि nearly हाफ of सब traffic-related fatalities occur in the अंधेरा , despite  only 25 % of traffic travelling during darkness .
While it is common for the term headlight to be  प्रयुक्त interchangeably in अनौपचारिक चर्चा , headlamp is the पद लिये the यंत्र itself , जबकि हेडलाइट properly refers  to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device .
Other vehicles , such  as रेल और वायुयान , हैं  required to have headlamps .
Bicycle headlamps are often used on  साइकिल , और हैं जरूरी in कुछ jurisdictions  .
They  can be संचालित by a बैटरी or a छोटी विद्युत  generator on the wheel .
Additionally  ऑटोमोटिव रात्रि दृष्टि प्रणालियों कार्य to संपूरक headlamps  .
Women  's अधिकारों हैं the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed  for women and girls of many societies worldwide .
In some places these rights are  institutionalized or समर्थित by विधि , लोकल कस्टम , और आचरण  , whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed .
They differ from broader notions of  इंसान अधिकारों through दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत  bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys .
Issues commonly associated with notions of  महिलाओं 's अधिकारों शामिल , हालांकि हैं नहीं सीमित to , the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ;  to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg ( , ( born  नवम्बर 13 , 1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne , अभिनेत्री , singer-songwriter , राजनैतिक activist  , author and talk show host .
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color Purple ( 1985 ) , playing  celie , a mistreated ब्लैक स्त्री in the गहन दक्षिण  .
She received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best  अभिनेत्री और जीती उसके पहला सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये  her role in the film .
In 1990 , she played Oda Mae Brown , a wacky  मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) सहेजें उसके प्रेमी ( demi  Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this  बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत an एक्टिंग  Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939 .
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2 , The Player , Made in America , How Stella Got Her  नाली वापस , लड़की , बाधित और चूहा रेस  .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation , as Terry  doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश , और as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली , as खूब as the आवाज़ of shenzi the लकड़बग्घा in the शेर  King .
Goldberg  रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये 13  Emmy Awards for her work in television .
She  थी co-producer of the लोकप्रिय खेल दिखाएँ हॉलीवुड  Squares from 1998 to 2004 .
She has been the moderator of the  दिन बात दिखाएँ the दृश्य  since 2007 .
Goldberg has a Grammy , two Daytime Emmys , two Golden Globes  , a टोनी ( लिये उत्पादन , नहीं एक्टिंग ) , और an ऑस्कर  .
In addition , Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award , four People  's चुनाव पुरस्कार , और रै महरूम सम्मानित साथ a स्टार on  the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She is one of  the few मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have जीती  an Emmy , Grammy , Oscar , and Tony Award .
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a major professional ice hockey  लीग of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब , of जिससे सात हैं फिलहाल स्तिथ in कनाडा  and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered in New York City , the  एनएचएल is widely माना to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग in the संसार , और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर  sports leagues in the United States and Canada .
The Stanley Cup , the oldest professional sports trophy in North America  , is awarded annually to the लीग playoff चैंपियन at the समाप्त of प्रत्येक  season .
The league was organized on November 26 , 1917 , in Montreal , Quebec ,  कनाडा , बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन , the नेशनल हॉकी संघ  ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started with four teams and , through a series  of expansions , contractions , और  relocations , the league is now composed of 30 active franchises .
The nation to which the name of the league originally  referred थी कनाडा , हालांकि the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 जब it विस्तारित into the संयुक्त  States .
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of  the संपूर्ण 2004–05 ऋतु , the लीग resumed खेल अंतर्गत a नई सामूहिक bargaining  agreement that included a salary cap .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of  sponsorships , उपस्थिति , और टेलीविज़न  audiences .
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the world and  फिलहाल रै खिलाड़ी इससे परिचय 20 अलग देशों  .
हालांकि canadians have historically गठित the बहुमत of the खिलाड़ी in the एनएचएल , over the पास्ट  four plus decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European players .
maggots  feeding on carrion .
A maggot is the larva of a fly  ( अनुक्रम diptera ) ; it is लागू in particular to the लार्वे of brachyceran उड़ता , ऐसे as houseflies ,  cheese flies , and blowflies , rather than larvae of the Nematocera , such as mosquitoes and Crane flies .
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be taken as such  ; in अनेक मानक पाठ्यपुस्तकों of कीटविज्ञान it करता नहीं appear in the अनुक्रमणिका  at all .
In many  non-technical ग्रन्थ the पद is प्रयुक्त लिये  insect larvae in general .
Other sources have coined  उनके अपना परिभाषाएं ; लिये उदाहरण : ``  ...
The term applies  to a ग्रब जब सब ट्रेस of limbs रै disappeared ... '' और `` ...  Applied to the footless larvae of Dipters . ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of wide importance in ecology and medicine ; among other roles , various species are  prominent in रीसाइक्लिंग carrion और कचरा , attacking फसलों और foodstuffs , spreading सूक्ष्मजैविक infections , और causing myiasis .
Herod ( , Hordos , Greek :  , hērōdēs ) , भी ज्ञात as हेरोदेस the ग्रेट ( 73/74 bce – 4  BCE in Jericho ) , was a Roman client king of Judea .
His epithet of `` the Great  '' is widely विवादित as he is वर्णित as `` a madman जो  murdered his own family and a great many rabbis `` .
He is also known for his colossal building  प्रोजेक्ट in जेरूसलम और elsewhere , सहित उसके विस्तार of the दूसरी टेम्पल in जेरूसलम ( sometimes  referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima .
Important  विवरण of उसके जीवनी हैं gleaned इससे the works of the  1st century CE Roman–Jewish historian Josephus Flavius .
The Romans made  हेरोदेस 's बेटे , हेरोदेस archelaus , ethnarch of judea , samaria , और idumea ( biblical  Edom ) from 4 BCE to 6 CE , referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea .
Archelaus was judged  incompetent by the रोमन सम्राट augustus जो तब संयुक्त samaria ,  Judea proper and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41 .
Herod 's  अन्य बेटे हेरोदेस antipas थी tetrarch  of Galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE .
ABO blood  समूह antigens उपस्थित on रेड रक्त  cells and IgM antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most important blood type system ( or  रक्त समूह प्रणाली ) in इंसान रक्त transfusion  .
The  संबद्ध anti-a और anti-b antibodies हैं प्रायः igm antibodies , जिससे हैं प्रायः उत्पादित in  the first years of life by sensitization to environmental substances such as food , bacteria , and viruses .
ABO blood types are also present in some other animals ,  लिये उदाहरण apes ऐसे as chimpanzees , bonobos , और gorillas  .
Year 1907 ( MCMVII ) was a common year starting on Tuesday ( link will display the full  पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting  on Monday of the 13-day-slower Julian calendar .
Northville is an  affluent नगर स्तिथ in और विभाजित by ओकलैंड  and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan .
The area is a suburb of  महानगर डेट्रॉयट .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी  5,970 at the 2010 census .
Most of the city is in  ओकलैंड काउंटी , और is घिरी by the नगर of novi  .
the वेन काउंटी portion is  surrounded by Northville Township .

Elaine Stritch ( born February 2 , 1925 ) is  an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री और vocalist  .
She has  appeared in numerous स्टेज plays और musicals , विशेषता  films , and many television programs .
She  is ज्ञात लिये उसके प्रदर्शन of `` the महिलाओं जो लंच '' in स्टीफन sondheim 's 1970 musical कम्पनी , उसके 2001  one-woman show , Elaine Stritch at Liberty , and recently for her role as Jack Donaghy 's mother Colleen on NBC 's 30 Rock .
She has been nominated for the Tony  पुरस्कार पाँच टाइम्स in विभिन्न श्रेणी  .
Stritch is  भी a three-time एमी पुरस्कार  winner .
Misfits is a British science  fiction comedy-drama टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ परिचय a समूह of यंग अपराधियों sentenced to कार्य in a जातियाँ सेवा  programme , where they obtain supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm .
the श्रेणी खोली in 2009  and is currently ongoing .
Antonia Thomas , Iwan Rheon , Lauren Socha ,  नाथन stewart-jarrett , और रॉबर्ट sheehan हैं introduced as अलीशा डैनियल्स , साइमन bellamy , केली बेली , कर्टिस  Donovan , and Nathan Young respectively .
Sheehan left after the second  श्रेणी , replaced in the तीसरा by जोसेफ gilgun as रूडी वेड  .
After the fourth series was  घोषित rheon , थामस और socha था बाएँ उनके भूमिकाएँ और होता be replaced by नई वर्ण कार्ला  Crome , Nathan McMullen and Matt Stokoe , as Jess , Finn and Alex respectively .
Midway  through the चौथी श्रेणी , stewart-jarrett बाएँ जबकि  Natasha O'Keeffe joined the cast as Abbey Smith .
On 19 March 2013 ,  चैनल 4 घोषित at a दबायें इवेंट कि वे have नवीनीकृत misfits  for a fifth and final series containing 8 episodes .
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10 , 1969 ) is a former American football quarterback who spent the majority of his career with the  ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग (  NFL ) .
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL , having played quarterback for the Atlanta Falcons (  1991 ) , ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स ( 1992 – 2007 ) , नई यॉर्क jets ( 2008 ) और मिनेसोटा  Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ) .
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw for over 70,000 yards , over 500 touchdowns , over 300  interceptions , over 6,000 completions , और over  10,000 pass attempts .
favre प्रारंभ at the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी मिसिसिपी लिये चार  years before being selected in the second round of the 1991 NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ) .
He was traded to Green Bay on February 10 ,  1992 , लिये the 19th चुनें in the 1992 एनएफएल  Draft .
Favre  became the पैकर्स ' starting क्वार्टरबैक in the चौथी खेल of the 1992 ऋतु  , stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski , and started every game through the 2007 season .
He  थी traded to the नई यॉर्क jets और प्रारंभ at क्वार्टरबैक लिये the 2008 ऋतु पहले  signing with the Vikings on August 18 , 2009 as their starting quarterback .
He  बना an एनएफएल रिकार्ड 297 लगातार starts (  321 including playoffs ) .
He is the only player to  जीत the ap सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी तीन लगातार  times ( 1995–97 ) .
He has led teams to eight division  championships ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2002 , 2003 , 2004 , 2007 , 2009 ) , पाँच nfc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2007 , 2009 ) , और  two Super Bowl appearances ( Super Bowl XXXI , Super Bowl XXXII ) , winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ) .
He holds many NFL records , including most  करियर touchdown गुजरता , सबसे करियर गुजर गज , सबसे करियर pass completions , सबसे करियर pass कोशिशें , सबसे करियर interceptions thrown  , most consecutive starts by a player , most consecutive starts by a quarterback , most career victories as a starting quarterback , most sacked , and most fumbles .
He is also  referred to by उसके  nickname `` The Gunslinger '' .

The  संसार चौड़ी वेब ( abbreviated as www or w3 , commonly  known as the web ) , is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet .
With a web browser , one can view web pages that may contain text  , बिंब , वीडियो , और अन्य मल्टीमीडिया , और  navigate between them via hyperlinks .
Using concepts from his earlier  हाइपरटेक्स्ट प्रणालियों जैसे enquire , अंग्रेजों इंजीनियर , कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक और at कि समय कर्मचारी of the cern , सर टिम berners-lee  , now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ) , wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European  शोध संगठन निकट जेनेवा straddling the किनारा between फ़्रांस और स्विट्ज़रलैंड , berners-lee और belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग  hypertext `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '' , and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year .
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20 , 1900July 22 , 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from Oregon , United States , known for his proclivity for opposing his  पार्टियों ' नेतृत्व , और specifically लिये उसके विपक्ष to the वियतनाम युद्ध on  constitutional grounds .
Born in Madison , Wisconsin , and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the University of Minnesota  विधि स्कूल , मोर्स स्थानांतरित to ऑरेगॉन in 1930 और began शिक्षण at the विश्वविद्यालयों of ऑरेगॉन स्कूल of विधि  .
During World War II he was elected to the United States Senate as a Republican ; he  became an स्वतंत्र बाद ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर 's चुनाव to  the presidency in 1952 .
While an independent , he set a record for performing the  दूसरी longest one-person filibuster in the इतिहास of  the Senate .
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955 , and was  reelected twice जबकि a सदस्य of कि  party .
Morse made a brief run for the Democratic Party  's अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1960  .
A few years later , Morse was one of only two Senators who  opposed the गल्फ of tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन , जिससे  authorized the president to take military action in Vietnam without a declaration of war .
He continued to speak out against the war in  the ensuing सालो , और खोया उसके 1968 बोली लिये reelection to bob packwood , जो criticized  his strong opposition to the war .
Morse made two  अधिक बोलियों लिये reelection to the सीनेट  before his death in 1974 .
In parliamentary procedure , a motion to table has  दो अलग और contradictory अर्थs:
In the United  राज्य , to तालिका प्रायः अर्थात् the to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to मूव  for postponement of consideration ; a proposal to suspend consideration of a pending motion .
Much less often , it means a motion to ``  put on the तालिका '' : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार ( or reconsideration ) , a  usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world .
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom , to table means to move to place [ the topic ] upon the table ( or to move to place on the  तालिका ) : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार ( or reconsideration ) of  a proposal .
Both the American and the British dialects have the sense of `` to  तालिका '' as to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to कारण [ the टॉपिक ] to  lie on the table .
The difference is the idea of what  the तालिका is लिये , कि of a शेल्फ बंद to the पक्ष , or an क्रियाशील  work bench .
The British meaning has the sense of the table as being an active work bench , with the topic being the center of attention ,  माना और discussed by सब जबतक it can be resolved , at जिससे  point it is taken off the 'table ' .
The American sense is that the table is like that  of a शेल्फ , अभिलेख , or long-term भंडार यंत्र , जहाँ the टॉपिक रै महरूम disposed of by sending it to the 'table  ' and leaving it there .
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 is a 2010 अमरीकी 3d कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड comedy-drama  prison film , and the third installment in the Toy Story series .
It was produced  by पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन studios और वितरित  by Walt Disney Pictures .
Directed by Lee Unkrich , the film was released  विश्वव्यापी इससे जून through अक्तूबर in डिज़्नी डिजिटल  3-D , RealD , and IMAX 3D .
Toy Story 3 was also the  पहला फिल्मी to be released theatrically साथ  Dolby Surround 7.1 sound .
The screenplay was written by Michael Arndt , while Unkrich wrote the story along with John  lasseter और एंड्रयू stanton , क्रमशः निदेशक और co-writer of the दो पहला  films .
The plot focuses on the toys Woody , Buzz Lightyear , and  उनके मित्रों dealing साथ an अनिश्चित भविष्य as उनके मालिक , एंडी , prepares  to leave for college .
Actors  tom हैंक्स , टिम एलन , जोन cusack , डॉन rickles , estelle हैरिस , जॉन ratzenberger , वालेस  Shawn , Jeff Pidgeon , Jodi Benson , R. Lee Ermey , John Morris , and Laurie Metcalf reprised their voice-over roles from the previous films .
Jim  varney , जो निभाई slinky श्वान in the पहला दो films , और जो ranft  , who portrayed Lenny and Wheezy , both died before production began on Toy Story 3 .
The role of Slinky Dog was taken over by Blake Clark ( a friend of Varney ) , while Ranft  's वर्ण और विभिन्न अन्य यहूद लिखा आउट of the  story .
New  वर्ण शामिल प्रदर्शन by ned beatty , टिमोथी डाल्टन , क्रिस्टन schaal , bonnie हंट  , Whoopi Goldberg , Jeff Garlin , Richard Kind , and Michael Keaton .
The feature broke Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening day North  अमरीकी सकल लिये an एनिमेटेड फिल्मी unadjusted लिये महंगाई  , and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189 .
It is also the  highest-grossing खोलने वीकेंड लिये a पिक्चर्स  film , as well as the highest-grossing opening weekend for a film to have opened in the month of June .
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010  , दोनो in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा , और  worldwide .
In early August , it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the North American box office ( surpassing Finding Nemo ) , and the  highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब समय विश्वव्यापी ( surpassing shrek 2 ) ; बाद कि माह , खिलौना स्टोरी 3 became the पहला कभी एनिमेटेड फिल्मी in  history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide .
It is currently  the 10th-highest-grossing  film of all time .
Toy Story 3 was nominated  लिये पाँच अकादमी पुरस्कार , सहित बेहतरीन चित्र  , Best Adapted Screenplay , and Best Sound Editing .
It was the third animated film ( after Beauty and  the जानवर और up ) to be मनोनीत लिये अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये  Best Picture .
It won the  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड विशेषता और बेहतरीन असली  Song .
John Levell Starks ( born August 10 , 1965 ) is an  अमरीकी रिटायर्ड पेशेवर बास्केट  shooting guard .
Starks was  सूचीबद्ध at 6'5 '' और 190 पाउंड दौरान  his NBA playing career .
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending four colleges in his native  ओक्लाहोमा , सहित ओक्लाहोमा राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों , he gained कीर्ति जबकि playing लिये the नई यॉर्क knicks of the नेशनल बास्केट संघ  in the 1990s .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile  मेमोरी कार्ड स्वरूप लिये उपयोग in पोर्टेबल डिवाइस , ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन , डिजिटल  cameras , GPS navigation devices , and tablet computers .
The  सुरक्षित डिजिटल मानक is कायम  by the SD Card Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in  अधिक than 400 ब्रांड्स आरपार दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी  and more than 8,000 models .
The Secure  डिजिटल स्वरूप शामिल चार कार्ड परिवारों  available in three different form factors .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ) , the High-Capacity ( SDHC ) ,  the extended-capacity ( sdxc ) , और the sdio , जिससे combines input/output कृत्यों साथ आंकड़ा भंडार  .
The three form factors are the original size , the `` mini  '' आकार , और the `` सूक्ष्म '' आकार ( देखिए उदाहरण  ) .
There  हैं अनेक combinations of रूप कारकों  and device families .
Electrically passive  adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी  card in a host device built to hold a larger card .
Host devices  कि comply साथ नए संस्करण of the specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept पुरानी  SD cards , but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer  वृहद क्षमता than  the host device can handle .
A newer card may use a file  प्रणाली the मेजबान यंत्र can नहीं navigate  .
Use of an SDIO card requires the host device be designed for the  input/output कृत्यों the कार्ड  provides .
The organization of the card was  बदला starting  with the SDHC family .
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB  पहले the sda था मानकीकृत a विधि  of doing so .
The SDA uses  अनेक trademarked लोगो to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ  and assure users of compatibility .
ह्यूज जॉन mungo ग्रान्ट ( born 9 सितंबर 1960  ) is a British actor and film producer .
He has received a Golden Globe ,  a bafta , और an मानद césar .
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4 billion from 25  नाट्य रिलीज विश्वव्यापी  .
Grant achieved international stardom after appearing in Richard  कर्टिस 's कामयाब चार विवाह और a अंत्येष्टि  ( 1994 ) .
He used this breakthrough role as a  बारंबार cinematic persona दौरान the 1990s , delivering कॉमिक  performances in mainstream films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ) .
By the  फेरे of the 21st सदी , he था स्थापित खुद as  a leading man skilled with a satirical comic talent .
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's  डायरी ( 2001 ) , परिचय a लड़के ( 2002 ) , प्रेम दरअसल  ( 2003 ) , and American Dreamz ( 2006 ) .
He later played against type with multiple cameo roles in the epic  नाटक फिल्मी बादल एटलस  ( 2012 ) .
भीतर the फिल्मी उद्योग , ग्रान्ट is cited as an anti-film स्टार  who approaches his roles like a character actor , and attempts to make his acting appear spontaneous .
Hallmarks of his comic  कौशल शामिल a nonchalant टच of विडंबना / sarcasm और पढ़ाई शारीरिक  mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery and facial expressions .
The entertainment media 's coverage of Grant 's  जीवन बंद the बिग स्क्रीन रै प्रायः निष्प्रभ उसके  work as a thespian .
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the profession of acting , and in his disdain towards the  संस्कृति of हस्ती और दुश्मनी towards the मीडिया  .
In a career  spanning 30 सालो , ग्रान्ट रै repeatedly claimed कि एक्टिंग is नहीं  a true calling but just a job he fell into .
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206  bc – 220 ad ) थी an इम्पीरियल राजवंश of चीन , preceded  by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ) .
It was founded by the rebel leader Liu Bang  , ज्ञात मरणोपरांत as सम्राट gaozu  of Han .
It was briefly  बाधित by the xin राजवंश ( 9–23  AD ) of the former regent Wang Mang .
This  interregnum separates the हान into दो अवधि : the पश्चिमी हान ( 206 bc – 9 ad )  and Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ) .
spanning over चार सदियां , the काल of the हान  Dynasty is considered a golden age in Chinese history .
To  इस दिन , चीन 's बहुमत जातीय समूह refers to itself as the  `` Han people '' and the Chinese script is referred to as `` Han characters `` .
The Han Empire was divided into  क्षेत्रों सीधे नियंत्रित by the सेंट्रल सरकारी , ज्ञात as commanderies , और  a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms .
These kingdoms gradually lost all vestiges of their  स्वतंत्रता , विशेषकर following the विद्रोह of  the Seven States .
The Xiongnu ,  a nomadic कनफेडरेशन जिससे वर्चस्व the  eastern Eurasian Steppe , defeated the Han army in battle in 200 BC .
following the शिकस्त , a राजनैतिक विवाह गठबंधन थी negotiated  in which the Han became the de facto inferior partner .
When , despite the treaty , the Xiongnu continued to raid Han borders ,  सम्राट wu of हान ( r. 141–87 bc ) शुभारम्भ  several military campaigns against them .
The ultimate Han victory  in ये युद्धों आखिरकार मजबूर  the Xiongnu to accept vassal status as Han tributaries .
These campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and  helped स्थापित the विशाल व्यापार संजाल ज्ञात as the रेशा सड़क ,  which reached as far as the Mediterranean world .
Han forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into  दो स्पर्धा राष्ट्र , the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी xiongnu , और  forced the Northern Xiongnu across the Ili River .
Despite these victories , the  territories उत्तर of हान 's सीमायें यहूद जल्दी overrun by the nomadic xianbei  Confederation .
After 92 AD , the palace eunuchs  increasingly शामिल themselves in अदालत राजनीती , engaging in हिंसक शक्ति struggles between the विभिन्न consort clans  of the empresses and empress dowagers , causing the Han 's ultimate downfall .
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by large Daoist  धार्मिक समाजों जिससे instigated the पीला पगड़ी विद्रोह और the पाँच pecks  of Rice Rebellion .
Following  the मौत of सम्राट ling ( r. 168–189 ad ) , the राजमहल हिजड़े suffered होलसेल नरसंहार  by military officers , allowing members of the aristocracy and military governors to become warlords and divide the empire .
When  साओ pi , किंग of वेई , usurped the सिंहासन इससे  Emperor Xian , the Han Dynasty ceased to exist .
The Han  राजवंश थी an आयु of आर्थिक समृद्धि और देखी a significant विकास  of the money economy first established during the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ) .
The  coinage जारी by the सेंट्रल सरकारी मिंट in 119  BC remained the standard coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ) .
To pay for its military campaigns and the settlement of newly conquered frontier territories , the  सरकारी राष्ट्रीयकृत the निजी नमक और आयरन उद्योग in 117  BC .
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period , and the lost revenue was  recouped through heavily taxing निजी उद्यमियों  .
The emperor was at  the शिखर of हान समाज  .
He presided over the Han government  लकिन साझा शक्ति साथ दोनो the धामों और नियुक्त मंत्रियों जो आए largely इससे  the scholarly gentry class .
From the reign of Emperor Wu onward , the Chinese court officially  प्रायोजित confucianism in शिक्षा और अदालत राजनीती , synthesized  with the cosmology of later scholars such as Dong Zhongshu .
इस नीति endured जबतक the पतन  of the Qing Dynasty in 1911 AD .
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant advances , including papermaking , the nautical steering rudder , the use of negative numbers in  गणित , the raised-relief मैप , the हाइड्रोलिक -powered armillary गोला लिये खगोलशास्त्र , और a भूकम्पमापी employing an उलट  pendulum .
Tourette syndrome ( also called Tourette 's syndrome , Tourette  's विकार , गाइल्स de la tourette सिंड्रोम , gts or , अधिक commonly , बस tourette 's or ts ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric विकार साथ onset in बाल्यकाल , characterized by अनेक  physical ( motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic .
These tics  characteristically मोम और  wane , can be suppressed temporarily , and are preceded by a premonitory urge .
Tourette  's is पारिभाषित as भाग of a वर्णक्रम of टिक विकार  , which includes transient and chronic tics .
Tourette 's was once considered a rare and bizarre syndrome , most often associated with the exclamation of  obscene शब्द or socially अनुचित और अपमानजनक remarks ( coprolalia ) , लकिन इस लक्षण is उपस्थित in तभी a छोटी अल्पसंख्यक  of people with Tourette 's .
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition , but  it is नहीं सदा correctly पहचाना क्युकी सबसे मामले हैं mild और the गंभीरता of tics decreases  for most children as they pass through adolescence .
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to  18 may have tourette 's ; the व्यापकता of क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age children is उच्चतर , साथ the अधिक आम tics of नजर blinking , खाँसी , गला clearing  , sniffing , and facial movements .
Extreme Tourette  's in adulthood is a rarity , और tourette 's करता नहीं  adversely affect intelligence or life expectancy .
Genetic and  पर्यावरणीय कारकों खेल a भूमिका in the etiology  of Tourette 's , but the exact causes are unknown .
In most cases ,  दवा is अनावश्यक  .
There is no  प्रभावी उपचार लिये प्रत्येक मामला of tics , लकिन निश्चित medications और therapies  can help when their use is warranted .
Education is an important part of any treatment plan , and explanation  और reassurance अलोन हैं प्रायः  sufficient treatment .
Comorbid  शर्तें ( co-occurring diagnoses अन्य than tourette 's ) ऐसे as attention-deficit अतिसक्रियता विकार ( adhd ) और obsessive–compulsive  disorder ( OCD ) are present in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics .
These other conditions often cause more functional impairment to the individual than the tics that are  the hallmark of tourette 's , hence it is महत्वपूर्ण to correctly पहचानो comorbid शर्तें और  treat them .
The eponym was bestowed by  jean-martin charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on निमित्त of उसके निवासी , जॉर्जेस अल्बर्ट édouard ब्रूटस गाइल्स de la tourette ( 1859–1904  ) , a French physician and neurologist , who published an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885 .
सनबीम बैज  .
Sunbeam was a marque  पंजीकृत by जॉन marston co. ltd of wolverhampton  , England , in 1888 .
The company first made bicycles , then motorcycles and cars from the late 19th  सदी जबतक परिचय 1936 , और लागू the marque to सब तीन  forms of transportation .
The company also manufactured aero engines in the First World War and 647 aircraft  दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध  .
A Sunbeam was the first British car to  जीत a ग्रैंड प्रिक्स रेस , और नियत a क्रमांक of  land speed records .
The company  गई into receivership in 1935 और थी खरीदा by  the Rootes Group , which continued to use the Sunbeam marque .
Fox News Channel ( FNC ) , also known as Fox News , is a  केबल न्यूज चैनल स्वामित्व by the फॉक्स entertainment समूह ,  a subsidiary of News Corporation .
As  of अप्रैल 2009 , the चैनल थी उपलब्धियाँ to 102 लाख households in the संयुक्त राज्य  and to viewers internationally , broadcasting primarily from its New York studios .
The  चैनल थी निर्मित by australian-american मीडिया mogul रुपर्ट मर्डोक ,  who hired former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO .
It launched on October 7 ,  1996 to 17 लाख केबल सदस्य  .
It grew  दौरान the लेट 1990s और 2000s to become the प्रबल  cable news network in the United States .
Critics have  stated कि फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल promotes रूढ़िवादी राजनैतिक  positions and biased reporting .
Commentators , news anchors , and reporters at Fox News Channel have  responded कि न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग और राजनैतिक commentary operate independently of प्रत्येक अन्य , और have अस्वीकृत कोई पूर्वाग्रह in न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग  .
The mandibular first molar or six-year  molar is the दाँत स्तिथ distally ( दूर इससे the midline  of the face ) from both the mandibular second premolars of the mouth but mesial ( toward the midline of the face ) from both mandibular second molars .
It is located  on the mandibular ( निम्नतर ) मेहराब of the मुँह , और generally opposes the ऊर्ध्वहनु  ( upper ) first molars and the maxillary 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion .
The function of this molar is similar to that of all  molars in लिहाज़ to पीस होने the प्रिंसिपल कार्रवाई दौरान mastication ,  commonly known as chewing .
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular first molars  : दो on the buccal ( पक्ष निकटतम the गाल ) , दो lingual ( पक्ष निकटतम the जीभ  ) , and one distal .
There are great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars  और those of the स्थाई mandibular molars , भी हालांकि उनके फलन  are similar .
The permanent mandibular molars  हैं नहीं माना to have कोई दांत कि  precede it .
Despite being  नामित molars , the पतझड़ी molars हैं  followed by permanent premolars .
In the universal  प्रणाली of संकेतन , the पतझड़ी  mandibular first molars are designated by a letter written in uppercase .
The  सही पतझड़ी mandibular  first molar is known as `` S '' , and the left one is known as `` L '' .
The international notation has a  अलग प्रणाली of संकेतन  .
Thus , the right deciduous  mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 84  '' , and the left one is known as `` 74 '' .
In the  सार्वभौमिक प्रणाली of संकेतन  , the permanent mandibular first molars are designated by a number .
The right  स्थाई mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 30 ''  , and the left one is known as `` 19 '' .
The  पामर संकेतन उपयोग a क्रमांक in संयोजन साथ a  symbol designating in which quadrant the tooth is found .
For this tooth , the left and right  पहला molars होता have the वही क्रमांक , `` 6 '' , लकिन the सही एक होता have the प्रतीक  , `` ┐ '' , over it , while the left one would have , `` ┌ '' .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संकेतन रै a अलग क्रमांकन प्रणाली than the पिछला दो , और  the right permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 46 '' , and the left one is known as `` 36 '' .
mandibular प्राथमिक पहला molars प्रायः  have four pulp horns .
The first molar is usually the first  स्थाई दाँत to erupt और रै वयस्क undertones  .
Anatomy : The mandibular first  molar रै पाँच पुलिन : the mesiobuccal ( mb , toward midline और गाल ) , mesiolingual ( ml , toward midline  and tongue ) , distolingual ( DL , away from midline and towards tongue ) , distobuccal ( DB , away from midline and toward cheek ) , and distal ( D , away from midline ) , listed in order of decreasing size .
Listed in order of decreasing height they are  : ml , dl , df , mf , और D. an आठवीं cusp थी मिला in a प्राथमिक  second lower molar in an Argentinean child .
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ) , the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( five sided  ) in आकार और tapers toward the lingual , साथ the पहलू होने the buccal सतह , the mesial सतह  , the lingual surface , distal surface , and the distobuccal surface .
The  occlusal सतह रै चार  grooves .
The central groove is not straight but runs down the center of the  दाँत mesially to distally और contains चार गड्ढों ( mesial , सेंट्रल  , central , and distal ) .
The distobuccal groove runs from  the distal गड्ढे in the सेंट्रल नाली distobuccally  separating the distal and distobuccal cusps .
The lingual groove runs from the more distal of the central pits in the central groove toward  the lingual सतह between the mesiolingual और distolingual  cusps .
The buccal groove runs from the more mesial of the central pits in the central groove  toward the buccal सतह between the mesiobuccal और  distobuccal cusps ending in the buccal pit .
The portion of the central groove between the central pits is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory to account for the  स्थितियाँ of the buccal और lingual डोले ( buccal नाली होने अधिक mesial than the lingual नाली जबकि वे  are parallel ) .
From the buccal (  buccal दृश्य ) , दो जड़ें हैं उपस्थित  .
The distal  रूट is generally straighter ,  although both often have a slight distal curvature .
The heights of contour on the mesial and distal contact the adjacent  दांत और हैं स्तिथ at the जंक्शन of the occlusal और मध्य तिहाई of the  crown .
the फ्लोरिडा विधानमंडल is the दो घरों कि अधिनियम as  the state legislature of the U.S. state of Florida .
The Florida Constitution states that `` The legislative power of the state shall be vested  in a विधानमंडल of the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा , '' रचित of a सीनेट और हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  .
The legislature is seated  at the फ्लोरिडा राज्य  Capitol in Tallahassee .
Stained glass  चित्रण of डेनियल interceding  with Arioch , the king 's guard .
Arioch had been charged with killing all the wise men  बाद वे यहूद नहीं समर्थ to interpret nebuchadnezzar  's dream .
Daniel 2  is the दूसरी अध्याय of the किताब  of Daniel in the Hebrew Bible .
The chapter 's source text is  predominantly लिखा  in Aramaic .
According to the text , Nebuchadnezzar is the king of Babylon  जो is troubled by उसके सपनो  .
He demands an interpretation for his dreams or  होगा have उसके रहस्यवादी interpreters चलाया  .
Daniel seeks Divine Wisdom to interpret the  किंग 's सपनो और गुणगान परमेश्वर  with a short psalm .
God gives  डेनियल a दृष्टि in the  night to reveal the king 's dream .
Able to satisfy the king , Daniel is  प्रचारित over the पूरे प्रांत of बाबुल  .
One Comcast Center , the  मुख्यालय of comcast in फिलाडेल्फिया  , PA .
The old  comcast लोगो इससे 1969 to 1999  , when it was replaced with the crescent logo .
The Comcast Corporation  is an अमरीकी प्रदाता of entertainment  , information and communications products and services .
It is the largest cable operator , one of the biggest mass media , home  अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाता , और तीसरा largest घर टेलीफोन सेवा प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य , providing केबल टेलीविज़न , ब्रॉडबैंड अंतरजाल , टेलीफोन सेवा और in कुछ क्षेत्रों घर सुरक्षा ( सहित burglar सचेतक , निगरानी कैमरे ,  fire alarm systems and home automation ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the District of Columbia .
The company is  headquartered in फिलाडेल्फिया , पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
In 2011 , Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate  nbcuniversal इससे ge in जनवरी 2011 , और began the प्रक्रम of खरीदना the बाकी 49 % on फ़रवरी  12 , 2013 , at a cost of $ 16.7 billion .
It  समाप्त the खरीदें on कूच  19 , 2013 .
Comcast  भी रै significant पकड़कर  in several cable networks ( including E !
entertainment टेलीविज़न , स्टाइल संजाल , g4 ,  the Golf Channel and NBC Sports Network ) , distribution ( ThePlatform ) , and related businesses .
Comcast has been the  विषय of आलोचना लिये क्रियाएँ सहित इसके stance on जाल neutrality  , as well as poor results on customer satisfaction surveys .
porcupines हैं rodents साथ a कोट of शार्प  spines , or quills , that defend and camouflage them from predators .
They are indigenous to the Americas  , दक्षिणी एशिया , और  Africa .
porcupines हैं the तीसरा largest of the  rodents , behind the capybara and the beaver .
Most  porcupines हैं परिचय long  , with an long tail .
Weighing , they are  rounded , विशाल और  slow .
Porcupines come in various shades of  भूरा , धूसर , और the असामान्य  white .
Porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated  erinaceomorph hedgehogs और monotreme  echidnas .
The common  साही is a herbivore  .
It eats leaves , herbs ,  टहनियों और ग्रीन पौधे जैसे skunk गोभी  and clover and in the winter it may eat bark .
The North American porcupine often climbs  पेड़ to ढूँढें खाना .
The African porcupine is not a  climber और forages on the मैदान  .
It is mostly nocturnal , but  होगा sometimes forage लिये खाना in the  day .
porcupines have become a pest in कीनिया और  are eaten as a delicacy .
The name porcupine  आता इससे मध्य फ्रेंच  porc espin ( spined pig ) .
A  क्षेत्रीय अमरीकी नाम लिये  the animal is quill pig .
First page of US  पेटेंट 129,843 लिये सुधार in  Lubricators for Steam-Engines
Elijah J. McCoy (  may 2 , 1844 – अक्तूबर 10 , 1929 ) थी a ब्लैक canadian-american आविष्कारक और इंजीनियर , जो थी notable लिये उसके 57 u.S. patents  , most to do with lubrication of steam engines .
Born free in Canada , he returned as a  five-year-old चाइल्ड साथ उसके परिवार to the संयुक्त राज्य in 1847 , जहाँ he जिया लिये the  rest of his life and became a US citizen .
Honda FCX Clarity , a hydrogen fuel  कोशिका demonstration गाडी introduced  in 2008
A hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle that uses hydrogen as  इसके onboard ईंधन लिये motive शक्ति  .
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen fueled space rockets  , as खूब as ऑटोमोबाइल और अन्य परिवहन  vehicles .
The power plants of such  वाहनों बदलें the रासायनिक उर्जा of हाइड्रोजन to mechanical उर्जा either by burning हाइड्रोजन in an आतंरिक दहन  engine , or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel cell to run electric motors .
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling  परिवहन is a कुंजी तत्व of a प्रस्तावित हाइड्रोजन  economy .
हाइड्रोजन ईंधन करता नहीं occur naturally on धरती और यूँ is नहीं an उर्जा  source ; rather it is an energy carrier .
It is most frequently  बना इससे मिथेन or अन्य चट्टान fuels , लकिन it can be उत्पादित using स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as हवा , सौर , or नाभिकीय  ) that are intermittent , too diffuse or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles .
एकीकृत wind-to-hydrogen पौधे , using electrolysis  of water , are exploring technologies to deliver costs low enough , and quantities great enough , to compete with traditional energy sources .
Many companies are working to develop technologies  कि might efficiently exploit the संभावित of हाइड्रोजन उर्जा  for mobile uses .
The attraction of using  हाइड्रोजन as an उर्जा करेंसी is कि , if हाइड्रोजन  is prepared without using fossil fuel inputs , vehicle propulsion would not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions .
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost , low energy content per unit volume , high tankage weights , very high storage vessel pressures , the storage , transportation and filling of  गैसीय or द्रव हाइड्रोजन in वाहनों , the विशाल निवेश in  infrastructure that would be required to fuel vehicles , and the inefficiency of production processes .
Sacramento is the capital city  of the u.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी of sacramento  County .
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American  नदी in the उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive सेंट्रल घाटी  .
With an  अनुमानित 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891 , it is the sixth-largest  city in California and the 35th largest city in the United States .
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of  the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात काउंटी साथ an  estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth  largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया बाद the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल , सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल , और  the San Diego metropolitan area , as well as the 25th largest in the United States .
sacramento थी cited by समय पत्रिका as  America 's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city  through the प्रयत्न of the स्विस अप्रवासी जॉन sutter , sr. , उसके बेटे जॉन  Sutter , Jr. , and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew quickly thanks  to the सुरक्षा of sutter 's फोर्ट , जिससे थी स्थापित  by Sutter in 1839 .
During the California Gold Rush , Sacramento was a major  वितरण पाइंट , a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच , और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल , stagecoaches  , riverboats , the telegraph , the Pony Express , and the First Transcontinental Railroad .
California State University ,  sacramento , अधिक commonly ज्ञात as sacramento राज्य or सैक  State , is the largest local university .
It is one of the  twenty-three campuses of  the California State University system .
Drexel  विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in शहर  , Sacramento .
University of the Pacific 's  mcgeorge स्कूल of विधि is स्तिथ in  the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California , Davis  is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस , वेस्ट of  the capital .
The UC Davis Medical Center , a world-renowned research hospital , is  स्तिथ in the नगर of sacramento  .
The Apple Store is a chain of  खुदरा स्टोर्स स्वामित्व और संचालित by ठहराना inc. , dealing in कंप्यूटर  and consumer electronics .
The stores sell Macintosh personal computers , software ,  ipods , ipads , आईफ़ोन , third-party accessories , और अन्य उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स ऐसे  as Apple TV .
Some high profile stores feature a Theatre for presentations and  वर्कशॉप और a स्टुडियो लिये प्रशिक्षण साथ ठहराना उत्पाद ; सब स्टोर्स प्रस्ताव a प्रतिभाशाली बार लिये तकनीकी support और मरम्मत  , as well as free workshops available to the public .
Under the leadership of Ron Johnson , the former Senior Vice President of Retail  परिचालन , the ठहराना स्टोर्स have , according to an आलेख in the नई यॉर्क टाइम्स , महरूम जिम्मेदार लिये `` [ turning ] the  boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets '' .
, Apple has 405 stores worldwide , with global sales of billion in  merchandise in 2011 , और वे सीसे the संयुक्त राज्य खुदरा  market in terms of sales per unit area .
स्टीवन पॉल `` स्टीव '' कार्य ( ; फ़रवरी 24 , 1955 – अक्तूबर 5 , 2011 ) थी an अमरीकी उद्योगों  and inventor , best known as the co-founder , chairman , and CEO of Apple Inc .
Through Apple , he was widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer revolution and for his  influential करियर in the कंप्यूटर और उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स फ़ील्ड , transforming `` एक उद्योग  after another , from computers and smartphones to music and movies ... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a member  of the फलक of निर्देशकों of the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी कम्पनी in 2006 , जब डिज़्नी acquired  Pixar .
Jobs was among the first to  देखिए the वाणिज्यिक संभावित of xerox parc 's चूहा -ड्राइवn आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस , जिससे led  to the creation of the Apple Lisa and , one year later , the Macintosh .
He also  निभाई a भूमिका in introducing the laserwriter ,  one of the first widely available laser printers , to the market .
बाद a शक्ति संघर्ष साथ the फलक of निर्देशकों in 1985 , कार्य  left Apple and founded NeXT , a computer platform development company specializing in the higher-education and business markets .
In 1986 , he acquired the computer  ग्राफिक्स प्रभाग of लुकासफ़िल्म , जिससे थी  spun off as Pixar .
He was credited  in खिलौना स्टोरी ( 1995 ) as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता  .
he परोसा as सीईओ और बहुमत shareholder  until Disney 's purchase of Pixar in 2006 .
In 1996 , after Apple had  विफल to उद्धार इसके ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली , copland , gil amelio turned to अगला कंप्यूटर , और the nextstep मंच  became the foundation for the Mac OS X .
कार्य लौटे to ठहराना as an सलाहकार , और  took control of the company as an interim CEO .
Jobs  brought ठहराना इससे निकट दिवालियापन to  profitability by 1998 .
As the new CEO of the company , Jobs oversaw the development of  the imac , itunes , ipod , iphone , और ipad , और on the सेवाएं पक्ष  , the company 's Apple Retail Stores , iTunes Store and the App Store .
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable financial returns , and  propelled ठहराना to become the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान सरेआम  traded company in 2011 .
The reinvigoration of the company is regarded by  अनेक टीकाकारों as एक of the महानतम turnarounds  in business history .
In  2003 , कार्य थी diagnosed  with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor .
Though it was initially treated , he reported a hormone imbalance , underwent a liver  प्रत्यारोपण in 2009 , और appeared progressively thinner as उसके स्वास्थ्य अस्वीकृत  .
On medical  छोड़ लिये सबसे of 2011 , कार्य resigned in  August that year , and was elected Chairman of the Board .
He died of respiratory arrest  सम्बन्धित to उसके metastatic  tumor on October 5 , 2011 .
Jobs received a number of honors and public recognition for his  influence in the प्रौद्योगिकी और म्यूज़िक उद्योग  .
He has been referred to as `` legendary '' , a `` futurist '' or  बस `` दूरदर्शी '' , और रै महरूम वर्णित as the `` पिता of the डिजिटल क्रान्ति '' , a `` निपुण  of innovation '' , and a `` design perfectionist '' .
