Roman numerals , the numeric system in  प्राचीन रोम , उपयोग combinations of अक्षर इससे  the Latin alphabet to signify values .
the संख्याएँ 1 to 10 can be expressed  in Roman numerals as follows:
और  .
The Roman  numeral प्रणाली is a cousin of etruscan  numerals .
Use of Roman  numerals जारी बाद the मनाही  of the Roman Empire .
From the 14th century on , Roman numerals began to be replaced in most contexts by more convenient  hindu-arabic numerals ; however इस प्रक्रम थी क्रमिक , और the उपयोग of रोमन numerals in कुछ नाबालिग अनुप्रयोग continues  to this day .
Effective  नाभिकीय चार्ज आरेख
The effective  नाभिकीय चार्ज ( प्रायः symbolize as or Z* ) is the जाल धनात्मक  charge experienced by an electron in a multi-electron atom .
The term `` effective '' is  प्रयुक्त क्युकी the shielding प्रभाव of negatively चार्ज  electrons prevents higher orbital electrons from experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons .
The effective nuclear  चार्ज अनुभवी by the बाहरी शेल इलेक्ट्रॉन  is also called the core charge .
It is  संभावित to determine the शक्ति of the नाभिकीय चार्ज  by looking at the oxidation number of the atom .
This is a  सूची of एपीसोड इससे the डिस्कवरी चैनल श्रेणी  , Storm Chasers .
A rural stretch of I-5 , with two lanes in each direction separated  by a विशाल grassy मध्य , और साथ cross-traffic सीमित  to overpasses and underpasses
the ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर नेशनल प्रणाली of अंतरराज्यीय और रक्षा राजमार्गों ( commonly ज्ञात as the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली , अंतरराज्यीय फ्रीवे प्रणाली , अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली , or बस the अंतरराज्यीय ) is a संजाल  of freeways that forms a part of the National Highway System of the United States .
The system is named for  अध्यक्ष ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , जो championed  its formation .
निर्माण थी प्राधिकृत by the संघीय सहायता राजमार्ग अधिनियम of  1956 , and the original portion was completed 35 years later .
The network has since been extended , and , it had a  कुल लंबाई of , बनाना it the संसार 's दूसरी longest बाद चीन 's . , परिचय one-quarter  of all vehicle miles driven in the country use the Interstate system .
The cost of construction has been estimated at $ 425 billion ( in  2006 डॉलर ) , बनाना it the `` largest पब्लिक works कार्यक्रम चूंकि  the Pyramids `` .
The  प्रणाली रै contributed in shaping the संयुक्त राज्य into a संसार आर्थिक  superpower and a highly industrialized nation .
.eu is the country code  top-level डोमेन ( cctld )  for the European Union ( EU ) .
शुभारम्भ on 7 दिसम्बर 2005 , the डोमेन is उपलब्धियाँ  for organisations in and residents of EU member states .
The TLD is administered by EURid , a consortium originally  consisting of the नेशनल cctld रजिस्ट्री ऑपरेटर of बेल्जियम , स्वीडन  , and Italy , joined later by the national registry operator of the Czech Republic .
Trademark owners were able to submit  पंजीकरण through a सूर्योदय काल , in an प्रयत्न  to prevent cybersquatting .
Full  पंजीकरण प्रारंभ on 7  April 2006 .
Meister means  निपुण in जर्मनी ( as in निपुण craftsman  , or as an honorific title such as Meister Eckhart ) .
The  शब्द is akin  to maestro .
In sports ,  meister is प्रयुक्त लिये the वर्तमान नेशनल , यूरोपीय or संसार  champion ( Deutscher Meister , *Europameister , Weltmeister ) .
Many modern day German police forces use  the शीर्षक meister .
During the Second World War , Meister was the highest  आयोजिक रैंक of the ordnungspolizei  .
Meister has been  उधार into अंग्रेज़ी कठबोली , जहाँ it  is used in compound nouns .
A person referred to as “Meister” is one who has extensive  सैद्धांतिक ज्ञान और व्यावहारिक कौशल in उसके व्यवसायिक , कारोबार , or कुछ अन्य  kind of work or activity .
For example , a  “puzzle-meister” होता be किसी अत्यधिक skilled at  solving puzzles .
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for  उदाहरण , “stubble-meister” लिये किसी साथ a छोटी , neat दाढ़ी or “crier-meister”  for someone who often cries ) .
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an American live-action children 's television series about teenagers with super-powers ,  आधारित on the 16th किश्त of the जापानी सुपर sentai मताधिकार , kyōryū sentai  Zyuranger .
Both the show and its related merchandise saw unbridled  overnight कामयाबी , बनने a स्टेपल of  1990s pop culture in mere months .
Under  the असली नाम , `` mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों '' the श्रेणी भागा इससे  1993 to 1995 and spawned the feature film Mighty Morphin Power Rangers : The Movie .
The second and third seasons of the  दिखाएँ खींचा on फुटेज और तत्व इससे the सुपर sentai श्रेणी gosei sentai dairanger और निंजा sentai kakuranger क्रमशः , हालांकि the  Zyuranger costumes were still used for the five main Rangers and several regular villains .
Only the mecha and the Kiba Ranger costume  ( worn by the श्वेत रेंजर ) यहूद retained इससे dairanger लिये the दूसरी ऋतु , जबकि  only the mecha from Kakuranger were featured in the third season .
However the Kakuranger costumes were later  प्रयुक्त लिये the शीर्षक वर्ण of the mini-series , mighty morphin एलियन  Rangers .
The series was produced by MMPR Productions , distributed by  saban entertainment , और aired on फॉक्स बच्चे  .
The show  's merchandise थी उत्पादित और वितरित  by Bandai Entertainment .
In 1996 , the series was rebranded as the Power Rangers franchise ; renaming  the श्रेणी प्रत्येक साल बाद , और using वेशभूषा , प्रॉप्स , और फुटेज इससे subsequent सुपर  Sentai series , as well as changing the cast and storyline .
जबकि an overarching कथानक होता continue जबतक शक्ति रेंजरों  Lost Galaxy , subsequent series after MMPR are not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense .
In 2010 , a re-version of Mighty Morphin Power Rangers , with a new logo , comic book-referenced graphics , and extra  वैकल्पिक खास प्रभाव , थी ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी बच्चे , और बंदाई उत्पादित ब्रांड नई खिलौने to coincide  with the series .
एडगर allan पो ( born एडगर पो ; जनवरी 19 , 1809 – अक्तूबर 7 , 1849 )  was an American author , poet , editor and literary critic , considered part of the American Romantic Movement .
Best known for his tales of  रहस्य और the घोर , पो थी एक of the earliest अमरीकी practitioners of the छोटी स्टोरी और is generally  considered the inventor of the detective fiction genre .
He is further credited with contributing to the  उभरते विधा of विज्ञान fiction  .
He was the first well-known American writer to try to  earn a जीना through लिखने अलोन , resulting in a financially  difficult life and career .
He was born as  एडगर पो in बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स ; he थी अनाथ यंग जब उसके माँ died  shortly after his father abandoned the family .
Poe was taken in by  जॉन और frances allan , of रिचमंड ,  Virginia , but they never formally adopted him .
He attended the  विश्वविद्यालयों of वर्जिनिया लिये एक सेमेस्टर लकिन बाएँ  due to lack of money .
After enlisting in the Army and later failing as an  अधिकारी 's cadet at वेस्ट पाइंट , पो parted तरीके  with the Allans .
His publishing career began humbly , with an anonymous collection of poems ,  tamerlane और अन्य कविताएं ( 1827 ) , credited तभी to  `` a Bostonian '' .
Poe switched  उसके फ़ोकस to गद्य और खर्च the अगला अनेक सालो working लिये साहित्यिक जर्नल्स  and periodicals , becoming known for his own style of literary criticism .
His work forced him to  मूव among अनेक शहरों , सहित बाल्टीमोर , फिलाडेल्फिया  , and New York City .
In  बाल्टीमोर in 1835 , he शादीशुदा वर्जिनिया clemm  , his 13-year-old cousin .
In January 1845 Poe published his poem ,  `` the रेवेन `` , to तत्काल  success .
His wife died of  तपेदिक दो सालो बाद इसके प्रकाशन  .
He began planning to produce his own journal , The Penn ( later renamed The  स्टाइलस ) , हालांकि he died पहले it could be उत्पादित  .
on अक्तूबर 7 , 1849 , at आयु 40 , पो died in बाल्टीमोर ; the कारण of उसके मौत is  unknown and has been variously attributed to alcohol , brain congestion , cholera , drugs , heart disease , rabies , suicide , tuberculosis , and other agents .
Poe and his works influenced  साहित्य in the संयुक्त राज्य और around the संसार , as खूब as in specialized फ़ील्ड , ऐसे as cosmology  and cryptography .
Poe and his work  appear throughout लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in साहित्य , म्यूज़िक , films  , and television .
A  क्रमांक of उसके घरों हैं  dedicated museums today .
The  रहस्य लेखक of अमेरिका उपस्थित an सालाना पुरस्कार ज्ञात  as the Edgar Award for distinguished work in the mystery genre .
Lions are  obligate carnivores ; वे आवश्यकता up to सात  kilograms ( 15 lbs ) of meat per day .
A major component of their diet is the  flesh of विशाल स्तनधारियों , जैसे  this African buffalo .
A carnivore ( ) meaning  'meat भक्षक ' ( लैटिन , caro अर्थ 'meat ' or 'flesh ' और vorare अर्थ 'to devour ' ) is  an organism that derives its energy and nutrient requirements from a diet consisting mainly or exclusively of animal tissue , whether through predation or scavenging .
Animals that depend  solely on एनिमल flesh लिये उनके nutrient आवश्यकताएँ हैं माना carnivores  while those that also consume non-animal food are considered carnivores .
Omnivores also consume both animal and non-animal food , and apart from the more  सामान्य परिभाषा , वहीँ is no clearly पारिभाषित अनुपात of संयंत्र to एनिमल सामग्री कि  would distinguish a facultative carnivore from an omnivore .
A carnivore that  sits at the शीर्ष of the foodchain is an apex  predator .
Plants that  कैप्चर और डाइजेस्ट कीट हैं  called carnivorous plants .
Similarly , fungi that capture  microscopic पशु हैं प्रायः पुकारा  carnivorous fungi .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football competition contested by the senior men  's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ) , the खेल 's वैश्विक शासी  body .
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930 , except in 1942  और 1946 जब it थी नहीं आयोजित क्युकी of the दूसरी  World War .
The  वर्तमान champions हैं स्पेन , जो जीती  the 2010 tournament .
The  वर्तमान स्वरूप of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान  nation ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification  phase , जिससे फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो ,  is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup  tournaments have महरूम जीती by आठ अलग नेशनल  teams .
Brazil have won five times , and they are the only team to  have निभाई in प्रत्येक टूर्नामेंट  .
The other World Cup winners are Italy  , साथ चार शीर्षक ; जर्मनी , साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता  Uruguay , with two titles each ; and England , France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is the  संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख लोगों देखी the फाइनल  match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will be  hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014 , रूस in 2018 , और क़तर  in 2022 .
Heroes is an American science fiction television  नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by टिम क्रिंग कि appeared on एनबीसी लिये चार  seasons from September 25 , 2006 through February 8 , 2010 .
The  श्रेणी tells the कहानियां of ordinary लोगों जो discover superhuman  abilities , and how these abilities take effect in the characters ' lives .
The series emulates the aesthetic style and storytelling of  अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे , using multi-episode स्टोरी arcs कि निर्माण upon a larger , अधिक encompassing  arc .
The series was produced by Tailwind  प्रोडक्शन्स in संघ  with Universal Media Studios .
It was  फिल्माया primarily in लॉस एंजिल्स ,  California .
Four complete seasons  aired , समाप्ति on फ़रवरी  8 , 2010 .
The critically acclaimed first season had a run of 23 episodes and  garnered an औसत of 14.3 लाख दर्शक in the संयुक्त राज्य , receiving the उच्चतम दरजा लिये an एनबीसी  drama premiere in five years .
The second season of Heroes attracted an average of 13.1 million viewers in the U.S. ,  और चिह्नित एनबीसी 's एकमात्र श्रेणी among the शीर्ष 20 क्रमित कार्यक्रम in कुल viewership लिये the 2007–2008  season .
Heroes has  अर्जित a क्रमांक of पुरस्कार और nominations , सहित प्राइमटाइम एमी पुरस्कार ,  Golden Globes , People 's Choice Awards and British Academy Television Awards .
An online  एक्सटेंशन of the श्रेणी , नायक 360 अनुभव , बाद rebranded as नायक evolutions ,  was created to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight into the show 's mythology .
Other official Heroes media include  मैगज़ीन , कार्रवाई आंकड़े , tie-in और इंटरैक्टिव वेबसाइटों , a मोबाईल खेल , a अनोखा  , clothing and other merchandise .
In the fall of 2008 , NBC Digital Entertainment  released a श्रेणी of ऑनलाइन सामग्री लिये the गर्मियाँ , सहित अधिक असली वेब सामग्री , बेतार आईटीवी interactivity  , graphic novels available for mobile viewing and webisodes .
NBC announced Heroes  रद्दीकरण on may 14  , 2010 .
Afterward , the network considered making a television special event to conclude the series ; however , on September 9 , 2010 , NBC announced the decision  to रोकें कोई further विकास of the नायक मताधिकार  .
Tim Kring then suggested that the broad premise of  नायक storylines अनुमत लिये the मताधिकार to वापसी लिये प्रशंसक , लकिन he किया  not specify when or in what media format .
On April 17  , 2013 , tv लकीर reported कि एमएसएन थी in बाते to revive  the series with a new cast .
जॉन pierpont  `` J. P . ''
Morgan ( April 17 , 1837 – March 31 , 1913 ) was  an अमरीकी फाइनेंसर , बैंकर , लोकसेवक और आर्ट कलेक्टर जो वर्चस्व कॉरपोरेट वित्त  and industrial consolidation during his time .
In 1892 Morgan arranged the merger of Edison General Electric  और thomson-houston इलेक्ट्रिक कम्पनी to रूप सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक  .
After financing the creation of the Federal Steel Company , he merged in 1901 with the  कार्नेगी स्टील कम्पनी और अनेक अन्य स्टील और आयरन व्यवसायों , सहित संचित स्टील  and Wire Company owned by William Edenborn , to form the United States Steel Corporation .
Morgan died in  रोम , इटली , in उसके नींद in 1913 at the आयु of 75 , leaving उसके  fortune and business to his son , John Pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan , Jr. , and bequeathing his mansion and large book collections to The Morgan Library & Museum in New York .
At the height of Morgan 's career during the early 1900s , he and his partners had financial  निवेश in अनेक विशाल corporations और यहूद अभियुक्त by आलोचकों of controlling the स्वदेश 's ऊँची वित्त  .
He directed the banking  गठबन्धन कि रोका the दहशत  of 1907 .
he थी the अग्रणी फाइनेंसर of the प्रगतिशील era , और  his dedication to efficiency and modernization helped transform American business .
This is a list of episodes  of the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  .
The episodes were directed by Shigeru Ueda and produced by the  yggdrasil कार्यपालिका कमेटी जिससे शामिल xebec और genco  .
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo and revolves around Rin Asōgi , an  अमर निजी अन्वेषक , as वो explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future  world and the supernatural events that surround the fictional society of immortals like herself .
There are large  समय गैप in the आतंरिक कालक्रम between the पहला पाँच एपीसोड  , ranging from one to thirty years .
The six episodes were  ब्रॉडकास्ट मासिक on at-x चैनल in जापानी , between फ़रवरी 3 और जुलाई  6 , 2008 .
प्रत्येक एपीसोड is 45 मिनट्स  long .
Two pieces of theme music are used for the episodes  : the खोलने थीम `` alsatia '' और the समाप्ति थीम `` कारण  Disarray '' .
Both were  रचित और performed by the  Japanese metal band Galneryus .
The series was produced to  commemorate the दसवाँ वर्षगांठ of the  AT-X network it originally aired on .
Aerial photo of FLETC , where US digital  forensics मानकों यहूद विकसित in the 1980s  and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes known as digital forensic science ) is a branch of forensic science  encompassing the रिकवरी और छानबीन of सामग्री मिला in डिजिटल डिवाइस ,  often in relation to computer crime .
The term digital forensics was originally used as a synonym for computer forensics  लकिन रै विस्तारित to कवर छानबीन of सब  devices capable of storing digital data .
With roots in the personal computing revolution of the late 1970s and early '80s , the discipline evolved in a  haphazard manner दौरान the 1990s , और it थी नहीं जबतक the जल्दी 21st सदी कि नेशनल  policies emerged .
Digital forensics  investigations have a किस्में of अनुप्रयोग  .
The most  आम is to support or खण्डन a परिकल्पना पहले दण्ड or  civil ( as part of the electronic discovery process ) courts .
Forensics may also feature in the private sector ;  ऐसे as दौरान आतंरिक कॉरपोरेट investigations or intrusion छानबीन ( a विशेषज्ञ जांच into the प्रकृति  and extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ) .
The technical aspect of an investigation is divided into several sub-branches , relating to the  प्रकार of डिजिटल डिवाइस शामिल ; कंप्यूटर forensics , संजाल forensics , forensic आंकड़ा विश्लेषण और मोबाईल यंत्र forensics  .
The  ठेठ forensic प्रक्रम encompasses the seizure , forensic इमेजिंग ( अधिग्रहण ) और विश्लेषण  of digital media and the production of a report into collected evidence .
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime , digital forensics can be used to attribute evidence to specific suspects , confirm alibis or  कथन , determine intent , पहचानो स्त्रोत ( लिये उदाहरण , in कापीराइट  cases ) , or authenticate documents .
Investigations are much broader in scope than other areas of forensic analysis ( where the usual aim is to provide  जवाब to a श्रेणी of simpler सवाल ) प्रायः involving जटिल time-lines or hypotheses  .
A  तुलना of the chromaticities enclosed  by some color spaces .
A color model is an abstract mathematical model describing the way colors can be  represented as tuples of संख्याएँ , typically as तीन or चार मान or रंग components ( e.g . आरजीबी और cmyk हैं रंग मॉडल  ) .
However , a color model with no associated mapping function to an absolute color space is a more or  कम मनमानी रंग प्रणाली साथ no कनेक्शन to कोई  globally understood system of color interpretation .
Adding a certain mapping function between  the रंग मॉडल और a निश्चित सन्दर्भ रंग स्पेस परिणाम in a definite  `` footprint '' within the reference color space .
This ``  पदचिह्न '' is ज्ञात as a gamut , और , in संयोजन  with the color model , defines a new color space .
For example , Adobe RGB  और srgb हैं दो अलग निरपेक्ष रंग स्पेसेस , दोनो आधारित  on the RGB model .
In the most generic sense of the  परिभाषा ऊपर , रंग स्पेसेस can be पारिभाषित बगैर the  use of a color model .
These  स्पेसेस , ऐसे as pantone , हैं in प्रभाव a दिए नियत of names or संख्याएँ जिससे हैं पारिभाषित  by the existence of a corresponding set of physical color swatches .
This article  focuses on the गणितीय  model concept .
Labor Day is an American federal holiday observed on  the पहला सोमवार in सितंबर , कि मनाता the  economic and social contributions of workers .
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy holder ) and an insurer , where the insurer promises to pay a  designated लाभार्थी a योग of धन ( the `` लाभ '' ) upon the मौत of the insured व्यक्ति  .
Depending on the  अनुबंध , अन्य कार्यक्रम ऐसे as टर्मिनल बीमारी or नाजुक बीमारी  may also trigger payment .
the नीति होल्डर typically pays  a premium , either regularly or as a lump sum .
Other expenses ( such as  अंत्येष्टि खर्च ) हैं भी sometimes शामिल  in the benefits .
Life policies are legal  अनुबंध और the शर्तें of the अनुबंध describe the सीमाएं of the insured  events .
Specific exclusions are often written into the contract to limit the  देयता of the insurer ; आम उदाहरण हैं दावा relating to आत्महत्या , धोखाधड़ी , युद्ध  , riot and civil commotion .
Life-based  अनुबंध tend to पतन into दो  major categories:
Protection policies – designed to  provide a लाभ in the इवेंट of निर्दिष्ट इवेंट , typically a  lump sum payment .
A  आम रूप  of this design is term insurance .
निवेश नीतियों – जहाँ  the main objective is to facilitate the growth of capital by regular or single premiums .
आम फ़ॉर्म ( in the us  ) are whole life , universal life and variable life policies .

9 – 12 February (  वियतनाम )
Mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born May 2 , 1962  in yorba लिंडा , नारंगी काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  , also credited and more popularly known as Mitzi Kapture .
Kapture began her  करियर in films , सबसे of जिससे यहूद नहीं  huge commercial successes .
She went on to  मेक a few टेलीविज़न अतिथि दिखावे ( macgyver , 1st & टेन , और as a प्रतियोगी  on The $ 100,000 Pyramid ) before she gained international exposure with her first major television role as Sergeant Rita Lee Lance in the television series Silk Stalkings .
kapture 's भूमिका as रीता , the अन्य हाफ of  the two `` Sams '' for almost 5 years , cemented her popularity .
Paired with Rob Estes who played Sergeant  क्रिस lorenzo , kapture gained वैश्विक मान्यता साथ साथ उसके costar चूंकि the दिखाएँ थी  broadcast in several countries .
Sergeant Lance eventually became Lieutenant  तलवार by the समय kapture बाएँ the श्रेणी in 1995 to have  her first child Madison .
दौरान उसके समय साथ the श्रेणी , kapture briefly सत in  the director 's chair , for two episodes .
She was interviewed for the Silk  stalkings ऋतु 1 dvd जिससे थी वितरित  by Anchor Bay Entertainment and released in September 2004 .
After a short hiatus from the screen following her exit from Silk Stalkings ,  kapture लौटे in 1997 to the छोटी स्क्रीन और  USA Network .
She played lead roles in two USA Pictures  मूल telemovies , पूर्ण अपराधों ( आधारित on a सच्चा स्टोरी , भी पुकारा छुपा और तलाश  : The Joanne Jensen Story ) , which also starred Jasmine Guy and His Bodyguard .
She later starred in a few other independent film projects and  थिएटर प्रोडक्शन्स और था अनेक टेलीविज़न अतिथि दिखावे  .
Kapture also had a  पुनरावर्ती भूमिका  on Baywatch as Alexis Ryker .
She played Anita Hodges on The  यंग और the बेचैन इससे 2002 through 2004 , जहाँ वो थी credited as mitzi kapture donahue , और स्ट्रक्चर  in the made-for-TV movie Night of Terror which premiered March 26 , 2006 on Lifetime Network .
Her latest is  a supporting भूमिका in परमेश्वर 's कानों ,  released in 2007 .
Kapture is the  आधिकारिक हस्ती  spokesperson for the Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society .
The Xbox 360 is the second video game console  विकसित by और उत्पादित लिये microsoft और the successor  to the Xbox .
The  एक्सबॉक्स 360 competes साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन  3 and Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles .
As of  सितंबर 30 , 2012 , 70 लाख एक्सबॉक्स 360 consoles have  been sold worldwide .
The Xbox 360 was officially unveiled on MTV on May 12 , 2005 ,  साथ विस्तृत लॉन्च और खेल सूचना divulged बाद कि माह at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment  Expo ( E3 ) .
The console sold out  completely upon रिलीज in सब regions  except in Japan .
Several major features of the Xbox 360 are its integrated Xbox Live service that allows players to compete online ; download arcade games , game demos ,  trailers , tv shows , म्यूज़िक और फिल्मों ; और इसके खिड़कियाँ मीडिया बीच मल्टीमीडिया सामर्थ्य  .
The Xbox Live  भी offers अभिगम to विभिन्न ( प्रायः region-specific  ) third-party media streaming applications .
At their E3 presentation on June 14 , 2010 ,  microsoft घोषित a redesigned एक्सबॉक्स 360  that would ship on the same day .
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous  एक्सबॉक्स 360 मॉडल और सुविधाएँ एकीकृत 802.11 b/g/n wi-fi , toslink s/pdif ऑप्टिकल ऑडियो आउटपुट , पाँच usb 2.0  ports ( compared to the three from older versions ) and a special AUX port .
Older models of the  एक्सबॉक्स 360 have चूंकि महरूम discontinued  .
The  पहला नई कंसोल to be released सुविधाएँ a 250 gb मुश्किल ड्राइव  , while a later , less expensive SKU features 4 GB internal storage .
Backpack  may भी refer to a 2001  novel by Emily Barr
A  आधुनिक backpack
स्विस फौज backpack  ca . 1960
एकीकृत तुमको  frame .
A backpack ( also called rucksack , knapsack , packsack , pack ) is , in its simplest form , a cloth sack carried  on एक 's वापस और secured साथ दो straps कि go over the कन्धों ,  but there can be exceptions .
Lightweight types of backpacks are  sometimes worn on तभी एक कंधे डोरी  .
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or carrying any sort of  उपकरण , क्युकी of the सीमित क्षमता to carry भारी weights लिये long अवधि of समय  in the hands .
Large backpacks , used to  carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 पाउंड ) , प्रायः offload the largest भाग ( up to परिचय 90 % ) of उनके वज़न onto padded हिप बेल्ट  , leaving the shoulder straps mainly for stabilising the load .
This improves the potential to carry heavy loads , as the hips are  stronger than the कन्धों , और भी increases चपलता और संतुलन , चूंकि the लोड यात्राएँ nearer the wearer 's अपना बीच of  mass .
In ancient times , the  backpack थी प्रयुक्त as a अर्थात् to carry the शिकारी 's larger  game and other types of prey and as a way of easier transport for other materials .
In the cases of larger hunts , the hunters would dismember their prey and distribute the pieces of the  एनिमल around , प्रत्येक एक पैकिंग the मांस into अनेक wrappings और तब into बैग जिससे  they placed on to their backs .
The bag  itself थी बना up of अलग एनिमल छुपा और स्किन ( depending on कया sorts of पशु यहूद  in the area ) and sewn together by the intestines of said animals , which were woven together tightly to make a sturdy thread-like material .
Mexico ( ; ; ) , officially the United  मैक्सिकन राज्य ( ) , is a संघीय संवैधानिक गणतंत्र in उत्तर अमेरिका  .
It is bordered on the north by the United States ; on the south and west by the Pacific Ocean ; on the southeast by  ग्वाटेमाला , बेलीज़ , और the caribbean समुद्र ; और on  the east by the Gulf of Mexico .
Covering almost two million square kilometres ( over 760,000 sq mi ) , Mexico is the fifth largest country in  the americas by कुल क्षेत्रफल और the 13th largest स्वतंत्र स्वदेश in the संसार  .
साथ an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of over 113 लाख , it is the संसार 's eleventh  most populous country and the most populous Spanish-speaking country .
Mexico is a federation  comprising thirty-one राज्य और a संघीय  District , the capital city .
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures matured into advanced civilizations such as the Olmec , the Toltec , the  teotihuacan , the zapotec , the माया और the एज़टेक पहले पहला सम्पर्क साथ europeans  .
In 1521 , Spain conquered and colonized the territory from  इसके आधार in méxico-tenochtitlan , जिससे थी administered as the  Viceroyalty of New Spain .
This territory would  आखिरकार become मैक्सिको following मान्यता of  the colony 's independence in 1821 .
The post-independence period was characterized by  आर्थिक अस्थिरता , the mexican-american युद्ध और  territorial cession to the United States , a civil war , two empires and a domestic dictatorship .
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910 , which culminated  साथ the promulgation of the 1917 संविधान और the emergence of the देश 's वर्तमान राजनैतिक प्रणाली  .
Elections held in July 2000 marked  the पहला समय कि an विपक्ष पार्टी जीती the प्रेसिडेंसी  from the Institutional Revolutionary Party .
Since 2006  the देश रै महरूम in the midst of a ड्रग  war which has caused 60,000 deaths .
Mexico has one of the world 's largest economies , and  is माना दोनो a क्षेत्रीय शक्ति और मध्य शक्ति  .
In addition , Mexico was the first Latin American member of the Organisation for Economic  co-operation और विकास oecd ( चूंकि  1994 ) , and considered an upper-middle income country by the World Bank .
Mexico is considered a newly  industrialized देश और an उभरते  power .
It has the fourteenth largest nominal GDP  और the eleventh largest जीडीपी by  purchasing power parity .
The economy is strongly  linked to those of इसके उत्तर अमरीकी फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध  ( NAFTA ) partners , especially the United States of America .
Mexico ranks sixth in  the संसार और पहला in the americas by क्रमांक of युनेस्को संसार विरासत साइट साथ 31 , और in 2007 थी the दसवाँ सबसे  visited country in the world with 21.4 million international arrivals per year .
Babe Ruth holds the  एमएलबी करियर slugging  percentage record ( .690 ) .
In baseball statistics , slugging  प्रतिशत ( abbreviated slg ) is a लोकप्रिय माप of the  power of a hitter .
It is  गणना as कुल  bases divided by at bats :
where AB  is the क्रमांक of at-bats लिये a दिए खिलाड़ी , और 1b ,  2B , 3B , and HR are the number of singles , doubles , triples , and home runs , respectively .
Walks are  specifically excluded इससे इस गणना  .
For example , in 1920 ,  बेब रुथ निभाई उसके पहला ऋतु लिये the  New York Yankees .
In 458 at bats , Ruth had 172 hits , comprising 73 singles ,  36 युगल , 9 तिगुना , और 54 घर रनों , जिससे brings the कुल आधार गिनती to ( 73 × 1 )  + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388 .
His total number of bases ( 388 ) divided  by उसके कुल at-bats ( 458 ) is .847 , उसके  slugging percentage for the season .
The next year he slugged .846 , and these records went unbroken until 2001 , when Barry Bonds achieved 411 bases in  476 at-bats , bringing उसके slugging प्रतिशत to .863 , बेमेल  since .
is a role-playing video game developed and published by  वर्गाकार ( अभी वर्गाकार एनिक्स ) लिये the सुपर निन्टेंडो entertainment प्रणाली  in 1995 .
Chrono Trigger 's development team included three designers that Square  उतावले the `` सपना टोली '' : hironobu sakaguchi , the निर्माता of वर्गाकार 's फाइनल काल्पनिक श्रेणी ; yuji horii , a freelance पंक्तियां और निर्माता of एनिक्स 's लोकप्रिय  Dragon Quest series ; and Akira Toriyama , a freelance manga artist famed for his work with Dragon Quest and Dragon Ball .
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game , Masato Kato wrote  सबसे of the प्लाट , जबकि composer yasunori mitsuda scored सबसे of the खेल पहले गिरना बीमार और deferring  remaining tracks to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu .
The game 's story  फ़ॉलो a समूह of adventurers जो  travel through time to prevent a global catastrophe .
Square  re-released a ported संस्करण by tose in जापानी लिये सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन in 1999 , बाद repackaged साथ a फाइनल काल्पनिक iv बंदरगाहों as फाइनल काल्पनिक क्रॉनिकल्स  in 2001 for the North American market .
A slightly  उन्नत chrono ट्रिगर थी released लिये the निन्टेंडो ds on नवम्बर 25 , 2008 , in उत्तर अमेरिका और जापानी , और  went on sale in Australia on February 3 , 2009 and in Europe on February 6 , 2009 .
The game  थी never released in pal territories पहले the  Nintendo DS version .
Chrono Trigger was a critical and commercial success upon release and is  माना आज to be एक of the महानतम  video games of all time .
Nintendo Power magazine described aspects of Chrono Trigger as  क्रांतिकारी , सहित इसके अनेक endings , plot-related sidequests focusing on अक्षर  development , unique battle system , and detailed graphics .
Chrono Trigger was the third best-selling game of 1995 , and the game 's  snes और प्लेस्टेशन iterations  have shipped 2.65 million copies as of March 2003 .
the संस्करण लिये the निन्टेंडो ds बेची  790,000 copies as of March 2009 .
Chrono Trigger was also  ported to मोबाईल फोन , आभासी कंसोल ,  the PlayStation Network ( only in the USA ) , iOS devices , and Android devices .
बकरी चीज
Goat cheese , or chèvre (  इससे the फ्रेंच शब्द लिये बकरी ) , is  cheese made out of the milk of goats .
Hyperthermia is elevated body temperature due to  विफल thermoregulation कि occurs जब a देह produces  or absorbs more heat than it dissipates .
Extreme  तापमान उन्नयन तब becomes a चिकित्सा आपात requiring तात्कालिक  treatment to prevent disability or death .
The most common  कल्याणकारी शामिल ऊष्मा स्ट्रोक और प्रतिकूल  reactions to drugs .
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused by exposure to excessive heat , or  संयोजन of ऊष्मा और आर्द्रता , कि overwhelms  the heat-regulating mechanisms .
The latter is a  अपेक्षाकृत विरल पक्ष प्रभाव of अनेक दवाएँ , विशेषकर those  that affect the central nervous system .
Malignant hyperthermia is a rare  complication of कुछ प्रकार of सामान्य एनेस्थीसिया  .
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices and may be used in the treatment  of कुछ kinds of कर्कट और अन्य शर्तें , सबसे commonly in संयोजन साथ  radiotherapy .
Hyperthermia differs from fever in that the  देह 's तापमान नियत पाइंट  remains unchanged .
The opposite  is hypothermia , जिससे occurs जब the तापमान बूंदें  below that required to maintain normal metabolism .
Belize , is a country located  on the northeastern coast of सेंट्रल अमेरिका  .
It is the only country in the area where English is the  आधिकारिक भाषा , हालांकि kriol और स्पेनी हैं अधिक commonly  spoken .
Belize is bordered on the  उत्तर by मैक्सिको , to the दक्षिण और  west by Guatemala and to the east by the Caribbean Sea .
इसके मेनलैंड  is about long and wide .
With of land and a population of only 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 census ) ,  बेलीज़ possesses the न्यूनतम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व in सेंट्रल  America .
the देश 's जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट of 3.15 % (  2012 est . ) is the second highest in the region and one of the highest in the western hemisphere .
Belize 's abundance of terrestrial and marine species , and its diversity of  ecosystems दे it a कुंजी प्लेस भीतर the globally significant mesoamerican  Biological Corridor .
Belize has  a विविध समाज , comprising अनेक संस्कृतियों  and languages .
It is the only nation in the region with a British colonial heritage , but as a part of the Western  caribbean मण्डल , it भी साझा a आम विरासत साथ the fellow anglophone  Caribbean countries .
In general , Belize is  माना to be a सेंट्रल अमरीकी और caribbean स्वदेश साथ दमदार  ties to both the Caribbean and Latin America .
Belize is a member of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) , the Community of Latin American and Caribbean States  ( celac ) , और सेंट्रल अमरीकी संयोजन प्रणाली  ( SICA ) .
Belize is known for its September  जश्न , और is the जन्मस्थान of चबाने गम और punta  Rock .
the `` बेट्सी  Ross '' flag
A `` Betsy Ross '' flag flying  बाहर सैन फ्रांसिस्को नगर हॉल
The Betsy Ross flag is an early design of the flag of the United States , popularly  attributed to बेट्सी रॉस , using the आम motifs of प्रत्यावर्ती red-and-white धारीदार फ़ील्ड साथ five-pointed सितारों in a  blue canton .
The flag was designed during the  अमरीकी क्रान्ति और सुविधाएँ 13 सितारों to represent the असली  13 colonies .
the distinctive विशेषता of the रॉस ध्वज  is the arrangement of the stars in a circle .
Although the Betsy Ross  स्टोरी is स्वीकृत by सबसे अमेरिकी , कुछ ध्वज  historians and revisionists do not accept the Betsy Ross design as the first American flag .
According to the traditional account , the original flag was made in June 1776 , when a small committee—including  जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , रॉबर्ट मॉरिस और सापेक्ष जार्ज रॉस —visited बेट्सी और discussed the need लिये  a new American flag .
Betsy accepted the  जॉब to manufacture the ध्वज , altering the कमेटी  's design by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars .
While the Betsy Ross legend is questionable , the flag  डिज़ाइन is ज्ञात to have महरूम in उपयोग by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड b . गली वर्णित it at the आत्मसमर्पण of सामान्य  Burgoyne and understood the circle of stars to represent equality among the American states .
It is one of the  oldest संस्करण of u.S. ध्वज ज्ञात to मौजूद ; जबकि it is नहीं the oldest surviving ध्वज centuries in cloth रूप , इसके likeness appears on पुरानी  physical relics , namely , the contemporary battlefield paintings by John Trumbull and Charles Willson Peale .
They depict the circular star arrangement being flown from ship masts and many other places , and thus  provide the पहला ज्ञात ऐतिहासिक दस्तावेज़ीकरण of the  flag 's appearance .
The seal of the  u.S. विभाग of दिग्गजों अफेयर्स उपयोग the बेट्सी रॉस ध्वज to represent सेवा  to all veterans from the American Revolution to the present day .
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star US flags has been featured in many popular artworks ( sometimes  inaccurately , as in वॉशिंगटन क्रासिंग the डेलावेयर ) और films , ऐसे as the 1960 संस्करण  of Pollyanna .
The flag continues  to be एक of the सबसे  popular symbols of the American Revolution .
A purr is a sound made by all species  of felids और is a भाग of बिल्ली संचार  .
It varies between cats ( for example by loudness and tone ) , and from species to  प्रजाति , लकिन can be characterized as a tonal गुलजार  .
The  पद `` purring '' रै महरूम प्रयुक्त liberally in साहित्य , और it रै महरूम claimed  that viverrids ( civet , mongoose , genet ) , bears , badgers , hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr .
Other animals that have been said to purr are rabbits ,  squirrels , गिनी सूअर , tapirs , ring-tailed lemurs , हाथियों  , raccoons and gorillas while eating .
However , using a strict definition of purring that continuous sound production must alternate between pulmonic egressive and ingressive airstream ( and usually go on for  मिनट्स ) , पीटर्स ( 2002 ) , in an विस्तृत पुनर्विलोकन of the वैज्ञानिक साहित्य , पहुँचे the निष्कर्ष कि जबतक तब तभी ‘purring cats’ ( फ़ेलिडाए  ) and two species of genets , Genetta tigrina , and most likely also Genetta genetta , had been documented to purr .
The platypus (  ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to  eastern Australia , including Tasmania .
Together with the  चार प्रजाति of एकिडना , it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes  , the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth .
It is the sole living  प्रतिनिधि of इसके परिवार ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus (  Ornithorhynchus ) , though a number of related species have been found in the fossil record .
The unusual  रूप of इस egg-laying , बतख -billed , बीवर -tailed , otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे  first encountered it , with some considering it an elaborate fraud .
It is one of the few venomous  स्तनधारियों , the पुरूष platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर कि delivers a venom  capable of causing severe pain to humans .
The unique features of  the platypus मेक it an महत्वपूर्ण विषय in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic  symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin .
The platypus is the animal  emblem of the राज्य of नई दक्षिण वेल्स  .
जबतक the जल्दी 20th सदी , it थी hunted लिये इसके फर  , but it is now protected throughout its range .
Although captive breeding programmes  have था तभी सीमित कामयाबी और the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of प्रदूषण  , it is not under any immediate threat .
St. Elizabeth is a village in  मिलर काउंटी , मिसौरी , संयुक्त  States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 336 at the 2010  census .
Wilton is a census-designated  प्लेस ( cdp ) in sacramento काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States .
It is part of the Sacramento –  arden-arcade – roseville महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The population was 5,363 at the 2010 census , up from 4,551  at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी  .
In human-computer interaction , cut and paste and copy and paste  हैं सम्बन्धित कमांड कि प्रस्ताव a user-interface बातचीत  technique for transferring text , data , files or objects from a source to a destination .
Most  ubiquitously , उपयोक्ता आवश्यकता the क्षमता to  cut and paste sections of plain text .
The cut command removes the selected data from its original position , while  the नक़ल कमांड creates a नकल ; in दोनो मामले the चयनित आंकड़ा is लगाई in a clipboard  .
The data in the clipboard is later  inserted in the स्थिति जहाँ the  paste command is issued .
The command names are an  इंटरफ़ेस रूपक आधारित on the शारीरिक कार्यविधि  used in manuscript editing to create a page layout .
This interaction technique has close associations with  सम्बन्धित तकनीकों in आलेखीय उपयोक्ता अंतरफलक कि उपयोग इंगित डिवाइस  such as a computer mouse ( by drag and drop , for example ) .
Economic order  मात्रा is the अनुक्रम मात्रा कि  minimizes total inventory holding costs and ordering costs .
It is  एक of the oldest शास्त्रीय  production scheduling models .
The framework used to determine this order quantity is also known  as barabas eoq मॉडल or barabas सूत्र  .
The model was developed by Ford W. Harris in 1913 , but R. H. Wilson , a consultant  जो लागू it extensively , is दिए क्रेडिट  for his in-depth analysis .
Stephen ``  स्टीवी '' रे vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3 , 1954 – अगस्त 27 , 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी  guitarist , singer-songwriter , and record producer .
Often referred to by his  आद्याक्षर srv , vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding  member and leader of Double Trouble .
Together with drummer Chris Layton and bassist  टॉमी शैनन , वे ignited the ब्लूज़ पुनरुद्धार  of the 1980s .
With a career spanning seven years , Vaughan and Double Trouble  consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि उनके एल्बम अक्सर गई  gold .
He was born and raised in  डलास , टेक्सास , और लिये a छोटी काल  of time lived in Graham , Texas .
As the  younger bhai of jimmie vaughan , vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार at आयु  seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs .
At age 17 , he dropped out of  ऊँची स्कूल और स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके musical करियर  , joining groups such as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed Triple Threat Revue , a band  कि आखिरकार विकसित into दोगुना ट्रबल और  regularly performed around Austin .
In 1982 ,  vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल performed at the montreux जैज़ पर्व  in Switzerland , catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's  नृत्य , जबकि browne offered the बैंड फ़्री उपयोग of उसके निजी स्टुडियो in लॉस एंजिल्स  to record an album .
In March 1983 , Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran record producer John  हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम , टेक्सास बाढ़ in जून of कि  year .
After successful touring , the group released the albums , Could n't  स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ) , the latter of जिससे प्रदर्शित  new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career had progressed successfully , Vaughan checked into a  पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया to दे up a कोका और दारू आदत और लौटे to touring  with the band .
In June 1989 , In Step was released and earned them a  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन ब्लूज़ प्रदर्शन  .
On August 27 , 1990 , Vaughan was killed in a  हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following a प्रदर्शन in  East Troy , Wisconsin .
vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र स्टाइल  was derived from a variety of musical genres .
He was  बहकावे by ब्लूज़ संगीतकारों सहित अल्बर्ट किंग , फ्रेडी किंग , ओटिस फटाफट ,  and Muddy Waters , and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His guitar playing reflected the  क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और pentatonic  scales .
he रै प्राप्त चौड़ी नाजुक मान्यता  for his guitar playing , ranking at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He was posthumously inducted into the  ब्लूज़ हॉल of कीर्ति in 2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम  Shores park .
Stevie Ray Vaughan  is widely माना to be एक of the महानतम संगीतकारों to  come from the state of Texas .
The Las Vegas  स्ट्रिप संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores , restaurants ,  और वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक देश मगर  Cuba and North Korea .
It is produced by The  coca-cola कम्पनी of अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया , और is प्रायः referred to बस  as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th  सदी by जॉन pemberton , coca-cola थी खरीदा  out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which  is तब बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout  the world .
The bottlers , who hold territorially  विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी , उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the concentrate  in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell ,  वितरित और merchandise coca-cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स  and vending machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola  उद्यमों , जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका  and western Europe .
The  coca-cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to  major restaurants and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी रै , on अवसर , introduced अन्य  cola drinks under the Coke brand name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke  , साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola , आहार कोक caffeine-free , coca-cola चेरी , coca-cola  Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand  's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011 , coca-cola  was the world 's most valuable brand .
Barry Louis  larkin ( born अप्रैल 28 , 1964 ) is a रिटायर्ड  Major League Baseball player .
Larkin played shortstop for the Cincinnati Reds  इससे 1986 to 2004 और थी एक of the pivotal खिलाड़ी on  the 1990 Reds ' World Series championship team .
Larkin was elected to the  नेशनल बेसबॉल हॉल  of Fame in January 2012 and was inducted on July 22 .
Larkin is considered one of the top players of his era ,  जीतना नौ चांदी slugger पुरस्कार और तीन  Gold Glove awards .
He was selected to the Major League All-Star Game twelve  टाइम्स , और थी निर्वाचित the 1995 नेशनल  League Most Valuable Player .
Brasília ( ) is the  संघीय पूंजी of ब्राज़ील और the सीट of सरकारी  of the Federal District .
Administratively , the  नगर is स्तिथ in the संघीय ज़िला जिससे  is in the Central-West Region .
Physically , it is  स्तिथ in the ब्राज़ीलियाई  Highlands .
It has a  जनसांख्यिकी of परिचय 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the महानगर क्षेत्रफल ) as of the 2008  IBGE estimate , making it the fourth largest city in Brazil .
However , as a metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल , it बाँधने निम्नतर at छठे  in population .
Brasília is the largest  नगर in the संसार कि किया नहीं मौजूद at the शुरूआत of the  20th century .
brasília रै the पांचवां largest जीडीपी among  Latin American cities and the third in Brazil .
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian  reais ( बराबर to लगभग $ 30,900 us डॉलर or €23,000 euros ) , the नगर  's per capita income is the highest among Brazil 's largest cities .
As the  नेशनल पूंजी , brasília is the सीट of सब तीन  branches of the federal government of Brazil .
The city also hosts the  मुख्यालय of अनेक ब्राज़ीलियाई कंपनियाँ  .
Planning policies such as the location of residential buildings  around expansive शहरी क्षेत्रों , as खूब as भवन the नगर around विशाल avenues और dividing it into सेक्टर  , have sparked a debate and reflection on life in big cities in the 20th century .
The city 's design divides it into  गिने ब्लॉक as खूब as सेक्टर लिये निर्दिष्ट क्रियाएँ , ऐसे as the होटल सेक्टर  , the Banking Sector or the Embassy Sector .
Brasília hosts 124 foreign  embassies  .
The city was planned and developed in 1956 with Lúcio Costa as the principal urban  प्लानर , ऑस्कर niemeyer as the प्रिंसिपल वास्तु और रॉबर्टो burle मार्क्स  as the landscape designer .
Brasilia is in the Unesco 's  संसार hertitage सूची due to इसके वास्तुकला  .
On April  22 , 1960 , it formally  became Brazil 's national capital .
Viewed from above , the main portion of the  नगर resembles an वायुयान or a  butterfly .
The city is commonly referred to  as पूंजी संघीय , or  simply BSB .
निवासियों of brasília हैं ज्ञात as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter  referring to those not born in the city but who migrated there after it was established ) .
In local usage , the word  `` brasília '' प्रायः refers तभी to the पहला प्रशासनिक प्रदेश ( ra i ) भीतर the संघीय ज़िला  ( Distrito Federal ) , where the most important government buildings are located .
Brasília has a unique status in Brazil , as  it is an प्रशासनिक प्रभाग बल्कि than a विधिक  municipality like nearly all cities in Brazil .
Nationally ,  the पद is लगभग सदा प्रयुक्त synonymously  with the Federal District , which constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit , analogous to a state .
Several `` satellite cities  '' मौजूद जिससे हैं भी भाग of  the Federal District .
Brasília  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the प्रमुख विमानक्षेत्र in brasília  , connecting the capital to all major Brazilian cities and many international destinations .
It is the third most important airport in Brazil , in  शर्तें of यात्री और वायुयान आंदोलनों  .
Personifications of Germany , France , Russia ,  austria-hungary , और the संयुक्त किंगडम attempting to  keep the lid on the simmering cauldron of imperialist and nationalist tensions in the Balkans to prevent a general European war .
वे यहूद कामयाब in 1912 और 1913 लकिन  did not succeed in in 1914 .
The causes of World War I , which began in central Europe in late July 1914 and finished in 1918 ,  शामिल अनेक कारकों , ऐसे as the विरोध और दुश्मनी of the चार दशकों अग्रणी up to the  war .
Militarism ,  alliances , साम्राज्यवाद , और राष्ट्रवाद  played major roles in the conflict as well .
The immediate origins of the war  , however , lay in the निर्णय लिया by कूटनीतिज्ञों और सेनापतियों दौरान the संकट of 1914 , casus  belli for which was the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand ( the Archduke of Austria Hungary ) and his wife Sophie by Gavrilo Princip , an irredentist Serb .
The crisis came after a long and difficult series of diplomatic clashes between the Great Powers ( Italy , France , Germany , the  अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य , the austria-hungarian साम्राज्य और रूस ) over यूरोपीय और औपनिवेशिक मुद्दे in the दशक  before 1914 that had left tensions high .
In  फेरे ये राजनयिक clashes can be traced to परिवर्तन  in the balance of power in Europe since 1867 .
The more immediate cause for the  युद्ध थी तनाव over territory  in the Balkans .
Austria-Hungary competed with Serbia and Russia  लिये territory और influence in the प्रदेश और वे खींचा the बाकी of the ग्रेट  Powers into the conflict through their various alliances and treaties .
Although the chain  of कार्यक्रम unleashed by the हत्या triggered the युद्ध , the युद्ध 's origins go deeper , involving नेशनल राजनीती , संस्कृतियों , अर्थशास्त्र , और a जटिल वेब  of alliances and counterbalances that had developed between the various European powers since 1870 .
Some of the most important long term or  संरचनात्मक कल्याणकारी हैं : the विकास of राष्ट्रवाद आरपार यूरोपीय , अनसुलझे territorial विवादों , an intricate प्रणाली of alliances , the आभास विश्लेषण of the संतुलन of शक्ति in यूरोपीय , convoluted और fragmented शासन , the बाहें दौड़ of the पिछला दशकों  , previous military planning , imperial and colonial rivalry for wealth , power and prestige , and economic and military rivalry in industry and trade – e.g. , the Pig War between Austria and Serbia .
Other causes that came into play during the diplomatic crisis that  preceded the युद्ध शामिल misperceptions of intent ( e.g. , the जर्मनी विश्वास कि the संयुक्त किंगडम होता remain  neutral ) and delays and misunderstandings in diplomatic communications .
The various categories of explanation  लिये संसार युद्ध i correspond to अलग इतिहासकारों ' overall  methods .
Most historians and  लोकप्रिय टीकाकारों शामिल कल्याणकारी इससे अधिक than एक श्रेणी  of explanation to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war .
The deepest distinction among these  खाते is between कहानियां कि देखिए it as the अपरिहार्य और predictable निष्कर्ष of निश्चित कारकों ,  and those that describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake .
In attributing causes for the war , historians and academics  था to सौदे साथ an unprecedented बाढ़ of memoirs और आधिकारिक दस्तावेज़ , released  as each country involved tried to avoid blame for starting the war .
Early releases of information  by सरकारें , विशेषकर those released लिये उपयोग by  the `` Commission on the Responsibility of the Authors of the War '' were shown to be incomplete and biased .
In addition some documents  , विशेषकर राजनयिक केबल between रूस और फ़्रांस , यहूद मिला to have  been doctored .
Even in later decades however , when  much अधिक सूचना था महरूम released , इतिहासकारों इससे the वही संस्कृति have महरूम दिखाया to आइये  to differing conclusions on the causes of the war .
Johnson 's new chart  of नेशनल प्रतीक  , published c. 1868 .
The large flags shown in the corners are the  37-star ध्वज of the संयुक्त राज्य ( flown 1867-1877 ) , the royal मानक of the संयुक्त किंगडम , the रूसी इम्पीरियल मानक ,  and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle .
Various other  ध्वज flown by जहाजों  are shown .
The Flag of Cuba is  labelled `` क्यूबन ( so पुकारा  ) `` .
The Chinese  ड्रैगन on the ध्वज of चीन थी  drawn mistakenly as a western dragon .
A national flag is a flag that  symbolizes a देश  .
The flag is flown by the  सरकारी , लकिन प्रायः can भी be flown by नागरिकों  of the country .
Both public and private buildings  ऐसे as स्कूलों और courthouses may मक्खी the नेशनल  flag .
in कुछ देशों , the नेशनल ध्वज हैं तभी  flown from non-military buildings on certain flag days .
There  हैं तीन पृथक प्रकार of नेशनल ध्वज लिये उपयोग on जमीन , और तीन  for use at sea , though many countries use identical designs for several ( and sometimes all ) of these types of flag .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the  सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ) , थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक  Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had  इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन  of slavery into the western territories .
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and  नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम  of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by  अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding  slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4  , 1861 , सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans  rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural  पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate  civil war .
Eight  बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत  calls for secession .
confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों  within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to  ढूँढें a सुलह , और दोनो पहलू  prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King  कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई  Confederate States of America .
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12 , 1861 , जब confederate  forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide  सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined  the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border  राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि  crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater  थी inconclusive in  1861–62 .
the पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य  ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी  a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then  much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी  River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate incursion उत्तर  ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western  सफलताओं led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड  of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and  marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate अवसंरचना  along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all  दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards  Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army  विफल , अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox  Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil  युद्ध थी एक of the earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph ,  steamships , और mass-produced हथियार यहूद  employed extensively .
The  mobilization of civilian कारखानों , खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन और  food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history ,  resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an  undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates  the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा ,  and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Norrie disease is a genetic  विकार कि primarily affects the नजर और लगभग  always leads to blindness .
In addition to the congenital ocular symptoms , some patients suffer from a progressive hearing loss  starting ज़्यादातर in उनके 2nd दशक of जीवन , जबकि another portion may be मानसिक  challenged .
Patients with Norrie disease may develop cataracts , leukocoria ( a condition where the pupils appear white when light is shone on  उन्हें ) , साथ साथ अन्य developmental मुद्दे in the नजर , ऐसे as shrinking of the ग्लोब और the बर्बाद  away of the iris .
around 30–50 % of उन्हें होगा भी have developmental डेलाy/ दिमागी retardation ,  psychotic-like features , incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities .
Most patients are born with normal hearing ; however ,  the onset of सुनना घाटा is बहुत आम in जल्दी किशोरावस्था  .
About 15 % of the patients are  अनुमानित to develop सब the सुविधाएँ of the  disease .
The disease  affects लगभग तभी पुरूष infants at जनम or जल्द बाद जनम , क्युकी the  disease is inherited X-linked recessive .
Only in very rare cases  , महिलाओं have महरूम diagnosed साथ  Norrie disease as well .
The  सटीक incidence क्रमांक is अनजान  ; only a few hundred cases have been reported so far .
It is a very rare disorder that is not associated with  कोई विशिष्ट जातीय or जातिगत  groups .
A contract is an  अनुबंध having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or अधिक  parties , each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them .
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by  `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक क्षमता जो एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of दायित्व  . ''
Proof  of कुछ or सब of ये तत्व may be किया in लिखने , हालांकि  contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct .
The  उपाय लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति ''  in the form of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction .
Both of  ये remedies पुरस्कार the पार्टी at घाटा the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी ''  or expectation damages , which are greater than mere reliance damages , as in promissory estoppel .
The parties may be  प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों or juristic व्यक्तियों  .
A  अनुबंध is a legally enforceable वादा  or undertaking that something will or will not occur .
The word promise can be  प्रयुक्त as a विधिक पर्याय लिये अनुबंध , हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a वादा may नहीं have the पूरा खड़ा  of a contract , as when it is an agreement without consideration .
Contract law varies greatly from  एक क्षेत्राधिकार to another , सहित मतभेद in आम विधि compared to सिविल विधि , the प्रभाव of  received law , particularly from England in common law countries , and of law codified in regional legislation .
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example , there are 40 relevant acts which  प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल ) स्तर , और an अतिरिक्त  26 acts at the level of the state of NSW .
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for international dealings , such as the United  राष्ट्र सम्मेलन on अनुबंध लिये the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बिक्री of goods  .
ASP.NET is a  server-side वेब अनुप्रयोग फ्रेमवर्क designed लिये वेब विकास to उपज  dynamic Web pages .
It was developed by Microsoft to allow  प्रोग्रामर्स to निर्माण डायनेमिक वेब साइट , वेब अनुप्रयोग और  web services .
It was first released in January 2002 with version 1.0 of the .NET Framework  , और is the successor to microsoft 's क्रियाशील सर्वर पृष्ठों ( asp ) प्रौद्योगिकी  .
ASP.NET is built on the Common Language Runtime ( CLR ) , allowing  प्रोग्रामर्स to लिखें asp.net कोड using कोई समर्थित .neT भाषा  .
The ASP.NET SOAP extension framework allows  asp.net components to प्रक्रम साबुन संदेश  .
Lysergic acid diethylamide , abbreviated LSD or LSD-25 , also known as lysergide ( INN ) and colloquially as acid , is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline family , well known for  इसके मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव जिससे can शामिल altered सोच प्रक्रियाओं , बंद और खोलें नजर visuals , synesthesia , an altered भाव of समय और आध्यात्मिक अनुभवों , as खूब as लिये इसके कुंजी भूमिका in 1960s  counterculture .
It is used  मुख्यतः as an entheogen , recreational  drug , and as an agent in psychedelic therapy .
एलएसडी is non-addictive , is नहीं ज्ञात to कारण दिमाग  damage , and has extremely low toxicity relative to dose .
However , adverse  मनोरोग प्रतिक्रियाएँ ऐसे as चिंता , paranoia , और delusions  are possible .
LSD  थी पहला synthesized by अल्बर्ट hofmann in 1938 इससे ergotamine  , a chemical derived by Arthur Stoll from ergot , a grain fungus that typically grows on rye .
The  छोटी रूप `` एलएसडी '' आता इससे इसके जल्दी कोड नाम lsd-25 , जिससे is an संक्षिप्त  for the German `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number .
LSD is sensitive to oxygen , ultraviolet light , and chlorine , especially in solution , though its potency  may पिछला लिये सालो if it is भंडारित दूर इससे लाइट और नमी at कम तापमान  .
In pure  रूप it is a colorless , गंधहीन , tasteless  solid .
LSD is typically delivered orally ,  प्रायः on a substrate ऐसे as absorbent blotter  paper , a sugar cube , or gelatin .
In its liquid  रूप , it can भी be administered by intramuscular or  intravenous injection .
LSD is  बहुत potent , साथ 20–30 μg ( micrograms  ) being the threshold dose .
New experiments with  एलएसडी प्रारंभ in 2009 लिये the पहला समय  in 40 years .
Introduced by Sandoz  laboratories , साथ trade-name delysid , as a ड्रग साथ विभिन्न मनोरोग उपयोग in 1947  , LSD quickly became a therapeutic agent that appeared to show great promise .
In the 1950s , officials  at the u.S. सेंट्रल प्रज्ञा एजेंसी ( सीआईए ) विचार the ड्रग might be लागू to दिमाग कंट्रोल और रासायनिक  warfare ; the agency 's MKULTRA research program propagated the drug among young servicemen and students .
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by youth  संस्कृति in the पश्चिमी संसार दौरान the 1960s led to a राजनैतिक  firestorm that resulted in its prohibition .
Currently , a number of organizations—including the  beckley न्यास , मानचित्र , heffter शोध संस्थान और the अल्बर्ट hofmann foundation—exist to निधि , प्रोत्साहित  and coordinate research into the medicinal and spiritual uses of LSD and related psychedelics .
The United States Navy 's Sea , Air  , जमीन टीमों , commonly ज्ञात as the नेवी seals , हैं the u.S. नेवी 's प्रिंसिपल खास  operations force and a part of the Naval Special Warfare Command and United States Special Operations Command .
``  मुहर '' is सदा capitalized in सन्दर्भ  to members of the Naval Special Warfare community .
The acronym is derived from their capacity to  operate at समुद्र , in the एयर , और on जमीन  .
seals हैं पुरूष सदस्यों  of the United States Navy .
An exchange  कार्यक्रम साथ the coast गार्ड , जिससे ग्रैजुएट  three Coast Guardsmen as SEALs , was suspended in 2011 .
The CIA 's highly secretive Special Activities  प्रभाग ( उदास ) और अधिक specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन  Group ( SOG ) recruits operators from the SEAL Teams .
Joint Navy  seals और सीआईए परिचालन go वापस to the famed macv-sog  during the Vietnam War .
This  सहयोग स्टिल exists आज और is देखी in the युद्धों  in Iraq and Afghanistan , and in the finding and killing of Osama bin Laden in Pakistan .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based  on un 2010 projections ( रेड , नारंगी , ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates  ( black ) .
Actual recorded  जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े  are in blue .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may rise to 16 billion by  2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान , it may मनाही to  6 billion .
The  संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल क्रमांक  of living humans on Earth .
As of today , it is  अनुमानित to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो  ( USCB ) .
The USCB  estimates कि the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded  7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund , it reached  इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31  , 2011 .
The  संसार जनसांख्यिकी रै अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of  the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350 , when it stood at around 370 million .
The  उच्चतम दरों of विकास – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद  seen briefly during the 1950s , and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , and had  अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million , and are now  अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख , जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल ,  and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued  बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ) , साथ  the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict further  विकास , stagnation , or भी overall मनाही  in the global population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth , citing the growing  pressures on the पर्यावरण , वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ  , and energy resources .
Memphis is a city in the southwestern corner of the U.S. state of  टेनेसी , और the काउंटी सीट of शेल्बी काउंटी .
The city is located on the 4th Chickasaw Bluff ,  दक्षिण of the संगम of  the Wolf and Mississippi rivers .
Memphis had a population of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest city in the state of Tennessee  , the largest नगर on the मिसिसिपी नदी , the तीसरा largest in  the Southeastern United States , and the 20th largest in the United States .
The greater Memphis metropolitan area , including adjacent  काउंटी in मिसिसिपी और अरकंसास , था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,316,100 .
This makes Memphis  the दूसरी largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in टेनेसी , surpassed  only by metropolitan Nashville , which has overtaken Memphis in recent years .
मेम्फिस is the youngest of  Tennessee 's major cities .
A resident of Memphis is referred to as a Memphian , and the Memphis region is known  , विशेषकर to मीडिया आउटलेट , as `` मेम्फिस &  The Mid-South `` .
The  cattenom नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र  in France .
France  produces around तीन quarters of इसके  electricity by nuclear power .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear  शक्ति संयंत्र in जर्मनी  .
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30 , 2011 , that Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be  shut bas by 2022 , in a नीति reversal following जापानी 's फुकुशिमा daiichi  nuclear disaster .
Currently ,  68 रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत  construction in 15 countries .
Nuclear power  स्टेशन operate in तीस देशों  .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster , it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year  , हालांकि according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ , of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों नियोजित to become operational between  2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
As of June 2011 ,  जर्मनी और स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं phasing-out  nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries such as Australia , Austria , Denmark , Greece , Ireland ,  इटली , लातवियाई , liechtenstein , ध्वज , मलेशिया , माल्टा , नई जीलैंड , नार्वे और पुर्तगाल remain opposed  to nuclear power .
skeletal  muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of  मांसपेशियां of the इंसान anatomy  .
There are approximately 642 skeletal  मांसपेशियां भीतर the ठेठ इंसान , और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of  a pair of identical bilateral muscles , found on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless ,  the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently , e.g  . regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
उदाहरण दायरा इससे  640 to 850 .
The muscles of the human body can  be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating  to the head and neck , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action refers  to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the मानक  anatomical position .
In  अन्य स्थितियाँ , अन्य क्रियाएँ  may be performed .
A reenactment of a  बैटल at फोर्ट फोस्टर , 1837 ( at hillsborough  River State Park )
The Seminole  युद्धों , भी ज्ञात as the फ्लोरिडा युद्धों , यहूद तीन विरोध in फ्लोरिडा between the seminole — the सामूहिक नाम  given to the amalgamation of various groups of native Americans and Black people who settled in Florida in the early 18th century — and the United States Army .
The First  seminole युद्ध थी इससे 1814 to 1819 ( हालांकि स्त्रोत differ ) , the दूसरी seminole युद्ध इससे 1835 to 1842 , और  the Third Seminole War from 1855 to 1858 .
The first  विरोध साथ the seminoles arose आउट of तनाव relating to सामान्य एंड्रयू  Jackson 's attack and destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816 .
Jackson  भी attacked the स्पेनी  at Pensacola .
Ultimately , the Spanish Crown  ceded the उपनिवेश to संयुक्त राज्य  rule .
Orono is a town in  penobscot काउंटी , maine , संयुक्त  States .
It was first settled in  1774 और नामित in सम्मान of मुख्य जोसेफ orono of  the Penobscot Nation .
It is home to The  विश्वविद्यालयों of maine  .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी  10,362 at the 2010 census .

Luxor Las Vegas is a hotel and  कसीनो on the लास वेगास स्ट्रिप in स्वर्ग  , Nevada .
The 30-story hotel , owned and operated by MGM Resorts International ,  रै a कसीनो साथ over 2,000 स्लॉट मशीने और 87 तालिका  games .
In the 2008 to 2009  नवीकरण , it रै a नई , अत्यधिक आधुनिकीकरण , और समकालीन डिज़ाइन और contains a कुल of 4,400 कक्ष , सहित 442 suites , अस्तर the आंतरिक दीवारें  of a pyramid style tower and within twin 22-story ziggurat towers that were built as later additions .
The hotel is  नामित बाद the नगर of लक्सर ( प्राचीन thebes  ) in Egypt .
Luxor is  the दूसरी largest होटल in लास वेगास ( the largest होने the  MGM Grand ) and the eighth largest in the world .
As of 2010 , the Luxor has a 4 Key  दरजा इससे the ग्रीन कुंजी eco-rating कार्यक्रम , जिससे evaluates  `` sustainable '' hotel operations .
A pilot experiment , also called a pilot study , is a small scale  प्रारंभिक पढ़ाई conducted in अनुक्रम to evaluate feasibility , समय , लागत , प्रतिकूल कार्यक्रम  , and effect size ( statistical variability ) in an attempt to predict an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research project .
Pilot studies ,  इसलिए , may नहीं be उचित  for case studies .
The Los Angeles Fire Department  ( lafd ) is the एजेंसी कि provides आग सुरक्षा और आपात  medical services for the city of Los Angeles .
It may be  unofficially referred to as the लॉस एंजिल्स नगर आग विभाग to फर्क it  from the Los Angeles County Fire Department .
The acre is a unit  of क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the इम्पीरियल और  U.S. customary systems .
An acre is about 40 %  of a हेक्टेयर – थोड़ा छोटी than  an American football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the United States , Australia ,  बर्मा और the संयुक्त किंगडम ( as of 2010 , the एकड़ is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त किंगडम , हालांकि is स्टिल प्रयुक्त in रियल एस्टेट  descriptions ) .
It is  स्टिल प्रयुक्त , to कुछ extent  , in Canada .
The international symbol of the  एकड़ is ac , और is पारिभाषित as 1/640  of a square mile .
the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज is  the international acre .
In the United  राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और  the slightly different US survey acre are in use .
The most common use of  the एकड़ is to माप tracts  of land .
One international acre is defined as  4046.8564224 वर्गाकार मीटर  .
During the Middle Ages , an acre was the amount of land that  could be plowed in एक दिन साथ a yoke of  oxen .

Language processing refers to the way human beings use words  to communicate विचार और जज्बात , और कैसा ऐसे संचार हैं processed  and understood .
Thus it is how the brain creates  और understands भाषा  .
Most recent theories consider that this  प्रक्रम is carried आउट entirely by और  inside the brain .
This is considered one of the most  characteristic abilities of the इंसान प्रजाति - शायद the सबसे characteristic  .
However very little is known  परिचय it और वहीँ is विशाल पैमाना  for research on it .
Most of the knowledge acquired  to तिथि on the विषय रै आइये इससे मरीजों जो have suffered कुछ प्रकार  of significant head injury , whether external ( wounds , bullets ) or internal ( strokes , tumors , degenerative diseases ) .
Studies have shown that most of the language  प्रसंस्करण कृत्यों हैं carried आउट in the दिमागी cortex .
The essential  फलन of the cortical भाषा क्षेत्रों  is symbolic representation .
Even though  भाषा exists in अलग फ़ॉर्म , सब of उन्हें हैं आधारित  on symbolic representation .
The  bugatti veyron eb 16.4 is a mid-engined ग्रैंड touring car , designed और विकसित by  the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
The Super Sport version of the  veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal उत्पादन car in the  world , with a top speed of .
The  असली संस्करण रै a शीर्ष  speed of .
It  थी नामित car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 )  by the BBC television programme Top Gear .
the मानक veyron जीती शीर्ष गियर्स बेहतरीन  Car Driven All Year award in 2005 .
On 6 April 2013 , Bugatti  नियत the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड खेल  Vitesse , reaching on average a top speed of .
The  veyron 's मुख्य पंक्तियां थी hartmut warkuss , और the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen  , with much of the engineering work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A  क्रमांक of खास विसंगतियाँ  have been produced .
In December 2010 , Bugatti began offering prospective  खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स रंग by using the veyron 16.4 configurator अनुप्रयोग on  the marque 's official website .
DVD is an optical disc storage  स्वरूप , invented और विकसित by फिलिप्स , सोनी  , Toshiba , and Panasonic in 1995 .
DVDs offer higher  भंडार क्षमता than कॉम्पैक्ट discs जबकि having  the same dimensions .
Pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using molding  मशीने कि physically स्टैम्प  data onto the DVD .
Such discs  हैं ज्ञात as dvD- rom , क्युकी  data can only be read and not written nor erased .
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a DVD recorder and then function as a DVD-ROM . Rewritable DVDs (  dvd-rw , dvd+rw , और dvd-ram ) can be अंकित और erased अनेक टाइम्स  .
DVDs are used in  dvd-video उपभोक्ता डिजिटल वीडियो स्वरूप और in dvd-audio  consumer digital audio format , as well as for authoring AVCHD discs .
DVDs  containing अन्य प्रकार of सूचना may be referred  to as DVD data discs .
What Chilli Wants is  an अमरीकी वास्तविकता श्रेणी on vh1 अभिनीत  Chilli , one-third of the Grammy Award -winning R & B trio TLC .
The show chronicles Chilli 's quest to find love with the  सहायता of tionna T. smalls , an लेखक और संबंध  coach .
The series premiered on  अप्रैल 11 , 2010 , और रै  since been renewed for a second season .
The  दूसरी ऋतु premiered on संडे  , January 2 , 2011 .
Peter Gene Hernandez ( born October 8 , 1985  ) , ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम ब्रूनो मंगल , is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter  and record producer .
Raised in  होनोलूलू , हवाई , by a परिवार of संगीतकारों , मंगल began बनाना म्यूज़िक at a यंग आयु और performed in  various musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood .
He graduated from high school and  तब स्थानांतरित to लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , to pursue a musical  career .
Mars produced songs for other artists ,  joining उत्पादन टोली the smeezingtons  .
Mars had an unsuccessful stint with Motown Records ,  लकिन तब हस्ताक्षरित साथ अटलांटिक in 2009  .
He  became पहचाना as a सोलो कलाकार बाद  lending his vocals and co-writing the hooks for the songs `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B , and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy .
he भी co-wrote the हिट्स `` सही गोलाकार `` by flo rida featuring  Ke $ ha , and `` Wavin ' Flag `` by K'naan .
In October 2010 , he  released उसके डेब्यू एल्बम  , Doo-Wops & Hooligans .
anchored by the विश्वव्यापी number-one singles `` बस the  Way You Are `` and `` Grenade `` , the album peaked at number three on the Billboard 200 .
Mars was nominated for seven  grammys at the 53rd ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , जीतना बेहतरीन पुरूष पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन लिये ``  Just the Way You Are '' .
His  दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम , अपरंपरागत ज्यूकबॉक्स , थी  released on December 11 , 2012 .
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a wide variety  of शैलियाँ और प्रभाव , और contains तत्व  of many musical genres .
He has worked with an  assortment of कलाकारों इससे विभिन्न जाति  .
As a child , he was  अत्यधिक बहकावे by कलाकारों ऐसे as छोटी रिचर्ड , एल्विस प्रेस्ली और माइकल जैक्सन और होता प्रायः  impersonate these artists from a young age .
Mars  भी incorporates रेगी - और motown -inspired  sounds into his work .
Worldwide , Mars  became the best-selling डिजिटल  artist in 2011 .
He had three singles in the  शीर्ष टेन , सहित पहला प्लेस साथ `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं '' , जिससे बेची  12.5 million copies .
Mars won Best International Male  सोलो कलाकार at the 2012 ब्रिट पुरस्कार  .
Bruno  मंगल रै बेची 6 लाख एल्बम  and 40 million singles worldwide as a singer .

Greek  mythology is the देह of मिथकों और शिक्षाओं कि belong to the प्राचीन यूनानियों , concerning  their gods and heroes , the nature of the world , and the origins and significance of their own cult and ritual practices .
It was a part of the  धर्म in प्राचीन यूनानियों और is भाग of धर्म in आधुनिक यूनानियों  and around the world , known as Hellenismos .
Modern scholars refer to and study the myths  in an attempt to throw लाइट on the धार्मिक और राजनैतिक संस्थानों of प्राचीन यूनानियों और इसके सभ्यता  , and to gain understanding of the nature of myth-making itself .
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives , and implicitly in  यूनानी representational कला , ऐसे as vase-paintings  and votive gifts .
Greek myth attempts  to बताइये the origins of the संसार , और विवरण the जीवनदान और adventures of a चौड़ी किस्में  of gods , goddesses , heroes , heroines , and mythological creatures .
These accounts initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic  परंपरा ; आज the यूनानी मिथकों हैं ज्ञात primarily इससे यूनानी साहित्य  .
The oldest  ज्ञात यूनानी साहित्यिक स्त्रोत , होमर  's epic poems Iliad and Odyssey , focus on events surrounding the Trojan War .
Two poems by Homer 's near  समकालीन hesiod , the theogony और the works और दिनों , contain खाते of the उत्पत्ति of the संसार , the उत्तराधिकार  of divine rulers , the succession of human ages , the origin of human woes , and the origin of sacrificial practices .
Myths are also preserved in the Homeric Hymns , in fragments of epic poems of the Epic Cycle , in lyric poems , in the works of the tragedians of the  पांचवां सदी bc , in कृतियाँ of विद्वानों और कवियों of the hellenistic आयु , और in ग्रन्थ इससे the समय of the रोमन साम्राज्य by लेखक ऐसे as  Plutarch and Pausanias .
Archaeological findings provide a principal source of detail about Greek mythology , with  देवताओं और नायक प्रदर्शित prominently in the सजावट  of many artifacts .
Geometric designs on pottery of the  आठवीं सदी bc depict दृश्यों इससे the trojan साईकिल as खूब  as the adventures of Heracles .
