In the succeeding Archaic ,  शास्त्रीय , और hellenistic अवधि , homeric और विभिन्न अन्य पौराणिक दृश्यों  appear , supplementing the existing literary evidence .
Greek mythology has had an extensive influence on the culture , arts , and  साहित्य of पश्चिमी सभ्यता और remains भाग of पश्चिमी विरासत  and language .
Poets and artists from ancient  टाइम्स to the उपस्थित have निकला प्रेरणा इससे यूनानी mythology और have  discovered contemporary significance and relevance in the themes .
Mouth & MacNeal  in 1971
Mouth &  macneal थी a पॉप duo इससे  the Netherlands .
They are  बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उनके लाख selling  recording of `` How Do You Do `` .
The Boise State Broncos football program represents Boise State University in college football and compete  in the फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ) of प्रभाग i as a सदस्य of the पहाड़ वेस्ट सम्मेलन  .
They are  फिलहाल led by सिर कोच क्रिस petersen  and play their home games at Bronco Stadium .
The franc ( sign : Fr . or SFr . ; German : Franken  , फ्रेंच और romansh : फ़्रैंक , इतालवी : फ्रेंको ; कोड : chf ) is the करेंसी और विधिक टेंडर of स्विट्ज़रलैंड  and Liechtenstein ; it is also legal tender in the Italian exclave Campione d'Italia .
Although  नहीं formally विधिक टेंडर in the जर्मनी exclave büsingen ( the एकमात्र विधिक करेंसी  is the euro ) , it is in wide daily use there .
The Swiss National Bank issues banknotes and the  संघीय मिंट swissmint मुद्दे सिक्के  .
The Swiss  फ़्रैंक is the तभी संस्करण of the फ़्रैंक  still issued in Europe .
The smaller denomination , a hundredth of a franc , is a Rappen (  rp . ) in जर्मनी , centime ( c. ) in फ्रेंच , centesimo ( ct. ) in इतालवी , और रैप ( rp .  ) in Romansh .
The ISO code of  the करेंसी प्रयुक्त by बैंको और वित्तीय संस्थानों is chf ,  although `` Fr . '' is used by most businesses and advertisers ; some use SFr . ; the Latinate `` CH '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica .
Given the different languages used in  स्विट्ज़रलैंड , लैटिन is प्रयुक्त लिये language-neutral inscriptions on the  coins .
Sir Charles Spencer `` Charlie ''  चैपलिन , ( 16 अप्रैल 188925 दिसम्बर 1977 ) थी a अंग्रेजों कॉमिक कर्ता और फिल्मकार जो  rose to fame in the silent era .
Chaplin became a  विश्वव्यापी प्रतीक through उसके स्क्रीन persona `` the ट्रैम्प `` और is माना एक  of the most important figures of the film industry .
His career spanned more than 75 years , from a child  in the विक्टोरियन era to बंद to उसके मौत at the आयु of 88 , और encompassed  both adulation and controversy .
Raised in London , Chaplin 's  बाल्यकाल थी पारिभाषित by गरीबी और hardship  .
He was sent to a workhouse twice before the  आयु of नौ ; उसके पिता थी अनुपस्थित , और उसके माँ थी वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी  asylum .
Chaplin began performing from a  यंग आयु , touring म्यूज़िक हॉल और बाद working as a  stage actor and comedian .
At 19 he was  हस्ताक्षरित to the prestigious फ्रेड karno कम्पनी , जिससे  took him to America .
Chaplin was scouted by the film industry ,  और बना उसके पहला दिखावे in 1914 साथ  Keystone Studios .
He  जल्द विकसित the ट्रैम्प persona  and formed a large fan base .
चैपलिन निर्देशित उसके films इससे an जल्दी स्टेज , और जारी to hone उसके शिल्प  as he moved to the Essanay , Mutual , and First National corporations .
by 1918 , he थी एक of the सबसे  famous men in the world .
In 1919 , Chaplin co-founded the  वितरण कम्पनी संयुक्त कलाकारों , giving उसे पूरा कंट्रोल over उसके films  .
His first feature-length  चित्र थी the बच्चा ( 1921 ) , followed by a स्त्री of पेरिस (  1923 ) , The Gold Rush ( 1925 ) , and The Circus ( 1928 ) .
He refused to move  to ध्वनि films in the 1930s , बजाय producing नगर लाइट्स ( 1931  ) and Modern Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue .
चैपलिन became increasingly राजनैतिक और उसके  next film , The Great Dictator ( 1940 ) , satirised Adolf Hitler .
The 1940s was a  दशक चिह्नित साथ विवाद लिये चैपलिन , और उसके लोकप्रियता अस्वीकृत  rapidly .
He was accused of communist sympathies  , जबकि उसके भागीदारी in a paternity सूट और विवाह  to much younger women were considered scandalous .
An FBI  छानबीन थी खोली on चैपलिन , और he थी आखिरकार मजबूर to छोड़ the संयुक्त  States and settle in Switzerland .
He abandoned the Tramp for  उसके बाद films , जिससे शामिल monsieur verdoux ( 1947 ) , limelight  ( 1952 ) , A King in New York ( 1957 ) , and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ) .
Chaplin wrote , directed , produced ,  संपादित , scored , और स्ट्रक्चर in सबसे of उसके films  .
He was a perfectionist , and his financial  स्वतंत्रता meant he प्रायः खर्च सालो on the विकास  and production of a picture .
His films are  characterised by slapstick संयुक्त साथ pathos , और प्रायः  feature the Tramp struggling against adversity .
Many contain social and political themes ,  as खूब as autobiographical  elements .
In 1972 , as part of a renewed appreciation for his work , Chaplin received an Honorary Academy Award  लिये `` the incalculable प्रभाव he रै था in बनाना गति तस्वीरें the  art form of this century '' .
He continues to be held in high regard , with The  सुनहरा फटाफट , नगर लाइट्स , आधुनिक टाइम्स , और the ग्रेट तानाशाह प्रायः क्रमित among the महानतम  films of all time .
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ) , commonly shortened to Planned  parenthood , is the u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियोजित parenthood संघ (  IPPF ) and one of its larger members .
PPFA is a  non-profit संगठन providing reproductive  health and maternal and child health services .
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund , Inc. ( PPAF ) is a related organization  जिससे lobbies लिये pro-choice विधान , व्यापक sex शिक्षा , और अभिगम to सस्ती स्वास्थ्य  care in the United States .
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S.  प्रदाता of reproductive स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं , सहित कर्कट  screening , HIV screening and counseling , contraception , and abortion .
Contraception accounts for 35  % of ppfa 's कुल सेवाएं और abortions खाता लिये 3 % ; ppfa conducts roughly 300,000 abortions  each year , among 3 million people served .
The organization has its roots in Brooklyn , New  यॉर्क , जहाँ मार्गरेट सैंगर खोली the देश 's पहला birth-control क्लिनिक .
सैंगर संस्थापित the अमरीकी जनम कंट्रोल लीग in 1921 , जिससे  in 1942 became part of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America .
Since then , Planned Parenthood  रै grown to have over 820 क्लिनिक स्थितियाँ in the  U.S. , with a total budget of US $ 1 billion .
ppfa provides an सरणी of सेवाएं to over तीन लाख लोगों in the  United States , and supports services for over one million clients outside the United States .
Mens rea  is लैटिन लिये `` अपराधी  mind '' .
In criminal law , it is viewed as  एक of the जरुरी तत्व  of some crimes .
the मानक आम विधि परीक्षण of दण्ड देयता is प्रायः expressed in the लैटिन phrase , actus  non facit reum nisi mens sit rea , which means `` the act is not culpable unless the mind is guilty '' .
Thus , in jurisdictions with due process , there must be an actus reus , or `` guilty act , '' accompanied by some level of mens rea to constitute  the अपराधों साथ जिससे the प्रतिवादी is चार्ज ( देखिए the तकनीकी आवश्यकता  of concurrence ) .
As a general  नियम , दण्ड देयता करता नहीं संलग्न to  a person who acted with the absence of mental fault .
The exception  is सख्त देयता अपराधों  .
In civil law , it is usually not  जरुरी to prove a subjective दिमागी तत्व to स्थापित देयता  for breach of contract or tort , for example .
However , if a tort is intentionally committed or a contract is intentionally breached  , ऐसे intent may बढ़ाएँ the पैमाना of देयता as खूब as the माप of  damages payable to the plaintiff .
Therefore , mens rea refers to the  दिमागी तत्व of the अपराध कि accompanies  the actus reus .
In some  jurisdictions , the शर्तें पुरुषों rea और actus reus have महरूम  replaced by alternative terminology .
In Australia , for example , the elements of the federal offences are now  designated as `` दोष तत्व '' or `` दिमागी तत्व '' ( पुरुषों rea ) और `` शारीरिक तत्व '' or `` बाह्य  elements '' ( actus reus ) .
This  शब्दावली थी अपनाया to बदलें the अस्पष्टता  of the Latin terms with simple and accurate phrasing .
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27 , 1822 – July 23 , 1885 ) was the 18th President of the United States ( 1869–1877 )  following उसके अत्यधिक कामयाब भूमिका as a युद्ध सामान्य in the दूसरी हाफ  of the Civil War .
Under Grant , the Union Army defeated the Confederate military ; having effectively ended the war and secession  साथ the आत्मसमर्पण of रॉबर्ट E. ली 's फौज  at Appomattox .
As president he led the Radical Republicans in their  प्रयत्न to eliminate सब vestiges of confederate राष्ट्रवाद और गुलामी  .
Upset over  uncontrolled हिंसा in the दक्षिण और having desired to protect अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी  citizenship , President Grant effectively destroyed the Ku Klux Klan in 1871 .
Grant was  the पहला अध्यक्ष to स्थापित सिविल सेवा सुधार having निर्मित a two-year federally वित्तपोषित  Civil Service Commission in 1871 .
In terms of foreign policy , Grant revealed an `` unexpected capacity for deliberation and consultation ''  कि प्रचारित the नेशनल ब्याज  .
His reputation was marred by his repeated defense of corrupt  appointees , और by अमेरिका 's पहला औद्योगिक आयु आर्थिक अवसाद ( पुकारा the `` दहशत of 1873  `` ) that dominated his second term .
Although his  रिपब्लिकन पार्टी विभाजित in 1872 साथ reformers  denouncing him , Grant was easily reelected .
By 1875 the  रूढ़िवादी श्वेत दक्षिणी विपक्ष regained कंट्रोल of प्रत्येक राज्य in the दक्षिण और as he बाएँ the श्वेत  House in March 1877 his policies were being undone .
A career soldier , he graduated from the  संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य अकादमी at वेस्ट पाइंट और परोसा in the mexican–american  War .
When the Civil  युद्ध began in 1861 , ग्रान्ट प्रशिक्षित संघ स्वयंसेवी  regiments in Illinois .
In 1862 , as a general he fought a series of battles and was  प्रचारित to प्रमुख सामान्य बाद forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a विशाल confederate फौज और gaining कंट्रोल of केंटकी और  most of Tennessee .
he तब led संघ शक्तियां to विजय बाद आरंभिक  setbacks in the Battle of Shiloh , earning a reputation as an aggressive commander .
In July 1863 , after a  long , जटिल अभियान , ग्रान्ट पराजित पाँच uncoordinated confederate  armies ( capturing one of them ) and seized Vicksburg .
This famous victory  दिया the संघ पूरा कंट्रोल  of the Mississippi River , split off the western Confederacy , and opened the way for more Union triumphs .
After another win at the Battle of Chattanooga in late  1863 , अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln बना उसे लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य और कमांडर of सब of the संघ  Armies .
As commanding general of the army , Grant  confronted रॉबर्ट E. ली in a श्रेणी of बहुत खूनी लड़ाइयों in 1864 ज्ञात as the overland अभियान  that ended with the bottling up of Lee at Petersburg , outside the Confederate capital of Richmond .
During the siege , Grant coordinated a series of devastating campaigns  शुभारम्भ by विलियम tecumseh शरमन , फिलिप sheridan , और जार्ज थामस .
Finally breaking through  ली 's trenches , the संघ फौज captured  Richmond in April 1865 .
Lee  surrendered उसके depleted शक्तियां to ग्रान्ट at appomattox  as the Confederacy collapsed .
हालांकि pro-confederate इतिहासकारों attacked ग्रान्ट as a निष्ठुर कसाई जो जीती  by brute force , most historians have hailed his military genius .
Grant 's two consecutive terms as President stabilized the nation  बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और दौरान the turbulent पुनर्निर्माण काल कि followed  .
As president , he  enforced पुनर्निर्माण by enforcing सिविल अधिकारों  laws and fighting Ku Klux Klan violence .
Grant won passage of the Fifteenth  amendment ; giving संवैधानिक सुरक्षा  for African-American voting rights .
He used the army to build  the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी in the दक्षिण , आधारित on ब्लैक मतदाता ,  Northern newcomers ( `` Carpetbaggers `` ) and native white supporters ( `` Scalawags . '' )
As a result , African Americans were  represented in the u.S. कॉंग्रेस लिये the पहला समय in अमरीकी इतिहास in  1870 .
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by having broken the deadlock on Indian appropriations in Congress , the  सृष्टि of the फलक of भारतीय commissioners to मेक सुधार सुझाव , और उसके enlistment of quaker protestants जो नियंत्रित  mid western Indian agencies , that effectively curbed Congressional patronage .
Grant remained determined in keeping  इंडियंस इससे होने exterminated इससे श्वेत settler  encroachment or by the U.S. military .
Grant 's reputation as president by 1875 was at an all-time high for his previous veto of the Inflation  विधेयक , the ड्योढ़ी of the resumption of specie अधिनियम , और सचिव bristow 's कामयाब छापे कि shut  down the Whiskey Ring .
Grant 's  विदेशी नीति , led by सचिव of राज्य हैमिल्टन मछली , implemented अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Arbitration , settled the Alabama Claims with Britain and avoided war with Spain over the Virginius Affair .
A jukebox is a partially  स्वचालित music-playing यंत्र , प्रायः  a coin-operated machine , that will play a patron 's selection from self-contained media .
The  क्लासिक ज्यूकबॉक्स रै बटन साथ अक्षर और संख्याएँ  on them that , when entered in combination , are used to play a specific selection .
A drug test  is a तकनीकी विश्लेषण of a biological नमूना – लिये उदाहरण मूत्र , बाल , रक्त , स्वेद  , or oral fluid / saliva – to determine the presence or absence of specified parent drugs or their metabolites .
Major uses of drug  परीक्षण हैं to detect the उपस्थिति of प्रदर्शन बढ़ाना steroids in खेल or लिये दवाएँ निषिद्ध  by laws , such as cannabis , cocaine and heroin .
A `` 10-panel urine  स्क्रीन '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines (  सहित methamphetamine  )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
cannabinoids  ( THC )
कोका
methadone
methaqualone
Opiates ( Codeine , Morphine , Heroin ,  oxycodone , hydrocodone  , etc . )
phencyclidine (  PCP )
propoxyphene
Saturn V rocket , used for  the अमरीकी मानवयुक्त चंद्र  landing missions
Space exploration is  the डिस्कवरी और खोजी of बाहरी स्पेस by अर्थात् of स्पेस प्रौद्योगिकी  .
Physical exploration of space is conducted both by human  spaceflights और by रोबोटिक spacecraft  .
While the observation of  वस्तुएँ in स्पेस , ज्ञात as खगोलशास्त्र , predates विश्वसनीय अंकित इतिहास , it थी the विकास of विशाल और  relatively efficient rockets during the early 20th century that allowed physical space exploration to become a reality .
Common rationales for exploring space include advancing scientific research , uniting different nations , ensuring  the भविष्य अस्तित्व of मानवता और विकासशील सैन्य और रणनीतिक लाभ  against other countries .
Various  आलोचनाओं of स्पेस खोजी  are sometimes made .
Space exploration has often  महरूम प्रयुक्त as a प्रॉक्सी प्रतियोगिता लिये geopolitical rivalries  such as the Cold War .
The early era of space exploration was driven by a  `` स्पेस रेस `` between the सोवियत संघ और the संयुक्त राज्य , the लॉन्च of the पहला man-made ऑब्जेक्ट to कक्षा the धरती , the ussr 's sputnik 1 , on 4 अक्तूबर 1957  , and the first Moon landing by the American Apollo 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often taken as the boundaries for this initial period .
The Soviet space program achieved many of the first milestones , including the first living being in orbit in  1957 , the पहला इंसान spaceflight ( यूरी गगारिन सवार वोस्तोक 1 ) in 1961 , the पहला spacewalk ( by aleksei leonov ) on 18 कूच 1965 ,  the first automatic landing on another celestial body in 1966 , and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971 .
After the first 20 years of  खोजी , फ़ोकस shifted इससे one-off फ़्लाइट to बेदर्दी हार्डवेयर , ऐसे as the स्पेस  Shuttle program , and from competition to cooperation as with the International Space Station ( ISS ) .
With  the substantial पूर्णता of the iss following sts-133  in March 2011 , plans for space exploration by the USA remain in flux .
Constellation , a  बुश प्रशासन कार्यक्रम लिये a वापसी to the चंद्रमा by 2020 थी judged inadequately वित्तपोषित  and unrealistic by an expert review panel reporting in 2009 .
The Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation  in 2010 to फ़ोकस on the विकास of the काबिलियत लिये crewed मिशन परे कम धरती कक्षा ( leo ) , envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the  ISS beyond 2020 , transferring the development of launch vehicles for human crews from NASA to the private sector , and developing technology to enable missions to beyond LEO , such as Earth/Moon L1 , the Moon , Earth/Sun L2 , near-earth asteroids , and Phobos or Mars orbit .
As of March 2011 , the US Senate and House of  प्रतिनिधि हैं स्टिल working towards a सुलह नासा funding विधेयक , जिससे होगा  probably terminate Constellation and fund development of a heavy lift launch vehicle ( HLLV ) .
In the 2000s  , the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन initiated a कामयाब मानवयुक्त spaceflight  program , while the European Union , Japan , and India have also planned future manned space missions .
चीन , रूस , जापानी , और इण्डिया have advocated मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा दौरान the  21st century , while the European Union has advocated manned missions to both the Moon and Mars during the 21st century .
From the 1990s onwards , private  रूचि began promoting स्पेस पर्यटन और तब निजी  space exploration of the Moon ( see Google Lunar X Prize ) .
John Calvin Coolidge , Jr. (  जुलाई 4 , 1872january 5 , 1933 ) थी the 30th अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1923–1929 ) .
A  रिपब्लिकन वकील इससे वर्मांट , कूलिज worked उसके रास्ता up the सीढ़ियाँ of मैसाचुसेट्स  state politics , eventually becoming governor of that state .
His conduct during the Boston Police Strike  of 1919 thrust उसे into the नेशनल स्पॉटलाइट और दिया उसे a प्रतिष्ठा as  a man of decisive action .
Soon after , he was elected as the 29th Vice President in  1920 और succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी upon the अचानक मौत of वारेन  G. Harding in 1923 .
निर्वाचित in उसके अपना सही in 1924 , he gained a प्रतिष्ठा  as a small-government conservative , and also as a man who said very little .
Coolidge restored public confidence in the White  हाउस बाद the घोटालों of उसके पूर्ववर्ती 's प्रशासन , और बाएँ दफ्तर साथ considerable  popularity .
As a Coolidge biographer put it , `` He embodied the spirit and hopes of the  मध्य क्लास , could interpret उनके longings और एक्स्प्रेस  their opinions .
That he did  represent the प्रतिभाशाली of the औसत is the  most convincing proof of his strength . ''
Some later criticized Coolidge as part of  a सामान्य आलोचना of laissez-faire सरकारी  .
His  प्रतिष्ठा underwent a पुनर्जागरण दौरान the रोनाल्ड reagan प्रशासन , लकिन the परम मूल्यांकन of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी  is still divided between those who approve of his reduction of the size of government programs and those who believe the federal government should be more involved in regulating and controlling the economy .
Espresso is a concentrated beverage brewed by forcing a small  राशि of nearly खौलते जल अंतर्गत दबाव through  finely ground coffee beans .
Espresso often has a  thicker संगति than कॉफी brewed by अन्य विधि , a उच्चतर विशेषज्ञता of निलंबित और dissolved solids , और crema  ( meaning cream , but being a reference to the foam with a creamy texture that forms as a result of the pressure ) .
as a परिणाम of the pressurized brewing प्रक्रम the जायका और रसायन  in a typical cup of espresso are very concentrated .
Espresso is the base for other drinks , such as a latte  , कापुचीनो , macchiato , मोचा  , or americano .
Espresso  रै अधिक कैफीन प्रति ईकाई आवाज़ than सबसे पेय , लकिन  the usual serving size is smaller—a typical 60 mL ( 2 US fluid ounce ) of espresso has 80 to 150 mg of caffeine , little less than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup of drip-brewed coffee .
Brian Keith Kelly ( born  अक्तूबर 25 , 1961 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल  coach and former player .
He is currently the head football coach for the  notre dame लड़ आयरिश , a स्थिति he रै आयोजित चूंकि दिसम्बर  2009 .
Kelly was previously head coach at Grand Valley State University ( 1991–2003 ) , Central Michigan  विश्वविद्यालयों ( 2004–2006 ) , और विश्वविद्यालयों of सिनसिनाटी ( 2006–2009  ) .
A contract  is an अनुबंध having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or  more parties , each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them .
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity  जो एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of  obligation . ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be done in writing ,  हालांकि अनुबंध may be बना entirely orally or  by conduct .
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` damages '' in the form of  मुआवजे of धन or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन enforced through  an injunction .
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit  of the सौदेबाजी '' or अपेक्षा क्षतिपूर्ति , जिससे हैं वृहद than mere रिलायंस क्षतिपूर्ति , as in  promissory estoppel .
The parties may be  प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों or juristic व्यक्तियों  .
A contract is a legally enforceable promise or  undertaking कि कुछ होगा  or will not occur .
The word  वादा can be प्रयुक्त as a विधिक पर्याय लिये अनुबंध , हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a वादा may नहीं have the  full standing of a contract , as when it is an agreement without consideration .
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another ,  सहित मतभेद in आम विधि compared to सिविल विधि , the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि ,  particularly from England in common law countries , and of law codified in regional legislation .
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example , there are 40  प्रासंगिक अधिनियमों जिससे प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल )  level , and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW .
In addition there are  6 अंतरराष्ट्रीय यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings , ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
Sidney Patrick Crosby , ONS ( born  अगस्त 7 , 1987 ) is a कनाडाई पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी खिलाड़ी जो is कप्तान of the पिट्सबर्ग  Penguins of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Crosby was drafted first overall by the  penguins आउट of the क्यूबेक  Major Junior Hockey League ( QMJHL ) .
During his two-year major junior career with the Rimouski Océanic , he earned  back-to-back chl खिलाड़ी of the साल पुरस्कार और led उसके क्लबों to the 2005 मेमोरियल  Cup final .
nicknamed `` the अगला एक `` , he थी एक of the सबसे अत्यधिक regarded ड्राफ्ट चयन in हॉकी इतिहास  , leading many to refer to the 2005 Draft Lottery as the `` Sidney Crosby Sweepstakes '' .
in उसके पहला एनएचएल ऋतु , crosby समाप्त छठे in लीग स्कोरिंग साथ 102  points ( 39 goals , 63 assists ) and was a runner-up for the Calder Memorial Trophy ( won by Alexander Ovechkin ) .
By his second season , he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals , 84 assists ) to  कैप्चर the आर्ट रॉस ट्रॉफी , बनने the youngest खिलाड़ी और the तभी किशोरावस्था to जीत a स्कोरिंग शीर्षक in  any major North American sports league .
कि वही ऋतु , crosby भी जीती the हार्ट मेमोरियल ट्रॉफी as the पेशेवर हॉकी लेखक संघ 's चुनाव लिये सबसे मूल्यवान  player and the Lester B. Pearson Award as the NHL Players Association 's choice for most outstanding player , becoming the seventh player in NHL history to earn all three awards in one year .
Crosby started the 2007–08 season with the  टोली 's कप्तानी और subsequently led उन्हें to the 2008 स्टेनली कप फाइनल , जहाँ वे यहूद  defeated by the Detroit Red Wings in six games .
The Penguins returned to the Finals against Detroit the following  साल और जीती in सात खेल ; crosby became the youngest कप्तान in एनएचएल इतिहास  to win the Stanley Cup .
In the  2009–10 ऋतु , crosby scored a career-high 51 लक्ष्य  , tying him with Steven Stamkos for the Rocket Richard Trophy as the league-leader ; with 58 assists , he totaled 109 points , second in the NHL .
During the off-season ,  crosby प्राप्त the चिह्नित मेसियर नेतृत्व  Award .
In 2010–11 , Crosby  sustained a concussion as a परिणाम of हिट्स  to the head in back-to-back games .
The injury left  उसे sidelined लिये  ten and a half months .
However , after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season ,  crosby 's concussion-like लक्षण लौटे in दिसम्बर 2011 , और he किया नहीं वापसी जबतक mid-march 2012 .
Internationally , Crosby has  represented कनाडा in numerous tournaments लिये the देश 's जूनियर  and men 's teams .
बाद स्पर्धा in the 2003 u-18 जूनियर संसार कप , he represented  Canada in back-to-back IIHF World U20 Championships , winning silver in 2004 and gold in 2005 .
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship , he led the  टूर्नामेंट in स्कोरिंग , जबकि भी कमाई शीर्ष आगे और all-star टोली  honours .
Four years later , Crosby was named to Team Canada  लिये the 2010 शीत ओलंपिक  in Vancouver .
Playing the  संयुक्त राज्य in the सुनहरा पदक  game , he scored the game-winning goal in overtime .
A United  राज्य cent , भी  known as a penny .
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its  longer संस्करण `` put my दो सेंट in '' is an संयुक्त राज्य ( us ) idiomatic अभिव्यक्ति , लिया इससे the असली अंग्रेज़ी मुहावरा अभिव्यक्ति  : to put in `` my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth . ''
It is  प्रयुक्त to preface the अंतरिम stating of one’s  opinion .
By deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting its value is only two cents , a very small amount –  the उपयोक्ता of the phrase उम्मीदें to lessen the प्रभाव of a संभवतः बयान , प्रर्दशित politeness और विनम्रता  .
however , it is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त साथ विडंबना  when expressing a strongly felt opinion .
The phrase is also  प्रयुक्त आउट of आदत to preface uncontentious  opinions .
लिये example:
The Chinese Civil War was a civil war in China fought between forces loyal to  the सरकारी of the गणतंत्र of चीन led by the kuomintang ( kmt ) और शक्तियां of the कम्युनिस्ट  Party of China ( CPC ) .
The war  began in अप्रैल 1927 , amidst the उत्तरी expedition  , and essentially ended when major active battles ceased in 1950 .
The  विरोध आखिरकार resulted in दो de facto राज्य , the गणतंत्र of चीन ( आरओसी ) in ताईवान और the लोगों  's Republic of China ( PRC ) in mainland China , both claiming to be the legitimate government of China .
The war represented an  वैचारिक विभाजित ( बाएँ vs . सही ) between the कम्युनिस्ट  CPC , and the KMT 's brand of Nationalism .
The  सिविल युद्ध जारी intermittently जबतक लेट 1937 , जब  the two parties formed a Second United Front to counter a Japanese invasion .
China 's full-scale civil war resumed in 1946  , a साल बाद the समाप्त of hostilities साथ  Japan .
After four more years , 1950 saw  the cessation of प्रमुख सैन्य hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन controlling मेनलैंड चीन ( सहित हाइनान  ) , and the Republic of China 's jurisdiction being restricted to Taiwan , Penghu , Quemoy , Matsu and several outlying islands .
The Kuomintang defeat is attributed to several factors : Corruption - Chiang wrote  in उसके डायरी on जून 1948 कि the kmt था विफल , नहीं क्युकी of बाह्य दुश्मनों लकिन क्युकी of  rot from within .
दमदार आरंभिक support इससे the  U.S. diminished , and then , stopped .
( Partly because of KMT corruption and anti-democratic  शासन , और partly क्युकी of the अनिश्चित u.S. विदेशी नीति towards साम्यवादी between 1945 और 1950  ) ; Communist land reform policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords .
This  ensured pla लोकप्रिय  support .
After the surrender of  जापानी at the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध ii , सोवियत शक्तियां turned over उनके captured जापानी  weapons to the CPC and allowed the CPC to take control of territory in Manchuria .
To this day , no armistice or peace treaty has  कभी महरूम हस्ताक्षरित , और it is debated  as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended .
Cross-Strait relations have been hindered by military threats and political  और आर्थिक दबाव , विशेषकर over ताईवान 's राजनैतिक औकात ,  with both governments officially adhering to a `` One-China policy . ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan as part of its territory and continues to  threaten the आरओसी साथ a सैन्य आक्रमण if the आरओसी officially declares स्वतंत्रता by बदलना इसके नाम to  and gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan .
The ROC mutually claims  मेनलैंड चीन , और वे दोनो continue the लड़ो  over diplomatic recognition .
Today  , the युद्ध as ऐसे occurs on the राजनैतिक और आर्थिक fronts in the रूप of cross-strait  relations ; however , the two separate de facto states have close economic ties .
The  एक सौ बारहवीं संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस थी the  meeting of the legislative branch of the United States federal government , from January 3 , 2011 until January 3 , 2013 .
It convened in Washington , D.C. on January 3  , 2011 , और ended on जनवरी 3 , 2013 , 17 दिनों पहले the समाप्त of the  presidential term to which Barack Obama was elected in 2008 .
सीनेटरों निर्वाचित to नियमित शर्तें in 2006 समाप्त  those terms in this Congress .
This Congress  शामिल the पिछला हाउस of प्रतिनिधि निर्वाचित इससे congressional जिले  that were apportioned based on the 2000 census .
In the 2010 midterm  चुनावों , the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी जीती the  majority in the House of Representatives .
जबकि the डेमोक्रेट रखा उनके  Senate majority , it was reduced from the previous Congress .
This was the first Congress in which the House  और सीनेट यहूद नियंत्रित by अलग पार्टियों चूंकि the 107th कॉंग्रेस  ( 2001–2003 ) , and the first Congress to begin that way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ) .
In this  कॉंग्रेस , the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि था the largest क्रमांक of रिपब्लिकन  members , 242 , since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ) .
It was also the first Congress since 1947 in which no member of the Kennedy family served , as well as the  सबसे नीतियां polarized कॉंग्रेस चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण , साथ रिकार्ड  low approval ratings .
Wealth in the United States is  commonly measured in शर्तें of जाल लायक , जिससे is the योग  of all assets , including home equity , minus all liabilities .
The total net worth of US households and nonprofit organizations  1945–2009 , unadjusted लिये महंगाई or जनसांख्यिकी बदलें  .
For example , a  household in कब्ज़ा of an $ 800,000 हाउस , $ 5,000 in परस्पर निधि , $ 30,000 in गाड़ियाँ , $ 20,000 लायक  of stock in their own company , and a $ 45,000 IRA would have assets totaling $ 900,000 .
Assuming that this household  होता have a $ 250,000 बंधक , $ 40,000 in car लोन , और $ 10,000 in क्रेडिट  card debt , its debts would total $ 300,000 .
Subtracting the debts from the worth of this household  's एसेट ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ) , इस  household would have a net worth of $ 600,000 .
Net worth can vary with  fluctuations in मान of the  underlying assets .
The wealth —more specifically ,  the मध्य जाल worth—of households in the संयुक्त राज्य is varied साथ संबंध  to race , education , geographic location and gender .
As one would expect , households with greater income feature the highest net  worths , हालांकि ऊँची आय can नहीं be लिया as an सदा सटीक indicator  of net worth .
Overall the number of wealthier households  is on the वृद्धि , साथ baby boomers hitting the highs  of their careers .
In addition , wealth is unevenly  वितरित , साथ the wealthiest 25 % of us households owning 87 % of the माल in the संयुक्त  States , which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009 .
Including human capital such as skills , the United Nations estimated  the कुल माल of the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008  to be $ 118 trillion .
This article deals with Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy ( SDR ) rather than the rhizotomy procedures for pain relief ; for those procedures ,  जिससे have begun to लो the नाम `` rhizotomy '' in निश्चित उदाहरण , देखिए facet rhizotomy और समान  .
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively destroys problematic nerve roots in the spinal cord ,  सबसे प्रायः to relieve the लक्षण of neuromuscular शर्तें ऐसे as spastic diplegia और अन्य फ़ॉर्म of spastic  cerebral palsy .
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic cerebral palsy has been the main use of rhizotomy for neurosurgeons specialising in  spastic cp चूंकि the 1980s ; in इस सर्जरी , the spasticity-causing nerves हैं पृथक और तब targeted और नष्ट  .
The sensory nerve roots ,  जहाँ spasticity is स्तिथ , हैं पहला अलग  from the motor ones , and the nerve fibres to be cut are then identified via electromyographic stimulation .
The ones  producing spasticity हैं तब selectively lesioned साथ छोटा  electrical pulses .
In spasticity ,  rhizotomy precisely लक्ष्य और नष्ट the क्षतिग्रस्त nerves कि don’t प्राप्त गामा अमीनो butyric एसिड , जिससे is the कोर  problem for people with spastic cerebral palsy .
These  over-firing , non-gaba-absorbing nerves generate असामान्य विद्युत कार्यकलाप दौरान the emg परीक्षण phase in sdr  and are thus considered to be the source of the patient 's hypertonia ; they are eliminated with the electrical pulses once identified , while the remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched .
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved , and that this is done without affecting  बेचैन प्रणाली संवेदनशीलता or फलन in अन्य क्षेत्रों , क्युकी the तभी nerves नष्ट हैं the over-firing ones जिम्मेदार  for the muscle tightness .
The terms rhizotomy and neurotomy are also increasingly becoming interchangeable in  the उपचार of दीर्घकालिक वापस पीड़ा इससे अपक्षयी डिस्क  disease .
This is a procedure called a facet rhizotomy and is not a surgical procedure but is instead done  on an outpatient आधार using a सरल जांच to लागू radiofrequency लहरें to the  impinged pain-causing nerve root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body .
Such radio frequency nerve lesioning results in five to eight or more  महीने of पीड़ा राहत पहले the तंत्रिका regenerates और another  round of the procedure needs to be performed .
A facet  rhizotomy is बस एक of अनेक अलग फ़ॉर्म of radiofrequency ablation , और इसके उपयोग of  the `` rhizotomy '' name should not be confused with the SDR procedure .
Migrant workers in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , 1935
The term migrant worker has different official meanings and  connotations in अलग भाग of the संसार  .
The United Nations ' definition is broad , including any  लोगों working बाहर of उनके घर  country .
The term can also be used to describe someone who migrates within a  देश , संभवतः उनके अपना , in अनुक्रम to pursue कार्य ऐसे as मौसमी  work .
Photograph of Lil Wayne  साथ teardrop टैटू नीचे उसके  eyes .
The teardrop tattoo or tear  टैटू is a सांकेतिक टैटू कि is लगाई  underneath the eye .
It has no fixed  अर्थ लकिन लगभग सब meanings  ( see below ) have some connection to prison .
U.S.  रूट 75 is a north–south  U.S. Highway .
The highway 's northern terminus is in Kittson County , Minnesota , at the Canadian border  , जहाँ it एकबार जारी as मनिटोबा राजमार्ग 75 on the अन्य पक्ष of the now-closed किनारा  crossing .
Its southern terminus is at  अंतरराज्यीय 30 और अंतरराज्यीय 45 in डलास , टेक्सास ,  where it is known as North Central Expressway .
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border route ,  इससे कनाडा to the गल्फ of मैक्सिको at galveston  , Texas .
However , the entire segment south of Dallas , Texas has been decommissioned in favor of Interstate 45 , a  कटऑफ खण्ड of town-to-town सतह सड़क having become राज्य  Highway 75 .
Lower Ninth Ward is a  पड़ोस of the नगर of नई ऑरलियन्स  .
As the name  implies , it is भाग of  the Ninth Ward of New Orleans .
The Lower Ninth Ward is often thought of as the entire area within  नई ऑरलियन्स downriver of the औद्योगिक कनाल ; however , the नगर नियोजन आयोग divides इस क्षेत्रफल into  the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods .
The term `` Lower '' refers  to इसके स्थान दूर towards the मुँह of the मिसिसिपी नदी  , `` down '' or `` below '' the rest of the city in local geographic terminology .
But the 9th Ward , like  सब wards in नई ऑरलियन्स , is a मतदान ज़िला  .
The 9th Ward  थी added as a मतदान  district in 1852 .
The `` lower '' 9th Ward is composed of Ward 9 Districts 1 , 2 , 4 , and 7  जिससे मेक up the पावन क्रॉस क्षेत्रफल और वार्ड 9 जिले 3 , 5 , 6 ,  and 8 .
Higher voting district numbers in  the 9th वार्ड ( 8-27 ) हैं on the upriver पक्ष  of the Industrial Canal .
The area came to national  ध्यान लिये इसके devastation  in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005 .
Hubble views of  कोपरनिकस crater ( इनसेट ) , जिससे is परिचय 58 मील ( 93  km ) wide
Red and orange tinted Moon  , as देखी इससे धरती दौरान a चंद्र ग्रहण , जहाँ  the Earth comes between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is the only natural satellite of the  धरती , और the पांचवां largest उपग्रह in the सौर प्रणाली  .
It is the largest natural satellite of a planet in the Solar System relative  to the आकार of इसके प्राथमिक , having 27 % the व्यास और 60 % the घनत्व of धरती  , resulting in its mass .
The Moon  is the दूसरी densest उपग्रह  after Io , a satellite of Jupiter .
The Moon is in synchronous rotation with Earth , always showing the same face with its near side  चिह्नित by अंधेरा volcanic मरिया कि भरण between the उज्जवल प्राचीन crustal हाइलैंड्स और  the prominent impact craters .
It is the brightest  ऑब्जेक्ट in the आसमान बाद the सूर्य  , although its surface is actually very dark , with a reflectance similar to that of coal .
Its prominence in the sky  और इसके नियमित साईकिल of phases have , चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स , बना the चंद्रमा an महत्वपूर्ण सांस्कृतिक  influence on language , calendars , art and mythology .
The Moon 's  गुरुत्वाकर्षक influence produces the समंदर tides  and the minute lengthening of the day .
The Moon 's current orbital distance , about thirty times the diameter of the Earth , causes it to  appear लगभग the वही आकार in the आसमान as the सूर्य , allowing it to कवर the सूर्य nearly precisely in कुल सौर  eclipses .
This matching  of apparent विज़ुअल आकार is  a coincidence .
The Moon 's linear  अलहदा इससे the धरती is फिलहाल increasing at a रेट of 3.82±0.07cm  per year , but this rate is not constant .
The  चंद्रमा is विचार to have formed nearly 4.5 अरब  years ago , not long after the Earth .
Although there have been several hypotheses for its origin in the past , the current most  widely स्वीकृत स्पष्टीकरण is कि the चंद्रमा formed इससे the मलबा बाएँ over बाद a दानव प्रभाव between  Earth and a Mars -sized body .
The  चंद्रमा is the तभी celestial देह  other than Earth on which humans have set foot .
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon  साथ unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the संयुक्त राज्य ' नासा अपोलो कार्यक्रम हासिल the तभी मानवयुक्त मिशन to तिथि , शुरूआत साथ the पहला मानवयुक्त चंद्र orbiting मिशन by अपोलो 8 in 1968 , और छह मानवयुक्त  lunar landings between 1969 and 1972 , with the first being Apollo 11 .
These missions returned over 380 kg of lunar rocks , which have  महरूम प्रयुक्त to develop a geological समझना of the चंद्रमा 's origins , the गठन of इसके आतंरिक ढांचा , और इसके subsequent  history .
After the Apollo 17 mission in 1972 ,  the चंद्रमा रै महरूम visited तभी by unmanned  spacecraft , notably by the final Soviet Lunokhod rover .
Since 2004 , Japan ,  चीन , इण्डिया , the संयुक्त राज्य , और the यूरोपीय स्पेस  Agency have each sent lunar orbiters .
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery of lunar water ice in  permanently shadowed craters at the डंडे और बंधी into the चंद्र regolith .
Future  मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा have महरूम नियोजित ,  including government as well as privately funded efforts .
The Moon remains , under  the बाहरी स्पेस सन्धि , फ़्री to  all nations to explore for peaceful purposes .
Ronald Wilson Reagan ( ; February 6  , 1911 – जून 5 , 2004 ) थी the 40th अध्यक्ष of the  United States ( 1981–1989 ) .
Prior to that , he was the 33rd Governor of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( 1967–1975 ) , और a रेडियो , फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न  actor .
Born in Tampico ,  इलिनोइस , और उठाया in डिक्सन , reagan थी शिक्षित at यूरेका कॉलेज , कमाई  a Bachelor of Arts degree in economics and sociology .
After graduating , Reagan moved first to Iowa to work as a  रेडियो प्रसारणकर्ता और तब , in 1937 , to लॉस एंजिल्स जहाँ he began  a career as an actor , first in films and later television .
Some of his most notable films include  knute rockne , सब अमरीकी ( 1940 ) , किंग्स पंक्ति ( 1942 ) , और bedtime लिये bonzo  ( 1951 ) .
Reagan served as President of the Screen Actors  गिल्ड और बाद as a प्रवक्ता लिये सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके प्रारंभ in राजनीती  occurred during his work for GE .
Originally a member of the Democratic Party , his positions began shifting rightward in the  1950s , और he switched to the रिपब्लिकन  Party in 1962 .
After delivering a rousing speech in support of Barry Goldwater 's presidential candidacy  in 1964 , he थी persuaded to तलाश the कैलिफ़ोर्निया  governorship , winning two years later and again in 1970 .
He  थी पराजित in उसके चलाएं लिये the रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय  nomination in 1968 and in 1976 , but won both the nomination and general election in 1980 , defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter .
As president , Reagan  implemented sweeping नई राजनैतिक और आर्थिक  initiatives .
His supply-side economic policies , dubbed `` Reaganomics `` , advocated reducing tax rates to spur economic growth ,  controlling the धन सप्लाई to reduce महंगाई , deregulation of the अर्थव्यवस्था , और reducing सरकारी बिता  .
In his first term he survived an assassination attempt ,  took a मुश्किल लकीर विरूद्ध मजदूर संघ , घोषित a नई युद्ध on दवाएँ , और ordered  an invasion of Grenada .
He was  re-elected in a भूस्खलन in 1984  , proclaiming that it was `` Morning in America `` .
His second term was primarily  चिह्नित by विदेशी matters , ऐसे as the समाप्ति of the ठंडा  War , the 1986 bombing of Libya , and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair .
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire `` , he supported  anti-communist आंदोलनों विश्वव्यापी और खर्च उसके पहला पद forgoing the रणनीति of détente by ordering a विशाल सैन्य buildup  in an arms race with the USSR .
Reagan negotiated with Soviet General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev , culminating in the  inf सन्धि और the घटी of दोनो देशों ' नाभिकीय arsenals  .
reagan बाएँ दफ्तर  in 1989 .
In 1994 , the former president disclosed that he  था महरूम diagnosed साथ अल्जाइमर 's बीमारी पहले in the साल ; he  died ten years later at the age of 93 .
A conservative icon , he ranks highly in public opinion polls  of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों और is credited लिये generating  an ideological renaissance on the American political right .
Complete set of  scrolls , constituting the संपूर्ण  Tanakh .
The Tanakh ( , or ; also  tenakh , tenak , tanach ) is a नाम प्रयुक्त in judaism लिये  the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh is also  ज्ञात as the masoretic टेक्स्ट or  the Miqra .
The name is an acronym formed from  the आरंभिक यहूदी अक्षर of the masoretic टेक्स्ट 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the तोरा ( ``  Teaching '' , also known as the Five Books of Moses ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra ''  ( מקרא ) , अर्थ `` कि जिससे is पढ़ा '' , is an  alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh .
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an  accompanying मौखिक परंपरा passed on by प्रत्येक पीढी , पुकारा  the Oral Torah .
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R is a Kawasaki  600 cc क्लास खेल मोटरसाइकिल  .
it थी introduced in 1995 , और रै महरूम constantly अद्यतनीकृत throughout the सालो  in response to new products from Honda , Suzuki , and Yamaha .
The ZX  श्रेणी is कया थी ज्ञात as the निंजा लकीर  of Kawasaki motorcycles in the 1980s and still carries the name today .
हत्या कोशिशें और भूखंड on राष्ट्रपतियों of the संयुक्त राज्य have महरूम numerous : अधिक than 20 कोशिशें to मार बैठे  and former presidents , as well as the Presidents-elect , are known .
चार बैठे राष्ट्रपतियों have महरूम मारे : अब्राहम lincoln  ( the 16th President ) , James A. Garfield ( the 20th President ) , William McKinley ( the 25th President ) and John F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ) .
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations : former President Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट ( the 26th अध्यक्ष ) , और अध्यक्ष  Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ) .
Although the historian J.W . Clarke has  सुझाया कि सबसे अमरीकी assassinations यहूद नीतियां प्रेरित क्रियाएँ , carried आउट by तर्कसंगत मेन , नहीं सब  such attacks have been undertaken for political reasons .
Some attackers had  questionable दिमागी स्थिरता , और a few यहूद judged  legally insane .
Since the Vice President of the United States has for  अधिक than a सदी महरूम निर्वाचित इससे the वही राजनैतिक पार्टी as the अध्यक्ष , the हत्या  of the President is unlikely to result in major policy changes .
इस may बताइये क्यों राजनैतिक समूह typically  do not make such attacks .
Where the Red Fern Grows is a novel  लिखा by विल्सन राल्स in 1961 परिचय a  boy who buys and trains two Redbone Coonhound hunting dogs .
ओक्लाहोमा ( ) ( pawnee : uukuhuúwa , cay  : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in West South Central United States .
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive  और the 28th सबसे populous  of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is  निकला इससे the choctaw शब्द okla और humma , अर्थ `` रेड लोगों  '' , and it is known informally by its nickname , The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and  भारतीय territory on नवम्बर 16 , 1907 , ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to डालें  the union .
Its  निवासियों हैं ज्ञात as oklahomans or , informally `` okies '' , और इसके  capital and largest city is Oklahoma City .
A major producer of natural gas  , आयल , और कृषि , ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of  aviation , energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the  स्वदेश , रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय  growth and gross domestic product growth .
ओक्लाहोमा नगर और तुलसा serve as ओक्लाहोमा 's प्राथमिक आर्थिक anchors  , with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within their metropolitan statistical areas .
With small mountain  सीमाएँ , प्रेयरी , mesas , और पूर्वी वनों , सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the u.s . आंतरिक  Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather .
In addition to having a prevalence of English , German ,  स्कॉटिश , आयरिश और देशी अमरीकी ancestry , अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला  in Oklahoma , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions  और historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव , a गंतव्य लिये दक्षिणी settlers , और a government-sanctioned territory लिये देशी अमेरिकी .
Redwall , by  ब्रायन ज़ाक , is a श्रेणी of children  's fantasy novels .
It is the title of the first book of the series , published in 1986 , as well as the name of the Abbey featured in the  किताब और the नाम of an एनिमेटेड tv श्रेणी आधारित on तीन of the novels  ( Redwall , Mattimeo , and Martin the Warrior ) , which first aired in 1999 .
The books are primarily aimed at  पुरानी children , लकिन have प्रशंसक of सब आयु  .
There have been twenty-two novels and two  चित्र किताबे प्रकाशित .
The twenty-second , and final  , अनोखा , the दुष्ट क्रू , थी मरणोपरांत  released on May 3 , 2011 .
Natural Gas is usually  measured by आवाज़ in the संयुक्त राज्य और  is stated in cubic feet .
A cubic  पैर of गैस is the राशि of गैस needed to भरण a आवाज़ of एक घन पैर अंतर्गत नियत  conditions of pressure and temperature.To measure larger amounts of natural gas , a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic feet , and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 cubic feet .
To provide greater accuracy in comparing  fuels , उर्जा सामग्री is measured in शर्तें of  `` British Thermal Units ( BTU 's ) . ''
A BTU  is the राशि of ऊष्मा जरूरी to उठाएँ एक पाउंड of जल ( लगभग  a pint ) , one degree Fahrenheit at or close to its point of maximum density .
One British therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- SI unit of heat  उर्जा बराबर to 100,000 अंग्रेजों थर्मल इकाई  ( BTU ) .
It  is लगभग the उर्जा समतुल्य of burning  100 cubic feet ( often referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas .
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and  नहीं उर्जा सामग्री , a therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रयुक्त by ( प्राकृतिक ) गैस कंपनियाँ to बदलें  the volume of gas used to its heat equivalent , and thus calculate the actual energy use .
The  therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रायः in the इकाई  therms/CCF .
It will vary with the mix of hydrocarbons  in the प्राकृतिक गैस  .
Natural  गैस साथ a उच्चतर than औसत विशेषज्ञता of  ethane , propane or butane will have a higher therm factor .
Impurities , such as carbon dioxide or  नाइट्रोजन , निम्नतर the therm फ़ैक्टर  .
The volume of  the गैस is गणना as if measured  at standard temperature and pressure ( STP ) .
The heat content of natural gas is solely dependent  on the संयोजन of the गैस , और is स्वतंत्र  of temperature and pressure .
One therm is equal to  परिचय 105.5 megajoules , 25,200 kilocalories  or 29.3 kilowatt-hours .
One therm can  भी be provided by  about of natural gas .
The therm  sometimes रै महरूम उलझन साथ the thermie  ( see below ) .
The names of both units come  इससे the यूनानी शब्द लिये ऊष्मा  .
A thermie ( th ) is a  मीट्रिक ईकाई of ऊष्मा उर्जा , भाग  of the meter-tonne-second system sometimes used by European engineers .
The  thermie is बराबर to the राशि of  energy required to raise the temperature of 1 tonne of water by 1 °C .
The thermie is  समतुल्य to 1,000 kilocalories , 4.1868 megajoules  or 3968.3 BTU .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war  लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका ( the  `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its  उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर  the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000  सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण  process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by  अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त  States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 ,  सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and  the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal  .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his  प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate सिविल युद्ध  .
Eight  बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी  to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized  numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed  by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference  विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह , और दोनो पहलू prepared  for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that  वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य  of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon Fort  sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण कैरोलिना  .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently ,  चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy , bringing उनके  total to eleven .
The Union soon  नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a  naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern  थिएटर थी inconclusive in  1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign  into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate  retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln  जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by  गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी , तब much of उनके  western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate  incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg  .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant  कमांड of सब संघ सेना  in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched  to the समुद्र , destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the  way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and  could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड , the  Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's  आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत  House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of  the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों  .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and  mass-produced हथियार यहूद  employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines ,  shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths of an  अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian हताहत  .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45  सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40  .
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28 , 1949 ) is a  पूर्व u.S. track और फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी , प्रेरक स्पीकर , socialite , टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व  and businessman .
He won the  सुनहरा पदक लिये decathlon in the  Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics .
Following his Olympic win and the related recognition , he married Kris Kardashian ,  और उसके पेशेवर करियर विकसित into होने a टेलीविज़न  celebrity .
By  1981 , he था स्ट्रक्चर in अनेक  made-for-TV movies and was Erik Estrada 's replacement on the top rated TV series CHiPs .
He  रै छह children : बर्ट , केसी , ब्रैंडन ,  Brody , Kendall and Kylie .
Since his 1991 marriage to Kris Jenner , he is  the stepfather to कोर्टनी , किम , khloe और  Rob Kardashian .
Since 2007 , he has appeared with his blended  परिवार on keeping up साथ the kardashians .
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated  E. कोलाई ) is a gram-negative , rod-shaped bacterium कि is commonly मिला in  the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ) .
Most E. coli strains are harmless , but some  serotypes can कारण गंभीर खाना विषाक्तता in इंसानो , और हैं occasionally जिम्मेदार  for product recalls due to food contamination .
The harmless strains are part of the normal flora of the gut , and can  लाभ उनके होस्ट by producing विटामिन k2 , और by preventing the स्थापना of रोगजनक जीवाणु भीतर the  intestine .
E. coli and related bacteria constitute about 0.1 % of gut flora , and  fecal–oral हस्तांतरण is the प्रमुख रूट through जिससे रोगजनक strains of the  bacterium cause disease .
Cells are able to survive outside the body for a limited amount of time , which makes  उन्हें आदर्श indicator जीवों to परीक्षण पर्यावरणीय नमूने लिये fecal संदूषण  .
वहीँ is , however , a growing  body of research that has examined environmentally persistent E. coli which can survive for extended periods outside of the host .
The bacterium can also be grown easily and  inexpensively in a प्रयोगशाला सेटिंग , और रै महरूम intensively investigated लिये over  60 years .
E. coli is the most widely studied  prokaryotic मॉडल सजीव , और an महत्वपूर्ण प्रजाति in the फ़ील्ड of जैवप्रौद्योगिकी और सूक्ष्मजैविकी  , where it has served as the host organism for the majority of work with recombinant DNA .
Area code 217 is  the उत्तर अमरीकी टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड लिये much of पश्चिमी  and central Illinois .
The 217 area includes Illinois ' capital ,  springfield , प्लस champaign , urbana , decatur , danville  , Quincy , and Rantoul .
217 was one of the original area codes ,  जिससे यहूद निर्मित in  1947 .
The only significant change in 217 's boundaries  थी in 1957 , जब इसके उत्तरी portion थी संयुक्त साथ भाग  of area code 815 to form area code 309 .
Image of the  largest अंटार्कटिक ओज़ोन छेद कभी अंकित  ( September 2006 ) , over the Southern pole
Layers of the  माहौल ( नहीं to  scale )
Ozone depletion  describes दो पृथक लकिन सम्बन्धित phenomena observed चूंकि the लेट 1970s : a स्थिर मनाही of परिचय 4 % प्रति दशक in  the total volume of ozone in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ozone layer ) , and a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's polar regions .
the latter घटना is referred  to as the ozone hole .
In addition to  ये well-known stratospheric phenomena , वहीँ हैं भी springtime  polar tropospheric ozone depletion events .
The details of  ध्रुवीय ओज़ोन छेद गठन differ इससे कि of mid-latitude thinning , लकिन the सबसे  important process in both is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic halogens .
The main source of  ये हैलोजन अणु in the stratosphere is photodissociation  of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( CFCs , freons , halons ) .
These compounds are  transported into the stratosphere बाद होने  emitted at the surface .
दोनो प्रकार of ओज़ोन depletion यहूद observed  to increase as emissions of halo-carbons increased .
CFCs and other contributory substances are  referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ods  ) .
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( UV light ) from passing  through the धरती 's माहौल , observed और प्रक्षिप्त decreases in ओज़ोन have उत्पन्न विश्वव्यापी चिंता अग्रणी to अपनाना of the मॉन्ट्रियल प्रोटोकॉल कि  bans the production of CFCs , halons , and other ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane .
It is suspected that a  किस्में of biological consequences ऐसे as increases in  skin cancer , cataracts , damage to plants , and reduction of plankton populations in the ocean 's photic zone may result from the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion .
The Preamble to the United States  संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक बयान of the संविधान  's fundamental purposes and guiding principles .
It states in general terms , and courts have  referred to it as विश्वसनीय प्रमाण of , the founding fathers ' इरादों regarding the संविधान 's अर्थ  and what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States .
As the phrase , `` we the people ''  suggests कि the नई सरकारी originates इससे the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य और it सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी  concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy .
Czechoslovakian shot putter Plihan  at the 1957 ईस्ट जर्मनी अंदर एथलेटिक्स  Championships
The shot put ( pronounced ) is a track and field event involving ``  फेंकना '' / '' putting '' ( फेंकना in a pushing गति ) a भारी गोलाकार ऑब्जेक्ट  —the shot—as far as possible .
The shot put  प्रतियोगिता लिये मेन रै महरूम a भाग of the आधुनिक ओलंपिक चूंकि उनके  revival in 1896 , women 's competition began in 1948 .
Map of the United Nations ( UN ) member states , with their territories ( including  निर्भर territories ) पहचाना by the un in  blue
There are United Nations (  un ) सदस्य राज्य , और प्रत्येक of उन्हें is  a member of the United Nations General Assembly .
The criteria for  प्रवेश of नई सदस्यों हैं नियत आउट in the संयुक्त राष्ट्र चार्टर  , Chapter II , Article 4:
A recommendation for admission from the Security Council requires affirmative votes from at least nine of the  परिषद 's पंद्रह सदस्यों , साथ none of the पाँच स्थाई सदस्यों मतदान विरूद्ध  .
The Security Council 's recommendation must then be  subsequently स्वीकृत in the सामान्य सभा  by a two-thirds majority vote .
In principle , only sovereign  राज्य can become un सदस्यों , और फिलहाल सब un सदस्यों हैं sovereign राज्य ( हालांकि a  few members were not sovereign when they joined the UN ) .
Because a state can only be admitted to the UN by the  स्वीकृति of the सुरक्षा परिषद और the सामान्य सभा , a क्रमांक of राज्य कि may be माना sovereign राज्य  according to the Montevideo Convention criteria are not members because the UN does not consider them to possess sovereignty , mainly due to the lack of international recognition or opposition from certain members .
In addition to the member states , the UN also invites non-member states ( currently two :  the पावन देखिए और फिलिस्तीन ) , intergovernmental संगठन , और अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन और entities जिनकी statehood or प्रभुता हैं  not precisely defined , to become observers at the General Assembly , allowing them to participate and speak , but not vote , in General Assembly meetings .
The Eiffel Tower ( , ) is an iron lattice tower located on the Champ  de मंगल in पेरिस , नामित बाद the इंजीनियर gustave एफिल , जिनकी कम्पनी designed और  built the tower .
Erected in 1889 as the entrance  मेहराब to the 1889 संसार 's मेला , it रै become दोनो a वैश्विक सांस्कृतिक  icon of France and one of the most recognizable structures in the world .
The tower is the tallest structure in Paris and the  most-visited सशुल्क स्मारक in the संसार ; 7.1 लाख लोगों ascended it in 2011  .
The third level observatory 's upper platform is at the  उच्चतम accessible to पब्लिक in the यूरोपीय संघ और the उच्चतम in यूरोपीय as long as the  platform of the Ostankino Tower , at , remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000 .
the मीनार प्राप्त इसके 250  millionth visitor in 2010 .
The tower  स्टैंड लम्बा , परिचय the वही ऊँचाई  as an 81-storey building .
दौरान इसके निर्माण , the एफिल मीनार surpassed the वॉशिंगटन स्मारक to assume the  title of the tallest man-made structure in the world , a title it held for 41 years , until the Chrysler Building in New York City was built in 1930 .
Because of the addition , in 1957 ,  of the एंटीना atop the एफिल मीनार , it is अभी taller than  the Chrysler Building .
Not including broadcast antennas , it is the second-tallest  ढांचा in फ़्रांस , बाद the millau viaduct  .
The tower has  तीन स्तर लिये विज़िटर  .
Tickets can be  खरीदा to ascend , by सीढ़ियाँ or लिफ्ट ( लिफ्ट ) , to the पहला  and second levels .
The walk from ground level to  the पहला स्तर is over 300 कदम , as is the चलना इससे  the first to the second level .
The third  और उच्चतम स्तर is accessible तभी by lift—stairs do मौजूद लकिन  are usually closed to the public .
The first and second  स्तर have रेस्तरां  .
The tower has become the most prominent symbol of  दोनो पेरिस और फ़्रांस , प्रायः in the establishing शॉट of films नियत  in the city .
Kenneth Wayne `` Ken '' Jennings III ( born May 23 ,  1974 ) is an अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ प्रतियोगी और लेखक  .
Jennings is noted for holding the record for the longest  जीतना streak on the u.S. syndicated  game show Jeopardy !
and as being the  all-time अग्रणी धन  winner on American game shows .
In  2004 , जेनिंग्स जीती 74 jeopardy  !
games before he  थी पराजित by चैलेंजर नैंसी zerg on उसके 75th  appearance .
His total  आय on jeopardy  !
are $ 3,172,700 , consisting of $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins , a $ 2,000  second-place पुरस्कार in उसके 75th रूप , a  $ 500,000 second-place prize in the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament  of champions , as खूब as हाफ of a $ 300,000  prize in the IBM Challenge .
दौरान उसके पहला  run of Jeopardy !
appearances  , जेनिंग्स अर्जित the रिकार्ड लिये the उच्चतम  American game show winnings .
His total was surpassed by Brad Rutter , who  पराजित जेनिंग्स in the फाइनल of the jeopardy  !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions ( first  aired on may 25 , 2005 ) , adding $ 2,000,000 to rutter  's existing Jeopardy !
winnings  .
जेनिंग्स regained the रिकार्ड बाद appearing on अनेक अन्य  game shows , culminating in an appearance on Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader ?
( first aired on October 10 , 2008 ) ,  हालांकि rutter retains the jeopardy !
रिकार्ड  .
After  उसके कामयाबी on jeopardy ! , जेनिंग्स लिखा परिचय उसके अनुभव और छान अमरीकी ट्रिविया इतिहास और संस्कृति in उसके किताब  Brainiac : Adventures in the Curious , Competitive , Compulsive World of Trivia Buffs , published in 2006 .
The Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल लीग or cfl ( ' [ lcf ] in फ्रेंच  ) is a professional sports league located in Canada .
The CFL is the highest level of competition in Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल , a रूप of gridiron फ़ुटबॉल closely सम्बन्धित to अमरीकी  football .
Its eight current teams , which are located in eight separate  शहरों , हैं विभाजित into दो विभाजन of चार टीमों प्रत्येक — the ईस्ट प्रभाग और the वेस्ट प्रभाग  .
The league 's 19-week regular season runs from late June to early November ;  प्रत्येक टोली plays 18 खेल साथ एक अलविदा  week .
following the नियमित ऋतु , the तीन टीमों साथ the बेहतरीन रिकॉर्ड in उनके प्रभाग ( मगर if the चौथी प्लेस टोली in एक प्रभाग रै a बेहतर रिकार्ड than the तीसरा प्लेस टोली in the  other division , when the team with the better record makes the playoffs and `` crosses over '' to the other division 's playoff ) compete in the league 's three-week divisional playoffs , which culminate in the late-November Grey Cup championship , the country 's largest annual sports and television event .
The CFL was officially founded on January 19 , 1958 , making it the second oldest  gridiron फ़ुटबॉल लीग in उत्तर अमेरिका स्टिल in आपरेशन , हालांकि सब इसके टीमों long predate the आधुनिक  formation of the league .
It is the highest level of play in Canadian football , the most popular football league in Canada , and the  second-most लोकप्रिय प्रमुख खेल लीग in कनाडा , बाद the नेशनल  Hockey League .
Although ice hockey is Canada 's most popular sport ,  the cfl रै increased the लोकप्रियता of कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल in क्यूबेक  and Western Canada .
Canadian football is also played at amateur levels ( i.e . youth , high school , CJFL ,  qjfl , cis और वरिष्ठ लीग ऐसे as the अलबर्टा फ़ुटबॉल  League ) .
The 2010s will be a significant decade for the CFL in  शर्तें of विकास , as टीमों have संवर , विस्तारित स्टेडियम , or  plan to build entirely new stadiums .
The Montreal Alouettes accomplished this first , adding 5,000 seats to  पर्सिवल molson मेमोरियल स्टेडियम in समय लिये  the 2010 CFL season .
the एडमॉन्टन एस्किमोस और कैला स्तेमपेड्रस भी संवर उनके  respective stadiums and facilities for the 2010 season .
In 2011 , the BC Lions played under a  नई , retractable छत in bc प्लेस बाद बिता एक और a हाफ  seasons at Empire Field .
Then the Winnipeg Blue Bombers will play in an entirely new stadium  at the विश्वविद्यालयों of मनिटोबा , अनुसूचित to खोलें in समय लिये the 2013 ऋतु  .
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats , Saskatchewan Roughriders and the new  ओटावा मताधिकार हैं भी looking at नई or extensively-renovated  stadiums in the following years .
There are also hopes of expanding the league to Atlantic Canada ( ideally basing a team in either the more populated Halifax , or the more  centralized moncton ) , as 2010 और 2011 था नियमित ऋतु  games hosted in Moncton .
According to sports historian Douglas Brei , the Canadian Football League holds the  भेद of होने the तभी पेशेवर खेल लीग in उत्तर अमेरिका , प्रमुख or नाबालिग लीग , in जिससे प्रत्येक मौजूदा मताधिकार रै जीती at  least one league title while in their current location .
Each  एंटीबॉडी बांधता to a विशिष्ट प्रतिजन ; an बातचीत  similar to a lock and key .
An antibody ( Ab ) , also known as an immunoglobulin ( Ig ) , is a large Y-shaped protein produced  by b-cells कि is प्रयुक्त by the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली to पहचानो और neutralize विदेशी वस्तुएँ  such as bacteria and viruses .
The antibody recognizes a  अद्वितीय भाग of the विदेशी निशाना , पुकारा  an antigen .
Each tip of the `` Y '' of an  एंटीबॉडी contains a paratope ( a ढांचा analogous to a ताला ) कि is विशिष्ट लिये एक particular  epitope ( similarly analogous to a key ) on an antigen , allowing these two structures to bind together with precision .
Using this binding mechanism , an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected cell for attack by other parts of the immune  प्रणाली , or can neutralize इसके निशाना सीधे ( लिये उदाहरण , by ब्लॉकिंग a भाग of a microbe कि is अनिवार्य लिये इसके आक्रमण और अस्तित्व  ) .
The  उत्पादन of antibodies is the प्रमुख  function of the humoral immune system .
Antibodies  हैं स्रावित by a प्रकार of श्वेत  blood cell called a plasma cell .
Antibodies can occur in two physical forms , a soluble form that is secreted from the cell , and a membrane -bound form  कि is संलग्न to the सतह of a b कोशिका और is referred to as the b  cell receptor ( BCR ) .
The BCR is only found on the surface of B  कोशिकाएं और facilitates the सक्रियण of ये कोशिकाएं और उनके subsequent differentiation into either एंटीबॉडी कारखानों पुकारा प्लाज्मा कोशिकाएं , or मेमोरी b कोशिकाएं कि  will survive in the body and remember that same antigen so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure .
In most cases , interaction of the B cell with a T helper cell is necessary to  उपज पूरा सक्रियण of the b कोशिका और , इसलिए , एंटीबॉडी पीढी following  antigen binding .
Soluble antibodies are released  into the रक्त और ऊतक fluids , as खूब  as many secretions to continue to survey for invading microorganisms .
Antibodies are glycoproteins belonging to  the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the शर्तें एंटीबॉडी और immunoglobulin  are often used interchangeably .
Antibodies are typically made of basic structural  units—each साथ दो विशाल भारी जंजीरों  and two small light chains .
There are several different types of antibody heavy chains , and several different kinds  of antibodies , जिससे हैं grouped into अलग isotypes आधारित on जिससे भारी  chain they possess .
Five different antibody isotypes are known in mammals , which  perform अलग भूमिकाएँ , और सहायता सीधा the उचित  immune response for each different type of foreign object they encounter .
Though the general structure of  सब antibodies is बहुत समान , a छोटी प्रदेश at the टिप of the प्रोटीन is अत्यधिक परिवर्तनीय , allowing लाखो of  antibodies with slightly different tip structures , or antigen binding sites , to exist .
इस प्रदेश is ज्ञात as the  hypervariable region .
प्रत्येक of ये विसंगतियाँ can bind  to a different antigen .
This enormous diversity of antibodies allows the immune  प्रणाली to recognize an बराबर चौड़ी किस्में of  antigens .
The large and diverse population of antibodies is generated by random combinations of a set of gene segments that encode different  प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग साइट ( or paratopes ) , followed by यादृच्छिक mutations in इस  area of the antibody gene , which create further diversity .
Antibody genes also  re-organize in a प्रक्रम पुकारा क्लास switching कि परिवर्तन the आधार of the भारी कड़ी to another  , creating a different isotype of the antibody that retains the antigen specific variable region .
This allows a single antibody  to be प्रयुक्त by अनेक अलग  parts of the immune system .
The symbol used  by the zodiac कातिल to चिह्न  his correspondence
The Zodiac Killer was a  सीरियल कातिल जो संचालित in उत्तरी  California in the late 1960s and early 1970s .
The killer 's  पहचान remains  unknown .
The Zodiac murdered victims in Benicia , Vallejo ,  झील berryessa , और सैन फ्रांसिस्को between दिसम्बर 1968  and October 1969 .
चार मेन और तीन महिलाओं between  the ages of 16 and 29 were targeted .
the कातिल originated the नाम `` zodiac  '' in a series of taunting letters sent to the local Bay Area press .
These letters  शामिल चार cryptograms ( or ciphers  ) .
Of the four cryptograms sent , only one has been  definitively  solved .
Suspects  have महरूम नामित by विधि प्रवर्तन और amateur जांचकर्ताओं  , but no conclusive evidence has surfaced .
In April 2004 , the San Francisco Police  विभाग चिह्नित the मामला `` निष्क्रिय '' , yet re-opened  the case at some point prior to March 2007 .
the मामला भी remains खोलें in the नगर of  Vallejo , as well as in Napa County and Solano County .
The California Department of Justice  रै कायम an खोलें मामला संचिका on the zodiac हत्याएं चूंकि 1969  .
Jennings is a  छोटी नगर in और the मोहल्ला सीट of जेफरसन डेविस मोहल्ला  , Louisiana , United States , near Lake Charles .
The population was 10,383 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी , a छोटी मनाही इससे  the 2000 tabulation .
The city is 68  प्रतिशत श्वेत  .
जेनिंग्स is the प्रिंसिपल नगर of the जेनिंग्स  Micropolitan Statistical Area , which includes all of Jefferson Davis Parish .
It is also  भाग of the larger झील charles-jennings  Combined Statistical Area .
Nanotechnology ( sometimes  shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the हेरफेर  of matter on an atomic and molecular scale .
The earliest , widespread description of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological goal of  precisely manipulating अणु और अणुओं लिये fabrication of macroscale उत्पाद , भी  now referred to as molecular nanotechnology .
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently established by the National  nanotechnology पहल , जिससे defines nanotechnology as the हेरफेर of पदार्थ साथ at तनिक एक आयाम sized  from 1 to 100 nanometers .
This definition reflects the fact that quantum mechanical effects are important at this quantum-realm scale , and so the definition  shifted इससे a particular technological लक्ष्य to a शोध श्रेणी समावेशी of सब प्रकार of शोध और technologies कि सौदे साथ the  special properties of matter that occur below the given size threshold .
It is therefore  आम to देखिए the बहुवचन रूप `` nanotechnologies  '' as well as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the broad range of research and applications whose common trait is size .
Because of the variety of potential applications ( including  औद्योगिक और सैन्य ) , सरकारें have invested अरबों of डॉलर in nanotechnology  research .
through इसके नेशनल nanotechnology पहल , the  USA has invested 3.7 billion dollars .
The European Union  रै invested 1.2 अरब और जापानी  750 million dollars .
Nanotechnology as defined by size is naturally very broad , including  फ़ील्ड of विज्ञान as विविध as सतह विज्ञान , सशुल्क रसायन , आणविक जीवविज्ञान , सेमीकंडक्टर भौतिकी  , microfabrication , etc .
The associated research and applications are equally diverse , ranging from extensions of conventional device physics to completely  नई approaches आधारित upon आणविक self-assembly , इससे विकासशील नई सामग्री साथ आयाम on the nanoscale to  direct control of matter on the atomic scale .
Scientists  फिलहाल बहस the भविष्य implications  of nanotechnology .
Nanotechnology may be able to create many new materials and devices with a vast range  of अनुप्रयोग , ऐसे as in आयुर्विज्ञान , इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स ,  biomaterials and energy production .
On the other hand , nanotechnology raises many of the same issues as any new technology , including concerns about the toxicity  और पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of nanomaterials , और उनके संभावित प्रभाव on वैश्विक अर्थशास्त्र , as खूब as अटकलें परिचय विभिन्न doomsday scenarios  .
These concerns have led to a  बहस among वकालत समूह और सरकारें on whether खास  regulation of nanotechnology is warranted .
Map of the  पूर्वी bloc
The term  पूर्वी bloc or कम्युनिस्ट bloc refers to the पूर्व कम्युनिस्ट राज्य of सेंट्रल और पूर्वी  Europe , generally the Soviet Union and the countries of the Warsaw Pact .
The terms Communist Bloc and Soviet Bloc  यहूद भी प्रयुक्त to denote groupings of राज्य लकीर साथ the सोवियत संघ , हालांकि ये शर्तें  might include states outside Central and Eastern Europe .
The New  जर्सी gubernatorial चुनाव  of 2009 took place on November 3 , 2009 .
Democratic Governor Jon Corzine was running for a second term and was being  challenged by रिपब्लिकन क्रिस क्रिस्टी , स्वतंत्र क्रिस्टोफर daggett और नौ अन्य , in जोड to अनेक write-in  candidates .
Christie won the  चुनाव , साथ परिचय 48.5 प्रतिशत of the vote , to 44.9 प्रतिशत  for Corzine and 5.8 percent for Daggett .
Christie won the largest margin for  a पहला पद रिपब्लिकन  since 1969 .
Christie assumed office  on जनवरी 19 , 2010  .
This was the first  चुनाव to भरण the newly निर्मित दफ्तर  of Lieutenant Governor .
The candidates for governor  और लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल यहूद joined साथ as a सिंगल  choice , so that voters did not have the opportunity to split the ticket .
Kim Guadagno , Christie 's running mate , became New  जर्सी 's पहला लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल following उसके उद्घाटन  .
स्वास्थ्य परवाह in the संयुक्त राज्य is provided  by many distinct organizations .
Health care facilities are  largely स्वामित्व और संचालित by निजी सेक्टर  businesses .
Health  बीमे लिये पब्लिक सेक्टर कर्मचारी  is primarily provided by the government .
60-65 % of healthcare  प्रावधान और बिता आता इससे  programs such as Medicare , Medicaid , TRICARE , the Children 's Health Insurance Program , and the Veterans Health Administration .
Most of the population under 65 is insured by their or a family  सदस्य 's नियोक्ता , कुछ ख़रीदे स्वास्थ्य बीमे on उनके  own , and the remainder are uninsured .
Of 17 high-income countries studied by the National  संस्थान of स्वास्थ्य in 2013 , the संयुक्त राज्य थी at or निकट the नीचे in शिशु मृत्यु , दिल  and lung disease , sexually transmitted infections , adolescent pregnancies , injuries , homicides , and rates of disability .
Together , such issues place the U.S. at the bottom  of the सूची लिये जीवन प्रत्याशा .
On average , a U.S. male can be  अपेक्षित to सजीव लगभग चार कम सालो than those in the top-ranked  country .
according to the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ) , the संयुक्त  States spent more on health care per capita ( $ 7,146 ) , and more on health care as percentage of its GDP ( 15.2 % ) , than any other nation in 2008 .
The Commonwealth Fund ranked the United States last in the quality of health care  among समान देशों , और टीप u.S.  care costs the most .
The U.S. Census Bureau reported that 49.9 million residents , 16.3 % of the population , were uninsured in 2010 ( up from 49.0 million  निवासियों , 16.1 % of the जनसांख्यिकी , in 2009  ) .
A 2004 Institute of Medicine ( IOM ) report  कहा : `` the संयुक्त राज्य is among the few industrialized राष्ट्र in the संसार कि करता नहीं  guarantee access to health care for its population . ''
A 2004 OECD report said : `` With the exception of  मैक्सिको , तुर्कों , और the संयुक्त राज्य , सब oecd देशों था हासिल सार्वभौमिक  or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990 . ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of  स्वास्थ्य बीमे कल्याणकारी roughly 48,000 अनावश्यक  deaths every year in the United States .
In 2007 , 62.1 % of filers for  bankruptcies claimed ऊँची चिकित्सा खर्च  .
A 2013  पढ़ाई मिला कि परिचय 25 % of सब वरिष्ठ नागरिकों घोषित दिवालियापन due to चिकित्सा खर्च  , and 43 % are forced to mortgage or sell their primary residence .
On March  23 , 2010 , the रोगी सुरक्षा और सस्ती परवाह अधिनियम ( ppaca ) became विधि , providing  for major changes in health insurance .
In physiology , body water is the water  सामग्री of the इंसान देह  .
a significant भिन्न  of the human body is water .
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of Medical Physiology states that `` the total amount of water in a man  of औसत वज़न ( 70 गामा ) is लगभग 40 लीटर , averaging 57 प्रतिशत of उसके कुल  body weight .
In  a नवजात शिशु , इस may be as ऊँची as 75 प्रतिशत of the देह  weight , but it progressively decreases from birth to old age , most of the decrease occurring during the first 10 years of life .
Also ,  मोटापा decreases the प्रतिशत of जल in  the body , sometimes to as low as 45 percent '' .
These figures are statistical averages , so are  illustrative , और जैसे सब biostatistics , होगा vary साथ बाते जैसे प्रकार of  population , age and number of people sampled , and methodology .
So there is not , and can not be , a figure that is exactly  the वही लिये सब लोगों , लिये इस or कोई अन्य  physiological measure .
For example , Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy & Physiology for Nurses gives a  फिगर of 60 % लिये the proportion of body-weight attributable to जल , जिससे approximates  Guyton 's 57 % .
In diseased states where body water is affected , the  कम्पार्टमेंट or compartments कि have बदला can दे clues to the  nature of the problem .
Body water is regulated by hormones  , सहित anti-diuretic हार्मोन  ( ADH ) , aldosterone and atrial natriuretic peptide .
Per Netter 's Atlas  of इंसान physiology , देह जल  is broken down into the following compartments:
Intracellular  द्रव ( 2/3 of देह जल )  .
Per Guyton , in a body containing 40 litres of fluid , about 25 litres is intracellular ,  जिससे amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ) , बंद पर्याप्त to  the 2/3 rule of thumb .
Jackson  's ग्रन्थ राज्य 70 % of देह द्रव  is intracellular .
extracellular द्रव (  1/3 of body water ) .
Per Guyton 's illustration , for a 40 litre body , about 15  लीटर is extracellular , जिससे amounts to 37.5 % again , इस is बंद to the  1/3 rule of thumb cited here .
Plasma ( 1/5 of  extracellular  fluid ) .
प्रति guyton 's उदाहरण , of the 15 लीटर  of extracellular fluid , plasma volume averages 3 litres .
This  amounts to 20 % , the वही  as per Netter 's Atlas .
