अंतरालीय द्रव ( 4/5 of extracellular  fluid )
transcellular द्रव ( a.k.a . `` तीसरा स्पेस ,  '' normally ignored in calculations )
Contained inside organs , such as the  जठरांत्र , प्रमस्तिष्कमेरु , उदरावरणीय  , and ocular fluids .
self-esteem is a पद प्रयुक्त in मनोविज्ञान to प्रतिबिंबित a व्यक्ति  's overall emotional evaluation of his or her own worth .
It is a judgement of oneself as  खूब as an रवैया toward the  self .
Self-esteem  encompasses मान्यताओं ( लिये उदाहरण , ``  I am competent , '' `` I am worthy '' ) and emotions such as triumph , despair , pride and shame .
Smith and Mackie define it by  saying `` the self-concept is कया we सोचो परिचय the स्वः ; self-esteem  , is the positive or negative evaluations of the self , as in how we feel about it . ''
Self-esteem is also known as the evaluative dimension of  the स्वः कि शामिल जज्बात of worthiness , prides और  discouragement .
One 's  self-esteem is भी closely संबद्ध  with self-consciousness .
Self-esteem is a disposition that a person has which  represents उनके निर्णयों of उनके अपना worthiness .
In the  mid-1960s , मॉरिस rosenberg और social-learning  theorists defined self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness .
Nathaniel Branden in 1969 defined self-esteem as ``  the अनुभव of होने competent to cope  with the basic challenges of life and being worthy of happiness . ''
According to Branden , self-esteem is the sum of  self-confidence ( a अहसास of निजी क्षमता ) और self-respect  ( a feeling of personal worth ) .
It exists as a consequence of the implicit judgement that every  व्यक्ति रै of उनके क्षमता to फेस जीवन 's चुनौतियां , to समझे और solve समस्याएं , और उनके सही  to achieve happiness , and be given respect .
As a social psychological  construct , self-esteem is आकर्षक क्युकी शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of  relevant outcomes , such as academic achievement ( Marsh 1990 ) or exercise behavior ( Hagger et al . 1998 ) .
In addition , self-esteem has also been treated as an  महत्वपूर्ण निष्कर्ष due to इसके बंद संबंध साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक  well-being ( Marsh 1989 ) .
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension ( for example , `` I believe I am  a शुभ लेखक और i महसूस प्रसन्न परिचय कि '' ) or a वैश्विक extent ( लिये उदाहरण , `` i मानना i am  a bad person , and feel bad about myself in general '' ) .
Psychologists usually regard self-esteem as an enduring personality characteristic ( ``  trait '' self-esteem ) , हालांकि सामान्य , short-term विसंगतियाँ  ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist .
Synonyms or near-synonyms  of self-esteem शामिल : self-worth , self-regard  , self-respect , and self-integrity .
A Masonic Lodge ,  प्रायः termed a निजी आवास or constituent  Lodge , is the basic organisational unit of Freemasonry .
Every  नई आवास जरूर be warranted or चार्टर्ड by a ग्रैंड आवास , लकिन  is subject to its direction only in enforcing the published Constitution of the jurisdiction .
By exception the three surviving lodges that formed the world 's first known Grand  आवास in लंदन ( आज पुकारा the संयुक्त ग्रैंड आवास of इंग्लैण्ड ) have the अद्वितीय विशेषाधिकार to operate as समय immemorial i.e . बगैर ऐसे वारंट ; तभी एक  other lodge operates without a warrant - this is the Grand Stewards ' Lodge in London , although it is not also entitled to the `` time immemorial '' title .
A Freemason is generally entitled to visit any Lodge  , in कोई क्षेत्राधिकार ( i.e . अंतर्गत कोई  Grand Lodge ) in amity with his own .
In some jurisdictions this privilege is restricted to  निपुण masons ( कि is , freemasons जो have attained the अनुक्रम 's तीसरा  degree ) .
He is first usually  जरूरी to जाँच , और certify , the नियमितता  of the relationship of the Lodge - and be able to satisfy that Lodge of his regularity of membership .
Freemasons gather together as a Lodge to work the three basic Degrees of Entered Apprentice ,  fellowcraft और निपुण मेसन  .
Pilkington Group Limited is a multinational glass manufacturing company headquartered in St Helens , United Kingdom and a wholly owned  subsidiary of the japan-based एनएसजी समूह  .
Prior to its  अधिग्रहण by एनएसजी in 2006 it थी an स्वतंत्र कम्पनी सूचीबद्ध on the लंदन  Stock Exchange and for a time was a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index .
A quotation is the repetition of one expression as part of another one , particularly when the quoted expression is  well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to इसके असली सोर्स , और it is indicated by ( punctuated साथ  ) quotation marks .
A quotation can also refer to the repeated use of units of any other form  of अभिव्यक्ति , विशेषकर भाग of कलाकारी works : तत्व of a पेंटिंग , दृश्यों इससे a फिल्म or भाग  from a musical composition .
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was a common year starting on  सोमवार ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting  on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian calendar .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the family  piperaceae , cultivated लिये इसके फल , जिससे is प्रायः सूखी  and used as a spice and seasoning .
The fruit , known as a peppercorn when dried , is  लगभग in व्यास , अंधेरा रेड जब fully वयस्क , और , जैसे  all drupes , contains a single seed .
peppercorns , और the मैदान pepper निकला इससे उन्हें , may be वर्णित बस as pepper , or अधिक precisely as  black pepper ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ) , green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is native to  दक्षिण इण्डिया , और is extensively cultivated वहीँ  and elsewhere in tropical regions .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper  , producing 34 % of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum क्रॉप as of 2008  .
Dried ground pepper has been  प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता लिये दोनो इसके फ्लेवर  and as a medicine .
Black pepper is the  संसार 's सबसे traded मसाला  .
it is एक of the सबसे आम मसाले added to यूरोपीय भोजन  and its descendants .
The spiciness of black  pepper is due to the रासायनिक piperine , नहीं to be उलझन  with the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs .
It is in  the आधुनिक संसार  , often paired with salt .
Fire hydrant in  charlottesville , वर्जिनिया  , USA
A fire hydrant ( also known colloquially as a fire plug in the United States or as a johnny pump in New York City ) , is an active fire protection measure , and a source of water  provided in सबसे शहरी , suburban और ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों साथ नगरपालिका जल सेवा to enable अग्निशमन to tap into the नगरपालिका जल सप्लाई  to assist in extinguishing a fire .
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify for an insurance discount since firefighters should  be समर्थ to अधिक rapidly बुझा a आग on the insured  property .
The concept  of आग plugs  dates to at least the 17th century .
This was a time when firefighters responding to a call would dig  bas to the लकड़ी जल मेन्स और hastily bore a छेद to सुरक्षित  water to fight fires .
The water would fill the hole creating a temporary well , and be transported from  the खूब to the आग by बाल्टी brigades or , बाद  , by hand-pumped fire engines .
The  छेद यहूद तब plugged साथ stoppers  , normally redwood , which over time came to be known as fire plugs .
The location of  the प्लग होता प्रायः be अंकित or चिह्नित so कि it could  be reused in future fires .
This is the source of the colloquial term  आग प्लग स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये आग hydrants आज  .
After the Great Fire of  लंदन in 1666 , the नगर संस्थापित जल मेन्स साथ छेद drilled at intervals , equipped  with risers , allowing an access point to the wooden fire plugs from street level .
The invention of a post- or pillar-type fire hydrant is  generally credited to फ्रेडरिक graff sr. , मुख्य इंजीनियर of the फिलाडेल्फिया जल works around  the year 1801 .
It  था a संयोजन hose/faucet आउटलेट और थी of `` गीला बैरल  '' design with the valve in the top .
It is said that Graff held the first patent for a fire hydrant , but this can not be verified  क्युकी the पेटेंट दफ्तर in वॉशिंगटन d.C. caught on आग in 1836 destroying अनेक पेटेंट रिकॉर्ड इससे कि काल in the प्रक्रम .
The President of the Republic of South  अफ़्रीकी is the सिर of राज्य और सिर  of government under South Africa 's Constitution .
From 1961 to 1994 , the head  of राज्य थी पुकारा the राज्य  President .
The President is elected by members of the National Assembly ,  the निम्नतर हाउस of पार्लियामेंट , और is प्रायः the नेता of the largest पार्टी ,  which has been the African National Congress since the first non-racial elections were held on 27 April 1994 .
The role was originally founded to be distinct from the now defunct role of prime  मंत्री , लकिन the दो भूमिकाएँ यहूद मिलाया in the 1983 संविधान जिससे  specified a four-year term of office .
The 1993 and later constitutions  हद the अध्यक्ष 's समय in दफ्तर to दो five-year  terms .
The first President to be elected under the new  संविधान थी नेल्सन मंडेला , और the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष is याक़ूब zuma .
Under the interim Constitution ( valid  इससे 1994 to 1996 ) , वहीँ थी a सरकारी of नेशनल एकता  , in which an MP from the largest opposition party was entitled to a position as Deputy President .
Along with Thabo Mbeki , the last State President , F.W . De Klerk also served  as डिप्टी अध्यक्ष , in उसके क्षमता as the नेता of  the National Party which was the second-largest party in the new Parliament .
But De Klerk later resigned  और गई into विपक्ष  with his party .
A voluntary coalition  सरकारी continues to मौजूद अंतर्गत the नई संविधान ( अपनाया in 1996 ) , हालांकि  there have been no appointments of opposition politicians to the post of deputy president .
Special education or special needs education is the education of students  साथ खास needs in a रास्ता कि पता the विद्यार्थी ' व्यक्तिगत मतभेद  and needs .
Ideally , this process involves the individually  नियोजित और systematically monitored व्यवस्था of शिक्षण प्रक्रियाओं , adapted उपकरण और सामग्री , accessible जमावट  , and other interventions designed to help learners with special needs achieve a higher level of personal self-sufficiency and success in school and community than would be available if the student were only given access to a typical classroom education .
Common special needs include challenges with learning ,  संचार चुनौतियां , emotional और behavioral विकार , शारीरिक disabilities  , and developmental disorders .
Students with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit from  अतिरिक्त शैक्षणिक सेवाएं ऐसे as अलग approaches to शिक्षण , उपयोग of  technology , a specifically adapted teaching area , or resource room .
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and can  भी लाभ इससे specialized शिक्षण तकनीकों or अलग शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम , लकिन the पद `` खास शिक्षा '' is generally प्रयुक्त to specifically  indicate instruction of students whose special needs reduce their ability to learn independently or in an ordinary classroom , and gifted education is handled separately .
In most  विकसित देशों , शिक्षक हैं modifying शिक्षण विधि और environments  so that the maximum number of students are served in general education environments .
Special education in developed countries is  प्रायः regarded कम as a `` प्लेस '' और अधिक as  `` a range of services , available in every school . ''
Integration can  reduce सोशल stigmas और improve अकादमिक  achievement for many students .
The opposite of special  शिक्षा is सामान्य शिक्षा  .
General education is the standard  curriculum प्रस्तुत साथ मानक शिक्षण विधि और बगैर अतिरिक्त  supports .
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born August 12 , 1930 , as Schwartz  györgy ) is a hungarian-american कारोबार  magnate , investor , and philanthropist .
He is the chairman  of सोरोस निधि प्रबन्धन  .
Soros  supports progressive-liberal  causes .
He is known as `` The Man Who Broke the Bank of England `` because of his in  निवेश profits दौरान the 1992 ब्लैक बुधवार uk करेंसी  crisis .
Between 1979 and  2011 , सोरोस दिया दूर over $ 8 अरब to इंसान  rights , public health , and education causes .
He played a significant role in  the शांतिपूर्ण परिवर्तन इससे साम्यवादी to पूंजीवाद in हंगेरियाई ( 1984–89  ) and provided one of Europe 's largest higher education endowments to Central European University in Budapest .
Soros is also  the अध्यक्ष of the खोलें समाज संस्थान  .
An actor portraying Alexander  ग्राहम घंटी बोलना into an जल्दी मॉडल  telephone .
The invention of the telephone is the culmination of work done by many individuals ,  the इतिहास of जिससे involves a संग्रहण of दावा और counterclaims  .
the विकास of the आधुनिक विद्युत टेलीफोन शामिल an सरणी of  lawsuits founded upon the patent claims of several individuals and numerous companies .
This article covers the early years from 1844 to 1898 , from conception of  the विचार of an इलेक्ट्रिक voice-transmission यंत्र , to विफल कोशिशें to उपयोग `` make-and-break '' वर्तमान , to कामयाब  experiments with electromagnetic telephones by Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Watson , and finally to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th century .
A Master of  ठीक कला ( mfa , m.f.a . ) is a ग्रैजुएट उपाधि typically requiring 2–3 सालो of postgraduate पढ़ाई परे  the bachelor 's degree ( BFA ) , although the term of study will vary by country or by university .
The  mfa is a रचनात्मक उपाधि प्रायः awarded as a टर्मिनल उपाधि  in visual arts , creative writing , filmmaking , dance , or theatre and other performing arts .
Coursework is primarily of an applied or performing nature  साथ the कार्यक्रम प्रायः culminating in a प्रमुख कार्य or प्रदर्शन  .
Master of Fine Arts programs have  generally जरूरी a स्नातक 's उपाधि prior to प्रवेश , लकिन अनेक do नहीं आवश्यकता कि  the undergraduate major be the same as the MFA field of study .
The most important admissions requirement  रै प्रायः महरूम a नमूना पोर्टफोलियो or a प्रदर्शन ऑडिशन  .
The Master of Fine Arts differs from the Master of Arts in that the MFA , while an academic program , centers around  अभ्यास in the particular फ़ील्ड , whereas कार्यक्रम अग्रणी to the ma प्रायः  center on the scholarly , academic , or critical study of the field .
Additionally , in the United States , an MFA is recognized as a terminal degree for practitioners of Visual Art , Design , Dance , Theatre , Film/Video , New Media , and  रचनात्मक लिखने - अर्थ कि it is माना to be the उच्चतम उपाधि in इसके फ़ील्ड , और is प्रयुक्त as a न्यूनतम योग्यता  to be able to apply to become a Full-Time Professor teaching at the University level in these disciplines .
There are exceptions to this standard in the Arts , notably in the  मामला of म्यूज़िक प्रदर्शन , जहाँ the mfa is नहीं देखी as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in the  context of the more standardized DMA degree .
It is also critical to note that in the interest of extending the connection between creative production and  जारी अकादमिक शोध , कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों have स्थापित practice-based ph.d कार्यक्रम in फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रचनात्मक लिखने , विज़ुअल कला , नई  media , design and theater .
While this has had an effect in Creative Writing , and to a lesser extent in design and new media , the influx of graduates  इससे practice-based phd कार्यक्रम रै नहीं appreciably बदला the मानक लिये the mfa as the टर्मिनल  degree in most Arts disciplines yet .
This is an ongoing contentious topic , and is the frequent subject of  अकादमिक panels , विशेषकर at the सालाना कॉलेज आर्ट संघ  conference .
The CAA 2008 guidelines  regarding the mfa strongly re-affirms कि the phd is नहीं जरूरी as  a terminal degree in the visual arts .
The atomic bombings of the  शहरों of हिरोशिमा और नागासाकी in जापानी यहूद conducted  by the United States during the final stages of World War II in 1945 .
the दो कार्यक्रम हैं the  only use of nuclear weapons in war to date .
Following a firebombing campaign that destroyed many Japanese  शहरों , the allies prepared लिये a costly आक्रमण of जापानी  .
The war in Europe ended when Nazi Germany  हस्ताक्षरित इसके यंत्र of आत्मसमर्पण on 8 may , लकिन the प्रशांत युद्ध  continued .
Together with the United  किंगडम और the गणतंत्र of चीन , the संयुक्त राज्य पुकारा लिये a आत्मसमर्पण of जापानी  in the Potsdam Declaration on 26 July 1945 , threatening Japan with `` prompt and utter destruction '' .
The Japanese government ignored this ultimatum ,  और the संयुक्त राज्य तैनात दो नाभिकीय हथियार  developed by the Manhattan Project .
American airmen dropped Little Boy on the city of  हिरोशिमा on 6 अगस्त 1945 , followed by मोटे man over नागासाकी on  9 August .
Within the first two to four  महीने of the bombings , the अधि प्रभाव मारे 90,000–166,000 लोगों in हिरोशिमा और 60,000–80,000 in नागासाकी  , with roughly half of the deaths in each city occurring on the first day .
The Hiroshima  प्रीफ़ेक्चर स्वास्थ्य विभाग अनुमानित कि , of the लोगों जो died on the दिन of the विस्फोट , 60 %  died from flash or flame burns , 30 % from falling debris and 10 % from other causes .
During the following months , large  संख्याएँ died इससे the प्रभाव of burns , विकिरण बीमारी , और अन्य  injuries , compounded by illness .
In a US estimate of the  कुल तात्कालिक और छोटी पद कारण of मौत , 15–20 % died इससे विकिरण बीमारी  , 20–30 % from burns , and 50–60 % from other injuries , compounded by illness .
In both cities ,  सबसे of the मुर्दे यहूद नागरिकों , हालांकि  Hiroshima had a sizeable garrison .
On 15 August , six days  बाद the bombing of नागासाकी , जापानी घोषित इसके आत्मसमर्पण to the allies  , signing the Instrument of Surrender on 2 September , officially ending World War II .
The bombings led , in part , to post-war Japan 's adopting Three  non-nuclear सिद्धान्त , forbidding the स्वदेश इससे नाभिकीय armament  .
The role of the bombings in Japan 's  आत्मसमर्पण और उनके नैतिक औचित्य हैं  still debated .
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 January 1948 ) , commonly known as Mahatma Gandhi , was  the preeminent नेता of भारतीय राष्ट्रवाद in british-ruled  India .
Employing non-violent civil disobedience , Gandhi led India to independence  और प्रेरित आंदोलनों लिये non-violence , सिविल अधिकारों और स्वतंत्रता आरपार the  world .
The son of a senior government official ,  गांधी थी born और उठाया in a हिन्दू bania जातियाँ in तटीय  Gujarat , and trained in law in London .
Gandhi became famous by fighting for the  सिविल अधिकारों of मुस्लिम और हिन्दू इंडियंस in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , using नई तकनीकों of non-violent  civil disobedience that he developed .
Returning to  इण्डिया in 1915 , he नियत परिचय organising peasants to विरोध  excessive land-taxes .
A lifelong  प्रतिद्वन्दी of `` सांप्रदायिकता `` ( i.e . basing राजनीती on धर्म  ) he reached out widely to all religious groups .
He became a leader of Muslims protesting  the घटती औकात of  the Caliphate .
Assuming leadership of the Indian National Congress  in 1921 , गांधी led देशभर अभियान लिये easing गरीबी , expanding महिलाओं 's अधिकारों , भवन धार्मिक और जातीय सौहार्द , समाप्ति अस्पृश्यता , increasing आर्थिक self-reliance  , and above all for achieving Swaraj —the independence of India from British domination .
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the national salt tax with the Dandi Salt March in 1930 , and later in  demanding the अंग्रेजों to तत्काल छोड़ो इण्डिया in 1942 , दौरान संसार युद्ध ii  .
He was imprisoned  लिये कि और लिये numerous अन्य राजनैतिक offenses  over the years .
Gandhi sought to practice non-violence and  सच्चाई in सब परिस्थितियों , और advocated  that others do the same .
He saw the villages as the core  of the सच्चा इण्डिया और प्रचारित self-sufficiency ; he किया नहीं support the industrialization  programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru .
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient residential community and wore the traditional  भारतीय धोती और चादर , woven साथ धागे he था हाथ spun on a  charkha .
His  मुख्य राजनैतिक दुश्मन in ब्रिटेन थी विंस्टन चर्चिल ,  who ridiculed him as a `` half-naked fakir . ''
He was a dedicated vegetarian , and  undertook long fasts as अर्थात् of दोनो self-purification और राजनैतिक  mobilization .
In his last year , unhappy at the partition of India , Gandhi worked to stop the carnage between Muslims ,  हिन्दुओं और सिखों कि raged in the किनारा  area between India and Pakistan .
He was assassinated on 30 January  1948 by nathuram गोडसे जो विचार गांधी थी too  sympathetic to India 's Muslims .
30 January is observed as  शहीदो ' दिन in इण्डिया  .
The honorific Mahatma ( ``  ग्रेट आत्मा '' ) थी लागू to उसे  by 1914 .
In  इण्डिया he थी भी पुकारा bapu  ( `` Father '' ) .
He is known in India as the  पिता of the स्वदेश ; उसके जन्मदिवस , 2 अक्तूबर , is commemorated वहीँ as गांधी jayanti , a नेशनल अवकाश  , and world-wide as the International Day of Non-Violence .
Gandhi 's  दर्शनशास्त्र थी नहीं सैद्धांतिक लकिन एक of व्यावहारिकतावाद , कि  is , practicing his principles in the moment .
Asked to give a  संदेश to the लोगों , he होता respond  , `` My life is my message . ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23 , ca . 1904 – May 10 , 1977 ) , born  lucille fay lesueur , थी an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री in फिल्मी , टेलीविज़न  and theatre .
Starting as a dancer in traveling theatrical companies before debuting on Broadway ,  क्रॉफर्ड थी हस्ताक्षरित to a गति चित्र अनुबंध by metro-goldwyn-mayer  in 1925 .
Initially frustrated by the size and quality of her  भाग , क्रॉफर्ड began a अभियान of self-publicity और became nationally ज्ञात  as a flapper by the end of the 1920s .
In the 1930s , Crawford 's fame  rivaled , और बाद outlasted , mgm सहयोगियों norma शियर्र और greta  Garbo .
क्रॉफर्ड प्रायः निभाई मेहनती यंग  women who find romance and financial success .
These ``  rags-to-riches '' कहानियां यहूद खूब प्राप्त by अवसाद -era ऑडियंस  and were popular with women .
Crawford became one of Hollywood 's most  prominent फिल्म सितारों और एक of the उच्चतम सशुल्क महिलाओं in the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन उसके films began खोने धन और by the समाप्त  of the 1930s she was labeled `` box office poison '' .
After an absence of nearly two years from the screen , Crawford  मंचन a वापसी by अभिनीत in मिल्ड्रेड पियर्स ( 1945 ) , लिये जिससे वो जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार  for Best Actress .
In 1955 , she became involved with the Pepsi-Cola  कम्पनी through उसके विवाह to कम्पनी अध्यक्ष अल्फ्रेड  Steele .
बाद उसके मौत in 1959 , क्रॉफर्ड थी निर्वाचित  to fill his vacancy on the board of directors but was forcibly retired in 1973 .
She continued acting in film and television regularly  through the 1960s , जब उसके प्रदर्शन became कम ; बाद the रिलीज of the  British horror film Trog in 1970 , Crawford retired from the screen .
Following a public appearance in 1974 , after which unflattering  छायाचित्र यहूद प्रकाशित , क्रॉफर्ड withdrew इससे पब्लिक जीवन और became increasingly reclusive  until her death in 1977 .
क्रॉफर्ड शादीशुदा  four times .
Her first three marriages ended in divorce ; the  पिछला ended साथ the मौत of husband अल्फ्रेड स्टील .
She adopted five children , one of  जिसको थी reclaimed by उसके जनम  mother .
क्रॉफर्ड 's संबंध साथ उसके दो पुरानी children  , Christina and Christopher , were acrimonious .
Crawford disinherited the two and , after Crawford 's death , Christina wrote a `` tell-all '' memoir , Mommie Dearest , in which she alleged a lifelong pattern of  शारीरिक और emotional गाली perpetrated by क्रॉफर्ड  .
She  थी voted the दसवाँ महानतम मादा स्टार in the इतिहास of  American cinema by the American Film Institute .
