1903 lanchester  rear-door Tonneau
tonneau कवर ( or ) describes a मुश्किल or नरम कवर प्रयुक्त to protect unoccupied यात्री सीटे  in a convertible or roadster , or the cargo bed in a pickup truck .
Hard tonneau covers open by a hinging or  फोल्डिंग यांत्रिकी जबकि नरम कवर खोलें by रोलिंग  up .
The tonneau  कवर is प्रयुक्त to छिपाते  cargo .
When the cover is pulled out , it keeps items out of the sun and provides  अतिरिक्त सुरक्षा by keeping निजी वस्तुएं आउट of sight  , as well as shielding the driver from view .
Twitter is an online social networking service and  microblogging सेवा कि enables इसके उपयोक्ता to भेजें और पढ़ा text-based संदेश of  up to 140 characters , known as `` tweets '' .
Twitter was created in March 2006 by Jack  dorsey और by जुलाई , the सोशल नेटवर्किंग साईट थी शुभारम्भ  .
The service rapidly gained worldwide popularity , with over 500 million  पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता as of 2012 , generating over 340 लाख tweets रोज़ और हैंडलिंग over  1.6 billion search queries per day .
Since its launch , Twitter has become one of the  टेन सबसे visited वेबसाइटों on the अंतरजाल , और रै महरूम वर्णित as  `` the SMS of the Internet . ''
Unregistered users can read tweets , while registered users  can पोस्ट tweets through the जालस्थल इंटरफ़ेस , sms , or a दायरा  of apps for mobile devices .
Twitter Inc. is based in San Francisco , with additional  सर्वर और कार्यालयों in नई यॉर्क नगर , बोस्टन , और सैन अंतोनियो  .
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film , co-produced and  निर्देशित by टॉड phillips और लिखा  by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore .
It is the first  फिल्मी of the hangover मताधिकार .the फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर , ed helms , zach  Galifianakis , Heather Graham , Justin Bartha , and Jeffrey Tambor .
The Hangover tells the story of Phil Wenneck , Stu Price and Alan Garner , who travel to Las Vegas  लिये a स्नातक पार्टी to celebrate उनके dost डग billings ' impending विवाह  .
However , Phil , Stu and Alan have no memory of the previous night 's  कार्यक्रम और जरूर ढूँढें डग पहले the विवाह can लो प्लेस  .
Lucas and Moore wrote the script after executive  निर्माता क्रिस bender 's dost disappeared और था  a large bill after being sent to a strip club .
After Lucas and Moore sold it to the studio for $ 2 million , Philips and Jeremy Garelick rewrote the script to  शामिल a बाघ as खूब as a subplot involving a baby और a पुलिस क्रूजर  , and also including boxer Mike Tyson .
Filming took place in Nevada for 15 days , and during filming , the three main  अभिनेताओं ( कूपर , helms और galifianakis ) formed a  friendship .
The Hangover was released on June 5 , 2009 ,  बनने a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक  success .
It became  the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009 , साथ a विश्वव्यापी  gross of over US $ 467 million .
Critics praised the  फिल्मी 's comedic दृष्टिकोण लकिन criticized  it for its vulgarity .
The film won the Golden Globe Award for Best Motion  चित्र – musical or कॉमेडी , और प्राप्त अनेक  other accolades .
It is the  tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009 in the संसार , as खूब as the दूसरी highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी कभी in the संयुक्त राज्य , surpassing a रिकार्ड  previously held by Beverly Hills Cop for almost 25 years and later being surpassed by Ted in 2012 .
Out of all R-rated films , it is the third  highest-grossing कभी in the u.S. , पीछे तभी the जुनून of the मसीह और the  Matrix Reloaded .
A sequel , The Hangover Part II , was released in 2011 ,  और a तीसरा और फाइनल फिल्मी , the hangover भाग iii , is नियत लिये रिलीज in 2013 .
Events involving meiosis  , प्रर्दशित chromosomal  crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a special type of  कोशिका प्रभाग जरुरी लिये यौन  reproduction in eukaryotes .
The cells produced  by meiosis हैं गैमीट  or spores .
In many organisms , including all  पशु और जमीन पौधे ( लकिन नहीं कुछ अन्य समूह ऐसे  as fungi ) , gametes are called sperm and egg cells .
Whilst the process of meiosis bears a number of  similarities साथ the 'life-cycle ' कोशिका प्रभाग प्रक्रम of समसूत्रण , it differs in दो  important respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination which  shuffles the जीनों producing a अलग जेनेटिक संयोजन in प्रत्येक gamete , compared साथ the co-existence of प्रत्येक of the दो पृथक pairs of प्रत्येक  chromosome ( one received from each parent ) in each cell which results from mitosis .
the outcome of meiosis is potentially four ( genetically  अद्वितीय ) अगुणित कोशिकाएं , compared साथ the दो ( genetically एकसमान  ) diploid cells produced from mitosis .
Meiosis begins with  एक द्विगुणित कोशिका containing दो नक़ल of प्रत्येक chromosome  —one from the organism 's mother and one from its father .
The cell divides twice , potentially  producing up to चार अगुणित कोशिकाएं containing  one copy of each chromosome .
( ``  potentially '' क्युकी in कुछ मामले , ऐसे as the गठन of  oocytes in mammals , only one of the possible four haploid cells survives . )
In animals the  अगुणित कोशिका resulting इससे meiosis is a पुरूष  or female gamete .
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete cells is a unique mixture of  मातृ और पैतृक डीएनए , resulting in औलाद कि हैं genetically पृथक  from either parent .
This gives rise  to जेनेटिक विविधता in sexually reproducing  populations .
This genetic diversity can provide the variation of physical and behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon  जिससे प्राकृतिक चयन can अधिनियम , लकिन , as वर्णित नीचे in खण्ड 6 , उत्पत्ति और फलन of meiosis , the जेनेटिक विविधता may  be largely a by-product of the homologous recombination that is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis .
It is also noteworthy that during meiosis , specific genes are more highly  transcribed , और ये हैं पुकारा the meiome , the पद प्रयुक्त in कार्यात्मक जीनोमिक्स  for the meiotic transcriptome .
Meiosis  is a कुंजी विशेषता लिये सब sexually reproducing  eukaryotes in which homologous chromosome pairing , synapse and recombination occur .
In addition to strong meiotic  stage-specific अभिव्यक्ति of mrna ( the meiome ) , however , वहीँ हैं भी pervasive translational  controls ( e.g . selective usage of preformed mRNA ) , regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein expression of genes during meiosis .
Thus  , दोनो the meiome और translational नियंत्रण  determine the broad restructuring of meiotic cells needed to carry out meiosis .
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated by a round of DNA replication , creating from the maternal and paternal  संस्करण of प्रत्येक chromosome ( homologs ) दो सटीक नक़ल , सिस्टर chromatids ,  attached at the centromere region .
In the beginning of meiosis  the मातृ और पैतृक homologs जोड़ी  to each other .
Then they  typically एक्सचेंज भाग by समजात recombination अग्रणी to crossovers of डीएनए between the मातृ  and paternal versions of the chromosome .
spindle मछली bind to the centromeres of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of homologs और arrange  the pairs at the spindle equator .
Then the  मछली खींचो the recombined  homologs to opposite poles of the cell .
As the chromosomes move away from the center the cell divides into two daughter cells ,  प्रत्येक containing a अगुणित क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों रचित of दो chromatids  .
After the recombined maternal and paternal  homologs have अलग into the दो बेटी कोशिकाएं , a दूसरी  round of cell division occurs .
There meiosis ends as the two sister  chromatids बनाना up प्रत्येक homolog हैं अलग  and move into one of the four resulting gamete cells .
upon fertilization , लिये उदाहरण जब a शुक्राणु enters  an egg cell , two gamete cells produced by meiosis fuse .
The gamete from the mother and the gamete from the  पिता प्रत्येक योगदान एक हाफ of the नियत of गुणसूत्रों  that make up the new offspring 's genome .
meiosis उपयोग अनेक of the वही mechanisms as समसूत्रण , a प्रकार of कोशिका प्रभाग प्रयुक्त by eukaryotes जैसे पौधे  and animals to split one cell into two identical daughter cells .
In all plants and in  अनेक protists meiosis परिणाम in the गठन of  spores : haploid cells that can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization .
Boxing ( pugilism , prize fighting , the sweet science or in  यूनानी pygmachia ) is a martial आर्ट और कॉम्बैट खेल in जिससे दो लोगों engage in a प्रतियोगिता of  strength , speed , reflexes , endurance and will by throwing punches with gloved hands .
Amateur boxing is an Olympic and Commonwealth sport and is a common  fixture in सबसे of the प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय खेल - it भी रै इसके अपना संसार championships  .
Boxing is supervised by a referee over a series  of one- to three-minute intervals पुकारा rounds  .
The result is decided when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by a referee , is disqualified for  तोड़कर a नियम , resigns by फेंकना in a तौलिया , or is सुनाया the विजेता or हारा आधारित on the न्यायाधीशों '  scorecards at the end of the contest .
The birth hour of boxing as a sport may be its  स्वीकृति by the प्राचीन यूनानियों as an ओलम्पिक खेल as  early as 688 BC .
मुक्केबाज़ी विकसित इससे 16th- और 18th-century prizefights , largely in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  , to the forerunner of modern boxing in the mid-19th century , again initially in Great Britain and later in the United States .
In 2004 , ESPN ranked boxing as  the सबसे मुश्किल खेल in  the world .
Agreement or concord  happens जब a शब्द परिवर्तन रूप depending on the अन्य शब्द to जिससे it  relates .
It is an instance of inflection , and usually involves making the  मान of कुछ व्याकरणिक श्रेणी ( ऐसे as लिंग or व्यक्ति ) `` सहमत '' between  different words or parts of the sentence .
For example , in Standard English , one may say I am or  he is , लकिन नहीं `` i is '' or `` he  am '' .
This is because the  व्याकरण of the भाषा requires कि the क्रिया और  its subject agree in person .
The pronouns I  और he हैं पहला और तीसरा व्यक्ति क्रमशः , as  are the verb forms am and is .
The verb form must be selected so that it  रै the वही व्यक्ति as the विषय  .
The agreement based on overt grammatical  श्रेणी as ऊपर is औपचारिक अनुबंध , in कंट्रास्ट to notional अनुबंध  , which is based on meaning .
For  उदाहरण , the phrase the संयुक्त राज्य  is treated as singular for purposes of agreement , even though it is formally plural .
इस is a सूची of स्थान नीचे औसत समुद्र  level that are on land .
Places in tunnels , mines , basements , dug holes ( also with  खोलें आसमान ) , अंतर्गत जल , अंतर्गत बर्फ , or मौजूदा temporarily as a परिणाम of ebbing  of sea tide etc . are not included .
All figures are  in मीटर नीचे समुद्र  level:
Debbie Macomber ( born October 22 , 1948 in Yakima , Washington ) is a best-selling  अमरीकी लेखक of over 150 रोमांस novels और समकालीन महिलाओं 's fiction  .
Over 140  लाख नक़ल of उसके किताबे हैं in  print throughout the world , and four have become made-for-TV-movies .
Macomber was the inaugural  विजेता of the fan-voted quill पुरस्कार लिये रोमांस in 2005 और रै महरूम awarded दोनो a रोमांस लेखक of  America RITA and a lifetime achievement award by the Romance Writers of America .
catonsville is a census-designated प्लेस  ( CDP ) in Baltimore County , Maryland , United States .
The population was 41,567  at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
The community lies to the west of Baltimore along  the नगर 's किनारा  .
catonsville is the घर of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड  , Baltimore County ( UMBC ) , a public research university with over 12,000 students .
A  वकील , according to ब्लैक 's विधि शब्दकोष , is `` a व्यक्ति सीखे in the विधि ;  as an attorney , counsel or solicitor ; a person who is practicing law . ''
Law is the system of rules of conduct established by the sovereign government of a  समाज to सही wrongs , maintain the स्थिरता of राजनैतिक और सोशल प्राधिकार , और उद्धार  justice .
Working as a lawyer  involves the व्यावहारिक अनुप्रयोग of अमूर्त विधिक theories और ज्ञान to solve विशिष्ट individualized  problems , or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e. , hire ) lawyers to perform legal services .
The role  of the वकील varies significantly आरपार विधिक jurisdictions  , and so it can be treated here in only the most general terms .
Vector Marketing is the  घरेलू बिक्री भुजा of cutco निगम , an olean , नई यॉर्क आधारित  cutlery manufacturer .
The Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a United States federal law requiring covered employers to provide employees job-protected and unpaid leave  लिये योग्य चिकित्सा और परिवार कारण .
Qualified  चिकित्सा और परिवार कारण शामिल : निजी or परिवार  illness , family military leave , pregnancy , adoption , or the foster care placement of a child .
The FMLA is  administered by the मजदूरी और घंटा प्रभाग  of the United States Department of Labor .
The bill was  a प्रमुख भाग of अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन 's कार्यसूची in  his first term .
President Clinton signed the bill into law on February 5 , 1993 ( ; 29 U.S.C .  सेक . 2601 ; 29 cfr 825 ) और it took प्रभाव on अगस्त 5 , 1993 , छह महीने बाद  .
The FMLA was intended `` to  संतुलन the मांगे of the  workplace with the needs of families . ''
The Act allows eligible employees to take up to 12 work weeks of unpaid leave  दौरान कोई 12-month काल to attend to the गंभीर स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन of the कर्मचारी , जनक , जीवनसाथी or चाइल्ड , or लिये गर्भावस्था or परवाह  of a newborn child , or for adoption or foster care of a child .
In order to be eligible for FMLA leave , an employee must have been at the  कारोबार at तनिक 12 महीने , और worked at तनिक 1,250 घंटों over the पास्ट 12 महीने , और कार्य  at a location where the company employs 50 or more employees within 75 miles .
The FMLA covers both public- and private-sector employees ,  लकिन निश्चित श्रेणी of कर्मचारी हैं excluded , सहित निर्वाचित officials और उनके निजी स्टाफ सदस्यों  .
The Vietnam War ( ) was a Cold War -era military conflict  कि occurred in वियतनाम , लाओस , और कंबोडिया इससे 1 नवम्बर 1955 to  the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975 .
This war followed the First Indochina War and was fought between North Vietnam , supported by its communist allies , and the  सरकारी of दक्षिण वियतनाम , समर्थित by the संयुक्त  States and other anti-communist countries .
The Viet Cong ( also known as the National Liberation Front , or NLF ) , a lightly  हथियारबंद दक्षिण वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट आम सामने निर्देशित by the उत्तर , largely लड़ा a छापामार युद्ध विरूद्ध  anti-communist forces in the region .
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese Army ) engaged in a more conventional war , at  टाइम्स committing विशाल इकाई into बैटल  .
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on air superiority and overwhelming  firepower to conduct ढूंढें और नष्ट परिचालन , involving  ground forces , artillery , and airstrikes .
The U.S. government viewed  भागीदारी in the युद्ध as a रास्ता to prevent a कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा of दक्षिण वियतनाम as भाग of उनके wider रणनीति of  containment .
The North Vietnamese government and Viet Cong were fighting  to reunify वियतनाम अंतर्गत कम्युनिस्ट  rule .
They viewed the conflict as a colonial war , fought initially against  फ़्रांस , समर्थित by the u.S. , और बाद विरूद्ध दक्षिण वियतनाम , जिससे it  regarded as a U.S. puppet state .
American military  advisors arrived in कया थी तब  French Indochina beginning in 1950 .
U.S. involvement escalated in the early 1960s , with troop levels  tripling in 1961 और tripling again in 1962  .
U.S. combat units were  तैनात शुरूआत in  1965 .
Operations spanned international borders ,  साथ लाओस और कंबोडिया heavily bombed  .
American involvement in the  युद्ध peaked in 1968 , at the समय of the  Tet Offensive .
After this , U.S. ground  शक्तियां यहूद धीरे withdrawn  as part of a policy known as Vietnamization .
Despite the  पेरिस सलाम accords ,  signed by all parties in January 1973 , fighting continued .
U.S. military involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as a result of the  case–church amendment passed  by the U.S. Congress .
The capture of Saigon  by the वियतनाम लोगों 's फौज in अप्रैल 1975 चिह्नित the समाप्त of the युद्ध , और  North and South Vietnam were reunified the following year .
The war exacted a huge human cost in terms  of fatalities ( देखिए वियतनाम युद्ध हताहत  ) .
Estimates of the number of Vietnamese  सैनिको और नागरिकों मारे vary  from 800,000 to 3.1 million .
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians , 20,000–200,000  laotians , और 58,220 u.S. सेवा सदस्यों  also died in the conflict .
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian  आइलैंड्स of अलास्का photographed इससे the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Space Station , May 2006 .
Ash plumes reached a  ऊँचाई of 19 km दौरान the climactic फटना at  Mount Pinatubo , Philippines in 1991 .
A volcano is an opening , or rupture , in a planet 's surface or crust , which allows  hot मैग्मा , volcanic राख और गैसों to एस्केप इससे the मैग्मा कक्ष नीचे  the surface .
ज्वालामुखी हैं generally मिला जहाँ tectonic  plates are diverging or converging .
A mid-oceanic ridge ,  लिये उदाहरण the mid-atlantic लकीरें , रै उदाहरण of ज्वालामुखी caused by अपसारी tectonic प्लेटों  pulling apart ; the Pacific Ring of Fire has examples of volcanoes caused by convergent tectonic plates coming together .
By contrast , volcanoes  हैं प्रायः नहीं निर्मित जहाँ दो tectonic प्लेटों  slide past one another .
Volcanoes can also form where there is stretching and thinning of the Earth 's crust in the interiors of plates , e.g. , in the East African Rift , the Wells  gray-clearwater volcanic फ़ील्ड और the रिओ ग्रांडे दरार in उत्तर अमेरिका  .
This type of volcanism falls under the  छतरियाँ of `` थाली परिकल्पना  '' volcanism .
Volcanism away from plate  सीमाएँ रै भी महरूम समझाया as mantle plumes  .
These so-called `` hotspots `` , for example Hawaii , are postulated to arise from upwelling diapirs  साथ मैग्मा इससे the core–mantle boundary , 3,000 km  deep in the Earth .
erupting ज्वालामुखी can पोज़ अनेक जोखिमों , नहीं  only in the immediate vicinity of the eruption .
volcanic राख can be a threat to वायुयान , in particular those साथ जेट इंजन जहाँ  ash particles can be melted by the high operating temperature .
Large eruptions can affect temperature as ash and droplets of  sulfuric एसिड अस्पष्ट the सूर्य और कूल the धरती 's निम्नतर माहौल or क्षोभमण्डल ; however , वे भी अवशोषित ऊष्मा radiated up इससे the  Earth , thereby warming the stratosphere .
Historically , so-called  volcanic सर्दियों have caused अनर्थकारी अकाल  .
A deep  pothole on नई यॉर्क नगर 's  Second Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes called a kettle and  ज्ञात in भाग of the पश्चिमी संयुक्त राज्य as a chuckhole ) is a प्रकार of disruption in the सतह of  a roadway where a portion of the road material has broken away , leaving a hole .
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC , also known as hypernephroma ) is a kidney cancer that originates in the lining of the proximal convoluted tubule , the very small tubes  in the गुर्दा कि हस्तांतरण gf ( glomerular filtrate ) इससे the glomerulus to the  descending limb of the nephron .
rcc is the सबसे आम प्रकार of गुर्दा कर्कट  in adults , responsible for approximately 80 % of cases .
It is also known to be  the सबसे lethal of सब the genitourinary tumors  .
आरंभिक उपचार is सबसे commonly a कट्टरपंथी or  partial nephrectomy and remains the mainstay of curative treatment .
Where the tumor is  confined to the renal parenchyma , the 5-year अस्तित्व रेट is 60-70  % , but this is lowered considerably where metastases have spread .
it is अपेक्षाकृत resistant to विकिरण चिकित्सा और कीमोथेरेपी  , although some cases respond to immunotherapy .
Targeted cancer therapies such as sunitinib , temsirolimus , bevacizumab ,  interferon-alpha , और sorafenib have improved the आउटलुक लिये rcc  .
Estée Lauder Companies , Inc.  is a निर्माता और marketer of प्रतिष्ठा skincare , मेकअप , महक और  hair care products .
The  कम्पनी रै इसके मुख्यालय in midtown मैनहटन  , New York City .
the peritoneum ( ) is the serous झिल्ली कि फ़ॉर्म the अस्तर of the abdominal गुहा or the coelom —it कवर  most of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and some invertebrates ( annelids , for instance ) .
It is composed of a layer  of mesothelium समर्थित by a पतला परत of संयोजी  tissue .
The  peritoneum दोनो supports the abdominal अंगों  and serves as a conduit for their blood and lymph vessels and nerves .
The abdominal cavity ( the space bounded  by the vertebrae , abdominal मांसपेशियां , diaphragm और श्रोणि मंजिल ) चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ  the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity , but wrapped in peritoneum ) .
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the stomach ) , the structures in the abdominal cavity that are located behind the intraperitoneal space are called ``  retroperitoneal `` ( e.g . the गुर्दे ) , और those structures  below the intraperitoneal space are called `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the bladder ) .
Modern  2.5 '' ssd प्रयुक्त in उपभोक्ता  laptops and desktop computers .
DDR  sdram आधारित  SSD .
अधिकतम और  .
PCI  संलग्न io त्वरक  SSD
PCI-E , DRAM ,  और नन्द आधारित ssd .
It  उपयोग an बाह्य शक्ति सप्लाई  to make the DRAM non-volatile .
A solid-state drive  ( ssd ) ( भी ज्ञात as a solid-state डिस्क or इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  disk , though it contains no actual `` disk '' of any kind ) is a data storage device using integrated circuit assemblies as memory to store data persistently .
SSD technology uses electronic interfaces  संगत साथ परंपरागत ब्लाक input/output ( i/o )  hard disk drives .
SSDs have no moving mechanical  components , जिससे फर्क उन्हें इससे परंपरागत electromechanical चुम्बकीय  disks such as hard disk drives ( HDDs ) or floppy disks , which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads .
Compared with electromechanical disks ,  ssds हैं typically कम susceptible to शारीरिक शॉक , much quieter , have  lower access time , and less latency .
However , while the price of SSDs has continued to decline in 2012 , SSDs are  स्टिल परिचय 7 to 8 टाइम्स अधिक महंगी  per unit of storage than HDDs .
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces  विकसित लिये मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव , यूँ permitting सरल बदलना in आम  applications .
, most SSDs use  nand-based फ्लैश मेमोरी , जिससे  retains data without power .
For applications requiring fast access , but not necessarily data persistence  बाद शक्ति घाटा , ssds may be constructed इससे random-access  memory ( RAM ) .
Such devices may employ separate power sources  , ऐसे as बैटरी , to maintain आंकड़ा बाद शक्ति  loss .
Hybrid  ड्राइव or ठोस राज्य संकर ड्राइव ( sshd ) combine the सुविधाएँ of ssds और hdds in the वही ईकाई , containing a विशाल मुश्किल  disk drive and an SSD cache to improve performance of frequently accessed data .
These devices may  प्रस्ताव near-ssd प्रदर्शन लिये  many applications .
Salmon roe ( left )  और sturgeon caviar ( सही ) परोसा साथ माँ of पर्ल  caviar spoons to avoid tainting the taste of the caviar .
Ossetra  caviar , सामन creme fraiche , आलू shallot  croquette , basil oil , egg whites and yolks
Caviar , according to the Food and Agriculture Organization , is a  उत्पाद बना इससे salt-cured fish-eggs of the acipenseridae  family .
The roe can be `` fresh '' ( non-pasteurized ) or  pasteurized , साथ pasteurization reducing इसके culinary  and economic value .
traditionally the पद caviar refers तभी to roe इससे जंगली sturgeon in the कैस्पियन  and Black Seas ( Beluga , Ossetra and Sevruga caviars ) .
depending on the देश , caviar may भी be प्रयुक्त to describe the roe of अन्य  fish such as salmon , steelhead , trout , lumpfish , whitefish , and other species of sturgeon .
Caviar is considered a luxury  कोमलता और is खाया as a  garnish or a spread .
In 2012 , caviar sold for $  2,500 प्रति पाउंड , or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500  per kilo .
The SEC Network is a television syndication  संजाल featuring सजीव प्रसारण of कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और बास्केट  events from the Southeastern Conference .
It is owned and operated  by ईएसपीएन प्लस और is दिखाया in अधिक than 50 प्रतिशत of households in the संयुक्त  States , mostly Southeastern United States markets .
The SEC Network typically airs in the noon  पूर्वी स्लॉट कि थी पूर्व घर to the raycom खेल  SEC game of the week .
Games are shown locally on broadcast stations , regional  खेल संजाल , as खूब as on ईएसपीएन gameplan , ईएसपीएन पूरा अदालत , और  ESPN3.com .
The SEC Network is  भी उपलब्धियाँ in कनाडा via अटलांटा  's WPCH-TV .
The SEC Network uses the same on-screen graphics  फिलहाल प्रयुक्त by ईएसपीएन on एबीसी , a संस्करण of ईएसपीएन 's ग्राफिक्स  package .
SEC Network 's football programming  स्टिल उपयोग a शीर्षक सुरक्षित क्षेत्रफल क्युकी सबसे of इसके affiliates do  not Letterbox their Standard Definition feeds , while ESPN 's television networks have allowed their graphics to abandon the title safe , but letterbox for SD viewers .
Starting with the SEC 2012 Basketball  ऋतु , सेक संजाल 's ग्राफिक्स have महरूम परिवर्तित to  a 16:9 Widescreen-only format .
This is also being used for the 2013 Basketball season , but had still adapted the  पूर्व 4:3-safe ग्राफिक्स स्वरूप लिये the 2012 सेक फ़ुटबॉल  season .
The 1990s , pronounced and also known  as `` the nineteen-nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the nineties  '' or `` the '90s '' , was a decade that began on January 1 , 1990 , and ended on December 31 , 1999 .
It was the 10th and last decade of the 20th  सदी और the 100th और पिछला दशक of the 2nd मिलेनियम  .
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold War at the beginning of  the दशक और the विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण of the अंतरजाल दौरान the दूसरी  half of the decade .
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a period of  unprecedented सलाम और समृद्धि , हालांकि अनेक भाग of the so-called तीसरा  World faced various problems including genocide , AIDS and new or continuing ethnic tensions and civil wars .
culturally बोलना the दशक थी characterized by  the rise of multiculturalism and alternative media .
Movements such as grunge , the rave scene and hip hop spread around the world  to यंग लोगों दौरान the दशक , aided by then-new प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as केबल टेलीविज़न  and the Internet .
A combination of factors , including the mass mobilization of capital markets through  neoliberalism , the शुरूआत of the फैली अप्रसार of नई मीडिया ऐसे as the अंतरजाल , और the विच्छेद  of the Soviet Union led to a realignment and reconsolidation of economic and political power across the world , and within countries .
Income inequality among countries in the world rose  sharply between the 1980s और the mid-1990s , पहले levelling बंद और  then falling after 2000 .
New ethnic conflicts emerged in Africa , the  balkans और the काकेशस , the पूर्व दो जिससे led to the rwandan नरसंहार  and Bosnian genocide , respectively .
The  संयुक्त राज्य began इसके वर्तमान सैन्य occupation of the मध्य ईस्ट दौरान the गर्मियाँ of  1990 with Desert Shield after it cut off a large portion of the world 's petroleum supply .
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel and the Arab world remained elusive , though the Irish  परेशानियों आए to a standstill in 1998 साथ the शुभ शुक्रवार अनुबंध बाद 30 सालो of हिंसा  .
The gray  भेड़िया or धूसर भेड़िया ( canis lupus ) is a प्रजाति of canid देशी to the wilderness और  remote areas of North America , Eurasia , and North Africa .
It is the largest member of  इसके परिवार , साथ males  averaging , and females .
It is  समान in सामान्य रूप और proportions  to a German shepherd , or sled dog , but has a larger head , narrower chest , longer legs , straighter tail and bigger paws .
Its  शीत फर is long और bushy , और predominantly a mottled धूसर in रंग , हालांकि  nearly pure white , red , or brown to black also occur .
Within the genus Canis , the gray wolf represents a more specialised and progressive form than its smaller cousins ( the coyote and golden  jackal ) , as demonstrated by इसके morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल शिकार , इसके अधिक मिलनसार प्रकृति और इसके अत्यधिक  advanced expressive behavior .
It is a social animal , travelling  in नाभिकीय परिवारों consisting of a पन्द्रहवें जोड़ी , accompanied  by the pair 's adult offspring .
The gray wolf is typically an apex predator  throughout इसके दायरा , साथ तभी इंसानो और टाइगर्स पोज़ a गंभीर  threat to it .
It feeds primarily on large ungulates  , हालांकि it भी eats छोटी पशु , पशुधन , carrion  , and garbage .
the धूसर भेड़िया is एक of the  world 's most well researched animals , with probably more books written about it than any other wildlife species .
It has a long history of association with humans , having  महरूम despised और hunted in सबसे agricultural समुदायों due to इसके हमले on पशुधन , जबकि conversely  being respected by some Native American tribes .
It is the sole ancestor of the dog ,  जिससे थी पहला domesticated in the मध्य  East .
Although the fear of wolves is prevalent in many human societies ,  the बहुमत of अंकित हमले on लोगों have महरूम attributed to  animals suffering from rabies .
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and  मारे लोगों , मुख्यतः children , लकिन इस is असामान्य , as भेड़ियों हैं अपेक्षाकृत few , सजीव दूर इससे लोगों , और  have been taught to fear humans by hunters and shepherds .
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' range to , though its still relatively widespread range  और stable जनसांख्यिकी अर्थात् कि the प्रजाति is नहीं threatened at a वैश्विक स्तर , और is  therefore classified by the IUCN as Least Concern .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization , characterised by an  निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the  Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic , which  preceded it , था महरूम destabilized through a श्रेणी of सिविल  wars .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire ,  सहित जूलियस सीज़र 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ; the बैटल of actium ( 31 bc ) ; और the granting of the honorific  Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ) .
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of  unprecedented स्थिरता और समृद्धि ज्ञात  as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest expanse  दौरान the शासनकाल of त्राजान ( 98–117  AD ) .
In the 3rd century , the Empire underwent a crisis that  threatened इसके अस्तित्व , लकिन थी reunified और stabilized अंतर्गत  the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century , during  जिससे समय a प्रणाली of डुअल नियम थी विकसित in the लैटिन वेस्ट और  Greek East .
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th  सदी , the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as कया होता बाद be ज्ञात as the  Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the  विकास of भाषा , धर्म , वास्तुकला , दर्शनशास्त्र , विधि , और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed , विशेषकर  Europe , and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world .
Education in the United States is mainly provided by the public  सेक्टर , साथ कंट्रोल और funding coming इससे तीन स्तर : लोकल , राज्य , और संघीय  , in that order .
Child education  is अनिवार्य , और वहीँ हैं भी a विशाल क्रमांक और चौड़ी किस्में of उच्चतर  education institutions throughout the country that one can choose to attend , both publicly and privately administered .
पब्लिक शिक्षा is universally  available .
School curricula  , funding , शिक्षण , नियुक्ति , और अन्य नीतियों हैं नियत through locally निर्वाचित स्कूल फलक साथ क्षेत्राधिकार  over school districts with many directives from state legislatures .
School districts are usually separate from other local jurisdictions , with  स्वतंत्र officials  and budgets .
शैक्षणिक मानकों और मानकीकृत परीक्षण निर्णय  are usually made by state governments .
The ages  लिये अनिवार्य शिक्षा  vary by state .
It begins from ages five  to आठ और ends इससे आयु चौदह  to eighteen .
Compulsory education  आवश्यकताएँ can generally be संतुष्ट by educating children  in public schools , state-certified private schools , or an approved home school program .
In most public and private schools , education is divided into three levels : elementary school , middle school ( sometimes called junior  ऊँची स्कूल ) , और ऊँची स्कूल ( sometimes referred to as द्वितीयक शिक्षा  ) .
In almost all  स्कूलों at ये स्तर , children हैं विभाजित by आयु समूह into ग्रेड , ranging इससे किंडरगार्टन ( followed  by first grade ) for the youngest children in elementary school , up to twelfth grade , the final year of high school .
The exact age  दायरा of विद्यार्थी in ये ग्रेड स्तर varies  slightly from area to area .
Post-secondary education , better known as `` college `` in the United States , is  generally governed separately इससे the elementary और ऊँची स्कूल प्रणाली  , and is described in a separate section below .
Government supported  , फ़्री पब्लिक स्कूलों लिये सब प्रारंभ होने स्थापित बाद the क्रान्ति , और विस्तारित in the  19th century , as the results of efforts of men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington .
By 1870 , all states had free elementary  स्कूलों , albeit तभी in शहरी centers  .
As the 20th century drew nearer , states started passing  कानून to मेक schooling अनिवार्य , और by 1910 , 72 प्रतिशत of children attended  school .
Private schools continued to spread during this  समय , as खूब as कॉलेजों and—in  the rural centers— land grant colleges .
The year of 1910 also  देखी the पहला सच्चा ऊँची  schools .
During the rest of the 20th  सदी , शैक्षणिक प्रयत्न केन्द्रित on reducing the  inequality of the schooling system .
The landmark Supreme  अदालत मामला भूरा v. फलक of शिक्षा बना the desegregation of elementary और ऊँची स्कूलों a  national priority , while the Pell Grant program helped poor minorities gain access to college .
Special  शिक्षा थी बना into संघीय  law in 1975 .
The Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 made  मानकीकृत परीक्षण a आवश्यकता , और in 1983 , a आयोग थी स्थापित to evaluate उनके परिणाम  and propose a course of action .
The resulting No Child Left  पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 थी विवादास्पद और इसके लक्ष्य proved  to be unrealistic .
A commission established in 2006 evaluated higher  शिक्षा , लकिन इसके सुझाव have yet to be fully implemented  .
Paul Bragg ( February 6 , 1895 – December 7 , 1976 ) , nutritionist , was  a पायोनियर in america’s तंदुरुस्ती गति  .
Health spending per capita , in $ US PPP-adjusted , with the US and  कनाडा compared amongst अन्य पहला संसार राष्ट्र  .
Comparison of the health care  प्रणालियों in कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य  are often made by government , public health and public policy analysts .
The two countries had similar  स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणालियों पहले कनाडा reformed इसके प्रणाली  in the 1960s and 1970s .
The United States spends much more  धन on स्वास्थ्य परवाह than कनाडा , on दोनो a per-capita  basis and as a percentage of GDP .
In 2006 , per-capita spending for health care in  कनाडा थी us $ 3,678 ; in the u.S. ,  US $ 6,714 .
The U.S.  खर्च 15.3 % of जीडीपी on स्वास्थ्य परवाह  in that year ; Canada spent 10.0 % .
In 2006 , 70 % of health  परवाह बिता in कनाडा थी financed by सरकारी  , versus 46 % in the United States .
Total government spending per capita in the U.S. on  स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी 23 % उच्चतर than कनाडाई सरकारी बिता , और u.S. सरकारी व्यय on स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी बस अंतर्गत 83 % of कुल  Canadian spending ( public and private ) though these statistics do n't take into account population differences .
Studies have come  to अलग conclusions परिचय the परिणाम of इस disparity  in spending .
A 2007 review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal found that `` health outcomes  may be श्रेष्ठ in मरीजों cared लिये in कनाडा बनाम the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन मतभेद हैं  not consistent . ''
Life  प्रत्याशा is longer in कनाडा , और इसके शिशु मृत्यु रेट is निम्नतर than कि of the  U.S. , but there is debate about the underlying causes of these differences .
One commonly cited comparison , the 2000  संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन 's दरजा of `` overall स्वास्थ्य सेवा प्रदर्शन '' , जिससे प्रयुक्त a `` कम्पोजिट माप of उपलब्धि in the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य  , the distribution of health , the level of responsiveness and fairness of financial contribution '' , ranked Canada 30th and the US 37th among 191 member nations .
This study rated the US  `` responsiveness '' , or विशेषता of सेवा लिये individuals  receiving treatment , as 1st , compared with 7th for Canada .
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for residents of the US , simply comparing the life expectancy  of दो समूह साथ अलग जातिगत मेकअप और अलग मोटापा दरों is संभावित नहीं an प्रभावी रास्ता of determining जिससे healthcare प्रणाली is श्रेष्ठ  .
the जो 's पढ़ाई विधि यहूद  criticized by some analyses .
Although there is a measure of consensus  कि life-expectancy और शिशु मृत्यु चिह्नित the सबसे विश्वसनीय तरीके to compare nation-wide स्वास्थ्य परवाह , assuming the जनसांख्यिकी मेकअप is समान , a हाल  report by the Congressional Research Service carefully summarizes some recent data and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons .
The sound source has now broken through the sound  गति अवरोध , और is traveling at 1.4 टाइम्स the  speed of sound , ( Mach 1.4 ) .
Since the source is moving  तेज़ ( साथ a गति ) than  the sound waves it creates , it actually leads the advancing wavefront .
The sound source will pass by a  stationary निरीक्षक ( साथ a गति ) पहले the निरीक्षक दरअसल hears  the sound it creates .
As a result ,  an निरीक्षक in सामने of the  source will detect
and an  निरीक्षक पीछे  the source .
A sonic boom produced by an aircraft moving at  m=2.92 , गणना इससे the कोन कोण of 20  degrees .
An observer hears the boom when the shock wave , on the  किनारे of the कोन , crosses उसके or उसके स्थान  .
mach कोन  angle
A sonic boom is the sound associated  साथ the शॉक लहरें निर्मित by an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the  air faster than the speed of sound .
Sonic booms  generate विशाल amounts of ध्वनि उर्जा , sounding  much like an explosion .
The crack of a supersonic bullet passing  ओवरहेड is an उदाहरण of a सोनिक बूम in miniature  .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American  late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted by jay लीनो कि initially aired इससे may 25 , 1992 to may 29  , 2009 , and resumed production on March 1 , 2010 .
The fourth incarnation of the  tonight दिखाएँ मताधिकार बना इसके डेब्यू on may 25 , 1992 , तीन दिनों  following Johnny Carson 's retirement as host of the program .
The program originates  इससे एनबीसी studios in burbank , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , और is ब्रॉडकास्ट सोमवार through शुक्रवार at 11:35 pm in the पूर्वी और प्रशांत समय  zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ) .
Unlike  कार्सन or उसके पूर्ववर्ती जोकर paar , लीनो तभी एकबार utilized  a guest host , preferring to host the series by himself .
On  अप्रैल 26 , 1999 , the दिखाएँ began प्रसारण in 1080i hdtv  , becoming the first American nightly talk show to be shot in high definition .
The  दिखाएँ is शॉट in 16:9  aspect ratio .
The series , which followed the same basic format as that of his  पूर्ववर्तियों ( an खोलने monologue followed by कॉमेडी दिनचर्या , साक्षात्कार और प्रदर्शन ) , भागा जबतक may 29 ,  2009 , after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien .
NBC signed Leno to a new deal for a nightly  बात दिखाएँ in the 10:00  pm ET timeslot .
The primetime series , titled The Jay Leno Show , debuted  on सितंबर 14 , 2009 , following a समान स्वरूप to the लीनो अवतार  of Tonight .
Neither O'Brien 's  संस्करण of the कार्यक्रम , जिससे premiered जून 1 , 2009 , nor  The Jay Leno Show generated the ratings that NBC had expected .
The network decided to move a condensed 30-minute version of Leno 's show to O'Brien 's time  स्लॉट , और o'brien 's tonight दिखाएँ a half-hour बाद  .
This decision met with opposition from  o'brien , जिनकी कार्यावधि on the tonight दिखाएँ ended जनवरी 22 , 2010 , बाद जिससे he began  his own talk show on TBS .
The Tonight Show  साथ jay लीनो तब began इसके दूसरी और वर्तमान अवतार  , the sixth of the franchise , on March 1 , 2010 .
rfid चिप अगला  to a grain of rice .
This chip contains a  radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य  magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number when queried by a reader device .
This  छोटी प्रकार is incorporated in उपभोक्ता उत्पाद ,  and implanted in pets , for identification purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to  ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा , लिये the उद्देश्य of automatically identifying और ट्रैकिंग टैग संलग्न to  objects .
The tags contain  electronically भंडारित सूचना  .
Some tags are powered and  पढ़ा at छोटी सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड  ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as  a बैटरी , or else have no बैटरी लकिन collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड , और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder  to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery powered  टैग may operate at सैंकड़ों  of meters .
Unlike a bar code , the tag does not necessarily  need to be भीतर लकीर of sight of the रीडर , और may be  embedded in the tracked object .
rfid टैग हैं प्रयुक्त in  many industries .
An RFID tag attached to an  ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके प्रगति through the सभा  line .
दवाएँ can be  tracked through warehouses .
Livestock and pets may have  टैग injected , allowing धनात्मक  identification of the animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to  कपडे , possessions , or भी implanted भीतर लोगों , the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked  information without consent has raised privacy concerns .
Id , ego and super-ego are the three parts of the psychic apparatus  पारिभाषित in सिग्मुंड फ्रायड 's संरचनात्मक मॉडल of the psyche ; वे हैं the तीन  theoretical constructs in terms of whose activity and interaction mental life is described .
According to this  मॉडल of the psyche , the id is the नियत of uncoordinated instinctual रुझान ; the super-ego plays the नाजुक और moralizing भूमिका  ; and the ego is the organized , realistic part that mediates between the desires of the id and the super-ego .
the super-ego can रोकें तुम इससे doing निश्चित  things that your id may want you to do .
Even though the model  is संरचनात्मक और makes सन्दर्भ to an apparatus , the id , अहंकार और super-ego हैं कृत्यों of the दिमाग बल्कि  than parts of the brain and do not correspond one-to-one with actual somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience .
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic model '' and `` topographical model '' ) was first discussed in his 1920 essay ``  परे the ख़ुशी principle `` और थी formalized और elaborated upon तीन सालो बाद in उसके `` the अहंकार  and the Id `` .
Freud 's proposal was influenced by  the ambiguity of the पद `` बेहोश `` और  its many conflicting uses .
एयर फ़ोर्स  ROTC emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer Training Corps ( AFROTC ) is one of the three primary commissioning  स्त्रोत लिये अधिकारियों in the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स , the अन्य दो होने the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स अकादमी ( usafa ) और एयर फ़ोर्स  Officer Training School ( OTS ) .
A subordinate command of the Air University within the Air Education and Training Command ( AETC ) , AFROTC  is लकीर अंतर्गत the jeanne M. holm बीच लिये अधिकारी accessions और नागरिक  Development at Maxwell AFB , Alabama .
The Holm Center , formerly known as  the एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी accession और प्रशिक्षण स्कूलों ( afoats ) , retains सीधा  responsibility for both AFROTC and OTS .
AFROTC is the largest and oldest source of  commissioned अधिकारियों लिये the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स  .
afrotc 's stated मिशन is to उपज विशेषता नेताओ  for the U.S. Air Force .
AFROTC units are located on 144 college and university campuses with 984  अतिरिक्त संस्थानों of उच्चतर सीखना participating in cross-town समझौतों कि allow उनके विद्यार्थी  to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby `` host '' college or university .
According to AFOATS HQ , in 2006 , AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF Second  lieutenants , साथ afrotc नामांकन ranging इससे 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993 , और around 13,000  enrolled today .
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are called ``  detachments , '' और हैं typically headed by an क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ अधिकारी in the रैंक of कर्नल or लेफ्टिनेंट कर्नल जो कृत्यों as दोनो the detachment कमांडर  for USAF purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution 's academic community .
Most colleges and universities will designate the  afrotc detachment as the विभाग of  Aerospace Studies .
The PAS is assisted by three to four Assistant Professors  of aerospace अध्ययन ( apas ) , सब क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ अधिकारियों in the बाँधने of प्रमुख  or captain .
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior  non-commissioned अधिकारी होगा typically provide सैन्य प्रशासनिक support और हैं प्रायः  augmented by one to two civilian staff support employees of the academic institution .
Within AFROTC detachments , the students ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) are organized  into विंग्स , समूह , squadrons , और फ़्लाइट , mirroring the यूएसएएफ कार्यात्मक  wing structure .
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General  सैन्य कोर्स ( जीएमसी ) consisting of the पहला दो सालो of प्रशिक्षण , और  the Professional Officer Course ( POC ) consisting of the last two years of training .
The AFROTC program is also divided into two  प्रशिक्षण कृत्यों : the अकादमिक कक्षा कार्यक्रम ( aerospace अध्ययन वर्ग ) और cadet  Activities ( i.e. , Leadership Laboratory , Physical Training , and other training ) .
Paper density ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a term used in the pulp and paper  उद्योग और भी लिये कपड़ा उद्योग to denote a माप of द्रव्यमान of the उत्पाद प्रति ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल  for a type of fabric , paper or paperboard .
The term `` density '' is not  प्रयुक्त in इसके  traditional sense of mass per unit volume .
`` Paper density  '' , बल्कि , is a माप of the क्षेत्रफल  density .
Paper products that let little  or no लाइट pass through ( e.g . पोस्टर फलक ) हैं माना  dense or heavy .
पेपर उत्पाद कि allow कुछ लाइट to pass through (  e.g . tissue paper ) are considered lightweight .
in the गूदा और पेपर उद्योग , it is आम to नियत a वाणिज्यिक  paper machine to produce paper to a target paper density .
Paper density can also be used to distinguish paper  इससे paperboard as the latter प्रायः रै a grammage  greater than 134 g/m2 .
दो तरीके of expressing पेपर  density are commonly used:
Expressed in grams per square meter (  g/m2 ) , पेपर घनत्व is भी ज्ञात  as grammage .
This is the  माप प्रयुक्त in सबसे भाग  of the world .
Expressed in terms of the mass (  expressed as वज़न ) प्रति क्रमांक  of sheets , it is known as basis weight .
The convention used in the United States and a few other  देशों using us पेपर आकार is पाउंड of a ream of 500 ( or in कुछ मामले 1000 ) चादरें of  a given ( raw , still uncut ) basis size .
जापानी पेपर is expressed as the वज़न in  kg of 1000 sheets .
Candace Nicole Parker ( born April 19 , 1986 ) is an American  बास्केट खिलाड़ी लिये the wnba 's लॉस एंजिल्स स्पार्क्स और ummc  Ekaterinburg of Russia .
She is the  younger सिस्टर of एनबीए खिलाड़ी एंथोनी पार्कर  .
She  attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of टेनेसी  and was drafted by the Sparks in 2008 .
She may be best known for being the first woman to dunk in an NCAA tournament game and the  पहला स्त्री to डंक twice in a कॉलेज game—she नियत दोनो माइलस्टोन as a redshirt freshman  on March 19 , 2006 .
She also became  तभी the दूसरी खिलाड़ी to डंक in  a WNBA game on June 22 , 2008 .
A versatile player , she is mainly a forward ,  लकिन थी सूचीबद्ध on टेनेसी 's रोस्टर as a आगे , बीच ,  and guard .
She was a starter  on the महिला vols बास्केट टोली ,  winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships .
Parker won  the 2009 निकलोडियन बच्चे  ' Choice award as the favorite female athlete in the sports category .
And she was a guest  स्टार on फिगर it  Out .
A food guide pyramid is a pyramid  तराशा मार्गदर्शिका of स्वस्थ भोजन विभाजित into भाग to दिखाएँ the  recommended intake for each food group .
The first food  पिरामिड थी प्रकाशित in स्वीडन in 1974  .
The most widely known food pyramid  थी introduced by the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि  in the year 1992 , was updated in 2005 , and then replaced in 2011 .
Over 25  अन्य देशों और संगठनों have  also published food pyramids .
Hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred  to in scandinavia as H. C. andersen ; अप्रैल 2 , 1805august 4  , 1875 ) was a Danish author and poet .
Although a prolific writer of plays , travelogues , novels , and poems , Andersen is best  remembered लिये उसके परी किस्से , a साहित्यिक विधा he so mastered कि he खुद रै become as mythical  as the tales he wrote .
Andersen 's popularity is not limited to children ;  उसके stories—called , or `` fantastic किस्से '' —express विषयवस्तु कि transcend  age and nationality .
During his  आजीवन he थी acclaimed लिये having प्रसन्न  children worldwide and was feted by royalty .
Andersen 's fairy tales , which have been translated into more than 125  भाषाएं , have become culturally अंतःस्थापित in the वेस्ट 's सामूहिक चेतना , readily accessible to children , लकिन पेश lessons  of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well .
They have inspired  गति तस्वीरें , plays , नाटिकाओं , और  animated films .
Two  आंकड़े locking आँखें in caravaggio 's the  Fortune Teller
Eye contact occurs when `` two people  dekh at प्रत्येक अन्य 's आँखें at  the same time . ''
In human beings , eye  सम्पर्क is a रूप of अशाब्दिक संचार और is  thought to have a large influence on social behavior .
coined in the जल्दी to mid-1960s , the पद रै आइये in the वेस्ट to प्रायः define the अधिनियम  as a meaningful and important sign of confidence and social communication .
The customs and  significance of नजर सम्पर्क vary widely between संस्कृतियों , साथ  religious and social differences often altering its meaning greatly .
The study of eye  सम्पर्क is sometimes ज्ञात  as oculesics .
Bed bugs are  parasitic कीट of the cimicid परिवार कि फीड  exclusively on blood .
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex of which Cimex lectularius , the common bed bug , is the best known as it prefers to feed on  इंसान रक्त हालांकि अन्य cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to अन्य पशु , e.g. , चमगादड़ बग , C. pipistrelli ( यूरोपीय ) , C. pilosellus ( पश्चिमी us ) , और C. adjunctus (  entire eastern US ) .
The name of the `` bed bug '' is derived from the preferred habitat of  cimex lectularius : गरम घरों और विशेषकर आसपास  or inside of beds and bedding or other sleep areas .
Bed bugs are mainly active at night  , लकिन हैं नहीं exclusively nocturnal  .
They usually feed  on उनके होस्ट बगैर होने  noticed .
A number of adverse health  प्रभाव may परिणाम इससे bed कीड़ा bites , सहित स्किन rashes  , psychological effects , and allergic symptoms .
Diagnosis involves  दोनो ढूंढना bed बग और the occurrence  of compatible symptoms .
Bed bugs  have महरूम ज्ञात as इंसान  parasites for thousands of years .
At a point in the early 1940s , they were mostly eradicated  in the विकसित संसार , लकिन have  increased in prevalence since 1995 .
Because  infestation of इंसान habitats रै महरूम on the बढ़ाएँ , bed कीड़ा bites  and related conditions have been on the rise as well .
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter Prophets in the  यहूदी बाइबल , preceding ezekiel , यिर्मयाह और  the Book of the Twelve .
( The order of the subsequent books differs  somewhat in the ईसाई बूढ़ा वसीयत  ) .
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a sinful Judah and for all the nations of the world that oppose God , while the last 27 prophesy the  बहाली of the स्वदेश of इसराईल और a नई सृष्टि in परमेश्वर 's गौरवशाली भविष्य किंगडम ; इस खण्ड शामिल the गीतों of the कष्ट नौकर , चार पृथक passages referring to  the nation of Israel , interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ .
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah son  of amoz , लकिन अभी विद्वानों widely सहमत कि the किताब is the कार्य of तीन अलग लेखक - few विद्वानों  deny this view , and those that do , do so for theological reasons .
The first , termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ) ,  contains the शब्द of the 8th-century bce नबी साथ 7th-century bce expansions ; the दूसरी , deutero-isaiah ( अध्याय 40–55 ) , is the कार्य of a 6th-century bce लेखक लिखने  near the end of the Babylonian captivity ; and the third , the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ) , was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from exile , probably by multiple authors .
Oregon State University ( OSU ) is  a coeducational , पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों  located in Corvallis , Oregon , United States .
The university offers  undergraduate , ग्रैजुएट और डॉक्टरेट  degrees and a multitude of research opportunities .
वहीँ हैं अधिक than 200 अकादमिक उपाधि  programs offered through the university .
osu 's कार्यक्रम in सूक्ष्मजैविकी , नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी , पारिस्थितिकी , वानिकी , पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य , biochemistry  , zoology , oceanography , food science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top tier programs .
The OSU 's liberal arts  कार्यक्रम have भी grown significantly और the विभाग is  considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution .
More than 200,000 people have  attended osu चूंकि इसके founding  .
The Carnegie Foundation classifies  ऑरेगॉन राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों as भाग of इसके  top tier of research institutions .
As  of 2008 , osu is एक of तभी seventy-three  land-grant universities .
The school is also recognized as a  sea-grant , space-grant और sun-grant संस्था , बनाना it एक of तभी दो us संस्थानों to retain सब चार designations  and the only public university to do so ( Cornell is the only other with similar designations ) .
As one of the  दो फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the ऑरेगॉन विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली , osu receives अधिक funding लिये शोध , annually  , than all other public higher education institutions in Oregon combined .
Female ejaculation  is the expulsion of द्रव by इंसान महिलाओं इससे  the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm .
It is also known colloquially  as gushing or squirting , हालांकि ये हैं माना  to be different phenomena in some research publications .
The exact  सोर्स और प्रकृति of the द्रव continue to be a टॉपिक of बहस among  medical professionals , which is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot .
The Kanab ambersnail , scientific name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or Oxyloma kanabense , is a critically  endangered subspecies or प्रजाति of छोटी , air-breathing जमीन घोंघा , a स्थलीय pulmonate gastropod mollusc  in the family Succineidae , the amber snails .
The common name of the amber snails is based on the shell ,  जिससे is पारदर्शी और जब खाली प्रायः resembles एम्बर  in color .
This species is  endemic to the संयुक्त राज्य , specifically the राज्य of  Arizona and Utah , where it was first collected in the early 20th century .
It has been listed as endangered on  the संयुक्त राज्य मछली और वन्यजीव सेवा सूची of endangered  species since 8 August 1991 .
This snail lives in wetlands , springs , and seeps , and only two of its natural habitats are known to exist : Three Lakes , a meadow near Kanab , Utah , and Vasey 's Paradise , a spring along the  कोलोराडो नदी भीतर ग्रैंड canyon नेशनल पार्क  .
In its natural habitat  it is बल्कि polyphagous , feeding मुख्यतः on जीवाणु  , plants and fungi , and reproduces during the summer .
Now considered a Critically Endangered species on the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species due to a series of factors (  सहित influence ) , the kanab ambersnail रै महरूम reintroduced to तीन स्रोतों  above the historic high water level along the Colorado River .
The  स्पेनी भाषा is the दूसरी  most used language in the United States .
There are more Spanish speakers in the United  राज्य than वहीँ हैं अध्यक्षों of चाइनीज , फ्रेंच , जर्मनी , इतालवी , हवाई  , and the Native American languages combined .
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by the U.S. Census Bureau , Spanish is the primary language  बोला at घर by लगभग 37 लाख लोगों aged पाँच or पुरानी , a फिगर अधिक than दोगुना कि  of 1990 .
There are  45 लाख hispanophones जो बोलो स्पेनी as a पहला or दूसरी भाषा , as खूब as छह लाख  Spanish language students , composing the largest national Spanish-speaking community outside of Mexico and making Spanish the Romance language and the Indo-European language with largest number of native speakers in the world .
Roughly half of all U.S. Spanish speakers  भी बोलो अंग्रेज़ी `` बहुत खूब , '' आधारित on the self-assessment जनसांख्यिकी सवाल उत्तरदाताओं  .
The language came to the country since the 16th and 17th centuries  साथ the आगमन of स्पेनी colonists in क्षेत्रों कि होता बाद become the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा , टेक्सास  , Colorado , New Mexico , Arizona , Nevada , Utah , and California and of the Spanish explorers - who explored areas of 42 states- .
Also west of Louisiana Territory was Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French recovery  of territory ) , बाद the फ्रेंच और भारतीय  War .
After of the incorporation of  ये राज्य to the u.S. in पहला हाफ of 19th सदी , the स्पेनी भाषा थी बाद reinforced by the अधिग्रहण of प्यूर्टो रीको in 1898 और by बाद लहरें of the हिस्पैनिक करणों ,  basically from Hispanic America , to the United States beginning in the second half of 19th century until today .

The Tokyo Mew Mew  manga और दुश्मनी श्रेणी सुविधाएँ a डाल  of characters designed by Mia Ikumi .
The series takes place in Tokyo , Japan , where five adolescent girls , called Mew Mews , are infused with  the डीएनए of endangered प्रजाति to कॉम्बैट एलियंस attempting to लो over  the Earth .
The  manga श्रेणी is followed by a छोटी sequel  series , Tokyo Mew Mew a la Mode , which introduces a new Mew Mew and a new threat .
The Mew Mews are led by the main character , Ichigo Momomiya , whose first task is to gather the other four Mew Mews : Mint  aizawa , सलाद midorikawa , खीर फोंग , और zakuro fujiwara  .
As the  श्रेणी progresses , ichigo goes इससे having a crush on masaya aoyama  to becoming his girlfriend while trying to hide her secret double life from him .
The series antagonists  शामिल तीन एलियंस , kish , पाई ,  and Tart , and their leader , Deep Blue .
Originally from Earth , the aliens were  मजबूर to छोड़ long पहले due to घातक पर्यावरणीय परिवर्तन  .
They have returned to kill the  इंसानो , जो वे महसूस हैं destroying उनके ग्रह , और reclaim  the planet .
In a la Mode , middle school student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth Mew Mew and , in the  अनुपस्थिति of ichigo , the अस्थाई नेता of the mew mews  .
A la Mode also introduces new set of  antagonists , the संत रोज़ crusaders , a समूह of इंसान  teenagers with various psychic abilities with a desire to create their own utopia .
Led by Duke ,  वे मेक अनेक कोशिशें to मार बेरी , आखिरकार turning the  local populace against the Mew Mews .
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew Mew was a story called Tokyo Black Cat  लड़की कि प्रदर्शित a cat-girl battling एलियन आक्रमणकारियों  .
After the story was transitioned to a more upbeat story  of पाँच मादा superheroes , the  character designs were redone to have a lighter , more colorful feel .
The main series characters were praised for being a perfect  अनुरूप लिये the overall स्टोरी , as खूब as लिये उनके cute  appearances .
The characters introduced in a la Mode were also  praised लिये उनके विज़ुअल दिखावे , लकिन criticized as होने दोहराव  of the original series .
The  अक्षर ड्यूक थी भी criticized लिये having a डिज़ाइन  reminiscent of the white supremacy group , the Ku Klux Klan .
Middle Triassic marginal marine sequence  of siltstones ( नीचे ) और limestones  ( above ) , Virgin Formation , southwestern Utah , USA
sedimentary रॉक्स हैं प्रकार of चट्टान कि हैं formed by the deposition  of material at the Earth 's surface and within bodies of water .
Sedimentation is the collective name for processes that cause mineral  and/or सशुल्क अणु ( detritus ) to settle और accumulate  or minerals to precipitate from a solution .
Particles that form  a sedimentary चट्टान by accumulating  are called sediment .
Before being  deposited , sediment थी formed by weathering और अपरदन in a सोर्स क्षेत्रफल , और तब  transported to the place of deposition by water , wind , ice , mass movement or glaciers which are called agents of denudation .
The  sedimentary चट्टान कवर of the महाद्वीपों of the धरती 's क्रस्ट is extensive , लकिन the कुल योगदान  of sedimentary rocks is estimated to be only 8 % of the total volume of the crust .
Sedimentary rocks are only a thin  veneer over a क्रस्ट consisting मुख्यतः of igneous  and metamorphic rocks .
Sedimentary rocks are deposited  in परतों as strata , forming a ढांचा  called bedding .
The study of sedimentary rocks and rock strata provides information about the subsurface that is useful for civil engineering , for example in  the निर्माण of सड़कें , घरों , tunnels , नहरों or अन्य  constructions .
Sedimentary rocks are also important sources of  प्राकृतिक संसाधन जैसे कोयले , चट्टान fuels , पीने जल  or ores .
The study of  the अनुक्रम of sedimentary चट्टान strata is the प्रमुख सोर्स लिये वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान परिचय  the Earth 's history , including palaeogeography , paleoclimatology and the history of life .
The scientific discipline that studies the properties  और उत्पत्ति of sedimentary रॉक्स is पुकारा sedimentology  .
Sedimentology is both part of geology and physical geography and overlaps partly  साथ अन्य disciplines in the धरती sciences , ऐसे as pedology , geomorphology  , geochemistry or structural geology .
