Gringo ( , , ) is a slang Spanish and Portuguese word  प्रयुक्त in ibero-america , to denote विदेशियों , प्रायः इससे  the United States .
The term can be applied to someone who is  दरअसल a foreigner , or it can denote a दमदार संघ or  assimilation into foreign ( particularly US ) society and culture .
In Spanish it does  नहीं have a ऋणात्मक connotation  .
Roger Axtell  , a सफर तहज़ीब विशेषज्ञ , टीप कि `` [ t ] he शब्द gringo is नहीं  necessarily a bad word .
It is slang but is  अपमानजनक तभी in इसके उपयोग और कॉन्टेक्स्ट  . ''
The  शब्द थी प्रयुक्त in स्पेन long पहले it crossed the अटलांटिक to denote  foreign , non-native speakers of Spanish .
The great white shark ,  carcharodon carcharias , भी ज्ञात as the ग्रेट श्वेत , श्वेत सूचक , श्वेत शार्क , or श्वेत मौत , is a प्रजाति of विशाल  lamniform shark which can be found in the coastal surface waters of all the major oceans .
The great white  शार्क is मुख्यतः ज्ञात लिये  its size , with the largest individuals known to have approached or exceeded in length , and in weight .
This shark reaches  इसके परिपक्वता around 15 सालो of आयु और can have a जीवन  span of over 30 years .
The great  श्वेत शार्क is arguably the संसार 's largest ज्ञात extant macropredatory  fish , and is one of the primary predators of marine mammals .
It is also known to prey upon a variety  of अन्य समुद्री पशु , सहित मछली और seabirds  .
It is the only known surviving species of  इसके genus carcharodon , और is क्रमित पहला in  having the most attacks on humans .
The IUCN list the great white shark as a vulnerable species  , जबकि it is शामिल in परिशिष्ट  II of CITES .
The bestselling novel Jaws by Peter Benchley and the subsequent blockbuster film by Steven Spielberg depicted the  ग्रेट श्वेत शार्क as a `` ferocious man भक्षक ``  .
in वास्तविकता , इंसानो हैं नहीं the पसन्दीदा  prey of the great white shark .
The  संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां हैं the सैन्य  forces of the United States of America .
They consist of the Army , Navy ,  समुद्री corps , एयर फ़ोर्स , और coast  Guard .
The U.S. has a  दमदार परंपरा of civilian कंट्रोल  of the military .
The President is  the सैन्य 's overall सिर , और helps रूप सैन्य नीति साथ the u.S. विभाग of रक्षा  ( DoD ) , a federal executive department , acting as the principal organ by which military policy is carried out .
The DoD is headed  by the सचिव of रक्षा  , who is a civilian and Cabinet member .
The Defense Secretary  is दूसरी in the सैन्य 's कड़ी of कमांड , बस नीचे the अध्यक्ष , और serves as the  principal assistant to the President in all DoD-related matters .
To coordinate  सैन्य कार्रवाई साथ कूटनीति , the अध्यक्ष रै an सलाहकार नेशनल  Security Council headed by a National Security Advisor .
Both the President and  सचिव of रक्षा हैं advised by a seven-member संयुक्त chiefs of  Staff , which includes the head of each of the Defense Department 's service branches as well as the chief of the National Guard Bureau .
Leadership is provided by  the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त chiefs of स्टाफ और the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  Chiefs of Staff .
The Commandant of  the coast गार्ड is नहीं a सदस्य of the  Joint Chiefs of Staff .
All of the branches work together during operations and joint  मिशन , अंतर्गत the एकीकृत combatant कमांड , अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the सचिव of रक्षा साथ  the exception of the Coast Guard .
The Coast Guard falls under the administration of the Department of  मातृभूमि सुरक्षा और receives इसके operational आदेश इससे the  Secretary of Homeland Security .
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the Department of the Navy  by the अध्यक्ष or कॉंग्रेस दौरान a  time of war .
All five armed services are  among the सात uniformed सेवाएं of the संयुक्त राज्य ; the अन्य हैं  the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned Corps and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Corps .
From  the समय of इसके inception , the सैन्य निभाई  a decisive role in the history of the United States .
A sense of national unity and identity was forged as a result of victory  in the पहला barbary युद्ध और the दूसरी barbary युद्ध  .
Even so ,  the संस्थापकों यहूद संदिग्ध of a स्थाई सैन्य फ़ोर्स और नहीं जबतक the outbreak of संसार  War II did a large standing army become officially established .
The National Security Act of 1947 , adopted following World War II and during the Cold War 's onset  , निर्मित the आधुनिक u.S. सैन्य फ्रेमवर्क ; the अधिनियम मिलाया previously cabinet-level विभाग of युद्ध और the विभाग of the नेवी into the नेशनल सैन्य स्थापना ( renamed  the Department of Defense in 1949 ) , headed by the Secretary of Defense ; and created the Department of the Air Force and National Security Council .
The U.S.  सैन्य is एक of the largest militaries  in terms of number of personnel .
It  draws इसके जनशक्ति इससे a विशाल पूल of सशुल्क स्वयंसेवक ; हालांकि conscription  has been used in the past in various times of both war and peace , it has not been used since 1972 .
As of 2013 , the U.S. spends  परिचय $ 554.2 अरब annually to निधि इसके सैन्य शक्तियां , और appropriates  approximately $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations .
put साथ , the u.S. constitutes roughly 43  percent of the world 's military expenditures .
The  u.S. हथियारबंद शक्तियां as a पूरे possess विशाल quantities of उन्नत और शक्तिशाली  equipment , along with widespread placement of forces around the world , giving them significant capabilities in both defense and power projection .
स्वतंत्रता of वाक is the राजनैतिक सही to communicate  one 's opinions and ideas using one 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive them .
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously , but includes any act of seeking ,  receiving और imparting सूचना or विचार , regardless of  the medium used .
In practice , the right to freedom of speech  is नहीं निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं , as साथ मानहानि , बदनामी , obscenity , राजद्रोह ( सहित , लिये  example inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright violation , revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human  सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों  law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right  shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to तलाश , प्राप्त और impart सूचना और विचार of सब kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in लिखने or in छपाई , in the रूप of आर्ट , or through  any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to  निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा of नेशनल सुरक्षा or of पब्लिक अनुक्रम ( अनुक्रम पब्लिक )  , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom  of वाक may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक  legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense , such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
the बिग बंग  Theory logo .
The Big Bang Theory is an American comedy television series created  और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक lorre और विधेयक prady  .
Like the name of the series itself , with the exception of the first episode— '' Pilot '' —episode titles of The Big Bang Theory always start with ``  the '' और resemble the नाम of a वैज्ञानिक principle , सिद्धान्त or प्रयोग , whimsically referencing a प्लाट पाइंट or quirk  .
, 133 एपीसोड  have aired .
The Big  बंग सिद्धान्त रै महरूम नवीनीकृत  for a seventh season .
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced , ; October 14 ,  1890 – कूच 28 , 1969 ) थी the 34th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States from 1953 until 1961 .
He had previously been a  five-star सामान्य in the संयुक्त राज्य फौज दौरान संसार युद्ध ii और परोसा as परम् कमांडर of the अलाइड शक्तियां in यूरोपीय ; he था जिम्मेदारी लिये नियोजन और supervising the आक्रमण of उत्तर अफ़्रीकी in आपरेशन  Torch in 1942–43 and the successful invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 from the Western Front .
In  1951 , he became the पहला  supreme commander of NATO .
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry and  थी reared in a विशाल परिवार in कान्सास by अभिभावक साथ  a robust work ethic and religious background .
As one of six sons  , he थी conditioned by a प्रतिस्पर्धी  atmosphere which instilled self-reliance .
He attended and  ग्रैजुएट इससे वेस्ट पाइंट और बाद शादीशुदा और था  two sons .
After World War II , Eisenhower served as Army  मुख्य of स्टाफ अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष हैरी S. ट्रूमैन , तब assumed the पोस्ट of अध्यक्ष  at Columbia University .
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a Republican to counter the non-interventionism of Senator  रॉबर्ट A. taft और to crusade विरूद्ध `` साम्यवादी , कोरियाई और भ्रष्टाचार  '' .
He won by a landslide ,  defeating डेमोक्रेट adlai stevenson और समाप्ति दो दशकों  of the New Deal Coalition .
In the first  साल of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी , आइज़नहावर अपदस्थ the नेता of इरान in the 1953  Iranian coup d'état and used nuclear threats to conclude the Korean War with China .
His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive nuclear  हथियार जबकि reducing the funding लिये conventional सैन्य शक्तियां ; the लक्ष्य थी to रखना दबाव on the सोवियत संघ  and reduce federal deficits .
In 1954 , Eisenhower first articulated the domino theory in his description of the  threat प्रस्तुत by the स्प्रेड of साम्यवादी  .
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution , which enabled him to  prevent चाइनीज कम्युनिस्ट आक्रामकता विरूद्ध चाइनीज राष्ट्रवादियों और स्थापित the u.S. नीति of defending  Taiwan .
When the Soviets launched  sputnik in 1957 , he था to खेल catch-up  in the space race .
Eisenhower forced Israel , the UK ,  और फ़्रांस to समाप्त उनके आक्रमण of मिश्र दौरान  the Suez Crisis of 1956 .
In 1958 , he sent 15,000 US  सैनिकों to लेबनान to prevent the pro-western सरकारी  from falling to a Nasser -inspired revolution .
निकट the समाप्त of उसके पद , उसके प्रयत्न to नियत up a  summit meeting with the Soviets collapsed because of the U-2 incident .
On the domestic front , he  covertly opposed जोसेफ मैकार्थी और contributed to the समाप्त of mccarthyism by खुलकर invoking  the modern expanded version of executive privilege .
he वरना बाएँ सबसे राजनैतिक कार्यकलाप  to his Vice President , Richard Nixon .
He was a moderate  रूढ़िवादी जो जारी नई सौदे एजेंसियों और  expanded Social Security .
Among his enduring innovations , he launched the Interstate Highway System ; the Defense Advanced Research  प्रोजेक्ट एजेंसी ( darpa ) , जिससे led to the अंतरजाल , among अनेक invaluable आउटपुट ; the नेशनल aeronautics और स्पेस प्रशासन ( नासा ) , ड्राइविंग शांतिपूर्ण डिस्कवरी in स्पेस ; the स्थापना of दमदार विज्ञान शिक्षा via the नेशनल रक्षा शिक्षा अधिनियम ;  and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act .
In social policy , he sent federal troops to Little Rock ,  अरकंसास , लिये the पहला समय चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण to  enforce federal court orders to desegregate public schools .
He also signed civil rights  विधान in 1957 और 1960 to protect the सही to  vote .
He implemented desegregation of the armed forces in two years and  बना पाँच नियुक्ति to the परम् अदालत  .
He was the first term-limited  अध्यक्ष in accordance साथ the 22nd amendment  .
आइज़नहावर 's दो शर्तें यहूद शांतिपूर्ण ones लिये the सबसे भाग और देखी considerable आर्थिक समृद्धि  except for a sharp recession in 1958–59 .
Eisenhower is often  क्रमित अत्यधिक among the u.S.  Presidents .
Air Force One is the official  एयर ट्रैफ़िक कंट्रोल कॉल चिह्न of a संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स  aircraft carrying the President of the United States .
In common  parlance the पद refers to those एयर फ़ोर्स वायुयान specifically designed , निर्मित  , and used for the purpose of transporting the president .
The  अध्यक्षीय वायुयान is a prominent  symbol of the American presidency and its power .
The idea of designating specific military aircraft to transport the President arose in 1943 , when officials of the United States Army Air Forces – the predecessor to the U.S. Air  फ़ोर्स – became चिंतित साथ relying on वाणिज्यिक एयरलाइंस to हस्तांतरण  the President .
A C-87 Liberator Express was reconfigured for use  as a अध्यक्षीय हस्तांतरण ; however , it थी अस्वीकृत by the रहस्य सेवा amid चिंताएं  over the aircraft 's safety record .
A C-54 Skymaster  थी तब परिवर्तित लिये अध्यक्षीय उपयोग ; इस वायुयान , उतावले the पवित्र गाय , transported अध्यक्ष  Franklin D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference in February 1945 , and was subsequently used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman .
The `` Air Force One '' call sign was  निर्मित बाद a 1953 घटना दौरान जिससे a उड़ान carrying अध्यक्ष ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर डाला the वही  airspace as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign .
Several aircraft have been  प्रयुक्त as एयर फ़ोर्स एक चूंकि the सृष्टि of the अध्यक्षीय बेड़े , सहित दो बोइंग 707s introduced in the 1960s और 1970s , क्रमशः  ; since 1990 , the presidential fleet has consisted of two Boeing VC-25As – specifically configured , highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft .
The Air Force is looking into  replacing the दो vc-25 वायुयान साथ तीन बदलना वायुयान शुरूआत in  2017 .
A wedding anniversary is the  वर्षगांठ of the तिथि  a wedding took place .
Traditional names exist for most of them : for instance , 50  सालो of विवाह is पुकारा a `` सुनहरी विवाह वर्षगांठ '' or बस  a `` golden anniversary '' .
A scanner with  duplexing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर  .
In multifunction or all-in-one printers , fax machines , photocopiers and scanners , an automatic document feeder or ADF is a feature which takes  अनेक पृष्ठों और फ़ीड्स the पेपर एक पेज at a समय into a स्कैनर or कॉपियर , allowing the उपयोक्ता to स्कैन , और thereby नक़ल , छपाई , or फैक्स , multiple-page दस्तावेज़ बगैर having to हस्तचालित बदलें  each page .
Most copiers allow scanning on the  फ्लैटबेड or platen ( the `` कांच '' ) or  through a document feeder .
The vast majority of fax  मशीने have an adf , allowing the unattended  sending of multi-page faxes .
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines , some  फैक्स यंत्र स्वामी उपयोग the फैक्स यंत्र  as a scanner , faxing multi-page documents to themselves .
Document  feeders हैं वर्णित by गति , in पृष्ठों प्रति मिनट  or ppm , and capacity , usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200 .
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) scanning : a reversing  स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or radf scans एक पक्ष of a पेज , तब flips  it and scans the other side .
A duplexing automatic  दस्तावेज़ फीडर or dadf scans दोनो पहलू  in one pass .
The advantage  of the dadf is तेज़ गति लिये two-sided  originals .
RADFs  और dadfs हैं रेटेड in बिंब प्रति मिनट ( ipm  ) , the number of sides they can scan each minute .
Fair Park is a recreational and  शैक्षणिक जटिल स्तिथ in डलास  , Texas ( USA ) .
The complex is registered as a Dallas Landmark , National Historic Landmark and is home  to नौ संग्रहालय , छह प्रदर्शन सुविधाएं , a लैगून , और the largest फेरिस व्हील in उत्तर अमेरिका  .
Many of the  इमारतें on the जटिल यहूद constructed लिये the टेक्सास centennial exposition in  1936 which drew over six million visitors .
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still  जीवित और it is पहचाना as a significant उदाहरण  of Art Deco architecture .
Fair Park has been designated a Great Place in  अमेरिका by the अमरीकी नियोजन संघ  .
The  अमरीकी नियोजन संघ ( apa ) “is an स्वतंत्र , not-for-profit शैक्षणिक संगठन  that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The  ग्रेट स्थान in अमरीकी कार्यक्रम helps to celebrate  areas with “exemplary character , quality , and planning.”
Being designated as a  ग्रेट प्लेस in अमेरिका , मेला पार्क थी एक  of only ten cities chosen in 2011 .
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. Joseph ) is the third-largest city  in कैलिफ़ोर्निया , the tenth-largest in the u.S. , और the काउंटी सीट of सांता क्लारा काउंटी जिससे is  located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay .
San Jose is the largest city within Silicon Valley , which is a major component of the greater San Francisco Bay Area , a region of 8.4  लाख लोगों और the पांचवां largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल (  CSA ) in the United States .
It is the largest city in  उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
San Jose was founded on November 29 , 1777 , as El  pueblo de सैन जोस de guadalupe , the पहला civilian कस्बा in the स्पेनी उपनिवेश of नुएवा  California , which later became Alta California .
The city served as a  खेती जातियाँ to support स्पेनी सैन्य संस्थापना  at San Francisco and Monterey .
When California gained statehood in  1850 , सैन जोस परोसा as इसके पहला  capital .
बाद अधिक than 150 सालो as a छोटी खेती नगर , सैन जोस और the surrounding सांता  Clara Valley became the last ( and largest ) contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay .
San Jose  अनुभवी increased माँग लिये आवास इससे  soldiers and veterans returning from World War II .
San Jose then continued its  आक्रामक विस्तार दौरान the 1950s और 1960s by  annexing more land area .
The rapid growth of the high-technology and electronics  उद्योग further त्वरित the परिवर्तन इससे an agricultural बीच , to an urbanized महानगर  area .
By the 1990s , San Jose 's location within the booming local  प्रौद्योगिकी उद्योग अर्जित the नगर इसके उपनाम , पूंजी of  Silicon Valley .
San Jose now  maintains वैश्विक नगर औकात और is the largest नगर in the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in शर्तें  of population , land area , and industrial development .
The U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो reported the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर to be  945,942 as of the 2010 Census .
As of April  2013 , the अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी  of San Jose was 984,000 .
San Jose , along with the Santa Clara Valley , experienced about half a century of  spectacular suburban sprawl , साथ विशेषताएँ of तीव्र शहरी समान to the  Los Angeles area of Southern California .
The city has  लिया definite कदम to avoid बनने  `` L.A. North '' .
However , the sprawl in San Jose is worse than in Los Angeles by measures  ऐसे as जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व और पब्लिक पारगमन सुरक्षा , निवेश  , and ridership .
Europe  चित्रित by antwerp cartographer  Abraham Ortelius in 1595
The history of Europe covers the people inhabiting the European continent since it was first populated in prehistoric  टाइम्स to उपस्थित , साथ the पहला होमो sapiens arriving between 45,000 और 25,000  BC .
The earliest  settlers to प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय आए  during the paleolithic era .
The arrival  of कृषि around 7000  BC ushered in the neolithic age .
Neolithic Europe lasted for 4000 years ,  अतिव्यापी साथ metal-using संस्कृतियों कि धीरे स्प्रेड throughout  the continent .
Technological advances  दौरान the प्रागैतिहासिक आयु tended to arrive इससे the  Middle East , spreading gradually to the northwest .
Some of the best-known civilizations of prehistoric  यूरोपीय यहूद मिनोआई और माइसीनियाई , जिससे flourished दौरान the कांस्य आयु जबतक वे collapsed  in a short period of time around 1200 BC .
The period known as  शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता began साथ the वृद्धि of the city-states of  Ancient Greece .
Greek influence reached its zenith under the  expansive साम्राज्य of सिकंदर the ग्रेट , spreading throughout  Asia .
Northern  और पश्चिमी यूरोपीय यहूद वर्चस्व by the la tène  culture , a precursor to the Celts .
Rome , a small city-state traditionally founded in 753 BC , would grow to become the Roman  गणतंत्र in 509 bc और होता सफल यूनानी संस्कृति as the प्रबल भूमध्यसागरीय  civilization .
The events of the rule of Julius Caesar  led to reorganization of the गणतंत्र  into the Roman Empire .
The empire was  बाद विभाजित by the सम्राट diocletian into  the Western and Eastern empires .
During the later years of the Roman Empire , the Germanic peoples  of उत्तरी यूरोपीय grew in शक्ति और दोहराया हमले led to the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in ad 476 , a तिथि जिससे traditionally  marks the end of the classical period and the start of the Middle Ages .
During the Middle Ages , the Eastern  रोमन साम्राज्य बच , हालांकि आधुनिक इतिहासकारों refer  to this state as the Byzantine Empire .
In Western Europe , Germanic peoples moved into positions of power in the remnants of the former Western Roman  साम्राज्य और स्थापित kingdoms और empires of उनके  own .
Of all of the Germanic peoples ,  the franks होता वृद्धि to a स्थिति of आधिपत्य over पश्चिमी यूरोपीय , the frankish साम्राज्य  reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800 .
Francia was divided into several parts ; West Francia would evolve into the Kingdom of  फ़्रांस , जबकि ईस्ट francia होता evolve into the पावन रोमन साम्राज्य , a precursor to आधुनिक जर्मनी .
the अंग्रेजों isles यहूद the  site of several large-scale migrations .
Native Celtic peoples  था महरूम अधिकारहीन दौरान the काल of रोमन ब्रिटेन , और जब the romans abandoned the अंग्रेजों isles दौरान the 400s , लहरें of germanic anglo-saxons  migrated to southern Britain and established a series of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927 .
During this  काल , the किंगडम of कैंडल और किंगडम  of Hungary ( 1000–1945 ) were organized as well .
The  viking आयु , a काल of migrations of scandinavian peoples , वर्चस्व the  period from the late 700s to the middle 1000s .
Chief among the Viking states was the Empire of Cnut the  ग्रेट , a डैनिश नेता जो होता become  king of England , Denmark , and Norway .
The Normans , a Viking people who settled in Northern France and founded the Duchy of  normandy , होता have a significant प्रभाव on अनेक भाग of यूरोपीय  , from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily .
Another Scandinavian people , the Rus ' people , would go on to found  kievan rus ' , an जल्दी राज्य जिससे थी a precursor  for the modern country of Russia .
As  the viking आयु खींचा to a बंद , the काल ज्ञात as the क्रूसेड , a श्रेणी of religiously-motivated  military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule , began .
Several  जेहादी राज्य यहूद संस्थापित in the पूर्वी  Mediterranean .
ये यहूद सब short-lived  .
The Crusaders would have  a profound प्रभाव on अनेक  parts of Europe .
Their Sack of  कुस्तुंतुनिया in 1204 brought an abrupt समाप्त  to the Byzantine Empire .
Extinct dog breeds  is a संकलन of श्वान breeds कि have become  extinct .
Wii Speak is a  माइक्रोफोन accessory लिये निन्टेंडो  's Wii video game console .
Connected to the console via USB , the device can be placed  निकट the वीडियो प्रदर्शक , allowing आवाज़ गपशप  to be conducted with the entire room .
The device features an LED to  indicate जब the माइक्रोफोन is क्रियाशील  .
Wii Speak  थी घोषित at निन्टेंडो  's 2008 E3 media briefing .
It was released separately and bundled  साथ एनिमल क्रासिंग : नगर लोक on नवम्बर 16 , 2008 , in उत्तर  America , and was released on December 5 , 2008 , in Europe .
The Wii Speak accessory is  succeeded by the अंतःस्थापित माइक्रोफोन  on the Wii U 's GamePad controller .
निसान बुद्धिमान  Key®
A smart key is an electronic access and  प्राधिकरण प्रणाली जिससे is उपलब्धियाँ as an विकल्प or मानक  in several cars .
It was first developed by Siemens in the mid-1990s and  introduced by mercedes-benz अंतर्गत the नाम `` keyless go '' in 1998 on the w220 s-class following इसके डिज़ाइन पेटेंट  filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17 , 1997 .
Univisión ( ) is a  spanish-language टेलीविज़न संजाल in the संयुक्त  States .
The network is primarily dedicated  लिये लैटिन अमरीकी परिवारों जो reside in the संयुक्त  States .
It has the largest audience of Spanish-language  टेलीविज़न दर्शक in the संसार according to nielsen दरजा  .
Randy Falco , (  सीईओ as of जून 29 , 2011 ) coo , रै महरूम in चार्ज of  the company since the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in April 2010 .
In recent years the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's five major English-language television networks , and is often a strong fifth , outranking The CW , with some fourth-place weekly placings ,  और as of 2012 , भी पहला प्लेस rankings लिये व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम over सब पाँच अंग्रेज़ी संजाल due to the संजाल 's सतत अनुसूची of नई telenovelas  all 52 weeks of the year .
Univisión is headquartered in New York ,  और रै इसके प्रमुख studios , उत्पादन सुविधाएं , और परिचालन in doral , फ्लोरिडा  , a suburb of Miami .
In 2009 , another television studio was announced  , univision studios , to be निर्मित in doral  .
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country , with local stations in over  50 बाज़ार साथ विशाल हिस्पैनिक और लातीनी populations और a नेशनल केबल संजाल फीड वितरित in बाज़ार बगैर either  the availability or the demand for a locally-based station .
Most of these stations air full local news and other local programming in addition to network shows , and in major markets such as Los Angeles , New York , and Miami the local newscasts  carried by the संजाल 's owned-and-operated स्टेशन ( o & o ) स्टेशन हैं बराबर प्रतिस्पर्धी साथ उनके english-language  counterparts ratings-wise .
Univisión was acquired on March 29 , 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's  saban पूंजी समूह ( जो था previously स्वामित्व the एंटिटी saban entertainment ) , tpg पूंजी , l.P. , विधाता इक्विटी साझेदार , मैडिसन dearborn साझेदार , और थामस H. ली साझेदार लिये $ 13.7 अरब or $ 36.25 प्रति share प्लस $ 1.4 अरब  in acquired debt .
The  buyout बाएँ the कम्पनी साथ  a debt level of twelve times its annual cash flow , which was twice the norm in buyouts done over the previous two years .
Artist 's  धारणा of a आदिग्रह  disk
The formation and of the Solar System is estimated to have begun 4.6 billion  सालो पहले साथ the गुरुत्वाकर्षक पतन of a छोटी भाग of a दानव  molecular cloud .
Most of the collapsing  द्रव्यमान एकत्रित in the केन्द्र , forming the सूर्य , जबकि the बाकी flattened into a आदिग्रह डिस्क  out of which the planets , moons , asteroids , and other small Solar System bodies formed .
This widely  स्वीकृत मॉडल , ज्ञात as the nebular परिकल्पना , थी  first developed in the 18th century by Emanuel Swedenborg , Immanuel Kant , and Pierre-Simon Laplace .
Its subsequent  विकास रै interwoven a किस्में of वैज्ञानिक disciplines  including astronomy , physics , geology , and planetary science .
Since the dawn of the space age in the 1950s and the discovery of extrasolar planets  in the 1990s , the मॉडल रै महरूम दोनो challenged और परिष्कृत to खाता  for new observations .
The  सौर प्रणाली रै विकसित considerably  since its initial formation .
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas and dust around their parent planets , while other moons are thought to have formed  independently और बाद महरूम captured by उनके ग्रह  .
Still others , as the Earth  's चंद्रमा , may be the परिणाम of दानव टक्करों  .
Collisions between bodies  have occurred continually up to the उपस्थित दिन और have महरूम सेंट्रल to  the evolution of the Solar System .
The positions of  the ग्रह प्रायः shifted  , and planets have switched places .
This planetary migration  is अभी विचार to have महरूम जिम्मेदार लिये much of the सौर  System 's early evolution .
In roughly 5 billion years , the Sun will cool and expand  outward अनेक टाइम्स इसके वर्तमान व्यास ( बनने a रेड दानव ) , पहले ढलाई बंद इसके बाहरी परतों as a ग्रहीय  nebula and leaving behind a stellar remnant known as a white dwarf .
In the far distant future , the  गम्भीरता of गुजर सितारों होगा धीरे reduce  the Sun 's retinue of planets .
Some planets will  be नष्ट , अन्य ejected into अंतरतारकीय  space .
Ultimately , over the  कोर्स of tens of अरबों of सालो , it is संभावित कि the सूर्य होगा  be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it .
The Trial ( Kafka 's original German title : , later as , and ) is a novel  लिखा by फ्रांज काफ्का in 1914 और 1915 लकिन नहीं  published until 1925 .
One of Kafka 's best-known works , it tells the story of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote , inaccessible authority  , साथ the प्रकृति of उसके अपराधों नाज़िल to neither उसे nor the रीडर  .
Like Kafka 's other novels , The Trial was never completed  , हालांकि it करता शामिल a अध्याय जिससे brings the  story to an end .
Because of this there are certain inconsistencies which exist within the  अनोखा , ऐसे as असमानताओं in समय in जोड to अन्य discontinuities in  narration .
After Kafka 's death in 1924 his friend and literary  executor अधिकतम brod संपादित  the text for publication by Verlag Die Schmiede .
The original manuscript  is आयोजित at the संग्रहालय of आधुनिक  Literature , Marbach am Neckar , Germany .
In  1999 , the किताब थी सूचीबद्ध in le mondes 100 किताबे of the सदी और as no  . 2 of the Best German Novels of the Twentieth Century .
Lisa Anne Loeb  ( born कूच 11 , 1968 ) is  an American singer-songwriter and actress .
She launched her  करियर in 1994 साथ the सोंग , `` रहो ( i छूटी तुम ) `` , जिससे थी  included in the film Reality Bites .
She was the first artist to  have a क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य  while not signed to a recording contract .
उसके पाँच स्टुडियो cds शामिल उसके प्रमुख लेबल डेब्यू  , the gold-selling Tails and its follow-up , the Grammy-nominated , gold-selling Firecracker .
Loeb has also  worked in फिल्मी , टेलीविज़न  , voice-over work and children’s recordings .
Loeb has appeared in two television series , Dweezil & Lisa , a weekly culinary adventure for  the खाना संजाल और क्रमांक 1 सिंगल , a वास्तविकता दिखाएँ  on the E !
Network in 2006 focused on her  क्वेस्ट लिये प्रेम , कामयाबी  , career , and family .
Her children 's music includes the albums Catch the Moon ( 2003  ) , और शिविर लिसा ( 2008 )  .
Her  पहला संयुक्त children 's किताब और एल्बम लिसा लोएब 's  Silly Sing-Along : The Disappointing Pancake and Other Zany Songs was published in 2011 .
In 2010 she founded the Lisa Loeb  चश्मा संग्रहण , जिससे is आधारित on  her own designs .
The Coat of arms of  the राज्य of नई जर्सी शामिलs:
A shield with three plows emblazoned ,  प्रतिनिधि of नई जर्सी 's agricultural  tradition .
A forward-facing  नाईट 's हेल्मेट  .
A horse 's head  as the crest of the हेल्मेट  .
The female figures  स्वतंत्रता और ceres , प्रतिनिधि of  the state 's motto ( see next item ) .
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a  `` स्वतंत्रता कैप `` ; ceres is पकड़कर an overflowing  cornucopia .
The streamer at the foot of the emblem contains  the राज्य motto of नई जर्सी , `` स्वतंत्रता और समृद्धि  '' , and the year of statehood , 1776 .
It was originally designed by Pierre  यूजीन du simitiere in 1777 और थी परिवर्धित  slightly in 1928 .
The seal is the central motif in the flag of New Jersey and  the ग्रेट मुहर of the राज्य of नई जर्सी  .
The Coat of  बाहें contains a घोड़ा  's head .
A helmet showing that  नई जर्सी governs itself तदनुसार और तीन plows on a शील्ड referring to  the State 's agriculture tradition , giving it the nickname `` Garden State '' .
The two  देवियाँ represent the राज्य motto  , `` Liberty and Prosperity '' .
स्वतंत्रता is on the  left .
She is  पकड़कर a स्टाफ साथ a स्वतंत्रता कैप on it , और the शब्द  liberty underneath her .
The  देवी on the सही  is Ceres , goddess of agriculture .
She is holding a  cornucopia साथ समृद्धि लिखा  below her .
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11 ,  1896 , the तिथि in जिससे the सभा officially स्वीकृत the ध्वज as the राज्य emblem , the buff रंग is due indirectly to जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , जो था ordered on अक्तूबर 2 , 1779  , that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue , with buff facings .
Buff-colored facings had until then been reserved only for his  अपना वर्दी और those of अन्य महाद्वीपीय सेनापतियों  and their aides .
Then  , on फ़रवरी 28 , 1780 , the महाद्वीपीय युद्ध अधिकारियों in फिलाडेल्फिया निर्देशित कि the वर्दी  coat facings of all regiments were to be the same as the background color of the regiments ' state flag .
The seal  is वर्णित in नई जर्सी statute  Title 52 , §2-1:
`` We Can Work It Out '' is a song by the  बीटल्स , लिखा by पॉल mccartney और  John Lennon .
It was released as  a `` दोगुना a-sided `` सिंगल साथ `` दिन tripper `` , the पहला समय दोनो  sides of a single were so designated in an initial release .
Both  गीतों यहूद अंकित दौरान  the Rubber Soul sessions .
The song is an example  of lennon–mccartney सहयोग at a गहराई कि happened  only rarely after they wrote the hit singles of 1963 .
This song , `` A Day in the Life `` , `` Baby , You 're  a समृद्ध man `` और `` i 've मिला a अहसास `` , हैं among the notable अपवाद .
As a medical diagnosis , pedophilia or paedophilia is a  मनोरोग विकार in व्यक्तियों 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी typically characterized by a प्राथमिक or विशेष यौन ब्याज toward prepubescent children ( generally आयु 11 सालो or younger  , though specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ) .
An adolescent who is 16 years of age or older must be at least five years older than  the prepubescent चाइल्ड पहले the आकर्षण can be diagnosed as pedophilia  .
The term has a  दायरा of परिभाषाएं , as मिला in psychiatry  , psychology , the vernacular , and law enforcement .
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder of adult personality and behaviour '' in which there is  a यौन वरीयता लिये children of prepubertal or जल्दी pubertal आयु  .
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM ) , it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 years of age or older have intense and  तूल यौन प्रेरणाएं towards और कल्पनाओं परिचय prepubescent children कि वे have either acted on or जिससे कारण उन्हें तकलीफ or interpersonal  difficulty .
In popular usage , pedophilia means any  यौन ब्याज in children or the अधिनियम of चाइल्ड यौन  abuse , often termed `` pedophilic behavior '' .
For example , The American Heritage Stedman 's  चिकित्सा शब्दकोष राज्य , `` pedophilia is the अधिनियम or काल्पनिक on the भाग of an वयस्क  of engaging in sexual activity with a child or children . ''
This common use  अनुप्रयोग भी extends to the यौन ब्याज in और यौन सम्पर्क  with pubescent or post-pubescent minors .
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who commit child sexual abuse commonly exhibit the disorder , some  अपराधियों do नहीं मिलें the नैदानिक निदान मानकों लिये pedophilia  and these standards pertain to prepubescents .
additionally , नहीं सब pedophiles  actually commit such abuse .
Pedophilia  थी पहला formally पहचाना और नामित in  the late 19th century .
A significant  राशि of शोध in the क्षेत्रफल रै लिया  place since the 1980s .
Although mostly documented in men , there are also women who  प्रदर्शनी the विकार , और शोधकर्ताओं assume उपलब्धियाँ  estimates underrepresent the true number of female pedophiles .
No cure for pedophilia has been developed , but there are therapies  कि can reduce the incidence of a व्यक्ति committing चाइल्ड  sexual abuse .
In the United States , following Kansas v. Hendricks , sex offenders who are diagnosed with certain mental disorders , particularly  pedophilia , can be विषय to indefinite सिविल प्रतिबद्धता , अंतर्गत विभिन्न राज्य कानून ( generically पुकारा svp कानून ) और the संघीय  Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 .
At present , the  सटीक कल्याणकारी of pedophilia have  not been conclusively established .
Research suggests that pedophilia  may be correlated साथ अनेक अलग neurological abnormalities , और प्रायः co-exists  with other personality disorders and psychological pathologies .
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement , a variety of typologies have been suggested  to categorize pedophiles according to बर्ताव  and motivations .
Julio César Chávez  ( born जूलियो césar chávez gonzález  on July 12 , 1962 ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer .
Chávez is considered by many people for their sport  आंकडे the महानतम सेनानी कभी to आइये आउट  of Mexico .
He is a six-time world champion in three weight divisions ,  और लिये अनेक सालो he थी माना एक of the बेहतरीन pound-for-pound boxer in  the world .
In a career that spanned over 25 years , Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984 , WBA Lightweight in 1987 , WBC  lightweight in 1988 , wbc लाइट welterweight in 1989 , ibf लाइट welterweight in 1990 , और wbc लाइट welterweight  in 1994 .
He holds records for most successful consecutive defenses of world titles ( 27 ) ,  सबसे शीर्षक झगड़े ( 37 ) , सबसे title-fight victories ( 31 ) और he is बाद जो लुई साथ ( 23 ) लिये सबसे  title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ) .
Chávez also has the longest  अपराजित streak in मुक्केबाज़ी इतिहास  , 13 years .
His record was 89-0-1 going  into उसके पहला घाटा to फ्रेंकी रान्डेल और था an 87 लड़ो जीत streak जबतक  his `` draw '' with Whitaker .
Julio César Chávez was known for his outstanding punching power , devastating body attack ,  remarkably दमदार chin और the अथक stalking of उसके  opponents .
He ranks # 24 on  ईएसपीएन 's 50 महानतम मुक्केबाज of सब  Time .
On December 7 , 2010 , he was inducted in the  prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय मुक्केबाज़ी हॉल of कीर्ति लिये the क्लास of  2011 .
He is the father of prospect Omar Chávez and former  wbc middleweight चैंपियन जूलियो césar  Chávez , Jr .
`` Selektion `` on the  judenrampe , auschwitz , may/june 1944  .
To be sent to the right  meant स्लेव मजदूर ; to the बाएँ , the  gas chamber .

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos , `` whole '' and kaustós , `` burnt '' ) also known as  the shoah ( यहूदी : , hashoah , `` प्रलय '' ; यहूदी : , churben or hurban , इससे the यहूदी लिये `` विनाश '' ) , थी the द्रव्यमान हत्या or नरसंहार of लगभग छह लाख यहूदियों दौरान संसार  War II , a programme of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany , led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party , throughout German-occupied territory .
Of the nine million Jews  जो था resided in यूरोपीय पहले the holocaust , लगभग two-thirds  were killed .
Over one million Jewish children  यहूद मारे in the holocaust , as यहूद लगभग दो  million Jewish women and three million Jewish men .
A network of over 40,000  सुविधाएं in जर्मनी और german-occupied territory यहूद प्रयुक्त to concentrate , थाम , और  kill Jews and other victims .
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition , and some use the common  संज्ञा `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य नाजी द्रव्यमान हत्याएं , सहित those of सोवियत बंदियों of युद्ध , पॉलिश और सोवियत नागरिकों , और  homosexuals .
Recent  estimates आधारित on आंकड़े प्राप्त चूंकि the पतन of the सोवियत संघ indicates कुछ टेन to  eleven million civilians and prisoners of war were intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime .
The persecution and  नरसंहार यहूद carried आउट  in stages .
Various laws to  हटाएँ the यहूदियों इससे सिविल समाज , सबसे prominently the nuremberg कानून , यहूद enacted in  Germany years before the outbreak of World War II .
विशेषज्ञता शिविरों यहूद स्थापित in जिससे inmates यहूद  subjected to slave labor until they died of exhaustion or disease .
Where Germany conquered new  territory in पूर्वी यूरोपीय , specialized इकाई पुकारा einsatzgruppen  murdered Jews and political opponents in mass shootings .
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos  पहले होने transported by भाड़ा ट्रैन to extermination शिविरों जहाँ , if वे बच the यात्रा , सबसे यहूद systematically  killed in gas chambers .
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the logistics  कि led to the genocides , turning the तीसरा reich into कया एक holocaust विद्वान रै पुकारा  `` a genocidal state '' .
4-H in the United States is a youth organization administered by  the नेशनल संस्थान of खाना और कृषि of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) , साथ the मिशन of `` engaging युवावस्था to पहुँचें  their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development . ''
The name represents four personal development  क्षेत्रों of फ़ोकस लिये the संगठन : सिर , दिल , हैंड्स , और  health .
The organization has over 6.5 million members in  the संयुक्त राज्य , इससे आयु पाँच to twenty-one , in लगभग  90,000 clubs .
The  लक्ष्य of 4-h is to develop नागरिकता , नेतृत्व , जिम्मेदारी और  life skills of youth through experiential learning programs and a positive youth development approach .
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally  केन्द्रित संगठन as a परिणाम of इसके इतिहास , 4-h आज focuses on नागरिकता , स्वस्थ जीना ,  science , engineering , and technology programs .
Today , 4-H and related programs exist in over eighty countries around the world ; the organization and  प्रशासन varies इससे देश to देश  .
Each of these programs operates independently ,  लकिन cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges  , global education programs , and communications .
The 4-H motto is  `` to मेक the बेहतरीन बेहतर '' , जबकि इसके स्लोगन is `` सीख  by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ) .
The national flag of Chile , consists of two unequal horizontal bands of white and red and a blue square the same height as  the श्वेत बैंड in the कैण्टन , जिससे bears a श्वेत five-pointed स्टार in the बीच  .
It  थी अपनाया on 18 अक्तूबर  1817 .
The  chilean ध्वज is भी ज्ञात in  Spanish as La Estrella Solitaria ( The Lone Star ) .
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; blue  symbolizes the आसमान और the प्रशांत समंदर , श्वेत is लिये the snow-covered andes , और रेड स्टैंड  for the blood spilled to achieve independence .
According to the epic poem La  araucana , the रंगों यहूद निकला इससे those इससे the ध्वज flown  by the Mapuche during the Arauco War .
`` Flag Day  '' is आयोजित प्रत्येक साल on the नवीं of जुलाई to commemorate  the 77 soldiers who died in the 1882 Battle of La Concepción .
Generation Y , also known as  the अंतर्दृष्टियों पीढी , is  the demographic cohort following Generation X .
There are no precise dates for when  पीढी y starts और ends  .
Commentators use beginning  जनम तिथियाँ इससे the latter 1970s  , or from the early 1980s to the early 2000s .

according to tacitus , नीरो targeted  Christians as those responsible for the fire .
The  ग्रेट आग of रोम ( ) थी an शहरी आग कि occurred  beginning 19 July AD 64 .
Virginia ( ) , officially the Commonwealth of Virginia , is a U.S. state  स्तिथ in the दक्षिण अटलांटिक प्रदेश of the संयुक्त  States .
Virginia is  nicknamed the `` बूढ़ा डोमिनियन '' और the `` माँ of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the आठ  U.S. presidents born there .
The geography and climate of the Commonwealth are shaped by the  ब्लू लकीरें kyu और the chesapeake खाड़ी , जिससे provide आवास लिये much of  its flora and fauna .
The capital  of the राष्ट्रमंडल is रिचमंड ; और वर्जिनिया बीच is the  most populous city .
Fairfax County is the most  populous राजनैतिक subdivision  .
The  wealthiest is loudoun  County .
The Commonwealth 's  जनसांख्यिकी is over आठ  million .
The area 's  इतिहास begins साथ अनेक स्वदेशी समूह , सहित  the Powhatan .
In 1607 the London Company established the Colony of Virginia  as the पहला स्थाई नई संसार अंग्रेज़ी  colony .
Slave labor and the land acquired from  विस्थापित देशी अमरीकी जनजातियों प्रत्येक निभाई a significant भूमिका in the उपनिवेश  's early politics and plantation economy .
Virginia was one of the  13 colonies in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और joined the confederacy in the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध , दौरान जिससे  Richmond was made the Confederate capital and Virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to form the state of West Virginia .
Although the  राष्ट्रमंडल थी अंतर्गत रूढ़िवादी single-party नियम लिये nearly a सदी following पुनर्निर्माण  , both major national parties are competitive in modern Virginia .
The Virginia General Assembly is  the oldest विधानमंडल in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध  .
the राज्य सरकारी रै महरूम repeatedly क्रमित  most effective by the Pew Center on the States .
it is अद्वितीय in कैसा it ट्रीट शहरों और काउंटी बराबर , manages लोकल  roads , and prohibits its governors from serving consecutive terms .
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agencies in Northern Virginia , including the  मुख्यालय of the विभाग of रक्षा और सीआईए ; और सैन्य सुविधाएं in हैम्पटन सड़कें , the साईट of the प्रदेश  's main seaport .
Virginia  's पब्लिक स्कूलों और अनेक कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों  have contributed to growing media and technology sectors .
as a परिणाम , कंप्यूटर चिप्स  have become the state 's leading export .
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live Movie  मेकर , codenamed sundance  ) is a freeware video editing software by Microsoft .
It is a part  of खिड़कियाँ अनिवार्य तन्त्र सुइट और offers the क्षमता  to create and edit videos as well as to publish them on SkyDrive , Facebook , YouTube , and Flickr .
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut single  by तुपाक shakur , और दसवाँ track इससे उसके डेब्यू एल्बम  , 2Pacalypse Now .
The song , which features R & B singer Dave Hollister  , is परिचय a बारह year-old लड़की नामित ब्रेंडा जो जीवनदान in a ghetto  , has a baby , and is incapable of supporting it .
The song explores the issue of teen  गर्भावस्था और इसके प्रभाव on the यंग माताओं और उनके  families .
Like  अनेक of shakur 's गीतों , `` ब्रेंडा 's मिला a baby '' draws  from the plight of the impoverished .
Using Brenda to represent young  माताओं in सामान्य , shakur criticises the कम स्तर of support  from the baby 's father , the government , and society in general .
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a  twelve-year-old लड़की जो मिला गर्भवती इससे उसके cousin और , क्युकी वो किया नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to जान परिचय the baby , फेंका it in a  trash can .
The official logo of Pokémon for its international release ; `` Pokémon  '' is छोटी लिये the असली जापानी शीर्षक of `` जेब  Monsters '' .
is a मीडिया मताधिकार प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by जापानी  video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996 .
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing video  खेल विकसित by खेल freak , पोकीमॉन रै चूंकि become the second-most कामयाब और lucrative वीडियो game-based  media franchise in the world , behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise .
Pokémon properties  have चूंकि महरूम merchandised into दुश्मनी , manga , व्यापार  cards , toys , books , and other media .
The  मताधिकार मनाये in 2006 , और , संचयी बिक्री of the वीडियो खेल  ( including home console versions , such as the `` Pikachu '' Nintendo 64 ) have reached more than 200 million copies .
In November 2005 , 4Kids Entertainment , which had managed the non-game related licensing of  पोकीमॉन , घोषित कि it था सहमत नहीं to नवीनीकृत  the Pokémon representation agreement .
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company International ) , a subsidiary of Japan 's  पोकीमॉन co. , अभी oversees सब पोकीमॉन लाइसेंसिंग  outside of Asia .
The name Pokémon is the romanized  संकुचन of the जापानी ब्रांड  .
The term Pokémon , in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself , also collectively refers to the 649  fictional प्रजाति कि have बना दिखावे in पोकीमॉन मीडिया as of the रिलीज of the पांचवां पीढी शीर्षक पोकीमॉन ब्लैक 2 और श्वेत 2 ; साथ the आगामी रिलीज of पोकीमॉन x और  Y , 6 new Pokémon have been featured in promotions for the games .
``  पोकीमॉन '' is एकसमान in दोनो the एकवचन और बहुवचन , as is  each individual species name ; it is grammatically correct to say `` one Pokémon '' and `` many Pokémon '' , as well as `` one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu '' .
Cover of the  पहला संस्करण of the प्रकाशन  Dada by Tristan Tzara ; Zurich , 1917
Dada ( ) or Dadaism was an art  गति of the यूरोपीय avant-garde  in the early 20th century .
Many claim Dada began in Zurich ,  स्विट्ज़रलैंड in 1916 , spreading to बर्लिन shortly thereafter लकिन the  height of New York Dada was the year before in 1915 .
To  उद्धरण डोना budd 's the भाषा of आर्ट ज्ञान , दादा  was born out of negative reaction to the horrors of World War I .
This international movement was  begun by a समूह of कलाकार और कवियों संबद्ध  with the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich .
Dada  अस्वीकृत कारण और लॉजिक , prizing बकवास , irrationality  and intuition .
The origin of the name Dada is  unclear ; कुछ मानना कि it is a nonsensical  word .
Others maintain that it originates from the Romanian artists Tristan Tzara and Marcel  janco 's बारंबार उपयोग of the शब्द da , da , अर्थ यस , यस in the रोमानियाई भाषा  .
another सिद्धान्त says कि the नाम `` दादा '' आए दौरान a बैठक of  the group when a paper knife stuck into a French-German dictionary happened to point to 'dada ' , a French word for 'hobbyhorse ' .
The movement primarily involved visual arts , literature , poetry , art manifestoes , art theory , theatre , and graphic design ,  और concentrated इसके anti-war राजनीती through a अस्वीकृति of the प्रचलित मानकों in आर्ट through anti-art सांस्कृतिक  works .
In addition to being anti-war , Dada was also  anti- बुर्जुआ और था राजनैतिक affinities साथ the कट्टरपंथी बाएँ  .
Dada activities included public gatherings , demonstrations , and publication of art/literary journals ;  passionate कवरेज of आर्ट , राजनीती , और संस्कृति यहूद विषय  often discussed in a variety of media .
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball , Emmy Hennings , Hans Arp , Raoul Hausmann , Hannah Höch , Johannes Baader , Tristan Tzara , Francis Picabia ,  रिचर्ड huelsenbeck , georg grosz , जॉन heartfield , मार्सल duchamp , beatrice लकडी , कर्ट schwitters , और hans रिक्टर , among अन्य  .
The movement influenced later styles like the avant-garde and downtown music  आंदोलनों , और समूह सहित surrealism , देवानंद réalisme , पॉप  art and Fluxus .
दादा is the groundwork to अमूर्त आर्ट और ध्वनि काव्य , a starting पाइंट लिये प्रदर्शन आर्ट , a prelude to postmodernism ,  an influence on pop art , a celebration of antiart to be later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism .
पहला trophic  level .
The plants in this image , and the  शैवाल और phytoplankton in the झील  , are primary producers .
They take nutrients from the soil  or the जल , और manufacture उनके अपना खाना by photosynthesis  , using energy from the sun .
The trophic level of an organism is  the स्थिति it occupies in a खाना कड़ी  .
The word trophic derives from  the यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring to खाना  or feeding .
A food chain represents a succession of organisms that  खा another सजीव और हैं , in  turn , eaten themselves .
The number of steps an organism is from the start of the chain is  a माप of इसके trophic स्तर  .
Food chains start at trophic  स्तर 1 साथ प्राथमिक निर्माता ऐसे as पौधे , मूव to herbivores at स्तर 2 , परभक्षी  at level 3 and typically finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5 .
The path along the chain can form  either a one-way प्रवाह ,  or a food `` web . ''
Ecological communities with higher  biodiversity रूप अधिक जटिल  trophic paths .
Four of the most  महत्वपूर्ण domesticated  silk moths .
Top to bottom : Bombyx mori ,  hyalophora cecropia , antheraea pernyi  , Samia cynthia .
From  मेयर्स konversations-lexikon  ( 1885-1892 )
a silk-producing  raspy cricket .
Silk is a  प्राकृतिक प्रोटीन fibre , कुछ फ़ॉर्म  of which can be woven into textiles .
The protein fibre of silk is composed mainly of  fibroin और उत्पादित by निश्चित कीट लार्वे to  form cocoons .
The  best-known प्रकार of रेशा is प्राप्त इससे the cocoons of the लार्वे of the शहतूत  silkworm Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ) .
The  shimmering रूप of रेशा is due to the triangular प्रिज़्म -like ढांचा  of the silk fibre , which allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at different angles , thus producing different colors .
Silks  हैं उत्पादित by अनेक अन्य कीट , लकिन generally तभी the रेशा of शलभ  caterpillars has been used for textile manufacturing .
There has been some research into  अन्य silks , जिससे differ at the  molecular level .
Many silks are mainly produced by the larvae of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis , but some adult insects  ऐसे as webspinners उपज रेशा , और कुछ  insects such as raspy crickets produce silk throughout their lives .
Silk production also occurs in  कलापक्ष ( मधुमक्खियों , wasps , और चींटियों ) , silverfish , mayflies , thrips , leafhoppers , भृंग , lacewings  , fleas , flies and midges .
Other types of  सन्धिपाद उपज रेशा , सबसे notably विभिन्न  arachnids such as spiders ( see spider silk ) .
Late Show with David Letterman is an American  late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted by दाउद लेटरमैन on  CBS .
The show debuted on August 30 , 1993 , and is produced by Letterman  's उत्पादन कम्पनी , विश्वव्यापी पैंट  Incorporated .
The show 's music director and band-leader of the  हाउस बैंड , the सीबीएस ऑर्केस्ट्रा , is पॉल shaffer  .
The head writer  is मैट रॉबर्ट्स और the  announcer is Alan Kalter .
Of the major U.S. late-night programs , Late Show  बाँधने दूसरी in संचयी औसत दर्शक over समय और तीसरा in क्रमांक of एपीसोड over समय  .
The show leads other late night shows in ad  आय साथ $ 271 लाख in 2009  .
In  सबसे u.S. बाज़ार the दिखाएँ airs at 11:35 p.m. eastern/pacific समय  , but is recorded Monday through Wednesday at 4:30 p.m. , and Thursdays at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m .
The  दूसरी गुरुवार एपीसोड प्रायः  airs on Friday of that week .
In 2002 , Late Show with David Letterman was  क्रमित no . 7 on tv मार्गदर्शिका 's 50 महानतम tv shows of  All Time .
CBS has a  अनुबंध साथ विश्वव्यापी पैंट to continue the दिखाएँ through 2014 ; by  then , Letterman will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host .
The Real Housewives  of नारंगी काउंटी is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता वृत्तचित्र  television program on Bravo , set in Orange County , California .
It was the first The Real  housewives कार्यक्रम in  the series .
The series is a voyeuristic look into the wealthy  जीवनदान of ये housewives , as वे दूकान  , get plastic surgery , gossip , fight and live lavishly .
The financial crisis , the beginning of which coincided almost exactly with the first season 's broadcast , has since trimmed the  housewives ' lifestyles साथ जॉब नुकसान , evictions , बंधक मूलभूत , foreclosures , और वैवाहिक stress—all अंकित in प्रगतिशील सीज़न of  the show .
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or other  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अर्थात् to stalk or harass an व्यक्तिगत , a समूह of individuals , or an  organization .
It may include the making of false accusations or  कथन of फैक्ट ( as in मानहानि ) , निगरानी , बनाना खतरे , पहचान चोरी  , damage to data or equipment , the solicitation of minors for sex , or gathering information that may be used to harass .
The definition of ``  उत्पीड़न '' जरूर मिलें the मानदंड कि a उचित व्यक्ति , in कब्ज़ा of the वही सूचना , होता  regard it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress .
cyberstalking is अलग इससे स्थानिक or ऑफ़लाइन stalking in कि it  occurs through the use of electronic communications technology such as the internet .
However ,  it sometimes लीड to it , or is accompanied  by it .
Both  हैं दण्ड offenses  .
Cyberstalking  साझा महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताएँ  with offline stalking .
Many  stalkers – ऑनलाइन or बंद –  are motivated by a desire to control their victims .
A  cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन अजनबी or a व्यक्ति  whom the target knows .
A  cyberstalker may be बेनाम और may solicit भागीदारी  of other people online who do not even know the target .
cyberstalking is a दण्ड ठोकर कि आता into खेल अंतर्गत  state anti-stalking laws , slander laws , and harassment laws .
A cyberstalking conviction can result  in a restraining अनुक्रम , परिवीक्षा , or भी  criminal penalties against the assailant , including jail .
A business letter is  प्रायः प्रयुक्त जब लिखने इससे एक कम्पनी to another , or लिये पत्राचार between  such organizations and their customers , clients and other external parties .
The overall style of letter  होगा निर्भर on the संबंध between  the parties concerned .
There are  अनेक कारण to लिखें a कारोबार  letter .
It could be to  निवेदन सीधा सूचना or कार्रवाई इससे another पार्टी , to अनुक्रम आपूर्तियाँ इससे a प्रदायक  , to identify a mistake that was committed , to reply directly to a request , to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill .
Even today , the business letter is still very useful because it produces  a स्थाई रिकार्ड , is गोपनीय , औपचारिक और delivers persuasive  , well-considered messages .
Tilapia ( ) is the common  नाम लिये nearly a सौ प्रजाति of cichlid  fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe .
Tilapia  हैं मुख्यतः freshwater मछली , inhabiting उथले स्ट्रीम ,  ponds , rivers and lakes , and less commonly found living in brackish water .
Historically  , वे have महरूम of प्रमुख महत्व in कारीगर फ़िशिंग in अफ़्रीकी  and the Levant , and are of increasing importance in aquaculture .
Tilapia can become problematic invasive species in new warm-water habitats , whether  deliberately or accidentally introduced , लकिन generally नहीं in शीतोष्ण climates  due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below about .
Turner & Hooch  is a 1989 कॉमेडी नाटक अपराधों फिल्मी अभिनीत tom हैंक्स और beasley  the Dog as the eponymous characters , Turner and Hooch respectively .
The film also stars Mare Winningham , Craig T. Nelson ,  और रेगिनाल्ड veljohnson  .
It was directed by Roger Spottiswoode ; the film  थी originally slated to be निर्देशित by हेनरी winkler , लकिन he थी terminated due to  `` creative differences '' .
It was co-written by Michael  blodgett इससे परे the घाटी  of the Dolls fame .
Although K-9 ( with James Belushi ) was released  prior to इस फिल्मी ( exactly तीन महीने पहले ) , टर्नर & hooch became अधिक लोकप्रिय और seemingly  overshadowed its greater success , even though K-9 had a very similar plot .
A pilot for a Turner & Hooch TV series was made and ran  as a भाग of the जादुई संसार  of Disney .
