Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian  -born जर्मनी राजनेता और the नेता of the  Nazi Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ) .
He was chancellor of Germany  इससे 1933 to 1945 और तानाशाह of नाजी  Germany ( as Führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945 .
Hitler was at the centre of Nazi  जर्मनी , संसार युद्ध ii in  Europe , and the Holocaust .
Hitler was a decorated  दिग्गज of संसार युद्ध i  .
he joined the जर्मनी मजदूर ' पार्टी  ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919 , and became leader of the NSDAP in 1921 .
in 1923 , he attempted a तख्तापलट  d'état in Munich , known as the Beer Hall Putsch .
The  विफल तख्तापलट resulted in हिटलर 's कारावास , दौरान जिससे समय  he wrote his memoir , Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ) .
After his release in 1924 , Hitler gained  लोकप्रिय support by attacking the सन्धि of versailles और promoting pan-germanism  , antisemitism , and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda .
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933 , he transformed the Weimar Republic  into the तीसरा reich , a single-party तानाशाही आधारित on the अधिनायकवादी और निरंकुश विचारधारा  of Nazism .
Hitler 's aim was to establish a New Order of absolute Nazi  जर्मनी आधिपत्य in महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय  .
To this end , his foreign and domestic policies had  the उद्देश्य of seizing lebensraum ( `` जीना स्पेस  '' ) for the Germanic people .
He directed the rearmament of Germany and the  आक्रमण of कैंडल by the wehrmacht in सितंबर 1939 , resulting in the outbreak of  World War II in Europe .
Under Hitler 's rule , in 1941 German forces and their  यूरोपीय allies occupied सबसे of यूरोपीय और उत्तर  Africa .
In 1943 ,  जर्मनी था महरूम मजबूर onto the रक्षात्मक और  suffered a series of escalating defeats .
In the final days of the war , during the Battle of  बर्लिन in 1945 , हिटलर शादीशुदा उसके long-time संगी  , Eva Braun .
On 30  अप्रैल 1945 , कम than दो दिनों बाद , the दो वचनबद्ध  suicide to avoid capture by the Red Army , and their corpses were burned .
Hitler 's aggressive foreign  नीति is माना the प्रमुख कारण of the outbreak  of World War II in Europe .
His antisemitic policies and racially motivated ideology resulted in the deaths of at least 5.5  लाख यहूदियों , और लाखो of अन्य लोगों deemed  racially inferior .
अंगूठा
A domain  नाम is an पहचान स्ट्रिंग कि defines a फ्रेम of प्रशासनिक  autonomy , authority , or control on the Internet .
Domain names  हैं formed by the नियम और प्रक्रियाओं  of the Domain Name System ( DNS ) .
Technically ,  कोई नाम पंजीकृत in the डीएनएस is a  domain name .
Domain names are used in various  नेटवर्किंग contexts और application-specific  naming and addressing purposes .
In general , a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource , such as a  निजी कंप्यूटर प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the अंतरजाल , a सर्वर कंप्यूटर होस्टिंग a वेब साईट , or the वेब साईट itself  or any other service communicated via the Internet .
Domain names are organized in subordinate levels (  subdomains ) of the डीएनएस रूट डोमेन , जिससे  is nameless .
The first-level set of domain names are the top-level domains ( TLDs ) , including the generic top-level  डोमेन ( gtlds ) , ऐसे as the prominent डोमेन com , सूचना , जाल और org , और the देश कोड  top-level domains ( ccTLDs ) .
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are typically open for  रिज़र्वेशन by end-users जो काश to कनेक्ट लोकल क्षेत्रफल संजाल to the अंतरजाल , बनाएँ अन्य सरेआम accessible अंतरजाल  resources or run web sites .
The registration of  ये डोमेन names is प्रायः administered by डोमेन नाम registrars  who sell their services to the public .
A fully qualified domain name ( FQDN  ) is a डोमेन नाम कि is completely निर्दिष्ट  in the hierarchy of the DNS , having no omitted parts .
Domain names are usually written in lowercase , although labels  in the डोमेन नाम प्रणाली हैं case-insensitive  .
नाइट्रेट is a polyatomic आयन साथ the आणविक सूत्र no3− और a आणविक द्रव्यमान  of 62.0049 g/mol . Nitrates also describe the organic functional group RONO2 .
These nitrate  esters हैं a specialized क्लास of  explosives .
A  गेहूं कटाई  in Idaho
This photo  इससे a 1921 ज्ञानकोष shows a ट्रैक्टर ploughing  a crop field .
Agriculture is a major  उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य और the देश is a  net exporter of food .
As of the last census of  कृषि in 2007 , वहीँ यहूद 2.2 लाख खेतो , covering  an area of , an average of per farm .
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states , it is particularly  concentrated in the विशाल expanse of चपटा , arable जमीन ज्ञात as the ग्रेट मैदान , जिससे encompasses the  central region of the nation .
The Mpemba  प्रभाव , नामित बाद tanzanian छात्र erasto mpemba , is the  assertion that warmer water can freeze faster than colder water .
Although there is anecdotal support for  the प्रभाव , वहीँ is no अनुबंध on exactly कया the प्रभाव is और अंतर्गत  what circumstances it occurs .
There have been reports of similar  phenomena चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स , हालांकि साथ अपर्याप्त  detail for the claims to be replicated .
The phenomenon seems contrary to  ऊष्मागतिकी , लकिन a क्रमांक of संभावित स्पष्टीकरण लिये the प्रभाव  have been proposed .
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise definition of `` freezing ''  और कंट्रोल a विशाल क्रमांक of starting पैरामीटर्स in अनुक्रम to confirm  or explain the effect .
The Siamese ( , ) is one of  the पहला distinctly पहचाना breeds  of Oriental cat .
The breed originated in Thailand (  formerly ज्ञात as सियाम ) , जहाँ वे हैं एक of अनेक देशी breeds और हैं  called Wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ , a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ) .
In the 20th century the Siamese cat became one of  the सबसे लोकप्रिय breeds in यूरोपीय और उत्तर अमेरिका  .
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a  सुपरमार्केट कड़ी आधारित in bellevue , वॉशिंगटन , साथ  64 stores in the Puget Sound region of Washington state and in the Portland , Oregon metropolitan area .
In economics , the money supply or  धन भण्डार , is the कुल राशि of मौद्रिक एसेट उपलब्धियाँ  in an economy at a specific time .
There are several ways to define `` money , '' but standard measures usually include currency in  परिसंचरण और माँग जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily पहुँचा  assets on the books of financial institutions ) .
Money supply  आंकड़ा हैं अंकित और प्रकाशित , प्रायः  by the government or the central bank of the country .
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored changes in money  सप्लाई क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव on the दाम स्तर , महंगाई , the एक्सचेंज रेट  and the business cycle .
कि संबंध between धन और कीमतें is historically  associated with the quantity theory of money .
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth and long-term price  महंगाई , at तनिक लिये रैपिड increases in the राशि of धन in  the economy .
That is , a country such as Zimbabwe which saw rapid increases  in इसके धन सप्लाई भी देखी रैपिड increases in कीमतें ( hyperinflation  ) .
This is one reason for the reliance on monetary  नीति as a अर्थात् of controlling महंगाई  .
The  प्रकृति of इस causal कड़ी is the विषय  of contention .
Some heterodox economists argue that the money supply is endogenous ( determined by the workings of the  अर्थव्यवस्था , नहीं by the सेंट्रल बैंको ) और कि the स्त्रोत of महंगाई जरूर be मिला in the distributional ढांचा  of the economy .
In addition , those economists seeing the  सेंट्रल बैंको 's कंट्रोल over the धन सप्लाई as feeble कह कि वहीँ हैं दो कमजोर कड़ी  between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate .
First , in the  aftermath of a मंदी , जब अनेक संसाधन हैं underutilized , an बढ़ाएँ in the धन  supply can cause a sustained increase in real production instead of inflation .
Second , if the velocity of money , i.e. , the ratio between nominal GDP and money  सप्लाई , परिवर्तन , an बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई could have either no प्रभाव  , an exaggerated effect , or an unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP .
लोगो लिये imax  .
वारेन थिएटर imax सिनेमा , wichita  , Kansas , USA , 601 seats .
A  तुलना between 35 mm  and 15/70 mm negative areas .
IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a  गति चित्र फिल्मी स्वरूप और a नियत of सिनेमा प्रक्षेप मानकों  created by the Canadian company IMAX Corporation .
IMAX has the capacity to record and  प्रदर्शक बिंब of दूर वृहद आकार और रेज़ोल्यूशन  than conventional film systems .
Since 2002 , some feature  films have महरूम परिवर्तित ( or upgraded  ) into IMAX format for display in IMAX theatres and some have also been partially shot in IMAX .
IMAX is  the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त प्रणाली लिये  special-venue film presentations .
, there are 697  imax थिएटर in 52 देशों  .
Today  's खास is a कनाडाई children 's टेलीविज़न  show produced by Clive VanderBurgh at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987 .
It also ran on  निकलोडियन और the आस्था और मान channel/odyssey ( अभी the hallmark चैनल ) as खूब as अनेक  PBS stations throughout the United States .
It was set in  a विभाग स्टोर , आधारित on the फ्लैगशिप स्थान of the  now defunct Simpson 's in Toronto .
Many sequences for  it यहूद शॉट at the महारानी गली वेस्ट और  Yonge Street store after hours .
Constitutionalism , in its most general meaning , is `` a complex of ideas ,  attitudes , और पैटर्न of बर्ताव elaborating the principle कि the प्राधिकार of सरकारी गर्भाशयी इससे  and is limited by a body of fundamental law '' .
A political organization is  संवैधानिक to the extent कि it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति कंट्रोल लिये the सुरक्षा of the  interests and liberties of the citizenry , including those that may be in the minority `` .
As described by  राजनैतिक वैज्ञानिक और संवैधानिक विद्वान  David Fellman :
An ice-cream headache , also known as  दिमाग फ्रीज , cold-stimulus सिरदर्द , or इसके दिए वैज्ञानिक नाम sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( अर्थ `` तंत्रिका पीड़ा of the sphenopalatine गंडिका `` ) , is a रूप of ब्रैड cranial पीड़ा or सिरदर्द commonly  associated with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops .
It is caused by having something cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ) , and is believed to result from a nerve  जवाब causing रैपिड constriction और सूजन of रक्त बरतन or a `` referring `` of पीड़ा इससे the छत of the मुँह to the  head .
The rate of intake for  ठंडा भोजन रै महरूम पढ़ाई as a contributing  factor .
There are people who can  नहीं अनुभव `` दिमाग फ्रीज '' or समान  symptoms .
The term ice-cream  सिरदर्द रै महरूम in उपयोग चूंकि at तनिक 31 जनवरी 1937 , contained in a जर्नल प्रविष्टि by  Rebecca Timbres published in the 1939 book We did n't ask Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia .
The first  प्रकाशित उपयोग of the पद दिमाग फ्रीज  , as it pertains to cold-induced headaches , was on 27 May 1991 .
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note ``  s '' बल्कि than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स कविता लिखा by रॉबर्ट burns in 1788 और नियत  to the tune of a traditional folk song ( Roud # 6294 ) .
It is well known in many countries , especially in the English-speaking world ;  इसके परंपरागत उपयोग होने to celebrate the प्रारंभ of the नई साल at the स्ट्रोक of मध्यरात्रि  .
By extension ,  it is भी सुंग at अंत्येष्टि , graduations और  as a farewell or ending to other occasions .
The international Boy Scout youth  गति , in अनेक देशों , उपयोग it as a बंद to jamborees  and other functions .
The song 's Scots title may be translated into English literally as `` old long since '' , or more  idiomatically , `` long long पहले '' , `` दिनों गए  by '' or `` old times '' .
Consequently `` For auld lang syne ''  , as it appears in the पहला लकीर of the कोरस , might be loosely अनूदित  as `` for ( the sake of ) old times '' .
the phrase `` auld लैंग syne '' is भी प्रयुक्त in समान कविताएं by रॉबर्ट ayton ( 1570–1638 ) , allan ramsay  ( 1686–1757 ) , and James Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns .
Matthew Fitt uses the phrase `` In the days of auld lang syne '' as the  समतुल्य of `` एकबार upon a समय  ...
``  in उसके retelling of परी किस्से  in the Scots language .
Ben Schulz ,  खिलाड़ी of leeroy  Jenkins at BlizzCon 2007
Leeroy Jenkins , sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and often elongated with numerous additional letters , is an Internet meme named for a player  अक्षर निर्मित by बेन schulz in blizzard entertainment 's mmorpg  , World of Warcraft .
The  अक्षर became लोकप्रिय due to a वीडियो  of the game that circulated around the Internet .
The phenomenon has since  स्प्रेड परे the सीमाएँ of the गेमिंग जातियाँ into अन्य  online and mainstream media .
Oscar Grant was fatally shot  by बार्ट पुलिस अधिकारी योहानेस mehserle in ओकलैंड , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त राज्य  , in the early morning hours of New Year 's Day 2009 .
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit train returning from  सैन फ्रांसिस्को , बार्ट पुलिस अधिकारियों detained ऑस्कर ग्रान्ट और अनेक अन्य यात्री on the मंच  at the Fruitvale BART Station .
Officer Johannes Mehserle and another officer were  restraining ग्रान्ट , जो थी सजदा और allegedly  resisting arrest .
Officer Mehserle stood and , according  to गवाह , कहा : `` मिलेंगी वापस  , I 'm gon na tase him . ''
Then Mehserle drew his gun and shot Grant once in  the वापस ; mehserle appeared दंग , put उसके हैंड्स to उसके सिर और exclaimed , ``  Oh , my God ! ''
During his court testimony , Mehserle  कहा कि ग्रान्ट तब exclaimed , ``  You shot me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was pronounced dead the next morning at  highland हॉस्पिटल in ओकलैंड  .
The events were captured  on अनेक डिजिटल  video and cell phone cameras .
The footage was  disseminated to मीडिया आउटलेट और to विभिन्न वेबसाइटों  , where it was watched millions of times .
The following days saw  दोनो शांतिपूर्ण और हिंसक विरोध  .
The shooting has been  variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter  and a summary execution .
On January 13  , alameda काउंटी prosecutors चार्ज mehserle साथ  murder for the shooting .
He resigned  उसके स्थिति और pleaded  not guilty .
The trial  began on जून 10 , 2010  .
Michael Rains , Mehserle 's criminal defense attorney ,  argued कि mehserle mistakenly शॉट ग्रान्ट साथ उसके पिस्टल , intending  to use his Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband .
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree murder and  पूछा a लॉस एंजिल्स न्यायधीश to instruct the जूरी to सीमा इसके deliberations to either second-degree  murder or acquittal .
ओकलैंड सिविल अधिकारों attorney जॉन burris दायर a $ 25 लाख wrongful  death claim against BART on behalf of Grant 's family .
on जुलाई 8 , 2010 , the जूरी लौटे इसके verdict : mehserle थी मिला अपराधी of involuntary  manslaughter and not guilty of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter .
Initial protests against the ruling were peacefully organized ; looting ,  आगजनी , विनाश of प्रॉपर्टी , और छोटी  riots broke out after dark .
Nearly 80 people were  आखिरकार गिरफ्तार  .
On Friday , July 9 , 2010 , the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil rights  मामला विरूद्ध mehserle ; the संघीय सरकारी can prosecute उसे independently लिये the वही अधिनियम  under the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy .
the विभाग of इंसाफ होगा be working साथ the u.S. attorney  's office in San Francisco and the FBI .
On November 5 , 2010 ,  mehserle थी sentenced to दो सालो , ऋण समय परोसा  .
He served his time in the Los Angeles County  कारावास , occupying a निजी कोशिका दूर इससे अन्य बंदियों  .
He was released on June 13  , 2011 और is अभी on पैरोल  .
Major  प्रतिनिधि of the हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण  .
the हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण थी a सांस्कृतिक  movement that spanned the 1920s .
At the time , it was known as the `` New Negro  गति '' , नामित बाद the 1925 anthology  by Alain Locke .
Though it was centered in the Harlem neighborhood of New York City , many French-speaking black writers from African and Caribbean colonies who lived in Paris were also  बहकावे by the  Harlem Renaissance .
The Harlem Renaissance is  unofficially पहचाना to have spanned इससे परिचय 1919 जबतक  the early or mid-1930s .
Many of its  विचार जिया on much  longer .
The zenith of this ``  flowering of नीग्रो साहित्य '' , as जेम्स weldon जॉनसन पसन्दीदा to कॉल the हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण , थी लगाई between 1924 ( the साल कि अवसर : a जर्नल of नीग्रो जीवन hosted a पार्टी लिये  black writers where many white publishers were in attendance ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ) .
African States  between 500 bce और  1500 CE
Obelisk at temple  of लक्सर , मिश्र  .
c.  1200 bce  .
अफ़्रीकी नाईट of baguirmi in  full padded armour suit .
The history of Africa begins with the  प्रागितिहास of अफ़्रीकी और the emergence of होमो sapiens in ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी , continuing  into the present as a patchwork of diverse and politically developing nation states .
Some  जल्दी प्रमाण of कृषि in अफ़्रीकी तिथियाँ  from 16,000 BCE , and metallurgy from about 4000 BCE .
The recorded history of early civilization arose in Egypt ,  और बाद in नुबिया , the मग़रिब और the सींग of अफ़्रीकी  .
During the Middle Ages , Islam  स्प्रेड through  the regions .
Crossing the Maghreb  और the सहेल , a प्रमुख बीच of मुस्लिम  culture was Timbuktu .
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture , Mali Empire , Ashanti Empire , Kingdom of  mapungubwe , किंगडम of ज्या , किंगडम of saloum , किंगडम of baol , किंगडम of ज़िम्बाब्वे , किंगडम  of Kongo , Ancient Carthage , Numidia , Mauretania , the Aksumite Empire , the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate .
From the late 15th century , Europeans and Arabs took slaves from West , Central and Southeast Africa  विदेशी in the अफ़्रीकी स्लेव  trade .
European colonization of Africa developed rapidly in the  हाथापाई लिये अफ़्रीकी of the लेट  19th and early 20th centuries .
Following struggles for  स्वतंत्रता in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप , as खूब as a weakened यूरोपीय बाद the दूसरी संसार  War ; decolonization took place .
Africa 's  इतिहास रै महरूम चुनौतीपूर्ण लिये शोधकर्ताओं in the फ़ील्ड of अफ़्रीकी  studies because of the scarcity of written sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa .
Scholarly techniques such as the  रिकॉर्डिंग of मौखिक इतिहास , ऐतिहासिक भाषाविज्ञान  , archaeology and genetics have been crucial .
curry फोली थी the पहला खिलाड़ी  in Major League Baseball history to hit for the cycle .
In baseball , hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one batter hitting a single , a double ,  a ट्रिपल , और a घर चलाएं in the वही खेल .
Collecting the hits in that  अनुक्रम is ज्ञात as a `` प्राकृतिक साईकिल  '' .
Cycles are uncommon in  प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ) , और have occurred  294 times since the first by Curry Foley in 1882 .
The cycle is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB history )  ; it रै महरूम पुकारा `` एक of the rarest '' और `` सबसे मुश्किल feats  '' in baseball .
Based on 2009 offensive levels , the  संभाव्यता of an औसत एमएलबी खिलाड़ी hitting लिये a साईकिल विरूद्ध an औसत टोली in  a game is approximately 0.00590 % ; this corresponds to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams .
In other  बेसबॉल लीग ,  the cycle is achieved less frequently .
Through September 4 , 2008 , 62 players in Nippon  पेशेवर बेसबॉल ( npb ) , the top-level बेसबॉल संगठन  in Japan , have hit for the cycle , the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara .
Two  खिलाड़ी have hit लिये the साईकिल on the वही दिन एकबार in  NPB history ; this has occurred twice in MLB history .
एक npb खिलाड़ी रै भी  hit for the cycle in an NPB All-Star game .
No player has ever hit for the cycle in  the एमएलबी all-star खेल or the postseason  .
The  प्रमुख स्लेव  routes in medieval Africa .
This article  discusses प्रणालियों , इतिहास , और प्रभाव  of slavery within Africa .
See Arab slave trade ,  अटलांटिक स्लेव व्यापार , maafa , और गुलामी in समकालीन  Africa for other discussions .
`` Slave  हस्तांतरण in अफ़्रीकी ''  .
Europeans usually  किया नहीं डालें the  interior regions .
Slavery in Africa has existed  throughout the महाद्वीप लिये अनेक सदियां , और  continues in the current day .
Systems of servitude and  गुलामी यहूद आम in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप ,  as they were in much of the ancient world .
In most African  समाजों जहाँ गुलामी थी प्रचलित , the enslaved लोगों  were largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves .
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began , many of the local slave systems changed  और began supplying captives लिये स्लेव बाज़ार  outside of Africa .
Slavery in historical Africa was practiced in many  अलग फ़ॉर्म और कुछ of ये do नहीं clearly अनुरूप the परिभाषाएं  of slavery elsewhere in the world .
Debt slavery , enslavement of war  captives , सैन्य गुलामी , और दण्ड गुलामी यहूद सब practiced  in various parts of Africa .
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior of Sub-Saharan Africa to other regions , slavery was a  छोटी भाग of the आर्थिक जीवन of अनेक समाजों in अफ़्रीकी जबतक the परिचय of transcontinental स्लेव ट्रेड ( अरब  and Atlantic ) .
स्लेव practices यहूद again रूपांतरित साथ यूरोपीय colonization of  Africa and the formal abolition of slavery in the early 1900s .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included  साथ the microsoft खिड़कियाँ nt परिवार of ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों कि provides सीमित सूचना परिचय कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शन और कार्यशील अनुप्रयोग , प्रक्रियाओं और cpu उपयोग , कमिट चार्ज और मेमोरी सूचना , संजाल कार्यकलाप और आंकडे , logged-in उपयोक्ता , और प्रणाली सेवाएं ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided  by Microsoft for Windows , 3rd party software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly , e.g , `` Process Explorer '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also  be प्रयुक्त to नियत प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं , प्रोसेसर अपनापन , forcibly terminate  processes , and shut down , restart , hibernate or log off from Windows .
खिड़कियाँ कार्य मैनेजर थी  introduced with Windows NT 4.0 .
Previous versions of Windows NT  शामिल the कार्य सूची अनुप्रयोग , जिससे था  far fewer features .
The task list  थी सक्षम of लिस्टिंग फिलहाल कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या  them , or creating a new process .
In Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is also  उपस्थित कि allows अभिगम to standby , hibernate , फेरे बंद , restart  , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows (  microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x , खिड़कियाँ 95 , खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the  programs currently running .
This file was executed by running the taskman.exe  संचिका इससे the c : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका  .
The Troop is an American-Canadian  live-action , सिंगल कैमरा कॉमेडी -adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय a तिकड़ी  of teenagers who fight and capture monsters and other supernatural phenomena that invade the fictional town of Lakewood .

Sparsely populated in relation to its area , the Democratic Republic of the Congo ( DRC ) is home to  a विशाल संभावित of प्राकृतिक संसाधन और खनिज माल , इसके untapped जमा of कच्चा खनिज हैं अनुमानित to be लायक in  excess of US $ 24 trillion , yet the economy of the DRC has declined drastically since the mid-1980s .
At the time of its independence in 1960 , DRC was the second most industrialized country in Africa after South Africa ; it boasted a  thriving खनन सेक्टर और इसके कृषि सेक्टर थी अपेक्षाकृत उत्पादक  .
If the viewer stares at this image for 20–60 seconds and  stares at a श्वेत ऑब्जेक्ट , a ऋणात्मक afterimage होगा appear ( in इस मामला  , it will be cyan on magenta ) .
This can also  be हासिल by the दर्शक closing his/her आँखें  and tilting their head up .
An afterimage or ghost image or image burn-in is an optical illusion that refers to an image continuing to  appear in एक 's दृष्टि बाद the एक्सपोज़र to the असली चित्र रै ceased  .
One of the  सबसे आम afterimages is the उज्जवल glow कि seems to फ्लैश  before one 's eyes after looking into a light source for a few seconds .
Closing the eye can help  achieve a बेहतर भाव of the रंग in इसके  own aspect .
Afterimages come in two forms ,  ऋणात्मक ( उलट ) और धनात्मक ( retaining असली रंग  ) .
The process behind positive  afterimages is अनजान , हालांकि विचार  to be related to neural adaptation .
On the other  हाथ , ऋणात्मक afterimages हैं  a retinal phenomenon and are well understood .
Lost is an  अमरीकी सीरियल नाटक टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on सितंबर  22 , 2004 on the American Broadcasting Company ( ABC ) .
The series was created by J. J.  abrams और डैमन lindelof , आधारित upon an  original pilot script titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber .
Six seasons of the show aired ,  in जोड to numerous काटें shows to पूर्वावलोकन  previous episodes .
ABC announced that Lost would end after six seasons , having  उत्पादित a कुल of 121 एपीसोड  .
The series follows the past ,  उपस्थित , और भविष्य अनुभव ( s ) of the survivors of a प्लेन क्रैश on a यात्री जेट , oceanic उड़ान 815  , flying from Sydney to Los Angeles after it crashes on a tropical island in the South Pacific .
The series also  शामिल कहानियां of the जीवनदान of लोगों already जीना on the द्वीप — वे शामिल the `` अन्य `` , जो  initially antagonize the survivors , as well as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana .
Each  एपीसोड typically सुविधाएँ कार्रवाई on the द्वीप as खूब as a द्वितीयक  storyline from another point in a character 's life .
Season 6 features a detailing of the lives of the  survivors in a अलग वास्तविकता , as if the उड़ान था never  crashed .
In the following list , the term `` featured  अक्षर ( s ) '' refers to the अक्षर or वर्ण जो  are featured in the secondary storyline of each episode .
``  No .
in  श्रेणी '' refers to the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in the  overall series , whereas `` No .
in season  '' refers to the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in प्रत्येक particular  season .
``  u.S. दर्शक ( लाख ) '' refers  to the number of Americans in millions who watched the episode live .
A total of 121 episodes of Lost were  उत्पादित , the पिछला of जिससे aired on may 23 , 2010  .

Flat feet ( also called pes planus  or गिरे arches ) is a औपचारिक सन्दर्भ to a चिकित्सा कंडीशन in जिससे the मेहराब of the पैर collapses , साथ the  entire sole of the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground .
In some individuals ( an estimated 20–30 % of the general population ) the arch  बस never develops in एक पैर ( unilaterally ) or दोनो फीट  ( bilaterally ) .
Three studies ( see citations below in military section ) of military recruits have shown no evidence of later increased injury , or foot problems , due to flat  फीट , in a जनसांख्यिकी of लोगों जो पहुँचें सैन्य सेवा आयु बगैर prior पैर समस्याएं  .
However , these studies can not be used  to न्यायधीश संभावित भविष्य क्षति इससे इस कंडीशन  when diagnosed at younger ages .
They also can not  be लागू to व्यक्तियों जिनकी चपटा फीट हैं संबद्ध साथ पैर लक्षण , or निश्चित लक्षण in अन्य भाग  of the body ( such as the leg or back ) possibly referable to the foot .
पीढी x , commonly abbreviated to gen x , is  the generation born after the Western post-World War II baby boom .
Demographers , historians and commentators use  शुरूआत जनम तिथियाँ इससे the जल्दी 1960s to the जल्दी 1980s  .
The  पद थी popularized by डगलस coupland  's 1991 novel Generation X : Tales for an Accelerated Culture .
Before  कि , it था महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये विभिन्न subcultures or countercultures  after the 1950s .
Pressure ulcers , also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores , are localized injuries to the skin and/or  underlying ऊतक प्रायः over a बोनी prominence , as a परिणाम of दबाव , or दबाव  in combination with shear and/or friction .
Most commonly this will be the sacrum , coccyx , heels or the  कूल्हों , लकिन अन्य साइट ऐसे as the elbows , अदब ,  ankles or the back of the cranium can be affected .
The cause of pressure  छाले is दबाव लागू to नरम ऊतक so कि  blood flow to the soft tissue is completely or partially obstructed .
Shear is also a cause  ; shear खींचता on रक्त बरतन कि  feed the skin .
Pressure ulcers most commonly  develop in व्यक्तियों जो हैं नहीं चलती परिचय or हैं confined  to wheelchairs .
it is widely believed कि अन्य कारकों can influence the सहिष्णुता  of skin for pressure and shear thereby increasing the risk of pressure ulcer development .
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition , microclimate ( skin wetness  caused by sweating or incontinence ) , रोगों कि reduce रक्त प्रवाह to the स्किन , ऐसे as arteriosclerosis or रोगों कि reduce the अहसास in the  skin , such as paralysis or neuropathy .
The healing of pressure  छाले may be slowed by the आयु of the व्यक्ति , चिकित्सा शर्तें ( ऐसे as arteriosclerosis  , diabetes or infection ) , smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs .
Although often prevented and treatable  if मिला जल्दी , दबाव छाले can be बहुत मुश्किल to prevent in critically बीमार मरीजों , frail बड़ो , व्हीलचेयर  users ( especially where spinal injury is involved ) and terminally ill patients .
Primary prevention is  to redistribute दबाव by turning the रोगी  regularly .
The  लाभ of turning to avoid further sores  is well documented since at least the 19th century .
In addition to turning and  re-positioning the रोगी in bed or व्हीलचेयर , खाने a संतुलित आहार साथ पर्याप्त  protein and keeping the skin free from exposure to urine and stool is very important .
The prevalence of pressure ulcers in hospital  जमावट is ऊँची , लकिन सुधार हैं होने  made .
According to the 2010 IPUP ( International Pressure Ulcer Prevalence  सर्वेक्षण ) conducted in कनाडा , वहीँ थी a significant घटी in the overall facility-acquired  prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010 .
Ulcers were most commonly  पहचाना at the sacral/coccyx अल्सर स्थान ; however , एड़ी छाले  were the most common facility-acquired location in the survey .
Overboard is a 1987 American romantic comedy film  अभिनीत goldie hawn और कर्ट रसेल  .
It  थी निर्देशित by गैरी मार्शल  , produced by Roddy McDowell , and loosely inspired by the 1974 Italian film Swept Away .
In turn , Overboard was  adapted into the 2006 दक्षिण कोरियाई  television series , Couple or Trouble .
ग्रीन खाड़ी is a नगर in और the काउंटी सीट of भूरा काउंटी in the u.S.  state of Wisconsin , located at the head of Green Bay , a sub-basin of Lake Michigan , at the mouth of the Fox River .
It has an elevation of above sea  स्तर और is स्तिथ उत्तर  of Milwaukee .
The population was  104,057 at  the 2010 census .
It is the third-largest city in the state of  विस्कॉन्सिन , बाद मिल्वौकी और मैडिसन  .
It is also the third-largest city on the  वेस्ट shore of झील मिशिगन , बाद शिकागो और  Milwaukee .
Green Bay is home to  the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग , बनाना it by दूर the smallest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the यूएसए  to host a major professional sports franchise .
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , जिससे कवर भूरा , kewaunee , और oconto काउंटी और था a संयुक्त  population of 282,599 at the 2000 census .
Green Bay is an  औद्योगिक नगर साथ अनेक meatpacking और पेपर पौधे , और a बंदरगाहों on ग्रीन खाड़ी , an भुजा of झील मिशिगन कि  locals call the Bay of Green Bay , to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city .
it is घर to the नेशनल रेलरोड संग्रहालय ; the  Neville Public Museum , with exhibitions of art , history , and science ; and the University of Wisconsin–Green Bay .
Luteinizing hormone ( LH , also known as lutropin and sometimes  lutrophin ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by gonadotroph कोशिकाएं in the  anterior pituitary gland .
In females , an  अधि वृद्धि of lh ( `` lh surge '' ) triggers ovulation और विकास  of the corpus luteum .
In males , where LH had also  महरूम पुकारा अंतरालीय cell-stimulating हार्मोन ( icsh ) ,  it stimulates Leydig cell production of testosterone .
It  अधिनियमों synergistically  with FSH .
Selena  quintanilla-pérez ( अप्रैल 16 , 1971 – कूच 31 , 1995 ) , ज्ञात बस  as Selena , was an American singer-songwriter .
She was named the `` top Latin artist of the '90s '' and `` Best selling  लैटिन कलाकार of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड लिये उसके चौदह top-ten singles in the शीर्ष लैटिन गीतों चार्ट , सहित सात number-one  hits .
Selena  था the सबसे कामयाब singles of 1994 और  1995 , `` Amor Prohibido `` and `` No Me Queda Más `` .
She was called `` The Queen of Tejano music `` and the  मैक्सिकन समतुल्य of मैडोना .
सेलिना released उसके पहला  album , Selena y Los Dinos , at the age of twelve .
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano  म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार और उतरा a रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध  with EMI a few years later .
Her  कीर्ति grew throughout the जल्दी 1990s , विशेषकर in spanish-speaking  countries , and she had begun recording in English as well .
Selena was murdered at the age of 23 on  कूच 31 , 1995 by yolanda saldívar , the पूर्व  president of her fan club .
On April 12 , 1995 , two  सप्ताह बाद उसके मौत , जार्ज W. बुश , राज्यपाल of  Texas at the time , declared her birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas .
Warner Bros. produced  सेलिना , a फिल्मी आधारित on उसके जीवन अभिनीत जेनिफर लोपेज़ , in  1997 .
Selena 's life was also the basis of the  musical सेलिना forever अभिनीत वेरोनिका vazquez as सेलिना  .
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated with a  life-sized कांस्य प्रतिमा ( mirador de la flor in कॉर्पस christi , टेक्सास  ) and a Selena museum opened there .
She has sold over 60 million albums  विश्वव्यापी , बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling  artists of all time .
She is also the only female artist to have five  एल्बम in u.s . बिलबोर्ड 200 at the वही  time .
German  stahlhelm इससे  World War II
Insignia of the  bolivian फौज colorados रेजीमेंट , प्रर्दशित a stahlhelm  and two crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm  ( बहुवचन ,  Stahlhelme ) is German for `` steel helmet '' .
The Imperial German Army began to replace the traditional  boiled-leather pickelhaube ( spiked कॉम्बैट  helmet ) with the Stahlhelm during World War I in 1916 .
the पद stahlhelm refers दोनो to a जेनेरिक स्टील हेल्मेट , और अधिक  specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German design .
The Stahlhelm , with its distinctive ``  कोयले scuttle `` आकार , थी an तुरन्त recognizable प्रतीक लिये सैन्य imagery और became a आम तत्व of  military propaganda on both sides , just like the Pickelhaube before it .
Its name was also used by the Stahlhelm , a paramilitary nationalist  संगठन स्थापित at the समाप्त of 1918  .
glow-in-the-dark  may refer to:
जीवदीप्ति , the उत्पादन  and emission of light by a living organism
Chemiluminescence , is the  उत्सर्जन of लाइट ( संदीप्ति  ) without emission of heat
Phosphorescence ,  a विशिष्ट प्रकार of photoluminescence  related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence  , उत्पादन of संदीप्ति in a  material by the bombardment of ionizing radiation
glow in the अंधेरा दौरे , a 2008 कॉन्सर्ट  tour by Kanye West
Frankfurt Airport  serves as a हब नगर लिये लुफ़्थान्सा और receives  flights from Star Alliance carriers .
Airline hubs  हैं एयरपोर्ट क्रमित as विशाल , मीडियम , छोटी , और non-hubs as एक of the faa विमानक्षेत्र श्रेणी जिससे  are re-evaluated every year based on number of commercial passengers .
The more common but informal use for the phrase airline hub is an airport that an  एयरलाइन उपयोग as a ट्रांसफ़र पाइंट to मिलेंगी यात्री to उनके  intended destination .
It is part of a hub and spoke model , where travelers  चलती between एयरपोर्ट नहीं परोसा by सीधा फ़्लाइट बदलें planes  en route to their destinations .
This  is as opposed to the पाइंट to  Point model .
Many hubs  of the एयरलाइंस हैं भी situated at  airports in the cities of the respective head offices .
Some airlines may use only a single  हब , जबकि अन्य एयरलाइंस उपयोग अनेक  hubs .
Hubs  हैं प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो यात्री फ़्लाइट as  well as cargo flights .
Many  एयरलाइंस भी उपयोग फ़ोकस  cities , which function much the same as hubs .
Airlines may also use secondary  hubs , a non-technical पद  for large focus cities .
A hub in the middle of a route is more effective than at either end as  connecting ट्रैफ़िक अधिक easily भरता the प्लेन - यात्री prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) रूट over a two-stop  ( three-leg ) route .
Hollow  lacedaemon  .
Site of the  menelaion , the shrine to हेलेन और menelaus constructed anciently in the कांस्य  Age city that stood on the hill of Therapne on the left bank of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of Dorian Sparta .
Across the valley the  successive ridges of माउंट taygetus हैं in  evidence .
स्पार्टा ( doric यूनानी : ; अटारी यूनानी : ) , or lacedaemon , थी a prominent city-state  in ancient Greece , situated on the banks of the Eurotas River in Laconia , in south-eastern Peloponnese .
it उभरा as a राजनैतिक एंटिटी around the 10th सदी bc ,  when the invading Dorians subjugated the local , non-Dorian population .
Around 650 BC , it rose to  become the प्रबल सैन्य land-power in प्राचीन  Greece .
Given its military pre-eminence , Sparta was recognized as  the overall नेता of the संयुक्त यूनानी शक्तियां दौरान the greco-persian  Wars .
Between 431 and 404 BC , Sparta was the principal enemy of  एथेंस दौरान the peloponnesian युद्ध , इससे जिससे it उभरा विजयी , हालांकि  at great cost .
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of Leuctra in 371 BC  ended स्पार्टा 's prominent भूमिका  in Greece .
However , it maintained  इसके राजनैतिक स्वतंत्रता जबतक the रोमन conquest  of Greece in 146 BC .
It then underwent a  long काल of मनाही , विशेषकर  in the Middle Ages , when many Spartans moved to live in Mystras .
Modern Sparta is the capital  of the यूनानी क्षेत्रीय ईकाई of laconia और a बीच  for the processing of goods such as citrus and olives .
Sparta was unique in ancient  यूनानियों लिये इसके सोशल प्रणाली और संविधान , जिससे completely केन्द्रित  on military training and excellence .
इसके निवासियों यहूद वर्गीकृत as spartiates ( spartan  citizens , who enjoyed full rights ) , Mothakes ( non-Spartan free men raised as Spartans ) , Perioikoi ( freedmen ) , and Helots ( state-owned serfs , enslaved non-Spartan local population ) .
Spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge training  और शिक्षा regimen , और spartan phalanges यहूद widely  considered to be among the best in battle .
Spartan women enjoyed considerably more rights and equality  to मेन than elsewhere in the शास्त्रीय  world .
Sparta was the subject of fascination  in इसके अपना दिन , as खूब as in the वेस्ट following the पुनरुद्धार  of classical learning .
This love or admiration of Sparta  is ज्ञात as laconism or laconophilia  .
Fantasy football is an interactive competition  in जिससे उपयोक्ता compete विरूद्ध प्रत्येक अन्य as सामान्य प्रबंधक  of virtual teams .
The players that an  व्यक्तिगत is समर्थ to मैनेज हैं पेशेवर अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी in the नेशनल  Football League .
The different actions people are  समर्थ to मेक हैं drafting , व्यापार , adding  or dropping players , and changing rosters .
Due to the growth of the Internet , Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity ,  विशेषकर क्युकी काल्पनिक फ़ुटबॉल प्रदाताओं ऐसे as ईएसपीएन , याहू , सीबीएस , और the एनएफएल itself हैं समर्थ to रखना track of आंकडे entirely ऑनलाइन , eliminating  the need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players .
सबसे लीग have a सिंगल सप्ताह चैंपियनशिप  in Week 16 of the NFL season .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN 2010  projections ( रेड , नारंगी , ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( ब्लैक ) .
Actual  अंकित जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in  blue .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may rise to 16  अरब by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान , it may  decline to 6 billion .
The  संसार जनसांख्यिकी  is the total number of living humans on Earth .
As of today  , it is अनुमानित to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau ( USCB ) .
The USCB estimates that the world  जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on कूच  12 , 2012 .
According to a separate  अनुमान by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी  Fund , it reached this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world  जनसांख्यिकी रै अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल  and the Black Death in 1350 , when it stood at around 370 million .
The highest rates of growth – global population  increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s , और लिये a longer  period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The  विकास रेट peaked at 2.2 % in  1963 , and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million  , और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख , जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख  per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the  निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ) , साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी  expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
विभिन्न longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास , stagnation ,  or even overall decline in the global population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth  , citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण , वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ , और उर्जा  resources .
skeletal मांसपेशियां  homo sapiens
This is a  तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the  human anatomy .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the  ठेठ इंसान , और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a  pair of identical bilateral muscles , found on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the exact number is  मुश्किल to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently  , e.g . regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
Examples range  इससे 640 to 850  .
The muscles  of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन , मांसपेशियां  of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action refers to the action of each  मांसपेशी इससे the मानक anatomical स्थिति  .
In  अन्य स्थितियाँ , अन्य क्रियाएँ  may be performed .
A gold bar is a  मात्रा of परिष्कृत धात्विक सुनहरा of कोई आकार कि is बना by a बार  producer meeting standard conditions of manufacture , labeling , and record keeping .
Larger gold bars that are produced by  pouring the molten मेटल into molds हैं  called ingots .
Smaller bars may be manufactured by minting or  stamping इससे appropriately लिपटे सुनहरा चादरें  .
The standard gold  बार आयोजित as सुनहरा reserves by सेंट्रल बैंको और traded among bullion डीलर is the  400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery gold bar .
The kilobar , which  is to कह 1000 गामा in द्रव्यमान , is the बार कि is अधिक manageable और is प्रयुक्त  extensively for trading and investment .
The premium on these bars when traded is very low over the spot value of  the सुनहरा बनाना it आदर्श लिये छोटी हस्तांतरण between बैंको और  traders .
Most kilobars are flat , although some  निवेशकों , विशेषकर in यूरोपीय , prefer the  brick shape .
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19 , 1949 ) is a former American football quarterback in the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग , playing लिये the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो इससे 1971 to 1982 , तब लिये the ह्यूस्टन  Oilers and Minnesota Vikings .
He is the father of current Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning , current New York Giants  starting क्वार्टरबैक एली मैनिंग , और पूर्व ओले मिस receiver कूपर मैनिंग  .
Advocacy is a  राजनैतिक प्रक्रम by an व्यक्तिगत or समूह जिससे aims to influence public-policy  and resource allocation decisions within political , economic , and social systems and institutions .
Advocacy can include many activities that a person or organization undertakes including media campaigns , public speaking  , commissioning और प्रकाशन शोध or पोल or the दाखिल  of an amicus brief .
Lobbying ( often by lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy where a  सीधा दृष्टिकोण is बना to विधायक on an समस्या जिससे plays a significant भूमिका in  modern politics .
Research is beginning to explore how advocacy groups in the U.S. and  कनाडा हैं using सोशल मीडिया to सुकर नागरिक सगाई और सामूहिक  action .
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a vertical tricolor of green , white , and red with the  नेशनल कोट of बाहें चार्ज in the बीच of the श्वेत  stripe .
While the meaning of the colors has changed over  समय , ये तीन रंगों यहूद अपनाया by मैक्सिको following स्वतंत्रता इससे स्पेन दौरान the देश 's  War of Independence , and subsequent First Mexican Empire .
The current flag was adopted in 1968 , but the overall design has  महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि 1821 , जब the पहला नेशनल  Flag was created .
the वर्तमान विधि of नेशनल प्रतीकों , विधि on the नेशनल बाहें , ध्वज ,  and Anthem , that governs the use of the national flag has been in place since 1984 .
Red , white , and green are the  रंगों of the नेशनल मुक्ति  army in Mexico .
The central emblem is the  एज़टेक pictogram लिये tenochtitlan ( अभी  Mexico City ) , the center of their empire .
It recalls the legend that inspired the Aztecs to settle on  कया थी originally a lake-island  .
The form of the coat of arms was most  recently संशोधित in 1968  .
A ribbon in  the नेशनल रंगों is at the  bottom of the coat of arms .
Throughout  इतिहास , the ध्वज रै बदला चार टाइम्स , as the डिज़ाइन of the  coat of arms and the length-width ratios of the flag have been modified .
However , the coat of arms has had the same features throughout : an eagle , holding a serpent in its talon , is  perched on शीर्ष of a prickly नाशपाती कैक्टस ; the कैक्टस is situated on a चट्टान कि उदय ऊपर a झील  .
The coat of arms  is निकला इससे an एज़टेक लेजेंड कि उनके देवताओं बताई उन्हें to निर्माण a नगर जहाँ वे स्पॉट an  eagle on a nopal eating a serpent , which is now Mexico City .
The current national flag , the Fourth National Flag , is also used  as the मैक्सिकन नवल ensign by जहाजों पंजीकृत in मैक्सिको .
A destination marketing organization or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town  , नगर , प्रदेश , or देश in अनुक्रम to बढ़ाएँ  the number of visitors .
It promotes the development and marketing of a destination , focusing  on सम्मेलन बिक्री , पर्यटन विपणन , और सेवाएं  .
Such organizations promote economic development of a destination by increasing visits  इससे पर्यटकों और कारोबार travelers , जिससे generates overnight आवास लिये a गंतव्य , विज़िट to रेस्तरां , और खरीदारी  revenues .
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most important tourism marketing  संगठन in उनके संबंधित पर्यटक गंतव्यों , as वे हैं सीधे जिम्मेदार लिये विपणन  the destination brand through travel and tourism `` product awareness '' to visitors .
DMOs produce billions of dollars in  सीधा और अप्रत्यक्ष आय और कर लिये उनके गंतव्यों ' economies  with their marketing and sales expertise .
Destination marketing organizations are often  पुकारा सफर , सम्मेलन , विज़िटर , or पर्यटन bureaux  , welcome centers , information centers and more .
Regardless of  the नाम , ये संगठन प्रस्ताव अनेक सेवाएं  to the traveling public .
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis )  is एक of the largest प्रजाति of हिरण in the संसार , और एक of the largest जमीन स्तनधारियों  in North America and eastern Asia .
It was long believed to be a  subspecies of the यूरोपीय रेड हिरण ( cervus elaphus ) , लकिन प्रमाण इससे a  2004 study of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that the two are distinct species .
This animal should not be confused with  the larger मूस ( alces alces )  , to which the name `` elk '' applies in Eurasia .
Apart from the  मूस , the तभी अन्य सदस्य of the हिरण  family to rival the elk in size is the south Asian sambar ( Rusa unicolor ) .
Elk  दायरा in वन और forest-edge आवास , feeding on grasses , पौधे  , leaves , and bark .
Although native to North America and eastern  एशिया , वे have adapted खूब to देशों जहाँ वे have महरूम introduced , सहित अर्जेंटीना  , Australia , and New Zealand .
Their great adaptability may threaten  endemic प्रजाति और ecosystems into जिससे वे  have been introduced .
Male elk  have विशाल antlers जिससे हैं शेड प्रत्येक  year .
Males also  engage in ritualized समागम व्यवहार दौरान the rut , सहित posturing , antler कुश्ती ( sparring ) , और bugling , a लाउड  series of vocalizations which establishes dominance over other males and attracts females .
Elk  हैं susceptible to a क्रमांक of  infectious diseases , some of which can be transmitted to livestock .
Efforts to eliminate infectious diseases  इससे नीलगाय populations , largely through टीकाकरण ,  have had mixed success .
Some cultures revere  the नीलगाय as a आध्यात्मिक फ़ोर्स  .
In parts of Asia ,  antlers और उनके मखमल हैं प्रयुक्त  in traditional medicines .
Elk are hunted as a game species ;  the मांस is leaner और उच्चतर in प्रोटीन than  beef or chicken .
The George Washington University ( GW , GWU , or George Washington ) is a comprehensive private ,  coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in वॉशिंगटन , d.C.  .
It awards certificates , Bachelor  डिग्री , मास्टर्स डिग्री , और phds  across several dozen disciplines .
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on February 9 ,  1821 as the columbian कॉलेज in the  District of Columbia .
The lion ( Panthera leo ) is one  of the चार बिग बिल्लियों in the genus पेंथेरा और a सदस्य  of the family Felidae .
With some males exceeding in weight ,  it is the second-largest जीना बिल्ली बाद  the tiger .
Wild lions currently exist in sub-Saharan Africa and in Asia ( where an endangered remnant population resides in  गिर वन नेशनल पार्क in इण्डिया ) जबकि अन्य प्रकार of शेर have disappeared इससे उत्तर अफ़्रीकी और दक्षिणपश्चिम एशिया in ऐतिहासिक  times .
Until the late Pleistocene , about 10,000 years ago ,  the शेर थी the सबसे फैली विशाल जमीन स्तनधारी बाद  humans .
They were found in most of Africa , across Eurasia from western Europe to India , and in the  americas इससे the yukon  to Peru .
The lion  is a vulnerable प्रजाति , having देखी a प्रमुख जनसांख्यिकी मनाही  of 30–50 % over the past two decades in its African range .
Lion populations are untenable  बाहर designated reserves और नेशनल  parks .
Although the cause of the decline is not fully  समझा , आवास घाटा और विरोध साथ इंसानो हैं फिलहाल the महानतम कल्याणकारी  of concern .
Within Africa , the West  अफ़्रीकी शेर जनसांख्यिकी is विशेषकर  endangered .
Lions live for 10–14 years  in the जंगली , जबकि in captivity वे can  live longer than 20 years .
In the wild , males seldom live longer than 10  सालो , as चोटों sustained इससे continual लड़  with rival males greatly reduce their longevity .
They typically  inhabit सवाना और घासभूमि , हालांकि  they may take to bush and forest .
Lions are unusually  सोशल compared to अन्य  cats .
A pride of lions consists of related females and  औलाद और a छोटी क्रमांक of वयस्क males  .
Groups of female lions  typically हंट साथ , preying  mostly on large ungulates .
Lions are apex and keystone  परभक्षी , हालांकि वे scavenge as अवसर  allows .
While  शेर do नहीं typically हंट इंसानो , कुछ have  been known to do so .
Sleeping mainly during the day , lions are primarily nocturnal ,  हालांकि bordering on crepuscular  in nature .
Highly distinctive , the male lion is  easily recognised by इसके माने , और इसके फेस is एक  of the most widely recognised animal symbols in human culture .
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period , with carvings and paintings from the Lascaux and Chauvet Caves , through virtually  सब प्राचीन और मध्यकालीन संस्कृतियों जहाँ वे एकबार occurred  .
It has been extensively depicted in  sculptures , in paintings , on नेशनल  flags , and in contemporary films and literature .
शेर have महरूम रखा in menageries चूंकि the समय of the रोमन साम्राज्य , और  have been a key species sought for exhibition in zoos over the world since the late 18th century .
zoos हैं cooperating विश्वव्यापी  in breeding programs for the endangered Asiatic subspecies .
In the history  of वीडियो खेल , the सातवाँ पीढी of consoles is the पिछला पीढी  , and includes consoles released since late by Nintendo , Microsoft , and Sony .
For home consoles , the seventh generation began on  22 नवम्बर 2005 साथ the रिलीज of एक्सबॉक्स 360 और जारी साथ the रिलीज of प्लेस्टेशन 3 on 11 नवम्बर  2006 , and Wii on 19 November 2006 .
Each new  कंसोल introduced a नई प्रकार of भेदन  in technology .
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions , the PlayStation 3 offered , in addition to FHD gaming , HD  फिल्म प्लेबैक via a built-in 3d blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी , और the वी केन्द्रित on integrating परिरक्षक साथ  movement sensors as well as joysticks .
joining निन्टेंडो in  the motion market , Sony released the PlayStation Move in September 2010 .
The  प्लेस्टेशन मूव सुविधाएँ गति संवेदन  gaming , similar to that of the Wii .
microsoft भी joined सोनी और निन्टेंडो  , with its Kinect .
Unlike the other two systems ( PlayStation  3 और वी ) , kinect करता नहीं उपयोग कोई परिरक्षक  of any sort and makes the users the `` controller . ''
Having sold 8 million units in  इसके पहला 60 दिनों on the मार्केट , kinect रै claimed the गिनीज संसार रिकार्ड of होने  the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device '' .
While the Xbox 360 offers wired  परिरक्षक as a स्टैंडअलोन उत्पाद , सब प्लेस्टेशन 3 परिरक्षक can  be used in wired and wireless configurations .
Starting with handheld consoles , the seventh generation  began on 21 नवम्बर 2004 साथ the उत्तर अमरीकी परिचय of the निन्टेंडो ds as a `` तीसरा pillar  '' , alongside Nintendo 's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles .
The Nintendo DS ( NDS ) features a touch screen and  built-in माइक्रोफोन , और supports बेतार आईईईई  802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards .
Additionally , the revised version of the NDS , the DSi , features  दो निर्मित in कैमरे , the क्षमता to डाउनलोड खेल इससे the dsi  store , and a web browser .
The PlayStation Portable , or PSP , released later the same year  on 12 दिसम्बर 2004 , followed a  different pattern .
It became  the पहला हैंडहेल्ड वीडियो खेल कंसोल to उपयोग an ऑप्टिकल डिस्क स्वरूप  , Universal Media Disc ( UMD ) , as its primary storage media .
Sony also gave the PSP robust  multi-media काबिलियत , कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन 3 और अन्य psps  , and Internet connectivity .
the निन्टेंडो ds likewise रै कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल through the निन्टेंडो wi-fi कनेक्शन और निन्टेंडो  DS Browser , as well as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles .
Despite high sales numbers for both consoles , PlayStation Portable sales have consistently lagged behind those of the Nintendo DS ;  nevertheless , the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल रै the भेद of होने the best-selling non-nintendo हैंडहेल्ड गेमिंग  system .
Sgt . Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club Band ( often shortened to Sgt . Pepper ) is the  आठवीं स्टुडियो एल्बम by अंग्रेज़ी  rock band the Beatles .
Released in June  1967 , the एल्बम शामिल गीतों ऐसे as `` साथ a छोटी सहायता  from My Friends `` , `` Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds `` , and `` A Day in the Life `` .
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ) , Sgt . Pepper further  रजि इससे the conventional पॉप चट्टान मुहावरा of the समय और incorporated balladry , साइकेडेलिक , म्यूज़िक हॉल  , and symphonic influences .
During  the sgt . pepper सत्र , the समूह improved upon the विशेषता of उनके म्यूज़िक 's उत्पादन  while exploring experimental recording techniques .
Producer George Martin 's  अभिनव दृष्टिकोण शामिल the उपयोग  of an orchestra .
Widely acclaimed and imitated , the album cover , designed by English pop artists Peter Blake and Jann Haworth , was  प्रेरित by a स्केच by पॉल mccartney कि चित्रित the बैंड पोज़ in सामने of a कोलाज of कुछ of उनके  favourite celebrities .
Sgt .  pepper थी a विश्वव्यापी नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी , बिता 27 सप्ताह at the शीर्ष of the  UK Album Chart and 15 weeks at number one on the US Billboard 200 .
A seminal work in the emerging psychedelic  चट्टान स्टाइल , the एल्बम थी critically acclaimed upon रिलीज और जीती चार  Grammy Awards in 1968 .
With an estimated 32  लाख नक़ल बेची , it is एक of the संसार 's  best selling albums .
Sgt . Pepper is considered by many to be the most influential and  प्रसिद्ध चट्टान एल्बम कभी , और रै महरूम नामित the महानतम एल्बम of सब समय by दोनो सब  Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone .
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral cortex that  is स्तिथ beneath the पार्श्ववर्ती फिशर on दोनो दिमागी  hemispheres of the mammalian brain .
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of visual memories , processing sensory input ,  comprehending भाषा , storing नई यादें , जज्बात , और deriving  meaning .
The human  फेफड़े हैं the अंगों of श्वसन  in humans .
Humans have two  फेफड़े , a सही फेफड़ों  and a left lung .
The right lung  consists of तीन निर्मोक जबकि the बाएँ फेफड़ों is थोड़ा छोटी consisting of तभी दो निर्मोक ( the बाएँ फेफड़ों रै a `` हृदय  notch '' allowing space for the heart within the chest ) .
Together , the lungs contain approximately of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli , having a  कुल सतह क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly the वही क्षेत्रफल as  one side of a tennis court .
Furthermore , if all  of the capillaries कि घेर the  alveoli were unwound and laid end to end , they would extend for about .
Each lung  weighs , इसलिए बनाना  the entire organ about .
इंसान फेफड़े
The trachea  divides into दो bronchi ( एक लिये प्रत्येक पक्ष ) at  the level of T4 .
This junction is also  ज्ञात as the carina  .
The conducting zone contains the trachea , the  bronchi , the bronchioles , और the टर्मिनल bronchioles the respiratory मण्डल  contains the respiratory bronchioles , the alveolar ducts , and the alveoli .
The conducting zone and the respiratory  stuffers ( लकिन नहीं the alveoli ) हैं बना  up of airways .
The  conducting मण्डल रै no गैस एक्सचेंज साथ the रक्त , और is  reinforced with cartilage in order to hold open the airways .
The conducting zone warms the  एयर to और humidifies the  air .
It  भी cleanses the एयर by निकालना अणु via cilia स्तिथ  on the walls of all the passageways .
The lungs  हैं घिरी by the  rib cage .
The respiratory zone is  the साईट of गैस एक्सचेंज  with blood .
the सहानुभूतिपूर्ण बेचैन प्रणाली via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on  the beta receptors causes bronchodilation .
The  parasympathetic बेचैन प्रणाली via acetylcholine , जिससे  acts on the M-3 muscarinic receptors , maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle .
This action is related ,  हालांकि माना पृथक इससे bronchoconstriction  .
Many other non-autonomic nervous  और biochemical stimuli , सहित कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और ऑक्सीजन , हैं भी  involved in the regulation process .
The pleural cavity is the  संभावित स्पेस between the parietal pleura , अस्तर the भीतरी वॉल of the thoracic पिंजरा , और  the visceral pleura lining the lungs .
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to alveolar tissue with  respiratory bronchioles , alveolar नलिकाएं और टर्मिनल bronchioles  .
However , it  प्रायः शामिल कोई रूप of फेफड़ों ऊतक , भी सहित bronchioles , bronchi  , blood vessels and lung interstitium .
The  मार्गरिटा is a मैक्सिकन कॉकटेल consisting of टकीला मिश्रित साथ cointreau or समान  orange -flavoured liqueur and lime or lemon juice , often served with salt on the glass rim .
It is  the सबसे आम tequila-based  cocktail in the United States .
The drink is served shaken with ice ( on the rocks ) ,  blended साथ बर्फ ( frozen मार्गरिटा ) , or बगैर बर्फ ( सीधा up ) .

Burgundy is a dark red color  संबद्ध साथ the बरगंडी वाइन of the वही नाम , जिससे in फेरे is नामित बाद  the Burgundy region of France .
The color burgundy is similar to other  शेड्स of अंधेरा रेड ऐसे as मैरून  .
When referring to the color ,  `` बरगंडी '' is प्रायः नहीं capitalized  .
The first recorded use of ``  बरगंडी '' as a रंग नाम in अंग्रेज़ी थी  in 1881 .

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a  casualty श्रेणी आबंटित अंतर्गत the औकात of लापता  to armed services personnel who are reported missing during active service .
They may have been killed ,  wounded , become a कैदी of युद्ध  , or deserted .
If deceased , neither their remains  nor संगीन can be positively पहचाना  .
Becoming MIA has been an occupational  रिस्क लिये सेवा कर्मियों लिये as long as वहीँ रै महरूम warfare  .

it is the काउंटी  seat of Shelby County .
