Intense  red-eye प्रभाव in ब्लू आँखें  with dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in  छायाचित्र is the आम रूप of रेड विद्यार्थियों in रंग  photographs of eyes .
It occurs when using a photographic flash very close to the camera lens  ( as साथ सबसे कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे ) , in परिवेश कम लाइट  .
The  प्रभाव appears in the आँखें of इंसानो और पशु  that have tapetum lucidum .
Theatrical followspot operators , positioned  nearly coincidentally साथ a बहुत उज्जवल लाइट और somewhat दूर  from the actors , occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage .
The effect is not visible to the rest  of the दर्शक क्युकी it is reliant on the बहुत छोटी कोण  between the followspot operator and the light .
The University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , सांता बारबरा ( commonly referred to as uc सांता बारबरा or ucsb  ) is a public research university and one of the ten general campuses of the University of California system .
The main campus  is स्तिथ on a साईट in goleta , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त राज्य , इससे सांता  Barbara and northwest of Los Angeles .
ट्रेसिंग इसके जड़ें वापस to 1891 as an स्वतंत्र शिक्षक  ' college , UCSB joined the University of California system in 1944 and is the third-oldest general-education campus in the system .
UCSB is one of America 's Public Ivy universities , which recognizes  शीर्ष पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों in the  United States .
The university is  a व्यापक डॉक्टरेट विश्वविद्यालयों और is व्यवस्थित into  five colleges and schools offering 87 undergraduate degrees and 55 graduate degrees .
The campus is the 6th-largest  in the uc प्रणाली by नामांकन साथ 18,977 undergraduate  and 2,950 graduate students .
In 2012 , UCSB was ranked  41st among `` नेशनल विश्वविद्यालयों  '' and 10th among public universities by U.S. News & World Report .
The university was also ranked  35th विश्वव्यापी by the टाइम्स उच्चतर शिक्षा संसार विश्वविद्यालयों rankings और 34th विश्वव्यापी ( 6th विश्वव्यापी लिये अभियान्त्रिकी ) by  the Academic Ranking of World Universities in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` very high activity '' research university and spent  $ 191.2 लाख on शोध expenditures in the 2007 फिस्कल साल , 97th-largest  in the United States .
UCSB houses twelve  नेशनल शोध centers , सहित  the renowned Kavli Institute for Theoretical Physics .
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates , one Fields Medalist , 29 members of the  नेशनल अकादमी of sciences , 27 सदस्यों of the नेशनल अकादमी of अभियान्त्रिकी , और 31 सदस्यों of  the American Academy of Arts and Sciences .
UCSB was the No . 3 host on the ARPAnet and was elected to the  संघ of अमरीकी विश्वविद्यालयों in 1995 .
The UC Santa  बारबरा gauchos compete in  the NCAA Division I Big West Conference .
The Gauchos have won NCAA national  championships in मेन 's सॉकर और मेन  's water polo .
Saint Joseph with the  शिशु यीशु by guido reni
Saint Joseph 's Day , March 19 , the  feast of st. जोसेफ is in पश्चिमी christianity the प्रिंसिपल feast दिन of संत  Joseph , Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary .
He is also the  step-father of यीशु of नासरत  /Jesus Christ .
It has the rank of a solemnity in the Roman Catholic Church ;  catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 celebrate  it as a first class feast .
Previous to 1962 it was celebrated as a  feast of the रैंक of दोगुना of  the first class .
It is a feast or commemoration in the  प्रांतों of the anglican नियाज़  , and a feast or festival in the Lutheran Church .
Saint Joseph 's Day is the Patronal Feast day for  कैंडल as खूब as लिये कनाडा , व्यक्तियों नामित जोसेफ , josephine , etc. , लिये धार्मिक संस्थान , स्कूलों और parishes bearing उसके नाम  , and for carpenters .
It is also  पिता 's दिन in कुछ कैथोलिक देशों ,  mainly Spain , Portugal , and Italy .
कूच 19 थी समर्पित to संत जोसेफ in अनेक  Western calendars by the tenth century , and this custom was established in Rome by 1479 .
Pope St. Pius V extended  इसके उपयोग to the संपूर्ण रोमन रीति by उसके अपोस्टोलिक  Constitution Quo Primum ( July 14 , 1570 ) .
Since  1969 , एपिस्कोपल सम्मेलनों may ,  if they wish , transfer it to a date outside Lent .
Between 1870 and 1955 , a feast was celebrated in honor of St. Joseph  as जीवनसाथी of the धन्य वर्जिन मरियम और संरक्षक of the सार्वभौमिक गिरिजाघर , the latter  title having been given to him by Pope Pius IX .
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday after Easter with an octave , after Divino Afflatu of  st. पायस x ( देखिए सुधार of the रोमन breviary by पोप पायस x ) , it थी स्थानांतरित to  the preceding Wednesday .
The feast  थी भी retitled the  Solemnity of Saint Joseph .
This celebration and its  accompanying अष्टक थी abolished दौरान the आधुनिकीकरण और  simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955 .
It is still maintained by Catholics  जो follow the missal of 1962 or  earlier missals .
As the traditional holiday of the Apostles Ss . Philip and James , May 1 , had faded from the memory of most Catholics by the  mid-twentieth सदी , कि of जोसेफ the कार्यकर्ता थी निर्मित in अनुक्रम to coincide साथ the  celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries .
The feast of Ss .  फिलिप और जेम्स , जिससे था महरूम मनाये on कि तिथि  since the sixth century , was moved from its traditional place .
In the new calendar published in 1969 , the feast , which at one time occupied the highest possible rank in the  गिरिजाघर पंचांग , थी घटाया to an वैकल्पिक मेमोरियल , the न्यूनतम  rank for a saint 's day .
the पूर्वी परंपरागत गिरिजाघर  celebrates Saint Joseph on the Sunday after Christmas .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an American  सिंगर , songwriter , रिकार्ड निर्माता , अभिनेत्री , और  philanthropist .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive  टॉमी mottola , कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और शाखित चार लगातार क्रमांक  one singles on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ) ,  म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ) , और मैरी क्रिसमस ( 1994 ) , कैरी थी स्थापित as कोलंबिया  's highest-selling act .
daydream ( 1995 ) बना म्यूज़िक इतिहास जब इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन `` , a duet साथ  Boyz II Men , spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the  रिकॉर्डिंग of the एल्बम , कैरी began to deviate इससे उसके r & b  and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became  evident साथ the रिलीज of तितली ( 1997 ) ,  at which time Carey had separated from Mottola .
Carey left  कोलंबिया in 2000 , और हस्ताक्षरित a  record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records .
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ) , she suffered a physical and emotional  विश्लेषण और थी hospitalized लिये कठोर थकावट  .
Following the film 's poor reception , she was bought out of her recording contract for  $ 50 लाख , जिससे led to a मनाही in उसके करियर  .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002 , and after  an unsuccessful काल , लौटे to the शीर्ष of म्यूज़िक चार्ट साथ the emancipation  of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` we belong साथ `` became उसके सबसे  successful single of the 2000s , and was later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard .
कैरी एकबार again ventured into फिल्मी साथ a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 )  ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career spanning over two decades , Carey has sold more than  200 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी , बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling म्यूज़िक कलाकारों of सब समय  .
In 1998 , she was honored as the world 's  best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार  .
Carey was also named  the best-selling मादा कलाकार of the मिलेनियम in  2000 .
According to the Recording  उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका , वो is the तीसरा  best-selling female artist in the United States , with 63.5 million certified albums .
With the  रिलीज of `` टच my देह `` ( 2008 ) , कैरी gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in  the United States , more than any other solo artist .
In  2012 , कैरी थी क्रमित दूसरी on vh1 's सूची  of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music '' .
Aside from her commercial  accomplishments , कैरी रै जीती पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , 17 संसार म्यूज़िक  Awards , 11 American Music Awards , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as the `` songbird  परम् '' by the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड , वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन दायरा , शक्ति  , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
A  bumblebee is कोई सदस्य of the मधुमक्खी  genus Bombus , in the family Apidae .
There are over 250  ज्ञात प्रजाति , मौजूदा primarily in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध हालांकि  they also occur in South America .
They have been introduced to New Zealand and  the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई राज्य of तस्मानिया  .
Bumblebees are social  कीट कि हैं characterised by ब्लैक और  yellow body hairs , often in bands .
However , some species have orange or red on  उनके  bodies , or may be entirely black .
Another obvious ( but not unique )  characteristic is the नरम प्रकृति of the बाल ( long , branched setae ) , पुकारा pile , कि कवर उनके संपूर्ण देह , बनाना  them appear and feel fuzzy .
They are best distinguished from similarly large , fuzzy bees by the form of the female hind leg , which is modified to form a  corbicula : a चमकदार concave सतह कि is bare , लकिन घिरी by a फ्रिंज of बालों प्रयुक्त to हस्तांतरण पराग ( in समान मधुमक्खियों , the हिन्द लेग is completely  hairy , and pollen grains are wedged into the hairs for transport ) .
Like their  रिश्तेदारों the मधु मधुमक्खियों , bumblebees फीड on मकरंद और  gather pollen to feed their young .
A man openly carrying a handgun in a  बर्गर किंग in त्रिभुज , कोलोराडो  .
In the United States , open carry is shorthand terminology  लिये `` खुलकर carrying a firearm in पब्लिक '' , as विशिष्ट इससे concealed carry , जहाँ firearms  can not be seen by the casual observer .
The  अभ्यास of खोलें carry , जहाँ गन स्वामी खुलकर carry firearms जबकि वे go परिचय उनके  daily business , has seen an increase in the U.S. in recent years .
This has been marked by  a क्रमांक of व्यवस्थित कार्यक्रम intended to  increase the visibility of open carry and public awareness about the practice .
Proponents of open carry point to  इतिहास और आंकडे , noting कि अपराधियों प्रायः  conceal their weapons .
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org , GeorgiaCarry.org  और कुछ भागीदार of the फ़्री राज्य प्रोजेक्ट , खोलें carry रै देखी a पुनरुद्धार in हाल  years , but it is not yet clear if this represents just a short-term trend .
The gun  अधिकारों जातियाँ रै महरूम मिश्रित in  its response .
Alan Gottlieb of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious in expressing  support , जबकि special-interest समूह ऐसे as the aforementioned opencarry.org और georgiacarry.org , और निश्चित नेशनल समूह ऐसे as the गन  Owners of America ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice .
Open carry is strongly opposed by  गन कंट्रोल समूह ऐसे as the ब्रैडी अभियान और  the Coalition to Stop Gun Violence .
the cattenom नाभिकीय शक्ति  Plant in France .
France produces  around तीन quarters of इसके विद्युत by नाभिकीय  power .
The  grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय शक्ति  Plant in Germany .
Chancellor Angela  मार्केल 's गठबन्धन घोषित on may 30 , 2011 , कि germany’s 17 नाभिकीय शक्ति स्टेशन  will be shut down by 2022 , in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68  रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत निर्माण in 15  countries .
Nuclear  शक्ति स्टेशन operate in तीस  countries .
In 2010 , before the  फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति , it थी reported कि an औसत of परिचय 10 नाभिकीय रिएक्टरों यहूद अपेक्षित  to become operational per year , although according to the World Nuclear Association , of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
As of  जून 2011 , जर्मनी और स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं  phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries such as Australia , Austria , Denmark , Greece , Ireland , Italy , Latvia ,  liechtenstein , ध्वज , मलेशिया , माल्टा , नई जीलैंड , नार्वे और पुर्तगाल remain opposed to  nuclear power .
Color motion picture film refers both to unexposed color photographic film in a format suitable for use in a motion picture camera , and to  समाप्त गति चित्र फिल्मी , तैयार लिये उपयोग in a प्रोजेक्टर , जिससे  bears images in color .
The first color cinematography was by means of additive color systems  ऐसे as the एक patented in इंग्लैण्ड by एडवर्ड रेमंड टर्नर in 1899 और tested in 1902  .
A simplified additive system was developed by George  अल्बर्ट स्मिथ और सफलतापूर्वक commercialized in 1909  as Kinemacolor .
These early systems used black-and-white film to photograph and  प्रोजेक्ट दो or अधिक घटक बिंब through अलग  color filters .
स्टिल इससे फुटेज अंकित  by Edward Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology , there are two distinct processes : Eastman Color Negative 2 chemistry ( camera negative stocks , duplicating interpositive and internegative  स्टॉक्स ) और eastman रंग धनात्मक 2 रसायन ( धनात्मक prints लिये सीधा प्रक्षेप ) , प्रायः abbreviated as  ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
Fuji 's  उत्पाद हैं संगत  with ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13 , 1980 ) is  an अमरीकी singer-songwriter , रिकार्ड निर्माता  , and actress .
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous debut album , which featured the hit  सोंग `` foolish `` , और बेची over 503,000 नक़ल in इसके पहला सप्ताह of रिलीज throughout the u.S.  in April 2002 .
the एल्बम नियत a soundscan रिकार्ड as the biggest खोलने सप्ताह  sales for a new female artist , outselling debuts by Alicia Keys and Lauryn Hill .
In the same week , she became the  पहला मादा यजमान to simultaneously थाम the शीर्ष दो स्थान on the  Billboard Hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish '' , and `` What 's Luv ? ``
(  साथ मोटे  Joe ) .
Ashanti broke records again by  having तीन शीर्ष टेन गीतों , `` foolish , '' `` कया 's luv ? ''  and `` Always on Time `` , on the Billboard Hot 100 charts in the same week , being the first woman to accomplish this feat and being second only to the Beatles .
In 2003 , the self-titled debut album won Ashanti her  पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन r & b एल्बम  .
As of April 1st 2013 , Ashanti  रै बेची over 27.7 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी  .
Ashanti ended  the दशक ( 2000–09 ) as the तीसरा  top new R & B artist behind Alicia Keys and Beyoncé .
She  भी ended the दशक  at number 38 on the Top Artist of the Decade list .
She is currently on the list of The Twenty Best Selling Music  singles चूंकि 1990 लिये उसके सिंगल foolish लिये selling 7.2 लाख  copies to-date .
Ashanti  रै an अनुमानित जाल लायक  of $ 40 million dollars [ USD ] .
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's ``  ai n't it मजेदार ( हत्या रिमिक्स ) `` , जिससे पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on बिलबोर्ड hot 100 , जिससे थी भी in the शीर्ष 10 चार्ट  at the same time as `` Foolish '' , `` Always on Time '' ( with Ja Rule ) , and `` What 's Luv '' ( with Fat Joe ) .
Later that year , she was  acclaimed as the `` राजकुमारी of hip-hop & r & b '' by उसके लेबल और capped बंद उसके कामयाब  debut by winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards .
Within seven years of  ashanti 's करियर , वो रै scored 16 शीर्ष 40  hits on the Hot 100 .
Ashanti has endorsed numerous products including Gap ,  हर्बल essences और mudd  Jeans .
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston , Janet Jackson , Prince , Madonna , Tupac  shakur , मरियम J. blige , एला fitzgerald , नशीले रॉबिन्सन , डोना गर्मियाँ  , and Blue Magic as her musical influences .
praised as a gifted songwriter by उसके peers और  critics alike , Ashanti has written/co-written the bulk of all her music .
She is currently working on her own publishing  कम्पनी हकदार लिखा entertainment  .
She released her fourth studio album  हकदार the घोषणा on जून 3 , 2008 और is फिलहाल in the स्टुडियो working  on her fifth .
She also performed the charity tune `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15 other  मादा गायकों लिये the `` स्टैंड up to कर्कट '' सजीव टेलीविज़न खास जिससे helped  raise $ 100 million dollars for cancer research .
The United States Army Air Forces ( USAAF or AAF ) was the military aviation arm of the United States of America  दौरान और तत्काल बाद संसार युद्ध ii , और the सीधा पूर्ववर्ती of  the United States Air Force .
The AAF was a component of the United States Army , which in 1942 was  विभाजित functionally by कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम into तीन autonomous शक्तियां : the फौज मैदान शक्तियां  , the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ) , and the AAF .
Each of these forces had a  commanding सामान्य जो reported  directly to the Chief of Staff of the United States Army .
The AAF administered all parts of military aviation formerly  वितरित among the फौज एयर corps , सामान्य मुख्यालय एयर फ़ोर्स , और मैदान शक्तियां corps क्षेत्रफल कमांडरों , और यूँ became the पहला  air organization of the U.S. Army to control its own installations and support personnel .
In  अभ्यास , the aaf थी वस्तुतः  autonomous inside the Army .
The peak size of the AAF was over 2.4 million men and women in  सेवा और nearly 80,000 वायुयान in 1944 , और 783 घरेलू  bases in December 1943 .
By VE Day  it था 1.25 लाख मेन  stationed overseas and operated from more than 1,600 airfields worldwide .
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in June 1941 to provide the air  भुजा a वृहद स्वायत्तता in जिससे to विस्तार अधिक efficiently , और to provide a ढांचा लिये the अतिरिक्त  command echelons required by a vastly increased force .
Although other nations already had separate air forces  स्वतंत्र of the फौज or नेवी ( ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों royal एयर फ़ोर्स और the जर्मनी luftwaffe ) , the aaf remained a भाग of the संयुक्त  States Army until the United States Air Force came into being in September 1947 .
However , in its expansion and conduct of the war ,  the aaf became अधिक than बस an भुजा of the वृहद  organization .
by the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध ii the aaf था become वस्तुतः an  independent service .
By regulation and executive order , the AAF was a subordinate agency of the War Department tasked only with  आयोजन , प्रशिक्षण , और equipping कॉम्बैट इकाई , सीमित in जिम्मेदारी to the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त राज्य , as यहूद  the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces .
In reality , Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the air war  in प्रत्येक भाग of the संसार , determining एयर नीति और issuing आदेश बगैर transmitting  them through the Chief of Staff .
This `` contrast  between सिद्धान्त और फैक्ट is ... आधारभूत to  an understanding of the AAF . ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of information law  कि allows लिये the पूरा or आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased सूचना और  documents controlled by the United States government .
The Act defines agency records subject to disclosure ,  outlines अनिवार्य प्रकटीकरण प्रक्रियाओं और अनुदान नौ छूटों  to the statute .
It was  originally हस्ताक्षरित into विधि by अध्यक्ष lyndon B. जॉनसन , despite  his misgivings , on July 4 , 1966 as and went into effect the following year .
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information  अधिनियम चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ the अलग और varying स्वतंत्रता of सूचना  Acts passed by the individual states .
Many of  those राज्य अधिनियमों may be समान लकिन नहीं एकसमान  to the federal act .
The European Union ( EU ) is an  आर्थिक और राजनैतिक संघ of 27 सदस्य राज्य कि  are located primarily in Europe .
The EU  operates through a प्रणाली of supranational स्वतंत्र संस्थानों और intergovernmental  negotiated decisions by the member states .
Institutions of the EU include the European Commission , the  परिषद of the यूरोपीय संघ , the यूरोपीय परिषद , the अदालत of इंसाफ of the यूरोपीय संघ ,  the European Central Bank , the Court of Auditors , and the European Parliament .
The European  पार्लियामेंट is निर्वाचित प्रत्येक पाँच सालो by  EU citizens .
The EU 's de facto  पूंजी is ब्रसेल्स  .
The EU traces its origins from the European Coal and Steel Community ( ECSC ) and the  यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ ( eec ) , formed by the भीतरी छह देशों in  1951 and 1958 respectively .
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in  आकार by the accession of नई सदस्य राज्य  and in power by the addition of policy areas to its remit .
The  maastricht सन्धि स्थापित the यूरोपीय  Union under its current name in 1993 .
The latest major amendment  to the संवैधानिक आधार of the eu , the सन्धि  of Lisbon , came into force in 2009 .
The EU has  विकसित a सिंगल मार्केट through a standardised  system of laws that apply in all member states .
Within the Schengen Area (  जिससे शामिल 22 eu और 4 non-eu राज्य ) पासपोर्ट नियंत्रण have महरूम  abolished .
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people , goods , services , and capital , enact legislation in justice and home affairs ,  और maintain आम नीतियों on व्यापार , कृषि , fisheries और क्षेत्रीय विकास  .
a मौद्रिक संघ , the eurozone , थी स्थापित  in 1999 and is composed of 17 member states .
Through the Common  विदेशी और सुरक्षा नीति the eu रै विकसित  a role in external relations and defence .
Permanent diplomatic missions have  महरूम स्थापित around the संसार  .
The EU is represented  at the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  , the WTO , the G8 and the G-20 .
With a combined population of  over 500 लाख निवासियों , or 7.3 % of the संसार जनसांख्यिकी , the eu , in 2012 , उत्पन्न a नाममात्र सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ) of 16.584 खरब us डॉलर , representing लगभग 20 % of the वैश्विक  GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity , and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world .
The EU was the  प्राप्तकर्ता of the 2012 नोबेल सलाम  Prize .
The Wales national  रग्बी लीग टोली represent वेल्स in अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी  league football matches .
Currently  the टोली is सातवाँ in  the RLIF World Rankings .
The team were  चलाएं अंतर्गत the auspices of the रग्बी फ़ुटबॉल लीग , लकिन an स्वतंत्र देह , वेल्स  Rugby League , now runs the team from Cardiff .
A total of three Welsh players have  महरूम डाला into the रग्बी लीग  Hall Of Fame .
Similar to many other  वेल्श नेशनल sporting टीमों , वेल्स स्ट्रिप रै महरूम primarily रेड लिये  many years , including now .
However  in उनके पिछला संसार कप अभियान in 2000 वे किया पहनें a कमीज़ featuring  the Welsh flag , adding a touch of green and white .
The team is known as `` The Dragons ''  और so the टीमों लोगो on the कमीज़  is a red dragon .
The team date back to 1907 , making  उन्हें the तीसरा oldest नेशनल पक्ष बाद  England and New Zealand .
And it was a touring New  जीलैंड पक्ष कि वेल्स पहला निभाई विरूद्ध in 1908  , winning 9-8 at Aberdare .
चूंकि तब वेल्स have regularly निभाई इंग्लैण्ड , चूंकि 1935 फ़्रांस , as  well as welcomed the touring Australia and New Zealand teams , although they rarely toured themselves , not playing a match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975 .
For twenty-six years Wales competed against their  दो biggest विरोधियों , इंग्लैण्ड और फ़्रांस , in the यूरोपीय राष्ट्र कप , जीतना the  trophy four times .
Wales have also competed in the World  कप on तीन अवसरों , the पहला समय होने  in 1975 .
In  1995 और 2000 वे था उनके सबसे कामयाब tournaments to  date , surprisingly making the Semi-Finals on both occasions before being beaten by England and Australia respectively .
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 World Cup , being the second highest ranked side  नहीं to do so , having खोया to स्कॉटलैंड on अंक अंतर over दो  matches .
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the new head  कोच और नियुक्त ली briers as कप्तान , having निभाई लिये वेल्स  since 1998 .
In recent seasons Wales have taken massive strides under former player Iestyn Harris who has coached  वेल्स to वापस to वापस यूरोपीय कप सफलताओं , जिससे culminated in a चार राष्ट्र रूप in 2011  .
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the heart muscle ) for any  कारण , प्रायः अग्रणी to दिल विफलता ; आम लक्षण हैं dyspnea ( breathlessness ) और परिधीय एडिमा ( सूजन of  the legs ) .
लोगों साथ cardiomyopathy हैं प्रायः at रिस्क of खतरनाक फ़ॉर्म of irregular  heart beat and sudden cardiac death .
The most  आम रूप of cardiomyopathy  is dilated cardiomyopathy .
Fuck in its literal meaning  refers to the अधिनियम of यौन मैथुन  .
It is an English word that is often  प्रयुक्त as a profanity , either to denote तिरस्कार  or as an intensifier .
The  उत्पत्ति of the शब्द is  obscure .
It is usually considered to be first  attested to around 1475 , लकिन it may be considerably  older .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives  ( ऐसे as कमीने और fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in  the position of a noun , a verb , an adjective or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of  the शब्द , as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it , ऐसे  as motherfucker .
Note : this article adopts the U.S.  विभाग of परिवहन 's परिभाषा of a यात्री गाडी , to औसत a car  or truck , used for passengers , excluding buses and trains .
The United States is home to the largest  यात्री गाडी मार्केट of कोई देश  in the world .
Overall , there were an estimated 254.4 million  पंजीकृत यात्री वाहनों in the संयुक्त राज्य according to a 2007 बिन्दु पढ़ाई  .
This number , along with the average age of vehicles , has increased  steadily चूंकि 1960 , indicating a growing क्रमांक of वाहनों  per capita .
The Chinese  car मार्केट , however , is poised to जल्द exceed the संयुक्त राज्य  ; by the end of 2012 , there were over 240 million cars on the road in China .
The United States is also home to three large vehicle manufacturers : General Motors , Ford  मोटर कम्पनी और क्रिसलर , जिससे have historically महरूम referred to as the `` बिग  Three . ''
Chrysler however is  no longer among the शीर्ष तीन  ; but is number five , behind Toyota and Honda .
The motor car has clearly become an  अभिन्न भाग of अमरीकी जीवन , साथ वाहनों  outnumbering licensed drivers .
Clinical laboratory in  a हॉस्पिटल सेटिंग प्रर्दशित अनेक  automated analysers .
A medical  प्रयोगशाला or नैदानिक प्रयोगशाला is a प्रयोगशाला जहाँ परीक्षण हैं किया on नैदानिक नमूनों in अनुक्रम to मिलेंगी सूचना  about the health of a patient as pertaining to the diagnosis , treatment , and prevention of disease .
In poker , players construct hands of five cards according to  predetermined नियम , जिससे vary according to जिससे रूपांतर of पोकर  is being played .
These  हैंड्स हैं compared using a हाथ रैंकिंग प्रणाली कि is मानक आरपार  all variants of poker , the player with the highest-ranking hand winning that particular deal in most variants of poker .
In some variants , the  lowest-ranking हाथ can जीत  or tie .
These hand rankings are also used in some  अन्य कार्ड खेल , और in पोकर  dice .
The ranking of a particular hand  is increased by सहित अनेक ताश of the वही कार्ड  rank , by all five cards being from the same suit , or by all five cards being of consecutive rank .
The relative  रैंकिंग of the विभिन्न हाथ श्रेणी is आधारित on the संभाव्यता of होने randomly  dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck .
Bruce Randall Hornsby ( born November 23 , 1954 ) is an  अमरीकी virtuoso ; a सिंगर , pianist , सिंथेसाइज़र , accordion , और dulcimer खिलाड़ी  , and songwriter .
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances , Hornsby draws frequently from classical ,  जैज़ , ब्लूग्रास , लोक , motown , इन्जील , चट्टान , ब्लूज़ , और jam बैंड musical परंपराओं साथ उसके  songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within .
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a number of occasions with industry awards , including the Best New Artist Grammy in 1987 with  ब्रूस hornsby और the दायरा , the बेहतरीन ब्लूग्रास रिकॉर्डिंग ग्रैमी in 1990 , और the बेहतरीन पॉप इंस्ट्रूमेंटल ग्रैमी  in 1993 .
Hornsby has also achieved recognition for his  सोलो एल्बम और प्रदर्शन , उसके touring बैंड ब्रूस hornsby और the noisemakers , उसके ब्लूग्रास  project with Ricky Skaggs and his appearances as a session- and guest-musician .
He also collaborated with Grateful Dead and was a member of the  बैंड इससे सितंबर 1990 to कूच 1992 , playing at over एक सौ  shows during that period .
Sugarcane  वृक्षारोपण in ग्रामीण  Cuba
Agriculture in  क्यूबा रै निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण  part in the economy for several hundred years .
Agriculture contributes less than  10 प्रतिशत to the सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ) , लकिन it employs roughly  20 percent of the working population .
About 30 percent of the country 's  जमीन is प्रयुक्त लिये क्रॉप cultivation  .
The  अकुशल agricultural उद्योग in क्यूबा रै led to  the need to import large amounts of foods .
Cuba now imports  परिचय 80 % of the खाना it rations to  the public .
The rationing program  खाते लिये परिचय a तीसरा of the खाना उर्जा  the average Cuban consumes .
Overall , however  , क्यूबा is निर्भर on imports  for only 16 % of its food .

Mega Millions  ( initially पुकारा the बिग खेल आचमन लाखो as the successor  of The Big Game ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game .
The first ( The Big  खेल ) आचमन लाखो आरेखण थी in 2002  ( see below ) .
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000 , paid in 26 equal yearly  किश्तों ( जबतक the नकदी विकल्प is चुनी ) ; प्रायः , the जैकपॉट increases जब  there is no top-prize winner .
However , despite no  जैकपॉट विजेता लिये the $ 12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18 , 2012 आरेखण , the जैकपॉट  remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on December 21 .
( See below for information on how the game 's jackpot  is वित्तपोषित . )
Reflecting common  अभ्यास among अमरीकी lotteries , the जैकपॉट is advertised  as a nominal value of annual installments .
A cash value option ( the usual  चुनाव ) , जब चुनी by a जैकपॉट विजेता ( देखिए नीचे ) , pays  the approximate present value of the installments .
Mega Millions  फिलहाल उपयोग a 5/56 ( श्वेत गेंदें ) प्लस 1/46  ( the Mega Ball ) double matrix to select its winning numbers .
प्रत्येक खेल लागत  $ 1 .
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( California is the exception ) ,  वहीँ is an विकल्प , पुकारा megaplier ( ऐसे खेल हैं $ 2 प्रत्येक ) जहाँ non-jackpot  prizes are multiplied by 2 , 3 , or 4 .
The  megaplier थी बना उपलब्धियाँ to सब आचमन लाखो jurisdictions  in January 2011 ; it began as a Texas -only option .
Mega  लाखो is drawn at 10:59 p.m. पूर्वी समय मंगलवार  and Fridays , including holidays .
Mega Millions is administered by a  consortium of इसके 12 असली lotteries और the drawings हैं आयोजित at wsb-tv  in Atlanta , Georgia .
पर्यवेक्षित by the  Georgia Lottery .
The largest jackpot in Mega Millions , as well as in American lottery history , was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a cash option of  $ 474,000,000 ) लिये the कूच 30 , 2012 आरेखण in जिससे वहीँ यहूद तीन jackpot-winning टिकटें ; एक  each in Illinois , Kansas , and Maryland .
All three tickets had been claimed as of April 18 , with each set of  विजेता चुनना the नकदी  option .
is a  जापानी manga श्रेणी निर्मित by लेखक tsugumi  Ohba and manga artist Takeshi Obata .
The main character is Light Yagami , a high  स्कूल छात्र जो discovers a अलौकिक कोपी , the `` मौत नोट '' , dropped on धरती by a shinigami  ( a god of death ) named Ryuk .
the मौत नोट अनुदान इसके उपयोक्ता the क्षमता to मार anyone जिनकी नाम और  face they know , by writing the name in the notebook while picturing their face .
The series centers around Light 's attempt to create and rule a world `` cleansed of  दुष्ट '' as `` परमेश्वर '' using the कोपी , और the  efforts of a detective known as L to stop him .
Death  नोट थी पहला serialized in 108 अध्याय by shueisha in  the Japanese manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December 2003 to May 2006 .
The  श्रेणी थी भी प्रकाशित in tankōbon स्वरूप in जापानी  starting in May 2004 and ending in October 2006 with a total of thirteen volumes .
The anime series  aired in जापानी इससे अक्तूबर 3 , 2006  , to June 26 , 2007 .
Composed of 37 episodes , the anime was developed by  madhouse और निर्देशित by tetsuro  Araki .
A light novel based on the series ,  लिखा by nisio isin , थी released in जापानी  .
additionally , विभिन्न वीडियो खेल  have been published by Konami for Nintendo DS .
The series was  adapted into live-action films released  in Japan on June 17 , 2006 , November 3 , 2006 , and February 2 , 2008 .
Viz Media licensed the Death Note manga in North America and has published all the  बारह आयतन इससे the श्रेणी , a 13th आवाज़ जिससे serves as a `` रीडर  's guide '' , as well as the light novels .
The episodes from  the दुश्मनी पहला appeared in उत्तर अमेरिका  as downloadable by IGN .

The  live-action films briefly निभाई in  certain North American theaters since 2008 .
however , none of the वीडियो  games have thus far been published in North America or Europe .
Death Note  is एक of साप्ताहिक shōnen jumps best-selling  manga series of all time , with sales over 26.5 million copies .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ) , also known as All Hallows ' Eve , is a yearly celebration observed in a number of  देशों on अक्तूबर 31 , the संध्या of the पश्चिमी ईसाई feast of सब hallows (  or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All Hallows ' Eve is a  christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय कटाई त्यौहार , और त्यौहार of the मुर्दे साथ संभावित pagan जड़ें  , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
Other  विद्वानों maintain कि it originated  independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties ,  नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , ठहराना bobbing , visiting haunted आकर्षण  , playing pranks , telling scary stories , and watching horror films .
New  यॉर्क नगर taxicabs दौरान  Midtown rush hour in Manhattan
The taxicabs of New York City , with their  distinctive पीला पेंट , हैं a widely पहचाना  icon of the city .
Taxicabs are operated by private  कंपनियाँ और licensed by the नई यॉर्क नगर टैक्सी और लिमोज़ीन  Commission ( TLC ) .
It also oversees over 40,000 other for-hire  वाहनों , सहित `` ब्लैक गाड़ियाँ '' , commuter वैन  and ambulettes .
`` Medallion taxis , '' the familiar yellow cabs , are the  तभी वाहनों in the नगर permitted to चुनें up यात्री in  response to a street hail .

Xylem is one of  the दो प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular  plants ( phloem is the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the  यूनानी शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ) , अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known  xylem tissue is wood , though it is found throughout the plant .
Its  मौलिक फलन is to हस्तांतरण जल , लकिन  it also transports some nutrients through the plant .
U.S.  महिलाओं suffragists  demonstrating for the right to vote , February 1913 .
Women 's suffrage also known as woman suffrage is the  सही of महिलाओं to vote और to  run for office .
Limited voting rights were gained by women in  स्वीडन , फिनलैंड और कुछ पश्चिमी u.S. राज्य in the लेट  19th century .
International organizations were formed to coordinate efforts , especially  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय परिषद of महिलाओं ( 1888 ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्त्री suffrage गठबंधन  ( 1904 ) .
In 1893 , New Zealand , then a self-governing British colony , granted adult  महिलाओं the सही to vote और the self-governing अंग्रेजों  colony of South Australia did the same in 1895 , but also permitted women to run for office .
Australia federated in 1901 , and women acquired the right  to vote और स्टैंड in संघीय चुनावों इससे 1902 , हालांकि uneven प्रतिबंध on aboriginal महिलाओं  voting in national elections were not completely removed until 1962 .
The first European country to introduce  महिलाओं 's suffrage थी the ग्रैंड duchy of फिनलैंड , तब भाग of the रूसी साम्राज्य , जिससे  also produced the world 's first female members of parliament in the 1907 parliamentary elections .
Norway followed , granting  पूरा महिलाओं 's suffrage in 1913  .
In most Western  देशों , महिलाओं 's suffrage आए बाद संसार i युद्ध i i , साथ कुछ महत्वपूर्ण  late adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971 .
Women 's  suffrage रै generally महरूम पहचाना बाद  political campaigns to obtain it were waged .
In many countries it was  granted पहले सार्वभौमिक  suffrage .
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right under the  सम्मेलन on the विलोपन of सब फ़ॉर्म of पक्षपात विरूद्ध महिलाओं , अपनाया  by the United Nations in 1979 .
The Thirteenth Tale (  2006 ) by डायने setterfield is a गोथिक सस्पेंस  novel , the author 's first published book .
Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist Christian denomination  साथ nontrinitarian मान्यताओं पृथक इससे मुख्यधारा christianity .सोर्सs लिये descriptors : • millenarian : • restorationist : • ईसाई : • denomination : the संगठन रिपोर्ट्स विश्वव्यापी सदस्यता  of over 7.78 million adherents involved in evangelism , convention attendance of over 12 million , and annual Memorial attendance of over 19 million .
They are directed by  the शासी देह of यहोवा  's Witnesses , a group of elders in Brooklyn , New York , that establishes all doctrines .
Jehovah 's Witnesses ' beliefs are  आधारित on उनके interpretations of the बाइबल और वे prefer to उपयोग उनके अपना अनुवाद , the नई  World Translation of the Holy Scriptures .
They believe that the destruction of  the उपस्थित संसार प्रणाली at armageddon is निकट  , and that the establishment of God 's kingdom on earth is the only solution for all problems faced by mankind .
The group emerged from the Bible Student movement —founded in the late 1870s by Charles Taze Russell with the formation of Zion 's Watch Tower Tract  समाज —with significant organizational  and doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford .
The name Jehovah 's witnesses  , आधारित on यशायाह 43:10–12 , थी अपनाया in 1931 to फर्क themselves इससे अन्य बाइबल  Student groups and symbolize a break with the legacy of Russell 's traditions .
Jehovah  's गवाह हैं बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उनके door-to-door उपदेश  , distributing literature such as The Watchtower and Awake !
, and refusing  सैन्य सेवा और रक्त transfusions  .
They consider use of the  नाम यहोवा vital लिये उचित इबादत  .
They reject  trinitarianism , अंतर्निहित अमरत्व of the आत्मा , और hellfire , जिससे  they consider to be unscriptural doctrines .
They do  नहीं observe क्रिसमस , ईस्टर , जन्मदिन , or  other holidays and customs they consider to have pagan origins incompatible with Christianity .
Adherents commonly refer to their body of beliefs as `` the  सच्चाई '' और consider themselves  to be `` in the truth '' .
They consider secular society to be  morally भ्रष्ट और अंतर्गत the influence of शैतानी ,  and most limit their social interaction with non-Witnesses .
संकीर्तन अनुशासनात्मक क्रियाएँ शामिल disfellowshipping , उनके पद  for formal expulsion and shunning .
Baptized individuals who  formally छोड़ हैं माना disassociated  and are also shunned .
Disfellowshipped and disassociated individuals may  आखिरकार be reinstated if deemed repentant  .
The religion 's position  regarding ईमानदार आपत्ति to सैन्य सेवा और refusal to सलाम  national flags has brought it into conflict with some governments .
Consequently , Jehovah 's Witnesses have been persecuted and  उनके क्रियाएँ हैं बैन or प्रतिबंधित in कुछ  countries .
Persistent legal challenges  by यहोवा 's  Witnesses have influenced legislation related to civil rights in several countries .
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian romantic Drama film  निर्देशित by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे portrays a हाल अमरीकी विधुर जो begins an बेनाम यौन संबंध साथ a यंग , betrothed  Parisian woman .
It stars Marlon Brando ,  मरिया श्नाइडर , और jean-pierre  Léaud .
The film 's raw portrayal of sexual violence  और emotional turmoil led to अंतरराष्ट्रीय विवाद और खींचा  various levels of government censorship .
The MPAA gave the  फिल्मी an x दरजा upon रिलीज  in the United States .
After revisions were  बना to the mpaa दरजा कोड ,  it was classified as an NC-17 in 1997 .
MGM  released a censored r-rated  cut in 1981 .
the फिल्मी रै इसके nc-17 दरजा लिये `` कुछ  explicit sexual content . ''
Windows XP is an operating system produced by Microsoft for use on  निजी कंप्यूटर , सहित घर और कारोबार desktops , लैपटॉप और मीडिया  centers .
पहला released to कंप्यूटर निर्माताओं on अगस्त 24 , 2001 , it is the दूसरी  most popular version of Windows , based on installed user base .
The name `` XP '' is short for `` eXPerience ''  , highlighting the उन्नत उपयोक्ता  experience .
खिड़कियाँ xp , the successor to खिड़कियाँ 2000 और खिड़कियाँ me , थी the पहला  consumer-oriented operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the Windows NT kernel .
Windows XP was released  विश्वव्यापी लिये खुदरा बिक्री on अक्तूबर 25 , 2001 , और over 400 लाख नक़ल  were in use in January 2006 .
It was succeeded by Windows  विस्टा in जनवरी 2007  .
Direct OEM and retail sales of  खिड़कियाँ xp ceased on जून 30 , 2008  .
microsoft जारी to बेचें खिड़कियाँ xp through उनके प्रणाली बिल्डर  ( smaller OEMs who sell assembled computers ) program until January 31 , 2009 .
On April 10 , 2012 , Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support for Windows XP and Office 2003 would end on April 8  , 2014 और सुझाया कि प्रशासकों शुरू तैयारी to migrate to a नए  OS .
the nt -आधारd संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ , जिससे हैं प्रोग्रामित  in C , C++ , and assembly , are known for their improved stability and efficiency over the 9x versions of Microsoft Windows .
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user interface  , a बदलें microsoft प्रचारित as अधिक user-friendly than पिछला संस्करण  of Windows .
In an attempt to  further ameliorate the `` dll नरक `` कि plagued the पास्ट संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ , improved side-by-side  assembly technology in Windows XP allows side-by-side installation , registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally shared software components in full isolation .
It is also the first  संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ to उपयोग उत्पाद सक्रियण  to combat illegal copying .
During Windows XP 's development , the  प्रोजेक्ट थी codenamed `` whistler '' , बाद whistler , अंग्रेजों कोलंबिया , as अनेक microsoft कर्मचारी  skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort .
According to web analytics data generated by Net Applications , Windows XP  थी the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त ऑपरेटिंग  system until August 2012 , when Windows 7 overtook it .
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 % ,  having decreased लगभग प्रत्येक माह चूंकि at तनिक नवम्बर  2007 , the first month for which statistics are publicly available from Net Applications .
``  पोर ऊना cabeza '' is an अर्जेंटाइन टैंगो साथ म्यूज़िक और गीत  written in 1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo Le Pera respectively .
The name is a Spanish  horse-racing phrase अर्थ `` by a सिर '' , जिससे refers to a घोड़ा जीतना  a race by the length of one head .
The lyrics speak of a compulsive  horse-track जुआरी जो compares  his addiction for horses with his attraction to women .
अल्फ्रेडो le प्रभा थी a ब्राज़ीलियाई इससे são पाउलो , a much italian-influenced  area in Brazil , and also the birthplace of Zequinha de Abreu , composer of Tico-Tico no Fubá .
le प्रभा और gardel died in an वायुयान  crash in Medellín , ( Colombia ) , on June 24 , 1935 .
Por una  cabeza
The  टैंगो रै चूंकि महरूम performed by numerous  tango orchestras .
Tango scenes with `` Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ) , Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) , Schindler 's List ( 1993 ) , True Lies ( 1994 ) , Titanic ( 1996 ) , Bad Santa ( Uncut Version , 2003 ) , All the King 's Men ( 2006 ) , Planet 51 ( 2009 ) , episode 37 of Nip/Tuck ( 2003–2010 ) , episode 9 of South Korean drama series Sweet Spy (  2005–08 ) , the शुरूआत और समाप्ति क्रेडिट of the दक्षिण कोरियाई नाटक ब्रॉडकास्ट i 'm sorry , i प्रेम तुम ( 2004 ) , और the एपीसोड `` bas the खरगोश छेद `` ( 2007  ) .
In the movie Frida ( Salma Hayek , 2002 ) ,  gardel is सुना गायन it on  a radio .
It is also quoted in  दाउद डेल tredici 's `` शुभ  News !
Nilda is Back ''  ( इससे the सोंग साईकिल miz  Inez Sez ) .
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) , the tango is performed by the `` The Tango Project '' , who actually appear in the dancing scene  अभिनीत al पचिनो ( the रिकॉर्डिंग प्रयुक्त is उपलब्धियाँ on एक of उनके cd एल्बम  ) .
जॉन विलियम्स arranged a संस्करण of the टुकड़ा कि appears on the  album `` Cinema Serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak Perlman .
Perlman and  विलियम्स ( conducting ) have भी  performed the piece together in live concerts .
In 2012  a नृत्य संस्करण  was released by the group `` Da Carrera '' featuring the original vocal recording by Carlos Gardel .
The baroreflex or  baroreceptor reflex is एक of the देह 's homeostatic mechanisms  for maintaining blood pressure .
It provides a negative feedback loop in which an elevated  रक्त दबाव reflexively कल्याणकारी दिल रेट to घटी इसलिए causing रक्त दबाव to घटी ; likewise , decreased रक्त दबाव  activates the baroreflex , causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure .
The system relies on specialized neurons , known as  baroreceptors , in the aortic मेहराब , carotid साइनस , और elsewhere to मॉनिटर परिवर्तन  in blood pressure and relay them to the brainstem .
Subsequent  परिवर्तन in रक्त दबाव हैं mediated by  the autonomic nervous system .
Atrial natriuretic peptide forms  a समानांतर ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया लूप in an endocrinological कंट्रास्ट to the renin-angiotensin  system .
The Loma Prieta earthquake , also known as the Quake of '89 and the World Series Earthquake ,  थी a प्रमुख भूकंप कि struck the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  on October 17 , 1989 , at 5:04 pm local time .
Caused by a slip along the San Andreas Fault , the quake lasted 10–15 seconds and  measured 6.9 on दोनो the पल परिमाण स्केल ( surface-wave परिमाण 7.1  ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale .
The quake killed 63 people throughout northern California , injured 3,757  और बाएँ कुछ 3,000–12,000 लोगों  homeless .
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for  the तीसरा खेल of the 1989 संसार श्रेणी , featuring दोनो of the  Bay Area 's Major League Baseball teams , the Oakland Athletics and the San Francisco Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage , this  थी the पहला प्रमुख भूकंप in the संयुक्त राज्य to have इसके  initial jolt broadcast live on television .
Pawn in the  मानक staunton  pattern
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the  weakest टुकड़ा in the खेल of शतरंज , historically representing infantry or , अधिक विशेषकर  , armed peasants or pikemen .
In chess , each player begins the game with eight  प्यादे , एक on प्रत्येक वर्गाकार of the रैंक तत्काल in  front of the other pieces .
( In algebraic  संकेतन , the श्वेत प्यादे प्रारंभ on a2 , b2 , c2 , ... , h2 , जबकि ब्लैक प्यादे  start on a7 , b7 , c7 , ... , h7 . )
व्यक्तिगत प्यादे हैं referred to by the संचिका  on which they stand .
For example , one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or `` Black 's  b-pawn '' , or कम commonly ( using वर्णनात्मक संकेतन )  , `` White 's king 's bishop pawn '' or `` Black 's queen 's knight pawn '' .
It is also common to refer to a rook pawn , meaning any pawn on the a- or h-file , a knight pawn  ( on the b- or g-file ) , a बिशप साहूकार ( on the c- or f-file ) , a महारानी साहूकार ( on the d-file ) , a किंग साहूकार ( on the e-file ) , और  a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ) .
The military forces of the  संसार have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay और  lesbian ) and bisexual individuals .
The  हथियारबंद शक्तियां of सबसे विकसित देशों have अभी removed नीतियों  excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict policies on sexual harassment ) .
Nations that permit gay people to serve openly in the military include the 4 of the 5 members of the UN Security  परिषद ( संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस , और रूस ) , the  Republic of China ( Taiwan ) , Australia , Israel , South Africa , Argentina , and all NATO members excluding Turkey .
Hydrogen production is the family of industrial methods for  generating हाइड्रोजन  .
Currently the dominant  प्रौद्योगिकी लिये सीधा उत्पादन is भाप reforming  from hydrocarbons .
Many other methods are known  सहित electrolysis और  thermolysis .
In 2006 , the  संयुक्त राज्य थी अनुमानित to  have a production capacity of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen .
5 million tonnes of hydrogen were  खपत on-site in आयल शोधन , और in the उत्पादन of अमोनिया  ( Haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ) .
0.4 million tonnes were an incidental  by-product of the chlor-alkali प्रक्रम  .
Hydrogen  उत्पादन is an अनुमानित  $ 100 billion industry .
A basis point ( often denoted as bp ,  colloquially referred to in the बहुवचन as `` bips '' , भी ज्ञात as a `` बीप '' ) is a ईकाई बराबर to एक hundredth of a प्रतिशत  point , or one part per ten thousand , 1/10000 .
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad , literally meaning 'for ( every ) myriad ( ten thousand ) ' , and in that context is written with which looks like a percent  चिह्न ( % ) साथ दो अतिरिक्त zeroes at the समाप्त ( जैसे a stylized रूप of the चार zeros in the  denominator , although it originates as a natural extension of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ) .
A basis  पाइंट is पारिभाषित as:
1  आधार पाइंट = 1 permyriad  = one one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01  % = 0.1‰ = 10−4  = = 0.0001
1 % =  100 bp = 100
Basis points are used as a convenient unit of measurement in  contexts जहाँ प्रतिशत मतभेद of कम than 1 % हैं discussed .
The most common example is interest rates , where  मतभेद in ब्याज दरों of कम than 1 % प्रति साल हैं प्रायः सार्थक  to talk about .
For example , a difference of 0.10 percentage  अंक is समतुल्य to a बदलें of 10 आधार अंक ( e.g . a 4.67 % रेट  increases by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ) .
Like percentage points , basis points avoid the ambiguity between relative and absolute  चर्चाएँ परिचय ब्याज दरों by dealing तभी साथ the निरपेक्ष बदलें in न्यूमेरिक मान  of a rate .
For example , if a report says there  रै महरूम a `` 1 % बढ़ाएँ '' इससे a 10 % ब्याज रेट , इस could refer to an बढ़ाएँ  either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative , 1 % of 10 % ) , or from 10 % to 11 % ( absolute , 1 % plus 10 % ) .
If , however , the report says there has been a `` 10 basis point increase '' from a 10 % interest rate , then we  जान कि the ब्याज रेट of 10 % रै increased by 0.10 % ( the निरपेक्ष बदलें ) to a 10.1 % रेट .
It is common practice in the financial industry to use basis points to denote a rate change in a financial instrument , or  the अंतर ( स्प्रेड ) between दो ब्याज दरों , सहित the yields of fixed-income प्रतिभूति  .
Since certain loans and bonds may commonly be  कोटेड in संबंध to कुछ अनुक्रमणिका or underlying सुरक्षा , वे होगा प्रायः  be quoted as a spread over ( or under ) the index .
For example , a loan that bears interest of 0.50 %  प्रति annum ऊपर the लंदन interbank offered रेट ( libor ) is कहा to  be 50 basis points over LIBOR , which is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 '' .
The term `` basis  पाइंट '' रै इसके origins in व्यापार the `` आधार '' or the  spread between two interest rates .
Since the basis is usually small , these are quoted multiplied up by  10000 , और hence a `` पूरा पाइंट '' गति in the ``  basis '' is a basis point .
कंट्रास्ट साथ pips  in FX forward markets .
The relationship between percentage changes and  आधार अंक can be summarized as फ़ॉलो : 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट बदलें = 100 आधार  points , and 0.01 percentage points = 1 basis point .
So , a bond whose yield increases from 5 % to 5.5  % is कहा to बढ़ाएँ by 50 आधार अंक ; or ब्याज दरों कि have risen 1 प्रतिशत  point are said to have increased by 100 basis points .
The British Royal  परिवार is the समूह of बंद रिश्तेदारों of  the monarch of the United Kingdom .
The term is also commonly applied to the same  समूह of लोगों जो हैं the संबंध of the monarch in उसके or उसके भूमिका as sovereign of कोई of the अन्य राष्ट्रमंडल  realms , thus sometimes at variance with official national terms for the family .
Members of the Royal Family  belong to , either by जनम or विवाह , the हाउस of विंडसर , चूंकि 1917 , जब जार्ज  V changed the name of the royal house from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha .
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were at war with  जर्मनी और दिए the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार 's दमदार जर्मनी ancestry ; it थी लगा  that its public image could be improved by choosing a more British house name .
The new name chosen , Windsor , had absolutely no connection other than as the name of the castle which  थी और continues to be a royal निवास  .
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a member of the Royal Family , and different lists will include  अलग लोगों , those carrying the स्टाइल उसके or उसके majesty ( hm ) , or उसके or उसके royal highness ( hrh ) हैं सदा माना सदस्यों , जिससे प्रायः परिणाम in the अनुप्रयोग of the पद to the monarch , the consort of the monarch , the विधवा consorts of पिछला monarchs , the children of the monarch और पिछला  monarchs , the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and previous monarchs , and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons .
On 30 November 1917 , King George V issued Letters Patent defining who are members of the Royal Family ; the  टेक्स्ट of the सूचना इससे the लंदन गजट is  as follows:
In 1996 ,  उसके majesty the महारानी परिवर्धित ये अक्षर पेटेंट , as थी evidenced  by this Notice from the London Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title and a style borne by members of the Royal Family to  अतिरिक्त व्यक्तियों to be born , evidenced by इस सूचना इससे the लंदन  Gazette:
Members and  रिश्तेदारों of the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार historically represented the monarch in विभिन्न स्थान throughout the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य , sometimes  for extended periods as viceroys , or for specific ceremonies or events .
आज , वे प्रायः perform ceremonial और सोशल  duties throughout the United Kingdom and abroad on behalf of the United Kingdom .
Aside from the monarch , their only constitutional role  in the अफेयर्स of सरकारी is to serve , if योग्य और जब नियुक्त by अक्षर पेटेंट , as a काउंसलर of राज्य , दो or अधिक of जिसको कसरत the  authority of the Crown ( within stipulated limits ) in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch .
In the other  realms of the राष्ट्रमंडल  royalty do not serve as Counsellors of State .
However in each such realm the monarch 's family members may act  on निमित्त of , हैं वित्तपोषित by , और represent the sovereign of कि  particular state , and not the United Kingdom .
The Queen , her consort , her children and grandchildren , as well as all former sovereigns ' children and  grandchildren थाम स्थान in the पहला भाग of the आधिकारिक आदेश of पूर्वता  in England and Wales , Scotland , and Northern Ireland .
Wives of the said enjoy their husbands ' precedence , and  पतियों of राजकुमारियों हैं unofficially लकिन habitually लगाई साथ  their wives as well .
However , the Queen changed the private order of precedence in the Royal Family in favour of  राजकुमारियों ऐनी और एलेक्जेंड्रा , जो henceforth  take private precedence over the Duchess of Cornwall , who is otherwise the realm 's highest ranking woman after the Queen herself .
She did not alter the relative precedence of other born-princesses , such as the  बेटियां of उसके younger  sons .
Haiti ( ; Haitian Creole Ayiti ) , officially the  गणतंत्र of हैती ( ; ) , is a caribbean देश  .
It occupies the western , smaller portion of the island of  हिस्पानिओला , in the वृहद antillean द्वीपसमूह , जिससे  it shares with the Dominican Republic .
Ayiti ( land of high mountains ) was the indigenous  taíno or amerindian नाम लिये the  island .
The country 's  उच्चतम पाइंट is pic la selle ,  at .
The total area of  हैती is और इसके पूंजी is port-au-prince  .
Haitian Creole and  फ्रेंच हैं the आधिकारिक भाषाएं  .
Haiti 's regional , historical , and  ethno-linguistic स्थिति is अद्वितीय लिये  several reasons .
It was the first independent nation of Latin America and the Caribbean , the first black -led republic  in the संसार , और the दूसरी गणतंत्र in the americas जब it gained स्वतंत्रता in 1804 as भाग of a कामयाब  slave revolution lasting nearly a decade .
In 2012 , Haiti announced its  इरादे to तलाश संबद्ध सदस्यता  status in the African Union .
Haiti is the most populous of the  predominantly francophone स्वतंत्र राष्ट्र  in the Americas .
It is one of only two independent nations in the Americas ( along with Canada ) to  designate फ्रेंच as an आधिकारिक भाषा ; the अन्य french-speaking क्षेत्रों  are all overseas départements , or collectivités , of France .
Haiti is the most populous  पूरा member-state of the caribbean जातियाँ ( caricom  ) .
It is the poorest  देश in the americas as measured  by the Human Development Index .
Political violence has occurred  regularly throughout इसके इतिहास , अग्रणी to सरकारी  instability .
Most recently , in February 2004 , a coup d'état originating in the north of the country  मजबूर the इस्तीफा और निर्वासन of अध्यक्ष jean-bertrand aristide  .
A provisional government took  कंट्रोल साथ सुरक्षा provided by the संयुक्त  Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ) .
Michel  martelly , the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष , थी निर्वाचित  in the Haitian general election , 2011 .
The island has had a history of  destructive भूकंप  .
A 7.0 magnitude earthquake  struck हैती on 12 जनवरी  2010 and devastated Port-au-Prince .
The  उच्चतम विश्वसनीय मौत गिनती  was estimated at 220,000 .
Haitian government  estimates यहूद उच्चतर  .
The Presidential palace , Parliament and many  अन्य महत्वपूर्ण structures यहूद नष्ट , साथ साथ अनगिनत घरों और व्यवसायों  , leaving hundreds of thousands of people homeless .
The  देश रै yet to रिकवर इससे the 2010 भूकंप ( और subsequent incidents ) due to दोनो the गंभीरता of  the damage Haiti endured in 2010 , as well as a government that was ineffective well before the earthquake .
United States aid  संगठन have दान $ 2 अरब  .
Combined with  अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय दान , ये निधि हैं intended to योगदान  to the rebuilding of the country .
The  खूनी beetroots is the pseudonym of सर bob कॉर्नेलियस  Rifo , the Italian electro house and dance-punk music producer , DJ and photographer .
the खूनी beetroots is well-known  for the black Venom mask he wears during performances .
In fact , the only identifying public feature of  rifo is the साल `` 1977 '' tattooed आरपार उसके छाती , जिससे is दोनो the साल कि the निर्माता और  punk-rock was born .
`` The Bloody Beetroots DJ set ''  contains सर bob कॉर्नेलियस rifo और  Tommy Tea .
A Motorola  सलाहकार alphanumeric पेजर प्रयुक्त in ब्राज़ील  in the 1990s , operated by Teletrim
A  पेजर is a बेतार दूरसंचार यंत्र कि receives  and displays numeric or text messages , or receives and announces voice messages .
one-way pagers can तभी प्राप्त संदेश , जबकि जवाब pagers और two-way  pagers can also acknowledge , reply to , and originate messages using an internal transmitter .
Pagers operate as part of a paging system which includes one or more fixed transmitters ( or in the  मामला of जवाब pagers और two-way pagers , एक  or more base stations ) , as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users .
These systems can range from a restaurant  प्रणाली साथ a सिंगल low-power ट्रांसमीटर , to a देशभर प्रणाली साथ  thousands of high-power base stations .
One of the first practical paging services  थी शुभारम्भ in 1950 लिये physicians  in the New York City area .
Physicians paid US $ 12 per month for the service and carried a ( 6 oz  ) पेजर कि होता प्राप्त फोन संदेश भीतर ( 25 mi )  of a single transmitter tower .
The system was manufactured by the  reevesound कम्पनी और संचालित by telanswerphone  .
In 1960 , John Francis Mitchell  संयुक्त तत्व of मोटोरोला 's walkie talkie और ऑटोमोबाइल रेडियो technologies to बनाएँ the पहला transistorized पेजर , और इससे  this point , paging technology continued to advance , and pager adoption continued to expand , until the early 1990s .
However , by the mid-1990s  , as सेल्यूलर technologies became सस्ता और अधिक widely उपलब्धियाँ , उन्नत सेवाएं  began to displace paging as a commercial product .
Today , pagers exist  largely as niche उत्पाद , ढूंढना preferential उपयोग in अनुप्रयोग  such as hospitals , public safety , and retail locations where their simplicity , high reliability , and low cost represent significant advantages .
Reevesville is a town in  dorchester काउंटी , दक्षिण कैरोलिना ,  United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 196 at the 2010  census .
As defined by the U.S. Office  of प्रबन्धन और बजट , और प्रयुक्त by the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो लिये सांख्यिकीय  purposes only , Reevesville is included within the Charleston-North Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area .
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda Kahlo y Calderón ; July 6 , 1907 – July 13 , 1954 )  थी a मैक्सिकन चित्रकार , born in coyoacán , जो is बेहतरीन ज्ञात  for her self-portraits .
kahlo 's जीवन began और ended in मैक्सिको  City , in her home known as the Blue House .
वो दिया उसके जनम तिथि as जुलाई 7 , 1910 , लकिन उसके जनम  certificate shows July 6 , 1907 .
Kahlo  था allegedly चाही the साल of उसके जनम to coincide साथ the साल  of the beginning of the Mexican revolution so that her life would begin with the birth of modern Mexico .
Her work  रै महरूम मनाये in मैक्सिको as emblematic of नेशनल और स्वदेशी परंपरा  , and by feminists for its uncompromising depiction of the female experience and form .
Mexican culture and Amerindian  सांस्कृतिक परंपरा हैं महत्वपूर्ण in उसके कार्य , जिससे  has been sometimes characterized as Naïve art or folk art .
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '' , and in 1938 André  ब्रेटन , प्रिंसिपल initiator of the surrealist गति , वर्णित kahlo 's आर्ट as  a `` ribbon around a bomb '' .
kahlo था a volatile विवाह साथ the प्रसिद्ध  Mexican artist Diego Rivera .
वो suffered  lifelong health problems .
Many of her health problems were the result of  a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना वो बच as a किशोरावस्था .
Recovering  इससे उसके चोटों पृथक उसके इससे अन्य लोगों और इस अलगाव  influenced her works , many of which are self-portraits of one sort or another .
Kahlo  सुझाया , `` i पेंट खुद क्युकी i am so  often alone and because I am the subject I know best . ''
She also  stated , `` i थी born a  bitch .
I  थी born a चित्रकार  . ''

theresienwiese on the दिन पहले  Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer  आयोजित annually in म्यूनिख , बायर्न , जर्मनी ,  running from late September to the first weekend in October .
It is one of the most famous events in Germany  और is the संसार 's largest मेला , साथ अधिक than  6 million people from around the world attending the event every year .
To the  स्थानीय , it is नहीं पुकारा oktoberfest , लकिन `` die wiesn ''  , after the colloquial name of the fairgrounds themselves .
The Oktoberfest is an  महत्वपूर्ण भाग of bar संस्कृति , having  been held since 1810 .
Other cities across the world also hold  oktoberfest जश्न , modeled बाद the असली  Munich event .
The Munich Oktoberfest originally took place during the sixteen  दिनों up to , और सहित , the  first Sunday in October .
In 1994 , the schedule was modified in response to German  reunification so कि if the पहला संडे in अक्तूबर जलप्रपात on the 1st or 2nd , तब the पर्व होता go on  until October 3 ( German Unity Day ) .
Thus ,  the पर्व is अभी 17 दिनों जब the पहला संडे  is October 2 and 18 days when it is October 1 .
In 2010 , the festival  lasted जबतक the पहला सोमवार in अक्तूबर , to चिह्नित  the anniversary of the event .
The festival is held in an area named the  theresienwiese ( फ़ील्ड , or मर्ग , of therese ) , प्रायः  called Wiesn for short , located near Munich 's center .
Large quantities  of oktoberfest बियर हैं खपत , साथ लगभग 7 लाख liters  served during the 16 day festival in 2007 .
Visitors may also enjoy a wide variety of traditional food such as Hendl ( chicken ) , Schweinebraten ( roast pork ) , Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock ) , Steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a stick ) , Würstl ( sausages ) along with Brezeln ( Pretzel ) ,  knödel ( आलू or ब्रैड पकौड़ी ) , käsespätzle ( चीज नूडल्स ) , reiberdatschi ( आलू pancakes ) , sauerkraut or rotkohl/blaukraut ( रेड गोभी  ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage ) .
