पहियों of gouda
Cheese is a  जेनेरिक पद लिये a विविध समूह of  milk-based food products .
Cheese is produced in wide-ranging  जायका , बनावट ,  and forms .
Cheese  consists of प्रोटीन और मोटे इससे मिल्क , प्रायः  the milk of cows , buffalo , goats , or sheep .
It is produced by coagulation  of the मिल्क प्रोटीन  casein .
Typically , the  मिल्क is acidified और जोड  of the enzyme rennet causes coagulation .
the solids हैं अलग  and pressed into final form .
Some  cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout  .
Most cheeses melt  at कुकिंग तापमान  .
Hundreds of types of  चीज इससे विभिन्न देशों हैं उत्पादित  .
Their styles , textures and flavors depend on the origin of the milk (  सहित the एनिमल 's आहार ) , whether वे have महरूम pasteurized , the butterfat सामग्री , the जीवाणु और मोल्ड , the प्रसंस्करण  , and aging .
Herbs , spices ,  or लकडी धुँआ may be प्रयुक्त as flavoring  agents .
The yellow to red color of many cheeses , such as Red Leicester , is  सामान्यतः formed इससे adding  annatto .
For  a few cheeses , the मिल्क is  curdled by adding acids such as vinegar or lemon juice .
Most cheeses are acidified to a lesser degree  by जीवाणु , जिससे फेरे मिल्क sugars into लैक्टिक एसिड , तब the जोड of rennet completes  the curdling .
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet are available ; most are produced by fermentation  of the कवक mucor miehei , लकिन अन्य have महरूम निकाली इससे विभिन्न प्रजाति  of the Cynara thistle family .
Cheese is valued for its portability , long  जीवन , और ऊँची सामग्री of मोटे , प्रोटीन ,  calcium , and phosphorus .
Cheese is more  कॉम्पैक्ट और रै a longer शेल्फ जीवन than मिल्क , हालांकि कैसा long a चीज होगा  keep may depend on the type of cheese ; labels on packets of cheese often claim that a cheese should be consumed within three to five days of opening .
Generally speaking , hard  cheeses पिछला longer than नरम cheeses  , such as Brie or goat 's milk cheese .
Cheesemakers near a dairy region may benefit from fresher  , lower-priced मिल्क , और निम्नतर शिपिंग  costs .
The long storage life of some  चीज , विशेषकर if it is encased in a सुरक्षात्मक rind , allows  selling when markets are favorable .
अतिरिक्त संघटक may be added to कुछ cheeses ,  such as black peppers , garlic , chives or cranberries .
A  विशेषज्ञ विक्रेता of चीज is sometimes  known as a cheesemonger .
To become an expert in this field , like wine or cooking , requires  कुछ औपचारिक शिक्षा और सालो of चख  and hands-on experience .
This position is  typically जिम्मेदार लिये सब पहलुओं of the चीज inventory ; selecting the चीज  menu , purchasing , receiving , storage , and ripening .
Legal  citation सिग्नल हैं a नियत of ब्रैड abbreviated वाक्यांश or शब्द प्रयुक्त to clarify the प्राधिकार or significance  of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition .
Signals help a reader quickly discern meaning or usefulness of a particular reference when the  सन्दर्भ itself करता नहीं provide पर्याप्त सूचना  .
Most citation signals are placed in  सामने of the citation to जिससे  they apply .
For example , in the paragraph When  लिखने a विधिक तर्क , it is महत्वपूर्ण to refer to  primary sources .
To assist readers in locating these sources ,  it is वांछनीय to उपयोग a मानकीकृत  citation format .
See generally  हार्वर्ड विधि पुनर्विलोकन संघ , the bluebook : a वर्दी  System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) .
Note  , however , कि कुछ न्यायालयों may आवश्यकता कोई  legal papers that are submitted to them to conform to a different citation format .
the signal is the phrase `` see generally  , '' जिससे indicates कि the citation  `` The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) '' provides general background information on the topic .
Neil Alden Armstrong ( August 5 , 1930 – August 25 , 2012 ) was an American  astronaut और the पहला व्यक्ति to चलना on the चंद्रमा  .
He was also an aerospace  इंजीनियर , नवल एविएटर , परीक्षण पायलट , और विश्वविद्यालयों प्राध्यापक  .
Before becoming an astronaut ,  आर्मस्ट्रांग थी an अधिकारी in the  U.S. Navy and served in the Korean War .
After the war , he earned his bachelor 's degree at Purdue University and served as a  परीक्षण पायलट at the नेशनल सलाहकार कमेटी लिये aeronautics high-speed उड़ान स्टेशन , अभी ज्ञात as the ड्राइडेन उड़ान शोध  Center , where he logged over 900 flights .
He  बाद समाप्त ग्रैजुएट अध्ययन at the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Southern California .
A participant in the U.S. Air Force 's Man in Space Soonest and X-20  dyna-soar इंसान spaceflight कार्यक्रम , आर्मस्ट्रांग joined the नासा astronaut  Corps in 1962 .
He made his first space  उड़ान , as कमांड पायलट of मिथुन 8 , in 1966 , बनने नासा  's first civilian astronaut to fly in space .
On this  मिशन , he performed the पहला डॉकिंग of दो  spacecraft , with pilot David Scott .
Armstrong 's  दूसरी और पिछला spaceflight थी as मिशन कमांडर of  the Apollo 11 moon landing , in July 1969 .
On this mission , Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin descended to the lunar surface and spent two and a half hours  exploring , जबकि माइकल कॉलिन्स remained in चंद्र कक्षा in the कमांड  Module .
Along with Collins and Aldrin , Armstrong was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by  अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन ; in 1978 , अध्यक्ष jimmy कार्टर प्रस्तुत आर्मस्ट्रांग the congressional स्पेस पदक of सम्मान in 1978 ; he और उसके पूर्व crewmates प्राप्त the congressional  Gold Medal in 2009 .
आर्मस्ट्रांग died in सिनसिनाटी , ओहियो , on अगस्त 25 ,  2012 , at the age of 82 , after complications from coronary artery bypass surgery .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970 – October 4 , 1989 ) was an  अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the पहला u.s . ट्रिपल क्राउन  champion in 25 years .
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 )  , the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ) , और the belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — रिकॉर्ड कि स्टिल  stand today .
He is considered to be one of the  महानतम thoroughbreds of सब समय  .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked  सचिवालय the 35th बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी of the 20th सदी ,  the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http .
He ranked second  पीछे man o ' युद्ध in the blood-horse 's सूची of  the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century .
सचिवालय थी sired by बिंदास शासक आउट  of Somethingroyal , by Princequillo .
He was foaled at  the मर्ग in  Caroline County , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War , Secretariat was a large chestnut  टट्टू और थी दिए the वही उपनाम , `` बिग रेड . ''
Secretariat 's  grandsire , nasrullah , is भी the great-great-grandsire  of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by  पैनी chenery , he थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by कनाडाई jockey रॉन turcotte  , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He raced  in chenery 's मर्ग stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत checkered  colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat .
सचिवालय stood लगभग लम्बा , और weighed ,  with a 75-inch girth , in his racing prime .
मैड्रिड ( , ) is the पूंजी  and largest city of Spain .
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the entire  जनसांख्यिकी of the मैड्रिड महानगर क्षेत्रफल is गणना to be around 6.5  million .
It is the third-largest city in the European Union , after London  और बर्लिन , और इसके महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the third-largest in the यूरोपीय संघ  after London and Paris .
The  नगर spans a कुल  of .
The city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the country and the Community  of मैड्रिड ( जिससे comprises the नगर of मैड्रिड , इसके conurbation और विस्तारित उपनगरों और गांवों ) ; इस  community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha .
As the capital city of Spain , seat of government , and residence of  the स्पेनी monarch , मैड्रिड is भी the राजनैतिक , आर्थिक और सांस्कृतिक  centre of Spain .
The  वर्तमान महापौर is ana  Botella from the People 's Party ( PP ) .
The Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP in the European Union and its influences in politics , education , entertainment , environment , media , fashion , science , culture , and  the कला सब योगदान to इसके औकात as एक of the संसार 's प्रमुख वैश्विक  cities .
Due to its economic output , high standard of  जीना , और मार्केट आकार , मैड्रिड is माना the प्रमुख वित्तीय केन्द्र of दक्षिणी यूरोपीय  and the Iberian Peninsula ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the major Spanish companies , such as Telefónica , Iberia or Repsol .
Madrid is  the सबसे touristic नगर of स्पेन , the fourth-most touristic of the महाद्वीप ,  and the seventh most visited city in the world according to Forbes .
is the 10th सबसे livable नगर in the  world according to Monocle magazine , in its 2010 index .
Madrid  भी बाँधने among the 12 greenest यूरोपीय शहरों in 2010. < संदर्भ name= '' एचटीटीपी : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html  '' > Madrid is currently a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics .
Madrid houses the headquarters of the World Tourism Organization ( WTO ) ,  belonging to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र संगठन ( un ) , the segib , the संगठन  of Ibero-American States ( OEI ) , and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ) .
It also hosts major international institutions regulators of Spanish : the Standing Committee of the Association of  स्पेनी भाषा अकादमियों , मुख्यालय of the royal स्पेनी अकादमी ( rae ) , the cervantes संस्थान और the न्यास of तात्कालिक  Spanish ( Fundéu ) .
Madrid  organizes मेलों as fitur , आरको , simo  TCI and the Cibeles Madrid Fashion Week .
While  मैड्रिड possesses a आधुनिक अवसंरचना , it  has preserved the look and feel of many of its historic neighbourhoods and streets .
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro Park , founded in 1631 ; the 19th-century National  पुस्तकालयों भवन ( संस्थापित in 1712 ) containing कुछ of स्पेन 's ऐतिहासिक अभिलेख ; a विशाल क्रमांक of नेशनल संग्रहालय , और the सुनहरी त्रिभुज of आर्ट , स्तिथ साथ the paseo डेल प्राडो और comprising तीन आर्ट संग्रहालय : प्राडो संग्रहालय , the museo nacional centro  de Arte Reina Sofía , a museum of modern art , and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum , which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums .
cibeles राजमहल और फव्वारा have  become the monument symbol of the city .
The path of the Via Appia  और of the via appia traiana .
Remains of the  appian रास्ता in रोम , निकट quarto  Miglio
Near  रोम  .
The Appian Way ( Latin and Italian : Via Appia ) was one  of the earliest और रणनीतिक सबसे महत्वपूर्ण रोमन सड़कें of the प्राचीन  republic .
It  कनेक्ट रोम to brindisi , apulia ,  in southeast Italy .
इसके महत्व is indicated by इसके  common name , recorded by Statius :
Appia teritur regina  longarum viarum
`` the  appian रास्ता is the महारानी  of the long roads ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus  , the रोमन censor जो began और समाप्त the पहला खण्ड as a सैन्य  road to the south in 312 BC during the Samnite Wars .
The Draupner wave , a single giant wave measured on New Year 's Day  1995 , आखिरकार पुष्टि the अस्तित्व of freak लहरें , जिससे था previously  been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as freak waves , monster waves , killer waves , extreme waves , and abnormal waves ) are  अपेक्षाकृत विशाल और spontaneous समंदर सतह लहरें कि occur दूर आउट at समुद्र , और हैं a threat भी to  large ships and ocean liners .
In oceanography , they are more precisely defined as waves whose height is more than twice the significant wave height (  swh ) , जिससे is itself पारिभाषित as the औसत of the largest तीसरा of लहरें in a वेव  record .
इसलिए दुष्ट लहरें हैं नहीं necessarily the biggest लहरें मिला at समुद्र ; वे हैं , बल्कि  , surprisingly large waves for a given sea state .
Rogue waves seem not to have a single distinct cause , but occur where physical factors such  as ऊँची हवाएँ और दमदार currents कारण लहरें to विलय to बनाएँ a सिंगल exceptional विशाल  wave .
electress sophia of हनोवर  ( 1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the British throne is the ordered sequence of all those people eligible  to सफल to the सिंहासन of the संयुक्त किंगडम और the अन्य 15 राष्ट्रमंडल  realms .
The Act  of उपनिवेश 1701 bestowed उत्तराधिकार on the electress sophia of  Hanover and her descendants while excluding Roman Catholics .
The British government does not publish an official list of all those in line to succeed , but the work of genealogical authors and amateur researchers  suggests कि वहीँ हैं अनेक हजार लोगों potentially in  line .
At a summit in Perth , Western Australia in 2011 , the heads of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms agreed to take steps to adopt  निरपेक्ष primogeniture , समाप्त the exclusion of लोगों शादीशुदा to रोमन catholics , और मेक अन्य परिवर्तन in the उत्तराधिकार  rules .
The line of succession is also  प्रयुक्त to चुनें the counsellors of राज्य ( और a रीजेंट  if the need arises ) under the provisions of the Regency Act 1937 .
For earlier versions of the line of succession , see  इतिहास of the अंग्रेजों लकीर of  succession .
Edward Montgomery Clift (  अक्तूबर 17 , 1920july 23 , 1966 ) थी an अमरीकी फिल्मी और स्टेज कर्ता the नई यॉर्क times’  obituary noted his portrayal of `` moody , sensitive young men '' .
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the social climber in George Stevens 's A Place in the Sun , the anguished Catholic priest in Hitchcock 's I Confess , the doomed regular soldier Robert E. Lee Prewitt in  फ्रेड zinnemann 's इससे यहाँ to शाश्वत , और the यहूदी gi bullied by antisemites in एडवर्ड dmytryk  's The Young Lions .
Later , after a  disfiguring car क्रैश in 1956 , और दारू और  prescription drug abuse , he became erratic .
Nevertheless important roles were still his , including `` the reckless , alcoholic , mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in John Huston 's The  misfits , the शीर्षक भूमिका in हस्टन 's , और the विशेषज्ञता शिविर शिकार in स्टेनली क्रेमर 's  Judgment at Nuremberg . ''
Clift received four Academy Award nominations during  उसके करियर , तीन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता और एक लिये बेहतरीन supporting  Actor .
The War on  आतंक ( भी ज्ञात as the वैश्विक युद्ध on आतंक ) is a पद commonly  applied to an international military campaign which started as a result of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States .
This resulted in an international  सैन्य अभियान to eliminate al-qaeda और अन्य उग्रवादी  organizations .
The United Kingdom and  अनेक अन्य नाटो और non-nato  nations participate in the conflict .
The phrase 'War on Terror ' was  पहला प्रयुक्त by us अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश  on 20 September 2001 .
The Bush administration and the Western media have since used the term to signify a global military ,  राजनैतिक , lawful , और conceptual struggle—targeting दोनो संगठन designated as आतंकवादी  and regimes accused of supporting them .
It was typically  प्रयुक्त साथ a particular फ़ोकस on उग्रवादी islamists  , al-Qaeda , and other jihadi groups .
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas Contingency Operation ) , it is still commonly used by politicians , in the  मीडिया और by कुछ पहलुओं of सरकारी officially , ऐसे as the संयुक्त राज्य  ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal .
German  battleship schleswig-holstein , westerplatte  , September 1 , 1939
Destroyer USS  शॉ exploding बाद उसके आगे पत्रिका थी detonated  during the Attack on Pearl Harbor
The  प्रमुख कल्याणकारी of संसार युद्ध ii यहूद nationalistic मुद्दे , अनसुलझे मुद्दे , और resentments resulting  from World War I and the interwar period in Europe , in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s .
the culmination of कार्यक्रम कि led to the outbreak of युद्ध हैं generally समझा to be the  1939 invasion of Poland by Germany and Soviet Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan .
These military aggressions were the  परिणाम of निर्णय बना by the सत्तावादी सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in जर्मनी  and by the leadership of the Kwantung Army in Japan .
World War II started after these aggressive actions were met with an  आधिकारिक घोषणा of युद्ध  and/or armed resistance .

The Mitsubishi Galant is an  ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by मित्सुबिशी मोटर्स between  1969 and 2012 .
The name was derived from the  फ्रेंच शब्द galant , अर्थ `` chivalrous  '' .
There have been nine  पृथक पीढियां , और संचयी बिक्री अभी exceed  five million .
It  began as a कॉम्पैक्ट सेडान , लकिन over the कोर्स  of its life has evolved into a larger mid-size car .
Initial production was only based in Japan , but  चूंकि 1994 the अमरीकी मार्केट रै महरूम परोसा by वाहनों समवेत at the पूर्व diamond-star मोटर्स ( dsm  ) facility in Normal , Illinois .
Blood pressure ( BP ) , sometimes referred to as arterial blood pressure ,  is the दबाव exerted by circulating रक्त upon the दीवारें of रक्त बरतन , और is एक of the प्रिंसिपल  vital signs .
When used  बगैर further specification , `` रक्त दबाव '' प्रायः  refers to the arterial pressure of the systemic circulation .
During  प्रत्येक धड़कन , रक्त दबाव varies between a अधिकतम ( systolic  ) and a minimum ( diastolic ) pressure .
The blood  दबाव in the परिसंचरण is प्रधानतया  due to the pumping action of the heart .
Differences in mean blood pressure are  जिम्मेदार लिये रक्त प्रवाह इससे एक स्थान to another  in the circulation .
The rate of mean  रक्त प्रवाह depends on the प्रतिरोध to प्रवाह प्रस्तुत  by the blood vessels .
औसत रक्त दबाव decreases as the circulating रक्त  moves away from the heart through arteries and capillaries due to viscous losses of energy .
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole circulation , although most of the fall occurs  साथ the छोटी धमनियों और arterioles  .
Gravity affects blood pressure via hydrostatic forces ( e.g. , during standing ) and  valves in रगों , श्वास , और pumping इससे संकुचन of skeletal मांसपेशियां  also influence blood pressure in veins .
Blood pressure without further specification usually refers to the systemic arterial pressure measured at a person 's upper arm and is a measure of the pressure in  the brachial धमनी , the प्रमुख धमनी in the  upper arm .
A person’s blood pressure is usually  expressed in शर्तें of the systolic दबाव over diastolic दबाव  and is measured in millimetres of mercury ( mmHg ) , for example 120/80 .
A veto  – लैटिन लिये `` i forbid '' – is the शक्ति ( प्रयुक्त by an अधिकारी of the राज्य , लिये  example ) to unilaterally stop an official action , especially the enactment of legislation .
A veto can be absolute , as  लिये उदाहरण in the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद , जिनकी स्थाई सदस्यों ( चीन , फ़्रांस , रूस  , United Kingdom , United States of America ) can block any resolution .
Or it can be limited , as in the legislative process of the United States , where a  two-thirds vote in दोनो the हाउस और सीनेट may ओवरराइड a अध्यक्षीय  veto of legislation .
A veto only gives power to stop changes ,  नहीं to अपनाना उन्हें ( मगर  for the rare `` amendatory veto '' ) .
यूँ a वीटो allows इसके होल्डर  to protect the status quo .
The concept of a veto body  originated साथ the रोमन  consuls and tribunes .
Either of the two consuls holding office in  a दिए साल could ब्लाक a सैन्य or सिविल निर्णय by the अन्य ; कोई ट्रिब्यून था the शक्ति  to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate .
Sulfur  डाइऑक्साइड ( भी गंधक डाइऑक्साइड  ) is the chemical compound with the formula .
It is a  विषाक्त गैस साथ a pungent , तकलीफदेह महकते , कि is released by ज्वालामुखी  and in various industrial processes .
Since coal and petroleum often contain sulfur compounds , their combustion generates  गंधक डाइऑक्साइड जबतक the गंधक यौगिकों हैं removed पहले  burning the fuel .
Further oxidation of SO2 , usually in the  उपस्थिति of a उत्प्रेरक ऐसे as no2 , फ़ॉर्म h2so4 , और यूँ एसिड  rain .
Sulfur dioxide emissions  हैं भी a precursor to अभिकण  in the atmosphere .
Both of these impacts are cause  लिये चिंता over the पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of ये  fuels .
Myasthenia gravis  ( इससे यूनानी μύς `` मांसपेशी '' , `` कमज़ोरी '' , और `` गंभीर '' ; abbreviated mg ) is an असंक्राम्य  neuromuscular disease leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability .
It is an  असंक्राम्य विकार , in जिससे कमज़ोरी is caused by circulating antibodies कि ब्लाक acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic  neuromuscular junction , inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions .
Myasthenia is treated medically with  acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants , और  , in selected cases , thymectomy .
The disease incidence is 3–30 cases per million per year and  उठती as a परिणाम of increased जागरूकता  .
MG must  be विशिष्ट इससे जन्मजात myasthenic syndromes कि can उपस्थित समान लक्षण लकिन प्रस्ताव no जवाब  to immunosuppressive treatments .
Reflective twisted  nematic द्रव क्रिस्टल प्रदर्शक  .
Polarizing filter film  साथ a लंबवत अक्ष to polarize लाइट  as it enters .
Glass substrate with ITO  electrodes .
The shapes of  ये electrodes होगा determine the आकार कि होगा appear  when the LCD is turned ON .
लंबवत ridges etched on  the surface are smooth .
मुड़ nematic द्रव  crystal .
Glass substrate with common electrode film ( ITO ) with  आड़ा ridges to लकीर up साथ the आड़ा  filter .
Polarizing filter film  साथ a आड़ा अक्ष to block/pass लाइट  .
Reflective  सतह to भेजें  light back to viewer .
( In a  backlit एलसीडी , इस परत  is replaced with a light source . )
A liquid-crystal display ( LCD )  is a चपटा फलक प्रदर्शक , इलेक्ट्रॉनिक विज़ुअल  display , or video display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals .
Liquid crystals do not  emit लाइट सीधे  .
LCDs are available to display arbitrary images ( as in a general-purpose computer display ) or fixed images which can be  प्रदर्शित or छुपा , ऐसे as preset शब्द , अंक , और 7-segment प्रदर्शक as in a डिजिटल क्लॉक  .
They use the same basic technology , except that arbitrary images are made up of a  विशाल क्रमांक of छोटी पिक्सेल , जबकि अन्य प्रदर्शक have larger तत्व  .
LCDs are used in a wide range of applications including  कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर , टेलीविज़न , यंत्र panels , वायुयान कॉकपिट प्रदर्शक  , and signage .
They are common in consumer devices such as video players , gaming devices  , घड़ियाँ , घड़ियाँ , calculators , और telephones , और have replaced कैथोड रे ट्यूब ( crt ) प्रदर्शक in सबसे  applications .
They are available in a wider range of screen sizes than CRT and  प्लाज्मा प्रदर्शक , और चूंकि वे do नहीं उपयोग  phosphors , they do not suffer image burn-in .
LCDs are , however ,  susceptible to चित्र हठ  .
The LCD screen is more energy  कुशल और can be disposed of अधिक सकुशल than  a CRT .
Its low electrical power consumption  enables it to be प्रयुक्त in बैटरी -powered इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  equipment .
It  is an electronically modulated ऑप्टिकल यंत्र बना up of कोई क्रमांक of खण्ड भर साथ द्रव crystals और arrayed  in front of a light source ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome .
Liquid  crystals यहूद पहला खोजा  in 1888 .
By 2008 , worldwide sales of televisions with LCD  screens exceeded सालाना बिक्री of crt इकाई ; the crt became obsolete लिये  most purposes .
The Borgata Hotel Casino and Spa is a  लक्ज़री होटल , कसीनो , और स्पा in अटलांटिक नगर , नई  Jersey , United States .
It is owned by Marina District Development , a joint venture between Boyd  गेमिंग और a divesture विश्वास स्थापित by mgm रिसॉर्ट अंतरराष्ट्रीय  .
the $ 1.1 अरब कसीनो होटल सुविधाएँ  2,002 rooms and is the largest hotel in New Jersey .
The Borgata  खोली in जुलाई 2003 as a लास vegas-style megaresort और is the top-grossing कसीनो  in Atlantic City .
A bottle of high potency  b-complex विटामिन संपूरक  pills .
A vitamin (  or ) is an सशुल्क यौगिक जरूरी by an  organism as a vital nutrient in limited amounts .
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is  पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव ,  and must be obtained from the diet .
Thus , the term is conditional both on  the हालातों और  on the particular organism .
For example , ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin for humans ,  लकिन नहीं लिये सबसे अन्य पशु , और biotin और विटामिन d हैं जरूरी  in the human diet only in certain circumstances .
By convention , the term vitamin includes  neither अन्य अनिवार्य nutrients , ऐसे as dietary खनिज , अनिवार्य वसीय acids , or अनिवार्य अमीनो acids ( जिससे हैं needed in larger  amounts than vitamins ) nor the large number of other nutrients that promote health but are otherwise required less often .
Thirteen  विटामिन हैं universally पहचाना  at present .
Vitamins are classified by their  biological और रासायनिक कार्यकलाप  , not their structure .
Thus , each `` vitamin '' refers  to a क्रमांक of vitamer यौगिकों कि सब दिखाएँ the biological कार्यकलाप संबद्ध  with a particular vitamin .
Such a set of chemicals is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin ``  जेनेरिक वर्णनकर्ता '' शीर्षक , ऐसे as `` विटामिन a `` , जिससे शामिल the  compounds retinal , retinol , and four known carotenoids .
Vitamers by definition are convertible to  the क्रियाशील रूप of the विटामिन in the देह , और हैं sometimes inter-convertible to एक  another , as well .
Vitamins have diverse  biochemical कृत्यों  .
Some have hormone-like functions as  regulators of खनिज चयापचय ( ऐसे as विटामिन d ) , or regulators of कोशिका और  tissue growth and differentiation ( such as some forms of vitamin A ) .
Others function as  antioxidants ( e.g. , विटामिन e और sometimes  vitamin C ) .
The largest number of vitamins ( such as B complex vitamins ) function as precursors for enzyme cofactors ,  कि सहायता एंजाइमों in उनके कार्य as catalysts in चयापचय .
In this role  , विटामिन may be tightly बंधी to एंजाइमों as भाग of prosthetic समूह  : For example , biotin is part of enzymes involved in making fatty acids .
Vitamins may also be less tightly  बंधी to एंजाइम catalysts as coenzymes , detachable अणुओं कि फलन  to carry chemical groups or electrons between molecules .
For  उदाहरण , फोलिक एसिड may carry मिथाइल , formyl  , and methylene groups in the cell .
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate reactions are vitamins '  best-known फलन , the अन्य विटामिन कृत्यों हैं बराबर महत्वपूर्ण  .
Until the mid-1930s , when the first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B complex and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement  टैबलेट यहूद बेची , विटामिन यहूद प्राप्त solely through खाना सेवन , और परिवर्तन in आहार ( जिससे , लिये उदाहरण , could occur दौरान a particular growing ऋतु ) प्रायः greatly altered  the types and amounts of vitamins ingested .
However ,  विटामिन have महरूम उत्पादित as कमोडिटी रसायन और बना widely उपलब्धियाँ as inexpensive  semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and food supplements and additives , since the middle of the 20th century .
World Muslim population by percentage  ( pew शोध बीच , 2009  )
संसार मुस्लिम जनसांख्यिकी  in millions
Islam is the world 's second largest  धर्म बाद christianity  .
according to a 2010 पढ़ाई , islam रै  1.62 billion adherents , making up over 23 % of the world population .
Islam is the  predominant धर्म in the मध्य ईस्ट , in सहेल , in the सींग of अफ़्रीकी  and northern Africa , and in some parts of Asia .
Large  समुदायों of मुसलमान हैं भी मिला  in China , the Balkans , and Russia .
Other parts of  the संसार मेजबान विशाल मुस्लिम अप्रवासी समुदायों ; in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय , लिये उदाहरण , islam is  the second largest religion after Christianity , where it represents 6 % of the total population .
according to the pew शोध बीच  in 2010 there were 49 Muslim-majority countries .
Around 62 % of the world 's Muslims live in  दक्षिण और southeast एशिया , साथ over 1 अरब adherents  .
the largest मुस्लिम देश is इंडोनेशिया , घर to 12.7 % of the संसार 's मुसलमान  , followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ) , India ( 10.9 % ) , and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ) .
परिचय 20 % of मुसलमान सजीव  in Arab countries .
In the Middle East , the non-Arab countries of Turkey and Iran are  the largest muslim-majority देशों ; in अफ़्रीकी , मिश्र और सीरियल have the सबसे populous मुस्लिम समुदायों  .
A study  conducted by the pew शोध बीच in 2010 और released  January 2011 found that there are 1.62 billion Muslims around the world .
The study found more Muslims  in the संयुक्त किंगडम than in लेबनान और  more in China than in Syria .
rhode द्वीप ( or ) , officially the राज्य of rhode द्वीप  and Providence Plantations , is a state in the New England region of the United States .
Rhode Island is the smallest in  क्षेत्रफल , the आठवीं तनिक populous , लकिन the दूसरी सबसे densely  populated of the 50 US states behind New Jersey .
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the  वेस्ट और मैसाचुसेट्स to the उत्तर और ईस्ट  , and it shares a water boundary with New York 's Long Island to the southwest .
Rhode Island was the first of the  13 असली colonies to घोषित स्वतंत्रता  from British rule , declaring itself independent on May 4 , 1776 , two months before any other colony .
The State was also the last of the thirteen original  colonies to ratify the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान  .
Rhode  द्वीप 's आधिकारिक उपनाम is `` the समंदर राज्य '' , a सन्दर्भ to the  State 's geography , since Rhode Island has several large bays and inlets that amount to about 14 % of its total area .
Its land area is , but its  कुल क्षेत्रफल is significantly larger  .
Dubai ( ; ' , ) is a city in the  संयुक्त अरब अमीरात , स्तिथ भीतर  the emirate of the same name .
The emirate of Dubai is located on the southeast  coast of the पारसी गल्फ on the arabian प्रायद्वीप और is एक of the सात अमीरात  that make up the country .
It has the largest population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 )  और the second-largest जमीन territory by क्षेत्रफल ( 4,114 km2 ) बाद abu  Dhabi .
Dubai and Abu  धाबी , the नेशनल पूंजी , हैं the तभी दो अमीरात to have वीटो शक्ति over नाजुक matters  of national importance in the country 's legislature .
The city of Dubai is located on the emirate 's northern  तटरेखा और heads up the dubai-sharjah-ajman महानगर क्षेत्रफल  .
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a country or  city-state और , in कुछ मामले , the uae as a पूरे रै महरूम वर्णित as  'Dubai ' .
The earliest mention of Dubai is in  1095 ad , और the earliest अंकित उपनिवेश in  the region dates from 1799 .
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally established in 1833 by Sheikh Maktoum bin Butti Al-Maktoum when he persuaded around 800 members of his tribe of the Bani Yas , living in what was then the Second Saudi  राज्य और अभी भाग of सऊदी अरब , to follow उसे to the दुबई क्रीक by the abu falasa गोत्र of  the Bani Yas .
It remained under the tribe 's control when the United Kingdom  assumed सुरक्षा of the sheikhdom in 1892 और joined the nascent संयुक्त अरब अमीरात  upon independence in 1971 as the country 's second emirate .
Its strategic geographic location made the town an important trading hub and by the  शुरूआत of the 20th सदी , दुबई थी already an महत्वपूर्ण क्षेत्रीय बंदरगाहों  .
Today , Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan  metropolis कि रै grown steadily to become a वैश्विक नगर और a कारोबार और सांस्कृतिक  hub of the Middle East and the Persian Gulf region .
Although Dubai 's economy was historically built on the oil industry , the emirate 's Western-style model of business drives its economy with the  प्रमुख revenues अभी coming इससे पर्यटन , रियल एस्टेट , और वित्तीय  services .
Dubai has recently attracted world attention through many innovative large  निर्माण प्रोजेक्ट और खेल कार्यक्रम  .
The  नगर रै become सांकेतिक लिये इसके skyscrapers और high-rise इमारतें , ऐसे as the संसार  's tallest Burj Khalifa , in addition to ambitious development projects including man-made islands , hotels , and some of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world .
This increased attention has also  highlighted मजदूर और इंसान अधिकारों मुद्दे concerning  the city 's largely South Asian paid workforce .
Dubai 's property market  अनुभवी a प्रमुख deterioration in 2008–2009 as a परिणाम  of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008 .
However , Dubai has made a steady  और क्रमिक रिकवरी साथ सहायता coming  from neighboring emirates .
The handful of new projects  कि हैं in the पाइपलाइन have महरूम समर्थ  to help Dubai real estate make a comeback .
As of 2012 , Dubai is the 22nd most expensive city in the world , and the most  महंगी नगर in the मध्य ईस्ट , surpassing इसराईल 's tel aviv ( 31st )  .
Dubai  रै भी महरूम रेटेड as एक of the बेहतरीन स्थान to सजीव in the मध्य  East , including by US American global consulting firm Mercer who rated the city as the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011 .

सतह of the अटलांटिक समंदर बैठक the  Earth 's planetary boundary layer and troposphere .
Waves on an  समंदर coast .
इस एनिमेशन उपयोग धरती विज्ञान आंकड़ा इससे a किस्में of सेंसर on नासा धरती observing satellites to माप शारीरिक  oceanography parameters such as ocean currents , ocean winds , sea surface height and sea surface temperature .
An ocean ( ; the World Ocean of classical antiquity ) is a body of saline water that  composes a विशाल भाग of a ग्रह 's जलमंडल  .
In the context of  धरती , it refers to एक or सब of the प्रमुख विभाजन of the ग्रह 's संसार समंदर – वे हैं , in descending अनुक्रम of  area , the Pacific , Atlantic , Indian , Southern ( Antarctic ) , and Arctic Oceans .
The word `` sea `` is often used interchangeably with `` ocean '' ,  लकिन सख्ती बोलना a समुद्र is a देह of saline जल  ( possibly a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land .
Earth is the only planet known to have an  समंदर ( or कोई विशाल amounts of खोलें द्रव  water ) .
Approximately 72 % of the planet 's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline water that is  customarily विभाजित into अनेक प्रिंसिपल महासागर और छोटी  seas , with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface .
In terms of the  जलमंडल of the धरती  , the ocean contains 97 % of the Earth 's water .
Oceanographers have  stated कि आउट of 97 % , तभी 5 % of the समंदर  as a whole on Earth has been explored .
Because it is the principal component  of धरती 's जलमंडल , the संसार समंदर is अभिन्न to सब ज्ञात जीवन  , forms part of the carbon cycle , and influences climate and weather patterns .
The total volume  is लगभग 1.3 अरब घन किलोमीटर  ( 310 million cu mi ) with an average depth of .
it is the आवास of 230,000 ज्ञात प्रजाति , हालांकि much of the समंदर  's depths remain unexplored and it is estimated that over two million marine species exist .
The origin of Earth 's oceans is still unknown , but oceans are believed to have formed  in the hadean काल और may have महरूम the impetus लिये the emergence  of life .
Extraterrestrial oceans may  be रचित of a चौड़ी दायरा of तत्व और यौगिकों  .
The only  पुष्टि विशाल stable लाशें of extraterrestrial सतह  liquids are the lakes of Titan , although there is evidence for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System .
Early in their geologic histories ,  मंगल और शुक्र हैं theorized to have था  large water oceans .
The Mars ocean hypothesis suggests that nearly a third of the surface of Mars was once covered by water , though the water on  मंगल is no longer oceanic , और a runaway ग्रीनहाउस प्रभाव may have boiled दूर the वैश्विक  ocean of Venus .
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point , so that water  might मौजूद in विशाल quantities in extraterrestrial environments  as brine or convecting ice .
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated  beneath the सतह of अनेक बौना ग्रह और प्राकृतिक satellites ; notably , the समंदर  of Europa is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth .
the सौर प्रणाली 's गैस दानव ग्रह हैं भी believed  to possess liquid atmospheric layers of yet to be confirmed compositions .
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons , including  सतह महासागर of द्रव जल भीतर a परितारकीय  habitable zone .
समंदर ग्रह हैं a काल्पनिक प्रकार of  planet with a surface completely covered with liquid .
Elvis  आरोन प्रेस्ली ( जनवरी 8 , 1935 – अगस्त 16  , 1977 ) was an American singer and actor .
A cultural icon , he  is commonly ज्ञात by the सिंगल नाम  Elvis .
One of the most popular musicians of the 20th  सदी , he is प्रायः referred to as the `` किंग of चट्टान और फेंकें '' or `` the किंग  '' .
Born in  tupelo , मिसिसिपी , प्रेस्ली स्थानांतरित to  Memphis , Tennessee , with his family at the age of 13 .
He began his career there in 1954 ,  working साथ सूर्य रिकॉर्ड मालिक sam phillips , जो चाही to लाओ the ध्वनि  of African-American music to a wider audience .
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist Bill Black , Presley  थी the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण popularizer of rockabilly , an uptempo , backbeat -ड्राइवn  fusion of country and rhythm and blues .
RCA Victor  acquired उसके अनुबंध in a सौदे arranged by कर्नल tom पार्कर , जो गई  on to manage the singer for over two decades .
Presley 's first  आरसीए सिंगल , `` heartbreak होटल `` ,  released in January 1956 , was a number-one hit .
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of rock and roll with a series  of संजाल टेलीविज़न दिखावे और chart-topping रिकॉर्ड  .
His energized interpretations of songs , many from African-American sources , and his  uninhibited प्रदर्शन स्टाइल बना उसे enormously popular—and विवादास्पद  .
In November  1956 , he बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू  in Love Me Tender .
Drafted into military  सेवा in 1958 , प्रेस्ली relaunched उसके रिकॉर्डिंग  career two years later with some of his most commercially successful work .
He  मंचन few कॉन्सर्ट however , और हिदायत by पार्कर , proceeded to devote  much of the 1960s to making Hollywood movies and soundtrack albums , most of them critically derided .
In 1968 , after seven years away from the stage , he returned to live performance in a celebrated  वापसी टेलीविज़न खास कि led to an विस्तारित लास वेगास कॉन्सर्ट रेसिडेंसी और a स्ट्रिंग  of profitable tours .
In 1973 Presley staged the first  कॉन्सर्ट ब्रॉडकास्ट globally via उपग्रह , aloha  from Hawaii .
Prescription drug abuse severely deteriorated his health  , और he died एकाएक in 1977  at the age of 42 .
प्रेस्ली is regarded as एक of the सबसे  important figures of 20th-century popular culture .
He had a versatile voice and unusually wide success  encompassing अनेक जाति  , including country , pop ballads , gospel , and blues .
He is the best-selling  सोलो कलाकार in the इतिहास of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक  .
मनोनीत लिये 14 प्रतिस्पर्धी grammys , he जीती तीन , और प्राप्त the ग्रैमी  Lifetime Achievement Award at age 36 .
He has been inducted into  अनेक म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति  .
A  कांच of रूट  beer with foam
Root beer is a carbonated , sweetened beverage , originally  बना using the रूट of a sassafras संयंत्र ( or the छाल of  a sassafras tree ) as the primary flavor .
रूट बियर , popularized in उत्तर अमेरिका , आता  in two forms : alcoholic and soft drink .
The historical root beer was analogous to  छोटी बियर in कि the प्रक्रम provided a पेय साथ a बहुत कम दारू  content .
Although roots  हैं प्रयुक्त as the सोर्स of अनेक नरम पेय  throughout the world , often different names are used .
Fluorescent minerals emit  दृश्य लाइट जब उजागर to  ultraviolet light
Fluorescence is the emission of  लाइट by a पदार्थ कि रै अवशोषित लाइट or अन्य  electromagnetic radiation .
It is a form of  संदीप्ति .
In most  मामले , the उत्सर्जित लाइट रै a longer wavelength , और इसलिए निम्नतर  energy , than the absorbed radiation .
However , when the absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense , it is possible for one electron to absorb two  photons ; इस two-photon अवशोषण can सीसे to उत्सर्जन of विकिरण having a shorter wavelength than the अवशोषित विकिरण  .
The emitted  विकिरण may भी be of the वही wavelength as  the absorbed radiation , termed `` resonance fluorescence '' .
The most striking examples of fluorescence occur when the  अवशोषित विकिरण is in the पराबैंगनी प्रदेश of the वर्णक्रम , और यूँ अदृश्य to the इंसान नजर , और the उत्सर्जित लाइट is in  the visible region .
Fluorescence has many practical applications , including mineralogy , gemology ,  रासायनिक सेंसर ( प्रतिदीप्ति स्पेक्ट्रमिकी ) , fluorescent लेबलिंग , dyes , biological डिटेक्टरों  , and , most commonly , fluorescent lamps .
Informal logic , intuitively , refers to the  सिद्धान्त of लॉजिक और लॉजिकल विचार बाहर of a औपचारिक सेटिंग  .
However , perhaps because of the informal in the title ,  the precise परिभाषा of अनौपचारिक लॉजिक  is a matter of some dispute .
Ralph H.  जॉनसन और J. एंथोनी ब्लेयर define अनौपचारिक लॉजिक as `` a शाखा of लॉजिक जिनकी कार्य is to develop non-formal मानकों , मापदण्ड  , procedures for the analysis , interpretation , evaluation , criticism and construction of argumentation . ''
This definition reflects what had been implicit in their  अभ्यास और कया अन्य यहूद doing in उनके अनौपचारिक लॉजिक ग्रन्थ  .
Informal logic is associated with ( informal ) fallacies ,  नाजुक सोच , the सोच कौशल गति और the interdisciplinary  inquiry known as argumentation theory .
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that the label `` informal logic '' covers  a `` संग्रहण of normative approaches to the पढ़ाई of तर्क  in ordinary language that remain closer to the practice of argumentation than formal logic . ''
USA annual  रियल जीडीपी 1910–60 , साथ the सालो  of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960 , with the years of the  ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted  .
The Great Depression began in August of 1929 , when the  संयुक्त राज्य अर्थव्यवस्था पहला गई into an आर्थिक  recession .
हालांकि the देश खर्च दो महीने साथ घटती जीडीपी , it थी नहीं जबतक the वॉल गली  Crash of October , 1929 that the effects of a declining economy were felt , and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued .
The market crash marked the beginning of a decade of high unemployment , poverty , low profits , deflation ,  plunging फार्म incomes , और खोया अवसर लिये आर्थिक विकास और निजी उन्नति  .
Although its causes are still uncertain and controversial ,  the जाल प्रभाव थी a अचानक और सामान्य घाटा of विश्वास in the आर्थिक  future .
The usual explanations include numerous factors , especially high consumer debt ,  ill-regulated बाज़ार कि permitted overoptimistic लोन by बैंको और निवेशकों , और the कमी of high-growth नई उद्योग , सब interacting to बनाएँ a downward आर्थिक सर्पिल of घटाया बिता , गिरना  confidence , and lowered production .
Industries that suffered the most included construction  , कृषि as dust-bowl शर्तें persisted in the agricultural heartland , शिपिंग , खनन , और  logging as well as durable goods like automobiles and appliances that could be postponed .
The economy  पहुँचे नीचे in the शीत of 1932–33 ; तब आए चार सालो of बहुत रैपिड विकास  until 1937 , when the Recession of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment .
the अवसाद caused  major political changes in America .
Three years into the depression , Herbert  हूवर खोया the 1932 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव to फ्रैंकलिन delano रूज़वेल्ट  in a sweeping landslide .
Roosevelt 's economic recovery plan , the New Deal , instituted unprecedented programs for relief , recovery  और सुधार , और brought परिचय a प्रमुख realignment of अमरीकी  politics .
The Depression also resulted in an  बढ़ाएँ of करणों of लोगों to अन्य देशों लिये the पहला समय in  American history .
लिये उदाहरण , कुछ आप्रवासियों गई वापस to उनके देशी देशों ,  and some native US citizens went to Canada , Australia , and South Africa .
It also  resulted in the द्रव्यमान माइग्रेशन of लोगों इससे badly hit क्षेत्रों in the ग्रेट मैदान और the दक्षिण to स्थान ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the उत्तर , क्रमशः  ( see Okies and the Great Migration of African Americans ) .
Racial tensions also  increased दौरान इस समय  .
By the 1940s immigration  था लौटे वापस to  normal , and emigration declined .
A well-known example of an  emigrant थी फ़्रैंक mccourt , जो गई to आयरलैंड , as  recounted in his book Angela 's Ashes .
The  मेमोरी of the अवसाद भी तराशा आधुनिक theories of अर्थशास्त्र और resulted in अनेक परिवर्तन in कैसा the  government dealt with economic downturns , such as the use of stimulus packages , Keynesian economics , and Social Security .
It also shaped modern American literature , resulting in famous novels such as John Steinbeck 's ``  the अंगूर of प्रकोप `` और `` of चूहे और मेन ``  .
The Great  अवसाद of the 1930s प्रारंभ साथ the भण्डार  market crash of October 1929 .
तुर्कों ( ) , officially the गणतंत्र of तुर्कों , is a transcontinental देश , स्तिथ ज़्यादातर on  Anatolia in Western Asia and on East Thrace in Southeastern Europe .
Turkey is  bordered by आठ देशों : बुल्गारिया to the उत्तरपश्चिम ; यूनानियों to the वेस्ट ; जॉर्जिया  to the northeast ; Armenia , Iran and the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast .
The Mediterranean Sea is to the  दक्षिण ; the ईजियन समुद्र is to the वेस्ट ; और the ब्लैक  Sea is to the north .
The Sea of Marmara , the Bosphorus and the Dardanelles ( which together form the  तुर्की straits ) demarcate the boundary between thrace और आनातोलिया ; वे भी पृथक  Europe and Asia .
Turkey 's location at the crossroads of  यूरोपीय और एशिया makes it a देश of significant geostrategic  importance .
The country  's आधिकारिक भाषा is तुर्की , a turkic भाषा  , which is spoken by approximately 85 % of the population as mother tongue .
The most numerous  जातीय समूह is the turks , जो constitute between  70 % and 75 % of the population according to The World Factbook .
Kurds are the largest  जातीय अल्पसंख्यक और , according to the वही सोर्स , क्रमांक around  18 % of the population while other ethnic minorities are estimated to be at 7–12 % .
The vast majority  of the जनसांख्यिकी is  Muslim .
The area now called Turkey has been inhabited since the  paleolithic , सहित विभिन्न प्राचीन आनातोलियाई सभ्यताओं  and Thracian peoples .
After Alexander the Great 's  conquest , the क्षेत्रफल थी hellenized , जिससे जारी साथ the  Roman rule and the transition into the Byzantine Empire .
the सलजूक़ turks began migrating into the क्षेत्रफल in the 11th सदी , starting the प्रक्रम of turkification  , which was greatly accelerated by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071 .
The Seljuk Sultanate  of rûm शासित आनातोलिया जबतक the mongol आक्रमण in 1243 ,  upon which it disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks .
Starting from the late 13th century , the Ottoman beylik  संयुक्त आनातोलिया और निर्मित an साम्राज्य encompassing much of southeastern  Europe , Western Asia and North Africa .
After the  उस्मानी साम्राज्य collapsed following इसके शिकस्त in संसार युद्ध i , भाग  of it were occupied by the victorious Allies .
A cadre of  यंग सैन्य अधिकारियों , led by mustafa kemal अतातुर्क और  his colleagues , organized a successful resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they established the modern Republic of Turkey , with Atatürk as its first president .
Turkey is a democratic , secular ,  एकात्मक , संवैधानिक गणतंत्र  with a diverse cultural heritage .
Turkey has become  increasingly एकीकृत साथ the वेस्ट through सदस्यता in संगठनों  such as the Council of Europe , NATO , OECD , OSCE and the G-20 major economies .
Turkey began full membership negotiations with the European  संघ in 2005 , having महरूम an संबद्ध सदस्य of the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ चूंकि 1963 और having  joined the EU Customs Union in 1995 .
Turkey has also fostered close cultural , political and economic relations  साथ the मध्य ईस्ट , काकेशस , the turkic राज्य of सेंट्रल एशिया और the अफ़्रीकी देशों through सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे as the turkic परिषद  , Joint Administration of Turkic Arts and Culture , Organisation of Islamic Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation .
Turkey 's growing  अर्थव्यवस्था और राजनयिक पहलों have led to  its recognition as a regional power .
तुर्कों is the संसार 's 17th largest अर्थव्यवस्था by नाममात्र जीडीपी और the  16th largest by purchasing power parity .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg ( , ( born November 13 , 1955 ) is an American  comedienne , अभिनेत्री , singer-songwriter , राजनैतिक activist , लेखक और  talk show host .
Goldberg made her  फिल्मी डेब्यू in the रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ) ,  playing Celie , a mistreated black woman in the Deep South .
She received a  नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री और जीती उसके  first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film .
In  1990 , वो निभाई oda mae भूरा , a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze  ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best  supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत  an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939 .
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2 ,  the खिलाड़ी , बना in अमेरिका , कैसा स्टेला मिला उसके नाली  Back , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation , as  टेरी doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश , और as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली , as खूब as the आवाज़ of shenzi the लकड़बग्घा  in The Lion King .
Goldberg has been  मनोनीत लिये 13 एमी पुरस्कार  for her work in television .
She  थी co-producer of the लोकप्रिय खेल  show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004 .
वो रै महरूम the मॉडरेटर of the दिन  talk show The View since 2007 .
Goldberg  रै a ग्रैमी , दो दिन emmys , दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स  , a Tony ( for production , not acting ) , and an Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg has a British  अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार , चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार , और रै महरूम सम्मानित साथ  a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She is one of the few  मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have जीती an एमी , ग्रैमी , ऑस्कर , और  Tony Award .
Augusta  is a संचित नगर in the u.S. राज्य of जॉर्जिया  , located at the fall line of the Savannah River , at the head of its navigable portion .
As of the 2010 census , the Augusta– Richmond County population was 195,844 not counting  the unconsolidated शहरों of hephzibah और  Blythe .
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta –  रिचमंड काउंटी महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , जिससे as of 2010 था an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of 556,877 , बनाना  it both the second-largest city and the second-largest metro area in the state after Atlanta .
It is the 116th-largest  नगर in the संयुक्त  States .
Internationally , Augusta  is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये होस्टिंग the मास्टर्स  Tournament in golf each spring .
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed  कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क जिससे contains आंकड़ा .
The name is  an एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड  for `` Compact Disc Read-only memory `` .
Computers can read  cd-roms , लकिन can नहीं  write on them .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software , including video games and multimedia  अनुप्रयोग , हालांकि कोई आंकड़ा can be भंडारित ( up to the क्षमता  limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called enhanced CDs , hold  दोनो कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और ऑडियो साथ the latter सक्षम of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी , जबकि आंकड़ा ( ऐसे as तन्त्र  or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow Book  is the तकनीकी मानक कि defines the  format of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of color-bound  किताबे कि contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप , the पीला  Book , created by Sony and Philips , was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It  adapted the स्वरूप  to hold any form of data .
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks before 1986 , and  ज्ञात colloquially as the चीलों ) हैं a पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी टोली आधारित in  Chicago , Illinois .
They are members of the  सेंट्रल प्रभाग of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन of the नेशनल  Hockey League ( NHL ) .
They have won four Stanley Cup  championships चूंकि उनके founding in 1926 , सबसे recently in 2009–10  .
The Blackhawks are one of the Original Six NHL  टीमों , साथ साथ the डेट्रॉयट रेड विंग्स , मॉन्ट्रियल canadiens , टोरंटो  Maple Leafs , Boston Bruins and New York Rangers .
Since the  ब्लैकहॉक्स have निभाई उनके घर खेल at the संयुक्त बीच बाद having खर्च 65  years playing at Chicago Stadium .
Lent celebrants  carrying आउट a गली बारात  during Holy Week .
The violet color is  प्रायः संबद्ध साथ penance और detachment  .
Similar Christian penitential  अभ्यास is देखी in अन्य कैथोलिक देशों , sometimes  associated with mortification of the flesh .
granada , निकारागुआ  .
Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year  of अनेक ईसाई denominations , स्थायी  for a period of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday .
In the general  latin-rite और सबसे पश्चिमी denominations lent is लिया to चलाएं इससे राख  Wednesday to Maundy Thursday ( Holy Thursday ) morning or to Easter Eve .
In the Catholic Church , Lent lasts until Holy  गुरुवार , जबकि अन्य denominations  run until Easter Eve .
The  परंपरागत purpose of lent is the तैयारी of the आस्तिक through  prayer , penance , repentance , almsgiving , and self-denial .
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of Holy Week , marking the death , burial and resurrection of Jesus , which recalls the events of the Bible when Jesus is  crucified on शुभ शुक्रवार , जिससे तब culminates in the जश्न on ईस्टर संडे of the क़यामत of यीशु मसीह .
During Lent , many of the  वफादार कमिट to उपवास or giving up निश्चित प्रकार of luxuries  as a form of penitence .
The Stations of the Cross , a devotional commemoration of  मसीह 's carrying the क्रॉस और of उसके निष्पादन  , are often observed .
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches  हटाएँ पुष्प इससे उनके altars , जबकि crucifixes , धार्मिक मूर्तियाँ , और अन्य विस्तृत धार्मिक प्रतीकों हैं प्रायः रहमत in बैंगनी fabrics in solemn  observance of the event .
In certain  परहेज़गारों कैथोलिक देशों , कुछ adherents चिह्नित the  season with the traditional abstention from the consumption of meat .
in कुछ देशों , ग्रैंड धार्मिक जुलूसों और सांस्कृतिक कस्टम हैं observed , और the वफादार attempt to  visit seven churches during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary .
Lent is traditionally described as lasting for forty days , in commemoration  of the चालीस दिनों जिससे , according to the gospels of मैथ्यू , चिह्नित और ल्यूक , यीशु खर्च उपवास in the मरुस्थल पहले the शुरूआत  of his public ministry , where he endured temptation by the Devil .
However , different Christian  denominations गणना the चालीस दिनों of  Lent differently .
In most Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as part of Lent ; thus the  काल इससे राख बुधवार जबतक ईस्टर consists of 40 दिनों जब the  Sundays are excluded .
However in  the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर lent is अभी लिया to समाप्त on पावन गुरुवार बल्कि  than Easter Eve , and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays , or 44 days in total .
This event , along with  इसके परहेज़गारों कस्टम हैं observed by catholics , lutherans  , Methodists , Presbyterians , and Anglicans .
स्थान of chernobyl नाभिकीय  power plant
The abandoned  नगर of pripyat साथ chernobyl संयंत्र  in the distance
Abandoned  आवास  blocks in Pripyat
The Chernobyl disaster ( , Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the  chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ) , जिससे थी अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार  of the central authorities of the Soviet Union .
An explosion and fire released large quantities of  रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the माहौल , जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the पश्चिमी  USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history , and is one of only two classified as a level 7 event on the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति in 2011 )  .
The battle  to contain the संदूषण और avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल  over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles .
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been  विवादित , और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers और  deformities are still being accounted for .
In grammar , a subject complement is a predicative expression that  फ़ॉलो a linking क्रिया ( copula ) और कि complements ( completes ) the विषय of the वाक्य by either  ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it .
in the पूर्व मामला , a renaming संज्ञा phrase  such as a noun or pronoun is called a predicative nominal .
An adjective following the copula  और describing the विषय is पुकारा a predicative  adjective .
In either case the predicative complement  in प्रभाव mirrors  the subject .
Subject complements are used with a small class of verbs called linking verbs or copula ,  of जिससे be is the सबसे  common .
Since copula are stative  क्रियाएँ , विषय complements हैं  not affected by any action of the verb .
Subject complements are  typically नहीं clause वितर्क , nor हैं वे clause  adjuncts .
Throughout the fifty-five year  इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , अनेक significant  records have been set .
This page only includes the  प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार जीती by विभिन्न कलाकारों  .
This does not include the various special awards that are presented by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences such as  आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार ,  Trustees Awards , Technical Awards or Legend Awards .
The page however does  शामिल अन्य non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात  as the Craft & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ) .
Marshall Bruce Mathers III ( born October 17 , 1972 ) , better known by his stage name  एमिनेम ( stylized as eminǝm ) और by उसके alter अहंकार पतला छायादार , is an अमरीकी rapper , रिकार्ड निर्माता , songwriter और कर्ता  .
Eminem , along with  उसके सोलो करियर , is a सदस्य of उसके समूह d12 , और भी एक  half of the hip hop duo Bad Meets Evil , with Royce da 5'9 '' .
Eminem is  एक of the best-selling कलाकारों  in the world and is the best-selling artist of the 2000s .
He has been listed and ranked as one of the  महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय by अनेक मैगज़ीन , सहित रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका जिससे क्रमित उसे 82nd on इसके सूची of the  100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
The same magazine declared  उसे the किंग of हिप हॉप .
Including his  कार्य साथ d12 और ख़राब meets दुष्ट , एमिनेम रै  achieved ten number-one albums on the Billboard 200 .
He has sold more than 100 million records worldwide , including 42 million tracks and 49.1  लाख एल्बम in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
As an underground rapper Eminem released  उसके डेब्यू सोलो एल्बम ,  Infinite in 1996 .
The album was a  नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक  failure .
He gained mainstream  लोकप्रियता in 1999 बाद the रिलीज of उसके major-label  debut album The Slim Shady LP .
the lp भी अर्जित एमिनेम उसके पहला ग्रैमी  Award for Best Rap Album .
His next  दो रिकॉर्ड the मार्शल mathers lp , और the एमिनेम दिखाएँ , भी जीती बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  , making Eminem the first artist to win Best Rap Album for three consecutive LPs .
This was  followed by another स्टुडियो रिलीज in 2004 titled  Encore .
Eminem then went on  अंतराल बाद touring in 2005  .
he released उसके पहला एल्बम in पाँच सालो titled  Relapse , on May 15 , 2009 .
In 2010 ,  एमिनेम released उसके सातवाँ  studio album Recovery .
Recovery was an international success and was named the best selling album of 2010  विश्वव्यापी , joining the एमिनेम दिखाएँ , जिससे थी the बेहतरीन विक्रेता  of 2002 .
Eminem won Grammy Awards for both Relapse and Recovery ,  giving उसे a कुल of 13 grammys in  his career .
Eminem has opened other ventures , including his own  रिकार्ड लेबल छायादार रिकॉर्ड साथ उसके मैनेजर पॉल rosenberg  .
He also has his own  रेडियो चैनल , शेड  45 on Sirius XM Radio .
Eminem began an acting career in  2002 , जब he स्ट्रक्चर in the हिप हॉप नाटक फिल्मी 8  Mile .
He won the Academy Award for Best  असली सोंग ,  becoming the first rap artist ever to win the award .
He has also made cameo appearances in The Wash ( 2001 )  , मजेदार लोगों ( 2009 ) और the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी अनुगामी  .
The acre is a unit of area used in  the इम्पीरियल और u.S. प्रथागत  systems .
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly smaller  than an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल फ़ील्ड  .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the United States , Australia , Burma and the United Kingdom  ( as of 2010 , the एकड़ is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त  Kingdom , though is still used in real estate descriptions ) .
It is still  प्रयुक्त , to कुछ  extent , in Canada .
The international symbol of the acre is ac , and is  पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a वर्गाकार मील  .
the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त  acre today is the international acre .
in the संयुक्त राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  acre and the slightly different US survey acre are in use .
the सबसे आम उपयोग of the  acre is to measure tracts of land .
One  अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 वर्गाकार  metres .
दौरान the मध्य आयु , an एकड़ थी the राशि of  land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen .
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of Conservation of Mass led to many  नई निष्कर्षों in the 19th सदी .
Joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions and John Dalton 's atomic theory  branched इससे the discoveries of एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये  .
Lavoisier 's  quantitative प्रयोग नाज़िल कि दहन शामिल ऑक्सीजन  rather than what was previously thought to be phlogiston .
The law of conservation of mass , or  principle of द्रव्यमान संरक्षण , राज्य कि लिये कोई प्रणाली बंद to सब हस्तांतरण of पदार्थ और उर्जा ( दोनो of जिससे have  mass ) , the mass of the system must remain constant over time , as system mass can not change quantity if it is not added or removed .
Hence ,  the मात्रा of द्रव्यमान  is `` conserved '' over time .
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor destroyed ,  हालांकि it may be rearranged in स्पेस , or the entities संबद्ध साथ it may be बदला in रूप , as लिये उदाहरण जब लाइट or शारीरिक कार्य is रूपांतरित  into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed .
The law implies ( requires ) that during any chemical  प्रतिक्रिया , नाभिकीय प्रतिक्रिया , or रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय in an पृथक प्रणाली , the द्रव्यमान of the  reactants or starting material must equal the mass of the products .
The concept of mass conservation is widely used in  अनेक फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रसायन , यांत्रिकी , और द्रव डायनामिक्स  .
Historically , mass  संरक्षण थी खोजा in रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये  in the late 18th century , and was of crucial importance in the progress from alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry .
The closely related concept of matter conservation was found to hold good in chemistry to such high approximation that it failed only for the high energies treated by the later refinements of relativity  सिद्धान्त , लकिन वरना remains उपयोगी और fear सटीक लिये सबसे रासायनिक calculations , भी in आधुनिक  practice .
In special relativity , needed for accuracy when large energy transfers between  प्रणालियों is शामिल , the अंतर between thermodynamically बंद और पृथक प्रणालियों becomes महत्वपूर्ण  , since conservation of mass is strictly and perfectly upheld only for so-called isolated systems , i.e . those completely isolated from all exchanges with the environment .
In this circumstance , the mass-energy equivalence theorem  राज्य कि द्रव्यमान संरक्षण is समतुल्य to कुल उर्जा संरक्षण , जिससे  is the first law of thermodynamics .
By contrast , for a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e. , one which is closed to  exchanges of पदार्थ , लकिन खोलें to exchanges of non-material उर्जा , ऐसे as ऊष्मा और कार्य , साथ the  surroundings ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved .
The input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the system in relativity theory , although the change is usually  छोटी , चूंकि अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of ऐसे उर्जा ( by तुलना साथ ordinary अनुभव ) carry तभी a छोटी राशि of द्रव्यमान ( again by ordinary मानकों of  measurement ) .
In special relativity , mass is not converted  to उर्जा , चूंकि उर्जा in सब of इसके फ़ॉर्म सदा retains इसके समतुल्य राशि  of mass throughout any transformation or translocation into , or out of , a system .
However , certain types of matter ( a different concept )  may be परिवर्तित to उर्जा , so long as the द्रव्यमान of the  system is unchanged in the process .
However , if such energy  is removed इससे प्रणालियों , वे जरूर खोना the द्रव्यमान कि  is associated with it .
In general relativity , mass ( and energy ) conservation in expanding volumes of  स्पेस is a जटिल अवधारणा , विषय to अलग परिभाषाएं , और neither द्रव्यमान nor उर्जा is as सख्ती और बस  conserved as is the case in special relativity and in Minkowski space .
For a discussion  , देखिए द्रव्यमान in सामान्य  relativity .
A pig is any of the animals in the  genus सस , भीतर the suidae  family of even-toed ungulates .
Pigs include the domestic  सुअर , इसके पूर्वज the जंगली boar , और  several other wild relatives .
Young and small  सूअर हैं ज्ञात as piglets  .
Pigs are  omnivores और हैं अत्यधिक सोशल और बुद्धिमान  animals .
8-inch ,  -inch , और -inch फ्लॉपी  disks
8-inch ,  -inch ( पूरा ऊँचाई  ) , and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch diskette 's ``  फ्लॉपी '' चुम्बकीय सामग्री , removed  from its housing
A floppy disk  , or diskette , is a डिस्क भंडार मीडियम रचित of a डिस्क of पतला और लचीली चुम्बकीय  storage medium , sealed in a rectangular plastic carrier lined with fabric that removes dust particles .
They are read and  लिखा by a फ्लॉपी डिस्क ड्राइव  ( FDD ) .
Floppy disks , initially as media and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes , were a  सर्वव्यापी रूप of आंकड़ा भंडार और एक्सचेंज इससे the mid-1970s खूब into the पहला  decade of the 21st century .
By 2010 , computer  motherboards यहूद rarely manufactured साथ फ्लॉपी ड्राइव support ; `` floppies could be प्रयुक्त as an बाह्य  USB drive , but `` , 8 `` , and non-standard drives could only be handled by old equipment .
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses , especially with legacy industrial computer equipment , they have been superseded by data  भंडार विधि साथ much वृहद क्षमता , ऐसे as usb फ्लैश ड्राइव , पोर्टेबल बाह्य मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव , ऑप्टिकल discs , मेमोरी ताश , और कंप्यूटर  networks .
An  एनिमेटेड आरेख of  a cutter
In baseball , a cutter ,  or काटें fastball , is a प्रकार of fastball जिससे ब्रेक थोड़ा toward the पिचर 's  glove side as it reaches home plate .
This pitch is somewhere between a  स्लाइडर और a fastball , as it is प्रायः thrown तेज़ than a स्लाइडर लकिन  with more motion than a typical fastball .
कुछ pitchers उपयोग a कटर as  a way to prevent hitters from expecting their regular fastballs .
A common technique  प्रयुक्त to throw a कटर is to उपयोग a four-seam fastball  grip with the baseball set slightly off center in the hand .
When a batter is able to hit a cutter pitch , it often results in soft contact and an easy out , due to the  पिच 's गति keeping the बॉल दूर इससे the चमगादड़ 's मीठी स्पॉट  .
the कटर is typically  2–5 mph slower than a pitcher 's four-seam fastball .
In 2010 , the average pitch classified as a cutter by  pitchf/x thrown by a right-handed पिचर थी 88.6 किमी ; the औसत four-seamer  was 92.1 mph .
`` What  it takes '' is a शक्ति ballad by अमरीकी  hard rock band Aerosmith .
It was written by Steven  टायलर , जो पेरी , और डेसमंड  Child .
It was released in 1990 as the third single from  एरोस्मिथ 's critically और commercially कामयाब  1989 album Pump .
In the video The  बनाना of पंप , a & r man जॉन kalodner वर्णित  the song as `` a masterpiece '' .
During live performances , Tyler sings the first verse a  cappella और बेल्ट आउट एक of उसके हस्ताक्षर चिल्लाती सही  before the chorus .
The  एल्बम संस्करण of the सोंग is followed  by an untitled hidden track .
