Odysseus ( or ;  यूनानी : , ) , भी ज्ञात by the रोमन  name Ulysses ( ; ) , was a legendary Greek king of Ithaca and a hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey .
Odysseus also plays a key role  in होमर 's इलियड और अन्य works in कि  same Epic Cycle .
Husband of Penelope , father of Telemachus , and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea , Odysseus is renowned for his  brilliance , छल , और versatility ( polytropos ) , और is hence ज्ञात by the epithet odysseus the cunning ( mētis ,  or `` cunning intelligence `` ) .
He is most famous for the ten eventful years he took to return  घर बाद the decade-long trojan युद्ध और उसके प्रसिद्ध trojan  Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy .
Erie is a Statutory Town in Boulder and Weld counties in  the u.S. राज्य of कोलोराडो .
The population according  to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी is 18,135 और थी अंकित  as 6,291 at the 2000 census .
The Town of Erie is located just west of  i-25 लिये आसान अभिगम to i-70 , डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र  and Colorado 's entire Front Range .
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 square miles , extending from the  उत्तर पक्ष of राज्य राजमार्ग 52 दक्षिण to राज्य राजमार्ग 7 , और between us 287 on the वेस्ट  and Interstate 25 to the east .
Erie is  लगभग 35 मिनट्स इससे डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , 25 मिनट्स  to Denver and 20 minutes from Boulder .
The Board of Trustees serves as the legislative and governing  देह of the कस्बा of erie और is जिम्मेदार लिये establishing  Town policies and goals .
The Board has the authority to adopt laws , ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the business of the Town ,  और by अध्यादेश may डालें into अनुबंध or intergovernmental समझौतों to furnish , प्राप्त सेवाएं or to provide लिये सहकारी सेवा डिलीवरी  .
Appointed by and  सेवारत at the ख़ुशी of the फलक of trustees , the कस्बा व्यवस्थापक is the मुख्य ऑपरेटिंग और प्रशासनिक अधिकारी of the कस्बा और is जिम्मेदार लिये  providing professional leadership in the administration and execution of policies and objectives formulated by the Board .
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to  communicate और कार्य साथ the जातियाँ to maintain a सुरक्षित पर्यावरण , prevent  crime and enforce the law , while protecting the rights of all .
Erie Municipal Airport ( EIK ) is owned and  संचालित by the कस्बा of erie और is रणनीतिक स्तिथ in the denver-boulder महानगर क्षेत्रफल on कोलोराडो राजमार्ग 7 , a छोटी  over three miles west of Interstate 25 .
The main runway is  कंक्रीट प्रशस्त और 4,700  feet long .
The is a  घर वीडियो खेल कंसोल उत्पादित by सोनी कंप्यूटर  Entertainment .
it is the successor to the प्लेस्टेशन  2 , as part of the PlayStation series .
The  प्लेस्टेशन 3 competes साथ microsoft 's एक्सबॉक्स 360 और  Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles .
It was first  released  on November 11 , 2006 , in Japan , with international markets following shortly thereafter .
the कंसोल थी पहला officially  announced at E3 2005 .
originally नियत लिये a वसन्त 2006  release date , it was delayed several times until finally hitting stores at the end of the year .
It was the first and  फिलहाल तभी कंसोल to उपयोग blu-ray  Disc as its primary storage medium .
Major features of the console include its unified online gaming service , the PlayStation Network ,  और इसके कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल और प्लेस्टेशन वीटा , in सितंबर 2009 the अद्यतनीकृत प्लेस्टेशन  3 Slim , was released .
This Slim is lighter and thinner than  the असली संस्करण , हालांकि it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 पीछे संगतता ( removed on बाद असली  models ) , but notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design .
As of  नवम्बर 4 , 2012 , 70 लाख  PlayStation 3s have been sold worldwide .
Its successor ,  प्लेस्टेशन 4 , is नियत लिये a q4 2013  release .
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech , 1st Marqués de Dalí de Pubol ( May 11 , 1904January 23 , 1989 ) , known as  साल्वाडोर dalí ( ) , थी a prominent स्पेनी surrealist चित्रकार born in figueres  , Spain .
Dalí was a skilled draftsman , best known for the  striking और विचित्र बिंब in उसके surrealist  work .
His painterly  कौशल हैं प्रायः attributed to the influence  of Renaissance masters .
His best-known work ,  the हठ of मेमोरी ,  was completed in 1931 .
Dalí 's expansive artistic repertoire included  फिल्मी , मूर्तिकला , और छायाचित्र , in सहयोग साथ  a range of artists in a variety of media .
Dalí attributed his `` love of everything that is gilded and  excessive , my जुनून लिये लक्ज़री और my प्रेम of प्राच्य कपडे '' to a self-styled  `` Arab lineage '' , claiming that his ancestors were descended from the Moors .
Dalí was highly  कल्पनाशील , और भी enjoyed indulging in असामान्य  and grandiose behavior .
His eccentric  manner और attention-grabbing पब्लिक क्रियाएँ sometimes खींचा अधिक ध्यान than उसके कलाकृति , to the dismay of those  who held his work in high esteem , and to the irritation of his critics .
पारस प्लेटो  by Silanion
The humanities are academic disciplines that study human culture , using methods that are primarily  विश्लेषणात्मक , नाजुक , or सट्टे , और having a significant ऐतिहासिक तत्व , as विशिष्ट इससे the मुख्यतः  empirical approaches of the natural sciences .
The humanities include ancient and  आधुनिक भाषाएं , साहित्य , दर्शनशास्त्र , धर्म ,  and visual and performing arts such as music and theatre .
The humanities that are also regarded as social  sciences शामिल इतिहास , मानवशास्त्र , क्षेत्रफल अध्ययन , संचार अध्ययन , सांस्कृतिक  studies , law , economics and linguistics .
Scholars working in  the मानवता हैं sometimes वर्णित  as `` humanists '' .
However , that term also  describes the philosophical स्थिति of मानवतावाद  , which some `` antihumanist `` scholars in the humanities reject .
Some secondary schools offer  मानवता वर्ग , प्रायः consisting of  English literature , global studies , and art .
Human disciplines like history , cultural anthropology and psychoanalysis study subject  matters to जिससे the प्रायोगिक विधि करता नहीं लागू , और वे have अभिगम बजाय to the तुलनात्मक  method and comparative research .
The  2005 ब्लू रूम क्रिसमस  Tree
the श्वेत हाउस क्रिसमस पेड़ , भी ज्ञात as the ब्लू रूम क्रिसमस पेड़ , is  the official indoor Christmas tree at the residence of the President of the United States , the White House .
The first indoor Christmas tree was installed in the White House sometime in the 19th century ( there are varying claims as to the exact year ) and  चूंकि 1961 the पेड़ रै था a प्रसंग मोटिफ at the discretion of the पहला महिला  of the United States .
The President of the United States  of अमेरिका ( potus ) is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी  of the United States .
The  अध्यक्ष लीड the कार्यपालिका शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी और is the  commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the execution of  संघीय विधि , alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका , राजनयिक , नियामक , और न्यायिक अधिकारियों , और concluding treaties साथ विदेशी  powers , with the advice and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves , and to convene  और adjourn either or दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत  extraordinary circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States , the power of the president and the federal  सरकारी have grown substantially और प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष , despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स , is largely जिम्मेदार लिये dictating the विधान कार्यसूची  of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States .
The president is  अक्सर वर्णित as the सबसे शक्तिशाली  person in the world .
The president is  indirectly निर्वाचित by the लोगों through the चुनावी कॉलेज to a four-year पद , और is एक of  only two nationally elected federal officers , the other being the Vice President of the United States .
The Twenty-second Amendment , adopted in 1951 , prohibits anyone from ever  होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी लिये a तीसरा पूरा पद .
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than  एकबार if कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष , or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष , लिये अधिक than दो सालो of another व्यक्ति  's term as president .
In  सब , 43 individuals have परोसा  55 four-year terms .
On  जनवरी 20 , 2009 , बराक ओबामा became the  44th and current president .
On  नवम्बर 6 , 2012 , he थी re-elected  and is scheduled to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Senses are physiological capacities of  जीवों कि provide आंकड़ा लिये बोध  .
The senses and their operation , classification , and theory are overlapping topics studied  by a किस्में of फ़ील्ड , सबसे notably neuroscience , संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान ( or संज्ञानात्मक  science ) , and philosophy of perception .
The nervous system  रै a विशिष्ट संवेदी प्रणाली or अंग  , dedicated to each sense .
Humans have  a multitude of होश  .
Sight (  ophthalmoception ) , सुनना ( audioception ) ,  taste ( gustaoception ) , smell ( olfacoception or olfacception ) , and touch ( tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized .
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by the traditional senses exists , including temperature ( thermoception ) , kinesthetic sense ( proprioception ) , pain ( nociception ) , balance ( equilibrioception ) , acceleration ( kinesthesioception ) ,  और विभिन्न आतंरिक stimuli ( e.g . the अलग chemoreceptors लिये detecting नमक और कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड एकाग्रता in the रक्त ) , तभी a छोटी  number of these can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves .
What constitutes a sense is  a पदार्थ of कुछ बहस , अग्रणी  to difficulties in defining what exactly a sense is .
Animals also have  receptors to भाव the संसार around उन्हें , साथ डिग्री of काबिलियत varying  greatly between species .
Humans have a  comparatively कमजोर भाव of महकते , जबकि कुछ पशु may कमी  one or more of the traditional five senses .
Some animals may also  सेवन और interpret संवेदी stimuli in बहुत अलग  ways .
Some species of animals are  समर्थ to भाव the संसार in a रास्ता कि इंसानो can नहीं , साथ कुछ प्रजाति समर्थ to भाव विद्युत और चुम्बकीय  fields , and detect water pressure and currents .
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are  air-breathing arthropods कि have आठ टाँगे और chelicerae  with fangs that inject venom .
They are the largest order of arachnids and rank  सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता among सब अन्य समूह of जीवों  .
Spiders are  मिला विश्वव्यापी on प्रत्येक महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक  , and have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 , at least 43,678 spider species , and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however , there has  महरूम भ्रम भीतर the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as to कैसा सब ये परिवारों चाहिए be वर्गीकृत , as evidenced by the over 20  different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically  , मकड़ियों differ इससे अन्य arthropods in कि the usual देह खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata  , the cephalothorax and abdomen , and joined by a small , cylindrical pedicel .
नापसंद कीट  , spiders do not have antennae .
In all except the most primitive group , the Mesothelae , spiders  have the सबसे centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of सब arthropods , as  all their ganglia are fused into one mass in the cephalothorax .
Unlike most arthropods , spiders have no extensor muscles in  उनके limbs और बजाय extend उन्हें by हाइड्रोलिक दबाव  .
Their abdomens bear  appendages कि have महरूम परिवर्धित into spinnerets कि extrude रेशा  from up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen .
Spider webs  vary widely in आकार , आकार और the  amount of sticky thread used .
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms ,  और मकड़ियों कि उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक abundant और  diverse than orb-web spiders .
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in  the devonian काल परिचय , लकिन ये पशु जाहिर  lacked spinnerets .
सच्चा मकड़ियों have महरूम मिला in carboniferous रॉक्स  from , and are very similar to the most primitive surviving order , the Mesothelae .
The main groups of modern  मकड़ियों , mygalomorphae और araneomorphae , पहला appeared  in the Triassic period , before .
A herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi , was described in 2008 ,  लकिन सब अन्य ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी , ज़्यादातर preying on कीट  and on other spiders , although a few large species also take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in  स्टिकी webs , lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas , mimicking the शिकार to  avoid detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations , but the active hunters  have अधि दृष्टि , और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in उनके चुनाव  of tactics and ability to develop new ones .
Spiders '  गुस्ताखी हैं too सीमित to लो solids , और वे liquidize उनके खाना by बाढ़ it साथ digestive  enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps , as they do not have true jaws .
Male spiders identify themselves by a  किस्में of जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to  avoid being eaten by the females .
Males of most species survive a few matings ,  सीमित मुख्यतः by उनके छोटी जीवन spans  .
Females weave silk  egg-cases , प्रत्येक of जिससे may contain  hundreds of eggs .
Females of many species care for  उनके यंग , लिये उदाहरण by carrying  them around or by sharing food with them .
A minority of species are social , building  सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere इससे a few to 50,000  individuals .
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration , as in the  विधवा मकड़ियों , to co-operative शिकार  and food-sharing .
Although most spiders live for at most two years , tarantulas and other  mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to 25 सालो  in captivity .
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans , scientists are  अभी researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in आयुर्विज्ञान और as non-polluting pesticides  .
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness , strength  और लोच कि is श्रेष्ठ to कि of सिंथेटिक सामग्री , और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम inserted into स्तनधारियों और पौधे to देखिए if ये can be  used as silk factories .
As a  परिणाम of उनके चौड़ी दायरा of व्यवहार , मकड़ियों  have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience , cruelty and creative powers .
Grey 's Anatomy is an American television medical  नाटक कि premiered on the अमरीकी प्रसारण कम्पनी ( एबीसी ) , as a mid-season  replacement on March 27 , 2005 .
The series has aired nine seasons , and focuses on the fictional lives of surgical interns and  निवासियों as वे धीरे evolve into seasoned डॉक्टर , जबकि trying to maintain निजी  lives .
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes , who serves as an executive  निर्माता , साथ साथ बेट्सी beers , चिह्नित गॉर्डन , क्रिस्टा vernoff , रोब मकई ,  Mark Wilding , and Allan Heinberg .
The series was created to be racially diverse  , utilizing a color-blind ढलाई  technique .
It is primarily  फिल्माया in लॉस एंजिल्स  , California .
The  श्रेणी ' समर्थक is dr. मेरेडिथ धूसर ( एलेन pompeo ) , जो originally  is accepted into the residency program at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital .
Meredith is assigned to work under Dr. Miranda Bailey ( Chandra Wilson ) , along  साथ dr. क्रिस्टीना यांग ( सैंड्रा oh ) , dr. जार्ज o'malley ( T. R. नाईट ) , dr. izzie स्टीवंस ( कैथरीन heigl )  , and Dr. Alex Karev ( Justin Chambers ) .
Following O'Malley 's death and Stevens ' departure , the hospital 's merger with  रहमत वेस्ट brings in dr. जैक्सन एवेरी ( जेसी विलियम्स ) और dr.  April Kepner ( Sarah Drew ) , in the sixth season .
The surgical wing is primarily  पर्यवेक्षित by dr. रिचर्ड webber ( जेम्स pickens , jr. ) , जो is  eventually replaced by Dr. Derek Shepherd ( Patrick Dempsey ) , and later Dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin McKidd ) .
Dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the conclusion of the third season , and is replaced by Dr. Erica Hahn ( Brooke Smith ) , who leaves the show during  the पांचवां ऋतु , और बाद dr. टेडी altman ( किम raver ) , जो प्रस्थान at the समाप्त of the आठवीं ऋतु  .
Introduced in the second season is Dr. Addison Montgomery ( Kate Walsh ) , who  पत्ते the दिखाएँ at the समाप्त of the तीसरा ऋतु , in अनुक्रम to लॉन्च उसके अपना spin-off चिकित्सा नाटक  Private Practice .
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and  dr. चिह्नित स्लोअन ( eric डेन ) भी डालें the दिखाएँ in the  second season , while the latter dies in the premiere of the ninth season .
Meredith  's half-sister , dr. lexie धूसर ( chyler leigh ) ,  appears from season three and dies at the end of season eight .
dr. एरिज़ोना रॉबिन्स ( जेसिका capshaw ) is  given series regular status at the beginning of the sixth season .
Grey 's  anatomy is the highest-rated  drama in the key 18–49 demographic .
Previously among the overall top-ten  रेटेड shows in the संयुक्त राज्य , धूसर 's anatomy रै महरूम खूब प्राप्त  by critics .
Considered an impact on culture , the series has received  numerous पुरस्कार , और रै भी महरूम शामिल in विभिन्न आलोचकों  ' top ten lists .
The  दिखाएँ रै उत्पादित अनेक specials , as खूब  as distributed all seasons to DVD , and released a collection of merchandise .
In 2012 , Grey 's Anatomy was named  the fifth-highest आय कमाई दिखाएँ , in  terms of advertising per half-hour .
On May 11 , 2012 ,  the श्रेणी थी नवीनीकृत लिये a नवीं ऋतु , जिससे premiered  on September 27 , 2012 .
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a mental disorder characterized by a  विश्लेषण of विचार प्रक्रियाओं और  by a deficit of typical emotional responses .
Common symptoms include auditory  मति , paranoid or विचित्र delusions , or disorganized वाक और सोच , और it is accompanied by significant  social or occupational dysfunction .
The onset of symptoms typically  occurs in यंग adulthood , साथ a वैश्विक आजीवन व्यापकता of परिचय  0.3–0.7 % .
निदान is आधारित on observed बर्ताव  and the patient 's reported experiences .
Genetics ,  जल्दी पर्यावरण , neurobiology , और मनोवैज्ञानिक और सोशल प्रक्रियाओं appear to be महत्वपूर्ण contributory कारकों ; कुछ recreational  and prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms .
Current research is focused on the role of neurobiology , although no single  पृथक सशुल्क कारण रै महरूम मिला  .
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate about whether the diagnosis  represents a सिंगल विकार or a क्रमांक of अलहदा  syndromes .
Despite the etymology of the term from the Greek roots skhizein ( σχίζειν , `` to split '' ) and phrēn , phren- ( φρήν , φρεν- ; `` mind '' ) , schizophrenia does not imply a `` split personality '' , or `` multiple personality disorder '' (  जिससे is ज्ञात ये दिनों as dissociative पहचान विकार ) —a कंडीशन साथ जिससे it is प्रायः उलझन in पब्लिक बोध  .
Rather ,  the पद अर्थात् a `` splitting of दिमागी कृत्यों '' , क्युकी  of the symptomatic presentation of the illness .
The  mainstay of उपचार is antipsychotic दवा  , which primarily suppresses dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity .
Psychotherapy and  वोकेशनल और सोशल पुनर्वास हैं भी महत्वपूर्ण  in treatment .
In more serious cases—where there is risk to self and others—  involuntary hospitalization may be जरुरी , हालांकि हॉस्पिटल stays हैं अभी shorter और कम बारंबार  than they once were .
The disorder is  विचार मुख्यतः to affect संज्ञान , लकिन it  also usually contributes to chronic problems with behavior and emotion .
People  साथ schizophrenia हैं संभावित to have अतिरिक्त ( comorbid  ) conditions , including major depression and anxiety disorders ; the lifetime occurrence of substance use disorder is almost 50 % .
सोशल समस्याएं , ऐसे as long-term बेरोजगारी  , poverty , and homelessness are common .
The average life expectancy of people with the disorder is 12 to 15 years less than those without ,  the परिणाम of increased शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं और a उच्चतर आत्महत्या रेट ( परिचय  5 % ) .
Paul Leslie Snider ( April 15 , 1951–August 14 , 1980 ) was the estranged  husband और मैनेजर of प्लेबॉय मॉडल डोरोथी stratten , जिसको he murdered पहले  killing himself the same day .
The  एपिक of gilgamesh , an एपिक कविता इससे  Mesopotamia , is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature .
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins  साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र sumerian कविताएं परिचय 'bilgamesh ' ( sumerian  for Gilgamesh ) , king of Uruk .
Four of these were used as source  सामग्री लिये a संयुक्त एपिक in अक्कादी  .
This first combined  एपिक , ज्ञात as the `` बूढ़ा babylonian '' संस्करण , तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी bc और is  titled after its incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ) .
Only a few  fragments of it have बच  .
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to  the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` he  who Saw the Deep '' ) .
Fragments of  लगभग दो तिहाई of इस longer , twelve-tablet संस्करण have महरूम बरामद  .
Some of the  बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the पुस्तकालयों  ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers on a friendship  between gilgamesh और enkidu  .
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract  उसे इससे oppressing the लोगों of uruk  .
Together , they journey to the Cedar Mountain to  शिकस्त humbaba , इसके monstrous  guardian .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven , which the  देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh लिये  spurning her advances .
As a punishment for these actions , the  देवताओं वाक्य enkidu to मौत  .
The second half of the epic  focuses on gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at enkidu 's  death , and his quest for immortality .
In order to learn the secret of eternal life , Gilgamesh  undertakes a long और perilous यात्रा .
he learns कि `` the  life that you are seeking you will never find .
When the gods created man they allotted to him death  , लकिन जीवन वे retained in उनके अपना keeping  . ''
इस उद्धरण थी originally attributed to siduri in the बूढ़ा babylonian संस्करण  of the epic , and then attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's  कीर्ति जिया on बाद उसके मौत , क्युकी of उसके ग्रेट  building projects , and his account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood .
The story has been  अनूदित into अनेक अलग भाषाएं , और gilgamesh रै चूंकि  become adapted in works of popular fiction .
A  सुकेन्द्रिक ( or ) is an सजीव जिनकी कोशिकाएं contain जटिल  structures enclosed within membranes .
Eukaryotes may more  formally be referred to as the टैक्सोन eukarya or eukaryota  .
The defining membrane-bound structure that sets eukaryotic cells apart from prokaryotic cells is the nucleus ,  or नाभिकीय लिफाफा , भीतर जिससे the जेनेटिक सामग्री is carried  .
The presence of a nucleus gives  eukaryotes उनके नाम , जिससे  comes from the Greek ( eu , `` good '' ) and ( karyon , `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ) .
Most eukaryotic cells  भी contain अन्य membrane-bound organelles ऐसे as  mitochondria , chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus .
All large complex organisms are eukaryotes ,  सहित पशु , पौधे और fungi  .
The  समूह भी शामिल अनेक एककोशिकीय  organisms .
Cell division in eukaryotes  is अलग इससे कि in जीवों बगैर  a nucleus ( Prokaryote ) .
It involves separating the duplicated  गुणसूत्रों , through आंदोलनों  directed by microtubules .
There are two types  of प्रभाग प्रक्रियाओं  .
In  समसूत्रण , एक कोशिका divides to उपज दो genetically  identical cells .
In meiosis , which is required in sexual reproduction , one diploid cell ( having two instances of each  chromosome , एक इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) undergoes recombination of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of parental गुणसूत्रों , और तब दो चरण of कोशिका प्रभाग , resulting in चार  haploid cells ( gametes ) .
Each  gamete रै बस एक पूरक of गुणसूत्रों , प्रत्येक a अद्वितीय  mix of the corresponding pair of parental chromosomes .
Eukaryota appears to be  monophyletic , और so makes up एक of the तीन डोमेन  of life .
The two other  डोमेन , जीवाणु और आर्किया , हैं prokaryotes और have none of  the above features .
Eukaryotes represent a tiny minority of all living things ; even in a human  देह वहीँ हैं 10 टाइम्स अधिक microbes than इंसान  cells .
However , due to their much  larger आकार उनके सामूहिक विश्वव्यापी बायोमास is अनुमानित at  about equal to that of prokaryotes .
They are  माना to have पहला विकसित  approximately 1.6–2.1 billion years ago .
The use of Internet services or software with Internet access to defraud victims or to otherwise take  लाभ of उन्हें , लिये उदाहरण by चोरी निजी सूचना , जिससे can भी सीसे to  identity theft .
A very common form of Internet fraud is the  वितरण of दुष्ट सुरक्षा तन्त्र  .
Internet services can be used to present fraudulent solicitations to prospective  पीड़ितों , to conduct बेईमान ट्रांजेक्शन , or to संचारण the proceeds of धोखाधड़ी to वित्तीय संस्थानों or  to others connected with the scheme .
Internet fraud can occur in chat  कक्ष , ईमेल , संदेश फलक , or  on websites .
The International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) is a NATO -led security mission in Afghanistan that was established by the United Nations  सुरक्षा परिषद in दिसम्बर 2001 by रेज़ोल्यूशन 1386 , as envisaged by the बॉन अनुबंध  .
Its main purpose is to train the Afghan National Security Forces (  ansf ) और assist अफगानिस्तान in पुनर्निर्माण कुंजी सरकारी संस्थानों लकिन is भी सगाई  in the 2001-present war with insurgent groups .
ISAF was initially charged with securing Kabul  और surrounding क्षेत्रों इससे the तालिबान , al qaeda और factional warlords , so as to allow  for the establishment of the Afghan Transitional Administration headed by Hamid Karzai .
In October 2003 , the UN Security  परिषद प्राधिकृत the विस्तार of the isaf मिशन throughout अफगानिस्तान , और  ISAF subsequently expanded the mission in four main stages over the whole of the country .
From 2006 to 2011 , ISAF had been  शामिल in increasingly अधिक intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन  in southern and eastern Afghanistan .
Troop  योगदानकर्ता शामिल इससे the संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम ,  NATO member states and a number of other countries .
The intensity of the combat faced by contributing nations  varies greatly , साथ the संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम , और कनाडा sustaining the बहुमत of हताहत in intensive कॉम्बैट  operations , with other contributors sustaining significantly less .
As of early  2010 , वहीँ यहूद at तनिक 700 सैन्य bases  inside Afghanistan but more were expected to be built in the coming years .
About  400 of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त by american‐led नाटो  forces and 300 by ANSF .
Cocaine (  benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( इन ) is a crystalline  tropane alkaloid that is obtained from the leaves of the coca plant .
The name comes  इससे `` कोका '' और the एल्कलॉएड प्रत्यय -ine  , forming cocaine .
It is a stimulant , an  भूख suppressant ,  and a topical anesthetic .
Biologically , cocaine acts as a  serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor  , also known as a triple reuptake inhibitor ( TRI ) .
It is addictive because of its  प्रभाव on the mesolimbic बदला  pathway .
Unlike most molecules , cocaine has  pockets साथ दोनो ऊँची hydrophilic और lipophilic दक्षता , violating the नियम  of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance .
This causes it to cross the blood–brain barrier far  बेहतर than अन्य psychoactive रसायन और may भी induce blood-brain अवरोध विश्लेषण  .
It is illegal to possess , produce , or distribute cocaine for  non-medicinal और non-government-sanctioned उद्देश्य  in almost every country .
Whole beef  tri-tip rump , roasted मीडियम  rare
The  tri-tip is a काटें of बीफ इससे  the bottom sirloin primal cut .
It is a small triangular muscle ,  प्रायः 1.5 to 2.5 पाउंड . ( 675 to 1,150g ) प्रति पक्ष  of beef .
The scientific name of this muscle is tensor fasciae latae , inserted in the fascia lata , the connective tissue  covering the quadriceps femoris , भी पुकारा quadriceps extensor , a समूह of चार मांसपेशियां जिससे in फेरे प्रविष्ट in the पटेला , or घुटना कैप of the एनिमल  .
Willmar is  a नगर in , और  the county seat of , Kandiyohi County , Minnesota , United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 19,610  at the 2010 census .
Willmar has been assigned ZIP code  56201 by the संयुक्त राज्य डाक सेवा  .
U.S . Routes 12 and 71  और मिनेसोटा राज्य राजमार्गों 23 और 40 हैं  four of the main routes in the city .
The Speaker of the United States House of  प्रतिनिधि ( or स्पीकर of the हाउस )  is the presiding officer of the chamber .
The office was  स्थापित in 1789 by आलेख i , खण्ड 2 of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , जिससे राज्य in भाग , ``  The House of Representatives shall chuse their Speaker ... ''
The current Speaker is John Boehner , a Republican who  represents ओहियो 's 8th congressional ज़िला  .
The Constitution does not  आवश्यकता कि the स्पीकर be a सदस्य of कॉंग्रेस  , but no non-member has ever been elected to the office .
The Speaker is second in the United States presidential line of succession , after the Vice President and ahead of the  अध्यक्ष प्रो tempore of the u.S.  Senate .
Unlike  कुछ वेस्टमिंस्टर प्रणाली parliaments , in जिससे the दफ्तर of स्पीकर is माना non-partisan , in the संयुक्त राज्य the  Speaker of the House is a leadership position and the office-holder actively works to set the majority party 's legislative agenda .
The Speaker  प्रायः करता नहीं personally preside over debates , बजाय delegating the  duty to members of the House from the majority party .
Aside from duties relating to heading the House  और the बहुमत राजनैतिक पार्टी , the स्पीकर भी performs प्रशासनिक और प्रक्रियात्मक कृत्यों  , and represents his or her Congressional district .
A bicycle frame is the main component of a  सायकिल , on to जिससे पहियों  and other components are fitted .
The modern and most common frame design for an upright  सायकिल is आधारित on the सुरक्षा सायकिल , और consists of दो त्रिकोण , a प्रमुख त्रिभुज  and a paired rear triangle .
This is  ज्ञात as the डायमंड  frame .
Frames are required to be strong , stiff and light , which they do by combining  अलग सामग्री और आकार  .
`` Simple gravity pendulum ''  मॉडल assumes no घर्षण or  air resistance .
An exemplar animation of a pendulum showing  the गति और त्वरण सदिश
A pendulum is a weight  निलंबित इससे a so कि it can झूले freely  .
When a pendulum is displaced  बगलों इससे इसके resting संतुलन स्थिति , it is विषय to a restoring  force due to gravity that will accelerate it back toward the equilibrium position .
When released , the  restoring फ़ोर्स संयुक्त साथ the लोलक 's द्रव्यमान कल्याणकारी it to oscillate  about the equilibrium position , swinging back and forth .
The time for one complete cycle , a  बाएँ झूले और a सही झूले , is पुकारा  the period .
A  लोलक swings साथ a विशिष्ट  period which depends ( mainly ) on its length .
From its discovery around 1602 by Galileo Galilei the regular motion of  pendulums थी प्रयुक्त लिये timekeeping , और थी the संसार 's सबसे सटीक timekeeping  technology until the 1930s .
pendulums हैं प्रयुक्त to विनियमित लोलक घड़ियाँ , और  are used in scientific instruments such as accelerometers and seismometers .
Historically they were  प्रयुक्त as gravimeters to माप the त्वरण of गम्भीरता in  geophysical surveys , and even as a standard of length .
The word 'pendulum ' is new  लैटिन , इससे the लैटिन pendulus  , meaning 'hanging ' .
The  सरल गम्भीरता लोलक is an idealized  mathematical model of a pendulum .
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the end of  a massless cord निलंबित इससे a ,  without friction .
When given an initial  धक्का , it होगा झूले वापस और forth at  a constant amplitude .
Real pendulums  हैं विषय to घर्षण और एयर खीचें , so the  amplitude of their swings declines .
The First Battle of Bull Run , also known as First Manassas ( the name used by  confederate शक्तियां ) , थी लड़ा on जुलाई 21 , 1861 , in प्रिंस विलियम काउंटी , वर्जिनिया  , near the city of Manassas .
It was  the पहला प्रमुख जमीन बैटल  of the American Civil War .
Just months after the start of the war at  फोर्ट sumter , the उत्तरी पब्लिक clamored लिये a कूच विरूद्ध the confederate पूंजी of रिचमंड , वर्जिनिया , जिससे वे  expected to bring an early end to the rebellion .
Yielding to political pressure , Brig . Gen. Irvin  mcdowell led उसके unseasoned संघ फौज आरपार सांड चलाएं विरूद्ध the बराबर अनुभवहीन confederate फौज of ब्रिगेडियर . gen. P.  G. T. Beauregard camped near Manassas Junction .
McDowell 's ambitious plan for a surprise flank attack on the  confederate बाएँ थी poorly चलाया by उसके अधिकारियों और मेन ; nevertheless , the confederates , जो था महरूम नियोजन to आक्रमण the संघ  left flank , found themselves at an initial disadvantage .
Confederate reinforcements under  ब्रिगेडियर . gen. जोसेफ E. johnston arrived इससे the shenandoah घाटी by रेलरोड और the कोर्स of the  battle quickly changed .
A brigade of Virginians under a relatively unknown colonel from the Virginia Military  संस्थान , थामस J. जैक्सन , stood उनके मैदान और जैक्सन प्राप्त उसके प्रसिद्ध  nickname , `` Stonewall Jackson '' .
The Confederates then  शुभारम्भ a दमदार counterattack , और as the संघ सैनिकों began withdrawing अंतर्गत आग , अनेक panicked  and it turned into a rout as McDowell 's men frantically ran without order in the direction of Washington , D.C .
Both  सेना यहूद sobered by the fierce लड़ और अनेक हताहत , और  realized the war was going to be much longer and bloodier than either had anticipated .
Thunderstorm  निकट garajau , madeira
Weather is the state of the atmosphere , to the degree that it is  hot or ठंडा , गीला or शुष्क , शांत or stormy , साफ or cloudy  .
Most  मौसम phenomena occur in the  troposphere , just below the stratosphere .
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and  वर्षण कार्यकलाप , whereas जलवायु is the पद लिये the  average atmospheric conditions over longer periods of time .
When used without qualification , ``  मौसम '' is समझा to be the  weather of Earth .
Weather is driven by air pressure (  तापमान और नमी ) मतभेद  between one place and another .
These pressure and temperature differences can occur  due to the सूर्य कोण at कोई particular स्पॉट , जिससे varies by अक्षांश  from the tropics .
the दमदार तापमान कंट्रास्ट  between polar and tropical air gives rise to the jet stream .
Weather systems in the mid-latitudes ,  ऐसे as extratropical cyclones , हैं caused  by instabilities of the jet stream flow .
Because the Earth 's axis is tilted relative  to इसके कक्षीय प्लेन , धूप is घटना at  different angles at different times of the year .
On  धरती 's सतह , temperatures प्रायः दायरा ±40  °C ( −40 °F to 100 °F ) annually .
Over thousands of years , changes in Earth 's orbit affect the amount and  वितरण of सौर उर्जा प्राप्त by the धरती और influence long-term जलवायु और वैश्विक जलवायु बदलें  .
Surface temperature  मतभेद in फेरे कारण दबाव मतभेद  .
Higher altitudes are cooler than lower altitudes  due to मतभेद in compressional हीटिंग  .
Weather forecasting is the application of science and technology to predict the  राज्य of the माहौल लिये a भविष्य समय और a दिए स्थान  .
The atmosphere is a  chaotic प्रणाली , so छोटी परिवर्तन to एक भाग of the  system can grow to have large effects on the system as a whole .
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout  इंसान इतिहास , और वहीँ is प्रमाण कि इंसान कार्यकलाप ऐसे as कृषि और उद्योग  has inadvertently modified weather patterns .
अध्ययन कैसा the मौसम works on अन्य  planets has been helpful in understanding how weather works on Earth .
A  प्रसिद्ध लैंडमार्क in the सौर प्रणाली , बृहस्पति 's ग्रेट रेड स्पॉट  , is an anticyclonic storm known to have existed for at least 300 years .
However ,  मौसम is नहीं सीमित to  planetary bodies .
A star 's corona is constantly being lost  to स्पेस , बनाना कया is essentially a बहुत  thin atmosphere throughout the Solar System .
The  गति of द्रव्यमान ejected इससे  the Sun is known as the solar wind .
Katy Perry is an American  singer-songwriter इससे सांता बारबरा , कैलिफ़ोर्निया .
She signed with  कैपिटल रिकॉर्ड  .
Perry has released three studio albums ,  सहित उसके डेब्यू ईसाई प्रयत्न कैटी हडसन , एक of  the Boys , and Teenage Dream .
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked off  साथ the विशाल चार्ट कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू सिंगल  `` I Kissed a Girl `` .
During her career , Perry has been nominated for numerous  प्रमुख म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , primarily लिये teenage सपना और  One of the Boys .
The following is a  सूची of sovereign राज्य और territories जहाँ  English is an official language or language of government .
In 2012 , there were 88 states  in कुल ( 60 sovereign राज्य और 28 non-sovereign राज्य  ) .
In many countries  अंग्रेज़ी is the प्रबल भाषा , लकिन करता नहीं  have official status .
In Australia , English is spoken by the vast majority of  the जनसांख्यिकी और is the तभी भाषा प्रयुक्त in सरकारी संस्थानों , लकिन ऑस्ट्रेलिया  does not have an official language .
The case is the same in the United  किंगडम और the संयुक्त राज्य , हालांकि अनेक राज्य और regions भीतर the  U.S. do have English as an official language .
English is the dominant language of New Zealand and an official  भाषा of कनाडा ( साथ साथ फ्रेंच ) , इण्डिया ( साथ साथ हिंदी और अनेक अन्य भाषाएं  ) , Ireland ( along with Irish ) , and the Philippines ( along with Tagalog ) .
English is the sole  आधिकारिक भाषा of the राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र  and the Commonwealth Games .
English is one of the official languages of the United  राष्ट्र , the यूरोपीय संघ और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलम्पिक कमेटी  .
Many of these countries are  वर्तमान or पूर्व colonies or dependencies of the संयुक्त  Kingdom ( see also British Empire ) , or of the United States , itself a former colony of the UK .
Notable exceptions include Rwanda , which was a former Belgian colony and Eritrea , which was an Italian colony where the  अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य spanned इसके कंट्रोल तभी in संसार युद्ध ii और shortly बाद ( 1941-1952  ) .
इण्डिया 's भाषाई चित्र  is complex .
According to the Constitution of India ,  `` हिंदी in the देवनागरी स्क्रिप्ट '' is the आधिकारिक भाषा of the संघ ; और अंग्रेज़ी the 'subsidiary आधिकारिक भाषा ' ; however  , English is mandated for the authoritative texts of all federal laws and Supreme Court decisions and ( along with Hindi ) is one of the two languages of the Indian Parliament .
अंग्रेज़ी is प्रयुक्त लगभग exclusively लिये उच्चतर  education , business and science .
Courses in  बहुमत of the स्कूलों हैं सिखाया exclusively  in English .
English is extensively  प्रयुक्त लिये प्रशासनिक उद्देश्य in इण्डिया  .
India is the second-largest English-speaking country in the world by  क्रमांक of अध्यक्षों , बाद the संयुक्त  States .
As such , many  consider अंग्रेज़ी to be the de facto आधिकारिक  language of India .
See Official  भाषाएं of इण्डिया  .
The  भाषाई मेकअप of पाकिस्तानी is  similarly complex .
While the national  भाषा is उर्दू , अंग्रेज़ी  is an official language and used in business , government and law .
English is a  अनिवार्य भाषा  in schools .
All  स्कूल पाठ्यक्रम हैं सिखाया  in English .
Pakistan is the 9th  largest english-speaking देश in the  world by population .
Southern Cone ( ,  ) is a भौगोलिक प्रदेश रचित of the southernmost  areas of South America , south of the Tropic of Capricorn .
हालांकि geographically इस शामिल दक्षिणी और भाग of southeast ( são पाउलो ) of ब्राज़ील , in शर्तें of राजनैतिक भूगोल  the Southern cone has traditionally comprised Argentina , Chile , Paraguay , and Uruguay .
In the narrowest sense , it only covers Argentina , Chile and Uruguay , bounded on the north by the states of Brazil , Paraguay , Bolivia and  पेरू , on the वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर , और दक्षिण to the जंक्शन between the प्रशांत और अटलांटिक महासागर , जिससे it is the closest महाद्वीपीय  area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ) .
High life expectancy , the highest Human Development Index of Latin  अमेरिका , ऊँची मानक of जीना , significant भागीदारी in the वैश्विक बाज़ार और the उभरते अर्थव्यवस्था of इसके सदस्यों मेक the दक्षिणी कोन the सबसे prosperous  macro-region in South America .
For multi-event athletic  प्रतियोगिताओं देखिए track और फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं , खण्ड `` बैठक  '' .
Meetings are sometimes held  around सम्मेलन टेबल .
In a meeting , two or more  लोगों आइये साथ to discuss एक or अधिक विषय  , often in a formal setting .
An official game in baseball , also sometimes called a  विनियमन खेल , is a खेल कि रै progressed परे the पाइंट at जिससे it can  be considered complete if necessary .
This is approximately the  halfway पाइंट of the  game .
In the case of inclement weather , any game which has reached this point may be stopped and shortened as  needed , साथ the परिणाम होने फाइनल , और सब रिकॉर्ड और आंकडे गिने  .
A game which has  नहीं पहुँचे इस पाइंट पहले होने रोका is either माना a निलंबित खेल ( to be जारी at a बाद तिथि इससे the पाइंट of  stoppage ) , or is simply canceled and replayed from the start .
( This depends on  the नियम of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत लीग  . )
In  either मामला , no आंकडे हैं गिने जबतक  the game becomes official .
Since most professional baseball  खेल हैं नौ पारी long , the पांचवां inning is प्रयुक्त  as the threshold for an official game .
If the visiting team is leading ,  or the खेल is tied , the समाप्त of the पांचवां  inning marks this point .
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already  ahead in the स्कोर , और theoretically होता नहीं need इसके हाफ of the पांचवां inning  , then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e. , the middle of the fifth ) is considered an official game .
The game is also considered official if the home team scores to  लो the सीसे in the नीचे of the पांचवां inning , चूंकि the खेल होता समाप्त तत्काल  if the same thing happened in the ninth .
In  nearly सब मामले , the `` आधिकारिक खेल '' औकात is प्रयुक्त to  determine whether a rain check will be honored for fans holding tickets .
If a game is started but does not reach  the पाइंट of बनने आधिकारिक , प्रशंसक हैं हकदार to a नई टिकट लिये the make-up खेल or ( in सबसे मामले ) कोई अन्य उपलब्धियाँ खेल  of their choice .
If a game is halted after it becomes official  , the खेल is बस shortened और no बरसात  check is given .
The `` official game '' statistic received some attention  दौरान the 1995 ऋतु , जब कैलोरी ripken , jr. थी approaching the रिकार्ड  for consecutive games played , previously held by Lou Gehrig .
Large numbers were hung on the side of the B & O Warehouse at Oriole  पार्क at camden गज to दिखाएँ the क्रमांक of खेल in ripken 's  streak .
Each day , a new number was unfurled during the fifth inning after each game  था become आधिकारिक ( चूंकि the statistic होता नहीं have गिने if the खेल था महरूम  stopped before that point ) .
A similar practice has been used to count down toward the demolition of several stadiums ( including Veterans Stadium in Philadelphia in 2003 , Busch Memorial  स्टेडियम in st. लुई in 2005 , और the असली यांकी स्टेडियम और shea स्टेडियम in नई यॉर्क नगर in 2008 ) ; as प्रत्येक खेल  became official , the team would unveil a new ( lower ) number showing the number of games left to be played in the stadium .
A telephone number or phone number is a sequence of digits used  to कॉल इससे एक टेलीफोन लकीर to another in a  public switched telephone network .
When telephone numbers were invented , they  यहूद छोटी — as few as एक , दो or तीन अंक — और यहूद दिए orally to a  switchboard operator .
As  फोन प्रणालियों have grown और interconnected to encompass  the world , telephone numbers have become longer .
in जोड to telephones , वे अभी  access other devices , such as computers and fax machines .
The number contains the information necessary to identify uniquely  the intended endpoint लिये  the telephone call .
Each such  endpoint जरूर have a अद्वितीय क्रमांक भीतर the  public switched telephone network .
Most countries use fixed length numbers ( for normal lines at least )  और इसलिए the क्रमांक of endpoints determines the जरुरी लंबाई  of the telephone number .
It is also possible for each  सदस्य to have a नियत of shorter संख्याएँ  for the endpoints most often used .
These ``  आशुलिपि '' or `` गति कॉलिंग '' संख्याएँ हैं automatically अनूदित to अद्वितीय  telephone numbers before the call can be connected .
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g. , 1-1-9 , 9-1-1 , 0-0-0 , 9-9-9 , 1-1-1 , and 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services numbers for China , Japan , South Korea , Taiwan and Sri Lanka ; Canada and the United States ; Australia ; the United Kingdom , Ireland , South Africa , Poland , Saudi  अरब , the संयुक्त अरब अमीरात , मोरक्को , मकाओ , बहरीन , क़तर , बांग्लादेश , बोत्सवाना , घाना , कीनिया , हांग काँग , मलेशिया , मॉरीशस , सिंगापुर , ज़िम्बाब्वे ,  Trinidad , Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union , respectively . )
Many systems also allow calls  भीतर a लोकल क्षेत्रफल to be बना बगैर  dialing the local area code .
For example ,  a फोन क्रमांक in उत्तर अमेरिका होगा प्रारंभ साथ तीन संख्याएँ ( ऐसे as 661 ) , जिससे is the क्षेत्रफल कोड ,  followed by seven digits split into sections of three and four ( such as 550-1212 ) , which is the local number .
Some areas now have mandatory  ten-digit डायलिंग in प्लेस , भी लिये लोकल  calls .
Most telephone networks today ( exceptions being private intercom and secure  फोन संजाल ) हैं interconnected in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन संजाल , जहाँ the स्वरूप of टेलीफोन संख्याएँ is  standardized by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164 .
This  specifies कि the संपूर्ण क्रमांक  should be 15 digits or shorter , and begin with a country prefix .
For most countries , this is followed by an area code or city code and  the सदस्य क्रमांक , जिससे might consist of the कोड लिये a particular  telephone exchange .
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an international telephone number in writing  or छपाई , starting साथ a प्लस चिह्न ( `` + '' ) और the  country code .
When calling an international  क्रमांक इससे a फिक्स्ड लकीर फोन , the + जरूर be replaced साथ  the international call prefix chosen by the country the call is being made from .
Some mobile phones allow the + to be  डाला सीधे  .
The format and allocation of local phone numbers are controlled by each nation 's respective government , either  सीधे or by प्रायोजित संगठन ( ऐसे as nanpa  overseen by NeuStar Inc. ) .
Before  a टेलीफोन कॉल is कनेक्ट , the टेलीफोन क्रमांक जरूर be dialed  by the calling party or Caller .
The called party might have  उपकरण कि presents कॉलर id पहले  the call is answered .
A collection agency is a  कारोबार कि pursues भुगतान of debts owed by individuals  or businesses .
Most collection agencies  operate as एजेंटों of लेनदारों और collect debts लिये  a fee or percentage of the total amount owed .
There are many  प्रकार of संग्रहण  agencies .
first-party एजेंसियों हैं oftentimes subsidiaries  of the original company the debt is owed to .
Third-party agencies are  पृथक कंपनियाँ contracted by a कम्पनी to collect  debts on their behalf for a fee .
Debt buyers purchase  the कर्ज़ at a प्रतिशत of इसके मान  , then attempt to collect it .
Each  देश रै इसके अपना नियम  and regulations regarding them .
Cannabis  पुष्प साथ दृश्य trichomes
Cannabis , also known as marijuana ( from the Mexican Spanish  marihuana ) , और by अन्य names , is a तैयारी of the कैनबिस संयंत्र intended लिये उपयोग as a psychoactive  drug and as medicine .
Pharmacologically ,  the प्रिंसिपल psychoactive constituent of कैनबिस is tetrahydrocannabinol ( thc  ) ; it is one of 483 known compounds in the plant , including at least 84 other cannabinoids , such as cannabidiol ( CBD ) , cannabinol ( CBN ) , tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ) .
and  cannabigerol ( cbg )  .
This  is a सूची of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल quarterbacks जो have प्रारंभ लिये the वॉशिंगटन redskins , as खूब as इसके पूर्ववर्तियों  the Boston Braves ( 1932 ) and Boston Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ) , in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
The Washington Redskins franchise was originally founded  in बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स as the बोस्टन braves , नामित बाद the  local baseball franchise .
The name was changed the following  साल to the redskins  .
In 1937 , the franchise moved to  वॉशिंगटन , d.c  .
Of the 49 Redskins starting quarterbacks , two  have महरूम inducted into the प्रो फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of कीर्ति : सैमी baugh और  Sonny Jurgensen .
