1st Special Forces  operational detachment-delta ( 1st sfod-d ) , popularly ज्ञात as डेल्टा फ़ोर्स , is एक of  the United States ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission Units .
It was formerly listed as the Combat Applications Group by the Department of Defense but has since been  officially re-designated the फौज compartmented तत्व  ( ACE ) .
While 1st  sfod-d is administratively समर्थित by usasoc , it जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the  operational control of the Joint Special Operations Command .
Delta Force and its Navy counterpart ,  the नवल खास warfare विकास समूह , हैं the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य  's primary counter-terrorism units .
Delta Force 's primary tasks are counter-terrorism , direct action ,  और नेशनल हस्तक्षेप परिचालन , हालांकि it is an अत्यधिक बहुमुखी समूह सक्षम of conducting अनेक प्रकार of गुप्त  missions , including , but not limited to , hostage rescues and raids .
the सेंट्रल प्रज्ञा एजेंसी 's अत्यधिक गुपचुप खास क्रियाएँ प्रभाग ( उदास ) और अधिक specifically  its elite Special Operations Group ( SOG ) often works with – and recruits – operators from Delta Force .
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive decay , in which an atomic nucleus emits  an अल्फा कण , और thereby परिणत ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into an अणु साथ  a mass number 4 less and atomic number 2 less .
Many other  प्रकार of decays हैं संभावित  .
रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय , भी ज्ञात as नाभिकीय क्षय or radioactivity  , is the process by which a nucleus of an unstable atom loses energy by emitting particles of ionizing radiation .
A material that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation — which includes the  उत्सर्जन of ऊर्जावान अल्फा अणु , बीटा अणु , और गामा किरणें — is माना रेडियोसक्रिय  .
There are many different  प्रकार of रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय ( देखिए  table below ) .
A decay , or loss of energy , results when an atom with one type of  केंद्रक , पुकारा the जनक radionuclide , परिणत to an अणु साथ a केंद्रक in a अलग राज्य , or to  a different nucleus containing different numbers of protons and neutrons .
Either of  ये उत्पाद is नामित  the daughter nuclide .
In some decays the parent and daughter are different chemical elements , and thus the decay process results  in नाभिकीय transmutation ( सृष्टि of an अणु of a नई तत्व  ) .
The first decay processes to be discovered were alpha decay  , बीटा क्षय , और गामा  decay .
Alpha  क्षय occurs जब the केंद्रक ejects  an alpha particle ( helium nucleus ) .
This is the most common process of emitting nucleons , but in rarer  प्रकार of decays , nuclei can eject protons , or विशिष्ट nuclei of अन्य तत्व ( in  the process called cluster decay ) .
Beta decay occurs when  the केंद्रक emits an इलेक्ट्रॉन or positron और a प्रकार of न्यूट्रिनो , in a प्रक्रम कि परिवर्तन  a proton to a neutron or the other way around .
The nucleus may capture an  orbiting इलेक्ट्रॉन , converting a प्रोटॉन into a न्यूट्रॉन  ( electron capture ) .
All of  ये प्रक्रियाओं परिणाम in नाभिकीय  transmutation .
By contrast ,  वहीँ मौजूद रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय प्रक्रियाओं कि do नहीं परिणाम  in transmutation .
The energy of an excited nucleus may be emitted  as a गामा रे in गामा क्षय , or प्रयुक्त to eject an कक्षीय इलेक्ट्रॉन by बातचीत साथ  the excited nucleus in a process called internal conversion .
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons , and this results  in a बदलें in an तत्व इससे एक  isotope to another .
One type of radioactive decay results  in उत्पाद जिससे हैं नहीं पारिभाषित , लकिन appear  in a range of `` pieces '' of the original nucleus .
इस क्षय is पुकारा spontaneous  fission .
This decay happens when  a विशाल अस्थिर केंद्रक अनायास splits into दो ( और  occasionally three ) smaller daughter nuclei , and usually emits gamma rays , neutrons , or other particles as a consequence .
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e. , random ) process at the level of single  अणु , in कि , according to क्वांटम सिद्धान्त , it is नामुमकिन  to predict when a particular atom will decay .
However , the chance that a  दिए अणु होगा क्षय is निरंतर  over time .
For a large number of atoms , the decay rate for the collection is computable from the  measured क्षय स्थिरांक of the न्यूक्लाइड ( or equivalently इससे the half-lifes ) .
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent  बाल हटाना जिससे removes the बाल  from the root .
New hair will not grow back in the previously waxed area for two  to आठ सप्ताह , हालांकि कुछ लोगों होगा प्रारंभ to  see regrowth in only a week .
Almost any area of the  देह can be waxed , सहित eyebrows , फेस , बिकिनी क्षेत्रफल  , legs , arms , back , abdomen and feet .
There are many  प्रकार of वैक्सिंग उपयुक्त लिये  removing unwanted hair .
Strip waxing is  संपन्नता by spreading a मोम thinly over the स्किन  .
A cloth or paper strip is then pressed on the  शीर्ष और ripped बंद the दिशा  of hair growth .
This removes the wax  साथ साथ the बाल  .
Strip wax  can भी be बना at घर  using lemon juice , water , sugar and honey .
Hot waxing utilizes Hot wax ( as  opposed to स्ट्रिप मोम  ) .
In this case , the wax is applied somewhat thickly and with no  cloth or पेपर स्ट्रिप्स  .
The wax then hardens when it cools , thus  allowing the आसान हटाना by a चिकित्सक बगैर  the aid of cloths .
This waxing  विधि is बहुत फायदेमंद to लोगों  who have sensitive skin .
Wall painting (  1st सदी ad ) इससे pompeii depicting  a multigenerational banquet
Ancient Roman culture existed throughout the  लगभग 1200-year इतिहास of the सभ्यता  of Ancient Rome .
The term refers to the culture of the Roman Republic , later the Roman Empire ,  जिससे , at इसके शिखर , covered an क्षेत्रफल इससे lowland स्कॉटलैंड  and Morocco to the Euphrates .
Life in  प्राचीन रोम revolved around the नगर of रोम , इसके  famed seven hills , and its monumental structures such as the Flavian Amphitheatre ( now called the Colosseum ) , the Forum of Trajan , and the Pantheon .
The city also had several theaters  , gymnasiums , और अनेक taverns , baths , और brothels  .
Throughout the territory under ancient Rome 's control , residential architecture ranged from very modest houses to country  विला , और in the पूंजी नगर of रोम , वहीँ यहूद इम्पीरियल निवास on the सुरुचिपूर्ण palatine  Hill , from which the word palace is derived .
The vast  बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी जिया in the  city center , packed into insulae ( apartment blocks ) .
The city of Rome was the largest megalopolis of that time ,  साथ a जनसांख्यिकी कि may खूब have exceeded एक लाख लोगों , साथ a ऊँची समाप्त अनुमान  of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000 .
Historical estimates indicate that around 30  प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the नगर 's क्षेत्राधिकार जिया in innumerable शहरी centers , साथ जनसांख्यिकी of at तनिक 10,000  and several military settlements , a very high rate of urbanization by pre-industrial standards .
the सबसे urbanized भाग of the साम्राज्य थी इटली , जिससे था an  estimated rate of urbanization of 32 % , the same rate of urbanization of England in 1800 .
Most Roman towns and cities had a forum , temples and the same type of buildings ,  on a छोटी स्केल , as मिला in  Rome .
The large urban population required an endless supply  of खाना जिससे थी a जटिल logistical कार्य , सहित acquiring , transporting , storing  and distribution of food for Rome and other urban centers .
Italian farms supplied vegetables and fruits ,  लकिन मछली और मांस यहूद luxuries  .
Aqueducts were built to bring  जल to शहरी centers और वाइन और आयल यहूद आयातित इससे hispania  , Gaul and Africa .
There was a very large amount  of कॉमर्स between the प्रांतों of the रोमन साम्राज्य  , since its transportation technology was very efficient .
The  औसत लागत of हस्तांतरण और the प्रौद्योगिकी  were comparable with 18th-century Europe .
The later city of Rome did not fill  the स्पेस भीतर इसके प्राचीन aurelian  walls until after 1870 .
Eighty  प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of प्राचीन रोम जिया  in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants .
Landlords generally resided  in शहरों और उनके estates यहूद बाएँ  in the care of farm managers .
The  दुर्दशा of ग्रामीण स्लेव थी generally बदतर than उनके counterparts working in शहरी  aristocratic households .
To stimulate a  उच्चतर मजदूर उत्पादकता सबसे जमींदार freed a विशाल क्रमांक of  slaves and many received wages .
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 people lived in one small  फार्म हट in मिश्र , जबकि छह परिवारों  owned a single olive tree . '' .
Such a rural environment  जारी to induce माइग्रेशन of जनसांख्यिकी to शहरी centers जबतक the जल्दी 2nd सदी , जब the शहरी जनसांख्यिकी रोका  growing and started to decline .
Starting in the middle of the 2nd century BC , private  यूनानी संस्कृति थी increasingly in ascendancy , in spite of tirades विरूद्ध the `` softening '' प्रभाव  of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists .
By the time of Augustus , cultured Greek household slaves taught the Roman young (  sometimes भी the लड़कियों ) ; शेफ़ , decorators , secretaries , डॉक्टर , और hairdressers—all  came from the Greek East .
Greek  sculptures सुशोभित hellenistic लैंडस्केप बागवानी on the palatine or in  the villas , or were imitated in Roman sculpture yards by Greek slaves .
the रोमन भोजन preserved in the  cookery books ascribed to Apicius is essentially Greek .
Roman writers  disdained लैटिन लिये a संस्कारी यूनानी  style .
Only in law and governance was the Italic nature  of रोम 's accretive संस्कृति परम्  .
Against this human background , both the urban and rural setting , one of history 's most influential  सभ्यताओं took आकार , leaving पीछे a सांस्कृतिक विरासत  that survives in part today .
James Joseph `` Duffy '' Waldorf , Jr. ( born August 20 ,  1962 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर  golfer .
कांच बोतलों ( लिये खीरा  slices ) on shipping pallets
A  सोवियत मेयोनेज़  jar
A modern ``  फ्रेंच  Kilner '' jar
कांच उत्पादन involves दो प्रमुख विधि – the फ्लैश कांच  process , which produces sheet glass , and glassblowing which produces bottles and other containers .
A season is a  subdivision of the साल , चिह्नित by परिवर्तन  in weather , ecology , and hours of daylight .
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the Earth around the Sun and the tilt of the  धरती 's अक्ष सापेक्ष to the प्लेन of क्रान्ति  .
In temperate and polar regions  , the सीज़न हैं चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the तीव्रता of धूप कि पहुँच the धरती 's सतह , विसंगतियाँ  of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate , and plants to be dormant .
During May ,  जून और जुलाई , the उत्तरी गोलार्ध  is exposed to more direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun .
The same is  सच्चा of the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in नवम्बर  , December and January .
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be  उच्चतर in the आसमान दौरान the गर्मियाँ  months which increases the solar flux .
However , due to seasonal lag ,  जून , जुलाई और अगस्त हैं the hottest महीने in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर , जनवरी  and February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere .
In temperate and subpolar regions , generally four calendar -based seasons ( with their adjectives )  हैं पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal ) , गर्मियाँ ( estival ) , पतझड़ ( autumnal ) और शीत  ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly use a six season model for  शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal  ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the  बरसात ( or गीला , or मानसून ) ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु , और in कुछ  tropical areas , a cool or mild season .
In some parts of  the संसार , खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित आधारित  on important events such as a hurricane season , tornado season or a wildfire season .
The six  ecological सीज़न
The four calendar seasons , depicted in  an प्राचीन रोमन मोज़ेक इससे ट्यूनीशिया
The Battle  of फोर्ट sumter ( अप्रैल 12–14 , 1861 ) थी the बमबारी और आत्मसमर्पण of फोर्ट sumter , निकट चार्ल्सटन , दक्षिण कैरोलिना  , that started the American Civil War .
following घोषणाओं of secession by सात दक्षिणी राज्य , दक्षिण कैरोलिना  demanded that the U.S. Army abandon its facilities in Charleston Harbor .
On December 26 , 1860 , U.S. Major Robert  एंडरसन surreptitiously स्थानांतरित उसके छोटी कमांड इससे the indefensible फोर्ट moultrie on सुलीवान 's द्वीप to फोर्ट sumter  , a substantial fortress controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor .
An  attempt by u.S. अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन to reinforce और resupply एंडरसन , using the  unarmed merchant ship Star of the West , failed when it was fired upon by shore batteries on January 9 , 1861 .
South Carolina authorities then seized all Federal  प्रॉपर्टी in the चार्ल्सटन क्षेत्रफल , मगर लिये फोर्ट  Sumter .
During the early months of 1861 , the  हालात around फोर्ट sumter increasingly began to resemble  a siege .
In March , Brig . Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard , the  पहला सामान्य अधिकारी of the newly formed confederate राज्य  of America , was placed in command of Confederate forces in Charleston .
Beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of batteries  around चार्ल्सटन हार्बर aimed at फोर्ट  Sumter .
Conditions in the fort grew dire as the Union  सैनिको rushed to पूरा the संस्थापना of अतिरिक्त बंदूकों  .
Anderson was  छोटी of मेन , खाना , और आपूर्तियाँ  .
the resupply of फोर्ट sumter became the पहला संकट  of the administration of President Abraham Lincoln .
He notified the Governor of  दक्षिण कैरोलिना , फ्रांसिस W. pickens , कि he थी sending सप्लाई जहाजों ,  which resulted in an ultimatum from the Confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately .
Major  एंडरसन refused to आत्मसमर्पण  .
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on April 12 , the Confederates bombarded the  फोर्ट इससे तोपखाने बैटरी surrounding the हार्बर  .
Although the Union garrison returned fire , they were significantly  outgunned और , बाद 34 घंटों , प्रमुख एंडरसन सहमत to evacuate  .
There was no loss of life on either side as a direct result of this  सगाई , हालांकि a गन विस्फोट दौरान the आत्मसमर्पण ceremonies  on April 14 caused two Union deaths .
Following the battle , there was widespread support from  दोनो उत्तर और दक्षिण लिये further सैन्य कार्रवाई  .
Lincoln 's immediate call for 75,000 volunteers to suppress the rebellion resulted  in an अतिरिक्त चार दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य भी declaring उनके secession और joining  the Confederacy .
the सिविल युद्ध  had begun .
3G , short for third  पीढी , is the तीसरा पीढी of मोबाईल  telecommunications technology .
3G telecommunication  संजाल support सेवाएं कि provide an सूचना ट्रांसफ़र  rate of at least 200 kbit/s .
However ,  अनेक सेवाएं advertised as 3g provide उच्चतर गति than the न्यूनतम  technical requirements for a 3G service .
Recent 3G releases , often denoted 3.5G  और 3.75g , भी provide मोबाईल ब्रॉडबैंड अभिगम of अनेक mbit/s  to smartphones and mobile modems in laptop computers .
3G finds application in wireless voice telephony ,  मोबाईल अंतरजाल अभिगम , फिक्स्ड बेतार अंतरजाल अभिगम ,  video calls and mobile TV .
``  mazel tov ! '' लिखा on a  wine glass tag
Traditionally , after the groom breaks the  कांच , the अतिथि चिल्लाओ `` mazel  Tov ! `` .
A birthday cake , iced with the  शब्द `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov )  , as is often done in Israel .
यहाँ the phrase is  written in Hebrew cursive .
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / Yiddish : `` מזל טוב '' , Hebrew : ``  mazal tov '' ; यहूदी : `` mazel tov '' ; lit .
`` good luck '' ) is a phrase used to express  बधाई लिये a प्रसन्न और significant अवसर  or event .
Hepatitis C is an  संक्रामक बीमारी affecting  primarily the liver , caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) .
The infection is often asymptomatic , but chronic infection can lead to  scarring of the जिगर और ultimately to cirrhosis  , which is generally apparent after many years .
In  कुछ मामले , those साथ cirrhosis होगा go on to develop जिगर विफलता  , liver cancer or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices .
HCV is spread primarily by  blood-to-blood सम्पर्क संबद्ध साथ intravenous ड्रग उपयोग ,  poorly sterilized medical equipment and transfusions .
An  अनुमानित 130–200 लाख  people worldwide are infected with .
The existence of (  originally `` non- a non- b hepatitis '' ) थी postulated in  the 1970s and proven in 1989 .
तभी infects इंसानो  and chimpanzees .
The virus persists in the liver  in परिचय 85 % of those संक्रमित  .
This persistent infection can be treated with medication : the standard therapy is a combination of peginterferon and ribavirin , with either  boceprevir or telaprevir  added in some cases .
Overall , 50–80 % of  लोगों treated  are cured .
Those who develop cirrhosis or liver  कर्कट may आवश्यकता a जिगर  transplant .
is the leading cause of liver  प्रत्यारोपण , हालांकि the वायरस प्रायः बारंबार बाद प्रत्यारोपण .
No vaccine  विरूद्ध is उपलब्धियाँ .
A flexible spending account ( FSA ) , also  ज्ञात as a लचीली बिता व्यवस्था , is एक of a क्रमांक of tax-advantaged वित्तीय  accounts that can be set up through a cafeteria plan of an employer in the United States .
An FSA allows an employee to set aside a portion of earnings to pay for qualified expenses as established in  the कैफेटेरिया योजना , सबसे commonly लिये चिकित्सा खर्च लकिन प्रायः लिये निर्भर परवाह or अन्य खर्च  .
धन deducted इससे an कर्मचारी 's अदा into an fsa is  not subject to payroll taxes , resulting in substantial payroll tax savings .
One significant disadvantage to using an FSA is that funds not used by  the समाप्त of the योजना साल हैं खोया to the कर्मचारी , ज्ञात as the `` उपयोग it or खोना it  '' rule .
The most common type of flexible spending account , the medical expense FSA ( also medical FSA or  स्वास्थ्य fsa ) , is समान to a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता ( hsa ) or a स्वास्थ्य reimbursement  account ( HRA ) .
However , while HSAs and HRAs are almost exclusively used as components  of a उपभोक्ता चलित स्वास्थ्य परवाह योजना , चिकित्सा fsas हैं commonly offered साथ अधिक परंपरागत स्वास्थ्य  plans as well .
In addition , funds in  a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता हैं नहीं खोया जब the  plan year is over , unlike funds in an FSA .
Paper forms or an FSA debit  कार्ड , भी ज्ञात as a flexcard , may be  used to access the account funds .
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a  u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the southeastern संयुक्त  States .
टेनेसी is the 36th सबसे extensive और the  17th most populous of the 50 United States .
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky and Virginia to the north , North Carolina to  the ईस्ट , जॉर्जिया , अलबामा , और मिसिसिपी to the दक्षिण , और  Arkansas and Missouri to the west .
The  एपलाशियन kyu dominate the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य , और the  Mississippi River forms the state 's western border .
Tennessee 's capital and second largest city is  नैशविले , जिससे रै a जनसांख्यिकी of 609,644  .
Memphis is the state 's largest city ,  साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of 652,050 .
The state of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga Association , a 1772 frontier  अनुबंध generally regarded as the पहला संवैधानिक सरकारी वेस्ट of the appalachians  .
What is now  टेनेसी थी initially भाग of उत्तर कैरोलिना ,  and later part of the Southwest Territory .
टेनेसी थी admitted to the संघ as  the 16th state on June 1 , 1796 .
Tennessee was the last state to leave the Union and  जुड़ें the confederacy at the outbreak of the u.S. सिविल युद्ध in 1861 , और the पहला राज्य to be readmitted to  the Union at the end of the war .
Tennessee furnished  अधिक सैनिको लिये the confederate फौज than कोई अन्य राज्य  , and more soldiers for the Union Army than any other Southern state .
In the 20th century ,  टेनेसी transitioned इससे an कृषिक अर्थव्यवस्था to a अधिक diversified अर्थव्यवस्था , aided at  times by federal entities such as the Tennessee Valley Authority .
In the early 1940s , the city of Oak Ridge was established to house the  मैनहटन प्रोजेक्ट 's यूरेनियम संवर्धन सुविधाएं , helping to निर्माण  the world 's first atomic bomb .
Tennessee has played a critical role in the  विकास of अनेक फ़ॉर्म of अमरीकी लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक , सहित  rock and roll , blues , country , and rockabilly .
Beale Street in Memphis is considered by many to be the birthplace of the blues , with  संगीतकारों ऐसे as w.c . सुलभ performing in इसके क्लब as जल्दी  as 1909 .
Memphis was also home to Sun Records ,  जहाँ संगीतकारों ऐसे as एल्विस प्रेस्ली , इसहाक़ हेज़ , जॉनी नकदी , कार्ल perkins , जेरी ली लुईस , रॉय orbison , और  Charlie Rich began their recording careers , and where rock and roll took shape in the 1950s .
The 1927 Victor recording sessions in Bristol generally  चिह्नित the शुरूआत of the देश म्यूज़िक विधा और the वृद्धि of the ग्रैंड ओले opry in the 1930s helped मेक नैशविले the बीच of  the country music recording industry .
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize Tennessee 's role in nurturing various forms of popular music : the Memphis Rock N ' Soul Museum , the  देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय in नैशविले , और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय rock-a-billy संग्रहालय in जैक्सन  .
In addition , the  rockabilly हॉल of कीर्ति , an ऑनलाइन साईट recognizing the  development of rockabilly in which Tennessee played a crucial role , is based in Nashville .
Tennessee 's major industries  शामिल कृषि , निर्माण , और पर्यटन  .
Poultry , soybeans , and cattle are the  राज्य 's प्राथमिक agricultural उत्पाद , और प्रमुख निर्माण निर्यात शामिल रसायन , परिवहन उपकरण  , and electrical equipment .
The Great Smoky Mountains National Park , the  स्वदेश 's सबसे visited नेशनल पार्क , is headquartered in the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य , और a खण्ड of the एपलाशियन  Trail roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina border .
Other major tourist attractions include the Tennessee Aquarium in Chattanooga , the Sunsphere in Knoxville , Dollywood in Pigeon Forge , the Parthenon , the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum , and Ryman  ऑडिटोरियम in नैशविले , और एल्विस प्रेस्ली 's graceland निवास  and tomb in Memphis .
One design  रूपांतर of a मुर्गा रिंग  .
A cock ring is a ring that can be placed around a man 's penis , usually at the base , primarily to  slow the प्रवाह of रक्त इससे the वीर्यपात penile ऊतक , यूँ maintaining an स्तंभन लिये a much  longer period of time .
Cock rings can be worn around just the  शिश्न or दोनो the शिश्न और scrotum , or बस the scrotum अलोन , हालांकि  this is usually called a testicle cuff .
Rings can be made of a variety of different materials , most commonly leather , rubber ,  or silicone , हालांकि नायलॉन और मेटल हैं भी प्रयुक्त either as  the main component or part of the closure .
The term cock ring is sometimes used as a synonym for a Prince Albert  piercing , a piercing of the शिश्न कि is प्रायः , हालांकि नहीं सदा , a मेटल रिंग  .
जब प्रयुक्त in मामले of erectile dysfunction वे हैं ज्ञात  by various names such as `` erection ring '' and `` tension ring '' .
The headquarters of  प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल at 245 पार्क एवेन्यू , midtown मैनहटन  , New York City , USA .
Major League Baseball ( MLB  ) is a पेशेवर बेसबॉल लीग , consisting  of teams that play in the National League and the American League .
Dating to 1876 and 1901  क्रमशः , the दो लीग मिलाया in 2000 into a सिंगल संगठन led by the कमिश्नर  of Baseball , after 100 years as separate legal entities .
MLB  constitutes एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग  of the United States and Canada .
It is composed of 30 teams —  29 in the संयुक्त राज्य और एक  in Canada .
Teams in MLB play 162 games each season over six months (  अप्रैल through सितंबर  ) .
Five teams in each league advance to a four-round postseason tournament  कि culminates in the संसार श्रेणी , a best-of-seven-games चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी  between the two league champions which dates to 1903 .
The organization oversees many minor-league baseball leagues which  operate परिचय 240 टीमों संबद्ध साथ the major-league  clubs .
With the International Baseball Federation , the league  भी manages the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संसार बेसबॉल  Classic tournament .
MLB has the highest season attendance of any  खेल लीग in the संसार साथ nearly 75 लाख spectators  in 2012 .
Delaware  ( ) is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ on the अटलांटिक coast in  the Mid-Atlantic region of the United States .
It is bordered to the south and west by Maryland , to the  पूर्वोत्तर by नई जर्सी , और to the उत्तर by  Pennsylvania .
The state takes its name from Thomas West , 3rd Baron De La Warr , an English  nobleman और वर्जिनिया 's पहला औपनिवेशिक राज्यपाल , बाद जिसको कया is अभी पुकारा केप  Henlopen was originally named .
Delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva Peninsula and is the second smallest , the sixth least  populous , लकिन the छठे सबसे densely आबादी of the पचास संयुक्त राज्य  .
डेलावेयर is विभाजित into तीन काउंटी  .
From  उत्तर to दक्षिण , ये तीन काउंटी  are New Castle , Kent , and Sussex .
While the southern two  काउंटी have historically महरूम predominantly agricultural , नई  Castle County has been more industrialized .
Before its coastline was explored by Europeans  in the 16th सदी , डेलावेयर थी inhabited by अनेक समूह of देशी अमेरिकी  , including the Lenape in the north and Nanticoke in the south .
It was initially  colonized by डच व्यापारियों at zwaanendael , स्तिथ निकट  the present town of Lewes , in 1631 .
डेलावेयर थी एक of the 13 colonies participating in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और on दिसम्बर 7  , 1787 , became the first state to ratify the Constitution of the United States , thereby becoming known as The First State .
Energy  परिवर्तन in उर्जा प्रणालियों  Language
Energy transformation  or उर्जा परिवर्तन is the प्रक्रम of बदलना  one form of energy to another .
In physics , the term energy describes the capacity to produce  निश्चित परिवर्तन भीतर a प्रणाली , बगैर लिहाज़ to सीमाएं in परिवर्तन  imposed by Entropy .
Changes in total energy of systems can only be accomplished by adding or subtracting energy from them , as energy is a quantity which is  conserved , according to the पहला विधि of ऊष्मागतिकी  .
According to special relativity , changes in the energy of systems will also coincide with changes in the system 's mass , and the total  राशि of द्रव्यमान of a प्रणाली is a माप of इसके उर्जा  .
Energy in a  प्रणाली may be रूपांतरित so कि it resides in a  different state , or a different type of energy .
Energy in many states may be used  to do अनेक किस्में  of physical work .
Energy may be used in natural processes or machines ,  or else to provide कुछ सेवा to समाज ( ऐसे as ऊष्मा  , light , or motion ) .
For example , an internal combustion engine converts the potential chemical  उर्जा in गैसोलीन और ऑक्सीजन into ऊष्मा , जिससे is तब रूपांतरित into the propulsive उर्जा ( गतिज उर्जा कि  moves a vehicle ) .
A  सौर कोशिका converts सौर विकिरण into विद्युत  energy that can then be used to light a bulb or power a computer .
The  जेनेरिक नाम लिये a यंत्र जिससे converts  energy from one form to another , is a transducer .
In  सामान्य , सबसे प्रकार of उर्जा , सहेजें लिये थर्मल  energy , may be converted efficiently to any other kind of energy .
Sometimes  इस occurs साथ an दक्षता of essentially 100 % , ऐसे as जब संभावित उर्जा is परिवर्तित to गतिज उर्जा  as an object falls in vacuum , or when it orbits nearer or farther from another object , in space .
Conversion of other types of energies to heat may also occurs with  nearly पूर्ण दक्षता ( अनेक प्रकार of घर्षण  do this ) .
Exceptions for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for isolated systems ) occur when energy has already been partly distributed among many available quantum  राज्य लिये a संग्रहण of अणु , जिससे हैं freely अनुमत to explore कोई  state of momentum and position ( phase space ) .
In such  हालातों , a माप पुकारा एन्ट्रॉपी , or evening-out of उर्जा वितरण in ऐसे राज्य  , dictates that future states of the system must be of at least equal evenness in energy distribution .
( There is no way , taking the universe as a whole , to collect  उर्जा into कम राज्य , एकबार it रै स्प्रेड to  them ) .
A consequence of this requirement is that there are limitations to the efficiency with which thermal  उर्जा can be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of उर्जा , चूंकि थर्मल उर्जा in संतुलन  at a given temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states .
Such energy  is sometimes माना `` degraded उर्जा , '' क्युकी  it is not entirely usable .
The second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that , for this reason , thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy with efficiencies approaching 100 % , only if the entropy ( even-ness or disorder  ) of the ब्रह्मांड is increased by अन्य अर्थात् , to compensate लिये the घटी in एन्ट्रॉपी संबद्ध साथ the disappearance of the  thermal energy and its entropy content .
Otherwise , only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and thus  , उपयोगी कार्य ) , चूंकि the शेष of the ऊष्मा जरूर be सुरक्षित to be transferred to a थर्मल टंकी at a निम्नतर तापमान , in ऐसे a रास्ता कि the बढ़ाएँ in एन्ट्रॉपी लिये इस प्रक्रम अधिक than compensates लिये the  entropy decrease associated with transformation of the rest of the heat into other types of energy .
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an ``  unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी  league of 30 franchised member clubs , of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered in New  यॉर्क नगर , the एनएचएल is widely माना to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर बर्फ  hockey league in the world , and one of the major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada .
The Stanley Cup , the oldest professional sports trophy in  उत्तर अमेरिका , is awarded annually to the लीग playoff चैंपियन  at the end of each season .
The league was organized on November 26 ,  1917 , in मॉन्ट्रियल , क्यूबेक , कनाडा , बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of  its predecessor organization , the National Hockey Association ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started with four teams and , through  a श्रेणी of expansions , contractions , और relocations , the लीग is  now composed of 30 active franchises .
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was Canada , although the league  रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 जब it  expanded into the United States .
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season , the league resumed  खेल अंतर्गत a नई सामूहिक bargaining अनुबंध कि शामिल a सैलरी  cap .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms  of sponsorships , उपस्थिति  , and television audiences .
The NHL draws many highly skilled  खिलाड़ी इससे सब over the संसार और  currently has players from about 20 different countries .
Although  canadians have historically गठित the बहुमत of the खिलाड़ी in the एनएचएल ,  over the past four plus decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European players .
This is the complete list of the ratified and unratified  amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान जिससे प्राप्त the स्वीकृति of the  United States Congress .
Twenty-seven amendments have been  ratified चूंकि the असली हस्ताक्षर of the संविधान  , the first ten of which are known collectively as the Bill of Rights .
The  कार्यविधि लिये amending the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान  is governed by Article V of the original text .
There have been many other proposals for  amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान introduced in  Congress , but not submitted to the states .
Before an amendment can take effect , it must be proposed  to the राज्य by a two-thirds vote of दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस or by a सम्मेलन ( ज्ञात as an आलेख v सम्मेलन ) पुकारा by two-thirds of the राज्य , और ratified by three-fourths of the राज्य  or by three-fourths of conventions thereof , the method of ratification being determined by Congress at the time of proposal .
To date , no convention for proposing amendments has been called by the states , and  तभी once—in 1933 लिये the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-first amendment —has the सम्मेलन विधि  of ratification been employed .
FMR LLC ( Fidelity Management and Research ) or Fidelity Investments is  an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय वित्तीय सेवाएं निगम  .
It is one of the largest  परस्पर निधि और वित्तीय सेवाएं  groups in the world .
It was founded in 1946 and  serves उत्तर अमरीकी निवेशकों  .
Fidelity  ventures is इसके  venture capital arm .
Fidelity International  सीमित ( फील ) , थी an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संबद्ध संस्थापित in 1969 , सेवारत  most countries in the rest of the world .
In September 2011 , FIL was  rebranded as 'fidelity विश्वव्यापी निवेश '  .
Fidelity Investments manages a large family of mutual funds , provides fund distribution and investment  सलाह सेवाएं , as खूब as providing छूट brokerage सेवाएं , रिटायरमेंट सेवाएं , माल  management , securities execution and clearance , life insurance and a number of other services .

Sociology is the scientific study of  इंसान समाज और इसके origins , विकास , संगठन  , and institutions .
It is a social science  जिससे उपयोग विभिन्न विधि of अनुभवजन्य छानबीन और नाजुक विश्लेषण to develop a देह of ज्ञान  about human social activity , structures , and functions .
A goal for many sociologists is to  conduct शोध जिससे may be लागू सीधे to सोशल नीति और welfare ,  while others focus primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes .
Subject matter ranges from the micro level of  व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी और बातचीत to the मैक्रो स्तर of प्रणालियों और the  social structure .
The traditional focuses of sociology include social stratification , social class  , संस्कृति , रेस और नस्ल , लिंग और कामुकता , सोशल गतिशीलता  , religion , secularization , law , and deviance .
As all spheres of human activity are affected by the interplay between social structure and individual agency , sociology has gradually  विस्तारित इसके फ़ोकस to further विषय , ऐसे as स्वास्थ्य , चिकित्सा , सैन्य और penal संस्थानों  , the Internet , environmental sociology , political economy and the role of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge .
The  दायरा of सोशल वैज्ञानिक विधि  has also expanded .
Social researchers draw  upon a किस्में of गुणात्मक और quantitative  techniques .
the भाषाई और सांस्कृतिक turns of the mid-twentieth सदी led to increasingly  interpretative , hermeneutic , and philosophic approaches to the analysis of society .
Conversely , recent decades have seen the rise of  नई analytically , mathematically और computationally कठोर तकनीकों , ऐसे as agent-based मॉडलिंग  and social network analysis .
Sociology should not  be उलझन साथ विभिन्न सामान्य सोशल अध्ययन पाठ्यक्रम जिससे भालू छोटी संबंध  to sociological theory or social science research methodology .
थंडर is the ध्वनि caused by  lightning .
Depending on the nature of the lightning and distance of the  श्रोता , थंडर can दायरा इससे a शार्प , लाउड  crack to a long , low rumble ( brontide ) .
The sudden increase in pressure and temperature from  बिजली produces रैपिड विस्तार of the एयर surrounding और  within a bolt of lightning .
In turn , this expansion of air creates a  सोनिक शॉक वेव , समान to a सोनिक बूम , जिससे produces the ध्वनि of थंडर , प्रायः  referred to as a clap , crack , or peal of thunder .
The distance of  the बिजली can be गणना by the श्रोता आधारित on the समय अंतराल इससे  when the lightning is seen to when the sound is heard .
Palma ( , , ) , in full Palma de Mallorca , is the major city and port on the island of  majorca ( mallorca ) और पूंजी नगर of the autonomous जातियाँ of  the Balearic Islands in Spain .
The names  ciutat de mallorca ( नगर of majorca ) और ciutat ( नगर ) यहूद प्रयुक्त पहले the  War of the Spanish Succession and are still used by people in Majorca .
However , the  आधिकारिक नाम थी mallorca , the  same as the island .
it is situated on the दक्षिण coast  of the island on the Bay of Palma .
As of the 2009 census , the population of the city of Palma proper was 401,270 , and the population of the  संपूर्ण शहरी क्षेत्रफल थी 517,285 , रैंकिंग as the बारहवीं largest शहरी क्षेत्रफल  of Spain .
लगभग हाफ of the कुल जनसांख्यिकी  of Majorca live in Palma .
The Cabrera Archipelago , though widely separated from Palma  उचित , is administratively माना भाग of the नगरपालिका  .
Its airport , Son Sant Joan , serves  over 22 लाख यात्री प्रत्येक  year .
The Marivent Palace was offered by the  नगर to the तब प्रिंस जुआन कार्लोस  I of Spain .
The royals have  चूंकि खर्च उनके गर्मियाँ छुट्टियाँ in पालमा  .

Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is a  fictional अक्षर , a supervillain  appearing in comic books published by DC Comics .
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman , and as a high-status  supervillain , रै भी आइये into विरोध साथ बैटमैन  and other superheroes in the DC Universe .
Created by Jerry Siegel and  जो shuster , the अक्षर पहला appeared in कार्रवाई  Comics # 23 ( April 1940 ) .
Luthor is described as `` a  power-mad , दुष्ट वैज्ञानिक '' of ऊँची प्रज्ञा  and incredible technological prowess .
Luthor 's goals typically center on killing Superman ,  the foremost बाधा to achieving the विलेन 's megalomaniacal लक्ष्य  .
Despite  periodically wearing a संचालित बहि  , Luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual identity .
The character was originally depicted as a mad scientist who , in the vein of pulp  novels , wreaks कहर on the संसार साथ उसके अत्याधुनिक weaponry  .
In his earliest  दिखावे , luthor is दिखाया साथ a पूरा  head of red hair .
Despite this , the character  बाद became hairless as the परिणाम  of an artist 's mistake .
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's origin and motivations , revealing  उसे to be a बाल्यकाल dost of सुपरमैन 's जो खोया उसके बाल जब a आग नष्ट उसके प्रयोगशाला  ; Luthor vowed revenge .
Following the 1985 limited series Crisis on Infinite Earths , the character was re-imagined as a  machiavellian उद्योगपति और white-collar दण्ड , भी briefly सेवारत as अध्यक्ष  of the United States .
In  हाल सालो , विभिन्न लेखक  have revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s .
The character was ranked  as the 8th महानतम विलेन by जादूगर on इसके 100 महानतम  Villains of All Time list .
IGN 's list of the Top 100 Comic Book  खलनायक of सब समय क्रमित  Luthor as # 4 .
luthor is भी वर्णित as a `` megavillain '' by कॉमिक किताब आलोचक पीटर sanderson , एक of a few genre-crossing खलनायक जिनकी adventures लो प्लेस `` in  a world in which the ordinary laws of nature are slightly suspended '' ; characters such as Professor Moriarty , Count Dracula , Hannibal Lecter , Doctor Doom , and Darth Vader , also fit this description .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day is a United States federal holiday marking the birthday of Rev  . dr. मार्टिन लूथर किंग  , Jr .
It is observed on the third Monday of January  प्रत्येक साल , जिससे is around the समय of किंग 's जन्मदिवस  , January 15 .
The floating holiday is similar to holidays set under the Uniform Monday Holiday  अधिनियम , हालांकि the अधिनियम predated the स्थापना of मार्टिन लूथर किंग  , Jr. Day by 15 years .
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent activism in the  सिविल अधिकारों गति , जिससे सफलतापूर्वक protested जातिगत पक्षपात  in federal and state law .
The campaign for a federal holiday in  किंग 's सम्मान began जल्द बाद उसके हत्या  in 1968 .
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983 , and it was first  observed on जनवरी 20 , 1986  .
At first , some states resisted observing the holiday as such ,  giving it वैकल्पिक names or combining it साथ अन्य छुट्टियाँ  .
It was  officially observed in सब 50 राज्य  for the first time in 2000 .
The camera phone solution allows  तत्काल sharing of तस्वीरें  .
As it 's automatic and instant , the user does not have to use a  केबल or removable मीडिया to कनेक्ट to a निजी  computer .
A camera phone is a mobile  फोन जिससे is समर्थ to कैप्चर स्टिल छायाचित्र ( और  usually video ) .
Since early in the 21st  सदी the बहुमत of मोबाईल फोन in उपयोग हैं  camera phones .
सबसे कैमरा फोन हैं simpler than  separate digital cameras .
Their usual fixed focus lenses and smaller  सेंसर सीमा उनके प्रदर्शन in ग़रीब  lighting .
lacking a शारीरिक शटर , सबसे  have a long shutter lag .
Flash  , जहाँ उपस्थित , is  usually weak .
Optical zoom and  तिपाई screws हैं विरल  .
Some also lack a USB connection , removable  मेमोरी कार्ड , or अन्य रास्ता of transferring उनके तस्वीरें अधिक जल्दी than by the फोन 's अंतर्निहित संचार  feature .
Some of the more expensive camera phones have only a few  of ये तकनीकी disadvantages , जिससे लागू सबसे acutely in  low light conditions and in any case have not inhibited their widespread use .
Most model lines improve in these regards  प्रत्येक साल  or two .
Some , such as the Droid Incredible only have a  मेनू चुनाव to प्रारंभ an अनुप्रयोग  program to activate the camera .
Others ,  ऐसे as the ब्लैकबेरी तूफ़ान 2 , droid x , मोटोरोला v980  and Nokia 5800 also have a separate camera button for quickness and convenience .
Windows Phones can be configured to operate  as a कैमरा भी if the फोन is  asleep .
Some camera phones are designed to resemble separate low-end digital compact cameras in appearance and to  कुछ extent in सुविधाएँ और चित्र विशेषता , और हैं ब्रांडेड as दोनो मोबाईल फोन और  cameras , including certain Sony phones .
The principal advantages of camera  फोन हैं लागत और compactness ; बेशक लिये a उपयोक्ता जो carries  a mobile phone anyway , the additional size and cost are negligible .
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile applications to  add सामर्थ्य ऐसे as geotagging और चित्र  stitching .
A few high end phones can  उपयोग उनके टच स्क्रीन to सीधा उनके कैमरा to फ़ोकस on a particular ऑब्जेक्ट in the फ़ील्ड of दृश्य , giving भी an अनुभवहीन उपयोक्ता  a degree of focus control exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus .
`` Whatever Happened to the Man of Tomorrow ? '' is a  1986 कॉमिक किताब स्टोरी featuring the dc कॉमिक्स अक्षर  of Superman .
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time , and soon to be retiring , Superman editor , Julius  schwartz , the स्टोरी थी प्रकाशित in दो भाग , शुरूआत in सुपरमैन # 423 और समाप्ति in कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स # 583 , दोनो प्रकाशित in सितंबर  1986 .
The story was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan , in his final major contribution to the Superman titles , and was inked by  जार्ज pérez in the समस्या of सुपरमैन और कर्ट schaffenberger in the समस्या of  Action Comics .
The story was an imaginary tale which told the final story of the Silver Age  सुपरमैन और उसके long इतिहास , जिससे थी होने rebooted following the कार्यक्रम of संकट on अनन्त earths , पहले उसके  modern introduction in the John Byrne series , The Man of Steel .
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long history of the  अक्षर और to serve as a पूरा निष्कर्ष to उसके  mythology .
The story is a frame story set  टेन सालो बाद सुपरमैन थी पिछला देखी , जहाँ लोइस लेन recounts the  tale of the end of Superman 's career to a reporter from the Daily Planet .
Her story includes numerous violent  हमले विरूद्ध सुपरमैन by उसके दुश्मनों , the पब्लिक रहस्योद्घाटन  of his secret identity of Clark Kent and a number of deaths of those closest to him .
The story has been cited as one of the  बेहतरीन कहानियां of the अक्षर of सुपरमैन , और आलोचकों और ऑडियंस अक्सर  choose it as one of the most memorable comics ever published .
It is used as an example of how to close the long-time  निरंतरता of a कॉमिक किताब अक्षर  .
The story 's legacy has endured with similar  कहानियां लिखा as श्रद्धांजलि to  it .
The title  is a सन्दर्भ to एक of the nicknames of सुपरमैन as the man of  Tomorrow , and was used in the title of another Superman .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car , designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in  molsheim , फ़्रांस by bugatti ऑटोमोबाइल  S.A.S .
The Super Sport  संस्करण of the veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal उत्पादन  car in the world , with a top speed of .
The original  संस्करण रै  a top speed of .
It was  नामित car of the दशक ( 2000–2009  ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear .
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best Car  चलित सब साल पुरस्कार in  2005 .
On 6 April 2013 , Bugatti set the record for the  तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड खेल vitesse , reaching  on average a top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss , and the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of  volkswagen , साथ much of the अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य होने conducted अंतर्गत the  guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A number  of खास विसंगतियाँ have  been produced .
In December 2010 , Bugatti began offering  prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स रंग by using the veyron 16.4 configurator अनुप्रयोग on the  marque 's official website .
The institution of the Eucharist has been a key theme in  the depictions of the पिछला भोजन in ईसाई आर्ट , as in इस  16th-century Juan de Juanes painting .
`` At the Last Supper , on the night he was  गद्दारी , हमारी रक्षक instituted the eucharistic बलिदान  of his Body and Blood . ''
( Catechism  of the कैथोलिक  Church 1323 )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers  to दोनो the जश्न of the द्रव्यमान , कि is , the eucharist liturgy , और the ब्रैड और वाइन जिससे बाद the  consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ , Lord and God , a declaration formulated by the Council of Trent with an anathema against anyone who denied this .
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional term used in  the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर to refer to the eucharistic प्रजाति (  the Body and Blood of Christ ) .

A short story is a brief work  of साहित्य , प्रायः लिखा in कथा  prose .
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions in  the 17th सदी , the छोटी स्टोरी  has grown to encompass a body of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization .
At its most prototypical the short story features a small  डाल of नामित वर्ण , और focuses on a self-contained घटना  with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood .
In so doing , short stories make use of plot , resonance , and other dynamic components  to a दूर वृहद उपाधि than is ठेठ of an किस्सा , yet to a दूर lesser उपाधि than a  novel .
While the short story is largely distinct from  the अनोखा , लेखक of दोनो generally चित्रण इससे a आम  pool of literary techniques .
छोटी कहानियां have  no set length .
In terms of word count there is  no आधिकारिक demarcation between an किस्सा ,  a short story , and a novel .
Rather , the form 's parameters are given by the rhetorical  और व्यावहारिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे a दिए स्टोरी is उत्पादित और माना , so कि कया constitutes a  short story may differ between genres , countries , eras , and commentators .
Like the novel , the short story 's predominant shape reflects the demands of the available markets for publication , and  the एवोल्यूशन of the रूप seems closely tied to the एवोल्यूशन of the प्रकाशन उद्योग और the सबमिशन दिशानिर्देश of इसके constituent  houses .
The short story has been considered both an apprenticeship form  preceding अधिक lengthy works , और a crafted रूप in  its own right , collected together in books of similar length , price , and distribution as novels .
Short story writers may define their works as part of the  कलाकारी और निजी अभिव्यक्ति of  the form .
They  may भी attempt to resist categorization  by genre and fixed form .
Area  कोड in  Michigan
Area  कोड 810 is the टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल  code serving eastern Michigan .
The raccoon ( , Procyon lotor ) , sometimes spelled racoon , also  ज्ञात as the आम raccoon , उत्तर अमरीकी raccoon , उत्तरी raccoon  and colloquially as coon , is a medium-sized mammal native to North America .
The raccoon is the largest of the  procyonid परिवार , having a देह लंबाई of और  a body weight of .
Its grayish coat  ज़्यादातर consists of घना underfur जिससे insulates  against cold weather .
Two of the raccoon 's most  distinctive सुविधाएँ हैं इसके अत्यधिक dexterous सामने पंजे और इसके फेशियल  mask , which are themes in the mythology of several Native American tribes .
raccoons हैं विख्यात लिये उनके प्रज्ञा , साथ अध्ययन  showing that they are able to remember the solution to tasks for up to three years .
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon , which is usually  nocturnal , consists of परिचय 40 % invertebrates , 33 % संयंत्र भोजन  , and 27 % vertebrates .
The original habitats of the raccoon are deciduous and mixed forests , but due to their adaptability they have extended their range to mountainous  क्षेत्रों , तटीय marshes , और शहरी क्षेत्रों , जहाँ कुछ homeowners consider उन्हें to be पीड़कों  .
As a result of escapes and  deliberate introductions in the mid-20th सदी , raccoons हैं अभी  also distributed across the European mainland , the Caucasus region and Japan .
Though  previously विचार to be एकान्त , वहीँ  is now evidence that raccoons engage in gender-specific social behavior .
Related females often share a common area , while unrelated males live together in  समूह of up to चार पशु to maintain उनके स्थितियाँ विरूद्ध विदेशी males दौरान the समागम ऋतु  , and other potential invaders .
Home range sizes vary anywhere from 3 hectares ( 7 acres )  लिये महिलाओं in शहरों to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) लिये males in prairies  .
After a gestation  काल of परिचय 65 दिनों , दो to पाँच यंग , ज्ञात as `` kits  '' , are born in spring .
the kits हैं subsequently उठाया by  their mother until dispersion in late fall .
हालांकि खिलाते raccoons have महरूम ज्ञात to सजीव over 20 सालो  , their average life expectancy in the wild is only 1.8 to 3.1 years .
In many areas , hunting and  vehicular चोट हैं the दो सबसे आम कल्याणकारी of  death .
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 Mw earthquake , with an epicenter near the town of Léogâne ( Ouest  विभाग ) , लगभग वेस्ट of port-au-prince , हैती 's पूंजी  .
The  भूकंप occurred at 16:53  local time ( 21:53 UTC ) on Tuesday , 12 January 2010 .
By 24 January , at least 52 aftershocks  measuring 4.5 or वृहद  had been recorded .
An estimated three  लाख लोगों यहूद प्रभावित by the भूकंप  .
The highest  विश्वसनीय मौत गिनती थी  estimated at 220,000 .
haitian सरकारी estimates  were higher .
the सरकारी of हैती अनुमानित कि 250,000 निवास  and 30,000 commercial buildings had collapsed or were severely damaged .
The  भूकंप caused प्रमुख क्षति in port-au-prince ,  Jacmel and other settlements in the region .
Many notable landmark buildings were  significantly क्षतिग्रस्त or नष्ट , सहित the अध्यक्षीय राजमहल , the नेशनल सभा भवन  , the Port-au-Prince Cathedral , and the main jail .
Among those killed were Archbishop of  port-au-prince जोसेफ सर्ज miot , और विपक्ष  leader Micha Gaillard .
The headquarters of the United  राष्ट्र स्थिरीकरण मिशन in हैती ( minustah ) , स्तिथ in the पूंजी  , collapsed , killing many , including the Mission 's Chief , Hédi Annabi .
Many countries responded to appeals for humanitarian aid , pledging funds and  dispatching बचाव और चिकित्सा टीमों  , engineers and support personnel .
Communication systems , air , land , and sea  हस्तांतरण सुविधाएं , अस्पताल , और विद्युत संजाल था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त by the भूकंप , जिससे hampered बचाव और सहायता प्रयत्न ; भ्रम  over who was in charge , air traffic congestion , and problems with prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work .
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were overwhelmed with tens  of हज़ारों of लाशें  .
These had to  be दफ्न in द्रव्यमान क़ब्रों  .
As rescues tailed off ,  आपूर्तियाँ , चिकित्सा परवाह और स्वच्छता  became priorities .
Delays in aid distribution led to  एंग्री appeals इससे सहायता मजदूर और survivors , और लूटने और विरल  violence were observed .
On 22 January the United Nations noted that the emergency  phase of the राहत आपरेशन थी आरेखण to a बंद , और on the following दिन the haitian  government officially called off the search for survivors .
Mister Ed is a fictional talking  घोड़ा , originally appearing in छोटी कहानियां by वाल्टर R. ब्रूक्स , और बाद in an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न हालात कॉमेडी उत्पादित by  Filmways that first aired in syndication from January 5 to July 2 , 1961 , and then on CBS from October 1 , 1961 to February 6 , 1966 .
The stars of the show were Mister Ed , a palomino horse who could `` talk '' , played by gelding Bamboo Harvester and voiced by former Western star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited  लिये the संपूर्ण लंबाई of the श्रेणी ) , और उसके मालिक , an eccentric और enormously klutzy , yet दोस्ताना , वास्तु नामित  Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ) .
Much of the program 's humor stemmed from the fact  मिस्टर ed होता बोलो तभी to wilbur , as खूब as ed  's notoriety as a troublemaker .
Other running jokes  केन्द्रित on wilbur 's अक्षर होने a विशाल  klutz and inadvertently causing harm to himself or others .
According to the show 's producer , Arthur Lubin , Young was chosen as the lead  अक्षर क्युकी he `` बस लगा जैसे the sort of guy a घोड़ा होता बात to '' .
lubin , a dost of mae वेस्ट , scored a तख्तापलट by persuading  the screen icon to guest star in one episode .
In the United States , reruns aired on Nick  at नाइट इससे कूच 3 , 1986 , to फ़रवरी 1 ,  1993 .
Sister station TV Land  भी reran the दिखाएँ इससे 1996–98  and again from 2003-06 .
The series is currently  ब्रॉडकास्ट प्रत्येक morning on इस tv , साथ साथ राजमार्ग  Patrol , and The Patty Duke Show .
It is also currently  ब्रॉडकास्ट on hallmark फिल्म चैनल  .
As of January  1 , 2011 , the  first two seasons of the show are available on Hulu .
The Rapture is  a पद in ईसाई eschatology जिससे refers to the `` होने caught up '' discussed in  1 Thessalonians 4:17 , when the `` dead in Christ '' and `` we who are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the clouds '' to meet `` the Lord in the air '' .
The term `` Rapture ''  is प्रयुक्त in at तनिक दो  senses .
In the pre-tribulation view , a group of people will be left behind on earth after  another समूह वस्तुतः पत्ते `` to  meet the Lord in the air . ''
इस is अभी the सबसे आम उपयोग of the पद , विशेषकर  among fundamentalist Christians and in the United States .
The other , older use of the  पद `` rapture '' is बस as a पर्याय लिये the फाइनल क़यामत generally , बगैर a विश्वास  that a group of people is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
This distinction is important as some types of Christianity never refer to `` the Rapture '' in religious education , but might use the older and  अधिक सामान्य भाव of the शब्द `` rapture '' in referring to कया happens दौरान the फाइनल क़यामत .
There are many views among Christians regarding the  समय of मसीह 's वापसी ( सहित whether it होगा occur in एक इवेंट  or two ) , and various views regarding the destination of the aerial gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4 .
Denominations such as Roman Catholics , Orthodox Christians , Lutheran Christians , and Reformed  ईसाइयों मानना in a rapture तभी in the भाव of a सामान्य फाइनल क़यामत , जब मसीह रिटर्न a सिंगल समय  .
They do not believe that a group of people is left behind on earth for an extended  tribulation काल बाद the कार्यक्रम of 1 thessalonians 4:17  .
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was developed in the 1830s by John Nelson Darby and the Plymouth  brethren , और popularized in the संयुक्त राज्य in the जल्दी  20th century by the wide circulation of the Scofield Reference Bible .
Kris Nathan  humphries ( born फ़रवरी 6 , 1985 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर  basketball player with the Brooklyn Nets .
The  philistine शहरों of गाजा , ashdod , ashkelon  , Ekron , and Gath
the philistines ( , , , or ; , plištim ) , pleshet or peleset , यहूद a  people who as part of the Sea Peoples appeared in the southern coastal area of Canaan at the beginning of the Iron Age ( circa 1175 BC ) , most probably from the Aegean region .
According to the Bible , they ruled the five  city-states ( the `` philistine pentapolis '' ) of गाजा , ashkelon , ashdod , ekron और gath , इससे wadi गाजा in the दक्षिण to  the Yarqon River in the north , but with no fixed border to the east .
The Bible paints them as the  किंगडम of इसराईल 's सबसे  dangerous enemy .
Originating somewhere in the  ईजियन , उनके जनसांख्यिकी थी around 25,000 in the 12th सदी bc ,  rising to a peak of 30,000 in the 11th century BC , of which the Aegean element was not more than half the total , and perhaps much less .
Nothing is known for certain about the original language or languages of the  philistines , however वे यहूद नहीं भाग of the सामीती canaanite  population .
There is some limited evidence in favour of the assumption  कि the philistines यहूद indo-european-speakers either इससे यूनानियों and/or luwian  speakers from the coast of Asia Minor .
philistine-related शब्द मिला in the बाइबल हैं नहीं सामीती  , and can in some cases , with reservations , be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots .
By the beginning of  the 1st मिलेनियम bce वे था अपनाया the  general Canaanite language of the region .
The  हथियारबंद सेवाएं वोकेशनल योग्यता बैटरी ( asvab ) is a अनेक चुनाव परीक्षण , administered by the संयुक्त राज्य  Military Entrance Processing Command , used to determine qualification for enlistment in the United States armed forces .
It is often offered to American high school students  जब वे हैं in the 10th , 11th और 12th ग्रेड , हालांकि anyone योग्य  for enlistment may take it .
Although the test is  administered by the सैन्य , it is नहीं ( और never रै महरूम ) a आवश्यकता कि a test-taker साथ a qualifying स्कोर enlist in the हथियारबंद  forces .
In financial  हिसाब , a संतुलन चादर or बयान of वित्तीय स्थिति is a सारांश of the वित्तीय balances of a एकमात्र बंदोबस्त , a  business partnership , a corporation or other business organization , such as an LLC or an LLP .
Assets ,  देनदारी और स्वामित्व इक्विटी हैं सूचीबद्ध as of  a specific date , such as the end of its financial year .
A balance sheet is often  वर्णित as a `` स्नैपशॉट of a कम्पनी  's financial condition '' .
Of the four basic financial  कथन , the संतुलन चादर is the तभी बयान जिससे applies to a सिंगल  point in time of a business ' calendar year .
A standard  कम्पनी संतुलन चादर रै तीन भाग : एसेट  , liabilities and ownership equity .
The main categories  of एसेट हैं प्रायः सूचीबद्ध पहला , और typically  in order of liquidity .
Assets are  followed by the देनदारी  .
The difference between the assets and the liabilities is known as equity or the net assets or the net worth or  पूंजी of the कम्पनी और according to the हिसाब समीकरण , जाल लायक जरूर बराबर एसेट  minus liabilities .
Another way to look at  the वही समीकरण is कि एसेट बराबरी देनदारी  plus owner 's equity .
Looking at the equation in this  रास्ता shows कैसा एसेट यहूद financed : either by उधार धन ( देयता  ) or by using the owner 's money ( owner 's equity ) .
Balance  चादरें हैं प्रायः प्रस्तुत साथ एसेट in एक खण्ड और  liabilities and net worth in the other section with the two sections `` balancing . ''
A business operating entirely in cash  can माप इसके profits by withdrawing the संपूर्ण बैंको संतुलन  at the end of the period , plus any cash in hand .
however , अनेक व्यवसायों हैं नहीं सशुल्क  immediately ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment .
In other words : businesses have  एसेट और so वे can नहीं , भी if वे want to , तत्काल  turn these into cash at the end of each period .
Often , these businesses owe money to suppliers and to tax authorities , and the proprietors do not withdraw  सब उनके असली पूंजी और profits at the समाप्त  of each period .
In other words  व्यवसायों भी have देनदारी  .
.17 hornady मैग्नम rimfire , commonly ज्ञात as the .17 hmr , is  a rimfire rifle cartridge developed by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002 .
It descended from the .22 Magnum by necking down the .22 Magnum case to take a .17  कैलिबर ( 4.5 mm ) गोली , और it is अधिक costly to shoot than परंपरागत .22 कैलिबर rimfire कारतूस  .
commonly loaded साथ a 17 अनाज ( 1.1 g ) गोली  , it can deliver muzzle velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ) .
The Schaumburg Flyers were a professional  बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in schaumburg , इलिनोइस , in  the United States .
The Flyers were to be a charter  सदस्य of the उत्तर अमरीकी लीग , जिससे is नहीं संबद्ध साथ प्रमुख लीग  Baseball , however , the team folded in March 2011 , before they began play in the NAL .
From the 1999 season to the 2010 season , the  flyers निभाई उनके घर खेल at alexian फ़ील्ड  , near the Elgin O'Hare Expressway .
The team formerly played in Thunder Bay , Ontario , where  वे यहूद ज्ञात as the थंडर खाड़ी whiskey jacks  .
the टोली थी originally a सदस्य  of the Northern League from 1993 to 2010 .
On July 27 , 2009 , the Flyers played host  to बैटल of the लिंगों ii , जिससे pitted the flyers विरूद्ध the नेशनल प्रो fastpitch सॉफ्टबॉल  Champions , the Chicago Bandits .
Played by official  सॉफ्टबॉल नियम , the खेल थी देखी by  an overflow record crowd of 8,918 , and was won by the Bandits 4-2 .
In 1999 , the  flyers नियुक्त उनके पहला मैनेजर  , Ron Kittle .
Kittle is best known for his playing days with the Chicago White  sox , और पूर्व शिकागो शावक और श्वेत sox खिलाड़ी ग्रेग  Hibbard was the pitching coach .
दौरान the जल्दी सालो of the मताधिकार , kittle किया a श्रेणी of tv commercials to प्रचार  the team , using the gimmick `` Ma Kittle . '' where he played both himself and his `` Ma . ''
The ads were successful at sparking some initial interest in the  टोली as the flyers hoped to चोरी दूर प्रशंसक इससे the  nearby Kane County Cougars .
The ad mimicked the highly successful Converse ads where Larry Johnson starred  as दोनो खुद और `` gramama . ''
At the end of  the 2001 ऋतु , however , kittle resigned इससे उसके managerial स्थिति  , and Jim Boynewicz was hired to replace him .
In 2004 , the Flyers made it to  the उत्तरी लीग चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी विरूद्ध the  St. Paul Saints .
Despite  अग्रणी the five-game श्रेणी 2-1 , schaumburg  eventually lost the series .
In Game 5 , Flyers  राहत पिचर lyle prempas अनुमत a खेल जीतना  grand slam by St. Paul infielder Marc Mirizzi in the ninth inning .
The  flyers appeared in the उत्तरी लीग  Playoffs four times ( 1999 , 2003 , 2004 , 2006 ) but never won the championship .
Some famous players who played for the Flyers  यहूद पूर्व ओकलैंड a 's outfielder ozzie canseco और  former Chicago Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith .
Rachel Hannah  वाइज़ ( / वाइस / ; born 7 कूच 1970  ) is an English film and theatre actress and former fashion model .
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall ,  कैम्ब्रिज in the जल्दी 1990s , तब प्रारंभ working in टेलीविज़न , appearing in इंस्पेक्टर मोर्स ,  the British mini-series Scarlet and Black , and the television film Advocates II .
She made her film début in the film Death Machine ( 1994 ) , but her breakthrough role came in the film  कड़ी प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ) , अग्रणी to a high-profile भूमिका as एवलिन carnahan-o'connell in the films the मम्मी ( 1999 ) और the मम्मी रिटर्न (  2001 ) .
Other notable films featuring Weisz are Enemy at the Gates , About a Boy ,  constantine , the फव्वारा और the निरंतर माली , लिये जिससे वो प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार , a सुनहरी ग्लोब और  a Screen Actors ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle .
She has been labelled an `` English rose  '' चूंकि उसके नाबालिग भूमिका in चोरी सौंदर्य (  1996 ) .
Weisz also  works in थिएटर  .
Her stage  भेदन थी the 1994 पुनरुद्धार of noël कायर  's play Design for Living , which earned her the London Critics Circle Award for the most promising newcomer .
Weisz 's  प्रदर्शन भी शामिल the 1999 donmar गोदाम उत्पादन of टेनेसी विलियम्स ' एकाएक  , Last Summer , and their 2009 revival of A Streetcar Named Desire .
Her portrayal of Blanche DuBois in  the latter खेल अर्जित उसके  the Critics ' Circle Theatre Award for Best Actress .
She has recently played Evanora in  oz the ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War (  देखिए नामकरण ) , थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the  Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its  उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of  slavery into the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the  दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल  unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham Lincoln ,  opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य  ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his  उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य  formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the  आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as  illegal .
lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित  his administration would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states  जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession  .
Confederate forces seized  numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by  the Confederacy .
A Peace  सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह  , and both sides prepared for war .
The  confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर  on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces  fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the  फोर्ट ; नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy  , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a  नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी अर्थव्यवस्था  .
The Eastern Theater  थी inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign  into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam  , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the  emancipation उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति  slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of  उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy  in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 ,  रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended  at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes  led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब  Union armies in 1864 .
In  the पश्चिमी थिएटर , विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched  to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions ,  और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड , the confederate पूंजी  .
The  defending confederate फौज विफल , अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण  to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the earliest  सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों  .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships ,  और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively  .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards ,  बैंको , परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार युद्ध  I .
It remains the deadliest war in  अमरीकी इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined  number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston  estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा  , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Potato bread is a form of bread in which  आलू replaces a portion of the नियमित गेहूं आटा  .
It is cooked  in a किस्में of  methods , including by baking it on a hot griddle or pan , or in an oven .
It may  be leavened or unleavened , और may have  a variety of other ingredients baked into it .
The ratio of potato to wheat flour varies significantly from recipe to recipe , with  कुछ व्यंजनों having a बहुमत of आलू , और अन्य having a बहुमत of गेहूं  flour .
Some  व्यंजनों कॉल लिये mashed आलू , साथ अन्य  calling for dehydrated potato flakes .
It is available as a commercial product in many countries , with  समान विसंगतियाँ in संघटक , कुकिंग विधि  , and other variables .
The Pacific Time Zone  observes मानक समय by subtracting  eight hours from Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
The clock time in this zone is based on  the औसत सौर समय of the 120th मध्याह्न वेस्ट of the ग्रीनविच  Observatory .
During  daylight छायांकन समय , इसके समय ऑफसेट is  .
in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा , इस  time zone is generically called Pacific Time ( PT ) .
Specifically , it is Pacific  मानक समय ( pst ) जब observing मानक समय ( शीत ) , और प्रशांत  Daylight Time ( PDT ) when observing daylight saving time ( summer ) .
Most of Canada uses  daylight छायांकन समय  .
In Mexico the UTC−8 time zone is known as the Northwest  मण्डल , जिससे is synchronized साथ the  U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule .
The largest  नगर in the प्रशांत समय मण्डल is लॉस एंजिल्स in कैलिफ़ोर्निया इससे यूएसए ;  the city 's metropolitan area is the largest in the zone .
the मण्डल is एक घंटा ahead of the अलास्का समय मण्डल  , one hour behind the Mountain Time Zone and three hours behind the Eastern Time Zone .
Stereo 8 , commonly known as the eight-track  कार्ट्रिज , eight-track टेप , or बस eight-track , is a चुम्बकीय टेप ध्वनि  recording technology .
It was popular in the United  राज्य इससे the mid-1960s through to the जल्दी 1980s , लकिन थी अपेक्षाकृत अनजान  in many European countries .
It was , however , very popular in  the संयुक्त किंगडम दौरान इस  period .
स्टीरियो 8 थी निर्मित in 1964 by a consortium led by विधेयक lear of  Lear Jet Corporation , along with Ampex , Ford Motor Company , General Motors , Motorola , and RCA Victor Records ( RCA ) .
it थी a further विकास of the समान stereo-pak four-track  cartridge created by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz .
A later quadraphonic  संस्करण of the स्वरूप थी घोषित by आरसीए in अप्रैल 1970 और पहला  known as Quad-8 , then later changed to just Q8 .
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian : , alternatively transcribed as Rameses  और ramses or ) , referred to as रामेसेस the ग्रेट , थी the तीसरा मिश्र pharaoh ( reigned 1279 bc – 1213 bc ) of the उन्नीसवीं  dynasty .
He is often regarded as the greatest , most  मनाये , और सबसे शक्तिशाली pharaoh of the मिश्र साम्राज्य  .
His successors and later Egyptians called him  the `` ग्रेट पूर्वज . ''
Ramesses II  led अनेक सैन्य रिझाने into the levant  , re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan .
He also led expeditions to  the दक्षिण , into नुबिया , commemorated  in inscriptions at Beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein .
At age fourteen , Ramesses was appointed  प्रिंस रीजेंट by उसके पिता  Seti I .
He is believed to have taken the throne in his late  किशोर और is ज्ञात to have शासित मिश्र इससे 1279 bc to 1213 bc लिये 66 सालो और 2 महीने , according to दोनो manetho  and Egypt 's contemporary historical records .
He was once said to have lived to be 99  सालो बूढ़ा , लकिन it is अधिक संभावित कि he died in  his 90th or 91st year .
If he became Pharaoh in 1279  bc as सबसे egyptologists आज मानना , he होता have assumed the सिंहासन  on May 31 , 1279 BC , based on his known accession date of III Shemu day 27 .
Ramesses II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed festivals (  the पहला आयोजित बाद तीस सालो of a pharaoh 's शासनकाल , और तब प्रत्येक तीन सालो ) दौरान उसके reign—more  than any other pharaoh .
On his death , he was buried in a tomb in the Valley of the Kings ; his body was later moved to a  royal संचय जहाँ it थी खोजा in 1881 , और is अभी on प्रदर्शक  in the Cairo Museum .
The early  भाग of उसके शासनकाल थी केन्द्रित on भवन  cities , temples and monuments .
He established the city of  pi-ramesses in the nile डेल्टा as उसके नई पूंजी  and main base for his campaigns in Syria .
This  नगर थी निर्मित on the remains of the नगर of avaris , the पूंजी  of the Hyksos when they took over , and was the location of the main Temple of Set .
He is also known as Ozymandias in the  यूनानी स्त्रोत , इससे a लिप्यन्तरण into यूनानी of  a part of Ramesses 's throne name , , `` Ra 's mighty truth , chosen of Ra '' .
The Texas Rangers are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली स्तिथ in  the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex , based in Arlington , Texas .
The Rangers franchise is  फिलहाल a सदस्य of the पश्चिमी प्रभाग  of Major League Baseball 's American League .
Since , the  रेंजरों have निभाई in रेंजरों ballpark in आर्लिंगटन  in Arlington , Texas .
The team 's name is borrowed from the famous law  प्रवर्तन एजेंसी of the वही नाम .
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the Washington Senators , an expansion team awarded to Washington , D.C. , after the city 's first  ballclub , the असली वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों , स्थानांतरित to मिनेसोटा और  became the Twins .
बाद the ऋतु , the नई सीनेटरों स्थानांतरित to आर्लिंगटन ,  Texas , and debuted as the Rangers the following spring .
The Texas Rangers Baseball Club has made six appearances in the MLB postseason , all  following प्रभाग championships , in 1996 , 1998 , 1999  , 2010 , 2011 and 2012 .
In 2010 , the Rangers advanced past the  प्रभाग श्रेणी लिये the पहला समय , defeating the tampa खाड़ी  Rays .
टेक्सास तब brought घर उनके पहला अमरीकी लीग  Pennant after beating the New York Yankees in six games .
In the 2010 World Series , the franchise 's first , the Rangers fell to  the सैन फ्रांसिस्को दिग्गज in पाँच  games .
Their lone victory made them the first Texas team to win a  संसार श्रेणी खेल , the ह्यूस्टन एस्टर्स having महरूम swept in उनके 2005 संसार श्रेणी रूप  .
They repeated as American League champions the following year , then lost the 2011 World  श्रेणी to the st. लुई कार्डिनल्स in सात  games .
Gaius Julius Caesar ( ,  जुलाई 100 bc – 15 कूच 44 bc ) थी a रोमन सामान्य , statesman , कौंसुल  and notable author of Latin prose .
He played a critical role in the events that led  to the निधन of the रोमन गणतंत्र और the वृद्धि  of the Roman Empire .
In  60 bc , सीज़र , crassus और pompey formed  a political alliance that was to dominate Roman politics for several years .
Their attempts to  amass शक्ति through populist tactics यहूद opposed by the रूढ़िवादी elite भीतर the रोमन सीनेट  , among them Cato the Younger with the frequent support of Cicero .
Caesar 's conquest of  gaul , समाप्त by 51 bc , विस्तारित रोम 's territory  to the English Channel and the Rhine .
Caesar became the first Roman general to cross both  जब he निर्मित a सेतु आरपार the राइन और conducted  the first invasion of Britain .
These achievements granted him unmatched military power and threatened to eclipse the standing of Pompey , who had  realigned खुद साथ the सीनेट बाद the मौत of crassus in 53 bc  .
With the Gallic Wars concluded , the Senate ordered  सीज़र to lay bas उसके सैन्य  command and return to Rome .
Caesar refused , and marked his defiance in 49 BC by crossing the Rubicon  साथ a लीजन , leaving उसके प्रांत और illegally प्रवेश रोमन territory  under arms .
Civil war  resulted , इससे जिससे he उभरा as the unrivaled  leader of Rome .
After assuming control of  सरकारी , सीज़र began a कार्यक्रम of सोशल और सरकारी  reforms , including the creation of the Julian calendar .
He centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic  और थी आखिरकार proclaimed `` तानाशाह in perpetuity '' .
But the underlying political conflicts had not been resolved , and on the Ides of March ( 15 March  ) 44 bc , सीज़र थी assassinated by a समूह of सीनेटरों led by मार्कस junius  Brutus .
A new series of civil  युद्धों broke आउट , और the संवैधानिक सरकारी of the गणतंत्र  was never restored .
Caesar 's adopted heir Octavian , later  ज्ञात as augustus , रोज़ to एकमात्र शक्ति , और the era of the रोमन साम्राज्य  began .
Much of Caesar 's life is known from his own accounts of his military campaigns , and from  अन्य समकालीन स्त्रोत , मुख्यतः the अक्षर और भाषणों  of Cicero and the historical writings of Sallust .
The later biographies of Caesar by  suetonius और प्लूटार्क हैं भी प्रमुख  sources .
Caesar is deemed to be  एक of the महानतम सैन्य कमांडरों  of history .
भाषाई मैप of सीरियल  , Cameroon , and Benin .
