There are hundreds of languages  बोला in सीरियल  .
The major languages are Yoruba , Hausa , Igbo  , ईदो , fulfulde , कनूरी  , and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria , English , the former  औपनिवेशिक भाषा , थी चुनी to सुकर the सांस्कृतिक और भाषाई  unity of the country .
English , however , remains an exclusive preserve of  the देश 's शहरी elite , और is नहीं widely बोला in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों , जिससे comprise  three quarters of the countries population .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole ,  encompassing तीन प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं परिवारों : afroasiatic , nilo-saharan , और niger–congo  .
Nigeria also has several as-yet  unclassified भाषाएं , ऐसे as cen tuum , जिससे may represent a relic of an भी वृहद  diversity prior to the spread of the current language families .
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot , ( UK ) bird  's घोंसला , बिशप 's फीता , और महारानी ऐनी 's फीता ( उत्तर अमेरिका ) ) is a flowering संयंत्र in the परिवार apiaceae , देशी  to temperate regions of Europe , southwest Asia and naturalised to North America and Australia .
domesticated गाजर हैं cultivars of a subspecies  , Daucus carota subsp . sativus .
In the United States , the title  of संघीय न्यायधीश प्रायः अर्थात् a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the नियुक्ति  Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution .
In addition to the Supreme Court of the  संयुक्त राज्य , जिनकी अस्तित्व और कुछ पहलुओं of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार हैं परे the संवैधानिक शक्ति of कॉंग्रेस to alter , अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13 न्यायालयों of appeals ( भी पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) साथ appellate क्षेत्राधिकार over अलग  regions of the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate  justices of the परम् अदालत , सर्किट न्यायाधीशों of the न्यायालयों of appeals , और ज़िला न्यायाधीशों of the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों  .
All of these judges described thus far are  referred to sometimes as `` आलेख iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत  the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In addition , judges of the Court  of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार कसरत न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant  to Article III .
Other judges serving in the federal courts , including magistrate judges and  दिवालियापन न्यायाधीशों , हैं भी sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however , वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट , और  their power derives from Article I instead .
देखिए आलेख  I and Article III tribunals .
Nelly  किम फ़र्टाडो ( born दिसम्बर 2 , 1978 ) is a कनाडाई  singer , songwriter and actress .
She has sold 20 million albums worldwide and  अधिक 20 लाख singles , bringing उसके कुल बिक्री to over  40 million records around the world .
Furtado first gained fame with her  डेब्यू एल्बम , वाह  , Nelly !
, which spawned two  कामयाब singles , `` i 'm जैसे a बर्ड `` और `` फेरे बंद the लाइट  `` . ``
I 'm Like A Bird '' won a 2001 Juno Award  लिये सिंगल of the साल और a 2002 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा  Pop Vocal Performance .
In 2003 , Furtado released Folklore ,  जिससे उत्पादित तीन अंतरराष्ट्रीय singles— `` powerless  ( Say What You Want ) `` , `` Try `` and `` Força `` .
Three  सालो बाद वो released  Loose , a worldwide commercial success .
The album spawned four number-one hits : `` Promiscuous `` ,  `` maneater `` , `` कह it सही `` और `` सब शुभ बाते ( आइये  to an End ) `` .
After a three-year break , she released her first full-length Spanish album , Mi Plan , and  फ़र्टाडो प्राप्त a लैटिन ग्रैमी लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन  Album .
In 2012 , Furtado 's  चौथी english-language स्टुडियो एल्बम ,  The Spirit Indestructible was released .
Furtado 's work has  अर्जित उसके numerous पुरस्कार और accolades , सहित 2 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  , 10 Juno Awards , 3 MuchMusic Video Awards and a star on Canada 's Walk of Fame .
जीव of the रात्रि is  the tenth studio album by Kiss .
It is the band 's last album for Casablanca  रिकॉर्ड , the तभी लेबल the समूह था कभी अंकित लिये at  that point .
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca founder and early Kiss supporter Neil Bogart , who had died  of कर्कट दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग सत्र  .
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official  सदस्य ( जबतक 1998 's psycho सर्कस ) , और इसके पहला एल्बम साथ vinnie विंसेंट as the initially uncredited सीसे guitarist ( विंसेंट होता बाद be  credited , but not featured pictorially on the cover , of 1985 's reissue of the album ) .
टच is a निर्णायक अर्थात् of receiving  information .
This photo shows tactile  markings identifying सीढ़ियाँ लिये visually  impaired people .
The somatosensory system is a diverse sensory system comprising the receptors and processing centres to  उपज the संवेदी modalities ऐसे as टच , तापमान , proprioception ( देह स्थिति ) , और nociception  ( pain ) .
The sensory receptors cover the skin and epithelia , skeletal  मांसपेशियां , हड्डियों और joints , आतंरिक अंगों , और the cardiovascular  system .
While touch  is माना एक of the पाँच परंपरागत  senses , the impression of touch is formed from several modalities .
In medicine , the colloquial term `` touch '' is  प्रायः replaced साथ `` दैहिक होश '' to बेहतर प्रतिबिंबित the किस्में  of mechanisms involved .
दैहिक होश हैं sometimes referred to as somesthetic होश , साथ the समझना  that somesthesis includes touch , proprioception and ( depending on usage ) also haptic perception .
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using  अलग receptors : thermoreceptors , nociceptors , mechanoreceptors और chemoreceptors  .
Transmission of information from the receptors passes via sensory nerves through  tracts in the स्पाइनल cord और into  the brain .
Processing primarily occurs in the  प्राथमिक somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in the parietal पालि of the दिमागी  cortex .
The  cortical homunculus थी  devised by Wilder Penfield .
At its simplest , the system works when activity in a sensory neuron  is triggered by a विशिष्ट stimulus ऐसे as ऊष्मा ; इस सिग्नल आखिरकार गुजरता to an क्षेत्रफल in the दिमाग uniquely attributed to कि  area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location .
The point-to-point mapping of the body surfaces in the brain is  पुकारा a homunculus और is अनिवार्य in the सृष्टि of a देह  image .
This brain-surface ( `` cortical  '' ) मैप is नहीं अपरिवर्तनीय  , however .
Dramatic shifts can  occur in जवाब to स्ट्रोक  or injury .
magnolia is a विशाल genus of परिचय 210 flowering संयंत्र प्रजाति  in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae .
It is named after French  वनस्पतिशास्त्री पियरे magnol  .
magnolia is an प्राचीन  genus .
Appearing  पहले मधुमक्खियों किया , the पुष्प विकसित to प्रोत्साहित परागण  by beetles .
To avoid damage  इससे pollinating भृंग , the carpels of magnolia पुष्प  are extremely tough .
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have been found dating to 20 million years ago , and of  पौधे identifiably belonging to the magnoliaceae डेटिंग to 95 लाख  years ago .
Another aspect of  magnolias कि is माना to represent an ancestral राज्य is कि the पुष्प कली is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in  sepals ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated and called tepals rather than distinct sepals and petals .
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic with several other flowering plants near the base of the  flowering संयंत्र lineage ऐसे as amborella और nymphaea ( as खूब as साथ अनेक अधिक recently निकला पौधे  such as Lilium ) .
The natural range of Magnolia species is a  disjunct वितरण , साथ a प्रमुख केन्द्र in ईस्ट और southeast एशिया और a द्वितीयक केन्द्र in पूर्वी उत्तर अमेरिका , सेंट्रल अमेरिका , the  West Indies , and some species in South America .
अंगूठा
`` White Christmas ''  is an इरविंग बर्लिन सोंग reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned  Christmas setting .
According to the Guinness Book  of संसार रिकॉर्ड , the संस्करण सुंग by bing crosby is the best-selling सिंगल of सब समय , साथ  estimated sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide .
Accounts  vary as to जब और जहाँ  Berlin wrote the song .
One story is that he wrote  it in 1940 , in गरम la quinta , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , जबकि रहकर  at the La Quinta Hotel , a frequent Hollywood retreat also favored by writer-producer Frank Capra , although the Arizona Biltmore also claims the song was written there .
He often stayed up all night  लिखने — he बताई उसके सचिव , ``  Grab your pen and take down this song .
I just wrote the best song I 've ever written — heck , I just wrote  the बेहतरीन सोंग कि anybody 's कभी लिखा  ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC skiing )  is a रूप of स्की touring in जिससे भागीदार propel themselves आरपार  snow-covered terrain using skis and poles .
The activity is popular in many  स्थान साथ विशाल snowfields , primarily  Northern Europe , Canada , and Alaska .
Cross-country skiing is part of the Nordic skiing sport family , which includes ski jumping , Nordic combined ( cross-country skiing  और स्की कूद ) , biathlon ( स्कीइंग और राइफल marksmanship ) और ski-orienteering ( जिससे शामिल मैप नेविगेशन  along snow trails and tracks ) .
Cross-country skiing is the modern style of skiing that most  resembles प्रागैतिहासिक स्कीइंग , विशेषकर जब किया in the backcountry  .
It is  भी सम्बन्धित  to Telemark skiing .
A use tax in United States is  पूरक to बिक्री कर जिससे अर्थात् , if तुम ख़रीदे a taxable product/services बगैर paying कोई बिक्री कर  to vendor , you owe use tax .
You must self assess use tax and  अदा it सीधे to the राज्य जहाँ the उत्पाद  were consumed or services were rendered .
Use tax typically is a tax on consumption but if you  ख़रीदे an मद ( बगैर paying बिक्री कर ) और स्टोर it in अपना गोदाम initially  , use tax applies to that location where goods were stored .
Later on when the final  खपत takes प्लेस at कुछ अन्य स्थान , तुम हैं जरूरी to अदा the अवकल  of tax rate to the jurisdiction of ultimate place of consumption .
This really means that you do n't have  to अदा दोनो बिक्री कर as खूब as उपयोग  Tax on one transaction .
It is  तभी एक or the अन्य कि तुम हैं जरूरी  to pay on purchase of taxable products/services .
If vendor does n't charge any Sales tax on its invoice then it  is the दायित्व of the खरीदार to स्वः assess उपयोग कर और अदा it to the उचित  Jurisdication .
Use Tax is generally charged at the same tax rate of Sales Tax but in some states the  कर रेट is अलग  .
Use tax is also termed as ``  खपत कर '' or `` उपभोक्ता  Use Tax '' .
A use tax  is a प्रकार of excise कर levied in the संयुक्त  States by numerous state governments .
It is assessed upon tangible personal property purchased by a  निवासी of the assessing राज्य लिये उपयोग , भंडार , or खपत in कि राज्य ( नहीं लिये पुनर्विक्रय ) , regardless  of where the purchase took place .
If a resident of a state makes a purchase  भीतर उसके घर राज्य , पूरा बिक्री कर  is paid at the time of the transaction .
The use tax applies when a resident of the  assessing राज्य purchases an मद कि is नहीं विषय to उसके घर राज्य 's  sales tax .
Usually , this is due to out-of-state purchases , as  खूब as ordering वस्तुएं through the मेल , by फोन , or over the अंतरजाल इससे अन्य  states .
The use tax is typically assessed at the same  रेट as the बिक्री कर कि होता have महरूम owed ( if कोई ) था  the same goods been purchased in the state of residence .
For example , a resident of Massachusetts , with a 6.25 % `` sales and use tax '' on certain goods and services ,  purchases non-exempt goods or सेवाएं in नई हैम्पशायर लिये उपयोग , भंडार  or other consumption in Massachusetts .
Under New Hampshire law  , the नई हैम्पशायर विक्रेता collects no बिक्री कर on the goods , लकिन the मैसाचुसेट्स purchaser/user जरूर स्टिल अदा 6.25 % of the बिक्री  price directly to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use tax .
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of purchase , whatever taxes were paid by the purchaser to that state can be  deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) इससे the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent उपयोग , भंडार or खपत  in Massachusetts .
With few exceptions , no state 's vendors  होगा चार्ज the देशी राज्य 's बिक्री कर on goods shipped आउट of राज्य , अर्थ सब goods  ordered from out-of-state are essentially free of sales tax .
The purchaser is therefore required to declare and  अदा the उपयोग कर to उसके घर राज्य on  these ordered goods .
The assessing jurisdiction may  मेक the उपयोग कर देय annually , लकिन कुछ राज्य आवश्यकता  a monthly payment .
For example , where a Vermont resident has not paid at least 6 % sales tax on property brought in  लिये उपयोग in the राज्य , वर्मांट विधि requires दाखिल a कर वापसी ( रूप su-452 और भुगतान ) by the 20th दिन of the माह  following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late fee , a 5 % penalty per month , to a maximum of 25 % , plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties .
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or governmental agencies , purchases for resale in commerce , and purchases via `` casual sales  '' by individuals नहीं in the ordinary कोर्स of  business .
Also note that there are thousands of tax jurisdictions in the U.S. and many have ever-changing  सूचियाँ of विशिष्ट प्रकार of goods और सेवाएं कि हैं नहीं taxable  .
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006  मैसाचुसेट्स विधि requires भुगतान of कर on `` pre-written '' ( नहीं कस्टम ) तन्त्र खरीदा और डाउनलोड over the अंतरजाल  for installation and use in Massachusetts , regardless of where it originates .
However , the actual use of the same software downloaded by a  मैसाचुसेट्स निवासी to a सर्वर in another राज्य remains a non-taxed `` सेवा  '' .
In contrast ,  अरकंसास generally करता नहीं कर anything वितरित over  the Internet ( such as downloaded software or music ) , except VoIP which is specifically defined as taxable `` telecommunications services '' .
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered  thru a ठोस मीडियम '' ( i.e. , on डिस्क ) in अरकंसास is taxable भी if ordered ऑनलाइन , मगर `` कस्टम  software for a particular customer '' which is non-taxable `` programming services '' even if delivered on a disk .
In most cases , this complexity is part of the underlying sales tax laws ; but while a brick-and-mortar store has to deal with only the sales tax laws of its own location , remote sellers have to deal with the use tax laws of many jurisdictions—up to  प्रत्येक us राज्य और मोहल्ले कि प्रकृती उन्हें , if the कम्पनी रै a उपस्थिति or `` नेक्सस '' in प्रत्येक राज्य ( as  large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ) .
In medicine , pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an increase of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery , pulmonary  रग , or pulmonary capillaries , साथ ज्ञात as the फेफड़ों vasculature , अग्रणी to shortness of साँस , dizziness , fainting , और अन्य लक्षण , सब of  which are exacerbated by exertion .
Pulmonary hypertension can be a severe disease  साथ a markedly decreased कसरत सहिष्णुता  and heart failure .
it थी पहला पहचाना  by Dr. Ernst von Romberg in 1891 .
According to the most recent classification , it can be one of five different types :  arterial , venous , hypoxic , thromboembolic or विविध  .

Sanuk , a  प्रभाग of deckers बाहरी निगम , is  a footwear brand based in Southern California .
sanuk , the थाई शब्द लिये मजा , थी संस्थापित  by Southern California native Jeff Kelley when he started making sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet .
The first  उत्पाद निर्मित थी ग्रीन carpeted और हकदार the  `` Fur Real '' after one shop owner asked if the novelty sandal was `` For Real . ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through boutique stores and  नहीं the intended लहरे दुकानें  .
The novelty act was followed up by a sandal wrapped in wire mesh , a  तेंदुआ छपाई संस्करण , और शैलियाँ बना आउट of a poncho सामग्री in a किस्में of रंगों  .
Sanuk has grown to include style options for men , women and youth and is  वितरित आरपार the संयुक्त राज्य और in over 50 देशों throughout यूरोपीय , एशिया , दक्षिण अमेरिका  and Australia .
sanuk centers itself around a धनात्मक जीवनशैली  advocating the slogan , `` Smile , Pass it on ! `` .
In computer science , array programming languages ( also known as vector or  multidimensional भाषाएं ) generalize परिचालन on scalars to लागू transparently to सदिश , matrices , और उच्चतर आयामी  arrays .
Array programming  primitives concisely एक्स्प्रेस व्यापक विचार  about data manipulation .
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain cases : it is not uncommon to  ढूँढें सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा one-liners कि आवश्यकता अधिक than a युगल  of pages of Java code .
APL , designed by Ken Iverson , was  the पहला प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा to provide सरणी  programming capabilities .
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A  प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा '' और नहीं to arrays प्रति se . iverson 's योगदान to rigor और स्पष्टता थी संभवतः अधिक महत्वपूर्ण than the  simple extension of dimensions to functions .
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party , usually an individual , pays a life insurance company  a सिंगल प्रीमियम कि होगा बाद be वितरित वापस to the insured पार्टी  over time .
Annuity contracts  traditionally provide a गारंटी वितरण of आय over समय , ऐसे as via फिक्स्ड भुगतान , जबतक the मौत of  the person or persons named in the contract or until a final date , whichever comes first .
however , the बहुमत of आधुनिक annuity ग्राहक उपयोग annuities तभी to accumulate निधि फ़्री of  income and capital gains taxes and to later take lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature .
अध्यक्ष बराक  Obama .
Barack  ओबामा साथ उसके पहला परम् अदालत nominee  , Sonia Sotomayor .
following is a सूची of सब संयुक्त राज्य  federal judges appointed by President Barack Obama during his presidency .
As of April 30 , 2013 , 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the  संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट , namely दो justices to the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य , 35 न्यायाधीशों to the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of  appeals and 150 judges to the United States district courts .
25 further nominations are currently  प्रतीक्षारत सीनेट कार्रवाई  .
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United States Courts of  appeals , 67 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों और 22 अतिरिक्त संघीय  judiciary vacancies that are anticipated to occur before the end of Obama 's second term .
Obama has not made any  recess नियुक्ति to the  federal courts .
Obama has made two nominations  to the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार  , an Article III tribunal .
Obama also designated sitting judge Emily  C. हेविट of the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of संघीय दावा , an आलेख  I court , to be Chief Judge of that court .
This is a list  of एयरपोर्ट in मैक्सिको  , sorted by location .
Mexico has about  1,834 एयरपोर्ट , रैंकिंग 2nd in क्रमांक of  airports in North America , and 3rd in the world .
Only  प्रमुख नेशनल और अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airports are shown .
Agency  कर्ज़ भी ज्ञात as an एजेंसी बंध is a सुरक्षा , प्रायः a बंध , जारी  by a U.S. government-sponsored agency .
The offerings of these agencies are backed but not guaranteed by the US  सरकारी चूंकि the एजेंसियों हैं निजी entities  .
कुछ prominent issuers of ये प्रतिभूति हैं छात्र ऋण विपणन संघ  ( Sallie Mae ) , Federal National Mortgage Association ( Fannie Mae ) and Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation ( Freddie Mac ) .
Agency securities are usually exempt  इससे राज्य और लोकल कर , लकिन नहीं संघीय कर  .
एजेंसी कर्ज़ is भी पुकारा  an agency security .
The Susquehanna Steam  इलेक्ट्रिक स्टेशन , a खौलते  water reactor .
The reactors are located  अंदर the आयताकार containment इमारतें towards the सामने of the  cooling towers .
Three nuclear-powered American warships , ( top to bottom ) nuclear cruisers USS Bainbridge and USS  long बीच साथ uss एंटरप्राइज़ the पहला nuclear-powered  aircraft carrier in 1964 .
Crew members are spelling out  आइंस्टीन 's mass-energy equivalence सूत्र  E = mc2 on the flight deck .
the रूसी nuclear-powered हिमभंजक  NS Yamal on a 1994 joint expedition with the NSF .
Nuclear power is the use  of sustained नाभिकीय परिवर्द्धन to generate  heat and electricity .
Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7  % of the संसार 's उर्जा और 13 % of the संसार 's विद्युत ,  in 2012 .
In 2013 , the IAEA report that there are 437 operational nuclear power  रिएक्टरों ( हालांकि नहीं सब हैं producing विद्युत ) , in 31 देशों  .
In addition ,  वहीँ हैं लगभग 140 नवल बरतन using  nuclear propulsion in operation , powered by some 180 reactors .
There  is an जारी  debate about the use of nuclear energy .
Proponents , such as the World  नाभिकीय संघ , the iaea और पर्यावरणविद लिये नाभिकीय उर्जा contend कि नाभिकीय  power is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions .
Opponents , such as Greenpeace International and NIRS , believe  कि नाभिकीय शक्ति मुद्राएँ अनेक खतरे to लोगों  and the environment .
Nuclear power plant accidents include the Chernobyl disaster  ( 1986 ) , फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति ( 2011 ) , और the तीन मील द्वीप दुर्घटना  ( 1979 ) .
There have  भी महरूम कुछ nuclear-powered  submarine mishaps .
Research into safety  सुधार is continuing और नाभिकीय संलयन , believed  to be safer , may be used in the future .
As of 2012 , according to the IAEA  , विश्वव्यापी वहीँ यहूद 68 सिविल नाभिकीय शक्ति रिएक्टरों अंतर्गत निर्माण in  15 countries .
In  the us the पंक्तियां of लगभग हाफ इसके रिएक्टरों have महरूम विस्तारित  to 60 years , and plans to build another dozen are under serious consideration .
However , Japan  's 2011 फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति prompted a पुनर्विचार  of nuclear energy policy in many countries .
Germany  decided to बंद सब इसके रिएक्टरों  by 2022 , and Italy has banned nuclear power .
Following Fukushima , the International Energy Agency halved its  अनुमान of अतिरिक्त नाभिकीय generating क्षमता to be निर्मित  by 2035 .
Photograph of the  बर्लिन वॉल लिया  from the West side .
The Wall was built in 1961 to  prevent ईस्ट germans इससे fleeing इससे साम्यवादी  .
It was an  iconic प्रतीक of the ठंडा युद्ध और इसके पतन  in 1989 marked the end of the War .
The Cold War , often dated from 1947 to 1991 , was a sustained state of political  और सैन्य टेंशन between शक्तियां in the पश्चिमी bloc , वर्चस्व by the संयुक्त राज्य साथ नाटो  among its allies , and powers in the Eastern Bloc , dominated by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact .
This began after the success of their temporary  wartime गठबंधन विरूद्ध नाजी जर्मनी , leaving the ussr और the us as दो superpowers साथ  profound economic and political differences .
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned Movement founded by Egypt , India , and Yugoslavia ; this  गुट अस्वीकृत संघ साथ either the us-led वेस्ट or the  Soviet-led East .
The Cold War was so named because the two major powers—each  possessing नाभिकीय हथियार और thereby threatened साथ  mutual assured destruction —never met in direct military combat .
Instead , in their struggle for global influence  वे सगाई in जारी मनोवैज्ञानिक warfare और in नियमित अप्रत्यक्ष confrontations  through proxy wars .
Cycles of  सापेक्ष शांत होता be followed by ऊँची टेंशन  , which could have led to world war .
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ) , the Korean  युद्ध ( 1950–1953 ) , the स्वेज संकट ( 1956 ) , the बर्लिन संकट of 1961 , the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट ( 1962 ) , the वियतनाम युद्ध ( 1959–1975 ) , the योम kippur युद्ध ( 1973 ) , the सोवियत  war in Afghanistan ( 1979–1989 ) , the Soviet downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ) , and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ) .
The conflict was expressed  through सैन्य coalitions , रणनीतिक conventional फ़ोर्स deployments , extensive सहायता to क्लाएंट राज्य , espionage , विशाल प्रचार  campaigns , conventional and nuclear arms races , appeals to neutral nations , rivalry at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ) , and technological competitions such as the Space Race .
The US and USSR became involved in political and military conflicts in the Third World countries of Latin America ,  अफ़्रीकी , the मध्य ईस्ट , और southeast  Asia .
To alleviate the risk of a potential nuclear war , both sides  sought राहत of राजनैतिक तनाव through détente in  the 1970s .
In the 1980s , the United States increased diplomatic , military , and economic  pressures on the सोवियत संघ , at a समय जब the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य थी already कष्ट इससे  economic stagnation .
In the mid-1980s ,  the नई सोवियत अध्यक्ष मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization  '' , 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` openness '' , ca . 1985 ) .
Pressures for  नेशनल स्वतंत्रता grew stronger in  Eastern Europe , especially Poland .
They reached a  तोड़कर पाइंट जब गोर्बाचेव refused to उपयोग सोवियत सैनिकों to support the faltering  government of East Germany in late 1989 .
भीतर सप्ताह सब the उपग्रह राज्य  broke free from Moscow in a peaceful wave of revolutions ( there was some violence in Romania ) .
The  pressures escalated अंदर the सोवियत संघ , जहाँ साम्यवादी गिरी और the  USSR was formally dissolved in late 1991 .
The United  राज्य remained as the संसार 's  only superpower .
The Cold War and  इसके कार्यक्रम have बाएँ a significant विरासत , और it is प्रायः referred to in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति , विशेषकर in  media featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare .
Pikes Peak State Park is a state park of Iowa , USA , featuring a  bluff निहार the अपर मिसिसिपी नदी विपरीत the संगम  of the Wisconsin River .
The park is operated by the Iowa Department of  प्राकृतिक संसाधन  .
It is nearly a thousand acres ( 4 km2  ) in extent  .
The nearest  नगर is मैकग्रेगर , आयोवा  .
Iowa  राजमार्ग 76 लगभग  defines its northern boundary .
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of  pikes शिखर , a विशेषकर ऊँची पाइंट निहार the gorge of the अपर मिसिसिपी , और जैसे pikes  Peak in Colorado , is named for Zebulon Pike .
There are hiking  trails , campgrounds  and RV facilities .
Mountain  बाइक हैं permitted in निश्चित  portions of the park .
Aside from  recreational विकास , the जमीन in the पार्क थी never साफ और to a  large extent remains as it was before the advent of white settlement .
It is part of a larger complex of parks ,  reserves और refuges जिससे शामिल पुतला mounds नेशनल स्मारक , the विभिन्न components of the पीला नदी राज्य वन , the विशाल  Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller , much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge .
The  पूर्वोत्तर आयोवा विरासत ट्रेल  System is undergoing development , and will connect elements of these sites .
Zac Brown Band is an American  country/folk बैंड आधारित in अटलांटा  , Georgia .
The lineup consists of Zac Brown ( lead vocals , guitar ) , Jimmy De Martini ( fiddle , vocals ) , John Driskell Hopkins ( bass  गिटार , vocals ) , coy bowles ( गिटार , keyboards ) , क्रिस fryar ( ड्रम ) , मिट्टी कुक ( गिटार , keyboards , mandolin  , steel guitar , vocals ) , and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ) .
The band has toured throughout the United States , including a slot on  the 2009 और 2010 bonnaroo  Music Festival .
They have also recorded five studio albums , and charted nine Number One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` Chicken Fried `` , `` Toes `` ,  `` राजमार्ग 20 सवारी `` , `` फ़्री `` , `` as वो 's चलना दूर `` , `` colder मौसम `` , `` घुटना गहन `` , `` रखना me in दिमाग `` , और `` अलविदा in उसके आँखें `` in जोड to the singles  `` Whatever It Is `` and `` No Hurry `` , which peaked at number 2 on the same chart .
Talk radio is a radio format  containing चर्चा परिचय topical मुद्दे  .
Most shows are regularly  hosted by a सिंगल व्यक्तिगत , और प्रायः विशेषता साक्षात्कार साथ a क्रमांक  of different guests .
बात रेडियो typically शामिल an तत्व of श्रोता भागीदारी  , usually by broadcasting live conversations between the host and listeners who `` call in '' ( usually via telephone ) to the show .
Listener  योगदान हैं प्रायः screened by a दिखाएँ 's निर्माता ( s ) in अनुक्रम to अधिकतम दर्शक ब्याज और , in the  case of commercial talk radio , attract advertisers .
Generally , the shows are organized into segments ,  प्रत्येक अलग by a ठहराना लिये विज्ञापन ; however , in पब्लिक or non-commercial रेडियो , म्यूज़िक is sometimes निभाई in प्लेस  of commercials to separate the program segments .
Variations of talk radio include conservative talk , hot  बात , उदार बात और खेल  talk .
While talk radio has historically been associated with AM/FM , starting around  2005 the प्रौद्योगिकी लिये internet-based talk-radio shows became लागत प्रभावी in the रूप of podcasts  .
Now , it is possible for an individual to  उपयोग a किस्में of सेवाएं to मेजबान an internet-based talk-radio दिखाएँ बगैर carriage  by a traditional radio station .
In  जोड tv प्रोग्रामिंग इससे बात और न्यूज आउटलेट ऐसे as बीबीसी , सीएनएन , ब्लूमबर्ग और फॉक्स हैं अभी प्रायः  available expanding the world of talk radio further .
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed not only on radios , but a wide variety of other devices and services including  pcs using itunes , स्टेशन निर्देशिका ऐसे as tunein , दिखाएँ निर्देशिका स्मार्टफ़ोन साथ ऐप्स ऐसे  as Stitcher .
Hippa is a genus of decapod  crustaceans in the परिवार hippidae , containing the following  species:
Hippa  adactyla fabricius  , 1787
hippa admirabilis ( thallwitz  , 1892 )
Hippa  alcimede ( de man  , 1902 )
Hippa  australis hale , 1927
Hippa  carcineutes holthuis & मैनिंग  , 1970
Hippa  celaeno ( de man ,  1896 )
Hippa granulatus (  borradaile , 1904 )
Hippa  hirtipes ( दाना , 1852  )
hippa इंडिका haig , मुरुगन & बालकृष्णन  Nair , 1986
Hippa marmorata  ( hombron &  Jacquinot , 1846 )
Hippa ovalis (  A. milne-edwards ,  1862 )
Hippa  picta ( heller ,  1861 )
Hippa strigillata  ( stimpson  , 1860 )
hippa testudinaria (  Herbst , 1791 )
Hippa  truncatifrons ( miers , 1878  )
It is closely  सम्बन्धित to the genus emerita , और प्रजाति have प्रायः महरूम  transferred between the two genera .
Jakarta ( ) , officially known as the Special Capital  प्रदेश of जकार्ता ( ) , is the पूंजी और largest नगर of  Indonesia .
स्तिथ on the उत्तरपश्चिम coast of जावा , जकार्ता is the देश 's आर्थिक , सांस्कृतिक और राजनैतिक केन्द्र , और  with a population of 10,187,595 as of November 2011 , it is the most populous city in Indonesia and in Southeast Asia , and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world .
The  आधिकारिक महानगर क्षेत्रफल , ज्ञात as jabodetabek ( a नाम formed by combining the आरंभिक syllables of जकार्ता , bogor , depok , tangerang  and Bekasi ) , is the second largest in the world , yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it .
जकार्ता is सूचीबद्ध as a वैश्विक नगर in the 2008 वैश्वीकरण  and World Cities Study Group and Network ( GaWC ) research .
और रै an  area of .
This area has population of well over 28 million , making it one of the  संसार 's largest conurbations in शर्तें of क्रमांक of  inhabitants .
in 2011 , जकार्ता क्रमित 17th  among the world 's 200 largest cities , a jump from its 2007 ranking of 171 .
Jakarta has  grown अधिक rapidly than kuala lumpur  , Beijing and Bangkok .
Established in the fourth century , the city became an  महत्वपूर्ण व्यापार बंदरगाहों लिये  the Kingdom of Sunda .
It was the de facto capital of the  डच ईस्ट इंडीज ( जब it थी ज्ञात as batavia ) और रै जारी as the पूंजी of  Indonesia since the country 's independence was declared in 1945 .
The  नगर is the सीट of the आसियान  Secretariat .
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport , Halim Perdanakusuma International  विमानक्षेत्र , और tanjung priok harbour ; it is कनेक्ट by अनेक intercity और commuter रेल , और  served by several bus lines running on reserved busways .
A typical  घर एयर कंडीशनिंग  window unit .
Air conditioning is the process of altering the properties of air  ( primarily तापमान और आर्द्रता ) to अधिक favourable शर्तें  .
More generally , air conditioning can refer to any form of  technological कूलिंग , हीटिंग , वेंटिलेशन , or कीटाणुशोधन कि modifies the  condition of air .
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air con , AC or A/C , and not to be confused with the abbreviation for alternating current ) is a  प्रमुख or घर appliance , प्रणाली , or यांत्रिकी designed to बदलें the एयर तापमान और आर्द्रता भीतर an क्षेत्रफल ( प्रयुक्त लिये कूलिंग  and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ) .
The cooling is  typically किया using a सरल प्रशीतन साईकिल , लकिन sometimes वाष्पीकरण  is used , commonly for comfort cooling in buildings and motor vehicles .
In construction , a  पूरा प्रणाली of हीटिंग , वेंटिलेशन  and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC `` .
`` 6 Foot 7 Foot '' ( also styled as `` 6'7 '' ) is a  सोंग by अमरीकी rapper लील वेन featuring लेबल mate , कोरी  Gunz .
It is  लिया इससे उसके नवीं स्टुडियो एल्बम  , Tha Carter IV ( 2011 ) .
It was  officially released on itunes on  December 16 , 2010 .
It was produced by `` A  milli `` निर्माता बांग्लादेश  .

DC Talk ( styled as dc Talk ) , is a Grammy  -winning ईसाई रैप तिकड़ी  .
The group was formed in Lynchburg , Virginia in 1987  by टोबी mckeehan , माइकल tait  , and Kevin Max Smith .
They have released five  प्रमुख स्टुडियो एल्बम साथ : dc बात ( 1989 ) , nu थांग  ( 1990 ) , Free at Last ( 1992 ) , Jesus Freak ( 1995 ) , and Supernatural ( 1998 ) .
In 2002 , the  ज्ञानकोष of समकालीन ईसाई म्यूज़िक पुकारा dc  Talk `` the most popular overtly Christian act of all time . ''
In  2000 , the समूह released an ep titled सोलो जिससे contained  two solo songs from each member .
Since  कि समय , dc बात रै महरूम on an indefinite अंतराल  , and the three band members have each led solo careers .
They have performed and recorded individual songs together  अनेक टाइम्स दौरान the 2000s , हालांकि the समूह never officially  reunited or disbanded .
The group  's musical स्टाइल विकसित significantly throughout  their career .
Their first two releases , DC Talk  और nu थांग , यहूद of the  hip hop genre .
DC Talk 's third album , Free at Last ,  भी मुख्यतः took influence इससे the हिप हॉप स्टाइल , हालांकि उनके म्यूज़िक  began taking on a rock sound .
The  तिकड़ी 's पिछला दो एल्बम  , Jesus Freak and Supernatural , were predominantly pop rock .
The Bible is a  संकलन of अनेक shorter किताबे लिखा at अलग टाइम्स  and later assembled into the biblical canon .
All but the shortest of these books have been divided into  अध्याय , generally a पेज or so in लंबाई , चूंकि  the early 13th century .
Since  the mid-16th सदी , प्रत्येक अध्याय रै महरूम further  divided into `` verses '' of a few short lines or sentences .
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one  श्लोक , as in the मामला of , और sometimes वहीँ is अधिक than एक वाक्य in a सिंगल  verse , as in the case of .
As the chapter and verse divisions were not part of the  असली ग्रन्थ , वे रूप भाग of the paratext  of the Bible .
The Jewish divisions of the Hebrew text  differ at विभिन्न अंक इससे those प्रयुक्त by ईसाइयों  .
For instance , in  यहूदी परंपरा , the ascriptions to अनेक ज़बूर हैं regarded as स्वतंत्र आयतें , बनाना 116 अधिक आयतें , whereas the स्थापित ईसाई  practice is to count and number each Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it .
Some chapter divisions also occur in different  स्थान , e.g . in यहूदी bibles is गिने as  in Christian translations .
An index ( plural : indexes ) is a list of words or phrases ( 'headings ' ) and associated  संकेतक ( 'लोकेटरs ' ) to जहाँ उपयोगी सामग्री relating to कि heading can be  found in a document .
In a traditional  back-of-the-book अनुक्रमणिका the headings होगा शामिल names of लोगों , स्थान और कार्यक्रम , और अवधारणाओं चयनित  by a person as being relevant and of interest to a possible reader of the book .
The pointers are  typically पेज संख्याएँ , अनुच्छेद  numbers or section numbers .
In a library  कैटलॉग the शब्द हैं लेखक , शीर्षक , विषय headings , etc.  , and the pointers are call numbers .
Internet search engines , such as Google , and full text searching help provide access to  सूचना लकिन हैं नहीं as चयनात्मक as an अनुक्रमणिका , as वे provide non-relevant कड़ी , और may मिस प्रासंगिक सूचना if  it is not phrased in exactly the way they expect .
In United  राज्य वित्तीय विनियमन , a संदिग्ध कार्यकलाप रपट ( or sar ) is a रपट  made by a financial institution to the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network ( FinCEN ) , an agency of the United States Department of the Treasury , regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity .
Facebook on  the ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking service , whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book  दिए to विद्यार्थी at the प्रारंभ of the अकादमिक साल by कुछ  university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other .
It was founded in February 2004  by चिह्नित zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी  Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership was initially limited by the  संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी , लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in  the Boston area , the Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It gradually added  support लिये विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने  to high school students , and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at  तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become  registered users of the site .
Users must register before using the site , after  जिससे वे may बनाएँ a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल , add अन्य उपयोक्ता as मित्रों , और एक्सचेंज संदेश , सहित  automatic notifications when they update their profile .
additionally , उपयोक्ता may जुड़ें common-interest उपयोक्ता समूह , व्यवस्थित by कार्यस्थल , स्कूल or कॉलेज , or अन्य  characteristics , and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As of September  2012 , फेसबुक रै over एक  billion active users .
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey , there are 7.5 million children under 13 with  खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10 , violating the साईट 's शर्तें of सेवा  .
In May 2005 , Accel partners invested $ 12.7  लाख in फेसबुक , और जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख of  his own money to the pot .
A January 2009  compete.com पढ़ाई क्रमित फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त  social networking service by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment  साप्ताहिक शामिल the साईट on इसके end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' सूची , saying , `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes , याद हमारी co-workers  ' birthdays , bug our friends , and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
आलोचकों , ऐसे as फेसबुक detox , राज्य कि फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल obsession  in the United States , resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast estimates Facebook  रै 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय u.S. विज़िटर  in May 2011 .
According  to सोशल मीडिया आज , in अप्रैल 2010 an अनुमानित 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख  ) of the U.S. population had a Facebook account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth started to  स्टाल in कुछ regions , साथ the साईट खोने 7 लाख क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता in  the United States and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1  , 2012 , और थी headquartered in मेनलो  Park , California .
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to  the पब्लिक और व्यापार on the नैस्डैक on may  18 , 2012 .
सल्फोनेमाइड कार्यात्मक  group
Hydrochlorothiazide  is a सल्फोनेमाइड और  a thiazide .
Furosemide  is a सल्फोनेमाइड , लकिन  not a thiazide .
Sulfonamide  or sulphonamide is the आधार of  several groups of drugs .
The original antibacterial  sulfonamides ( sometimes पुकारा sulfa दवाएँ or sulpha दवाएँ ) हैं  synthetic antimicrobial agents that contain the sulfonamide group .
कुछ sulfonamides हैं भी विहीन of जीवाणुरोधी  activity , e.g. , the anticonvulsant sultiame .
The sulfonylureas and thiazide diuretics are newer  ड्रग समूह आधारित on the जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides  .
sulfa allergies हैं आम , hence medications  containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully .
It is important to make a distinction  between sulfa दवाएँ और अन्य sulfur-containing दवाएँ और एडिटिव , ऐसे as sulfates और sulfites , जिससे हैं chemically  unrelated to the sulfonamide group , and do not cause the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in the sulfonamides .
This is a list of  वर्ण इससे जार्ज लोपेज़  .
Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) are  domesticated धूसर geese ( either ग्रेलैग geese or swan geese ) रखा as मुर्गीपालन लिये उनके मांस , अंडे , और bas feathers  since ancient times .
30 Seconds to Mars is an American rock  बैंड इससे लॉस एंजिल्स , formed in 1998  .
Since 2007 , the  बैंड रै consisted of कर्ता jared leto ( सीसे vocals , लय गिटार , songwriter  ) , Shannon Leto ( drums , percussion ) and Tomo Miličević ( lead guitar , keyboards ) .
Following the departure of Matt Wachter ( now of Angels & Airwaves )  in 2007 , टिम kelleher became the bassist लिये the समूह , performing सजीव तभी साथ दोनो jared और miličević रिकॉर्डिंग बास लिये स्टुडियो  recordings , while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009 .
Previously , the group  भी प्रदर्शित guitarists  Solon Bixler ( now of Great Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ) .
To date , 30 Seconds to Mars have  released तीन स्टुडियो एल्बम – 30 सेकेंड to मंगल ( 2002  ) , A Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ) , This Is War ( 2009 ) and three extended plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ) , To the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ) , and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ) .
30 सेकेंड to मंगल ' म्यूज़िक रै महरूम संबद्ध ज़्यादातर साथ neo-prog , प्रगतिशील  metal and post-grunge , but they have also included emo , screamo , space rock and synthrock into their music .
They have been compared to Pink  floyd ( जो यहूद an influence on उनके कार्य ) और औजार क्युकी of उनके उपयोग of philosophical और आध्यात्मिक गीत ,  concept albums and their use of experimental music .
A Christmas Story is a 1983 American Christmas comedy film  आधारित on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of लेखक और raconteur जां गड़रिये  , based on his book In God We Trust , All Others Pay Cash , with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories .
It  थी निर्देशित  by Bob Clark .
The film has since become a holiday classic and is shown numerous  टाइम्स on टेलीविज़न दौरान the क्रिसमस ऋतु on the संजाल tbs , प्रायः  in a 24-hour marathon .
In 2012 , the film was selected for preservation in the National Film  रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस लिये होने `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically significant  '' .
A Joe  's केकड़ा shack शाखा  in San Diego , CA .
The building was  initially a rowing क्लबों और थी बाद परिवर्तित  into the restaurant .
Joe 's  केकड़ा shack is an अमरीकी कड़ी of beach-themed seafood कैज़ुअल डाइनिंग रेस्तरां  owned by Ignite Restaurant Group .
Founded in Houston ,  टेक्सास , the रेस्तरां अभी operates स्थितियाँ सब आरपार the संयुक्त  States of America .
It serves seafood  और अमरीकी भोजन  .
The restaurants also  have a तोहफा दूकान कि बिकता facetious t-shirts featuring वाक्यांश विज्ञापन  Joe 's seafood choices .
It  is आधारित in  Houston , Texas .
New York City Cruise Liner  टर्मिनल in नरक 's रसोईघर at 52nd गली  .
The  नई यॉर्क यात्री जलयान टर्मिनल ( भी ज्ञात as the लक्ज़री लाइनर पंक्ति or मैनहटन क्रूज टर्मिनल  or New York Cruise Terminal ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side .
The terminal consists  of उत्तर नदी पियर 88 , 90 , 92 और 94 on the हडसन नदी  between West 46th and West 54th Street .
( As a general rule , pier numbers in Manhattan can  be संकल्पित by adding 40 to the सम्बन्धित cross-street  . )
Ships  अभी डॉक at पियर  88 , 90 and 92 .
Pier 94 on the north side is now used  लिये प्रदर्शनी स्पेस  .
Pier 86 , once used by United States Lines ,  is अभी घर to the uss intrepid  .
In 2003 , the terminal  संभाला 900,000 यात्री  .
The city is forecasting that 1.5  लाख होगा उपयोग the टर्मिनल  by 2017 .
the पियर हैं  long and apart .
They were first  समाप्त in 1935 to बदलें the चेल्सी पियर as the  city 's luxury liner terminal .
The new terminal was built to handle bigger ships that had  outgrown the  Chelsea Piers .
The piers were renovated  in 1970 और हैं फिलहाल undergoing  another $ 150 million renovation .
The renovated plans call for it to handle  तीन विशाल जहाजों at a समय  .
In doing renovations , the city is also  considering decommissioning बांध 92  .
Logo  of the नई  York Cruise Terminal.For
दशकों the टर्मिनल थी  the only ocean-going passenger terminal in New York harbor .
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to handle comfortably only three large ships at a time , two new terminals have opened in the harbor — the Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened  in 2004 in bayonne , नई जर्सी ( प्रयुक्त by royal caribbean क्रूज लकीर , हस्ती क्रूज़ और azamara क्रूज़ ) , और the ब्रुकलीन क्रूज टर्मिनल ( प्रयुक्त by the महारानी मरियम 2 और अन्य जहाजों  of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn , New York .
The West Side  राजमार्ग takes a छोटी जोग ईस्ट इससे the पियर to नीचे वेस्ट 42nd गली क्युकी जब the  terminal was built land had to be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers .
The US Army Corps of Engineers , who control the  waterfront आयाम , होता नहीं extend the pierhead लकीर दूर into the नदी , so the नगर विस्तारित  the pier by cutting away at the land .
The city earlier did this for the  चेल्सी पियर ; however in चेल्सी तभी  landfill was taken away .
At the  यात्री टर्मिनल वास्तविक मैनहटन  schist was taken away .

Many major  यात्री जहाजों have docked वहीँ , सहित the rms महारानी मरियम 2 और स्वतंत्रता  of the Seas , before the Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened .

नॉर्वेजियाई क्रूज लकीर 's जल्द to be नवीनतम  ship the Norwegian Breakaway will sail year-round out of the New York Passenger Ship Terminal .
The city will spend $ 4  लाख to renovate और उन्नयन the  cruise terminal to accommodate the ship .

Christian right is a term used in the United States  to describe right-wing ईसाई राजनैतिक समूह कि हैं characterized by उनके दमदार support  of socially conservative policies .
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their understanding of the teachings of Christianity to politics and public policy by proclaiming the  मान of those शिक्षाओं and/or by seeking to उपयोग those शिक्षाओं to influence विधि और पब्लिक  policy .
In the U.S. , the Christian right is an  अनौपचारिक गठबन्धन formed around a कोर of धर्मान्तरण protestants कि draws `` support इससे नीतियां रूढ़िवादी catholics , यहूदियों , mormons  , and occasionally secularists '' who share their goals .
The movement has its roots in  अमरीकी राजनीती going वापस as दूर the 1940s और रै महरूम  especially influential since the 1970s .
Their influence draws , in part , from  grassroots सक्रियता as खूब as  their focus on social issues and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues .
The Christian right is notable today for advancing socially conservative positions on  मुद्दे सहित स्कूल दुआ , स्टेम कोशिका शोध , समलैंगिकता , निरोधक , गर्भपात  , and pornography .
Although the Christian right is usually associated with the U.S. ,  the गति रै महरूम a कुंजी फ़ैक्टर in the राजनीती of कनाडा , the नीदरलैंड्स , उत्तरी आयरलैंड  and Australia , among others .
Far East Movement (  stylized as far★east गति or abbreviated fm ) is  an American hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles .
The group  formed in 2003 और consists of kev nish ( केविन nishimura ) , prohgress  ( James Roh ) , J-Splif ( Jae Choung ) , and DJ Virman ( Virman Coquia ) .
Far East Movement 's first claim to fame was their  सोंग `` गोलाकार गोलाकार '' प्रदर्शित in the हॉलीवुड फिल्म  , The Fast and the Furious : Tokyo Drift , and its subsequent soundtrack , video game and DVD .
Since `` Round Round '' , the group has been featured on various network shows  सहित , , अनुगामी , गपशप लड़की , और finishing the खेल ( a प्रदर्शित  film at Sundance 2007 ) .
Their single `` Like a G6 `` hit number one on the Billboard  hot 100 चार्ट और on itunes as खूब in लेट अक्तूबर  2010 .
Far  ईस्ट गति भी रै the भेद of होने the पहला asian-american समूह to earn a #  1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States .
LR44 is the IEC designation  लिये an क्षारीय 1.5 वोल्ट बटन कोशिका , commonly प्रयुक्त in छोटी led flashlights ,  digital thermometers , calculators , calipers , watches , clocks , toys and laser pointers .
LR44  क्षारीय  cell
The battery nomenclature is defined by the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्युततकनीकी आयोग ( आईईसी ) in इसके 60086-3 मानक ( प्राथमिक  batteries , part 3 Watch batteries ) .
The letter L indicates the  electrochemical प्रणाली प्रयुक्त ; a जस्ता ऋणात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड , मैंगनीज डाइऑक्साइड depolarizer  and positive electrode , and an alkaline electrolyte .
R44 indicates a round cell 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and 5.2±0.2 mm height as  पारिभाषित by the आईईसी मानक  60086 .
Manufacturers have their own part numbers  लिये आईईसी प्रकार lr44 बैटरी including:

4.5-volt , D , C , AA , AAA , AAAA , A23 ,  9-volt , cr2032 और lr44 बैटरी
Other types  of बैटरी हैं or यहूद बना  in the R44 size .
Formerly , mercury batteries were  बना as बटन कोशिकाएं ( प्रकार mr44 और nr44 )  .
Zinc-air batteries  प्रकार pr44 आवश्यकता  air to work .
Silver-oxide batteries type SR44 may provide extra  क्षमता compared to lr44 प्रकार लकिन have थोड़ा अलग वोल्टेज विशेषताएँ  .
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide  बैटरी may be degraded साथ प्रतिस्थापन of lr44 प्रकार  .
