Hurricane  कैटरीना थी the deadliest और सबसे destructive अटलांटिक  hurricane of the 2005 Atlantic hurricane season .
It was the costliest natural disaster , as well as one of the five  deadliest hurricanes , in the इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
among अंकित अटलांटिक hurricanes , it  was the sixth strongest overall .
At least 1,833 people died in the hurricane and subsequent floods , making it the deadliest U.S. hurricane since the 1928 Okeechobee hurricane ; total property damage was  अनुमानित at $ 81 अरब ( 2005 usd ) , nearly ट्रिपल the क्षति brought by hurricane एंड्रयू in  1992 .
Hurricane Katrina formed over the Bahamas on August 23 , 2005 and crossed southern Florida as a moderate Category 1 hurricane  , causing कुछ मौतों और बाढ़ वहीँ पहले strengthening rapidly in  the Gulf of Mexico .
The hurricane strengthened to a  श्रेणी 5 hurricane over the गरम गल्फ जल , लकिन weakened पहले बनाना इसके दूसरी landfall as a श्रेणी  3 hurricane on the morning of Monday , August 29 in southeast Louisiana .
It caused  कठोर विनाश साथ the गल्फ coast  from central Florida to Texas , much of it due to the storm surge .
The most significant  क्रमांक of मौतों occurred in नई ऑरलियन्स , louisiana , जिससे flooded as the तटबन्ध  system catastrophically failed , in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland .
Eventually 80 % of the city and large  tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded , और the floodwaters  lingered for weeks .
however , the worst प्रॉपर्टी क्षति occurred in तटीय क्षेत्रों , ऐसे as सब मिसिसिपी beachfront कस्बों , जिससे यहूद flooded  over 90 % in hours , as boats and casino barges rammed buildings , pushing cars and houses inland , with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach .
The hurricane surge protection failures in New Orleans are  माना the worst सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी विपत्ति in u.S. इतिहास और prompted a मुकदमा विरूद्ध the u.S. फौज corps of इंजीनियर्स ( usace ) , the designers और बिल्डर  of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965 .
Responsibility for the failures and flooding was laid squarely on the Army Corps in January 2008 by Judge  stanwood डुवल , u.S. ज़िला अदालत , लकिन the संघीय एजेंसी could नहीं be आयोजित financially liable due to sovereign प्रतिरक्षण in the बाढ़  Control Act of 1928 .
There was also an investigation of the responses from federal , state and local governments , resulting in the  इस्तीफा of संघीय आपात प्रबन्धन एजेंसी ( fema ) निदेशक माइकल D. भूरा , और of नई ऑरलियन्स पुलिस विभाग ( nopd ) अधीक्षक  Eddie Compass .
Several agencies including the United States Coast Guard ( USCG ) , National  hurricane बीच ( nhc ) , और नेशनल मौसम सेवा (  NWS ) were commended for their actions .
वे provided सटीक hurricane मौसम ट्रैकिंग  forecasts with sufficient lead time .
Even the most insistent appeals  इससे नेशनल , राज्य और लोकल पब्लिक officials to निवासियों to evacuate पहले the तूफ़ान किया नहीं warn  that the levees could breach and fail .
u.S. कर्ज़ इससे  1940 to 2011 .
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the  पब्लिक '' और ब्लैक लाइनों indicate the कुल नेशनल  debt or gross public debt .
The difference is the `` intragovernmental debt , ''  जिससे शामिल दायित्वों to सरकारी कार्यक्रम ऐसे as सोशल सुरक्षा  .
stated as a सूत्र , नेशनल कर्ज़ = कर्ज़  held by the Public + Intragovernmental Debt .
the दूसरी फलक shows the दो कर्ज़ आंकड़े as  a percentage of U.S. GDP ( dollar value of U.S. economic production for that year ) .
The top  फलक is deflated so प्रत्येक साल is in 2010  dollars .
The United States public debt is the money borrowed by the federal government of the United States through the issuing of  प्रतिभूति by the राजकोष और अन्य संघीय सरकारी  agencies .
US public debt  consists of दो घटकs:
Debt held by the public includes Treasury securities held by investors outside the federal government , including that held by  individuals , corporations , the संघीय आरक्षित प्रणाली और विदेशी , राज्य और लोकल  governments .
Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in accounts administered by the  संघीय सरकारी कि हैं owed to कार्यक्रम beneficiaries , ऐसे as the सोशल सुरक्षा विश्वास निधि  .
Debt held by government accounts  represents the संचयी surpluses , सहित ब्याज आय  , of these accounts that have been invested in Treasury securities .
Public  कर्ज़ increases or decreases as a परिणाम of the सालाना  unified budget deficit or surplus .
The federal government budget deficit or surplus is the difference between  सरकारी रसीदें और बिता , ignoring intra-governmental  transfers .
However , some  बिता कि is excluded इससे the deficit ( supplemental appropriations  ) also adds to the debt .
Historically , the US  पब्लिक कर्ज़ as a share of जीडीपी increased दौरान युद्धों  and recessions , and subsequently declined .
For example , debt held by the public as a share of GDP peaked just  बाद संसार युद्ध ii ( 113 % of जीडीपी in 1945 ) , लकिन तब गिरी  over the following 30 years .
In recent decades , however , large  बजट deficits और the resulting increases in कर्ज़ have led to चिंता परिचय the long-term स्थिरता of  the federal government 's fiscal policies .
On 2  अप्रैल 2013 , कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक थी लगभग  $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of GDP .
Intragovernmental holdings  stood at $ 4.846 खरब , giving a संयुक्त कुल पब्लिक कर्ज़ of $ 16.805  trillion .
As of January 2013 , $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the debt held by the public was owned by foreign investors , the largest  of जिससे यहूद the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन और जापानी at बस over $ 1.1 खरब  each .
In basketball , an  assist is attributed to a खिलाड़ी जो गुजरता the बॉल to a  teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal , meaning that he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket .
There is some judgment involved in deciding  whether a passer चाहिए be credited साथ  an assist .
An assist can be  scored लिये the passer भी if the  player who receives the pass makes a basket after dribbling the ball .
However , the original definition of an assist did not include  ऐसे परिस्थितियों , so the तुलना of assist आंकडे आरपार eras is a जटिल  matter .
Only the pass  सीधे पहले the स्कोर may be गिने as an assist , so no अधिक than एक assist can be अंकित प्रति फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य  ( unlike in other sports , such as ice hockey ) .
A pass that leads to a  शूटिंग बेईमानी और स्कोरिंग by फ़्री throws करता नहीं गिनती as an assist in the एनबीए , लकिन करता in fiba खेल ( तभी एक assist is awarded  per set of free throws in which at least one free throw is made ) .
Point guards tend to get the most assists per game ( apg ) , as  उनके भूमिका is primarily कि of a  passer and ballhandler .
Centers tend  to मिलेंगी कम assists , लकिन centers साथ शुभ मंजिल उपस्थिति और  court vision can dominate a team by assisting .
Being inside the key , the center often has the best  कोण और the बेहतरीन स्थिति लिये `` बर्तन '' और अन्य  short passes in the scoring area .
Center Wilt Chamberlain  led the एनबीए in assists  in 1968 .
A strong center with  inside-scoring prowess , ऐसे as पूर्व एनबीए बीच hakeem olajuwon , can भी be an प्रभावी assistor क्युकी  the defense 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters .
The NBA single-game assist record is 30 , held by Scott Skiles  of the ऑरलैंडो जादू विरूद्ध the डेनवर टेंडर्स ,  on December 30 , 1990 .
The NBA  रिकार्ड लिये सबसे करियर assists is आयोजित by  John Stockton with 15,806 .
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK  , जब discussing प्रॉपर्टी कर in the संयुक्त राज्य , or previously in साइप्रस और माल्टा ) is a now-abstract  unit of currency used sometimes in accounting .
In the United States , it is a  notional ईकाई समतुल्य to of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर ( a  tenth of a cent ) .
in the संयुक्त किंगडम it थी प्रस्तावित दौरान the दशकों of चर्चा on  the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound sterling .
Several  अन्य मुद्राएँ प्रयुक्त the मिल  , such as the Maltese lira .
The term  आता इससे the लैटिन `` millesimum '' , अर्थ ``  thousandth part '' .
The Greco-Persian Wars ( also often  पुकारा the पारसी युद्धों ) यहूद a श्रेणी of विरोध between the हख़ामनी साम्राज्य of फारस और city-states  of the Hellenic world that started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC .
The  टक्कर between the fractious राजनैतिक संसार of the यूनानियों और the विशाल साम्राज्य of  the Persians began when Cyrus the Great conquered Ionia in 547 BC .
Struggling to rule the  independent-minded शहरों of ionia , the फारसियों  appointed tyrants to rule each of them .
This would prove to  be the सोर्स of much ट्रबल लिये the यूनानियों  and Persians alike .
In  499 bc , the तब tyrant of miletus , aristagoras , embarked on an expedition to जीतें the द्वीप of naxos , साथ पारसी support ; however , the  expedition was a debacle and , pre-empting his dismissal , Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians .
This was the beginning of the Ionian Revolt , which would  पिछला जबतक 493 bc , progressively आरेखण अधिक regions of एशिया  Minor into the conflict .
Aristagoras secured military  support इससे एथेंस और eretria , और in 498  BC these forces helped to capture and burn the Persian regional capital of Sardis .
The Persian king Darius the Great vowed  to have बदला on एथेंस और eretria  for this act .
the विद्रोह जारी , साथ the दो पहलू  effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC .
In 494 BC , the Persians regrouped ,  और attacked the epicentre of  the revolt in Miletus .
At the Battle of Lade , the Ionians suffered a decisive defeat , and the rebellion collapsed ,  साथ the फाइनल सदस्यों होने stamped आउट the following  year .
Seeking to secure his empire  इससे further revolts और इससे the हस्तक्षेप of the मेनलैंड यूनानियों  , Darius embarked on a scheme to conquer Greece and to punish Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis .
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 BC , with  the पारसी सामान्य mardonius conquering thrace और macedon पहले अनेक mishaps  forced an early end to the campaign .
In 490 BC a second force was  भेजा to यूनानियों , इस समय आरपार the ईजियन समुद्र , अंतर्गत  the command of Datis and Artaphernes .
This expedition subjugated  the cyclades , पहले besieging , capturing और  razing Eretria .
However , while en  रूट to आक्रमण एथेंस , the पारसी फ़ोर्स थी decisively पराजित by the athenians  at the Battle of Marathon , ending Persian efforts for the time being .
Darius then began to plan to  पूरा the conquest of यूनानियों , लकिन died in 486 bc और जिम्मेदारी  for the conquest passed to his son Xerxes I .
in 480 bc , xerxes personally led the दूसरी पारसी आक्रमण  of Greece with one of the largest ancient armies ever assembled .
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by  स्पार्टा और एथेंस ) at the बैटल of thermopylae अनुमत the फारसियों to मशाल एथेंस और overrun  most of Greece .
However , while seeking to destroy the combined Greek fleet  , the फारसियों suffered a कठोर  defeat at the Battle of Salamis .
The following year , the confederated Greeks went on the offensive ,  defeating the पारसी फौज at the बैटल of plataea , और समाप्ति the आक्रमण  of Greece .
The allied  यूनानियों followed up उनके कामयाबी by destroying the बाकी of the पारसी बेड़े at the बैटल of mycale , पहले  expelling Persian garrisons from Sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ) .
The actions of the general Pausanias at the siege of Byzantium alienated many of the Greek states from the Spartans , and the anti-Persian alliance was therefore  reconstituted around athenian नेतृत्व , as the so-called delian लीग  .
The  delian लीग जारी to अभियान विरूद्ध फारस लिये the अगला तीन दशकों , शुरूआत  with the expulsion of the remaining Persian garrisons from Europe .
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in  466 bc , the लीग जीती a दोगुना विजय कि  finally secured freedom for the cities of Ionia .
However , the League 's involvement in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted in a disastrous defeat ,  और further campaigning थी निलंबित  .
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in 451 BC , but  हासिल छोटी , और जब it withdrew the greco-persian युद्धों खींचा to a शांत समाप्त  .
Some historical sources suggest the end of hostilities was marked by a peace  सन्धि between एथेंस और फारस , the so-called सलाम of callias  .
hooverville निकट  Portland , Oregon
A `` Hooverville '' is the popular name for  shanty कस्बों निर्मित by बेघर लोगों दौरान the ग्रेट अवसाद  .
They were named after Herbert Hoover  , जो थी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान  the onset of the Depression and widely blamed for it .
the पद थी coined by चार्ल्स माइकेल्सन , publicity मुख्य  of the Democratic National Committee .
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born  सितंबर 25 , 1975 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस  Colts of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was drafted in the sixth round of  the 1998 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट by the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स  .
बाद a ऋतु on the अभ्यास स्क्वाड और दो सीज़न बैकिंग  up Brett Favre , he was traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001 .
hasselbeck gained the starting भूमिका in 2003 , और led सिएटल to छह playoff दिखावे और a सुपर कटोरी  appearance ; he was selected to three Pro Bowls and an All-Pro selection .
Following ten seasons with the  सीहॉक्स , hasselbeck joined the टेनेसी टाइटन्स  in 2011 .
Hasselbeck then signed a contract with the Indianapolis Colts in 2013  कम than 24 घंटों बाद होने released  by the Tennessee Titans .
ICT is inevitably  सम्बन्धित to the कंप्यूटर संजाल  .
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ) , is often used as an  विस्तारित पर्याय लिये सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी ( it ) , लकिन is a अधिक विशिष्ट पद कि तनावों the भूमिका of एकीकृत संचार और the संयोजन of दूरसंचार ( टेलीफोन लाइनों और बेतार सिग्नल ) , कंप्यूटर as खूब as जरुरी  enterprise software , middleware , storage , and audio-visual systems , which enable users to access , store , transmit , and manipulate information .
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s , but it became popular  बाद it थी प्रयुक्त in a रपट to the uk सरकारी by डेनिस stevenson in 1997 और in the संशोधित नेशनल curriculum लिये इंग्लैण्ड , वेल्स  and Northern Ireland in 2000 .
The term ICT is now also used to refer to the convergence of audio-visual and telephone networks  साथ कंप्यूटर संजाल through a सिंगल cabling or कड़ी प्रणाली  .
There are large economic incentives ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual ,  भवन प्रबन्धन और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ the कंप्यूटर संजाल प्रणाली using a सिंगल एकीकृत प्रणाली of cabling , सिग्नल वितरण और प्रबन्धन  .
The term Infocommunications is used in some cases as  a shorter रूप of सूचना और संचार ( s ) प्रौद्योगिकी  .
In fact Infocommunications is the expansion of telecommunications with information processing  और सामग्री हैंडलिंग कृत्यों on a आम डिजिटल प्रौद्योगिकी  base .
For a  तुलना of ये और अन्य शर्तें  , see .
For ICT Development  अनुक्रमणिका around the संसार , देखिए  .
This is a list of  वर्ण इससे जार्ज लोपेज़  .
A schematic presentation of  the प्लम खीर मॉडल of the अणु ; in thomson 's गणितीय मॉडल the `` corpuscles '' ( or  modern electrons ) were arranged non-randomly , in rotating rings
The current  मॉडल of the sub-atomic ढांचा involves a  dense nucleus surrounded by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by  J. J. thomson , जो खोजा the इलेक्ट्रॉन in 1897 , थी प्रस्तावित  in 1904 before the discovery of the atomic nucleus in order to add the electron to the atomic model .
In this model , the atom is composed of  electrons ( जिससे thomson स्टिल पुकारा `` corpuscles '' , हालांकि G. J. stoney था प्रस्तावित कि अणु of विद्युत be पुकारा electrons in 1894 )  surrounded by a soup of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative charges , like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding `` .
The  electrons ( as we जान उन्हें आज ) यहूद विचार to be positioned throughout the अणु , लकिन साथ  many structures possible for positioning multiple electrons , particularly rotating rings of electrons ( see below ) .
बजाय of a सूप , the अणु थी भी sometimes  said to have had a `` cloud '' of positive charge .
With this model , Thomson abandoned his  पहले `` nebular अणु '' परिकल्पना in जिससे the अणु थी रचित  of immaterial vortices .
Now , at least part of the atom was to be composed of Thomson 's particulate negative corpuscles , although the rest of the positively  चार्ज भाग of the अणु remained somewhat nebulous  and ill-defined .
The 1904  thomson मॉडल थी disproved by the 1909  gold foil experiment of Hans Geiger and Ernest Marsden .
This was  interpreted by अर्नेस्ट रदरफोर्ड  in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom  containing a बहुत ऊँची धनात्मक चार्ज ( in the मामला of सुनहरा , पर्याप्त to संतुलन परिचय 100 electrons ) ,  thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom .
Although gold has an  परमाणु क्रमांक of 79 , तत्काल बाद रदरफोर्ड 's पेपर appeared in 1911 antonius वैन  den Broek made the intuitive suggestion that atomic number is nuclear charge .
The matter  जरूरी प्रयोग  to decide .
Henry Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) that the  प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज थी बहुत बंद to the परमाणु क्रमांक ( moseley मिला तभी एक ईकाई अंतर  ) , and Moseley referenced only the papers of Van den Broek and Rutherford .
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of the atom in the same year , in which a nucleus containing an  परमाणु क्रमांक of धनात्मक चार्ज is घिरी by an बराबर क्रमांक of electrons  in orbital shells .
Bohr  था भी प्रेरित moseley  's work .
thomson 's मॉडल थी compared ( हालांकि नहीं by thomson  ) to a British dessert called plum pudding , hence the name .
thomson 's पेपर थी प्रकाशित in the कूच 1904 संस्करण of the philosophical पत्रिका  , the leading British science journal of the day .
In  thomson 's दृश्य : ... the अणु of the तत्व consist of a क्रमांक of negatively electrified  corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of uniform positive electrification , ...
In this model , the electrons were  फ़्री to घूर्णन भीतर the blob or बादल of धनात्मक  substance .
These orbits were stabilized  in the मॉडल by the फैक्ट कि जब an इलेक्ट्रॉन स्थानांतरित दूर इससे the बीच of the धनात्मक बादल , it लगा a larger जाल  positive inward force , because there was more material of opposite charge , inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ) .
In Thomson 's model , electrons were free to rotate in rings which were further stabilized by interactions between the electrons , and spectra were to be accounted for  by उर्जा मतभेद of  different ring orbits .
Thomson attempted to make his model account for some of the major spectral lines known for some  तत्व , लकिन थी नहीं notably कामयाब at इस  .
Still , Thomson 's model ( along with a similar Saturnian ring model for  परमाणु electrons , भी put आगे in 1904 by nagaoka बाद जेम्स क्लर्क मैक्सवेल 's मॉडल of शनि 's बजती ) , यहूद  earlier harbingers of the later and more successful solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom .
ठेठ स्ट्रिप  of bacon .
Bacon  is a cured मांस  prepared from a pig .
It is first cured using large quantities of salt , either in a  brine or in a शुष्क पैकिंग ; the परिणाम is भैस बेकन ( भी  known as green bacon ) .
Fresh bacon may then be further dried for weeks or months in  ठंडा एयर , or it may be boiled or स्मोक्ड  .
Fresh and  सूखी बेकन is typically  cooked before eating .
boiled बेकन is तैयार to खा , as is कुछ स्मोक्ड बेकन , लकिन may  be cooked further before eating .
Bacon is prepared from several  अलग कटौती of मांस  .
It is usually made from side and back cuts of  पोर्क , मगर in the संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ it is लगभग सदा prepared इससे पोर्क पेट ( typically referred to as `` streaky '' , `` वसीय '' , or ``  American style '' outside of the US and Canada ) .
The side cut has more  मांस और कम मोटे  than the belly .
Bacon may be prepared from either of two distinct back cuts :  fatback , जिससे is लगभग pure मोटे , और पोर्क loin  , which is very lean .
bacon-cured पोर्क loin is ज्ञात  as back bacon .
Uncooked pork  पेट बेकन स्ट्रिप्स  .
Bacon may be  खाया स्मोक्ड , boiled , fried , baked ,  or grilled , or used as a minor ingredient to flavor dishes .
Bacon is also used for  barding और larding roasts ,  especially game , e.g . venison , pheasant .
The word is derived  इससे the बूढ़ा ऊँची जर्मनी bacho , अर्थ `` buttock '' , `` हैम '' or `` पक्ष  of bacon '' , and cognate with the Old French bacon .
In continental Europe , this part of the pig is usually not smoked like bacon is in the United States ; it is  प्रयुक्त primarily in घन ( lardons ) as a कुकिंग संघटक , valued दोनो as a सोर्स of मोटे  and for its flavor .
In Italy , this is called  pancetta और is प्रायः पकाया in छोटी घन or परोसा uncooked  and thinly sliced as part of an antipasto .
Meat from other animals ,  ऐसे as बीफ , मेमने , मुर्गा , बकरी , or तुर्कों , may भी be काटें , cured  , or otherwise prepared to resemble bacon , and may even be referred to as `` bacon '' .
Such use is common  in क्षेत्रों साथ significant यहूदी और मुस्लिम  populations .
The USDA defines  बेकन as `` the cured पेट of a स्वाइन carcass '' ; अन्य कटौती  and characteristics must be separately qualified ( e.g. , `` smoked pork loin bacon '' ) .
For safety , bacon must be treated to prevent trichinosis ,  caused by trichinella , a parasitic roundworm  which can be destroyed by heating , freezing , drying , or smoking .
Bacon  is विशिष्ट इससे नमक  pork and ham by differences in the brine ( or dry packing ) .
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients , most notably sodium nitrite , and occasionally sodium nitrate or potassium nitrate ( saltpeter  ) ; सोडियम ascorbate or erythorbate हैं added to accelerate curing और stabilize  color .
flavorings ऐसे as भूरा शुगर or  maple are used for some products .
If used , sodium  polyphosphates हैं added to improve sliceability और reduce  spattering when the bacon is pan fried .
Today , a  brine लिये हैम , लकिन नहीं बेकन , शामिल  a large amount of sugar .
Historically , `` ham '' and  `` बेकन '' referred to अलग कटौती of मांस कि यहूद brined  or packed identically , often together in the same barrel .
The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 ( ERISA ) ( , codified in part at ) is a federal law which establishes  न्यूनतम मानकों लिये पेंशन योजनाएँ in निजी उद्योग और provides लिये extensive नियम  on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans .
ERISA was enacted to protect the interests of employee  लाभ योजना भागीदार और उनके beneficiaries  by:
Requiring the  प्रकटीकरण of वित्तीय और अन्य सूचना  concerning the plan to beneficiaries ;
establishing मानकों of conduct  for plan fiduciaries ;
Providing for  उचित remedies और  access to the federal courts .
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full  देह of कानून regulating कर्मचारी लाभ योजनाएँ , जिससे हैं मिला  mainly in the Internal Revenue Code and ERISA itself .
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA  is विभाजित among the विभाग of मजदूर , the विभाग of the राजकोष ( विशेषकर the आतंरिक आय  Service ) , and the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation .
Illegal immigration to the United States is  the अधिनियम of विदेशी नागरिकों प्रवेश the संयुक्त राज्य , बगैर सरकारी अनुमति और in उल्लंघन  of United States nationality law , or staying beyond the termination date of a visa , also in violation of the law .
A warning sign at the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary between  the United States and Canada in Point Roberts , Washington .
a much अलग दृष्टिकोण  at the U.S.-Mexico border near El Paso , Texas
The undocumented  अप्रवासी जनसांख्यिकी of the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 थी अनुमानित by the बीच लिये आव्रजन  Studies to be about 11 million people , down from 12.5 million people in 2007 .
Other estimates  दायरा इससे  7 to 20 million .
According to a 2005 Pew Hispanic Center  रपट , 56 % of undocumented आप्रवासियों यहूद इससे मैक्सिको ; 22 % यहूद इससे अन्य लैटिन अमरीकी  countries ; 13 % were from Asia ; 6 % were from Europe and Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world .
Alvin  स्वतंत्र स्कूल ज़िला is a  school district based in Alvin , Texas ( USA ) .
एल्विन isd is a विशाल suburban स्कूल ज़िला दक्षिण of ह्यूस्टन in the  communities of Alvin , Manvel , Pearland , Hillcrest , Rosharon , Iowa Colony , Liverpool , and Amsterdam .
AISD serves Pearland city  's rapidly growing पश्चिमी portion of the नगर सहित the नई विशाल master-planned समुदायों  of Shadow Creek Ranch , South Fork , and Southern Trails .
Alvin  isd कवर  of land .
In  इंसान anatomy , the ulnar  nerve is a nerve which runs near the ulna bone .
The ulnar  collateral स्नायु of कोहनी संयुक्त is in संबंध साथ  the ulnar nerve .
The nerve is the largest  unprotected तंत्रिका in the इंसान देह ( अर्थ unprotected  by muscle or bone ) , so injury is common .
This nerve is directly connected to the little finger , and the adjacent half of the ring finger , supplying the palmar  पक्ष of ये उंगलियाँ , सहित दोनो सामने और वापस of the नुस्ख़े , शायद as दूर वापस as the fingernail  beds .
One method of injuring the  तंत्रिका is to स्ट्राइक the medial epicondyle of the humerus  from posteriorly , or inferiorly with the elbow flexed .
The ulnar nerve is trapped between the bone and the  overlying स्किन at इस पाइंट  .
This is commonly referred to as bumping one 's  `` मजेदार अस्थि ''  .
This name is  विचार to be a pun , आधारित on the ध्वनि प्रतिरूप between the नाम  of the bone of the upper arm , the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous `` .
alternatively , according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी शब्दकोष it may refer to  `` the peculiar sensation experienced when it is struck '' .
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry , shortened Hogwarts , is a fictional  अंग्रेजों स्कूल of जादू लिये विद्यार्थी aged ग्यारह to  eighteen , and is the primary setting for the first six books in J.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series .
Rowling has suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ) , which she had seen at  kew gardens कुछ समय पहले लिखने the श्रेणी , हालांकि the names `` the हॉग्वार्ट्स '' और `` hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 निगेल molesworth  book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans .
Hogwarts school was voted as the 36th best Scottish educational establishment in a 2008  ऑनलाइन रैंकिंग , outranking एडिनबर्ग 's loretto स्कूल  .
According to a director of the  स्वतंत्र स्कूलों संजाल rankings , it थी added to  the schools listing `` for fun '' and was then voted on .
The U.S. subprime  बंधक संकट थी a नियत of कार्यक्रम और शर्तें कि led to a वित्तीय  crisis and subsequent recession that began in 2008 .
It was  characterized by a वृद्धि in subprime बंधक delinquencies और  foreclosures , and the resulting decline of securities backed by said mortgages .
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September 2008 , with  significant disruption in the प्रवाह of क्रेडिट to व्यवसायों  and consumers and the onset of a severe global recession .
There were many causes of the crisis , with commentators  assigning अलग स्तर of दोष to वित्तीय संस्थानों , regulators , क्रेडिट एजेंसियों , सरकारी आवास नीतियों  , and consumers , among others .
A proximate cause  थी the वृद्धि in subprime  lending .
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a  दिए साल रोज़ इससे the ऐतिहासिक 8 % or निम्नतर दायरा to लगभग 20 % इससे 2004 to 2006 , साथ much उच्चतर ratios  in some parts of the U.S .
A high percentage of these  subprime mortgages , over 90 % in 2006 लिये उदाहरण  , were adjustable-rate mortgages .
These two changes were part of a broader trend of lowered  lending मानकों और higher-risk बंधक  products .
Further , U.S. households had become increasingly indebted  , साथ the अनुपात of कर्ज़ to डिस्पोजेबल निजी आय उठती  from 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007 , much of this increase mortgage-related .
When U.S. home prices declined steeply after  peaking in mid-2006 , borrowers ' क्षमता to पुनर्वित्त उनके लोन became  more difficult .
As adjustable-rate mortgages  began to रीसेट at उच्चतर ब्याज दरों ( causing उच्चतर  monthly payments ) , mortgage delinquencies soared .
प्रतिभूति समर्थित साथ mortgages , सहित subprime mortgages  , widely held by financial firms globally , lost most of their value .
Global investors also  drastically घटाया purchases of mortgage-backed कर्ज़ और अन्य प्रतिभूति  as part of a decline in the capacity and willingness of the private financial system to support lending .
Concerns  परिचय the soundness of u.S. क्रेडिट और वित्तीय बाज़ार led  to tightening credit around the world and slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe .
The crisis had severe , long-lasting  consequences लिये the u.S. और यूरोपीय  economies .
The U.S. entered a deep recession , with nearly 9  लाख कार्य खोया दौरान 2008 और 2009 , roughly  6 % of the workforce .
U.S. housing prices fell nearly 30 % on  औसत और the u.S. भण्डार मार्केट गिरी लगभग  50 % by early 2009 .
As of early 2013 , the U.S. stock market had recovered to its pre-crisis  शिखर लकिन आवास कीमतें remained निकट उनके कम पाइंट और बेरोजगारी  remained elevated .
Economic  विकास remained नीचे pre-crisis  levels .
Europe also continued to struggle with its  अपना आर्थिक संकट  .
Carl  जंग in 1910  .
मायर्स और briggs extrapolated उनके mbti  theory from Jung 's writings in his book Psychological Types .
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI ) assessment is a  psychometric प्रश्नावली designed to माप मनोवैज्ञानिक  preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions .
ये वरीयताओं यहूद extrapolated इससे the typological theories प्रस्तावित by कार्ल गुस्ताव  Jung and first published in his 1921 book Psychological Types ( English edition , 1923 ) .
Jung theorized that there are four principal psychological functions by which we experience the world :  सनसनी , अंतर्ज्ञान , अहसास , और सोच  .
One of these  चार कृत्यों is प्रबल  most of the time .
The  असली डेवलपर of the व्यक्तित्व inventory यहूद katharine कुक briggs और उसके बेटी , इसाबेल briggs मायर्स  ; these two , having studied extensively the work of Jung , turned their interest of human behavior into a devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to practical use .
They began creating the  indicator दौरान संसार युद्ध ii , believing कि a ज्ञान of व्यक्तित्व वरीयताओं  would help women who were entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective '' .
The initial questionnaire grew into the  myers-briggs प्रकार indicator , जिससे थी पहला  published in 1962 .
The  mbti focuses on सामान्य populations और emphasizes  the value of naturally occurring differences .
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying  assumption of the mbti is कि we सब have विशिष्ट वरीयताओं in the रास्ता we construe हमारी  experiences , and these preferences underlie our interests , needs , values , and motivation '' ( p. 499 ) .
`` Judas ''  is a सोंग by अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार महिला गागा  , from her second studio album Born This Way ( 2011 ) .
It  थी released by interscope रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल 15  , 2011 , four days ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and produced by  महिला गागा और redone , `` यहूदा '' is a नृत्य और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस सोंग  about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her .
It embodies the  incidents कि have haunted गागा in the पास्ट ,  and its core meaning refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga has further explained that the song was  भी परिचय honoring एक 's भीतरी अंधेरा in अनुक्रम  to bring oneself into the light .
the कलाकृति लिये the सिंगल थी  designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word .
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups , the song was generally well received by  आलोचकों , जो likened the सोंग to `` ख़राब रोमांस `` साथ कुछ noting it चाहिए  have been the album 's lead single .
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks , including `` Poker Face `` ,  `` lovegame `` , `` ख़राब रोमांस '' , और `` alejandro  `` .
It contains three distinct  hooks और a हाउस -influenced ब्रेक  down .
Gaga explained  कि the लाइनों बोला दौरान the विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे मोचन ,  regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be .
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales  खोलने , लकिन थी कम कामयाब commercially in  comparison to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the  शीर्ष टेन of the चार्ट in सबसे प्रमुख म्यूज़िक  markets , and also reached the top of the charts in South Korea .
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011 , co-directed  by गागा और laurieann गिब्सन और co-starring नॉर्मन reedus  .
It  रै a biblical कथानक जहाँ reedus  played Judas Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene .
The video portrays them as  आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों going to जेरूसलम  .
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus , and  ended साथ गागा as magdalene getting stoned to मौत  .
Before its release , the Catholic League condemned Gaga  लिये the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके भूमिका  in the video .
However , critics generally praised the video ,  नहीं ढूंढना कोई अप्रिय सामग्री  .
The video was  मनोनीत लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 एमटीवी वीडियो  Music Awards .
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows , including The Graham  नॉर्टन दिखाएँ , शनिवार रात्रि सजीव , शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '' , the फ्रेंच x फ़ैक्टर as  well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show .
Marvin Gaye (  अप्रैल 2 , 1939april 1 , 1984 ) , born मारविन pentz gay , jr. , थी an अमरीकी  singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of  motown रिकॉर्ड in the 1960s साथ a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स सहित `` कैसा मीठी it is ( to be loved by तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम कुएं और tammi terrell , बाद कमाई the  titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's  मिलेंगी it on और became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक दूर इससे the बागडोर of इसके  production company .
Gaye 's  बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे अनेक r & b subgenres  such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s  , gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` यौन healing `` और the मध्यरात्रि  Love album .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye  रै महरूम मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों , सहित the  Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and  sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in the गति चित्र उद्योग और is the तभी श्रेणी in जिससे प्रत्येक सदस्य  is eligible to nominate for .
Best Picture is considered the most important of the Academy Awards , as it  represents सब the directing , एक्टिंग , म्यूज़िक composing , लिखने , संपादन और  other efforts put forth into a film .
Consequently ,  बेहतरीन चित्र is the फाइनल पुरस्कार और the निष्कर्ष  of the annual Academy Awards ceremony .
The Grand Staircase  कालम at the dolby थिएटर in लॉस एंजिल्स , जहाँ the अकादमी पुरस्कार ceremonies have  been held since 2002 , showcase every film that has won the Best Picture title since the award 's inception 85 years ago .
भारी बरसात is an इंटरैक्टिव नाटक action-adventure वीडियो खेल निर्मित by  French developer Quantic Dream exclusively for the PlayStation 3 .
the खेल is लिखा और निर्देशित by quantic  Dream 's founder and CEO David Cage .
Heavy Rains story is a dramatic thriller modelled after film noir , featuring four  protagonists शामिल साथ the रहस्य of the origami कातिल , a सीरियल कातिल जो उपयोग  extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims .
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the next victim , while investigative journalist  मैडिसन paige , एफबीआई profiler नॉर्मन jayden , और निजी जासूस स्कॉट शेल्बी हैं प्रत्येक trying to track bas clues  to the Origami Killer 's identity .
The player interacts with the game by performing actions highlighted on screen related to  motions on the नियंत्रक , और in कुछ मामले , performing a श्रेणी of जल्दी समय कार्यक्रम  during fast-paced action sequences .
The player 's decisions and  क्रियाएँ दौरान the खेल होगा affect the कथा  .
The main characters can  be मारे , और निश्चित क्रियाएँ may सीसे to अलग  scenes and endings .
A playable demo was  released on 11  February 2010 .
The demo was released prior to  इस तिथि लिये लोगों जो took भाग in  a Four Day Challenge on 5 February 2010 .
A patch to allow use of  the प्लेस्टेशन मूव नियंत्रक  to play the game was released in September 2010 .
Heavy Rain was critically  acclaimed और रै बेची  over two million copies .
It won 2010 's Game of  the साल इससे सीएनएन और गेमिंग संघ , और बेहतरीन  PS3 Game of 2010 by GameSpy and IGN .
A modified version of the  खेल थी released titled भारी बरसात संस्करण modifiée exclusively  in France , aimed towards a younger audience .
In 2010 , the game was included in the book  1001 वीडियो खेल तुम जरूर खेल  Before You Die .
कुल superannuation उद्योग देनदारी  : members funds and reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988 .
Annual total  superannuation उद्योग एसेट  growth 1996-2005 .
superannuation in ऑस्ट्रेलिया refers to the इंतजाम जिससे लोगों मेक  in Australia to have funds available for them in retirement .
In Australia  , superannuation इंतजाम हैं government-supported और प्रोत्साहित , और  minimum provisions are compulsory for employees .
For example , employers are required to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries and  मजदूरी ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation निधि , लकिन लोगों हैं प्रोत्साहित to put aside अतिरिक्त  funds into superannuation .
The minimum obligation required by employers is  नियत to बढ़ाएँ to 12 % धीरे stepping  annually from 2013 to 2020 .
An individual can withdraw funds out of a  superannuation निधि जब the व्यक्ति meets एक of the शर्तें  of release contained in Schedule 1 of the Superannuation Industry ( Supervision ) Regulations 1994 .
This is a list of the  वर्ण इससे the अमरीकी comedy-drama टेलीविज़न  series The Game .
Electoral College map showing the results  of the 2012 u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव  .
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the popular vote in 26 states  और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया ( denoted in ब्लू ) to कैप्चर 332  electoral votes .
Former Governor  mitt romney ( r - ma ) जीती the लोकप्रिय vote in 24 राज्य ( denoted in रेड )  to capture 206 electoral votes .
Cartogram representation of the Electoral College vote for the 2012  चुनाव , साथ प्रत्येक वर्गाकार representing एक चुनावी  vote .
The United States Electoral College is the  संस्था कि officially elects the अध्यक्ष और  Vice President of the United States every four years .
The  अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं नहीं  elected directly by the voters .
Instead , they are elected by `` electors ''  जो हैं चुनी by लोकप्रिय vote on a state-by-state  basis .
Electors are apportioned  to प्रत्येक राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , लकिन नहीं to territorial possessions of the  United States , such as Puerto Rico and Guam .
The  क्रमांक of निर्वाचक in प्रत्येक राज्य is बराबर to the क्रमांक of  members of Congress to which the state is entitled .
The  twenty-third amendment रै सदा resulted in  the District of Columbia having three electors .
There are 538 electors , based on there  होने 435 प्रतिनिधि और 100 सीनेटरों , प्लस  the three electors from the District of Columbia .
Electors are  pledged to particular अध्यक्षीय और वाइस अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार  , though unpledged electors are possible .
In  सब राज्य , मगर maine  and Nebraska , electors are elected on a `` winner-take-all '' basis .
That  is , सब निर्वाचक pledged to the अध्यक्षीय  candidate who wins the most votes in a state become electors for that state .
Maine and Nebraska  उपयोग the `` congressional ज़िला विधि '' , selecting एक elector भीतर प्रत्येक congressional  district by popular vote and selecting the remaining two electors by a statewide popular vote .
Although no elector is required by federal law to honor a  प्रतिज्ञा , वहीँ have तभी महरूम बहुत few अवसरों जब an elector voted contrary  to a pledge .
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how  a अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं निर्वाचित और requires  each elector to cast one vote for President and another vote for Vice President .
Critics argue that the Electoral College is  inherently undemocratic और देता झूले राज्य अनुपातहीन  influence in electing the President and Vice President .
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage in  the चुनाव of the अध्यक्ष to the छोटी राज्य , as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्वाचक लिये the छोटी  states is three compared to one for the election of representatives .
On the other  हाथ , the winner-take-all विधि  of voting favors the larger states .
A number of  संवैधानिक amendments have  been proposed seeking to alter the Electoral College or replace it with a direct popular vote .
Barack Hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4 , 1961 ) is the 44th and current President  of the संयुक्त राज्य , the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to  hold the office .
Born in Honolulu ,  हवाई , ओबामा is a ग्रैजुएट of कोलंबिया विश्वविद्यालयों  and Harvard Law School , where he was president of the Harvard Law Review .
He was a community organizer  in शिकागो पहले कमाई उसके विधि  degree .
He worked as a civil rights  attorney in शिकागो और सिखाया संवैधानिक विधि at the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Chicago Law School from 1992 to 2004 .
He  परोसा तीन शर्तें representing the 13th  District in the Illinois Senate from 1997 to 2004 , running unsuccessfully for the United States House of Representatives in 2000 .
In 2004 , Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent Illinois in the United States Senate with his victory in  the कूच लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी प्राथमिक , उसके keynote पता at the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल सम्मेलन in जुलाई , और उसके चुनाव to the सीनेट in  November .
He began his presidential campaign in 2007 , and in 2008 , after a close primary campaign against Hillary Rodham Clinton ,  he जीती sufficient delegates in the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी primaries to प्राप्त the अध्यक्षीय  nomination .
He then defeated Republican nominee John  मैक्केन in the सामान्य चुनाव , और थी उदघाटन  as president on January 20 , 2009 .
Nine months later , Obama was named  the 2009 नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार laureate  .
He  थी re-elected अध्यक्ष in नवम्बर 2012 ,  defeating Republican nominee Mitt Romney , and was sworn in for a second term on January 20 , 2013 .
Early in his first term in office , Obama signed into law economic stimulus  विधान in जवाब to the ग्रेट मंदी in the रूप of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 और the कर राहत , बेरोजगारी बीमे  Reauthorization , and Job Creation Act of 2010 .
अन्य प्रमुख घरेलू पहलों in उसके प्रेसिडेंसी शामिल the रोगी सुरक्षा और सस्ती परवाह  Act , often referred to as `` Obamacare '' ; the Dodd–Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act ; the Do n't Ask , Do n't Tell Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget Control Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012 .
In May 2012  , he became the पहला बैठे u.S. अध्यक्ष to सरेआम support same-sex विवाह और in 2013 उसके  administration filed briefs which urged the Supreme Court to rule in favor of same-sex couples in two high-profile cases .
In foreign policy , Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the  इराकी युद्ध , increased troop स्तर in अफगानिस्तान , हस्ताक्षरित the नई प्रारंभ बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ रूस , ordered u.S.  military involvement in Libya , and ordered the military operation that resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden .
The Honda CBR1100XX  सुपर blackbird थी a होंडा मोटरसाइकिल  made from 1996 to 2007 .
The bike was developed to  चुनौती the कावासाकी निंजा zx-11 as the संसार  's fastest production motorcycle , and Honda succeeded with a top speed of .
दो सालो बाद the शीर्षक passed  to the Suzuki Hayabusa , which reached .
The Blackbird is named after the  लॉकहीड sr-71 , भी a गति रिकार्ड होल्डर  .
Sample  दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health record based on images
Sample view of  an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य  record
An  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड ( ehr ) is an evolving अवधारणा  defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations .
It is a  रिकार्ड in डिजिटल स्वरूप कि is theoretically सक्षम of होने साझा आरपार अलग  health care settings .
In some cases this sharing  can occur by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना प्रणालियों  and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include a range of data , including demographics ,  चिकित्सा इतिहास , दवा और allergies , immunization औकात , प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम , radiology  images , vital signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing information .
The Mariner  up on the mast in a  storm .
One of  the wood-engraved illustrations  by Gustave Doré .
The Rime of the Ancient Mariner ( originally The Rime of the Ancyent Marinere ) is the longest major poem by the  अंग्रेज़ी कवि सैमुएल टेलर कॉलरिज , लिखा in 1797–98 और प्रकाशित in 1798 in the पहला संस्करण of  Lyrical Ballads .
Modern editions use a  बाद संशोधित संस्करण मुद्रित in 1817 कि  featured a gloss .
Along with other poems in Lyrical Ballads , it  थी a सिग्नल शिफ़्ट to आधुनिक काव्य और the शुरूआत of अंग्रेजों रोमांटिक  literature .
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines  कैसा वेब browsers और अन्य उपयोक्ता एजेंटों can automatically चुनें the उचित प्रॉक्सी सर्वर ( अभिगम  method ) for fetching a given URL .
A PAC file contains a  जावास्क्रिप्ट फलन “findproxyforurl ( url ,  host ) ” .
This function  रिटर्न a स्ट्रिंग साथ एक or अधिक  access method specifications .
These specifications cause the user agent  to उपयोग a particular प्रॉक्सी सर्वर or to  connect directly .
Multiple  विशेषताएँ provide a fall-back जब a प्रॉक्सी fails  to respond .
The browser fetches this  pac संचिका पहले requesting  other URLs .
The URL of  the pac संचिका is either विन्यस्त हस्तचालित or संकल्पित  automatically by the Web Proxy Autodiscovery Protocol .
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1 , 1996 ) ,  ज्ञात mononymously as zendaya , is an अमरीकी  actress , singer and dancer .
she stars on  the डिज़्नी चैनल sitcom  Shake It Up as Rocky Blue .
She has starred in two films  और निभाई एक of the सीसे भूमिकाएँ in the  film Frenemies as Halley Brandon .
She voiced  फर्न in the pixie खोखला  Games .
She appeared in Good Luck Charlie as Rocky Blue and in a Good Luck Charlie  और शेक it up क्रॉसओवर शीर्षक चार्ली शेक  It Up .
She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the episode `` Walk The Prank '' and on  a.n.t . फार्म as sequoia जोन्स in the एपीसोड `` रचनात्मक  ConsultANT . ''
Zendaya  is भी a संगीतकार  .
She signed  a सौदे साथ हॉलीवुड रिकॉर्ड on अगस्त 8 , 2012 और प्रारंभ  recording songs for her debut album on August 12 , 2012 .
She released a single from an  स्वतंत्र लेबल पुकारा `` swag it आउट `` और another सिंगल साथ बेला thorne पुकारा  `` Watch Me , '' which is featured on the Break It Down album .
On March 20 , 2012 , Zendaya and Bella Thorne  released an एल्बम साथ पुकारा शेक it up : सजीव 2 नृत्य , प्रत्येक have उनके अपना सोंग on it , साथ  with a mash-up of both songs together as one .
On August 21 , 2012 ,  zendaya और बेला thorne released an ep पुकारा  Shake It Up : Made In Japan .
Zendaya has a Christmas song called `` Shake Santa Shake , '' which is on the Disney Channel Holiday Playlist CD  , जिससे थी released on अक्तूबर 2 ,  2012 .
On March 5 , 2013 the  तीसरा शेक it up साउंडट्रैक थी released , हकदार i < 3 नृत्य ; on it , zendaya रै  two songs with Bella - `` Contagious Love '' and `` This Is My Dance Floor '' - as well as one solo song , `` Beat of My Drum . ''
This is a list of airports in Pennsylvania ( a U.S. state  ) , grouped by प्रकार और sorted by स्थान  .
It contains all  public-use और सैन्य एयरपोर्ट in the  state .
Some private-use and former airports may be included where notable , such as airports that were previously  public-use , those साथ वाणिज्यिक enplanements अंकित by the faa or एयरपोर्ट आबंटित an iata  airport code .
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc .  originally released in 2007 लिये the iphone और ipod टच प्लेटफ़ॉर्म , it रै महरूम विस्तारित  to support other Apple devices such as the iPad and Apple TV .
Unlike  microsoft 's खिड़कियाँ फोन और google 's  Android , Apple does not license iOS for installation on non-Apple hardware .
, Apple 's App Store contained  अधिक than 700,000 आईओएस अनुप्रयोग , जिससे have collectively  been downloaded more than 30 billion times .
It had a 21 % share of the smartphone mobile  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली इकाई shipped in the चौथी क्वार्टर of 2012 , पीछे तभी  Google 's Android .
In June 2012  , it accounted लिये 65 % of मोबाईल वेब आंकड़ा  consumption ( including use on both the iPod Touch and the iPad ) .
At the half of 2012  , वहीँ यहूद 410 लाख डिवाइस activated  .
According to the special media event held  by ठहराना on सितंबर 12 , 2012 , 400 लाख डिवाइस  have been sold through June 2012 .
The user interface of iOS  is आधारित on the अवधारणा of सीधा हेरफेर , using multi-touch  gestures .
इंटरफ़ेस कंट्रोल तत्व consist  of sliders , switches , and buttons .
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe , tap , pinch , and reverse pinch , all  of जिससे have विशिष्ट परिभाषाएं भीतर the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग  system and its multi-touch interface .
Internal accelerometers are used by some applications to  respond to shaking the यंत्र ( एक आम परिणाम is the undo कमांड ) or घूर्णन it in तीन आयाम ( एक आम परिणाम  is switching from portrait to landscape mode ) .
iOS is derived from  os x , साथ जिससे it साझा the डार्विन न्यास  .
iOS is Apple 's mobile version of the OS X  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली प्रयुक्त on ठहराना कंप्यूटर  .
In iOS , there are  चार abstraction परतों : the कोर os परत , the कोर सेवाएं परत  , the Media layer , and the Cocoa Touch layer .
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the device 's flash memory for the  प्रणाली विभाजन , using roughly 800 mb of कि विभाजन ( varying by मॉडल  ) for iOS itself .
आईओएस फिलहाल रनों  on iPhone , iPad , iPod touch and Apple TV .
The Plymouth  superbird is प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके अत्यधिक  high rear wing .

A spoiler is an automotive  aerodynamic यंत्र जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन फलन is to 'spoil ' प्रतिकूल एयर गति  across a body of a vehicle in motion , usually described as turbulence or drag .
विघ्न on the सामने of a गाडी हैं प्रायः पुकारा एयर dams , क्युकी in जोड to directing  air flow they also reduce the amount of air flowing underneath the vehicle which generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag .
Spoilers are  प्रायः fitted to रेस और high-performance खेल गाड़ियाँ , हालांकि  they have become common on passenger vehicles as well .
Some spoilers are added to cars primarily for styling  उद्देश्य और have either छोटी aerodynamic लाभ or भी मेक the वायुगतिकी बदतर  .
Spoilers for cars are often  incorrectly उलझन साथ , or the पद प्रयुक्त interchangeably  with , wings .
Automotive wings  हैं डिवाइस जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन is to generate downforce as एयर  passes around them , not simply disrupt existing airflow patterns .
Mario , who serves as Nintendo 's mascot , is a fictional  अक्षर निर्मित by खेल पंक्तियां शिगेरू miyamoto और voiced  by Charles Martinet .
This is a list of video games where the character Mario plays  a भाग , either as the समर्थक , विपक्षी , supporting  character , as part of an ensemble cast , as a cameo , or in a game within a game .
It does not include simple references to the character , such as the portraits of Mario found  in the लेजेंड of zelda : a कड़ी  to the Past .
The year indicated is the year the game was first  released , सबसे commonly in जापानी ; खेल यहूद sometimes  released years later in other regions of the world .
The list  शामिल पोर्ट , remakes  and compilations .
It does  n't शामिल कोई आभासी  Console re-releases .
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I  am a man of निरंतर विषाद '' ) is a परंपरागत अमरीकी लोक सोंग पहला अंकित by लंड  Burnett , a partially blind fiddler from Kentucky .
The song was originally recorded by Burnett as  `` विदाई सोंग '' मुद्रित in a रिचर्ड burnett songbook  , circa 1913 .
An early  संस्करण थी अंकित by emry आर्थर in 1928 ( vocalion  Vo 5208 ) .
Public interest  in the सोंग थी नवीनीकृत बाद the रिलीज of the 2000 फिल्मी  O Brother , Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a सेंट्रल  role in the film 's plot .
The song was also  शामिल in the फिल्मी 's अत्यधिक कामयाब , multiple-platinum  selling soundtrack .

The volt ( symbol : V ) is the SI derived unit for  इलेक्ट्रिक संभावित ( वोल्टेज ) , इलेक्ट्रिक संभावित अंतर  , and electromotive force .
The volt is named in honor of the Italian physicist  alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ) , जो invented the वोल्टायिक pile  , possibly the first chemical battery .
A plaque commemorating the location of the  साराजेवो हत्या और कदम of gavrilo princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987 , पहले कदम यहूद  removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A  प्लैक commemorating the स्थान  of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , heir presumptive to  the austro-hungarian सिंहासन , और उसके बीवी , सोफी , duchess of hohenberg , यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो ,  by Gavrilo Princip , one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's  south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be संयुक्त into a वृहद सर्बिया or a यूगोस्लाविया  .
The assassins ' motives were consistent with the movement that  बाद became ज्ञात as यंग बोस्निया  .
सर्बियाई सैन्य अधिकारियों  stood behind the attack .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military  प्रज्ञा dragutin dimitrijević , उसके righthand man प्रमुख vojislav tankosić , और masterspy  Rade Malobabić .
Major Tankosić armed the assassins with bombs and  pistols और प्रशिक्षित उन्हें .
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses  और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ of हथियार और operatives  into Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the key members of the clandestine tunnel , and the key  सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों जो यहूद स्टिल जिंदा यहूद गिरफ्तार  , tried , convicted and punished .
Those who were  गिरफ्तार in बोस्निया यहूद आजमाया in  Sarajevo in October 1914 .
The other conspirators  यहूद गिरफ्तार और आजमाया पहले a सर्बियाई कंगारू अदालत on the french-controlled  Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators .
much of कया is ज्ञात परिचय the assassinations आता इससे  these two trials and related records .
कार्यभार of जिम्मेदारी लिये the bombing और हत्याएं of  28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month later .
Mission San Juan Capistrano was a Spanish  मिशन in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , स्तिथ in present-day सैन जुआन  Capistrano .
It was founded  on सब संतो ' दिन नवम्बर 1 , 1776 , by स्पेनी catholics  of the Franciscan Order .
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano , a 15th century theologian and ``  योद्धा पुजारी '' जो resided in the abruzzo प्रदेश of इटली , सैन जुआन capistrano रै the भेद  of being home to the oldest building in California still in use , a chapel built in 1782 .
Known  alternately as `` सेरा 's चैपल '' और `` पिता सेरा 's  Church , '' it is the only extant structure where it has been documented that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass .
One of  the बेहतरीन ज्ञात of the alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया मिशन ( और एक of the few मिशन to have दरअसल महरूम  founded twice—others being Mission San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La Purísima Concepción ) .
The site was originally consecrated  on अक्तूबर 30 , 1775 , by पिता fermín lasuén , लकिन थी  quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego .
The success of the settlement is evident in  इसके ऐतिहासिक रिकॉर्ड  .
Prior to the arrival of the missionaries ,  कुछ 550 natives यहूद बिखरे throughout  the local area .
By 1790 , the number of converted Christians had grown to 700 ,  और बस छह सालो बाद nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( हाल converts  ) lived in or around the Mission compound .
1,649 baptisms were  conducted कि साल अलोन , आउट of the कुल  4,639 souls converted between 1776 and 1847 .
More than 2,000 former inhabitants ( mostly  juaneño इंडियंस ) हैं दफ्न in unmarked क़ब्रों in the मिशन  's cemetery ( campo santo ) .
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) St. John O'Sullivan , who recognized the property 's historic  मान और working tirelessly to conserve और rebuild इसके structures , हैं दफ्न at the प्रवेश to the कब्रिस्तान on  the west side of the property , and a statue raised in his honor stands at the head of the crypt .
The surviving chapel also serves as  the फाइनल resting प्लेस of तीन पैड्रेस जो passed on जबकि सेवारत at the मिशन : fathers  José Barona , Vicente Fustér , and Vicente Pascual Oliva are all entombed beneath the sanctuary floor .
The Criolla or `` Mission grape , '' was first planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in  1783 , the पहला वाइन उत्पादित in alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया उभरा इससे the मिशन 's वाइनरी  .
the मिशन डाला a long काल of क्रमिक  decline after secularization in 1833 .
Numerous efforts  यहूद बना over the सालो to restore the मिशन to इसके पूर्व महिमा , लकिन none  met with great success until the arrival of Father O'Sullivan in 1910 .
बहाली प्रयत्न continue , और `` सेरा 's चैपल '' is  still used for religious services .
About  half-a-million विज़िटर , सहित 80,000 स्कूल children  , come to the Mission each year .
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake  ) हैं a प्रसिद्ध architectural अचरज , the मिशन is शायद बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये the सालाना `` वापसी of the दात '' जिससे is traditionally  observed every March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's Day ) .
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a favorite  विषय लिये अनेक notable कलाकारों , और रै महरूम immortalized in साहित्य और  on film numerous times , perhaps more than any other mission .
In 1984 , a modern church complex was constructed just north and  वेस्ट of the मिशन यौगिक और is अभी ज्ञात as मिशन basilica सैन जुआन capistrano  .
Today , the mission compound serves as a museum , with the Serra Chapel within the  यौगिक सेवारत as a चैपल लिये the मिशन मोहल्ला  .
Better Off Dead is a 1985  अमरीकी टीन रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी अभिनीत जॉन cusack और लिखा और  directed by Savage Steve Holland .
It tells the story of high  स्कूल छात्र लेन myer जो is suicidal बाद  his girlfriend breaks up with him .
Mercedes-Benz Superdome  ( originally louisiana superdome और commonly  The Superdome ) is a sports and exhibition stadium , located in the Central Business District of New Orleans , Louisiana , USA .
Plans were drawn up  in 1967 , by the नई ऑरलियन्स modernist architectural कड़  of Curtis and Davis .
Its  स्टील फ़्रेम कवर a expanse  .
Its dome is made of a Lamella multi-ringed frame and has a diameter of , making it  the largest फिक्स्ड domed ढांचा in  the world .
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints ,  the ncaa 's प्रभाग i-a tulane ग्रीन वेव फ़ुटबॉल टोली ( the largest फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम in सम्मेलन यूएसए ) , the राज्य फार्म bayou क्लासिक , the  R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl , the Allstate Sugar Bowl and , every fourth year , the BCS National Championship Game .
Because of the size and location in one of the  प्रमुख पर्यटक गंतव्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य , the superdome routinely makes the `` छोटी सूची '' of उम्मीदवार होने माना लिये  major sporting events , such as the Super Bowl and the Final Four .
In 2005 ,  the superdome gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय ध्यान of a अलग प्रकार जब it housed हज़ारों of लोगों  seeking shelter from Hurricane Katrina .
The  भवन suffered extensive क्षति as a परिणाम of  the storm , and was closed for many months afterward .
On October 3 , 2011 , it was announced that German  automaker mercedes-benz खरीदा नामकरण अधिकारों to the स्टेडियम  .
The new name took effect on  अक्तूबर 23 , 2011  .
It is the third stadium that has naming rights from Mercedes-Benz ( and first in the United States ) , after the Mercedes-Benz  एरिना , the स्टेडियम of bundesliga क्लबों vfb stuttgart , in stuttgart , जर्मनी और the mercedes-benz एरिना  in Shanghai , China .
