Disney 's Animal Kingdom  आवास is an african-themed डीलक्स रिज़ॉर्ट at the वॉल्ट  Disney World Resort .
It  खोली on अप्रैल  16 , 2001 .
The resort is  स्वामित्व और संचालित by  Walt Disney Parks and Resorts .
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is  स्तिथ in the एनिमल किंगडम रिज़ॉर्ट क्षेत्रफल , सटा  to Disney 's Animal Kingdom .
It gives guests the opportunity to view grazing wildlife outside their rooms and public  क्षेत्रों in the रिज़ॉर्ट भीतर निकटता of the पशु , conveying the अहसास of होने in  an African savanna .
The People 's Party ,  भी ज्ञात as the `` populists '' , थी a short-lived राजनैतिक पार्टी in the  United States established in 1891 during the Populist movement ( United States , 19th Century ) .
It was most  महत्वपूर्ण in 1892-96 , और तब rapidly  faded away .
Based among poor , white cotton farmers in the South ( especially North Carolina , Alabama , and Texas ) and hard-pressed wheat  किसानो in the मैदान राज्य ( विशेषकर कान्सास और नेब्रास्का ) , it represented a कट्टरपंथी crusading रूप of agrarianism और दुश्मनी  to banks , railroads , and elites generally .
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor unions ,  और in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed उनके अध्यक्षीय nominee , विलियम जेनिंग्स  Bryan .
The  शर्तें `` populist '' और `` populism `` हैं commonly प्रयुक्त लिये anti-elitist  appeals in opposition to established interests and mainstream parties .
Linguistic map of  सीरियल , कैमरून  , and Benin .
Sign in English  , बाहर the  University of Lagos
There are hundreds  of भाषाएं बोला in सीरियल  .
The major languages are Yoruba , Hausa ,  इग्बो , ईदो , fulfulde , कनूरी ,  and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria  , अंग्रेज़ी , the पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा , थी चुनी to सुकर the सांस्कृतिक और  linguistic unity of the country .
English , however , remains an exclusive preserve of the  देश 's शहरी elite , और is नहीं widely बोला in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों , जिससे comprise तीन  quarters of the countries population .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm  of अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे , encompassing तीन प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी  languages families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum , which  may represent a relic of an भी वृहद विविधता prior to the स्प्रेड of the वर्तमान भाषा परिवारों .
A  श्रेणी of कार्यक्रम led  to the attack on Pearl Harbor .
War  between जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य था महरूम a सम्भावना कि प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's सैन्य शक्तियां नियोजित  for since the 1920s , though real tension did not begin until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by Japan .
Over the next decade , Japan expanded slowly into China ,  अग्रणी to सब आउट युद्ध between  the two in 1937 .
In 1940 Japan invaded  फ्रेंच इंडोचायना in an प्रयत्न to embargo सब imports into चीन  , including war supplies purchased from the U.S .
This move prompted the  संयुक्त राज्य to embargo सब आयल निर्यात , अग्रणी the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी to अनुमान कि it था कम  than two years of bunker oil remaining and to support the existing plans to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies .
नियोजन था महरूम underway लिये कुछ समय on an आक्रमण on the `` दक्षिणी संसाधन क्षेत्रफल '' to add  it to the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific .
The Philippine islands , at that  समय an अमरीकी  territory , were also a Japanese target .
The Japanese military concluded that an invasion of the  फिलीपीन होता provoke an अमरीकी सैन्य जवाब  .
Rather than seize and fortify the islands , and wait for the inevitable US counterattack , Japan 's military  नेताओ बजाय decided on the pre-emptive पर्ल हार्बर आक्रमण , जिससे वे assumed होता negate the अमरीकी शक्तियां needed लिये the मुक्ति और reconquest of the आइलैंड्स  .
Planning for the attack had begun in very  जल्दी 1941 , by admiral isoroku  Yamamoto .
He finally won assent from the  नवल ऊँची कमांड by , among अन्य बाते , threatening  to resign .
The  आक्रमण थी स्वीकृत in the गर्मियाँ at an इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन और again at  a second Conference in the fall .
Simultaneously over the  साल , पायलटों यहूद प्रशिक्षित , और जहाजों prepared  for its execution .
प्राधिकार लिये the आक्रमण थी granted at the दूसरी इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन  if a diplomatic result satisfactory to Japan was not reached .
After final approval by Emperor Hirohito the  अनुक्रम to आक्रमण थी जारी at the शुरूआत of  December .
A  आम दफ्तर stapler
a आम स्कूल  stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins sheets of paper or  समान सामग्री by ड्राइविंग a पतला मेटल स्टेपल through the चादरें और फोल्डिंग the  ends .
Staplers are widely used in  सरकारी , कारोबार , कार्यालयों ,  homes and schools .
The word `` stapler '' can  दरअसल refer to a क्रमांक of अलग डिवाइस of  varying uses .
In addition to joining paper sheets together , staplers can also be used  in a सर्जिकल सेटिंग to जुड़ें ऊतक साथ साथ सर्जिकल स्टेपल्स to बंद a सर्जिकल घाव  ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ) .
typically , सबसे staplers  are used to join multiple sheets of paper .
Paper staplers come in two  पृथक प्रकार : हस्तचालित और इलेक्ट्रिक  .
Manual staplers are normally hand-held ,  हालांकि मॉडल कि हैं प्रयुक्त जबकि नियत on a डेस्क or अन्य सतह  are not uncommon .
Electric staplers  मौजूद in a किस्में of अलग  designs and models .
Their primary  ऑपरेटिंग फलन is to जुड़ें विशाल संख्याएँ of  paper sheets together in rapid succession .
Some electric  staplers can जुड़ें up to 20 चादरें at a  time .
Swallowing , known  scientifically as deglutition , is the प्रक्रम in the इंसान or एनिमल देह कि makes कुछ pass इससे the मुँह  , to the pharynx , and into the esophagus , while shutting the epiglottis .
If this fails and the object  goes through the श्वासनली , तब choking or pulmonary  aspiration can occur .
In the human body it is  नियंत्रित by the swallowing reflex .
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4 , 1792 – August 11 , 1868 ) , of Pennsylvania , was a leader of  the कट्टरपंथी रिपब्लिकन गुट of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी  and a fierce opponent of slavery .
He was one  of the सबसे influential सदस्यों in the  history of Congress .
As chairman of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee ,  स्टीवंस , a witty , व्यंग्यात्मक स्पीकर और flamboyant पार्टी नेता , वर्चस्व the हाउस इससे  1861 until his death .
He wrote much of the financial  विधान कि सशुल्क लिये  the American Civil War .
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the prime  नेताओ of the कट्टरपंथी republicans  during the war and Reconstruction era .
scholarly दृश्य of स्टीवंस have swung sharply चूंकि  his death as interpretations of Reconstruction have changed .
Historians of the Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding harsh treatment of the white South and violating  अमरीकी परंपराओं of republicanism , depicting स्टीवंस as  a villain for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates .
इस अत्यधिक ऋणात्मक characterization  held sway into the 1950s .
The  वृद्धि of the neo-abolitionist स्कूल in the 1950s led to a दमदार  positive appreciation of Stevens ' work on civil rights for Freedmen .
A recent biographer characterizes him as , `` The Great Commoner , savior of free public education in Pennsylvania , national Republican leader in the struggles against  गुलामी in the संयुक्त राज्य और intrepid mainstay of the attempt to सुरक्षित जातिगत इंसाफ लिये the freedmen दौरान पुनर्निर्माण , the तभी सदस्य of the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि कभी  to have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress . ''
Overview of  the अनुवाद of eukaryotic  messenger RNA
Diagram showing the  अनुवाद of mrna और the  synthesis of proteins by a ribosome
In molecular biology and genetics ,  अनुवाद is the प्रक्रम through जिससे सेल्यूलर ribosomes manufacture प्रोटीन  .
It is part  of the प्रक्रम of  gene expression .
In  अनुवाद , मेसेंजर rna ( mrna ) उत्पादित by ट्रांसक्रिप्शन is decoded by the राइबोसोम to उपज a विशिष्ट अमीनो  acid chain , or polypeptide , that will later fold into an active protein .
In bacteria ,  अनुवाद occurs in the कोशिका 's कोशिकाद्रव्य , जहाँ the विशाल और छोटी  subunits of the ribosome are located , and bind to the mRNA .
In eukaryotes , translation occurs across the membrane of  the endoplasmic reticulum in a प्रक्रम पुकारा vectorial संश्लेषण  .
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing the  बाइंडिंग of trnas साथ पूरक anticodon sequences to कि of the mrna  .
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids  कि हैं chained साथ into a polypeptide as the mrna गुजरता through  and is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker and ticker tape .
In many instances , the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the outer membrane of the rough endoplasmic reticulum and  रिलीज the nascent प्रोटीन polypeptide अंदर लिये बाद vesicle हस्तांतरण और स्राव बाहर  of the cell .
Many types of transcribed RNA , such as transfer RNA , ribosomal RNA  , और छोटी नाभिकीय rna , do नहीं undergo अनुवाद  into proteins .
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation , elongation , translocation and termination ( all describing the growth of the amino acid chain , or  polypeptide कि is the उत्पाद of अनुवाद  ) .
Amino acids are  brought to ribosomes और समवेत  into proteins .
In activation , the correct  अमीनो एसिड is covalently बंधुआ to the  correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ) .
the अमीनो एसिड is joined by इसके carboxyl समूह  to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond .
When the tRNA has an amino acid  linked to it , it is termed ``  charged '' .
दीक्षा involves the छोटी subunit of the राइबोसोम  binding to the 5 ' end of mRNA with the help of initiation factors ( IF ) .
Termination of the polypeptide happens  जब the a साईट of the राइबोसोम चेहरों a  stop codon ( UAA , UAG , or UGA ) .
no trna can recognize  or bind to this codon .
Instead , the stop codon induces the binding of a release factor protein that prompts the  disassembly of the संपूर्ण ribosome/mrna जटिल .
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting  अनुवाद ; ये शामिल anisomycin , cycloheximide , chloramphenicol ,  tetracycline , streptomycin , erythromycin , and puromycin , among others .
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a  अलग ढांचा इससे कि of eukaryotic ribosomes , और यूँ एंटीबायोटिक can specifically  target bacterial infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells .
A multimedia  संदेश on a मोबाईल फोन  .
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS ) is a  मानक रास्ता to भेजें संदेश कि शामिल मल्टीमीडिया  content to and from mobile phones .
It extends the core  sms ( छोटी संदेश सेवा ) काबिलियत कि अनुमत एक्सचेंज of टेक्स्ट  messages only up to 160 characters in length .
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets , although it is also popular as a method of  delivering न्यूज और entertainment सामग्री सहित वीडियो , तस्वीरें , टेक्स्ट पृष्ठों और  ringtones .
The standard is  विकसित by the खोलें मोबाईल गठबंधन ( ओमो ) , हालांकि दौरान विकास it  was part of the 3GPP and WAP groups .
Smallpox was an  संक्रामक बीमारी अद्वितीय to इंसानो , caused by either of दो वायरस  variants , Variola major and Variola minor .
The disease is also known by the Latin names Variola or  variola वीरा , निकला इससे varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus  ( `` pimple '' ) .
The disease was originally known in English as the `` pox '' or `` red plague '' ; the term `` smallpox '' was  पहला प्रयुक्त in ब्रिटेन in the 15th सदी to फर्क variola इससे the `` ग्रेट चेचक '' ( उपदंश  ) .
The last naturally  occurring मामला of smallpox ( variola नाबालिग ) थी diagnosed  on 26 October 1977 .
Smallpox localized in small  रक्त बरतन of the स्किन और in the मुँह  and throat .
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular  खाज और , बाद , उठाया fluid-filled  blisters .
V. प्रमुख produces a अधिक गंभीर बीमारी और रै  an overall mortality rate of 30–35 % .
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also known  as alastrim , cottonpox , milkpox , whitepox , और क्यूबन खुजली ) जिससे मारता  about 1 % of its victims .
Long-term complications of V. major infection include  characteristic scars , commonly on the फेस  , which occur in 65–85 % of survivors .
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring , and  limb deformities due to गठिया और osteomyelitis  are less common complications , seen in about 2–5 % of cases .
Smallpox is believed to  have उभरा in इंसान populations  about 10,000 BC .
The earliest physical evidence of it is probably the  pustular खाज on the mummified देह of pharaoh  Ramses V of Egypt .
The disease killed an estimated 400,000 Europeans annually during  the closing सालो of the 18th सदी ( सहित पाँच reigning monarchs ) , और थी जिम्मेदार लिये a तीसरा of सब  blindness .
Of all  those संक्रमित , 20–60 % —and over 80 %  of infected children—died from the disease .
Smallpox  थी जिम्मेदार लिये an अनुमानित 300–500 लाख मौतों  during the 20th century .
as recently as 1967 , the संसार स्वास्थ्य  Organization ( WHO ) estimated that 15 million people contracted the disease and that two million died in that year .
After vaccination campaigns throughout the 19th and 20th  सदियां , the जो certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979  .
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases to have been eradicated , the other being  rinderpest , जिससे थी घोषित eradicated  in 2011 .
`` I Want to  थाम अपना हाथ '' is a सोंग  by the English rock band the Beatles .
Written by John Lennon and Paul McCartney ,  और अंकित in अक्तूबर 1963 , it थी the पहला बीटल्स रिकार्ड to be बना using  four-track equipment .
With advance  आदेश exceeding एक लाख नक़ल in the संयुक्त किंगडम , `` i want to थाम अपना हाथ '' होता साधारणतया have गए सीधा to the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों रिकार्ड चार्ट on इसके दिन of रिलीज ( 29 नवम्बर 1963  ) had it not been blocked by the group 's first million seller `` She Loves You `` , the Beatles ' previous UK single , which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the group .
Taking two weeks to dislodge its predecessor , `` I Want to  थाम अपना हाथ '' ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये पाँच सप्ताह और remained in the uk शीर्ष पचास  for twenty-one weeks in total .
It was also the group 's first American number one ,  प्रवेश the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट on 18 जनवरी 1964 at क्रमांक forty-five और starting  the British invasion of the American music industry .
by 1 फ़रवरी it आयोजित the क्रमांक एक स्पॉट — लिये सात सप्ताह  — before being replaced by `` She Loves You '' , a reverse scenario of what had occurred in Britain , and remained in the US charts for a total of fifteen weeks .
`` I Want to Hold  अपना हाथ '' became the बीटल्स ' best-selling  single worldwide .
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the United States in the late  1950s और जारी जबतक the जल्दी 1970s  .
Gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s , which have been stripped of extraneous weight  और jacked up using a ट्रक बीम धुरी to provide बेहतर वज़न वितरण on त्वरण ( बीम axles हैं भी हल्का than an स्वतंत्र सामने बर्खास्तगी ) , हालांकि a  raised stock front suspension is common as well .
Common weight reduction  तकनीकों शामिल fiberglass देह panels , stripped  interiors and plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ) .
Because they were  primarily निर्मित लिये रेसिंग , ये गाड़ियाँ typically था the इंजन swapped to a larger or अधिक शक्तिशाली  one , the existing stock engine modified ( often heavily ) or both .
It was very common to fit a Roots  supercharger और mechanical ईंधन  injection , such as one from Algon , Hilborn , or Crower .
With form being dictated by function , their appearance is often very top heavy and ungainly ,  largely due to सामने ends होने उठाया उच्चतर than भण्डार , to assist in the वज़न ट्रांसफ़र दौरान रैपिड त्वरण ( रेसिंग ) .
Having  उनके exhaust पाइप निकास through the सामने फेंडर खूब is a  common characteristic of gassers , as is having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes , pearls , and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts .
The name arose because they competed in a gasoline -fueled drag  रेसिंग क्लास , बल्कि than एक using methanol or nitromethane  .
The gasser is the predecessor  of the आधुनिक मजेदार car  .
Twelve-lead EKG of a  26-year-old पुरूष
Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical  कार्यकलाप of the दिल over a काल of समय , as detected by electrodes संलग्न to the सतह of the स्किन और अंकित by a यंत्र बाह्य to the देह  .
The recording produced by this  noninvasive कार्यविधि is termed an electrocardiogram ( भी ईसीजी or  EKG ) .
An ECG is used to  माप the रेट और नियमितता of heartbeats , as खूब as the आकार और स्थिति  of the chambers , the presence of any damage to the heart , and the effects of drugs or devices used to regulate the heart , such as a pacemaker .
Most ECGs are performed for diagnostic or research purposes on human hearts , but may also  be performed on पशु , प्रायः लिये निदान of दिल abnormalities  or research .
Donald  जॉन ट्रम्प , sr. ( born जून 14 , 1946 ) is an अमरीकी कारोबार महारथी  , television personality and author .
He is the chairman and president of The Trump  संगठन और the संस्थापक of ट्रम्प entertainment रिसॉर्ट  .
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle , outspoken manner ,  और भूमिका on the एनबीसी वास्तविकता दिखाएँ the प्रशिक्षु have बना उसे a well-known हस्ती जो थी no  . 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list .
Trump  is the बेटे of फ्रेड ट्रम्प , a धनवान  New York City real-estate developer .
He worked for his father 's firm  , एलिज़ाबेथ ट्रम्प & बेटे , जबकि उपस्थित the व्हार्टन स्कूल of the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया , और  in 1968 officially joined the company .
He was given control of the  कम्पनी in 1971 और renamed it the ट्रम्प  Organization .
In 2010 , Trump expressed an  ब्याज in बनने a प्रत्याशी लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in the 2012 चुनाव  , though in May 2011 , he announced he would not be a candidate .
In  दिसम्बर 2011 , ट्रम्प थी सुझाया as a संभावित वाइस अध्यक्षीय चयन by  Michele Bachmann , if she were to win the Republican nomination .
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam Cooke , written and  पहला अंकित in 1963 और released अंतर्गत the आरसीए विक्टर लेबल shortly बाद  his death in late 1964 .
Though  तभी a modest hit लिये cooke in तुलना साथ उसके पिछला singles , the सोंग  came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement .
The song has gained in popularity and critical acclaim in the decades since its  रिलीज , और is # 12 on रोलिंग स्टोन 's 500 महानतम  Songs of All Time .
Steam rising from the  nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति स्टेशन  in Iceland .
Geothermal energy is  थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और भंडारित  in the Earth .
Thermal energy is the energy that  determines the तापमान of पदार्थ  .
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the  असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) और इससे  radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its surface , drives a  निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल उर्जा in the रूप of ऊष्मा इससे the  core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal  originates इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ) , अर्थ  earth , and θερμος ( thermos ) , meaning hot .
At the core of the Earth , thermal energy is created by  रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय और temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °c ( 9,000  °F ) .
ऊष्मा conducts इससे the कोर  to surrounding cooler rock .
The high  तापमान और दबाव कारण कुछ चट्टान  to melt , creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock .
The magma heats rock and water in the  क्रस्ट , sometimes up to 370 °c ( 700 °f  ) .
From hot springs , geothermal  उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये स्नान चूंकि paleolithic टाइम्स और लिये स्पेस हीटिंग चूंकि प्राचीन  Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
विश्वव्यापी , परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal शक्ति  is online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district heating , space  हीटिंग , स्पा , औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं , desalination और agricultural  applications .
Geothermal power is  लागत प्रभावी , विश्वसनीय , चिरस्थायी , और environmentally दोस्ताना , लकिन रै  historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources ,  विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर हीटिंग , खोलने  a potential for widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse  गैसों फंस गहन भीतर the धरती , लकिन ये emissions हैं  much lower per energy unit than those of fossil fuels .
As a result , geothermal power has the potential to  सहायता mitigate वैश्विक वार्मिंग  if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The  धरती 's geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा  needs , but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited .
खुदाई और खोजी लिये गहन संसाधन  is very expensive .
Forecasts for  the भविष्य of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions  about technology , energy prices , subsidies , and interest rates .
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show  कि ग्राहक होता be willing to अदा a छोटी अधिक लिये a बेदर्दी उर्जा  source like geothermal .
But  as a परिणाम of सरकारी assisted शोध और उद्योग  experience , the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
In 2001 ,  geothermal उर्जा लागत between दो और टेन  cents per kwh .
Ownership of property  may be निजी , सामूहिक , or आम और the प्रॉपर्टी may be वस्तुएँ  , land/real estate , or intellectual property .
Determining ownership in law involves determining who has certain  अधिकारों और कर्तव्य over the  property .
These rights and  कर्तव्य , sometimes पुकारा a 'bundle  of rights ' , can be separated and held by different parties .
The question of ownership reaches back to the ancient  दार्शनिकों , प्लेटो और अरस्तू , जो आयोजित अलग राय  on the subject .
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought private property  निर्मित divisive inequalities , जबकि अरस्तू ( 384 bc – 322 bc ) विचार निजी प्रॉपर्टी सक्रिय लोगों to प्राप्त  the full benefit of their labor .
Private  प्रॉपर्टी can circumvent कया is अभी referred to as the “ त्रासदी of the  commons ” problem , where people tend to degrade common property more than they do private property .
Given a short-sighted owner , however , a private property system can make these tragedies worse—for example , a private owner of a piece of oil-rich property  , depending on उसके worldview , might be अधिक दिलचस्पी in short-term वित्तीय लाभ than वृद्धिशील उपयोग साथ an नजर toward अन्य 's चिंताएं ( e.g. , those of भविष्य  generations , the disenfranchised , etc . ) .
While Aristotle justified the existence of private  स्वामित्व , he बाएँ खोलें सवाल of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate प्रॉपर्टी between कया is निजी और आम और (  2 ) how to allocate the private property within society .
Over the millennia , and across cultures what can be property  और कैसा it is regarded culturally  have varied widely .
Ownership is the basis for many other concepts that form the foundations of ancient and modern societies such as money ,  व्यापार , कर्ज़ , दिवालियापन , the criminality of चोरी , और निजी vs. पब्लिक प्रॉपर्टी  .
Ownership is the key building block in  the विकास of the पूंजीवादी socio-economic  system .
Adam Smith stated  कि एक of the पवित्र कानून of इंसाफ थी to गार्ड  a person 's property and possessions .
The process and mechanics of ownership  हैं fairly जटिल : एक can लाभ , ट्रांसफ़र और खोना  ownership of property in a number of ways .
To acquire property one  can खरीदें it साथ धन , व्यापार it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी , प्राप्त it as a तोहफा , चोरी  it , find it , make , it or homestead it .
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money , exchanging it for other property , giving it as a gift , being robbed  of it , it , or having it stripped इससे एक 's स्वामित्व through विधिक अर्थात् ऐसे as eviction , foreclosure , seizure  , or taking .
Ownership is self-propagating in that the owner of any property  होगा भी अपना the आर्थिक लाभ  of that property .
`` What 's My Name ? '' is a song recorded  by barbadian रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार रिहाना , लिये उसके  fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ) .
Featuring guest vocals from  कनाडाई rapper ड्रेक , the सोंग थी released as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे  Loud on October 29 , 2010 through Def Jam Recordings .
The R & B song was produced by the Norwegian  उत्पादन duo स्टारगेट , और थी लिखा by the duo साथ साथ  Ester Dean , Traci Hale , and Drake .
Lyrically  , it incorporates विषयवस्तु of यौन  intercourse and romance .
Music  आलोचकों दिया the सोंग धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ , citing it कुछ of रिहाना 's बेहतरीन गायन कार्य to तिथि  ; there was a praise regarding its romantic nature , as well as its sexual tones .
`` What 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success and topped the US Billboard Hot  100 चार्ट , giving रिहाना उसके तीसरा number-one सिंगल in 2010 , as खूब as उसके  eighth overall on the chart .
The song also topped the charts in Hungary and  the संयुक्त किंगडम और पहुँचे the शीर्ष पाँच in कनाडा  , Ireland , New Zealand , Norway and Slovakia .
the सोंग प्राप्त a नामांकन  at the 54th Grammy Awards for Best Rap/Sung Collaboration .
An accompanying music video ,  निर्देशित by फिलिप andelman , portrays a रोमांटिक एनकाउंटर between रिहाना और ड्रेक in a  grocery store along with romantic scenes between the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side .
`` What 's My Name ? '' was  प्रचारित साथ सजीव प्रदर्शन आरपार दोनो पहलू of the अटलांटिक , सहित शनिवार रात्रि सजीव  in America and the series seven finale of The X Factor in the United Kingdom .
The latter performance resulted in an investigation from the country 's media  नियामक , ofcom , लिये the raunchy प्रकृति of रिहाना 's  outfit .
A mathematical constant is a  खास क्रमांक , प्रायः a रियल क्रमांक , कि is `` significantly  interesting in some way '' .
Constants arise in many different areas of mathematics , with constants such as e ( mathematical constant ) | and pi|  occurring in ऐसे विविध contexts as भूगोल , क्रमांक सिद्धान्त और कलन  .
What it means for a constant to arise  `` naturally '' , और कया makes a निरंतर `` दिलचस्प '' , is ultimately a पदार्थ of स्वाद , और कुछ गणितीय स्थिरांक हैं  notable more for historical reasons than for their intrinsic mathematical interest .
The more popular constants have been studied  throughout the आयु और computed to अनेक दशमलव स्थान  .
All mathematical constants are definable numbers and usually  हैं भी computable संख्याएँ  ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ) .
चुनावों to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट यहूद आयोजित on नवम्बर  2 , 2010 , for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 seats .
( A special  चुनाव on जनवरी 19 , 2010 in मैसाचुसेट्स  was held earlier in the year . )
thirty-four of the सीटे यहूद लिये six-year शर्तें to the सीनेट 's `` क्लास तीन '' , और तीन यहूद खास  elections for shorter terms .
Of the 37 elections , 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or were defeated in  the प्राथमिक ) और 18 प्रदर्शित लाज़िम republicans ( आठ of जिसको रिटायर्ड or यहूद पराजित  in the primary ) .
After the previous elections ( in 2008 ) , the United States  सीनेट थी रचित of 58 डेमोक्रेट , 40 republicans , और 2  independents who caucus with the Democrats .
Republicans won four seats held by  retiring डेमोक्रेट और republicans पराजित  two incumbent Democrats .
This was the largest number  of republicans gains चूंकि the 1994 चुनावों और भी the पहला समय चूंकि कि चुनाव  that Republicans successfully defended all of their own seats .
This was the fourth consecutive election of `` class 3 '' senators where Democrats have  विफल to लाभ सीटे और the तीसरा लगातार mid-term चुनाव आयोजित  in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up seats .
Despite these Republican wins , however , the  डेमोक्रेट retained a बहुमत of the सीनेट साथ 51 सीटे प्लस 2  independents who caucus with them , compared to the 47 Republicans .
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice each year as the Sun  पहुँच इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम excursion सापेक्ष to the celestial equator on the celestial  sphere .
As a result , on the day of the solstice , the Sun appears to have reached  इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम सालाना ऊँचाई in the आसमान ऊपर  the horizon at local solar noon .
The word  संक्रांति is निकला इससे the लैटिन सोल ( सूर्य ) और sistere ( to स्टैंड स्टिल ) , क्युकी at the solstices , the सूर्य स्टैंड स्टिल in उतार ; कि is , the  seasonal movement of the Sun 's path ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction .
The  solstices , साथ साथ the equinoxes  , are connected with the seasons .
In many cultures the solstices mark either  the शुरूआत or the midpoint  of winter and summer .
The term solstice can also be used in a  broader भाव , as the तिथि ( दिन ) जब  this occurs .
The  दिन of the संक्रांति is either the longest दिन of the साल ( in गर्मियाँ  ) or the shortest day of the year ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics .
जेरी ली लुईस ( born सितंबर 29 , 1935 ) is  an American rock and roll and country music singer-songwriter and pianist .
He is known by the nickname `` The Killer '' and is often viewed as  “rock & फेंकें 's पहला ग्रेट जंगली  man” .
An early pioneer of rock and roll music , in 1956  लुईस बना उसके पहला रिकार्डिंग at सूर्य रिकॉर्ड  .
`` Crazy Arms `` sold 300,000  नक़ल in the दक्षिण , लकिन it थी उसके 1957 hit `` पूरे lotta shakin ' going on  `` that shot Lewis to fame worldwide .
Lewis followed this in that same year when he recorded songs such as `` Great Balls of Fire  `` , `` breathless `` और `` ऊँची स्कूल गोपनीय  `` .
Lewis sold more  रिकॉर्ड than एल्विस प्रेस्ली at इस  time .
However , Lewis ' rock 'n ' roll career faltered in  the वेक of उसके विवाह to उसके यंग  cousin .
He had little success in the charts following  the कांड और उसके लोकप्रियता जल्दी  faded .
His live performance fees  plummeted इससे $ 10,000 प्रति रात्रि to $ 250 .
In the  meantime he थी संकल्पित to लाभ वापस कुछ  of his popularity .
दौरान the जल्दी 60’s he किया n't have much चार्ट  success with few exceptions such as `` What 'd I Say `` .
His live performances at this  समय यहूद increasingly जंगली  and energetic .
His album Live at the Star Club , Hamburg from  1964 is प्रायः regarded by अनेक म्यूज़िक पत्रकारों और प्रशंसक as एक of the wildest और महानतम  rock and roll concert albums ever .
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire  '' लिये अनेक सालो साथ छोटी कामयाबी , in 1968 लुईस बना a परिवर्तन into देश म्यूज़िक और  had hits with songs such as `` Another Place , Another Time '' .
This reignited his career and throughout the late '60s and '70s  he regularly अव्वल the country-western चार्ट  .
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make Love Sweeter For You ``  , `` वहीँ जरूर be अधिक to प्रेम than इस `` , `` होता तुम लो another मौका on me ``  and `` Me And Bobby McGee `` .
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his rock  'n ' फेंकें पास्ट साथ गीतों ऐसे as a कवर of  the Big Bopper 's `` Chantilly Lace `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away `` .
In the 21st century Lewis continues to tour to audiences around  the संसार और स्टिल रिलीज नई एल्बम  .
One  ऐसे एल्बम , titled पिछला man खड़ा , is उसके  best selling to date at over a million copies sold worldwide .
This was  followed by औसत बूढ़ा man जिससे रै प्राप्त  some of the best sales of Lewis’s career .
Lewis has had a dozen gold records in both rock and  देश , जीती अनेक ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , सहित a आजीवन  Achievement Award .
Lewis was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of  कीर्ति in 1986 , और उसके pioneering योगदान to the विधा रै महरूम  recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame .
In 1989 , his life was chronicled in the  फिल्म ग्रेट गेंदें of आग , अभिनीत डेनिस quaid .
In 2003 , Rolling Stone Magazine listed his box set All Killer , No Filler :  the anthology क्रमांक 242 on उनके सूची of `` 500 महानतम एल्बम of सब  time `` .
In 2004 , they  क्रमित उसे क्रमांक 24 on उनके सूची of  the 100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar  quartet और the क्लास of '55 एल्बम , जिससे भी शामिल जॉनी नकदी , कार्ल perkins  , Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley .
Henry Louis  स्टीफंस , बेनाम watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man पढना  a newspaper with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery '' .
the emancipation उदघोषणा थी an अनुक्रम जारी to सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ( सहित the फौज और नेवी ) of the संयुक्त  States by President Abraham Lincoln on January 1 , 1863 , during the American Civil War .
It was  आधारित on the अध्यक्ष 's संवैधानिक प्राधिकार as कमांडर in मुख्य of the  armed forces ; it was not a law passed by Congress .
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever free , and ordered the Army ( and all segments of the Executive branch ) to treat as free  सब those enslaved in टेन राज्य कि यहूद स्टिल in विद्रोह , यूँ applying to 3.1  million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S .
The Proclamation  could नहीं be enforced in क्षेत्रों स्टिल अंतर्गत विद्रोह , लकिन as the फौज took कंट्रोल of confederate regions , the स्लेव in those  regions were emancipated rather than returned to their masters .
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion had  already महरूम subdued यहूद तत्काल emancipated , और over 3 लाख अधिक यहूद  emancipated as the Union army advanced .
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave states  कि यहूद नहीं in विद्रोह , nor to सबसे regions already नियंत्रित by the संघ फौज ; emancipation वहीँ होता आइये बाद पृथक  state actions and/or the December 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment , which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S .
The Proclamation did not compensate the owners , did not itself outlaw slavery  , और किया नहीं मेक the ex-slaves ( पुकारा freedmen  ) citizens .
It made the eradication of slavery an  सुस्पष्ट युद्ध लक्ष्य , in जोड to the लक्ष्य of reuniting  the Union .
On September 22 , 1862 ,  lincoln था जारी a प्रारंभिक उदघोषणा कि he होता अनुक्रम the emancipation of सब स्लेव  in any state of the Confederate States of America that did not return to Union control by January 1 , 1863 .
None returned , and  the अनुक्रम , हस्ताक्षरित और जारी जनवरी 1 , 1863 , took प्रभाव मगर in स्थितियाँ  where the Union had already mostly regained control .
The  उदघोषणा outraged श्वेत southerners जो envisioned a रेस युद्ध , angered कुछ उत्तरी डेमोक्रेट , सक्रिय anti-slavery  forces , and weakened forces in Europe that wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy .
It also lifted the  आत्माओं of अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी दोनो in the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी राज्य , और led  to many slaves escaping their masters and running behind Union lines in order to have their emancipation enforced .
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by Zack Snyder and  co-written by उसे और स्टीव शिबुया  .
It  is स्नाइडर 's पहला फिल्मी  based on an original script .
The film  सितारों एमिली ब्राउनिंग , abbie cornish , जेना malone , वैनेसा हजेंस ,  Jamie Chung , and Carla Gugino .
The storyline follows  the कल्पनाओं of a यंग स्त्री जो is वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी संस्था , as वो makes a योजना  to escape the hospital before suffering a lobotomy .
The film was  released in दोनो conventional  and IMAX theatres in the United States at midnight on March 25 , 2011 .
It received  generally ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , लकिन थी  a moderate box office success .
Front  और वापस of canon powershot  A95 , a typical pocket-size digital camera
Haselblad 503CW with  ixpress v96c डिजिटल वापस , an उदाहरण of  a professional digital camera system
A digital camera ( or digicam ) is a camera that takes video or still photographs by  रिकॉर्डिंग बिंब on an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक चित्र सेंसर  .
Most cameras sold today are digital , and digital cameras are incorporated  into अनेक डिवाइस ranging इससे गुस्से और मोबाईल फोन ( पुकारा कैमरा फोन ) to वाहनों  .
Digital and film cameras share an optical  प्रणाली , typically using a लेंस साथ a परिवर्तनीय diaphragm  to focus light onto an image pickup device .
The  diaphragm और शटर admit the सही राशि of लाइट to the imager , बस as साथ फिल्मी लकिन the  image pickup device is electronic rather than chemical .
however , नापसंद फिल्मी कैमरे , डिजिटल कैमरे can प्रदर्शक बिंब on a स्क्रीन तत्काल  after being recorded , and store and delete images from memory .
Many  डिजिटल कैमरे can भी रिकार्ड चलती  video with sound .
Some digital cameras can crop and stitch pictures  और perform अन्य elementary चित्र संपादन  .
The inside and front of  a डेल poweredge वेब सर्वर , a कंप्यूटर  designed for rack mounting
अनेक वेब सर्वर may be प्रयुक्त लिये a ऊँची ट्रैफ़िक जालस्थल , यहाँ  four Sun Fire X4200 servers are installed together
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the  तन्त्र ( the कंप्यूटर अनुप्रयोग ) कि helps to उद्धार वेब सामग्री  that can be accessed through the Internet .
The most common use of web servers is to  मेजबान वेबसाइटों , लकिन वहीँ हैं अन्य उपयोग ऐसे as गेमिंग , आंकड़ा भंडार  or running enterprise applications .
The American Red Cross ( ARC ) , also known as the American National Red Cross ,  is a humanitarian संगठन कि provides आपात सहायता  , disaster relief and education inside the United States .
It is the designated U.S. affiliate of the International  संघ of रेड क्रॉस और रेड crescent समाजों  .
Today , in addition to domestic disaster  राहत , the अमरीकी रेड क्रॉस offers सेवाएं in पाँच अन्य क्षेत्रों : जातियाँ सेवाएं कि सहायता the मोहताज ; संचार सेवाएं और सुकून लिये सैन्य सदस्यों और उनके परिवार सदस्यों ; the संग्रहण , प्रसंस्करण  and distribution of blood and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness , health , and safety ; and international relief and development programs .
Issued a corporate charter by the United  राज्य कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत शीर्षक 36 of the संयुक्त राज्य कोड , खण्ड 3001 , the अमरीकी नेशनल रेड क्रॉस is governed by स्वयंसेवक और समर्थित  by community donations , income from health and safety training and products , and income from blood products .
The American Red Cross  is headquartered in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
The Chairman of the Board of  राज्यपालों , सेवारत उसके दूसरी three-year  term , is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter .
The current President and Chief Executive  अधिकारी is गेल J. mcgovern  .

A rooster , showing  wattles , earlobes और  comb
A rooster  crowing (  with audio )
सही
A rooster ( also  पुकारा a cockerel or मुर्गा ) is a पुरूष  gallinaceous bird .
It  प्रायः refers to a पुरूष  chicken ( Gallus gallus ) .
Immature male chickens less  than एक साल बूढ़ा हैं पुकारा  cockerels .
The term `` rooster ''  originates in the संयुक्त राज्य , और the पद is widely प्रयुक्त throughout उत्तर अमेरिका ,  as well as Australia and New Zealand .
In the United Kingdom and Ireland the older  पद `` cockerel '' is अधिक commonly प्रयुक्त  .
`` Cock '' is in general use as the name for a male of other  प्रजाति of बर्ड , लिये उदाहरण `` मुर्गा गौरैया  '' .
`` Roosting '' is the  कार्रवाई of perching aloft to नींद at रात्रि ,  and is done by both sexes .
The rooster is polygamous , but can not  गार्ड अनेक nests of अंडे at एकबार  .
He guards the  सामान्य क्षेत्रफल जहाँ उसके मुर्गियां हैं nesting  , and will attack other roosters that enter his territory .
During the daytime , he usually sits on a high perch , usually 3–5 feet  बंद the मैदान to serve as a lookout लिये उसके झुण्ड .
He will sound a distinctive alarm  कॉल if परभक्षी हैं  nearby .
The Pokémon Trading Card Game ( Pokémon TCG  ) is a collectible कार्ड खेल आधारित on the पोकीमॉन वीडियो खेल श्रेणी , पहला प्रकाशित in अक्तूबर 1996  by Media Factory in Japan .
In the US , it was initially  प्रकाशित by wizards of the coast , the कम्पनी कि produces  , in December 1998 .
Nintendo took  over प्रकाशन  in June 2003 .
It is one of Nintendo 's  पिछला बाकी दमदार कड़ी to इसके विरासत as a playing कार्ड  company .
Land Rover is a British  car निर्माता साथ इसके मुख्यालय in gaydon ,  Warwickshire , United Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles .
It is part of  the जैगुआर जमीन रोवर समूह , a  subsidiary of Tata Motors of India .
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car brand in  the संसार ( बाद जीपी ) .
The Land  रोवर नाम थी originally प्रयुक्त by the रोवर  Company for one specific vehicle model , named simply the Land Rover , launched by Rover in 1948 .
Over the following years it developed into a  marque encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive मॉडल , सहित the defender , डिस्कवरी  , Freelander , Range Rover , Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque .
Land  रोवर्स हैं फिलहाल समवेत in the कम्पनी 's halewood और solihull  plants , with research and development taking place at JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres .
Land Rover sold 194,000  वाहनों विश्वव्यापी in 2009  .
हालांकि the ब्रांड originates इससे the असली 1948  model , Land Rover as a company has only existed since 1978 .
Prior to this , it was a product line of the Rover Company which was subsequently absorbed into the Rover-Triumph division of  the अंग्रेजों leyland मोटर निगम ( bl ) following leyland  Motor Corporation ’s takeover of Rover in 1967 .
The ongoing commercial  कामयाबी of the असली जमीन रोवर श्रेणी मॉडल , और latterly the दायरा रोवर in the 1970s in the midst of bl’s खूब प्रलेखित कारोबार परेशानियों prompted the स्थापना  of a separate Land Rover company but still under the BL umbrella , remaining part of the subsequent Rover Group in 1988 , under the ownership of British Aerospace after the remains of British Leyland were broken up and privatised .
In 1994 Rover  समूह पीएलसी थी acquired  by BMW .
In 2000 , Rover Group was broken-up by BMW and Land  रोवर थी बेची to घाट मोटर कम्पनी , बनने भाग of इसके प्रीमियर ऑटोमोटिव समूह  .
In 2006 Ford purchased the Rover  ब्रांड इससे bmw लिये around £6  million .
This reunited the Rover and Land  रोवर ब्रांड्स लिये the पहला समय चूंकि 2000 जब the रोवर समूह  was broken up by BMW .
In  जून 2008 , घाट बेची दोनो जमीन रोवर  and Jaguar Cars to Tata Motors .
This sale  भी शामिल the dormant  Rover brand
The cover of the  पहला dvd संकलन released by aniplex  of The New Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The ninth season of the  ब्लीच दुश्मनी श्रेणी is नामित  .
The series  is आधारित on tite kubo 's manga  with same name .
The episodes are directed by Noriyuki Abe and  उत्पादित by tv टोकियो , dentsu , और स्टुडियो  Pierrot .
The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction of a new Soul Reaper  कप्तान , shūsuke amagai , और the रहस्य surrounding the kasumiōji गोत्र , एक of the परिवारों कि constitute the धामों  of Soul Society .
The season began airing  on अप्रैल 23 , 2008 in जापानी on tv टोकियो और  ended on October 7 , 2008 .
The English adaptation of the Bleach anime is licensed by Viz Media , and this arc began airing on  अगस्त 28 , 2010 on कार्टून संजाल 's वयस्क तैरना , और  finished on January 29 , 2011 .
Five DVD compilations , each containing four episodes of  the ऋतु , have महरूम released by aniplex ; the पहला dvd संकलन थी released on नवम्बर 26 , 2008 और the पांचवां  on March 25 , 2009 .
A DVD  बक्सा होगा be प्रकाशित by viz मीडिया  on December 13 , 2011 .
The  एपीसोड उपयोग तीन टुकड़े of थीम म्यूज़िक : एक खोलने  theme and two closing themes .
The opening theme  is `` chu-bura `` by kelun  .
The first closing theme is `` Orange '' by Lil'B , used for episodes 168 to 179 , and  the दूसरी closing थीम is `` gallop '' by pe'zmoku , प्रयुक्त लिये the शेष of  the episodes .
The regulation of prostitution in  the संयुक्त राज्य is नहीं among the enumerated शक्तियां of the संघीय सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , it is इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the राज्य to  permit , prohibit , or otherwise regulate commercial sex , except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most states , prostitution is  माना a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक अनुक्रम अपराधों , a  crime that disrupts the order of a community .
It was at one time  माना to be a vagrancy  crime .
Currently , Nevada is the only  राज्य to allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति , the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the  Nevada Revised Statutes .
Only 8  काउंटी फिलहाल contain  active brothels .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ) ,  washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो ) , कार्सन नगर , डगलस काउंटी , और  Lincoln County .
The other  काउंटी theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति , लकिन कुछ  of these counties currently have no active brothels .
Street  वेश्यावृति , `` pandering , '' और जीना बंद of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत  Nevada law , as elsewhere in the country .
As with  अन्य देशों , वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त राज्य  can be divided into three broad categories : street prostitution , brothel prostitution , and escort prostitution .
The East Coast of the United States , also known as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic Seaboard and commonly shortened to East  coast , refers to the easternmost coast of the संयुक्त  States along the Atlantic Ocean .
The states which have  shoreline on the ईस्ट coast हैं , इससे उत्तर to दक्षिण , the u.S. राज्य of maine , नई  Hampshire , Massachusetts , Rhode Island , Connecticut , New York , New Jersey , Delaware , Maryland , Virginia , North Carolina , South Carolina , Georgia , and Florida .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9 , 1913 – April 22 , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States  , सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974 , जब he became the तभी अध्यक्ष to इस्तीफा the  office .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from California and as the 36th Vice President  of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1953 to 1961  .
निक्सन थी born in yorba लिंडा  , California .
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934  और ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of विधि in 1937 ,  returning to California to practice law .
He and his wife , Pat Nixon , moved to  वॉशिंगटन to कार्य लिये the संघीय सरकारी  in 1942 .
He  subsequently परोसा in the संयुक्त राज्य  Navy during World War II .
Nixon was elected in California  to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the  Senate in 1950 .
His pursuit  of the alger hiss मामला स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा  as a leading anti-communist , and elevated him to national prominence .
He was the running mate of Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर , the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी अध्यक्षीय nominee  in the 1952 election .
Nixon served  लिये आठ सालो as वाइस अध्यक्ष  .
He waged an  unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 1960 , narrowly खोने to  John F. Kennedy , and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962 .
In  1968 , he भागा again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी  and was elected .
हालांकि निक्सन initially escalated अमेरिका 's भागीदारी in the  Vietnam War , he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's  विज़िट to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the दो राष्ट्र , और he initiated  détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his administration generally  embraced नीतियों कि transferred शक्ति इससे वॉशिंगटन  to the states .
Among other things , he launched initiatives to fight  कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ , imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण , enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी स्कूलों , और  established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over the lunar landings  शुरूआत साथ अपोलो 11 , he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त स्पेस  exploration .
He was re-elected  by a भूस्खलन in  1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo , the resignation of his vice president , Spiro Agnew ,  और a continuing श्रेणी of खुलासे परिचय the वाटरगेट कांड और अन्य misconduct by सदस्यों  of the administration .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much of his political support , and on  अगस्त 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित महाभियोग और हटाना  from office .
After his resignation  , he controversially प्राप्त a pardon जारी  by his successor , Gerald Ford .
In retirement , Nixon 's work as an elder statesman  , authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking  many foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate his public image .
He suffered a  debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18 , 1994 , और died  four days later at the age of 81 .
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names  zoloft , lustral ) is an antidepressant of the चयनात्मक serotonin reuptake  inhibitor ( SSRI ) class .
It was  introduced to the मार्केट  by Pfizer in 1991 .
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major  depressive विकार in वयस्क outpatients as खूब as obsessive–compulsive , दहशत , और  social anxiety disorders in both adults and children .
In 2011 , it was the second-most prescribed  antidepressant on the u.S. खुदरा मार्केट , साथ 37,208,000  prescriptions .
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar to that  of पुरानी tricyclic antidepressants , लकिन इसके पक्ष  effects are much less pronounced .
Differences with newer  antidepressants हैं subtler और भी  mostly confined to side effects .
Evidence suggests that sertraline may work  बेहतर than fluoxetine ( prozac ) लिये कुछ subtypes  of depression .
Treatment of panic disorder with sertraline results in a  significant घटी of the क्रमांक of दहशत हमले  and in improved quality of life .
For  obsessive-compulsive विकार , sertraline is नहीं as प्रभावी as संज्ञानात्मक behavioral चिकित्सा  ; the best results have been achieved by combining these two treatments .
Although approved  लिये सोशल phobia और posttraumatic तनाव विकार  , sertraline leads to only modest improvement in these conditions .
Sertraline also alleviates the  लक्षण of premenstrual dysphoric विकार और can be प्रयुक्त in sub-therapeutic  doses or intermittently for its treatment .
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications  of अन्य ssris , साथ ऊँची दरों of मतली , अतिसार , अनिद्रा , और  sexual side effects ; however , it does not cause weight gain , and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild .
In  गर्भवती महिलाओं लेने sertraline , the ड्रग थी उपस्थित in significant  concentrations in fetal blood , and was also associated with a higher rate of various birth defects .
Similarly to other antidepressants , the use  of sertraline लिये अवसाद may be संबद्ध साथ a उच्चतर रेट  of suicidality .
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama  फिल्मी निर्देशित by रॉबर्ट टाउनसेंड , जो co-wrote the स्क्रिप्ट साथ  Keenan Ivory Wayans .
Distributed by 20th Century Fox , the film 's main cast includes Townsend , Michael Wright , Leon Robinson ,  हैरी J. lennix , tico कुएं , हेरोल्ड निकोलस of the निकोलस भाइयो , और  Diahann Carroll .
The plot of the film ( which is loosely based on the lives of several artists : The Dells , The Temptations , Four  टॉप , विल्सन पिकेट , जेम्स भूरा , फ्रेंकी lymon , sam cooke और अन्य ) फ़ॉलो the  three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats .
The film depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired  आत्मा अधिनियम through the आँखें of the फिल्मी 's प्रमुख समर्थक , डोनाल्ड `` बतख '' matthews ( portrayed by टाउनसेंड ) , जो serves  as a narrator throughout the film .
However , a majority of the cinema is  प्रस्तुत in a लगातार समय लकीर as opposed to परंपरागत  flash backs .
The film includes a significant amount of  असली म्यूज़िक conceived by विभिन्न कलाकारों लिये the फिल्मी 's साउंडट्रैक , सहित singles ऐसे as `` a दिल  Is a House for Love `` , `` We Have n't Finished Yet '' , and `` Nothing But Love '' .
The film was released to most North American audiences March 29 , 1991 however it was not made available to  ऑडियंस in अन्य महाद्वीपों जबतक 2002 जब a dvd थी released prior to  another DVD release in 2006 for the film 's 15th anniversary .
the फिल्म प्राप्त मिश्रित  reviews from critics .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970 –  अक्तूबर 4 , 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became  the first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years .
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby (  1:59.4 ) , the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ) , और the belmont stakes ( 2:24  ) — records that still stand today .
He is considered  to be एक of the महानतम thoroughbreds  of all time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the  20th सदी , the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse on the सूची url_http  .
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the  शीर्ष 100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th सदी  .
Secretariat was sired by Bold Ruler out of  somethingroyal , by princequillo  .
He was  foaled at the मर्ग in कैरोलीन काउंटी  , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War ,  सचिवालय थी a विशाल शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी दिए the वही उपनाम  , `` Big Red . ''
Secretariat  's grandsire , nasrullah , is भी the great-great-grandsire  of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery  , he थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by कनाडाई jockey रॉन turcotte ,  along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He raced in  chenery 's मर्ग stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत checkered  colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat stood approximately tall ,  और weighed , साथ a 75-inch girth  , in his racing prime .
a ठेठ 12 v  , 40 Ah Lead-acid car battery
An  ऑटोमोटिव बैटरी is a प्रकार of rechargeable बैटरी कि  supplies electric energy to an automobile .
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting , lighting ,  प्रज्वलन ) to शक्ति the प्रारंभ मोटर , the लाइट्स , और the प्रज्वलन प्रणाली  of a vehicle’s engine .
Automotive SLI  बैटरी हैं प्रायः lead-acid प्रकार , और हैं बना of छह  galvanic cells in series to provide a 12 volt system .
Each cell provides 2.1 volts for a total  of 12.6 वोल्ट at पूरा चार्ज .
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors , often equipped with diesel engines , may  have दो बैटरी in श्रेणी लिये a 24 वोल्ट प्रणाली , or may have समानांतर  strings of batteries .
Lead-acid batteries are made up of plates of lead  और पृथक प्लेटों of सीसे डाइऑक्साइड , जिससे हैं submerged into an electrolyte  solution of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % water .
This causes a chemical  प्रतिक्रिया कि रिलीज electrons , allowing  them to flow through conductors to produce electricity .
As the  बैटरी discharges , the एसिड of the electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ  the materials of the plates , changing their surface to lead sulfate .
When the battery is recharged , the chemical reaction is  reversed : the सीसे सल्फेट reforms into सीसे डाइऑक्साइड  and lead .
साथ the प्लेटों लौटी to उनके असली  condition , the process may now be repeated .
Battery recycling of automotive  बैटरी reduces the need लिये संसाधन जरूरी लिये manufacture of नई बैटरी ,  diverts toxic lead from landfills , and prevents risk of improper disposal .
full-time नियुक्ति is नियुक्ति in जिससे a व्यक्ति works  a minimum number of hours defined as such by his/her employer .
Full-time employment often comes with benefits that are not typically offered to part-time , temporary , or  लचीली मजदूर , ऐसे as सालाना  leave , sickleave , and health insurance .
Full-time jobs are  प्रायः माना  careers .
वे generally अदा  more than part-time jobs , and usually carry more hours per week .
The Fair Labor Standards Act ( FLSA ) does  नहीं define full-time नियुक्ति  or part-time employment .
This is a  पदार्थ generally to be संकल्पित by the नियोक्ता  ( US Department of Labor ) .
The definition by employer  can vary और is generally प्रकाशित in a कम्पनी  's Employee Handbook .
Companies commonly require from 30–35 or 40 hours per week to be defined  as full-time और इसलिए योग्य लिये लाभ  .
Full-Time  औकात varies between कम्पनी और is प्रायः आधारित on  the shift the employee must work during each work week .
The `` standard '' work week consists of five eight-hour  दिनों , commonly परोसा between 9:00am to 5:00pm totaling  40 hours .
While a four-day week generally consists  of चार ten-hour दिनों ; it may भी consist of as छोटी as नौ घंटों  for a total of a 36 hour work week .
Twelve-hour shifts are often three days per week , unless  the कम्पनी रै the इरादे of paying आउट the कर्मचारी  overtime .
Overtime  is legally सशुल्क आउट anytime an कर्मचारी works अधिक  than 40 hours per week .
The legal minimum for overtime  starts at आधार अदा + one-half  .
The increased payout is  माना to compensate थोड़ा लिये the increased थकान  which a person experiences on such long shifts .
Shifts can also be very  irregular , as in खुदरा , लकिन हैं स्टिल full-time if the जरूरी  number of hours is reached .
There are some situations  जहाँ a व्यक्ति जो needs full-time कार्य is dropped to part-time , जिससे is sometimes  a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker .
Seahorse is  the शीर्षक दिए to 54 प्रजाति of समुद्री  fish in the genus Hippocampus .
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the  प्राचीन यूनानी hippos अर्थ `` घोड़ा '' और kampos  meaning `` sea monster '' .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA )  थी enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य  as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug  नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture , importation , कब्ज़ा  , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation  लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on narcotic दवाएँ  .
The legislation created five Schedules (  classifications ) , साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ to be शामिल  in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing , and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000 ,  जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i . वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित लिये गाली ( an अपरिभाषित पद ) , फिलहाल स्वीकृत चिकित्सा उपयोग in उपचार in the संयुक्त राज्य  , and international treaties .
माया numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal ( base -  बीस ) numeral प्रणाली प्रयुक्त by the pre-columbian  Maya civilization .
The numerals are made  up of तीन प्रतीकों ; शून्य ( शेल आकार ) , एक  ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ) .
For  उदाहरण , तेरह is लिखा as तीन  dots in a horizontal row above two horizontal lines stacked above each other .
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27 , 1908 – January 22 , 1973 ) , often referred to as LBJ , was the 36th President of the United States (  1963–1969 ) , a स्थिति he assumed बाद उसके सेवा as the 37th वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1961–1963  ) .
He is one of only four people who  परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य  : Representative , Senator , Vice President , and President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as a United  राज्य प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961 , सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट बहुमत नेता , दो as सीनेट  Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960 , Johnson was asked  by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate लिये the  1960 presidential election .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on November 22 , 1963 ,  समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही , जीतना by a विशाल हाशिया  over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President , he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that included laws that upheld  सिविल अधिकारों , पब्लिक प्रसारण , medicare , medicaid , पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा , सहायता to शिक्षा , और उसके `` युद्ध on गरीबी .  ''
Johnson was  प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार , '' उसके coercion of शक्तिशाली  politicians in order to advance legislation .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War , from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000  कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968 , as अमरीकी  casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry  antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the  U.S. and abroad .
Summer riots broke  आउट in सबसे प्रमुख शहरों बाद 1965 , और अपराधों दरों soared , as  his opponents raised demands for `` law and order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split in  अनेक feuding गिरोहों , और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the  1968 New Hampshire primary , he ended his bid for reelection .
रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड  Nixon was elected to succeed him .
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency  चिह्नित the शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the संयुक्त राज्य बाद the नई  Deal era .
Johnson is ranked favorably by  कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी of उसके घरेलू  policies .
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a C-21 steroid hormone  शामिल in the मादा menstrual साईकिल , गर्भावस्था ( supports gestation ) और  embryogenesis of humans and other species .
Progesterone belongs to a class of  हार्मोन पुकारा progestogens , और  is the major naturally occurring human progestogen .
बिग बर्ड is a समर्थक  of the children 's television show Sesame Street .
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney since 1969 , he is an  eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) लम्बा उज्जवल primrose-yellow बर्ड  .
He can  रोलर स्केट , बर्फ स्केट , नृत्य , गाओ , लिखें काव्य , चित्रण  and even ride a unicycle .
But despite this wide array of talents , he is prone to frequent misunderstandings , on one occasion even singing the alphabet as one big long word ( from  the सोंग पुकारा `` abc-def-ghi , '' सुनाया `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz  '' ) , pondering what it could ever mean .
He lives  in a विशाल घोंसला पीछे the 123 तिल  Street brownstone and has a teddy bear named Radar .
Webtrends  is a निजी कम्पनी headquartered in पोर्टलैंड  , Oregon , United States .
It provides web ,  सोशल , और मोबाईल analytics और अन्य  software solutions related to marketing intelligence .
The  कम्पनी थी संस्थापित in 1993 और अभी serves अधिक than 10,000 विशाल और छोटी कड़s.  < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 ' >
The Second Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) was the  दूसरी प्रमुख crusade शुभारम्भ इससे यूरोपीय  .
the दूसरी crusade थी प्रारंभ in जवाब to the पतन of the काउंटी  of Edessa the previous year to the forces of Zengi .
the काउंटी था महरूम संस्थापित दौरान the  First Crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098 .
While it was the  पहला जेहादी राज्य to be संस्थापित , it  was also the first to fall .
The Second Crusade was announced by Pope  यूजीन iii , और थी the पहला of the क्रूसेड to be led by यूरोपीय किंग्स  , namely Louis VII of France and Conrad III of Germany , with help from a number of other European nobles .
The armies of the two kings  marched separately आरपार  Europe .
After crossing Byzantine territory into Anatolia ,  दोनो सेना यहूद separately पराजित by the seljuq turks  .
The main  पश्चिमी ईसाई सोर्स , odo of deuil , और syriac ईसाई स्त्रोत अर्जी कि the बीज़ान्टिन सम्राट मैनुएल i comnenus secretly  hindered the crusaders ' progress , particularly in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them .
Louis and Conrad and the remnants of their armies  पहुँचे जेरूसलम और , in 1148  , participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus .
The crusade in the east was a failure for the  crusaders और a ग्रेट विजय लिये  the Muslims .
It would ultimately have a key influence on the fall  of जेरूसलम और दे वृद्धि to the तीसरा crusade at the समाप्त of  the 12th century .
The only success of the Second Crusade came to a combined force of 13,000 Flemish ,  frisian , नॉर्मन , अंग्रेज़ी , स्कॉटिश , और जर्मनी crusaders in 1147  .
Travelling from  इंग्लैण्ड , by जलयान , to the पावन जमीन , the फौज रोका और helped  the smaller ( 7,000 ) Portuguese army in the capture of Lisbon , expelling its Moorish occupants .
Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. ( )  , ब्रांडेड as walmart , is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय खुदरा निगम  that runs chains of large discount department stores and warehouse stores .
The company is the world 's third  largest पब्लिक निगम , according to the सौभाग्य वैश्विक 500 सूची in 2012 , the biggest निजी नियोक्ता in  the world with over two million employees , and is the largest retailer in the world .
Walmart remains a  family-owned कारोबार , as the कम्पनी is नियंत्रित by the वाल्टन परिवार , जो  own a 48 percent stake in Walmart .
It is also one of the  संसार 's सबसे  valuable companies .
The company was founded by Sam Walton in 1962 ,  incorporated on अक्तूबर 31 , 1969 , और सरेआम traded on the नई यॉर्क भण्डार एक्सचेंज  in 1972 .
It is  headquartered in bentonville  , Arkansas .
Walmart  is भी the largest  grocery retailer in the United States .
In 2009 , it generated 51 percent of  इसके us $ 258 अरब बिक्री in the u.S. इससे किराना कारोबार  .
it भी owns और operates the sam 's क्लबों खुदरा  warehouses in North America .
By 1988 , Wal-Mart was the most profitable retailer in the US  , और by नवम्बर 1990 , it outsold k-mart  .
By 1991 it outsold Sears  in खुदरा , बनाना it अमेरिका 's largest रिटेलर , a भेद  it still holds .
Walmart has  8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 देशों , अंतर्गत  55 different names .
The company  operates अंतर्गत the  Walmart name in the United States , including the 50 states and Puerto Rico .
It operates in Mexico as Walmex , in the United Kingdom as  asda , in जापानी as seiyu , और in इण्डिया as बेहतरीन  Price .
It has wholly owned operations in  अर्जेंटीना , ब्राज़ील , और  Canada .
Walmart 's investments outside North America have had mixed results : its  परिचालन in the संयुक्त किंगडम , दक्षिण अमेरिका , और चीन  are highly successful , whereas ventures in Germany and South Korea were unsuccessful .
Robert William Gary Moore ( 4 April 1952 – 6  फ़रवरी 2011 ) , थी a उत्तरी आयरिश संगीतकार , सबसे widely recognised  as a singer and guitarist .
In a career dating back to the 1960s , Moore  निभाई साथ कलाकारों सहित फिल lynott और ब्रायन downey दौरान उसके  teens , leading him to memberships with the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions .
Moore shared  the स्टेज साथ ऐसे ब्लूज़ और चट्टान luminaries  as B.B . King , Albert King , Colosseum II , George Harrison and Greg Lake , as well as having a successful solo career .
He guested on a number of albums  अंकित by ऊँची प्रोफ़ाइल संगीतकारों , सहित a कैमियो रूप playing the सीसे गिटार सोलो on `` वो 's my baby ``  from Traveling Wilburys Vol . 3 .
An  उदाहरण of रैक आरोहित  servers
A web hosting service is a type of  अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals और संगठन to मेक उनके  website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by  क्लाइंट , as खूब as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी , typically in a आंकड़ा  center .
वेब होस्ट can भी provide आंकड़ा बीच स्पेस और कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल लिये अन्य सर्वर  located in their data center , called colocation , also known as Housing in Latin America or France .
The  पैमाना of वेब होस्टिंग सेवाएं  varies greatly .
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting , where  फाइलें can be अपलोड via संचिका ट्रांसफ़र प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or a वेब इंटरफ़ेस  .
The files are usually  वितरित to the वेब `` as is  '' or with minimal processing .
Many  अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps )  offer this service free to subscribers .
Individuals and  संगठन may भी obtain  Web page hosting from alternative service providers .
Personal  वेब साईट होस्टिंग is typically फ़्री  , advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense  depending upon the आकार और प्रकार of the जालस्थल  .
Single page hosting is  generally sufficient लिये निजी  web pages .
A complex  साईट काल्स लिये a अधिक व्यापक पैकेज कि provides डेटाबेस  support and application development platforms ( e.g . PHP , Java , Ruby on Rails , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow  ग्राहक to लिखें or स्थापना स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums और सामग्री  management .
Also , Secure  sockets परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically  used for e-commerce .
The host may also provide an interface or control  फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing  scripts , as well as other modules and service applications like e-mail .
Some  होस्ट specialize in निश्चित तन्त्र or सेवाएं ( e.g . e-commerce ) , जिससे हैं commonly  used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure .
Obstetrics ( from the Latin obstare , `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all women 's  reproductive tracts और उनके children दौरान गर्भावस्था ( prenatal काल ) , प्रसव और the postnatal काल  .
Many obstetricians are also  स्त्रीरोग , अर्थ वे perform in दोनो specialties  .
In the United States ,  ये physicians हैं commonly referred  to as OB/GYNs .
The Wright brothers , Orville ( August 19 , 1871 – January 30 , 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16 , 1867 – May 30 , 1912 ) , were two  अमरीकी भाइयो , आविष्कारक , और विमानन pioneers जो यहूद credited साथ inventing और भवन the संसार 's पहला कामयाब वायुयान और बनाना the पहला नियंत्रित , संचालित और sustained  heavier-than-air human flight , on December 17 , 1903 .
From 1905 to 1907 , the brothers developed their  उड़ती यंत्र into the पहला व्यावहारिक  fixed-wing aircraft .
Although not the first to build and fly experimental aircraft ,  the राइट भाइयो यहूद the पहला to इफ़तेरा वायुयान नियंत्रण कि बना  fixed-wing powered flight possible .
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was their invention of  three-axis कंट्रोल , जिससे सक्रिय the पायलट to steer the वायुयान effectively  and to maintain its equilibrium .
This  विधि became मानक और remains मानक on  fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds .
From the beginning of their aeronautical work , the  राइट भाइयो केन्द्रित on विकासशील a विश्वसनीय विधि of पायलट कंट्रोल  as the key to solving `` the flying problem '' .
This  दृष्टिकोण differed significantly इससे अन्य experimenters of the समय जो put  more emphasis on developing powerful engines .
Using a small homebuilt wind tunnel , the Wrights also collected more accurate data than any before , enabling them to design and  निर्माण विंग्स और propellers कि यहूद अधिक कुशल than कोई पहले  .
Their first U.S. patent , 821,393 , did not claim invention of a flying machine , but rather , the invention  of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic कंट्रोल कि manipulated a उड़ती यंत्र  's surfaces .
They gained  the mechanical कौशल अनिवार्य लिये उनके कामयाबी by working लिये सालो in उनके दूकान  with printing presses , bicycles , motors , and other machinery .
Their work with  साइकिल in particular बहकावे उनके विश्वास कि an  unstable vehicle like a flying machine could be controlled and balanced with practice .
From 1900 until their first powered flights in late 1903 , they  conducted extensive glider परीक्षण कि भी विकसित उनके कौशल as  pilots .
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie Taylor became an important part of the team , building their  पहला वायुयान इंजन in बंद सहयोग साथ  the brothers .
The Wright  भाइयो ' औकात as आविष्कारक of the वायुयान रै महरूम  subject to counter-claims by various parties .
Much controversy persists over the  अनेक स्पर्धा दावा of जल्दी aviators  .
America 's Next  शीर्ष मॉडल , साईकिल 12 is the बारहवीं साईकिल of अमेरिका  's Next Top Model and the sixth season to air on The CW network .
It premiered  on कूच 4  , 2009 .
The cycle 's  कैच phrase is `` मिलेंगी in the  Fold . ''
The cycle 's promotional song  is महिला गागा 's ``  The Fame '' .
The prizes for  इस साईकिल are:
A modeling  अनुबंध साथ elite मॉडल  Management .
A  फ़ैशन स्प्रेड और कवर  in Seventeen .
A 100,000  अनुबंध साथ covergirl कॉस्मेटिक्स  .
The  पहला हाफ of the साईकिल took प्लेस in नई  York City , moving the show back from Los Angeles last season .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय गंतव्य लिये इस साईकिल is são  Paulo , Brazil , the series first visit to South America .
the क्रमांक of लड़कियों थी घटाया to 13 , the पहला समय चूंकि साईकिल  9 , after being maintained at 14 in the last two cycles .
This was the last time  paulina porizkova participated as न्यायधीश  .
The winner was 20-year-old  teyona एंडरसन इससे woodstown , नई जर्सी  .
This season averaged 4.35  लाख दर्शक प्रति एपीसोड  .
Exxon Mobil Corporation , or ExxonMobil ,  is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय आयल और गैस निगम headquartered  in Irving , Texas , United States .
It is a direct descendant of John D. Rockefeller 's  मानक आयल कम्पनी , और थी formed on नवम्बर 30 , 1999 , by the विलय of exxon और  Mobil .
It is affiliated with  इम्पीरियल आयल जिससे operates in कनाडा  .
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by revenue and in 2013 , became  the largest सरेआम traded कम्पनी by मार्केट capitalization  in the world .
The company is ranked # 5 globally  in फोर्ब्स वैश्विक 2000 सूची in 2013 .
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and , at then ( 2007 ) rates of production ,  हैं अपेक्षित to पिछला over 14 सालो  .
With 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a  संयुक्त रोज़ शोधन क्षमता of , exxon mobil is the largest refiner in the संसार ,  a title that was also associated with Standard Oil since its incorporation in 1870 .
ExxonMobil is the largest of the  संसार 's supermajors साथ रोज़ उत्पादन of 3.921 लाख  BOE ( barrels of oil equivalent ) .
In 2008 , this was approximately 3 % of world  उत्पादन , जिससे is कम than अनेक of the largest state-owned पेट्रोलियम  companies .
When ranked by oil  और गैस reserves it is 14th in the संसार साथ  less than 1 % of the total .
A 2012 article in The Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into  एक of the planet’s सबसे hated corporations , समर्थ to determine अमरीकी विदेशी नीति और  the fate of entire nations '' .
In terms of its environmental record , ExxonMobil increasingly drills in terrains  leased to उन्हें by dictatorships , ऐसे as those in chad और भूमध्यरेखीय  Guinea .
ली रेमंड , the corporation’s मुख्य कार्यपालिका जबतक 2005 ,  was `` notoriously sceptical about climate change and disliked government interference at any level '' .
The company was widely criticized for its  slow जवाब to सफ़ाई इसके 1989 valdez आयल spill in अलास्का  .
इस आलेख is परिचय the ग्लोब थिएटर  of Shakespeare .
For the  आधुनिक पुनर्निर्माण in  London , see Shakespeare 's Globe .
For other uses  , देखिए ग्लोब थिएटर  ( disambiguation ) .
The  ग्लोब थिएटर थी a थिएटर in लंदन  associated with William Shakespeare .
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company , the Lord Chamberlain 's Men , on land owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by  उसके बेटे , निकोलस brend और पोता सर मैथ्यू brend , और थी नष्ट  by fire on 29 June 1613 .
A second Globe Theatre was built on the same  साईट by जून 1614 और बंद in 1642  .
A modern  पुनर्निर्माण of the ग्लोब , नामित `` शेक्सपियर 's ग्लोब  `` , opened in 1997 approximately from the site of the original theatre .
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced and directed by Frank Capra , based on the short story `` The  महानतम तोहफा `` , जिससे फिलिप वैन doren stern लिखा in 1939 और privately प्रकाशित in 1945  .
the फिल्मी is माना एक of the सबसे loved films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और रै become परंपरागत  viewing during the Christmas season , alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol .
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey , a man who has given up  उसके सपनो in अनुक्रम to सहायता अन्य और जिनकी निकट आत्महत्या on क्रिसमस संध्या brings परिचय the हस्तक्षेप  of his guardian angel , Clarence Odbody ( Henry Travers ) .
Clarence shows  जार्ज सब the जीवनदान he रै छुआ और कैसा अलग जीवन in उसके जातियाँ  of Bedford Falls would be had he never been born .
Despite initially performing poorly at  the बक्सा दफ्तर due to ऊँची उत्पादन लागत और stiff प्रतियोगिता at the समय of इसके रिलीज , the फिल्मी रै आइये to be regarded  as a classic and is a staple of Christmas television around the world .
Theatrically , the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3  लाख , लगभग twice the उत्पादन लागत , a फिगर it never आए बंद to achieving  in its initial release .
An appraisal in 2006 reported :  `` हालांकि it थी नहीं the पूरा बक्सा दफ्तर विफलता कि आज everyone मानता ... it थी initially a प्रमुख निराशा  and confirmed , at least to the studios , that Capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see , money-making events they once were . ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by the American Film Institute as one of the 100 best  अमरीकी films कभी बना , रखकर क्रमांक 11 on इसके आरंभिक 1998 महानतम फिल्म सूची , और होता भी प्लेस क्रमांक एक on इसके सूची of the सबसे प्रेरणादायक  American films of all time .
आंकड़ा गोदाम  Overview
In computing , a  आंकड़ा गोदाम or एंटरप्राइज़ आंकड़ा गोदाम ( dw , dwh , or edw ) is a डेटाबेस  used for reporting and data analysis .
It is a central repository of data  जिससे is निर्मित by integrating आंकड़ा इससे एक  or more disparate sources .
Data warehouses store current as well  as ऐतिहासिक आंकड़ा और हैं प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना चर्चित रिपोर्ट्स लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन रिपोर्टिंग ऐसे  as annual and quarterly comparisons .
The  आंकड़ा भंडारित in the गोदाम हैं अपलोड इससे the  operational systems ( such as marketing , sales etc. , shown in the figure to the right ) .
The  आंकड़ा may pass through an operational  data store for additional operations before they are used in the DW for reporting .
The typical ETL -based data  गोदाम उपयोग स्टेजिंग , आंकड़ा संयोजन , और अभिगम परतों to  house its key functions .
The staging layer or staging database  स्टोर्स कच्चा आंकड़ा निकाली इससे प्रत्येक of the disparate  source data systems .
The integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by transforming the data  इससे the स्टेजिंग परत प्रायः storing इस रूपांतरित आंकड़ा in an operational  data store ( ODS ) database .
The integrated data are then moved  to yet another डेटाबेस , प्रायः पुकारा the आंकड़ा गोदाम डेटाबेस , जहाँ the आंकड़ा is arranged into hierarchical  groups often called dimensions and into facts and aggregate facts .
The combination of  तथ्य और आयाम is sometimes  called a star schema .
The access layer helps  उपयोक्ता retrieve आंकड़ा .
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated data source systems  करता नहीं आवश्यकता etl , स्टेजिंग databases , or operational आंकड़ा स्टोर databases  .
The integrated data  सोर्स प्रणालियों may be माना to be a भाग of  a distributed operational data store layer .
Data federation  विधि or आंकड़ा आभासीकरण विधि may be प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the वितरित एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों to consolidate  and aggregate data directly into the data warehouse database tables .
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse  , the एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों और the आंकड़ा गोदाम हैं सब एकीकृत चूंकि वहीँ  is no transformation of dimensional or reference data .
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the drill down from the aggregate data of the  आंकड़ा गोदाम to the transactional आंकड़ा of the एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों  .
Data warehouses can be  subdivided into आंकड़ा  marts .
Data marts store subsets of  आंकड़ा इससे a गोदाम  .
This definition of the data  गोदाम focuses on आंकड़ा भंडार  .
The main source of the data is cleaned , transformed , cataloged and made available for use by managers and  अन्य कारोबार पेशेवर लिये आंकड़ा खनन , ऑनलाइन विश्लेषणात्मक प्रसंस्करण , मार्केट शोध और  decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ) .
However , the means to retrieve and analyze data , to extract ,  रूपांतरण और लोड आंकड़ा , और to मैनेज the आंकड़ा शब्दकोष  are also considered essential components of a data warehousing system .
Many  सन्दर्भ to आंकड़ा warehousing उपयोग  this broader context .
Thus , an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence tools , tools  to निकालें , रूपांतरण और लोड आंकड़ा into the repository , और  tools to manage and retrieve metadata .
पोर्टलैंड स्टोन पाषाण on the आइल  of Portland , England
An abandoned  निर्माण कुल पाषाण निकट एडिलेड ,  South Australia
A quarry is a type of open-pit mine  इससे जिससे चट्टान or खनिज हैं निकाली  .
Quarries are generally used for  extracting भवन सामग्री , ऐसे as आयाम स्टोन , निर्माण  aggregate , riprap , sand , and gravel .
They are often collocated with concrete and asphalt plants due to the requirement  लिये विशाल amounts of कुल in  those materials .
खोलें खानों कि उपज खनिज हैं typically  referred to as open pit mines .
