The word  पाषाण can शामिल भूमिगत quarrying  for stone , such as Bath stone .
Mormons (  ) हैं a धार्मिक और सांस्कृतिक समूह सम्बन्धित to mormonism , the प्रिंसिपल शाखा of the latter दिन संत गति  of Restorationist Christianity , which began with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s .
After Smith 's death in 1844 the Mormons followed Brigham Young  to कया होता become the यूटा  Territory .
Today  mormons हैं समझा to be सदस्यों of the गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day  Saints ( LDS Church ) .
कुछ mormons हैं भी either स्वतंत्र  or non-practicing .
The center of Mormon cultural influence  is in यूटा , और उत्तर अमेरिका रै अधिक mormons than कोई अन्य महाद्वीप  , though the majority of Mormons live outside the United States .
Mormons have  विकसित a दमदार भाव of communality कि तना  from their doctrine and history .
During the 19th century Mormon converts tended to gather to a central geographic  स्थान , और between 1852 और 1890 a अल्पसंख्यक of mormons खुलकर practiced  plural marriage , a form of religious polygamy .
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and resources to serving in their church , and  अनेक यंग mormons चुनें to serve a full-time proselytizing मिशन  .
Mormons have a health code that  eschews alcoholic पेय , तम्बाकू , कॉफी  , tea , and other addictive substances .
They tend to be very family-oriented , and have strong connections  आरपार पीढियां और साथ विस्तारित परिवार , परावर्तक of उनके विश्वास कि परिवारों  can be sealed together beyond death and throughout eternity .
Mormons also have a strict law of chastity , requiring  abstention इससे यौन संबंध बाहर of विवाह  and strict fidelity within marriage .
mormons self-identify as ईसाई ,  though some of their beliefs differ from mainstream Christianity .
Mormons believe in the Bible , as well as other books of  scripture , ऐसे as the किताब of mormon  .
They have a unique  दृश्य of cosmology , और मानना कि सब लोगों  are spirit-children of God .
Mormons  मानना कि returning to परमेश्वर requires following the उदाहरण of यीशु  Christ , and accepting his atonement through ordinances such as baptism .
They  मानना कि मसीह 's गिरिजाघर थी लौटी through जोसेफ  Smith , and is guided by living prophets and apostles .
Central to Mormon faith is the belief that God  बोलती to उसके children और जवाब उनके  prayers .
In financial accounting , assets are  आर्थिक संसाधन  .
Anything tangible or intangible that is capable  of होने स्वामित्व or नियंत्रित to उपज मान और कि is आयोजित to  have positive economic value is considered an asset .
बस stated , एसेट represent मान of स्वामित्व कि can be परिवर्तित  into cash ( although cash itself is also considered an asset ) .
The balance  चादर of a कड़ रिकॉर्ड  the monetaryJ .
G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley ,  2005.there हैं अलग विधि of assessing  the monetary value of the assets recorded on the Balance Sheet .
In some cases , the Historical Cost is used ; such that the value of the asset when  it थी खरीदा in the पास्ट is प्रयुक्त as the मौद्रिक  value .
In  अन्य उदाहरण , the उपस्थित मेला मार्केट मान of the एसेट  is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet .
मान of the एसेट  owned by the firm .
It is money and other  valuables belonging to an व्यक्तिगत  or business .
Two major asset classes are  ठोस एसेट और intangible  assets .
Tangible  एसेट contain विभिन्न subclasses , सहित वर्तमान  assets and fixed assets.J .
Downes , J.E .  गुडमैन , `` शब्दकोष of वित्त & निवेश शर्तें '' , सामन्त 's वित्तीय मार्गदर्शिका , 2003 वर्तमान एसेट शामिल inventory , जबकि फिक्स्ड एसेट शामिल ऐसे वस्तुएं as इमारतें और उपकरण .J . downes , j.e . गुडमैन ,  `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005 .
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources and rights that have a value  to the कड़ क्युकी वे दे the कड़ कुछ दयालु of लाभ  in the market place .
Examples of intangible assets are  साख , copyrights , trademarks , patents और कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम , और वित्तीय एसेट , सहित ऐसे  items as accounts receivable , bonds and stocks .
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is  an electrically excitable कोशिका कि प्रक्रियाओं और transmits सूचना  through electrical and chemical signals .
A chemical signal occurs via a synapse  , a specialized कनेक्शन साथ अन्य  cells .
Neurons  कनेक्ट to प्रत्येक अन्य  to form neural networks .
Neurons are the core components of the  बेचैन प्रणाली , जिससे शामिल  the brain , spinal cord , and peripheral ganglia .
A number of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to touch ,  ध्वनि , लाइट और numerous अन्य stimuli affecting कोशिकाएं  of the sensory organs that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain .
Motor neurons receive  सिग्नल इससे the दिमाग और स्पाइनल cord , कारण मांसपेशी  contractions , and affect glands .
interneurons कनेक्ट न्यूरॉन्स to  other neurons within the same region of the brain or spinal cord .
A  ठेठ न्यूरॉन possesses a कोशिका देह ( प्रायः  called the soma ) , dendrites , and an axon .
Dendrites are thin  structures कि उठता इससे the कोशिका देह , प्रायः extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres और branching  multiple times , giving rise to a complex `` dendritic tree '' .
An axon  is a खास सेल्यूलर एक्सटेंशन कि arises इससे the कोशिका देह at a साईट पुकारा the axon  hillock and travels for a distance , as far as 1 meter in humans or even more in other species .
the कोशिका देह of a न्यूरॉन अक्सर देता वृद्धि to अनेक dendrites , लकिन  never to more than one axon , although the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates .
At the majority of synapses , signals are sent from  the axon of एक न्यूरॉन to a dendrite of another  .
There are , however , many exceptions to these rules : neurons that lack dendrites ,  न्यूरॉन्स कि have no axon , synapses कि कनेक्ट an axon  to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite , etc .
All neurons are electrically excitable , maintaining voltage gradients across their membranes by means  of metabolically चलित आयन पंपों , जिससे combine साथ आयन चैनल्स अंतःस्थापित in the झिल्ली to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular विशेषज्ञता मतभेद of ions  such as sodium , potassium , chloride , and calcium .
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage  can alter the फलन of voltage-dependent  ion channels .
If the voltage changes by a large  पर्याप्त राशि , an all-or-none electrochemical पल्स पुकारा an कार्रवाई संभावित is उत्पन्न  , which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon , and activates synaptic connections with other cells when it arrives .
Neurons do not  undergo कोशिका प्रभाग  .
In most cases , neurons are  उत्पन्न by खास प्रकार of स्टेम कोशिकाएं  .
Astrocytes , a type of glial cell , have also been observed to turn into  न्यूरॉन्स by पुण्य of the स्टेम कोशिका characteristic pluripotency  .
In humans , neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in two brain areas , the  हिप्पोकैम्पस और घ्राण बल्ब , वहीँ is दमदार प्रमाण लिये पीढी of  substantial numbers of new neurons .
सुपर कटोरी xliii थी an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स और the  National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season .
The Steelers defeated the Cardinals  by the स्कोर of 27–23  .
The game was played on February 1 , 2009 , at  रेमंड जेम्स स्टेडियम in tampa , फ्लोरिडा  .
With this win , the  स्टीलर्स became the पहला टोली to जीत छह  Super Bowls .
Pittsburgh , who finished the regular season with a 12–4 record , also won  उनके दूसरी सुपर कटोरी in चार सालो बाद जीतना सुपर कटोरी xl at the  end of the 2005 season .
the कार्डिनल्स डाला the खेल seeking उनके पहला एनएफएल शीर्षक चूंकि 1947  , the longest championship drought in the league .
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season , compiling a 9–7 record  , और the playoffs साथ the सहायता of सिर कोच केन whisenhunt , जो थी the स्टीलर्स ' अप्रिय समन्वयक in सुपर कटोरी xl , और  the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner , who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team , St. Louis Rams .
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 halftime lead , aided by linebacker James Harrison  's सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड 100-yard interception वापसी लिये a touchdown  .
Trailing 20–7 at the  प्रारंभ of the चौथी क्वार्टर , एरिज़ोना scored 16 अनुत्तरित अंक , सहित चौड़ी receiver लैरी fitzgerald 's  64-yard touchdown reception , to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game .
But the Steelers  marched 78 गज to स्कोर on चौड़ी receiver santonio  Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left .
Holmes , who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown ,  सहित चार receptions लिये 73 गज on कि फाइनल game-winning  drive , was named Super Bowl MVP .
He became the sixth wide  receiver to जीत the पुरस्कार , और भी थी the तीसरा पिट्सबर्ग receiver  to win the award , following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward .
Despite the global financial crisis and limited amount  of आनुषंगिक festivities कि हैं सामान्यतः आयोजित पहले the खेल , the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न संजाल ब्रॉडकास्ट आकर्षित an औसत u.S. दर्शक of 98.7 लाख दर्शक  , making it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point .
A diagram of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम , प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the दायरा  of frequencies and wavelengths
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम is the दायरा of  all possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation .
The ``  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम '' of an ऑब्जेक्ट रै a अलग अर्थ , और is बजाय the characteristic  distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object .
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for  आधुनिक रेडियो संचार to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त , thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of किलोमीटर bas  to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long wavelengths is the size  of the ब्रह्मांड itself , जबकि it is विचार कि the छोटी wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई , हालांकि in  principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम हैं प्रयुक्त in विज्ञान लिये spectroscopic और अन्य probing interactions  , as ways to study and characterize matter .
In addition  , विकिरण इससे विभिन्न भाग of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक  other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
marchantia , a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer to all embryophytes (  जमीन पौधे ) कि do नहीं have सच्चा vascular ऊतक और हैं इसलिए  called ' non-vascular plants ' .
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the transport  of जल ; however चूंकि ये do नहीं contain lignin , वे  are not considered to be true vascular tissue .
Currently  bryophytes हैं विचार नहीं to be a प्राकृतिक or monophyletic समूह ; however  the name is convenient and remains in use as a collective term for mosses , hornworts , and liverworts .
Bryophytes  उपज enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia और sporangia ) , लकिन वे उपज  neither flowers nor seeds , reproducing via spores .
The term bryophyte comes from Greek  βρύον , bryon , `` tree-moss , oyster-green ''  + φυτόν - phyton `` plant '' .
A bank is a financial institution and a  वित्तीय intermediary कि स्वीकृत जमा और चैनल्स those जमा into lending क्रियाएँ , either सीधे  by loaning or indirectly through capital markets .
A bank is the  कनेक्शन between ग्राहक कि have पूंजी deficits  and customers with capital surpluses .
Due to their influence within a  वित्तीय प्रणाली और an अर्थव्यवस्था , बैंको हैं generally अत्यधिक regulated in सबसे  countries .
Most banks operate under a system known as fractional reserve  बैंकिंग जहाँ वे थाम तभी a छोटी आरक्षित of the निधि deposited और lend आउट the बाकी लिये  profit .
They are generally subject to minimum capital requirements which are based on an international  नियत of पूंजी मानकों , ज्ञात as the basel accords  .
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte dei Paschi di Siena ,  headquartered in सियेना , इटली , जिससे  has been operating continuously since 1472 .
it is followed by berenberg बैंको of हैम्बर्ग (  1590 ) and Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ) .
बैंकिंग in इसके आधुनिक भाव विकसित in समृद्ध शहरों  of Renaissance Italy , such as Florence , Venice and Genoa .
In the history of banking , a number  of बैंकिंग dynasties —among उन्हें notably medici , fugger , welser , berenberg  , Baring and Rothschild —have played a central role over many centuries .
The Xbox is a video game  कंसोल manufactured by microsoft  .
It was released on November 15 , 2001 in  उत्तर अमेरिका , फ़रवरी 22 , 2002 in जापानी , और कूच  14 , 2002 in Australia and Europe .
It was Microsoft  's पहला foray  into the gaming console market .
As part of the  sixth-generation of गेमिंग , the एक्सबॉक्स competed साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 2 , sega 's dreamcast ( जिससे रोका अमरीकी बिक्री  before the Xbox went on sale ) , and Nintendo 's GameCube .
The Xbox was the first console  offered by an अमरीकी कम्पनी बाद the  Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996 .
The integrated Xbox Live  सेवा शुभारम्भ in नवम्बर 2002 अनुमत खिलाड़ी to खेल खेल  online with a broadband connection .
It first competed with  dreamcast 's ऑनलाइन सेवा लकिन बाद primarily  competed with PlayStation 2 's online service .
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a subscription , as well as broadband-only connection which was  नहीं completely अपनाया yet , एक्सबॉक्स सजीव थी a कामयाबी due to बेहतर सर्वर , सुविधाएँ ऐसे as a दोस्त सूची , और पड़ाव शीर्षक जैसे हेलो 2 released in  November 2004 , which is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years .
Xbox 's  successor , the एक्सबॉक्स 360  , was launched in November 2005 .
The Xbox was discontinued in  लेट 2005 in जापानी जहाँ बिक्री यहूद  poor .
It was  discontinued in लेट 2006 in यूरोपीय और  early 2007 in North America .
The last Xbox game in Europe was  टोनी हॉक 's प्रोजेक्ट 8 released in नवम्बर 2006  , and the last game in North America was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008 .
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox  consoles थी discontinued on कूच 2 , 2009 , stating कि कोई in-warranty  repair now needed will not be undertaken .
Xbox access to Xbox  सजीव थी रोका on अप्रैल 15  , 2010 .
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ) , commonly referred  to as the इन्जील of जॉन or बस जॉन और प्रायः referred to in नई वसीयत स्कॉलरशिप as the चौथी इन्जील , is an खाता of the  public ministry of Jesus .
It begins with the witness and  प्रतिज्ञान by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट और concludes साथ the मौत  , burial , resurrection , and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus .
This account is fourth of the canonical gospels  , बाद the synoptics मैथ्यू ,  Mark and Luke .
states that the book derives from  the गवाही of the ' शिष्य जिसको  Jesus loved . '
Along with Peter , the unnamed  शिष्य is विशेषकर बंद to यीशु , और early-church परंपरा पहचाना उसे as जॉन the  Apostle , one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles .
The gospel is closely related  in स्टाइल और सामग्री to the तीन surviving epistles of जॉन ऐसे कि टीकाकारों दावत the चार किताबे साथ , yet , according to  most modern scholars , John was not the author of any of these books .
Recent Christian  scripture स्कॉलरशिप अधिक और अधिक रै लगाई जॉन भीतर  a first-century Jewish context .
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work to trace the  विकास of the परंपरा इससे जिससे the इन्जील  arose .
The discourses seem to be concerned with the actual issues of the  church-and-synagogue बहस at the समय जब the इन्जील थी  written .
It is notable  कि , in the इन्जील , the जातियाँ स्टिल appears to define itself primarily  against Judaism , rather than as part of a wider Christian church .
Though Christianity started as a movement  भीतर judaism , धीरे ईसाइयों और यहूदियों became bitterly  opposed .
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics , meaning that it describes Jesus  as the अवतार of the दैवी लोगो through जिसको सब बाते यहूद बना , as the ऑब्जेक्ट of veneration , और अधिक explicitly  as God incarnate .
Only in John  करता यीशु बात at लंबाई परिचय खुद और उसके दैवी  role , often shared with the disciples only .
Against  the synoptics , जॉन focuses largely on अलग चमत्कार ( सहित  resurrecting Lazarus ) , given as signs meant to engender faith .
Synoptic  तत्व ऐसे as parables और  exorcisms are not found in John .
It presents a realized eschatology  in जिससे मोक्ष is already उपस्थित लिये the  believer .
The Plagues of Egypt  ( ) , भी पुकारा the टेन plagues ( ) or the biblical plagues , यहूद टेन calamities कि , according to the biblical किताब of exodus , इसराईल  's God , Yahweh , inflicted upon Egypt to persuade Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery .
Pharaoh capitulated after  the दसवाँ प्लेग , triggering the  Exodus of the Jewish people .
The plagues were designed to contrast the power of  yahweh साथ the नपुंसकता of मिश्र 's विभिन्न  gods .
Some commentators have associated several  of the plagues साथ निर्णय on विशिष्ट देवताओं संबद्ध  with the Nile , fertility and natural phenomena .
The plagues of Egypt are  भी उल्लेखित in the कुरान ( 7,133–136  ) .
According to the Book of Exodus , God proclaims that all the  देवताओं of मिश्र होगा be judged through the दसवाँ  and final plague:
जॉन मार्टिन 's पेंटिंग of the  plague of hail and fire ( 1823 ) .
A role-playing game ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying game ) is a game  in जिससे खिलाड़ी assume the भूमिकाएँ of वर्ण in a fictional सेटिंग  .
Players take responsibility for acting out these roles within a narrative , either  through शाब्दिक एक्टिंग or through a प्रक्रम of संरचित decision-making or अक्षर विकास  .
Actions taken within  अनेक खेल सफल or असफल according to a औपचारिक  system of rules and guidelines .
वहीँ हैं अनेक  forms of RPG .
The original form , sometimes called the tabletop RPG , is  conducted through चर्चा , whereas in सजीव कार्रवाई role-playing खेल ( larp ) खिलाड़ी physically  perform their characters ' actions .
In both of these forms , an arranger called a game master ( GM ) usually decides on the rules and setting  to be प्रयुक्त और अधिनियमों as रेफरी , जबकि प्रत्येक of the अन्य खिलाड़ी plays the भूमिका of a सिंगल अक्षर  .
Several varieties of RPG also  मौजूद in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मीडिया , ऐसे as multi-player text-based muds और उनके graphics-based successors , massively  multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ) .
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing video games in which players control a  अक्षर or टोली जो undertake quests , और may शामिल सामर्थ्य कि अग्रिम using सांख्यिकीय  mechanics .
These games often share settings and rules  साथ tabletop rpgs , लकिन emphasize अक्षर उन्नति  more than collaborative storytelling .
Despite this variety of forms , some game forms such as trading card games and  wargames कि हैं सम्बन्धित to role-playing  games may not be included .
Role-playing activity  may sometimes be उपस्थित in ऐसे खेल , लकिन  it is not the primary focus .
The term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation  खेल और exercises प्रयुक्त in शिक्षण , प्रशिक्षण , और अकादमिक  research .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming )  , थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession  and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
the युद्ध था इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर  the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's  अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by  अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य  ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his  उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861 ,  seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President  जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित  his administration would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave  राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये  secession .
Confederate  शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर  territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference  विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह , और दोनो पहलू prepared  for war .
The  confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि  they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12 , 1861 , जब confederate शक्तियां  fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for  प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन  , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon  नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि  crippled the southern economy .
The  पूर्वी थिएटर थी  inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with  confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam , dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप  .
lincoln जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies , and the  संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी नदी  .
In 1863 , Robert  E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the  Battle of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to ulysses S.  Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the  पश्चिमी थिएटर , विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched  to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could  afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड ,  the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's  आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the earliest  सच्चा औद्योगिक  wars .
railroads , the टेलीग्राफ , steamships , और mass-produced  weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of  civilian कारखानों , खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन  and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American  इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको  and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years  बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged  18–40 .
The definition of the  संसार 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र रै महरूम निर्दिष्ट by the एयरपोर्ट  Council International in Geneva , Switzerland .
The ACI defines and measures  the following तीन प्रकार of विमानक्षेत्र  traffic:
Passenger traffic : total  यात्री emplaned और deplaned , यात्री  in transit counted once
Cargo  ट्रैफ़िक : loaded और मोड  freight and mail in metric tonnes
Traffic movements :  अवतरण और take-offs of  aircraft
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe  कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक 11  November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the  प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939 , और the पहला संसार युद्ध or संसार  War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the  सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी , austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन , as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध  the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations  डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies , और the उस्मानी  Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel , including 60  लाख europeans , यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in  history .
More than 9 million combatants were  मारे , largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in  the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history ,  subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन , ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the  nations involved .
One of the  long-term कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the  foreign policies of the great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of  ऑस्ट्रिया , the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट  when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several  alliances formed over the पिछला  decades were invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers were  at युद्ध और , via उनके colonies , the  conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of  the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण of  Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and  ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस , providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of  war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled  into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला  little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian  फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians , लकिन थी रोका in  its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November  the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध , खोलने  up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
इटली और बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in  1915 and Romania in 1916 .
In Russia ,  the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought  the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive  साथ the पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और  American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with  क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर  1918 .
the युद्ध ended in विजय लिये  the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as the participants  आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a  total war .
By the end of the war , four  प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी , रूसी , austro-hungarian  and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great  राशि of territory , जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled  entirely .
The map of central Europe  थी redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य  .
The League of Nations  थी formed in the आशा of preventing another  such conflict .
The European  राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप  of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also  referred to as the bp आयल spill , the bp आयल विपत्ति , the गल्फ of मैक्सिको आयल spill , और the macondo blowout ) थी an आयल spill in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको on  the BP -operated Macondo Prospect , considered the largest accidental marine oil spill in the history of the petroleum industry , estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill .
Following the explosion and sinking of the Deepwater Horizon  आयल रिग , जिससे claimed 11 जीवनदान , a sea-floor  oil gusher flowed unabated for 87 days , until it was capped on 15 July 2010 .
The  कुल निर्वहन is अनुमानित  at .
A massive response ensued to protect beaches , wetlands and estuaries from the spreading  आयल utilizing skimmer जहाजों , फ्लोटिंग booms , नियंत्रित burns और of  Corexit oil dispersant .
After several failed efforts to contain the flow , the  खूब थी घोषित sealed on 19 सितंबर 2010  .
Some reports indicate  the खूब साईट continues  to leak .
Due to the months-long  spill , साथ साथ प्रतिकूल प्रभाव इससे the जवाब और क्लीनअप क्रियाएँ , extensive क्षति to समुद्री और वन्यजीव habitats , फ़िशिंग और पर्यटन उद्योग , और इंसान स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं  have continued through 2013.Three years after the spill , tar balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast .
Numerous  investigations छान the कल्याणकारी of the विस्फोट और  record-setting spill .
Notably , the U.S. government 's September 2011 report pointed to  defective सीमेंट on the खूब , faulting ज़्यादातर bp , लकिन भी खूब ऑपरेटर transocean और ठेकेदार  Halliburton .
Earlier in 2011 , a White House commission  likewise blamed bp और इसके साझेदार लिये a श्रेणी of cost-cutting निर्णय और an अपर्याप्त सुरक्षा प्रणाली , लकिन भी concluded कि the spill resulted  from `` systemic '' root causes and `` absent significant reform in both industry practices and government policies , might well recur '' .
In November 2012 ,  bp और the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of इंसाफ settled संघीय दण्ड आरोप साथ bp pleading अपराधी to  11 counts of manslaughter , two misdemeanors , and a felony count of lying to Congress .
bp भी सहमत to चार सालो of सरकारी निगरानी of इसके सुरक्षा practices और आचार , और the पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा एजेंसी  announced that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government .
BP and the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $  4.525 अरब in जुर्माना और अन्य भुगतान लकिन further विधिक कार्यवाही नहीं अपेक्षित to conclude जबतक 2014 हैं जारी to determine  payouts and fines under the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment .
as of फ़रवरी 2013 , दण्ड और सिविल settlements और  payments to a trust fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion .
``  जहाँ the गलियों have no नाम  '' is a song by rock band U2 .
it is the खोलने track इससे उनके 1987 एल्बम  The Joshua Tree and was released as the album 's third single in August 1987 .
The song 's hook is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a delay effect , played  दौरान the सोंग 's परिचय और again at the  end .
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to  the ख़्याल कि it is संभावित to पहचानो a व्यक्ति 's धर्म और आय आधारित on the गली on जिससे वे  lived , particularly in Belfast .
During the band 's difficulties recording the song ,  निर्माता ब्रायन eno माना erasing the सोंग 's टेपों to have उन्हें प्रारंभ इससे खरोंच  .
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' was praised by critics and  became a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी , peaking at क्रमांक तेरह in the  US , number fourteen in Canada , number ten in the Netherlands , and number four in the United Kingdom .
The song has become one of the band 's most popular  गीतों और रै remained a स्टेपल of उनके सजीव अधिनियम चूंकि the सोंग debuted  in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour .
The song was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop for the  फिल्मांकन of इसके म्यूज़िक वीडियो , जिससे जीती a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन म्यूज़िक वीडियो .recently the सोंग रै महरूम प्रयुक्त by  the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born  जुलाई 9 , 1956 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता , निर्माता , लेखक , और निदेशक  .
Hanks is  ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ in अपोलो  13 , Big , That Thing You Do !
, The Green Mile , You  've मिला मेल , sleepless in सिएटल , चार्ली विल्सन 's युद्ध , कैच me if तुम can , फॉरेस्ट गंप , डाल दूर , a लीग of  Their Own , The Da Vinci Code , Angels & Demons , as well as animated films like the Toy Story film series , The Polar Express , and The Simpsons Movie .
He has earned and been nominated for numerous awards during his career ,  सहित जीतना a सुनहरी ग्लोब लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता और an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका in फिलाडेल्फिया और a सुनहरी ग्लोब , an अकादमी पुरस्कार , a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार  , and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump , and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004 .
Hanks is also known for his  सहयोग साथ फिल्मी निदेशक स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग  on Saving Private Ryan and the mini-series Band of Brothers , which launched Hanks also as a successful director , producer and writer .
As of 2012 , Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2  अरब at the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा दफ्तर अलोन , और over $ 8.5 अरब विश्वव्यापी बनाना  him the highest all-time box office star .
The Cape is an  अमरीकी सुपरहीरो नाटक श्रेणी  .
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season replacement  शुरूआत साथ a two-hour पायलट एपीसोड on संडे , जनवरी 9 ,  2011 at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific Time .
An encore played on Monday , January 10 , with follow-up episodes continuing on Monday  evenings in the 9 pm timeslot शुरूआत on जनवरी  17 .
NBC subsequently  काटें the कुल क्रमांक of एपीसोड to be aired इससे  13 to 10 as a result of low ratings .
On March 2 ,  2011 , एनबीसी घोषित कि the श्रेणी finale  would only be aired on the network 's website .
हैली 's धूमकेतु or धूमकेतु हैली ( or ) , officially designated 1p/halley  , is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years .
हैली is the तभी short-period धूमकेतु कि is clearly दृश्य to the  naked eye from Earth , and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter  और अधिक spectacular , लकिन होगा appear तभी एकबार  in thousands of years .
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System  have महरूम observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों चूंकि  at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese , Babylonian  , और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers , लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना as reappearances of the वही ऑब्जेक्ट at the  time .
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705  by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer edmond हैली , बाद  whom it is now named .
Halley 's Comet last  appeared in the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली in 1986 और होगा  next appear in mid-2061 .
During  इसके 1986 apparition , हैली became the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft  , providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's ``  गंदा स्नोबॉल '' मॉडल , जिससे correctly  predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is  largely रचित of dusty , non-volatile सामग्री , और कि तभी a छोटी portion of it  is icy .
The following is a list of the  सबसे populous incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त राज्य  of America .
As defined by the United States Census  ब्यूरो , an `` incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations , सहित  city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
A few exceptional Census  designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं भी शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau 's listing of incorporated places .
Consolidated  city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी  that includes the entire population of a county , or county equivalent .
Some  संचित city-counties , however  , include multiple incorporated places .
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a  भाग of another incorporated प्लेस  .
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual  municipalities भीतर उनके पारिभाषित हद , जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों भीतर शहरी  agglomerations .
A different ranking is evident when considering  u.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल  populations .
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620  transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों , सहित a कोर समूह of separatists  , to New England .
Their story is one of  travail और अस्तित्व in a हर्ष नई संसार  environment .
A New Zealand forward ( in white )  takes a शॉट on लक्ष्य विरूद्ध कैमरून in the  2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup .
Forwards , also known as strikers , are the players  on a टोली in संघ फ़ुटबॉल जो खेल निकटतम to the opposing टोली 's लक्ष्य , और  are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals .
This very advanced position and its limited defensive responsibilities  औसत आगे सामान्यतः स्कोर अधिक लक्ष्य than  other players .
This position requires intelligence ,  गति , और शक्ति , दोनो of निष्पादन और of विचार , to perform  the role well .
Modern team formations usually include  एक to तीन आगे ; दो is the सबसे आम  .
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an  उन्नत स्थिति ( the केन्द्र आगे ) , और another attacking  forward who plays somewhat deeper and assists in making goals as well as scoring ( the second striker ) .
it चाहिए be विख्यात कि अंदर आगे develop इससे attacking midfield स्थितियाँ और  hence are naturally midfielders .
Barcelona FC star Lionel Messi is a typical  attacking मिडफील्डर देखी as a आगे due to उसके शॉट सटीकता  .
A California domestic partnership is a legal relationship available to same-sex couples , and to certain  opposite-sex युगल in जिससे at तनिक एक पार्टी is at तनिक 18 सालो  of age .
It affords the couple `` the same rights , protections , and benefits , and ... the same  जिम्मेदारियों , दायित्वों , और कर्तव्य अंतर्गत विधि ... '' as शादीशुदा spouses  .
Enacted in 1999 , the domestic partnership registry was the first of its  दयालु in the संयुक्त राज्य निर्मित by a विधानमंडल  without court intervention .
Initially ,  घरेलू partnerships enjoyed बहुत few privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation अधिकारों और the सही  to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner .
The legislature  रै चूंकि विस्तारित the पैमाना of कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू partnerships to  include all of the rights and responsibilities common to marriage .
As such , California domestic  partnerships हैं functionally समतुल्य to सिविल संघ  offered in several other states .
Although the program enjoys broad support in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , it रै महरूम the सोर्स of कुछ विवाद  .
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex  परिवारों have challenged the विस्तार of घरेलू partnerships  in court .
Conversely , advocates of same-sex marriage contend that anything less than full marriage rights extended  to same-sex साझेदार is analogous to the `` पृथक लकिन बराबर '' जातिगत  laws of the Jim Crow era .
Mark A. Jackson ( born April 1 , 1965 ) is an American basketball coach , and  पूर्व खिलाड़ी जो is the वर्तमान सिर कोच of the सुनहरी राज्य योद्धाओं of the एनबीए  .
A point guard from St. John 's University , he played for the New York Knicks , Indiana Pacers , Los Angeles Clippers , Denver  टेंडर्स , टोरंटो रैपटर्स , यूटा जैज़ और ह्यूस्टन rockets in the एनबीए in a करियर spanning इससे 1987  to 2004 .
Jackson has  भी worked as a कमेंटेटर लिये ईएसपीएन और एबीसी  alongside his former coach Jeff Van Gundy and play-by-play man Mike Breen .
He was previously an  एनबीए विश्लेषक लिये the यस संजाल 's नई  Jersey Nets games .
South Africa has eleven official languages : Afrikaans , English  , ndebele , उत्तरी sotho , sotho , swazi , tswana , सोंगा , venda , ख़ोसा  and Zulu .
Fewer than two percent of South Africans  बोलो a पहला भाषा अन्य than an आधिकारिक  one .
Most South Africans  can बोलो अधिक than एक  language .
Dutch and English were the first official  भाषाएं of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी इससे 1910 to  1925 .
अफ्रीकी थी added as a  part of Dutch in 1925 .
Dutch was replaced by Afrikaans when South Africa became a republic in 1961 , and Dutch was dropped in 1983 , so  between 1983 और 1994 , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी था दो आधिकारिक भाषाएं : अंग्रेज़ी  and Afrikaans .
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those  भाषाएं : isizulu , isixhosa , अफ्रीकी , sepedi ( referring to उत्तरी sotho ) , setswana , अंग्रेज़ी  , Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ) , Xitsonga , Siswati , Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ) .
In South Africa , Southern Ndebele is known  बस as ndebele , as सबसे अध्यक्षों of उत्तरी ndebele सजीव in  Zimbabwe .
The 1993 version of  the संविधान referred to उत्तरी sotho as sesotho sa leboa  , but the 1996 version referred to the language as Sepedi .
Different government departments  और आधिकारिक लाशें  use different terms to denote Northern Sotho .
The main language of  सरकारी is अंग्रेज़ी भी if दक्षिण africans  often take pride in using indigenous languages for any purpose .
Afrikaans also features prominently in commerce together with English  as the भाषाएं साथ the उच्चतम क्रमांक of धाराप्रवाह अध्यक्षों हैं अफ्रीकी और अंग्रेज़ी  .
In terms of linguistic classification , the official languages include two  west-germanic भाषाएं ( अंग्रेज़ी और अफ्रीकी ) और नौ bantu  languages .
Four of these are Nguni languages ( Zulu , Xhosa , Swati and Ndebele ) and  तीन हैं sotho–tswana भाषाएं ( उत्तरी sotho , दक्षिणी sotho  and Tswana ) .
सोंगा is a tswa–ronga  language .
South African Sign Language  is a पृथक हालांकि incompletely उभरा नेशनल मानक भाषा  which also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects .
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of  एल्युमिनियम और नाइट्रिक एसिड , मौजूदा सामान्यतः as a crystalline हाइड्रेट , सबसे commonly  as aluminium nitrate nonahydrate , Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O .
The New York Jets are a professional football team headquartered in  florham पार्क , नई जर्सी , representing the नई यॉर्क महानगर  area .
The team is a member of the Eastern Division  of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) .
In a unique arrangement for  the लीग , the jets share metlife स्टेडियम in ईस्ट रदरफोर्ड , नई जर्सी साथ the नई  York Giants .
The  मताधिकार is legally और corporately  registered as New York Jets , LLC .
The  टोली थी संस्थापित in 1959 as the टाइटन्स of नई यॉर्क , an असली  member of the American Football League ; later , the franchise joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger .
The team  began to खेल in 1960 at the  Polo Grounds .
Under  नई स्वामित्व , the वर्तमान नाम थी अपनाया in 1963 और the मताधिकार  was relocated to Shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984 .
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the  पहला समय in 1968 और गई on to compete in सुपर कटोरी iii जहाँ वे पराजित the बाल्टीमोर कोल्टस , बनने  the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game .
Since 1968 , the Jets have appeared in  the playoffs तेरह टाइम्स , और in the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार टाइम्स , सबसे recently  losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010 .
However , the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl , making them one of three NFL  टीमों to जीत उनके लोन सुपर कटोरी रूप , साथ साथ the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो  and Tampa Bay Buccaneers .
the टोली 's प्रशिक्षण सुविधा , अटलांटिक स्वास्थ्य jets प्रशिक्षण  Center , which opened in 2008 , is located in Florham Park .
The team currently holds  उनके सालाना प्रशिक्षण शिविर सत्र on the कैम्पस of the राज्य  University of New York at Cortland in Cortland , New York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park complex .
psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms , also known as psychedelic  मशरूम , हैं fungi कि contain psychoactive indole  alkaloids .
There are multiple colloquial terms for psilocybin mushrooms , the  सबसे आम होने shrooms और जादू  mushrooms .
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe , Conocybe , Copelandia , Galerina ,  gerronema , gymnopilus , hypholoma , inocybe , mycena , panaeolus  , Pluteus , and Psilocybe .
There are  लगभग 190 प्रजाति of psilocybin मशरूम  and most of them fall in the genus Psilocybe .
Psilocybin mushrooms  have संभावित महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्रागैतिहासिक टाइम्स और may  have been depicted in rock art .
Many  संस्कृतियों have प्रयुक्त ये  mushrooms in religious rites .
In modern Western society  वे हैं प्रयुक्त recreationally लिये उनके  psychedelic effects .
Recent studies done at Imperial College London and Johns Hopkins School  of आयुर्विज्ञान conclude कि जब प्रयुक्त properly , psilocybin अधिनियमों  as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States ,  situated in the उत्तरपश्चिम extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप , साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा  to the east , the Arctic Ocean to the north , and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the largest state in the United  राज्य by क्षेत्रफल , the 4th तनिक populous और the तनिक densely आबादी of  the 50 United States .
लगभग हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों  live within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
अलास्का 's अर्थव्यवस्था is वर्चस्व by the आयल , प्राकृतिक गैस , और फ़िशिंग  industries ; it has these resources in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from Russia  on कूच 30 , 1867 , लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये  inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several administrative changes  पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on may  11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period , when it  थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq , अर्थ  `` the mainland '' or , more literally , `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is also  ज्ञात as alyeska , the `` ग्रेट जमीन ''  , an Aleut word derived from the same root .
The 101 French  विभाग हैं विभाजित into 342 arrondissements , जिससे may be  translated into English as districts .
The capital of  an arrondissement/district is  called a subprefecture .
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the department , that  प्रीफ़ेक्चर is the पूंजी of the arrondissement , एक्टिंग दोनो as a प्रीफ़ेक्चर और as  a subprefecture .
Arrondissements are further  विभाजित into cantons और communes  .
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna , literally ``  म्यान '' or `` म्यान `` ) is a tubular ट्रैक्ट जिससे is a sex अंग और  has two main functions ; sexual intercourse and childbirth .
In humans , this passage leads  इससे the खोलने of the भग to the गर्भाशय ( गर्भ )  , but the vaginal tract ends at the cervix .
Unlike men , who have  तभी एक genital orifice , महिलाओं have दो , the  urethra and the vagina .
The vaginal opening is much  larger than the urethral खोलने , और दोनो  openings are protected by the labia .
The inner mould of the  योनि रै a foldy बनावट  which can create friction for the penis during intercourse .
During  arousal , the योनि gets नम to सुकर  the entrance of the penis .
The Latinate plural ``  vaginae '' is rarely प्रयुक्त in  English .
Colloquially , the word vagina is often  प्रयुक्त to refer to the भग or to  the female genitals in general .
However , by its  शब्दकोष और anatomical परिभाषाएं , योनि refers  exclusively to the specific internal structure .
The  सिनसिनाटी लाल हैं a प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल  team based in Cincinnati , Ohio .
They are members of the  नेशनल लीग सेंट्रल प्रभाग  .
Established in 1881  as an स्वतंत्र क्लबों , the टोली became a चार्टर सदस्य  of the American Association in 1882 , and joined the National League in 1890 .
The club traditionally traces its  उत्पत्ति to बेसबॉल 's पहला खुलकर पेशेवर  team in 1869 .
The  लाल have जीती पाँच संसार श्रेणी शीर्षक , एक अमरीकी  Association pennant , nine National League pennants and ten division titles .
The Reds played in  the नेशनल लीग वेस्ट between 1969 और 1993  and have been in the National League Central since 1994 .
चूंकि 2003 , the लाल have निभाई at ग्रेट अमरीकी  Ball Park , built next to their home from 1970 to 2002 , Riverfront Stadium .
Bob  castellini रै स्वामित्व the सिनसिनाटी  Reds since 2006 .
A  शरारत बदबू  bomb .
A stink bomb is a device  designed to बनाएँ an अप्रिय महकते  .
वे दायरा in प्रभावकारिता इससे सरल  pranks to military grade malodorants or riot control chemical agents .
The Guinness Book of Records  सूचियाँ दो smelliest substances .
One is `` US Government Standard Bathroom Malodor '' ; a mixture of eight chemicals with a stench  resembling इंसान मल , तभी much stronger , designed  to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners .
Another one , `` Who me ? `` , is a mixture of five  sulfur-containing रसायन और खुश्बू जैसे rotting खाना और carcasses  .
The  कहावत `` a चित्र is लायक a हजार शब्द '' refers to the ख़्याल  that a complex idea can be conveyed with just a single still image .
It  भी aptly characterizes एक of the प्रमुख लक्ष्य of कल्पना  , namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of data quickly .
the अभिव्यक्ति `` उपयोग  a picture .
It 's worth a thousand words . '' appears in a 1911  समाचारपत्र आलेख quoting समाचारपत्र एडिटर आर्थर ब्रिसबेन discussing पत्रकारिता और publicity  .
1913  समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन
A similar phrase , `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '' , appears in a 1913  समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the piqua स्वचालित सप्लाई हाउस of piqua ,  Ohio .
An early use of  the सटीक phrase appears in an 1918 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the सैन अंतोनियो लाइट जिससे says : एक of the स्वदेश 's महानतम सम्पादक says : एक चित्र is  Worth a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the War Exemplifies the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers .
It is believed by some that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in  the विज्ञापन व्यापार जर्नल मुद्रक ' स्याही , promoting the  use of images in advertisements that appeared on the sides of streetcars .
The December 8 , 1921 issue carries an ad entitled , `` One Look  is लायक a हजार शब्द . ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10 , 1927 issue with the phrase `` One Picture  लायक टेन हजार शब्द , '' जहाँ it is labeled a चाइनीज कहावत ( 一圖勝萬言  ) .
The Home Book of Proverbs , Maxims , and  परिचित वाक्यांश उद्धरण बर्नार्ड as saying he पुकारा it `` a चाइनीज कहावत  , so that people would take it seriously . ''
Soon after , the proverb would become  popularly attributed to कन्फ्यूशियस .
The discussion of `` One Picture Worth Thousand Words '' versus `` One Picture  लायक टेन हजार शब्द '' wan येन i hua और 10.000 मील लायक 10.000 किताबे is cited in सूचना  graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures .
A picture is  लायक a हजार  words
despite इस आधुनिक उत्पत्ति of the  popular phrase , the sentiment has been expressed by earlier writers .
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in  fathers और बेटे in 1862 ) , `` a चित्र shows me at a  glance what it takes dozens of pages of a book to expound . ''
Computer programmer and author Fred Brooks makes an opposite  बयान regarding प्रोग्रामिंग in the mythical man-month : `` दिखाएँ me अपना flowcharts  and conceal your tables , and I shall continue to be mystified .
Show me your tables , and I won’t usually need  अपना flowcharts ; they’ll be स्पष्ट  . ''
the phrase रै भी महरूम spoofed by जॉन मैकार्थी , the प्रसिद्ध कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक , to मेक  the opposite point : `` As the Chinese say , 1001 words is worth more than a picture . ''
A season is a subdivision  of the साल , चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in मौसम , पारिस्थितिकी , और  hours of daylight .
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the Earth around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth  's अक्ष सापेक्ष to the प्लेन of क्रान्ति  .
In temperate  और ध्रुवीय regions , the सीज़न हैं चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the तीव्रता of धूप कि पहुँच the धरती  's surface , variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate , and plants to be dormant .
During May , June and  जुलाई , the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is उजागर to अधिक सीधा धूप क्युकी  the hemisphere faces the sun .
The same is true of the  दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in नवम्बर , दिसम्बर और  January .
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be higher in the sky during  the गर्मियाँ महीने जिससे increases the सौर फ्लक्स  .
However , due to seasonal lag , June , July and August are the hottest months in the northern  गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर , जनवरी और फ़रवरी हैं the hottest महीने in the  southern hemisphere .
In temperate and  subpolar regions , generally चार पंचांग -आधारd सीज़न  ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ) , summer ( estival ) , autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate  जलवायु regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal  ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet , or monsoon ) season and the dry season , and  in कुछ तीव्र क्षेत्रों , a कूल or  mild season .
In some parts of the world , special `` seasons '' are loosely defined based on  महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम ऐसे as a hurricane ऋतु , बवंडर ऋतु or a दावानल ऋतु  .

डच निर्यात  in 2006
At the time of  लिखने the नीदरलैंड्स is the 17th largest  economy of the world .
( see :  सूची of देशों  by GDP ( nominal ) )
GDP per  capita is roughly $ 42,000 जिससे puts it in the शीर्ष 10 of richest राष्ट्र in  the world ( see : List of countries by GDP ( PPP ) per capita ) .
Between 1996 and  2000 सालाना आर्थिक विकास (  GDP ) averaged over 4 % , well above the European average .
Growth slowed  considerably in 2001-05 as भाग of the  global economic slowdown .
2006 और 2007 however दिखाया  economic growth of 3.4 % and 3.9 % .
The Dutch economy was hit considerably by the ongoing  वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट और the ensuing यूरोपीय कर्ज़  crisis .
Several banks went bankrupt ,  और a क्रमांक of अन्य था to प्राप्त  governmental aid .
In 2009 the  अर्थव्यवस्था अस्वीकृत साथ 3.5 % , followed by दो सालो  of mild growth .
The Dutch economy is currently in a recession again , with an  आर्थिक मनाही of 0.5 % in 2012  .
Inflation is  at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी  2013 .
Unemployment has  महरूम अपेक्षाकृत कम compared to अन्य eu राष्ट्र लिये  decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 % .
The Netherlands managed to maintain its  aaa दरजा at तनिक जबतक कूच 2013 according to the तीन प्रमुख क्रेडिट  rating agencies .
Historically , the Dutch introduced and invented the  भण्डार मार्केट by the merchandise व्यापार through  Dutch West India Company .
The Netherlands is a founding member  of the यूरोपीय संघ , the oecd और the संसार  Trade Organization .
Loyal to the Game is the tenth studio  एल्बम और छठे स्टुडियो  album by Tupac Shakur .
It contains remixes of previously  unreleased म्यूज़िक अंकित by shakur पहले उसके मौत in 1996  .
Released in the United States on December 14 , 2004 ( December 12 in the  संयुक्त किंगडम ) , वफ़ादार to the खेल  was produced by Eminem .
The original panel of The View ; Meredith  vieira , स्टार जोन्स , डिब्बी matenopoulos  and Barbara Walters in 1997 .
The View is an American  बात दिखाएँ ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी कि debuted in 1997  as part of the network 's daytime programming block .
Created by Barbara Walters and Bill  geddie , जो दोनो भी serve as the दिखाएँ 's कार्यपालिका निर्माता , the कार्यक्रम  features a panel of women as co-hosts .
Along with Walters , the current panel  शामिल whoopi गोल्डबर्ग , जो serves as the मॉडरेटर , आनन्द behar ,  Elisabeth Hasselbeck , and Sherri Shepherd .
International  संस्करण of the कार्यक्रम हैं aired  in several countries .
As of the 2012–13 season , its 16th , The View is the  fourth-longest कार्यशील नेशनल दिन बात दिखाएँ in इतिहास , पीछे  The Phil Donahue Show ( 29 ) , the variously-named Live !
programs ( 25 ) ,  और the ओपरा विनफ्रे दिखाएँ ( 25  ) .
Prunus virginiana , commonly called bitter-berry , chokecherry , Virginia bird cherry and western chokecherry ( also black  chokecherry लिये P. virginiana var . demissa ) , is a प्रजाति of बर्ड चेरी ( prunus subgenus padus ) देशी to उत्तर अमेरिका ; the प्राकृतिक ऐतिहासिक  range of P. virginiana includes most of the continent , except for the far north and far south .
Los Angeles  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the प्राथमिक विमानक्षेत्र सेवारत the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल  , the second-most populated metropolitan area in the United States .
It is most often referred to by its  iata विमानक्षेत्र कोड lax , साथ the अक्षर  pronounced individually .
LAX is located in southwestern  लॉस एंजिल्स साथ the प्रशांत coast in the पड़ोस of westchester , इससे the शहर कोर और is the प्राथमिक  airport of Los Angeles World Airports ( LAWA ) , an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports .
In 2011 , LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the world after Hartsfield-Jackson  अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , बीजिंग पूंजी अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , लंदन हीथ्रो विमानक्षेत्र , शिकागो  O'Hare International Airport , and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers .
The airport  holds the अर्जी लिये `` the संसार 's व्यस्ततम उत्पत्ति और गंतव्य  ( O & D ) airport '' in 2011 that involves non-connecting passenger traffic .
It is also the only airport to rank among the top five  u.S. एयरपोर्ट लिये दोनो यात्री और कार्गो ट्रैफ़िक  .
LAX is the busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles  क्षेत्रफल , लकिन अन्य एयरपोर्ट सहित bob आशा विमानक्षेत्र , जॉन वेन विमानक्षेत्र , long बीच विमानक्षेत्र ,  LA/Ontario International Airport , and Palm Springs International Airport also serve the region .
LAX is  भी the व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the वेस्ट coast of the संयुक्त राज्य in शर्तें of उड़ान परिचालन ,  passenger traffic and air cargo activity , leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim `` .
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24 , 1976 ) is an American  फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the डेनवर broncos of the नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) .
He  निभाई लिये the इंडियानापोलिस  Colts for 14 seasons from 1998 to 2011 .
He is the son of  पूर्व एनएफएल क्वार्टरबैक  Archie Manning and an elder brother of New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning .
Manning played college football for the  विश्वविद्यालयों of टेनेसी , अग्रणी the स्वयंसेवक to the 1997 सेक चैंपियनशिप  in his senior season .
However , No . 3 Tennessee lost to the No . 2  नेब्रास्का cornhuskers 42-17 in the नारंगी कटोरी giving नेब्रास्का और tom ओसबोर्न उनके  3rd national championship in 4 years .
He  थी चुनी by the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस साथ the  first overall pick in the 1998 NFL Draft .
From 1998 to 2010 , he led the Colts to eight (  सात afc दक्षिण और एक afc ईस्ट ) प्रभाग championships , दो afc championships ,  and to a Super Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ) .
He has won a record four league most valuable player awards , was the most valuable player of Super Bowl XLI , has been  नामित to बारह प्रो प्याले , रै बारह 4,000-yard गुजर सीज़न , और is the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस ' all-time नेता in गुजर गज (  54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ) .
in 2009 , he थी नामित the बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी in the एनएफएल और फॉक्स खेल साथ साथ खेल illustrated  named him the NFL player of the decade of the 2000s .
In  may 2011 , he underwent गर्दन सर्जरी to alleviate गर्दन पीड़ा और भुजा कमज़ोरी he dealt साथ दौरान the पिछला few सीज़न पहले  signing a five-year , $ 90 million contract extension with the Colts in July 2011 .
Manning had hoped to play in the 2011 season , but in September 2011 , he  underwent a much अधिक गंभीर दूसरी सर्जरी : a स्तर एक सर्वाइकल  fusion procedure .
Manning had never missed an  एनएफएल खेल in उसके करियर , लकिन थी मजबूर  to miss the entire 2011 season .
He was released by the Colts  on कूच 7 , 2012 , और बाद an लगभग two-week काल जहाँ he visited साथ  and worked out for several NFL teams , he signed with the Denver Broncos on March 20 , 2012 .
Manning 's pre-snap routine has earned him the nickname , `` The Sheriff '' and  is एक of the सबसे recognizable और parodied in the  NFL .
The Indianapolis Colts  ' लगभग विशेष उपयोग of the hurry-up ठोकर led to मैनिंग using an सरणी of इशारों और मौखिक  commands to call the play at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle .

Baker Hughes is one of the world 's  largest oilfield सेवाएं कंपनियाँ .
It operates in over 90 countries , providing the oil and gas industry with products and services  लिये खुदाई , गठन मूल्यांकन , पूर्णता , उत्पादन और टंकी  consulting .
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the America Tower  in the अमरीकी सामान्य बीच in neartown  , Houston .
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed when Baker International and  ह्यूजेस औजार कम्पनी मिलाया in 1987  .
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with major offices in Liverpool ,  संयुक्त किंगडम ; सिंगापुर ; दुबई ; a शोध और मेंटेनेंस सुविधा in celle , जर्मनी ; lafayette , louisiana ; ह्यूस्टन , टेक्सास  ; Pescara , Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur , Malaysia .
The company is administered broadly in two hemispheres : the eastern  गोलार्ध साथ पाँच regions ( यूरोपीय , अफ़्रीकी , the मध्य ईस्ट , एशिया प्रशांत और russia/caspian ) और the पश्चिमी  hemisphere with four regions ( Canada , US Land , US Gulf , and Latin America ) .
Each of these regions  is subdivided into  markets .
The United States one- cent coin , commonly known as a  पैनी , is a ईकाई of करेंसी equaling एक one-hundredth of  a United States dollar .
The cent 's  प्रतीक is ¢  .
इसके obverse रै प्रदर्शित the प्रोफ़ाइल of अध्यक्ष  Abraham Lincoln since 1909 , the centennial of his birth .
From 1959 ( the  sesquicentennial of lincoln 's जनम  ) to 2008 , the reverse featured the Lincoln Memorial .
Four different  रिवर्स डिजाइन in 2009 सम्मानित lincoln 's 200th जन्मदिवस  and a new , permanent reverse – the Union Shield – was introduced in 2010 .
The coin  is 0.75 इंच  ( 19.05 mm ) in diameter and 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness .
The U.S. Mint  's आधिकारिक नाम लिये a पैनी is `` '' और the u.S.  Treasury 's official name is `` one cent piece '' .
The colloquial term penny derives from  the अंग्रेजों सिक्का of the वही नाम , the pre-decimal संस्करण of जिससे था a समान मान  .
In American  अंग्रेज़ी , कौड़ी is the बहुवचन रूप , अन्य बहुवचन फ़ॉर्म पेंस और पेशाब  ( standard use in British English ) are not used .
As of 2012 , it costs the U.S. Mint  2.00 सेंट to मेक a cent क्युकी  of the cost of materials and production .
This figure  शामिल the mint’s फिक्स्ड components  for distribution and fabrication , estimated at $ 13 million in FY 2011 .
It also includes Mint overhead allocated  to the पैनी , जिससे थी $ 17.7  million for 2011 .
Fixed costs and overhead would have to be absorbed by other  circulating सिक्के बगैर the पैनी .
The loss in profitability due to producing the  एक cent सिक्का in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये the साल of  2012 was $ 58,000,000 .
This was a slight decrease from 2011  , the साल पहले , जिससे था a उत्पादन  loss of $ 60,200,000 .
or more specifically , are ornamental varieties of domesticated common carp ( Cyprinus  carpio ) कि हैं रखा लिये सजावटी उद्देश्य in बाहरी कोई तालाबों  or water gardens .
Koi varieties are  विशिष्ट by coloration , patterning  , and scalation .
Some of the  प्रमुख रंगों हैं श्वेत , ब्लैक , रेड , पीला ,  blue , and cream .
The most popular category  of कोई is the gosanke , जिससे is बना up of the kohaku , taisho sanshoku  , and Showa Sanshoku varieties .
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over  650,000 कर्मचारी of the संघीय सरकारी , परिचय 5,000 कर्मचारी of the ज़िला of कोलंबिया  , and a few hundred private sector employees , mostly in and around federal facilities .
AFGE is the largest union for civilian , non- postal federal employees and the largest union  लिये ज़िला of कोलंबिया कर्मचारी जो रपट सीधे to the महापौर ( i.e. , बाहर  of D.C. public schools ) .
It is  संबद्ध साथ the afl-cio .

Green  : a spore tetrad  .
ब्लू : a spore bearing a trilete  mark – the -shaped scar .
