The evolution of plants has resulted in  increasing स्तर of जटिलता , इससे the earliest algal  mats , through bryophytes , lycopods , ferns to the complex gymnosperms and angiosperms of today .
While many of the groups  जिससे appeared पहले continue to thrive , विशेषकर in the environments  in which they evolved , for a time each new grade of organisation became more `` successful '' than its predecessors .
In the Ordovician period , around ,  the पहला जमीन पौधे appeared  .
These  began to diversify in the लेट सिल्यूरियन काल , around , और the परिणाम of उनके diversification  are displayed in remarkable detail in an early Devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert .
इस chert preserved जल्दी  plants in cellular detail , petrified in volcanic springs .
By the middle of the Devonian Period , most of the features recognised in plants today are present , including roots , leaves  और द्वितीयक लकडी ; और , by लेट devonian टाइम्स , बीज था विकसित  .
Late Devonian plants had thereby reached a  उपाधि of परिष्कार कि अनुमत उन्हें  to form forests of tall trees .
Evolutionary innovation  जारी into the carboniferous काल और is स्टिल  ongoing today .
Most plant groups were relatively  unscathed by the permo-triassic extinction इवेंट  , although the structures of communities changed .
This may have set the scene  लिये the रूप of the flowering पौधे in the triassic ( ~ ) , और  their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene .
The latest major group of plants to evolve were the grasses ,  जिससे became महत्वपूर्ण in the mid-paleogene  , from around .
The grasses , as well as many  अन्य समूह , विकसित नई mechanisms of चयापचय to जीवित the कम और  warm , dry conditions of the tropics over the last .
The winning Super Bowl team  receives the विंस लोम्बार्डी  Trophy .
The Super Bowl is  an सालाना अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खेल कि determines the चैंपियन of  the National Football League ( NFL ) .
The contest is  आयोजित in an अमरीकी नगर कि is चुनी तीन to चार सालो  beforehand , usually in warm-weather or domed sites .
Since 1971 , the winner of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) Championship Game has faced  the विजेता of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) चैंपियनशिप खेल  in the culmination of the NFL playoffs .
Before the 1970 merger between the  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( afl ) और the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल  ) , the two leagues met in four such contests .
the पहला दो यहूद ज्ञात as the `` afl-nfl  World Championship Game . ''
Super  कटोरी iii in 1969 थी the पहला ऐसे खेल कि carried the `` सुपर कटोरी ''  moniker , the names `` Super Bowl I `` and `` Super Bowl II `` were retroactively applied to the first two games .
The NFC /NFL leads in Super  कटोरी विन्स साथ 25 , जबकि the afc /afL  has won 22 .
Eighteen different franchises , including teams that  relocated to another  city , have won the Super Bowl .
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the  सबसे सुपर प्याले साथ छह championships ( रिकार्ड 6–2 ) , जबकि दोनो the डलास cowboys और सैन फ्रांसिस्को  49ers have five wins each ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ) .
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the most Super Bowl  दिखावे साथ आठ , जबकि the भैंस बिल्स have the सबसे लगातार  appearances with four losses in a row from 1990 to 1993 .
The  नई इंग्लैण्ड देशप्रेमी , डेनवर broncos और मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स  have also lost a record four Super Bowls .
Buffalo and Minnesota are both 0–4  , डेनवर is 2–4 और नई इंग्लैण्ड is 3–4  .
The record for consecutive wins is two and is shared by seven franchises : the 1966-67 Green Bay Packers , the 1972-73 Miami Dolphins , the  1974-75 और 1978-79 पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स ( the तभी टोली to accomplish इस feat twice ) , the 1988-89 सैन  Francisco 49ers , the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys , the 1997-98 Denver Broncos , and the 2003-04 New England Patriots .
The only team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and  no नुकसान is the बाल्टीमोर ravens , जो in जीतना सुपर कटोरी xlvii  unseated and replaced the 49ers in that position .
Four current NFL teams have never  appeared in a सुपर कटोरी , सहित मताधिकार relocations और renaming : the क्लीवलैंड भूरा , डेट्रॉयट शेर , jacksonville jaguars , और  Houston Texans , though both the Browns and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl .
Martin County is a county located in the  u.S. राज्य of टेक्सास .
As of the  2010 जनसांख्यिकी  , its population was 4,799 .
Its  सीट is stanton  .
The  काउंटी is नामित लिये wylie मार्टिन  , an early settler .
Martin County is one of 30 prohibition  , or entirely शुष्क , काउंटी in the राज्य  of Texas .
Alkaline  phosphatase ( alp , alkp ) ( ) is a hydrolase एंजाइम जिम्मेदार लिये निकालना फास्फेट  groups from many types of molecules , including nucleotides , proteins , and alkaloids .
the प्रक्रम of निकालना the फास्फेट  group is called dephosphorylation .
As  the नाम suggests , क्षारीय phosphatases हैं सबसे  effective in an alkaline environment .
It is sometimes used  synonymously as मौलिक phosphatase .
triticale ( × triticosecale ) , ( ) is a संकर of गेहूं ( triticum ) और rye ( secale  ) first bred in laboratories during the late 19th century .
The grain was originally  करवाया in स्कॉटलैंड और स्वीडन  .
Commercially available triticale is almost always a second generation hybrid , i.e. , a cross between two  kinds of प्राथमिक ( पहला क्रॉस ) triticales .
As a rule , triticale combines  the उपज संभावित और अनाज विशेषता of गेहूं साथ the  disease and environmental tolerance ( including soil conditions ) of rye .
Only  recently रै it महरूम विकसित into  a commercially viable crop .
Depending on the cultivar ,  triticale can अधिक or कम resemble  either of its parents .
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder , although some  triticale-based भोजन can be खरीदा at स्वास्थ्य खाना स्टोर्स  or are to be found in some breakfast cereals .
When  क्रासिंग गेहूं और rye , गेहूं is प्रयुक्त as the मादा जनक  and rye as the male parent ( pollen donor ) .
The resulting hybrid is  बंध्य , और जरूर be treated साथ colchicine to induce polyploidy  and thus the ability to reproduce itself .
The primary producers of  triticale हैं कैंडल , जर्मनी , फ़्रांस , बेलारूस और  Australia .
In 2009 , according to the Food and Agriculture Organization  ( fao ) , 15.0 लाख टन यहूद harvested in  29 countries across the world .
The triticale hybrids are all  amphidiploid , जिससे अर्थात् the संयंत्र is द्विगुणित लिये दो genomes निकला इससे अलग  species .
In  अन्य शब्द , triticale  is an allotetraploid .
In earlier years ,  सबसे कार्य थी किया on octoploid triticale  .
अलग ploidy स्तर have महरूम निर्मित  and evaluated over time .
The tetraploids showed little promise , but hexaploid triticale was  कामयाब पर्याप्त to ढूँढें वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग  .
The  cimmyt triticale सुधार कार्यक्रम चाही  to improve food production and nutrition in developing countries .
triticale रै संभावित in the उत्पादन of ब्रैड और अन्य  food products , such as cookies , pasta , pizza dough and breakfast cereals .
The protein content  is उच्चतर than कि of गेहूं , हालांकि  the glutenin fraction is less .
The  अनाज रै भी महरूम stated to have उच्चतर  levels of lysine than wheat .
Assuming increased acceptance , the milling  उद्योग होगा have to adapt to triticale , as the मिलिंग तकनीकों  employed for wheat are unsuited to triticale .
Sell et al .  मिला triticale could be प्रयुक्त as a फीड अनाज , और बाद  research found its starch was particularly readily digested .
As a feed grain ,  triticale is already खूब स्थापित और of ऊँची  economic importance .
It has received attention as a  संभावित उर्जा क्रॉप , और शोध is फिलहाल होने conducted on the उपयोग of the  crop 's biomass in bioethanol production .
`` Puff , the Magic Dragon  '' is a सोंग लिखा by लियोनार्ड lipton और पीटर yarrow  , and made popular by Yarrow 's group Peter , Paul and Mary in a 1963 recording .
The  सोंग हासिल ग्रेट  popularity .
A college football national championship in the highest level of collegiate play in the United States , currently the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ) Division I Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS  ) , is a नामांकन awarded annually by विभिन्न third-party संगठन to उनके चयन  ( s ) of the best college football team ( s ) .
Division I FBS ( formerly Division  i-a ) फ़ुटबॉल is the तभी ncaa खेल in जिससे a वार्षिक चैंपियन is नहीं संकल्पित by an  NCAA sanctioned championship event .
Because the championship  टोली is नहीं संकल्पित by a ncaa चैंपियनशिप or टूर्नामेंट इवेंट , it is sometimes unofficially referred  to as a `` mythical national championship `` .
Since the NCAA , the sport 's governing body , does not  determine or घोषित a नेशनल चैंपियन in इस फ़ील्ड  , determination of such has often engendered controversy .
A championship team is independently declared by various  individuals और संगठन , प्रायः referred to as `` चयनकर्ताओं  '' .
These choices are sometimes  at हालात साथ  each other .
While the NCAA has never  officially endorsed an सालाना चैंपियनशिप टोली , it रै प्रलेखित the चुनाव of  several selectors in the official NCAA Football Bowl Subdivision Records .
In addition , various third party analysts have  independently प्रकाशित उनके अपना सूचियाँ of कया वे have संकल्पित  to be the most legitimate selections for each season .
These are also often at odds with each other as well as  व्यक्तिगत स्कूल 's दावा on नेशनल championships , जिससे , लिये कोई particular ऋतु  , may or may not correlate to the selections published elsewhere .
Currently , two  widely पहचाना नेशनल champions चयनकर्ताओं हैं the संबद्ध दबायें , जिससे conducts a पोल of फ़ुटबॉल sportswriters , और the यूएसए आज कोच ' पोल , a पोल of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच  Association active coaches that is contractually obligated to name the winner of the Bowl Championship Series championship game as its national champion .
The Milwaukee  ब्रेवर्स हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित  in Milwaukee , Wisconsin .
The team is a member of the Central Division of Major League  बेसबॉल 's नेशनल लीग और plays इसके घर खेल  at Miller Park .
The team is so named because of the city 's  संघ साथ the brewing उद्योग  .
The Washington Nationals  हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल  team based in Washington , D.C .
The Nationals are a member of the East Division  of the नेशनल लीग of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल  ( MLB ) .
The team 's home ballpark is  नागरिकों पार्क , स्तिथ on दक्षिण कैपिटल गली in southeast d.C.  , near the Anacostia River .
The park opened in 2008 ,  replacing rfk स्टेडियम , the टोली 's घर इससे  2005 to 2007 .
The  नागरिकों ' नाम गर्भाशयी इससे the पूर्व वॉशिंगटन  baseball team that had the same name ( used interchangeably with Senators ) .
Their nickname is  `` the nats '' —a shortened  version that was also used by the old D.C. teams .
an विस्तार मताधिकार , the क्लबों थी संस्थापित in as the मॉन्ट्रियल  Expos , the first major league team in Canada .
वे यहूद आधारित in मॉन्ट्रियल , क्यूबेक , और निभाई उनके घर खेल at  Jarry Park Stadium and later in Olympic Stadium .
In , the Expos won a division  चैंपियनशिप , जीती उनके first-ever playoff श्रेणी by defeating the फिलाडेल्फिया फ़िलीज़ , 3–2 , और उन्नत to the नेशनल लीग चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी , जहाँ वे होता go on to खोना to the  Los Angeles Dodgers , 3–2 , in their only postseason appearance during the strike-shortened season .
The Expos had their highest winning  प्रतिशत in the strike-shortened ऋतु of , जब the  team had the best record in baseball .
The team 's  subsequent shedding of खिलाड़ी caused प्रशंसक ब्याज  to drop off .
After the 2001 season , MLB considered revoking the team 's franchise ,  साथ साथ either the मिनेसोटा जुड़वा or the tampa खाड़ी शैतान  Rays .
After being purchased by MLB in 2002 , the team was moved before the season to Washington and renamed the Nationals , the first relocation  चूंकि the दूसरी वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों स्थानांतरित to आर्लिंगटन , टेक्सास , और  became the Texas Rangers in .
The Nationals are one of two MLB franchises , and the only one in the National  लीग , कि रै never निभाई in a संसार श्रेणी ( the सिएटल  Mariners are the other ) .
A contingent fee ( in the United States ) or conditional fee ( in England and Wales ) is any fee for  सेवाएं provided जहाँ the शुल्क is देय तभी if  there is a favourable result .
In the law , it is defined as a `` fee charged for  a वकील 's सेवाएं तभी if the मुकदमा is कामयाब or is favorably settled  out of court ... .
Contingent fees are usually  गणना as a प्रतिशत of the क्लाएंट 's जाल  recovery . ''
In the English legal system , it is  generally referred to  as no win no fee .
A conditional fee  अनुबंध between a विधि कड़  and a client .
The usual form of this  अनुबंध is कि the solicitor होगा लो a विधि मामला on  the understanding that if lost , no payment is made .
However , if the case is won , the  वकील होगा be हकदार to the सामान्य  fee based on hourly billing , plus a success fee .
The success fee in  इंग्लैण्ड जरूर be as a प्रतिशत no वृहद than 100  % of the normal fee .
This contrasts with the contingency fee in the US , which gives the successful  attorney a प्रतिशत of the क्षतिपूर्ति awarded  in favor of his client .
This makes it  easier लिये the ग़रीब to pursue उनके सिविल अधिकारों चूंकि वरना  , to sue someone for a tort , one must first be wealthy enough to pursue such litigation in the first place .
However , because of the high risk , few attorneys will take  मामले on a आकस्मिकता आधार जबतक वे महसूस the मामला रै  good merit .
According to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert Kritzer , contingent fees were allowed as of that year in the following  देशों : ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ब्राज़ील , कनाडा , the डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र , फ़्रांस , यूनानियों ,  Ireland , Japan , New Zealand , the United Kingdom and the United States .
वे हैं भी अनुमत in निजी  injury actions in Lithuania .
Recently , they  have महरूम अनुमत in बेल्जियम  as well .
A Convocation ( Latin 'calling together ' ,  translating the यूनानी ecclesia ) is a समूह of लोगों formally  assembled for a special purpose .
Sons of  अराजकता is a टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by कर्ट sutter परिचय the जीवनदान of a close-knit  outlaw motorcycle club operating in Charming , a fictional town in California 's Central Valley .
The show  centers on समर्थक जैक्सन `` जैक्स '' teller ( चार्ली hunnam ) , the then-vice  president of the club , who begins questioning the club and himself .
Sons of Anarchy premiered on  सितंबर 3 , 2008 , on केबल  network FX .
The third season of the series attracted an  औसत of 4.9 लाख दर्शक प्रति सप्ताह , बनाना it fx 's उच्चतम रेटेड श्रेणी कभी , surpassing  FX 's other hits The Shield , Nip/Tuck , and Rescue Me .
On February 3 , 2012 , Sons of Anarchy  थी नवीनीकृत लिये दो अतिरिक्त सीज़न  , a fifth and a sixth .
Those involved in the production of the series imply that a seventh  और फाइनल ऋतु is निर्माता कर्ट sutter 's  plan .
The Grímsvötn  sub-glacial झीलों ( ; vötn = `` waters '' , एकवचन : ) और the  volcano of the same name are in South-East Iceland .
They are in the  हाइलैंड्स of आइसलैंड at the  northwestern side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap .
The lakes  हैं at , at an  elevation of .
Beneath the lakes is  the मैग्मा कक्ष of the grímsvötn  volcano .
Grímsvötn  is a basaltic ज्वालामुखी जिससे रै the उच्चतम फटना आवृत्ति of  all the volcanoes in Iceland and has a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system .
The massive  climate-impacting laki फिशर फटना of 1783–1784 थी a भाग  of the same fissure system .
Grímsvötn was erupting at the same  समय as laki दौरान 1783 , लकिन जारी to  erupt until 1785 .
Because most of the volcano lies underneath  vatnajökull , सबसे of इसके eruptions have महरूम subglacial और the बातचीत of मैग्मा और meltwater  from the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity .
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 UTC , an eruption began , with high plumes accompanied by multiple earthquakes , resulting  in रद्दीकरण of 900 फ़्लाइट in आइसलैंड , और in the संयुक्त किंगडम , ग्रीनलैंड , जर्मनी , आयरलैंड और नार्वे  on 22–25 May .
Until 25 May the eruption scale had  महरूम larger than कि of the 2010  eruption of Eyjafjallajökull .
The eruption stopped at  02:40 utc on 25 may 2011 , हालांकि वहीँ थी कुछ विस्फोटक कार्यकलाप इससे the  tephra vents affecting only the area around the crater .
Vetting is the process of performing a background check  on किसी पहले offering उन्हें  employment , conferring an award , etc .
A prospective person or project  may be vetted पहले बनाना a भर्ती निर्णय  .
In addition , in intelligence gathering , assets  हैं vetted to determine उनके उपयोगिता  .

Caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's Entertainment from 1995 to 2010 ) is an American public gaming corporation  कि owns और operates over 50 कसीनो , होटल , और सात गोल्फ़  courses under several brands .
The company , based in Paradise , Nevada , is the largest gaming company  in the संसार , साथ सालाना revenues of $  8.9 billion ( 2010 ) .
Caesars is a public company , with a joint venture of  अपोलो वैश्विक प्रबन्धन और टेक्सास प्रशांत समूह ownig a विशाल portion of the स्टेक और blackstone समूह भी  holding a significant stake .
The name change from `` Harrah 's Entertainment Inc.  '' to `` caesars entertainment निगम '' थी बना  official on November 23 , 2010 .
Harrah 's remains a  कुंजी ब्रांड in the कम्पनी  .
On  नवम्बर 5 , 2010 , harrah 's घोषित an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering of 31,250,000  shares but retracted this offering on November 19 .
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a person who is not a Canadian  नागरिक लकिन जो रै महरूम granted अनुमति to सजीव और कार्य in कनाडा बगैर कोई  time limit on his or her stay .
A permanent resident must  सजीव in कनाडा लिये दो सालो आउट  of every five or risk losing that status .
A Permanent Resident holds many of the same rights and responsibilities as a Canadian citizen , among others the right to work for any enterprise as well as  लिये the संघीय or प्रांतीय सरकारी ( अंतर्गत प्रतिबंध  of access rights to certain regulated professions ) .
the प्रमुख मतभेद हैं  that residents can not :
vote in  चुनावों in कनाडा  ;
run for  निर्वाचित दफ्तर  ;
hold  कनाडाई passports  ;
In addition , they may be  अनुमत to जुड़ें कनाडा 's हथियारबंद शक्तियां  if the national interest would not be prejudiced .
Permanent residents  भी रिस्क प्रत्यर्पण लिये गंभीर अपराधों  committed while resident in Canada .
Permanent residents may  लागू लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता बाद तीन सालो in कनाडा  ; however this is not mandatory .
Erica Kane is a fictional character  इससे the अमरीकी  ABC Daytime soap opera All My Children .
The character was portrayed by actress Susan Lucci from her debut on January 16 , 1970 until  the पिछला ब्रॉडकास्ट टेलीविज़न एपीसोड aired on सितंबर  23 , 2011 .
On February 11 , 2013 , it was  घोषित कि lucci होगा guest-star on the prospect पार्क 's  continuation of All My Children .
In  the u.S. , एरिका is माना  to be the most popular character in soap opera history .
Regarding the North-American  मार्केट , tv मार्गदर्शिका काल्स उसके `` unequivocally the सबसे प्रसिद्ध साबुन ओपेरा अक्षर in the इतिहास  of daytime TV '' , and included her in their 2013 list of The 60 Nastiest Villains of All Time .
A graph of the US CPI  इससे 1913 to 2006 ( in ब्लू ) , और इसके  percent annual change ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI ) measures changes in the  दाम स्तर of a मार्केट बास्केट of उपभोक्ता goods  and services purchased by households .
The CPI in the United States is defined by the Bureau of Labor Statistics as `` a measure of the average change over  समय in the कीमतें सशुल्क by शहरी उपभोक्ता लिये a मार्केट बास्केट  of consumer goods and services . ''
The CPI is a statistical  अनुमान constructed using the कीमतें of a नमूना of प्रतिनिधि वस्तुएं  whose prices are collected periodically .
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are  computed लिये अलग श्रेणी और sub-categories of goods और सेवाएं , होने संयुक्त to उपज the overall अनुक्रमणिका  with weights reflecting their shares in the total of the consumer expenditures covered by the index .
It is one of several  दाम indices गणना by सबसे नेशनल  statistical agencies .
The annual  प्रतिशत बदलें in a cpi is प्रयुक्त as a  measure of inflation .
A CPI can be used to index ( i.e. , adjust for the effect of inflation )  the रियल मान of मजदूरी , salaries , pensions , लिये regulating कीमतें और लिये deflating मौद्रिक magnitudes to दिखाएँ  changes in real values .
In most countries , the CPI is , along  साथ the जनसांख्यिकी जनसांख्यिकी और the यूएसए नेशनल आय और उत्पाद खाते , एक of  the most closely watched national economic statistics .
Knocking on wood , or to touch wood , refers to the  apotropaic परंपरा in पश्चिमी लोकगीत of वस्तुतः touching/knocking on लकडी , or merely stating कि तुम हैं doing or intend वही  , in order to avoid `` tempting fate `` after making a favourable observation , a boast , or declaration concerning one 's own death .
रॉकर भुजा
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine of automotive , marine ,  मोटरसाइकिल और प्रत्यागमनी विमानन इंजन , the रॉकर भुजा is an oscillating लीवर कि conveys रेडियल गति इससे the कैम पालि  into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it .
One  समाप्त is उठाया और lowered by a घूर्णन पालि of the camshaft  ( either directly or via a tappet ( lifter ) and pushrod ) while the other end acts on the valve stem .
When the camshaft lobe raises the outside of the arm , the inside  दबाता bas on the वाल्व स्टेम  , opening the valve .
When the outside of the  भुजा is permitted to वापसी due to the camshafts रोटेशन , the  inside rises , allowing the valve spring to close the valve .
The  ड्राइव  cam is driven by the camshaft .
This pushes the rocker arm up and down about the  trunnion pin or रॉकर शाफ्ट  .
Friction may be reduced at the  पाइंट of सम्पर्क साथ the वाल्व स्टेम by a रोलर कैम अनुसरणकर्ता  .
A similar arrangement transfers the motion  via another रोलर कैम अनुसरणकर्ता to a दूसरी रॉकर  arm .
This rotates  परिचय the रॉकर शाफ्ट , और हस्तांतरण  the motion via a tappet to the poppet valve .
In this case this opens the  सेवन वाल्व to the बेलन सिर  .
The effective leverage of the arm ( and thus the force it can exert on the valve stem ) is determined by the  रॉकर भुजा अनुपात , the अनुपात of the अलहदा इससे the रॉकर भुजा 's बीच  of rotation to the tip divided by the distance from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod .
Current automotive design favors  रॉकर भुजा ratios of परिचय 1.5:1 to 1.8:1  .
However , in the past  छोटी धनात्मक ratios ( the वाल्व लिफ्ट is वृहद than the कैम लिफ्ट ) और भी  negative ratios ( valve lift smaller than the cam lift ) have been used .
Many pre-WW2 engines  उपयोग 1:1 ( न्यूट्रल ) ratios  .
For car  इंजन the रॉकर बाहें हैं generally स्टील stampings , providing  a reasonable balance of strength , weight and economical cost .
Because the rocker arms are , in part ,  प्रत्यागमनी वज़न , excessive द्रव्यमान विशेषकर at the लीवर ends हद the इंजन 's क्षमता to पहुँचें ऊँची ऑपरेटिंग  speeds .
`` The Night  the लाइट्स गई आउट in जॉर्जिया '' is a दक्षिणी गोथिक सोंग लिखा by songwriter  Bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by his then-wife Vicki Lawrence .
Reba  mcentire बाद covered it  in 1991 .
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western Studios on Sunset in Hollywood and released less than two weeks later in November 1972 , the song centers around the older  bhai of the narrator , falsely convicted of और चलाया लिये a हत्या , जिससे the narrator herself रै वचनबद्ध  .
In postal mail , a  वापसी पता is an सुस्पष्ट समावेश of the पता of the व्यक्ति  sending the message .
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized  intermediaries ) साथ a अर्थात् to determine कैसा to respond to the  sender of the message if needed .
The return address need not include a sender 's name , but should include address or  p.o . बक्सा विवरण in the वही रास्ता as the डिलीवरी  address should .
In some  देशों , the वापसी पता is conventionally स्तिथ  in the upper left hand corner of the envelope , card , or label .
In the United Kingdom , the return address is usually placed on  the रिवर्स of the लिफाफा  , near the top .
व्यवसायों प्रायः उपयोग लिफाफे  preprinted with a return address .
Many  individuals have चादरें of चिपकने लेबल्स  preprinted with their home address to affix to their correspondence .
Charities  sometimes शामिल ऐसे  sheets in mailshots .
Rolls of Return Address Labels can be purchased from companies that sell personalized  लेबल्स to provide individuals an आसान रास्ता to छिलके और स्टिक वापसी पता लेबल्स  to their envelopes .
the वापसी पता  is not required on postal mail .
However , lack of a return address  रोकता the डाक सेवा इससे होने समर्थ to वापसी the मद if it proves undeliverable ; ऐसे  as from damage , postage due , or invalid destination .
ऐसे मेल may यूँ  become dead letter mail .
Should the return address be of a different state or country , the  मेल may be routed through कि स्थान लिये आसानी  of return .
A nerve guidance  conduit ( भी referred to as an कृत्रिम तंत्रिका conduit or कृत्रिम तंत्रिका graft , as opposed  to an autograft ) is an artificial means of guiding axonal regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration and is one of several clinical treatments for nerve injuries .
When direct  suturing of the दो आउट of a severed तंत्रिका can नहीं be संपन्नता बगैर टेंशन , the मानक नैदानिक  treatment for peripheral nerve injuries is autologous nerve grafting .
Due to the limited availability of donor tissue and functional recovery in autologous nerve grafting , neural  ऊतक अभियान्त्रिकी शोध रै केन्द्रित on the विकास of bioartificial तंत्रिका मार्गदर्शन conduits as an वैकल्पिक उपचार  , especially for large defects .
Similar techniques are also being explored for  तंत्रिका मरम्मत in the स्पाइनल cord लकिन तंत्रिका regeneration in the सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली मुद्राएँ a वृहद  challenge because its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their native environment .
The creation of artificial  conduits is भी ज्ञात as entubulation क्युकी the तंत्रिका ends  and intervening gap are enclosed within a tube composed of biological or synthetic materials .
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube , synthetic tube or tissue-engineered conduit , it should facilitate neurotropic and neurotrophic communication between the proximal and distal  ends of the तंत्रिका गैप , ब्लाक बाह्य inhibitory कारकों , और provide a शारीरिक मार्गदर्शन लिये axonal regrowth  .
The most basic  उद्देश्य of a तंत्रिका मार्गदर्शन conduit is to combine शारीरिक ,  chemical , and biological cues under conditions that will foster tissue formation .
Materials that have been  प्रयुक्त to मेक biologic tubes शामिल रक्त बरतन और skeletal मांसपेशियां , जबकि nonabsorbable  and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have been made from silicone and polyglycolide respectively .
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a combination of many elements : scaffold structure ,  scaffold सामग्री , सेल्यूलर therapies , neurotrophic कारकों और biomimetic सामग्री .
The  चुनाव of जिससे शारीरिक , रासायनिक और biological cues to उपयोग is आधारित on the गुण of the तंत्रिका पर्यावरण  , which is critical in creating the most desirable environment for axon regeneration .
The factors  कि कंट्रोल सामग्री चयन शामिल biocompatibility  , biodegradability , mechanical integrity , controllability during nerve growth , implantation and sterilization .
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality television series produced by RDF USA ( later Zodiak USA ) and Richard Dominick Productions for truTV about the  day-to-day परिचालन of अमरीकी आभूषण और ऋण , a family-owned साहूकार दूकान स्तिथ at 20450 greenfield सड़क , between 8 मील सड़क और the  John C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit , Michigan .
The series premiered  on अगस्त 16 , 2010 , delivering दो लाख दर्शक , सेटिंग  a record as truTV 's most-watched series premiere ever .
amoxicillin  BP
Amoxicillin ( INN ) , formerly  amoxycillin ( बैन ) , और abbreviated amox , is a moderate-spectrum , bacteriolytic  , β-lactam antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms .
It is usually the drug of choice within the class because  it is बेहतर अवशोषित , following मौखिक प्रशासन  , than other β-lactam antibiotics .
Amoxicillin is one of  the सबसे आम एंटीबायोटिक  prescribed for children .
the ड्रग became उपलब्धियाँ  in 1972 .
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase  -producing जीवाणु , जिससे हैं resistant to a व्यापक वर्णक्रम  of β-lactam antibiotics , such as penicillin .
For this reason , it is  प्रायः संयुक्त साथ clavulanic एसिड , a β-lactamase  inhibitor .
This increases effectiveness by  reducing इसके susceptibility to β-lactamase  resistance .
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27 , 1908 – January 22 ,  1973 ) , प्रायः referred to as lbj , थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ) , a स्थिति he assumed बाद उसके  service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is one of only four people who served in all four elected federal  कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : प्रतिनिधि , सीनेटर  , Vice President , and President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as a United States  प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961 , सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त राज्य  Senate Majority Leader , two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After campaigning  unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960 , जॉनसन थी पूछा by जॉन F.  Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the  हत्या of जॉन F. कैनेडी on नवम्बर 22 , 1963 , समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही  , winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President , he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation  कि शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों , पब्लिक प्रसारण , medicare , medicaid , पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा , सहायता to शिक्षा ,  and his `` War on Poverty . ''
जॉनसन थी प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार  , '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated  अमरीकी भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध , इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों  in early 1968 , as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar movement  आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses  in the U.S. and abroad .
Summer riots  broke आउट in सबसे प्रमुख शहरों बाद 1965 , और अपराधों  rates soared , as his opponents raised demands for `` law and order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions  , और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर  primary , he ended his bid for reelection .
रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to  succeed him .
Historians argue  कि जॉनसन 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the  peak of modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era .
Johnson is ranked favorably by  कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी of उसके घरेलू नीतियों  .
The Big Bang Theory  डाल at कॉमिक कॉन 2009 , इससे बाएँ : कुणाल  Nayyar , Simon Helberg , Kaley Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The  बिग बंग सिद्धान्त , निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक lorre  and Bill Prady , premiered on CBS on September 24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter , two Caltech physicists ; Penny , a waitress and aspiring  अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान आरपार the हॉल ; और लियोनार्ड और शेल्डन 's मित्रों और co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर हावर्ड wolowitz ,  and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ) , a physicist colleague , and , at different times , a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , a  microbiologist , हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी , और पूर्व part-time वेट्रेस alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( ऋतु 3 अतिथि ; ऋतु 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ) , जो joins the समूह बाद होने matched to शेल्डन on a डेटिंग जालस्थल ; और कॉमिक किताब store-owner , स्टुअर्ट खिलते ( सीज़न 2–5 पुनरावर्ती  ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The show also features numerous  supporting वर्ण , प्रत्येक of जिसको plays a prominent भूमिका in  a small group of episodes .
The American Civil  युद्ध ( acw ) , भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ) , थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त  States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the  एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories  .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four  सालो of खूनी कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the  South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham  lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य  ' territories .
Lincoln won ,  लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861  , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President  जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession  as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address  घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं  initiate civil war .
Eight remaining  स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत  calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized  numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed  by the Confederacy .
A Peace  सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह  , and both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European  देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना  the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on  अप्रैल 12 , 1861 , जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी  fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln  पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन , चार  more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the  किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी  that crippled the southern economy .
the पूर्वी थिएटर थी inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862  confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य  ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the  emancipation उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी  a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862  the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at  the Mississippi River .
in 1863 , रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion  north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S.  ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना in 1864 .
in the पश्चिमी थिएटर , विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट  to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack  the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the  Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The  defending confederate फौज विफल , अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट  at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil  युद्ध थी एक of the earliest  true industrial wars .
railroads , the टेलीग्राफ , steamships  , and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The  mobilization of civilian कारखानों , खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन  and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting in  the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined  number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at  टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी  white males aged 18–40 .
Human evolution refers to the evolutionary process leading up to  the रूप of आधुनिक  humans .
While it began with the last common ancestor of all life , the topic usually covers only the evolutionary history of primates , in particular the genus Homo , and the  emergence of होमो sapiens as a पृथक प्रजाति of hominids ( or `` ग्रेट apes ''  ) .
The study of human evolution involves many  वैज्ञानिक disciplines , सहित शारीरिक मानवशास्त्र , primatology , पुरातत्व , भाषाविज्ञान  , evolutionary psychology , embryology and genetics .
According to  जेनेटिक अध्ययन , primates diverged इससे अन्य स्तनधारियों परिचय  in the Late Cretaceous period , and the earliest fossils appear in the Paleocene , around .
The family  मानवनुमा diverged इससे the hylobatidae ( गिबन ) परिवार  15-20 million years ago , and around , the Ponginae ( orangutans ) , diverged from the Hominidae family .
Bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin line , and the earliest bipedal Hominin  is माना to be either sahelanthropus or orrorin , साथ ardipithecus , a पूरा  bipedal , coming somewhat later .
The gorilla and chimpanzee diverged around the same time ,  परिचय 4-6 लाख सालो पहले , और  either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin may be our last shared ancestor with them .
The early bipedals  आखिरकार विकसित into the australopithecines  and later the genus Homo .
The earliest documented members of the genus Homo are Homo habilis which  विकसित around ; the earliest प्रजाति लिये जिससे वहीँ is  positive evidence of use of stone tools .
The brains of these early hominins  यहूद परिचय the वही आकार  as that of a chimpanzee .
During the  अगला लाख सालो a प्रक्रम of encephalization began , और  with the arrival of Homo erectus in the fossil record , cranial capacity had doubled to 850 cm3 .
Homo erectus and Homo ergaster were the first of the hominina to leave Africa , and these species spread  through अफ़्रीकी , एशिया , और यूरोपीय between .
It is believed that these species were  the पहला to उपयोग आग और जटिल टूल्स  .
According to the Recent African  ancestry सिद्धान्त , आधुनिक इंसानो विकसित in अफ़्रीकी संभवतः इससे होमो heidelbergensis , होमो rhodesiensis or होमो antecessor और migrated आउट of the महाद्वीप  some 50,000 to 100,000 years ago , replacing local populations of Homo erectus , Homo denisova , Homo floresiensis and Homo neanderthalensis .
archaic होमो sapiens , the forerunner of  anatomically modern humans , evolved between 400,000 and 250,000 years ago .
Recent DNA evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are present among all non-African populations , and Neanderthals and other  hominids , ऐसे as denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of उनके genome to present-day इंसानs. < संदर्भ name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > anatomically आधुनिक इंसानो विकसित इससे archaic होमो sapiens in the  Middle Paleolithic , about 200,000 years ago .
The transition to behavioral modernity with the development of symbolic culture , language , and  specialized lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000 सालो पहले according to अनेक विज्ञानियों हालांकि कुछ सुझाएँ  a gradual change in behavior over a longer time span .
Lisa Cuddy ,  m.d . , is a fictional अक्षर on the  Fox network medical drama House .
She is  portrayed  by Lisa Edelstein .
Cuddy was the Dean of Medicine and hospital administrator of the fictional  princeton-plainsboro शिक्षण हॉस्पिटल in  New Jersey .
She also becomes  हाउस 's प्रेम ब्याज through the सालो  to start a relationship with him in season seven .
Cuddy  छोड़ो उसके जॉब बाद the कार्यक्रम of ऋतु सात 's  finale `` Moving On `` .
Track and  फ़ील्ड is a खेल comprising विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी एथलेटिक  contests based on running , jumping , and throwing .
The name of the sport derives from the  प्रतियोगिता स्थान : a स्टेडियम साथ an ओवल कार्यशील track around  a grass field .
The throwing and  कूद कार्यक्रम generally लो प्लेस  in the central enclosed area .
Track and field falls under the umbrella sport of athletics , which also  शामिल सड़क कार्यशील , क्रॉस देश कार्यशील ,  and race walking .
The two most  prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय track और फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं हैं आयोजित अंतर्गत the ध्वज of एथलेटिक्स : the एथलेटिक्स  competition at the Olympic Games and the IAAF World Championships in Athletics .
The International Association of Athletics  federations is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय शासी देह लिये track और फ़ील्ड  .
Track and field  कार्यक्रम हैं generally व्यक्तिगत खेल साथ  athletes challenging each other to decide a single victor .
The racing events are won by the athlete with the fastest time , while the jumping and throwing  कार्यक्रम हैं जीती by the खिलाड़ी जो रै हासिल the महानतम अलहदा or ऊँचाई  in the contest .
The running events are  categorised as sprints , मध्य और long-distance  events , relays , and hurdling .
Regular jumping events include long jump , triple jump  , ऊँची जम्प और ध्रुव वॉल्ट , जबकि the सबसे आम फेंकना  events are shot put , javelin , discus and hammer .
There are also `` combined  कार्यक्रम '' , ऐसे as heptathlon और decathlon , in जिससे एथलीट compete in a क्रमांक  of the above events .
Records are kept  of the बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन in विशिष्ट कार्यक्रम , at संसार  and national levels , right down to a personal level .
however , if एथलीट हैं deemed to have violated the इवेंट 's नियम or regulations  , they are disqualified from the competition and their marks are erased .
In North America , the term track and field may be  प्रयुक्त to refer to एथलेटिक्स in सामान्य , बल्कि than specifically track  and field events .
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ) , codenamed Operation  मरुस्थल तूफ़ान ( 17 जनवरी 1991 – 28 फ़रवरी 1991 ) थी a युद्ध waged by a u.n.-authorized गठबन्धन फ़ोर्स  from 34 nations led by the United States , against Iraq in response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation of Kuwait .
The war is also known  अंतर्गत अन्य names , ऐसे as the पारसी गल्फ युद्ध , पहला गल्फ युद्ध , गल्फ युद्ध i , or the पहला इराकी युद्ध , पहले the पद  `` Iraq War '' became identified instead with the 2003 Iraq War ( also referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ) .
Kuwait 's  आक्रमण by इराकी सैनिकों कि began 2 अगस्त 1990 थी मिले साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय condemnation , और brought तात्कालिक आर्थिक  sanctions against Iraq by members of the U.N. Security Council .
U.S. President  जार्ज H. W. बुश तैनात u.S. शक्तियां into सऊदी अरब , और  urged other countries to send their own forces to the scene .
An array of nations  joined the गठबन्धन  .
The great majority of the Coalition 's military forces were from the  u.S. , साथ सऊदी अरब , the संयुक्त किंगडम और मिश्र as अग्रणी योगदानकर्ता  , in that order .
Saudi Arabia paid around  us $ 36 अरब of the us $  60 billion cost .
The war was marked by the beginning of live  न्यूज on the सामने लाइनों of the लड़ो , साथ the  primacy of the U.S. network CNN .
The war has also earned the nickname Video Game War after the daily  ब्रॉडकास्ट बिंब on फलक the u.S. बमवर्षक दौरान आपरेशन  Desert Storm .
The initial conflict  to निकाल इराकी सैनिकों इससे कुवैत began साथ an aerial बमबारी  on 17 January 1991 .
This was  followed by a मैदान उत्पीड़न  on 24 February .
This was a decisive victory for the Coalition forces ,  जो liberated कुवैत और उन्नत into इराकी territory  .
The Coalition ceased their  अग्रिम , और घोषित a cease-fire 100 घंटों बाद  the ground campaign started .
Aerial and ground combat was  confined to इराकी , कुवैत , और क्षेत्रों on सऊदी अरब 's  border .
इराकी शुभारम्भ scud मिसाइलें विरूद्ध  Coalition military targets in Saudi Arabia and against Israel .
The nickel , in American usage , is a  five- cent सिक्का जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य  Mint .
Composed of 75 % copper and 25 % nickel ,  the टुकड़ा रै महरूम struck चूंकि 1866 .
The silver half  dime , बराबर to पाँच सेंट , था महरूम  issued since the 1790s .
The American Civil War  caused आर्थिक hardship , ड्राइविंग सुनहरा और चांदी इससे परिसंचरण ; in जवाब , in प्लेस of low-value  coins , the government at first issued paper currency .
In 1865 , Congress abolished the five-cent fractional currency note after Spencer M.  क्लार्क , सिर of the करेंसी ब्यूरो ( आज the ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण  ) , placed his own portrait on the denomination .
After successful  परिचय of two-cent और three-cent टुकड़े , बगैर अनमोल मेटल , कॉंग्रेस भी प्राधिकृत  a five-cent piece consisting of base metal ; the Mint began striking this version in 1866 .
The initial design of the  शील्ड निकल थी struck जबतक 1883 , तब  replaced by the Liberty Head nickel .
The Buffalo nickel was introduced in  1913 as भाग of a ड्राइव to बढ़ाएँ  the beauty of American coinage ; in 1938 , the Jefferson nickel followed .
In 2004 and 2005 , special designs  in सम्मान of the bicentennial of the लुईस और क्लार्क expedition  were issued .
In 2006 , the Mint  reverted to using जेफरसन निकल पंक्तियां फेलिक्स schlag 's असली रिवर्स ( or `` tails  '' side ) , although a new obverse , by Jamie Franki , was substituted .
As of 2013 , it costs more than eleven cents to produce a nickel ; the Mint is  exploring the सम्भावना of reducing लागत by using कम महंगी धातुओं  .
A poster with  पुष्प or क्लस्टर of पुष्प उत्पादित by बारह प्रजाति  of flowering plants from different families
A flower , sometimes known as a bloom or blossom  , is the reproductive ढांचा मिला in flowering पौधे ( पौधे of  the division Magnoliophyta , also called angiosperms ) .
The biological function of a  पुष्प is to प्रभाव जनन , प्रायः by providing a यांत्रिकी लिये the  union of sperm with eggs .
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs from different individuals in a population  ) or allow selfing ( संलयन of शुक्राणु और अंडा इससे the वही पुष्प ) .
Some  पुष्प उपज diaspores बगैर  fertilization ( parthenocarpy ) .
Flowers contain  sporangia और हैं the साईट जहाँ  gametophytes develop .
Flowers  दे वृद्धि to फल और  seeds .
Many  पुष्प have विकसित to be आकर्षक to पशु , so as  to cause them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen .
In addition to  facilitating the जनन of flowering पौधे , पुष्प have long महरूम admired और प्रयुक्त by इंसानो  to beautify their environment , and also as objects of romance , ritual , religion , medicine and as a source of food .
the mcdonnell डगलस ( अभी बोइंग ) f-15 त्रिभुज is  a twin-engine , all-weather tactical fighter designed by McDonnell Douglas to gain and maintain air superiority in aerial combat .
It is considered among the most successful modern fighters , with over 100  aerial कॉम्बैट victories साथ no नुकसान in dogfights  .
Following reviews of proposals , the United States Air Force  चयनित mcdonnell डगलस ' डिज़ाइन in 1967 to मिलें the सेवा 's need लिये a समर्पित एयर बड़प्पन  fighter .
The Eagle first flew in July  1972 , और डाला सेवा  in 1976 .
Since the 1970s , the Eagle has been exported  to इसराईल , जापानी , सऊदी अरब , और अन्य  nations .
The F-15  थी originally envisioned as a pure एयर  superiority aircraft .
Its design included a secondary ground-attack  काबिलियत कि थी largely अप्रयुक्त  .
The design proved flexible enough that an all-weather strike derivative , the F-15E Strike  त्रिभुज , थी बाद विकसित , और डाला सेवा in 1989 .
The  f-15 त्रिभुज is अपेक्षित to be in  service with the U.S. Air Force past 2025 .
Mimio is a  ब्रांड नाम of a लकीर of प्रौद्योगिकी उत्पाद  aimed at the education market .
The primary  उत्पाद हैं केन्द्रित around कंप्यूटर whiteboard  interactive teaching devices .
MimioCapture  डिवाइस भी allow उपयोक्ता to कैप्चर सब of the स्याही स्ट्रोक्स  that are written on the whiteboard .
When used in  संयोजन साथ a वीडियो प्रोजेक्टर it turns the ordinary whiteboard  surface into a fully interactive whiteboard .
The  उत्पाद लकीर थी originally  designed by Virtual Ink .
On October 4 , 2006 Newell Rubbermaid acquired  the mimio इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard ( iwb  ) product line .
Rahab of  जेरिको
Rahab , ( ; ; ) was , according to the Book of Joshua , a  स्त्री जो जिया in जेरिको in the promised जमीन और assisted the israelites  in capturing the city .
Nearly all English translations  of जोशुआ describe उसके as a बदचलन  or prostitute .
The Organization of American States ( Spanish : Organización de los  estados americanos , पुर्तगाली : organização डॉस estados americanos , फ्रेंच : संगठन देस états américains ) , or the  OAS , is a regional international organization .
The  oas थी संस्थापित on 30 अप्रैल 1948 , और रै इसके  headquarters in Washington , D.C. , United States .
Its members are the 35  स्वतंत्र राज्य of the  Americas .
Since 26 May 2005 , the Secretary  सामान्य of oas रै महरूम जोस मिगुएल  Insulza .
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão Colombo ; before 31 October 145120 May 1506 )  थी an इतालवी एक्सप्लोरर , नाविक , और colonizer , born in the गणतंत्र of  Genoa , in what is today northwestern Italy .
Under the auspices of the Catholic Monarchs of  स्पेन , he समाप्त चार voyages आरपार the अटलांटिक  Ocean that led to general European awareness of the American continents .
Those voyages , and his efforts  to स्थापित स्थाई settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला , initiated  the Spanish colonization of the New World .
In the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms seeking wealth through the establishment of trade  रूट और colonies , कोलंबस 's सट्टे प्रस्ताव , to पहुँचें the ईस्ट इंडीज by sailing westward , आखिरकार प्राप्त the support of the स्पेनी क्राउन , जिससे  saw in it a promise , however remote , of gaining the upper hand over rival powers in the contest for the lucrative spice trade with Asia .
दौरान उसके पहला voyage in 1492 , बजाय of reaching जापानी as he था intended , कोलंबस  landed in the Bahamas archipelago , at a locale he named San Salvador .
Over the course of three more  voyages , कोलंबस visited the वृहद और lesser antilles  , as well as the Caribbean coast of Venezuela and Central America , claiming them for the Spanish Empire .
Though Columbus was not the first  यूरोपीय एक्सप्लोरर to पहुँचें the americas ( having महरूम preceded by the नॉर्स expedition led by leif ericson in the 11th सदी ) , कोलंबस 's voyages led to the पहला स्थायी यूरोपीय सम्पर्क साथ the americas ,  inaugurating a period of European exploration , conquest , and colonization that lasted for several centuries .
They had , therefore , an  विशाल प्रभाव in the ऐतिहासिक विकास of the  modern Western world .
Columbus himself saw his accomplishments  primarily in the लाइट of the spreading of the ईसाई  religion .
Never admitting that  he था पहुँचे a महाद्वीप previously अनजान to europeans , बल्कि than the ईस्ट इंडीज he था नियत आउट लिये , कोलंबस पुकारा  the inhabitants of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ) .
Columbus 's strained relationship with the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial administrators in America led to his arrest and  dismissal as राज्यपाल of the settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला in 1500 , और बाद to protracted वाद over  the benefits which Columbus and his heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown .
करवाया in जर्मनी , the boxer is a नस्ल  of stocky , medium-sized , short-haired dogs .
The coat is smooth and tight-fitting ; colors are fawn or  brindled , साथ or बगैर श्वेत markings , जिससे may कवर the संपूर्ण देह .
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they have broad , short skulls ) , and have a square muzzle , mandibular prognathism (  an underbite ) , बहुत दमदार जबड़े , और a शक्तिशाली काटना आदर्श लिये फांसी on to विशाल  prey .
The  boxer थी करवाया इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी बुल और the  now extinct Bullenbeisser , and is part of the Molosser group .
Boxers were first exhibited in a dog show  लिये st. bernards in म्यूनिख in 1895 , the पहला boxer क्लबों होने  founded the next year .
आधारित on 2012 अमरीकी kennel क्लबों आंकडे , मुक्केबाज आयोजित स्थिर as the सातवाँ सबसे लोकप्रिय  breed of dog in the United States for the third consecutive year .
Serial ATA ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface that  connects मेजबान बस adapters to द्रव्यमान भंडार डिवाइस ऐसे as मुश्किल  disk drives and optical drives .
Serial ATA replaces the older AT Attachment standard ( ATA ; later referred to as Parallel ATA or PATA ) , offering several advantages over the older interface : reduced cable size and cost (  सात conductors बजाय of 40 ) , देशी hot swapping , तेज़ आंकड़ा ट्रांसफ़र through उच्चतर signalling दरों , और अधिक कुशल ट्रांसफ़र through an (  optional ) I/O queuing protocol .
SATA host adapters and devices communicate via a high-speed  सीरियल केबल over दो  pairs of conductors .
In contrast , parallel ATA ( the redesignation for the legacy ATA specifications ) used a 16-bit wide data  बस साथ अनेक अतिरिक्त support और कंट्रोल सिग्नल , सब ऑपरेटिंग at much  lower frequency .
To ensure backward compatibility  साथ विरासत ata तन्त्र और अनुप्रयोग , sata उपयोग the वही मौलिक ata और  ATAPI command-set as legacy ATA devices .
SATA has replaced parallel ATA  in उपभोक्ता डेस्कटॉप और लैपटॉप कंप्यूटर , और रै largely replaced  PATA in new embedded applications .
SATA 's market share in the  डेस्कटॉप pc मार्केट थी 99 % in  2008 .
PATA remains widely used in industrial and embedded applications that use CompactFlash  भंडार , भी हालांकि the नई cfast मानक is आधारित  on SATA .
Serial ATA industry compatibility specifications  originate इससे the सीरियल ata अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन (  aka .
SATA-IO ,  serialata.org  ) .
The SATA-IO group collaboratively creates , reviews , ratifies , and  publishes the interoperability विशेषताएँ , the परीक्षण मामले , और plug-fests .
As with many other industry compatibility standards , the  sata सामग्री स्वामित्व is transferred to अन्य उद्योग लाशें : primarily the incits t13 उपसमिति ata , the incits t10 उपसमिति ( scsi  ) ; a subgroup of T10 responsible for Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) .
the पूरा specification  from SATA-IO .
The remainder of this article will  कोशिश to उपयोग the शब्दावली और विशेषताएँ  of SATA-IO .
The history of the Internet began  साथ the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर  in the 1950s .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over  the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर विज्ञान प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , Los Angeles ( UCLA ) , after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I at NPL in the UK , CYCLADES  , मेरिट संजाल , tymnet , और telenet , यहूद विकसित in the लेट  1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols  लिये internetworking , in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could be  joined together into a network of networks .
In  1982 , the अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल सुइट ( tcp/ip ) थी  standardized , and consequently , the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks , called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science Network ( CSNET ) and again  in 1986 जब nsfnet provided अभिगम to महासंगणक साइट in the  United States from research and education organizations .
वाणिज्यिक अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) began to emerge in  the late 1980s and early 1990s .
the arpanet थी decommissioned  in 1990 .
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was  decommissioned , निकालना the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the अंतरजाल to carry वाणिज्यिक  traffic .
Since the  mid-1990s , the अंतरजाल रै था a क्रांतिकारी प्रभाव on संस्कृति और कॉमर्स , सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल , तत्काल  messaging , Voice over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) `` phone calls '' , two-way interactive video calls , and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums , blogs , social networking , and online shopping sites .
The research and  शिक्षा जातियाँ continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल  such as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and higher speeds over  रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल ऑपरेटिंग at 1-gbit/s , 10-gbit/s , or अधिक  .
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way  दूरसंचार संजाल in the साल 1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated सूचना  by 2007 .
Today the  अंतरजाल continues to grow , चलित by कभी वृहद amounts of ऑनलाइन सूचना  , commerce , entertainment , and social networking .
The Gift is the second album by  स्कॉटिश सिंगर सुसान बॉयल , जिससे थी released on 8 नवम्बर  2010 .
Boyle hinted that the  एल्बम रै a 1960s महसूस `` क्युकी कि थी  [ her ] era '' .
on 30 November 2011 , the album received a  नामांकन in 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन परंपरागत  Pop Vocal Album .
`` This Is Just  to कह '' ( 1934 ) is a प्रसिद्ध  imagist poem by William Carlos Williams .
Professor Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore is a major  अक्षर और समर्थक of J. K. रोलिंग 's हैरी कुम्हार  series .
For most of the series , he  is the हेडमास्टर of the wizarding स्कूल  Hogwarts .
As part of his backstory , it is revealed that he is the founder  और नेता of the अनुक्रम of the फीनिक्स , an संगठन समर्पित  to fighting the main antagonist of the series , Lord Voldemort .
Dumbledore is  portrayed by रिचर्ड हैरिस in the फिल्मी adaptions of हैरी कुम्हार और the पारस  's Stone and Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets .
After Harris ' death ,  माइकल gambon portrayed डम्बल्डोर लिये सब of the बाकी  films .
Rowling stated she chose the name Dumbledore , which is an Early  आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी शब्द लिये `` bumblebee `` , क्युकी of डम्बल्डोर 's प्रेम of म्यूज़िक : वो  imagined him walking around `` humming to himself a lot '' .
Calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid linear polypeptide hormone that  is उत्पादित in इंसानो primarily by the parafollicular कोशिकाएं ( भी ज्ञात as c-cells ) of the थायराइड  , and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial body .
It  अधिनियमों to reduce रक्त कैल्सियम ( ca2+ ) , opposing  the effects of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) .
calcitonin रै महरूम मिला in मछली  , reptiles , birds , and mammals .
Its importance in humans has not been as well established as its importance in  अन्य पशु , as इसके फलन is प्रायः नहीं significant in the विनियमन of सामान्य कैल्सियम  homeostasis .
It  belongs to calcitonin-like  protein family .
A  mousepad साथ  a padded wrist rest .
A mousepad ( US ) or mouse mat ( UK ) is a surface  लिये रखकर और चलती a कंप्यूटर  mouse .
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a mouse directly on a table by providing a surface to  allow the ट्रैकिंग led or बॉल ( in पूर्व मॉडल ) to माप गति  accurately and without jitter .
कुछ mousepads बढ़ाएँ ergonomics by  providing a padded wrist rest .
The stadium seen  इससे ऊपर in 1980
दिसम्बर 29 , 2002  implosion
The Riverfront  स्टेडियम साईट in जून  , 2006 .
This photo  थी लिया इससे the पश्चिमी concourse  of Great American Ball Park .
A small portion of the Riverfront Stadium site is now occupied by  the लाल ' हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय  and Main Street , which was extended when the new park was built .
the सिनसिनाटी bengals '  Paul Brown Stadium is in the distance .
Riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ) ,  बाद ज्ञात as cinergy फ़ील्ड ( 1996–2002 ) , थी the घर of the सिनसिनाटी लाल नेशनल लीग बेसबॉल  team and the Cincinnati Bengals National Football League team .
Located on the Ohio River in downtown Cincinnati , the stadium was best known as the home of `` The  बिग रेड यंत्र `` , as the लाल यहूद  often called in the 1970s .
Construction  began on फ़रवरी 1 , 1968 , और थी समाप्त  at a cost of less than $ 50 million .
On June 30 , 1970 , the Reds  hosted the अटलांटा braves in उनके ग्रैंड खोलने , साथ हांक आरोन  hitting the first ever home run at Riverfront .
Two weeks later on July 14 , 1970  , riverfront hosted the 1970 प्रमुख  League Baseball All-Star Game .
This game is best remembered for the often-replayed collision at home plate between Reds star  पीट रोज़ और catcher रे fosse of the क्लीवलैंड इंडियंस  .
In  सितंबर 1996 , riverfront स्टेडियम थी renamed `` cinergy फ़ील्ड '' in a प्रायोजन सौदे साथ वृहद  Cincinnati 's energy company , Cinergy Corporation .
In 2001 , to  मेक रूम लिये ग्रेट अमरीकी बॉल  Park , the seating capacity at Cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000 .
There was a huge wall in  बीच फ़ील्ड दृश्य बाद the renovations ,  to serve as the batter 's eye .
The stadium was demolished  by implosion on दिसम्बर 29 , 2002  .
Nexen Tire is a tire manufacturer  , headquartered in yangsan , दक्षिण gyeongsang प्रांत  , and Seoul , both in South Korea .
Its  प्रमुख घरेलू प्रतिस्पर्धी  are Hankook Tire and Kumho Tires .
The  कम्पनी 's नाम is  reflected in the company slogan , `` Next Century Tire . ''
The silent  बहुमत is an अनिर्दिष्ट विशाल बहुमत of लोगों in a देश or  group who do not express their opinions publicly .
The term was popularized ( though not  पहला प्रयुक्त ) by u.S. अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन in a नवम्बर 3 , 1969 , वाक in जिससे he कहा , `` और so tonight—to तुम , the ग्रेट  silent majority of my fellow Americans—I ask for your support . ''
In this usage it referred to  those अमेरिकी जो किया नहीं जुड़ें in the विशाल  demonstrations against the Vietnam War at the time , who did not join in the counterculture , and who did not participate in public discourse .
Nixon along with many others saw this group of Middle Americans  as होने निष्प्रभ in the मीडिया by the अधिक गायन  minority .
The phrase was used in the 19th century as a euphemism referring to all the people  जो have died , और अन्य have प्रयुक्त it पहले और बाद  Nixon to refer to groups of voters in various nations of the world .
Sam , a rhesus  मंकी , उड़ाया to an ऊँचाई of 88  km in 1959 .
( नासा  )
Before  इंसानो गई into स्पेस , अनेक पशु यहूद शुभारम्भ  into space , including numerous monkeys , so that scientists could investigate the biological effects of space travel .
The United States launched flights  containing primate कार्गो primarily between 1948-1961 साथ एक उड़ान  in 1969 and one in 1985 .
France launched two  monkey-carrying फ़्लाइट  in 1967 .
The Soviet Union and Russia  शुभारम्भ बंदरों between  1983 and 1996 .
Most monkeys  यहूद anesthetized पहले  lift-off .
Overall  thirty-two बंदरों उड़ाया in the  space program ; none flew more than once .
numerous back-up बंदरों भी गई  through the programs but never flew .
Monkeys from several species were used , including rhesus monkeys ,  cynomolgus बंदरों , गिलहरी बंदरों , और pig-tailed  macaques .
Some chimpanzees ( which  हैं apes बल्कि than बंदरों )  were also used .
RAID ( redundant array of independent disks , originally  अनावश्यक सरणी of inexpensive डिस्क ) is a भंडार प्रौद्योगिकी कि combines अनेक  disk drive components into a logical unit .
Data is distributed across the drives in one of  अनेक तरीके पुकारा `` रेड स्तर '' , depending on the स्तर of अतिरेक  and performance required .
The term `` RAID '' was first  पारिभाषित by दाउद पैटरसन , garth A. गिब्सन , और रैंडी katz  at the University of California , Berkeley in 1987 .
Marketers representing industry RAID manufacturers later attempted to reinvent the term to describe a redundant  सरणी of स्वतंत्र डिस्क as a अर्थात् of  disassociating a low-cost expectation from RAID technology .
RAID is now used as an umbrella term for  कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा भंडार योजनाएं कि can divide और replicate आंकड़ा among अनेक  physical drives : RAID is an example of storage virtualization and the array can be accessed by the operating system as one single drive .
The different schemes  or architectures हैं नामित by  the word RAID followed by a number ( e.g . RAID 0 , RAID 1 ) .
Each scheme provides a different balance between the key  लक्ष्य : विश्वसनीयता और उपलब्धता , प्रदर्शन  and capacity .
RAID levels greater than RAID 0 provide  सुरक्षा विरूद्ध unrecoverable ( सेक्टर ) पढ़ा त्रुटियाँ , as खूब as पूरे  disk failure .
A  lymphocyte is a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate  immune system .
Under the microscope , lymphocytes can be divided into  विशाल lymphocytes और छोटी lymphocytes  .
Large granular lymphocytes include  प्राकृतिक कातिल कोशिकाएं ( nk कोशिकाएं )  .
Small  lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं  and B cells .
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark comedy  फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by जोएल और ethan  Coen .
Jeff Bridges stars as Jeff Lebowski , an unemployed Los  एंजिल्स slacker और avid बॉलर , nicknamed `` the यार .  ''
After a case of mistaken identity , The Dude  is introduced to a करोड़पति भी नामित  Jeffrey Lebowski .
When the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped ,  he आयोग the यार to उद्धार  the ransom to secure her release .
The plan goes awry when The Dude 's friend Walter Sobchak (  जॉन गुडमैन ) योजनाएं to रखना the पूरा फिरौती  .
Steve Buscemi  , फिलिप seymour हॉफमन , दाउद huddleston , julianne मूर , tara reid , और जॉन turturro भी स्टार in the फिल्मी , जिससे  is narrated by a cowboy known only as `` The Stranger '' , played by Sam Elliott .
The film is  loosely प्रेरित by the कार्य of  Raymond Chandler .
Joel  कोएन stated : `` we चाही to do a चांडलर दयालु of स्टोरी – कैसा it चालें episodically , और  deals with the characters trying to unravel a mystery , as well as having a hopelessly complex plot that 's ultimately unimportant . ''
The original score was  रचित by कार्टर burwell , a longtime  collaborator of the Coen Brothers .
The Big Lebowski was a  निराशा at the u.S. बक्सा दफ्तर और प्राप्त  mixed reviews at the time of its release .
Reviews have trended towards the positive over time , and the film has become a cult  पसंदीदा , विख्यात लिये इसके idiosyncratic वर्ण , सपना sequences , unconventional संवाद , और eclectic  soundtrack .
Severus Snape is a fictional  अक्षर in the हैरी कुम्हार किताब श्रेणी लिखा  by J.K. Rowling .
In the first novel of the  श्रेणी , he is शत्रु toward हैरी और is निर्मित up  to be the primary antagonist until the final chapters .
As the  श्रेणी progresses , snape 's अक्षर becomes अधिक परतदार  and complex .
रोलिंग करता नहीं fully खुलासा the विवरण of उसके सच्चा loyalties  until the end of the final book , Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows .
Over the course of the series , Snape 's portrayal evolves from  कि of a दुर्भावनापूर्ण और दलगत टीचर to कि of a pivotal अक्षर of considerable  complexity and moral ambiguity .
Snape primarily teaches Potions at Hogwarts , though in the  छठे अनोखा he सिखाती रक्षा विरूद्ध the अंधेरा कला ,  a position which he was known to have desired throughout the series .
he ultimately becomes हेडमास्टर  of Hogwarts in the final novel .
रोलिंग रै वर्णित  him as `` a gift of a character '' .
Grits refers to  a ground-corn खाना of देशी अमरीकी उत्पत्ति , कि is  common in the Southern United States and mainly eaten at breakfast .
आधुनिक grits हैं commonly बना  of alkali-treated corn known as hominy .
Grits are  समान to अन्य मोटा maize-based porridges इससे  around the world such as polenta or the thinner farina .
`` Instant grits  '' have महरूम  processed to speed cooking .
The  शब्द `` grits '' गर्भाशयी इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी  word `` grytt , '' meaning coarse meal .
This word originally referred to  गेहूं और अन्य porridges अभी ज्ञात as groats in भाग  of the U.K..
Maize , unknown in Europe in the Middle Ages , is a food derived from corn ( a New World plant  ) और `` मकई '' था महरूम प्रयुक्त to describe गेहूं उत्पाद in अनेक यूरोपीय  regions .
`` Grits '' may be either singular or plural ; historically , in the American South the word  थी invariably एकवचन notwithstanding इसके बहुवचन रूप ( cf . ऐसे खाना names  as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '' , likewise plural in form , but singular in use ) .
Sometimes , grits  हैं पुकारा sofkee or sofkey ( इससे a  native American Muskogee word ) .
In molecular biology , human chorionic  gonadotropin ( hcg ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the निषेचित अंडा बाद धारणा  .
Later during pregnancy it is  बना by the विकासशील placenta , और बाद by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast  .
कुछ cancerous tumors उपज इस हार्मोन ; इसलिए , elevated स्तर measured  when the patient is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis .
However , it is not known whether  इस उत्पादन is a contributing कारण or an प्रभाव  of tumorigenesis .
The pituitary  एनॉलॉग of hcg , ज्ञात as luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ) , is उत्पादित  in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages .
, the FDA has prohibited the sale  of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर  hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent and illegal .

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores ,  रेस्तरां , और वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक देश मगर क्यूबा और  North Korea .
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta , Georgia , and  is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of the coca-cola कम्पनी  in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late  19th सदी by जॉन pemberton , coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler , जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक to इसके  dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then  बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers  throughout the world .
The bottlers , who hold territorially  विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी , उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the concentrate in संयोजन साथ filtered  water and sweeteners .
The bottlers  तब बेचें , वितरित और merchandise coca-cola  to retail stores and vending machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises , which is the  largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और पश्चिमी यूरोपीय  .
The  coca-cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां  and food service distributors .
The  coca-cola कम्पनी रै , on अवसर  , introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name .
The most common  of ये is आहार कोक , साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola , आहार कोक  Caffeine-Free , Coca-Cola Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's best  वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011 , coca-cola थी the संसार  's most valuable brand .
An ombudsman is an official , usually appointed by the government or by parliament but with a significant degree of  स्वतंत्रता , जो is चार्ज साथ representing the रूचि of the पब्लिक by investigating  and addressing complaints of maladministration or violation of rights .
In some countries an Inspector General , Citizen  एडवोकेट or अन्य आधिकारिक may have कर्तव्य समान to those of a नेशनल ombudsman , और may  also be appointed by the legislature .
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state , local or municipal government , and  unofficial ombudsmen may be नियुक्त by , or भी कार्य लिये , a निगम ऐसे as a यूटिलिटी प्रदायक or a समाचारपत्र ,  for an NGO , or for a professional regulatory body .
Whether appointed by the legislature , the executive , or an organization  ( or , कम अक्सर , निर्वाचित by the constituency कि he or वो serves ) , the ठेठ कर्तव्य of an ombudsman  are to investigate complaints and attempt to resolve them , usually through recommendations ( binding or not ) or mediation .
Ombudsmen  sometimes भी उद्देश्य to पहचानो प्रणालीगत मुद्दे अग्रणी to  poor service or breaches of people 's rights .
At the national level , most ombudsmen have a wide  जनादेश to सौदे साथ the संपूर्ण पब्लिक सेक्टर , और sometimes भी तत्व of the निजी सेक्टर ( लिये उदाहरण , contracted सेवा  providers ) .
In some cases , there is a more restricted  जनादेश , लिये उदाहरण साथ particular  sectors of society .
More recent developments have included the creation of  specialised children 's ombudsman और सूचना कमिश्नर एजेंसियों  .
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with  the हैंडलिंग of चिंताएं परिचय नेशनल सरकारी is अधिक formally referred to as the `` संसदीय  Commissioner '' ( e.g . the United Kingdom Parliamentary Commissioner for Administration , and the Western Australian state Ombudsman ) .
In many  देशों जहाँ the ombudsman 's remit extends परे dealing साथ कथित maladministration to promoting और protecting  human rights , the ombudsman is recognised as the national human rights institution .
The post  of ombudsman था by the समाप्त of the 20th सदी महरूम instituted by  most governments and by some intergovernmental organizations such as the European Union .
Making  a शिकायत to an ombudsman is  usually free of charge .
