New England is a region in the northeastern corner of the United States consisting of  the छह राज्य of maine , नई हैम्पशायर , वर्मांट , मैसाचुसेट्स , rhode द्वीप  , and Connecticut .
New England is bordered  by नई यॉर्क राज्य to the दक्षिणपश्चिम , क्यूबेक  to the northwest , and New Brunswick and the Atlantic Ocean to the east .
In one of the earliest English settlements in North America ,  तीर्थयात्रियों इससे इंग्लैण्ड पहला settled in नई इंग्लैण्ड in 1620 , to रूप  Plymouth Colony .
Ten years later , the Puritans  settled उत्तर of plymouth उपनिवेश in बोस्टन ,  thus forming Massachusetts Bay Colony .
Over the next 130 years , New England fought in four  फ्रेंच और भारतीय युद्धों , जबतक the अंग्रेजों  defeated the French and their native allies in North America .
In the late 18th century , the New  इंग्लैण्ड colonies initiated the प्रतिरोध to the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट 's  efforts to impose new taxes without the consent of the colonists .
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great Britain responded with a series of punitive  कानून stripping मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government , जिससे यहूद termed the `` असहनीय अधिनियमों `` by the colonists  .
The confrontation led to open  warfare in 1775 , the expulsion of the अंग्रेजों अधिकारियों  from New England in spring 1776 , and the Declaration of Independence in July 1776 .
Some of the first  आंदोलनों of अमरीकी साहित्य , दर्शनशास्त्र , और शिक्षा  originated in New England .
The region played a prominent role in the movement to abolish slavery , and was the  पहला प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य to be रूपांतरित by the औद्योगिक  Revolution .
Today , New England is a major world  बीच of शिक्षा , ऊँची प्रौद्योगिकी ,  insurance , and medicine .
Boston is its cultural , financial , educational ,  चिकित्सा और परिवहन बीच .
Each state is principally subdivided into small incorporated  municipalities ज्ञात as नई इंग्लैण्ड कस्बों , जिससे हैं  often governed by town meeting .
The only unincorporated territory in New  इंग्लैण्ड exists in the sparse , उत्तरी regions of वर्मांट , नई हैम्पशायर  , and Maine .
चूंकि 1970 , मतदाता have अधिक प्रायः समर्थित उदार उम्मीदवार at the राज्य  and federal level than those of any other region in the United States .
New England is  the तभी एक of the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's नौ क्षेत्रीय विभाजन जिनकी नाम  does not derive from its geography , and it is the only multi-state region with clear , consistent boundaries .
It maintains a strong sense of cultural  पहचान नियत अलावा इससे the बाकी of the देश , हालांकि the शर्तें of  this identity are often contested , combining Puritanism with liberalism , agrarian life with industry , and isolation with immigration .
आपात  !
is  an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि combines  the medical drama and action-adventure genres .
It was produced  by चिह्नित सात सीमित और वितरित  by Universal Studios .
It debuted as a  midseason बदलना on जनवरी 15 , 1972 , on एनबीसी , replacing the दो short-lived श्रेणी the साझेदार  and The Good Life , and ran until September 3 , 1977 , with six additional two-hour television films during the following two years .
आपात  !
was created and  उत्पादित by जोकर webb और रॉबर्ट A. cinader , दोनो of जिसको  were also responsible for the police dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet .
The Eastern Time Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17  u.S. राज्य in the पूर्वी भाग of the संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य , भाग  of Canada and three countries in South America .
Places that  उपयोग पूर्वी मानक समय ( est ) जब observing मानक  time ( autumn/winter ) are 5 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ) , when observing daylight saving time (  spring/summer ) is 4 घंटों पीछे समन्वित सार्वभौमिक समय  ( ) .
In the northern parts of the time zone , during the second Sunday in March , at  2:00 a.m. est , घड़ियाँ हैं उन्नत to 3:00 a.m. edt leaving  a one hour `` gap . ''
During the first Sunday in  नवम्बर , at 2:00 a.m. edt , घड़ियाँ हैं स्थानांतरित वापस  to 1:00 a.m. EST , thus `` duplicating '' one hour .
Southern parts of the zone ( Panama  और the caribbean ) do नहीं observe daylight छायांकन  .
Standard form  of the आवधिक  table .
The colors represent  अलग श्रेणी of तत्व समझाया नीचे  .
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements , organized on the  आधार of उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ , इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations , और पुनरावर्ती रासायनिक  properties .
Elements are presented in order of increasing  परमाणु क्रमांक ( क्रमांक of protons ) .
The standard form of table  comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड or प्रमुख देह of तत्व  , positioned above a smaller double row of elements .
The table can also be deconstructed  into चार आयताकार ब्लॉक : the s-block to the बाएँ , the p-block to the सही  , the d-block in the middle , and the f-block below that .
The rows of the table are called  अवधि ; the कालम of the s- , d- , और p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह  , with some of these having names such as the halogens or the noble gases .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be  प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध between the गुण of the तत्व और भविष्यवाणी  the properties of new , yet to be discovered or synthesized , elements .
As a result , a  आवधिक table—whether in the मानक रूप or कुछ अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क  for analyzing chemical behavior , and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
हालांकि precursors मौजूद , dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन  , in 1869 , of the first widely recognized periodic table .
He developed his table to illustrate  आवधिक रुझान in the गुण of the then-known  elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some  गुण of then-unknown तत्व कि होता be अपेक्षित  to fill gaps in this table .
Most of his predictions were  proved सही जब the तत्व in सवाल यहूद  subsequently discovered .
mendeleev 's आवधिक तालिका रै चूंकि महरूम विस्तारित और परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी  or synthesis of further new elements and the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior .
All elements from  परमाणु संख्याएँ 1 ( हाइड्रोजन  ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized .
The  तत्व इससे 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम मिला to मौजूद naturally , हालांकि कुछ हैं मिला तभी in ट्रेस amounts  and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories .
The elements after  98 have तभी महरूम  synthesized in laboratories .
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued ,  साथ the सवाल of कैसा the आवधिक तालिका may need to be परिवर्धित  to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of  naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित  in laboratories .
minecraft is a सैंडबॉक्स इंडी खेल originally  created by Swedish programmer Markus `` Notch '' Persson and later developed and published by Mojang .
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17 , 2009 , as a developmental alpha version  और , बाद क्रमिक अद्यतन  , was published as a full release version on November 18 , 2011 .
a संस्करण लिये एंड्रॉइड थी released a माह पहले on अक्तूबर  7 , and an iOS version was released on November 17 , 2011 .
On May 9 , 2012 , the game was released  on एक्सबॉक्स 360 as an एक्सबॉक्स सजीव आर्केड खेल , co-developed by 4j studios  .
All versions of  minecraft प्राप्त आवधिक  updates .
The creative and building  पहलुओं of minecraft allow खिलाड़ी to निर्माण constructions आउट  of textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world .
Other activities in the game  शामिल खोजी , महफ़िल  resources , crafting and combat .
Gameplay in its  वाणिज्यिक रिलीज रै दो प्रिंसिपल मोड्स : अस्तित्व , जिससे requires खिलाड़ी to acquire संसाधन और maintain उनके स्वास्थ्य और  hunger ; and creative , where players have an unlimited supply of resources , the ability to fly , and no health or hunger .
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival , differing only in difficulty ; it  is नियत to hardest सेटिंग और respawning is निष्क्रिय , forcing खिलाड़ी to हटाएँ उनके संसार upon  death .
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded the Innovation  पुरस्कार , बेहतरीन downloadable खेल पुरस्कार , और the बेहतरीन डेब्यू खेल पुरस्कार इससे the खेल डेवलपर चुनाव पुरस्कार ; और the दर्शक पुरस्कार , as  well as the Seumas McNally Grand Prize , from the Independent Games Festival in 2011 .
In 2012 , Minecraft was awarded a Golden Joystick Award in the  श्रेणी बेहतरीन downloadable खेल  .
As of April 8 , 2013 , the game has sold over 10 million copies on PC and as of January 22  , 2013 , over 20 लाख नक़ल आरपार सब प्लेटफ़ॉर्म  .
The Dark Knight is a  2008 british-american सुपरहीरो फिल्मी निर्देशित  , produced , and co-written by Christopher Nolan .
Based on the DC Comics character Batman , the film is the second part of Nolan 's Batman film  श्रेणी और a sequel to 2005 's बैटमैन begins  .
Christian Bale reprises the lead role of Bruce Wayne/Batman , with a returning cast of Michael  caine as अल्फ्रेड pennyworth , गेरी oldman as जेम्स गॉर्डन और मॉर्गन फ्रीमैन as लुसियस फॉक्स  .
The film introduces the character of Harvey  डेंट ( आरोन eckhart ) , गोथम 's newly निर्वाचित ज़िला attorney और the consort of ब्रूस वेन 's बाल्यकाल dost  Rachel Dawes ( Maggie Gyllenhaal ) , who joins Batman and the police in combating the new rising threat of a criminal mastermind calling himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ) .
Nolan  's प्रेरणा लिये the फिल्मी थी the जोकर 's कॉमिक किताब डेब्यू  in 1940 , the 1988 graphic novel , and the 1996 series , which retold Two-Face 's origin .
The nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first applied to Batman in  बैटमैन no . 1 ( 1940 ) , in a स्टोरी लिखा by विधेयक  Finger .
The Dark Knight was filmed primarily in Chicago , as well  as in अनेक अन्य स्थितियाँ in the संयुक्त राज्य ,  the United Kingdom , and Hong Kong .
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some sequences , including the  जोकर 's पहला रूप in the फिल्मी  .
On  जनवरी 22 , 2008 , कुछ महीने बाद he था समाप्त फिल्मांकन on the अंधेरा नाईट और छह महीने पहले the फिल्मी 's रिलीज , झाड़  Ledger died from a toxic combination of prescription drugs , leading to intense attention from the press and movie-going public .
warner भाईs. था initially निर्मित a वाइरल विपणन अभियान लिये the अंधेरा नाईट  , developing promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen shots of Ledger as the Joker , but after Ledger 's death , the studio refocused its promotional campaign .
The  अंधेरा नाईट थी released on जुलाई 16 , 2008 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ,  on July 18 , 2008 in North America , and on July 24 , 2008 in the United Kingdom .
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and one of the best superhero  films कभी बना , the फिल्मी प्राप्त अत्यधिक धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ और नियत numerous रिकॉर्ड दौरान इसके  theatrical run .
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide , it is the  14th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब समय , unadjusted  for inflation .
The film received eight  अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations ; it जीती the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि संपादन  and Ledger was posthumously awarded Best Supporting Actor .
The Dark Knight  उदय , the फाइनल भाग of the त्रयी , थी released on जुलाई  20 , 2012 .
The timeline of radio lists within the history of radio , the technology and events that produced  यंत्र कि उपयोग रेडियो लहरें और क्रियाएँ कि लोगों  undertook .
Later , the history is dominated by programming  और सामग्री , जिससे is  closer to general history .
The Sydney  ओपेरा हाउस is a multi-venue performing कला  centre in New South Wales , Australia .
It was conceived and largely built  by डैनिश वास्तु jørn utzon , खोलने in 1973 बाद a long  gestation that began with his competition-winning design in 1957 .
Joseph Cahill 's New South  वेल्स सरकारी दिया the go-ahead लिये कार्य  to begin in 1958 .
The government 's bold decision to select Utzon  's डिज़ाइन is प्रायः निष्प्रभ by the कांड  that followed .
It is on  bennelong पाइंट in सिडनी harbour  , close to the Sydney Harbour Bridge .
It sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central business district ( the CBD  ) , घिरी on तीन पहलू by the harbour ( सिडनी कोव और फार्म कोव ) और  inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens .
Contrary to  इसके नाम , it घरों अनेक प्रदर्शन  venues .
It is  among the व्यस्ततम performing कला केंद्रों  in the world , hosting over 1,500 performances each year attended by some 1.2 million people .
It provides a  स्थान लिये अनेक performing-arts कंपनियाँ , सहित the चार कुंजी निवासी कंपनियाँ ओपेरा ऑस्ट्रेलिया , the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बैले , the सिडनी  Theatre Company and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra , and presents a wide range of productions on its own account .
It is also one of the most popular visitor  आकर्षण in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , साथ अधिक than सात लाख लोगों visiting प्रत्येक साल ,  300,000 of whom take a guided tour .
It is administered by the  सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस विश्वास , अंतर्गत the नई दक्षिण वेल्स  Ministry of the Arts .
On 28 June 2007 , it was  बना a युनेस्को संसार विरासत साईट  .
It  is एक of the 20th सदी 's सबसे distinctive  buildings and one of the most famous performing arts centres in the world .
A graph of body mass index as a function  of देह द्रव्यमान और देह ऊँचाई  is shown above .
The dashed lines  represent subdivisions  within a major class .
For instance the ``  underweight '' वर्गीकरण is further विभाजित into ``  severe '' , `` moderate '' , and `` mild '' subclasses .
The body mass index ( BMI ) , or  quetelet अनुक्रमणिका , is a माप लिये इंसान देह आकार आधारित  on an individual 's weight and height .
It was  devised between 1830 और 1850 by the belgian बहुश्रुत adolphe quetelet दौरान  the course of developing `` social physics '' .
Body mass index is  पारिभाषित as the व्यक्तिगत 's देह द्रव्यमान विभाजित by the वर्गाकार  of their height .
The formulae universally  प्रयुक्त in आयुर्विज्ञान उपज a ईकाई of माप  of kg/m2 .
BMI can also be determined using a BMI chart , which displays BMI as a function of  वज़न ( आड़ा अक्ष ) और ऊँचाई ( लंबवत अक्ष ) using रुपरेखा लाइनों लिये अलग  values of BMI or colors for different BMI categories .
† The factor for UK/US units is  अधिक precisely 703.06957964 , लकिन कि स्तर of परिशुद्धता  is not meaningful for this calculation .
To work from stone  और पाउंड पहला गुणा the स्टोन by 14 तब add the पाउंड to दे the पूरे द्रव्यमान in पाउंड ; to कार्य  from feet and inches first multiply the feet by 12 then add the inches to give the whole height in inches .
Thomas Paine ( January 29 , 1737 ( NS February 9 , 1737 ) – June 8 , 1809 ) was an  english-american राजनैतिक activist , लेखक , राजनैतिक theorist और  revolutionary .
As the author of two highly influential pamphlets at the start of the  अमरीकी क्रान्ति , he प्रेरित the देशप्रेमी in 1776 to घोषित  independence from Britain .
His ideas  reflected आत्मज्ञान era बयानबाजी  of transnational human rights .
He has been called `` a corsetmaker by trade , a  पत्रकार by व्यवसायिक , और a propagandist by inclination  . ''
Born in Thetford ,  इंग्लैण्ड , in the काउंटी of नॉर्फ़ोक , paine emigrated to the अंग्रेजों  American colonies in 1774 with the help of Benjamin Franklin and he arrived in time to participate in the American Revolution .
His principal contributions were the powerful , widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 )  , the all-time best-selling अमरीकी किताब कि advocated औपनिवेशिक अमेरिका 's स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , और  The American Crisis ( 1776–83 ) , a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series .
Common Sense was so influential that John Adams said , `` Without  the कलम of the लेखक of आम भाव , the  sword of Washington would have been raised in vain.”
Paine lived in France  लिये सबसे of the 1790s , बनने  deeply involved in the French Revolution .
He wrote the Rights of Man ( 1791 ) , in part  a रक्षा of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति  against its critics .
His attacks on British writer Edmund Burke led to  a विचारण और conviction in absentia in 1792 लिये the अपराधों of seditious  libel .
In 1792 , despite not being able to speak French  , he थी निर्वाचित to the फ्रेंच नेशनल  Convention .
The  girondists regarded  him as an ally .
Consequently , the Montagnards , especially  robespierre , regarded  him as an enemy .
In  दिसम्बर 1793 , he थी गिरफ्तार और imprisoned  in Paris , then released in 1794 .
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason (  1793–94 ) , उसके किताब कि अधिवक्ताओं देववाद , promotes कारण और freethinking , और argues  against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular .
he भी लिखा the pamphlet कृषिक इंसाफ ( 1795 ) , discussing the origins  of property , and introduced the concept of a guaranteed minimum income .
In 1802 ,  he लौटे to अमेरिका जहाँ he  died on June 8 , 1809 .
Only six people attended his  अंत्येष्टि as he था महरूम ostracized लिये उसके उपहास  of Christianity .
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate safety and  efficacy आंकड़ा ( or अधिक specifically , सूचना परिचय प्रतिकूल ड्रग प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of अन्य उपचार ) लिये स्वास्थ्य interventions ( e.g.  , drugs , diagnostics , devices , therapy protocols ) .
They are conducted only after satisfactory information has been gathered on  the विशेषता of the गैर नैदानिक सुरक्षा , और स्वास्थ्य authority/ethics कमेटी स्वीकृति  is granted in the country where approval of the drug or device is sought .
previously , अनेक उभरते देशों  did not require local trials for product approvals .
Now , though  उभरते देशों स्टिल accept आंकड़ा इससे u.s./europe , वे भी आवश्यकता  some local trials .
Depending on the type of product and the stage of its development , investigators initially enroll volunteers and/or patients into small pilot studies , and  subsequently conduct larger स्केल अध्ययन in मरीजों कि प्रायः compare the नई उत्पाद साथ अन्य already स्वीकृत लिये the affliction of ब्याज  .
As positive safety and efficacy data are  gathered , the क्रमांक of मरीजों  is typically increased .
Clinical  ट्रायल can vary in आकार , और can involve a सिंगल शोध एंटिटी  in one country or many such entities in multiple countries .
A full series of trials may incur sizable costs , and the burden of paying for all the necessary people and services is usually borne by the sponsor ,  जिससे may be a सरकारी संगठन or a फार्मास्युटिकल , जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  or medical device company .
When the diversity of required  support भूमिकाएँ exceeds the संसाधन of the प्रायोजक , a नैदानिक विचारण is प्रबंधित  by an outsourced partner , such as a contract research organization or a clinical trials unit in the academic sector .
The Green Bay Packers are  an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित  in Green Bay , Wisconsin .
They are  सदस्यों of the उत्तर प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
ग्रीन खाड़ी is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the एनएफएल , having  been organized and playing in 1919 .
The Packers are the only non-profit ,  community-owned प्रमुख लीग पेशेवर खेल टोली in the  United States .
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town teams '' that were once common  in the एनएफएल दौरान the 1920s और 1930s  .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney  calhoun , the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional टीमों in ग्रीन  Bay dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team  विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन और the मिडवेस्ट  .
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA )  in 1921 , the forerunner to कया is ज्ञात आज as the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is  the पिछला एनएफएल `` छोटी कस्बा '' टोली , इसके लोकल प्रशंसक आधार और मीडिया extends  into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league  championships ( अधिक than कोई अन्य टोली in the एनएफएल ) , सहित नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories  —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ) .
The Packers have long-standing , bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central )  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों , the शिकागो bears , मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स और the डेट्रॉयट  Lions .
The Bears-Packers rivalry is  एक of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास , डेटिंग वापस  to 1921 .
Ethanol fuel is ethanol (  ethyl दारू ) , the वही प्रकार of दारू  found in alcoholic beverages .
It is most often used as a motor fuel  , मुख्यतः as a biofuel योगात्मक  for gasoline .
World ethanol production for transport  ईंधन tripled between 2000 और 2007 इससे 17  billion to more than 52 billion liters .
From 2007 to  2008 , the share of इथेनॉल in वैश्विक  gasoline type fuel use increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 % .
In 2011 worldwide  इथेनॉल ईंधन उत्पादन पहुँचे 22.36 अरब u.S. द्रव गैलन ( bg ) ( 84.6 अरब liters ) , साथ the संयुक्त राज्य as the शीर्ष निर्माता साथ 13.9  bg ( 52.6 billion liters ) , accounting for 62.2 % of global production , followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ) .
Ethanol fuel has a `` gasoline gallon equivalency ``  ( gge ) मान of , जिससे अर्थात् 1.5 गैलन of इथेनॉल उपज the उर्जा of एक गैलन of  gasoline .
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil and in the United States , and together both countries  यहूद जिम्मेदार लिये 87.1 % of the संसार 's इथेनॉल ईंधन उत्पादन  in 2011 .
Most cars on the road today in the U.S. can run on blends  of up to 10 % इथेनॉल , और इथेनॉल represented 10 % of the u.S. गैसोलीन ईंधन सप्लाई निकला  from domestic sources in 2011 .
Since 1976 the  ब्राज़ीलियाई सरकारी रै बना it अनिवार्य to मिश्रण इथेनॉल साथ गैसोलीन , और चूंकि 2007 the विधिक  blend is around 25 % ethanol and 75 % gasoline ( E25 ) .
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million flex-fuel automobiles and light trucks  और 1.5 लाख flex-fuel मोटरसाइकिल कि regularly उपयोग neat इथेनॉल  fuel ( known as E100 ) .
bioethanol is a रूप of बेदर्दी उर्जा  that can be produced from agricultural feedstocks .
It can be made from  बहुत आम फसलों ऐसे as शुगर cane , आलू  , manioc and corn .
There has been considerable debate  परिचय कैसा उपयोगी bioethanol होगा be in replacing गैसोलीन  .
Concerns about its production and use relate to increased food prices due to the large amount of arable land required  लिये फसलों , as खूब as the उर्जा और प्रदूषण संतुलन of the पूरे साईकिल of इथेनॉल उत्पादन , विशेषकर  from corn .
Recent developments with  cellulosic इथेनॉल उत्पादन और व्यावसायीकरण  may allay some of these concerns .
Cellulosic ethanol offers promise because cellulose fibers , a major and universal component  in संयंत्र कोशिकाएं दीवारें , can be प्रयुक्त to उपज इथेनॉल  .
According to the International Energy Agency , cellulosic ethanol could  allow इथेनॉल fuels to खेल a much बडे भूमिका in the भविष्य than previously  thought .
Saab 9-3  sportcombi biopower  .
The second  e85 flexifuel मॉडल introduced  by Saab in the Swedish market .
A plaque  commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो हत्या और कदम of  Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987 , before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque  commemorating the स्थान of the  Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of  ऑस्ट्रिया , वारिस presumptive to the austro-hungarian सिंहासन , और उसके बीवी , सोफी , duchess of hohenberg , यहूद शॉट मुर्दे  in Sarajevo , by Gavrilo Princip , one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
The political objective of the assassination was to break off  austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे  could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia .
The assassins ' motives were consistent with the movement  कि बाद became ज्ञात  as Young Bosnia .
Serbian  सैन्य अधिकारियों stood पीछे the  attack .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators  थी मुख्य of सर्बियाई सैन्य प्रज्ञा dragutin dimitrijević , उसके righthand man प्रमुख vojislav tankosić  , and Masterspy Rade Malobabić .
Major Tankosić armed the  हत्यारे साथ बम  and pistols and trained them .
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of  safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ of हथियार और operatives into  Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the  कुंजी सदस्यों of the clandestine टनल , और the कुंजी सर्बियाई सैन्य  conspirators who were still alive were arrested , tried , convicted and punished .
Those who were arrested in Bosnia were  आजमाया in साराजेवो in अक्तूबर  1914 .
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika  सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया तीन of the शीर्ष सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों .
Much of what is known about the  assassinations आता इससे ये दो ट्रायल और सम्बन्धित  records .
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is  अत्यधिक विवादास्पद क्युकी the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of संसार युद्ध  I one month later .
Renée Kathleen  zellweger ( born अप्रैल 25 , 1969 ) is  an American actress and producer .
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ) , and subsequently received two nominations  लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as ब्रिजेट जोन्स in the कॉमेडी ब्रिजेट जोन्स 's डायरी ( 2001 ) , और as roxie हार्ट in the musical  Chicago ( 2002 ) .
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting  अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the नाटक ठंडा पहाड़  ( 2003 ) .
She has won an Academy Award , three Golden Globe Awards , three  स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार , और a bafta पुरस्कार ; थी नामित hasty खीर 's स्त्री of the साल in 2009 ; और  established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007 .
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles )  हैं the तीन smallest हड्डियों in the इंसान देह , the malleus , the incus और the stapes  .
वे हैं contained भीतर the मध्य कान स्पेस और serve  to transmit sounds from the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ) .
The absence  of the auditory ossicles होता  constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing loss .
The  पद `` ossicles '' वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` छोटा हड्डियों '' और commonly  refers to the auditory ossicles , though the term may refer to any small bone throughout the body .
The New Covenant ( Hebrew • • —  यूनानी • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical निर्वचन  originally derived from a phrase in the Book of Jeremiah , in the Hebrew Scriptures .
It is often thought of as an eschatological  मुक्तिदाता आयु or संसार to आइये और is सम्बन्धित to the  biblical concept of the Kingdom of God .
Generally , Christians believe that the New Covenant was instituted at the Last  भोजन as भाग of the eucharist , जिससे in the इन्जील of जॉन शामिल  the New Commandment .
There are several Christian eschatologies that further define the New Covenant , as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an ongoing  संबंध between ईसाई ईमानवालों और परमेश्वर कि होगा be in पूरा फलीभूत बाद the दूसरी coming of मसीह ; कि is , it होगा  not only be in full fruition in believing hearts , but in the future external world as well .
The connection between the Blood of  मसीह और the नई वचन is देखी in सबसे आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद  of the New Testament with the saying : `` this cup that is poured out for you is the new covenant in my blood '' .
Christians  मानना कि यीशु is the मध्यस्थ of the नई वचन , और कि the रक्त  of Christ shed at his crucifixion is the required blood of the covenant .
As with all covenants between God and  man वर्णित in the बाइबल , the नई वचन is माना `` a बंध in रक्त sovereignly  administered by God . ''
It has been theorized that the New  वचन is the विधि of मसीह as बोला दौरान उसके उपदेश  on the Mount .
The following List of people  pardoned or granted दया by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  documents the most prominent cases of each presidency .
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II , Section 2 , Clause 1 ) , Presidents  have the शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया in एक or अधिक of the following तरीके : the क्षमता to ग्रान्ट a पूरा pardon  , to commute a sentence , or to rescind a fine .
U.S. Presidents have  no शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया  for crimes prosecuted under state law .
As to the  अंतर between a  pardon and a commutation:
A pardon is an  कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम vacating a conviction  .
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone currently serving a sentence  लिये a अपराधों pursuant to a conviction , बगैर vacating  the conviction itself .
Approximately 20,000 pardons and  clemencies यहूद जारी by u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों in  the 20th century alone .
The records of acts of clemency  यहूद पब्लिक जबतक 1934  .
In 1981 the  दफ्तर of the pardon attorney थी निर्मित और रिकॉर्ड इससे अध्यक्ष  H. W. Bush forward are now listed .
इस सूची शामिल  pardons and commutations .
Tampa (  ) is a नगर in  the U.S. state of Florida .
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County and is located on the  वेस्ट coast of फ्लोरिडा , on tampa खाड़ी निकट the  Gulf of Mexico .
The population  of tampa in 2011  was 346,037 .
The current  स्थान of tampa थी एकबार inhabited by स्वदेशी peoples of the सुरक्षा हार्बर  culture , most notably the Tocobaga and the Pohoy , who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay .
It was briefly explored by Spanish explorers in  the जल्दी 16th सदी , लकिन वहीँ यहूद no स्थाई अमरीकी or यूरोपीय settlements भीतर आज  's city limits until after the United States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819 .
In 1824 , the United States Army established a frontier outpost  पुकारा फोर्ट ब्रुक at the मुँह  of the Hillsborough River , near the site of today 's Tampa Convention Center .
The first civilian  निवासियों यहूद pioneers जो settled निकट the फोर्ट लिये सुरक्षा इससे the  nearby Seminole population .
The town grew slowly until the 1880s  , जब रेलरोड कड़ी , the डिस्कवरी of फास्फेट , और the आगमन of the सिगार उद्योग jump-started tampa 's विकास  and helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s .
Today ,  tampa is a भाग of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल सबसे  commonly referred to as the Tampa Bay Area .
For U.S. Census purposes , Tampa is part of the Tampa-St.  petersburg-clearwater , फ्लोरिडा महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million residents , making it the second largest  महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ( एमएसए ) in the राज्य , और the चौथी largest in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य , पीछे  Miami , Washington , D.C. , and Atlanta .
The Greater Tampa Bay area has just over  4 लाख निवासियों और generally शामिल the  Tampa and Sarasota metro areas .
The Tampa Bay Partnership and U.S. Census data showed an average annual growth of 2.47 percent ,  or a लाभ of लगभग 97,000 निवासियों प्रति साल .
Between 2000 and 2006 , the Greater Tampa Bay Market experienced a  संयुक्त विकास रेट of 14.8 प्रतिशत , growing इससे 3.4 लाख to 3.9 लाख और  hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1 , 2007 .
A  2012 अनुमान shows the tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल जनसांख्यिकी to have  4,310,524 people and a 2017 projection of 4,536,854 people .
Tampa has a  क्रमांक of खेल टीमों , ऐसे as the tampa खाड़ी buccaneers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग , the  Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League , and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League .
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League  बेसबॉल और the tampa खाड़ी rowdies of the उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग खेल उनके  home games in neighboring St. Petersburg , Florida .
In  2008 , tampa थी क्रमित  as the 5th best outdoor city by Forbes .
A 2004 survey by the NYU newspaper Washington Square  न्यूज क्रमित tampa as a शीर्ष नगर लिये `` twenty-somethings . ''
Tampa is now ranked as a ``  गामा '' संसार नगर by loughborough  University .
According to  loughborough , tampa बाँधने alongside अन्य संसार  cities such as Phoenix , Santo Domingo , and Osaka .
In recent years Tampa has seen a notable upsurge in  high-market माँग इससे उपभोक्ता , signaling अधिक माल concentrated  in the area .
Tampa hosted the 2012 Republican  नेशनल सम्मेलन  .
The Chevrolet Cavalier was a compact  ऑटोमोबाइल उत्पादित इससे 1982 to  2005 by General Motors .
Built on the company 's  j मंच , the cavalier उत्पादित the उच्चतम  sales in 1984 .
AT & T Mobility LLC branded and  referred to as at & t ( formerly cingular बेतार llc ) , is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of at & t inc. कि provides बेतार सेवाएं to 107 लाख सदस्य  in the United States , including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands .
AT & T Mobility is the second largest wireless telecommunications  प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य और प्यूर्टो रीको , पीछे verizon  Wireless , which serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012 .
AT & T Mobility is  headquartered in the lenox पार्क क्षेत्रफल of dekalb co.  Georgia , just outside Atlanta .
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC from 2000 to 2007 , a joint venture between SBC Communications and BellSouth , the company acquired the old AT &  t बेतार in 2004 ; sbc बाद acquired the असली at & t  and re-branded as `` AT & T '' .
cingular became wholly स्वामित्व by at & t in  December 2006 as a result of AT & T 's acquisition of BellSouth .
In January 2007 , Cingular confirmed it would re-brand  itself अंतर्गत the at & t नाम .
Although the legal corporate name change  occurred तत्काल , लिये दोनो नियामक और brand-awareness कारण दोनो ब्रांड्स यहूद प्रयुक्त in the कम्पनी 's साइनेज  and advertising during a transition period .
The  परिवर्तन concluded in लेट जून  , just prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone .
On March  20 , 2011 , at & t गतिशीलता घोषित  its intention to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 billion .
If it had  प्राप्त सरकारी और नियामक स्वीकृति , at & t  would have had more than 130 million subscribers .
However , the U.S. Department of Justice , the Federal  संचार आयोग , और at & t गतिशीलता 's प्रतिस्पर्धी ( ऐसे as स्प्रिंट nextel ) opposed  the move on the grounds that it would reduce competition in the cellular communications market .
In December 2011 , in the face of both  सरकारी और फैली उपभोक्ता विपक्ष , at & t withdrew उनके प्रस्ताव  to complete the merger .
Martin Luther  किंग , jr. ( जनवरी 15 , 1929 – अप्रैल 4 , 1968 ) थी  an American clergyman , activist , and leader in the African-American Civil Rights Movement .
He is best known for his role in  the उन्नति of सिविल अधिकारों using  nonviolent civil disobedience .
King has  become a नेशनल प्रतीक  in the history of American progressivism .
A Baptist minister , King  became a सिविल अधिकारों activist जल्दी in उसके करियर  .
He led the 1955 Montgomery Bus  बहिष्कार और helped मिला the दक्षिणी ईसाई  Leadership Conference ( SCLC ) in 1957 , serving as its first president .
With the SCLC , King led  an unsuccessful संघर्ष विरूद्ध पृथक्करण in albany , जॉर्जिया , in 1962 , और व्यवस्थित nonviolent विरोध in बर्मिंघम , अलबामा , कि आकर्षित नेशनल  attention following television news coverage of the brutal police response .
King also helped to  व्यवस्थित the 1963 कूच on वॉशिंगटन , जहाँ he वितरित  his `` I Have a Dream `` speech .
There , he established his reputation as one of  the महानतम orators in अमरीकी  history .
He also established his reputation  as a कट्टरपंथी , और became an ऑब्जेक्ट of the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन 's cointelpro लिये  the rest of his life .
FBI agents investigated him  लिये संभावित कम्युनिस्ट ties , अंकित उसके extramarital liaisons और reported  on them to government officials , and on one occasion , mailed King a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit suicide .
On October  14 , 1964 , किंग प्राप्त the नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार लिये  combating racial inequality through nonviolence .
In 1965 , he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to Montgomery marches and the following year  , he took the गति उत्तर to शिकागो  .
In the final years of his life , King expanded  उसके फ़ोकस to शामिल गरीबी और the वियतनाम युद्ध , alienating  many of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam '' .
King was planning a  नेशनल occupation of वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , पुकारा the  Poor People 's Campaign .
King was assassinated  on अप्रैल 4 , 1968 , in  Memphis , Tennessee .
His death was followed by riots  in अनेक u.S. शहरों  .
Allegations that James  अर्ल रे , the man convicted of हत्या किंग , था महरूम framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट साथ सरकारी एजेंटों persisted  for decades after the shooting , and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King .
King was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom and the  congressional सुनहरा पदक  posthumously .
Martin Luther King , Jr.  दिन थी स्थापित as a u.S. संघीय  holiday in 1986 .
Hundreds of streets in the U.S. have been  renamed in उसके सम्मान .
A memorial statue on the  नेशनल मॉल थी खोली  to the public in 2011 .
the बाघ ( पेंथेरा tigris ) is the largest  cat species , reaching a total body length of up to and weighing up to .
It is the third  largest जमीन carnivore ( पीछे तभी the ध्रुवीय भालू  and the brown bear ) .
Its most recognizable  विशेषता is a पैटर्न of अंधेरा लंबवत धारियाँ on reddish-orange  fur with a lighter underside .
It has exceptionally  stout दांत , और the canines हैं the longest among  living felids with a crown height of as much as or even .
In zoos , tigers have lived for 20  to 26 सालो , जिससे भी seems to be उनके आयु in  the wild .
They are territorial and generally solitary but social animals  , प्रायः requiring विशाल संलग्न क्षेत्रों of आवास कि support  their prey requirements .
This , coupled with the fact that  वे हैं स्वदेशी to कुछ of the अधिक densely आबादी  places on Earth , has caused significant conflicts with humans .
Tigers  एकबार ranged widely आरपार एशिया , इससे तुर्कों in the वेस्ट  to the eastern coast of Russia .
over the पास्ट 100 सालो , वे have खोया 93 % of उनके ऐतिहासिक दायरा , और have महरूम extirpated इससे  southwest and central Asia , from the islands of Java and Bali , and from large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia .
Today , they range from the Siberian  ताइगा to खोलें grasslands  and tropical mangrove swamps .
The remaining  छह बाघ subspecies have महरूम वर्गीकृत  as endangered by IUCN .
The global  जनसांख्यिकी in the जंगली is अनुमानित to क्रमांक between 3,062 और 3,948 individuals , bas इससे around 100,000  at the start of the 20th century , with most remaining populations occurring in small pockets isolated from each other .
Major reasons for population  मनाही शामिल आवास विनाश , आवास fragmentation  and poaching .
The extent of area occupied by tigers is estimated at  कम than , a 41 % मनाही इससे the क्षेत्रफल अनुमानित  in the mid-1990s .
Tigers are among the most  recognisable और लोकप्रिय of the संसार 's charismatic  megafauna .
They have featured prominently in ancient mythology and folklore ,  और continue to be चित्रित in आधुनिक films और साहित्य  .
Tigers appear on many flags , coats of  बाहें , और as mascots लिये sporting  teams .
The Bengal tiger is the national animal  of दोनो इण्डिया और बांग्लादेश  .
The simplified  आतंरिक ढांचा of a हरितलवक
Overview of the  calvin साईकिल और कार्बन  fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that  बदलें कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड  and other compounds into glucose .
These reactions occur in the  stroma , the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक बाहर of the thylakoid  membranes .
These  प्रतिक्रियाएँ लो the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और perform further रासायनिक  processes on them .
There are three  phases to the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ , collectively पुकारा  the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation , reduction reactions , and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite  इसके नाम , इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी  when light is available .
Plants do not  carry आउट the calvin  cycle by night .
They , instead  , रिलीज sucrose into the फ्लोएम  from their starch reserves .
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation , C4 carbon fixation , and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ;  कैम पौधे स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक रात्रि और रिलीज it by दिन in अनुक्रम to मेक इस प्रक्रम  work .
A linen handkerchief  साथ खींचा लड़ी कढ़ाई around  the edges
Linen  cloth बरामद इससे qumran गुफा  1 near the Dead Sea .
Linen ( ) is a textile  बना इससे the मछली of the flax संयंत्र , linum usitatissimum  .
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture  , लकिन जब it is बना into garments , it is valued लिये इसके  exceptional coolness and freshness in hot weather .
The word `` linen '' is of West Germanic  उत्पत्ति और cognates साथ the लैटिन नाम लिये the flax संयंत्र linum , और the  earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ) .
This word history has given rise to a number of other terms in English  , the सबसे notable of जिससे is the अंग्रेज़ी शब्द लकीर , निकला इससे the उपयोग of  a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line .
Textiles in a linen weave texture , even  जब बना of कपास , गांजा और अन्य non-flax  fibers are also loosely referred to as `` linen '' .
Such fabrics generally  have उनके अपना विशिष्ट names अन्य than लिनेन ; लिये उदाहरण , ठीक कपास धागे in a linen-style  weave is called Madapolam .
The collective term `` linens `` is still often used  generically to describe a क्लास of woven और भी knitted bed , नहाना , तालिका  and kitchen textiles .
the नाम linens is retained क्युकी traditionally  , linen was used for many of these items .
In the past , the word `` linens '' was also used to mean lightweight undergarments  ऐसे as शर्ट , chemises , waistshirts , lingerie ( a शब्द भी cognate साथ लिनेन ) , और detachable कमीज़ छल्लों और cuffs , जिससे यहूद  historically made almost exclusively out of linen .
the अंदर cloth परत of ठीक कम्पोजिट कपडे garments (  as for example jackets ) was traditionally made of linen , and this is the origin of the word lining .
Linen textiles appear to be some  of the oldest in the संसार : उनके इतिहास goes वापस  many thousands of years .
Fragments of  स्ट्रॉ , बीज , मछली , yarns , और विभिन्न प्रकार of fabrics जिससे तिथि वापस to परिचय 8000  BC have been found in Swiss lake dwellings .
dyed flax मछली मिला in a प्रागैतिहासिक गुफा in जॉर्जिया सुझाएँ the उपयोग of  woven linen fabrics from wild flax may date back even earlier to 36,000 BP .
Linen was sometimes  प्रयुक्त as करेंसी in प्राचीन  Egypt .
Egyptian mummies were  लपेटा in लिनेन क्युकी it थी देखी  as a symbol of light and purity , and as a display of wealth .
Some of these fabrics , woven from hand spun yarns ,  यहूद बहुत ठीक लिये उनके दिन , लकिन हैं coarse compared  to modern linen .
Today , linen  is प्रायः an महंगी वस्त्र  , and is produced in relatively small quantities .
It has a long `` staple '' (  व्यक्तिगत रेशा लंबाई ) सापेक्ष  to cotton and other natural fibers .
Many products are made of linen : aprons , bags , towels ( swimmers , bath , beach , body and wash towels ) ,  napkins , bed linens , लिनेन चौके , धावक , कुर्सी कवर  , and men 's & women 's wear .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football competition contested by the senior men 's  नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération  Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has  महरूम awarded प्रत्येक चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट  in 1930 , except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War .
The current champions are Spain , who  जीती the 2010 टूर्नामेंट  .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues  भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस  phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification  phase , जिससे फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the  preceding three years , is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been  जीती by आठ अलग नेशनल टीमों  .
Brazil have won five  टाइम्स , और वे हैं the तभी टोली to have निभाई in  every tournament .
The other World Cup winners are Italy , with four titles ; Germany ,  साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे , साथ दो शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और इंग्लैण्ड  , France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1  लाख लोगों देखी the फाइनल मैच of the 2006 फीफा  World Cup held in Germany .
The next three  संसार cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014 , रूस in  2018 , and Qatar in 2022 .
The is an expansion  यंत्र लिये the वी रिमोट वीडियो खेल नियंत्रक लिये the वी कि  allows it to more accurately capture complex motion .
According to Nintendo , the sensor in the device  पूरक the accelerometer और सेंसर बार सामर्थ्य of the वी रिमोट to enable क्रियाएँ to be rendered  identically on the screen in real time .
the वी 's successor कंसोल , the वी u , supports the वी motionplus और  its peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary .
Majulah  singapura ( onward सिंगापुर ) is the नेशनल  anthem of Singapore .
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a theme song for official functions of the City Council of Singapore , the song was  चयनित in 1959 as the द्वीप 's गान जब it attained self-government  .
Upon full independence in 1965 , Majulah  singapura थी formally अपनाया as सिंगापुर 's नेशनल  anthem .
By law the  गान may तभी be सुंग साथ इसके असली मलय गीत , हालांकि वहीँ मौजूद प्राधिकृत अनुवाद of the गीत  of the anthem in Singapore 's three other official languages : English , Mandarin and Tamil .
Originally composed in the key of G  प्रमुख , in 2001 the नेशनल गान थी officially relaunched in the निम्नतर कुंजी of f प्रमुख as इस थी कहा to allow  for a `` grander and more inspiring arrangement '' .
The national anthem is regularly performed or sung in schools and armed forces camps at ceremonies held at the beginning and/or  the समाप्त of प्रत्येक दिन , दौरान जिससे the नेशनल ध्वज is भी उठाया और  lowered and the national pledge is taken .
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on occasions of national  जश्न or नेशनल significance ऐसे as at the नेशनल दिन परेड , at नेशनल दिन observance ceremonies  conducted by educational institutions and government departments , and at sporting events at which Singapore teams are participating .
An  expedition 's shipwrights भवन  a brigantine , 1541 .
Shipbuilding is  the निर्माण of जहाजों और  floating vessels .
It normally  takes प्लेस in a specialized सुविधा ज्ञात  as a shipyard .
Shipbuilders , also called shipwrights ,  follow a specialized occupation कि traces इसके  roots to before recorded history .
Shipbuilding and ship repairs , both  वाणिज्यिक और सैन्य , हैं  referred to as `` naval engineering '' .
the निर्माण of नौकाएँ  is a similar activity called boat building .
The  dismantling of जहाजों is पुकारा जलयान  breaking .
Wakonda is a  कस्बा in मिट्टी काउंटी , दक्षिण  Dakota , United States .
The population  थी 321 at the 2010  census .
The following is a list of  the सबसे populous incorporated  places of the United States of America .
As defined by the United States Census Bureau , an `` incorporated place `` includes a  किस्में of designations , सहित नगर , कस्बा , गाँव , बरो , और नगरपालिका  .
A few exceptional Census Designated Places (  cdps ) हैं भी शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated  places .
Consolidated  city-counties represent a पृथक  type of government that includes the entire population of a county , or county equivalent .
Some  संचित city-counties , however , शामिल अनेक  incorporated places .
This list presents  तभी कि portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of ऐसे संचित  city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated place .
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual  municipalities भीतर उनके पारिभाषित हद , जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities  or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
A different ranking is evident  जब considering u.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations  .

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress  बिंब , homebrew वीडियो खेल और डाउनलोड वाणिज्यिक  games ( since the Nintendo DS is not sold with a rewritable storage medium ) .
Licensed developers , however , can use a blue  बुद्धिमान प्रणालियों नाइट्रो emulator बक्सा  to flash cards .
These devices are  भी ज्ञात as `` flashcarts ''  or `` flashcards '' .
There are two main classes of  flashcarts : पुरानी डिवाइस जिससे अनुरूप in slot-2 ( the खेल लड़के अग्रिम खेल पाक स्लॉट  ) and newer devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ) .
slot-2 ( or first-generation ) डिवाइस have महरूम historically सस्ता due to economies of स्केल ( inherited  from their use with Game Boy Advance ) , but require a booting tool in Slot-1 in order to use the touch screen and other DS features .
second-generation डिवाइस ( those जिससे तभी उपयोग slot-1 ) do नहीं कार्य साथ  GBA homebrew , but became less expensive and easier to use , rivaling many Slot-2 devices in price .
first-generation डिवाइस शामिल gba फ्लैश कारतूस  , GBAMP CF , SuperCard , and M3 .
second-generation डिवाइस शामिल r4 क्रान्ति  , CycloDS , G6 Real and DS-X .
The storage device  either contains फ्लैश मेमोरी or a स्लॉट लिये  a memory card to store homebrew .
Storage devices with a  memory-card स्लॉट प्रायः have अधिक भंडार  capacity than flash-memory devices .
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( Mb ) , memory-card  क्षमता is प्रायः measured in मेगाबाइट ( mb ) ( जहाँ 8  Mb is 1 MB ) .
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; DS and Game Boy  अग्रिम roms ; खास सुविधाएँ ( ऐसे as क्षमता to खेल मीडिया फाइलें ) ; शारीरिक आकार  and cost .
Strictly speaking , a storage device  is नहीं जरुरी लिये ds साथ flashme संस्थापित क्युकी  homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB .
However ,  इस is नहीं an easily-portable विधि क्युकी the ds needs  to be within range of a suitable Wi-Fi card .
हैं अमरीकी लोगों of जापानी  heritage .
Japanese  अमेरिकी have historically महरूम among the तीन largest एशियाई अमरीकी समुदायों , लकिन in हाल दशकों , it रै  become the sixth largest group at roughly 1,304,286 , including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity .
In the 2010 census , the largest Japanese American  समुदायों यहूद मिला in कैलिफ़ोर्निया साथ 272,528 , हवाई साथ 185,502 , नई यॉर्क साथ 37,780 ,  Washington with 35,008 , and Illinois with 17,542 .
Southern California has the largest  japanese-american जनसांख्यिकी  in North America .

This is a comprehensive  लिस्टिंग जिससे हाइलाइट significant उपलब्धियाँ और माइलस्टोन आधारित upon बिलबोर्ड  magazine 's singles charts , most notably the Billboard Hot 100 .
This list spans  इससे the समस्या दिनाँक जनवरी  1 , 1955 to present .
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the issue dated August 4 , 1958 , and is currently the  मानक लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक चार्ट in the संयुक्त  States .
Prior to the creation of the Hot 100 , Billboard published  चार singles चार्ट : `` बेहतरीन विक्रेता in स्टोर्स '' , `` सबसे निभाई by jockeys '' , `` सबसे  Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 '' .
These charts , which  ranged इससे 20 to 100 स्लॉट , यहूद phased  out at different times between 1957 and 1958 .
Though technically not part of the Hot 100 chart history , their data is included for computational purposes , and to avoid  unenlightening or भ्रामक  characterizations .
All items listed below are  इससे the hot 100 era , जबतक वरना  noted ( pre-Hot 100 charts ) .
V is an American science fiction television  श्रेणी कि भागा लिये दो सीज़न on एबीसी , इससे नवम्बर 3 , 2009 to  March 15 , 2011 .
A  रीमेक of the 1983 miniseries निर्मित by केनेथ जॉनसन , the नई श्रेणी क्रॉनिकल्स the आगमन on धरती of a technologically  advanced alien species which ostensibly comes in peace , but actually has sinister motives .
V stars Morena Baccarin , Lourdes Benedicto ,  मॉरिस शाहबलूत , जोएल gretsch , लोगन huffman , चार्ल्स mesure , एलिज़ाबेथ मिशेल , लौरा vandervoort और स्कॉट भेड़िया , और थी कार्यपालिका उत्पादित  by Scott Rosenbaum , Yves Simoneau , Scott Peters , and Jace Hall .
The series was produced by The Scott  पीटर्स कम्पनी , hdfilms और warner भाईs. टेलीविज़न  .
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity , in which the participants use a Global Positioning System ( GPS ) receiver or  मोबाईल यंत्र और अन्य navigational तकनीकों to छुपा और तलाश containers , पुकारा `` geocaches '' or `` caches '' , anywhere  in the world .
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook where the  geocacher enters the तिथि वे मिला it और लक्षण it साथ उनके स्थापित  code name .
बाद हस्ताक्षर into the log , the संचय  must be placed back exactly where the person found it .
Larger containers such as plastic storage containers ( Tupperware or similar ) or ammunition boxes can also contain  वस्तुएं लिये व्यापार , प्रायः खिलौने or trinkets of छोटी मान  .
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking , trigpointing ,  orienteering , treasure-hunting , letterboxing , और  waymarking .
Boogie Down Productions was a hip hop group  कि थी originally रचित of krs-one  , D-Nice , and DJ Scott La Rock .
DJ Scott La Rock was murdered on  अगस्त 27 , 1987 , महीने बाद the रिलीज of bdp 's डेब्यू एल्बम  , Criminal Minded .
The name of the group , Boogie Down ,  गर्भाशयी इससे a उपनाम लिये the दक्षिण bronx खण्ड of the bronx , एक  of the five boroughs of New York City .
The  समूह pioneered the संलयन of डांसहॉल रेगी और हिप हॉप म्यूज़िक और उनके डेब्यू lp दण्ड minded contained  frank descriptions of life in the South Bronx of the late 1980s thus setting the stage for what would eventually become gangsta rap .
A municipal bond is a bond issued by a local  सरकारी , or उनके एजेंसियों  .
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states , cities , counties , redevelopment agencies ,  special-purpose जिले , स्कूल जिले , पब्लिक यूटिलिटी जिले , सरेआम स्वामित्व एयरपोर्ट  and seaports , and any other governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below the state level .
Municipal bonds  may be सामान्य दायित्वों of the जारीकर्ता or secured  by specified revenues .
In the United States , interest income received by  धारकों of नगरपालिका bonds is प्रायः exempt इससे the संघीय आय कर और इससे the आय कर of the राज्य in जिससे वे हैं  issued , although municipal bonds issued for certain purposes may not be tax exempt .
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought to market with price restrictions until the deal  is बेची , नगरपालिका bonds हैं फ़्री to व्यापार at कोई समय एकबार वे हैं खरीदा by the  investor .
पेशेवर व्यापारियों regularly व्यापार और retrade  the same bonds several times a week .
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written by Steve Winwood ,  स्पेंसर डेविस और muff winwood , और originally performed by the स्पेंसर डेविस समूह  .
the मौलिक रिफ of the सोंग थी उधार इससे the होमर बैंको सोंग  `` ( Ai n't That ) A Lot of Love '' , written by Banks and Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker .
`` Gim me Some  lovin ' '' थी a uk # 2 in the पतझड़  of 1966 and a US # 7 .
The song is ranked # 247 on  the रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's सूची of the  500 Greatest Songs of All Time .
The version issued in the UK ( and probably most of Europe ) is different from that issued  in the us on the संयुक्त कलाकारों लेबल , होने धीमा , और lacking the बैकिंग vocals और `` सजीव  sounding '' performance found on the US single .
( The US  संस्करण रै अधिक प्रायः महरूम प्रयुक्त on reissue  CDs , even those coming from Europe . )
The  सिंगल सुविधाएँ the ध्वनि  of the Hammond B-3 organ .
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of information related  to films , टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम , और वीडियो खेल  .
This includes actors ,  उत्पादन क्रू कर्मियों , और  fictional characters featured in these three visual entertainment media .
It is one of the most popular online entertainment destinations , with over  100 लाख अद्वितीय उपयोक्ता प्रत्येक माह और a ठोस और rapidly growing मोबाईल उपस्थिति  .
IMDb was launched on October 17 , 1990  , और in 1998 थी acquired by  Amazon.com .
As of  अप्रैल 27 , 2013 , आईएमडीबी था 2,503,783 शीर्षक ( शामिल  episodes ) and 5,192,493 personalities in its database , as well as 43 million registered users .
The  जालस्थल रै an एलेक्सा रैंक  of 48 .
Fibre Channel  मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( 64-bit pci-x  card )
scsi मेजबान बस एडाप्टर  ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware , a host  नियंत्रक , मेजबान एडाप्टर , or मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( hba ) connects a मेजबान प्रणाली  ( the computer ) to other network and storage devices .
The  शर्तें हैं primarily प्रयुक्त to refer  to devices for connecting SCSI , Fibre Channel and eSATA devices .
However , devices  लिये connecting to आईडीई , ईथरनेट , firewire  , USB and other systems may also be called host adapters .
Recently , the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over Ethernet has brought about Ethernet HBAs ,  जिससे हैं अलग इससे ईथरनेट nics in कि वे शामिल टीसीपी offload इंजन .
There are also converged HBAs that support both Ethernet and  fibre चैनल पुकारा converged संजाल adapters  ( CNAs ) .
cashmere  Scarves
Modern  मेन 's cashmere sweaters  for sale .
cashmere ऊन , प्रायः बस ज्ञात as cashmere , is a रेशा  obtained from Cashmere goats and other types of goat .
The word  cashmere गर्भाशयी इससे an बूढ़ा स्पेलिंग  of Kashmir .
Cashmere  is ठीक in बनावट , दमदार  , light , and soft .
Garments made from it  provide बेहतरीन इन्सुलेशन  .
In  the संयुक्त राज्य , अंतर्गत the u.s . ऊन उत्पाद labeling अधिनियम of 1939 , as amended , ( 15 uction 68b ( a ) (  6 ) ) , states that a wool or textile product may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such wool  उत्पाद is the ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat  fibers produced by a cashmere goat ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the fiber of such wool product  करता नहीं exceed 19  microns ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3 percent ( by weight ) of cashmere  मछली साथ औसत diameters कि exceed 30 माइक्रोन  .
The average fiber diameter may be  विषय to a गुणांक of विभिन्नता around the औसत कि shall नहीं exceed  24 percent .
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the  मालिक और licensor of sofabed और चमड़े specialty खुदरा स्टोर्स in the संयुक्त राज्य , साथ स्टोर्स स्तिथ  throughout the Eastern seaboard , in the Midwest , on the West Coast and in the Southwest .
The company was founded in 1975  और is आधारित in woodbury , नई  York .
On July 19 , 2010 , the company announced that it  था दायर लिये दिवालियापन as a consequence of `` substantial  losses '' .
According to Furniture Today the  कम्पनी थी क्रमांक 48 among फर्नीचर रिटेलर साथ  US $ 114 million in sales for the year ending August 29 , 2009 .
It subsequently emerged from Chapter 11 under the  कंट्रोल of इसके प्रमुख प्रदायक , the haining mengnu  Group .
अंडा फेंकें is a पद प्रयुक्त  for many different foods around the world .
2__egg_roll __ किस्में of अंडा रोल्स हैं मिला in मेनलैंड चीन , अनेक chinese-speaking  regions of Asia , and Chinese immigrant communities around the world .
Egg  रोल्स as referred  to in China .
In Guangdong and Hong  काँग , अंडा फेंकें प्रायः refers  to biscuit roll .
This is a  प्रकार of  biscuit .
The  संघटक शामिल  egg , flour and sugar .
Egg roll also is a  डिश in कैण्टन और हांग काँग , इस is प्रायः  made with vegetable .
Within China egg  रोल्स हैं खाया predominantly in the southeast और हैं  not as commonly consumed in the north and western parts of China .
In American Chinese  भोजन , an अंडा फेंकें is a savory डिश typically परोसा as  an appetizer .
It is usually stuffed with chicken , pork or shrimp , cabbage , carrots ,  टमाटर , सेम sprouts और अन्य सब्जियां , और तब गहन fried  .
This variety of the egg roll is very  आम और लोकप्रिय , आरपार भी क्षेत्रीय किस्में of अमरीकी चाइनीज खाना , और is प्रायः शामिल as भाग of a `` संयोजन  platter '' .
In  मॉन्ट्रियल , कनाडा , open-ended eggrolls  are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish .
वे can be either  kosher certified or merely kosher style .
Pain and suffering is the legal term  लिये the शारीरिक और emotional तनाव caused इससे an चोट ( देखिए भी  pain and suffering ) .
Some damages that might be under  इस श्रेणी होता be : aches , अस्थाई  and permanent limitations on activity , potential shortening of life , depression or scarring .
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an injury , it is common for someone to seek  धन दोनो in मुआवजे लिये वास्तविक धन कि is खोया और लिये the पीड़ा  and stress associated with virtually any injury .
In a suit , pain and suffering is part of the `` general damages ''  खण्ड of the claimant 's अर्जी , or , alternatively , it is an तत्व of `` compensatory '' non-economic क्षतिपूर्ति कि allows रिकवरी लिये the दिमागी anguish  and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress .
Apart from money damages awarded in trial , money damages are also given informally outside the judicial system in mediations , arbitration ( both  of जिससे may be अदालत annexed or गैर litigated दावा ) as खूब  as in routine insurance settlements .
Individual claimants or those represented by  वकील प्रायः उपस्थित मांगे to insurers to settle  for money .
These demand for  bodily चोट मुआवजे monies  often set out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings .
Demands are usually written  summaries of a claimant 's चिकित्सा परवाह और the तथ्य जिससे resulted  in the injury .
Sample of a  medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी stampin
the  संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा , a medallion हस्ताक्षर  guarantee is a special signature guarantee for the transfer of securities .
It is a guarantee by the  transferring वित्तीय संस्था कि  the signature is genuine and the financial institution accepts liability for any forgery .
Signature  guarantees protect शेयरधारकों by preventing  unauthorized transfers and possible investor losses .
They also limit the liability of  the ट्रांसफ़र एजेंट  who accepts the certificates .
Different institutions have different  नीतियों as to कया प्रकार of पहचान वे आवश्यकता to provide the गारंटी और whether  they charge a fee for such service ( usually nominal if any ) .
Most institutions will not guarantee a signature  of किसी जो रै नहीं already महरूम उनके ग्राहक  .
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public , in the sense that a `` signature guarantee ''  is a प्रमाणन by the संस्था कि the हस्ताक्षर is प्रामाणिक , और an acknowledgment is a प्रमाणन by a नोटरी पब्लिक  attesting that the signer signed a document voluntarily .
Some banks may no longer provide this service ,  however , अनेक स्टिल do as खूब as अन्य वित्तीय संस्थानों ऐसे as  a Savings and Loans and Credit Unions .
At their sole discretion , these institutions  may स्टिल मनाही to provide the medallion हस्ताक्षर  Guarantees .
When US citizens are abroad , some financial  संस्थानों may accept संयुक्त राज्य दूतावास seals , in प्लेस of the medallion  Signature Guarantee Stamp .
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked at a junkyard on  टर्मिनल द्वीप , लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया ,  March 1956
The General Motors streetcar conspiracy ( also known as the Great American streetcar scandal ) refers to allegations and convictions in  संबंध to a कार्यक्रम by सामान्य मोटर्स ( gm ) और अन्य कंपनियाँ जो खरीदा और तब dismantled स्ट्रीटकार और इलेक्ट्रिक ट्रैन  systems in many American cities .
Between 1936 and 1950 , National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM , Firestone Tire  , मानक आयल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , phillips पेट्रोलियम , mack ट्रक  , and the Federal Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction systems in 45 cities including Baltimore , Newark , Los Angeles , New York City , Oakland and San Diego and converted them into bus operation .
Several of the companies involved were convicted in 1949 of conspiracy to monopolize interstate commerce but were  acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the स्वामित्व of ये कंपनियाँ  .
Some suggest that this program played a key role in the  मनाही of पब्लिक पारगमन in शहरों आरपार the संयुक्त राज्य ; notably एडविन J. quinby , जो पहला खींचा ध्यान to the कार्यक्रम in 1946 , और तब ब्रैडफोर्ड C. snell , an anti-trust attorney  for the United States Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to national awareness .
Both Quinby and Snell  argued कि the deliberate विनाश of streetcars थी भाग of a larger रणनीति to धक्का the  United States into automobile dependency .
Others say that independent economic factors brought about changes in the transit system , including the Great Depression , the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 , labor unrest , market  शक्तियां , rapidly increasing ट्रैफ़िक जमघट , शहरी sprawl , कराधान नीतियों कि favored निजी गाडी स्वामित्व  , and general enthusiasm for the automobile .
One writer on the subject has suggested that Snell and  अन्य गिरी into simplistic षड्यंत्र सिद्धान्त सोच , bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` clearly , gm waged a युद्ध on  electric traction .
It was indeed an all out assault , but by  no अर्थात् the सिंगल कारण लिये the विफलता  of rapid transit .
Also , it is just as  साफ कि क्रियाएँ और inactions by सरकारी contributed  significantly to the elimination of electric traction . ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective  rail-based शहरी हस्तांतरण प्रणालियों आधारित on streetcars or trams , सहित न्यूर्क , फिलाडेल्फिया , सैन फ्रांसिस्को , पिट्सबर्ग , और बोस्टन ;  others are re-introducing them .
The  स्टोरी रै महरूम छान अनेक टाइम्स in छपाई , फिल्मी और अन्य मीडिया , notably in जो framed  Roger Rabbit , Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia .
Corwin House , Salem , Massachusetts  , निर्मित ca . 1660 ,  First Period English
American colonial architecture includes several  भवन डिज़ाइन शैलियाँ संबद्ध साथ the औपनिवेशिक काल of the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित पहला काल अंग्रेज़ी  ( late-medieval ) , French Colonial , Spanish Colonial , Dutch Colonial and Georgian .
These styles are associated with the houses ,  चर्च और सरकारी इमारतें of the  period from about 1600 through the 19th century .
`` In the Mood '' is a  बिग बैंड era # 1 hit अंकित by अमरीकी bandleader  Glenn Miller .
It topped the charts in 1940 in  the u.S. और एक साल बाद थी प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म सूर्य घाटी  Serenade .
In 1999 , National Public Radio ( NPR ) included the 1939 Glenn Miller recording on RCA Bluebird on the NPR 100 , the  सूची of `` the 100 सबसे महत्वपूर्ण अमरीकी musical  works of the 20th century '' .
वरुण  logo
The  वरुण कनाडा प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s पहला regional-scale  underwater ocean observatory that plugs directly into the Internet .
चूंकि दिसम्बर 2009 , it रै अनुमत लोगों to `` लहरे '' the seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों चलाएं deep-water प्रयोग  from labs and universities around the world .
Along with its sister project , VENUS ,  वरुण offers a अद्वितीय दृष्टिकोण to समंदर  science .
Traditionally , ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based  satellites to carry आउट उनके शोध , जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट उपयोग a remotely संचालित क्रॉलर  .
A gramophone  रिकार्ड , commonly ज्ञात as a फोनोग्राफ रिकार्ड ( in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी ) , विनाइल  record ( in reference to vinyl , the material most commonly used after about 1950 ) , or colloquially , `` a record '' , is an analog sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed , modulated spiral groove .
The groove  प्रायः starts निकट the periphery और  ends near the center of the disc .
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch , 10-inch ,  7-inch , इत्यादि . ) , the rotational गति at जिससे वे हैं निभाई ( `` 33 आरपीएम `` , `` 78 '' , `` 45 '' , इत्यादि . ) , उनके समय क्षमता ( `` long playing '' ) , उनके reproductive सटीकता , or  `` fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '' , `` Orthophonic '' , `` full-range '' , etc . ) , and the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono `` , `` stereo `` , `` quadraphonic `` , etc . ) .
Phonograph records were the primary medium used for music reproduction for most of the 20th century , replacing the  फोनोग्राफ बेलन , साथ जिससे it था co-existed , by  the 1920s .
By the late 1980s , digital media had gained a larger  मार्केट share , और the  vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991 .
They continue  to be manufactured  and sold in the 21st century .
In 2008 , nearly  2.9 लाख इकाई shipped , the सबसे in कोई साल चूंकि  1998 and the format has continued to slowly regain popularity .
They are  विशेषकर प्रयुक्त by djs और audiophiles लिये अनेक  types of music .
as of 2013 , विनाइल रिकॉर्ड  continue to be used for distribution .
