grasslands हैं क्षेत्रों जहाँ the वनस्पति is वर्चस्व by grasses ( पोएसी ) , however  sedge ( Cyperaceae ) and rush ( Juncaceae ) families can also be found .
Grasslands occur naturally on all  महाद्वीपों मगर अंटार्कटिक .
In  शीतोष्ण latitudes , ऐसे as northwestern यूरोपीय और the ग्रेट मैदान और कैलिफ़ोर्निया in उत्तर अमेरिका , देशी grasslands हैं वर्चस्व  by perennial bunch grass species , whereas in warmer climates annual species form a greater component of the vegetation .
Grasslands are  मिला in सबसे ecoregions  of the Earth .
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications (  subdivisions ) of the शीतोष्ण grasslands , savannas , और shrublands बायोम ( ' ecosystem  ' ) , which is one of eight terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's surface .
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis , also called henna  पेड़ ) or हिना is a flowering संयंत्र , the एकमात्र प्रजाति in the genus  Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae .
The English name ``  हिना '' आता इससे the अरबी ( ala-lc : ḥinnāʾ / सुनाया ) or colloquially  , loosely pronounced .
The name is also used for dye  preparations निकला इससे the संयंत्र , और  for the art of temporary tattooing based on those dyes .
हिना रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता to डाई स्किन , बाल , और fingernails  , as well as fabrics including Silk , wool and leather .
Additionally , the name  is misused लिये अन्य स्किन और बाल dyes , ऐसे as ब्लैक  henna or neutral henna , which are not derived from the plant .
a पतला फिल्मी is a परत of सामग्री ranging इससे भिन्नों  of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness .
Electronic  सेमीकंडक्टर डिवाइस और ऑप्टिकल coatings हैं  the main applications benefiting from thin-film construction .
A familiar application of thin films is the household mirror , which typically has a thin  मेटल कोटिंग on the वापस of a चादर of कांच to रूप a  reflective interface .
the प्रक्रम of silvering थी एकबार commonly  used to produce mirrors .
A very-thin-film coating ( less than  a nanometer मोटा ) is प्रयुक्त to उपज two-way  mirrors .
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g . antireflective , or AR ,  coatings ) हैं typically उन्नत जब the thin-film कोटिंग consists of अनेक परतों having varying  thicknesses and refractive indices .
Similarly , a periodic structure of alternating thin films of different materials  may collectively रूप a so-called superlattice जिससे कारनामे the घटना  of quantum confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions .
कार्य is होने किया साथ ferromagnetic और ferroelectric पतला films  for use as computer memory .
It is  भी होने लागू to  pharmaceuticals , via thin-film drug delivery .
Thin-films are  प्रयुक्त to उपज  thin-film batteries .
Thin films are  भी प्रयुक्त in dye-sensitized  solar cells .
सिरेमिक पतला films हैं in  wide use .
The relatively high hardness and inertness of ceramic  सामग्री मेक इस प्रकार of पतला कोटिंग of ब्याज लिये सुरक्षा  of substrate materials against corrosion , oxidation and wear .
In particular , the  उपयोग of ऐसे coatings on कटिंग टूल्स can extend  the life of these items by several orders of magnitude .
Research  is होने किया on a नई क्लास of thin-film अकार्बनिक ऑक्साइड सामग्री , पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal  cation multicomponent oxides , which could be used to make transparent transistors that are inexpensive , stable , and environmentally benign .
Gears of War is a military science  fiction third-person शूटर वीडियो खेल विकसित by एपिक खेल और  published by Microsoft Game Studios .
It was initially released as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in North America ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया , और सबसे of यूरोपीय और शामिल a `` सीमित कलेक्टर 's संस्करण '' साथ added सामग्री और an आर्ट  book titled Destroyed Beauty that detailed much of the game 's back-story .
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity , a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in conjunction with People Can Fly and released a year  बाद , featuring नई सामग्री सहित  additional campaign levels , a new multiplayer game mode , and Games for Windows Live functionality .
The game  focuses on the सैनिकों of डेल्टा स्क्वाड as वे wield a हताश , last-ditch attempt  to save the remaining human inhabitants of the fictional planet Sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the Locust Horde .
the खिलाड़ी assumes the भूमिका of मार्कस fenix ( लकिन can भी  play as Dominic Santiago ) , a former prisoner and war-hardened soldier .
The game is based on the use of cover and strategic fire for the player to advance through the  scenarios ; a दूसरी खिलाड़ी can खेल cooperatively through the प्रमुख अभियान to  assist .
The game also features  अनेक ऑनलाइन एकाधिक खेल मोड्स लिये up to आठ खिलाड़ी .
Gears of War sold over three  लाख नक़ल in बस टेन सप्ताह और थी the fastest-selling वीडियो खेल of 2005 as खूब as  the second-most played game over Xbox Live during .
It currently stands as the 5th  बेहतरीन selling एक्सबॉक्स 360 खेल of सब  time .
The game has since sold  over पाँच लाख नक़ल by सितंबर  2008 .
The game was well received by critics , who praised its gameplay and detailed visuals , and it won several ``  खेल of the साल '' पुरस्कार  in 2006 .
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of War  मताधिकार , सहित the 2008 sequel गियर्स of युद्ध 2 और इसके follow-up , गियर्स of युद्ध 3 , जिससे थी released on सितंबर 20 , 2011 , बाद having initially महरूम नियत to have महरूम released on अप्रैल 5 , 2011  , the date upon which Epic Games ' Cliff Bleszinski was a guest on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon .
Adaptations to books , comics , as well  as a विशेषता फिल्मी हैं to  be expected .
A  पेड़ grows in ब्रुकलीन is  a 1943 novel written by Betty Smith .
The story focuses on  an irish-american परिवार in williamsburg  , Brooklyn , New York City .
The novel is  नियत in the पहला और दूसरी दशकों of  the 20th century .
the किताब थी an  immense success .
The main metaphor of the book is the hardy Tree of  स्वर्ग , देशी to चीन और ताईवान , अभी माना हृदयरोग , और आम  in the vacant lots of New York City .
संसार मैप साथ the intertropical  zone highlighted in red .
Tropical climate zones  of the धरती जहाँ सब बारह महीने have औसत  temperatures above 18 °C ( 64 °F ) .
The tropics is a region of  the धरती surrounding the equator  .
It is limited in latitude by  the tropic of कर्कट in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध at लगभग n और the tropic  of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; these latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth .
The  ऊष्णकटिबन्ध हैं भी referred to as the तीव्र मण्डल और the torrid मण्डल ( देखिए भौगोलिक  zone ) .
The tropics  शामिल सब the क्षेत्रों on the धरती जहाँ the सूर्य पहुँच  a point directly overhead at least once during the solar year .
The tropics are distinguished from the  अन्य climatic और biomatic regions of धरती , the मध्य latitudes और the ध्रुवीय regions  on either side of the equatorial zone .
For the INXS song , see What You  need ( सोंग ) .
`` What You Need '' is an episode of the American  टेलीविज़न anthology श्रेणी the गोधूलि  Zone .
It is based on the  छोटी स्टोरी of the वही नाम by लुईस padgett  ( Henry Kuttner and C. L. Moore ) .
PlayhouseSquare ,  in the क्लीवलैंड थिएटर ज़िला in शहर क्लीवलैंड , ओहियो , is the second-largest  theater complex in the United States , second only to New York City 's Lincoln Center ) .
Constructed in a span of 19 months in the  जल्दी 1920s , the थिएटर यहूद subsequently बंद bas , लकिन  were revived through a grassroots effort .
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new era of downtown  पुनरोद्धार in क्लीवलैंड , और थी पुकारा `` एक of the शीर्ष टेन सफलताओं  in Cleveland history . ''
The driver and passenger front airbags ,  बाद having महरूम तैनात , in a अंग्रेजों peugeot  306 car .
An airbag is a  गाडी सुरक्षा  device .
It is an occupant restraint system consisting of  a लचीली कपड़ा लिफाफा or cushion  designed to inflate rapidly during an automobile collision .
Its purpose is  to cushion occupants दौरान a क्रैश और provide सुरक्षा  to their bodies when they strike interior objects such as the steering wheel or a window .
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag modules in various  पक्ष और frontal स्थितियाँ of the यात्री seating स्थितियाँ , और सेंसर may तैनात एक or अधिक airbags in an प्रभाव मण्डल at परिवर्तनीय दरों आधारित on the प्रकार  , angle and severity of impact ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to severe frontal crashes .
Airbags  हैं सामान्यतः designed साथ the इरादे of supplementing the सुरक्षा  of an occupant who is correctly restrained with a seatbelt .
Most designs are  inflated through pyrotechnic अर्थात् और can तभी be संचालित  once .
Newer side-impact airbag modules  consist of संपीडित एयर सिलेंडर कि  are triggered in the event of a side impact vehicle impact .
The  पहला वाणिज्यिक डिजाइन यहूद introduced in यात्री  automobiles during the 1970s with limited success .
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in many markets during the late 1980s and early 1990s with a driver airbag , and a front passenger airbag as  खूब on कुछ गाड़ियाँ ; और अनेक आधुनिक वाहनों अभी शामिल चार  or more units .
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to report financial  सूचना to the आतंरिक आय सेवा ( irs ) of the संयुक्त  States .
They are used to report income , calculate  कर to be सशुल्क to the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य , और ज़ाहिर  other information as required by the Internal Revenue Code ( IRC ) .
There are over  800 विभिन्न  forms and schedules .
the best-known of ये is रूप  1040 used by individuals .
In the United States , driver 's licenses are issued by each individual state ( including Washington , D.C. and territories ) ,  बल्कि than the संघीय सरकारी क्युकी of the राजनैतिक अवधारणा of संघवाद  .
Drivers are  सामान्यतः जरूरी to obtain a अनुज्ञा इससे उनके राज्य of निवास और सब राज्य recognize प्रत्येक अन्य  's licenses for temporary visitors subject to normal age requirements .
A state may also suspend an individual 's  ड्राइविंग विशेषाधिकार भीतर इसके सीमायें लिये  traffic violations .
Many states  share a आम प्रणाली of अनुज्ञा वर्ग , साथ कुछ अपवाद , और वाणिज्यिक  license classes are standardized by federal regulation at 49 CFR part 383 .
China has been  the सोर्स of अनेक आविष्कारों , सहित the चार ग्रेट आविष्कारों  : papermaking , the compass , gunpowder , and printing ( both woodblock and movable type ) .
The list below contains  ये और अन्य आविष्कारों  .
The Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics ,  hydraulics , और गणित लागू to horology , metallurgy , खगोलशास्त्र , कृषि  , engineering , music theory , craftsmanship , nautics , and warfare .
By the Warring States Period ( 403–221 BC ) , they had advanced metallurgic technology , including the blast furnace and cupola  भट्टी , जबकि the finery forge और puddling प्रक्रम यहूद ज्ञात by  the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ) .
A sophisticated economic system in  चीन दिया जनम to आविष्कारों ऐसे as पेपर धन दौरान the सोंग  Dynasty ( 960–1279 ) .
The invention of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an array of inventions such as the fire  तलवार , जमीन मेरा , नवल मेरा , हाथ तोपों , exploding गोलों , multistage प्रक्षेपास्त्र , और प्रक्षेपास्त्र बम साथ aerodynamic विंग्स और विस्फोटक payloads  .
With the navigational aid of the  11th-century कम्पास और क्षमता to steer at ऊँची समुद्र साथ the 1st-century sternpost अरित्र , premodern चाइनीज sailors  sailed as far as East Africa and Egypt .
In water-powered clockworks , the premodern Chinese had used the escapement  यांत्रिकी चूंकि the 8th सदी और the अंतहीन power-transmitting  chain drive in the 11th century .
They also made large mechanical puppet theaters driven by waterwheels and  carriage पहियों और wine-serving  automatons driven by paddle wheel boats .
The  contemporaneous peiligang और pengtoushan संस्कृतियों  represent the oldest Neolithic cultures of China and were formed around 7000 BC .
Some of the first inventions of Neolithic , prehistoric China include semilunar and rectangular stone knives , stone hoes and spades , the  cultivation of बाजरा , राइस और the सोयाबीन , the refinement of sericulture , the भवन of rammed धरती structures साथ लाइम -plastered हाउस floors , the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's व्हील , the सृष्टि of pottery साथ  cord-mat-basket designs , the creation of pottery tripods and pottery steamers , and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination .
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and buffalo during the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c . 2000 BC ) period , the absence of Longshan-era irrigation or high-yield crops , full evidence of Longshan cultivation of dry-land cereal crops which gave high yields `` only when the soil was  carefully cultivated , '' सुझाएँ कि the हल थी ज्ञात at तनिक by the longshan संस्कृति काल और explains the ऊँची agricultural उत्पादन yields जिससे अनुमत the वृद्धि of चाइनीज सभ्यता दौरान the  Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c . 1050 BC ) .
With  बाद आविष्कारों ऐसे as the multiple-tube बीज ड्रिल और भारी moldboard आयरन  plow , China 's agricultural output could sustain a much larger population .
For the purposes of this list , inventions are regarded as technological firsts developed in China , and as such does not include foreign  technologies जिससे the चाइनीज acquired through सम्पर्क , ऐसे as the पवनचक्की इससे the मध्य ईस्ट or the दूरदर्शी  from Early modern Europe .
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere and later invented separately  by the चाइनीज , ऐसे as the ओडोमीटर और कड़ी  pump .
Scientific , mathematic or natural  discoveries , परिवर्तन in नाबालिग अवधारणाओं of डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल और कलाकारी  innovations can not be regarded as inventions and do not appear on the list .
Gross domestic product in 2011 US dollars per capita , adjusted for inflation and  खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी ( log स्केल ) इससे 1860 to 2011 , साथ जनसांख्यिकी ( डिस्क क्षेत्रफल ) लिये the us ( पीला ) , uk ( नारंगी ) , जापानी ( रेड ) , चीन ( रेड )  , and India ( blue ) .
Globalization ( or  globalisation—see स्पेलिंग मतभेद ) is the प्रक्रम of अंतरराष्ट्रीय संयोजन arising इससे the इंटरचेंज of संसार  views , products , ideas , and other aspects of culture .
Put in simple terms , globalization refers to  प्रक्रियाओं कि प्रचार world-wide  exchanges of national and cultural resources .
Advances in transportation and telecommunications infrastructure , including the rise of the Internet , are  प्रमुख कारकों in वैश्वीकरण , generating further interdependence  of economic and cultural activities .
Though several scholars place the origins of globalization in  आधुनिक टाइम्स , अन्य ट्रेस इसके इतिहास long पहले the यूरोपीय आयु of  discovery and voyages to the New World .
Some even trace the origins to  the तीसरा मिलेनियम  BCE .
Since the beginning of the 20th  सदी , the pace of वैश्वीकरण रै intensified at a रैपिड रेट  , especially during the Post Cold War era .
The term globalization  रै महरूम in increasing उपयोग चूंकि the mid-1980s और विशेषकर  since the mid-1990s .
In 2000 , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) पहचाना चार मौलिक पहलुओं of वैश्वीकरण : व्यापार और  transactions , capital and investment movements , migration and movement of people and the dissemination of knowledge .
Further , environmental challenges such as climate change , cross-boundary water and air  प्रदूषण , और over-fishing of the समंदर हैं linked साथ वैश्वीकरण  .
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by  कारोबार और कार्य संगठन , अर्थशास्त्र , socio-cultural  resources , and the natural environment .
The Replacements is a  2000 अमरीकी खेल कॉमेडी फिल्मी निर्देशित  by Howard Deutch .
It stars  कियानू रीव्स , जीन hackman , और ब्रुक  Langton .
An American  एयरलाइंस वायुयान takes बंद  from Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport .
This airport is  the एयरलाइन 's largest  hub .
अमरीकी एयरलाइंस उड़ता to 79 घरेलू गंतव्यों और 78 अंतरराष्ट्रीय गंतव्यों  in 48 countries .
(  as of दिसम्बर  2012 )
The list includes the city , country , the codes of the International Air Transport Association ( IATA airport code ) and the International Civil Aviation Organization ( ICAO airport code )  , और the विमानक्षेत्र 's नाम , साथ the एयरलाइन 's hubs , फ़ोकस शहरों  and seasonal destinations marked .
The list  भी contains गंतव्यों no longer  served by the airline , which are marked as terminated destinations .
It does not include destinations served for American Airlines by its regional affiliates  अमरीकी त्रिभुज एयरलाइंस , कार्यपालिका एयरलाइंस , और americanconnection  .
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a traditional Jamaican mento folk song , the best-known version of  जिससे थी सुंग by हैरी belafonte और an वैकल्पिक संस्करण  interspersed with another Jamaican folksong , Hill and Gully Rider , by Dame Shirley Bassey .
Despite the song 's mento  प्रभाव , `` day-o ( the banana नाव सोंग ) '' is widely ज्ञात  as an example of calypso music .
It is a work  सोंग , इससे the पाइंट of दृश्य of डॉक मजदूर working  the night shift loading bananas onto ships .
Daylight has come , the  शिफ़्ट is over और वे want उनके कार्य  to be counted up so that they can go home .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 July  1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918  .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its  occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939 , और the  First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of  जर्मनी , austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन , as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the अनुबंध , इटली किया नहीं डालें into  the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations  डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies , और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया  the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel  , सहित 60 लाख europeans , यहूद mobilised in एक of the  largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of technological  advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता  .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in  संसार इतिहास , subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन , ऐसे as  revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the  युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in  the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe .
More  तत्काल , the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया , the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914  by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
अनेक alliances formed over the पिछला  decades were invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers were at war  और , via उनके colonies , the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड  around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired  the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी  for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing a casus belli for  ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध जर्मनी  .
After the German march on Paris was brought  to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने  settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the  रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians , लकिन थी  stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the  उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध , खोलने up fronts in the  Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went  to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in  1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent  क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें साथ  the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the  पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब  offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries ,  सहमत to an armistice on 11  November 1918 .
The war  ended in विजय लिये the allies  .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle  fronts , as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो  a total war .
By the end of the war , four  प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी , रूसी , austro-hungarian  and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the  पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory , जबकि  the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of central Europe  थी redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य  .
The League of Nations was  formed in the आशा of preventing another  such conflict .
The European nationalism  शाखित by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires , the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ  the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
Nurse Jackie is an American  श्रेणी कि premiered on जून 8 , 2009 , on showtime , फिल्म  Central and The Movie Network .
The series stars Edie Falco as the title character Jackie Peyton , an  आपात विभाग नर्स at सब  Saints ' Hospital in New York City .
For Jackie , ``  प्रत्येक दिन is a ऊँची तार अधिनियम of  juggling patients , doctors , fellow nurses and her own indiscretions . ''
Keeping Up with the  kardashians ( प्रायः referred to बस as the kardashians ) is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता  television series that premiered on October 14 , 2007 , on E ! .
it फ़ॉलो the जीवनदान of the kardashian/jenner परिवार  , including sisters Kourtney , Kim , and Khloé Kardashian .
The series ' success has led  to the spin-offs कोर्टनी और किम लो नई यॉर्क , khloé &  Lamar , Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami , and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami .
Afghanistan ( ; ; ) , officially the Islamic Republic of  अफगानिस्तान , is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming  part of South Asia , Central Asia , and to some extent Western Asia .
It has a population of around 30 million inhabiting an area of approximately  , बनाना it the 42nd सबसे populous और 41st largest स्वदेश in the संसार  .
It is bordered by Pakistan in the south and the east , Iran in the west  , तुर्कमेनिस्तान , उज़्बेकिस्तान और ताजिकिस्तान in the उत्तर , और  China in the far northeast .
Afghanistan has  महरूम an प्राचीन फोकल पाइंट of the रेशा  Road and human migration .
Archaeologists have found evidence of human  habitation इससे as दूर वापस as the मध्य paleolithic  .
Urban civilization may have  begun in the क्षेत्रफल as जल्दी as 3,000 to  2,000 BCE .
Sitting at an important  geostrategic स्थान कि connects the मध्य ईस्ट संस्कृति साथ सेंट्रल एशिया और the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप , the जमीन रै महरूम घर to विभिन्न peoples through  the ages and witnessed many military campaigns , notably by Alexander the Great , Genghis Khan , and in modern era Western forces .
The land also served as a  सोर्स इससे जिससे the greco-bactrians , kushans , hephthalites , saffarids  , Ghaznavids , Ghorids , Khiljis , Timurids , Mughals , Durranis , and others have risen to form major empires .
The political history of the modern state of Afghanistan begins in 1709 , when the Hotaki dynasty was established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad  शाह दुर्रानी 's वृद्धि to शक्ति in 1747  .
In the late  19th सदी , अफगानिस्तान became a बफ़र  state in the `` Great Game `` between the British and Russian empires .
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War , King Amanullah  began a यूरोपीय स्टाइल modernization of the देश लकिन  was stopped by the ultra-conservatives .
During the Cold War , after the withdrawal of the British from neighboring India in 1947 , the United States and the Soviet Union began spreading  प्रभाव in अफगानिस्तान , जिससे led to a खूनी युद्ध between the us-backed मुजाहिदीन शक्तियां और the soviet-backed अफगान सरकारी in जिससे over  a million Afghans lost their lives .
This was followed by the 1990s civil  युद्ध , the वृद्धि और पतन of the extremist तालिबान  government and the 2001–present war .
In December 2001 , the United Nations Security Council authorized the creation of  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा सहायता फ़ोर्स ( isaf ) to सहायता maintain सुरक्षा in अफगानिस्तान और assist  the Karzai administration .
Three decades of war made Afghanistan one of the world 's most dangerous  देशों , सहित the largest निर्माता of शरणार्थियों और  asylum seekers .
While  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय जातियाँ is पुनर्निर्माण war-torn अफगानिस्तान , आतंकवादी समूह ऐसे as the हक्कानी संजाल  and Hezbi Islami are actively involved in a nationwide Taliban -led insurgency , which includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks .
According to the United Nations , the  insurgents यहूद जिम्मेदार लिये 80 % of civilian हताहत in 2011 और 2012  .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming )  , थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' )  and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery ,  विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories  .
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं  intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000  सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished ,  and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham  lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories  .
lincoln जीती , लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based  slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared  उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate  civil war .
Eight  बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत  calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized  numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy  .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise  , और दोनो पहलू prepared लिये युद्ध .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent  on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate  States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when  confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित  by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently ,  चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy , bringing उनके  total to eleven .
The Union  जल्द नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि  crippled the southern economy .
The  पूर्वी थिएटर थी  inconclusive in 1861–62 .
the पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended  with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
lincoln जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy ,  तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy  in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate  incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg  .
Western successes led to  ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ  armies in 1864 .
In  the पश्चिमी थिएटर , विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched  to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the  confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान  towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed ,  अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at  Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one  of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads , the telegraph  , steamships , और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively  .
The  mobilization of civilian कारखानों , खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन  and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history ,  resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian  casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death  टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और  30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Cost  of goods बेची ( cogs ) refer to the inventory  costs of those goods a business has sold during a particular period .
Costs are associated with particular goods using one of  अनेक formulas , सहित विशिष्ट पहचान , first-in  first-out ( FIFO ) , or average cost .
Costs include all costs of purchase , costs  of परिवर्तन और अन्य लागत incurred in bringing the inventories to  their present location and condition .
Costs  of goods बना by the कारोबार शामिल सामग्री  , labor , and allocated overhead .
The costs of those goods not yet sold  हैं deferred as लागत of inventory जबतक the inventory is बेची or  written down in value .
Freak  lunchbox कैंडी स्टोर in halifax  , Nova Scotia
A confectionery store ( more commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the United Kingdom , a candy store  in the उत्तर अमेरिका , or a lolly दूकान in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) बिकता confectionery और is प्रायः targeted to children  .
Most confectionery stores are filled with an assortment of  मिठाई दूर larger than a पंसारी or convenience स्टोर could  accommodate .
वे प्रायः प्रस्ताव a चयन of बूढ़ा fashioned  treats , and sweets from different countries .
Very often unchanged in layout since their inception ,  confectioneries हैं ज्ञात लिये उनके वार्मिंग और  nostalgic feel .
The  गाँव of pateley सेतु दावा to have the oldest  confectionery store in England .

Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa , Cayuga  : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in वेस्ट दक्षिण  Central United States .
ओक्लाहोमा is the 20th सबसे  extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and  humma , अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '' , और it is ज्ञात informally by इसके उपनाम ,  The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on  नवम्बर 16 , 1907 , ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to डालें the  union .
Its residents are known  as oklahomans or , informally `` okies '' , और इसके पूंजी और  largest city is Oklahoma City .
A major producer  of प्राकृतिक गैस , आयल , और कृषि , ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन ,  energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the  स्वदेश , रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय विकास और सकल  domestic product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic  anchors , साथ nearly दो तिहाई of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर  statistical areas .
With small mountain ranges , prairie , mesas , and eastern forests , most of Oklahoma  झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the u.s . आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स —a प्रदेश विशेषकर prone to  severe weather .
In addition to having a prevalence of English , German ,  स्कॉटिश , आयरिश और देशी अमरीकी ancestry , अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला in ओक्लाहोमा  , second only to California .
ओक्लाहोमा is स्तिथ on a संगम of तीन प्रमुख अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक regions और historically  served as a route for cattle drives , a destination for southern settlers , and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans .
Stacked and  खड़ा car  tires
A tire ( or tyre ) is a ring-shaped covering that fits  around a व्हील 's रिम to protect it और enable बेहतर गाडी  performance .
Most tires , such as those for automobiles and  साइकिल , provide कर्षण between the गाडी और the सड़क जबकि providing  a flexible cushion that absorbs shock .
The materials of  आधुनिक न्यूमेटिक टायर हैं सिंथेटिक रबर , प्राकृतिक रबर , कपड़ा और  wire , along with carbon black and other chemical compounds .
They consist of  a tread और a देह  .
The tread provides traction while the body provides  containment लिये a मात्रा of संपीडित  air .
Before rubber was developed , the first versions of tires  यहूद बस bands of मेटल कि fitted around लकड़ी पहियों to  prevent wear and tear .
Early rubber  टायर यहूद ठोस ( नहीं न्यूमेटिक  ) .
Today , the majority of tires are pneumatic  inflatable structures , comprising  a doughnut-shaped body of cords and wires encased in rubber and generally filled with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion .
Pneumatic tires are used on many types of  वाहनों , सहित गाड़ियाँ , साइकिल , मोटरसाइकिल  , trucks , earthmovers , and aircraft .
Metal tires are still used on locomotives and railcars , and solid rubber ( or other  पॉलिमर ) टायर हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त in विभिन्न non-automotive अनुप्रयोग , ऐसे  as some casters , carts , lawnmowers , and wheelbarrows .
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11 , 1741 – June 17 , 1775 ) was an American  डॉक्टर जो निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका in अमरीकी patriot संगठन in बोस्टन in जल्दी दिनों of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति , आखिरकार  serving as president of the revolutionary Massachusetts Provincial Congress .
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and William Dawes on April 18 , 1775 , to leave Boston and spread  the सचेतक कि the अंग्रेजों गैरीसन in बोस्टन थी सेटिंग आउट to रेड the कस्बा of concord और गिरफ़्तार विद्रोही  leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams .
Warren participated in  the अगला दिन 's लड़ाइयों of lexington और concord , जिससे हैं commonly माना to  be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary War .
Warren had been commissioned a Major General in the colony 's  मिलिशिया shortly पहले the जून 17 , 1775 बैटल  of Bunker Hill .
Rather than exercising his rank , Warren served in the battle as a private soldier ,  और थी मारे in कॉम्बैट जब अंग्रेजों सैनिकों stormed the redoubt atop  Breed 's Hill .
His death , immortalized in John Trumbull 's painting , The Death of General Warren at the Battle of Bunker 's Hill , June 17 , 1775 , galvanized the  विद्रोही शक्तियां , और he रै महरूम स्मरणीय in अनेक प्लेस names in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
STM image of self-assembled supramolecular  जंजीरों of the सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर quinacridone on ग्रेफाइट  .
An organic semiconductor is an  सशुल्क सामग्री साथ सेमीकंडक्टर गुण , कि is , साथ  an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals .
सिंगल अणुओं , छोटी कड़ी ( oligomers ) और  organic polymers can be semiconductive .
Semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) include the  polycyclic खुशबूदार यौगिकों pentacene , anthracene , और  rubrene .
Polymeric  सशुल्क semiconductors शामिल बहु ( 3-hexylthiophene ) , बहु ( p-phenylene vinylene  ) , as well as polyacetylene and its derivatives .
There are two major  अतिव्यापी वर्ग of सशुल्क semiconductors  .
These are  सशुल्क charge-transfer देवालय और विभिन्न linear-backbone  conductive polymers derived from polyacetylene .
Linear backbone organic semiconductors  शामिल polyacetylene itself और इसके  derivatives polypyrrole , and polyaniline .
At least locally , charge-transfer  देवालय प्रायः प्रदर्शनी समान conduction mechanisms to अकार्बनिक semiconductors  .
Such  mechanisms उठता इससे the उपस्थिति of  hole and electron conduction layers separated by a band gap .
While such classic mechanisms are important locally , as with inorganic  amorphous semiconductors , tunnelling , स्थानीयकृत राज्य , गतिशीलता गैप , और phonon -assisted hopping भी significantly योगदान to  conduction , particularly in polyacetylenes .
Like inorganic  semiconductors , सशुल्क semiconductors  can be doped .
Organic  semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे as polyaniline  ( Ormecon ) and are also known as organic metals .
Typical current  वाहक in सशुल्क semiconductors  are holes and electrons in π-bonds .
लगभग सब सशुल्क solids  are insulators .
लकिन जब उनके constituent अणुओं  have π-conjugate systems , electrons can move via π-electron cloud overlaps , especially by hopping , tunnelling and related mechanisms .
Polycyclic aromatic  hydrocarbons और phthalocyanine नमक crystals हैं उदाहरण  of this type of organic semiconductor .
Mainly due  to कम गतिशीलता , भी unpaired electrons may be stable  in charge-transfer complexes .
Such  unpaired electrons can  function as current carriers .
This type of  सेमीकंडक्टर is भी प्राप्त by pairing an इलेक्ट्रॉन  donor molecule with an electron acceptor molecule .
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the  paraurethral नलिकाएं through और around the मादा urethra दौरान or पहले  an orgasm .
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting , although these are  माना to be अलग phenomena in कुछ शोध publications  .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a  टॉपिक of बहस among चिकित्सा पेशेवर , जिससे is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह  over the existence of the G-Spot .
The FIFA Women  's संसार कप is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे  by the senior women 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been awarded every four  सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in  1991 .
जापानी जीती the 2011 टूर्नामेंट  in a penalty shootout .
The current format of the  टूर्नामेंट involves 16 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over  a period of about three weeks ; – this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes  प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो , is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट  together with the host nation ( s ) .
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important International competition in women 's football and is played  amongst महिलाओं 's नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल टीमों of the सदस्य राज्य of फीफा , the खेल 's वैश्विक शासी  body .
The first Women 's World Cup tournament , named the Women 's World Championship , was held  in 1991 , sixty-one सालो बाद the मेन 's पहला  FIFA World Cup tournament in 1930 .
The six World Cup  tournaments have महरूम जीती by चार अलग  national teams .
The next World  कप होगा be hosted by कनाडा  in 2015 .
Scorpions is a young adult novel written by Walter Dean Myers  , पहला प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त राज्य by हार्पर & पंक्ति on जून 20 ,  1988 .
