'Son of man ' is the  अनुवाद of विभिन्न यहूदी और यूनानी वाक्यांश  used in both the Hebrew Bible and the New Testament .
It has diverse meanings , ranging from a normal  इंसान होने to a prophesied अनन्त , दैवी  ruler .
The Hebrew expression `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e . ben-'adam )  appears एक सौ और सात टाइम्स in  the Hebrew Bible .
This is the most common Hebrew construction for the  एकवचन लकिन is प्रयुक्त ज़्यादातर in ezekiel ( 93 टाइम्स ) और 14 टाइम्स  elsewhere .
In thirty two  मामले the phrase appears in इंटरमीडिएट  plural form `` sons of men '' , i.e . human beings .
As generally interpreted by  यहूदियों , it denotes humankind  generally .
In the Koine Greek of the New Testament , `` the son of  man '' is invariably प्रयुक्त as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ  ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article .
The use of the definite article in `` the son of man  '' in the ईसाई gospels is अनोखा , और पहले इसके उपयोग वहीँ , no रिकॉर्ड of इसके उपयोग in कोई of the surviving यूनानी दस्तावेज़  of antiquity exist .
Geza Vermes has stated that  `` the बेटे of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is  unrelated to Hebrew Bible usages .
In Christian usage , unlike the Son of God title , which has been an  अनिवार्य तत्व of ईसाई creeds चूंकि the अपोस्टोलिक आयु , the उदघोषणा of  `` Jesus as the Son of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity .
The interpretation of  the उपयोग of `` the बेटे of man '' in the नई वसीयत रै remained चुनौतीपूर्ण और बाद  150 years of debate no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars .
निपुण of foxhounds लीड the फ़ील्ड इससे powderham किला  in Devon , England , with the hounds in front .
Fox hunting is an  कार्यकलाप involving the ट्रैकिंग , पीछा , और sometimes हत्या of a फॉक्स , traditionally a रेड फॉक्स , by प्रशिक्षित  foxhounds or other scent hounds , and a group of unarmed followers led by a master of foxhounds , who follow the hounds on foot or on horseback .
Fox hunting originated in the form practised until recently in the United  किंगडम in the 16th सदी , लकिन is practised सब over the संसार , सहित in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , कनाडा , फ़्रांस , आयरलैंड  , Italy and the United States .
In Australia , the term also refers to the hunting of  foxes साथ firearms समान to spotlighting or हिरण  hunting .
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g. , deer hunting with bow and arrow  ) ; in ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड , `` शिकार '' बगैर योग्यता implies फॉक्स शिकार ( or अन्य फ़ॉर्म of शिकार साथ हाउंडs- beagling , स्टैग शिकार , मिंक शिकार  , drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here .
The sport is controversial , particularly in the UK , where it was banned in Scotland in  2002 , और in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स in नवम्बर 2004 ( विधि enforced इससे  February 2005 ) , though shooting foxes as vermin remained legal .
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an important part of rural culture and useful for  कारण of संरक्षण और pest कंट्रोल , जबकि प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue कि it is बेदर्द और  unnecessary .
Tobacco advertising is the advertising of  तम्बाकू उत्पाद or उपयोग ( typically सिगरेट धूम्रपान ) by the तम्बाकू उद्योग through a किस्में  of media including sponsorship , particularly of sporting events .
It is now  एक of the सबसे अत्यधिक  regulated forms of marketing .
Some or all forms  of तम्बाकू विज्ञापन हैं बैन in अनेक देशों  .
Bally  technologies , inc. is a निर्माता of स्लॉट मशीने  and other gaming technology based in Las Vegas , Nevada .
The company was  संस्थापित in 1968 as उन्नत पेटेंट  Technology .
It eventually  बदला इसके नाम to गठबंधन गेमिंग और acquired , in 1996 , बल्ली  Gaming International , a former division of Bally Manufacturing .
In 2006 , the entire company  अपनाया the बल्ली नाम , a ट्रेडमार्क कि originated  in 1932 by the Bally Manufacturing Corporation .
Gustave Doré 's  engravings illustrated the दैवी कॉमेडी (  1861–1868 ) ; here , Dante is lost in Canto 1 of the Inferno .
Inferno ( Italian for  `` नरक `` ) is the पहला भाग of दांते एलीगियरी 's  14th-century epic poem Divine Comedy .
It is  followed by purgatorio  and Paradiso .
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante  through नरक , हिदायत by the रोमन कवि वर्जिल .
In the  कविता , नरक is चित्रित as नौ वृत्त of कष्ट  located within the Earth .
Allegorically  , the दैवी कॉमेडी represents the यात्रा of the आत्मा towards  God , with the Inferno describing the recognition and rejection of sin .
Smirnoff is a brand of vodka  स्वामित्व और उत्पादित by the अंग्रेजों कम्पनी diageo  .
The Smirnoff brand began with a  वोदका डिस्टिलरी संस्थापित in मास्को by pyotr arsenievich smirnov  ( 1831–1898 ) .
It is now distributed in  130 देशों .
It is produced in several  देशों सहित इण्डिया , आयरलैंड , इटली , the संयुक्त किंगडम  and the United States .
Smirnoff products include vodka , flavoured vodka ,  और malt पेय .
in कूच 2006 , diageo उत्तर अमेरिका claimed कि स्मरनॉफ वोदका थी  the best-selling distilled spirit brand in the world .
Big Brown ( foaled April 10 , 2005  in केंटकी ) is a रिटायर्ड चैंपियन अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse और विजेता  of the 2008 Kentucky Derby and 2008 Preakness Stakes .
Bred by Dr. Gary B.  नैप 's monticule खेतो in lexington , केंटकी , he जीती  his first five race starts .
He was sired by Grade III  विजेता boundary , a बेटे of उत्तर अमरीकी चैंपियन  sire Danzig , a son of Northern Dancer .
Big Brown  's बांध थी mien , भी a पोती of उत्तरी नर्तकी  through her sire , Nureyev .
The Serenity Prayer is  the आम नाम लिये an originally बेनाम  prayer by the American theologian Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ) .
It has been adopted  by alcoholics बेनाम और अन्य twelve-step  programs .
The best-known form is : God ,  ग्रान्ट me the serenity to accept the बाते i  can not change,
The courage to  बदलें the बाते  I can,
And wisdom to  जान the अंतर  .
The Declaration and  resolves of the पहला महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस ( भी ज्ञात as the घोषणा of औपनिवेशिक अधिकारों , or the  Declaration of Rights ) , was a statement adopted by the First Continental Congress on October 14 , 1774 , in response to the Intolerable Acts passed by the British Parliament .
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the  असहनीय अधिनियमों , सूचीबद्ध a औपनिवेशिक विधेयक of  rights , and provided a detailed list of grievances .
It was  समान to the घोषणा of अधिकारों और grievances , passed  by the Stamp Act Congress a decade earlier .
The Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's plans :  to डालें into a बहिष्कार of अंग्रेजों व्यापार ( the महाद्वीपीय संघ ) जबतक उनके grievances यहूद redressed , to प्रकाशित  addresses to the people of Great Britain and British America , and to send a petition to the King .
पल्स दबाव is the दबाव कि is लगा  when feeling the pulse .
Measured in millimeters of mercury (  mmhg ) , the दबाव अंतर between the systolic और diastolic pressures is the दबाव बदलें to बनाएँ the पल्स  , which is the pulse pressure .
If resting blood  दबाव is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of पारा ( mmhg ) ,  pulse pressure is 40 .
The Hills is a reality television series which originally aired on MTV from May 31 , 2006  जबतक जुलाई 13 , 2010  .
The show uses a reality television format , following the personal lives of several young adults living in Los Angeles  , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , लकिन tends towards a कथा स्वरूप अधिक commonly मिला in scripted जाति ऐसे  as soap operas .
The series originally followed the personal life of former Laguna Beach star Lauren Conrad  और उसके मित्रों ' नई जीवनदान  in Los Angeles .
After five seasons , Conrad left the series  और थी replaced by another पूर्व लगुना बीच स्टार , kristin cavallari , शुरूआत in the दूसरी हाफ of  the fifth season .
The  श्रेणी concluded at the  end of the sixth season .
Entertainment Weekly ranked The Hills 82nd on their  सूची of `` the 100 बेहतरीन shows of the पिछला 25 सालो , '' stating कि the श्रेणी  was a `` New Classic . ''
AOL TV  पुकारा it tv 's biggest  Guilty Pleasure .
The series  premiered in अनुप्रयोग in the पतन of  2009 alongside Laguna Beach : The Real Orange County .
In poker , bad beat is a  subjective पद लिये a हाथ in जिससे a खिलाड़ी साथ कया appear  to be strong cards nevertheless loses .
It most often occurs where one player bets the clearly  stronger हाथ और उनके प्रतिद्वन्दी makes a ग़रीब कॉल कि आखिरकार ``  hits '' and wins .
There is no consensus among poker  खिलाड़ी as to कया exactly constitutes a ख़राब ताल और प्रायः खिलाड़ी होगा असहमत  about whether a particular hand was a bad beat .
The goldfish  ( carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater मछली  in the family Cyprinidae of order Cypriniformes .
It was one of the earliest fish to  be domesticated , और is  one of the most commonly kept aquarium fish .
A relatively small member of the carp  परिवार ( जिससे भी शामिल the कोई कार्प और the crucian कार्प  ) , the goldfish is a domesticated version of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east Asia .
It was first domesticated in China more than a thousand years ago ,  और अनेक पृथक breeds have चूंकि महरूम  developed .
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size , body shape , fin configuration and  coloration ( विभिन्न combinations of श्वेत , पीला , नारंगी , रेड , भूरा , और ब्लैक हैं ज्ञात ) .
uncooked  Rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade , singular : roulade ) is a German meat roulade  प्रायः consisting of बेकन , प्याज , सरसों और अचार लपेटा in thinly sliced बीफ जिससे  is then cooked .
In some countries  , the roulade is भी ज्ञात as  `` beef olive '' .
Beef or veal is used as meat though some food scholars tend  to मानना कि the असली संस्करण  was probably venison or pork , and pork is still popular in some areas .
The  बीफ rouladen as we जान उन्हें आज have  become popular over the last century .
the काटें is प्रायः topside बीफ  or silverside since this is the cheaper cut .
The more expensive  संस्करण होता be the गोलाकार स्टीक  , also known as rump steak .
the मांस is काटें into  large , thin slices .
The filling is a mixture of smoked and cooked pork belly , chopped onions and chopped pickles ( gurken )  जिससे is at टाइम्स varied by adding minced मांस , सॉसेज मांस , पाइन nuts  and mustard .
The  मिश्रण varies इससे  region to region .
Rouladen are traditionally served  लिये डिनर .
Red wine is often  परोसा साथ इस डिश  .
ठेठ  eukaryotic cell .
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic reactions and processes that take place in the  कोशिकाएं of जीवों to बदलें biochemical उर्जा इससे nutrients into एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट  ( ATP ) , and then release waste products .
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic  प्रतिक्रियाएँ , जिससे ब्रेक विशाल अणुओं into छोटी ones , releasing उर्जा in the प्रक्रम  as weak so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products .
Respiration is one of the key ways a cell gains  उपयोगी उर्जा to ईंधन सेल्यूलर  activity .
Cellular respiration is considered  an ऊष्माक्षेपी रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रिया  .
The overall  प्रतिक्रिया is टूटा into अनेक छोटी ones जब it occurs in the देह  , most of which are redox reactions themselves .
Although technically , cellular respiration is  a दहन प्रतिक्रिया , it  clearly does not resemble one when it occurs in a living cell .
इस अंतर is क्युकी it occurs  in many separate steps .
While the overall reaction is a  दहन प्रतिक्रिया , no सिंगल प्रतिक्रिया कि comprises it is a  combustion reaction .
Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and plant cells in respiration include sugar , amino acids and  वसीय acids , और a आम oxidizing एजेंट ( इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ) is आणविक ऑक्सीजन ( o2  ) .
The energy stored in ATP ( its third phosphate group is weakly bonded to the rest of the molecule and is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds  to रूप , thereby transferring उर्जा लिये उपयोग by the कोशिका ) can तब be प्रयुक्त to ड्राइव प्रक्रियाओं requiring उर्जा , सहित जैवसंश्लेषण , locomotion or परिवहन of अणुओं आरपार कोशिका झिल्लियों  .
Countries by 2011  जीडीपी ( नाममात्र ) according to the  CIA World Factbook .
This article includes a list of countries in the world sorted by their gross domestic product ( GDP ) , the market value of all  फाइनल goods और सेवाएं इससे a स्वदेश in a दिए साल  .
The GDP dollar estimates  प्रस्तुत यहाँ हैं गणना at मार्केट or सरकारी  official exchange rates .
Several economies which are not considered to be countries ( world , the  eu , और कुछ निर्भर territories ) हैं शामिल in the सूचियाँ क्युकी वे appear  in the sources .
These economies are not  क्रमित in the चार्ट यहाँ , लकिन हैं सूचीबद्ध  where applicable .
The figures presented  यहाँ do नहीं लो into खाता मतभेद in the लागत of जीना in अलग देशों , और the परिणाम can  vary greatly from one year to another based on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency .
Such fluctuations may change a country 's ranking from one year to the  अगला , भी हालांकि वे प्रायः मेक छोटी or no अंतर  to the standard of living of its population .
इसलिए ये आंकड़े  should be used with caution .
Some  countries/regions may have नागरिकों जिससे हैं on औसत  wealthy .
These countries/regions could appear  in इस सूची as having a छोटी  GDP .
This would be because the country/region listed has a small population , and therefore  छोटी कुल अर्थव्यवस्था ; the जीडीपी is गणना as the जनसांख्यिकी  times the wealth per capita .
Comparisons of national  माल हैं भी अक्सर बना on the आधार of खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी ( ppp ) , to  adjust for differences in the cost of living in different countries .
( See List of  देशों by जीडीपी (  PPP ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem , but has its own drawbacks ; it does not reflect  the मान of आर्थिक आउटपुट in अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार , और it भी  requires more estimation than nominal GDP .
On the whole , PPP per capita  आंकड़े हैं अधिक narrowly स्प्रेड than नाममात्र  GDP per capita figures .
The  पहला सूची शामिल आंकड़ा compiled by the संयुक्त  Nations Statistics Division for 2011 .
The second list largely includes data ( estimate )  compiled by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक  Fund for 2012 .
The third list shows the World Bank 's mostly 2011  estimates , और the चौथी सूची शामिल ज़्यादातर 2012 estimates  from the CIA World Factbook .
Lapping is a  machining प्रक्रम , in जिससे दो सतहों हैं मला साथ साथ an अक्खड़ between  them , by hand movement or by way of a machine .
This can  लो दो  forms .
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ) , typically involves rubbing a brittle material such as glass against a surface such as iron or glass itself ( also known as the `` lap '' or  पीस औजार ) साथ an अक्खड़ ऐसे as एल्यूमिनियम ऑक्साइड , जौहरियों 's रूज , optician 's रूज , एमरी , सिलिकॉन कार्बाइड , डायमंड , etc. , in between  them .
This  produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the अक्खड़  rolls about between the two surfaces and removes material from both .
The other form of lapping involves a  softer सामग्री ऐसे as पिच or a सिरेमिक लिये the गोद ,  which is `` charged '' with the abrasive .
The lap is then used to cut  a harder material—the workpiece  .
The abrasive embeds within the softer material which  holds it और permits it to स्कोर आरपार  and cut the harder material .
Taken to a  महीन सीमा , इस होगा उपज a polished सतह ऐसे as साथ a पॉलिशिंग  cloth on an automobile , or a polishing cloth or polishing pitch upon glass or steel .
Taken to the ultimate limit , with the aid of accurate  interferometry और specialized पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled हाथ पॉलिशिंग , lensmakers can उपज सतहों कि हैं चपटा to बेहतर than 30 nanometers  .
This is one twentieth of the wavelength  of लाइट इससे the commonly प्रयुक्त 632.8 nm हीलियम नियॉन  laser light source .
Surfaces this flat can be  molecularly बंधुआ ( optically contacted ) by bringing  them together under the right conditions .
( This is not the same as the  wringing प्रभाव of जोहानसन ब्लॉक  , although it is similar ) .
The term `` America 's Team '' is a popular  उपनाम in the संयुक्त राज्य कि refers to the डलास cowboys  in the National Football League .
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film , where the narrator opens with the following introduction  : the पद is पहचाना और प्रायः प्रयुक्त by मीडिया आउटलेट , सहित ईएसपीएन , याहू ! , एचबीओ खेल ,  and Sports Illustrated .
My Babysitter 's a Vampire ( French : Ma  gardienne est un पिशाच ) is a 2011 कनाडाई टेलीविज़न श्रेणी , आधारित on the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी of  the same name .
In Canada , the series premiered in French on Télétoon on February  28 , 2011 , in अंग्रेज़ी on teletoon on कूच 14 , 2011 ,  and on Disney Channel in the United States on June 27 , 2011 .
The  दिखाएँ थी निर्मित by भैस tv , creators  of 6teen and Total Drama .
The show follows Ethan Morgan ( Matthew Knight ) , who , in  the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी , learns कि उसके दाई सारा ( वैनेसा मॉर्गन  ) is a vampire .
In the film , he learns he is able to have  visions और उसके बेहतरीन dost बेनी वीयर ( atticus मिशेल ) is  a spellmaster .
The series follows the three as they take on supernatural forces and have adventures , with  occasional सहायता इससे fellow vampires रोरी ( cameron कैनेडी ) और एरिका ( केट टॉड ) , जबकि dealing  with the troubles of regular high school life .
A second season was confirmed to start production in September 2011 and it  पहला premiered on डिज़्नी चैनल on जून 29 , 2012 , it premiered on teletoon  September 6 , 2012 .
Télétoon  प्रारंभ featuring ऋतु  2 sneak-peak episodes on October 28 , 2012 and premiered it on January 10 , 2013
Dodge B Series utility  circa 1950 , चलित by  Albert Namatjira
A pickup truck or pick-up , often simply referred to as  a पिकअप , is a लाइट मोटर गाडी साथ an open-top , पश्च  cargo area ( bed ) .
In North America , the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory  निर्मित , एकीकृत bed , as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों , प्रायः आधारित on a निजी  car chassis , but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use .
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup ,  ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड , or bakkie  in South Africa .
Large pickup trucks are  somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय , जहाँ वैन और लाइट  lorries are commonly used for similar roles .
The President of the United States  of अमेरिका ( potus ) is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी  of the United States .
The president  लीड the कार्यपालिका शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी और is  the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the execution of federal law , alongside the  जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका , राजनयिक , नियामक , और न्यायिक अधिकारियों , और concluding treaties साथ विदेशी  powers , with the advice and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves ,  और to convene और adjourn either or दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत असाधारण  circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States , the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each modern president , despite possessing no formal legislative powers  परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स , is largely जिम्मेदार लिये dictating the विधान कार्यसूची of उसके पार्टी और the विदेशी और घरेलू नीति  of the United States .
The  अध्यक्ष is अक्सर वर्णित as the सबसे  powerful person in the world .
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term , and is one of only two nationally elected  संघीय अधिकारियों , the अन्य होने the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States .
The Twenty-second Amendment  , अपनाया in 1951 , prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने  elected to the presidency for a third full term .
It also prohibits a person from  होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी अधिक than एकबार if कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष , or एक्टिंग  president , for more than two years of another person 's term as president .
In all , 43 individuals have  परोसा 55 four-year  terms .
On January 20 , 2009 , Barack  ओबामा became the 44th और वर्तमान अध्यक्ष  .
On November 6 ,  2012 , he थी re-elected और is अनुसूचित  to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Bottled  खनिज जल
Bottled  जल is पीने जल ( e.g. , खूब जल , आसुत जल , खनिज  water , or spring water ) packaged in plastic or glass water bottles .
बोतलबंद जल may be कार्बोनेटेड  or not .
Sizes range from small single serving bottles  to विशाल carboys लिये जल coolers  .
Map of the major rivers ,  झीलों , और टंकी in इण्डिया
Map  प्रर्दशित नदियाँ  and flood prone areas in India
Rivers of India play an important  भूमिका in the जीवनदान of  the Indian people .
The river systems provide irrigation , potable  जल , सस्ती परिवहन , विद्युत , और the livelihoods लिये a  large number of people all over the country and to rural areas .
This easily explains why nearly all the major  शहरों of इण्डिया हैं स्तिथ by the बैंको of  rivers .
The rivers also have an important role in  हिन्दू mythology और  are considered holy by all Hindus in the country .
Seven  प्रमुख नदियाँ साथ साथ  their numerous tributaries make up the river system of India .
Most of the rivers  डालना उनके waters into the खाड़ी of बंगाल ; however , कुछ of the नदियाँ  whose courses take them through the western part of the country and towards the east of the state of Himachal Pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea .
Parts of Ladakh , northern parts of the Aravlli range and the arid  भाग of the थार मरुस्थल have अंतर्देशीय नाले  .
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the  पाठ्यक्रम of the नदियाँ of इण्डिया साथ साथ उनके tributaries और शाखाओं in  1810-11 AD and presented a minute account of it .
The shifting  of the पाठ्यक्रम और bed  over the centuries is very remarkable .
Many of the channels  उल्लेखित in कि सर्वेक्षण have अभी become मुर्दे , सूखी or भी  extinct .
All major rivers of India originate from one of  the तीन प्रमुख watersheds  :
the हिमालय और  the Karakoram ranges
विंध्य और satpura सीमाएँ  and Chotanagpur plateau in central India
Sahyadri or  पश्चिमी ghats in पश्चिमी  India
The Bretton Woods system of monetary  प्रबन्धन स्थापित the नियम लिये वाणिज्यिक और वित्तीय संबंध among the संसार 's प्रमुख  industrial states in the mid-20th century .
The Bretton  वुड्स प्रणाली थी the पहला उदाहरण of a fully negotiated मौद्रिक  order intended to govern monetary relations among independent nation-states .
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World War II was still raging , 730 delegates from all 44 Allied nations gathered at  the माउंट वॉशिंगटन होटल in bretton वुड्स , नई हैम्पशायर , संयुक्त राज्य , लिये the संयुक्त राष्ट्र मौद्रिक और वित्तीय सम्मेलन  .
The delegates deliberated during 1–22 July 1944 ,  और हस्ताक्षरित the अनुबंध on इसके फाइनल  day .
Setting up a system of rules , institutions , and procedures to regulate the international monetary system ,  the planners at bretton वुड्स स्थापित the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बैंको लिये पुनर्निर्माण और विकास ( ibrd ) , जिससे  today is part of the World Bank Group .
These organizations became operational in 1945 after a sufficient  क्रमांक of देशों था ratified the  agreement .
The chief  सुविधाएँ of the bretton वुड्स प्रणाली यहूद an दायित्व लिये प्रत्येक देश to अपनाना a मौद्रिक नीति कि कायम  the exchange rate by tying its currency to the U.S. dollar and the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments .
On 15 August 1971 , the United States  unilaterally terminated convertibility of the us $ to सुनहरा  .
This brought the Bretton Woods system to an end and saw  the डालर become fiat करेंसी  .
This action , referred to  as the निक्सन शॉक , निर्मित the हालात in जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य डालर  became a reserve currency used by many states .
At the same time  , अनेक फिक्स्ड मुद्राएँ ( ऐसे as gbp , लिये उदाहरण ) ,  also became free floating .
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an  इतालवी कम्पनी कि डिजाइन और manufactures  motorcycles .
Headquartered in Bologna , Italy , Ducati is owned by Audi through its  इतालवी subsidiary लेम्बोर्गिनी .
A credit score is a numerical expression based on a statistical analysis of a  व्यक्ति 's क्रेडिट फाइलें , to represent the creditworthiness  of that person .
A credit score is primarily based on credit  रपट सूचना typically sourced इससे  credit bureaus .
Lenders , such as banks and credit card  कंपनियाँ , उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to evaluate the संभावित रिस्क posed by lending धन to उपभोक्ता और to mitigate नुकसान due to ख़राब कर्ज़  .
Lenders use credit scores to  determine जो qualifies लिये a ऋण , at कया ब्याज  rate , and what credit limits .
lenders भी उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to determine  which customers are likely to bring in the most revenue .
The use of credit or identity  स्कोरिंग prior to authorizing अभिगम or  granting credit is an implementation of a trusted system .
Credit scoring  is नहीं सीमित to  banks .
Other organizations , such as  मोबाईल फोन कंपनियाँ , बीमे कंपनियाँ , जमींदार , और सरकारी विभाग employ  the same techniques .
Credit scoring also has a lot of  ओवरलैप साथ आंकड़ा खनन , जिससे उपयोग अनेक समान तकनीकों  .
These techniques combine  हज़ारों of कारकों लकिन वे हैं अधिक or कम  similar or the same .
The seven SI base units  और the interdependency of उनके परिभाषाएं : लिये उदाहरण , to निकालें the परिभाषा of the मीटर इससे the गति of लाइट , the परिभाषा  of the second must be known while the ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length , mass and time .
The International System of Units ( SI ) defines seven units of  माप as a मौलिक नियत इससे जिससे सब अन्य si इकाई हैं निकला  .
ये si आधार इकाई और  their physical quantities are:
metre for  लंबाई ( us अंग्रेज़ी  : meter )
किलोग्राम लिये द्रव्यमान ( नोट : नहीं  the gram )
second  लिये समय
ampere for  इलेक्ट्रिक वर्तमान
केल्विन लिये तापमान
candela for  चमकदार तीव्रता
mole for the  राशि of पदार्थ  .
The SI  आधार quantities रूप a नियत of mutually स्वतंत्र  dimensions as required by dimensional analysis commonly employed in science and technology .
However , in a  दिए realization of ये इकाई वे may खूब be interdependent  , i.e . defined in terms of each other .
The names of SI units are written  in लोअरकेस वर्ण ( the 'degree  Celsius ' meets this rule , as 'degree ' is the unit , and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ) .
The symbols of units are written in  लोअरकेस ( e.g . मीटर रै the प्रतीक m ) , मगर कि प्रतीकों लिये इकाई नामित  after persons are written with an initial capital letter ( e.g. , the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ) .
Many  अन्य इकाई , ऐसे as the लीटर ( us अंग्रेज़ी  : liter ) , are formally not part of the SI , but are accepted for use with SI .
स्मारक canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as The  स्मारक ) is a भाग of the नेशनल पार्क सेवा निकट the नगर of ग्रैंड जंक्शन  , Colorado .
Spectacular canyons cut deep into sandstone  और भी granite–gneiss–schist चट्टान formations  , in some areas .
This is an area of desert land high on the Colorado  पठार , साथ पिनियन और juniper वनों  on the plateau .
The park hosts a  चौड़ी दायरा of वन्यजीव , सहित red-tailed चीलों और सुनहरी  eagles , ravens , jays , desert bighorn sheep , and coyotes .
Activities include hiking , horseback riding , road  bicycling , और दर्शनीय ड्राइव ; a आगंतुक बीच on  the west side contains a natural history museum and gift shop .
There are magnificent views from trails and the  रिम चट्टान ड्राइव , जिससे हवाएँ साथ  the plateau .
Nearby are the Book Cliffs , and the largest flat-topped  पहाड़ in the संसार , the  Grand Mesa .
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon , which runs the width of the park , and includes rock formations such as  स्वतंत्रता स्मारक , the चुंबन युगल , और कोक चूल्हों  .
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 square  मील ) , much of जिससे रै महरूम अनुशंसित to कॉंग्रेस लिये नामांकन  as wilderness .
left to right :  यूटिलिटी वर्दी , ब्लू पोशाक वर्दी , सेवा वर्दी  , and Evening Dress uniforms
The Uniforms of the United States  समुद्री corps serve to फर्क marines  from members of other services .
Among current uniforms in the United States Armed  शक्तियां , the marines ' वर्दी have महरूम in सेवा  the longest .
The Marine Dress Blue uniform has , with few  परिवर्तन , महरूम worn in essentially इसके वर्तमान रूप चूंकि  the 19th century .
North American telephone area codes 419 and 567 serve the northwest  quadrant of the u.S. राज्य  of Ohio .
The largest city served by  ये क्षेत्रफल कोड is टोलेडो ( और इसके उपनगरों of हॉलैंड , maumee , northwood , ऑरेगॉन , ओटावा पहाड़ियाँ , perrysburg  , Rossford , Sylvania , Swanton , Waterville , and Whitehouse ) .
Other cities served by these area codes  शामिल एडीए , ashland , bellevue , bluffton , बोलिंग ग्रीन , ब्रायन , bucyrus , celina , क्लाइड , crestline , defiance , delphos , एडिसन , erastus , findlay , fostoria , fremont  , Galion , Kenton , Lima , Mansfield , Mount Gilead , Napoleon , Norwalk , Oak Harbor , Port Clinton , Sandusky , Shelby , St. Marys , Tiffin , Upper Sandusky , Van Wert , Wapakoneta , Wauseon , Willard .
Other areas served include the Lake Erie  आइलैंड्स उत्तर of बंदरगाहों क्लिंटन और वेस्ट of sandusky  .
The main area code , 419 , was created as  एक of the असली क्षेत्रफल कोड in अक्तूबर 1947 ; the ओवरले क्षेत्रफल कोड 567  was created on January 1 , 2002 .
despite the उपस्थिति of टोलेडो , the राज्य 's fourth-largest नगर , 419 थी the पिछला of ओहियो  's original four area codes to have been split or overlaid .
Mickey Leroy Gilley ( born March 9 , 1936  ) is an अमरीकी देश म्यूज़िक सिंगर और संगीतकार .
Although he started out singing  straight-up देश और पश्चिमी सामग्री in the 1970s , he स्थानांतरित towards a अधिक पॉप -friendly ध्वनि in the 1980s , bringing उसे further कामयाबी on नहीं बस the देश चार्ट  , but the pop charts as well .
Among his biggest hits are `` Room Full of Roses , '' `` Do n't the Girls All Get  prettier at closing समय , '' और the रीमेक of the आत्मा hit `` स्टैंड  by Me `` .
He is also the  cousin of जेरी ली लुईस  , Carl McVoy , Jim Gilley and Jimmy Swaggart .
According to the Federal  विमानन प्रशासन , gilley is a licensed पायलट , जो holds an यंत्र दरजा साथ वाणिज्यिक पायलट privileges  for multi-engine airplanes , as well as private pilot privileges for single engine aircraft .
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11  , सितंबर 11th , or 9/11 ) यहूद a श्रेणी of चार समन्वित आतंकवादी हमले शुभारम्भ by the इस्लामी आतंकवादी समूह al-qaeda  upon the United States in New York City and the Washington , D.C. area on September 11 , 2001 .
चार यात्री airliners यहूद hijacked  by 19 al-Qaeda terrorists so they could be flown into buildings in suicide attacks .
Two of those planes , American Airlines Flight 11 and United Airlines Flight 175 , were crashed into the North and South towers ,  क्रमशः , of the संसार व्यापार बीच जटिल in नई यॉर्क नगर  .
Within two hours , both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting  फ़ायर causing आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब अन्य इमारतें in the wtc जटिल , as खूब as प्रमुख  damage to ten other large surrounding structures .
A third plane , American Airlines Flight 77 , was  क्रैश into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय of the संयुक्त राज्य  Department of Defense ) , leading to a partial collapse in its western side .
The fourth plane , United Airlines Flight 93 , was targeted at the United States Capitol in  वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , लकिन क्रैश into a फ़ील्ड  near Shanksville , Pennsylvania , after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers .
In total , almost  3,000 लोगों died in the हमले , सहित the 227 नागरिकों  and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes .
suspicion जल्दी  fell on al-Qaeda .
Although the group 's  नेता , ओसामा बिन लादेन , initially अस्वीकृत कोई भागीदारी ,  in 2004 he claimed responsibility for the attacks .
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited  u.S. support of इसराईल , the उपस्थिति of u.S. सैनिकों in सऊदी  Arabia , and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks .
The  संयुक्त राज्य responded to the हमले by शुभारंभ the युद्ध on आतंक और आक्रमणकारी  Afghanistan to depose the Taliban , which had harbored al-Qaeda .
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism legislation  और विस्तारित विधि प्रवर्तन शक्तियां  .
Having evaded capture for  सालो , बिन लादेन थी स्तिथ और मारे  by U.S. forces in May 2011 .
The  विनाश of the जुड़वा मीनारें और अन्य गुण  caused serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect on global markets .
Cleanup of the  संसार व्यापार बीच साईट थी समाप्त in may 2002  , and the Pentagon was repaired within a year .
Numerous memorials have been constructed , including the National September 11 Memorial &  संग्रहालय in नई यॉर्क , the प्रस्तुतीकरण मेमोरियल , और the उड़ान 93 नेशनल मेमोरियल in पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
After a lengthy delay , the One World Trade Center is  अपेक्षित to be समाप्त at मैदान शून्य in नई  York City in 2013 .
Finding Nemo is a 2003  अमरीकी computer-animated comedy-drama एडवेंचर फिल्मी  written and directed by Andrew Stanton , released by Walt Disney Pictures , and the fifth film produced by Pixar Animation Studios .
It tells  the स्टोरी of the over-protective clownfish नामित marlin ( अल्बर्ट ब्रूक्स ) जो , साथ साथ a राजसी तंग  named Dory ( Ellen DeGeneres ) , searches for his abducted son Nemo ( Alexander Gould ) all the way to Sydney Harbour .
साथ the रास्ता , marlin learns to लो risks  and let Nemo take care of himself .
It is Pixar 's first film  to be released in cinemas in the उत्तरी  hemisphere summer .
The film was re-released for the  पहला समय in 3d on सितंबर 14 , 2012 , और it थी released  on Blu-ray on December 4 , 2012 .
A sequel , Finding Dory  , is फिलहाल in विकास , नियत to be released  on November 25 , 2015 .
The film received universal critical acclaim  और जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड विशेषता , और  was nominated in three more categories including Best Original Screenplay .
It was the second highest-grossing film  of 2003 , कमाई a कुल of  $ 921 million worldwide .
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time , with over 40 million copies sold as of 2006 , and was the  highest-grossing g-rated फिल्मी of सब समय पहले पिक्चर्स 's  own Toy Story 3 overtook it .
It is also the 23rd  highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब समय , as खूब as the 3rd highest-grossing  animated film .
In 2008 , the  अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नामित it the दसवाँ महानतम एनिमेटेड  film ever made during their Top 10 .
The sixth season of America 's Best Dance Crew , also known as America 's Best Dance Crew : Season of the  सुपरस्टार , premiered on अप्रैल 7 , 2011 और concluded on जून 5 , 2011  .
Auditions were held in four cities from January 21  through फ़रवरी 5 : शिकागो ,  Houston , New York , and Los Angeles .
This season takes a different  रूट इससे पास्ट सीज़न  .
The crews must perform to the music  of एक विशिष्ट कलाकार प्रत्येक सप्ताह , सहित रिहाना  , Lil Wayne , and other popular stars .
This season also features special guest appearances by various  म्यूज़िक हस्तियाँ सहित जस्टिन बीबर , the ब्लैक eyed मटर , कैटी पेरी , kesha  , Nicki Minaj , and Kanye West .
Dominic  `` d-trix '' sandoval , a पूर्व सदस्य of क्वेस्ट क्रू , the विजेता  of the third season of America 's Best Dance Crew , joins returning judges Lil Mama and JC Chasez as the newest judge .
In the season finale , I aM mE was declared  the विजेता of ऋतु 6 और प्राप्त the $ 100,000  ( USD ) prize .
In the  संयुक्त राज्य , सोशल सुरक्षा refers to the old-age  , Survivors , and Disability Insurance ( OASDI ) federal program .
The original Social Security  अधिनियम ( 1935 ) और the वर्तमान संस्करण of the अधिनियम , as amended , encompass अनेक सोशल welfare  and social insurance programs .
Social Security is primarily funded through  समर्पित payroll कर पुकारा संघीय बीमे योगदान  Act tax ( FICA ) .
Tax deposits are formally entrusted  to the संघीय old-age और survivors बीमे विश्वास निधि , the संघीय विकलांगता बीमे विश्वास निधि , the संघीय  Hospital Insurance Trust Fund , or the Federal Supplementary Medical Insurance Trust Fund which comprise the Social Security Trust Fund .
Upward redistribution of income is  जिम्मेदार लिये परिचय 43 % of the प्रक्षिप्त  Social Security shortfall over the next 75 years .
According to economist Martin Feldstein , the combined spending for all social insurance programs in 2003  गठित 37 % of सरकारी व्यय और 7 % of the सकल घरेलू  product .
Social Security is currently estimated to  रखना roughly 40 प्रतिशत of सब  Americans age 65 or older out of poverty .
The Social Security Administration  is headquartered in woodlawn , मेरीलैंड  , just west of Baltimore .
The  दारू by आवाज़ दिखाया on  a bottle of absinthe .
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV , abv , or alc/vol ) is a standard measure of how much alcohol (  इथेनॉल ) is contained in an alcoholic पेय ( expressed as a  percentage of total volume ) .
The ABV standard  is प्रयुक्त विश्वव्यापी .
In some countries , alcohol by volume is referred to as  डिग्री gay-lussac ( बाद the फ्रेंच केमिस्ट जोसेफ  Louis Gay-Lussac ) .
Laurel Hollow is a village in the Town of  सीप खाड़ी in nassau काउंटी , नई यॉर्क in the  United States .
The population was 1,952 at  the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी .
Charles  जॉन huffam डिकेंस ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 1812 – 9 जून  1870 ) was an English writer and social critic .
He created some of the world 's most memorable  fictional वर्ण और is generally regarded as the महानतम उपन्यासकार  of the Victorian period .
During his life , his works enjoyed unprecedented  कीर्ति , और by the बीसवीं सदी उसके साहित्यिक प्रतिभाशाली थी broadly acknowledged by आलोचकों  and scholars .
His novels and  छोटी कहानियां continue to be  widely popular .
Born in Portsmouth , England , Dickens left school to work in a  फैक्टरी बाद उसके पिता थी thrown into कर्जदार ' थाना  .
Although he had little formal  शिक्षा , उसके जल्दी impoverishment drove उसे to सफल  .
Over his career he edited a weekly journal for 20 years , wrote 15 novels , 5 novellas and hundreds of short stories and non-fiction  आलेख , lectured और performed extensively , थी an indefatigable अक्षर लेखक , और campaigned vigorously लिये children 's अधिकारों , शिक्षा , और अन्य सोशल  reforms .
Dickens sprang to fame with  the 1836 सीरियल प्रकाशन of  The Pickwick Papers .
Within a few years he had become an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय साहित्यिक हस्ती , प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके ह्यूमर , व्यंग्य , और keen अवलोकन  of character and society .
His novels , most published in monthly or weekly instalments ,  pioneered the सीरियल प्रकाशन of कथा fiction , जिससे became the प्रबल विक्टोरियन विधि लिये अनोखा  publication .
The  किस्त स्वरूप अनुमत डिकेंस to evaluate उसके दर्शक 's प्रतिक्रिया , और he प्रायः परिवर्धित  his plot and character development based on such feedback .
For example , when  उसके बीवी 's chiropodist expressed तकलीफ at the रास्ता मिस mowcher in दाउद कॉपरफील्ड लगा to प्रतिबिंबित  her disabilities , Dickens went on to improve the character with positive lineaments .
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon ; His caricature of Leigh Hunt in  the फिगर of mr skimpole in bleak हाउस थी likewise toned bas on सलाह इससे कुछ of उसके मित्रों , as वे पढ़ा एपीसोड  .
In the same novel , both Lawrence Boythorne and Mooney the  beadle हैं drawn इससे रियल जीवन – boythorne इससे वाल्टर जंगली landor और मूनी  from 'Looney ' , a beadle at Salisbury Square .
His plots were  carefully constructed , और डिकेंस प्रायः wove  in elements from topical events into his narratives .
Masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to have each  नई मासिक एपीसोड पढ़ा to उन्हें , खोलने up  and inspiring a new class of readers .
Dickens was  regarded as the  literary colossus of his age .
His 1843 novella , A Christmas Carol , is one of the most influential works ever  लिखा , और it remains लोकप्रिय और continues  to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre .
His creative  प्रतिभाशाली रै महरूम praised by fellow writers—from leo टालस्टाय to G. K. चेस्टरटन और जार्ज  Orwell —for its realism , comedy , prose style , unique characterisations , and social criticism .
On the other hand Oscar Wilde , Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a lack  of मनोवैज्ञानिक गहराई , ढीला लिखने , और a रग of saccharine sentimentalism  .
Martin Luther King and  अन्य सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ in सामने of the प्रतिमा of अब्राहम  Lincoln , August 28 , 1963
The civil rights movement was a series of worldwide  राजनैतिक आंदोलनों लिये समता  before the law that peaked in the 1960s .
In many situations it took  the रूप of अभियान of सिविल प्रतिरोध aimed at achieving बदलें by  nonviolent forms of resistance .
In some situations it was accompanied , or followed , by  सिविल अशांति और हथियारबंद विद्रोह  .
The process was long and tenuous in many countries , and many of these movements did not fully achieve their goals although , the efforts of these  आंदोलनों किया सीसे to सुधार in the विधिक अधिकारों of previously दलित समूह  of people .
The main aim of the civil rights movement included ,  और शामिल , ensuring कि the अधिकारों of सब लोगों  are equally protected by the law , including the rights of minorities .
Civil rights movements ranging from the global LGBT rights movement to the global Women 's  अधिकारों गति to विभिन्न जातिगत अल्पसंख्यक अधिकारों आंदोलनों around the  world continue .
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup , the world  चैंपियनशिप लिये मेन 's नेशनल संघ फ़ुटबॉल टीमों  .
It took place in South  अफ़्रीकी इससे 11 जून to 11 जुलाई 2010  .
The bidding process for hosting the tournament finals was open only to African nations ; in 2004 , the international  फ़ुटबॉल संघ , फीफा , चयनित दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी over मिश्र और मोरक्को to become the पहला अफ़्रीकी स्वदेश to मेजबान the फाइनल  .
The matches were played  in टेन स्टेडियम in नौ मेजबान शहरों around the देश  , with the final played at the Soccer City stadium in South Africa 's largest city , Johannesburg .
Thirty-two teams were selected for  भागीदारी via a विश्वव्यापी योग्यता टूर्नामेंट कि began in अगस्त  2007 .
In the first round of the tournament finals , the teams  competed in round-robin समूह of चार टीमों लिये अंक , साथ the शीर्ष दो टीमों  in each group proceeding .
These sixteen teams advanced  to the नॉकआउट स्टेज , जहाँ तीन rounds of खेल decided जिससे टीमों  would participate in the final .
In the final , Spain , the European champions , defeated third-time finalists  the नीदरलैंड्स 1–0 बाद अतिरिक्त समय , साथ आन्द्रेस iniesta 's लक्ष्य in the 116th मिनट giving स्पेन उनके पहला संसार शीर्षक  , becoming the eighth nation to win the tournament , and the first European nation to win the tournament outside its home continent .
Host nation South  अफ़्रीकी , 2006 संसार champions इटली और 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस यहूद सब  eliminated in the first round of the tournament .
It was the first time that the  होस्ट यहूद eliminated in the पहला  round .
New Zealand with  उनके तीन draws यहूद the तभी अपराजित  team in the tournament , but were also eliminated in the first round .
The McMuffin is a family of breakfast sandwiches in various sizes  और configurations , बेची by the fast-food रेस्तरां  chain McDonald 's .
The Egg McMuffin is the signature breakfast sandwich ; it was invented by the late McDonald 's  वाल हर्ब पीटरसन in the लेट 1960s और थी introduced देशभर in 1972  .
John Lennon was an English musician who gained worldwide fame as one of the  संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स , लिये उसके subsequent सोलो करियर , और लिये उसके राजनैतिक  activism and pacifism .
He was shot by Mark David  chapman at the प्रवेश of the भवन जहाँ he जिया , the डकोटा , in  New York City on 8 December 1980 .
Lennon had  बस लौटे इससे रिकार्ड संयंत्र स्टुडियो  with his wife , Yoko Ono .
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center , where it was stated that  nobody could have जिया लिये अधिक than a few मिनट्स बाद sustaining ऐसे  injuries .
Shortly after  लोकल न्यूज स्टेशन reported लेनन  's death , crowds gathered at Roosevelt Hospital and in front of the Dakota .
Lennon was cremated on 10  दिसम्बर 1980 at the ferncliff कब्रिस्तान in hartsdale  , New York ; the ashes were given to Ono , who chose not to hold a funeral for him .
The first report of Lennon 's death  to a u.S. नेशनल दर्शक थी घोषित by हावर्ड cosell  , on ABC 's Monday Night Football .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major United States port  और the largest नगर और महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the राज्य  of Louisiana .
The population of the  नगर थी 343,829 as of the  2010 U.S. Census .
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New  orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764  in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States .
The  नई orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल  , a larger trading area , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans , a city located on the Loire River in Centre , France , and  is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके पृथक फ्रेंच क्रियोल वास्तुकला , as खूब  as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage .
New Orleans is also  प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके भोजन , म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़  ) , and its annual celebrations and festivals , most notably Mardi Gras .
The city  is प्रायः referred to as the `` सबसे अद्वितीय  '' in America .
New Orleans  is स्तिथ in southeastern  Louisiana , straddling the Mississippi River .
The city and  ऑरलियन्स मोहल्ला (  ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by  the parishes of st. tammany to the उत्तर , st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट , plaquemines to the  south and Jefferson to the south and west .
Lake Pontchartrain , part of which is included in the city  हद , झूठ to the उत्तर और झील borgne  lies to the east .
The United States presidential election of  1968 थी the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित  on Tuesday , November 5 , 1968 .
the रिपब्लिकन nominee , पूर्व vice-president रिचर्ड  Nixon , won the election over the Democratic nominee , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a campaign that promised to restore law and order to the nation 's  शहरों , फटा by दंगे और अपराधों .
Analysts have argued  the चुनाव of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted  the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide , the election saw  the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a रिपब्लिकन निर्वाचित लिये the पहला समय in बारह  years .
It was a wrenching national experience , conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King , Jr. , and subsequent race riots across the nation , the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy ,  फैली विपक्ष to the वियतनाम युद्ध आरपार विश्वविद्यालयों campuses , और हिंसक confrontations between पुलिस और anti-war प्रदर्शनकारियों at the 1968 लोकतांत्रिक  National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
The election featured  the strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व अलबामा  Governor George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because  वालेस 's अभियान opposed संघीय हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to समाप्त स्कूल पृथक्करण , he carried  the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North .
This  थी the पिछला चुनाव in जिससे नई यॉर्क था the सबसे  votes in the electoral college ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census , California gained the most electoral votes  और रै remained the सबसे populous राज्य चूंकि  then .
इस is the नवीनतम चुनाव जहाँ a अध्यक्षीय  ticket won without carrying the vice presidential candidate 's home state .
Karak ( ; also known as Garak , Garrak , and Gorg ) is a village in Gamasiyab  ग्रामीण ज़िला , in the सेंट्रल ज़िला of nahavand काउंटी ,  Hamadan Province , Iran .
At the  2006 जनसांख्यिकी , इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी  294 , in 65 families .
