Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967 – April 5 , 1994 ) was an American musician and  कलाकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर , guitarist और प्राथमिक songwriter of the grunge  band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle  म्यूज़िक झाँकी , having इसके डेब्यू एल्बम ब्लीच released on the स्वतंत्र रिकार्ड लेबल sub पॉप in  1989 .
After signing with major label DGC  रिकॉर्ड , the बैंड मिला भेदन कामयाबी साथ `` खुश्बू जैसे टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind  ( 1991 ) .
Following the success of Nevermind , Nirvana was labeled  `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी x , और कोबेन hailed  as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was often uncomfortable and  कुंठित , believing उसके संदेश और कलाकारी दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक , साथ उसके निजी  issues often subject to media attention .
He challenged  निर्वाण 's दर्शक  with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the last years of his life ,  कोबेन struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन , बीमारी  and depression .
He also had difficulty coping  साथ उसके कीर्ति और पब्लिक चित्र , और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding  himself and his wife , musician Courtney Love .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was found dead  at उसके घर in सिएटल , the शिकार of कया थी officially शासित a आत्महत्या by  a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
The  हालातों of उसके मौत at आयु 27 have become  a topic of public fascination and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana , with  कोबेन as a songwriter , रै बेची over  25 million albums in the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide .
A millwright is  a craftsman or tradesman सगाई साथ the निर्माण और मेंटेनेंस  of machinery .
More generally in the English speaking  संसार , जल्दी millwrights यहूद विशेषज्ञ बढ़ई जो erected मशीने प्रयुक्त in कृषि , खाना प्रसंस्करण और प्रसंस्करण lumber और पेपर  .
In the early part of the Industrial Revolution , their skills were pressed  into सेवा भवन the earliest संचालित वस्त्र मिलों  .
आधुनिक millwrights कार्य साथ स्टील और अन्य सामग्री in जोड to लकडी और जरूर प्रायः combine  the skills of several skilled trades in order to successfully fabricate industrial machinery or to assemble machines from pre-fabricated parts .
The modern millwright  जरूर भी be समर्थ to पढ़ा blueprints और  other schematics to aid him in the construction of complex systems .
Millwrights are frequently  unionized , साथ around 45 % unionized in the us , हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights  often set themselves up as independent contractors .
The  समायोजन ब्यूरो is a 2011 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कार्रवाई थ्रिलर फिल्मी loosely  based on the Philip K. Dick short story , `` Adjustment Team `` .
The film was written and  निर्देशित by जार्ज nolfi और सितारों मैट डैमन  and Emily Blunt .
The cast also includes Anthony  mackie , जॉन slattery , माइकल केली  , and Terence Stamp .
The score was  रचित by थामस न्युमैन , साथ दो गीतों by रिचर्ड ashcroft ( `` भविष्य 's उज्जवल '' लिये  the opening sequence ; `` Are You Ready ? '' for the closing credits ) .
सोडियम azide is the अकार्बनिक  compound with the formula NaN3 .
This colorless salt is  the gas-forming घटक in  many car airbag systems .
it is प्रयुक्त लिये the तैयारी  of other azide compounds .
It is an ionic substance , is highly  घुलनशील in जल , और  is very acutely toxic .
Double rainbow and  supernumerary rainbows on the अंदर of the प्राथमिक  arc .
The shadow of the photographer 's head  on the नीचे marks the केन्द्र of the रेनबो  circle ( antisolar point ) .
A rainbow is an optical and meteorological phenomenon that is caused by  प्रतिबिंब of लाइट in जल droplets in the धरती 's माहौल , resulting in a वर्णक्रम of लाइट  appearing in the sky .
It takes the form  of a multicoloured  arc .
Rainbows caused by sunlight always  appear in the खण्ड of आसमान सीधे विपरीत  the sun .
in a `` प्राथमिक रेनबो '' , the चाप shows  red on the outer part and violet on the inner side .
This rainbow is caused by light being refracted while entering a droplet  of जल , तब reflected अंदर on the वापस of the droplet और refracted again जब  leaving it .
In a double rainbow ,  a दूसरी चाप is देखी बाहर the प्राथमिक चाप , और रै the अनुक्रम of इसके रंग  reversed , red facing toward the other one , in both rainbows .
This  दूसरी रेनबो is caused by  light reflecting twice inside water droplets .
The Conservative Party , officially the Conservative and  यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी और colloquially referred to as the tory पार्टी or the tories , is a centre-right  political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and British unionism .
it  is the largest राजनैतिक पार्टी in the संयुक्त किंगडम , होने the largest सिंगल पार्टी in the  House of Commons with 303 MPs , the largest party in local government with 9,391 councillors , and the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs .
It governs in coalition  साथ the उदार डेमोक्रेट , साथ पार्टी नेता दाउद cameron  as Prime Minister .
The Conservative Party was founded in 1834 ,  और थी एक of दो प्रबल पार्टियों in the 19th सदी  , along with the Liberal Party .
It changed its name to the Conservative and Unionist Party in 1912 after merging with the Liberal Unionist  पार्टी , हालांकि कि नाम is rarely प्रयुक्त और it is generally referred to as बस the रूढ़िवादी  Party .
In the 1920s , the Liberal vote  greatly diminished और the श्रमिक पार्टी became the conservatives ' प्रमुख  rivals .
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57 years of the 20th century , including Winston  चर्चिल ( 1940–45 , 1951–55 ) और मार्गरेट थैचर ( 1979–90  ) .
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic liberalisation and  देखी the conservatives become the सबसे eurosceptic of the  three major parties .
The party was  लौटे to सरकारी in गठबन्धन , having विफल to जीत a बहुमत , in 2010 अंतर्गत the  more `` liberal '' leadership of David Cameron .
In the European Parliament , the Conservatives are the largest  अंग्रेजों पार्टी साथ 25 meps , जो बैठना साथ the नरम eurosceptic यूरोपीय conservatives और reformists ( ecr ) संसदीय समूह , जबकि the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of  the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty .
They are the third-largest party in the Scottish Parliament and  second-largest in the वेल्श सभा .
They were formally allied  to the ulster यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी ( uup ) as भाग of the ulster conservatives और unionists व्यवस्था ,  with the UUP currently participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive .
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose  फाइनल , और शायद सबसे recognizable , line-up comprised  Beyoncé Knowles , Kelly Rowland and Michelle Williams .
formed in 1990 in ह्यूस्टन , टेक्सास , नियति 's चाइल्ड सदस्यों began उनके musical endeavors  as Girl 's Tyme comprising , among others , Knowles , Rowland , LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett .
After  सालो of सीमित कामयाबी , वे यहूद हस्ताक्षरित  to Columbia Records as Destiny 's Child .
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream recognition  following the रिलीज of उनके best-selling दूसरी एल्बम , the लिखने 's on the वॉल , जिससे contained the  number-one singles `` Bills , Bills , Bills `` and `` Say My Name `` .
Despite critical and commercial success , the group was plagued by internal conflict and legal  turmoil , as roberson और luckett attempted to विभाजित इससे the समूह 's मैनेजर mathew  Knowles , citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland , his daughter and niece , respectively .
Both Roberson  और luckett यहूद जल्द replaced साथ विलियम्स और farrah फ्रैंकलिन  ; however , in 2000 , Franklin was dismissed , leaving them as a trio .
उनके तीसरा एल्बम , उत्तरजीवी , जिससे contains विषयवस्तु the पब्लिक interpreted as a चैनल to the समूह 's अनुभव ,  contains the worldwide hits `` Independent Women `` , `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious `` .
In 2002 , they announced a hiatus and  re-united दो सालो बाद लिये the रिलीज of उनके चौथी  studio album , Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ) .
Destiny  's चाइल्ड रै बेची अधिक than 50 लाख  records worldwide to date .
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one of the greatest musical trios of all time , the ninth most successful artist/band of the 2000s , and placed  the समूह 68th in इसके all-time hot 100 कलाकारों सूची  in 2008 .
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United States federal agency under the  विभाग of स्वास्थ्य और इंसान सेवाएं headquartered in druid पहाड़ियाँ , unincorporated  DeKalb County , Georgia , in Greater Atlanta .
It  works to protect पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा by providing  information to enhance health decisions , and it promotes health through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations .
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease  रोकथाम और कंट्रोल ( विशेषकर संक्रामक रोगों और foodborne pathogens और अन्य सूक्ष्मजैविक infections ) , पर्यावरणीय स्वास्थ्य , occupational सुरक्षा और  health , health promotion , injury prevention and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the United States .
The CDC is the United States '  नेशनल पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य संस्थान और is a founding सदस्य of the  International Association of National Public Health Institutes .
भूकंप भविष्यवाणी `` is प्रायः पारिभाषित as the specification  of the time , location , and magnitude of a future earthquake within stated limits '' , and particularly of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in a region . ''
This can be  विशिष्ट इससे भूकंप forecasting , जिससे is the probabilistic मूल्यांकन of सामान्य भूकंप  hazard , including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes , in a given area over periods of years or decades .
This can be further distinguished from real-time earthquake warning systems , which , upon detection of a severe earthquake , can  provide neighboring regions a few सेकेंड चेतावनी of potentially significant shaking  .
to be उपयोगी , an भूकंप भविष्यवाणी जरूर be precise पर्याप्त to वारंट the लागत of increased एहतियात  , including disruption of ordinary activities and commerce , and timely enough that preparation can be made .
Predictions must also be reliable , as false alarms and cancelled  सचेतक हैं नहीं तभी economically costly , लकिन seriously undermine विश्वास in , और  thereby the effectiveness of , any kind of warning .
With over 7,000 earthquakes around the world each year with a magnitude of 4.0 or greater ,  नगण्य कामयाबी in भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is easily प्राप्त using fear व्यापक पैरामीटर्स of समय , स्थान , or परिमाण  .
However , such  नगण्य `` कामयाब पूर्वानुमान  '' are not useful .
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports  कि वे यहूद पूर्वानुमानित , or at तनिक anticipated , लकिन no अर्जी of a कामयाब भविष्यवाणी of a प्रमुख  earthquake has survived close inquiry .
In the 1970s there was intense  आशावाद amongst वैज्ञानिकों कि कुछ विधि of predicting भूकंप might be मिला  , but by the 1990s continuing failure led many scientists to question whether it was even possible .
While many scientists still hold that , given enough resources ,  भविष्यवाणी might be संभावित , अनेक अन्य maintain कि भूकंप भविष्यवाणी  is inherently impossible .
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13 ,  1993 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , सिंगर , संगीतकार ,  songwriter and record producer .
Ryan is best known for starring as  बेली पिकेट in the डिज़्नी चैनल असली श्रेणी  The Suite Life on Deck .
In 2008 , The Suite  जीवन on डेक क्रमित as tv 's शीर्ष श्रेणी among बच्चे 6-11 और  the No . 2 scripted series among tweens 9-14 .
Ryan  प्रारंभ एक्टिंग in पेशेवर थिएटर at the आयु of सात ; in 2007 वो appeared in the बार्नी  & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let 's Go to the Firehouse and then was discovered in a nationwide search by Disney .
She is also known  लिये appearing in the 2008 विशेषता  film The Longshots as Edith .
In 2009 , she guest starred in an episode of  wizards of waverly प्लेस in wizards on डेक साथ हन्ना मोंटाना as बेली पिकेट साथ  with her other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck .
Then , in 2010 , she starred in the film 16 Wishes , which was the  सबसे देखी केबल कार्यक्रम on the दिन of इसके प्रीमियर  on the Disney Channel .
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ;  the फिल्म प्राप्त ऊँची viewership in the वयस्कों  demographic ( 18-34 ) .
जल्द बाद कि , रयान स्ट्रक्चर in the स्वतंत्र  theatrical film , What If ... , which premiered on August 20 , 2010 .
Ryan also starred in  the नई डिज़्नी चैनल असली फिल्म , रेडियो विद्रोही , जहाँ वो portrays the भूमिका of tara एडम्स , a शर्मीले 17-year-old  girl who adopts the radio personality , Radio Rebel .
released फ़रवरी 17 , 2012  .
Ryan stars in the  titular भूमिका in the डिज़्नी चैनल असली  Series , Jessie .
stührling tourbillon गति  ( ) .
In horology , a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind ''  ) is an जोड to the यांत्रिकी of a  watch escapement .
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet from an earlier idea by the English chronometer maker John Arnold , a  tourbillon aims to काउंटर the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता by mounting the escapement और संतुलन व्हील in a घूर्णन पिंजरा  , to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position .
Originally an attempt to  improve सटीकता , tourbillons हैं स्टिल शामिल in कुछ महंगी  modern watches as a novelty and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity .
The mechanism is usually exposed on  the देखें 's फेस to दिखाएँ  it off .
The Windows Installer ( previously known as  microsoft installer ) is a तन्त्र घटक प्रयुक्त लिये the संस्थापना ,  maintenance , and removal of software on modern Microsoft Windows systems .
The installation information , and often the files  themselves , हैं packaged in संस्थापना पैकेज , loosely रिलेशनल databases संरचित as com संरचित storages  and commonly known as `` MSI files '' , from their default file extension .
Windows Installer contains  significant परिवर्तन इससे इसके  predecessor , Setup API .
New  सुविधाएँ शामिल a जीयूआई फ्रेमवर्क और स्वचालित पीढी  of the uninstallation sequence .
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to  stand-alone executable installer frameworks ऐसे as पुरानी  versions of InstallShield and NSIS .
Microsoft encourages third parties to use  खिड़कियाँ installer as the आधार लिये संस्थापना frameworks , so कि वे synchronize correctly  with other installers and keep the internal database of installed products consistent .
Important  सुविधाएँ ऐसे as rollback और versioning  depend on a consistent internal database for reliable operation .
furthermore , खिड़कियाँ installer facilitates the principle of तनिक विशेषाधिकार  by performing software installations by proxy for unprivileged users .
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages , originally marketed as energy drinks  , बेची by phusion प्रोजेक्ट of शिकागो , इलिनोइस  .
phusion operates as पेय  Four Brewing Company .
Four Loko ,  the कम्पनी 's सबसे लोकप्रिय पेय , debuted  in the United States market in 2005 .
It is now sold in 48 states , and in  कनाडा , the बहामा , बोलीविया , होंडुरास  , and Europe .
The name `` Four '' is derived from the original energy  पेय 's चार प्रमुख संघटक : दारू , कैफीन , taurine , और  guarana .
Four branded products have been the object of  विधिक , नैतिक , और स्वास्थ्य चिंताएं सम्बन्धित to the कम्पनी allegedly  marketing them to the underaged and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine .
After the  पेय थी बैन in अनेक राज्य , a उत्पाद reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed  caffeine , taurine , and guarana as ingredients , and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink .
The neck of a guitar showing the nut ( in the  पृष्ठभूमि , coloured श्वेत )  and first four metal frets .
A  fret is a उठाया तत्व on the गर्दन  of a stringed instrument .
Frets  प्रायः extend आरपार the पूरा  width of the neck .
On most modern western fretted  यंत्र , frets हैं मेटल स्ट्रिप्स inserted into the fingerboard  .
On some historical instruments and  non-european यंत्र , frets हैं बना  of pieces of string tied around the neck .
Frets  divide the गर्दन into फिक्स्ड खण्ड at intervals सम्बन्धित  to a musical framework .
On instruments such as guitars ,  प्रत्येक fret represents एक semitone in the मानक पश्चिमी प्रणाली जहाँ  one octave is divided into twelve semitones .
Fret is often used as a verb , meaning simply `` to press down  the स्ट्रिंग पीछे a fret  . ''
fretting प्रायः refers to the frets  and/or their system of placement .
There  थी खपत of दारू  both during and after prohibition .
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production ,  वितरण और बिक्री of alcoholic पेय in the संयुक्त राज्य और थी widely समर्थित by the अमरीकी  public when it went into effect in 1920 .
The temperance movement  था popularized the विश्वास कि दारू थी the प्रमुख कारण of सबसे निजी और सोशल समस्याएं और निषेध  was seen as the solution to the nation 's poverty , crime , violence , and other ills .
Upon ratification of the amendment , the famous  इंजीलवादी बिली संडे कहा कि `` the slums होगा  soon be only a memory .
We will turn our prisons  into कारखानों  and our jails into storehouses and corncribs . ''
(  compare christianity  and alcohol . )
Since alcohol  थी to be बैन और चूंकि it थी देखी as the कारण of  most , if not all , crime , some communities sold their jails .
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States Congress confidently asserted that `` There is as much chance of  repealing the eighteenth amendment as वहीँ is लिये a हमिंगबर्ड to मक्खी to the ग्रह मंगल साथ the वॉशिंगटन स्मारक  tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ) , ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI  आयाम प्रतीक : l ) , is the आधारभूत ईकाई of लंबाई in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of  Units ( SI ) .
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the  अलहदा इससे the धरती 's equator to the उत्तर ध्रुव ( at समुद्र स्तर ) , इसके परिभाषा  has been periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology .
Since  1983 , it रै महरूम पारिभाषित as `` the लंबाई of the पाथ travelled by लाइट  in vacuum during a time interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second . ''
Geologists exploring Jurassic sedimentary rocks  in makhtesh gadol , negev मरुस्थल ,  Israel
Geologists  explaining the महत्व of volcanic राख परतों to विद्यार्थी  on field in Iceland
A geologist is a scientist who studies the solid and liquid matter  कि constitutes the धरती as खूब as the प्रक्रियाओं और  history that has shaped it .
Geologists  प्रायः engage in अध्ययन भूविज्ञान  .
geologists , अध्ययन अधिक of an लागू विज्ञान  than a theoretical one , must approach Geology using physics , chemistry and biology as well as other sciences .
Geologists , compared to  वैज्ञानिकों सगाई in अन्य फ़ील्ड , हैं generally अधिक उजागर to the बाहरी than रहकर in laboratories  ; although some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab .
Geologists are engaged in exploration for mining companies in  ढूंढें of धातुओं , oils , और अन्य धरती  resources .
They are also in the  forefront of प्राकृतिक जोखिमों और आपदाओं चेतावनी और शमन , अध्ययन भूकंप , volcanic कार्यकलाप ,  tsunamis , weather storms , and the like ; their studies are used to warn the general public of the occurrence of these events .
Currently ,  geologists हैं भी सगाई in the चर्चा of  climate change , as they study the history and evidence for this Earth process .
Below is a  व्यापक ड्रिल और tap आकार चार्ट लिये सब drills , इम्पीरियल  and metric , and taps up to 36.5 mm .
Modern  वैक्यूम tubes , ज़्यादातर  miniature style
In electronics , a vacuum tube , electron tube  ( in उत्तर अमेरिका ) , तापायनिक वाल्व , ट्यूब , or वाल्व is a यंत्र controlling इलेक्ट्रिक  current through a vacuum in a sealed container .
The container is often thin  पारदर्शी कांच in a roughly बेलनाकार  shape .
The simplest vacuum tube , the diode , is  essentially an incandescent लाइट बल्ब साथ  an added electrode inside .
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot ,  electrons हैं `` boiled '' बंद इसके सतह और into  the vacuum inside the bulb .
If the  एलेक्ट्रोड -- पुकारा a `` थाली '' or `` धनाग्र '' -- is बना अधिक धनात्मक than the hot फिलामेंट , a सीधा वर्तमान  flows through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ) .
As the current only flows in one direction , it makes it possible to convert an  प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान लागू to the फिलामेंट to सीधा  current .
The introduction of a  तीसरा एलेक्ट्रोड , a ग्रिड between the फिलामेंट और  the plate , yields another function .
A  वोल्टेज लागू to the ग्रिड नियंत्रण  the current flowing from the filament to the plate .
Thus , it allows the device to be used  as an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रवर्धक .
Vacuum  tubes हैं यूँ प्रयुक्त लिये rectification , प्रवर्धन , switching  , or similar processing or creation of electrical signals .
the विशाल बहुमत of आधुनिक दिन tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक साथ a वैक्यूम अंदर , और essentially  rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament .
Some  अपवाद to इस हैं dealt साथ in the खण्ड  about gas-filled tubes below .
Vacuum tubes  यहूद नाजुक to the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रौद्योगिकी , जिससे drove the विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण of रेडियो प्रसारण , टेलीविज़न , रडार  , sound reinforcement , sound recording and reproduction , large telephone networks , analog and digital computers , and industrial process control .
Although some  अनुप्रयोग था counterparts using पहले technologies ऐसे as the चिंगारी गैप ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical कंप्यूटर , it थी  the invention of the vacuum tube with three electrodes ( called a triode ) and its capability of electronic amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical .
In most applications , solid-state devices such as  transistors और अन्य सेमीकंडक्टर डिवाइस have  replaced tubes .
solid-state डिवाइस पिछला longer और हैं छोटी ,  more efficient , more reliable , and cheaper than tubes .
Tubes can be  नाजुक , sometimes generate significant अनावश्यक ऊष्मा , और can लो अनेक seconds—many मिनट्स in नाजुक applications—after  powering on to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational tolerance .
However , tubes  स्टिल ढूँढें उपयोग जहाँ solid-state डिवाइस have नहीं महरूम विकसित , हैं अव्यवहारिक , or जहाँ a ट्यूब रै श्रेष्ठ  performance , as with some devices in professional audio and high-power radio transmitters .
Tubes are  स्टिल उत्पादित लिये ऐसे अनुप्रयोग  .
Tubes  हैं कम संभावित than सेमीकंडक्टर डिवाइस to be नष्ट  by the electromagnetic pulse produced by nuclear explosions and geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares .
skittles is a ब्रांड of fruit-flavoured मिठाई , फिलहाल उत्पादित और  marketed by the Wm . Wrigley Jr. Company , a division of Mars , Inc .
They have hard sugar  शेल जिससे carry the अक्षर  S .
The inside is mainly sugar , corn syrup , and hydrogenated palm kernel oil along with fruit juice ,  साइट्रिक एसिड , और प्राकृतिक और कृत्रिम चटपटा  .
the confectionery रै महरूम बेची in a  variety of flavour collections , such as Tropical and Wild Berry .
सर विंस्टन लियोनार्ड spencer-churchill , ( 30 नवम्बर 1874 – 24 जनवरी 1965  ) was a British politician who was the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955 .
Widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th century ,  चर्चिल थी भी an अधिकारी in the अंग्रेजों फौज , a इतिहासकार , a लेखक , और  an artist .
He is the only British  प्रधान मंत्री in इतिहास to have प्राप्त the नोबेल  Prize in Literature , and was also the first person to be made an Honorary Citizen of the United States .
Churchill was born into an  वैभवशाली परिवार as the पोता of the  7th Duke of Marlborough .
His father , Lord Randolph  चर्चिल , थी a charismatic राजनेता जो परोसा as  Chancellor of the Exchequer ; his mother , Jennie Jerome , was an American socialite .
As a young army officer , he saw  कार्रवाई in अंग्रेजों इण्डिया , the सूडान , और the  Second Boer War .
He gained fame as a war  correspondent और लिखा किताबे परिचय उसके  campaigns .
At the  forefront of राजनीती लिये पचास सालो , he आयोजित अनेक  political and cabinet positions .
पहले the पहला संसार युद्ध , he परोसा as अध्यक्ष of the फलक of व्यापार  , Home Secretary , and First Lord of the Admiralty as part of the Asquith Liberal government .
During the war , he continued as First Lord of the  admiralty जबतक the विनाशकारी gallipoli  Campaign caused his departure from government .
He then briefly resumed active army service on the Western Front as commander of  the 6th बटालियन of the royal स्कॉट्स  Fusiliers .
He returned to government  as मंत्री of munitions , सचिव of  State for War , and Secretary of State for Air .
After the War , Churchill served  as चांसलर of the exchequer in the रूढ़िवादी ( baldwin ) सरकारी of 1924–29 , controversially returning the पाउंड स्टर्लिंग in 1925  to the gold standard at its pre-war parity , a move widely seen as creating deflationary pressure on the UK economy .
Also controversial was his  विपक्ष to increased घर नियम लिये इण्डिया और उसके प्रतिरोध  to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII .
Out of office and politically `` in the wilderness ''  दौरान the 1930s , चर्चिल took the सीसे in चेतावनी परिचय नाजी जर्मनी और  in campaigning for rearmament .
On the outbreak of the Second  संसार युद्ध , he थी again नियुक्त  First Lord of the Admiralty .
Following the  इस्तीफा of नेविली चेम्बरलेन on 10 may 1940 , चर्चिल became  Prime Minister .
His steadfast refusal to consider defeat , surrender , or a  सुलह सलाम helped inspire अंग्रेजों प्रतिरोध , विशेषकर दौरान the मुश्किल जल्दी दिनों  of the War when Britain stood alone among European countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler .
Churchill was particularly  विख्यात लिये उसके भाषणों और रेडियो प्रसारण , जिससे helped inspire the अंग्रेजों  people .
He led Britain as Prime  मंत्री जबतक विजय over नाजी  Germany had been secured .
After the Conservative  पार्टी खोया the 1945 चुनाव , he became नेता of the  Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government .
After winning the 1951 election , he again became Prime  मंत्री , पहले retiring in 1955 .
Upon his death ,  एलिज़ाबेथ ii granted उसे the इज्ज़त of a राज्य अंत्येष्टि  , which saw one of the largest assemblies of world statesmen in history .
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll , Churchill is widely regarded as  होने among the सबसे influential लोगों  in British history .
Ruby Gloom is an animated  टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ आधारित on an वस्त्र मताधिकार  .
The show is produced by Nelvana and began  airing on अक्तूबर 13 , 2006 in कनाडा on  the network YTV .
It stars  the आवाज़ें of सारा gadon , एमिली हैम्पशायर  , and Peter Keleghan .
The Ford Focus is a  कॉम्पैक्ट car ( c-segment in यूरोपीय ) manufactured  by the Ford Motor Company since 1998 .
Ford began sales  of the फ़ोकस to यूरोपीय in जुलाई 1998 और in उत्तर  America during 1999 for the 2000 model year .
In Europe , South America , North America and South Africa ,  the फ़ोकस replaced the विभिन्न संस्करण of the घाट अनुरक्षण बेची in those बाज़ार  .
In Asia and  australasia , it replaced  the Ford Laser .
As of the first half of 2012 , the Focus  surpassed the टोयोटा कोरोला to become  the world 's best selling automobile nameplate .
The Focus  रै महरूम माना एक of the 50 महानतम  cars of the past fifty years by British magazine CAR .
an आगर थाली -- an उदाहरण  of a bacterial growth medium .
Specifically , it is a  streak थाली ; the नारंगी लाइनों और  dots are formed by bacterial colonies .
A growth medium or culture medium is a liquid or gel designed to support the growth  of microorganisms or कोशिकाएं , or छोटी पौधे जैसे the मॉस physcomitrella  patens .
There are different types of media for growing  अलग प्रकार of कोशिकाएं  .
There  हैं दो प्रमुख प्रकार of विकास मीडिया : those प्रयुक्त लिये कोशिका संस्कृति , जिससे उपयोग विशिष्ट कोशिका प्रकार निकला  from plants or animals , and microbiological culture , which are used for growing microorganisms , such as bacteria or yeast .
The most common growth media for microorganisms are nutrient broths and agar plates ;  specialized मीडिया हैं sometimes जरूरी लिये microorganism और कोशिका संस्कृति  growth .
Some  जीवों , termed सुकुमार जीवों , आवश्यकता specialized  environments due to complex nutritional requirements .
Viruses , for example , are obligate intracellular parasites and  आवश्यकता a विकास मीडियम containing  living cells .
A talent agent , or booking agent , is a person who finds jobs for actors , authors ,  फिल्मी निर्देशकों , संगीतकारों , मॉडल , निर्माता , पेशेवर एथलीट , लेखक और अन्य  people in various entertainment businesses .
An  एजेंट भी defends , supports और promotes  the interest of his/her clients .
Agents can not  उपज उनके अपना shows due  to conflict of interest .
A talent agent must be  परिचित साथ  their clients .
An  एजेंट रै to जान कया दयालु of कार्य the क्लाएंट can और can  not do in order to match them with various jobs .
Having an agent is not required ,  लकिन करता सहायता the  artist in getting jobs .
In many cases casting directors , or  अन्य व्यवसायों , go to हुनर एजेंसियों to ढूँढें कलाकारों वे  are looking for .
the एजेंट is सशुल्क a प्रतिशत of the स्टार 's आय  ( typically 10 % ) .
एजेंटों sometimes होगा be referred  to as `` 10 percenters . ''
There are different regulations that govern different types of agents that are  स्थापित by कलाकार 's संघ और the विधिक क्षेत्राधिकार in जिससे the  agent operates .
There are  भी पेशेवर संगठन  that license talent agencies .
Since the decline in viewership in theaters , from the 1950s to 1960s ,  इस caused a स्मारकीय शिफ़्ट in कैसा studios होता उपज films  and thus reducing the cost of exclusive and expensive actors .
Actors and actresses were working for the studios but were not owned by one major studio  एंटिटी और so यहूद समर्थ to कार्य on भीतर उनके समय और साथ अन्य studios  .
Because of  इस , एजेंटों यहूद अभी देखी as  a necessity instead of an option .
एजेंटों अभी became तीसरा पार्टियों कि negotiated between studios  and clients , this making their services imperative between each party .
Since talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts , all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया मजदूर कोड , जिससे काल्स an एजेंट a `` व्यक्ति or निगम जो engages in the occupation of procuring  , offering , promising , or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists . ''
Mars has  दो ज्ञात moons , phobos और deimos  , which are thought to be captured asteroids .
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph Hall and are named after the  वर्ण phobos ( panic/fear ) और deimos ( terror/dread ) जो , in यूनानी mythology ,  accompanied their father Ares , god of war , into battle .
Ares was known as  मंगल to the romans  .
It is possible that Mars may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 meters and a  धूल रिंग between phobos और deimos may be उपस्थित लकिन none  have been discovered .
In law enforcement parlance , the term murder book refers to  the मामला संचिका of a हत्या छानबीन  .
Typically , murder books include  अपराधों झाँकी छायाचित्र और sketches , पोस्टमार्टम और forensic रिपोर्ट्स , transcripts  of investigators ' notes and witness interviews .
The murder book encapsulates the complete  पेपर ट्रेल of a हत्या छानबीन , इससे the समय the हत्या is पहला  reported through the arrest of a suspect .
Law enforcement agencies typically guard  हत्या किताबे carefully , और it is असामान्य लिये नागरिकों to be दिए आज़ाद अभिगम  to these kinds of records , especially for unsolved cases .
A  melon baller
Melon balls are  गेंदें of melon बना using a melon baller कि varies इससे  around 1 centimeter to 3 centimeters ( about 3/8 inch to 1 inch ) .
They are  generally प्रयुक्त in फल सलाद  .
A KSA , or Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities , is a series of narrative statements that are required when  applying to संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी जॉब उद्घाटन  .
KSAs are used to determine ,  साथ साथ resumes , जो the बेहतरीन आवेदकों  are when several candidates qualify for a job .
The  ज्ञान , कौशल और abilities ( ksas ) जरुरी लिये the कामयाब प्रदर्शन  of a position are contained on each job vacancy announcement .
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked federal  एजेंसियों to रोकें requiring जॉब आवेदकों to भरण आउट the questionnaires  , to be phased out within a year .
KSAs are brief and focused essays about  एक 's करियर और शैक्षणिक पृष्ठभूमि कि presumably qualify एक to perform the  duties of the position being applied for .
A knowledge , skills , and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay about one 's talent and expertise and related experiences ( work ,  शिक्षा , स्वयंसेवी ) और accomplishments  .
A series of KSA statements are  प्रायः जरूरी जब applying लिये सबसे संघीय सरकारी  and some state and city government jobs .
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities of a  prospective आवेदक in शर्तें of संभावित क्षमता to perform the कर्तव्य  of the job .
Most  सरकारी भर्ती officials dekh लिये a छोटी , कुरकुरे और साफ ksa कि  emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous work .
KSA  कथन हैं भी ज्ञात as मूल्यांकन  Factors .
Other agencies sometimes call them `` Rating Factors '' , `` Quality Ranking Factors '' , `` Knowledge ,  abilities , कौशल और अन्य विशेषताएँ  '' , or `` Job Elements '' .
The name can be  बस a नाम लकिन प्रायः it प्रभाव  content and length of the essay .
Every  एजेंसी रै इसके अपना regulations लकिन सबसे of  the time the each KSA factor should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long .
The below definitions are defined by the U.S.  दफ्तर of कर्मियों प्रबन्धन  :
Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The  गुण जरूरी to perform a जॉब और हैं generally  demonstrated through qualifying service , education , or training .
Knowledge - Is a body of  सूचना लागू सीधे to the प्रदर्शन  of a function .
Skill - Is an  observable competence to perform a सीखे  psychomotor act .
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable behavior or a  बर्ताव कि परिणाम in an observable  product .
The scoring of KSA essays  is आधारित on a स्केल of इससे एक to  100 .
Job  आवेदकों जरूर स्कोर ऊपर 70  to be considered for the position .
High scores are  निकला through answering the ksa सवाल as specifically  as possible , providing examples from previous employment or training that clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications .
When applying  to संघीय सरकारी स्थितियाँ , a संघीय पुनरारंभ  is usually required in addition to KSA statements .

Whole grains are cereal grains  कि contain खाद्यान्न रोगाणु , भ्रूणपोष , और चोकर , in कंट्रास्ट to  refined grains , which retain only the endosperm .

Love Always is the debut album of American R & B duo K-Ci  & जोजो , released on जून 17 , 1997 , by mca  Records .
It was recorded at various  studios in नई यॉर्क और the लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल in  1996 and 1997 .
It was produced by  जोजो और अनेक अन्य , सहित  DeVante Swing , James Mtume , and Jeff Redd .
the duo यहूद originally a भाग  of Jodeci before this album .
the एल्बम peaked at छठे on the us बिलबोर्ड 200  and also appeared on international charts .
The single `` All My Life `` charted number  एक in अनेक देशों , और सब चार of the एल्बम 's singles peaked ऊपर the शीर्ष 25 in the us hot r & b/hip-hop गीतों और the  New Zealand Top 40 Singles .
Love Always was received  favorably by आलोचकों , जो praised the भाइयो  ' singing ability and the production .
The album has been certified three times platinum by the  रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) और सुनहरा by म्यूज़िक  Canada and IFPI Sweden .
As of  जून 1999 it था बेची 2.9 लाख नक़ल in  the United States .
A  variable-rate बंधक , adjustable-rate बंधक ( भुजा ) , or ट्रैकर बंधक is a  mortgage loan with the interest rate on the note periodically adjusted based on an index which reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets .
the ऋण may be offered  at the lender 's standard variable rate/ base rate .
There may be a direct and  legally-defined कड़ी to the underlying अनुक्रमणिका , लकिन जहाँ the lender offers no विशिष्ट कड़ी to the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका the  rate can be changed at the lender 's discretion .
The term ``  variable-rate बंधक '' is सबसे आम बाहर the संयुक्त राज्य , whilst in  the United States , `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most common , and implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal government , with caps on charges .
In  अनेक देशों , समायोज्य रेट mortgages हैं the norm , और  in such places , may simply be referred to as mortgages .
Among the most common indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity  राजकोष ( cmt ) प्रतिभूति , the लागत of निधि अनुक्रमणिका ( cofi ) , और the लंदन interbank  Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) .
A few lenders use their  अपना लागत of निधि as an अनुक्रमणिका ,  rather than using other indices .
This is done to ensure a steady  हाशिया लिये the lender , जिनकी अपना लागत of funding होगा प्रायः  be related to the index .
Consequently , payments made by the borrower may  बदलें over समय साथ the बदलना ब्याज  rate ( alternatively , the term of the loan may change ) .
This  is पृथक इससे the ग्रैजुएट भुगतान बंधक , जिससे offers बदलना  payment amounts but a fixed interest rate .
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only mortgage , the fixed rate  बंधक , the ऋणात्मक amortization बंधक  , and the balloon payment mortgage .
Adjustable  दरों ट्रांसफ़र भाग of the  interest rate risk from the lender to the borrower .
They can be used  जहाँ मनमौजी ब्याज दरों मेक  fixed rate loans difficult to obtain .
The borrower benefits if the  ब्याज रेट जलप्रपात लकिन loses if the ब्याज  rate increases .
The borrower benefits from  घटाया मार्जिन to the underlying लागत of उधार compared to फिक्स्ड  or capped rate mortgages .
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy , a United States Senator and brother of assassinated President John Fitzgerald `` Jack ''  कैनेडी , took प्लेस shortly बाद मध्यरात्रि on जून 5 , 1968 , in लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , दौरान the अभियान ऋतु लिये the संयुक्त राज्य  Presidential election , 1968 .
After winning the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया और दक्षिण डकोटा प्राथमिक चुनावों लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , कैनेडी थी शॉट as he walked through the रसोईघर of the दूत होटल  and died in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later .
Sirhan Sirhan , a 24-year-old  फिलीस्तीनी / जार्डन अप्रवासी , थी convicted of कैनेडी 's  murder and is serving a life sentence for the crime .
Sirhan 's lawyers have released statements  claiming प्रमाण कि  he was framed .
The shooting was recorded on audio  टेप by a freelance समाचारपत्र रिपोर्टर , और the aftermath थी captured  on film .
कैनेडी 's देह lay in repose at st. पैट्रिक 's गिरजाघर  in New York for two days before a funeral mass was held on June 8 .
His body was interred near his  bhai जॉन at आर्लिंगटन नेशनल कब्रिस्तान  .
His death prompted the  सुरक्षा of अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार by the संयुक्त  States Secret Service .
Hubert Humphrey went on to win the Democratic nomination for the  प्रेसिडेंसी , लकिन ultimately narrowly खोया the चुनाव to  Richard Nixon .
As with his brother Jack 's death ,  bobby 's हत्या और the हालातों surrounding it have शाखित  a variety of conspiracy theories .
As of 2013 Kennedy remains one  of तभी दो बैठे संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों to be  assassinated ( the other being Huey Long ) .
The Modern Age of Comic Books is  an अनौपचारिक नाम लिये the काल in the इतिहास of मुख्यधारा अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे generally  considered to last from the mid-1980s until present day .
In this period , comic book characters generally became darker and more psychologically complex , creators became  better-known और क्रियाशील in बदलना the उद्योग , स्वतंत्र कॉमिक्स flourished , और larger प्रकाशन घरों became अधिक commercialized  .
An alternate name for this period is the Dark Age of Comic Books ,  due to the लोकप्रियता और कलाकारी influence of grim शीर्षक , ऐसे as और  Watchmen .
When Harry Met  सैली ... is a 1989 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा  by Nora Ephron and directed by Rob Reiner .
It stars Billy Crystal as Harry and  मेग रयान as सैली .
The story follows the title characters from the  समय वे मिलें बस पहले sharing a cross-country ड्राइव , through बारह  years or so of chance encounters in New York City .
The film raises the question `` Can men and women ever just be friends ? '' and advances many  विचार परिचय संबंध कि became household अवधारणाओं , ऐसे as  those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person '' .
The origins of the film came from Reiner 's  वापसी to सिंगल जीवन बाद a तलाक  .
An interview  ephron conducted साथ reiner provided  the basis for Harry .
Sally  थी आधारित on ephron  and some of her friends .
Crystal came on board and made his own  योगदान to the पटकथा , बनाना हैरी  funnier .
Ephron  supplied the ढांचा of the फिल्मी साथ much of the संवाद  based on the real-life friendship between Reiner and Crystal .
The  साउंडट्रैक consists of मानकों performed by हैरी connick  , Jr. , with a big band and orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman .
Connick  जीती उसके पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये  Best Jazz Male Vocal Performance .
Columbia Pictures released the film using the `` platform '' technique , which involved opening it in a few select cities , letting  धनात्मक शब्द of मुँह generate ब्याज , और तब धीरे expanding वितरण over subsequent  weeks .
When Harry Met Sally ... grossed a  कुल of us $ 92 .8 लाख in उत्तर अमेरिका  .
Ephron  प्राप्त a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार , an ऑस्कर नामांकन , और a लेखक  Guild of America Award nomination for her screenplay .
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years ... 100 Laughs  सूची of the शीर्ष कॉमेडी films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और क्रमांक 60 on ब्रावो 's `` 100 funniest  Movies '' .
In early 2004 , the film was adapted for  the स्टेज in a उत्पादन अभिनीत ल्यूक पेरी  and Alyson Hannigan .

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged food products  primarily consisting of boxed पास्ता bundled साथ a पैकेट or पैकेट्स  of powdered sauce or seasonings .
The contents of each box are combined with  browned मैदान बीफ , जल और मिल्क to बनाएँ a पूरा  dish .
The product line  भी सुविधाएँ उत्पाद साथ अन्य starches ऐसे  as rice or potatoes instead of pasta .
it is बना  by General Mills .
हालांकि the क्लासिक boxed हैमबर्गर हेल्पर उत्पाद  only supply the starch item and the sauce packets , some varieties of the product include ground beef .
These include a frozen food line , which features some of the  ब्रांड 's क्लासिक किस्में in a पूरा भोजन kit रूप , साथ frozen मैदान बीफ और  frozen sauce packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag .
There is also an `` instant '' version of Hamburger Helper  containing निर्जलित मांस , नूडल्स और seasonings in a छोटी  pouch , requiring only water to be added .
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping Hand '' , an  anthropomorphic एनिमेटेड , चार fingered left-hand दस्ताने , जिससे appears in the उत्पाद 's टेलीविज़न  commercials and on the packages .

A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object  कि is neither a ग्रह nor a उपग्रह  .
More explicitly , the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a celestial body in direct orbit of the Sun that is massive enough for its shape  to be नियंत्रित by gravitation , लकिन कि नापसंद a ग्रह रै नहीं साफ इसके कक्षीय  region of other objects .
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies orbiting the Sun , brought about by an increase in  discoveries of trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ कि rivaled प्लूटो in आकार , और आखिरकार precipitated by the डिस्कवरी  of an even more massive object , Eris .
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the  neighbourhood of उनके कक्षा हैं पारिभाषित as ग्रह , जबकि those कि हैं नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to be rounded by उनके अपना गम्भीरता हैं  defined as small Solar System bodies .
Dwarf  ग्रह आइये in between  .
The  exclusion of बौना ग्रह इससे the रोस्टर of ग्रह by the iau रै महरूम दोनो praised और criticized ; it थी कहा to be the `` सही निर्णय '' by माइक  Brown , who discovered and other new dwarf planets , but has been rejected by Alan Stern , who had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990 .
The IAU  फिलहाल recognizes पाँच बौना ग्रह  in the Solar System : , Pluto , , , and .
However , only two of these  लाशें , ceres और प्लूटो , have महरूम observed in पर्याप्त विवरण  to demonstrate that they fit the definition .
Eris has been accepted as a dwarf  ग्रह क्युकी it is अधिक  massive than Pluto .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian objects with an absolute  परिमाण उज्जवल than +1 ( और hence a व्यास of ≥838 km assuming a ज्यामितीय ऐल्बीडो of ≤1 ) हैं to be नामित अंतर्गत  the assumption that they are dwarf planets .
The only two such objects known at the time , Makemake  और हउमेया , गई through इस नामकरण कार्यविधि और यहूद  declared to be dwarf planets .
It is  suspected कि another सौ or so ज्ञात वस्तुएँ in the  Solar System are dwarf planets .
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be  मिला जब the संपूर्ण प्रदेश ज्ञात as the kuiper बेल्ट is छान , और कि the क्रमांक may exceed  10,000 when objects scattered outside the Kuiper belt are considered .
Individual astronomers recognize several of these  , और in अगस्त 2011 माइक भूरा प्रकाशित a सूची of 390 प्रत्याशी वस्तुएँ , ranging इससे  `` nearly certain '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets . '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the  पाँच स्वीकृत by the iau प्लस , , , और – as `` वस्तुतः निश्चित '' , साथ another  two dozen highly likely , and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total .
The classification of bodies in other  ग्रहीय प्रणालियों साथ the विशेषताएँ  of dwarf planets has not been addressed .
A debit card ( also known as a bank card or check card ) is a plastic payment card that  provides the cardholder इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अभिगम to उसके or उसके बैंको खाता ( s ) at a वित्तीय संस्था  .
Some cards have a stored value with which a payment is made , while most relay a message to the cardholder 's  बैंको to withdraw निधि इससे a payee 's designated  bank account .
The card  , जहाँ स्वीकृत , can be प्रयुक्त  instead of cash when making purchases .
In some cases , the primary account  क्रमांक is आबंटित exclusively लिये उपयोग on the अंतरजाल और वहीँ is no  physical card .
In many  देशों , the उपयोग of डेबिट ताश रै become so फैली कि उनके आवाज़ रै  overtaken or entirely replaced cheques and , in some instances , cash transactions .
the विकास of डेबिट ताश , नापसंद क्रेडिट ताश और चार्ज ताश , रै  generally been country specific resulting in a number of different systems around the world , which were often incompatible .
Since the mid-2000s , a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be used in other  देशों और अनुमत उनके उपयोग लिये अंतरजाल और फोन  purchases .
Unlike credit and charge cards , payments using a debit  कार्ड हैं तत्काल transferred इससे the cardholder 's designated बैंको खाता  , instead of them paying the money back at a later date .
Debit cards usually also allow for instant withdrawal of  नकदी , एक्टिंग as the एटीएम कार्ड लिये withdrawing नकदी  .
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to  ग्राहक , जहाँ a ग्राहक can withdraw नकदी साथ साथ उनके खरीदें  .
Francois Henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( September 26 , 1914 - January 23 , 2011 ) was an American  फ़िटनेस , कसरत , और nutritional विशेषज्ञ और प्रेरक स्पीकर जो is sometimes पुकारा `` the गॉडफादर  of fitness '' and the `` first fitness superhero . ''
He  वर्णित खुद as होने a `` sugarholic '' और a  `` junk food junkie '' until he was 15 .
He also had behavioral problems , but `` turned his  जीवन around '' बाद सुनना to a पब्लिक लेक्चर by पॉल ब्रैग  , a well-known nutrition speaker .
During his career , he came to believe that the country 's overall health depended on the health of its population , writing  कि `` शारीरिक संस्कृति और पोषण — is the मोक्ष  of America . ''
Decades before health and  फ़िटनेस began होने प्रचारित by हस्तियाँ जैसे जेन फोंडा और रिचर्ड सीमन्स , lalanne थी already widely  recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet .
He published numerous books on fitness and  hosted a फ़िटनेस टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ between 1953 और 1985  .
As early as 1936 , at age 21 , he opened one of the nation 's  पहला फ़िटनेस gyms in ओकलैंड , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , जिससे became a प्रोटोटाइप लिये दर्जनों of समान gyms using  his name .
One of  उसके 1950s टेलीविज़न कसरत कार्यक्रम थी aimed toward महिलाओं , जिसको he भी प्रोत्साहित to  join his health clubs .
He invented a number of exercise  मशीने , सहित leg-extension  and pulley devices .
Besides producing his own series of videos , he coached the elderly and disabled not to  forgo कसरत , believing it होता enable उन्हें to बढ़ाएँ उनके शक्ति  .
LaLanne also  gained मान्यता लिये उसके कामयाबी as a bodybuilder , as  well as for his prodigious feats of strength .
Arnold Schwarzenegger once  stated , `` कि जोकर lalanne 's an एनिमल ! , '' बाद lalanne , at 54 , ताल  a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest .
On  the अवसर of lalanne 's मौत , श्वार्ज़नेगर credited lalanne लिये होने `` an apostle लिये फ़िटनेस '' by प्रेरणादायी `` अरबों  all over the world to live healthier lives , '' and , as governor of California , had earlier placed him on his Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness .
स्टीव रीव्स credited lalanne as उसके प्रेरणा  to build his muscular physique while keeping a slim waist .
He was inducted to the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल of कीर्ति और रै a स्टार  on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
एयर शक्तियां of सबसे of the देशों उपयोग  system similar to Armies .
However , the RAF and the air forces of many Commonwealth countries , or those formerly under a British influence , use a different set of ranks loosely based on naval equivalents ; Lieutenant ,  कमांडर , कप्तान और commodore हैं prefixed लिये एयर फ़ोर्स उपयोग साथ उड़ान , wing , समूह और एयर , क्रमशः  ( the first three being the units that they used to command ) .
पेनेलोपे क्रूज़ sánchez ( ; born अप्रैल 28 ,  1974 ) is a Spanish actress .
Signed by an agent at age 15 , she made her acting debut at 16 on television  और उसके विशेषता फिल्मी डेब्यू the following साल in jamón , jamón ( 1992 ) ,  to critical acclaim .
Her subsequent roles in  the 1990s और 2000s शामिल खोलें अपना आँखें ( 1997 ) , the hi-lo देश  ( 1999 ) , The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ) .
Cruz achieved recognition for her lead  भूमिकाएँ in the 2001 films वैनिला  Sky and Blow .
She has since built a successful career , appearing in films from  a चौड़ी दायरा of जाति , सहित the कॉमेडी waking up in रेनो ( 2002 ) , the थ्रिलर gothika  ( 2003 ) , the Christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ) , and the action adventure Sahara ( 2005 ) .
She has received critical acclaim for her roles in Volver ( 2006 ) and Nine (  2009 ) receiving सुनहरी ग्लोब और अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations लिये प्रत्येक  .
She won the Academy Award  लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री in 2008  for Vicky Cristina Barcelona .
She was the first Spanish  अभिनेत्री in इतिहास to प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार और  the first Spanish actress to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Cruz has modeled for companies  ऐसे as आम , ralph लॉरेन और  L'Oréal .
Penélope and her  younger सिस्टर mónica क्रूज़ have designed  items for Mango .
She  रै दान दोनो उसके  time and money to charities .
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and India , where she spent one week working for Mother Teresa ;  वो दान उसके सैलरी इससे ' to सहायता निधि the लेट नन 's मिशन  .
A wax sculpture of Cruz will be  लगाई in a प्रीमियर स्पॉट in the grevin  Wax Museum in Paris .
File Explorer , previously known as Windows Explorer , is a file manager application and also a navigation tool that is  शामिल साथ रिलीज of the microsoft खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली इससे खिड़कियाँ  95 onwards .
It provides a  आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस लिये accessing the संचिका  systems .
It is also the component of the operating  प्रणाली कि presents अनेक उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस वस्तुएं on the मॉनिटर  such as the taskbar and desktop .
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows Explorer running ( for example , the File | Run command in Task Manager on NT-derived  संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ होगा फलन बगैर it , as होगा कमांड typed in a कमांड संकेत  window ) .
Located in the C : \Windows directory , it is sometimes referred to as the Windows shell  , explorer.exe , or बस “explorer”  .
The Care Bears are  वर्ण निर्मित by अमरीकी बधाई in 1981  for use on greeting cards .
The original artwork for the cards  थी चित्रित by कलाकार एलेना kucharik .
In 1983 , Kenner turned the Care  bears into plush टेडी bears  .
The  परवाह bears appeared in उनके अपना tv specials पुकारा the परवाह bears in the  Land Without Feelings ( 1983 ) and The Care Bears Battle the Freeze Machine ( 1984 ) .
They also had their own  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी इससे 1985 to 1988 , in जोड to तीन विशेषता films : the परवाह bears फिल्म ( 1985 ) , परवाह bears फिल्म ii : a नई पीढी  ( 1986 ) , and The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland ( 1987 ) .
Each Care  भालू आता in a अलग रंग और रै a specialized तमगा on इसके पेट कि  represents its duty and personality .
This insignia was  ज्ञात as उनके `` tummy प्रतीक  . ''
However , the movie Care Bears : Oopsy  करता it ! renamed उन्हें `` पेट बैज  '' .
Adding to the Care Bear family are the `` Care Bear Cousins '' , which feature a lion , rabbit , penguin ,  raccoon , और अन्य ऐसे पशु निर्मित in the वही स्टाइल as the टेडी  bears .
In 2002 , the bears were  reintroduced साथ नई खिलौने  .
Made by Play-Along Toys , the new toys  offered सुविधाएँ ऐसे as illuminated bellies upon टच , एरोबिक  bears , and glow-in-the-dark bears .
As part of this comeback , the Bears have appeared in two  computer-animated फिल्मों : परवाह bears : यात्रा to joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) और the परवाह bears ' बिग काश फिल्म ( 2005 ) .
In 2007 , the franchise celebrated its 25th anniversary ; another  relaunch took प्लेस , as खूब as the रिलीज of परवाह bears  : Oopsy Does It ! .

it premiered on  The Hub on June 2 , 2012 .
