Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate Highway  in the संयुक्त राज्य कि रनों इससे अंतरराज्यीय 15 निकट कोव  Fort , Utah , to a Park and Ride near Baltimore , Maryland .
It was the first Interstate  राजमार्ग प्रोजेक्ट in the  United States .
I-70  लगभग traces the पाथ of u.S. रूट 40 ( और  also the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains .
West of the Rockies , the route of I-70 was  निकला इससे अनेक स्त्रोत  .
I-70 is the fifth longest  अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग ,  after I-90 , I-80 , I-40 , and I-10 .
The  निर्माण of i-70 in कोलोराडो और यूटा is माना an अभियान्त्रिकी आश्चर्य  as the route passes through the Eisenhower Tunnel , Glenwood Canyon , and the San Rafael Swell .
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the  उच्चतम पाइंट साथ the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग  system with an elevation of .
The sections of  the अंतरराज्यीय in मिसौरी और कान्सास have रखी अर्जी  to be the first interstate in the United States .
Though disputed , the Federal Highway Administration has  claimed the खण्ड of i-70 through glenwood canyon , समाप्त in 1992 , थी the पिछला टुकड़ा  of the Interstate Highway system , as originally planned , to open to traffic .
फ़ोटो of 1999  total eclipse
As seen from the Earth , a solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the Sun  और धरती , और the चंद्रमा fully or partially ब्लॉक  ( `` occults `` ) the Sun .
This can happen only  at नई चंद्रमा , जब the सूर्य और the चंद्रमा  are in conjunction as seen from Earth in an alignment referred to as syzygy .
In a total eclipse , the disk of the Sun  is fully obscured  by the Moon .
In partial and annular eclipses only  भाग of the सूर्य is obscured  .
If the Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit , a  छोटी करीब to the धरती , और in the वही कक्षीय प्लेन , वहीँ होता be कुल सौर eclipses प्रत्येक  single month .
However , the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at more than 5  डिग्री to धरती 's कक्षा around the सूर्य ( देखिए ecliptic ) so इसके छाया at नई चंद्रमा प्रायः चूकें  Earth .
Earth  's कक्षा is पुकारा the ecliptic प्लेन as the चंद्रमा 's कक्षा जरूर क्रॉस इस प्लेन in अनुक्रम लिये  an eclipse ( both solar as well as lunar ) to occur .
In addition , the Moon 's actual orbit is elliptical , often taking  it दूर पर्याप्त दूर इससे धरती कि इसके apparent आकार is नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to ब्लाक the  Sun totally .
the कक्षीय planes क्रॉस प्रत्येक साल at a लकीर of नोड resulting in at तनिक दो , और up  to five , solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses .
However , total solar eclipses are rare at any particular  स्थान क्युकी totality exists तभी साथ a सीमित पाथ on धरती 's  surface traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra .
An  ग्रहण is a प्राकृतिक घटना  .
nevertheless , in कुछ प्राचीन और आधुनिक संस्कृतियों , सौर eclipses  have been attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens .
a कुल सौर ग्रहण can be frightening to लोगों जो हैं बेखबर of इसके खगोलीय  explanation , as the Sun seems to disappear during the day and the sky darkens in a matter of minutes .
Because it is dangerous to look directly at the Sun , observers should use special eye protection or  अप्रत्यक्ष देखने तकनीकों जब देखने a आंशिक ग्रहण , or the आंशिक  phases of a total eclipse .
It is safe to  दृश्य the कुल phase of a कुल सौर  eclipse with the unaided eye and without protection , however .
People referred to as eclipse  chasers or umbraphiles होगा सफर to रिमोट स्थितियाँ to observe  or witness predicted central solar eclipses .
A political party ( from , Genitive partis , `` part '' , ``  portion '' ) is a राजनैतिक संगठन कि typically seeks to influence  , or entirely control , government policy , usually by nominating candidates with aligned political views and trying to seat them in political office .
पार्टियों participate in चुनावी अभियान और  educational outreach or protest actions .
पार्टियों प्रायः espouse an विचारधारा or दृष्टि , expressed in a पार्टी कार्यक्रम  , bolstered by a written platform with specific goals , forming a coalition among disparate interests .
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging  to the genus mangifera , consisting of numerous तीव्र fruiting पेड़ in the flowering संयंत्र परिवार  Anacardiaceae .
The mango is native to South Asia , from where it  रै महरूम वितरित विश्वव्यापी to become एक of  the most cultivated fruits in the tropics .
While other Mangifera species ( e.g . horse mango , M. foetida ) are also grown on a  अधिक स्थानीयकृत आधार , mangifera इंडिका – the 'common आम ' or 'इण्डियाn आम ' – is the तभी आम पेड़  commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions .
It is the national  फल of इण्डिया , पाकिस्तानी  and Philippines .
In several cultures , its fruit and leaves are ritually used as  पुष्पक सजावट at विवाह , पब्लिक जश्न और धार्मिक  ceremonies .
Gill  arnette byrd , < संदर्भ नाम > एचटीटीपी : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/b/byrdgi00.htm  ( born February 20 , 1961 in San Francisco , California ) is a former professional American football player .
he थी a दो समय प्रो कटोरी cornerback in 1991 और 1992  for the San Diego Chargers after graduating from San Jose State University .
Byrd was  inducted into the chargers हॉल  of Fame in 1998 .
He  थी an all-city कार्यशील वापस और रक्षात्मक वापस at लोवेल ऊँची स्कूल ( सैन फ्रांसिस्को ) , helping to  lead the Cardinals to the city championship in his senior season of 1978 .
World map  प्रर्दशित the tropic of  Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer , also  referred to as the उत्तरी tropic , is the वृत्त of अक्षांश on the धरती कि marks the सबसे northerly  position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead at its zenith .
This event occurs once per year , at the time of the June  संक्रांति , जब the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is tilted toward the सूर्य to इसके अधिकतम  extent .
It currently ( Year 2013 )  झूठ at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ उत्तर of the equator  .
Its  दक्षिणी गोलार्ध बंटवारा , अंकन the सबसे southerly  position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead , is the Tropic of Capricorn .
These tropics are two of the  पाँच प्रमुख उपाधि उपायों or प्रमुख वृत्त of अक्षांश कि चिह्नित मानचित्र  of the Earth , besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles and the Equator .
The positions of these circles of latitude ( other than  the equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the झुकाव of the धरती 's  axis of rotation relative to the plane of its orbit .
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs , and is currently  the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया , उत्तर अमेरिका , यूरोपीय , और ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Discs using the DVD-Video specification  आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव और an h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 डिकोडर  ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2  संपीडित वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः  multi-channel formats as described below ) .
Typically , the  आंकड़ा रेट लिये dvd फिल्मों सीमाएँ इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s  , and the bit rate is usually adaptive .
it थी पहला उपलब्धियाँ  for retail around 1997 .
The DVD-Video specification was created  by dvd फ़ोरम और can be प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo लाइसेंसिंग निगम लिये a शुल्क of  $ 5,000 .
The  specification is नहीं सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ , क्युकी  every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement .
Certain information in  the dvd किताब is मालिकाना  and confidential .
In computing and  specifically अंतरजाल , a जोंक is एक जो लाभ , प्रायः deliberately , इससे अन्य ' सूचना or प्रयत्न लकिन करता नहीं प्रस्ताव  anything in return , or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid being called a leech .
In economics , this type of  बर्ताव is पुकारा `` फ़्री सवारी '' और is संबद्ध साथ the फ़्री सवार प्रॉब्लम  .
Depending on context , leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer resources , but  प्रायः बजाय to लालची उपयोग according to तहज़ीब : to wit , using too much of कया is freely दिए बगैर contributing a उचित  amount back to the community that provides it .
The name derives from  the जोंक , an एनिमल कि झंझट रक्त और  then tries to leave unnoticed .
अन्य शर्तें हैं प्रयुक्त ,  such as `` freeloader '' , but leech is the most common .
The full eagle logo , used in  विभिन्न संस्करण इससे 1970 to 1993  .
the संयुक्त राज्य डाक सेवा ( usps ) , भी ज्ञात as the पोस्ट दफ्तर और u.S. मेल ,  is an independent agency of the United States federal government responsible for providing postal service in the United States .
It is one of the few government agencies explicitly  प्राधिकृत by the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान  .
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the Second  महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस , जहाँ बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन थी नियुक्त the पहला  postmaster general .
The cabinet-level Post Office Department was created in 1792 from Franklin 's operation and  रूपांतरित into इसके वर्तमान रूप in 1971 अंतर्गत the डाक reorganization  Act .
The USPS  employs over 574,000 मजदूर और operates  over 260,000 vehicles .
The USPS is the operator of the  largest गाडी बेड़े in the  world .
The USPS is legally  obligated to serve सब अमेरिकी , regardless of भूगोल ,  at uniform price and quality .
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal  letterboxes in the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन स्टिल competes विरूद्ध निजी पैकेज डिलीवरी सेवाएं ,  such as UPS and FedEx .
The USPS has not directly received taxpayer-dollars since the early 1980s with  the नाबालिग एक्सेप्शन of subsidies लिये लागत संबद्ध साथ the  disabled and overseas voters .
Since  the 2006 all-time शिखर मेल आवाज़ , बाद जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed the डाक जवाबदेही और enhancement अधिनियम `` , ( जिससे mandated $ 5.5 अरब प्रति साल to be सशुल्क into an खाता to pre-fund retiree health-care , 75 सालो into the भविष्य , a आवश्यकता  unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ) , revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume , prompting the postal service to look to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit .
वॉशिंगटन , d.C. रै महरूम the पूंजी  of the United States since 1800 .
Eight other cities have served as the meeting place for  कॉंग्रेस और हैं इसलिए माना to have एकबार महरूम the पूंजी of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
In addition , each of the 50 U.S. states  और the पाँच प्रिंसिपल territories of  the United States maintains its own capital .
राजकुमारी  cut diamond set in a ring
The Princess  काटें is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय  cut shape for diamonds , next to a round brilliant .
The face-up shape of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the profile or  side-on आकार is समान to कि of an उलट  pyramid with four beveled sides .
The princess cut is a relatively  नई डायमंड काटें , having  been created in the 1960s .
it रै gained in लोकप्रियता in हाल सालो as a अधिक distinctive वैकल्पिक to the अधिक लोकप्रिय गोलाकार शानदार काटें , in जिससे the शीर्ष of डायमंड , पुकारा the क्राउन  , is cut with a round face-up shape and the bottom , called the pavilion , is shaped similar to a cone .
A princess cut with the same width as the diameter of a  गोलाकार शानदार होगा तौल अधिक as it रै  four corners which would otherwise have been cut off and rounded to form a round brilliant .
The princess cut is  sometimes referred to as a वर्गाकार  modified brilliant .
However , while displaying the same high degree of brilliance  , इसके faceting स्टाइल is अद्वितीय और completely अलग इससे कि  of a round brilliant .
The Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut , having a  step-modified `` double-french '' or `` क्रॉस '' काटें क्राउन और a श्रेणी of अद्वितीय , chevron-shaped facets in the मण्डप जिससे combine to दे a पृथक cross-shaped प्रतिबिंब  when the stone is viewed directly through the table .
Effectively , the Princess cut combines  the ऊँची उपाधि of लाइट वापसी of a गोलाकार शानदार काटें साथ a distinctive  square or rectangular shape .
The square princess cut diamond is usually slightly cheaper than round brilliant cut diamonds of the same carat weight because it  retains परिचय 80 % of the अशिष्ट डायमंड , as opposed to the गोलाकार शानदार जिससे retains तभी परिचय  50 % of the rough .
The ability to  retain अधिक क्रिस्टल वज़न makes  this shape popular amongst diamond cutters .
accredited gem appraisers ( आगा ) और अमरीकी gem समाज प्रयोगशाला ( agsl )  and European Gem Laboratories-USA ( EGL-USA ) are currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for cut .
There is no universal definition of what measurements make an ideal princess cut diamond and many  डायमंड निर्माताओं मार्केट आदर्श ईंट साथ differing facet पैटर्न और कोण as ``  ideal cut '' .
In  कंट्रास्ट to the agsl , आगा , और egl-usa the gemological संस्थान of अमेरिका ( gia ) रै stated कि वहीँ is नहीं पर्याप्त उद्योग सर्वसम्मति  or empirical data to specify cut grading standards for Princess cut diamonds and to do so is at the risk of consumers who may be deceived by diamonds accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades .
The name `` Princess Cut '' was originally used in connection with another diamond cut  , वरना ज्ञात as the `` प्रोफ़ाइल '' काटें , designed by arpad nagy  , a London cutter , in 1961 .
The same name was later used and made popular by Ygal  पर्लमैन , betzalel ambar , और इसराईल itzkowitz  in Israel in 1979 .
A similar cut  साथ तभी 49 facets , as opposed to the असली 58 facets of the राजकुमारी काटें , थी बाद ब्रांडेड the  `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles .
Three years of optical research yielded a square  स्टोन साथ faceting समान to कि of a गोलाकार शानदार  cut diamond .
A  तुलना
The number of  chevrons can affect the overall आउटलुक of a  princess cut diamond .
This can usually be  संकल्पित by the तार आरेख कि is plotted  in diamond grading reports .
By adding more chevrons on the pavilion side  of the डायमंड , the व्यक्तिगत facets of the डायमंड  will now be broken down into smaller facets .
As a result , it can  दे a राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड a `` कुचल  ice '' look .
Vice versa , when a princess cut diamond has lesser chevrons , it  tends to दे the डायमंड a चंकी आउटलुक due to broader  facets .
The domestic dog ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies  of the धूसर भेड़िया ( canis lupus ) , a सदस्य of the कैनिडाए परिवार  of the mammalian order Carnivora .
the पद `` घरेलू श्वान '' is generally  used for both domesticated and feral varieties .
The dog has been  the पहला एनिमल to be domesticated और रै महरूम the सबसे widely रखा working , शिकार , और  pet animal in human history .
The  शब्द `` श्वान '' may भी औसत the पुरूष of a canine प्रजाति  , as opposed to the word `` bitch '' for the female of the species .
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000 years  पहले लकिन , , the oldest चट्टान नमूनों genetically linked to the आधुनिक श्वान 's lineage तिथि to लगभग  33,000-36,000 years ago .
Dogs ' value to early human hunter-gatherers led to them  जल्दी बनने सर्वव्यापी आरपार  world cultures .
Dogs perform many roles for people , such as hunting , herding ,  pulling loads , सुरक्षा , assisting पुलिस और सैन्य , companionship  , and , more recently , aiding handicapped individuals .
This impact on human  समाज रै दिए उन्हें the उपनाम `` man 's बेहतरीन dost '' in the पश्चिमी  world .
In some cultures ,  कुत्तो हैं भी a सोर्स  of meat .
In  2001 , वहीँ यहूद अनुमानित  to be 400 million dogs in the world .
Most breeds of dogs are at most a few  सौ सालो बूढ़ा , having महरूम artificially चयनित  for particular morphologies and behaviors by people for specific functional roles .
Through this selective breeding , the dog has  विकसित into सैंकड़ों of varied breeds , और shows अधिक behavioral और morphological  variation than any other land mammal .
For example , height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in  the आयरिश wolfhound ; रंग varies इससे श्वेत through grays ( प्रायः पुकारा `` ब्लू '' ) to ब्लैक , और भूरा इससे  light ( tan ) to dark ( `` red '' or `` chocolate '' ) in a wide variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long , coarse-haired to wool-like , straight , curly , or smooth .
It is  आम लिये सबसे breeds to शेड  this coat .
Diagram of a  हस्तांतरण इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी
A 1973 Siemens electron  सूक्ष्मदर्शी , musée देस कला et métiers , पेरिस
An electron microscope (  em ) is a प्रकार of सूक्ष्मदर्शी कि उपयोग an इलेक्ट्रॉन बीम to illuminate a नमूना  and produce a magnified image .
An EM has greater resolving power than a light microscope and can reveal the structure of smaller objects because  electrons have wavelengths परिचय 100,000 टाइम्स shorter than दृश्य लाइट photons  .
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary ,  non-confocal लाइट microscopes हैं सीमित by विवर्तन to परिचय 200 nm रेज़ोल्यूशन और  useful magnifications below 2000x .
The electron microscope uses  electrostatic और इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक lenses to कंट्रोल the इलेक्ट्रॉन बीम और फ़ोकस it to रूप  an image .
These electron  ऑप्टिकल lenses हैं analogous to the कांच lenses of a लाइट  optical microscope .
Electron microscopes are  प्रयुक्त to investigate the ultrastructure of a चौड़ी दायरा of biological और अकार्बनिक नमूनों  including microorganisms , cells , large molecules , biopsy samples , metals , and crystals .
Industrially ,  the इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी is प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये विशेषता कंट्रोल  and failure analysis .
Modern electron  microscopes उपज इलेक्ट्रॉन micrographs , using specialized डिजिटल  cameras or frame grabbers to capture the image .
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried chicken fast food restaurants  संस्थापित in 1972 in नई ऑरलियन्स , louisiana .
Often referred  to as popeyes और sometimes as popeyes मुर्गा & बिस्कुट or popeyes मुर्गा & seafood  , It was acquired by Sandy Springs , Georgia -based AFC Enterprises , originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company , in 1993 .
According to a company press release dated June 29 , 2007 , Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken restaurant group , measured by number of  इकाई '' , साथ अधिक than 1,800 रेस्तरां in अधिक than 40 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और over 22 देशों विश्वव्यापी सहित तुर्कों , उत्तरी साइप्रस , बहरीन , चीन , हांग काँग , इराकी , इंडोनेशिया , जॉर्डन , कुवैत ,  United Arab Emirates , Japan , Malaysia , Saudi Arabia , South Korea , Singapore , Canada , Jamaica , Guyana , Suriname , Mexico , Trinidad , Puerto Rico , Honduras , Vietnam , Panama , Peru , and Costa Rica .
परिचय तीस स्थितियाँ हैं company-owned  , the rest franchised .
The leg  दबायें is a वज़न प्रशिक्षण कसरत  in which the individual pushes a weight or resistance away from them using their legs .
The term leg press  भी refers to the apparatus प्रयुक्त to perform  this exercise .
The leg press can  be प्रयुक्त to evaluate an खिलाड़ी 's overall निम्नतर देह  strength ( from knee joint to hip ) .
using the तिर्यक  sled-type leg press machine .
There are two  प्रमुख प्रकार of लेग  press:
the तिर्यक or लंबवत  'sled ' type leg press .
Weight disks ( plates )  हैं संलग्न सीधे  to the sled , which is mounted on rails .
the उपयोक्ता sits नीचे the sled और pushes  it upward with their feet .
These machines normally  शामिल समायोज्य सुरक्षा कोष्ठक कि prevent the उपयोक्ता इससे होने  trapped under the weight .
The 'cable '  प्रकार लेग दबायें , or 'seated लेग दबायें '  , commonly found on multigyms .
The user sits upright and pushes forward with their feet onto a plate that is  संलग्न to the वज़न स्टेक by अर्थात् of a long स्टील केबल  .
Wendy Williams Hunter ( born Wendy Joan Williams ; July 18 , 1964 ) is an  अमरीकी मीडिया व्यक्तित्व , अभिनेत्री और  author .
She hosts a  syndicated टेलीविज़न बात दिखाएँ , the वेन्डी  Williams Show .
Prior to television , Williams was a ``  शॉक jockette `` on अनेक रेडियो shows  .
Williams has gained notoriety  लिये उसके on-air spats साथ  celebrities .
She was the subject of the 2006 VH1 reality TV series called  the वेन्डी विलियम्स अनुभव जिससे ब्रॉडकास्ट कार्यक्रम surrounding  her radio show .
She has written an  आत्मकथा और अनेक अन्य किताबे  , and has created a product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams .
Patrick Henry `` Treason '' speech before the  हाउस of burgesses in an 1851 पेंटिंग by पीटर  F. Rothermel
`` Give me liberty , or give me death ! '' is a quotation attributed to  पैट्रिक हेनरी इससे a वाक he बना to the वर्जिनिया सम्मेलन  .
On that day , at St. John 's Church in Richmond , Virginia ,  और is credited साथ having swung the संतुलन in convincing the वर्जिनिया हाउस of burgesses  to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War .
Among  the delegates to the सम्मेलन यहूद भविष्य  US Presidents Thomas Jefferson and George Washington .
Newfoundland and Labrador ( ,  locally ) is the easternmost  province of Canada .
situated in the देश 's अटलांटिक प्रदेश , it incorporates the  island of Newfoundland and mainland Labrador to the northwest , with a combined area of .
In  2011 , the प्रांत  's population was 514,536 .
Approximately 92 percent of the province 's population lives on the Island of Newfoundland ( including its  संबद्ध छोटी आइलैंड्स ) , of जिससे अधिक than हाफ सजीव on the avalon  Peninsula .
The province is  कनाडा 's सबसे linguistically homogenous , साथ 97.6 %  of residents reporting English ( Newfoundland English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ; .
Historically , Newfoundland was also home to unique varieties of  फ्रेंच , और आयरिश , as खूब as the now-extinct beothuk भाषा  .
In  labrador , लोकल dialects of innu-aimun  and Inuktitut are also spoken .
Newfoundland and  labrador 's पूंजी और largest नगर , st. जॉन 's , is कनाडा 's 20th-largest जनसांख्यिकी  Metropolitan Area , and is home to almost 40 percent of the province 's population .
St. John 's is the seat of government , home  to the हाउस of सभा of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador और the उच्चतम अदालत in the क्षेत्राधिकार  , the Newfoundland and Labrador Court of Appeal .
A former colony and dominion of the  संयुक्त किंगडम , न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador became the दसवाँ प्रांत to डालें the कनाडाई  Confederation on March 31 , 1949 , as Newfoundland .
On December 6 , 2001 , an amendment was made to the Constitution  of कनाडा to बदलें the प्रांत 's आधिकारिक नाम to न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador .
In day-to-day conversation ,  however , canadians generally स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and to the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador .
Theodore  `` t.r .  ''
Roosevelt , Jr. ( ; October 27 ,  1858—january 6 , 1919 ) थी the 26th अध्यक्ष of the  United States ( 1901–1909 ) .
He is  विख्यात लिये उसके समृद्ध व्यक्तित्व , दायरा of रूचि और उपलब्धियाँ , और उसके नेतृत्व  of the Progressive Movement , as well as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity .
He was a leader of the Republican Party and founder of the first  अवतार of the short-lived प्रगतिशील ( `` सांड मूस ''  ) Party of 1912 .
Before becoming President , he held  कार्यालयों at the नगर , राज्य  , and federal levels .
रूज़वेल्ट 's उपलब्धियाँ as a naturalist , एक्सप्लोरर , शिकारी  , author , and soldier are as much a part of his fame as any office he held as a politician .
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in  as अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in 1901 , बनाना उसे the  youngest president ever ; he beat out the youngest elected president , John F. Kennedy , by only one year .
रूज़वेल्ट थी भी the पहला of तभी तीन बैठे  presidents to have won the Nobel Peace Prize .
The Teddy  भालू is नामित बाद उसे , despite उसके  contempt for being called `` Teddy '' .
Born into a wealthy family in New York City , Roosevelt was a  sickly चाइल्ड जो suffered इससे दमा और ठहरे  at home studying natural history .
to overcome उसके शारीरिक कमज़ोरी  , he embraced a strenuous life .
Home-schooled , he became  an eager छात्र of प्रकृति  .
He attended Harvard University  , जहाँ he पढ़ाई जीवविज्ञान , boxed और विकसित  an interest in naval affairs .
In 1881 , one year out of Harvard , he was elected to the  नई यॉर्क राज्य सभा , जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार  faction of his Republican Party ( the `` GOP '' ) .
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established  उसके पेशेवर प्रतिष्ठा as a गंभीर इतिहासकार ; he लिखा numerous  books on hunting , the outdoors , and current political issues , as well as frontier history .
In 1884  , उसके पहला बीवी और उसके माँ  died on the same day .
He temporarily left  राजनीती और गई to the frontier , बनने a rancher  in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas .
Returning to New  यॉर्क नगर , he भागा लिये महापौर in 1886 , finishing तीसरा  with 60,000 votes .
He later gained fame by taking  vigorous चार्ज of the नगर पुलिस  .
At  the नेशनल स्तर , he थी a  leader in civil service reform .
The Spanish–American War broke out  in 1898 जबकि रूज़वेल्ट थी , effectively , कार्यशील  the Department of the Navy .
He promptly  resigned और formed the अशिष्ट राइडर्स – a  volunteer cavalry regiment that fought in Cuba .
The war hero was elected governor in 1898 and  in 1900 थी मनोनीत लिये वाइस अध्यक्ष  .
He successfully  सक्रिय the gop आधार as a अत्यधिक दृश्य प्रचारक to reelect अध्यक्ष  William McKinley on a platform of high tariffs , the gold standard , imperialism , prosperity at home and victory abroad .
In 1901 , President William McKinley  थी assassinated और रूज़वेल्ट became  President .
He attempted to move the Republican Party ( GOP ) toward  प्रगतिवाद , सहित विश्वास busting और increased  regulation of businesses .
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon  the मौत of उसके पूर्ववर्ती , जीतना the largest प्रतिशत of the लोकप्रिय  vote since the uncontested election of 1820 .
Roosevelt coined the  phrase `` वर्गाकार सौदे `` to describe उसके घरेलू कार्यसूची , emphasizing कि the औसत नागरिक  would get a fair share under his policies .
As an outdoorsman and  naturalist , he प्रचारित the संरक्षण  movement .
on the संसार स्टेज , रूज़वेल्ट 's नीतियों यहूद characterized  by his slogan , `` Speak softly and carry a big stick `` .
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common  पूर्वज ( s ) ( अन्य than a जनक , child/descendant , सहोदर , child/descendant  of a sibling , or sibling of a parent/ancestor ) .
However in common  parlance , `` cousin '' सामान्यतः specifically  means `` first cousin '' .
Systems of `` degrees '' and ``  removals '' हैं प्रयुक्त in the english-speaking संसार to describe the सटीक संबंध between दो cousins  ( in the broad sense ) and the ancestor they have in common .
Various governmental entities have established systems for legal use that can more  precisely बताएँ kinships साथ आम पूर्वजो मौजूदा कोई क्रमांक of पीढियां in the पास्ट , हालांकि आम उपयोग प्रायः eliminates the डिग्री और removals और refers to लोगों साथ आम ancestry as बस `` दूर  cousins '' or `` relatives '' .
Webster is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC  इससे सितंबर 16 , 1983 जबतक may 8 , 1987 , और in first-run अनुप्रयोग इससे सितंबर  21 , 1987 until March 10 , 1989 .
The  श्रेणी थी निर्मित by  Stu Silver .
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who , after losing his  अभिभावक , is अपनाया by उसके एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर , portrayed by एलेक्स karras , और उसके नई socialite बीवी , निभाई by सुसान  Clark .
The focus was largely on  कैसा इस impulsively शादीशुदा युगल था to समायोजन to उनके नई जीवनदान और अचानक  parenthood , but it was the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plot .
the श्रेणी थी उत्पादित by जॉर्जियाई खाड़ी ltd. , emmanuel लुईस entertainment  Enterprises , Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and Paramount Television .
Like NBC 's earlier hit  diff'rent स्ट्रोक्स , वेबस्टर प्रदर्शित a यंग african-american  boy adopted by a white family .
तीन प्रकार of कोशिका  division
Cell division is the process by which a parent cell  divides into दो or अधिक बेटी कोशिकाएं  .
Cell  प्रभाग प्रायः occurs as  part of a larger cell cycle .
In eukaryotes , there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative division , whereby each daughter cell is  genetically एकसमान to the जनक कोशिका ( समसूत्रण ) , और a reductive कोशिका प्रभाग , whereby the क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों in the  daughter cells is reduced by half , to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ) .
Both of these cell division cycles are required in  sexually reproducing जीवों at कुछ पाइंट in उनके जीवन साईकिल , और दोनो हैं believed to be उपस्थित in the पिछला eukaryotic आम पूर्वज prokaryotes भी undergo a vegetative कोशिका प्रभाग ज्ञात as शब्दकोष परिवर्द्धन  , where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells .
All cell divisions , regardless of  सजीव , हैं preceded by a सिंगल गोलाकार of डीएनए replication  .
For simple  एककोशिकीय जीवों ऐसे as the amoeba , एक कोशिका प्रभाग is समतुल्य  to reproduction – an entire new organism is created .
On a larger scale ,  mitotic कोशिका प्रभाग can बनाएँ progeny इससे बहुकोशिकीय  organisms , such as plants that grow from cuttings .
Cell division also enables  sexually reproducing जीवों to develop इससे the one-celled zygote  , which itself was produced by cell division from gametes .
And after growth , cell division allows for  continual निर्माण और मरम्मत of the  organism .
A human being 's  देह अनुभवों परिचय 10,000 खरब कोशिका  divisions in a lifetime .
Cell division has  महरूम modeled by परिमित  subdivision rules .
The primary concern of cell division is the  मेंटेनेंस of the असली कोशिका 's  genome .
Before division can occur , the genomic information that is stored in  गुणसूत्रों जरूर be replicated , और the duplicated genome जरूर be अलग cleanly  between cells .
A  ग्रेट सौदे of सेल्यूलर अवसंरचना is शामिल in keeping  genomic information consistent between `` generations '' .
Mountain  सीमाएँ of मैसाचुसेट्स  , United States .
Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones , 23 February 1955 ,  southampton , हैम्पशायर , इंग्लैण्ड ) is a अंग्रेजों संगीतकार , सिंगर  and songwriter .
According to the Guinness Book of British Hit  singles & एल्बम , `` जोन्स is an संपन्नता singer-songwriter जो थी a नियमित चार्ट आगंतुक in the mid-1980s  with his brand of synthpop .
Jones , who was  बराबर लोकप्रिय in the u.S. , appeared  at Live Aid `` .
Allmusic journalist ,  स्टीफन थामस erlewine adds , `` जोन्स थी एक of the धमक आंकड़े  of mid-1980s synthpop .
His music merged the technology  intensive ध्वनि of नई वेव साथ  the cheery optimism of hippies and late 1960s pop .
Jones racked up a string of hits in the mid and late 1980s , before he retreated  into होने a cult फिगर in the 1990s  '' .
The International Isle of Man TT ( Tourist Trophy ) Race is a motorcycle racing event held on the Isle  of man और थी लिये अनेक सालो the सबसे prestigious  motorcycle race in the world .
The event  थी भाग of the fim मोटरसाइकिल ग्रैंड प्रिक्स संसार चैंपियनशिप दौरान the काल 1949–1976 पहले होने  transferred to the United Kingdom after safety concerns and run by the FIM as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season .
The Isle of Man TT Races  became भाग of the tt सूत्र 1 चैंपियनशिप इससे 1977  to 1990 to preserve the event 's racing status .
From 1989 the  रेसिंग रै महरूम विकसित by the आइल of man विभाग  of Tourism as the Isle of Man TT Festival .
The race is run in a time-trial format  on पब्लिक सड़कें बंद लिये रेसिंग by the प्रावधानों of an अधिनियम of tynwald ( the पार्लियामेंट  of the Isle of Man ) .
The first race was held on Tuesday 28 May 1907 and was  पुकारा the अंतरराष्ट्रीय auto-cycle पर्यटक ट्रॉफी  .
The event was organised by  the auto-cycle क्लबों over 10 गोद of the st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स of 15 मील 1,470 गज लिये road-legal touring मोटरसाइकिल  with exhaust silencers , saddles , pedals and mud-guards .
The winner of the single-cylinder class , and overall winner of  the पहला इवेंट in 1907 , थी चार्ली collier सवारी a matchless मोटरसाइकिल  in a time of 4 hours , 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average race speed of 38.21 mph .
The winner of the twin-cylinder  क्लास थी rem fowler सवारी a peugeot एंजिन नॉर्टन in a समय of 4 घंटों  21 minutes and 52 seconds at an average race speed of 36.21 mph .
The trophy presented to Charlie Collier as the winner of the 1907  आइल of man tt रेस , थी दान by the  Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars .
It featured a stylised  संस्करण of ओलम्पिक परमेश्वर hermes by giovanni  Da Bologna as a silver figurine astride a winged wheel .
The trophy was similar in design to the 18 carat gold Montague Trophy presented to John  नेपियर ( arrol-johnston ) as the inaugural विजेता of the आइल of man पर्यटक ट्रॉफी car रेस in 1905 अभी ज्ञात  as the RAC Tourist Trophy .
The Marquis de  mouzilly st. मंगल ट्रॉफी  is now presented annually to the winner of the Isle of Man Senior TT Motor-Cycle Race .
The 2007 Isle of Man TT  थी the centenary इवेंट जिससे भागा between 26 may और 8 जून 2007 और प्रदर्शित a खास re-enactment of the 1907  Isle of Man TT Race held on the village green next to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007 .
The vintage parade of 100 classic motorcycles for the Centenary  re-enactment on the असली st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स थी flagged दूर by पूर्व  World Motor-Cycle Champion Geoff Duke .
The first of the  भागीदार to be flagged दूर थी the recently लौटी  twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the first Isle of Man TT Race in 1907 .
भी participating in the 2007 re-enactment थी tt रेस प्रतिस्पर्धी guy मार्टिन सवारी a 1938  Triumph Tiger 100 500 cc and other former TT competitors including Alan Cathcart , Sammy Miller , Nick Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap .

Unemployment (  or joblessness ) occurs जब लोगों हैं  without work and actively seeking work .
The  बेरोजगारी रेट is a माप of the व्यापकता of बेरोजगारी और it  is calculated as a percentage by dividing the number of unemployed individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force .
During periods of recession , an economy  प्रायः अनुभवों a अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची बेरोजगारी  rate .
According to International Labour Organization  रपट , अधिक than 197 लाख लोगों globally हैं आउट of कार्य or 6 % of the  world 's workforce were without a job in 2012 .
There remains considerable  सैद्धांतिक बहस regarding the कल्याणकारी , consequences  and solutions for unemployment .
Classical economics , New classical economics , and the Austrian School of economics argue that  मार्केट mechanisms हैं विश्वसनीय अर्थात् of resolving  unemployment .
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the  मजदूर मार्केट इससे the बाहर , ऐसे as unionization , न्यूनतम मजदूरी कानून , कर  , and other regulations that they claim discourage the hiring of workers .
Keynesian  अर्थशास्त्र emphasizes the cyclical प्रकृति of बेरोजगारी और  recommends government interventions in the economy that it claims will reduce unemployment during recessions .
This theory focuses on recurrent shocks that  एकाएक reduce कुल माँग लिये goods और सेवाएं और यूँ  reduce demand for workers .
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to  बढ़ाएँ माँग लिये मजदूर ; ये can शामिल वित्तीय stimuli , सरेआम वित्तपोषित  job creation , and expansionist monetary policies .
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment , there are a few  categorizations of बेरोजगारी कि हैं प्रयुक्त to अधिक precisely मॉडल the प्रभाव  of unemployment within the economic system .
The main types of unemployment include structural unemployment which focuses on structural  समस्याएं in the अर्थव्यवस्था और inefficiencies अंतर्निहित in श्रमिक बाज़ार , सहित a बेमेल between  the supply and demand of laborers with necessary skill sets .
संरचनात्मक वितर्क emphasize कल्याणकारी  and solutions related to disruptive technologies and globalization .
Discussions of frictional  बेरोजगारी फ़ोकस on voluntary निर्णय to कार्य आधारित on प्रत्येक individuals ' valuation of उनके  own work and how that compares to current wage rates plus the time and effort required to find a job .
Causes and  समाधान लिये frictional बेरोजगारी प्रायः पता  job entry threshold and wage rates .
Behavioral economists highlight  व्यक्तिगत biases in निर्णय बनाना , और प्रायः involve  problems and solutions concerning sticky wages and efficiency wages .
Collectivism is any philosophic , political , religious  , आर्थिक , or सोशल आउटलुक कि emphasizes the interdependence of प्रत्येक  human being in a society or civilization .
Collectivism is a basic cultural element that exists as the reverse  of व्यक्तिगत in इंसान प्रकृति ( in the वही रास्ता ऊँची कॉन्टेक्स्ट संस्कृति exists as  the reverse of low context culture ) .
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion within social groups ( such as an ``  in-group '' , in कया विशिष्ट कॉन्टेक्स्ट it is पारिभाषित ) और in कुछ मामले , the प्रधानता of समूह लक्ष्य over व्यक्तिगत  goals .
Collectivists often focus on  जातियाँ , समाज , स्वदेश  or country .
It has been used as an element in many different and diverse types of government and political , economic and educational philosophies throughout history  और सबसे इंसान समाजों in अभ्यास contain तत्व of दोनो व्यक्तिगत और collectivism  .
Some examples of collectivist  संस्कृतियों शामिल इण्डिया  and Japan .
Collectivism can be divided into horizontal  collectivism और लंबवत  collectivism .
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal  individuals , और is यूँ प्रायः आधारित on decentralization और समतावाद  .
Vertical collectivism is based on  hierarchical structures of शक्ति और on moral और सांस्कृतिक conformity , और is इसलिए आधारित  on centralization and hierarchy .
A cooperative enterprise would be an example of horizontal collectivism , whereas a military  पदानुक्रम होता be an उदाहरण  of vertical collectivism .
Acute disseminated  encephalomyelitis ( adem ) is an प्रतिरक्षा  mediated disease of the brain .
It usually occurs following a viral infection but may appear following  टीकाकरण , बैक्टीरियल or parasitic संक्रमण , or भी appear अनायास  .
As it involves autoimmune demyelination ,  it is समान to अनेक काठिन्य , और is माना  part of the Multiple sclerosis borderline diseases .
The incidence  रेट is परिचय 8 प्रति 1,000,000 लोगों  per year .
Although it occurs in all ages , most reported cases are in children and adolescents ,  साथ the औसत आयु around 5 to 8 सालो बूढ़ा  .
The mortality rate may be as high as 5 % , full  रिकवरी is देखी in 50 to 75 % of मामले , जबकि up to 70 to 90 % रिकवर  with some minor residual disability .
The average time to  रिकवर is एक to छह  months .
ADEM produces multiple  जलन lesions in the दिमाग और स्पाइनल cord , विशेषकर in the श्वेत पदार्थ  .
Usually these are found in the subcortical and central white matter and cortical gray-white  जंक्शन of दोनो दिमागी बांटती , cerebellum , brainstem , और स्पाइनल cord , लकिन periventricular श्वेत पदार्थ और धूसर पदार्थ of the cortex , thalami और basal ganglia may  also be involved .
When the patient suffers more than one demyelinating episode , it is called recurrent disseminated encephalomyelitis or  multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis (  MDEM ) .
The stomach is a muscular , hollow , dilated part of the digestion system which functions as an important organ of the  digestive ट्रैक्ट in कुछ पशु , सहित vertebrates , echinoderms  , insects ( mid-gut ) , and molluscs .
It is involved in the second phase of  पाचन , following  mastication ( chewing ) .
The stomach is  स्तिथ between the ग्रासनाल और the छोटी आंत  .
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes called protease and strong acids to aid in food digestion , (  भेजा to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through चिकना muscular contortions ( पुकारा segmentation ) पहले sending partially  digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines .
The word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus which is derived from the Greek word  stomachos ( στόμαχος ) , ultimately इससे stoma ( ) , `` मुँह  '' .
The words gastro- and gastric (  अर्थ सम्बन्धित to the पेट ) हैं दोनो निकला इससे the यूनानी  word gaster ( ) .
1940 Pontiac  खास श्रेणी  25 Woodie
A woodie is a car body style , especially a station wagon , where the rear bodywork is constructed of  लकडी फ्रेमवर्क साथ infill panels of लकडी or चित्रित मेटल  .
After the demise of actual wood construction , manufacturers used  अनुकरण woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented  with three-dimensional , simulated framework—to recall wood construction .
In 2008 ,  लकडी निर्माण थी जगाई abstractly on the घाट फ्लेक्स साथ a श्रेणी  of side and rear horizontal grooves .
A pearl is a hard object  उत्पादित भीतर the नरम ऊतक ( specifically the mantle  ) of a living shelled mollusc .
Just like the shell of a clam , a  पर्ल is बना up of कैल्सियम कार्बोनेट in मिनट crystalline रूप , जिससे रै महरूम deposited in  concentric layers .
The ideal  पर्ल is perfectly गोलाकार और चिकना  , but many other shapes of pearls ( baroque pearls ) occur .
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as gemstones and  वस्तुएँ of सौंदर्य लिये अनेक सदियां , और क्युकी of इस , the शब्द पर्ल रै become a रूपक लिये कुछ  very rare , fine , admirable , and valuable .
the सबसे मूल्यवान मोती occur अनायास in the  wild , but they are extremely rare .
These wild pearls are  referred to as प्राकृतिक मोती .
संस्कारी or farmed मोती इससे पर्ल oysters और freshwater  mussels make up the majority of those that are currently sold .
Imitation pearls are also widely  बेची in inexpensive आभूषण , लकिन the विशेषता of उनके iridescence is प्रायः बहुत ग़रीब , और प्रायः , कृत्रिम मोती  are easily distinguished from genuine pearls .
Pearls have been harvested and cultivated  primarily लिये उपयोग in आभूषण , लकिन in the पास्ट वे यहूद भी सिले onto lavish कपडे  .
Pearls have also been crushed and used in  कॉस्मेटिक्स , दवाइयाँ , और in पेंट formulations  .
Whether wild or cultured , gem quality pearls are almost always  nacreous और , as is the आंतरिक of the शेल  that produces them .
However , almost all species of shelled molluscs are capable of  producing मोती ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions  '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape .
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs and also  अंतर्गत u.S. संघीय व्यापार आयोग नियम , और हैं formed in  the same way , most of them have no value , except as curiosities .
bing ( ज्ञात previously as सजीव ढूंढें , खिड़कियाँ सजीव ढूंढें  , and MSN Search ) is a web search engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) from Microsoft .
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve  बाल्मर on may 28 , 2009 at the सब  Things Digital conference in San Diego for release on June 1 .
Notable changes include the listing of search  सुझाव जबकि प्रश्नों हैं डाला और a सूची of सम्बन्धित खोज ( पुकारा `` explore फलक '' ) आधारित on semantic  technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008 .
On July 29 , 2009 , Microsoft  और याहू ! घोषित a सौदे in  which Bing would power Yahoo ! Search .
All Yahoo !  ढूंढें वैश्विक ग्राहक और साझेदार हैं अपेक्षित  to have made the transition by early 2012 .
In October 2011 , Bing announced it was working on new back-end search  अवसंरचना , साथ the लक्ष्य of delivering तेज़ और थोड़ा अधिक प्रासंगिक ढूंढें परिणाम  for users .
Known as `` Tiger  '' , the नई index-serving प्रौद्योगिकी रै महरूम incorporated into bing  globally , since August 2011 .
In May 2012 , Bing announced another redesign of its search engine that includes `` Sidebar  '' , a सोशल विशेषता कि खोज उपयोक्ता ' सोशल संजाल लिये सूचना प्रासंगिक to the  search query .
A diagram showing an I  गठन on ठोकर और a 4-3 गठन  on defense
in अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल , प्रत्येक टोली रै ग्यारह  players on the field at one time .
The specific role that a player takes on  the फ़ील्ड is पुकारा उनके स्थिति  .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions ,  कि is टीमों may बदलें कोई क्रमांक of  players after any play .
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players , the offense ( the team with the ball ,  जो is trying to स्कोर ) , the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे स्कोरिंग , और to लो the बॉल इससे उन्हें ) , और  the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons , various specific positions  मौजूद depending on कया the खिलाड़ी 's प्रमुख  job is .
The Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ;  ulster-scots : airish fowk ) हैं an जातीय समूह जो originate  in Ireland , an island in northwestern Europe .
आयरलैंड रै महरूम आबादी लिये around 9,000  years ( according to archaeological studies , see Prehistoric Ireland ) .
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors are recorded in legends – they are claimed to be  descended इससे समूह ऐसे as the nemedians , fomorians , fir bolg  , Tuatha Dé Danann and the Milesians .
Lebor Gabála Érenn , a book  of आयरिश mythology tells कि milesians यहूद  Scythian descendants .
The main groups that interacted with the Irish  in the मध्य आयु शामिल  the Picts , Scots , and the Vikings .
Due to this  सम्पर्क , icelanders हैं विख्यात लिये having  some Irish descent .
The Anglo-Norman invasion of  the ऊँची मध्य आयु , the अंग्रेज़ी बागानों और the subsequent अंग्रेज़ी नियम of the देश introduced the normans और  Flemish into Ireland .
Welsh , Picts , Bretons , and small parties of Gauls and even  anglo-saxons हैं ज्ञात in आयरलैंड इससे much  earlier times .
वहीँ have महरूम अनेक notable  Irish people throughout history .
The 6th century Irish monk and missionary Columbanus is regarded as one of the  `` fathers of यूरोपीय '' , followed by kilian of würzburg  and Vergilius of Salzburg .
The scientist Robert Boyle is considered the ``  पिता of रसायन  `` .
Famous Irish explorers  शामिल ब्रेंडन the नाविक , रॉबर्ट mcclure , अर्नेस्ट shackleton  and Tom Crean .
By some accounts , the first European child born in North America had Irish descent on both  पहलू ; और an irishman थी the पहला यूरोपीय to नियत पैर on अमरीकी मृदा in कोलंबस ' expedition of 1492  .
There are  वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों जीना in अनेक पश्चिमी  countries , particularly in English-speaking countries .
historically , करणों रै महरूम caused by  politics , famine and economic issues .
An estimated 50 to 80 million people are descendants of Irish people , primarily in the United Kingdom ,  the संयुक्त राज्य , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , कनाडा और आइसलैंड ; वहीँ हैं भी छोटी संख्याएँ in अर्जेंटीना , चिली , मैक्सिको , जमैका , बारबाडोस , दक्षिण  Africa , New Zealand , France , Germany and Brazil .
The largest  क्रमांक of वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों  live in the United States .
The number of people living in Australia who are of  आयरिश descent is उच्चतर , as a प्रतिशत  of total population , than that of any other country .
Approximately forty percent  of the उपनिवेश जनसांख्यिकी of आइसलैंड आए  from Ireland or Scotland .
The very  पहला निवासियों of  Iceland were Irish .
The Hubble Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space telescope that was  carried into कक्षा by a स्पेस  Shuttle in 1990 and remains in operation .
A aperture telescope in low Earth  कक्षा , हबल 's चार प्रमुख यंत्र observe in the निकट पराबैंगनी , दृश्य  , and near infrared .
The telescope is  नामित बाद the astronomer एडविन  Hubble .
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of  धरती 's माहौल allows it to लो अत्यधिक शार्प बिंब साथ लगभग no  background light .
Hubble 's Deep Field have been some of the most  विस्तृत visible-light बिंब कभी , allowing  a deep view into space and time .
Many Hubble observations have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics  , ऐसे as accurately determining the रेट of विस्तार of the  universe .
Although not the first space telescope ,  हबल is एक of the largest और सबसे बहुमुखी , और is खूब ज्ञात as दोनो a vital शोध औजार और  a public relations boon for astronomy .
The HST was built by the United States space agency NASA , with contributions from the European  स्पेस एजेंसी , और is संचालित by the स्पेस दूरदर्शी विज्ञान संस्थान  .
The HST is one of NASA 's Great Observatories , along with the Compton Gamma  रे वेधशाला , the चन्द्रा x-ray वेधशाला , और the स्पिट्जर  Space Telescope .
Space  telescopes यहूद प्रस्तावित as  early as 1923 .
Hubble was funded in the 1970s , with  a प्रस्तावित लॉन्च in 1983 , लकिन the प्रोजेक्ट थी घिरा by  technical delays , budget problems , and the Challenger disaster .
When finally launched in 1990 , scientists found that the main mirror had been ground  incorrectly , compromising the दूरदर्शी 's सामर्थ्य  .
The telescope was restored to  इसके intended विशेषता by a सर्विसिंग मिशन in 1993  .
Hubble is the  तभी दूरदर्शी designed to be सर्विस  in space by astronauts .
Between 1993 and 2002 , four missions repaired , upgraded , and  replaced प्रणालियों on the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां मिशन थी रद्द on सुरक्षा grounds  following the Columbia disaster .
However , after spirited public  चर्चा , नासा व्यवस्थापक माइक griffin स्वीकृत एक फाइनल  servicing mission , completed in 2009 by Space Shuttle Atlantis .
The telescope is now  अपेक्षित to फलन जबतक at तनिक  2013 .
Its  वैज्ञानिक successor , the जेम्स webb स्पेस दूरदर्शी (  JWST ) , is to be launched in 2018 or possibly later .
Anti-inflammatory refers  to the प्रॉपर्टी of a पदार्थ or उपचार  that reduces inflammation .
Anti-inflammatory drugs make up  परिचय हाफ of analgesics , remedying पीड़ा by reducing सूजन as opposed  to opioids , which affect the central nervous system .
The Tonight Show is a  us late-night बात दिखाएँ कि रै aired on  NBC since 1954 .
It is the longest currently running regularly scheduled entertainment program in the US and the  तीसरा longest-running दिखाएँ on एनबीसी बाद मिलें the दबायें और  Today .
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ) , Jack Paar (  1957–1962 ) , जॉनी कार्सन ( 1962–1992 ) , jay लीनो ( 1992–2009 , 2010–present ) , और कोनन o'brien (  2009–2010 ) .
Several  अतिथि होस्ट भी appeared , विशेषकर  during the Paar and Carson eras .
The longest-serving host to date was Johnny Carson , who hosted The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson for 30  सीज़न इससे the पतन of 1962 through the वसन्त  of 1992 .
The current host of the show is Jay Leno , who had previously  hosted the दिखाएँ इससे 1992 to 2009 और began उसके दूसरी कार्यकाल on कूच  1 , 2010 .
On April 3 , 2013 , NBC announced Jimmy  fallon होता become the नई मेजबान of the tonight  Show .
The  tonight दिखाएँ साथ jimmy fallon होगा प्रीमियर फ़रवरी 24 , 2014  , the day after the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics .
ss एंड्रिया डोरिया  .
Pronounced was an ocean liner for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione Italia )  घर ported in जेनोआ , इटली , सबसे प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके डूब in 1956 , जब  52 people died ( 51 from immediate impact ) .
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria , the ship had a  सकल पंजीकरण tonnage of 29,100 और a क्षमता of परिचय 1,200 यात्री  and 500 crew .
For a country attempting to  rebuild इसके अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रतिष्ठा बाद संसार युद्ध ii , एंड्रिया डोरिया  was an icon of Italian national pride .
Of all Italy 's ships at the time , Andrea Doria  थी the largest , तीव्रतम और माना  safest .
शुभारम्भ on 16 जून 1951 , the जलयान undertook  its maiden voyage on 14 January 1953 .
On 25 July 1956 , while the  एंड्रिया डोरिया थी approaching the coast of nantucket , मैसाचुसेट्स , बंधी लिये नई यॉर्क नगर , the eastbound of  the Swedish American Line collided with it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime disasters .
Struck in the side , the top-heavy Andrea Doria immediately  प्रारंभ to सूची severely to स्टारबोर्ड , जिससे बाएँ हाफ of इसके lifeboats  unusable .
The consequent  shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant घाटा of जीवन , लकिन the दक्षता of the  ship 's technical design allowed it to stay afloat for over 11 hours after the ramming .
The good behavior of the crew , improvements in communications  और the रैपिड जवाब of अन्य जहाजों averted a विपत्ति समान in  scale to that of the in 1912 .
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued  और बच , जबकि 46 लोगों died as a consequence  of the collision .
the evacuated लक्ज़री लाइनर capsized  and sank the following morning .
This accident  remains the worst मेरीटाइम विपत्ति to occur  in United States waters since the sinking of the in 1915 .
The incident and its aftermath  यहूद heavily covered by the न्यूज  media .
While the rescue  प्रयत्न यहूद दोनो कामयाब और commendable , the कारण of the टक्कर साथ the स्टॉकहोम और  the loss of Andrea Doria generated much interest in the media and many lawsuits .
Largely because of an out-of-court  उपनिवेश अनुबंध between the दो शिपिंग कंपनियाँ दौरान hearings तत्काल बाद  the disaster , no determination of the cause ( s ) was ever formally published .
Although greater blame appeared initially to fall on the Italian liner , more recent discoveries have indicated  कि a misreading of रडार on the स्वीडिश जलयान may have initiated the टक्कर कोर्स , अग्रणी to त्रुटियाँ on दोनो जहाजों .
Andrea Doria was the last major transatlantic  यात्री पोत to डूबना पहले वायुयान became the पसन्दीदा  method of travel .
Dialysis  tubing
डायलिसिस tubing is a प्रकार of सेमi- or  partially permeable membrane tubing made from regenerated cellulose or cellophane .
It can be used for diffusion with  solutes or परासरण if प्रयुक्त साथ जल  only .
Osmosis is when water passes through a  semi-permeable परत to पहुँचें संतुलन  .
Diffusion  , on the अन्य हाथ , allows the गति  of molecules from high concentration to low concentration .
It will only allow molecules to pass through a  semi-permeable झिल्ली or परत if the अणु is छोटी पर्याप्त to अनुरूप through  the membrane or a membrane 's pore .
This usually results with the effects of diffusion  through a झिल्ली तभी वाकई affects छोटी अणुओं , और लगभग never larger  molecules .
डायलिसिस tubing is प्रयुक्त in नैदानिक हालातों to ensure a filtered  flow of molecules , preventing the flow of larger solute molecules .
Small molecules can be `` washed '' out  of a समाधान जिससे is उत्तेजित through the tubing into  a solvent , usually water , which surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away .
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes , a solution containing several types of  अणुओं , प्रायः ग्लूकोज और मंड , is लगाई into a semi-permeable डायलिसिस थैला  , such as a cellulose membrane with pores , and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band .
The sealed dialysis bag is placed in a container  of a अलग समाधान , or जल  .
Molecules small enough to pass  through the tubing ( जल , लवण , monosaccharides , और अन्य छोटी अणुओं ) tend to मूव into or आउट of the डायलिसिस  bag in the direction of decreasing concentration , therefore displaying diffusion .
Larger  अणुओं ( ऐसे as प्रोटीन , or polysaccharides ) कि have आयाम significantly वृहद than  the pore diameter are retained inside the dialysis bag .
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that has a lesser solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) will cross a semi-permeable membrane , like dialysis tubing , into  a hypertonic समाधान ( a समाधान कि रै a उच्चतर solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) in an attempt to पहुँचें संतुलन , जहाँ  the solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium .
Mercury  प्रयोगशाला थर्मामीटर
A thermometer ( from the Greek , thermos , meaning `` hot '' and μἐτρον , metron , `` measure '' ) is a  यंत्र कि उपायों तापमान or तापमान अनुपात using a किस्में of अलग  principles .
A thermometer has two important elements : the temperature sensor ( e.g . the bulb on a  mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे कुछ शारीरिक बदलें occurs साथ तापमान , प्लस कुछ अर्थात् of converting इस शारीरिक बदलें into  a numerical value ( e.g . the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) .
There are many types and many uses for  thermometers , as विस्तृत नीचे in भाग  of this article .
Snow  श्वेत और the सात dwarfs is a 1937 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक  film produced by Walt Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures .
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm , it is the  पहला full-length cel एनिमेटेड विशेषता फिल्मी और the earliest in the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड  Classics series .
The story was adapted by storyboard artists  डोरोथी ऐन रिक्त , रिचर्ड creedon , मेरिल de मारिस , ओटो englander , अर्ल hurd , लंड rickard  , Ted Sears and Webb Smith .
David Hand was the supervising director , while William Cottrell , Wilfred Jackson , Larry  morey , perce pearce , और बेन sharpsteen निर्देशित the फिल्मी 's व्यक्तिगत sequences  .
Snow White premiered at the Carthay  वृत्त थिएटर on दिसम्बर 21 , 1937 , followed by a देशभर रिलीज on फ़रवरी 4 , 1938 , और  with international earnings of $ 8 million during its initial release briefly assumed the record of highest grossing sound film at the time .
The  लोकप्रियता of the फिल्मी रै led to it होने re-released theatrically अनेक टाइम्स , जबतक  its home video release in the 1990s .
Adjusted for  महंगाई , it is एक of the शीर्ष टेन performers at  the North American box office .
At the 11th Academy  पुरस्कार , वॉल्ट डिज़्नी थी awarded an मानद ऑस्कर , और the फिल्मी थी मनोनीत लिये  Best Musical Score .
It was added to the United States National Film Registry in 1989 and  is क्रमित in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's सूची of the 100 महानतम  American films , who also named the film as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008 .
Disney 's take on the fairy tale has had  a बिग सांस्कृतिक प्रभाव , resulting in a लोकप्रिय थीम पार्क आकर्षण , a वीडियो  game , and a Broadway musical .
Childbirth ,  श्रमिक , डिलीवरी , जनम , partus , or parturition is the culmination  of a pregnancy period with the expulsion of one or more newborn infants from a woman 's uterus .
The process of normal childbirth is  categorized in तीन चरण of श्रमिक : the shortening और dilation of the ग्रीवा , descent और जनम  of the infant , and birth of the placenta .
In many cases and with increasing frequency , childbirth is achieved through induction of labor  or caesarean खण्ड , जिससे is the हटाना of the neonate through a सर्जिकल incision in the उदर  , rather than through vaginal birth .
प्रसव by c-sections increased 50 % in  the U.S. from 1996 to 2006 , and comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada .
With respect to induced labor  , अधिक than 22 % of महिलाओं undergo प्रेरण of श्रमिक in the  United States .
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can  be नुकसानदेह to the भ्रूण और neonate as खूब as नुकसानदेह or बगैर लाभ to the माँ , और have स्थापित सख्त दिशानिर्देश लिये non-medically indicated induced births  and elective cesarean before 39 weeks .
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva show which followed  bam margera और उसके क्रू as वे undertook चुनौतियां , performed  stunts and traveled the world .
The show ran for 5  सीज़न between 2003  and 2005 .
Flushed Away is a 2006  british/american कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड कार्रवाई / एडवेंचर कॉमेडी  film directed by David Bowers and Sam Fell .
It was made in the partnership between Aardman Animations and DreamWorks Animation ,  और is aardman 's पहला completely computer-animated विशेषता as opposed to the  usual stop-motion .
The film stars the voice  talents of ह्यूज जैकमैन , केट विंसलेट , एंडी serkis , विधेयक nighy , इयान  McKellen , Shane Richie and Jean Reno .
The story was by Sam Fell , Peter Lord , Dick Clement , and Ian La Frenais , and the screenplay was written by Dick Clement , Ian La Frenais ,  क्रिस्टोफर लॉयड , जो keenan , और विलियम davies  .
The film was released in US on 3 November 2006 , and in UK on December 1 2006 , and was distributed by  सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें , मगर लिये स्विट्ज़रलैंड , स्पेन , और the नीदरलैंड्स , जिससे यहूद संभाला by  Universal Pictures .
The  अटलांटा braves हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल  team based in Atlanta .
the braves हैं a सदस्य of the पूर्वी  Division of Major League Baseball 's National League .
The  braves have निभाई in टर्नर फ़ील्ड  since 1997 .
The `` Braves '' name , which was first  प्रयुक्त in 1912 , originates इससे a पद  for a Native American warrior .
They  हैं nicknamed `` the bravos '' , और प्रायः referred to as `` अमेरिका  's Team `` in reference to the team 's games being broadcast on the nationally available TBS from the 1970s until 2007 , gaining a wide fanbase .
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the most successful franchises in baseball , winning division titles an unprecedented 14 consecutive times in that  काल ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 ऋतु in जिससे वहीँ यहूद no आधिकारिक प्रभाग  champions ) .
The Braves won the NL West 1991–93 and the  nl ईस्ट 1995–2005 , और लौटे to the playoffs  as the National League Wild Card in 2010 .
The Braves advanced  to the संसार श्रेणी पाँच टाइम्स in the 1990s  , winning the title in 1995 .
Since their debut in the National League in 1876 , the franchise has won 16 divisional titles , 17 National League pennants , as well as three World Series championships—in 1914 as the Boston Braves , in 1957 as the Milwaukee   Braves , and in 1995 in Atlanta .
The Braves are the only MLB franchise to have won the World  श्रेणी in तीन अलग घर शहरों .
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining  चार्टर franchises ( the अन्य होने the शिकागो शावक ) और थी संस्थापित in बोस्टन  , Massachusetts , in 1871 as the Boston Red Stockings ( not to be confused with the American League 's Boston Red Sox ) .
They  हैं माना `` the oldest लगातार  playing team in major North American sports . ''
There is an argument as to who is actually older because although the Cubs are a full season ``  पुरानी '' ( formed as the शिकागो श्वेत stockings in 1870 ) शिकागो खोया दो सीज़न to the ग्रेट शिकागो आग  , thus the Braves have played more consecutive seasons .
After various  नाम परिवर्तन ( ऐसे as the बोस्टन beaneaters ) , the टोली संचालित  as the Boston Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century .
In 1953 , the team moved to Milwaukee , Wisconsin and became the  मिल्वौकी braves , followed by the मूव to अटलांटा  in 1966 .
The team 's tenure in Atlanta is famous for Hank Aaron breaking Babe Ruth 's career  घर चलाएं रिकार्ड in 1974 , हालांकि the बहुमत of आरोन 's घर रनों यहूद hit जबकि the टोली थी  in Milwaukee .
His record stood  जबतक 2007 , जब सैन फ्रांसिस्को बाएँ क्षेत्ररक्षक  Barry Bonds broke the record .
The leaves of a  beech पेड़
3D rendering of a μCT scan of a leaf piece , resolution  circa 40 μm/ voxel  .
A leaf is an organ of a vascular plant , as defined in  वनस्पति शर्तें , और in particular in संयंत्र morphology  .
Foliage is a mass noun that  refers to पत्ते as a विशेषता  of plants .
Typically a leaf is a thin , flattened organ borne above ground and specialized for photosynthesis , but many types of leaves are adapted  in तरीके लगभग unrecognisable in those शर्तें : कुछ हैं नहीं चपटा ( लिये उदाहरण अनेक रसीले पत्ते और conifers ) , कुछ हैं नहीं ऊपर मैदान ( ऐसे as बल्ब तराजू ) , और  some are without major photosynthetic function ( consider for example cataphylls , spines , and cotyledons ) .
Conversely , many structures of non-vascular  पौधे , or भी of कुछ lichens , जिससे हैं नहीं पौधे at सब ( in the भाव of होने  members of the kingdom Plantae ) , do look and function much like leaves .
Furthermore , several structures found in vascular plants look like leaves but are not  दरअसल पत्ते ; वे differ इससे पत्ते in उनके structures  and origins .
Examples include  phyllodes , cladodes , और  phylloclades .
Title card for  the 1937 हमारी गिरोह कॉमेडी rushin '  Ballet .
Our Gang ( also  ज्ञात as the छोटी दुष्टों or एचएएल रोच 's दुष्टों ) हैं a श्रेणी  of American comedy short films about a group of poor neighborhood children and their adventures .
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach , the series is noted for showing children behaving in a  अपेक्षाकृत प्राकृतिक रास्ता , as रोच और असली निदेशक रॉबर्ट F. mcgowan worked to फिल्मी the unaffected , कच्चा nuances apparent in नियमित children बल्कि than have उन्हें imitate  adult acting styles .
In addition , Our Gang notably put boys , girls , whites and blacks  साथ in a समूह as बराबरी , कुछ कि `` broke नई मैदान , '' according  to film historian Leonard Maltin .
Such a thing had never been done before in  सिनेमा लकिन रै चूंकि महरूम दोहराया बाद the कामयाबी of हमारी  Gang .
The first production at the  रोच स्टुडियो in 1922 थी a श्रेणी  of silent short subjects .
When Roach  बदला वितरकों इससे pathé to metro-goldwyn-mayer ( mgm ) in 1927 , और परिवर्तित the श्रेणी  to sound in 1929 , the series took off even further .
उत्पादन जारी at the रोच स्टुडियो जबतक 1938 , जब the  series was sold to MGM , who then continued producing the comedies until 1944 .
The Our Gang series includes  a कुल of 220 शॉर्ट्स और एक विशेषता फिल्मी , सामान्य  Spanky , featuring over forty-one child actors .
As MGM retained the rights to the Our Gang trademark  following उनके खरीदें of the उत्पादन अधिकारों , the 80 roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated  for television under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955 .
Both Roach 's  the छोटी दुष्टों पैकेज ( अभी स्वामित्व by सीबीएस टेलीविज़न वितरण ) और mgm 's हमारी गिरोह पैकेज ( अभी स्वामित्व by warner भाईs. entertainment  ) have since remained in syndication , with periodic new productions based on the shorts surfacing over the years , including a 1994 Little Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures .
Zacharias Janssen ( also  zacharias जानसन or sacharias जानसन ) ( b.1580-88 , d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) थी a डच spectacle-maker इससे middelburg संबद्ध  with the invention of the first optical telescope .
janssen is sometimes भी credited लिये inventing  the first truly compound microscope .
However , the origin of the microscope , just like the origin of  the दूरदर्शी , is a पदार्थ of बहस  .
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo :  dáʔaw ) is a विशाल freshwater झील in  the Sierra Nevada of the United States .
At a surface elevation of , it is located along the border between California  और नेवाडा , वेस्ट of कार्सन  City .
Lake Tahoe is  the largest अल्पाइन झील in  North America .
Its depth is , making it the United State 's  second-deepest ( the deepest is crater झील in ऑरेगॉन , होने deeper  , at ) .
additionally , झील tahoe is सूचीबद्ध as the 26th  largest lake by volume in the world at .
The lake was formed about 2 million years ago and is a part of  the झील tahoe जलाशय साथ the आधुनिक झील होने तराशा  during the ice ages .
It is known for the clarity of its  जल और the परिदृश्य of surrounding kyu  on all sides .
the क्षेत्रफल surrounding the झील is भी  referred to as Lake Tahoe , or simply Tahoe .
Lake  tahoe is a प्रमुख पर्यटक आकर्षण  in both Nevada and California .
It  is घर to a क्रमांक of स्की रिसॉर्ट  , summer outdoor recreation , and tourist attractions .
Snow and skiing are a significant part  of the क्षेत्रफल 's  economy and reputation .
Mountain and  झील नजारा हैं आकर्षण  throughout the year .
the नेवाडा पक्ष  also includes large casinos .
Highways provide year-round access  इससे रेनो , कार्सन नगर , और sacramento  .

The Twenty-seventh Amendment ( Amendment  xxvii ) prohibits कोई विधि कि increases or decreases the सैलरी of सदस्यों  of the Congress from taking effect until the start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives .
It is the most recent  amendment to the संयुक्त  States Constitution .
It was  सुपुर्द to the राज्य लिये अनुसमर्थन  in 1789 and was adopted in 1992 .
“First they came ... ” is a famous statement and provocative poem attributed to pastor Martin Niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) about  the सुस्ती of जर्मनी intellectuals following the nazis ' वृद्धि to शक्ति और the subsequent purging of उनके चुनी  targets , group after group .
There is some disagreement over the exact wording of the quotation and when it was  निर्मित ; the सामग्री of the quotation may have महरूम प्रस्तुत  differently by Niemöller on different occasions .
