For  तुलना , महाद्वीपों  are also shown .
चार तिहाई  logo
The Four Thirds system is a  मानक निर्मित by ओलम्पस और कोडक लिये डिजिटल single-lens reflex  camera ( DSLR ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a standard that ,  साथ डिजिटल कैमरे और lenses उपलब्धियाँ इससे अनेक निर्माताओं ,  allows for the interchange of lenses and bodies from different manufacturers .
seems to कवर the  standard .
Proponents describe it as an open standard , but  कंपनियाँ may तभी उपयोग it अंतर्गत a non-disclosure अनुबंध  .
Unlike  पुरानी slr प्रणालियों , चार तिहाई रै महरूम designed इससे  the ground up to be entirely digital .
Many lenses are extensively  computerized , to the पाइंट कि ओलम्पस offers फर्मवेयर अद्यतन  for many of them .
Lens design has been tailored to the  आवश्यकताएँ of डिजिटल सेंसर , सबसे  notably through telecentric designs .
The size of the sensor is  significantly छोटी than लिये सबसे dslrs और इस  implies that lenses , especially telephoto lenses , can be smaller .
For example , a Four Thirds  लेंस साथ a 300 mm फोकल लंबाई होता कवर परिचय the वही कोण  of view as a 600 mm focal length lens for the 35 mm film standard , and is correspondingly more compact .
Thus , the Four Thirds System has crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of about 2 , and while this enables  longer फोकल लंबाई लिये वृहद आवर्धन , it करता n't सहायता the manufacture  of wide angle lenses .
The image sensor format , generally intermediate between  those of larger slrs और छोटी कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे , generally देता स्तर  of cost , performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes .
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts installed  throughout a भवन to सप्लाई conditioned एयर to  a room through outlet vents , called diffusers ; and ducts to remove air through return-air grilles .
HVAC ( heating ,  वेंटिलेशन , और एयर कंडीशनिंग ) is the प्रौद्योगिकी of अंदर  and automotive environmental comfort .
hvac प्रणाली डिज़ाइन is a subdiscipline of mechanical अभियान्त्रिकी  , based on the principles of thermodynamics , fluid mechanics , and heat transfer .
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the  फ़ील्ड 's संक्षिप्त  as HVAC & R or HVACR , or ventilating is dropped as in HACR ( such as the designation of HACR-rated circuit breakers ) .
HVAC is important in the design of medium to large industrial and office buildings such as skyscrapers and in marine  environments ऐसे as एक्वैरियम , जहाँ सुरक्षित और स्वस्थ भवन शर्तें हैं regulated साथ आदर to  temperature and humidity , using fresh air from outdoors .
Ventilation on the downdraught system , by  impulsion , or the 'plenum ' principle , लागू to schoolrooms  ( 1899 )
Heating , ventilating , and air conditioning  is आधारित on आविष्कारों और discoveries बना by निकोलय lvov , माइकल फैराडे ,  Willis Carrier , Reuben Trane , James Joule , William Rankine , Sadi Carnot , and many others .
The invention of the components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial revolution , and new methods of modernization , higher  दक्षता , और प्रणाली कंट्रोल हैं constantly introduced by कंपनियाँ और आविष्कारक विश्वव्यापी  .
The three central functions of heating , ventilating , and  air-conditioning हैं interrelated , विशेषकर साथ the need to provide  thermal comfort and acceptable indoor air quality within reasonable installation , operation , and maintenance costs .
HVAC systems can  provide वेंटिलेशन , reduce एयर घुसपैठ , और maintain दबाव  relationships between spaces .
The means  of एयर डिलीवरी और हटाना इससे स्पेसेस  is known as room air distribution .
The starting point in carrying  आउट an अनुमान दोनो लिये कूलिंग और हीटिंग depends on the exterior  climate and interior specified conditions .
However before  लेने up the ऊष्मा लोड गणना , it is जरुरी to ढूँढें भैस  air requirements for each area in detail , as pressurization is an important consideration .
In modern buildings the design , installation , and control systems of  ये कृत्यों हैं एकीकृत into एक or अधिक hvac प्रणालियों  .
For very  छोटी इमारतें , ठेकेदारों सामान्यतः क्षमता इंजीनियर और चुनें  HVAC systems and equipment .
For larger buildings , building services designers and engineers , such as mechanical , architectural , or building services  इंजीनियर्स analyze , डिज़ाइन , और बताएँ the hvac प्रणालियों , और specialty mechanical ठेकेदारों fabricate और  commission them .
Building permits and  code-compliance inspections of the संस्थापना हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी  for all sizes of buildings .
The HVAC industry is a worldwide  एंटरप्राइज़ , साथ भूमिकाएँ सहित आपरेशन और मेंटेनेंस , प्रणाली डिज़ाइन और  construction , equipment manufacturing and sales , and in education and research .
The HVAC industry was historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC equipment , but regulating and standards organizations such as HARDI , ASHRAE , SMACNA , ACCA ,  वर्दी mechanical कोड , अंतरराष्ट्रीय mechanical कोड , और amca have महरूम स्थापित to support the उद्योग और प्रोत्साहित ऊँची मानकों और उपलब्धि  .
Royal Navy Commander  जेम्स बंध , cmg , rnvr , is a fictional अक्षर निर्मित  by British journalist and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953 .
He is the  समर्थक of the जेम्स बंध श्रेणी of novels  , films , comics and video games .
Fleming wrote twelve Bond novels and two short story  संग्रहण पहले उसके मौत , हालांकि the पिछला दो books— the man साथ the सुनहरी गन और octopussy और the जीना  Daylights —were published posthumously .
The Bond character is a Secret Service agent ,  कोड क्रमांक 007 , residing in लंदन लकिन क्रियाशील  internationally .
Bond was a composite character who was based on a number of commandos whom Fleming knew  दौरान उसके सेवा in the नवल प्रज्ञा प्रभाग दौरान संसार युद्ध ii , to जिसको फ्लेमिंग added उसके अपना स्टाइल और a क्रमांक of उसके अपना tastes  ; Bond 's name was appropriated from American ornithologist James Bond .
Bond has a number of character traits which run throughout the books , including an  enjoyment of गाड़ियाँ , a प्रेम of खाना और पेय , और an औसत सेवन of  sixty custom-made cigarettes a day .
Since Fleming 's death in 1964 , there have been other authorised writers  of बंध सामग्री , सहित जॉन गार्डनर , जो लिखा चौदह  novels and two novelizations and Raymond Benson , who wrote six novels , three novelizations and three short stories .
There have also been  तीन लेखक जो लिखा एक किताब प्रत्येक , किंग्सले एमिस ( लिखने  as Robert Markham ) , Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery Deaver .
Additionally  a श्रेणी of novels आधारित on बंध  's youth— Young Bond —was written by Charlie Higson .
As spin-offs from the literary works , there was a television adaptation of the  पहला अनोखा , कसीनो royale , in जिससे बंध थी निभाई as an अमरीकी  agent .
A comic strip series also ran  in the रोज़ एक्स्प्रेस समाचारपत्र  .
There have also  महरूम twenty-five बंध films ; सात अभिनेताओं  have played Bond in these films .
`` Nature Boy '' is a song by Eden  ahbez , प्रकाशित in 1947  .
The song tells a  काल्पनिक of a `` अजीब एनचांटेड लड़के ... जो wandered बहुत दूर '' तभी to सीख कि `` the महानतम  thing ... was just to love and be loved in return '' .
Nat King Cole 's 1948 recording of the  सोंग थी a प्रमुख hit और `` प्रकृति लड़के '' रै चूंकि become a पॉप  and jazz standard , with dozens of major artists interpreting the song .
Louisiana ( or ; , ;  louisiana क्रियोल : léta de la lwizyàn ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in the दक्षिणी प्रदेश  of the United States of America .
Louisiana is the 31st most extensive and the 25th  सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य  .
Its capital is Baton  रूज और largest नगर is नई  Orleans .
Louisiana is the only state in the U.S. with  राजनैतिक subdivisions termed parishes , जिससे हैं लोकल सरकारी 's समतुल्य to काउंटी  .
The largest parish by population is East  baton रूज मोहल्ला , और the largest by  land area is Cameron Parish .
Much of the state 's lands were formed from  sediment धोया bas the मिसिसिपी नदी , leaving विशाल deltas और विशाल क्षेत्रों of तटीय  marsh and swamp .
These contain a rich  दक्षिणी biota ; ठेठ उदाहरण शामिल पक्षियों ऐसे as  ibis and egrets .
There are also many  प्रजाति of पेड़ मेंढक , और मछली ऐसे as sturgeon  and paddlefish .
In more elevated areas , fire is a natural process in  the लैंडस्केप , और रै उत्पादित extensive क्षेत्रों of longleaf पाइन  forest and wet savannas .
These support an exceptionally large number  of संयंत्र प्रजाति , सहित अनेक प्रजाति of orchids और मांसाहारी  plants .
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural , multilingual heritage , being so strongly  बहकावे by an जिसमें of 18th-century फ्रेंच , स्पेनी , देशी अमरीकी ( भारतीय ) और अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों  that they are considered to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S .
Before the American purchase of  the territory , the वर्तमान louisiana राज्य था महरूम दोनो  a Spanish and French colony .
In addition , the pattern of development included importing numerous African slaves in  the 18th सदी , साथ अनेक इससे the वही प्रदेश of वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी , यूँ concentrating  their culture .
In the  post-civil युद्ध पर्यावरण , anglo-americans  increased the pressure for Anglicization , and in 1915 , English was made the only official language of the state .
Women 's rights are  the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed लिये महिलाओं और लड़कियों  of many societies worldwide .
In some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by law ,  लोकल कस्टम , और आचरण , whereas in अन्य वे may be उपेक्षित  or suppressed .
They differ from broader notions of human  अधिकारों through दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह  against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys .
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include , though are not limited to ,  the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted ; to डालें  into legal contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
The laws of science or scientific laws are  कथन कि describe , भविष्यवाणी , और शायद बताइये क्यों , a दायरा  of phenomena behave as they appear to in nature .
The term `` law '' has diverse usage in many cases : approximate , accurate , broad or narrow  theories , in सब प्राकृतिक वैज्ञानिक disciplines ( भौतिकी , रसायन , जीवविज्ञान  , geology , astronomy etc . ) .
an analogous पद लिये  a scientific law is a principle .
वैज्ञानिक विधिs:
summarize a large  संग्रहण of तथ्य संकल्पित by प्रयोग into  a single statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one  or अनेक कथन or समीकरण , or at तनिक stated in a सिंगल वाक्य , so कि  it can be used to predict the outcome of an experiment , given the initial , boundary , and other physical conditions of the processes which take place,
are strongly supported by  अनुभवजन्य प्रमाण - वे हैं वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान कि प्रयोग have repeatedly सत्यापित  ( and never falsified ) .
Their accuracy does not change when new theories are worked out ,  लकिन बल्कि the पैमाना of अनुप्रयोग , चूंकि the समीकरण ( if कोई ) representing  the law does not change .
As with other scientific knowledge ,  वे do नहीं have निरपेक्ष certainty जैसे गणितीय theorems or पहचान  , and it is always possible for a law to be overturned by future observations .
are  प्रायः कोटेड as a आधारभूत controlling influence बल्कि than  a description of observed facts .
I.e . `` the  कानून of गति आवश्यकता कि  ''
Laws differ from  hypotheses और postulates , जिससे हैं प्रस्तावित दौरान the वैज्ञानिक  process before and during validation by experiment and observation .
These are  नहीं कानून चूंकि वे have नहीं महरूम सत्यापित to the वही उपाधि और may नहीं be fear  general , although they may lead to the formulation of laws .
A law is a more solidified  और औपचारिक बयान , आसुत  from repeated experiment .
Although the concepts of a law or principle in nature is borderline to philosophy , and presents the depth to which mathematics can describe nature  , वैज्ञानिक कानून हैं माना इससे a वैज्ञानिक परिप्रेक्ष्य और follow the वैज्ञानिक विधि ; वे `` serve उनके purpose '' बल्कि than `` questioning  reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ) .
For example , whether a law `` refers to  वास्तविकता '' is a philosophical समस्या  , rather than scientific .
Fundamentally , all scientific laws follow  इससे भौतिकी , कानून जिससे occur in अन्य sciences ultimately follow  from physical laws .
Often , from mathematically fundamental  viewpoints , सार्वभौमिक स्थिरांक emerge इससे वैज्ञानिक  laws .
The launch of the PlayStation 3 into the Japanese market on  10 नवम्बर 2006 चिह्नित the दूसरी प्रमुख सातवाँ  generation entertainment system to be released .
The system was released seven days later on 17  नवम्बर in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Introduction into other world markets was delayed by a shortage of diodes for use in the  blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी ; the यंत्र थी शुभारम्भ in यूरोपीय और अन्य संसार बाज़ार in the पहला हाफ of  2007 .
Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly Williams and Grainger ) is a  fictional अक्षर इससे the सीबीएस साबुन operas the यंग और the बेचैन और the बिंदास और the खूबसूरत  , portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman .
She made  उसके डेब्यू दौरान the एपीसोड  airing on January 21 , 1983 .
In 1992 , Bregman began  बनाना विरल दिखावे on the बिंदास और the खूबसूरत , बाद resulting  in the character migrating there fully in 1995 .
Following a guest appearance in 2000  , bregman लौटे to the यंग और the बेचैन  on August 24 , 2001 , remaining on recurring status .
In 2013 , it  थी घोषित कि bregman था  been placed on contract .
Much of Lauren 's  इतिहास रै revolved around उसके romances साथ पॉल विलियम्स , स्कॉट  Grainger , Sr. , and Michael Baldwin among many others causing a fierce rivalry with Traci Abbott Connolly .
लॉरेन is भी प्रसिद्ध  for her long , violent rivalry with Sheila Carter .
The 2010 NBA Finals was the National Basketball  संघ ( एनबीए ) चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी लिये the 2009–10  season .
The best-of-seven playoff was  लडे between the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स , champions of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन और defending एनबीए champions , और  the Boston Celtics , champions of the Eastern Conference .
The Lakers defeated  the सेल्टिक्स , चार खेल to तीन , to जीत the मताधिकार 's  16th NBA championship .
The 64th edition of the  चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी थी निभाई between जून 3 और जून 17 , थी ब्रॉडकास्ट  on ABC , and was watched by an average of 18.1 million people .
the सेल्टिक्स अर्जित उनके berth  into the playoffs by winning the Atlantic Division .
The  लेकर्स जीती the प्रशांत प्रभाग  to earn their berth .
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals  by defeating the मियामी ऊष्मा in the best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार , the क्लीवलैंड cavaliers in the best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन  Semifinals , and defending Eastern conference champion Orlando Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals .
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Oklahoma City Thunder  in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार , the यूटा जैज़ in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन  Semifinals , and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven Western Conference Finals .
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the Major League Baseball World  श्रेणी 2–3–2 सात खेल स्वरूप , साथ the लेकर्स possessing home-court लाभ as a बदला लिये finishing साथ बेहतर  regular season record than the Celtics .
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe Bryant , Pau Gasol , and Ron  artest brought the लेकर्स बंद to विजय in खेल  1 .
A record breaking performance from Ray Allen  's आठ three-point baskets ensured the सेल्टिक्स  a Game 2 triumph .
Derek Fisher ’s  11 अंक in the चौथी क्वार्टर helped the  Lakers win Game 3 .
The Celtics won Game 4 ; it did n't hurt that they netted an excellent performance in baskets  by the team’s reserves , जबकि पॉल पियर्स led the टोली to a खेल 5 जीत साथ 27 अंक on 57 %  shooting from the floor .
The Lakers avoided  विलोपन by जीतना a निर्णायक खेल  6 with 24 points contributed by their bench .
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points early in the third quarter , the Lakers rallied and won their second  लगातार चैंपियनशिप by लेने over an रोमांचक खेल 7 aided by लेट योगदान  on offense by Pau Gasol and Artest and rebounding .
Bryant was named  सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of the फाइनल लिये उसके  second consecutive trophy .
This was the first NBA Finals  to go the पूरा सात खेल चूंकि और तभी the चौथी चूंकि  the NBA Finals returned to a 2–3–2 format in .
The Laker franchise has 16 NBA  championships ( पाँच in मिनियापोलिस , 11 in लॉस एंजिल्स ) trailing the  Celtics ' seventeen championships .
The NBA Finals used the `` World Series '' Format in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated the Washington Capitols 4 games to 2 ; in 1953 Minneapolis  पराजित the नई यॉर्क knicks 4 खेल to 1 ; in 1954 मिनियापोलिस पराजित the syracuse नागरिकों 4 खेल to 3 ; और in 1955  Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3 .
The NBA  होता वापसी to the 2–2–1–1–1 नेशनल  Hockey League seven game series format until 1985 .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the family Piperaceae ,  cultivated लिये इसके फल , जिससे is प्रायः सूखी और प्रयुक्त as a मसाला और seasoning  .
The fruit , known as a peppercorn when dried , is  लगभग in व्यास , अंधेरा रेड जब fully वयस्क , और , जैसे सब drupes , contains a सिंगल बीज  .
Peppercorns  , और the मैदान pepper निकला इससे उन्हें , may be वर्णित बस as pepper , or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( पकाया और  dried unripe fruit ) , green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is native to south India ,  और is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in तीव्र  regions .
फिलहाल वियतनाम is the संसार 's largest निर्माता और निर्यातक  of pepper , producing 34 % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper has been  प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता लिये दोनो इसके फ्लेवर और as a आयुर्विज्ञान  .
Black pepper is the  संसार 's सबसे traded मसाला  .
It is one of the most  आम मसाले added to यूरोपीय भोजन  and its descendants .
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine  , नहीं to be उलझन साथ the capsaicin कि देता मांसल मिर्च  theirs .
It is  in the आधुनिक संसार  , often paired with salt .
in cardiovascular physiology , ejection भिन्न  ( EF ) represents the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle ( heart ) with each heart beat or cardiac cycle .
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into  the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the बाएँ ventricle जिससे ejects via the aortic वाल्व into the प्रणालीगत  circulation .
इमेजिंग of the physiology of the mammalian दिल is the आर्ट कि  allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a worldwide utility enabling  पढ़ाई of हृदय प्रदर्शन reproducibly और inexpensively  .
Simplified ,  ejection भिन्न is a गणितीय उत्पाद  allowed by cardiac imaging .
As a mathematical term  , ejection भिन्न is an एक्सटेंशन of the कार्य of  Adolph Fick in cardiac output .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography ,  computed टोमोग्राफी , चुम्बकीय अनुनाद इमेजिंग और muga स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically  relevant mathematics regarding Ischemia , Congenital Heart Disease and Heart Failure .
The prosecutor is the chief legal representative of the  अभियोजन in देशों साथ either the आम  law adversarial system , or the civil law inquisitorial system .
The prosecution is the legal party responsible for presenting the case in a criminal trial  विरूद्ध an व्यक्तिगत अभियुक्त of तोड़कर  the law .
Strawberry shortcake most commonly means a dessert  in the shortcake परिवार  of cakes .
स्ट्रॉबेरी shortcake  may also refer to:
Strawberry Shortcake , a character  और मताधिकार निर्मित by अमरीकी  Greetings
The  shortened शीर्षक of स्ट्रॉबेरी  on the Shortcake , a Japanese romance movie .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ) , also transliterated as  मुहम्मद ( ) , थी a धार्मिक , राजनैतिक , और सैन्य नेता इससे मक्का जो एकीकृत अरब  into a single religious polity under Islam .
He is believed  by मुसलमान और bahá'ís to be  a messenger and prophet of God .
Muhammad is almost universally  माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी भेजा by परमेश्वर लिये  mankind .
non-muslims लिहाज़  Muhammad as the founder of Islam .
Muslims  consider उसे to be the restorer of an अनछुए असली monotheistic  faith of Adam , Noah , Abraham , Moses , Jesus , and other prophets .
Born in  परिचय 570 ce in the arabian नगर of मक्का , he थी अनाथ  at an early age and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly  as a व्यापारी , as खूब as a गड़रिये , और थी  first married by age 25 .
Being in the habit of  periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ  , he later reported that it was there , at age 40 , that he received his first revelation from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad started  उपदेश ये खुलासे सरेआम , proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक `` , कि पूरा  `` surrender '' to Him ( lit .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn )  स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर , और कि he खुद थी a नबी और मेसेंजर of परमेश्वर , in the  same vein as other Islamic prophets .
Muhammad gained few followers early on ,  और थी मिले साथ दुश्मनी इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके  followers were treated harshly .
To escape  persecution , मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of उसके अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he और  his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
This  इवेंट , the हिज्र , marks the शुरूआत of  the Islamic calendar , which is also known as the Hijri Calendar .
In Medina ,  मुहम्मद संयुक्त the जनजातियों  under the Constitution of Medina .
After eight years of fighting  साथ the meccan जनजातियों , उसके अनुसरणकर्ता , जो by तब था grown to 10,000 , took कंट्रोल  of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca .
he नष्ट the pagan मूर्तियों in the नगर और तब भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता  out to destroy all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia .
In 632 , a few months after returning to Medina  इससे the विदाई यात्राएं , मुहम्मद गिरी बीमार और died  .
By the time of his death , most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam ,  और he था संयुक्त अरब into a सिंगल मुस्लिम धार्मिक  polity .
the खुलासे  ( or Ayah , lit .
`` Signs [ of  परमेश्वर ] '' ) — जिससे मुहम्मद reported receiving जबतक उसके मौत – रूप the आयतें of the कुरान , regarded  by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based .
Besides the Quran , Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are also  upheld by मुसलमान as the स्त्रोत of शरीयत  law .
They  discuss मुहम्मद और अन्य नबियों of  Islam with reverence , adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned .
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times were largely  ऋणात्मक , appraisals in आधुनिक इतिहास have महरूम दूर कम  so .
The Great Books  ( दूसरी संस्करण  )
Great Books of the Western World is a series of books originally published in the United States in 1952 by  ब्रिटैनिका विश्वकोष inc. to उपस्थित the ग्रेट किताबे in a सिंगल पैकेज of 54 आयतन  .
The series is  अभी in इसके दूसरी संस्करण और contains 60  volumes .
The original editors of the series chose three  मापदण्ड लिये समावेश : a किताब जरूर be प्रासंगिक to समकालीन मुद्दे , और नहीं तभी महत्वपूर्ण in इसके ऐतिहासिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट ; it जरूर  reward rereading ; and it must be a part of `` the great conversation about the great ideas , '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors .
Books were not chosen on the basis of ethnic or cultural inclusiveness  , ऐतिहासिक influence , or the सम्पादक ' अनुबंध साथ the  views expressed .
`` Cocaine ''  is a सोंग लिखा और अंकित by jj cale in  1976 , but also known as a cover version recorded by Eric Clapton .
Allmusic calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly popular hits '' and notes that `` even for  an कलाकार जैसे क्लैप्टन साथ a विशाल देह of high-quality कार्य , 'cocaine ' बाँधने among उसके बेहतरीन  . ''
Glyn Johns , who had previously worked with The Who , Led Zeppelin and The Rolling  पत्थरों , उत्पादित the क्लैप्टन रिकॉर्डिंग , जिससे थी released on क्लैप्टन 's 1977 एल्बम slowhand और as a सिंगल in 1980  .
The live version of `` Cocaine '' , from the Just One Night album recorded in Tokyo , charted on the Billboard Hot 100 as  the b-side of `` तुलसा समय `` , जिससे थी a no . 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine '' was one of several of Cale 's songs recorded by  क्लैप्टन , सहित `` बाद मध्यरात्रि `` और `` travelin ' लाइट  '' .
The  आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर ( पुकारा हवाई आपरेशन or आपरेशन ai by the जापानी इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और the बैटल of पर्ल हार्बर  ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ) .
From the standpoint of the defenders ,  the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48 a.m. हवाई  Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the  u.S. प्रशांत बेड़े इससे दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध विदेशी territories  of the United Kingdom , the Netherlands , and the United States .
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters ,  बमवर्षक और torpedo planes in दो लहरें , शुभारम्भ इससे  six aircraft carriers .
All  आठ u.S. नेवी battleships यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त  , with four being sunk .
Two of these were later raised , and  साथ the बाकी चार repaired , छह battleships लौटे  to service later in the war .
The  जापानी भी sank or क्षतिग्रस्त तीन cruisers  , three destroyers , an anti-aircraft training ship , and one minelayer .
188 u.S. वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402  Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as the power station ,  डॉकयार्ड , मेंटेनेंस , और ईंधन और torpedo भंडार सुविधाएं , as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन  ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked .
Japanese losses  यहूद लाइट : 29 वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines खोया , और  65 servicemen killed or wounded .
One Japanese  नाविक थी captured  .
The attack came as a profound  शॉक to the अमरीकी लोगों और led सीधे to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into संसार युद्ध ii in दोनो  the Pacific and European theaters .
the following दिन ( दिसम्बर  8 ) , the United States declared war on Japan .
Domestic support for non-interventionism , which had  महरूम दमदार , disappeared  .
Clandestine support  of ब्रिटेन ( लिये उदाहरण the neutrality पैट्रोल ) थी  replaced by active alliance .
subsequent परिचालन by the u.S. prompted जर्मनी और  Italy to declare war on the U.S. on December 11 , which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day .
There were  numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents लिये unannounced  military action by Japan .
However , the lack of any formal warning , particularly while negotiations were still apparently  जारी , led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim दिसम्बर 7 ,  1941 , `` a date which will live in infamy `` .
Project Runway Season 2 was the  दूसरी ऋतु of ब्रावो 's कामयाब प्रोजेक्ट रनवे , a वास्तविकता प्रतियोगिता लिये फ़ैशन  designers .
Season 2 began  airing on दिसम्बर  7 , 2005 .
following a देशभर ढूंढें पहले in the साल , सोलह designers यहूद चुनी  as semi-finalists and brought to New York City in June , 2005 .
After the first challenge , called `` Road To The Runway '' ,  चौदह गई on to compete as finalists  .
The winning designer , Chloe Dao , received $ 100,000 in seed money to help launch her own line , a 2007  शनि आसमान roadster , a स्प्रेड in elle पत्रिका , और a mentorship साथ the banana  Republic Design Team .
Winning alongside Dao was  उसके मॉडल , अनुग्रह kelsey , जो प्राप्त the  ELLE Magazine spread .
Michael Kors  और नीना गार्सिया लौटे as न्यायाधीशों लिये  the second season .
The  चौथी judging सीट घुमाया प्रत्येक  week , based on the challenge .
Tim Gunn , fashion chair at Parsons The New School for Design ,  लौटे as a mentor लिये the designers .
Kara  janx बाद appeared in प्रोजेक्ट  Runway : All Stars in 2012 , where she finished 7th out of 13 .
Andrae Gonzalo , in the same  साल , competed in the दूसरी ऋतु of the सब सितारों संस्करण  placing 10th out of 13 .
an उदाहरण of  a Heraclius mule
In  numismatics , a खच्चर is a सिक्का or पदक minted साथ  obverse and reverse designs not normally seen on the same piece .
These  can be जानबूझकर or  produced by error .
This type of error is highly sought after  , और उदाहरण can लाने steep कीमतें  from collectors .
The earliest mules are found  among प्राचीन यूनानी और रोमन  coins .
Opinion is divided between those who think that they are accidental , the result of an incorrect  संयोजन of a नई die साथ एक कि था officially महरूम withdrawn इससे उपयोग , or the कार्य of coiners working  with dies stolen from an official mint , perhaps at a time when one of them should have been destroyed .
The name derives from the mule , the hybrid offspring of a horse and a donkey , due to such  a सिक्का having दो पहलू intended लिये अलग सिक्के , much as a खच्चर रै अभिभावक of दो अलग प्रजाति  .
This page  दस्तावेज़ the tornadoes और बवंडर  outbreaks of 2010 .
The majority of  tornadoes रूप in the u.S. , लकिन वे can occur  almost anywhere under the right conditions .
A lesser number occur outside the U.S. , most notably  in भाग of neighboring दक्षिणी कनाडा दौरान the उत्तरी गोलार्ध  's summer season , but are also known in South America , Europe , Asia , and Australia .
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the United States in 2010 ( of which  at तनिक 1,266 यहूद पुष्टि ) , साथ 45 पुष्टि fatalities  .
Elsewhere in  the संसार , 11 लोगों यहूद मारे in tornadoes , छह in अर्जेंटीना ,  three in the Bahamas , one in Bangladesh , and one in Germany .
The year was near  औसत लिये tornadoes despite an अत्यधिक शांत जल्दी वसन्त काल , however ऐसे बदला बाद a विशाल upswing starting  in late April and a busy late spring and summer period .
The  पतझड़ महीने यहूद थोड़ा  above average .
A  lymphocyte is a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका in  the vertebrate immune system .
Under the  सूक्ष्मदर्शी , lymphocytes can be विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes  and small lymphocytes .
Large granular lymphocytes  शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल कोशिकाएं ( nk  cells ) .
Small  lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं और  B cells .
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's  कार्य स्वचालन फ्रेमवर्क , consisting of a command-line शेल और संबद्ध एनक्रिप्शन भाषा निर्मित on .neT फ्रेमवर्क  .
PowerShell  provides पूरा अभिगम to com और wmi , enabling प्रशासकों to perform प्रशासनिक  tasks on both local and remote Windows systems .
In PowerShell , administrative tasks are generally performed by cmdlets ( pronounced command-lets ) , which are  specialized .neT वर्ग implementing a particular आपरेशन  .
सेट of cmdlets may be संयुक्त साथ in स्क्रिप्ट , executables ( जिससे हैं स्टैंडअलोन अनुप्रयोग  ) , or by instantiating regular .NET classes ( or WMI/COM Objects ) .
These work by accessing data in  अलग आंकड़ा स्टोर्स , जैसे the filesystem or रजिस्ट्री , जिससे हैं बना उपलब्धियाँ  to the PowerShell runtime via Windows PowerShell providers .
Windows PowerShell also provides a hosting  api साथ जिससे the खिड़कियाँ powershell  runtime can be embedded inside other applications .
These applications can then use  खिड़कियाँ powershell कार्यक्षमता to implement निश्चित परिचालन , सहित  those exposed via the graphical interface .
This capability has been used by Microsoft Exchange Server  2007 to expose इसके प्रबन्धन कार्यक्षमता as powershell cmdlets और प्रदाताओं और  implement the graphical management tools as PowerShell hosts which invoke the necessary cmdlets .
Other Microsoft applications including Microsoft SQL Server 2008 also  expose उनके प्रबन्धन इंटरफ़ेस  via PowerShell cmdlets .
With PowerShell , graphical interface-based management  अनुप्रयोग on खिड़कियाँ हैं परतदार on शीर्ष of खिड़कियाँ powershell  .
A PowerShell  एनक्रिप्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये खिड़कियाँ उत्पाद is mandated  by the Common Engineering Criteria .
Windows PowerShell includes its own  extensive , console-based सहायता , समान to  man pages in Unix shells , via the Get-Help cmdlet .
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical film starring Julie Andrews , Dick Van Dyke , David Tomlinson ,  और glynis जॉन्स , उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी , और आधारित on  the Mary Poppins books series by P. L. Travers .
The film was directed by Robert Stevenson and  लिखा by विधेयक वाल्श और डॉन dagradi  , with songs by the Sherman Brothers .
It was shot  at वॉल्ट डिज़्नी studios in burbank  , California .
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her  प्रदर्शन as मरियम poppins और the फिल्मी भी जीती ऑस्कर लिये बेहतरीन  Film Editing , Original Music Score , Best Song for `` Chim Chim Cher-ee '' and Best Visual Effects , and received a total of 13 nominations .
A story arc is an extended or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling media such as  टेलीविज़न , कॉमिक किताबे , कॉमिक स्ट्रिप्स , boardgames , वीडियो खेल , और in कुछ मामले  , films .
On a  टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम , लिये उदाहरण  , the story would unfold over many episodes .
In television , the use of the  स्टोरी चाप is much अधिक आम in dramas than in comedies  , especially in soap operas .
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs  than समाचारपत्र कॉमिक्स , as सबसे वेब कॉमिक्स have पठनीय अभिलेख  online that a newcomer to the strip can read in order to understand what is going on .
Although story arcs have existed for decades , the term `` story arc ''  थी coined in 1988 in संबंध to the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी wiseguy  , and was quickly adapted for other uses .
Many American comic book series are now  लिखा in चार or six-issue arcs , भीतर  a continuing series .
Short story arcs are easier to package as trade paperbacks  लिये पुनर्विक्रय , और अधिक accessible to the कैज़ुअल रीडर than the never-ending निरंतरता  that once characterised comics .
Black Friday is the day following  थैंक्सगिविंग दिन in the संयुक्त राज्य , प्रायः regarded  as the beginning of the Christmas shopping season .
In recent years , most major retailers have  खोली अत्यधिक जल्दी और offered promotional बिक्री to लात बंद the अवकाश खरीदारी ऋतु , समान to मुक्केबाज़ी दिन बिक्री  in many Commonwealth Nations .
Black Friday is not an official public holiday  as ऐसे , लकिन अनेक non-retail कर्मचारी और स्कूलों have दोनो थैंक्सगिविंग और the दिन बाद बंद , followed by a वीकेंड  , thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers .
it रै routinely महरूम the व्यस्ततम खरीदारी दिन of the साल चूंकि 2005  , although news reports , which at that time were inaccurate , have described it as the busiest shopping day of the year for a much longer period of time .
The day 's name originated in Philadelphia ,  जहाँ it originally थी प्रयुक्त to describe the भारी और विघटनकारी पैदल  and vehicle traffic which would occur on the day after Thanksgiving .
Use of the term started before 1961 and began  to देखिए broader उपयोग बाहर फिलाडेल्फिया around  1975 .
Later an  वैकल्पिक स्पष्टीकरण began to be offered : कि  `` Black Friday '' indicates the point at which retailers begin to turn a profit , or are `` '' .
For many years , it was common for retailers  to खोलें at 6:00 a.m. , लकिन in the लेट 2000s अनेक था crept to 5:00 or  even 4:00 .
This was taken to a new extreme in 2011 , when several retailers ( including Target , Kohl 's ,  macy 's , बेहतरीन ख़रीदे , और bealls ) खोली at मध्यरात्रि लिये the  first time .
In 2012 , Walmart and several other retailers announced that they would open most of their stores at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( except in  राज्य जहाँ खोलने on थैंक्सगिविंग is निषिद्ध due to ब्लू कानून , ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स  where they still opened around midnight ) , prompting calls for a walkout among some workers .
Black  शुक्रवार खरीदारी is ज्ञात लिये attracting आक्रामक crowds , साथ सालाना रिपोर्ट्स of assaults , shootings  , and throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the best deal on a product before supplies run out .
The Family That Preys is a 2008 American movie  नाटक लिखा , उत्पादित ,  and directed by Tyler Perry .
The  पटकथा focuses on दो परिवारों , एक धनवान और the अन्य working क्लास  , whose lives are intertwined in both love and business .
The movie is the second of four in  जिससे पेरी 's हस्ताक्षर अक्षर , madea  , does not make an appearance .
It is  भी the दूसरी perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside पापा 's छोटी लड़कियों ) कि  is not based on any of the filmmaker 's stage plays .
Net 10 , Net 15 , Net 30 and Net 60 ( also Net 10 days , et al ) are forms of trade credit which specify that the net amount ( the total outstanding on the invoice ) is expected to be paid in full and  प्राप्त by the विक्रेता भीतर 10 , 15 , 30 or 60 दिनों बाद the goods हैं dispatched or सेवा is  completed .
Net 30 or Net 60 terms are often  coupled साथ a क्रेडिट लिये जल्दी भुगतान  .
The word net in  इस भाव अर्थात् `` कुल बाद सब  discounts . ''
It originally derives from the Latin nitere ( to  चमक ) और nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण , trim ) , और अधिक recently  from the French net ( sharp , neat , clean ) .
roadtown , tortola
The British West Indies were  the आइलैंड्स in और around the caribbean कि यहूद भाग  of the British Empire .
In 1912 , the British West Indies were divided into eight colonies : The Bahamas , Barbados , British Guiana , British Honduras  , जमैका ( साथ इसके dependencies the turks और caicos आइलैंड्स और the केमन आइलैंड्स ) , त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो , the windward  Islands and the Leeward Islands .
Between 1958 and 1962 , all of the island territories except the British Virgin Islands ,  the बहामा , अंग्रेजों होंडुरास और अंग्रेजों guiana यहूद संगठित into the वेस्ट इंडीज  Federation .
It was hoped that the  संघ होता become स्वतंत्र as a सिंगल स्वदेश , लकिन it था  limited powers , many practical problems , and a lack of popular support .
नतीजतन , the वेस्ट इंडीज  Federation was dissolved .
Most of the territories , including all the larger ones , are now independent as separate countries , with membership to many international forums such as the Organization of American States , the  संघ of caribbean राज्य , the संसार व्यापार संगठन , the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , the caribbean जातियाँ , the राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र और the caribbean विकास बैंको among  others .
the शेष हैं अंग्रेजों  overseas territories .
All the former nations of  the अंग्रेजों वेस्ट इंडीज , मगर the राष्ट्रमंडल of डोमिनिकन  , Guyana and Trinidad and Tobago , are Commonwealth Realms .
the पद is स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये अंग्रेजों विदेशी territories  in the Caribbean , such as the Cayman Islands .
The remaining  अंग्रेजों वेस्ट इंडीज
`` What a Wonderful World '' is a  सोंग लिखा by bob thiele ( as `` जार्ज डगलस ''  ) and George David Weiss .
It was first recorded by  लुई आर्मस्ट्रांग और released as a सिंगल  in 1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent in the  म्यूज़िक संसार ( thiele as a निर्माता और वेइस as a composer/performer  ) .
आर्मस्ट्रांग 's रिकॉर्डिंग थी inducted in the  Grammy Hall of Fame in 1999 .
The publishing for this song  is नियंत्रित by मेमोरी लेन म्यूज़िक समूह , कार्लिन  Music Corp. , and Bug Music , Inc .
उद्घाटन दिन 2009 on the वेस्ट कदम of  the U.S. Capitol .
President George W. Bush and  पहला महिला लौरा बुश सीसे the inaugural परेड bas पेन्सिलवेनिया  Avenue to the White House , 2005
The inauguration of the president of the United States is  a ceremonial इवेंट अंकन the शुरुआत of a नई four-year पद of  a president of the United States .
the दिन a अध्यक्षीय उद्घाटन occurs is ज्ञात as `` उद्घाटन  Day '' and occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ) .
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment , the  तिथि थी कूच 4 , the दिन of the साल on जिससे the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य पहला took प्रभाव in 1789 ; the  last inauguration to take place on the older date was Franklin D. Roosevelt 's first one on March 4 , 1933 . )
The most recent public presidential inauguration  रस्म , the swearing in of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा to शुरू उसके दूसरी four-year पद  in office , took place on Monday , January 21 , 2013 .
The only inauguration element mandated by the United States Constitution is that the  अध्यक्ष मेक an शपथ or प्रतिज्ञान पहले कि व्यक्ति can `` डालें  on the Execution '' of the office of the presidency .
however , over the सालो , विभिन्न परंपराओं have arisen कि have विस्तारित the उद्घाटन  from a simple oath-taking ceremony to a day-long event , including parades , speeches , and balls .
From the presidency of Andrew  जैक्सन through कि of jimmy कार्टर , the प्राथमिक उद्घाटन  Day ceremony took place on the Capitol 's East Portico .
Since the  1981 उद्घाटन of रोनाल्ड reagan , the रस्म रै महरूम  held at the Capitol 's West Front .
The inaugurations of William Howard Taft in 1909 and Reagan in  1985 यहूद स्थानांतरित indoors at the कैपिटल due to ठंडा  weather .
The War of 1812 and  संसार युद्ध ii caused दो inaugurations to be आयोजित at  other locations in Washington , D.C .
When George Washington was inaugurated , the  शपथ थी administered by रॉबर्ट livingston , चांसलर of नई यॉर्क राज्य  , in 1789 , and by William Cushing , Associate Justice of the Supreme Court , in 1793 .
Since Chief  इंसाफ ओलिवर एल्सवर्थ swore in अध्यक्ष जॉन एडम्स , no मुख्य  justice has missed an Inauguration Day .
जब उद्घाटन दिन रै गिरे on a संडे , the मुख्य इंसाफ रै administered the शपथ  to the president on the Sunday privately and then again the next day publicly .
When a new president takes over mid-term due to  the मौत or इस्तीफा of a अध्यक्ष , the शपथ of दफ्तर is administered लकिन औपचारिक , पब्लिक उद्घाटन कार्यक्रम have नहीं महरूम  held .
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta ( ; born March 28 , 1986 ) , known by her stage name Lady Gaga , is an American  सिंगर , songwriter , रिकार्ड निर्माता , नर्तकी , activist , businesswoman , फ़ैशन पंक्तियां , अभिनेत्री  and philanthropist .
Born and raised in New York City , she primarily studied at the  कान्वेंट of the पवित्र दिल और briefly attended नई यॉर्क विश्वविद्यालयों 's tisch स्कूल of the कला पहले withdrawing  to focus on her musical career .
She soon began  performing in the चट्टान म्यूज़िक झाँकी of मैनहटन  's Lower East Side .
By the end of 2007 ,  रिकार्ड कार्यपालिका और निर्माता विंसेंट हर्बर्ट हस्ताक्षरित  her to his label Streamline Records , an imprint of Interscope Records .
initially working as a songwriter at interscope रिकॉर्ड , उसके गायन abilities captured the ध्यान of  recording artist Akon , who also signed her to Kon Live Distribution , his own label under Interscope .
Lady Gaga came to prominence as a recording artist  following the रिलीज of उसके डेब्यू एल्बम , the कीर्ति ( 2008 ) , जिससे थी a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी कि अव्वल चार्ट around the संसार  and included the international number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face `` .
After embarking on the The Fame Ball Tour , she followed the album with The Fame  दानव ( 2009 ) , जिससे शाखित the विश्वव्यापी hit singles `` ख़राब रोमांस `` , `` टेलीफोन  `` , and `` Alejandro `` .
The Fame Monsters success allowed her to  embark on the eighteen-month long दानव बॉल दौरे , जिससे बाद became  one of the highest-grossing concert tours of all time .
Her most recent album , Born This Way ( 2011 ) ,  अव्वल the चार्ट of सबसे प्रमुख बाज़ार और उत्पन्न अधिक अंतरराष्ट्रीय chart-topping  singles , including `` Born This Way `` , `` Judas `` , and `` The Edge of Glory `` .
Influenced by  britney स्पीयर्स , दाउद बोवी , माइकल जैक्सन , मैडोना , और महारानी , महिला गागा is पहचाना लिये  her flamboyant , diverse and outré contributions to the music industry through her fashion , performances and music videos .
As of October 2011 , she has  बेची an अनुमानित 23 लाख एल्बम और 64 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी  and her singles are some of the best-selling worldwide .
Her  उपलब्धियाँ शामिल पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  and 13 MTV Video Music Awards .
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in  2010 ) , क्रमित चौथी in vh1 's सूची of 100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक , is the छठे बेहतरीन selling डिजिटल singles कलाकार in us according to riaa , is regularly  placed on lists composed by Forbes magazine and was named one of the most influential people in the world by Time magazine .
Besides her musical career , she involves  herself साथ humanitarian कल्याणकारी और lgbt  activism .
McKethan  स्टेडियम घर of घड़ियाल  baseball
A picture  of the 1924  Baseball team
The Florida Gators baseball  टोली represents the विश्वविद्यालयों of फ्लोरिडा  in the sport of baseball .
The Florida Gators compete in  प्रभाग i of the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक्स संघ ( ncaa )  , and the Eastern Division of the Southeastern Conference ( SEC ) .
They play their home games in Alfred A. McKethan  स्टेडियम on the विश्वविद्यालयों 's gainesville , फ्लोरिडा कैम्पस , और हैं फिलहाल  led by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan .
In the ninety-eight season history of the Gators baseball program , the  टोली रै जीती बारह सेक championships और रै appeared in आठ कॉलेज संसार श्रेणी  tournaments .

A political campaign is an  व्यवस्थित प्रयत्न जिससे seeks to  influence the decision making process within a specific group .
In democracies , political  अभियान प्रायः refer to चुनावी अभियान , wherein प्रतिनिधि  are chosen or referendums are decided .
In modern politics , the most high profile political campaigns are focused on candidates for head of  राज्य or सिर of सरकारी , प्रायः a अध्यक्ष or प्रधान मंत्री  .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton and  उसके बेटी ,  Harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November 12 , 1815 – October 26 , 1902 ) was an  अमरीकी सोशल activist , abolitionist , और अग्रणी  figure of the early women 's rights movement .
Her Declaration of Sentiments ,  प्रस्तुत at the पहला महिलाओं 's अधिकारों सम्मेलन आयोजित in 1848 in seneca जलप्रपात , नई यॉर्क , is प्रायः credited साथ initiating the पहला व्यवस्थित  women 's rights and women 's suffrage movements in the United States .
Before Stanton narrowed her political focus almost exclusively to women 's rights , she  थी an क्रियाशील abolitionist साथ साथ उसके husband ,  Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin , Gerrit Smith .
Unlike many of those involved in the women 's rights movement , Stanton addressed  विभिन्न मुद्दे pertaining to महिलाओं परे मतदान  rights .
Her concerns included women 's parental and  कस्टडी अधिकारों , प्रॉपर्टी अधिकारों , नियुक्ति और आय अधिकारों , तलाक , the आर्थिक स्वास्थ्य  of the family , and birth control .
She was also an  outspoken समर्थक of the 19th-century  temperance movement .
After the American Civil War , Stanton 's commitment to female suffrage caused a schism in the women 's rights movement when she , together  साथ सुसान B. एंथोनी , अस्वीकृत to support ड्योढ़ी of the fourteenth और पंद्रहवीं amendments to the  United States Constitution .
She opposed giving added legal protection and voting  अधिकारों to अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी मेन जबकि महिलाओं , ब्लैक और  white , were denied those same rights .
Her position on this issue , together with her thoughts on organized Christianity and women 's issues beyond voting rights , led to the formation of two  पृथक महिलाओं 's अधिकारों संगठन कि यहूद आखिरकार rejoined , साथ stanton as अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त संगठन , लगभग बीस  years after her break from the original women 's suffrage movement .
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both The Woman 's Bible  और उसके आत्मकथा , साथ साथ अनेक आलेख और pamphlets concerning मादा suffrage और महिलाओं 's  rights .
My Fair Lady is a  musical आधारित upon जार्ज बर्नार्ड शॉ 's pygmalion और साथ किताब  and lyrics by Alan Jay Lerner and music by Frederick Loewe .
The  स्टोरी चिंताएं eliza doolittle , a काकनी पुष्प लड़की जो takes वाक  lessons from professor Henry Higgins , a phoneticist , so that she may pass as a well-born lady .
The musical 's 1956 Broadway production was a hit ,  सेटिंग कया थी तब the रिकार्ड लिये the longest  run of any major musical theatre production in history .
It was  followed by a hit लंदन उत्पादन , a लोकप्रिय  film version , and numerous revivals .
It has been  पुकारा `` the पूर्ण musical  '' .
Deregulation is the  अधिनियम or प्रक्रम of निकालना or  reducing state regulations .
It is therefore opposite of  विनियमन , जिससे refers to the प्रक्रम of the सरकारी regulating  certain activities .
The Boston Bruins Radio Network is a 25-station ( 17  a.M. , 8 f.m . प्लस 2 f.m . अनुवादक ) सीबीएस रेडियो संजाल जिससे carries सजीव खेल  broadcasts of the Boston Bruins .
The network 's flagship station  is wbz-fm /98.5- बोस्टन ,  Massachusetts .
