This article  is परिचय the छोटी  story .
For the poem by Sara Teasdale  , देखिए वहीँ होगा आइये नरम  Rains .
`` There Will Come Soft Rains '' is a short story by science fiction  लेखक रे bradbury जिससे थी पहला प्रकाशित in the may 6 , 1950 समस्या of collier  's .
Later that  वही साल the स्टोरी थी शामिल in bradbury  's The Martian Chronicles ( 1950 ) .
With over 1.2  अरब लोगों , हान चाइनीज is the  largest ethnic group in the world .
Pashtun people of the  pashtunistan प्रदेश , जिससे sits in an क्षेत्रफल between दक्षिण of the हिन्दू  Kush in Afghanistan and the Indus River in Pakistan .
वे क्रमांक around  50 million .
The Korowai people of  पापुआ गिने बस around 3,000 लोगों , और यहूद  uncontacted until the 1970s .
Ethnicity or ethnic group is a  socially पारिभाषित श्रेणी आधारित on आम संस्कृति or राष्ट्रीयता  .
नस्ल can , लकिन करता नहीं have to , शामिल आम ancestry , रूप ,  cuisine , dressing style , heritage , history , language or dialect , religion , symbols , traditions , or other cultural factor .
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through common characteristics which  नियत the समूह अलावा इससे अन्य समूह .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar  संयंत्र in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार और can सप्लाई शक्ति 24 घंटों  a day .
Solar energy ,  रौशन लाइट और ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य , रै  been harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity ,  सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis , जिससे can मेक considerable योगदान  to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly  characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर , बदलें  and distribute solar energy .
Active solar techniques include the use of  photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors  to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials  साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing गुण  , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of  सस्ती , inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term लाभ  .
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous ,  inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन , बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता , reduce  pollution , lower the costs of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
ये लाभ  are global .
Hence the additional costs of  the प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना  investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
The classical Latin alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved  इससे a पश्चिमी किस्में of the यूनानी वर्णमाला पुकारा the cumaean वर्णमाला , जिससे  was adopted and modified by the Etruscans who ruled early Rome .
The  etruscan वर्णमाला थी in फेरे अपनाया और further परिवर्धित  by the ancient Romans to write the Latin language .
During the Middle  आयु , the लैटिन वर्णमाला थी adapted to रोमांस भाषाएं , सीधा  descendants of Latin , as well as to Celtic , Germanic , Baltic , and some Slavic languages .
With the  आयु of उपनिवेशवाद और ईसाई इंजीलवाद , the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट थी  spread overseas , and applied to indigenous American , Australian , Austronesian , Austroasiatic , and African languages .
More recently , linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin script or the International Phonetic  वर्णमाला ( itself largely आधारित on लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट ) जब transcribing or बनाना लिखा  standards for non-European languages , such as the African reference alphabet .
The term Latin alphabet may refer to either the alphabet used to write Latin ( as described in this article  ) , or अन्य alphabets आधारित on the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट , जिससे is the मौलिक नियत of अक्षर आम to the विभिन्न alphabets descended  from the classical Latin one , such as the English alphabet .
ये latin-derived alphabets may छोड़ें अक्षर ,  like the Rotokas alphabet , or add new letters , like the Danish and Norwegian alphabet .
Letter shapes have changed over the centuries , including the creation for  मध्यकालीन लैटिन of निम्नतर मामला फ़ॉर्म जिससे किया नहीं मौजूद in the शास्त्रीय  period .
The  हत्या of संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln took  place on Good Friday , April 14 , 1865 , as the American Civil War was drawing to a close .
The  हत्या occurred पाँच दिनों बाद the कमांडर of the confederate फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया  , General Robert E. Lee , surrendered to Lieutenant General Ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac .
Lincoln was the first American president to be assassinated , though an  unsuccessful attempt था महरूम बना on एंड्रयू जैक्सन 30 सालो पहले in 1835  .
The assassination was planned and carried out by the well-known stage actor John Wilkes Booth , as part of a  larger षड्यंत्र in a बोली to revive the confederate कारण .
Booth 's  co-conspirators यहूद लुईस पावेल और दाउद herold , जो यहूद आबंटित to मार  Secretary of State William H. Seward , and George Atzerodt who was to kill Vice President Andrew Johnson .
By simultaneously eliminating the  शीर्ष तीन लोगों in the प्रशासन , बूथ और उसके co-conspirators hoped to sever  the continuity of the United States government .
Lincoln was shot while watching the play Our American Cousin with his wife Mary  टॉड lincoln at घाट 's थिएटर in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. on the रात्रि of अप्रैल 14 , 1865  .
He died  जल्दी the अगला  morning .
The rest of the  षड्यंत्रकारियों ' प्लाट विफल ; पावेल तभी प्रबंधित to घाव seward , जबकि atzerodt  , Johnson 's would-be assassin , lost his nerve and fled Washington .
Add-on  might mean:
Plug-in ( computing ) , a piece of software  जिससे enhances another तन्त्र अनुप्रयोग और प्रायः can नहीं be  run independently
ब्राउजर एक्सटेंशन  , which modifies the interface and/or behavior of web browsers
Add-on ( Mozilla ) , a piece of software that  enhances और customizes mozilla-based  applications
Add-ons for Firefox  ( addons.mozilla.org ) , the आधिकारिक मोज़िला न्यास वेब  site which serves as a repository of add-ons for Mozilla-based applications
Peripheral , an optional computer hardware  घटक कि significantly पूरक or enhances the कार्यक्षमता  of the original unit
Video game  accessory , a टुकड़ा of हार्डवेयर प्रयुक्त in संयोजन साथ  a video game console for playing video games
Club level seating is a special section  of seating in आधुनिक खेल स्टेडियम  .
The Club Level is usually located towards the middle of  the स्टेज of seating भाग , ऊपर the निम्नतर  deck but below the upper deck .
They are  प्रायः सही अगला to the लक्ज़री बाक्स , either सही ऊपर  , right below , or sandwiched between two levels of Luxury Boxes .
Club Level  seating is माना as उच्चतर क्लास than बैठे anywhere else  in the arena , but lower class compared to the Luxury Boxes .
Unlike the Luxury Boxes , most club levels do not wrap  entirely around the एरिना  .
Some club levels stop at a certain point , giving way to an expansion of the Mezzanine , while  अन्य दे रास्ता to निम्नतर क्लास लक्ज़री बाक्स ( ऐसे as `` पार्टी suites '' )  .
A notable exception to this is Emirates  स्टेडियम in लंदन , जिससे  has a complete tier of club seating .
Club Levels allow  प्रशंसक अनेक स्तर  of entertainment .
Club Level seating is open to the elements , as opposed  to the entirely enclosed लक्ज़री बाक्स , जिससे देता अधिक of an बाहरी छाप at roofless  and open-roof stadiums and arenas .
Club Level seating is  सामान्यतः खरीदा on a अनुबंध आधार to allow लिये अधिकतम लाभ  on the part of the stadium .
The Club Level provides  प्रशंसक साथ खास अभिगम to an अंदर भाग of the एरिना विशेष to प्रशंसक  with special tickets .
These areas are air conditioned and allow access to special  रेस्तरां , merchandise स्टैंड , और लाउंज क्षेत्रों of  the stadium that are not otherwise available .
Concession stands and vendors on the Club Level  भी प्रायः प्रस्ताव अलग मेनू than in अन्य स्टैंड to दे  more of a special feel to the Club .
These areas are closed off to the rest of the stadium  , और वे प्रायः can तभी be पहुँचा  through the exclusive , private club entrances .
Sophia  लोरेन ( ; born सोफिया villani scicolone ; 20  September 1934 ) is an Italian actress .
Loren is widely  पहचाना as इटली 's सबसे  renowned and honored actress .
She was the  पहला अभिनेत्री of the talkie era to जीत an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये a non-english-speaking प्रदर्शन  , for her portrayal of Cesira in Vittorio De Sica 's Two Women .
Her other awards  शामिल a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , पाँच खास  Golden Globes , a BAFTA Award and a Laurel Award .
In 1995 she received the Cecil B. DeMille  पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ , एक of अनेक  such awards .
Her films include : Houseboat ( 1958 ) , El Cid ( 1961 ) , Yesterday , Today and Tomorrow ( 1963  ) , विवाह italian-style ( 1964 ) , और a खास दिन ( 1977 ) .
In later  सालो वो रै appeared in अमरीकी blockbusters  such as Grumpier Old Men ( 1995 ) , and Nine ( 2009 ) .
In 1994 she starred in Robert Altman  's prêt-à-porter , जिससे अर्जित उसके a सुनहरी ग्लोब नामांकन the वही  year .
वो रै भी हासिल नाजुक और  commercial success in TV movies such as Courage ( 1986 ) .
Deaths for self-inflicted injuries  प्रति 100,000 निवासियों in 2004  .
incidence of आत्महत्या is underreported due to दोनो  religious and social pressures , and possibly completely unreported in some areas .
nevertheless , इससे reported मामले ,  certain trends are apparent .
चूंकि the आंकड़ा is skewed , comparing आत्महत्या दरों  between nations is statistically unsound .
The  रुझान themselves हैं नहीं the कारण , लकिन may be  indicative of a root cause .
The Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy for  लड़कियों - दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी is a मादा बोर्डिंग स्कूल संस्थापित  in January 2007 and located in Henley on Klip near Meyerton , south of Johannesburg , South Africa .
The academy was founded by Oprah Winfrey with the goal of providing educational and  नेतृत्व अवसर लिये academically gifted लड़कियों इससे impoverished पृष्ठभूमि  .
ओपरा विनफ्रे नेतृत्व  Academy for Girls
Digicel is a  मोबाईल फोन संजाल प्रदाता ऑपरेटिंग in 31 बाज़ार आरपार the caribbean , सेंट्रल  America , and Oceania regions .
The  कम्पनी is स्वामित्व by  Irishman Denis O'Brien , is incorporated in Bermuda , and based in Jamaica .
It has  परिचय 13 लाख बेतार  users .
As of 2012 , Digicel 's markets comprise : Anguilla , Antigua and Barbuda , Aruba , Barbados , Bermuda , Bonaire , the British Virgin Islands , the Cayman Islands , Curacao , Dominica , El Salvador , Fiji , French Guiana , Grenada , Guadeloupe , Guyana , Haiti , Jamaica , Martinique , Nauru , Panama  , पापुआ नई गिनी , समोआ , संत किट्स और नेविस , संत लूसिया , संत विंसेंट और the grenadines , सूरीनाम  , Tonga , Trinidad & Tobago , Turks and Caicos , and Vanuatu .
इस is a सूची of रिकॉर्ड of the  FIFA World Cup and its qualification matches .
Hospital  आपात कोड हैं प्रयुक्त in अस्पताल विश्वव्यापी  to alert staff to various emergencies .
The use of codes is  intended to convey अनिवार्य सूचना जल्दी और साथ minimal गलतफहमी to स्टाफ , जबकि  preventing stress and panic among visitors to the hospital .
These codes may be posted on placards throughout the  हॉस्पिटल , or मुद्रित on कर्मचारी पहचान बैज  for ready reference .
Back of a hospital ID  बैज प्रर्दशित विपत्ति कोड  .
Hospital emergency codes may denote  अलग कार्यक्रम at अलग अस्पताल , सहित  nearby ones .
Because many physicians work at more than one  सुविधा , इस may सीसे to भ्रम in emergencies , so वर्दी प्रणालियों have  been proposed .
The route of the  eifel जलसेतु , साथ  its average slope .
The  eifel जलसेतु थी  one of the longest aqueducts of the Roman Empire .
The  जलसेतु , constructed in ad 80 , carried जल कुछ इससे the hilly eifel प्रदेश of कया is अभी  Germany to the ancient city of Colonia Claudia Ara Agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ) .
If the  auxiliary स्पर्स to अतिरिक्त  springs are included , the length was .
The construction was almost entirely below  मैदान , और the प्रवाह of the जल थी उत्पादित  entirely by gravity .
A few bridges , including one up  to in लंबाई , यहूद needed to pass over  valleys .
Unlike some of the other famous Roman  aqueducts , the eifel जलसेतु थी specifically designed to  minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing .
In chemistry , a  disulfide बंध ( br.e . disulphide बंध ) is a covalent बंध , प्रायः निकला  by the coupling of two thiol groups .
The linkage is also called an  ss-bond or disulfide सेतु  .
The overall  कनेक्टिविटी is इसलिए r-s-s-r  .
The terminology  is widely प्रयुक्त in  biochemistry .
In formal terms , the connection is a persulfide , in analogy to  इसके congener , परऑक्साइड ( r-o-o-r ) , लकिन इस शब्दावली is अस्पष्ट और is no longer प्रयुक्त ( मगर in सन्दर्भ  to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ) .
Formal depiction  of disulfide बंध गठन  as an oxidation .
Westminster Abbey is used  लिये the राजतिलक of अंग्रेजों  monarchs
Religion in the United Kingdom and in the countries that preceded it , has been dominated , for over 1,400  सालो , by विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of christianity  .
According to some surveys , a majority of citizens still identify with Christianity , although  नियमित गिरिजाघर उपस्थिति रै गिरे dramatically चूंकि the मध्य of the 20th सदी , और आव्रजन और जनसांख्यिकी बदलें have contributed  to the growth of other faiths .
Religious affiliations of  uk नागरिकों हैं अंकित by नियमित सर्वेक्षण , the चार प्रमुख ones होने  the UK Census , the Labour Force Survey , the British Social Attitudes survey and the European Social Survey .
according to the 2001 uk जनसांख्यिकी , christianity is the प्रमुख धर्म , followed by islam  , Hinduism , Sikhism , Judaism and Buddhism in terms of number of adherents .
इस , और the अपेक्षाकृत विशाल क्रमांक of individuals साथ नाममात्र or no धार्मिक  affiliations has led commentators to variously describe the United Kingdom as a multi-faith , secularised , or post-Christian society .
The United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously  स्वतंत्र देशों इससे 1707 , और नतीजतन सबसे of the largest  religious groups do not have UK-wide organisational structures .
While some groups have separate structures for the  व्यक्तिगत देशों of the संयुक्त किंगडम , अन्य may have a सिंगल ढांचा  covering England and Wales or Great Britain .
Similarly , due to the relatively recent creation of Northern Ireland  in 1921 , सबसे प्रमुख धार्मिक समूह in उत्तरी आयरलैंड  are organised on an all-Ireland basis .
The 1967 Newark riots were a major civil disturbance that occurred in the city of  न्यूर्क , नई जर्सी between जुलाई 12 और जुलाई 17 , 1967  .
The six days of rioting , looting , and destruction  बाएँ 26 मुर्दे और सैंकड़ों घायल  .
In  संयुक्त राज्य कॉलेज एथलेटिक्स , redshirt is a विलंब or बर्खास्तगी  of an athlete 's participation in order to lengthen his or her period of eligibility .
Typically , a student 's athletic eligibility in a given sport is four seasons , a number  निकला इससे the चार सालो of अकादमिक वर्ग कि हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी to obtain a स्नातक 's उपाधि at an अमरीकी कॉलेज or  university .
However , a student athlete may be offered the opportunity to redshirt for up to  दो सालो , जिससे allows the खिलाड़ी to स्प्रेड those चार सालो of पात्रता over पाँच , or  sometimes six years .
In a redshirt year , a  छात्र खिलाड़ी may attend वर्ग at the कॉलेज or विश्वविद्यालयों , अभ्यास साथ an एथलेटिक टोली , और  dress for play but he or she may not compete during the game .
Using this mechanism , a student athlete has up to five academic years to use  the चार सालो of पात्रता , यूँ बनने  a fifth-year senior .
The term is used as  a क्रिया , संज्ञा , और क्रियाशील  .
For example , a coach may choose to  redshirt a खिलाड़ी जो is तब referred to as a redshirt freshman or बस a  redshirt .
The  विपरीत of इस is  a `` true freshman . ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a  वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted  until 11 November 1918 .
It was  predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence  until the start of World War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
it शामिल सब the संसार 's ग्रेट शक्तियां , जिससे यहूद समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente  of the United Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
ये alliances यहूद दोनो reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र  entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel , including 60 million  europeans , यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in  history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of  technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित  improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving  the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन  , such as revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of  साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of यूरोपीय  .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the  सिंहासन of austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट  when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances  formed over the  previous decades were invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers were  at युद्ध और , via उनके colonies , the विरोध  soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as  तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण  of Serbia .
While the Russians  mobilised , the germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस  , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western  सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला छोटी जबतक  1917 .
On the Eastern Front  , the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians , लकिन थी  stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman  साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध , खोलने  up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 और  Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government  collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the सेंट्रल  Powers .
After a  1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove  back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany  , जिससे था इसके अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत  to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
the युद्ध ended in  victory for the Allies .
Events on the home  fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts , as the भागीदार  tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German , Russian ,  austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased  to exist .
The successor states of the  पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory ,  while the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of central  यूरोपीय थी redrawn into  several smaller states .
The League of Nations was formed in the  आशा of preventing another ऐसे विरोध .
The  यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires , the परखना of जर्मनी  's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
Map of countries that declared themselves to be socialist states under the Marxist–Leninist or  माओवादी परिभाषा - कि is to कह , `` कम्युनिस्ट राज्य '' - between  1979 and 1983 .
This period  चिह्नित the महानतम territorial extent  of Communist states .
A communist state is a state where the means  of उत्पादन हैं collectively स्वामित्व by the समाज  .
It has a form of government characterized by single-party rule or dominant-party rule of a communist party ( referred as Dictatorship of the  proletariat by इसके proponents ) और a professed निष्ठा to a leninist or marxist–leninist विचारधारा  as the guiding principle of the state .
Technically , ``  कम्युनिस्ट राज्य '' is a contradictio in terminis as a कम्युनिस्ट समाज as पारिभाषित  by both Marxists and anarcho-communists is in principle stateless .
From  इस परिप्रेक्ष्य , the पद marxist-leninist  state is more appropriate .
Historically , a `` communist state '' referred to a  प्रणाली जहाँ पब्लिक स्वामित्व of सब or सबसे अर्थात् of उत्पादन by the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी -run राज्य is deemed जरुरी to further the रूचि of the working क्लास  ; today , a communist state can also , for instance , refer to contemporary China and Vietnam , where a Communist Party-run state exists alongside a mixed economy .
According to Marxist–Leninists , the state is a tool in the hands of the ruling class , which in a  समाजवादी समाज is the working क्लास , so a समाजवादी राज्य is , according  to Leninists , a state of the working class .
In practice , communist states  do नहीं दरअसल refer to themselves  as such .
They do this not to disguise the fact that  the सत्ताधारी पार्टी is कम्युनिस्ट , लकिन बल्कि क्युकी वे do नहीं consider themselves to be a कम्युनिस्ट समाज  at present .
Instead , they constitutionally identify  themselves as समाजवादी राज्य  or workers ' states .
The primary goal of these states , which also explains their official name , is to guide their respective  देशों in the प्रक्रम of भवन समाजवादी , ultimately अग्रणी to साम्यवादी  .
Communist states may have several legal political parties , but the communist party is usually granted a  खास or प्रबल भूमिका in सरकारी , प्रायः by statute or अंतर्गत the  constitution .
Consequently , the institutions of the state  और of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी become intimately entwined , ऐसे as in the  development of parallel institutions .
In the 20th century , most communist  राज्य अपनाया नियोजित  economies .
However , there were exceptions : The Soviet Union during the 1920s and late 1980s and  यूगोस्लाविया बाद संसार युद्ध ii अनुमत सीमित बाज़ार और a उपाधि of कार्यकर्ता self-management , जबकि चीन , वियतनाम और लाओस introduced far-reaching  market reforms after the 1980s .
In the 21st century , China  और वियतनाम have अनुमत a मिश्रित अर्थव्यवस्था  to develop .
The fundamental concepts of  कम्युनिस्ट राज्य प्रायः diverge इससे the असली socio-economic विचारधाराओं  from which they develop .
As a result , many  adherents of ये विचारधाराओं प्रायः oppose the राजनैतिक प्रणालियों  commonly associated with these states .
For  उदाहरण , dissenting साम्यवादियों ऐसे as trotskyists यहूद प्रायः opposed to the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य of the 20th सदी , claiming either  that they had nothing to do with `` real '' communism or that the ideology of such states had reached a point of irrevocable corruption .
Michael  फ्रेड फेल्प्स ii ( born जून 30 , 1985 ) is  a retired American swimmer and the most decorated Olympian of all time , with a total of 22 medals .
Phelps also holds the  all-time रिकॉर्ड लिये ओलम्पिक सुनहरा medals ( 18 , दोगुना the दूसरी उच्चतम रिकार्ड धारकों ) , ओलम्पिक सुनहरा medals in व्यक्तिगत  events ( 11 ) , and Olympic medals in individual events for a male ( 13 ) .
In winning eight gold medals at the 2008 Beijing Games , Phelps took  the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे first-place finishes at कोई सिंगल  Olympic Games .
Five of those victories were in individual  कार्यक्रम , tying the सिंगल खेल रिकार्ड  .
In  the 2012 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in लंदन , फेल्प्स जीती चार golds और दो चांदी medals ,  making him the most successful athlete of the Games for the third Olympics in a row .
Phelps is the long course world recordholder in the  100-meter तितली , 200-meter तितली और 400-meter व्यक्तिगत medley as खूब as the पूर्व long कोर्स संसार recordholder  in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter individual medley .
He has won a total of 71 medals in major  अंतरराष्ट्रीय long-course प्रतियोगिता , 57 सुनहरा , 11 चांदी , और तीन कांस्य spanning the ओलंपिक  , the World , and the Pan Pacific Championships .
Phelps 's international titles and record-breaking  प्रदर्शन have अर्जित उसे the संसार तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार सात टाइम्स और अमरीकी तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार  nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012 .
His unprecedented  ओलम्पिक कामयाबी in 2008 अर्जित फेल्प्स  Sports Illustrated magazine 's Sportsman of the Year award .
After the 2008 Summer  ओलंपिक , फेल्प्स प्रारंभ the माइकल फेल्प्स न्यास , जिससे focuses  on growing the sport of swimming and promoting healthier lifestyles .
He expects to do further work with his foundation after the 2012  ओलंपिक , जिससे he रै कहा होगा  be his last .
Lenovo Group Limited ( )  is a चाइनीज बहुराष्ट्रीय कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कम्पनी साथ इसके  headquarters in Beijing , China and Morrisville , North Carolina and its registered office in Hong Kong , China .
Its products include  निजी कंप्यूटर , टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर , मोबाईल फोन , workstations , सर्वर ,  electronic storage devices , IT management software and smart televisions .
Lenovo is the  संसार 's second-largest pc  vendor by 2012 unit sales .
It markets the ThinkPad  लकीर of कोपी कंप्यूटर और the thinkcentre  line of desktops .
लेनोवो रै परिचालन in अधिक than 60 देशों  and sells its products in around 160 countries .
Lenovo was founded in  बीजिंग in 1984 और incorporated in हांग काँग  in 1988 under its previous name , Legend .
Lenovo is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and is a  constituent of the हैंग सेंग china-affiliated corporations  Index .
Slug is a common name for an  जाहिर shell-less स्थलीय  gastropod mollusk .
The word `` slug '' is also often used as part of the common name of any  gastropod mollusc कि रै no शेल , रै a बहुत घटाया शेल , or रै तभी a छोटी आतंरिक  shell .
( This is in contrast to the common name `` snail `` ,  जिससे is लागू to gastropods कि have a नतीजे शेल कि is विशाल पर्याप्त कि the नरम भाग of the  animal can retract fully into it . )
Slugs exist on land and in the sea , and there is  भी एक genus of freshwater slugs , acochlidium .
The unadorned word `` slug '' is  however लागू primarily to जमीन slugs , whereas slugs इससे the समुद्र or इससे freshwater  are usually referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs '' .
Land gastropods with a shell that is not  काफी vestigial , लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( जैसे अनेक in the परिवार  Urocyclidae ) , are known as semislugs .
The various taxonomic families of slugs form  भाग of अनेक काफी अलग विकासवादी lineages जिससे भी  include snails .
Thus , for example , the various families of land slugs are not very  closely सम्बन्धित to एक another , despite a सतही समानता in  the overall body form .
The  shell-less कंडीशन रै arisen अनेक टाइम्स independently दौरान the विकासवादी  past , and thus the category `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one .
Slugs , like all other gastropods , undergo torsion ( a 180° twisting  of the आतंरिक अंगों ) दौरान विकास  .
Internally , slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of this rotation , but externally the bodies of land  slugs appear to be अधिक or कम सममित , मगर लिये the positioning of the pneumostome , जिससे is on एक पक्ष of the एनिमल , सामान्यतः  the right hand side .
The soft , slimy bodies of slugs are prone to desiccation , so land-living  slugs हैं confined to नम environments और जरूर रिट्रीट to नम  hiding places when the weather is dry .
The subsequent information in  इस आलेख applies to जमीन  slugs .
is a Latin word that  अर्थात् `` यूँ '' or , in लिखने , `` it थी यूँ in  the source material '' .
Sic  may भी refer  to:
Sic  , cluj , a कम्यून  in Romania
sic , the क्षेत्रीय  code for Sicily
Sic (  रव कलाकार ) , styled as [ sic ] , स्टेज नाम of जेनिफर  Morris , a Canadian noise artist
Sic ( band ) is a  आधुनिक hardcore/thrash मेटल बैंड इससे torshavn , the पूंजी  of the Faroe Islands
`` ( sic )  '' , a सोंग by अमरीकी बैंड slipknot  on the album Slipknot
SIC , the initial of  मार्को simoncelli  .
SIC as an  एक्रोनिम may स्टैंड  for:
sic , सिलिकॉन कार्बाइड , a semiconducting  material , also used to make metalworking tools
SIC ( cyclecar )  ( società इटालियाना cyclecars  )
Standard Industrial Classification ,  a 20th-century u.S. प्रणाली लिये classifying  industries
अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानक औद्योगिक वर्गीकरण  a UN system for economic activities
Shetland  आइलैंड्स परिषद
the Swiss  interbank clearing  system
सैन isidro क्लबों  , an Argentine rugby union club
Standing Interpretation Committee , a committee dedicated to the  निर्वचन of अंतरराष्ट्रीय हिसाब मानकों  IFRS
schwarz सूचना मानदंड  in the field of statistics
second-in-command in the फ़ील्ड of  aviation
Sistema  interconectado सेंट्रल शक्ति ग्रिड  in Chile
Sociedade  independente de comunicação ( sic ) , a टेलीविज़न  channel in Portugal
Sea Isle City , New Jersey , a  तटीय कस्बा in the संयुक्त राज्य
Segmented Integer  काउंटर विधि , a विधि of आपरेशन  in cryptography
Sepang International  सर्किट , a high-end racetrack कि होस्ट the  Malaysian round of Formula 1
शंघाई अंतरराष्ट्रीय सर्किट  , a motor racing venue in Shanghai , China
Simplified  निर्देशात्मक कंप्यूटर , a काल्पनिक  computer used in systems programming
SIC ( Sons Idées Couleurs ) , an early  twentieth-century आर्ट पत्रिका उत्पादित by फ्रेंच  author Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College , a two year Junior College in  harrisburg , इलिनोइस , संयुक्त राज्य
Specific inductive capacity , abbreviated to SIC , which is more  commonly ज्ञात as the सापेक्ष विद्युतशीलता or the परावैद्युत  constant
St Ignatius ' College ,  riverview , a जेसुइट स्कूल in सिडनी ,  Australia
इम्पीरियल मानक of नेपोलियन  I
Napoleon  बोनापार्ट ( , ; 15 अगस्त 1769 – 5 may 1821 ) थी a फ्रेंच सैन्य और राजनैतिक नेता  who rose to prominence during the latter stages of the French Revolution and its associated wars in Europe .
As Napoleon I , he was  सम्राट of the फ्रेंच इससे 1804 to 1815  .
His legal reform , the Napoleonic Code , has been a  प्रमुख influence on अनेक सिविल विधि jurisdictions विश्वव्यापी , लकिन he is बेहतरीन remembered लिये उसके भूमिका in the युद्धों led विरूद्ध  France by a series of coalitions , the so-called Napoleonic Wars .
He  स्थापित आधिपत्य over सबसे of महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय और sought to स्प्रेड the आदर्शों of the फ्रेंच  Revolution , while consolidating an imperial monarchy which restored aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime .
Due to his success in these wars , often against  numerically श्रेष्ठ दुश्मनों , he is generally regarded as एक of the महानतम सैन्य  commanders of all time , and his campaigns are studied at military academies worldwide .
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of  प्रतिष्ठित इतालवी ancestry जिससे था  settled Corsica in the 16th century .
He trained as  an तोपखाने अधिकारी in मेनलैंड  France .
He rose to prominence under the French First  गणतंत्र और led कामयाब अभियान विरूद्ध the  First and Second Coalitions arrayed against France .
He led a successful  आक्रमण of the इतालवी  peninsula .
In 1799 , he staged a coup d'état and installed himself as First Consul ; five years later  the फ्रेंच सीनेट proclaimed उसे सम्राट , following a plebiscite in उसके  favour .
In the first decade of the 19th century , the French Empire under Napoleon engaged in a  श्रेणी of conflicts—the napoleonic युद्धों —that शामिल प्रत्येक प्रमुख  European power .
After a streak of victories , France secured a dominant position in continental Europe , and Napoleon maintained the French sphere of influence through the formation of  extensive alliances और the नियुक्ति of मित्रों और परिवार सदस्यों to नियम अन्य यूरोपीय देशों  as French client states .
The Peninsular War and 1812 French  आक्रमण of रूस चिह्नित turning अंक in नेपोलियन  's fortunes .
His Grande  armée थी badly क्षतिग्रस्त in the अभियान और never  fully recovered .
In 1813 , the  छठे गठबन्धन पराजित उसके शक्तियां at लिपजिग ; the following साल the  Coalition invaded France , forced Napoleon to abdicate and exiled him to the island of Elba .
Less than a year later , he escaped Elba and returned to power , but  थी पराजित at the बैटल of वाटरलू  in June 1815 .
नेपोलियन खर्च the पिछला छह सालो of उसके जीवन  in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena .
An autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer , but there has been some debate  परिचय the कारण of उसके मौत , as कुछ विद्वानों have speculated कि he थी a शिकार  of arsenic poisoning .
This is a  कालानुक्रमिक लिस्टिंग of the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों  from Pennsylvania .
संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों हैं popularly निर्वाचित  , for a six-year term , beginning January 3 .
Elections are  आयोजित the पहला मंगलवार बाद  November 1 .
Before 1914 , they were chosen by the  पेन्सिलवेनिया सामान्य सभा , और पहले 1935 , उनके  terms began March 4 .
The South  अफ़्रीकी नेशनल रग्बी संघ टोली ( ज्ञात as the springboks ) represents  South Africa in rugby union .
They  compete in the सालाना रग्बी चैंपियनशिप , साथ  with southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina , Australia and New Zealand .
They have won this championship on three  अवसरों in सोलह  years .
They are currently ranked second in the world  by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी फलक , और यहूद नामित 2008 संसार टोली of the साल at  the Laureus World Sports Awards .
Although South Africa was instrumental in the creation of the Rugby World Cup competition , the Springboks did  नहीं compete in the पहला दो संसार cups in 1987 और 1991 क्युकी of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of दक्षिण  Africa .
The team made its World Cup debut  in 1995 , जब the newly लोकतांत्रिक दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी  hosted the tournament .
The Springboks then  पराजित the सब अश्वेतों 15–12 in the फाइनल , जिससे is अभी remembered as एक of the महानतम पल in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's sporting  history , and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process .
South  अफ़्रीकी regained उनके शीर्षक as champions 12 सालो  later , when they defeated England 15–6 in the 2007 final .
As a result of the 2007 World Cup tournament the Springboks were promoted to  पहला प्लेस in the आईआरबी संसार rankings , a स्थिति वे आयोजित जबतक  July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot .
The Springboks play in green and gold  jerseys , और उनके प्रतीक हैं the springbok  and the Protea .
The side  रै महरूम playing अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी चूंकि 1891 , जब a अंग्रेजों  Isles side toured the nation , playing South Africa in their first Test on 30 July .
South Africa was coached by Jake White  , जो led the boks to the 2007 संसार कप शीर्षक  , announcing his resignation effectively from the end of 2007 .
His replacement 's ( Peter de  villiers ) अनुबंध समाप्त in 2011 , following a 11–9 शिकस्त to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the रग्बी संसार  Cup quarter-final , who then stated he would not be signing a new deal .
The previous captain was John Smit , who before he  रिटायर्ड in 2011 निभाई वेश्या लिये सबसे of उसके करियर , हालांकि  he has also been a prop , mainly in 2008 and 2009 .
Due to Smit being  अनुपलब्ध लिये the नवम्बर 2010 परीक्षण बाद सर्जरी , ताला विक्टर matfield took  Smit 's place as captain for that tour .
The current  कप्तान is जां de  Villiers .
The  बैटल of gettysburg ( , साथ an ध्वनि  ) , was fought July 1–3 , 1863 , in and around the town of Gettysburg , Pennsylvania .
It was the battle with the  largest क्रमांक of हताहत in the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और is प्रायः वर्णित  as the war 's turning point .
Union Maj. Gen. George Gordon Meade 's Army of the Potomac defeated  हमले by confederate gen. रॉबर्ट E. ली 's फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया , समाप्ति ली 's आक्रमण  of the North .
After his success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in May  1863 , ली led उसके फौज through the shenandoah घाटी to शुरू उसके दूसरी  invasion of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign .
With his army in high spirits , Lee intended to shift the focus of the summer campaign from war-ravaged northern Virginia  और hoped to influence उत्तरी राजनेता to दे up उनके अभियोजन of the युद्ध  by penetrating as far as Harrisburg , Pennsylvania , or even Philadelphia .
Prodded by President Abraham Lincoln , Maj. Gen. Joseph Hooker moved his  फौज in pursuit , लकिन थी सुकून बस तीन दिनों पहले the बैटल और  replaced by Meade .
Elements of the two armies initially collided at Gettysburg on July 1 , 1863 , as Lee urgently concentrated his forces there , his  उद्देश्य होने to engage the संघ फौज और नष्ट it .
Low ridges to  the उत्तरपश्चिम of कस्बा यहूद defended initially by a संघ प्यादे प्रभाग अंतर्गत  Brig . Gen. John Buford , and soon reinforced with two corps of Union infantry .
However , two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the  उत्तरपश्चिम और उत्तर , collapsing the hastily विकसित संघ लाइनों , sending the defenders  retreating through the streets of town to the hills just to the south .
on the दूसरी दिन of बैटल , सबसे of दोनो  armies had assembled .
the संघ लकीर थी रखी आउट  in a defensive formation resembling a fishhook .
In the late afternoon of July 2 , Lee launched a heavy assault on the Union left flank  , और fierce लड़ raged at छोटी गोलाकार शीर्ष , the wheatfield , शैतान 's डेन  , and the Peach Orchard .
On the Union right , demonstrations  escalated into full-scale assaults on culp 's हिल और  Cemetery Hill .
All across  the रणभूमि , despite  significant losses , the Union defenders held their lines .
On the third  दिन of बैटल , जुलाई 3 , लड़ resumed on culp 's हिल , और प्यादे लड़ाइयों raged to the ईस्ट  and south , but the main event was a dramatic infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates against the center of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge , known as Pickett 's Charge .
The charge was repulsed by  संघ राइफल और तोपखाने आग , at ग्रेट  losses to the Confederate army .
Lee led his  फौज on a torturous रिट्रीट  back to Virginia .
Between 46,000 and 51,000  सैनिको इससे दोनो सेना  were casualties in the three-day battle .
That November , President Lincoln used the  समर्पण रस्म लिये the gettysburg नेशनल कब्रिस्तान to सम्मान the गिरे  Union soldiers and redefine the purpose of the war in his historic Gettysburg Address .
An academic discipline , or field of study , is  a शाखा of ज्ञान कि is सिखाया और शोधकार्य at the कॉलेज  or university level .
Disciplines are defined ( in part ) ,  और पहचाना by the अकादमिक जर्नल्स in जिससे शोध  is published , and the learned societies and academic departments or faculties to which their practitioners belong .
However , there exists no formal  मापदण्ड लिये जब शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम और scholarly  journals form an academic discipline .
A huge difference exists between , on the one hand , well established disciplines that exist in almost all universities all over the world ,  have a long इतिहास , और have a खूब स्थापित नियत of जर्नल्स और सम्मेलनों , और , on the अन्य हाथ , सुझाव लिये नई फ़ील्ड समर्थित तभी by few विश्वविद्यालयों  and publications .
Fields of study usually have several  sub-disciplines or शाखाओं , और the distinguishing लाइनों between ये हैं प्रायः दोनो मनमानी  and ambiguous .
PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but  भी प्रयुक्त as a general-purpose प्रोग्रामिंग  language .
PHP is now installed on more  than 244 लाख वेबसाइटों और 2.1 लाख  web servers .
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995 , the reference  क्रियान्वयन of पीएचपी is अभी उत्पादित by the  PHP Group .
While PHP originally stood for  निजी घर पेज , it अभी स्टैंड लिये पीएचपी :  Hypertext Preprocessor , a recursive acronym .
PHP  कोड is interpreted by a वेब सर्वर साथ a पीएचपी प्रोसेसर मोड्यूल जिससे generates the  resulting web page : PHP commands can be embedded directly into an HTML source document rather than calling an external file to process data .
It has also evolved to include a  command-line इंटरफ़ेस काबिलियत और can be प्रयुक्त in स्टैंडअलोन  graphical applications .
PHP is free  तन्त्र released अंतर्गत the पीएचपी अनुज्ञा , जिससे is असंगत साथ the  GNU General Public License ( GPL ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP .
PHP can be deployed on most web servers and also as a  स्टैंडअलोन शेल on लगभग प्रत्येक ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली और मंच , फ़्री  of charge .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May  29 , 1917 – नवम्बर 22 , 1963 ) , प्रायः referred to by  his initials JFK , was the 35th President of the United States , serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service as commander of the Motor  torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत , कैनेडी  represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter ,  he परोसा in the u.S. सीनेट इससे 1953  until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican  प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड निक्सन in the 1960 u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव  .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to  have महरूम निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर , the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर  Roosevelt ) , and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only  non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष , और is the तभी अध्यक्ष  to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion , the Cuban Missile Crisis , the building of the Berlin Wall , the Space Race , the  african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति , और जल्दी चरण of the वियतनाम युद्ध  .
Therein , Kennedy increased the number of  सैन्य advisers , खास आपरेशन शक्तियां , और helicopters  in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
the कैनेडी प्रशासन अपनाया the नीति of the रणनीतिक  Hamlet Program which was implemented by the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain forced relocation , village internment  , और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the उत्तरी और दक्षिणी कम्युनिस्ट  insurgents .
Kennedy was  assassinated on नवम्बर 22 , 1963 in  Dallas , Texas .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime , but he was shot and killed  by जोकर माणिक्य दो दिनों बाद , पहले a विचारण  could take place .
The FBI and the  वारेन आयोग officially concluded कि ओसवाल्ड  was the lone assassin .
However , the United States  हाउस चुनें कमेटी on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded कि those investigations यहूद  flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
However , ABC News in their investigation ,  the कैनेडी हत्या : परे षड्यंत्र , पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों  of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense  tfx सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional छानबीन कि lasted  from 1963 to 1970 .
Since the 1960s  सूचना concerning कैनेडी 's  private life has come to light .
Details of Kennedy 's health  समस्याएं in जिससे he struggled have become  better known , especially since the 1990s .
Although initially kept secret from  the सामान्य पब्लिक , रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's  philandering have garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks highly in public  राय दरजा of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों  .
`` Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed by Ben E. King and written by King ,  जेरी leiber , और माइक stoller , प्रेरित by the आध्यात्मिक `` रब स्टैंड by me , '' प्लस  two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3 .
There have been  over 400 अंकित संस्करण  of the song .
A political cartoon  इससे an 1894 पक पत्रिका by इलस्ट्रेटर s.d . ehrhart , shows a फार्म स्त्री  labeled `` Democratic Party '' sheltering from a tornado of political change .
A metaphor is a figure of speech that describes a subject by  asserting कि it is , on कुछ पाइंट of तुलना , the वही as  another otherwise unrelated object .
Metaphor is a type of  सादृश्य और is closely सम्बन्धित to अन्य rhetorical आंकड़े of वाक  that achieve their effects via association , comparison or resemblance including allegory , hyperbole , and simile .
In simpler terms ,  a रूपक compares दो वस्तुएँ or बाते  without using the words `` like '' or `` as '' .
One of the most prominent examples  of a रूपक in अंग्रेज़ी साहित्य is  the All the world 's a stage monologue from As You Like It :
All the  संसार 's a स्टैगe,
And all the men and  महिलाओं merely खिलाड़ी ;
They  have उनके exits और उनके entrances ; — विलियम शेक्सपियर  , As You Like It , 2/7
इस उद्धरण is a रूपक  because the world is not literally a stage .
By figuratively asserting that the world is a stage , Shakespeare uses the points of comparison between the  संसार और a स्टेज to convey an समझना परिचय the यांत्रिकी of the संसार और the जीवनदान of the लोगों  within it .
माउंट फुजी , इससे the thirty-six दृश्य of माउंट फुजी , रंग  woodcut by Katsushika Hokusai
rembrandt वैन rijn  , Self-portrait , etching , c.1630
Francisco Goya , There  is no एक to सहायता उन्हें , आपदाओं  of War series , aquatint c.1810
फेलिक्स vallotton , la raison probante ( the cogent कारण  ) , woodcut from the series Intimités , 1898
Printmaking is the process of making  artworks by मुद्रण , सामान्यतः on पेपर .
Printmaking normally covers only the  प्रक्रम of बनाना prints साथ an तत्व of मौलिकता , बल्कि than  just being a photographic reproduction of a painting .
Except in the case of monotyping , the process  is सक्षम of producing multiples of the वही टुकड़ा , जिससे is पुकारा a  print .
Each print produced is  नहीं माना a `` नक़ल '' लकिन बल्कि is माना  an `` original '' .
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking process , and also because the  imagery of a छपाई is typically नहीं बस a जनन of another कार्य लकिन बल्कि is प्रायः a अद्वितीय चित्र designed इससे the प्रारंभ to be expressed in a particular  printmaking technique .
A print may be  ज्ञात as  an impression .
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not chosen only for its ability to produce multiple impressions , but  बल्कि लिये the अद्वितीय qualities कि प्रत्येक of the printmaking प्रक्रियाओं lends itself to .
Prints are created by transferring  स्याही इससे a मेट्रिक्स or through a prepared  screen to a sheet of paper or other material .
Common types of matrices include :  मेटल प्लेटों , प्रायः तांबे or जस्ता , or पॉलिमर प्लेटों लिये नक्काशी or etching ; स्टोन , एल्यूमिनियम ,  or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts .
Screens made of  रेशा or सिंथेटिक fabrics हैं प्रयुक्त  for the screenprinting process .
Other types of  मेट्रिक्स substrates और सम्बन्धित प्रक्रियाओं हैं discussed  below .
अनेक impressions मुद्रित इससे the  same matrix form an edition .
Since the late 19th century , artists have generally signed  व्यक्तिगत impressions इससे an संस्करण और प्रायः क्रमांक the impressions to रूप a  limited edition .
Prints  may भी be मुद्रित in किताब रूप ,  such as illustrated books or artist 's books .
Il Divo is an English multinational  operatic पॉप गायन समूह निर्मित by म्यूज़िक  manager , executive , and reality TV star Simon Cowell .
Formed in the  संयुक्त किंगडम , वे हैं भी हस्ताक्षरित  to Cowell 's record label , Syco Music .
Il Divo is a group of four male singers : French pop singer  सेबेस्तियन izambard , स्पेनी baritone कार्लोस marín , अमरीकी टेनर दाउद मिलर , और स्विस  tenor Urs Bühler .
To date , they have sold  अधिक than 26 लाख एल्बम  worldwide .
Su-15 , one of the  प्रिंसिपल सोवियत एयर रक्षा  interceptors in the 1970s and 1980s
An  interceptor वायुयान ( or बस interceptor ) is a प्रकार of सेनानी वायुयान designed specifically to prevent  missions of enemy aircraft , particularly bombers and reconnaissance aircraft , and destroy them , relying usually on great speed and powerful armament .
Being used since the First World War , after the late 1960s , interceptors became less important due to shifting  इससे बमवर्षक to इंटरकांटिनेंटल बैलिस्टिक  missiles ( ICBMs ) for nuclear warfare .
A Vietnamese American (  ) is an अमरीकी of वियतनामी  descent .
They make up  परिचय हाफ of सब विदेशी वियतनामी ( người việt hải  Ngoại ) and are the fourth-largest Asian American group .
Mass Vietnamese  आव्रजन to the संयुक्त राज्य प्रारंभ बाद 1975  , after the end of the Vietnam War .
Early immigrants  यहूद शरणार्थी नाव लोगों fleeing  persecution or poverty .
मजबूर to भागो इससे उनके मातृभूमि और प्रायः thrust into ग़रीब शहरी पड़ोस  , these newcomers have nevertheless managed to establish strong communities in a short amount of time .
More than sixty percent of Vietnamese Americans reside  in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , टेक्सास , वॉशिंगटन , फ्लोरिडा  , and Virginia .
Front page of the U.S.  हथियारबंद शक्तियां समाचारपत्र , सितारों  and Stripes , 2 May 1945
Adolf Hitler  वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या by gunshot on 30 अप्रैल 1945  in his Führerbunker in Berlin .
His wife Eva ( née Braun )  वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या साथ उसे  by ingesting cyanide .
That afternoon , in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions , their remains were carried up  the सीढ़ियाँ through the बंकर 's आपात निकास , doused in पेट्रोल और नियत alight in the reich  Chancellery garden outside the bunker .
The Soviet archives record that their burnt remains were  बरामद और interred in successive स्थितियाँ जबतक 1970  when they were again exhumed , cremated and the ashes scattered .
Accounts differ as to the cause of death ; one that he died by poison  तभी और another कि he died by a self-inflicted gunshot , जबकि  biting down on a cyanide capsule .
समकालीन इतिहासकारों have अस्वीकृत ये खाते as होने either  Soviet propaganda or an attempted compromise in order to reconcile the different conclusions .
One eye-witness  अंकित कि the देह दिखाया लक्षण of having  been shot through the mouth , but this has been proven unlikely .
There is also  विवाद regarding  the authenticity of skull and jaw fragments which were recovered .
In  2009 , डीएनए परीक्षण यहूद performed on  a skull Soviet officials had long believed to be Hitler 's .
The tests revealed that the skull  थी दरअसल कि of a स्त्री कम than  40 years old .
स्थान of मिसौरी
The alcohol laws of Missouri are among the least restrictive and  सबसे lax और permissive in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Missouri is  ज्ञात throughout the मिडवेस्ट लिये इसके largely laissez-faire दृष्टिकोण to दारू विनियमन , in शार्प कंट्रास्ट to the  very strict alcohol laws of some of its neighbors , like Kansas and Oklahoma .
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF , commonly  ज्ञात as flesh-eating बीमारी or flesh-eating  bacteria syndrome , is a rare infection of the deeper layers of skin and subcutaneous tissues , easily spreading across the fascial plane within the subcutaneous tissue .
Necrotizing fasciitis is quickly  progressing , having वृहद रिस्क of विकासशील in the immunocompromised  due to conditions like diabetes , cancer , etc .
It is a severe disease of sudden onset and is usually  treated तत्काल साथ ऊँची doses of intravenous एंटीबायोटिक  .
Type I describes a  polymicrobial संक्रमण , whereas प्रकार ii describes a  monomicrobial infection .
Many types of bacteria can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g. , Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ) , Staphylococcus aureus , Clostridium  perfringens , bacteroides fragilis , aeromonas  hydrophila ) .
Such infections are more likely to  occur in लोगों साथ compromised  immune systems .
Historically ,  समूह a streptococcus बना up  most cases of Type II infections .
However , since as early as 2001 , another serious form of  monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis रै महरूम observed साथ increasing आवृत्ति  , caused by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ) .
Some published case reports have implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal  anti-inflammatory दवाएँ और nf , हालांकि the प्रमाण of the कड़ी थी कहा to be कमजोर क्युकी of a छोटी क्रमांक of मामला मरीजों और it थी unclear  whether the drugs just masked the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se .
World War II ( WWII or WW2  ) , भी ज्ञात as the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , थी a वैश्विक युद्ध  that lasted from 1939 to 1945 .
It involved the vast majority of the world 's nations  —including सब of the ग्रेट शक्तियां —eventually forming  two opposing military alliances : the Allies and the Axis .
It was the most  फैली युद्ध in इतिहास , साथ अधिक than 100 लाख  people serving in military units from over 30 different countries .
In a state of `` total war `` , the major participants placed their entire economic , industrial , and scientific capabilities at  the सेवा of the युद्ध प्रयत्न , erasing the भेद between civilian और सैन्य  resources .
Marked by mass deaths of civilians , including the Holocaust and the only use of nuclear weapons in  warfare , it resulted in 50 लाख to over 75 लाख fatalities  .
ये मौतों मेक संसार  War II by far the deadliest conflict in human history .
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and  थी already at युद्ध साथ the गणतंत्र of चीन in 1937 , लकिन the संसार युद्ध is generally कहा to have begun on  1 September 1939 with the invasion of Poland by Germany and subsequent declarations of war on Germany by France and Britain .
From late 1939 to early 1941 , in a series of campaigns and treaties ,  जर्मनी formed the अक्ष गठबंधन साथ इटली , conquering or subduing much of  continental Europe .
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact , Germany and  the सोवियत संघ partitioned और annexed territories  between themselves of their European neighbours , including Poland .
The United Kingdom and the other members of the British Commonwealth were the only major  अलाइड शक्तियां continuing the लड़ो विरूद्ध the अक्ष , साथ लड़ाइयों लेने प्लेस in उत्तर अफ़्रीकी as खूब as the long-running  Battle of the Atlantic .
In June 1941 , the European Axis launched an invasion of the Soviet Union , giving a start to the largest land  थिएटर of युद्ध in इतिहास , जिससे tied bas the प्रमुख भाग of the अक्ष ' सैन्य  forces for the rest of the war .
In December 1941 , Japan  joined the अक्ष , attacked the संयुक्त राज्य और यूरोपीय territories in the प्रशांत समंदर  , and quickly conquered much of the Western Pacific .
The Axis advance was  रोका in 1942 , बाद जापानी खोया a श्रेणी of नवल लड़ाइयों और यूरोपीय  Axis troops were defeated in North Africa and , decisively , at Stalingrad .
In  1943 , साथ a श्रेणी of जर्मनी defeats in पूर्वी यूरोपीय , the अलाइड आक्रमण of इटली , और अमरीकी victories in the  Pacific , the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts .
In 1944 , the Western Allies invaded France ,  जबकि the सोवियत संघ regained सब of इसके territorial  losses and invaded Germany and its allies .
During  1944 और 1945 the संयुक्त राज्य पराजित  the Japanese Navy and captured key Western Pacific islands .
The war in Europe ended  साथ the कैप्चर of बर्लिन by सोवियत और पॉलिश सैनिकों और the subsequent  German unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945 .
Following the Potsdam Declaration  by the allies on 26 जुलाई 1945 , the संयुक्त राज्य dropped परमाणु  bombs on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima on 6 August , and Nagasaki on 9 August .
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent , and the Soviet Union having declared war on Japan by invading Manchuria , Japan surrendered on 15 August  1945 , समाप्ति the युद्ध in एशिया और cementing the कुल विजय of the allies over the अक्ष  .
World War II altered the political alignment and  सोशल ढांचा of the  world .
The United Nations ( UN ) was  स्थापित to फोस्टर अंतरराष्ट्रीय सहयोग और prevent भविष्य  conflicts .
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States , the Soviet Union , China , the United Kingdom ,  और france—became the स्थाई सदस्यों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद  .
The  सोवियत संघ और the संयुक्त राज्य  emerged as rival superpowers , setting the stage for the Cold War , which lasted for the next 46 years .
meanwhile , the influence of यूरोपीय ग्रेट शक्तियां प्रारंभ to मनाही  , while the decolonisation of Asia and Africa began .
Most countries whose industries had  महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त स्थानांतरित towards  economic recovery .
Political integration , especially in Europe , emerged as an effort to stabilise  postwar संबंध और लड़ो अधिक effectively in the ठंडा युद्ध  .
A limited liability company ( LLC ) is  a लचीली रूप of एंटरप्राइज़ कि मिश्रणों तत्व of साझेदारी  and corporate structures .
Note than an LLC is not a corporation , and  कॉलिंग an llc a निगम is technically गलत .
An LLC is a  विधिक रूप of कम्पनी कि provides सीमित देयता  to its owners in the vast majority of United States jurisdictions .
LLCs do not need  to be व्यवस्थित लिये लाभ  .
पाँच k-cups
The inside of a used K-Cup , with the top  foil और the प्रयुक्त कॉफी grounds removed  .
This shows  the फिल्टर अंदर the  K-Cup .
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or other  सिंगल कप brewing प्रणालियों to काढ़ा a कप of कॉफी  , tea , or hot chocolate .
Each K-Cup is a  प्लास्टिक संग्राहक साथ a कॉफी फिल्टर अंदर  .
Ground coffee beans are packed in  the k-cup और sealed air-tight साथ  a combination plastic and foil lid .
When the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer , the brewer punctures the  foil ढक्कन और the नीचे of the k-cup और शक्तियां hot जल अंतर्गत दबाव through the k-cup और  into a mug .
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain Coffee Roasters  , diedrich/ ग्लोरिया जीन्स , टिमोथी 's संसार कॉफी , वैन houtte , हिरण कॉफी , celestial seasonings , bigelow चाय कम्पनी , twinings , टली 's , कॉफी लोगों  and Newman 's Own .
Keurig 's  patents on the असली k-cup  design expired in September 2012 .
keurig holds at तनिक एक अतिरिक्त , still-active us पेटेंट और another पेटेंट अनुप्रयोग ,  detailing improvements that have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup design .
Electa Pocket Chronograph ( ca . 1890s ) manufactured by  the gallet देखें कम्पनी in la chaux-de-fonds ,  Switzerland .
Gallet MultiChron Astronomic ( ca . 1959 ) —complex mechanical chronograph with 12 hour recoding  सामर्थ्य , स्वचालित दिन , तिथि , माह , और चंद्रमा phase  display
a आधुनिक seiko क्वार्ट्ज wristwatch using the chronograph  function ( movement 7T92 ) .
Citizen Atessa Eco-Drive  atv53-3023 analog-digital chronograph साथ 4 क्षेत्रफल रेडियो नियंत्रित  reception ( North America , Europe , China , Japan ) .
A  chronograph is a विशिष्ट प्रकार of देखें  that is used as a stopwatch combined with a display watch .
A basic chronograph has an independent  स्वीप दूसरी हाथ ; it can be प्रारंभ , रोका , और लौटे to शून्य by successive  pressure on the stem .
Louis  moinet invented the chronograph  in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect , part of the PCI  लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened to बस पीसीआई ) is a लोकल कंप्यूटर बस लिये  attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the functions found on a processor bus ,  लकिन in a मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि is स्वतंत्र of कोई particular  processor .
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly  to the प्रोसेसर बस , और हैं आबंटित पता in the प्रोसेसर 's पता  space .
Attached devices can take  either the रूप of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself ,  called a planar device in the PCI specification , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus was  पहला implemented in ibm pc compatibles , जहाँ it विस्थापित  the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration .
It has subsequently  महरूम अपनाया लिये अन्य  computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express , but , most motherboards are  स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट , जिससे हैं sufficient लिये अनेक उपयोग  .
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the  आकार और अंतरण of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ) , विद्युत  characteristics , bus timing , and protocols .
the specification can be खरीदा  from the PCI Special Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include :  संजाल ताश , ध्वनि ताश , modems , अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or सीरियल  , TV tuner cards and disk controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until growing  बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the पसन्दीदा  interface for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI video cards remain available for use with old PCs without  अगप or पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस स्लॉट  .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly  एकीकृत onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक सीरियल  bus and PCI Express versions .
Michael Whitaker Smith ( born October 7 , 1957 ) is an American contemporary Christian musician , who has  charted primarily in the समकालीन ईसाई और occasionally  in the mainstream charts .
His biggest success in mainstream music was in  1991 जब `` प्लेस in इस संसार '' hit no . 6 on the  Billboard Hot 100 .
स्मिथ is a three-time ग्रैमी  Award winner , and has earned 40 Dove Awards .
Over the course of his career ,  he बेची अधिक than 13 लाख एल्बम और अंकित 29 no . 1 hit गीतों ,  fourteen gold albums , and five platinum albums .
Smith is an American Music Award recipient ; he was  भी नामित एक of लोगों पत्रिका  's `` Most Beautiful People '' .
An American poster  इससे the संसार युद्ध ii -era कि थी प्रयुक्त to inform लोगों परिचय कया  they should do if they suspect sabotage .
तोड़फोड़ is a deliberate कार्रवाई aimed  at weakening another entity through subversion , obstruction , disruption , or destruction .
In a workplace setting , sabotage is the  सचेत वापसी of दक्षता generally निर्देशित at causing कुछ बदलें in कार्यस्थल शर्तें  .
One  जो engages in तोड़फोड़  is a saboteur .
As a rule , saboteurs  कोशिश to छिपाते उनके पहचान क्युकी of the consequences of  their actions .
For example , whereas an environmental pressure group might be happy to be identified  साथ an अधिनियम of तोड़फोड़ , it होता नहीं want the व्यक्तिगत  identities of the perpetrators known .
Patrick Henry College ( PHC ) is a private , independent college with an Evangelical Christian basis that  focuses on शिक्षण शास्त्रीय उदार कला और सरकारी , स्तिथ in purcellville  , Virginia , United States .
Patrick Henry is known for its  रूढ़िवादी धर्मान्तरण ईसाई  focus .
As of  अप्रैल 17 , 2007 , the कॉलेज थी accredited by the transnational संघ of ईसाई  Colleges and Schools , a national faith-related accrediting organization recognized by the Department of Education and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation .
The school was founded with the help of the Home  स्कूल विधिक रक्षा संघ , और अभी serves as the मुख्यालय लिये the संगठन , साथ  which it is still closely connected .
The history of  टेलीविज़न comprises the कार्य of numerous इंजीनियर्स और आविष्कारक in  several countries over many decades .
the earliest प्रस्ताव थी in 1908 , in a पेपर by a . A. campbell-swinton  and postulated the use of cathode rays .
The first practical demonstrations of television , however  , यहूद विकसित using electromechanical  methods to scan , transmit , and reproduce an image .
As electronic camera and  प्रदर्शक tubes यहूद perfected , electromechanical टेलीविज़न दिया रास्ता to all-electronic  systems in nearly all applications .

A  फिल्म थिएटर ( भी पुकारा a सिनेमा , फिल्म हाउस , फिल्मी हाउस  , film theater or picture house ) is a venue , usually a building , for viewing films .
Most  लकिन नहीं सब फिल्म थिएटर हैं वाणिज्यिक परिचालन केटरिंग  to the general public , who attend by purchasing a ticket .
The movie is projected with a  फिल्म प्रोजेक्टर onto a विशाल प्रक्षेप स्क्रीन at the सामने  of the auditorium .
Most movie theaters are now equipped for digital cinema  प्रक्षेप , निकालना the need to बनाएँ और हस्तांतरण a शारीरिक फिल्मी छपाई  .

A motorcycle  क्लबों is a समूह of individuals  whose primary interest and activities involve motorcycles .
Lyme disease , Lyme borreliosis is an infectious  बीमारी caused by at तनिक तीन प्रजाति of जीवाणु belonging  to the genus Borrelia .
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of Lyme disease in North America ,  whereas borrelia afzelii और borrelia garinii कारण सबसे  European cases .
The disease is named after the towns of Lyme and  बूढ़ा lyme , कनेक्टिकट , यूएसए , जहाँ a क्रमांक of मामले  were identified in 1975 .
Although Allen Steere realized that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978 , the cause of the disease remained a  रहस्य जबतक 1981 , जब B. burgdorferi थी पहचाना by विली  Burgdorfer .
Lyme  बीमारी is the सबसे आम tick-borne  disease in the Northern Hemisphere .
Borrelia is transmitted  to इंसानो by the काटना of संक्रमित ticks  belonging to a few species of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ) .
Early symptoms may include fever  , सिरदर्द , थकान , अवसाद , और a characteristic गोलाकार  skin rash called erythema migrans ( EM ) .
Left untreated ,  बाद लक्षण may involve the joints , दिल ,  and central nervous system .
In most cases , the infection  और इसके लक्षण हैं eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक , विशेषकर if the बीमारी is treated  early .
Delayed or  अपर्याप्त उपचार can सीसे to अधिक गंभीर लक्षण , जिससे can be disabling  and difficult to treat .

Penis ( plural penises or penes ) is a general term  लिये the अंगों साथ जिससे पुरूष और उभयलिंगी पशु introduce शुक्राणु  into receptive females during copulation .
Such organs occur in many  पशु , दोनो vertebrate और invertebrate , लकिन males do नहीं भालू a शिश्न in प्रत्येक एनिमल प्रजाति , और in those प्रजाति  in which the male does bear a so-called penis , the penes in the various species are not necessarily homologous .
For example , the penis of a mammal is at  सबसे analogous to the शिश्न of a पुरूष कीट or  barnacle .
The term penis applies to many  reproductive intromittent अंगों , लकिन नहीं to सब ; लिये उदाहरण the intromittent अंग of सबसे cephalopoda  is the hectocotylus , a specialised arm , and male spiders use their pedipalps .
In most species  of पशु in जिससे वहीँ is an अंग कि might reasonably be वर्णित as a शिश्न , it रै no प्रमुख फलन  other than intromission , or at least conveying the sperm to the female , but in the placental mammals the penis bears the distal part of the urethra , which discharges both urine during urination and semen during copulation as the occasion requires .
Artists and  रंगमंडल ( a & r ) is the प्रभाग of a रिकार्ड लेबल or म्यूज़िक प्रकाशन कम्पनी  that is responsible for talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of recording artists and/or songwriters .
It also acts as a liaison between artists and the record label or publishing company ;  प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट of एल्बम रिलीज is generally माना अंतर्गत the purview of , और  responsibility of , A & R .
A furlong is a measure of distance in imperial units and  u.S. प्रथागत इकाई बराबर to one-eighth of a मील , समतुल्य  to 220 yards , 660 feet , 40 rods , or 10 chains .
The exact value of the  furlong varies थोड़ा among english-speaking  countries .
Five furlongs are approximately  1 किलोमीटर ( 1.0058 km is a करीब सन्निकटन  ) .
Since the original definition of the metre was one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the circumference of the Earth ( along the great circle coincident with the meridian of  देशांतर गुजर through पेरिस ) , the परिधि of the धरती is परिचय 40,000  km or about 200,000 furlongs .
CR2032  लिथियम बटन कोशिका बैटरी
Lithium 9 volt  , aa , & aaa आकार
Lithium batteries are  डिस्पोजेबल ( प्राथमिक ) बैटरी कि have  lithium metal or lithium compounds as an anode .
They  स्टैंड अलावा इससे अन्य बैटरी in उनके ऊँची चार्ज  density ( long life ) and high cost per unit .
Depending on the  डिज़ाइन और रासायनिक यौगिकों प्रयुक्त , लिथियम कोशिकाएं can उपज voltages इससे 1.5 v ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or  alkaline battery ) to about 3.7 V. Lithium batteries are widely used in products such as portable consumer electronic devices .
रेमंड `` रे '' चार्ल्स जोकर lamontagne ( ; born जून 18 , 1973 )  is an American singer-songwriter .
LaMontagne has released four studio albums , Trouble ,  तक the सूर्य turns ब्लैक , गपशप in  the Grain and God Willin ' & the Creek Do n't Rise .
He was born in New Hampshire and was inspired to create  म्यूज़िक बाद सुनना an  album by Stephen Stills .
