फेसबुक on the  Ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking  सेवा , जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब दिए to विद्यार्थी at the प्रारंभ of  the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other .
It was  संस्थापित in फ़रवरी 2004 by चिह्नित zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज  roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership was initially  सीमित by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी , लकिन थी विस्तारित to  other colleges in the Boston area , the Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It gradually  added support लिये विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने  to high school students , and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any  उपयोक्ता जो घोषित themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो  old to become registered users of the site .
उपयोक्ता जरूर पंजीकरण पहले using the साईट , बाद जिससे वे may बनाएँ a निजी  profile , add other users as friends , and exchange messages , including automatic notifications when they update their profile .
Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups , organized by workplace , school or college , or  अन्य विशेषताएँ , और categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` लोगों  From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As of  सितंबर 2012 , फेसबुक रै over  one billion active users .
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey , there are 7.5 million children under 13  साथ खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10 , violating the साईट 's शर्तें of सेवा  .
In May  2005 , accel साझेदार invested $ 12.7 लाख  in Facebook , and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot .
A January 2009 Compete.com study  क्रमित फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा  by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list , saying , `` How on earth did we stalk our exes  , याद हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन , कीड़ा हमारी मित्रों , और खेल  a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics , such as Facebook Detox , state that  फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य , resulting in विशाल amounts  of time lost and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast estimates  फेसबुक रै 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय  U.S. visitors in May 2011 .
According to Social Media Today , in April 2010 an estimated 41.6  % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a फेसबुक खाता  .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth  प्रारंभ to स्टाल in कुछ regions , साथ the साईट खोने 7 लाख क्रियाशील  users in the United States and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public  offering on फ़रवरी 1 , 2012 , और थी headquartered in मेनलो पार्क , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the public and  व्यापार on the नैस्डैक on may 18  , 2012 .
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel ( 15 November 1891 – 14 October 1944 ) , popularly known as The  मरुस्थल फॉक्स ( wüstenfuchs , ) , थी a जर्मनी फ़ील्ड मार्शल of संसार  War II .
He  अर्जित the आदर of  both his own troops and the enemies he fought .
Rommel was a highly decorated officer in World  युद्ध i और थी awarded the डालना le mérite लिये उसके कारनामे on  the Italian front .
In World War II , he further  विशिष्ट खुद as the कमांडर of the 7th panzer  Division during the 1940 invasion of France .
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the  उत्तर अफ़्रीकी अभियान स्थापित उसे as एक of the सबसे समर्थ कमांडरों of the युद्ध  , and earned him the appellation of the Desert Fox .
He is regarded  as एक of the सबसे skilled कमांडरों  of desert warfare in the conflict .
he बाद commanded the जर्मनी शक्तियां opposing  the Allied cross-channel invasion in Normandy .
His assignments  never took उसे to the पूर्वी  Front .
Rommel is regarded as  having महरूम a दयालु और  professional officer .
His Afrika Korps was never accused of war  अपराधों , और सैनिको captured दौरान उसके अफ़्रीकी अभियान यहूद reported to have महरूम treated  humanely .
आदेश to मार यहूदी सैनिको , नागरिकों  and captured commandos were ignored .
Late in the war , Rommel was linked to the  षड्यंत्र to assassinate एडोल्फ  Hitler .
Since Rommel was a national  नायिका , हिटलर desired to eliminate  him quietly .
He forced Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill , in return for  आश्वासनों कि ख़बरों 's परिवार होता  not be persecuted following his death .
Stained  कांच प्रतिनिधित्व of  the Holy Spirit as a dove , c. 1660 .
The seven  उपहार of the पावन स्पिरिट is an enumeration of सात आध्यात्मिक उपहार originating साथ patristic लेखक , बाद elaborated  by five intellectual virtues and four other groups of ethical characteristics .
They are : wisdom ,  समझना , अचरज और डरते ( भय of the रब ) , counsel  , knowledge , fortitude , and piety ( reverence ) .
The Earth Day Flag , the  नवीनतम प्रस्ताव of जॉन  McConnell for a flag of Earth Day
धरती दिन is an सालाना इवेंट , मनाये on अप्रैल 22 , on जिससे कार्यक्रम हैं आयोजित विश्वव्यापी  to demonstrate support for environmental protection .
It was first celebrated  in 1970 , और is अभी समन्वित globally by the धरती  Day Network , and celebrated in more than 192 countries each year .
In 1969 at a UNESCO  सम्मेलन in सैन फ्रांसिस्को , the तिथि प्रस्तावित थी कूच 21 , 1970 , the  first day of spring in the northern hemisphere .
This day of nature 's  equipoise थी बाद मंजूर in a उदघोषणा  signed by Secretary General U Thant at the United Nations .
A month later a separate  धरती दिन थी संस्थापित by संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर gaylord नेल्सन as an पर्यावरणीय  teach-in first held on April 22 , 1970 .
Nelson was later awarded the Presidential Medal  of स्वतंत्रता पुरस्कार in मान्यता  of his work .
While  इस अप्रैल 22 धरती दिन थी केन्द्रित on the संयुक्त राज्य , an संगठन शुभारम्भ by डेनिस  Hayes , who was the original national coordinator in 1970 , took it international in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations .
Numerous communities celebrate Earth Week , an entire week of  क्रियाएँ केन्द्रित on पर्यावरणीय मुद्दे  .
Iodine is a chemical element with  प्रतीक i और परमाणु क्रमांक  53 .
The name is  इससे यूनानी ioeidēs , अर्थ बैंगनी  or purple , due to the color of elemental iodine vapor .
Iodine  और इसके यौगिकों हैं primarily प्रयुक्त in पोषण ,  and industrially in the production of acetic acid and certain polymers .
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number , low toxicity , and  आसानी of अनुलग्नक to सशुल्क यौगिकों have बना it a भाग of अनेक x-ray  contrast materials in modern medicine .
Iodine has  तभी एक stable समस्थानिक  .
A number of iodine  radioisotopes हैं भी प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा अनुप्रयोग  .
Iodine is found on Earth mainly as the highly water-soluble  आयोडाइड आयन , i− , जिससे concentrates it in महासागर और brine तालों  .
Like the other halogens , free iodine occurs mainly as a diatomic molecule I2 , and then only momentarily  बाद होने oxidized इससे आयोडाइड by an oxidant जैसे फ़्री  oxygen .
In the universe and on Earth ,  आयोडीन 's ऊँची परमाणु क्रमांक  makes it a relatively rare element .
However  , इसके उपस्थिति in समंदर  water has given it a role in biology .
It is  the अधिकतम अनिवार्य तत्व utilized widely by जीवन in biological कृत्यों  ( only tungsten , employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria , is heavier ) .
Iodine 's rarity in many soils , due to initial low abundance as a crust-element  , और भी leaching of घुलनशील आयोडाइड by rainwater , रै led to अनेक कमियां समस्याएं in जमीन पशु और अंतर्देशीय इंसान populations  .
Iodine deficiency affects about two billion  लोगों और is the अग्रणी preventable कारण of बौद्धिक  disabilities .
Iodine is required by higher animals ,  जिससे उपयोग it to synthesize थायराइड हार्मोन , जिससे contain the तत्व  .
Because  of इस फलन , radioisotopes of आयोडीन हैं concentrated in  the thyroid gland along with nonradioactive iodine .
if inhaled , the radioisotope iodine-131 , जिससे रै a ऊँची परिवर्द्धन उत्पाद उपज  , concentrates in the thyroid , but is easily remedied with potassium iodide treatment .
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the act of  attempting to influence निर्णय बना by officials in the सरकारी  , most often legislators or members of regulatory agencies .
lobbying is किया by अनेक अलग प्रकार of लोगों और व्यवस्थित समूह , सहित individuals in the  private sector , corporations , fellow legislators or government officials , or advocacy groups ( interest groups ) .
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies , meaning  a वोटर or bloc of मतदाता भीतर उसके or उसके चुनावी ज़िला , or नहीं ; वे  may engage in lobbying as a business , or not .
Professional lobbyists are people whose  कारोबार is trying to influence विधान  on behalf of a group or individual who hires them .
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of their normal job ( for instance , a CEO meeting with a representative about a project important to his/her  कम्पनी , or an activist बैठक साथ his/her विधायक in an unpaid क्षमता  ) .
Governments often define and  विनियमित व्यवस्थित समूह lobbying कि रै become influential  .
The ethics and  नैतिकता of lobbying  are .
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt , when the implication is that people with inordinate socioeconomic  शक्ति हैं corrupting the विधि ( टेढ़ी it दूर इससे निष्पक्षता ) in अनुक्रम to serve उनके अपना  conflict of interest .
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' interests are duly defended against  अन्य ' भ्रष्टाचार , or भी बस बनाना यकीनन कि अल्पसंख्यक रूचि हैं fairly defended  against mere tyranny of the majority .
For example , a  चिकित्सा संघ , or a व्यापार संघ of स्वास्थ्य बीमे कंपनियाँ , may लॉबी a विधानमंडल in अनुक्रम to counteract  the influence of tobacco companies , in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ) .
The difficulty in drawing  उद्देश्य लाइनों between जिससे lobbyists हैं `` शुभ lobbyists '' और जिससे ones हैं `` ख़राब ones '' is compounded  by the cleverness with which lobbyists or their clients can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind .
At heart , the effort  to influence विधान is a शक्ति  struggle .
As in other forms  of शक्ति संघर्ष , ऐसे as युद्ध or विधि प्रवर्तन , motives दायरा  from to self-defense to fighting for justice , and the dividing line between predation and justice is subject to rationalization .
सनशाइन of अपना  love guitar riff
Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup  consisting of bassist/vocalist जोकर ब्रूस , guitarist/vocalist  Eric Clapton , and drummer Ginger Baker .
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues  चट्टान , मुश्किल चट्टान और साइकेडेलिक चट्टान , combining the psychedelia-themed गीत , eric क्लैप्टन 's ब्लूज़ गिटार playing और vocals , जोकर ब्रूस 's  voice and prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming .
The group 's third album ,  पहियों of आग , थी the संसार 's पहला  platinum-selling double album .
Cream are widely regarded as  होने the संसार 's पहला कामयाब  supergroup .
In their career , they sold  over 15 लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी  .
Cream 's music included songs based on traditional blues such as `` Crossroads `` and `` Spoonful `` , and modern  ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` born अंतर्गत a ख़राब चिह्न `` , as खूब as अधिक eccentric  songs such as `` Strange Brew `` , `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad `` .
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK , number 11 )  , `` सनशाइन of अपना प्रेम `` ( us , क्रमांक 5 ) , `` श्वेत  Room `` ( US , number 6 ) , `` Crossroads '' ( US , number 28 ) , and `` Badge `` ( UK , number 18 ) .
Cream made a significant impact on the popular music of the  समय , और , साथ साथ जिमि हेंड्रिक्स , और टेरी कठ of शिकागो , popularised the उपयोग of the  wah-wah pedal .
They provided a heavy yet technically  निपुण musical थीम कि foreshadowed और बहकावे the emergence of अंग्रेजों  bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s .
The band 's live performances influenced  प्रगतिशील चट्टान  acts such as Rush .
मलाई यहूद inducted into the चट्टान  and Roll Hall of Fame in 1993 .
They were included in both Rolling Stone and VH1 's lists  of the `` 100 महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय ''  .
They were also  क्रमित क्रमांक 16 on vh1 's `` 100 महानतम  Artists of Hard Rock '' .
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters , and starring  ricki झील , सन्नी बोनो , डिब्बी हैरी , माइकल st. जेरार्ड , shawn थॉम्पसन , colleen fitzpatrick , जेरी stiller , और  in his last film role , Divine .
hairspray थी a नाटकीय प्रस्थान इससे waters ' पहले works ,  with a much broader intended audience .
In fact , Hairsprays PG is the  mildest दरजा a waters फिल्मी रै प्राप्त ; सबसे of उसके पिछला  films were rated X by the MPAA .
Set in 1962 Baltimore , Maryland , the film  घूमती around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था ट्रेसी turnblad as वो pursues स्टारडम as a नर्तकी on a लोकल tv दिखाएँ और रैलियों विरूद्ध जातिगत पृथक्करण  .
Hairspray was only a moderate success  upon इसके आरंभिक नाट्य रिलीज , कमाई a modest  gross of $ 8 million .
However , it  प्रबंधित to आकर्षित a larger दर्शक on  home video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic .
सबसे आलोचकों praised the फिल्मी , हालांकि कुछ  were displeased with the overall campiness .
In 2002 , the film was adapted into a Broadway musical of the same name ,  जिससे जीती आठ टोनी पुरस्कार , सहित बेहतरीन  Musical in 2003 .
A second film version of Hairspray , an adaptation of the stage musical , was also released  by नई लकीर सिनेमा in 2007 , जिससे शामिल अनेक परिवर्तन of scripted वस्तुएं इससे the असली  .
The film also ranks # 444 on Empire magazine  's 2008 सूची of the 500 महानतम फिल्मों of सब समय  .
a ईसाई denomination is an identifiable  religious body under a common name , structure , and doctrine within Christianity .
Some groups  शामिल do नहीं consider themselves a denomination ( e.g. , the कैथोलिक  Church considers itself the one true church and the Apostolic See , and as pre-denominational ) .
Some groups  viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist होने पुकारा a denomination और do नहीं have  any formal denominational structure , authority , or record-keeping beyond the local congregation ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this category .
Some groups are large ( e.g . Catholics , Lutherans , Anglicans or Baptists ) , while others  हैं बस a few छोटी चर्च , और in सबसे मामले the सापेक्ष आकार is नहीं evident  in this list .
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist Christianity , Pietism ,  evangelicalism , pentecostalism और the पवित्रता गति sometimes क्रॉस denominational लाइनों  , or in some cases create new denominations out of two or more continuing groups , ( as is the case for many United and uniting churches , for example ) .
Such subtleties and  complexities हैं नहीं clearly  depicted here .
Major  विभाजन भीतर christianity  .
Note : This is not a complete list , but aims to  provide a comprehensible अवलोकन of the विविधता among  denominations of Christianity .
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations , many of which can not be verified to be significant , only those denominations with Wikipedia  आलेख होगा be सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम to ensure कि सब प्रविष्टियां on इस सूची  are notable and verifiable .
Between denominations , theologians , and comparative religionists there are considerable  मतभिन्नता परिचय जिससे समूह can be properly पुकारा ईसाई , मतभिन्नता arising  primarily from doctrinal differences between groups .
लिये the purpose of सादगी , इस सूची is intended  to reflect the self-understanding of each denomination .
Explanations of different opinions concerning their status as  ईसाई denominations can be मिला at उनके संबंधित  articles .
There is no official recognition in most parts of the world for religious bodies , and there is no  आधिकारिक clearinghouse जिससे could determine the औकात or respectability of धार्मिक  bodies .
Often there is considerable disagreement between various churches about whether other churches should be  labeled साथ pejorative शर्तें ऐसे as `` cult '' , or परिचय whether इस or कि समूह enjoys कुछ माप  of respectability .
Such considerations often vary from  प्लेस to प्लेस , जहाँ एक धार्मिक समूह may आनंद बहुमत औकात in एक प्रदेश , लकिन be widely regarded as a  `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the world .
Inclusion on this list does not indicate any  निर्णय परिचय the आकार , महत्व , or अक्षर of a समूह  or its members .
1804 map of ``  louisiana `` , edged on the वेस्ट by the रॉकी kyu  .
The Louisiana Purchase ( `` Sale of Louisiana '' ) was the acquisition by the  संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका in 1803 of of फ़्रांस 's अर्जी to the territory  of Louisiana .
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11 ,250,000 )  प्लस रद्दीकरण of debts लायक 18 लाख francs ( $ 3,750,000 ) , लिये a कुल योग of 15 लाख डॉलर ( कम than 3 सेंट प्रति एकड़ ) लिये the louisiana  territory ( $ million in dollars , less than 42 cents per acre ) .
The Louisiana territory encompassed all or part  of 15 उपस्थित u.S. राज्य  and two Canadian provinces .
The land purchased contained all of present-day Arkansas , Missouri , Iowa , Oklahoma , Kansas , and Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota ; most of South Dakota ; northeastern New Mexico ;  उत्तरी टेक्सास ; the portions of मोंटाना , व्योमिंग , और कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; louisiana वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी , सहित the  city of New Orleans ; and small portions of land that would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan .
France controlled this vast area from 1699 until  1762 , the साल it दिया the territory to इसके  ally Spain .
अंतर्गत नेपोलियन बोनापार्ट , फ़्रांस took वापस the territory  in 1800 in the hope of building an empire in North America .
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending  युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन , however , led फ़्रांस to लापरवाही ये योजनाएँ और बेचें the संपूर्ण territory to the  United States , who had originally intended only to seek the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands .
The purchase of the territory of  louisiana took प्लेस दौरान the  presidency of Thomas Jefferson .
At the time  , the खरीदें faced घरेलू विपक्ष क्युकी  it was thought to be unconstitutional .
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions for acquiring territory ,  जेफरसन decided to go ahead साथ the खरीदें वैसे in अनुक्रम to हटाएँ फ़्रांस 's उपस्थिति in the प्रदेश और to protect दोनो u.S. व्यापार अभिगम to the बंदरगाहों of  New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River .
Ceremony at  प्लेस d'armes , नई ऑरलियन्स अंकन ट्रांसफ़र  of Louisiana to the United States , 10 March 1804 , as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup .
`` Cool Jerk '' is a popular song  लिखा by डोनाल्ड storball और originally performed by  The Capitols .
Released in 1966 , it reached No . 2 on the  अमरीकी r & b चार्ट और no . 7 on the पॉप  chart .
The backing track for this song was actually recorded (  secretly ) by the motown हाउस बैंड the दुर्गंध  Brothers .
Per one of the  दुर्गंध भाइयो , the सोंग थी originally to be  called `` Pimp Jerk . ''
This was taken from watching neighborhood pimps , who would dance in the  क्लब , लकिन यहूद too `` कूल '' to do the झटका जैसे नियमित folks  .
Their version was  subsequently नामित `` the pimp  Jerk . ''
The  निर्माता थी भयभीत कि a सोंग साथ the शब्द pimp in the  title would be banned or not receive much positive attention , and had the title changed to its current form .
The  go-go 's , टॉड rundgren , बिग ट्रबल , इंसान यौन  Response , The La De Da 's , The Creation , and The Coasters have covered the song .
Todd Rundgren did his version  in an विषम समय हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ) , giving an obviously jerky  feel to the song .
The Go-Go 's covered the song for their 1982 album Vacation and later  re-recorded it लिये उनके 1990 एल्बम महानतम  .
In the  विशेषता फिल्मी घर अलोन 2 : खोया in नई यॉर्क , ताऊ फ़्रैंक  ( Gerry Bamman ) sings `` Cool Jerk '' in the shower .
A version of the song with different lyrics ( `` Do the  कूल चाबुक '' ) is प्रयुक्त in कूल चाबुक commercials  .
A recording of `` Cool Jerk '' by Ricardo  रे is प्रदर्शित in the विशेषता फिल्मी donnie brasco  ( 1997 ) .
The  सोंग सुविधाएँ in the फिल्मी खड़ा in the साए  of Motown , performed by the Funk Brothers with lead vocals by Bootsy Collins .
The song is  सुना briefly in the एनिमेटेड विशेषता , मेडागास्कर  3 : Europe 's Most Wanted .
Despite this  कारण , it is सूचीबद्ध in कुछ विसंगतियाँ  of the film 's soundtrack .
A league is a unit  of लंबाई ( or , rarely ,  area ) .
It was long common in Europe and Latin America , but  it is no longer an आधिकारिक ईकाई in कोई  nation .
The  लीग originally referred to the  distance a person could walk in an hour .
Since  the मध्य आयु , अनेक मान have  been specified in several countries .
In the context of nautical distances , the 3 mile (  4.8 km ) अलहदा corresponds to कैसा दूर an निरीक्षक of औसत ऊँचाई ( 5'9 ''  or 1.78 m ) can see when standing at sea level .
Thus , a ship traveling one `` league  '' रै पहुँचे कया थी previously the farthest दृश्य अलहदा  on the horizon .
The  कमी of a ऐतिहासिक और वैश्विक मानक लिये the सटीक माप of a `` लीग '' can be accounted  for by the variable elevation of the observer ( i.e. , sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ) .
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free State , a  डोमिनियन of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल , having seceded इससे the संयुक्त किंगडम अंतर्गत  the Anglo-Irish Treaty .
It  comprises 26 of आयरलैंड 's  32 counties .
Since 1949  it रै existed as the गणतंत्र  of Ireland .
From its foundation , the  आयरिश फ़्री राज्य थी embroiled in a सिविल युद्ध between राष्ट्रवादियों supporting the  Treaty and opponents who supported a republic .
The  pro-treaty पक्ष , संगठित as cumann na ngaedheal उभरा विजयी  from the conflict and won subsequent elections .
वे formed the सरकारी of the राज्य जबतक  1932 , when they peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty faction in Fianna Fáil , who defeated them in an election .
The Irish  राज्य , despite इसके हिंसक beginnings , रै  remained a liberal democracy throughout its existence .
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain established under the Treaty and Ireland 's neutrality  in the दूसरी संसार युद्ध demonstrated इसके स्वतंत्रता in  foreign policy matters from Britain .
In 1948 Ireland formally left the British  राष्ट्रमंडल और अपनाया the शीर्षक  of `` Republic '' .
In the economic sphere , the  आयरिश राज्य रै था a मिश्रित प्रदर्शन  .
On independence , it  थी एक of the wealthier देशों  in Europe per head of population .
However it also inherited  इससे अंग्रेजों नियम the समस्याएं of बेरोजगारी , करणों , uneven भौगोलिक  development and lack of a native industrial base .
लिये much of इसके इतिहास , the राज्य struggled  to rectify these problems .
Particular peaks of emigration were  अंकित दौरान the लेट 1930s , 1950s और 1980s , जब the आयरिश अर्थव्यवस्था  recorded little growth .
In the  1930s , fianna fáil सरकारें attempted to बनाएँ आयरिश घरेलू उद्योग  using subsidies and protective tarifs .
In the late  1950s , ये नीतियों यहूद dropped in पक्ष of फ़्री व्यापार साथ  selected countries and encouraging of foreign investment with low taxes .
This was  विस्तारित जब आयरलैंड  entered the European Economic Community in 1972 .
In the 1990s and 2000s , Ireland experienced an economic boom known as the  सेल्टिक बाघ , in जिससे the देश 's जीडीपी surpassed अनेक of इसके यूरोपीय पड़ोसी  .
आव्रजन भी surpassed करणों , bringing the राज्य 's जनसांख्यिकी  up to over 4 million .
However , since 2008 , Ireland has experienced a severe  संकट in the बैंकिंग सेक्टर और साथ sovereign  debt .
The resultant economic slump has deepened the  प्रभाव of the संसार मंदी  on Ireland .
From 1937  to 1998 , the आयरिश संविधान शामिल a अर्जी on उत्तरी आयरलैंड  as a part of the national territory .
However , the  राज्य भी opposed और प्रयुक्त इसके सुरक्षा शक्तियां विरूद्ध those हथियारबंद समूह  - principally the Provisional Irish Republican Army , who tried to unite Ireland by force .
This  occurred in the 1950s , throughout the  1970s and 1980s and has continued on a reduced scale .
Irish governments meanwhile tried to broker an agreement to the conflict  ज्ञात as the परेशानियों भीतर उत्तरी आयरलैंड इससे 1968  to the late 1990s .
The British government officially recognised the right of the Irish government  to be a पार्टी to the उत्तरी negotiations  in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985 .
In 1998 , as part of the Good Friday Agreement , the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to  उत्तरी आयरलैंड और बजाय extend the सही of आयरिश नागरिकता to सब the लोगों of the द्वीप चाहिए वे काश to have it  .
John Quincy Adams ( July 11  , 1767february 23 , 1848 ) थी the छठे अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1825–1829 ) .
He served as American  राजनयिक , सीनेटर , और congressional प्रतिनिधि  .
He was a member of the Federalist , Democratic-Republican , National  रिपब्लिकन , और बाद anti-masonic और  Whig parties .
एडम्स थी the बेटे of पूर्व अध्यक्ष  John Adams and Abigail Adams .
As a diplomat ,  एडम्स निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in negotiating अनेक अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties ,  most notably the Treaty of Ghent , which ended the War of 1812 .
As Secretary of State , he negotiated with the United Kingdom over America 's northern border with Canada ,  negotiated साथ स्पेन the annexation of फ्लोरिडा , और authored  the Monroe Doctrine .
Historians  सहमत he थी एक of the महानतम राजनयिकों और secretaries  of state in American history .
As president , he  sought to modernize the अमरीकी अर्थव्यवस्था और  promoted education .
Adams enacted a part of his  कार्यसूची और सशुल्क बंद much of the नेशनल कर्ज़  .
He was stymied by a  कॉंग्रेस नियंत्रित by उसके दुश्मनों , और उसके  lack of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut him .
He lost his  1828 बोली लिये re-election  to Andrew Jackson .
In doing so , he became the first president  चूंकि उसके पिता to serve a सिंगल पद  .
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped America 's foreign  नीति in लकीर साथ उसके ardently राष्ट्रवादी प्रतिबद्धता to अमेरिका 's रिपब्लिकन  values .
More recently Howe (  2007 ) portrayed एडम्स as the exemplar और moral  leader in an era of modernization .
During Adams ' lifetime , technological innovations and new means of  संचार स्प्रेड संदेश of धार्मिक पुनरुद्धार , सोशल सुधार , और पार्टी राजनीती  .
Goods , money , and people  traveled अधिक rapidly और efficiently than कभी  before .
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts after leaving office ,  सेवारत लिये the पिछला 17 सालो of उसके जीवन साथ दूर वृहद acclamation than  he had achieved as president .
He is , so far , the only president later elected  to the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( हालांकि जॉन टायलर थी निर्वाचित to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ) .
Animated by his growing revulsion against slavery ,  एडम्स became a अग्रणी प्रतिद्वन्दी of the स्लेव  Power .
He predicted that  if a सिविल युद्ध यहूद to ब्रेक आउट , the अध्यक्ष could abolish  slavery by using his war powers .
Adams also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the slavery  समस्या , लकिन कहा कि if the दक्षिण became स्वतंत्र वहीँ  would be a series of bloody slave revolts .
Windows  अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 ( ie9 ) is a संस्करण of the अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर  web browser from Microsoft .
It was  released to the पब्लिक on कूच  14 , 2011 .
Microsoft has released Internet Explorer 9 as a major  out-of-band संस्करण कि is नहीं tied to the रिलीज अनुसूची of कोई  particular version of Windows , unlike previous versions .
It is the first version since Internet Explorer 2 to not be bundled with a  खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली , हालांकि कुछ oems have संस्थापित it साथ खिड़कियाँ 7 on उनके pcs , as खूब as नई खिड़कियाँ 7 लैपटॉप  .
The system requirements for Internet Explorer 9 are Windows 7 , Windows Server 2008 R2 , Windows  विस्टा सेवा पैक 2 or खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 sp2 साथ the मंच अद्यतन  .
Windows XP  और पहले  are not supported .
Internet  एक्सप्लोरर 9 is the पिछला संस्करण  of Internet Explorer to be supported on Windows Vista .
Both  ia-32 और x64 builds हैं  available .
Internet Explorer 9 supports several CSS 3 properties , embedded ICC v2 or  v4 रंग प्रोफ़ाइल support via खिड़कियाँ रंग प्रणाली , और रै improved जावास्क्रिप्ट  performance .
It is the  पिछला of the पाँच प्रमुख वेब browsers  to implement support for Scalable Vector Graphics ( SVG ) .
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D ,  hardware-accelerated टेक्स्ट रेंडरिंग using directwrite , hardware-accelerated वीडियो रेंडरिंग using मीडिया न्यास  , imaging support provided by Windows Imaging Component , and high fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline .
अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 भी supports the html5 वीडियो  and audio tags and the Web Open Font Format .
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid and pain  reliever पहला marketed by the dr . मील  Medicine Company .
it थी विकसित by मौरिस  Treener , head chemist at Miles , in Elkhart , Indiana .
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches ,  pains , सूजन , ज्वर , सिरदर्द , heartburn , खट्टा पेट , अपच , और hangovers , जबकि neutralizing  excess stomach acid .
It  थी शुभारम्भ  in 1931 .
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer  बना to relieve जुकाम और फ्लू , alka-seltzer प्लस , थी बाद introduced  .
A  short-lived antacid non-aspirin रूपांतर , alka-mints  , was introduced in 1994 and discontinued in 1997 .
Alka-Seltzer is currently owned by  बायर schering फार्मा ag ,  Germany .
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an  संपूर्ण लकीर of medications बेची over the काउंटर और लिया by अर्थात् of rapidly  dissolving tablets that form a carbonated solution in water .

A stalactite ( , ; from the Greek stalasso ,  ( σταλάσσω ) , `` to ड्रिप '' , और अर्थ `` कि जिससे drips '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem ( द्वितीयक  mineral ) that hangs from the ceiling of limestone caves .
It is a  प्रकार of dripstone  .
The corresponding  गठन on the मंजिल of the गुफा is ज्ञात  as a stalagmite .
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an  अकादमिक उपाधि बजाय of स्पेलिंग आउट the शीर्षक in पूरा , ऐसे as in सन्दर्भ किताबे जैसे जो 's जो  and on business cards .
Many degrees have  अधिक than एक संक्षिप्त  .
In the UK , it is not generally the custom to punctuate  abbreviations लिये डिग्री साथ पूरा stops ( e.g . `` बीएससी  '' rather than `` B.Sc . `` .
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into large  और पृथक populations or समूह by anatomical , सांस्कृतिक , जातीय , जेनेटिक , भौगोलिक , ऐतिहासिक , भाषाई ,  religious , or social affiliation .
First used to denote national affiliations , the  पद began to be प्रयुक्त to सुनाना to शारीरिक traits in the  17th century .
In the early 20th century the term was often used , in a taxonomic  भाव , to denote genetically differentiated इंसान populations पारिभाषित by phenotype  .
While  biologists sometimes उपयोग the अवधारणा of रेस to मेक भेद among फजी सेट of traits , अन्य in the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ सुझाएँ कि the विचार of रेस प्रायः is प्रयुक्त in a भोली or simplistic  way , i.e . that among humans , race has no taxonomic significance : all living humans belong to the same species , Homo sapiens and subspecies , Homo sapiens sapiens .
सोशल conceptions और groupings of दौड़  vary over time , involving folk taxonomies
that  define of individuals आधारित on  perceived traits .
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete , and generally discourage racial  स्पष्टीकरण लिये सामूहिक differentiation  in both physical and behavioral traits .
Since the  दूसरी हाफ of the 20th सदी the एसोसिएशन of रेस साथ the विचारधाराओं और theories कि grew  out of the work of 19th-century anthropologists and physiologists has led to the use of the word race itself becoming problematic .
Although still used in general contexts , it is now often replaced by other words which  हैं कम अस्पष्ट और emotionally चार्ज , ऐसे as populations , लोगों ( s ) , जातीय समूह  or communities depending on context .
Lucy Stone ( August 13 , 1818 – October 19 , 1893 ) was a prominent  अमरीकी abolitionist और suffragist , और a गायन एडवोकेट और  organizer promoting rights for women .
In 1847 , Stone became the first  स्त्री इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to  earn a college degree .
She spoke  आउट लिये महिलाओं 's अधिकारों और विरूद्ध गुलामी at a समय जब महिलाओं यहूद  discouraged and prevented from public speaking .
Stone was the  पहला अंकित अमरीकी स्त्री to retain  her own last name after marriage .
Stone 's organizational activities  लिये the कारण of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों yielded ठोस gains in the मुश्किल राजनैतिक पर्यावरण of the 19th  century .
Stone helped initiate the first  नेशनल महिलाओं 's अधिकारों सम्मेलन और वो समर्थित और sustained it annually  along with a number of other local , state and regional activist conventions .
स्टोन spoke in सामने of a क्रमांक of  legislative bodies to promote laws giving more rights to women .
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby  abolish गुलामी , बाद जिससे वो helped रूप the largest समूह of like-minded महिलाओं 's अधिकारों reformers , the नीतियां मॉडरेट  American Woman Suffrage Association , which worked for decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote .
Stone  लिखा extensively परिचय a चौड़ी दायरा of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों  , publishing and distributing speeches by herself and others , and convention proceedings .
In the long-running and influential Woman 's Journal , a weekly periodical that she established and promoted  , स्टोन aired दोनो उसके अपना और differing दृश्य परिचय महिलाओं  's rights .
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the woman 's  अधिकारों गति '' , स्टोन वितरित a वाक जिससे sparked सुसान  B. Anthony to take up the cause of women 's suffrage .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that `` Lucy Stone was the  पहला व्यक्ति by जिसको the दिल of the अमरीकी पब्लिक  was deeply stirred on the woman question . ''
Together , Anthony , Stanton , and Stone have  महरूम पुकारा the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of महिलाओं 's  suffrage and feminism .
In finance  , a बंध is an यंत्र of indebtedness  of the bond issuer to the holders .
It is a debt security , under which the issuer owes the holders a debt and  , depending on the शर्तें of the बंध , is obliged to अदा उन्हें ब्याज ( the कूपन )  or to repay the principal at a later date , termed the maturity .
ब्याज is प्रायः देय at फिक्स्ड intervals ( semiannual  , annual , sometimes monthly ) .
Very often the bond is negotiable , i.e . the ownership of the instrument can be  transferred in the द्वितीयक  market .
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the holder of the bond is the lender (  creditor ) , the जारीकर्ता of the बंध is the borrower ( debtor ) , और the कूपन is the ब्याज  .
Bonds  provide the borrower साथ बाह्य निधि to वित्त long-term निवेश , or , in the मामला of  government bonds , to finance current expenditure .
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term  वाणिज्यिक पेपर हैं माना to be धन मार्केट यंत्र  and not bonds : the main difference is in the length of the term of the instrument .
Bonds and stocks are both securities , but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an equity stake in the  कम्पनी ( i.e . वे हैं स्वामी ) , whereas bondholders have a creditor हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी  ( i.e . they are lenders ) .
Another  अंतर is कि bonds प्रायः have a पारिभाषित पद , or परिपक्वता , बाद  which the bond is redeemed , whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely .
An  एक्सेप्शन is an irredeemable बंध , ऐसे as consols , जिससे is  a perpetuity , i.e . a bond with no maturity .
A  स्केल मॉडल of  the Tower of London .
This model  can be मिला अंदर  the tower .
