Model  जहाजों और किला
A scale model is a physical model , a representation or copy of an object that is larger or smaller than the actual size  of the ऑब्जेक्ट , जिससे seeks to maintain the सापेक्ष proportions ( the स्केल फ़ैक्टर ) of the शारीरिक आकार of the असली ऑब्जेक्ट  .
Very often the scale model is  प्रयुक्त as a मार्गदर्शिका to बनाना the ऑब्जेक्ट in  full size .
Scale  मॉडल हैं निर्मित or  collected for many reasons .
The Zune HD was a portable media player in the Zune  उत्पाद परिवार released on सितंबर 15 , 2009 by microsoft  .
It was a direct competitor  साथ the ठहराना ipod और iphone श्रेणी  of mobile devices .
It  थी initially released in  16 and 32 GB capacities .
A 64 GB version was  released on अप्रैल 9 , 2010  .
It utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation and  शामिल wi-fi लिये तुल्यकालन , अभिगम to the zune  Marketplace and Web browsing .
The Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra  apx 2600 चिप , allowing it to खेल 720p वीडियो through the वैकल्पिक hdmi zune डॉक  on a high-definition television .
Otherwise , content would be scaled down to  480x272 पिक्सेल on the खिलाड़ी 's  OLED touchscreen .
बूढ़ा sparky , the इलेक्ट्रिक  chair used at Sing Sing prison
Execution by electrocution , usually  performed using an इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी , is an निष्पादन विधि originating in the संयुक्त राज्य in जिससे the  condemned person is strapped to a specially built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body .
This execution method was created by employees of Thomas Edison during the War of Currents , and has been used only  in the संयुक्त राज्य और , लिये a काल of अनेक दशकों , in the फिलीपीन ( इसके पहला उपयोग वहीँ in 1924 अंतर्गत अमरीकी  occupation , last in 1976 ) .
Historically , once the condemned person was  संलग्न to the कुर्सी , विभिन्न चक्र ( differing in वोल्टेज और अवधि ) of प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान होता be passed through the व्यक्तिगत  's body , in order to cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ) .
the पहला धक्का of इलेक्ट्रिक वर्तमान थी designed to कारण तात्कालिक unconsciousness  and brain death ; the second one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs .
मौत थी अक्सर caused by विद्युत  overstimulation of the heart .
Although in the United States the  इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै become a प्रतीक of the मौत दंड , इसके  use is in decline due to the rise of lethal injection , which is widely believed to be a more humane method of execution .
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a method of  निष्पादन , आज it is तभी कायम as a द्वितीयक विधि कि may be चुनी over lethal  injection at the request of the prisoner .
as of 2010 , electrocution is an  optional form of execution in Alabama , Florida , South Carolina and Virginia .
They allow the  कैदी to  choose lethal injection as an alternative method .
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee , the electric chair has been retired except for those whose capital crimes were committed prior to legislated dates  in 1998 ( केंटकी : कूच 31 , 1998 ; टेनेसी : दिसम्बर 31 , 1998 ) और जो chose electrocution  .
In both states , inmates who do not choose electrocution  or inmates जो वचनबद्ध उनके अपराधों बाद the designated  date are killed by lethal injection .
The  इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी is an वैकल्पिक रूप of निष्पादन स्वीकृत लिये संभावित उपयोग in अरकंसास  and Oklahoma if other forms of execution are found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution .
It is the sole method of  निष्पादन in वर्मांट , जहाँ देशद्रोह  is the only capital crime .
On February  8 , 2008 , the नेब्रास्का परम् अदालत संकल्पित  that execution by electric chair was a `` cruel and unusual punishment '' under the state 's constitution .
इस brought executions of इस प्रकार to an समाप्त  in Nebraska , the only remaining state to retain electrocution as its sole method of execution for murder .
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General Assembly , the state  विधानमंडल of the अमरीकी राज्य of मेरीलैंड , और is रचित of 141 delegates  elected from 47 districts .
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland State  हाउस ( राज्य कैपिटल ) on राज्य वृत्त in annapolis , जिससे is the राज्य  capital .
The  राज्य हाउस भी घरों the मेरीलैंड राज्य सीनेट कक्ष और the कार्यालयों of the  Governor and Lieutenant Governor of the State of Maryland .
Each Delegate has  कार्यालयों in annapolis , in the आसपास  Casper R. Taylor , Jr. House Office Building .
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle for Paris ) took place  दौरान संसार युद्ध ii इससे 19 अगस्त 1944 जबतक the आत्मसमर्पण of the occupying  German garrison on 25 August .
The Liberation of Paris started with an uprising by the French  प्रतिरोध विरूद्ध the जर्मनी गैरीसन  .
On  24 अगस्त , the फ्रेंच शक्तियां of the आंतरिक ( शक्तियां françaises de  l'intérieur , FFI ) received reinforcements from the Free French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton .
The capital region of France had been governed by Nazi Germany since the signing of the Second Compiègne Armistice in June 1940 , when  the जर्मनी फौज occupied उत्तरी और westernmost फ़्रांस , और जब the कठपुतली शासन  of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France .
This battle marked the liberation of  पेरिस और the निर्वासन of the vichy सरकारी to  Sigmaringen in Germany .
However , there was still much heavy  लड़ to be किया पहले फ़्रांस थी liberated , सहित the अभियान in दक्षिणी फ़्रांस दौरान august-september ( in provence और extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ) , साथ the german-held  seaports of western France ( such as at Brest and Dunkirk ) , in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France , and in northeastern France , such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers .
The German Army and SS fought doggedly in these areas for  the शेष of 1944  and into 1945 .
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as ``  अहसास alright '' is a सोंग लिखा by डेव मेसन of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड  Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album , Traffic .
The song was also a hit single for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969 , # 69 , recharted in  1972 , us # 33 ) , mongo santamaría ( 1969 , # 95 ) और ग्रैंड दुर्गंध रेलरोड  ( 1971 , US # 54 ) .
it रै भी महरूम अंकित by तीन श्वान रात्रि ( 1969 ) , the 5th आयाम ( 1970 ) , लू राल्स , फ्रेडी किंग , पॉल weller , lulu ,  Chairmen of the Board ( 1970 ) , Rare Earth , The Electric Concept Orchestra , Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ) , The Ohio Players ( 1971 ) , Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ) , Maceo Parker , Gladys Knight & the Pips , Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes .
A Steel Drum version by Trinidad Oil  कम्पनी थी reissued on the  dancefloor jazz compilation Blue Juice 2 .
It was also featured in the 2000 film  duets , सुंग by huey लुईस  .
Both the original and the  जो cocker कवर यहूद प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म उड़ान , अभिनीत  Denzel Washington .
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor , voice  कर्ता , सिंगर , songwriter और संगीतकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके अभिनीत भूमिका as ned bigby on the निकलोडियन sitcom ned 's declassified स्कूल  Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules , as the lead character Nolan Byrd .
Werkheiser also played  पीटर parkes in the चौथी और  final season of the ABC Family show Greek .
Sample  दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य  record based on images
Sample view of an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an  evolving अवधारणा पारिभाषित as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य सूचना  about individual patients or populations .
It is a record in digital format that is  theoretically सक्षम of होने साझा आरपार अलग स्वास्थ्य परवाह  settings .
In some cases this sharing can occur  by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना प्रणालियों  and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include a range of data , including demographics , medical history ,  दवा और allergies , immunization औकात , प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम , radiology बिंब , vital लक्षण , निजी आंकड़े जैसे आयु और  weight , and billing information .
Loan  origination is the प्रक्रम by जिससे a borrower applies  for a new loan , and a lender processes that application .
Origination generally  शामिल सब the कदम इससे लेने a ऋण अनुप्रयोग  up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ) .
Loan servicing  कवर सबकुछ बाद disbursing the  funds until the loan is fully paid off .
Loan origination is a specialized version of new  खाता खोलने लिये वित्तीय सेवाएं  organizations .
Certain people and  संगठन specialize in ऋण  origination .
Mortgage brokers and other mortgage  originator कंपनियाँ serve as a prominent  example .
There are  अनेक अलग प्रकार  of loans .
For  अधिक सूचना on ऋण प्रकार , देखिए  the loan and consumer lending articles .
Steps involved in  originating a ऋण vary by ऋण प्रकार , विभिन्न kinds of  loan risk , regulator , lender policy , and other factors .
Top left : The Tennessee Valley  प्राधिकार , भाग of the नई सौदे , होने  signed into law in 1933 .
Top right : Franklin Delano Roosevelt , who was  जिम्मेदार लिये पहलों और कार्यक्रम collectively ज्ञात as the नई  Deal .
Bottom : A  पब्लिक भित्ति इससे एक of the कलाकारों  employed by the New Deal .
The New  सौदे थी a श्रेणी of आर्थिक  programs enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936 .
They  शामिल अध्यक्षीय कार्यपालिका आदेश or कानून passed  by Congress during the first term of President Franklin D. Roosevelt .
The  कार्यक्रम यहूद in जवाब to the ग्रेट अवसाद , और केन्द्रित on कया इतिहासकारों कॉल the `` 3 rs '' :  Relief , Recovery , and Reform .
That is Relief for the unemployed and poor  ; रिकवरी of the अर्थव्यवस्था to सामान्य स्तर ; और सुधार of the वित्तीय  system to prevent a repeat depression .
The New Deal  उत्पादित a राजनैतिक realignment , बनाना the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी  the majority ( as well as the party that held the White House for seven out of nine Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ) , with its base in liberal ideas , the white South , traditional Democrats , big city machines , and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities .
The Republicans were split , with conservatives opposing  the संपूर्ण नई सौदे as an दुश्मन of कारोबार और विकास , और उदारवादियों accepting कुछ  of it and promising to make it more efficient .
The realignment crystallized into the New Deal Coalition that  वर्चस्व सबसे अध्यक्षीय चुनावों into the 1960s , जबकि the विपक्ष रूढ़िवादी  Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963 .
By 1936 the term `` liberal  '' typically थी प्रयुक्त लिये समर्थक of the नई सौदे , और  `` conservative `` for its opponents .
From  1934 to 1938 , रूज़वेल्ट थी assisted in उसके endeavours by a “pro-spender” बहुमत  in Congress ( drawn from two-party , competitive , non-machine , Progressive , and Left party districts ) .
As noted by Alexander Hicks , “Roosevelt , backed by rare ,  non-southern डेमोक्रेट majorities — 270 non-southern डेमोक्रेट प्रतिनिधि  and 71 non-Southern Democrat senators — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34  ) और a `` दूसरी नई सौदे '' ( 1935–38 ) , साथ the दूसरी एक अधिक  liberal and more controversial .
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt with diverse groups ,  इससे बैंकिंग और railroads to उद्योग और खेती , सब of जिससे मांगे सहायता लिये आर्थिक अस्तित्व  .
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration , for instance , provided $ 500 million for relief operations by states  और शहरों , जबकि the short-lived cwa ( सिविल works प्रशासन ) दिया बस्तियों धन to operate make-work  projects in 1933-34 .
The `` Second New Deal `` in 1935–38  शामिल the वेगनर अधिनियम to प्रचार मजदूर संघ , the works प्रगति प्रशासन ( wpa ) राहत कार्यक्रम ( जिससे बना the संघीय सरकारी by दूर the largest  single employer in the nation ) , the Social Security Act , and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers .
The final major items  of नई सौदे विधान यहूद the सृष्टि of the संयुक्त राज्य आवास प्राधिकार और फार्म सुरक्षा प्रशासन , दोनो in 1937 , और the मेला मजदूर मानकों  Act of 1938 , which set maximum hours and minimum wages for most categories of workers .
The economic downturn of 1937–38 , and the bitter split  between the afl और cio मजदूर संघ led to प्रमुख रिपब्लिकन gains  in Congress in 1938 .
रूढ़िवादी republicans और डेमोक्रेट in कॉंग्रेस  joined in the informal Conservative Coalition .
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs such as the WPA and CCC  और अवरोधित प्रमुख उदार प्रस्ताव  .
Roosevelt himself  turned उसके ध्यान to the युद्ध प्रयत्न  , and won reelection in 1940 and 1944 .
The Supreme Court declared the National Recovery Administration ( NRA ) and the first  संस्करण of the agricultural समायोजन अधिनियम ( aaa ) असंवैधानिक , however the aaa  was rewritten and then upheld .
As the  पहला रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित बाद fdr , ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर ( 1953–61  ) left the New Deal largely intact , even expanding it in some areas .
In the 1960s , Lyndon  B. जॉनसन 's ग्रेट समाज प्रयुक्त the नई सौदे as प्रेरणा लिये a नाटकीय विस्तार of उदार कार्यक्रम  , which Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained .
After 1974 , however , the call  लिये deregulation of the अर्थव्यवस्था gained  bipartisan support .
The New Deal regulation of banking (  glass–steagall अधिनियम ) थी निलंबित in the  1990s .
Many New Deal programs remain active , with some still operating under the  असली names , सहित the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम ( fdic ) , the संघीय क्रॉप बीमे निगम ( fcic ) , the संघीय आवास  Administration ( FHA ) , and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ) .
The largest programs still in existence today are  the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रणाली और the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग ( सेक  ) .
A  स्त्री ( ) , pl : महिलाओं  ( ) is a female human .
The term  स्त्री is प्रायः सुरक्षित लिये an वयस्क  , with the term girl being the usual term for a female child or adolescent .
However , the term woman is also sometimes used  to पहचानो a मादा इंसान , regardless of आयु , as in वाक्यांश ऐसे as  `` Women 's rights `` .
Women are typically capable of giving birth , though older  महिलाओं जो have गए through रजोनिवृत्ति और कुछ intersex महिलाओं  can not .
`` I  do n't want to मिस a बात '' is a सोंग performed  by American rock band Aerosmith for the 1998 film Armageddon .
Written by Diane Warren , the song debuted at number one on the Billboard Hot 100  ( the पहला # 1 लिये the बैंड बाद 28 सालो  together ) .
The  सोंग ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये चार सप्ताह इससे  September 5 to September 26 , 1998 .
The  सोंग भी ठहरे at क्रमांक 1 लिये अनेक  weeks in several other countries .
In the UK , the song  peaked at क्रमांक चार , बनने एरोस्मिथ 's उच्चतम charting सोंग in the uk , जहाँ it थी the 17th  best-selling single of 1998 , and has sold over a million copies .
Although not used by the majority of the world 's countries ,  daylight छायांकन समय is आम in the पश्चिमी  world .
Daylight  छायांकन समय ( dst ) —also गर्मियाँ समय in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी — is the अभ्यास of  advancing clocks during the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less .
Typically clocks  हैं समायोजित आगे एक घंटा निकट the प्रारंभ  of spring and are adjusted backward in autumn .
The modern idea of daylight saving was first  प्रस्तावित in 1895 by जार्ज vernon हडसन और it थी पहला implemented दौरान  the First World War .
Many countries have used it  at विभिन्न टाइम्स  since then .
Much of the United States used DST in the 1950s and 1960s , and DST use expanded following the 1970s energy crisis  और रै महरूम widely प्रयुक्त in उत्तर अमेरिका और यूरोपीय  since then .
The practice has  महरूम दोनो praised और criticized  .
Adding daylight  to evenings लाभ retailing , खेल , और अन्य क्रियाएँ कि exploit धूप बाद  working hours , but can cause problems for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun .
Although an early goal  of dst थी to reduce संध्या उपयोग of incandescent lighting ( formerly a प्राथमिक उपयोग of विद्युत  ) , modern heating and cooling usage patterns differ greatly , and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory .
DST clock shifts present  अन्य चुनौतियां  .
They complicate  timekeeping , और can disrupt बैठक , सफर , बिलिंग , रिकार्ड keeping , चिकित्सा डिवाइस  , heavy equipment , and sleep patterns .
तन्त्र can प्रायः समायोजन कंप्यूटर घड़ियाँ automatically , लकिन  this can be limited and error-prone , particularly when DST dates are changed .
Floorplan of the  château de montargis
Montargis is a commune in the Loiret department in  north-central फ़्रांस on the loing नदी  .
The town is located about  दक्षिण of पेरिस और ईस्ट of orléans in  the Gâtinais .
Montargis is the  दूसरी largest नगर  in the Loiret , after Orléans .
It is near a large  वन , और contains लाइट उद्योग  and farming , including saffron .
Due to  इसके numerous नहरों और पुलों , montargis  sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais . ''
Though quite  आधुनिक , it retains a मध्यकालीन  charm in its downtown area .
In computer storage , a logical unit number , or LUN , is a number  प्रयुक्त to पहचानो a लॉजिकल ईकाई , जिससे is a यंत्र addressed by the scsi प्रोटोकॉल or प्रोटोकॉल जिससे  encapsulate SCSI , such as Fibre Channel or iSCSI .
A LUN may be  प्रयुक्त साथ कोई यंत्र जिससे supports read/write परिचालन , ऐसे as a टेप  drive , but is most often used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN .
Though not technically  सही , the पद `` lun '' is प्रायः भी प्रयुक्त  to refer to the logical disk itself .
The Gospel According to Mark ( , , to  euangelion kata markon ) , commonly shortened to the इन्जील of चिह्नित or बस  Mark , is the second book of the New Testament .
This canonical account of the life  of यीशु of नासरत is एक of the तीन synoptic  gospels .
It  थी विचार to be an निचोड़ , जिससे खाते  for its place as the second gospel in the Bible .
however , सबसे समकालीन विद्वानों अभी  regard it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ) .
That Mark was used as a source for the other synoptic  gospels इन्जील of मैथ्यू और इन्जील of ल्यूक is widely आयोजित by अनेक  , although not all , New Testament scholars .
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of  यीशु इससे उसके बपतिस्मा by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to उसके मौत और क़यामत  .
It focuses particularly on the last week of his  जीवन ( अध्याय 11–16 )  in Jerusalem .
Its swift narrative  portrays यीशु as a वीर man of कार्रवाई ,  an exorcist , healer and miracle worker .
An important  थीम of चिह्नित is the मुक्तिदाता  Secret .
Jesus  silences the demoniacs he heals , कोशिशें unsuccessfully  to keep his messianic identity secret , and conceals his message with parables .
Meanwhile , the  शिष्यों असफल to समझे दोनो the implication of the चमत्कार of  Jesus and the meaning of the things he predicts about his arrest , death and resurrection .
Most scholars believe that the original text of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the discovery of Jesus '  खाली मकबरा और कि the following खाता of उसके क़यामत दिखावे is  a later addition .
According to tradition and some early church writers  , the लेखक is चिह्नित the इंजीलवादी , the साथी of the  apostle Peter .
The gospel , however , appears to rely on several underlying sources , varying in form  और in धर्मशास्त्र , जिससे tells विरूद्ध the परंपरा कि the इन्जील थी आधारित on पीटर 's  preaching .
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness accounts as well as known apostolic preachings , and pre-existing written records  कि do नहीं मौजूद आज लकिन can be पुष्टि इससे 2nd-century  commentators .
Some of the  कहानियां in the इन्जील may have महरूम transmitted orally  before being written down .
Various elements within the gospel suggest that  the लेखक लिखा in सीरियाई or फिलिस्तीन लिये a non-jewish ईसाई  community .
The  रब of the बजती is an एपिक ऊँची काल्पनिक अनोखा लिखा by अंग्रेज़ी भाषाशास्त्री और विश्वविद्यालयों  of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien .
The story began as a sequel to Tolkien 's  1937 children 's काल्पनिक अनोखा the होब्बिट ,  but eventually developed into a much larger work .
It was  लिखा in चरण between 1937 और 1949 ,  much of it during World War II .
It  is the दूसरी best-selling अनोखा कभी लिखा  , with over 150 million copies sold .
The title of the novel refers to the story 's main antagonist , the Dark Lord Sauron , who  था in an पहले आयु निर्मित the एक रिंग to नियम the अन्य बजती of शक्ति  as the ultimate weapon in his campaign to conquer and rule all of Middle-earth .
From quiet beginnings in the Shire , a Hobbit land not unlike the English countryside , the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth , following the course of the War  of the रिंग through the आँखें of इसके वर्ण , notably the hobbits frodo baggins , samwise `` sam '' gamgee , meriadoc `` मैरी '' brandybuck और peregrin `` pippin '' took , लकिन भी the hobbits  ' chief allies and travelling companions : Aragorn , a Human Ranger ; Boromir , a man from Gondor ; Gimli , a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas , an Elven prince ; and Gandalf , a Wizard .
The work was initially intended by Tolkien to be one volume of a two-volume set ,  साथ the अन्य होने the silmarillion , लकिन इस विचार थी बर्खास्त by उसके प्रकाशक  .
It was decided for economic  कारण to प्रकाशित the रब of the बजती as तीन आयतन over the कोर्स of a साल इससे 29 जुलाई  1954 to 20 October 1955 , thus creating the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy .
The three volumes were  हकदार the फेलोशिप of the रिंग  , The Two Towers , and The Return of the King .
Structurally , the novel is divided internally into six books , two per  आवाज़ , साथ अनेक appendices  of background material included at the end of the third volume .
The Lord of the Rings has since been  reprinted numerous टाइम्स और अनूदित into अनेक  languages .
Tolkien 's work has been the subject of  extensive विश्लेषण of इसके विषयवस्तु  and origins .
Although a major work in itself , the story was only the last  गति of a larger एपिक tolkien था worked on चूंकि 1917 , in a प्रक्रम he वर्णित  as mythopoeia .
Influences on this earlier work , and on the story of The Lord of the Rings , include philology , mythology ,  धर्म और the लेखक 's distaste लिये the प्रभाव of industrialization , as खूब as पहले काल्पनिक works  and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I .
The Lord of the Rings in  इसके फेरे is माना to have था a ग्रेट प्रभाव on आधुनिक काल्पनिक ; the प्रभाव of tolkien 's  works is such that the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' and `` Tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary .
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the Rings has led to numerous references in popular culture , the founding of many  समाजों by प्रशंसक of tolkien 's works , और the प्रकाशन of अनेक किताबे परिचय tolkien  and his works .
The Lord of the Rings has  प्रेरित , और continues to inspire , कलाकृति , म्यूज़िक , films और टेलीविज़न , वीडियो खेल  , and subsequent literature .
Award-winning adaptations of The  रब of the बजती have महरूम बना लिये रेडियो , थिएटर  , and film .
The following is an  एपीसोड सूची लिये the निकलोडियन  sitcom Drake & Josh .
The  श्रेणी debuted on जनवरी  11 , 2004 .
A TV film  मैरी क्रिसमस , ड्रेक & जोश थी बना  apart from the regular series on December 5 , 2008 .
There are a total of 60 episodes were  उत्पादित spanning चार सीज़न .
Drake Bell ,  जोश पेक , और मिरांडा cosgrove यहूद the तभी अभिनेताओं  to appear in all 60 episodes .
The San Francisco 49ers conduct  प्रशिक्षण शिविर at the टोली 's मुख्यालय और अभ्यास सुविधा in सांता  Clara , California in August 2010 .
The offense is wearing red jerseys  साथ the एक्सेप्शन of क्वार्टरबैक एलेक्स स्मिथ  , who is in a black jersey ; the defense in white .
In the National Football League ,  प्रशिक्षण शिविर refers to the समय पहले  the season commences .
During this time , teams will sometimes congregate  at an बाहर स्थान , प्रायः a विश्वविद्यालयों , to conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर लिये  at least the first few weeks .
This is  समान to बेसबॉल 's वसन्त  training .
Training camp is used  in अनेक अलग तरीके  .
New players and coaches use it to acclimate  themselves to नई teammates और  systems .
For younger players  , it serves as a काल of मूल्यांकन ; लिये  veterans , it is time to round back into form .
Training camp  is विभाजित into अनेक अलग  components .
The  पहला is scrimmages  .
These are  pseudo-games जहाँ टीमों चलाएं nearly  full games ' worth of plays .
Sometimes , two  अभ्यास सत्र हैं आयोजित on  the same day .
इस अवधारणा is referred to  as two-a-days .
Other parts of training  शिविर शामिल drills , बैठक साथ कोच और अन्य खिलाड़ी at  one 's position , weight training , and pre-season games .
The latter half of training  शिविर लीड सीधे into the प्रदर्शनी ऋतु  .
With  एनएफएल प्रशिक्षण शिविरों starting in late-july , the  biggest concern has been dehydration .
In 2001 ,  मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स खिलाड़ी korey stringer died  of a medical condition based from dehydration and heatstroke .
The death of Stringer prompted the NFL  to बदलें उनके प्रशिक्षण नीतियों  .
At each practice , every team  जरूर have the टोली डॉक्टर और प्रशिक्षकों on the फ़ील्ड ; additionally  , an ambulance must be present during practices .
With NFL training  शिविरों शुरूआत in लेट जुलाई , कठोर मौसम  can affect practice and exhibition games .
In 2002 , a  क्लीवलैंड भूरा प्रदर्शनी खेल ended due to बिजली निकट क्लीवलैंड भूरा स्टेडियम , और कठोर  storms have been known to disrupt training camps .
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to catch an early look at the players ; admission to  practices is प्रायः फ़्री or substantially कम महंगी than a खेल टिकट , बनाना प्रशिक्षण शिविर यात्राएँ a लोकप्रिय विकल्प लिये प्रशंसक जो can नहीं attend अनेक खेल due  to financial or other reasons .
NFL teams  प्रायः बेचें कलाकृतियां और concessions at शिविर साइट साथ  with offering activities and events to make training camp a more fan-friendly experience .
In computing , a file system ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which can be used to  स्टोर , retrieve और अद्यतन a  set of files .
The term could refer to the abstract data structures used to define files , or to the  वास्तविक तन्त्र or फर्मवेयर components कि implement the अमूर्त  ideas .
Some file  प्रणालियों हैं प्रयुक्त on लोकल आंकड़ा भंडार डिवाइस ; अन्य provide संचिका अभिगम  via a network protocol ( e.g . NFS , SMB , or 9P clients ) .
Some file systems are `` virtual '' ,  in कि the `` फाइलें '' supplied हैं computed on निवेदन ( e.g  . procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store .
The file system manages access to both the  सामग्री of फाइलें और the मेटाडेटा परिचय those  files .
It is responsible for  arranging भंडार स्पेस ; विश्वसनीयता , दक्षता , और ट्यूनिंग साथ लिहाज़  to the physical storage medium are important design considerations .
William Howard Taft ( September 15 , 1857 – March 8 , 1930 ) was the  27th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1909–1913 ) और बाद the दसवाँ मुख्य  Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ) .
He  is the तभी व्यक्ति to have  served in both of these offices .
Before becoming  अध्यक्ष , taft , a रिपब्लिकन , थी चयनित to serve on  the Superior Court of Cincinnati in 1887 .
In  1890 , taft थी नियुक्त solicitor सामान्य of the  United States and in 1891 a judge on the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit .
In 1900 , President  विलियम mckinley नियुक्त taft governor-general  of the Philippines .
In 1904 , President Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft Secretary of War in an effort  to दूल्हे taft , तब उसके बंद राजनैतिक ally , into उसके handpicked  presidential successor .
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving , assuming on  कुछ अवसरों the भूमिका of एक्टिंग सचिव of राज्य  , while declining repeated offers from Roosevelt to serve on the Supreme Court .
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt , Taft  जीती an आसान विजय in उसके 1908 बोली लिये  the presidency .
In his only term , Taft 's domestic  कार्यसूची emphasized trust-busting , सिविल सेवा सुधार , strengthening the अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स  Commission , improving the performance of the postal service , and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment .
Abroad , Taft sought to further the  आर्थिक विकास of राष्ट्र in लैटिन अमेरिका और एशिया through `` डालर कूटनीति  `` , and showed decisiveness and restraint in response to revolution in Mexico .
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the  राजनैतिक ramifications of उसके निर्णय , प्रायः alienated उसके अपना कुंजी constituencies , और थी overwhelmingly पराजित in उसके  bid for a second term in the presidential election of 1912 .
In surveys of presidential scholars , Taft is  प्रायः क्रमित निकट the मध्य of सूचियाँ of सब  American Presidents .
बाद leaving दफ्तर , taft खर्च उसके समय in academia , मध्यस्थता  , and the search for world peace through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace .
In 1921 , after  the पहला संसार युद्ध , अध्यक्ष वारेन G. हार्डिंग नियुक्त taft  Chief Justice of the United States .
Taft served in this capacity until shortly  पहले उसके मौत in 1930  .
The Ten  आयतें is a 1956 एपिक फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by सेसिल B. demille कि dramatized the biblical  story of the Exodus , in which the Hebrew-born Moses , an adopted Egyptian prince , becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves .
It starred Charlton Heston in the  सीसे भूमिका , yul brynner as उसके adoptive bhai , pharaoh rameses ii , ऐनी बैक्सटर as  Nefretiri , Edward G. Robinson as Dathan , Yvonne De Carlo as Sephora , Debra Paget as Lilia , and John Derek as Joshua .
the supporting डाल शामिल सर सेड्रिक hardwicke as pharaoh  Seti I , Nina Foch as Bithiah , Martha Scott as Yoshebel , Judith Anderson as Memnet , Vincent Price as Baka , and John Carradine as Aaron .
the फिल्मी थी released by सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें  in VistaVision on October 5 , 1956 .
The Ten Commandments , which DeMille narrated , was  the पिछला फिल्मी कि he निर्देशित  .
He  थी नियत to सीधा the 1958 रीमेक of उसके 1938 फिल्मी  The Buccaneer , but his final illness forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law , actor Anthony Quinn .
DeMille had also planned to film the  जीवन of रब baden पावेल , the संस्थापक of the स्काउट गति , साथ दाउद niven  ; this project was never realized .
The Ten Commandments is a  आंशिक रीमेक of demille 's 1923 मूक फिल्मी  .
Some of the  डाल और क्रू of the 1956 संस्करण worked  on the original .
It has since been remade as a  टेलीविज़न miniseries ब्रॉडकास्ट in अप्रैल  2006 .
The Ten Commandments is one of the most  financially कामयाब films कभी बना , grossing over $ 65 लाख  at the U.S. box office .
Adjusting for inflation , this makes  it the छठे highest-grossing फिल्मी domestically , साथ an समायोजित कुल of $ 1,025,730,000  in 2012 .
The box  दफ्तर जालस्थल ``  The Numbers '' lists the domestic gross at $ 80 million .
In 1999 , The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States  नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस as होने `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically  significant '' .
In June 2008 , the  अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नाज़िल इसके `` टेन शीर्ष टेन `` —the बेहतरीन टेन films in टेन अमरीकी फिल्मी genres—after  polling over 1,500 people from the creative community .
the टेन आयतें थी सूचीबद्ध as  the tenth best film in the epic genre .
The film received seven Academy Award  nominations सहित बेहतरीन चित्र , और जीती the अकादमी  Award for Best Visual Effects .
Charlton Heston was nominated  लिये a सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति चित्र कर्ता  in the drama category .
Yul Brynner won the National Board of Review Award for Best Actor for  उसके भूमिका as rameses , साथ साथ उसके अन्य भूमिकाएँ in the किंग और  I and Anastasia .
Louisville ( , or ) is a major city and the largest city in the U.S. state  of केंटकी और the काउंटी सीट of  Jefferson County .
Since  2003 , the नगर 's सीमायें have महरूम साथ those of the  county because of a city-county merger .
The city 's total consolidated population at the 2010 census was 741,096 ( Louisville 's balance total , 602,011 , excludes  semi-autonomous कस्बों और is the जनसांख्यिकी सूचीबद्ध in सबसे  sources and national rankings ) .
As of 2010 , the Louisville  महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( एमएसए ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,307,647 रैंकिंग  42nd nationally .
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson  काउंटी और 12 surrounding काउंटी , आठ in केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी इंडियाना ( देखिए  Geography below ) .
The Louisville Combined Statistical Area , having a population  of 1,451,564 , शामिल the एमएसए , hardin काउंटी और larue  County in Kentucky , and Scott County , Indiana .
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century ,  louisville आज is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the स्थान of the केंटकी डर्बी , the पहला of  three annual thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown .
A  ठेठ प्रायोगिक सेटअप  for an aldol reaction .
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C )  the तापमान of जिससे is होने monitored by a तापयुग्म ( the तार on  the left ) .
A cooling bath , in laboratory chemistry ( often but not always organic chemistry )  अभ्यास , is a द्रव मिश्रण जिससे is प्रयुक्त to maintain कम temperatures , typically between 13 °c  and −196 °C .
These low temperatures are used  to collect liquids बाद आसवन , to हटाएँ सॉल्वैंट्स using a रोटरी evaporator  , or to perform a chemical reaction below room temperature ( see : kinetic control ) .
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen , water , or even air ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b )  a मिश्रण of 3 components : ( 1 ) a कूलिंग एजेंट ( ऐसे as शुष्क बर्फ or जल बर्फ ) ; ( b ) a द्रव 'कैरीr ' ( ऐसे as द्रव जल , एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल , एसीटोन , इत्यादि . ) , जिससे हस्तांतरण ऊष्मा between the नहाना  and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid system .
( A  परिचित उदाहरण of इस is the  use of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze ice cream .
The phase-change of  बर्फ into द्रव जल requires उर्जा , 'pulling '  heat from the system .
adding नमक lowers the अस्थायी at जिससे  this happens , meaning more energy has to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice .
इस effectively makes the बर्फ  'colder ' — it must 'pull ' more heat from its environment to become liquid . )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient or  excessive खाना सेवन to the detriment of an व्यक्तिगत 's शारीरिक और  mental health .
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia  नर्वोज़ा हैं the सबसे आम विशिष्ट फ़ॉर्म  in the United Kingdom .
Other types of  खाने विकार शामिल binge खाने विकार  and eating disorder not otherwise specified .
bulimia नर्वोज़ा is a विकार characterized  by binge eating and purging .
Purging can  शामिल self-induce उल्टी , over-exercising  , and the usage of diuretics , enemas , and laxatives .
Anorexia  नर्वोज़ा is characterized by चरम खाना प्रतिबंध to the पाइंट  of self-starvation and excessive weight loss .
हालांकि primarily विचार of as affecting महिलाओं ( an अनुमानित 5–10 लाख  being affected in the U.K. ) , eating disorders affect males as well .
An  अनुमानित 10 – 15 % of लोगों साथ खाने विकार  are males ( Gorgan , 1999 ) .
( an estimated 1  लाख u.K. males होने प्रभावित  ) .
Although eating disorders are increasing all over  the संसार among दोनो मेन और महिलाओं , वहीँ is प्रमाण to सुझाएँ कि it is महिलाओं in the पश्चिमी  world who are at the highest risk of developing them and the degree of westernization increases the risk .
nearly हाफ of सब अमेरिकी  personally know someone with an eating disorder .
The skill to comprehend the central processes of  भूख रै increased tremendously चूंकि लेप्टिन थी खोजा , और the कौशल to observe the  functions of the brain as well .
Interactions between  प्रेरक , homeostatic और self-regulatory कंट्रोल प्रक्रियाओं हैं  involved in eating behaviour , which is a key component in eating disorders .
The precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely understood , but there is  प्रमाण कि it may be linked to अन्य चिकित्सा शर्तें और परिस्थितियों .
Cultural idealization of thinness and  youthfulness have contributed to खाने विकार  affecting diverse populations .
One study showed that girls with ADHD have a greater chance of  getting an खाने विकार than those नहीं प्रभावित  by ADHD .
Another study suggested that  महिलाओं साथ ptsd , विशेषकर due to sexually सम्बन्धित आघात , हैं अधिक संभावित to develop एनोरेक्सिया  nervosa .
One study showed that foster girls are more  संभावित to develop bulimia  nervosa .
Some think that peer pressure and  idealized body-types देखी in the मीडिया हैं भी a significant  factor .
Some research show that for certain people there  हैं जेनेटिक कारण क्यों वे may be prone to विकासशील an खाने  disorder .
Recent studies have found evidence a correlation between patients  साथ bulimia नर्वोज़ा और पदार्थ उपयोग  disorders .
In addition ,  चिंता विकार और व्यक्तित्व विकार  are common occurrences with clients of eating disorders .
While proper treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from specific  प्रकार of खाने विकार , the consequences of खाने विकार can be कठोर , सहित मौत ( whether इससे सीधा चिकित्सा प्रभाव of अशांत खाने  habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ) .
Slavery in the United States existed from the  जल्दी सालो of the औपनिवेशिक काल ; it थी firmly स्थापित by the समय the संयुक्त राज्य sought  independence from Great Britain in 1776 .
However , by 1804 , all states north of the Mason and Dixon Line  था either abolished गुलामी outright or passed कानून  for the gradual abolition of slavery .
In 1787 Congress  निषिद्ध गुलामी in the उत्तरपश्चिम  Territory .
But slavery  gained नई जीवन in the दक्षिण  with the cotton industry after 1800 , and expanded into the Southwest .
The nation was polarized into slave and free  राज्य साथ the mason-dixon लकीर ,  which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland .
The United States and Great Britain both prohibited the international slave trade in 1808 , but the domestic trade , with sales to the Deep South , expanded dramatically  , और अनेक captives यहूद shipped by the coastwise स्लेव  trade .
पहले the 1840s , the दक्षिण थी vigorously defending  slavery and its expansion into the territories .
In the  उत्तर कुछ abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार , और numerous  anti-slavery forces rejected it as detrimental to the rights of free men .
बाद विफल compromises और अब्राहम lincoln 's चुनाव , in 1861 ग्यारह स्लेव राज्य  broke away to form the Confederate States of America , leading to the American Civil War .
The federal government  in 1862 बना abolition of गुलामी a  war goal .
In January 1863 President Lincoln freed  स्लेव in the confederacy through  the Emancipation Proclamation .
After the war ,  the तेरहवीं amendment , प्रभावी दिसम्बर 1865 , abolished गुलामी  throughout the entire United States , including the Border states and the Indian territories .
From the  16th to the 19th सदियां , an अनुमानित 12 लाख africans यहूद shipped as स्लेव  to the Americas .
See Slavery in  the americas  .
The  ग्रेट बहुमत गई to the शुगर बागानों of the  West Indies or Brazil , where mortality was high .
About 645,000 were  brought to कया is अभी the संयुक्त  States .
By the 1860 United States Census , the slave  जनसांख्यिकी in the अमरीकी दक्षिण था grown to चार  million .
Of all 1,515,605  परिवारों in the 15 स्लेव राज्य , nearly 400,000 आयोजित स्लेव ( roughly  one in four ) , amounting to 8 % of all American families .
While some slaves  worked as हाउस बन्दों और शहरी शिल्पकार , the ग्रेट बहुमत worked on बागानों  or large farms , cultivating lucrative cash crops , such as rice , tobacco , sugar and , after 1800 , chiefly cotton .
By 1860 most slaves were held in  the गहन दक्षिण , जहाँ वे परोसा in work-gangs  ; two-thirds worked in cotton .
In small operations  , वे worked साथ उनके स्वामी  .
In large plantations they were  निर्देशित by श्वेत सशुल्क overseers  .
Under the system that became  chattel गुलामी ( स्वामित्व of a इंसान होने , और of his/her वंशजों ) , a जातिगत तत्व थी  fundamental : slaves were blacks of African descent and owned , almost universally , by whites of European descent .
In the 17th century , Virginia , followed by other  दक्षिणी colonies , enacted विधि कि children of स्लेव माताओं  were born into slavery .
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away (  जिससे थी मुश्किल और illegal to do ) , or by manumission by स्वामी , जिससे थी regulated by राज्य , और became increasingly  difficult or prohibited .
In the earliest  era of chattel गुलामी , the colonies भी व्यवस्थित कार्य  by a system of bonded labor known as indentured servitude .
This typically lasted for several years for  दोनो ग़रीब europeans और africans alike , to अदा बंद the लागत  of transport to the colonies .
They contracted for  ऐसे इंतजाम क्युकी of ग़रीब  economies in their home countries .
Between  1680 और 1700 , as कम europeans migrated  to the colonies , planters began to import more Africans as slaves .
Recognizing the importance of slavery , the  हाउस of burgesses in वर्जिनिया enacted a  new slave code in 1705 ; it combined a variety of legislation and added new provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law .
Schematic cross  खण्ड of भाग of पत्ता , जाइलम  shown as red circles at figure 8 .
Xylem is  एक of the दो प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular  plants ( phloem is the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from  the यूनानी शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ) , अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम  tissue is wood , though it is found throughout the plant .
Its basic  फलन is to हस्तांतरण जल , लकिन it भी transports कुछ nutrients  through the plant .
This  क्लॉक प्रतिनिधित्व shows कुछ of the प्रमुख इकाई  of geological time and definitive events of Earth history .
The Hadean eon  represents the समय पहले चट्टान रिकार्ड of जीवन on धरती ; इसके अपर boundary is अभी  regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years ago ) .
Other subdivisions reflect the evolution of life ; the Archean and Proterozoic are both eons ,  the palaeozoic , mesozoic और cenozoic हैं eras of the phanerozoic  eon .
The two million year  quaternary काल , the समय of recognizable इंसानो  , is too small to be visible at this scale .
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to time , and is used by geologists , paleontologists , and other  धरती वैज्ञानिकों to describe the समय और संबंध between कार्यक्रम कि have occurred throughout  Earth 's history .
The table of geologic time spans presented here  agrees साथ the तिथियाँ और नामकरण नियत forth by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आयोग on स्तरिकी मानक रंग  codes of the International Commission on Stratigraphy .
Evidence from radiometric dating  indicates कि the धरती is परिचय 4.54  billion years old .
The geology or deep time of Earth 's past has been organized into various units according to  कार्यक्रम जिससे took प्लेस in प्रत्येक  period .
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by  परिवर्तन in the संयोजन of strata जिससे correspond to उन्हें , indicating प्रमुख geological or paleontological  events , such as mass extinctions .
For example , the boundary between the Cretaceous  काल और the paleogene काल is पारिभाषित by the cretaceous–paleogene extinction इवेंट , जिससे चिह्नित the  demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life .
Older time spans which predate the reliable fossil record (  पहले the proterozoic इओन ) हैं पारिभाषित by निरपेक्ष  age .
The TI-82 is a  graphing परिपथ बना by  Texas Instruments .
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a  stripped bas , अधिक उपयोक्ता दोस्ताना संस्करण of the ti-85 , और as a  replacement for the TI-81 .
It was the direct  पूर्ववर्ती of the ti-83  .
It shares with the TI-85 a 6 MHz  zilog z80 माइक्रोप्रोसेसर  .
Like the TI-81 , the TI-82 features a 96x64  पिक्सेल प्रदर्शक , और the कोर विशेषता नियत of the  TI-81 with many new features .
The cast of  वर्ण of the किंग of सेनानी  XI .
The King of Fighters fighting game series ,  उत्पादित by snk playmore , शामिल a चौड़ी डाल of वर्ण , कुछ of जिससे हैं  taken from other SNK games .
The story takes  प्लेस in a fictional ब्रह्मांड in जिससे an सालाना श्रेणी of 3-on-3  or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held .
The first game in the series introduces  the आरंभिक प्रमुख अक्षर of the श्रेणी , kyo kusanagi , a यंग जापानी सेनानी जो is the वारिस to  a powerful group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities .
Kyo fights against the  kusanagi गोत्र 's दुश्मनों , उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वी iori yagami , और the परमेश्वर  Orochi and its human followers , among others .
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights , while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a new story arc , revolving around K ' , a young  man जो seeks to नष्ट the रहस्यमय nests संगठन क्युकी वे kidnapped उसे at an जल्दी आयु और stripped उसे of उसके पास्ट यादें , so कि वे could  force him to be a fighter under their control .
In The King of Fighters 2003 , a new character named Ash Crimson enters the tournament , to steal the powers  of the clans जो sealed the orochi in the पास्ट लिये an अनजान कारण  .
A  नई समूह of antagonists , ज्ञात as those इससे the पास्ट , भी appears in  the series ; they want to obtain Orochi 's power for the purpose of giving it to their unknown master .
The plot and  the वर्ण आए इससे the  Yamata no Orochi legend .
There are also several  वर्ण in the खेल कि हैं parodies  or homages to several popular anime , manga , and films .
Merchandise based on the  वर्ण रै भी महरूम released , सहित  action figures and keychains .
The characters have garnered praise from  अनेक वीडियो खेल publications लिये the विशेषता of उनके  designs and movesets .
Comments focused on the lack of improvements  in कुछ of the वर्ण , लकिन  added that the roster is greatly diverse .
Whale Wars is a weekly American documentary-style reality television series that premiered on November  7 , 2008 on the एनिमल ग्रह केबल  channel .
The program follows Paul Watson , founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation  समाज , as he और the क्रू सवार उनके विभिन्न बरतन harass  Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica .
On January 5 , 2013 , Animal  ग्रह नवीनीकृत the श्रेणी लिये a छठे  season .
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia harpyja ) is a  neotropical प्रजाति of त्रिभुज .
It is sometimes known as the  अमरीकी harpy त्रिभुज to फर्क it इससे the पापुआई त्रिभुज जिससे is sometimes ज्ञात as the नई  Guinea Harpy Eagle or Papuan Harpy Eagle .
It is the largest and most powerful raptor  मिला in the americas , और among the largest extant प्रजाति  of eagles in the world .
It usually inhabits tropical lowland  rainforests in the अपर ( emergent ) canopy  layer .
Destruction of its natural habitat has seen it vanish from many parts of its former range ,  और it is nearly extirpated in सेंट्रल  America .
Biological classification , or scientific classification in biology , is a method of  वैज्ञानिक taxonomy प्रयुक्त to समूह और categorize जीवों into समूह  such as genus or species .
These groups are  ज्ञात as taxa ( एकवचन  : taxon ) .
Modern biological classification has its root in the work of Carolus  लीनियस , जो grouped प्रजाति according to साझा शारीरिक विशेषताएँ  .
These groupings have since been revised to  improve संगति साथ the darwinian principle of आम  descent .
With the  परिचय of the cladistic विधि in the लेट 20th सदी , phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे  organisms are grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness , ignoring morphological similarity , has become common in some areas of biology .
Molecular phylogenetics , which uses DNA sequences as data  , रै भी चलित अनेक हाल revisions और is संभावित  to continue doing so .
biological वर्गीकरण belongs  to the science of biological systematics .
Lennon  's हस्ताक्षर
John Winston Ono Lennon , ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was  an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार , सिंगर और songwriter जो रोज़ to विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as a संस्थापक सदस्य of the बीटल्स , एक of the सबसे  commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music .
With Paul McCartney , he formed one  of the सबसे मनाये songwriting partnerships  of the 20th century .
Born and raised in Liverpool , as a teenager Lennon became involved in the skiffle  craze ; उसके पहला बैंड , the quarrymen ,  evolved into the Beatles in 1960 .
As the group disintegrated towards  the समाप्त of the दशक , लेनन embarked on a सोलो करियर कि उत्पादित the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन lennon/plastic  Ono Band and Imagine , and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a Chance `` and `` Imagine `` .
After his marriage to Yoko  ओनो in 1969 , he बदला उसके नाम to  John Ono Lennon .
लेनन disengaged खुद इससे the म्यूज़िक कारोबार in 1975 to devote समय to उठाने उसके शिशु बेटे शॉन  , but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new album Double Fantasy .
He  थी murdered तीन सप्ताह बाद इसके  release .
Lennon  नाज़िल a rebellious प्रकृति और acerbic wit  in his music , writing , drawings , on film and in interviews .
Controversial through his political and peace activism , he moved to New York City in 1971 , where his  आलोचना of the वियतनाम युद्ध resulted in a lengthy attempt by रिचर्ड निक्सन 's प्रशासन to निर्वासन उसे , जबकि कुछ of उसके गीतों यहूद अपनाया  as anthems by the anti-war movement .
As of 2012 , Lennon 's solo album sales in the United  राज्य exceed 14 लाख इकाई , और as लेखक , co-writer or यजमान , he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one  singles on the US Hot 100 chart .
In 2002 , a BBC poll on the 100 Greatest Britons voted him eighth , and in  2008 , रोलिंग स्टोन क्रमित उसे the fifth-greatest सिंगर  of all time .
He was  मरणोपरांत inducted into the songwriters हॉल of कीर्ति in  1987 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994 .
Statue of  rip वैन winkle in irvington , नई यॉर्क , नहीं  far from `` Sunnyside `` , the home of Washington Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a  छोटी स्टोरी by अमरीकी लेखक वॉशिंगटन इरविंग  published in 1819 , as well as the name of the story 's fictional protagonist .
Written while Irving was living in Birmingham , England , it  थी भाग of a संग्रहण हकदार the स्केच किताब of geoffrey  Crayon .
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill  kyu , इरविंग बाद admitted , `` जब i लिखा the स्टोरी  , I had never been on the Catskills . ''
Throughout the  fifty-five साल इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , अनेक significant  records have been set .
This  पेज तभी शामिल the प्रतिस्पर्धी  awards won by various artists .
This does not include the various special awards that are  प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences ऐसे as आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार , trustees  Awards , Technical Awards or Legend Awards .
The page however does include other  non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) कि  may have been presented to the artist ( s ) .
Pee-wee Herman is a  कॉमिक fictional अक्षर निर्मित और portrayed by अमरीकी  comedian Paul Reubens .
He is best known for his two television series  और फिल्मी श्रेणी दौरान the 1980s  .
The childlike Pee-wee Herman  अक्षर विकसित as a स्टेज अधिनियम कि जल्दी led to an  HBO special in 1981 .
As the stage performance gained further  लोकप्रियता , reubens took the अक्षर to गति चित्र साथ  Pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985 , toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children .
This paved the way for  pee-wee 's playhouse , an एमी पुरस्कार जीतना children  's series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991 .
Another film , Big Top  pee-wee , थी released in 1988 .
Due to negative media attention following a scandal in 1991 , Reubens decided to shelve his  alter अहंकार दौरान the 1990s , और तब धीरे resurrected it दौरान the following  decade .
It was at that  समय कि reubens addressed योजनाएँ to लिखें a  new Pee-wee film , Pee-wee 's Playhouse : The Movie .
In June 2007 , Reubens appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the  पहला समय चूंकि 1991 at स्पाइक tv 's यारों ' चुनाव पुरस्कार  .
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a group of teenage friends living in the fictional  suburban कस्बा of पाइंट प्लेस , विस्कॉन्सिन , इससे may 17 , 1976 , to दिसम्बर  31 , 1979 .
It debuted on the Fox television network , first airing on August 23 , 1998 ,  कार्यशील लिये आठ लगातार सीज़न , और concluding साथ the  200th episode on May 18 , 2006 .
The main teenage cast members were Topher Grace , Mila Kunis , Ashton Kutcher , Danny  masterson , लौरा prepon , और wilmer valderrama  .
the प्रमुख वयस्क डाल सदस्यों यहूद डेबरा  Jo Rupp , Kurtwood Smith , Don Stark and , during the first three seasons , Tanya Roberts .
Kansas ( ) is a U.S.  राज्य स्तिथ in the midwestern संयुक्त  States .
It is named after the Kansas River which  बहती through it , जिससे in फेरे थी नामित बाद the  Kansa Native American tribe , which inhabited the area .
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to mean `` people of the wind '' or `` people  of the दक्षिण हवा , '' हालांकि इस थी संभवतः नहीं the पद 's असली अर्थ  .
Residents of  कान्सास हैं पुकारा `` kansans  . ''
For thousands of years what is now Kansas was home to  numerous और विविध देशी अमरीकी  tribes .
जनजातियों in the पूर्वी भाग of the  state generally lived in villages along the river valleys .
Tribes in the Western  भाग of the राज्य यहूद सेमi- nomadic और hunted  large herds of bison .
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the  1830s , लकिन the pace of उपनिवेश त्वरित in the 1850s  , in the midst of political wars over the slavery issue .
When officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854 , abolitionist Free-Staters from New England and  pro-slavery settlers इससे neighboring मिसौरी rushed to the territory to determine if कान्सास होता become a फ़्री राज्य or a स्लेव राज्य  .
Thus , the  क्षेत्रफल थी a hotbed of हिंसा और अराजकता in इसके जल्दी दिनों as ये शक्तियां  collided , and was known as Bleeding Kansas .
the abolitionists आखिरकार prevailed  and on January 29 , 1861 , Kansas entered the Union as a free state .
After the Civil War , the population of Kansas grew  rapidly , जब लहरें of आप्रवासियों turned the  prairie into farmland .
Today , Kansas  is एक of the सबसे उत्पादक agricultural राज्य ,  producing high yields of wheat , sorghum and sunflowers .
कान्सास is the 15th सबसे extensive और the 33rd सबसे  populous of the 50 United States .
Psychology  is an अकादमिक और लागू अनुशासन कि involves  the scientific study of mental functions and behaviors .
Psychology has the immediate goal of understanding individuals and groups by both establishing general principles and  researching विशिष्ट मामले , और by अनेक खाते it ultimately  aims to benefit society .
In this field , a professional or  शोधकर्ता is पुकारा a मनोवैज्ञानिक और can be वर्गीकृत as a सोशल , behavioral  , or cognitive scientist .
Psychologists  attempt to समझे the भूमिका of दिमागी कृत्यों in व्यक्तिगत और सोशल बर्ताव , जबकि भी  exploring the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors .
Psychologists explore concepts such as perception , cognition , attention  , जज्बात , phenomenology , प्रेरणा , दिमाग कामकाज , व्यक्तित्व , बर्ताव  , and interpersonal relationships .
Psychologists of diverse  धारियाँ भी consider the बेहोश  mind .
Psychologists employ empirical methods to infer  causal और correlational संबंध between psychosocial परिवर्तनीय  .
In addition , or in opposition , to employing empirical and deductive methods ,  some—especially नैदानिक और counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon सांकेतिक निर्वचन  and other inductive techniques .
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '' , with  मनोवैज्ञानिक निष्कर्षों linking to शोध और perspectives इससे the सोशल sciences , प्राकृतिक sciences , आयुर्विज्ञान  , and the humanities , such as philosophy .
While  मनोवैज्ञानिक ज्ञान is प्रायः लागू to the मूल्यांकन और उपचार  of mental health problems , it is also directed towards understanding and solving problems in many different spheres of human activity .
The majority of psychologists are involved in some kind of  therapeutic भूमिका , practicing in नैदानिक , counseling , or स्कूल  settings .
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior  , और typically कार्य in विश्वविद्यालयों मनोविज्ञान विभाग or सिखा in अन्य अकादमिक जमावट ( e.g. , चिकित्सा  schools , hospitals ) .
Some are employed in industrial and organizational settings , or in other areas such as human development and aging ,  खेल , स्वास्थ्य , और the मीडिया , as खूब as in forensic छानबीन और अन्य पहलुओं  of law .
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13 , 1743 ( April 2 , 1743 O.S. ) – July 4 ,  1826 ) थी an अमरीकी founding पिता , the प्रिंसिपल लेखक of the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता ( 1776 )  and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ) .
At the beginning of the American Revolution , he served in the Continental Congress ,  representing वर्जिनिया और तब परोसा as a wartime राज्यपाल of वर्जिनिया ( 1779–1781  ) .
Just after the war  ended , इससे mid-1784 जेफरसन परोसा as a राजनयिक  , stationed in Paris .
In May 1785 , he  became the संयुक्त राज्य  Minister to France .
Jefferson was the first United States  सचिव of राज्य ( 1790–1793 ) सेवारत अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष  George Washington .
With his close  dost जेम्स मैडिसन he व्यवस्थित the democratic-republican पार्टी , और subsequently resigned  from Washington 's cabinet .
Elected Vice President in 1796 , when he came in second to John Adams of  the federalists , जेफरसन opposed एडम्स और साथ मैडिसन secretly लिखा the केंटकी और वर्जिनिया रिज़ॉल्यूशन , जिससे attempted  to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts .
Elected president in what  जेफरसन पुकारा the क्रान्ति of 1800 , he oversaw the खरीदें of the  vast Louisiana Territory from France ( 1803 ) , and sent the Lewis and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west .
His second term was beset with troubles at home , such as the  विफल देशद्रोह विचारण of उसके पूर्व वाइस अध्यक्ष  Aaron Burr .
With escalating  ट्रबल साथ ब्रिटेन जो थी चुनौतीपूर्ण अमरीकी neutrality और threatening  shipping at sea , he tried economic warfare with his embargo laws which only damaged American trade .
In 1803 , President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian  जनजातीय हटाना और relocation to the louisiana territory वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी , in अनुक्रम  to open lands for eventual American settlers .
A leader in the Enlightenment , Jefferson was a  बहुश्रुत जो spoke पाँच भाषाएं धड़ल्ले और थी deeply दिलचस्पी in विज्ञान , आविष्कार , वास्तुकला , धर्म और दर्शनशास्त्र  , interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency .
He designed his own large mansion  on a 5,000 एकड़ वृक्षारोपण निकट charlottesville ,  Virginia , which he named Monticello .
While  नहीं a notable orator , जेफरसन थी  a skilled writer and corresponded with many influential people in America and Europe throughout his adult life .
हालांकि जेफरसन स्वामित्व अनेक स्लेव , he opposed the संस्था सब उसके जीवन और  consequently treated and took care of them very well and expected them to work no more than free farmers .
चूंकि 1802 इतिहासकारों और अन्य have महरूम विभाजित over the विवाद of whether जेफरसन  was the father of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings , a slave at Monticello . ''
Historians are also in  असहमति साथ कैसा much जेफरसन थी वचनबद्ध to the  anti-slavery cause .
In 1807 , President Jefferson signed into law a  विधेयक कि बैन the importation of स्लेव into  the United States .
After Martha  जेफरसन , उसके बीवी of ग्यारह सालो , died in 1782 , जेफरसन remained a विधुर लिये the बाकी of उसके जीवन ; उनके विवाह उत्पादित छह  children , of whom two survived to adulthood .
Though Jefferson has been criticized by many modern day scholars over the issue of slavery , he  remains रेटेड as एक of the महानतम u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों  .
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written  by स्टीवन वैन zandt , उत्पादित by वैन zandt और आर्थर  Baker and recorded by Artists United Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South African policy of apartheid .
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the artists involved would refuse any and all offers to perform at Sun City , a resort  जिससे थी स्तिथ in bantustan of bophuthatswana , एक of a क्रमांक of internationally अपरिचित supposed `` स्वतंत्र '' राज्य निर्मित by the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी सरकारी to forcibly  relocate its black population .
This page is  a सूची of वर्ण in the पुलिस अकादमी फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न  series .
Bill Russell won 11 championships  साथ the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स  .
This is a list of NBA players  साथ सबसे championships जीती as  a player .
The National  बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ) is a प्रमुख पेशेवर बास्केट  league in North America .
It was founded in 1946 as the  बास्केट संघ of अमेरिका  ( BAA ) .
The league adopted  इसके वर्तमान नाम at the प्रारंभ of  the when it merged with the National Basketball League ( NBL ) .
The NBA  फाइनल is the चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी लिये the एनबीए  and the conclusion of the sport 's postseason .
The winning team of the  श्रेणी receives the लैरी o'brien चैंपियनशिप  Trophy .
Players from the winning team usually receive championship  बजती इससे the टोली honoring उनके योगदान  .
However , in some rare occasion ,  the टीमों opted to दिया अन्य commemorative  items , such as wrist watches , instead of rings .
The number of championships won by NBA  सुपरस्टार is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a मापन of उनके विशालता  .
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the record for the  सबसे एनबीए championships जीती साथ 11 शीर्षक दौरान  his 13-year playing career .
He won his first  चैंपियनशिप साथ the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स  in his rookie year .
Afterwards , he went on to win 10 championships in the next 12  सालो , सहित आठ लगातार  championships from 1959 to 1966 .
He won the  पिछला दो championships  in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach .
Russell 's teammate , Sam  जोन्स , जीती 10 championships इससे 1959  to 1969 , the second most in NBA history .
Four Celtics players , Tom Heinsohn , K. C.  जोन्स , satch सैंडर्स और जॉन havlicek , जीती आठ championships  each .
Two other Celtics , Jim  loscutoff और फ़्रैंक रैमसे , जीती सात  championships each .
Four players , Bob Cousy , Kareem  abdul-jabbar , माइकल जॉर्डन और scottie pippen , जीती  six championships each .
Jordan and Pippen  हैं सदस्यों of the शिकागो bulls टोली  who won three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s .
Robert Horry  और जॉन salley हैं the तभी खिलाड़ी to have जीती  the championships with three different teams .
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets , the Los Angeles Lakers and the San Antonio Spurs ,  जबकि salley जीती चार championships साथ the डेट्रॉयट पिस्टन्स , the bulls और the लेकर्स .
Frank Saul and  स्टीव केर हैं the तभी खिलाड़ी to जीत दो championships  with two different teams in consecutive seasons .
Saul won  लगातार championships साथ the रोचेस्टर रॉयल्स और the मिनियापोलिस  Lakers in the 1950s , while Kerr won consecutive championships with the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
Accuracy indicates proximity of  मापन परिणाम to the सच्चा मान , परिशुद्धता to the  repeatability , or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science , engineering , industry , and statistics , the accuracy of a measurement  प्रणाली is the उपाधि of निकटता of माप of a मात्रा to कि मात्रा 's वास्तविक ( सच्चा  ) value .
The precision of a  मापन प्रणाली , भी पुकारा reproducibility or repeatability , is  the degree to which repeated measurements under unchanged conditions show the same results .
Although the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous  in colloquial उपयोग , वे हैं deliberately  contrasted in the context of the scientific method .
A measurement system can be accurate  लकिन नहीं precise , precise लकिन नहीं सटीक , neither , or  both .
For example  , if an प्रयोग contains a व्यवस्थित गलती , तब increasing the  sample size generally increases precision but does not improve accuracy .
The result would be a consistent yet inaccurate  स्ट्रिंग of परिणाम  from the flawed experiment .
Eliminating the  व्यवस्थित गलती improves सटीकता  but does not change precision .
A  मापन प्रणाली is designated मान्य if it is  both accurate and precise .
Related terms include bias ( non- random or directed  प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर or कारकों unrelated to the स्वतंत्र  variable ) and error ( random variability ) .
The terminology is also applied to  अप्रत्यक्ष measurements—that is , मान प्राप्त  by a computational procedure from observed data .
In addition  to सटीकता और परिशुद्धता , माप may भी  have a measurement resolution , which is the smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement .
In the case of full reproducibility , such as when rounding a number to a  representable फ्लोटिंग पाइंट क्रमांक , the शब्द परिशुद्धता रै a  meaning not related to reproducibility .
For  उदाहरण , in the आईईईई 754-2008 मानक it अर्थात् the क्रमांक of बिट्स in the significand , so it is प्रयुक्त  as a measure for the relative accuracy with which an arbitrary number can be represented .
Fuck in its literal  अर्थ refers to the अधिनियम of यौन मैथुन  .
It is an English  शब्द कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity , either to denote  disdain or as an intensifier .
The origin of  the शब्द is  obscure .
It is usually  माना to be पहला attested to around 1475  , but it may be considerably older .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker  और fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा , a क्रिया , an क्रियाशील or  an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the word  , as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it , ऐसे as motherfucker  .
Animated ,  color-coded मैप प्रर्दशित the विभिन्न  continents and regions .
Depending on the convention and model , some continents may be consolidated or subdivided : for example , Eurasia is most often subdivided into  यूरोपीय और एशिया ( रेड शेड्स ) , जबकि उत्तर और दक्षिण अमेरिका हैं sometimes पहचाना  as one American continent ( green shades ) .
A  महाद्वीप is एक of अनेक बहुत  large landmasses on Earth .
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict  मापदण्ड , साथ up to सात regions commonly regarded as continents—they  are ( from largest in size to smallest ) : Asia , Africa , North America , South America , Antarctica , Europe , and Australia .
In geology ,  महाद्वीपों हैं वर्णित by  means of tectonic plates .
Plate  विवर्तनिकी is the प्रक्रम और पढ़ाई of the गति  , collision and division of continents , earlier known as continental drift .
Biker Boyz is a 2003 film about a group of  भूमिगत मोटरसाइकिल खीचें racers  .
It stars Laurence Fishburne , Djimon  hounsou , डेरेक ल्यूक , meagan शुभ , और larenz टेट और is लिखा और निर्देशित by reggie  Rock Bythewood .
It also  सुविधाएँ लिसा bonet , ऑरलैंडो जोन्स , बच्चा चट्टान और वैनेसा  Bell Calloway .
For the Steel  पैंथर सोंग , देखिए  Feel the Steel .
जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी is a वैवाहिक प्रॉपर्टी शासन कि originated  in civil law jurisdictions and is now also found in some common law jurisdictions .
The states of the United States that recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it was inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system , which  itself थी inherited इससे स्पेनी विधि ( a रोमन -derived सिविल विधि प्रणाली ) और ultimately इससे the  Visigoths .
While under Spanish rule  louisiana अपनाया the ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली of acquests और gains , जिससे replaced the परंपरागत फ्रेंच  community of movables and acquests in its civil law system .
मैप of the संयुक्त राज्य  with community property states highlighted in red .
In addition to the highlighted states , Alaska is a  पृथक प्रॉपर्टी राज्य कि permits युगल to ऑप्ट into a जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी  arrangement .
In a community  प्रॉपर्टी क्षेत्राधिकार , सबसे प्रॉपर्टी acquired दौरान the विवाह ( मगर लिये उपहार or inheritances ) —the जातियाँ ,  or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce , annulment or death .
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the absence of specific  प्रमाण कि होता पाइंट to a contrary निष्कर्ष लिये a particular  piece of property .
प्रभाग of जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी may लो प्लेस  by item , by splitting all items or by value .
In some jurisdictions , such as  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , a 50/50 प्रभाग of जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी is सख्ती mandated by statute , अर्थ कि the फ़ोकस तब  shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as community or separate property .
In other jurisdictions , such as Texas , a divorce court may decree an ``  निष्पक्ष वितरण `` of जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी , जिससे may परिणाम in an गैरबराबरी प्रभाग of  such .
In non-community  प्रॉपर्टी राज्य प्रॉपर्टी may be विभाजित  by equitable distribution .
Generally  बोलना , the प्रॉपर्टी कि प्रत्येक संगी brings into the विवाह or  receives by gift , bequest or devise during marriage is called separate property ( i.e. , not community property ) .
See  प्रभाग of प्रॉपर्टी  .
प्रभाग of जातियाँ debts may नहीं  be the same as division of community property .
For example , in California , community property is  जरूरी to be विभाजित `` बराबर '' जबकि जातियाँ कर्ज़ is  required to be divided `` equitably '' .
Property that is owned by one spouse before the  विवाह is the पृथक प्रॉपर्टी of कि जीवनसाथी , जबतक the प्रॉपर्टी is `` transmuted '' into जातियाँ  property .
the नियम लिये इस  vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction .
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge waving to  the भीड at the मॉल shortly बाद  the wedding .
The wedding of Prince William , Duke of Cambridge , and Catherine  मिडलटन took प्लेस on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी  in London .
The groom , Prince William , Duke of Cambridge , is the eldest son of Charles , Prince of Wales , and is second in the  लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to the अंग्रेजों सिंहासन और the तख्तों of पंद्रह अन्य  Commonwealth realms .
The bride , Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is  the ज्येष्ठ of तीन children of माइकल और carole मिडलटन of bucklebury  , Berkshire .
The Dean of Westminster , John Hall ,  presided at the सेवा ; the archbishop of canterbury , rowan विलियम्स , conducted the विवाह ; रिचर्ड chartres , the बिशप  of London , preached the sermon ; and a reading was given by the bride 's brother , James .
विलियम 's बेहतरीन man थी उसके bhai , प्रिंस हैरी , जबकि the बहू  's sister , Pippa , was maid of honour .
The ceremony was attended by the bride  's और दूल्हे 's परिवारों , as खूब as अनेक विदेशी रॉयल्स ,  diplomats , and the couple 's chosen personal guests .
After the ceremony , the couple  बना the परंपरागत रूप on the बालकनी  of Buckingham Palace .
As Prince William was  नहीं the वारिस apparent to the सिंहासन , the विवाह थी नहीं a पूरा राज्य अवसर और अनेक विवरण  were left to the couple to decide , such as much of the guest list of about 1,900 .
Prince  विलियम और केट मिडलटन मिले  in 2001 .
Their engagement on  20 अक्तूबर 2010 थी घोषित on 16 नवम्बर  2010 .
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much  मीडिया ध्यान , होने compared in अनेक तरीके साथ the 1981 विवाह  of William 's parents .
The occasion was a public holiday in the United Kingdom and  प्रदर्शित अनेक ceremonial पहलुओं , सहित उपयोग of the राज्य carriages और भूमिकाएँ लिये the पैर गार्ड और  Household Cavalry .
Events were held around the Commonwealth to mark the wedding ; organisations and hotels held events  आरपार कनाडा , over 5,000 गली पार्टियों यहूद आयोजित throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम , और एक लाख लोगों lined the रूट between  Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace .
The ceremony  थी viewed सजीव by tens of लाखो अधिक  around the world , including 72 million on the YouTube Royal Channel .
In the United Kingdom ,  टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस peaked at 26.3 लाख दर्शक , साथ a कुल of 36.7  million watching part of the coverage .
