A hand ( med . / lat . : manus , pl . manūs ) is a prehensile , multi- fingered extremity located at the end of an arm  or forelimb of primates और इंसानो , chimpanzees , बंदरों , और lemurs  .
a few अन्य vertebrates ऐसे as the कोआला ( जिससे रै दो opposable thumbs on प्रत्येक `` हाथ '' और फिंगरप्रिंट  remarkably similar to human fingerprints ) are often described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs .
Hands are the main structures for physically manipulating the environment ,  प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो सकल मोटर कौशल ( ऐसे as grasping a विशाल ऑब्जेक्ट ) और ठीक मोटर कौशल  ( such as picking up a small pebble ) .
The fingertips  contain कुछ of the densest क्षेत्रों of तंत्रिका endings on the देह , हैं the richest सोर्स of  tactile feedback , and have the greatest positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands .
Like other paired organs ( eyes , feet , legs ) , each hand is dominantly  नियंत्रित by the opposing दिमाग गोलार्ध , so कि handedness , or the पसन्दीदा हाथ चुनाव लिये single-handed क्रियाएँ  such as writing with a pencil , reflects individual brain functioning .
Some  विकासवादी anatomists उपयोग the पद हाथ to refer to the appendage of अंक on the forelimb अधिक generally — लिये उदाहरण  , in the context of whether the three digits of the bird hand involved the same homologous loss of two digits as in the dinosaur hand .
The human hand has 27 bones , not including  the sesamoid हड्डियों जिससे क्रमांक  varies between people .
14 of which are the phalanges ( proximal ,  इंटरमीडिएट और distal ) of the उंगलियाँ  .
The metacarpals are the  हड्डियों कि connects the उंगलियाँ और the  wrist .
प्रत्येक इंसान हाथ  has 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal bones .
too कूल थी a पेशेवर कुश्ती  tag team and former faction most notably active in World Wrestling Federation/Entertainment between 1998 and 2001 and for a short time in 2004 .
मौलिक डिजिटल सचेतक  clock without a radio .
The mark in the top-left of  the प्रदर्शक indicates कि the समय  is 4:00pm , not 4:00am .
A 1969 radio alarm clock ( Sony Digimatic  8fc-59w ) साथ an जल्दी mechanical-digital  display .
A digital clock is a type  of क्लॉक कि प्रदर्शक the समय डिजिटली , i.e . in numerals or अन्य प्रतीकों  , as opposed to an analog clock , where the time is indicated by the positions of rotating hands .
डिजिटल घड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः संबद्ध साथ इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ड्राइव , लकिन  the `` digital '' description refers only to the display , not to the drive mechanism .
( Both analog and digital clocks can be driven either  mechanically or electronically , लकिन `` घटीयंत्र '' mechanisms  with digital displays are rare . )
The biggest digital  क्लॉक is the lichtzeitpegel ( `` लाइट समय स्तर '' ) on the टेलीविज़न  tower Rheinturm Düsseldorf , Germany .
Family Guy creator  सेठ macfarlane भी provides the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin , stewie griffin  , Brian Griffin , and Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is an  अमरीकी एनिमेटेड sitcom कि सुविधाएँ पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं , और numerous नियमित  cast and recurring guest stars .
The  प्रिंसिपल आवाज़ डाल consists of दिखाएँ निर्माता सेठ macfarlane , एलेक्स borstein , सेठ  Green , Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now , the new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include  पैट्रिक warburton , आदम वेस्ट , जॉन G. ब्रेनन , निकोल सुलीवान और जेनिफर tilly , और repeat अतिथि सितारों शामिल फिलिस diller ,  Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
अनेक डाल सदस्यों provide आवाज़ें  for multiple characters .
The voice actors , in portraying the various character  personalities on the दिखाएँ , चित्रण प्रेरणा इससे हस्तियाँ  and pop culture .
Family Guy  वर्ण have महरूम निभाई by अधिक than एक कर्ता , बाद सदस्यों of  the show left the series or had conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode  `` मुश्किल विधिक `` और macfarlane रै भी जीती an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन  and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production , though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series .
The five sets  of the फलक खेल एकाधिकार चित्रित यहाँ दिखाएँ the  evolution of the game 's artwork and designs in the United States from 1935–2005 .
The history  of the फलक खेल एकाधिकार can be traced वापस to the  early 20th century .
The earliest known  डिज़ाइन थी by the अमरीकी , एलिज़ाबेथ magie , patented in 1904 लकिन  existing as early as 1902 .
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to  illustrate an आर्थिक principle , namely the georgist अवधारणा  of a single land value tax .
A series of board games  यहूद विकसित इससे 1906 through the 1930s कि शामिल the खरीदे और selling  of land and the development of that land .
By 1934 , a board game had been created much like the version of Monopoly sold by Parker  भाइयो और इसके सम्बन्धित कंपनियाँ through the  rest of the 20th century , and into the 21st .
Several people , mostly in the Midwestern United States and near  the ईस्ट coast , contributed to the खेल 's डिज़ाइन और एवोल्यूशन  .
By the 1970s , the idea that the game had been created  solely by चार्ल्स darrow था become लोकप्रिय लोकगीत ; it थी मुद्रित in the  game 's instructions for many years , in a 1974 book devoted to Monopoly , and was cited in a general book about toys even as recently as 2007 .
Even a guide to family games published for Reader 's Digest in 2003 only gave credit to Darrow and Elizabeth Magie , erroneously stating that Magie 's  असली खेल थी निर्मित in the 1800s , और नहीं acknowledging कोई of the खेल 's विकास between magie 's सृष्टि of the खेल , और the eventual  publication by Parker Brothers .
Also in the 1970s , Professor Ralph Anspach , who had himself published a board game  intended to illustrate the सिद्धान्त of दोनो monopolies और विश्वास busting , लड़ा पार्कर भाइयो  and its then parent company , General Mills , over the trademarks of the Monopoly board game .
Through the research of Anspach  और अन्य , much of the जल्दी इतिहास of the खेल  was `` rediscovered '' .
Anspach confronted  maxine ब्रैडी , लेखक of the 1974 किताब the एकाधिकार किताब : रणनीति और tactics of the संसार 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल over  the actual history of the game on Barry Farber 's New York City talk show in 1975 .
क्युकी of the lengthy अदालत प्रक्रम , सहित appeals , the विधिक  status of Parker Brothers ' trademarks on the game was not settled until 1985 .
The game 's name remains a registered trademark of  पार्कर भाइयो , as do इसके विशिष्ट डिज़ाइन  elements .
At the conclusion of the court case , the game  's लोगो और ग्राफिक डिज़ाइन तत्व became भाग of a larger एकाधिकार ब्रांड , licensed by पार्कर भाइयो  ' parent companies onto a variety of items through the present day .
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's early history in the  1970s और 1980s , और अनेक किताबे और जर्नल आलेख on the विषय , हास्ब्रो ( पार्कर भाइयो  ' current parent company ) did not acknowledge any of the game 's history before Charles Darrow on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012 .
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone other than Darrow in materials  प्रकाशित or प्रायोजित by उन्हें , at  least as recently as 2006 .
International tournaments , first held  in the जल्दी 1970s , continue to the उपस्थित , साथ the अगला संसार  championship likely scheduled for 2013 .
Starting in  1985 , a नई पीढी of  spin-off board games and card games appeared on both sides of the Atlantic Ocean .
In 1989 ,  the पहला of अनेक वीडियो खेल और कंप्यूटर खेल  editions was published .
Since 1994 , many  आधिकारिक विसंगतियाँ of the खेल , आधारित on स्थितियाँ अन्य than अटलांटिक नगर , नई जर्सी ( the आधिकारिक u.S. सेटिंग ) or लंदन  ( the official Commonwealth setting , excepting Canada ) , have been published by Hasbro or its licensees .
In 2008 , Hasbro permanently changed the color scheme and some of the gameplay of the standard U.S . Edition of the  खेल to मैच the uk संस्करण , हालांकि the u.S. मानक संस्करण maintains  the Atlantic City property names .
Hasbro also modified the official logo to give the `` Mr . Monopoly '' character a 3-D  computer-generated dekh , जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम अपनाया by licensees  USAopoly , Winning Moves and Winning Solutions .
And Hasbro  रै भी महरूम सहित the गति die , introduced in 2006 's एकाधिकार : the आचमन संस्करण by  Winning Moves Games , in versions produced directly by Hasbro ( such as the 2009 Championship Edition ) .
In baseball , a  बलिदान मक्खी is a batted बॉल कि satisfies  four criteria:
वहीँ हैं कम than दो outs जब  the ball is hit .
The ball is hit to the  आउटफील्ड ( मेला or बेईमानी ) , or to infield  foul territory .
The batter is put  आउट क्युकी an outfielder ( or an infielder कार्यशील in the आउटफील्ड , or बेईमानी territory  ) catches the ball on the fly ( alternatively if the batter would have been out if not for an error or if the outfielder drops the ball and another runner is put out ) .
A runner who is  already on आधार स्कोर on the खेल  .
It is called a `` sacrifice '' fly because the batter presumably intends to  कारण a teammate to स्कोर a चलाएं , जबकि sacrificing उसके अपना क्षमता  to do so .
Minnesota  ( ) is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the  Midwestern United States .
Minnesota was carved out of the  पूर्वी हाफ of the मिनेसोटा territory और admitted  to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11 , 1858 .
Known as the `` Land of  10,000 झीलों '' , the राज्य 's नाम आता इससे a डकोटा शब्द  for `` sky-tinted water '' .
Those waters , together  साथ वनों , पार्क , और wilderness क्षेत्रों , प्रस्ताव निवासियों और  tourists a variety of outdoor recreational opportunities .
Minnesota is the 12th most extensive and  the 21st सबसे populous of the u.S.  states .
nearly 60 % of इसके निवासियों सजीव in the minneapolis–saint पॉल महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( ज्ञात as the `` जुड़वा शहरों '' ) , the बीच of परिवहन  , business , industry , education , government and home to an internationally known arts community .
The remainder of the state  consists of पश्चिमी prairies अभी दिए over to intensive कृषि ; पतझड़ी वनों in the southeast , अभी साफ , farmed  and settled ; and the less populated North Woods , used for mining , forestry , and recreation .
Minnesota is known for its relatively mixed social and political orientations , and  रै a ऊँची रेट of नागरिक भागीदारी और वोटर turnout  .
Minnesota  बाँधने among the healthiest राज्य  , and has a highly literate population .
The  विशाल बहुमत of निवासियों हैं of scandinavian  and German descent .
The state is known as a  बीच of scandinavian अमरीकी  culture .
Ethnic  विविधता रै increased in हाल  decades .
substantial influxes of एशियाई , अफ़्रीकी , और लैटिन अमरीकी आप्रवासियों have  joined the descendants of European settlers and the original Native American inhabitants .
अनुदान हैं non-repayable निधि by एक पार्टी ( ग्रान्ट makers ) , प्रायः a सरकारी  department , corporation , foundation or trust , to a , often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity , educational institution , business or an individual .
In order to receive a grant , some form of `` Grant Writing '' often  referred to as either a प्रस्ताव or an अनुप्रयोग  is usually required .
Most grants are made  to निधि a विशिष्ट प्रोजेक्ट और आवश्यकता  some level of compliance and reporting .
The grant writing process involves an applicant submitting a  प्रस्ताव ( or सबमिशन ) to a संभावित funder , either on the आवेदक 's अपना पहल or in जवाब to a निवेदन  for Proposal from the funder .
Other grants can be given to  individuals , ऐसे as पीड़ितों of प्राकृतिक आपदाओं or individuals  who seek to open a small business .
Sometimes grant  makers आवश्यकता ग्रान्ट जरुरतमंदों to have कुछ रूप of tax-exempt  status , be a registered nonprofit organization or a local government .
For  उदाहरण , tiered funding लिये a फ्रीवे हैं बहुत विशाल अनुदान  negotiated at government policy level .
However smaller grants may be  provided by a सरकारी एजेंसी ( e.g  . municipal government ) .
project-related funding involving सरकारें , कारोबार , समुदायों , और individuals is प्रायः  arranged by application either in writing or online .
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1  stable समस्थानिक , 59co . 28 radioisotopes have महरूम characterized साथ the सबसे stable होने 60co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो , 57co  with a half-life of 271.79 days , 56Co with a half-life of 77.27 days , and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days .
All of the remaining radioactive isotopes have half-lives  कि हैं कम than 18 घंटों  and the majority of these have half-lives that are less than 1 second .
This element also has 11 meta  राज्य , सब of जिससे have half-lives कम than  15 minutes .
The isotopes of cobalt range in  परमाणु वज़न इससे 47co to 75co  .
The primary decay mode for isotopes with atomic mass unit values less than that of the most  abundant stable समस्थानिक , 59co , is इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर और the प्राथमिक विधि of क्षय लिये those of वृहद than 59  atomic mass units is beta decay .
The primary decay products before 59Co are iron isotopes and the  प्राथमिक उत्पाद बाद हैं निकल  isotopes .

Who  स्थानांतरित my चीज  ?
An Amazing Way to Deal with Change in Your Work and in Your Life , published in 1998 , is a  प्रेरक किताब by स्पेंसर जॉनसन लिखा in the स्टाइल of a मिसाल or कारोबार fable  .
it describes बदलें in एक 's कार्य और जीवन , और चार ठेठ प्रतिक्रियाएँ  to said change by two mice and two `` littlepeople '' , during their hunt for cheese .
A New York  टाइम्स कारोबार बेस्टसेलर चूंकि  release , Who Moved My Cheese ?
remained on the list for almost five years  और खर्च over 200 सप्ताह  on Publishers Weekly 's hardcover nonfiction list .
It has sold more than 26 million copies  विश्वव्यापी in 37 भाषाएं और remains to be एक of the best-selling  business books .
Nikita Sergeyevich Khrushchev ( –  सितंबर 11 , 1971 ) led the सोवियत संघ दौरान भाग of the ठंडा  War .
He served  as पहला सचिव of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी of the सोवियत संघ इससे 1953 to  1964 , and as Chairman of the Council of Ministers , or Premier , from 1958 to 1964 .
Khrushchev was  जिम्मेदार लिये the आंशिक de-stalinization of the सोवियत संघ , लिये बैकिंग the प्रगति of the  early Soviet space program , and for several relatively liberal reforms in areas of domestic policy .
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him from power in 1964 ,  replacing उसे साथ लियोनिद brezhnev as पहला सचिव और एलेक्सी kosygin as प्रीमियर  .
Khrushchev was born in the Russian village of Kalinovka in 1894 , close to the  present-day किनारा between रूस और युक्त  .
He was employed  as a metalworker in उसके युवावस्था , और दौरान the रूसी सिविल  War was a political commissar .
With the help of Lazar Kaganovich ,  he worked उसके रास्ता up the सोवियत पदानुक्रम  .
He supported  जोसेफ स्टालिन 's purges , और स्वीकृत  thousands of arrests .
In 1939 ,  स्टालिन भेजा उसे to govern युक्त , और he जारी  the purges there .
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the Great Patriotic War ( Eastern Front of World War II ) , Khrushchev was again  a commissar , सेवारत as an intermediary between स्टालिन और उसके सेनापतियों .
Khrushchev was present at the bloody  रक्षा of stalingrad , a फैक्ट he took ग्रेट  pride in throughout his life .
After the war , he  लौटे to युक्त पहले होने  recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers .
In the power struggle triggered by Stalin 's death in 1953 ,  khrushchev , बाद अनेक सालो , उभरा विजयी .
On February 25 , 1956 , at  the 20th पार्टी कॉंग्रेस , he वितरित the `` रहस्य  Speech , '' denouncing Stalin 's purges and ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union .
His domestic  नीतियों , aimed at bettering the जीवनदान of ordinary नागरिकों  , were often ineffective , especially in the area of agriculture .
Hoping eventually to rely on missiles for national defense ,  khrushchev ordered प्रमुख कटौती in conventional  forces .
Despite the cuts , Khrushchev 's  नियम देखी the tensest सालो of the ठंडा युद्ध , culminating  in the Cuban Missile Crisis .
कुछ of khrushchev 's नीतियों यहूद देखी as erratic , विशेषकर by उसके उभरते विरोधियों  , who quietly rose in strength and deposed him in October 1964 .
He did not suffer the  घातक भाग्य of कुछ पिछला losers of सोवियत शक्ति struggles , लकिन थी pensioned  off with an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside .
His lengthy memoirs were  smuggled to the वेस्ट  and published in part in 1970 .
khrushchev died in 1971 of  heart disease .
Upper gastrointestinal ( GI ) bleeding  refers to hemorrhage in the अपर जठरांत्र  tract .
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI bleeding is the ligament of Treitz , which connects the  चौथी portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm निकट the splenic  flexure of the colon .
Upper GI bleeds are considered medical  emergencies , और आवश्यकता प्रवेश  to hospital for urgent diagnosis and management .
Due to advances in  medications और endoscopy , अपर gi hemorrhage is  now usually treated without surgery .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN 2010 projections ( red , orange , green ) and  us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates (  black ) .
Actual  अंकित जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं  in blue .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may  वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान , it may मनाही  to 6 billion .
The  संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल  number of living humans on Earth .
As of today , it is estimated to number billion by the  संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ( uscb  ) .
The USCB estimates that the  संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on  March 12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations  जनसांख्यिकी निधि , it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31 , 2011 .
The world population has experienced continuous  विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और  the Black Death in 1350 , when it stood at around 370 million .
The highest rates of growth – global  जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान  the 1950s , and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in  1963 , और था  declined to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million , and are now expected  to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख , जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल , और हैं अपेक्षित to  increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued  बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट  ) , with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various  longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास ,  stagnation , or even overall decline in the global population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world  जनसांख्यिकी विकास , citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण , वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ , और उर्जा संसाधन  .
फिलिप्स lumileds lighting कम्पनी is the निर्माता of a चौड़ी दायरा of high-power/high-efficiency  light-emitting diodes ( LEDs ) .
it is a अभी a fully स्वामित्व प्रभाग  of Philips Lighting .
Knuckle mnemonic for the number of  दिनों in प्रत्येक माह  of the Gregorian Calendar .
Each  projecting knuckle  represents a 31-day month .
A  mnemonic ( , साथ a मूक `` m '' ) , or mnemonic यंत्र , is कोई सीखना  technique that aids information retention .
mnemonics उद्देश्य to अनुवाद सूचना into a रूप कि  the human brain can retain better than its original form .
Even  the प्रक्रम of applying इस परिवर्तन might  already aid the transfer of information to long-term memory .
Commonly encountered  mnemonics हैं प्रायः लिये सूचियाँ और in auditory रूप , ऐसे as छोटी कविताएं , acronyms , or यादगार वाक्यांश , लकिन mnemonics can भी  be for other types of information and in visual or kinesthetic forms .
Their use is based on the observation  कि the इंसान दिमाग अधिक easily remembers स्थानिक , निजी , आश्चर्यजनक , शारीरिक ,  sexual , humorous , or otherwise 'relatable ' information , rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of information .
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek  शब्द μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ) , अर्थ `` of मेमोरी '' और is सम्बन्धित to mnemosyne ( `` स्मरण '' ) , the नाम  of the goddess of memory in Greek mythology .
Both of these words are derived from μνήμη ( mnēmē  ) , `` स्मरण , मेमोरी ''  .
Mnemonics in antiquity were  सबसे प्रायः माना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of कया is  today known as the Art of memory .
Ancient Greeks and Romans distinguished between two  प्रकार of मेमोरी : the 'natural ' मेमोरी  and the 'artificial ' memory .
The former  is inborn , और is the एक कि everyone  uses automatically and without thinking .
The  कृत्रिम मेमोरी in कंट्रास्ट रै to be प्रशिक्षित और विकसित through the  learning and practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques .
Mnemonic systems are special techniques  or रणनीति consciously प्रयुक्त to improve मेमोरी , it helps employ सूचना already भंडारित  in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task .
President Bush  हस्ताक्षर the no चाइल्ड बाएँ पीछे अधिनियम at हैमिल्टन h.s  . in Hamilton , Ohio .
The No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 ( NCLB ) is a United States  अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the elementary  and Secondary Education Act , which included Title I , the government 's flagship aid program for disadvantaged students .
NCLB supports standards-based  शिक्षा सुधार आधारित on the आधार कि सेटिंग ऊँची मानकों और establishing  measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education .
The Act requires states to develop  आकलन in मौलिक कौशल .
States must give these assessments to all  विद्यार्थी at चुनें ग्रेड स्तर in अनुक्रम to प्राप्त  federal school funding .
The Act  करता नहीं assert a नेशनल उपलब्धि मानक  ; standards are set by each individual state .
NCLB expanded the federal role in public  शिक्षा through सालाना परीक्षण  , annual academic progress , report cards , teacher qualifications , and funding changes .
The bill passed in  the u.S. कॉंग्रेस साथ bipartisan  support .

A  पिकअप ट्रक or pick-up , प्रायः बस referred to as a  pickup , is a light motor vehicle with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed ) .
in उत्तर अमेरिका , the पद पिकअप is प्रयुक्त लिये लाइट ट्रक साथ a हल्का ड्यूटी chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित , एकीकृत  bed , as well as for coupé utility vehicles , often based on a personal car chassis , but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use .
Some countries have their own terms  समान to पिकअप , ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड , or bakkie in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी  .
Large pickup trucks are somewhat rare in Europe ,  जहाँ वैन और लाइट lorries हैं commonly  used for similar roles .
This  15th-century चित्रण of शारलेमेन और पोप एड्रियन i shows a well-bred मध्यकालीन घोड़ा  with arched neck , refined head and elegant gait .
Horses in the Middle  आयु differed in आकार , निर्माण और नस्ल  from the modern horse , and were , on average , smaller .
They were also more central to  समाज than उनके आधुनिक counterparts , होने अनिवार्य लिये युद्ध , कृषि  , and transport .
Consequently ,  विशिष्ट प्रकार of घोड़ा विकसित , अनेक of  which have no modern equivalent .
While an understanding of modern  घोड़ा breeds और equestrianism is vital लिये कोई विश्लेषण of the मध्यकालीन घोड़ा , शोधकर्ताओं  also need to consider documentary ( both written and pictorial ) and archaeological evidence .
घोड़े in the मध्य आयु यहूद rarely differentiated  by breed , but rather by use .
This led them to be described , for example , as `` chargers ``  ( युद्ध घोड़े ) , `` palfreys `` ( सवारी घोड़े ) , कार्ट घोड़े or packhorses  .
Reference is also given to their  प्लेस of उत्पत्ति , ऐसे as `` स्पेनी  horses , '' but whether this referred to one breed or several is unknown .
Another difficulty arising during any study of medieval documents or literature is the flexibility of the medieval languages ,  जहाँ अनेक शब्द can be प्रयुक्त लिये एक बात ( or , conversely  , several objects are referred to by one word ) .
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably ( even within one document ) , and where one epic  may बोलो disparagingly of a rouncey , another गुणगान इसके कौशल और swiftness  .
Significant technological advances in equestrian equipment , often introduced from other  संस्कृतियों , अनुमत लिये significant परिवर्तन in दोनो warfare  and agriculture .
In particular , improved  डिजाइन लिये the solid-treed काठी as खूब as the आगमन of the रकाब , नाल और घोड़ा कॉलर  were significant advances in medieval society .
Consequently , the assumptions and theories developed by historians are not definitive , and debate still rages on many issues , such as the breeding or size of the horse , and a number of sources must  be consulted in अनुक्रम to समझे the विशालता of the विषय  .
The Music Man is a  musical साथ किताब , म्यूज़िक , और गीत by मेरेडिथ willson , आधारित  on a story by Willson and Franklin Lacey .
The plot concerns con man Harold Hill , who poses as a  लड़कों ' बैंड आयोजक और नेता और बिकता बैंड यंत्र और वर्दी to भोली townsfolk  before skipping town with the cash .
In River City , Iowa , prim librarian and piano teacher Marian  paroo sees through उसे , लकिन जब हिल helps उसके younger bhai overcome उसके भय of सोशल interactions due to उसके लिस्प , marian begins to पतन in प्रेम साथ  Harold .
हेरोल्ड , in फेरे गिरना लिये marian , risks  being caught to win her .
In 1957 , the show  became a hit on ब्रॉडवे , जीतना पाँच टोनी पुरस्कार , सहित  Best Musical , and running for 1,375 performances .
The cast album won the first Grammy Award for `` Best  असली डाल एल्बम '' और थी क्रमांक एक on  the Billboard charts for 245 weeks .
The show  's कामयाबी led to revivals और a लोकप्रिय  1962 film adaptation and a 2003 television remake .
It  अक्सर is उत्पादित by दोनो पेशेवर और amateur  theater companies .
Surveyor  's व्हील
A surveyor 's wheel , also called a clickwheel ,  hodometer , waywiser , trundle व्हील , measuring व्हील , or perambulator  is a device for measuring distance .
Largest  non-polar रेगिस्तान
Sand dunes in  the rub ' al खली ( `` खाली  quarter '' ) of Saudi Arabia .
makhtesh रेमन , negev  desert , Israel
A desert is a landscape or region of land that is very dry because of low rainfall  amounts ( वर्षण ) , प्रायः रै छोटी कवरेज by पौधे , और in जिससे स्ट्रीम शुष्क up जबतक  they are supplied by water from outside areas .
Deserts can also  be वर्णित as क्षेत्रों जहाँ अधिक जल  is lost by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation .
Desert plants must  have खास adaptations to जीवित साथ  this little water .
Deserts generally receive less  than 25 cm of बरसात ( वर्षण ) प्रत्येक  year .
Semideserts or steppes  हैं regions जिससे प्राप्त between  and .
In the Köppen  जलवायु वर्गीकरण प्रणाली , रेगिस्तान हैं classed as bwh ( hot मरुस्थल  ) or BWk ( temperate desert ) .
In the Thornthwaite  जलवायु वर्गीकरण प्रणाली , रेगिस्तान होता be वर्गीकृत  as arid megathermal climates .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began  on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर  1918 .
It was  predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence  until the start of World War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were  समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम  , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and  विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies , और the उस्मानी  Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately ,  अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों , सहित 60 लाख  Europeans , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants  यहूद मारे , largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल  increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history ,  subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन , ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक  of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the  पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the  great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the  सिंहासन of austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब  Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances  formed over the पिछला  decades were invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers were  at युद्ध और , via उनके colonies , the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around  the world .
on 28 जुलाई , the austro-hungarians fired the पहला  shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium  और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस , providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of  war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static  बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला छोटी जबतक  1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was successful  विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians , लकिन थी  stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
in नवम्बर the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध , खोलने up fronts  in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in  1915 और रोमानिया in 1916 .
In  रूस , the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in  March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies drove back  the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी शक्तियां began  entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble  साथ क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत to an armistice on  11 November 1918 .
The war ended in  विजय लिये  the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were as  उग्र as on the बैटल fronts , as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति  and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German ,  रूसी , austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to मौजूद  .
The  successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि  of territory , while the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The  मैप of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक छोटी  states .
The League of Nations was formed in the hope  of preventing another ऐसे विरोध  .
The European nationalism spawned by  the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires , the परखना  of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
`` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979  सोंग originally लिखा by रॉबर्ट  Hazard and made famous by singer Cyndi Lauper .
It was the first major  सिंगल released by lauper as a सोलो कलाकार और the lead-off सिंगल इससे  her debut album She 's So Unusual .
Lauper’s version gained  मान्यता as a feminist गान और प्रचारित by an award-winning  video .
It has been covered on either an album or in live  कॉन्सर्ट by over 30 अन्य कलाकारों .
The single  थी lauper 's भेदन hit , reaching # 2 on  the Billboard Hot 100 and becoming a worldwide hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984 .
It  remains एक of lauper 's हस्ताक्षर गीतों और थी a widely लोकप्रिय  song during the era of its release , the 1980s .
The ``  रोलिंग स्टोन & एमटीवी : '100 महानतम पॉप गीतों ' : 1-50 '' , `` रोलिंग स्टोन : `` the 100 शीर्ष म्यूज़िक वीडियो  '' '' and the `` VH1 : 100 Greatest Videos '' lists ranked the song at # 22 , # 39 and # 45 , respectively .
The song received a Grammy Award nomination  लिये रिकार्ड of the साल और बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन  .
View of  defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति  and placement .
Defibrillation is a common treatment for  life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias  , ventricular fibrillation , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of  विद्युत उर्जा to the प्रभावित दिल साथ a यंत्र पुकारा  a defibrillator .
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle , terminates the dysrhythmia , and  allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished by the देह 's प्राकृतिक pacemaker , in the sinoatrial  node of the heart .
Defibrillators can be external , transvenous , or  implanted , depending on the प्रकार of यंत्र प्रयुक्त or needed  .
Some external units , known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ) , automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms  , अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to उपयोग उन्हें सफलतापूर्वक  with little , or in some cases no training at all .
The Cato  संस्थान is an अमरीकी libertarian सोचो टैंक headquartered  in Washington , D.C .
It was founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray  rothbard , ed क्रेन और चार्ल्स koch , अध्यक्ष of the फलक और मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी of the संगुटिका  Koch Industries , Inc. .
In July 1976 ,  the नाम थी बदला to the  Cato Institute .
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think Tank Index , Cato is the 6th most  influential us आधारित सोचो टैंक , रैंकिंग 3rd in आर्थिक नीति और 2nd in  Social Policy .
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the understanding of public policies based on the  सिद्धान्त of सीमित सरकारी , फ़्री बाज़ार , व्यक्तिगत स्वतंत्रता , और सलाम .
The Institute will use the most effective means to originate  , एडवोकेट , प्रचार , और disseminate  applicable policy proposals that create free , open , and civil societies in the United States and throughout the world . ''
Cato scholars were critical of George W. Bush 's Republican administration (  2001–2009 ) on अनेक मुद्दे , सहित the इराकी युद्ध , सिविल लिबर्टीज , शिक्षा , कृषि , उर्जा  policy , and excessive government spending .
On other issues , they  समर्थित बुश प्रशासन पहलों , सबसे notably स्वास्थ्य परवाह , सोशल सुरक्षा  , global warming , tax policy , and immigration .
During the 2008 U.S.  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , केटो विद्वानों criticized दोनो major-party  candidates , John McCain and Barack Obama .
Cato has criticized President Obama 's stances on policy issues since his inauguration , such as fiscal stimulus , healthcare reform , foreign policy , and  the युद्ध on दवाएँ , जबकि supporting उसके stance on the repeal of  Do n't Ask , Do n't Tell and liberal immigration policy .
Dracula is  an 1897 गोथिक हॉरर अनोखा by आयरिश लेखक  Bram Stoker .
Famous for introducing the character of the vampire Count  ड्रैकुला , the अनोखा tells the स्टोरी of ड्रैकुला 's attempt to relocate इससे transylvania to इंग्लैण्ड , और  the battle between Dracula and a small group of men and women led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing .
Dracula has been assigned to  अनेक साहित्यिक जाति सहित पिशाच साहित्य , हॉरर fiction , the गोथिक अनोखा  and invasion literature .
The novel touches on themes  ऐसे as the भूमिका of महिलाओं in विक्टोरियन संस्कृति , यौन प्रथाओं  , immigration , colonialism , and post-colonialism .
Although Stoker did not  इफ़तेरा the पिशाच , he पारिभाषित इसके आधुनिक रूप , और the अनोखा रै शाखित numerous नाट्य  , film and television interpretations .
Quidditch is a competitive sport in the wizarding world of the  हैरी कुम्हार ब्रह्मांड , और is इससे the श्रेणी of children 's novels और फिल्मों  .
It is an extremely rough but very popular  semi-contact खेल , निभाई by wizards और witches  .
Matches are played between two teams of seven players  सवारी उड़ती broomsticks , using चार गेंदें और छह elevated ring-shaped लक्ष्य , तीन on प्रत्येक पक्ष of the quidditch पिच  ( field ) .
In the Harry Potter  ब्रह्मांड , quidditch holds a fervent following समान to the  position that association football holds as a globally popular sport .
The sport is  स्मारकीय throughout  the wizarding world .
Harry plays an important position for  उसके हाउस टोली at हॉग्वार्ट्स : he is the seeker और becomes  the captain in his sixth year there .
Regional  और अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिताओं हैं उल्लेखित  throughout the series .
in प्याला of आग , quidditch at हॉग्वार्ट्स  is cancelled for the Tri-Wizard Tournament , but Harry and the Weasleys attend the Quidditch World Cup .
In addition , Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a golden egg from a dragon called the Hungarian Horntail ( in the first task of the Tri-Wizard Tournament ) , to capture a  उड़ती कुंजी in पारस 's स्टोन , और on दो कुंजी अवसरों in deathly hallows — getting थाम of ravenclaw 's diadem , और दौरान the फाइनल लड़ो साथ voldemort — the `` unerring  skill of the Seeker '' is useful to him in snatching the Elder Wand out of the air .
Harry Potter has owned two broomsticks , the  nimbus 2000 और the firebolt , दोनो of जिससे हैं नष्ट by the  series ' end .
The game has been adopted in the  रियल संसार in the रूप of मगलू quidditch  .
The  संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस is the bicameral विधानमंडल of the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य consisting  of two houses : the lower house known as the House of Representatives and the upper house known as the Senate .
Congress meets in the Capitol  in वॉशिंगटन , d.c  .
Both  प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटरों हैं चुनी through सीधा  election .
Congress has a total of 535 voting members : 435 members  in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और 100 सदस्यों in the सीनेट  .
सदस्यों of the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि serve two-year  terms representing the people of a district .
Congressional districts are apportioned  to राज्य by जनसांख्यिकी using the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी परिणाम , प्रत्येक राज्य  in the union having at least one representative in the House of Representatives .
Regardless of  जनसांख्यिकी , प्रत्येक of the 50 राज्य रै दो सीनेटरों ; the 100 सीनेटरों प्रत्येक serve  a six-year term .
the शर्तें हैं लड़खड़ाते so प्रत्येक दो सालो लगभग  one-third of the Senate is up for election .
Each staggered group of one-third of the  सीनेटरों हैं पुकारा 'classes  ' .
no राज्य of the संयुक्त  States has two senators from the same class .
Most incumbents seek  re-election , और उनके ऐतिहासिक likelihood of जीतना  subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent .
In August 2012 , a Gallup poll reported that Congress’s  स्वीकृति दरजा amongst अमेरिकी थी at 10 % , मिलान a 38-year  low reached in November 2011 .
`` A  छोटी अधिक देश than कि '' is the शीर्षक of a सोंग लिखा by जॉय + रोरी 's रोरी ली feek , व्यान  Varble , and Don Poythress , and recorded by American country artist Easton Corbin .
It was released  in अगस्त 2009 as कोर्बिन 's डेब्यू सिंगल और is शामिल  on his self-titled debut album .
In April 2010 , the song  पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the देश म्यूज़िक चार्ट , बनाना कोर्बिन the पहला पुरूष सोलो कलाकार in सात  years to send a debut single to Number One .
It has  महरूम certified  Gold by the RIAA .
The BlackBerry is a line of wireless handheld devices  और सेवाएं designed और marketed by शोध  In Motion Limited ( RIM ) operating as BlackBerry .
The first BlackBerry device , an email  पेजर , थी released in 1999 ; the सबसे हाल ब्लैकबेरी  devices , the Z10 and Q10 , were announced on January 30 , 2013 .
The user interface varies by model ; most feature a physical QWERTY keyboard , while newer  पीढियां have relied on a multi-touch स्क्रीन और आभासी कुंजीपटल  .
A BlackBerry can shoot video , take photos , play music , and  perform ऑनलाइन कृत्यों ऐसे as web-browsing और  emailing .
They can also  भेजें और प्राप्त धक्का ईमेल और तत्काल संदेश जबकि maintaining a ऊँची  level of security through on-device message encryption , and are designed to function as personal digital assistants .
BlackBerry devices support a large variety of instant messaging  सुविधाएँ , साथ the सबसे लोकप्रिय होने the मालिकाना  BlackBerry Messenger service .
The BlackBerry  playbook is a टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर  offered by the company .
The 100 millionth BlackBerry smartphone was shipped in June quarter of 2010 and the 200  millionth स्मार्टफोन थी shipped in सितंबर क्वार्टर of 2012 .
BlackBerry accounts for 3 %  of मोबाईल यंत्र बिक्री विश्वव्यापी in 2011 , बनाना इसके निर्माता  the sixth most popular device maker ( 25 % of mobile device sales are smartphones ) .
The consumer BlackBerry  अंतरजाल सेवा is उपलब्धियाँ in 91 देशों विश्वव्यापी on over 500 मोबाईल सेवा  operators using various mobile technologies .
as of सितंबर 2012 , वहीँ यहूद  eighty million subscribers worldwide to BlackBerry .
In 2011 the Caribbean and Latin America had the  उच्चतम penetrations of ब्लैकबेरी स्मार्टफ़ोन विश्वव्यापी , साथ up to परिचय 45 प्रति cent in the  region having a RIM device .
ब्लैकबेरी , iphone , एंड्रॉइड , और खिड़कियाँ फोन हैं माना  the four major smartphone brands .
BlackBerry is widely  referred to as `` crackberry '' in the संयुक्त राज्य , जिससे alludes to इसके excessive  use by its owners and is a reference to the addictiveness of crack cocaine .
Use of the term CrackBerry  became so फैली कि in नवम्बर 2006 वेबस्टर 's नई संसार कॉलेज शब्दकोष नामित  `` crackberry '' the `` New Word of the Year . ''
An  उदाहरण of a माँग वक्र shifting  .
The shift from D1 To D2  अर्थात् an बढ़ाएँ in माँग साथ  consequences for the other variables
In economics , the  माँग वक्र is the आलेख depicting the संबंध between the दाम  of a certain commodity and the amount of it that consumers are willing and able to purchase at that given price .
It is a  ग्राफिक प्रतिनिधित्व of  a demand schedule .
The demand curve for all consumers together follows from the  माँग वक्र of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत उपभोक्ता : the व्यक्तिगत मांगे  at each price are added together .
Demand curves are used to estimate behaviors in competitive markets , and are often combined with supply  वक्र to अनुमान the संतुलन दाम ( the दाम at जिससे विक्रेता साथ हैं willing to बेचें the वही राशि as खरीदार साथ हैं willing to ख़रीदे , भी ज्ञात as मार्केट clearing  price ) and the equilibrium quantity ( the amount of that good or service that will be produced and bought without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess demand ) of that market .
In a monopolistic  मार्केट , the माँग वक्र facing the monopolist  is simply the market demand curve .
historia
by nikolaos  Gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from Greek - historia , meaning `` inquiry , knowledge acquired by investigation '' ) is an umbrella term that  relates to पास्ट कार्यक्रम as खूब as the डिस्कवरी , संग्रहण , संगठन , और प्रस्तुतीकरण of सूचना  about these events .
The term includes cosmic , geologic  , और सशुल्क इतिहास , लकिन is प्रायः generically implied  to mean human history .
Scholars who  लिखें परिचय इतिहास हैं पुकारा इतिहासकारों  .
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a narrative to examine  और analyse a अनुक्रम of पास्ट कार्यक्रम , और objectively determine the पैटर्न  of cause and effect that determine them .
Historians sometimes debate the nature of history and its usefulness  by discussing the पढ़ाई of the अनुशासन as an समाप्त in itself और as a रास्ता of providing  `` perspective '' on the problems of the present .
Stories common to a particular culture , but  नहीं समर्थित by बाह्य स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as the किस्से surrounding किंग आर्थर ) हैं प्रायः वर्गीकृत as सांस्कृतिक  heritage or legends , because they do not support the `` disinterested investigation '' required of the discipline of history .
Events occurring prior to written record  हैं माना प्रागितिहास  .
Herodotus , a 5th century B.C . Greek historian is considered within the Western tradition to be the `` father of history '' , and , along  साथ उसके समकालीन thucydides , helped रूप the मूलाधार लिये the आधुनिक पढ़ाई of इंसान  history .
Their work continues to be read today and the divide between the culture-focused Herodotus and  the military-focused thucydides remains a पाइंट of contention or दृष्टिकोण in आधुनिक ऐतिहासिक  writing .
In the  पूर्वी परंपरा , a राज्य वृत्तान्त the वसन्त और पतझड़ annals थी ज्ञात to be compiled  from as early as 722 BCE although only 2nd century BCE texts survived .
Ancient influences have helped spawn  रूपांतर interpretations of the प्रकृति of इतिहास जिससे  have evolved over the centuries and continue to change today .
The modern study of history is wide-ranging , and includes  the पढ़ाई of विशिष्ट regions और the पढ़ाई of निश्चित topical or thematical तत्व  of historical investigation .
Often history is taught as  भाग of प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक शिक्षा , और the अकादमिक पढ़ाई of इतिहास  is a major discipline in University studies .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) ,  born मैल्कम छोटी और भी ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( ) , थी  an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist .
To his admirers , he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks , a man who  indicted श्वेत अमेरिका in the harshest शर्तें लिये इसके अपराधों विरूद्ध  black Americans .
Detractors  अभियुक्त उसे of उपदेश जातिवाद ,  black supremacy , and violence .
he रै महरूम पुकारा एक of the महानतम  and most influential African Americans in history .
Malcolm  x 's पिता died—killed by श्वेत supremacists , it थी rumored—when he थी यंग ,  and at least one of his uncles was lynched .
When he  थी 13 , उसके माँ थी लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल ,  and he was placed in a series of foster homes .
In 1946 , at age 20 , he went to  थाना लिये तोड़कर और प्रवेश  .
In  थाना , मैल्कम x became a सदस्य of the स्वदेश of islam ; बाद  his parole in 1952 , he quickly rose to become one of its leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group , but disillusionment with Nation of Islam head  इलियास मुहम्मद led उसे to छोड़ the स्वदेश in कूच  1964 .
After  a काल of सफर in अफ़्रीकी और the  Middle East , he returned to the United States , where he founded Muslim Mosque , Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity .
In February 1965 , less than a year after leaving the Nation of  islam , he थी assassinated by तीन सदस्यों of the समूह  .
मैल्कम x 's expressed  beliefs changed substantially over time .
As a spokesman for the Nation of  islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated विरह of  black and white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association with it , `` I  किया अनेक बाते as a [ ब्लैक ] मुस्लिम कि i 'm  sorry for now .
I was a zombie then ... pointed in a certain direction and told to march ''  —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम , he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to कार्य साथ  civil rights leaders , he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .
Henry Merritt `` Hank '' Paulson , Jr. ( born March 28 , 1946  ) is an अमरीकी बैंकर जो परोसा as the 74th संयुक्त  States Secretary of the Treasury .
He had served as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Goldman Sachs , and is now chairman of the Paulson Institute , which he founded in 2011 to promote sustainable economic growth and a  क्लीनर पर्यावरण around the संसार , साथ an आरंभिक फ़ोकस on the संयुक्त राज्य  and China .
A virtual machine ( VM ) is a software  implemented abstraction of the underlying  hardware , which is presented to the application layer of the system .
आभासी मशीने may be आधारित on विशेषताएँ  of a hypothetical computer or emulate the computer architecture and functions of a real world computer .
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing  arthropods कि have आठ टाँगे और chelicerae साथ fangs कि इंजेक्ट venom  .
They are the largest order of arachnids and rank  सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता among  all other groups of organisms .
Spiders are found worldwide on every  महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक , और have become स्थापित in nearly प्रत्येक आवास साथ the एक्सेप्शन  of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 , at least 43,678 spider  प्रजाति , और 109 परिवारों have महरूम अंकित by taxonomists ; however , वहीँ रै महरूम भ्रम भीतर  the scientific community as to how all these families should be classified , as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders  differ इससे अन्य arthropods in कि the usual देह खण्ड हैं fused  into two tagmata , the cephalothorax and abdomen , and joined by a small , cylindrical pedicel .
Unlike  कीट , मकड़ियों do नहीं  have antennae .
In all except the most primitive group , the Mesothelae , spiders have the most centralized nervous  प्रणालियों of सब arthropods , as सब उनके ganglia हैं fused into एक द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax  .
Unlike most arthropods , spiders have  no extensor मांसपेशियां in उनके limbs और बजाय extend  them by hydraulic pressure .
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been modified into  spinnerets कि extrude रेशा इससे up to छह प्रकार of रेशा ग्रंथियों  within their abdomen .
Spider webs vary widely  in आकार , आकार और the राशि  of sticky thread used .
It now appears that the spiral orb web  may be एक of the earliest फ़ॉर्म , और मकड़ियों कि उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक abundant  and diverse than orb-web spiders .
Spider-like arachnids with  silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल  about , but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets .
True spiders have been  मिला in carboniferous रॉक्स इससे , और हैं बहुत समान to the  most primitive surviving order , the Mesothelae .
The main groups of  आधुनिक मकड़ियों , mygalomorphae और araneomorphae  , first appeared in the Triassic period , before .
A herbivorous species ,  bagheera kiplingi , थी वर्णित in 2008 , लकिन सब अन्य ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी , ज़्यादातर preying on कीट  and on other spiders , although a few large species also take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a  चौड़ी दायरा of रणनीति to कैप्चर शिकार : trapping it in स्टिकी webs  , lassoing it with sticky bolas , mimicking the prey to avoid detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing  कंपन , लकिन the क्रियाशील hunters have अधि दृष्टि , और  hunters of the genus Portia show signs of intelligence in their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones .
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids , and they liquidize their food by  बाढ़ it साथ digestive एंजाइमों और पीस it साथ the bases of उनके pedipalps , as  they do not have true jaws .
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of complex courtship rituals to  avoid होने खाया by the महिलाओं  .
Males of most species survive a few matings  , सीमित मुख्यतः by उनके छोटी जीवन spans .
Females weave  रेशा egg-cases , प्रत्येक of जिससे may  contain hundreds of eggs .
Females of many species care for their young , for example  by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing खाना साथ उन्हें  .
A minority of species are social ,  भवन सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere इससे a few to  50,000 individuals .
Social  बर्ताव सीमाएँ इससे precarious toleration ,  as in the widow spiders , to co-operative hunting and food-sharing .
Although most spiders live for at  सबसे दो सालो , tarantulas और अन्य mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to  25 years in captivity .
While the venom of a few  प्रजाति is खतरनाक to इंसानो , वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी  venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides .
Spider silk provides a combination  of lightness , शक्ति और लोच कि is श्रेष्ठ to कि of सिंथेटिक  materials , and spider silk genes have been inserted into mammals and plants to see if these can be used as silk factories .
As a result of their wide range of behaviors , spiders have become  आम प्रतीकों in आर्ट और mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of सब्र , क्रूरता  and creative powers .

मध्य us household  income , 2001-2011
household आय is a माप commonly प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त  States government and private institutions .
Each household  is measured by the आय of प्रत्येक  resident over the age of 15 .
Income includes wages and salaries , unemployment insurance , disability  भुगतान , चाइल्ड support भुगतान प्राप्त , नियमित rental रसीदें , as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार , निवेश , or अन्य kinds of आय प्राप्त routinely  .
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been  increasing लगभग प्रत्येक साल इससे 1945 to 1999 , it रै चूंकि महरूम  flat and even decreased recently .
u.S. मध्य household आय  fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United  राज्य , अर्थ households जीना on कम than $ 2 प्रति दिन पहले सरकारी लाभ , doubled  from 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011 , including 2.8 million children .
The residents of the household do  नहीं have to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the household लिये उनके आय to be माना भाग of the household  's income .
As households tend to share a similar economic  कॉन्टेक्स्ट , the उपयोग of household आय remains  among the most widely accepted measures of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any  विश्लेषण of fluctuations भीतर or among the household आय श्रेणी , और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles  difficult or even impossible .
A registered agent , also known as a resident agent or statutory agent , in  संयुक्त राज्य कारोबार विधि , is a कारोबार or व्यक्तिगत designated to प्राप्त सेवा of प्रक्रम ( sop ) जब a कारोबार एंटिटी is a  party in a legal action such as a lawsuit or summons .
The  पंजीकृत एजेंट 's पता may भी be जहाँ the राज्य  will send the paperwork for the yearly renewal of the business entity 's charter .
The registered agent for a business entity may be an individual member of the company ,  or ( अधिक प्रायः ) a तीसरा पार्टी , ऐसे as the संगठन  's lawyer or a service company .
Failure to properly maintain a  पंजीकृत एजेंट can affect a कम्पनी negatively  .

`` Life , Liberty , and the  pursuit of सुख '' is a well-known  phrase in the United States Declaration of Independence .
The phrase is  meant to exemplify the `` unalienable अधिकारों '' साथ जिससे सब इंसान beings हैं endowed  by their creator for their protection of which they institute governments .
Fencing , is  typically विभाजित into ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी  , Classical fencing and historical fencing , .
The sport  of तलवारबाजी ( commonly पुकारा ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी or प्रतिस्पर्धी तलवारबाजी  ) is divided into three weapon categories : foil , sabre and épée .
Classical fencing uses the same  तीन हथियार , लकिन approaches तलवारबाजी as a  martial art .
Competitive Fencing  is एक of पाँच खेल जिससे रै महरूम प्रदर्शित at प्रत्येक एक of the आधुनिक ओलम्पिक खेल , the  other four being Athletics , Cycling , Swimming , and Gymnastics .
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ) , also called simply  the quadriceps , quadriceps extensor , quads , is a विशाल मांसपेशी समूह कि शामिल the चार प्रचलित  muscles on the front of the thigh .
It is the great extensor muscle of the knee , forming a large  मांसल द्रव्यमान जिससे कवर the सामने और पहलू of the femur .
The  उचित लैटिन बहुवचन रूप of the  adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites .
In modern  अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग , quadriceps is प्रयुक्त  in both singular and plural .
The  एकवचन रूप quadricep , उत्पादित  by hypercorrection , is frequently used .
RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April 1912  बाद colliding साथ an हिमशैल दौरान उसके maiden voyage इससे southampton , uk to नई यॉर्क नगर  , US .
The sinking of  टाइटैनिक caused the मौतों of 1,502 लोगों in एक  of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in modern history .
The RMS  टाइटैनिक थी the largest जलयान afloat at the समय of  her maiden voyage .
She was the second of three Olympic class ocean  liners संचालित by the श्वेत स्टार लकीर , और वो थी निर्मित by the harland और wolff डॉकयार्ड in belfast  with Thomas Andrews , who perished with the ship , as her naval architect .
On her maiden voyage , she  carried 2,224 यात्री और क्रू .
Under the command of Edward Smith , her passengers included some of the wealthiest people in the world , as well as hundreds of emigrants  इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड , scandinavia और elsewhere throughout यूरोपीय seeking a नई जीवन in उत्तर अमेरिका  .
The ship was designed to be the last word in comfort and luxury , with an on-board gymnasium  , तैराकी पूल , पुस्तकालयों , high-class रेस्तरां और opulent केबिन  .
She also had a  शक्तिशाली बेतार टेलीग्राफ provided लिये the convenience  of passengers as well as for operational use .
Though she had advanced safety features such as  watertight compartments और remotely activated watertight द्वार , वो lacked पर्याप्त  lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard .
Because of outdated maritime safety regulations , she carried only enough lifeboats for 1,178 people—slightly more than  हाफ of the क्रमांक यात्राएं on the maiden voyage , और one-third उसके कुल यात्री और क्रू क्षमता  .
After  leaving southampton on 10 अप्रैल 1912 , टाइटैनिक पुकारा at cherbourg  in France and Queenstown ( now Cobh ) in Ireland before heading westwards towards New York .
On 14 April 1912 , four days into the crossing and  परिचय 375 मील ( 600 km ) दक्षिण of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  , she hit an iceberg at 11:40 pm ship 's time .
The glancing collision caused Titanics hull plates to  बकल inwards साथ उसके स्टारबोर्ड पक्ष और खोली पाँच of उसके सोलह watertight  compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with water .
meanwhile , यात्री और कुछ क्रू सदस्यों यहूद  evacuated in lifeboats , many of which were launched only partly loaded .
A disproportionate number of men  यहूद बाएँ सवार क्युकी of a `` महिलाओं और children पहला `` प्रोटोकॉल  followed by some of the officers loading the lifeboats .
By 2:20 AM , she broke apart and foundered ,  साथ खूब over एक हजार लोगों  still aboard .
Just under two hours after the Titanic foundered , the Cunard liner RMS Carpathia  arrived on the झाँकी of the डूब , जहाँ वो brought सवार an अनुमानित 705  survivors .
The disaster was greeted with worldwide  शॉक और आक्रोश at the विशाल घाटा of जीवन और the नियामक और operational  failures that had led to it .
Public inquiries in Britain and the United  राज्य led to प्रमुख सुधार  in maritime safety .
One of their most important legacies was the establishment in 1914 of the International Convention  लिये the सुरक्षा of जीवन at समुद्र ( solas ) , जिससे स्टिल governs मेरीटाइम  safety today .
Additionally , several new wireless regulations  यहूद passed around the संसार in an प्रयत्न to सीख इससे the अनेक missteps  in wireless communications -- -which could have saved many more passengers .
Many of the survivors lost all of their money and possessions and  यहूद बाएँ अक्षम ; अनेक परिवारों , विशेषकर those of क्रू सदस्यों इससे southampton  , lost their primary bread-winners .
They were  helped by an outpouring of पब्लिक सहानुभूति  and charitable donations .
Some of the male survivors were  अभियुक्त of कायरता लिये leaving the जलयान जबकि लोगों यहूद स्टिल on फलक ; the श्वेत स्टार लकीर 's अध्यक्ष , J. ब्रूस ismay , faced सोशल ostracism  for the rest of his life .
The  रेक of the टाइटैनिक remains on the समुद्रतल  , split in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of .
Since its discovery in 1985 , thousands of artefacts have been recovered  और put on प्रदर्शक at संग्रहालय around the संसार  .
Titanic has become one of the most famous ships in  इतिहास , उसके मेमोरी रखा जिंदा by numerous किताबे , लोक गीतों , films , दर्शाती , और  memorials .
The human leg is the entire lower  extremity or limb of the इंसान देह , सहित the पैर , जांघ और भी the हिप or gluteal प्रदेश ; however ,  the precise definition in human anatomy refers only to the section of the lower limb extending from the knee to the ankle .
Legs are used for standing , walking , jumping , running , kicking , and  समान क्रियाएँ , और constitute a significant portion of a  person 's mass .
इस आलेख is परिचय the जनसांख्यिकी सुविधाएँ of the जनसांख्यिकी  of Turkey , including population density , ethnicity , education level , health of the populace , economic status , religious affiliations and other aspects of the population .
As  of 2010 , the जनसांख्यिकी of तुर्कों is अनुमानित  to be 73.7 million with a growth rate of 1.21 % per annum ( 2009 figure ) .
The  जनसांख्यिकी is अपेक्षाकृत यंग  with 26.6 % falling in the 0-14 age bracket .
According to the OECD/World Bank  जनसांख्यिकी आंकडे in तुर्कों the जनसांख्यिकी विकास इससे  1990 to 2008 was 16 million or 29 % .

A full-size car  is a विपणन पद प्रयुक्त in उत्तर अमेरिका  for an automobile larger than a mid-size car .
In the United  राज्य , the epa उपयोग the  term `` large car '' to denote full-size cars .
Joel Grey ( born April 11 , 1932 ) is an American stage and screen actor , singer , and dancer , known for his role as the Master of Ceremonies in both  the स्टेज और फिल्मी अनुकूलन of the kander & उतार musical कैबरे  .

James Madison , Jr. ( March 16 , 1751 ( O.S . March 5 ) – June 28 , 1836 ) was an  अमरीकी statesman और राजनैतिक theorist , the चौथी अध्यक्ष of the  United States ( 1809–1817 ) .
He is hailed as  the “father of the constitution” लिये होने इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the drafting  of the United States Constitution and as the key champion and author of the United States Bill of Rights .
He  परोसा as a राजनेता much of  his adult life .
After the constitution had  महरूम drafted , मैडिसन became एक of the नेताओ in  the movement to ratify it .
His collaboration with Alexander Hamilton and John  jay उत्पादित the federalist papers ( 1788 )  .
Circulated only in New York at  the समय , वे होता बाद be माना among the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण polemics  in support of the Constitution .
He was also a delegate to the Virginia constitutional ratifying  सम्मेलन , और थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the कामयाब अनुसमर्थन प्रयत्न  in Virginia .
Like most of his contemporaries ,  मैडिसन बदला उसके राजनैतिक  views during his life .
During the drafting and ratification of the constitution , he favored a  दमदार नेशनल सरकारी , हालांकि बाद he grew to एहसान stronger राज्य सरकारें , पहले settling between the दो extremes लेट  in his life .
In 1789 , Madison became a leader in the new House  of प्रतिनिधि , drafting अनेक  basic laws .
He is notable for drafting the first ten amendments to  the संविधान , और यूँ  is known as the `` Father of the Bill of Rights `` .
Madison worked closely with President  जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to व्यवस्थित the नई संघीय  government .
Breaking with Hamilton and what became the Federalist Party in 1791 , Madison and Thomas  जेफरसन व्यवस्थित कया वे पुकारा the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( बाद पुकारा by इतिहासकारों the democratic-republican  Party )
As Jefferson’s Secretary of State  ( 1801–1809 ) , मैडिसन पर्यवेक्षित the louisiana  Purchase , which doubled the nation’s size .
After  उसके चुनाव to the प्रेसिडेंसी ,  he presided over renewed prosperity for several years .
As president ( 1809–17 ) ,  बाद the विफलता of राजनयिक विरोध और a व्यापार embargo विरूद्ध ग्रेट ब्रिटेन ,  he led the nation into the War of 1812 .
He was responding to British encroachments on American honor and rights ; in addition , he wanted to end  the influence of the अंग्रेजों among उनके भारतीय allies , जिनकी प्रतिरोध अवरोधित संयुक्त  States settlement in the Midwest around the Great Lakes .
Madison found the war to be an administrative nightmare , as the United States had neither a  दमदार फौज nor वित्तीय प्रणाली ; as a परिणाम , he afterward समर्थित a stronger नेशनल सरकारी और a दमदार सैन्य  , as well as the national bank , which he had long opposed .
Like other Virginia  कूटनीतिज्ञों in the स्लेव समाज , he थी a slaveholder जो inherited उसके वृक्षारोपण ज्ञात as montpelier  , and owned hundreds of slaves during his lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other crops .
Madison supported the  three-fifths सुलह कि अनुमत three-fifths of the enumerated जनसांख्यिकी  of slaves to be counted for representation .
``  रोमन 's बदला '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी  rapper Nicki Minaj from her debut studio album Pink Friday .
It was written by Minaj and rapper Eminem , who is also featured in the  सोंग , और थी उत्पादित by swizz beatz  .
It was released exclusively on October 30 , 2010 through the  us itunes स्टोर , as a promotional रिलीज preceding the एल्बम  's release .
The song initiated a feud between Lil '  किम और minaj , जहाँ अनेक लोगों लगा  the song was directed at Lil ' Kim and regarded around her feelings towards Minaj 's rise to fame .
The song references Minaj 's alter-ego , Roman Zolanski , and Eminem  's alter-ego , पतला छायादार  .
The song garnered very positive reviews from critics ,  सबसे of जिससे praised the सोंग as a stand-out  track on the album .
An  आधिकारिक रिमिक्स featuring minaj 's mentor , लील वेन ,  was released to the US iTunes Store on January 19 , 2011 .
The  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल थी प्रयुक्त in the  song 'Firing Squad ' by Horseshoe G.A.N.G .
Hydraulic  द्रव होने poured  .
Hydraulic fluids , also called  हाइड्रोलिक liquids , हैं the मीडियम by जिससे शक्ति is transferred in हाइड्रोलिक मशीनरी  .
Common hydraulic  fluids हैं आधारित on खनिज  oil or water .
Examples of equipment that might use hydraulic fluids include excavators and backhoes , hydraulic brakes , power steering systems  , ट्रांसमिशन , कचरा ट्रक , वायुयान उड़ान कंट्रोल प्रणालियों , lifts , और औद्योगिक  machinery .
Hydraulic systems like the ones  उल्लेखित ऊपर होगा कार्य सबसे efficiently if the हाइड्रोलिक द्रव प्रयुक्त  has no compressibility
महिंद्रा ट्रैक्टर
Mahindra  tractors , the फार्म उपकरण प्रभाग of महिंद्रा & महिंद्रा , builds और स्त्रोत  tractors that are sold worldwide across six continents .
Mahindra  is भी among the शीर्ष तीन ट्रैक्टर  manufacturers in the world .
Mahindra has a huge consumer base in India , China and  अमेरिका और a growing आधार in ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
The company builds more tractors in India than  कोई अन्य निर्माता , और रै the  capacity to build 150,000 tractors a year .
In 1963 , M & M formed a joint venture with International Harvester to  manufacture tractors carrying the महिंद्रा nameplate लिये  the Indian market .
Armed with engineering , tooling and  निर्माण know-how gained  from this relationship , M & M developed its first tractor , the B-275 .
Mahindra  tractors साथ बिक्री of nearly 85,000 इकाई annually is एक of the largest  tractor companies in the world , and is number one in sales in India - the largest tractor market in the world .
To expand into the growing tractor market in  चीन , महिंद्रा acquired बहुमत हिस्सेदारी in jiangling  .
To raise awareness about Mahindra in the US , Mahindra USA announced its new sponsorship in the  nascar देशभर श्रेणी साथ r3 मोटरस्पोर्ट , जिससे is participating साथ a # 23 महिंद्रा  Tractors Chevrolet .
The car will be driven by Robert Richardson , Jr.  महिंद्रा यूएसए , inc. घोषित a 17-race प्राथमिक और 18-race संबद्ध प्रायोजन लिये the  2009 NASCAR Nationwide Series .
With this sponsorship ,  महिंद्रा थी the पहला भारतीय कम्पनी to प्रायोजक  a car in NASCAR .
In 2008 , Mahindra  थी a प्रायोजक of the मैकडोनाल्ड मोटरस्पोर्ट टोली जिससे भागा the  # 81 car in the NASCAR Nationwide Series .
The POWER6 is a  माइक्रोप्रोसेसर विकसित by ibm कि implemented the  Power ISA v.2.03 .
When it became available in systems in 2007 , it succeeded  the शक्ति5+ as ibm 's फ्लैगशिप  Power microprocessor .
It is part of the eCLipz project , said to have a goal of converging IBM  's सर्वर हार्डवेयर जहाँ व्यावहारिक ( hence `` ipz '' in the एक्रोनिम : iseries , pseries  , and zSeries ) .
The American middle class is a social  क्लास in the संयुक्त राज्य .
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion and common language use  , समकालीन सोशल वैज्ञानिकों have put आगे अनेक , अधिक or कम  congruent , theories on the American middle class .
Depending on class model  प्रयुक्त , the मध्य क्लास may constitute anywhere इससे 25 % to  66 % of households .
One of the first major studies of the middle class in America was White Collar : The  अमरीकी मध्य वर्ग , प्रकाशित in 1951 by समाजशास्त्री  C. Wright Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills .
Later sociologists such as Dennis Gilbert of  हैमिल्टन कॉलेज commonly divide the मध्य क्लास into दो sub-groups  .
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the upper or professional  मध्य क्लास consisting of अत्यधिक शिक्षित , वेतनभोगी पेशेवर और  managers .
Constituting roughly one third of households is the lower middle class  consisting ज़्यादातर of semi-professionals , skilled कारीगरों और lower-level  management .
Middle-class persons commonly have a comfortable standard of living  , significant आर्थिक सुरक्षा , considerable कार्य स्वायत्तता और rely on उनके विशेषज्ञता to sustain  themselves .
Members of the middle class  belong to विविध समूह जिससे ओवरलैप  with each other .
Overall , middle-class  व्यक्तियों , विशेषकर upper-middle-class individuals , हैं characterized  by conceptualizing , creating and consulting .
Thus ,  कॉलेज शिक्षा is एक of the प्रमुख  indicators of middle-class status .
Largely attributed to the nature of  middle-class occupations , मध्य क्लास मान tend to emphasize  independence , adherence to intrinsic standards , valuing innovation and respecting non-conformity .
Politically  अधिक क्रियाशील than अन्य जनसांख्यिकी , कॉलेज शिक्षित मध्य  class professionals are split between the two major parties .
Income varies considerably from near the national median  to खूब in excess of $ 100,000  .
Household income figures , however , do not always reflect class status and standard of living , as they are  largely बहकावे by the क्रमांक of आय earners और असफल to recognize household  size .
It is therefore possible for a large , dual-earner , lower middle class  household to out-earn a छोटी , one-earner , अपर मध्य क्लास household  .
The middle classes are very  influential , as वे encompass the बहुमत of मतदाता , लेखक , शिक्षक  , journalists , and editors .
Most  societal रुझान in the us originate भीतर the  middle classes .
