The cast members of Saturday Night Live  यहूद originally referred to as  the `` Not Ready For Prime Time Players '' .
The original cast ( l to r ) : Laraine  न्युमैन , जॉन belushi , जेन कर्टिन , gilda radner ,  Dan Aykroyd , Garrett Morris , and Chevy Chase
Ruins from the 1906 San Francisco earthquake , remembered as one of  the worst प्राकृतिक आपदाओं in संयुक्त राज्य इतिहास
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) hazard resulting in an event of  substantial extent causing significant शारीरिक क्षति or विनाश , घाटा of जीवन ,  or drastic change to the environment .
A disaster can be ostensively defined as any tragic event stemming from events such as  भूकंप , floods , अनर्थकारी दुर्घटनाओं  , fires , or explosions .
It is a phenomenon that can cause damage to  जीवन और प्रॉपर्टी और नष्ट the आर्थिक , सोशल और सांस्कृतिक  life of people .
In contemporary academia ,  आपदाओं हैं देखी as the consequence of inappropriately  managed risk .
These risks are the product of a  संयोजन of दोनो hazard/s और vulnerability  .
Hazards that strike in areas with low vulnerability will never  become आपदाओं , as is the मामला in uninhabited  regions .
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 percent of all deaths caused by  आपदाओं occur in विकासशील देशों , और नुकसान due to प्राकृतिक आपदाओं हैं 20 टाइम्स वृहद ( as a प्रतिशत of जीडीपी ) in विकासशील देशों  than in industrialized countries .
In computing , booting (  भी ज्ञात as booting up ) is the आरंभिक नियत of परिचालन कि a कंप्यूटर प्रणाली performs जब विद्युत शक्ति  to the CPU is switched on .
The process begins when a computer is turned on for the first time or is re-energized after being turned off ,  और ends जब the कंप्यूटर is तैयार to perform इसके सामान्य परिचालन  .
On modern general purpose computers , this can take tens of seconds and typically involves performing a power-on self-test ,  locating और initializing परिधीय डिवाइस , और तब ढूंढना , लदान और  starting an operating system .
Many computer  प्रणालियों भी allow ये परिचालन to be initiated by a तन्त्र कमांड बगैर साइकिलिंग शक्ति , in कया  is known as a soft reboot , though some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot .
A boot loader is a computer program that loads the main  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण लिये the कंप्यूटर बाद पूर्णता of the  self-tests .
The computer term boot is short for bootstrap or  बूटस्ट्रैप लोड और गर्भाशयी इससे the phrase to खींचो oneself  up by one 's bootstraps .
The usage calls attention to the requirement that , if most software is loaded  onto a कंप्यूटर by अन्य तन्त्र already कार्यशील on the कंप्यूटर , कुछ  mechanism must exist to load initial software onto the computer .
Early computers used a  किस्में of ad-hoc विधि to मिलेंगी a छोटी कार्यक्रम into  memory to solve this problem .
The invention  of एकीकृत सर्किट read-only मेमोरी ( rom ) of विभिन्न प्रकार हल इस विरोधाभास by allowing  computers to be shipped with a start up program that could not be erased .
विकास in the क्षमता of rom रै अनुमत कभी  more elaborate start up procedures to be implemented .
On general purpose  कंप्यूटर , the बूट प्रक्रम begins साथ the निष्पादन  of an initial program stored in boot ROMs or read in another fashion .
in कुछ पुरानी कंप्यूटर , the आरंभिक कार्यक्रम might have महरूम the अनुप्रयोग  to run , if no operating system was used , or the operating system .
in अन्य कंप्यूटर , the आरंभिक कार्यक्रम is a बूट लोडर कि may तब लोड into random-access मेमोरी ( राम ) , इससे nonvolatile  secondary storage ( such as a hard disk drive ) or , in some older computers , from a medium such as punched cards , punched tape , or magnetic tape in older computers , the binary code of an operating system or runtime environment and then execute it .
If  the बूट लोडर is सीमित in इसके आकार और सामर्थ्य , it may , बजाय ,  load a larger and more capable secondary boot loader , which would then load the operating system or runtime environment .
Some embedded systems do not  आवश्यकता a noticeable बूट अनुक्रम to शुरू कामकाज और जब turned on may बस चलाएं operational कार्यक्रम  that are stored in ROM .
Firebird  is an खोलें सोर्स एसक्यूएल रिलेशनल डेटाबेस प्रबन्धन प्रणाली  that runs on Linux , Windows , and a variety of Unix .
The database forked from Borland 's open  सोर्स संस्करण of interbase in 2000 , लकिन चूंकि firebird 1.5 the कोड रै महरूम largely  rewritten .
Outsourcing is the contracting out of an internal  कारोबार प्रक्रम to a third-party संगठन .
The  अभ्यास of contracting a कारोबार प्रक्रम आउट to a तीसरा  party rather than staffing it internally is common in the modern economy .
The term ``  आउटसोर्सिंग '' became लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त  States near the turn of the 21st century .
आउटसोर्सिंग sometimes involves transferring कर्मचारी और  assets from one firm to another , but not always .
The definition of outsourcing includes both foreign and  घरेलू contracting , और sometimes शामिल offshoring , जिससे अर्थात् relocating  a business function to another country .
Financial  बचत इससे निम्नतर अंतरराष्ट्रीय मजदूर दरों  is a big motivation for outsourcing/offshoring .
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing , which entails bringing processes  संभाला by third-party firms in-house , और is sometimes संपन्नता  via vertical integration .
However , a business can provide a contract  सेवा to another कारोबार बगैर necessarily insourcing कि कारोबार प्रक्रम  .
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating  retrovirus ) कि कल्याणकारी acquired immunodeficiency सिंड्रोम ( एड्स ) , a कंडीशन  in humans in which progressive failure of the immune system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive .
Infection with  hiv occurs by the ट्रांसफ़र of रक्त ,  semen , vaginal fluid , pre-ejaculate , or breast milk .
Within these  bodily fluids , hiv is उपस्थित as दोनो फ़्री वायरस अणु  and virus within infected immune cells .
HIV infects vital cells in the human  प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली ऐसे as हेल्पर t कोशिकाएं ( specifically cd4 + t कोशिकाएं ) , macrophages  , and dendritic cells .
HIV infection leads to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of  mechanisms सहित : apoptosis of uninfected bystander कोशिकाएं , सीधा वाइरल हत्या of  infected cells , and killing of infected CD4+ T cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that recognize infected cells .
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a critical level , cell-mediated  प्रतिरक्षण is खोया , और the देह becomes progressively अधिक susceptible  to opportunistic infections .
The firepole in a fire  स्टेशन in टोरंटो
A fireman 's pole ( also called a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube or pipe installed between  floors in आग स्टेशन , allowing अग्निशमन responding to an सचेतक to जल्दी descend to the मैदान मंजिल तेज़ than by using a मानक staircase  .
the यंत्र थी invented in the 1870s by दाउद kenyon , in शिकागो  , Illinois , although it is often incorrectly credited to the Boston Fire Department .
मरियम poppins is the शीर्षक अक्षर of a श्रेणी of  children 's books written by P. L. Travers .
Throughout the Mary Poppins series , which lasted from 1934 to 1988  , मरियम shepard थी the इलस्ट्रेटर और acted as a दूसरी लेखक  .
The books centre on a  जादुई अंग्रेज़ी नैनी , मरियम  Poppins .
She is  blown by the ईस्ट हवा to क्रमांक सत्रह चेरी पेड़ लेन , लंदन , और  into the Banks ' household to care for their children .
मुठभेड़ों साथ चिमनी sweeps , दुकानदारों और  various adventures follow until Mary Poppins abruptly leaves , i.e. , `` pops-out '' .
The  adventures लो प्लेस over a कुल  of eight books .
However , only the first three books  विशेषता मरियम poppins arriving  and leaving .
The later five books recount previously  unrecorded adventures इससे उसके असली तीन विज़िट  .
As P. L. Travers  explains in उसके परिचय to मरियम poppins in the पार्क , `` वो  can not forever arrive and depart . ''
The books were adapted  in 1964 into a musical डिज़्नी  film starring Julie Andrews and Dick Van Dyke .
In 2004 , Disney Theatrical  उत्पादित a स्टेज musical अनुकूलन in the वेस्ट समाप्त थिएटर  .
The stage musical was transferred to  ब्रॉडवे in 2006 जहाँ it भागा जबतक इसके closing  on March 3 , 2013 .
It has  महरूम अत्यधिक कामयाब , as  was the 1964 film .
The Last  सोंग is a 2010 अमरीकी coming of आयु टीन रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी  developed alongside Nicholas Sparks ' novel by the same name .
the फिल्मी थी निर्देशित by जूली ऐनी रॉबिन्सन in उसके  feature film directorial debut and co-written by Sparks and Jeff Van Wie .
The Last Song stars Miley Cyrus , Liam Hemsworth , and Greg Kinnear and follows a troubled teenager as she reconnects with her estranged father and falls  in प्रेम दौरान a गर्मियाँ in a शांत दक्षिणी संयुक्त राज्य बीच कस्बा  .
The  फिल्मी is वितरित by touchstone  Pictures .
Sparks was approached to write both the  फिल्मी 's पटकथा और the अनोखा  .
स्पार्क्स समाप्त the पटकथा in जनवरी 2009 , prior to the पूर्णता of the  novel , making The Last Song his first script to be optioned for film .
The setting , originally in North Carolina like the novel ,  स्थानांतरित to जॉर्जिया बाद the राज्य था campaigned लिये महीने to मेजबान उत्पादन  .
Upon beginning production in  tybee द्वीप , जॉर्जिया और आसपास savannah , the पिछला सोंग became the पहला  movie to be both shot and set in Tybee Island .
Filming lasted from June  15 to अगस्त 18 , 2009 साथ much of  it occurring on the island 's beach and pier .
The Last Song was originally scheduled for wide  रिलीज on जनवरी 8 , 2010  , but was postponed to March 31 , 2010 .
लिखा simlish
Simlish is a fictional  भाषा प्रदर्शित in ea खेल  ' Sim series of games .
It debuted in SimCopter , and has been especially  prominent in the सीम , the सीम 2 और the  Sims 3 .
the सीम विकास टोली निर्मित the अद्वितीय simlish भाषा  by experimenting with fractured Ukrainian , French , Latin , Finnish , English , Fijian , Cebuano , and Tagalog .
simlish can भी be सुना in simcity 4 , simcity  Societies and SimCity 2013 , but far less frequently .
Civilized Creatures in  spore can भी be सिखाया  to speak Simlish .
It is  भी प्रदर्शित to an extent  in Firaxis Games ' Sid Meier 's SimGolf .
पंक्तियां होगा राइट थी सचेत of the need लिये संवाद in the खेल  , but thought that using a real language would make it sound too repetitive and would also be too costly to hire translators for world languages .
Initially , inspired by the Native  अमरीकी कोड talkers of संसार युद्ध ii , सीम निर्माता होगा राइट और भाषा विशेषज्ञ मार्क gimbel  suggested experimenting with the Navajo language to create Simlish .
However , they ultimately decided that  simlish worked बेहतरीन as a `` भाषा '' बना up of gibberish शब्द कि could n't be अनूदित , so कि इसके  meaning would be left open to the imagination of the player .
Wright later commented that using ``  बकवास भाषा '' turned आउट to be the सही विकास चुनाव , as लोगों यहूद सक्षम of  imagining it more realistically than a computer could simulate a real one .
The  वास्तविक ध्वनि of simlish थी निर्मित improvisationally  by voice actors Stephen Kearin and Gerri Lawlor .
An example of Ultrasonic Testing ( UT )  on ब्लेड जड़ें of a v2500 iae वायुयान  engine .
Step 1 : The UT probe is  लगाई on the रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected साथ the सहायता of a खास borescope  tool ( video probe ) .
Step  2 : यंत्र जमावट  are input .
Step  3 : the जांच is  scanned over the blade root .
In this case , an indication ( peak in the data ) through the red  लकीर ( or फाटक ) indicates a शुभ ब्लेड ; an indication  to the left of that range indicates a crack .
Principle of  अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण .
LEFT : A probe sends a sound  वेव into a परीक्षण सामग्री  .
There are two indications , one from the initial pulse of the probe , and  the दूसरी due to the वापस वॉल गूंज  .
RIGHT : A defect creates a third indication and  simultaneously reduces the आयाम of the वापस वॉल indication  .
The depth of the defect is  संकल्पित by the अनुपात d/e
In ultrasonic testing (  ut ) , बहुत छोटी अल्ट्रासोनिक pulse-waves साथ बीच बारंबारता  ranging from 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally up to 50 MHz are launched into materials to detect internal flaws or to characterize materials .
A common example  is अल्ट्रासोनिक मोटाई मापन , जिससे परीक्षण the मोटाई  of the test object , for example , to monitor pipework corrosion .
Ultrasonic testing is often  performed on स्टील और अन्य धातुओं और alloys , हालांकि  it can also be used on concrete , wood and composites , albeit with less resolution .
It is a form of non-destructive testing used in many industries including  aerospace , ऑटोमोटिव और अन्य परिवहन सेक्टर  .
The vas deferens ( plural :  vasa deferentia ) , भी पुकारा ductus deferens ( लैटिन : `` carrying-away पोत '' ; बहुवचन : ductus deferentes ) , is भाग of the पुरूष anatomy  of many vertebrates ; they transport sperm from the epididymis in anticipation of ejaculation .
Vascular ischemia of the  toes साथ characteristic cyanosis  .
In medicine , ischemia , also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia , ( ; from Greek language ισχαιμία , ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a restriction or thinning or  to मेक or grow thin/lean , haema रक्त ) is a प्रतिबंध in रक्त सप्लाई to ऊतकों , causing a shortage of ऑक्सीजन और ग्लूकोज needed लिये सेल्यूलर चयापचय  ( to keep tissue alive ) .
Ischemia is generally caused  by समस्याएं साथ रक्त बरतन , साथ resultant  damage to or dysfunction of tissue .
It also means local anemia in a given part of a  देह sometimes resulting इससे जमघट ( ऐसे  as vasoconstriction , thrombosis or embolism ) .
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome , also known  as trisomy 21 , is a जेनेटिक विकार caused by the उपस्थिति  of all or part of a third copy of chromosome 21 .
Down syndrome is the  सबसे आम chromosome तबदीली in इंसानो  .
it is typically संबद्ध साथ a विलंब in संज्ञानात्मक क्षमता ( दिमागी retardation , or mr ) और शारीरिक  growth , and a particular set of facial characteristics .
The average IQ of young adults with Down syndrome is around 50 , whereas young adults  बगैर the कंडीशन typically have an iq of 100 .
(  mr रै historically महरूम पारिभाषित  as an IQ below 70 . )
A large proportion of  individuals साथ bas सिंड्रोम  have a severe degree of intellectual disability .
Down syndrome is named after John Langdon  bas , the अंग्रेजों चिकित्सक जो वर्णित the  syndrome in 1866 .
The condition was clinically described earlier by Jean Etienne  dominique esquirol in 1838 और edouard  Seguin in 1844 .
Down syndrome was  पहचाना as a chromosome 21 trisomy by dr.  Jérôme Lejeune in 1959 .
Down syndrome can be identified in a baby  at जनम or पहले जनम by prenatal  screening .
Pregnancies with  इस निदान हैं  often terminated .
The CDC estimates that about one of every  691 शिशु born in the संयुक्त राज्य  each year is born with Down syndrome .
Many children with Down syndrome are educated in regular school classes while  अन्य आवश्यकता specialised शैक्षणिक सुविधाएं  .
Some children graduate from high school ,  और , in the us , वहीँ हैं increasing अवसर लिये  participating in post-secondary education .
Education and  उचित परवाह रै महरूम दिखाया to improve विशेषता  of life significantly .
Many adults with Down Syndrome are able to work at paid  नियुक्ति in the जातियाँ , जबकि अन्य आवश्यकता a अधिक sheltered कार्य  environment .
Hot flashes ( also known as  hot flushes , or रात्रि sweats if वे happen at रात्रि ) हैं a लक्षण जिससे may have अनेक  other causes , but which is often caused by the changing hormone levels that are characteristic of menopause .
The Servicemen 's  readjustment अधिनियम of 1944 ( p.l . 78-346 , 58 स्टेट . 284m ) , ज्ञात informally as the  G.I . Bill , was a law that provided a range of benefits for returning World War II veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ) .
Benefits included low-cost mortgages , low-interest loans to start a business or farm , cash payments of tuition  और जीना खर्च to attend कॉलेज , ऊँची स्कूल or वोकेशनल शिक्षा , as खूब  as one year of unemployment compensation .
It was available to every veteran who had been on active duty during the war  सालो लिये at तनिक नब्बे दिनों और था नहीं महरूम dishonorably  discharged ; combat was not required .
By the end of the program in 1956 , roughly 2.2 million  दिग्गजों था प्रयुक्त the g.i . विधेयक शिक्षा लाभ in अनुक्रम to attend  colleges or universities , and an additional 6.6 million used these benefits for some kind of training program .
चूंकि the असली 1944 विधि , the पद रै आइये to शामिल अन्य दिग्गज लाभ कार्यक्रम  created to assist veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service .
Historians  और अर्थशास्त्रियों consider the g.i . विधेयक a प्रमुख राजनैतिक success—especially in कंट्रास्ट  to the treatments of World War I veterans—and a major contribution to America 's stock of human capital that sped long-term economic growth .
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal that occurred in the United States in the 1970s as a result of the June 17 , 1972 break-in at the Democratic  नेशनल कमेटी मुख्यालय at the वाटरगेट दफ्तर जटिल in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , और the निक्सन प्रशासन 's attempted cover-up of इसके भागीदारी  .
The scandal  आखिरकार led to the इस्तीफा of रिचर्ड निक्सन , the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , on अगस्त  9 , 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. President .
The  कांड भी resulted in the indictment , विचारण , conviction , और incarceration of  forty-three persons , dozens of whom were Nixon 's top administration officials .
The affair began with the  गिरफ़्तार of पाँच मेन लिये तोड़कर और प्रवेश into the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी  ( DNC ) headquarters at the Watergate complex on June 17 , 1972 .
The Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash found on the burglars to a  slush निधि प्रयुक्त by the कमेटी लिये the re-election of the अध्यक्ष , the आधिकारिक संगठन  of Nixon 's campaign .
In July 1973 , as evidence mounted against the president 's staff ,  सहित गवाही provided by पूर्व स्टाफ सदस्यों in an छानबीन conducted by the सीनेट वाटरगेट कमेटी , it थी नाज़िल कि अध्यक्ष निक्सन था a tape-recording  system in his offices and he had recorded many conversations .
Recordings from these tapes  implicated the अध्यक्ष , revealing he था attempted to कवर up the questionable ( और illegal  ) goings-on that had taken place during his administration , both before and after the break-in .
बाद a protracted श्रेणी of कड़वा अदालत लड़ाइयों , the u.S. परम् अदालत  unanimously ruled that the president had to hand over the tapes to government investigators ; he ultimately complied .
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of Representatives and a strong  सम्भावना of a conviction in the सीनेट , निक्सन resigned the प्रेसिडेंसी  on August 9 , 1974 .
His successor , Gerald Ford ,  तब जारी a pardon to उसे  .
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly Lansing  और स्पेंसर ) is a fictional अक्षर on the एबीसी दिन साबुन ओपेरा  General Hospital .
Elizabeth is the granddaughter of Dr. Steve Hardy ( John Beradino ) ,  एक of the originating कोर वर्ण of the  series .
Rebecca Herbst originated the character on  अगस्त 1 , 1997 और रै महरूम the तभी  contract actress to play the role .
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings , Lucky Spencer and  एलिज़ाबेथ webber और जेसन मॉर्गन और एलिज़ाबेथ  Webber .
The United States presidency of Ronald Reagan , also known  as the reagan प्रशासन , थी a रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन headed by रोनाल्ड reagan इससे जनवरी  20 , 1981 , to January 20 , 1989 .
Domestically , the administration favored reducing government  कार्यक्रम और introduced the largest across-the-board कर कटौती in अमरीकी इतिहास  .
The economic policies  enacted in 1981 , ज्ञात as `` reaganomics `` , यहूद an उदाहरण of  supply-side economics .
Reagan aimed to encourage  उद्यमिता और सीमा the विकास of सोशल बिता , as खूब as the कटौती  of regulation and inflation .
Economic growth saw a strong recovery in the 1980s ,  helping reagan to जीत a भूस्खलन re-election  .
The  नेशनल कर्ज़ increased  significantly , however .
Regarding foreign policy , the administration was  steadfastly anti-communist , कॉलिंग the सोवियत संघ an `` दुष्ट  empire `` and ending 1970s détente .
Reagan accelerated the massive  buildup of the सैन्य प्रारंभ by उसके पूर्ववर्ती  , including an invasion of Grenada , the first major overseas action by U.S. troops since the end of the Vietnam War .
The `` Reagan  doctrine `` controversially granted सहायता to अर्धसैनिक शक्तियां seeking to फेकने  communist governments , particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan .
Reagan also promoted new technologies such as  मिसाइल रक्षा प्रणालियों in अनुक्रम to confront the soviets और उनके  allies .
In diplomacy , Reagan forged a strong  गठबंधन साथ uk प्रधान मंत्री मार्गरेट थैचर , और he मिले साथ सोवियत सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल  Gorbachev four times , aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals .
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` Reagan  क्रान्ति '' , or the आयु of reagan in मान्यता of the राजनैतिक realignment दोनो भीतर और  beyond the U.S. in favor of his brand of conservatism and his faith in free markets .
The  reagan प्रशासन worked toward the पतन  of Soviet Communism , and it did collapse just as he left office .
Victory in the Cold  युद्ध led to a unipolar संसार साथ the u.S. as  the world 's sole superpower .
While the  damaging iran-contra affair engulfed अनेक reagan aides दौरान  his second term , Reagan himself left office with a 63 percent approval rating , one of the higher approval ratings of departing presidents .
After years of unstinting praise from the right , and unrelenting criticism  इससे the बाएँ , इतिहासकार दाउद हेनरी पाता कि by 2009 a सर्वसम्मति था उभरा among विद्वानों कि reagan revived कोसा और turned the स्वदेश to the सही by demonstrating a ``  pragmatic conservatism '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system .
Furthermore , says Henry , the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the presidency and  अमरीकी self-confidence , और contributed critically to समाप्ति the ठंडा  War .
Crude death  रेट by देश (  2006 ) .
मृत्यु रेट is a माप of the क्रमांक of मौतों  ( in general , or due to a specific cause ) in a population .
Scaled to the size of that  जनसांख्यिकी , प्रति ईकाई of  time .
Mortality rate is typically  expressed in इकाई of मौतों प्रति 1000 individuals प्रति साल ; यूँ , a मृत्यु रेट of 9.5  ( out of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population , or 0.95 % out of the total .
It is distinct from  morbidity रेट , जिससे refers to the क्रमांक of individuals in ग़रीब स्वास्थ्य दौरान a दिए समय काल  ( the prevalence rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate ) .
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes  inappropriately प्रयुक्त to refer to the क्रमांक of मौतों among a नियत of diagnosed हॉस्पिटल मामले  for a disease or injury , rather than for the general population of a country or ethnic group .
This disease mortality  statistic is अधिक precisely referred to as `` मामला fatality  rate `` ( CFR ) .
One  distinguishes:
The crude  मौत रेट , the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल  per 1000 people .
the crude death rate for the whole world is about 8.37 per 1000  प्रति साल according to the वर्तमान सीआईए संसार factbook  .
the perinatal  mortality rate , the sum of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births .
the मातृ मृत्यु अनुपात , the क्रमांक of  maternal deaths per 100,000 live births in same time period .
The maternal mortality  रेट , the क्रमांक of मातृ मौतों प्रति 1,000 महिलाओं of reproductive  age in the population ( generally defined as 15–44 years of age ) .
The infant mortality rate , the number of  मौतों of children कम than 1 साल बूढ़ा प्रति  1000 live births .
The child mortality rate , the number  of मौतों of children कम than 5 सालो  old per 1000 live births .
The standardised mortality ratio (  smr ) - इस represents a आंशिक तुलना to the संख्याएँ of मौतों कि होता  have been expected if the population had been of a standard composition in terms of age , gender , etc .
The age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR )  - इस refers to the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल प्रति  1000 people of a given age ( e.g . age 62 last birthday ) .
In regard to the or failure of  चिकित्सा उपचार or प्रक्रियाओं , एक होता  also distinguish:
The early mortality rate , the total number of deaths in the early  चरण of an जारी उपचार , or in the काल तत्काल following  an treatment .
The late mortality rate , the total number of deaths  in the लेट चरण of an जारी उपचार , or a significant लंबाई of समय बाद  an acute treatment .
Note that the crude death rate as defined above  और लागू to a पूरे जनसांख्यिकी can दे a भ्रामक  impression .
The crude death rate depends on the age ( and  लिंग ) विशिष्ट मृत्यु दरों और the आयु ( और लिंग ) वितरण of the  population .
the क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति 1000 लोगों can be उच्चतर लिये विकसित राष्ट्र than in less-developed  countries , despite life expectancy being higher in developed countries due to standards of health being better .
This happens because  विकसित देशों typically have a completely अलग जनसांख्यिकी आयु वितरण , साथ a much उच्चतर proportion  of older people , due to both lower recent birth rates and lower mortality rates .
A more complete picture of mortality is given by a life  तालिका जिससे shows the मृत्यु रेट separately लिये  each age .
A life table is necessary to  दे a शुभ अनुमान of जीवन  expectancy .
An otoacoustic emission ( OAE ) is a sound which is  उत्पन्न इससे भीतर the भीतरी कान .
Having been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948 , its existence was first demonstrated  experimentally by दाउद kemp in 1978 और otoacoustic emissions have चूंकि महरूम दिखाया to उठता  by a number of different cellular mechanisms within the inner ear .
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the inner ear has been damaged , so OAEs are often used  in the प्रयोगशाला और the क्लिनिक as a माप of भीतरी  ear health .
Broadly  बोलना , वहीँ हैं दो प्रकार of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic  emissions ( SOAEs ) , which can occur without external stimulation , and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ) , which require an evoking stimulus .
Hurricane Tomas was  the उन्नीसवीं नामित तूफ़ान और बारहवीं hurricane  of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season .
Tomas developed from a tropical wave  ईस्ट of the windward आइलैंड्स on अक्तूबर  29 .
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane , it moved through the  windward आइलैंड्स और passed बहुत निकट संत लूसिया .
After reaching  श्रेणी 2 औकात on the saffir-simpson स्केल , टॉमस जल्दी  weakened to a tropical storm in the central Caribbean Sea , due to strong wind shear and dry air .
Tomas  बाद regained hurricane औकात as  it reorganized near the Windward passage .
Throughout the hurricane 's  पाथ , 71 लोगों हैं ज्ञात to have महरूम मारे , 14 of  whom were in Saint Lucia .
Monetary losses throughout the  windward आइलैंड्स यहूद अनुमानित at us $ 588 लाख  , mainly in Saint Lucia .
In  the वेक of the तूफ़ान in हैती , बाढ़ intensified an जारी हैजा  outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities .
According to a report released in December 2010 ,  55 लोगों यहूद मारे in क्यूबा और hispanola , हालांकि  the distribution of these fatalities are unknown .
Overall damage from  the तूफ़ान थी at तनिक $  741 million .
Victoria Jackson (  born अगस्त 2 , 1959 ) is an अमरीकी हास्य , अभिनेत्री , satirist , सिंगर  and internet blogger best known as a cast member of the NBC television sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992 .
She has  प्राप्त ध्यान as a गायन आलोचक of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा  , and is an active participant in the Tea Party movement .
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by heavy reliance on  तकनीकों जैसे fragmentation , विरोधाभास , और questionable narrators , और  is often ( though not exclusively ) defined as a style or trend which emerged in the post–World War II era .
Postmodern works  हैं देखी as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध आत्मज्ञान सोच  and Modernist approaches to literature .
Postmodern literature ,  जैसे postmodernism as a पूरे , tends to resist परिभाषा or वर्गीकरण  as a `` movement '' .
Indeed , the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical theory , particularly reader-response and deconstructionist approaches , and the subversions of the implicit contract between author , text and reader by  जिससे इसके works हैं प्रायः characterised , have led to pre-modern fictions ऐसे as cervantes ' डॉन quixote ( 1605,1615 ) और laurence sterne 's eighteenth-century व्यंग्य tristram shandy होने retrospectively  inducted into the fold .
While there is little consensus on the precise characteristics , scope , and importance of  postmodern साहित्य , as is प्रायः the  case with artistic movements , postmodern literature is commonly defined in relation to a precursor .
For example , a postmodern literary work tends not to conclude with the neatly  tied-up समाप्ति as is प्रायः मिला in modernist साहित्य , लकिन प्रायः  parodies it .
Postmodern authors  tend to celebrate मौका over शिल्प , और further employ  metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority .
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is  the questioning of भेद between ऊँची और कम संस्कृति through the उपयोग of pastiche , the संयोजन of विषय  and genres not previously deemed fit for literature .
Enigma is an electronic musical  प्रोजेक्ट संस्थापित in जर्मनी by माइकल cretu  , David Fairstein and Frank Peterson in 1990 .
The Romanian-born Cretu conceived the Enigma project while working in Germany , but based his recording studio A.R.T . Studios in  ibiza , स्पेन , इससे the जल्दी 1990s जबतक may 2009 , जहाँ he रै अंकित सब of पहेली 's स्टुडियो रिलीज  to date .
Cretu  is दोनो the composer और  the producer of the project .
His former wife , pop  सिंगर सैंड्रा , प्रायः provided  vocals on Enigma tracks .
Jens Gad  co-arranged और निभाई गिटार on तीन of the पहेली  albums .
Peter Cornelius also  contributed to पहेली दौरान the  1990s .
Seven studio albums have been  उत्पादित अंतर्गत  the name of the project .
Scooby-Doo  is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड कार्टून मताधिकार , comprising अनेक  animated television series produced from 1969 to the present day .
The  असली श्रेणी , scooby-doo  , Where Are You !
, was created for Hanna-Barbera Productions  by लेखक जो माणिक्य और केन स्पीयर्स in 1969  .
This Saturday morning cartoon  श्रेणी प्रदर्शित चार teenagers— फ्रेड जोन्स , daphne ब्लेक , velma dinkley , और norville `` shaggy '' रोजर्स — और उनके talking भूरा ग्रेट डेन श्वान नामित scooby-doo  , who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps .
Following the success of the original series , Hanna-Barbera and its successor Warner Bros .  एनिमेशन have उत्पादित numerous follow-up और spin-off एनिमेटेड श्रेणी और अनेक सम्बन्धित works , सहित टेलीविज़न specials और telefilms , a लकीर  of direct-to-video films , and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films .
Some versions of Scooby-Doo feature different variations on the show 's supernatural theme , and include  वर्ण ऐसे as स्कूबी 's cousin scooby-dum और भतीजे scrappy-doo in जोड to or बजाय  of some of the original characters .
Scooby-Doo was originally broadcast on  सीबीएस इससे 1969 to 1976 , जब it स्थानांतरित to  ABC .
ABC aired the show  जबतक canceling it in 1986 , और प्रस्तुत a spin-off featuring the वर्ण  as children , A Pup Named Scooby-Doo , from 1988 until 1991 .
Two  नई scooby-doo श्रेणी , कया  's New , Scooby-Doo ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a Clue  ! ] ] , aired as भाग of बच्चे wb on the wb संजाल  and its successor , The CW network , from 2002 until 2008 .
The most recent Scooby-Doo  श्रेणी , scooby-doo !
Mystery Incorporated , aired  on कार्टून संजाल इससे 2010 to 2013  .
Repeats of the various Scooby-Doo series are  ब्रॉडकास्ट अक्सर on कार्टून संजाल  and Boomerang in the United States and other countries .
Call of Duty  is a first-person और third-person शूटर  computer/ video game franchise .
The series began on the  pc , और बाद विस्तारित to consoles और handhelds  .
अनेक spin-off खेल have  also been released .
The earlier games in the series are  नियत primarily in संसार युद्ध ii , इस शामिल  : Call of Duty , Call of Duty 2 , and Call of Duty 3 .
शुरूआत साथ आधुनिक warfare , जिससे is  set in modern times , the series has shifted focus away from World War II .
Call of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare ( released  नवम्बर 2007 ) थी followed by कॉल of ड्यूटी  : World at War and Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 2 .
ब्लैक ops ( released नवम्बर 2010 ) takes प्लेस in the ठंडा युद्ध , जबकि आधुनिक  Warfare 3 ( released November 2011 ) takes place in the near-future setting .
ब्लैक ops 2 ( released नवम्बर  13 , 2012 ) takes place in the year 2025 .
The Call of Duty games are published and owned by  एक्टिविजन साथ aspyr मीडिया प्रकाशन it लिये ठहराना  OS X .
While the studio Infinity Ward primarily still develops them , Treyarch has also developed  अनेक of the शीर्षक साथ the रिलीज of the studios ' खेल  interlaced with each other .
Some games have been developed by Gray Matter Interactive , Spark  असीमित , विस्मित entertainment , n-space , विद्रोह developments , ideaworks खेल स्टुडियो , sledgehammer खेल और nstigate  Games .
The games use a variety of  इंजन , सहित the id तकनीक 3 , the treyarch ngl ,  and the IW 5.0 .
Other products in the  मताधिकार शामिल a लकीर of कार्रवाई आंकड़े designed by plan-b खिलौने , a कार्ड खेल  created by Upper Deck , and a comic book mini-series published by WildStorm .
as of नवम्बर 11 , 2011 , the कॉल of ड्यूटी  series have sold over 100 million copies .
As of March 31 , 2012 there are 40  लाख मासिक क्रियाशील खिलाड़ी आरपार सब of the कॉल of ड्यूटी शीर्षक , साथ  10 million Call of Duty : Elite users and 2 million paying annual members .
Over 1.6 billion hours of online  gameplay have महरूम logged आधुनिक warfare  3 since its 2011 release .
The estate tax in  the संयुक्त राज्य is a कर imposed on the ट्रांसफ़र of the `` taxable एस्टेट `` of a मृतक व्यक्ति , whether ऐसे प्रॉपर्टी is transferred  via a will , according to the state laws of intestacy or otherwise made as an incident of the death of the owner , such as a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust , or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries .
The  एस्टेट कर is एक भाग of the एकीकृत तोहफा और एस्टेट  Tax system in the United States .
The other part of the system , the gift  कर , imposes a कर on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी दौरान a व्यक्ति 's जीवन ; the तोहफा कर रोकता avoidance of the एस्टेट  tax should a person want to give away his/her estate .
In addition to the federal government ,  अनेक राज्य भी थोपने an एस्टेट कर , साथ the राज्य संस्करण पुकारा either an एस्टेट कर or an उत्तराधिकार  tax .
Opponents of  the एस्टेट कर कॉल it the  `` death tax '' .
If an asset is left  to a जीवनसाथी or a federally पहचाना दान  , the tax usually does not apply .
In addition , up to $ 5,250,000 can be  दिए by an व्यक्तिगत , पहले and/or upon उनके मौत , बगैर रूष्ट  federal gift or estate taxes .
Gavin McGregor  rossdale ( born 30 अक्तूबर 1967 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी कर्ता और संगीतकार , ज्ञात  as the lead singer and rhythm guitarist of the rock band Bush .
Following Bush 's separation in 2002 , which  lasted लिये आठ सालो , he थी the सीसे सिंगर और guitarist लिये संस्थान ,  and later began a solo career .
When performing solo , Gavin  plays गीतों इससे उसके extensive musical  libraries .
Rossdale has been ranked in the Top 100  भारी मेटल vocalists by hit parader  ( # 75 ) .
raffaello sanzio da urbino ( अप्रैल 6 or कूच 28 , 1483 – अप्रैल  6 , 1520 ) , better known simply as Raphael , was an Italian painter and architect of the High Renaissance .
His  कार्य is admired लिये इसके स्पष्टता of रूप और आसानी of संयोजन और  for its visual achievement of the Neoplatonic ideal of human grandeur .
Together with  michelangelo और लियोनार्डो da विंची , he फ़ॉर्म the परंपरागत ट्रिनिटी  of great masters of that period .
Raphael was enormously productive , running an unusually large  कार्यशाला , और despite उसके मौत at 37 , a विशाल देह of उसके  work remains .
Many of his works are found in the Vatican Palace , where the  frescoed राफेल कक्ष यहूद the सेंट्रल , और the largest  , work of his career .
The best known work is The School of Athens in  the वेटिकन stanza देला segnatura  .
After his early  सालो in रोम much of उसके कार्य थी self-designed , लकिन लिये the सबसे  part executed by the workshop from his drawings , with considerable loss of quality .
He was extremely  influential in उसके आजीवन , हालांकि बाहर रोम उसके कार्य थी ज़्यादातर  known from his collaborative printmaking .
After his death , the influence of his great rival Michelangelo was more widespread until the 18th and 19th  सदियां , जब राफेल 's अधिक निर्मल और समन्वयात्मक qualities यहूद again regarded  as the highest models .
His career falls naturally into three phases and three styles , first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria , then a period of about four years ( from 1504–1508 ) absorbing the artistic traditions of  फ्लोरेंस , followed by उसके पिछला hectic और triumphant बारह सालो in रोम , working लिये दो popes और  their close associates .
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born October 28 ,  1967 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  .
She  became a हॉलीवुड स्टार बाद headlining the रोमांटिक कॉमेडी  Pretty Woman ( 1990 ) , which grossed $ 464 million worldwide .
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy Award nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 )  और pretty स्त्री , वो जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in एरिन brockovich (  2000 ) .
Her films The Pelican Brief (  1993 ) , my बेहतरीन dost 's विवाह ( 1997 ) , रहस्यवादी पिज़्ज़ा ( 1988 ) , नॉटिंग हिल ( 1999 ) , runaway बहू ( 1999 ) , समंदर 's ग्यारह ( 2001 ) , समंदर 's बारह ( 2004 ) , चार्ली विल्सन 's युद्ध  ( 2007 ) , Valentine 's Day ( 2010 ) , Eat Pray Love ( 2010 ) , and Mirror Mirror ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box office receipts of over $ 2.6 billion , making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts .
Roberts had become one of the highest-paid actresses  in the संसार , टॉपिंग the हॉलीवुड पत्रकारों  annual `` power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006 .
Her fee for 1990 's Pretty Woman was $ 300,000 ; in 2003 , she was paid an  unprecedented $ 25 लाख लिये उसके भूमिका in mona लिसा मुस्कान (  2003 ) .
As of 2010 , Roberts 's  जाल लायक थी अनुमानित to be $ 140  million .
Roberts has been named  एक of लोगों पत्रिका 's `` 50 सबसे खूबसूरत  People in the World '' eleven times , tied with Halle Berry .
In 2011 , she was named one of  the `` 100 hottest महिलाओं  of All-Time '' by Men 's Health .
In 2001 ,  महिलाओं घर जर्नल क्रमित उसके as the 11th  most powerful woman in the United States .
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ( born May 14 , 1984 ) is an  अमरीकी कंप्यूटर प्रोग्रामर और अंतरजाल  entrepreneur .
He is best known as one of five  co-founders of the सोशल नेटवर्किंग जालस्थल  Facebook .
As of April 2013 , Zuckerberg is the  अध्यक्ष और मुख्य कार्यपालिका of फेसबुक , inc. और  in 2013 his personal wealth was estimated to be US $ 13 .3 billion .
Together with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin  , एंड्रयू mccollum , डस्टिन moskovitz और क्रिस ह्यूजेस , zuckerberg शुभारम्भ फेसबुक इससे  Harvard 's dormitory rooms .
The group then introduced Facebook  onto अन्य campuses देशभर और स्थानांतरित to पालो आल्टो , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त राज्य  ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards .
In 2007 , at the age of twenty-three years , Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a result of Facebook and the number of Facebook  उपयोक्ता विश्वव्यापी पहुँचे a कुल of एक अरब in  2012 .
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal disputes that were initiated by others in the group , who  claimed a share of the कम्पनी आधारित upon उनके भागीदारी दौरान the विकास  phase of Facebook .
Since 2010 , Zuckerberg  रै महरूम नामित among the 100 wealthiest और सबसे influential लोगों in the संसार by समय पत्रिका  as a part of its Person of the Year accolade .
Zuckerberg  थी निभाई by कर्ता जेसी eisenberg in the 2010 हॉलीवुड फिल्मी  The Social Network in which the rise of Facebook is portrayed .
The  mayflower थी the जलयान कि in 1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों , सहित  a core group of Separatists , to New England .
Their story is one of travail and  अस्तित्व in a हर्ष नई संसार  environment .

Committee of Ways and Means  is the मुख्य कर -writing कमेटी of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस  of Representatives .
सदस्यों of the तरीके और अर्थात् कमेटी हैं नहीं अनुमत to serve on कोई अन्य हाउस समितियों जबतक वे  apply for a waiver from their party 's congressional leadership .
The Committee has jurisdiction over all taxation ,  tariffs और अन्य revenue-raising  measures , as well as a number of other programs including:
सोशल  Security
बेरोजगारी  benefits
medicare
प्रवर्तन of चाइल्ड  support laws
Temporary  सहायता लिये मोहताज परिवारों , a संघीय  welfare program
फोस्टर परवाह और अपनाना  programs
The U.S. Constitution  requires कि सब बिल्स regarding कराधान जरूर originate  in the House of Representatives .
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation must go through this committee , the  कमेटी is बहुत influential , as is इसके सीनेट बंटवारा , the u.S. सीनेट कमेटी on वित्त  .
The Ways and Means  कमेटी in the 111th कॉंग्रेस थी chaired by चार्ली rangel , जो था लिया  a leave of absence as chairman until House ethics violations were resolved .
However , his leave of absence as  अध्यक्ष थी शासित to be a इस्तीफा  .
Pete Stark resigned as acting chairman , so Sander Levin  आयोजित कि स्थिति जबतक the प्रारंभ  of the 112th Congress .
Dave Camp became  the कमेटी कुर्सी लिये the 112th कॉंग्रेस , बाद the republicans  won control of the House in the 2010 election .
The blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus )  is a समुद्री स्तनधारी belonging to the suborder  of baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ) .
At in length and or more in weight , it is the  largest ज्ञात एनिमल to have कभी existed  .
Long and slender , the blue whale 's body can be various  शेड्स of bluish-grey dorsally और somewhat हल्का underneath  .
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and North Pacific , B.  m. intermedia of the दक्षिणी समंदर और B. m. brevicauda ( भी ज्ञात as the सानो ब्लू व्हेल ) मिला  in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean .
B. m. indica , found in the  भारतीय समंदर , may be another subspecies  .
As with other baleen  whales , इसके आहार consists लगभग exclusively  of small crustaceans known as krill .
Blue whales were abundant in nearly  सब the महासागर on धरती जबतक the शुरूआत of the बीसवीं सदी  .
For over a century , they were hunted almost to extinction  by whalers जबतक सुरक्षित by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  community in 1966 .
A 2002 report estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000  ब्लू whales विश्वव्यापी , स्तिथ in at  least five groups .
More recent  शोध into the सानो subspecies suggests  this may be an underestimate .
Before whaling , the largest  जनसांख्यिकी थी in the अंटार्कटिक , क्रमांकन लगभग 239,000  ( range 202,000 to 311,000 ) .
There remain only much smaller ( around 2,000 )  एकाग्रता in प्रत्येक of the पूर्वी उत्तर प्रशांत , अंटार्कटिक , और भारतीय समंदर समूह  .
There are two more  समूह in the उत्तर अटलांटिक , और  at least two in the Southern Hemisphere .
The globe artichoke ( Cynara  cardunculus var . scolymus ) is a किस्में  of a species of thistle cultivated as a food .
The  खाद्य पदार्थ is कलियों कि रूप  within the flower heads before the flowers come into bloom .
The buds go away or change to  a coarse , मुश्किल खाद्य रूप  when the flower blooms .
The uncultivated  or जंगली किस्में of the प्रजाति  is called a cardoon .
It  is a बारहमासी संयंत्र देशी to the  Mediterranean region .
The United States one hundred-dollar bill ( $ 100 ) is a denomination  of संयुक्त राज्य करेंसी .
U.S. statesman , inventor , and diplomat  बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse  of the bill .
On the reverse of  the banknote is an चित्र of  Independence Hall .
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has been printed since July 13 ,  1969 , जब the denominations of $ 500 , $ 1,000 , $ 5,000 , और $ 10,000 यहूद रिटायर्ड  .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life  of a $ 100 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 90 महीने ( 7.5 सालो ) पहले it is replaced  due to wear and tear .
The bills are also commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '' , in reference to the use of Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन 's पोर्ट्रेट on the denomination , or `` c-notes '' , आधारित on the रोमन numeral लिये  100 .
The bill is one of two denominations printed today that does not feature a President of the United  राज्य ; the अन्य is the $ 10 विधेयक , featuring सिकंदर हैमिल्टन  .
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the reverse ,  according to the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण , shows लगभग  4:10 .
One hundred hundred-dollar bills are delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in  mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000  ) .
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on April 21 , 2010 , and was  to be जारी to the पब्लिक on फ़रवरी 11 , 2011 , लकिन उत्पादन थी shut bas in दिसम्बर 2010 क्युकी as अनेक as 30 % यहूद  unusable due to a manufacturing flaw .
A vertical crease  in the पेपर reveals a  blank space on the bill when pulled out .
In their replacement , and continuing the  ऊँची माँग of इस denomination , the श्रेणी 2006a थी शुभारम्भ retaining the पिछला  design ( 1996-generation ) .
On April 24 , 2013 , the Federal  आरक्षित घोषित the नई $ 100 विधेयक  would enter circulation on October 8 , 2013 .

David ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : Daveed ) according to the Hebrew Bible , was the second king of the United  किंगडम of इसराईल , और according to the नई वसीयत gospels of मैथ्यू और ल्यूक  , an ancestor of Jesus .
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE , his reign over Judah c.  1010–1002 bce , और उसके शासनकाल over the संयुक्त  Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE .
The Books of Samuel , 1 Kings , and 1 Chronicles are  the तभी स्त्रोत of सूचना on दाउद , हालांकि the tel डान stele ( दिनाँक c. 850–835 bce ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd  ) , read as `` House of David '' , which most scholars take as confirmation of the existence in the mid-9th century BCE of a Judean royal dynasty called the House of David .
He is depicted as a righteous  किंग , हालांकि नहीं बगैर त्रुटियां , as खूब as an acclaimed योद्धा , संगीतकार ,  and poet , traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms .
David is central to Jewish , Christian , and  इस्लामी doctrine और संस्कृति  .
Biblical tradition maintains that  a सीधा वंशज of दाउद होगा be the मसीहा  .
In  islam he is माना to be  a prophet and the king of a nation .
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the capital  और largest शहरी agglomerate of नेपाल  .
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu  महानगर नगर at इसके कोर , और इसके सिस्टर शहरों patan , kirtipur , thimi  , and Bhaktapur .
It also includes the recently recognized  शहरी क्षेत्रों of shankhapur , karyabinayak , और champapur  .
Banepa , Dhulikhel , and Panauti are satellite urban areas of Kathmandu  स्तिथ बस बाहर the काठमांडू  valley .
Kathmandu is also  ज्ञात informally as `` ktm  '' or the `` tri-city '' .
According to a  जनसांख्यिकी conducted in 2011 , काठमांडू metropolis अलोन रै 975,453 निवासियों  ; and the agglomerate has a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants .
The metropolitan city area  is और रै a जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of 19,250  per km2 .
The city stands at an  उन्नयन of लगभग in the bowl-shaped काठमांडू घाटी of सेंट्रल नेपाल  .
It is surrounded by  चार प्रमुख kyu : shivapuri  , Phulchoki , Nagarjun , and Chandragiri .
Kathmandu Valley is part of three districts ( Kathmandu , Lalitpur , and Bhaktapur ) , has the highest population  घनत्व in the देश , और is घर to परिचय a बारहवीं of नेपाल 's जनसांख्यिकी .
During Rana and Shah eras , the name `` Nepal '' referred  तभी to the काठमांडू घाटी ; it थी कया लोगों जो जिया  outside the valley called it .
दौरान इस  period , British historians called the valley itself `` Nepal Proper '' .
Today , Kathmandu is not only the capital of the Federal  लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of नेपाल , लकिन भी the मुख्यालय  of the Central Development Region of Nepal .
The Central Region  comprises तीन zones : bagmati , narayani  , and Janakpur .
Kathmandu is located  in the bagmati  Zone .
Kathmandu  is the गेटवे  to tourism in Nepal .
It is also the  तंत्रिका बीच of the देश  's economy .
It has the most advanced infrastructure of any urban area in  नेपाल , और इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is केन्द्रित on पर्यटन  , which accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96 .
( Tourism in  काठमांडू अस्वीकृत thereafter दौरान a काल of राजनैतिक अशांति , लकिन चूंकि  then has improved . )
The city  रै a समृद्ध इतिहास , spanning nearly 2000 सालो  , as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley .
Religious and cultural festivities  रूप a प्रमुख भाग of the जीवनदान of लोगों residing  in Kathmandu .
Most of  काठमांडू 's लोगों follow हिंदुत्व और अनेक  others follow Buddhism .
वहीँ हैं लोगों of अन्य धार्मिक मान्यताओं  as well , giving Kathmandu a cosmopolitan culture .
Nepali  is the सबसे commonly बोला भाषा  in the city .
Nepal Bhasa is the indigenous language  बोला by the नेवार लोगों .
Hindi is  widely समझा और अंग्रेज़ी is समझा  by Kathmandu 's educated residents .
The city 's  साक्षरता रेट is 98 %  .
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage ,  पर्यटन उद्योग , और अर्थव्यवस्था ; इसलिए युनेस्को 's संसार विरासत साईट सूचियाँ सब तीन शहरों ' स्मारक और आकर्षण  together under one heading , `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site `` .
Field hockey  , प्रायः referred to बस as हॉकी , is a टोली खेल of the हॉकी परिवार जिससे is निभाई between  two teams of eleven players with hockey sticks and a hard , solid plastic ball .
At the turn of the  21st सदी , the खेल is निभाई globally , साथ particular लोकप्रियता throughout यूरोपीय , एशिया , महासागरीय , और दक्षिण अमेरिका – in जोड to होने the नेशनल  sport of Pakistan and India .
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in Canada , the United  राज्य , और अन्य regions of the संसार जहाँ the खेल of बर्फ हॉकी  is more popular .
During play , goal keepers are the only players who are allowed to touch the ball with any part of their body ( with the exception of a player 's  हाथ माना 'part of the स्टिक ' ) , साथ इस तभी applying भीतर the शूटिंग वृत्त ( भी ज्ञात as the d , or शूटिंग चाप , or बस the वृत्त )  , while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick .
The team  कि स्कोर the सबसे लक्ष्य by  the end of the match wins .
If the score is tied at the end of the game , either a draw is declared or  the खेल goes into अतिरिक्त समय and/or a दंड गोलीबारी , depending on the प्रतियोगिता  's format .
The governing body of hockey is the International Hockey Federation ( FIH ) , with men and women being represented  internationally in प्रतियोगिताओं सहित the ओलम्पिक खेल , राष्ट्रमंडल खेल , हॉकी संसार कप , champions ट्रॉफी और जूनियर हॉकी संसार कप , साथ अनेक देशों कार्यशील  extensive junior , senior , and masters ' club competitions .
The FIH is also responsible for  organising the हॉकी नियम फलक और विकासशील  the rules for the sport .
A popular variant of field hockey is  अंदर हॉकी , जिससे differs in a क्रमांक of respects  while embodying the primary principles of hockey .
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side  रूपांतर , साथ a फ़ील्ड जिससे is घटाया to लगभग 40m  × 20m .
With many of the rules remaining the same , including obstruction and feet , there are several key variations - Players may not raise the ball unless shooting on goal , players may not hit the ball ( instead utilising pushes to transfer  the बॉल )  , and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the ball will rebound off .
Ethan `` Cane '' Ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional  अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी सीबीएस साबुन ओपेरा the यंग  and the Restless .
He is portrayed by Australian  कर्ता डेनियल गोडार्ड , जो originally auditioned लिये ब्रैड स्नाइडर on as the संसार turns लकिन थी अनुशंसित  for a role on The Young and the Restless instead .
The role was to be  portrayed as an अमरीकी , लकिन गोडार्ड  's Australian descent influenced the character 's background .
Former head writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the episode airing on January 12 , 2007 as an Australian  बारटेंडर in ढूंढें of उसके परिवार , a डेब्यू  that received a mixed response .
Latham created Cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly Rhodes ) and Jill Foster Abbott ( Jess Walton ) but the  अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि थी rewritten by मरिया एरिना घंटी in 2009 , reestablishing उसे as the बेटे of कोलिन और genevieve एटकिन्सन ( ट्रिस्टन रोजर्स और जिनी फ्रांसिस )  .
हालांकि characterized as `` रहस्यमय '' , cane is `` वफ़ादार और समर्पित '' , जबकि गोडार्ड  described the character as a `` typical Australian , working-class kind of guy '' .
He was the first member of the Atkinson  परिवार to appear on the श्रेणी , followed by उसके अभिभावक और  identical twin brother .
Soon  बाद उसके डेब्यू , he became a अग्रणी अक्षर , a  decision praised by viewers and critics .
The character has been involved with Amber Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ) ,  क्लो मिशेल ( एलिज़ाबेथ hendrickson ) और सबसे notably लिली सर्दियों ( christel खलील ) , a रोमांस कि  garnered significant fan attention .
In 2009 , Cane and Lily were married ; Global BC  होता बाद कॉल लिली the प्रेम of cane  's life .
The  जोड़ी था दो children ,  Charlie and Mattie Ashby .
In 2011  , the कर्ता थी fired , और  Cane was shot to death onscreen .
However , Goddard was rehired soon after viewers campaigned for his return , revealing  कि cane 's एकसमान जुड़वा bhai थी in फैक्ट the man जो died  .
इस कुर्बान उसके विवाह to लिली , लकिन the युगल  were remarried on Valentine 's Day in 2012 .
गोडार्ड रै महरूम widely acclaimed लिये उसके portrayal ; canyon न्यूज कहा कि he portrays the  character honestly , and is `` always dependable , on fire and exciting '' .
John  क्रिस्टोफर `` जॉनी '' डेप ii ( born जून 9 , 1963 ) is an अमरीकी  actor , film producer , and musician .
He has won the Golden  ग्लोब पुरस्कार और स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड  award for Best Actor .
डेप रोज़ to prominence on the 1980s टेलीविज़न श्रेणी 21 जम्प  Street , becoming a teen idol .
Dissatisfied with that status  , डेप turned to फिल्मी लिये अधिक चुनौतीपूर्ण भूमिकाएँ ; he निभाई the शीर्षक अक्षर of the acclaimed एडवर्ड scissorhands ( 1990 ) और बाद मिला बक्सा दफ्तर कामयाबी in films ऐसे as sleepy खोखला ( 1999  ) , Charlie and the Chocolate Factory ( 2005 ) , Alice in Wonderland ( 2010 ) , Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ) .
He has collaborated with  निदेशक और dost टिम बर्टन in आठ films ; the सबसे हाल होने  Dark Shadows ( 2012 ) .
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood , Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco , Hunter S. Thompson in Fear and Loathing  in लास वेगास , जार्ज जंग in उड़ा , और the बैंको डाकू जॉन dillinger in माइकल मन 's पब्लिक दुश्मनों  .
Films featuring Depp have grossed  over $ 3.1 अरब at the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा  office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide .
He has been nominated for top awards many times , winning the Best Actor Awards from the Golden –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy Globes  –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy लिये स्वीनी टॉड : the राक्षस नाई of बेड़े गली और इससे the स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड लिये pirates of the caribbean  : The Curse of the Black Pearl .
He also has  garnered a sex प्रतीक औकात in अमरीकी सिनेमा , होने twice नामित as  the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009 .
He  रै महरूम सूचीबद्ध in the 2012 गिनीज किताब of संसार रिकॉर्ड  as the highest paid actor , with $ 75 million .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3 , commonly known as the  वेब ) , is a प्रणाली of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ पहुँचा  via the Internet .
With a web browser , one can view web pages that may contain  टेक्स्ट , बिंब , वीडियो , और  other multimedia , and navigate between them via hyperlinks .
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE , British engineer , computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN , Sir Tim  berners-lee , अभी निदेशक of the संसार चौड़ी वेब consortium ( w3c ) , लिखा a प्रस्ताव in कूच 1989 लिये कया होता आखिरकार become the  World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use  हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in जिससे the  user can browse at will '' , and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year .
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born November 11 , 1986 ) is an American football  क्वार्टरबैक लिये the नई यॉर्क jets of the  National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was drafted in the first round  of the 2009 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट as the पांचवां overall  selection by the Jets and the second quarterback taken overall .
He played college football  at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ( USC ) .
Sanchez grew  up in a well-disciplined  and athletic family .
In the eighth grade , he began to play football and learn the intricacies  of the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति , प्रशिक्षण साथ उसके  father , Nick .
A well-regarded prospect , Sanchez committed to Southern California  following उसके कामयाब ऊँची स्कूल करियर in जिससे he led उसके टोली to a चैंपियनशिप शीर्षक दौरान उसके फाइनल ऋतु  .
At USC , Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback during his first three years though he  रोज़ to prominence due to उसके ब्रैड दिखावे on the फ़ील्ड in 2007 due to चोटों suffered by starting क्वार्टरबैक  John David Booty .
Sanchez also became popular within the  जातियाँ due to उसके mexican-american  heritage .
Named the starter in 2008 , Sanchez led  यूएससी to a 12–1 रिकार्ड और जीती the रोज़ कटोरी विरूद्ध  Penn State for which Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable Player award for his performance on offense .
हालांकि अनेक माना उसे too अनुभवहीन , सांचेज़ घोषित  his intention to enter the 2009 NFL Draft .
He was selected by the Jets after they traded up with  the क्लीवलैंड भूरा , और थी नामित the starting क्वार्टरबैक  prior to the start of the season .
Despite a subpar performance  , सांचेज़ led the jets to the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल , a खोने प्रयत्न to the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस , बनने the चौथी रुकी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास  to win his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games .
In his second season , Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the  playoffs और the टोली 's दूसरी लगातार afc चैंपियनशिप खेल  where they narrowly lost to the Pittsburgh Steelers , 24–19 .
With the win over the New England Patriots the week prior , Sanchez tied four other  quarterbacks लिये the दूसरी सबसे post-season सड़क victories  by a quarterback in NFL history .
In leading the Jets to two consecutive conference championships , Sanchez joined  क्वार्टरबैक बेन roethlisberger as the तभी दो quarterbacks in एनएफएल इतिहास to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन  championship in their first two seasons in the league .
The next two seasons would be a regression for both the team  और सांचेज़ as वे विफल to पहुँचें the  playoffs .
Fans and  मीडिया आलोचकों पुकारा लिये a  struggling Sanchez to be benched .
He  आखिरकार थी replaced towards the समाप्त of the  2012 season with Greg McElroy .
Paul Avery (  अप्रैल 2 , 1934december 10 , 2000 ) थी an अमरीकी पुलिस रिपोर्टर , बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके कहानियां on the  infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac , and later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping .
A small  submersible ac sump पंप साथ a गार्डन नली  connector
A sump pump is a pump used to remove water  कि रै संचित in a जल collecting sump जलाशय , commonly  found in the basement of homes .
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of a basement waterproofing system ,  funneling into the जलाशय or क्युकी of बरसात or प्राकृतिक मैदान जल , if the तहखाने is नीचे the जल  table level .
Sump pumps are used  जहाँ तहखाने बाढ़ happens regularly  and to remedy dampness where the water table is above the foundation of a home .
Sump pumps send water away from a house to any place where it is no longer  समस्यापूर्ण , ऐसे as a नगरपालिका तूफ़ान नाली or a शुष्क खूब  .
Pumps may discharge to  the sanitary सीवर in पुरानी  installations .
एकबार माना स्वीकार्य , इस अभ्यास may अभी violate the plumbing कोड or नगरपालिका bylaws , क्युकी  it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system .
Municipalities  urge homeowners to डिस्कनेक्ट और  reroute sump pump discharge away from sanitary sewers .
Fines  may be imposed लिये noncompliance  .
Many homeowners have inherited their sump pump  configurations और do नहीं एहसास कि the पंप discharges  to the sewer .
If the  निर्वहन is खिलाया to  a laundry sink in the basement , it 's likely going to the sewer .
Usually  hardwired into a घर 's विद्युत प्रणाली , sump  pumps may have a battery backup .
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some pumps , eliminating the need for electricity at the  व्यय of using potable जल , potentially बनाना उन्हें अधिक महंगी to operate than विद्युत पंपों और बनाना an  additional water disposal problem .
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped , a backup system is important  लिये मामले जब the प्रमुख शक्ति is आउट लिये prolonged अवधि of समय , as दौरान a कठोर  storm .
There are  generally दो प्रकार of sump पंपों — pedestal और  submersible .
The pedestal pump 's motor is mounted above the sump , where it  is अधिक easily  serviced , but is also more conspicuous .
The pump impeller is driven by  a long , लंबवत एक्सटेंशन शाफ्ट और the impeller  is in a scroll housing in the base of the pump .
the submersible पंप is entirely  mounted inside the sump , and is specially sealed to prevent electrical short circuits .
Sump pump systems are also  utilized in औद्योगिक और वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल  water table -related problems in surface soil .
An artesian  aquifer or आवधिक ऊँची जल तालिका हालात can कारण the  ground to become unstable due to water saturation .
as long as the पंप कृत्यों , the  surface soil will remain stable .
These sumps are typically  टेन फीट in गहराई or अधिक ; lined साथ corrugated मेटल पाइप कि  contains perforations or drain holes throughout .
They may include electronic control systems with visual and audible alarms and are  प्रायः covered to prevent मलबा और पशु इससे  falling in .
Bleeding Kansas ,  खूनी कान्सास or the किनारा युद्ध , थी a श्रेणी of हिंसक राजनैतिक confrontations involving anti-slavery free-staters और  pro-slavery `` Border Ruffian `` elements , that took place in the Kansas Territory and the neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861 .
at the दिल of the विरोध थी the सवाल of whether  Kansas would enter the Union as a free state or slave state .
As such ,  bleeding कान्सास थी a प्रॉक्सी युद्ध between northerners और southerners over the समस्या  of slavery in the United States .
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was  coined by होरेस greeley of the नई यॉर्क ट्रिब्यून  ; the events it encompasses directly presaged the American Civil War .
Congress had long struggled to balance the  रूचि of pro-slavery शक्तियां और anti-slavery शक्तियां  .
The events later known as Bleeding Kansas were set into motion by the Kansas–Nebraska  अधिनियम of 1854 , जिससे nullified the मिसौरी सुलह और बजाय implemented the  concept of popular sovereignty .
An ostensibly democratic idea , popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it would be a free or slave  राज्य ; however , इस resulted in आव्रजन en masse to कान्सास by कार्यकर्ताओं  from both sides .
At one point , Kansas had two separate governments , each with its  अपना संविधान , हालांकि तभी एक थी federally पहचाना .
On  जनवरी 29 , 1861 , कान्सास थी admitted to the संघ as a फ़्री राज्य , कम than तीन  months before the Battle of Fort Sumter which began the Civil War .
Benzene is an organic chemical compound  साथ the आणविक सूत्र c6 h|hydrogen|h6  .
Its molecule is composed of 6  कार्बन अणु joined in a रिंग , साथ 1 हाइड्रोजन अणु संलग्न  to each carbon atom .
Because its molecules contain  तभी कार्बन और हाइड्रोजन अणु , बेंजीन  is classed as a hydrocarbon .
Benzene is a natural constituent  of crude आयल , और is एक of the सबसे मौलिक  petrochemicals .
Benzene is an aromatic hydrocarbon and the second [ n ] -  annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ) , a चक्रीय हाइड्रोकार्बन  with a continuous pi bond .
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H . Benzene is a colorless and highly flammable  द्रव साथ a मीठी  smell .
It is mainly used as a  precursor to भारी रसायन , ऐसे as ethylbenzene और  cumene , which are produced on a billion kilogram scale .
Because it has a high octane number ,  it is an महत्वपूर्ण घटक of गैसोलीन , composing  a few percent of its mass .
सबसे non-industrial अनुप्रयोग have  been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity .
Giovanni Virginio  स्क्यापारेल्ली ( ; 14 कूच 1835 – 4 जुलाई 1910 ) थी an इतालवी astronomer  and science historian .
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's Wii  खेल कंसोल to चलाएं तन्त्र कि रै नहीं महरूम प्राधिकृत by  Nintendo .
It achieves this by defeating the  वी 's नक़ल सुरक्षा और कोड हस्ताक्षर  measures .
In more general terms , Wii Homebrew  refers to the उपयोग of the वी 's हार्डवेयर , accessories और  software for purposes outside those intended by the manufacturer .
Original efforts  केन्द्रित on using the वी रिमोट as a इंगित यंत्र on अन्य  operating systems , or running web-based games in the built-in web browser .
Subsequent developments in games exploits , such  as the `` गोधूलि हैक `` , `` bannerbomb '' और इसके बाद अवतार `` letterbomb '' , `` तोड़ स्टेक '' , `` इंडियाना pwns '' , `` yu-gi-owned '' , `` bathaxx  '' , and `` Return of the Jodi '' , made installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible .
Hadley ( right ) discussing the  2006 israel-lebanon संकट साथ बुश और राइस  .
Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13 , 1947 )  थी the 21st u.S. सहायक to the अध्यक्ष लिये नेशनल सुरक्षा अफेयर्स ( commonly referred  as National Security Advisor ) , serving under President George W. Bush .
Take identical growing plants and  दे उर्वरक to हाफ of उन्हें  .
If there are differences  between the निषेचित संयंत्र समूह और the unfertilized `` कंट्रोल '' समूह , ये  differences may be due to the fertilizer .
A scientific control is an experiment or observation  designed to minimize the प्रभाव of परिवर्तनीय  other than the single independent variable .
This increases the reliability of the results , often  through a तुलना between कंट्रोल माप और  the other measurements .
Scientific controls  हैं a भाग of the वैज्ञानिक विधि  .
For example , during drug  परीक्षण , वैज्ञानिकों होगा कोशिश to कंट्रोल दो समूह to रखना उन्हें as एकसमान  as possible , then allow one group to try the drug .
Another example might  be परीक्षण संयंत्र उर्वरक by giving it to तभी हाफ the पौधे in a गार्डन : the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक हैं the  control group , because they establish the baseline level of growth that the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against .
बगैर a कंट्रोल समूह , the प्रयोग can नहीं  determine whether the fertilizer-treated plants grow more than they would have if untreated .
Ideally , all variables in an experiment will be controlled (  accounted लिये by the कंट्रोल माप ) और none होगा be uncontrolled  .
In such an experiment , if all the controls work as expected , it is possible to conclude that the experiment  is working as intended और कि the परिणाम of the प्रयोग हैं due to the प्रभाव of the परिवर्तनीय  being tested .
That is , scientific controls allow an investigator  to मेक a अर्जी जैसे `` दो परिस्थितियों यहूद एकसमान जबतक  factor X occurred .
Since factor X is the  तभी अंतर between the दो परिस्थितियों ,  the new outcome was caused by factor X . ''
< < Chemical  तत्व आंकड़ा सन्दर्भ
John Adams ( October 30 , 1735 ( O.S . October 19 , 1735 ) – July 4 , 1826 ) was the second president of the United  राज्य ( 1797–1801 ) , having पहले परोसा as the पहला वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
An  अमरीकी founding पिता , he थी a statesman , राजनयिक , और a  leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain .
Well  शिक्षित , he थी an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically  about his often seminal ideas , both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
Adams came to  prominence in the जल्दी चरण  of the American Revolution .
A lawyer and public figure in Boston , as a delegate from Massachusetts to the Continental Congress , he played a leading  भूमिका in persuading कॉंग्रेस to घोषित स्वतंत्रता  .
He  assisted थामस जेफरसन in drafting the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता  in 1776 , and was its primary advocate in the Congress .
Later , as a diplomat in Europe  , he helped negotiate the eventual सलाम सन्धि साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , और  was responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers .
A  राजनैतिक theorist और इतिहासकार , एडम्स largely लिखा the मैसाचुसेट्स  Constitution in 1780 , which together with his earlier Thoughts on Government , influenced American political thought .
One of  उसके महानतम भूमिकाएँ थी as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर  : in 1775 , he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief , and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States .
Adams ' revolutionary  श्रेय secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन  's vice president and his own election in 1796 as the second president .
During his one term , he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans , as well as the  प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना federalist पार्टी led by उसके कड़वा दुश्मन सिकंदर  Hamilton .
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts , and built up the army and navy  विशेषकर in the फेस of an undeclared नवल युद्ध ( पुकारा the `` quasi-war  `` ) with France , 1798–1800 .
The major accomplishment of  उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध in the फेस of हैमिल्टन  's opposition .
in 1800 , एडम्स थी पराजित लिये re-election by  Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts .
He later resumed his  दोस्ती साथ जेफरसन  .
He and his  बीवी , अबीगैल एडम्स , संस्थापित an संपन्नता परिवार  line of politicians , diplomats , and historians now referred to as the Adams political family .
Adams was the father of  जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स , the छठे  President of the United States .
उसके उपलब्धियाँ have प्राप्त वृहद मान्यता in आधुनिक  times , though his contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders .
Adams was the first  u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the भवन कि आखिरकार became  known as the White House .
a वाट भाप  engine .
The steam engine ,  fuelled primarily by कोयले , propelled the औद्योगिक  Revolution in Great Britain and the world .
the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति थी the परिवर्तन to नई निर्माण प्रक्रियाओं  that occurred in the period from about 1760 to some time between 1820 and 1840 .
This transition included going from hand production methods  to मशीने , नई रासायनिक निर्माण और आयरन उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं , improved दक्षता of जल शक्ति  , the increasing use of steam power and development of machine tools .
The transition also  शामिल the बदलें इससे लकडी और अन्य bio-fuels  to coal .
The Industrial revolution began in  ब्रिटेन और भीतर a few दशकों स्प्रेड to पश्चिमी  Europe and the United States .
The  औद्योगिक क्रान्ति marks a प्रमुख turning पाइंट in इतिहास  ; almost every aspect of daily life was influenced in some way .
Most notably ,  औसत आय और जनसांख्यिकी  began to exhibit unprecedented sustained growth .
In the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E. Lucas , Jr. , `` For the first time in history , the living  मानकों of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained विकास ... nothing remotely जैसे इस आर्थिक बर्ताव is उल्लेखित by the शास्त्रीय अर्थशास्त्रियों  , even as a theoretical possibility . ''
William  घंटी स्कॉट  Iron and Coal , 1855-60
The period of time  covered by the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति varies  with different historians .
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke  आउट ' in ब्रिटेन in the 1780s और थी नहीं fully लगा जबतक the 1830s or 1840s , जबकि T. S. एश्टन आयोजित कि  it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830 .
Some 20th-century historians such as John Clapham and Nicholas Crafts have  argued कि the प्रक्रम of आर्थिक और सोशल बदलें took प्लेस धीरे  and the term revolution is a misnomer .
इस is स्टिल a विषय  of debate among historians .
GDP per  capita थी broadly stable पहले the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति और the emergence  of the modern capitalist economy .
The Industrial Revolution began an era of per-capita  आर्थिक विकास in पूंजीवादी  economies .
Economic historians are in  अनुबंध कि the onset of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति is the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण इवेंट  in the history of humanity since the domestication of animals and plants .
The First Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 and 1870 , when technological and economic progress gained momentum with the increasing adoption  of steam-powered नौकाएँ , जहाजों और रेल , the विशाल स्केल manufacture of यंत्र टूल्स और  the increasing use of steam powered factories .
Juliet AnnMarie Huddy  ( born सितंबर 27 , 1969 )  , is an American television news reporter , currently appearing on Fox News Channel .
This list ranks U.S.  शहरों by जमीन क्षेत्रफल ( नहीं सहित लाशें  of water ) .
Total areas ( including water ) are also given , but note that , when  क्रमित by कुल क्षेत्रफल , a क्रमांक of तटीय शहरों appear disproportionately `` larger  '' .
सैन फ्रांसिस्को is an चरम उदाहरण  ; water makes up nearly 80 % of its total area of 232 square miles ( 601 km2 ) .
Note also that in many cases a city may be geographically large primarily because its municipal government  रै मिलाया साथ the सरकारी of the surrounding  county .
In some cases the county no longer exists , while in others the arrangement has formed a Consolidated city–county (  or city- बरो in अलास्का , or city- मोहल्ला in louisiana  ) .
These are  दिखाया in बिंदास in the सूची नीचे ( लकिन नहीं सब उदाहरण  may be indicated ) .
** These are  स्वतंत्र शहरों , अर्थ वे हैं नहीं a  part of any county .
The large  आंत ( or bowel , कोलन ) is the पिछला  part of the digestive system in vertebrate animals .
Its function is to  अवशोषित जल इससे the बाकी indigestible खाना पदार्थ , और  then to pass useless waste material from the body .
This article is primarily about the human gut ,  हालांकि the सूचना परिचय इसके प्रक्रियाओं हैं सीधे  applicable to most mammals .
The large intestine consists of  the cecum , मलाशय और गुदा कनाल  .
It starts in  the सही iliac प्रदेश of the pelvis , बस at or नीचे the सही कमर  , where it is joined to the bottom end of the small intestine .
From here it continues up the abdomen , then across the width of the abdominal  गुहा , और तब it turns bas , continuing to इसके endpoint at the गुदा  .
The large  आंत is परिचय long , जिससे is परिचय  one-fifth of the whole length of the intestinal canal .
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine  शामिल the cecum , कोलन , मलाशय , और गुदा कनाल  .
However ,  कुछ स्त्रोत exclude the गुदा कनाल  .
The Green Bay Packers are  an अमरीकी  football team based in Green Bay , Wisconsin .
They  हैं सदस्यों of the उत्तर प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the NFL  , having महरूम व्यवस्थित और playing in 1919  .
The  पैकर्स हैं the तभी non-profit , community-owned प्रमुख लीग  professional sports team in the United States .
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town  टीमों '' कि यहूद एकबार आम in the एनएफएल दौरान the 1920s और 1930s  .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun , the Green Bay Packers can trace  उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional टीमों in ग्रीन खाड़ी  dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team  विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन  and the Midwest .
They joined the American  पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( apfa ) in 1921 , the forerunner to  what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ) .
हालांकि ग्रीन खाड़ी is the पिछला एनएफएल `` छोटी कस्बा '' टोली , इसके लोकल प्रशंसक आधार और मीडिया extends  into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any  अन्य टोली in the एनएफएल ) , सहित नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी  victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ) .
The Packers have long-standing ,  कड़वा rivalries साथ उनके nfc उत्तर ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों , the शिकागो bears  , Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions .
The Bears-Packers  फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास  , dating back to 1921 .
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley '' ) is  an urbanized घाटी स्तिथ in the लॉस एंजिल्स महानगर क्षेत्रफल of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States , defined by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it .
Home  to 1.76 लाख लोगों , it झूठ  north of the larger and more populous Los Angeles Basin .
Nearly two thirds of the Valley  's जमीन क्षेत्रफल is भाग of the नगर of लॉस एंजिल्स  .
The other incorporated cities in  the घाटी हैं ग्लेनडेल , burbank , सैन फर्नांडो , छुपा पहाड़ियाँ  and Calabasas .

the संसार of coca-cola , is a स्थाई  exhibition featuring the history of The Coca-Cola Company .
Its well-known advertising as well as a host of entertainment areas and attractions , and is located  in अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया ( जहाँ the कम्पनी 's मुख्यालय हैं स्तिथ  ) at Pemberton Place ( named in honor of John Pemberton , the inventor of Coca-Cola ) .
as part of  जॉर्जिया 's संग्रहालय  .
