It  खोली to the पब्लिक on may 24 , 2007 ,  relocating from and replacing the original exhibit .
Pretties is a 2005 science  fiction अनोखा और the दूसरी किताब of the uglies त्रयी लिखा  by Scott Westerfeld .
It is set in a future dystopian world in which everyone  is turned `` pretty '' by चरम कॉस्मेटिक सर्जरी upon reaching आयु 16 .
It tells the story of teenager Tally  youngblood जो विद्रोहियों विरूद्ध समाज 's enforced  conformity .
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born  सितंबर 26 , 1971 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री sentenced to जीवन  in prison for murdering her children .
Born in Union , South Carolina , and a former student of the  विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिण कैरोलिना संघ , वो थी convicted on जुलाई 22 , 1995 लिये murdering उसके दो बेटे  , 3-year-old Michael Daniel Smith , born October 10 , 1991 , and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith , born August 5 , 1993 .
The case  gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान shortly बाद it विकसित , due to उसके  claiming that a black man stole her car and kidnapped her sons .
She later  claimed कि वो suffered इससे दिमागी स्वास्थ्य मुद्दे  that impaired her judgment .
According to the South Carolina  विभाग of corrections , स्मिथ होगा be योग्य  for parole on November 4 , 2024 , after serving a minimum of thirty years .
She is incarcerated at South Carolina 's Leath  correctional संस्था , निकट  Greenwood .
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali taken from the Inuit Koyukon Athabaskan language meaning `` The Great One '' ) is the highest mountain peak in the United  राज्य और in उत्तर अमेरिका साथ a समिट उन्नयन  of above sea level .
At some , the base to peak rise is considered the largest of any  पहाड़ situated entirely ऊपर समुद्र स्तर  .
Measured by topographic prominence  , it is the तीसरा सबसे prominent शिखर बाद  Mount Everest and Aconcagua .
Located in the Alaska Range  in the आंतरिक of us राज्य of अलास्का , it  is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve .
The  पहला यूरोपीय to दस्तावेज़ sighting the पहाड़  was George Vancouver in 1794 .
In 1903 , James Wickersham recorded the  पहला attempt at चढ़ाई mckinley जिससे  was unsuccessful .
In 1906 , Frederick Cook claimed the first ascent  जिससे थी बाद सिद्ध to be गलत  .
The first verifiable ascent to McKinley 's summit was achieved on June 7 , 1913 by climbers  हडसन stuck , हैरी karstens , वाल्टर हार्पर , और  Robert Tatum .
In 1951 , Bradford Washburn pioneered the West Buttress  रूट माना to be the safest और easiest  route and therefore the most popular currently in use .
The  होंडा s600 is an ऑटोमोबाइल  manufactured by Honda .
It was launched in  कूच 1964 .
Available as a roadster – bearing strong resemblance to the Honda  s500 – और as a fastback coupé – introduced in कूच 1965 – the s600 थी the पहला होंडा  available in two trim levels .
During its production run up to 1966 , the model styling would remain pretty much the  वही , साथ the सबसे notable परिवर्तन coming to the सामने grille  , bumper , and headlights .
Powered by a DOHC , water-cooled ,  four-cylinder इनलाइन इंजन साथ चार carburetors , the इंजन क्षमता थी  increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc .
The  इंजन उत्पादित at 8,500 आरपीएम और  had a top speed of .
With the convertible  weighing in at mere , the अतिरिक्त चादर मेटल  of the coupe only added to the overall weight .
Suspension was  स्वतंत्र साथ sealed रोलर कड़ी  drive to each rear wheel .
The S600 was  the पहला द्रव्यमान marketed  Honda car .
First offered only in right-hand drive , it  जल्द became उपलब्धियाँ in left-hand ड्राइव to अपील  to export markets .
There  यहूद a few pre-production s500s manufactured  in left hand drive , two or three even being shown in some early sales brochures .
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were available in standard trim and a special , upgraded package called the SM600 which included , among other  वस्तुएं , खास पेंट रंगों , विशेष badging , a मानक रेडियो और स्पीकर , a खास एंटीना in the यात्री पक्ष सूर्य छज्जा , मानक reversing  lights , a standard cigarette lighter , a standard heater , better cushioned seats , and a detachable seat track for quick removal of the passenger seat .
Honda built 3,912 roadsters in  1964 , साथ उत्पादन चढ़ाई to 7,261 convertibles  and 1,519 coupes in 1965 .
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the S800 ) with only 111  roadsters और 281 coupes , giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles और 1,800 coupes  for the 3 year span .
Everybody Hates Chris is an American television  काल sitcom कि depicts the teenage अनुभवों of हास्य क्रिस चट्टान ( जो is भी the narrator ) जबकि growing up in the bedford-stuyvesant  neighborhood of Brooklyn , New York .
the दिखाएँ is नियत between 1983 और 1987 ; however , चट्टान खुद  was a teenager between 1978 and 1983 .
Rock grew up with a boy named Kenny Montero , whom he has  प्रायः referred to as the प्रेरणा लिये a लॉट of the एपीसोड  .
In many interviews ,  चट्टान रै वर्णित केनी as the  reason he got into comedy in the first place .
The show  's शीर्षक parodies the सीबीएस sitcom  Everybody Loves Raymond .
Rock stated : ``  everybody loves रेमंड लकिन everybody hates क्रिस  ! `` .
the दिखाएँ 's सीसे अभिनेताओं हैं टायलर जेम्स विलियम्स , टेरी  Crews , Tichina Arnold , Tequan Richmond , Imani Hakim , and Vincent Martella .
In  पतन 2008 , the the cw स्थानांतरित everybody hates  Chris and The Game to the Friday night death slot .
The fourth season of the series premiered Friday ,  अक्तूबर 3 , 2008 , at 8:00pm eastern/7:00pm सेंट्रल  .
On May 21 , 2009 , The CW  घोषित कि it था रद्द  Everybody Hates Chris .
Prior to this , executive producer Chris  चट्टान घोषित कि the समाप्त of ऋतु 4 matched up साथ उसके अपना  past—dropping out of high school to become a comedian—and that it was time to end the show .
Pleural effusion is  excess द्रव कि accumulates between the दो  pleural layers , the fluid-filled space that surrounds the lungs .
excessive amounts of ऐसे द्रव can impair श्वास by limiting the  expansion of the lungs during ventilation .
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional  शीर्षक of an बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी वीर एपिक कविता consisting of 3182 alliterative long लाइनों , नियत in  Scandinavia , commonly cited as one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature .
It survives in a single  पाण्डुलिपि ज्ञात as the nowell  Codex .
Its composition by an anonymous Anglo-Saxon  कवि is दिनाँक between the 8th और the जल्दी  11th century .
In 1731 , the manuscript was badly damaged by a fire that swept through  a भवन आवास a संग्रहण of मध्यकालीन पांडुलिपियों समवेत  by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton .
The poem fell into obscurity for decades , and its existence did not become widely known again until it was  मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण prepared by the icelandic-danish विद्वान grímur jónsson thorkelin  .
In  the कविता , बियोवुल्फ़ , a नायिका of the geats in scandinavia , आता to the सहायता of hroðgar , the किंग  of the Danes , whose mead hall ( in Heorot ) has been under attack by a monster known as Grendel .
After Beowulf slays him ,  grendel 's माँ हमले the हॉल और  is then also defeated .
विजयी , बियोवुल्फ़ goes घर to  Geatland in Sweden and later becomes king of the Geats .
After a period of fifty years has  passed , बियोवुल्फ़ defeats a ड्रैगन  , but is fatally wounded in the battle .
After his death  , उसके सेवकों दफनाने उसे in a tumulus , a दफ़न mound  , in Geatland .
Shem Ham and Japheth by  जेम्स tissot 1904  .
Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez :  ሴም , sēm ; `` renown ; समृद्धि ; नाम '' ) थी  one of the sons of Noah in the Hebrew Bible as well as in Islamic literature .
He is most  popularly regarded as the ज्येष्ठ बेटे , हालांकि  some traditions regard him as the second son .
Genesis  10:21 refers to सापेक्ष आयु of shem और उसके bhai japheth , लकिन साथ  sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations .
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also , the father of all the children of Eber , the  bhai of japheth the elder , भी to उसे यहूद children  born . `` .
However , the New  अमरीकी मानक बाइबल देता , `` भी  to Shem , the father of all the children of Eber , and the older brother of Japheth , children were born . ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at  the जनम of arphaxad , ( लकिन nearly 101 - देखिए कालक्रम नोट , ) दो सालो बाद the बाढ़ , बनाना उसे मुश्किल 99 at the समय the बाढ़  began ; and that he lived for another 500 years after this , making his age at death 600 years .
The children of Shem were Elam , Asshur ,  arphaxad , lud , और aram , in जोड  to daughters .
अब्राहम , the patriarch  of the Hebrews and Arabs , was one of the descendants of Arphaxad .
Islamic literature describes Shem  as एक of the believing बेटे of  Noah .
Some sources even  पहचानो shem as a नबी in उसके अपना सही  and that he was the next prophet after his father .
In one Muslim legend , Shem was  एक of the लोगों कि परमेश्वर बना यीशु उठाएगा as  a sign to the Children of Israel .
The 1st century historian Flavius Josephus , among many others , recounted the tradition that these five  बेटे यहूद the progenitors of the राष्ट्र of ईलम , assyria , chaldea  , Lydia , and Syria , respectively .
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages , as a subset of the  afro-asiatic भाषाएं , denoting the आम भाषाई विरासत of अरबी , aramaic , अक्कादी  , Ethiopic , Hebrew and Phoenician languages .
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g. , B. Talmud  nedarim 32b ; उत्पत्ति rabbah 46:7 ; उत्पत्ति rabbah 56:10 ; leviticus rabbah 25:6 ; संख्याएँ rabbah 4:8 . ) , shem is  believed to have been Melchizedek , King of Salem whom Abraham is recorded to have met after the battle of the four kings .
In a few of the many extra-biblical sources that  describe उसे , shem is भी credited साथ हत्या nimrod , बेटे of cush  .
Shem is mentioned in Genesis 5:32 ,  6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; भी in 1 क्रॉनिकल्स  1:4 .
Geographic  identifications of flavius josephus , c. 100 ad ; japheth 's  sons shown in red , Ham 's sons in blue , Shem 's sons in green .
Go Daddy or Go  पापा समूह inc. is a privately आयोजित कम्पनी कि is primarily  an internet domain registrar and web hosting company .
Go Daddy Group Inc. filed for an IPO in 2006 , but  बाद रद्द it , due to `` मार्केट uncertainties  '' .
In addition to domain  पंजीकरण और होस्टिंग go पापा भी बिकता  e-business related software and services .
On June 24 , 2011 , The Wall Street Journal reported that  private-equity firms केकेआर और चांदी झील साझेदार , साथ साथ a तीसरा निवेशकों , यहूद nearing a सौदे to ख़रीदे the कम्पनी लिये between  $ 2–2.5 billion .
On July 1 , 2011 Go Daddy confirmed that  केकेआर , चांदी झील साझेदार और प्रौद्योगिकी क्रॉसओवर  Ventures had closed the deal .
Although the purchase price was not  officially घोषित it थी reported to be $ 2.25 अरब , लिये  65 % of the company .
, Bob Parsons had ceded the CEO role of Go Daddy  to वारेन adelman , जो था महरूम साथ the कम्पनी  for about 10 years .
The Andorran coat  of बाहें at the andorran पार्लियामेंट  .
Andorra ( ; , ) , officially the Principality of Andorra ( ) , also called the Principality of the Valleys of  अंडोरा , ( ) , is a landlocked microstate in southwestern यूरोपीय , स्तिथ in the पूर्वी pyrenees kyu  and bordered by Spain and France .
It is the sixth  smallest स्वदेश in यूरोपीय , having an क्षेत्रफल of और an अनुमानित  population of 85,000 in 2012 .
Its  पूंजी , अंडोरा la वेला , is the उच्चतम पूंजी नगर  in Europe , at an elevation of above sea level .
The  आधिकारिक भाषा is कैटलन , हालांकि स्पेनी ,  Portuguese , and French are also commonly spoken .
Created under a charter in 988 ,  the उपस्थित principality थी formed in 1278  .
It is known as a principality as it is a  साम्राज्य headed by दो co-princes – the बिशप of urgell और the अध्यक्ष  of France .
Andorra is a  prosperous देश मुख्यतः क्युकी of इसके पर्यटन उद्योग , जिससे सेवाएं  an estimated 10.2 million visitors annually , and also because of its status as a tax haven .
It is not a member of the European Union , but  the यूरोपियन is the de facto करेंसी  .
The people of Andorra have the 4th  उच्चतम इंसान जीवन प्रत्याशा  in the world — 82 years at birth .
The George Washington University ( GW , GWU , or George Washington )  is a व्यापक निजी , coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ  in Washington , D.C. .
It awards certificates , Bachelor  डिग्री , मास्टर्स डिग्री , और phds आरपार अनेक दर्जन  disciplines .
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on February 9 , 1821 as The  columbian कॉलेज in the ज़िला of कोलंबिया  .
किम्बर्ली नोएल `` किम '' कार्दशियन ( born अक्तूबर 21 , 1980 ) is an अमरीकी  socialite , television personality and occasional actress .
In 2007 , she gained  सुर्खी as the विषय of a sex टेप कि subsequently resulted in a अदालत  awarding her $ 5 million ; later in that same year , she and her family rose to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up with the Kardashians , and  इसके subsequent spin-offs , सहित कोर्टनी और किम लो नई यॉर्क और  Kourtney and Kim Take Miami .
In 2010 , Kardashian was the  highest-earning वास्तविकता स्टार  , with estimated earnings of $ 6 million .
With sisters Kourtney  और khloé , कार्दशियन co-owns the  fashion boutique chain D-A-S-H .
She has been involved in the production of several lines of  कपडे और सुगंध  .
In  अगस्त 2011 , कार्दशियन शादीशुदा बास्केट  player Kris Humphries in a widely publicized ceremony .
That October ,  कार्दशियन दायर लिये तलाक following  72 days of marriage .
The move garnered significant backlash  इससे the मीडिया , जो labeled it a  `` publicity stunt '' .
After 536  दिनों , कार्दशियन और humphries पहुँचे an अघोषित  settlement at the Los Angeles Superior Court , finalizing the divorce in April 2013 .
Aerial view of Oahu with freeways and  राजमार्गों , 3d computer-generated चित्र
Fly-around  दौरे of the द्वीप
oahu ( ) or oahu , ज्ञात as `` the महफ़िल प्लेस '' , is the तीसरा largest of the हवाई आइलैंड्स  and the most populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii .
The state  पूंजी , होनोलूलू , is on  Oahu 's southeast coast .
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the islands in Kaneohe Bay and off the  पूर्वी ( windward ) coast , it रै a कुल जमीन क्षेत्रफल of , बनाना it the 20th largest द्वीप  in the United States .
In the greatest dimension ,  इस volcanic द्वीप is  long and across .
The  लंबाई of the shoreline  is .
The island is the result of two separate shield volcanoes : Waianae and  koolau , साथ a व्यापक `` घाटी '' or काठी ( the सेंट्रल oahu मैदान  ) between them .
The  उच्चतम पाइंट is mt . ka'ala  in the Waianae Range , rising to above sea level .
The base currency of the  संयुक्त राज्य is the u.S. डालर , और is मुद्रित on बिल्स in denominations  of $ 1 , $ 2 , $ 5 , $ 10 , $ 20 , $ 50 , and $ 100 .
At one time , however , U.S.  करेंसी शामिल पाँच larger  denominations .
Notes in the denominations of $ 500 , $ 1,000 , $ 5,000 , and $ 10,000 were printed  लिये सामान्य उपयोग , और a $ 100,000 नोट थी मुद्रित लिये निश्चित आतंरिक  transactions .
British Honduras was a British  उपनिवेश in सेंट्रल अमेरिका .
In 1981 , the colony  gained पूरा स्वतंत्रता , और is अभी the  independent nation of Belize .
First  colonised by spaniards in the 17th सदी ,  the territory on the east coast of Central America , south of Mexico , became a British crown colony in 1862 .
In 1964 , it  became a self-governing  colony .
Belize became fully independent from  the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1981 .
Belize was the last  महाद्वीपीय कब्ज़ा of the संयुक्त किंगडम  in the Americas .
Spelt , also known as dinkel wheat , or hulled wheat , is an  प्राचीन प्रजाति of गेहूं इससे the  fifth millennium BC .
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from  the कांस्य आयु to मध्यकालीन टाइम्स ; it अभी survives as a relict क्रॉप in सेंट्रल यूरोपीय और उत्तरी स्पेन  and has found a new market as a health food .
Spelt is  sometimes माना a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति आम गेहूं ( T. aestivum  ) , in which case its botanical name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp . spelta .
It is a hexaploid wheat  , जिससे अर्थात् it रै छह सेट of गुणसूत्रों  .
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective created by author  और चिकित्सक सर आर्थर कोनन डोयल  .
A London-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities border on the fantastic , Holmes is  प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके कुटिल लॉजिकल तर्क , उसके क्षमता to अपनाना लगभग कोई भेस ,  and his use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases .
Holmes , who  पहला appeared in प्रकाशन in 1887  , was featured in four novels and 56 short stories .
The first novel , A Study in Scarlet , appeared  in beeton 's क्रिसमस सालाना in 1887  and the second , The Sign of the Four , in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890 .
The character grew tremendously in popularity with the first series of short stories in The  strand पत्रिका , शुरूआत साथ a कांड in बोहेमिया in 1891 ; further श्रेणी of छोटी  stories and two novels published in serial form appeared between then and 1927 .
The stories  कवर a काल इससे around 1880  up to 1914 .
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and biographer , Dr. John H. Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier `` and `` The Lion 's  माने `` ) और दो अन्य हैं लिखा in the तीसरा व्यक्ति ( `` the mazarin स्टोन `` और `` उसके पिछला धनुष ``  ) .
In two stories ( `` The Musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria Scott `` ) , Holmes  tells वाटसन the प्रमुख स्टोरी इससे उसके यादें , जबकि वाटसन becomes the narrator of the फ़्रेम  story .
The first and fourth novels , A Study in Scarlet and The  घाटी of भय , प्रत्येक शामिल a long अंतराल of सर्वज्ञ  narration recounting events unknown to either Holmes or Watson .
The  संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the  United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ) .
it is अक्सर referred  to as the House .
The other  हाउस is the सीनेट .
The composition and  शक्तियां of the हाउस हैं स्थापित in आलेख एक of  the United States Constitution .
The major power of the House is  to pass संघीय विधान कि affects the संपूर्ण देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर  also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills , to impeach  officials , और to elect the u.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत  in the Electoral College .
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its  जनसांख्यिकी लकिन is हकदार to at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि  .
The  सबसे populous राज्य , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , currently has 53 representatives .
The total number of voting  प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by विधि  at 435 .
Each representative  serves लिये a two-year पद  .
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives , who presides over the chamber , is elected by the members of the House , and is  इसलिए traditionally the नेता of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन सम्मेलन , whichever  party has more voting members .
The House meets  in the दक्षिण wing of the संयुक्त  States Capitol .
Jell-O is a brand name belonging to U.S.-based  kraft भोजन लिये a क्रमांक of जिलेटिन desserts , सहित फल gels , puddings और no-bake मलाई  pies .
The brand 's popularity has led to it  होने प्रयुक्त as a जेनेरिक पद लिये जिलेटिन मिठाई आरपार the  U.S. and Canada .
Kennywood is an amusement park  स्तिथ in वेस्ट mifflin , पेन्सिलवेनिया  , a suburb of Pittsburgh .
The park first opened in 1898 as a `` trolley park '' attraction at the  समाप्त of the mellon परिवार 's monongahela गली रेल  .
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and Andrew McSwigan and thus  began the kennywood entertainment कम्पनी कि रै remained a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार  for over 100 years .
This traditional amusement park still has structures and rides  डेटिंग वापस to इसके खोलने और  the early 1900s .
Along with Rye Playland Park , it is one of only  दो मनोरंजन पार्क सूचीबद्ध in the नेशनल पंजीकरण of ऐतिहासिक स्थान  .
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood Entertainment  कम्पनी , जिससे जबतक दिसम्बर 2007 थी a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार स्वामित्व  by the Henninger and McSwigan families .
Kennywood  entertainment is अभी संचालित by california-based राजमहल entertainment , a subsidiary  of Parques Reunidos , an international amusement park company based in Madrid , Spain .
Parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of Candover  निवेश , an निवेश निधि आधारित in the uk  .
A Social Security  कार्ड जारी by the रेलरोड रिटायरमेंट  Board in 1943 to a now deceased person .
In the United States , a Social Security number (  ssn ) is a nine-digit क्रमांक जारी to u.S. नागरिकों , स्थाई निवासियों , और  temporary ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act , codified as .
The number is issued to  an व्यक्तिगत by the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रशासन , an स्वतंत्र  agency of the United States government .
Its  प्राथमिक purpose is to track individuals लिये  Social Security purposes .
A Social Security number may be  प्राप्त by applying on रूप ss-5 , `` अनुप्रयोग  for A Social Security Number Card '' .
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of art and design , especially visual art and music , where the work is set  आउट to expose the essence or पहचान of a विषय through eliminating सब non-essential फ़ॉर्म , सुविधाएँ  or concepts .
Minimalism is any design or style in  जिससे the सरलतम और fewest तत्व हैं प्रयुक्त to  create the maximum effect .
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified  साथ developments in post–world युद्ध ii पश्चिमी आर्ट , सबसे strongly साथ अमरीकी विज़ुअल कला in the  1960s and early 1970s .
Prominent artists associated  साथ इस गति शामिल डोनाल्ड judd , जॉन mccracken , agnes मार्टिन , डान flavin  , Robert Morris , Anne Truitt , and Frank Stella .
It is rooted in the  reductive पहलुओं of modernism , और is प्रायः interpreted as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध  Abstract expressionism and a bridge to Postminimal art practices .
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in music which features repetition and iteration  , as in the रचनाएं of la मोंटे यंग , टेरी रिले  , Steve Reich , Philip Glass , and John Adams .
Minimalist  रचनाएं हैं sometimes  known as systems music .
The term  `` अल्पतम '' is प्रायः लागू colloquially to designate  anything that is spare or stripped to its essentials .
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett ,  the films of रॉबर्ट bresson , the कहानियां of रेमंड carver , और भी the ऑटोमोबाइल डिजाइन  of Colin Chapman .
The word was first used in  अंग्रेज़ी in the जल्दी 20th सदी to describe  the Mensheviks .
In  रसायन और भौतिकी , डाल्टन 's विधि ( भी पुकारा डाल्टन 's विधि of आंशिक pressures  ) states that the total pressure exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases .
This empirical law  थी observed by जॉन डाल्टन in 1801  and is related to the ideal gas laws .
Mathematically , the  दबाव of a मिश्रण of गैसों can  be defined as the summation
or
जहाँ represent the आंशिक दबाव  of each component .
It  is assumed कि the गैसों do नहीं  react with each other
जहाँ is the mole भिन्न of the  i-th component in the total mixture of n components .
the संबंध नीचे provides a रास्ता  to determine the volume based concentration of any individual gaseous component
where is the  विशेषज्ञता of the i-th घटक expressed  in ppm .
Dalton 's law is  नहीं exactly followed by रियल गैसों  .
Those deviations are  considerably विशाल at ऊँची pressures  .
In  ऐसे शर्तें , the आवाज़ occupied by the अणुओं can  become significant compared to the free space between them .
In  particular , the छोटी औसत दूरियाँ between अणुओं उठाता the तीव्रता  of intermolecular forces between gas molecules enough to substantially change the pressure exerted by them .
Neither of  those प्रभाव हैं माना by the आदर्श गैस मॉडल  .
This is a list of the largest United States colleges and universities by  नामांकन लिये कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों in  the United States .
कया इस सूची  includes:
Colleges  और विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर  the United States
University systems  if the प्रणाली is चलाएं अंतर्गत a सिंगल प्रशासन
Enrollment is the sum of the  headcount of undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट  students
Enrollment is  गिने by the एकीकृत post-secondary शिक्षा प्रणाली  within the U.S. Department of Education .
Enrollment is  the 12-month unduplicated headcount , indicating the क्रमांक of अद्वितीय  students who attended the university during the year .
