`` Right Round '' is a song  performed by अमरीकी rapper flo rida , released as the सीसे सिंगल इससे  his second studio album , R.O.O.T.S . ( 2009 ) .
The song features guest  vocals इससे kesha  .
It was released to radio on  27 जनवरी 2009 और थी डिजिटली released on  10 February by Poe Boy Entertainment and Atlantic Records .
The song lyrically  बोलती of flo rida 's जाल बॉल रेफरी enthusiasm , जबकि adapting  the chorus of the 1984 Dead or Alive song `` You Spin Me Round ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook .
according to एक of the सोंग 's लेखक , the  chorus refers to oral sex .
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song , but in  the संयुक्त राज्य , दौरान the चलाएं atop the चार्ट , kesha थी uncredited  .
The song received mostly negative reviews from critics  , जो claimed it थी kitsch और misogynistic  .
However , it was a commercial success , reaching the  शीर्ष टेन of the चार्ट in उन्नीस देशों विश्वव्यापी  .
In the United States ,  it became flo rida 's दूसरी number-one सिंगल और broke the रिकार्ड लिये first-week बिक्री  when it was released to digital retailers .
The single 's accompanying music  वीडियो थी निर्देशित by मैल्कम जोन्स और मनोनीत लिये  an MTV Video Music Award .
The song has been used in several movies , such as The  hangover , the भद्दा सच्चाई और the तेलुगु  movie Pilla Zamindar .
In the movie Pitch  पूर्ण , the सोंग is performed by the a cappella  group the Treblemakers .
The Chief Justice of the United States is the head of the United States federal court system ( the judicial branch of  the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य ) और the मुख्य न्यायधीश of the परम् अदालत  of the United States .
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight  हैं the संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त  States .
From 1789 until 1866 , the office was known as the Chief  इंसाफ of the परम्  Court .
The Chief Justice is the highest judicial officer in the country , and acts as a chief  प्रशासनिक अधिकारी लिये the संघीय न्यायालयों और as सिर of the न्यायिक सम्मेलन of the संयुक्त राज्य appoints the निदेशक of the प्रशासनिक  Office of the United States Courts .
The Chief Justice also  serves as a प्रवक्ता लिये the न्यायिक  branch .
the मुख्य इंसाफ  leads the business of the Supreme Court .
He presides  over मौखिक वितर्क पहले  the court .
When  the अदालत renders an राय , the मुख्य justice—when  in the majority—decides who writes the court 's opinion .
The Chief Justice also  रै significant agenda-setting  power over the court 's meetings .
In the case of an impeachment of a President of the United  राज्य , जिससे रै occurred twice , the मुख्य इंसाफ presides  over the trial in the Senate .
In modern tradition , the Chief Justice  रै the ceremonial ड्यूटी of administering the शपथ  of office of the President of the United States .
The first  मुख्य इंसाफ  was John Jay .
The 17th and current Chief  इंसाफ is जॉन G. रॉबर्ट्स , jr  .
Caribou near  prudhoe खाड़ी  , 1973
Prudhoe Bay  आयल फ़ील्ड is a विशाल आयल फ़ील्ड on अलास्का 's उत्तर  Slope .
It is the largest oil field in both the United States and in North  अमेरिका , covering और originally containing लगभग  of oil .
The amount of recoverable oil in the field is more than  दोगुना कि of the अगला largest फ़ील्ड in the संयुक्त राज्य , the ईस्ट टेक्सास आयल  field .
The field is operated by BP ; partners are ExxonMobil and  conocophillips अलास्का  .
Labor  संघ हैं legally पहचाना as प्रतिनिधि  of workers in many industries in the United States .
Their activity  आज centers on सामूहिक bargaining over मजदूरी , लाभ , और working शर्तें लिये  their membership , and on representing their members in disputes with management over violations of contract provisions .
Larger unions also typically  engage in lobbying क्रियाएँ और electioneering at  the state and federal level .
Most unions in  अमेरिका हैं लकीर साथ एक of दो larger छतरियाँ संगठन : the afl-cio निर्मित in 1955 , और the बदलें to  Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005 .
Both advocate  नीतियों और विधान on निमित्त of मजदूर in the  United States and Canada , and take an active role in politics .
The AFL-CIO is especially concerned  साथ वैश्विक व्यापार मुद्दे  .
In 2010 , the percentage of workers belonging  to a संघ in the संयुक्त राज्य ( or कुल मजदूर संघ `` घनत्व  '' ) was 11.4 % , compared to 18.4 % in Germany , 27.5 % in Canada , and 70 % in Finland .
Union membership in the private sector has fallen under  7 % — स्तर नहीं देखी चूंकि  1932 .
संघ allege कि employer-incited विपक्ष रै contributed  to this decline in membership .
The most  prominent संघ हैं among  public sector employees such as teachers and police .
Members of  संघ हैं disproportionately  older , male and residents of the Northeast , the Midwest , and California .
Union workers average 10-30 % higher pay than  non-union in अमेरिका बाद controlling लिये व्यक्तिगत  , job , and labor market characteristics .
Although much smaller  compared to उनके शिखर सदस्यता in the 1950s , अमरीकी संघ remain a prominent राजनैतिक फ़ैक्टर , दोनो through mobilization of उनके अपना सदस्यताएँ और through  coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around issues such as immigrant rights , trade policy , health care , and living wage campaigns .
To fight alleged employer anti-union programs , unions are currently  वकालत नई `` कार्ड जाँच `` संघीय विधान कि होता आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to सौदेबाजी साथ a संघ if  more than 50 % of workers signed forms , or `` cards , '' stating they wish to be represented by that union .
The current procedure involves waiting  45 to 90 दिनों लिये a federally पर्यवेक्षित secret-ballot कर्मचारी referendum on the विषय  .
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that , `` Strong unions have helped to  reduce असमानता , whereas weaker संघ have बना it easier  for CEOs , sometimes working with market forces that they have helped shape , to increase it . ''
The decline in unionization  चूंकि wwii in the संयुक्त राज्य रै महरूम संबद्ध साथ a सुनाया  rise in income and wealth inequality .
A Christian  lacroix फ़ैशन बुटीक
A boutique is a  छोटी खरीदारी आउटलेट , विशेषकर एक कि specializes in elite और फैशनेबल  items such as clothing and jewelry .
The word is French  लिये `` दूकान '' , via लैटिन इससे  Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ) , `` storehouse '' .
The term entered into everyday  अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग in the लेट 1960s जब , लिये a ब्रैड काल  , London was the centre of the fashion trade .
Carnaby Street  और the किंग्स सड़क यहूद the फ़ोकस of much  media attention as home to the most fashionable boutiques of the era .
Now the East of London has been regenerated and more Boutiques pop up in  फैशनेबल क्षेत्रों , ऐसे as मीनार सेतु सड़क .
It can also refer to a specialised firm  ऐसे as a बुटीक निवेश बैंको or बुटीक विधि  firm .
The word is often used to  describe a प्रॉपर्टी in the स्वतंत्र खण्ड of the होटल मार्केट ( ऐसे as  The Rockwell in London ) in order to distinguish themselves from larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ) .
In such cases the establishments  उद्देश्य to convey the विचार कि the आपरेशन is elite और अत्यधिक  specialised .
In the strictest sense of the word , boutiques would be  one-of-a-kind लकिन अधिक generally बोलना , कुछ जंजीरों can be referred to as boutiques if वे  specialize in particular styles .
Recently , the term `` boutique ''  रै प्रारंभ होने लागू to normally-mass-market वस्तुएं कि हैं either niche  or produced in intentionally small numbers at very high prices .
इस may be referred to  as boutique manufacturing .
For example , before the release of the Wii , a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo  could become a `` बुटीक video-game कम्पनी '' , producing खेल लिये niche ऑडियंस ,  rather than trying to compete directly with Microsoft and Sony .
In the traditional luxury-  देखें उद्योग scalfaro अंतरराष्ट्रीय is माना as  the precursor in manufacturing and sale of bespoke watches .
The Swiss  कम्पनी उपयोग a अत्यधिक लचीली बुटीक निर्माण साईट , जिससे  allows producing small series or even unique timepieces .
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items and  अन्य truly one-of-a-kind वस्तुएं , अन्य बस उपज t-shirts , स्टिकर  , and other fashion accessories in artificially small runs and sell them at unusually high prices .
In the early 1990s Selena  प्रारंभ निर्माण उसके अपना लकीर of  women 's clothing .
Opening two boutiques  labeled as `` सेलिना इत्यादि . बुटीक & सैलून '' एक स्तिथ in कॉर्पस christi  and one located in San Antonio , Texas .
One was due to open  in monterrey , मैक्सिको , in 1995 लकिन due to  her death it was not opened .
Around  1999 the सैन अंतोनियो स्थान बंद और  the Corpus Christi location was closed in 2009 .
in लेट 1990s कुछ यूरोपीय खुदरा व्यापारियों विकसित the विचार of tailoring a दूकान towards a जीवनशैली  theme , in the form of `` concept stores '' , which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments .
One of the first concept  स्टोर्स थी 10 कोरसो como in मिलान , इटली followed by colette  in Paris and Quartier 206 in Berlin .
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters , D-A-S-H ,  और the गैप , ऑस्ट्रेलियाई कड़ी billabong और , हालांकि कम आम , रब & टेलर  adapted to the concept store trend after 2000 .
नेवी संघीय क्रेडिट संघ ( or नेवी संघीय ) is a क्रेडिट संघ headquartered in वियना , वर्जिनिया , चार्टर्ड और regulated अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of  the National Credit Union Administration ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government .
Navy Federal is the largest  प्राकृतिक सदस्य ( or खुदरा ) क्रेडिट संघ in the संसार  , both in asset size and in membership .
As of September  2012 , नेवी संघीय था over $ 50 अरब usd  in assets , and over 4 million members .
Stevland  hardaway मॉरिस ( born may 13 , 1950 as stevland hardaway judkins ) , ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम स्टीवी अचरज , is an अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter , और multi-instrumentalist  , a child prodigy who developed into one of the most creative musical figures of the late 20th century .
Blind since shortly after birth , Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla label at the age  of ग्यारह , और continues to perform और रिकार्ड लिये  Motown to this day .
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles such as `` Superstition `` , ``  सर ड्यूक `` , `` तुम हैं the सनशाइन of my जीवन `` और `` i बस पुकारा  to Say I Love You `` .
खूब ज्ञात एल्बम भी शामिल  Talking Book , Innervisions and Songs in the Key of Life .
He has recorded more than thirty U.S. top ten hits and  प्राप्त twenty-two ग्रैमी पुरस्कार ,  the most ever awarded to a male solo artist .
Wonder is also  विख्यात लिये उसके कार्य as an activist लिये राजनैतिक  causes , including his 1980 campaign to make Martin Luther King , Jr. 's birthday a holiday in the United States .
In 2009 ,  अचरज थी नामित a संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Messenger of Peace .
In 2008 , Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100  all-time शीर्ष कलाकारों to celebrate the us singles चार्ट 's पचासवें वर्षगांठ , साथ  Wonder at number five .
By popular vote , Stevie was  inducted into the soulmusic हॉल of कीर्ति  at SoulMusic.com in December 2012 .
Psychosis (  इससे the यूनानी ψυχή `` psyche '' , लिये mind/soul , और -ωσις `` -ओएसआईs '' , लिये असामान्य कंडीशन or derangement ) refers to an असामान्य कंडीशन of the दिमाग  , and is a generic psychiatric term for a mental state often described as involving a `` loss of contact with reality `` .
लोगों कष्ट इससे मनस्ताप  are described as psychotic .
Psychosis  is दिए to the अधिक कठोर फ़ॉर्म of मनोरोग  disorder , during which hallucinations and delusions , gross excitement or stupor and impaired insight may occur .
The  पद `` मनस्ताप '' is बहुत व्यापक और can औसत anything इससे अपेक्षाकृत सामान्य  aberrant experiences through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder .
Moreover a wide variety of central nervous system diseases , from both  बाह्य substances और आतंरिक physiologic बीमारी , can उपज लक्षण  of psychosis .
This led many  पेशेवर to कह कि मनस्ताप is नहीं  specific enough as a diagnostic term .
Despite this , `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in  सामान्य बर्ताव ( ऋणात्मक लक्षण ) और अधिक commonly to विविध  types of hallucinations or delusional beliefs ( e.g . grandiosity , delusions of persecution ) .
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs  may be वर्णित as `` frankly psychotic '' , whereas एक exhibiting बहुत हल्का लक्षण could be  classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome '' .
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to  the धनात्मक लक्षण of मनस्ताप , विशेषकर those of schizophrenia  .
This is thought to occur  through a यांत्रिकी of aberrant salience  of environmental stimuli .
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine  प्रणाली ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled ट्रायल of ये दवाएँ , however , दिखाएँ either no significant अंतर between ड्रग और placebo , or  a very small effect size , suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system .
लोगों experiencing मनस्ताप may प्रदर्शनी कुछ व्यक्तित्व  changes and thought disorder .
depending on इसके गंभीरता , इस may be accompanied  by unusual or bizarre behavior , as well as difficulty with social interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities .
सामान्य grievous is a fictional  character in the Star Wars universe .
A recurring antagonist , he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems , a  राजनैतिक गुट of ग्रहीय प्रणालियों waging युद्ध on the गांगेय गणतंत्र  .
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber combat by  गिनती dooku , he is a निष्ठुर और शक्तिशाली योद्धा devoted  to Jedi 's destruction during the Clone Wars .
His acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi body  गिनती होता संकेत the आकाशगंगा to दे उसे  the nickname the Knightslayer .
Though the notorious Jedi slayer was the being in the galaxy during the Clone Wars who had killed the most Jedi in single  कॉम्बैट , he किया नहीं संकोच to भागो इससे लड़ाइयों he knew he होता खोना  .
Statistics play an important role  in summarizing बेसबॉल प्रदर्शन और evaluating खिलाड़ी  in the sport .
Since the flow of a baseball game has natural breaks to it , and normally  खिलाड़ी अधिनियम individually बल्कि than performing in क्लस्टर , the खेल lends  itself to easy record-keeping and statistics .
Statistics have been kept for professional baseball since the creation of  the नेशनल लीग और अमरीकी लीग , अभी भाग  of Major League Baseball .
Many statistics are also available from outside of Major  लीग बेसबॉल , इससे लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल संघ  of Professional Base Ball Players and the Negro Leagues .
Dorothea  lange 's migrant माँ depicts अक्षम मटर pickers in कैलिफ़ोर्निया , centering on फ्लोरेंस ओवेन्स थॉम्पसन  , age 32 , a mother of seven children , in Nipomo , California , March 1936 .
USA annual real GDP from  1910–60 , साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939  ) highlighted .
The unemployment rate in  the us 1910–1960 , साथ the सालो of the  Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
the ग्रेट अवसाद थी a कठोर विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक  depression in the decade preceding World War II .
the समय of the ग्रेट अवसाद varied आरपार  nations , but in most countries it started in 1930 and lasted until the late 1930s or middle 1940s .
It was the longest , most  फैली , और deepest अवसाद of the 20th सदी  .
In the 21st century  , the ग्रेट अवसाद is commonly प्रयुक्त as an उदाहरण of कैसा दूर the  world 's economy can decline .
The depression originated in the U.S. , after the fall in stock prices that began  around सितंबर 4 , 1929 , और became विश्वव्यापी न्यूज साथ the भण्डार मार्केट क्रैश of अक्तूबर 29 , 1929 ( ज्ञात  as Black Tuesday ) .
the ग्रेट अवसाद था विनाशकारी प्रभाव  in countries rich and poor .
Personal income  , कर आय , profits और कीमतें dropped ,  while international trade plunged by more than 50 % .
Unemployment in  the u.S. रोज़ to 25 % , और in कुछ  countries rose as high as 33 % .
Cities all around the world were hit  मुश्किल , विशेषकर those निर्भर  on heavy industry .
Construction  थी वस्तुतः halted in  many countries .
Farming and  ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों suffered as क्रॉप  prices fell by approximately 60 % .
Facing plummeting demand  साथ few वैकल्पिक स्त्रोत of कार्य , क्षेत्रों निर्भर on प्राथमिक सेक्टर  industries such as cash cropping , mining and logging suffered the most .
Some economies started to  रिकवर by the mid-1930s  .
In  अनेक देशों , the ऋणात्मक प्रभाव of the ग्रेट  Depression lasted until the end of World War II .
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ) , also known as a premature ventricular complex , ventricular premature  संकुचन ( or जटिल or देवालय ) ( vpc ) , ventricular असामयिक ताल ( vpb ) , or ventricular extrasystole ( ves ) , is a अपेक्षाकृत आम इवेंट जहाँ the धड़कन is initiated  by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node , the normal heartbeat initiator .
The electrical events of the heart  detected by the electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily विशिष्ट  from a normal heart beat .
A PVC  may be आभास as a `` छोड़ा ताल ``  or felt as palpitations in the chest .
In a normal heartbeat , the ventricles contract after the atria have helped to fill them by  contracting ; in इस रास्ता the ventricles can पंप a maximized राशि of रक्त  both to the lungs and to the rest of the body .
In a PVC , the  ventricles अनुबंध पहला और पहले the atria have optimally भर the  ventricles with blood , which means that circulation is inefficient .
However , single beat PVC  arrhythmias do नहीं प्रायः पोज़ a खतरे और can be asymptomatic in स्वस्थ  individuals .
William Gary Busey ( born  जून 29 , 1944 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात as गेरी busey , is  an American film and stage actor , and artist .
He has appeared in a variety of films , including  lethal हथियार , पाइंट ब्रेक , और अंतर्गत घेरा , as खूब as अतिथि दिखावे on gunsmoke , वाकर  , Texas Ranger , Law & Order , and Entourage .
He was  मनोनीत लिये an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता  in 1978 for his role in The Buddy Holly Story .
The  anti-counterfeiting व्यापार अनुबंध ( acta ) , is a बहुराष्ट्रीय सन्धि लिये the purpose of establishing  international standards for intellectual property rights enforcement .
The agreement aims to establish an international  विधिक फ्रेमवर्क लिये लक्ष्यीकरण नकली goods , जेनेरिक दवाइयाँ और कापीराइट infringement on the अंतरजाल , और होता बनाएँ a नई शासी देह बाहर मौजूदा forums , ऐसे as the संसार व्यापार संगठन  , the World Intellectual Property Organization , or the United Nations .
The agreement was signed in October 2011 by Australia , Canada , Japan  , मोरक्को , नई जीलैंड , सिंगापुर , दक्षिण कोरियाई , और the संयुक्त राज्य  .
In 2012 , Mexico , the European Union and 22  देशों जिससे हैं सदस्य राज्य of the यूरोपीय  Union signed as well .
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally  स्वीकृत ) the अनुबंध , जिससे होता आइये into फ़ोर्स in देशों कि  ratified it after ratification by six countries .
Supporters have described the agreement as a response to `` the increase in global  व्यापार of नकली goods और pirated कापीराइट सुरक्षित  works '' .
ट्रेड संघ representing मजदूर in the म्यूज़िक , फिल्मी और tv उद्योग और विशाल बौद्धिक property-based संगठन  such as the Motion Picture Association of America and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America were active in the treaty 's development .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों कह the सम्मेलन adversely  affects fundamental rights including freedom of expression and privacy .
ACTA has also been criticised by Doctors Without  सीमायें लिये endangering अभिगम to दवाइयाँ  in developing countries .
The secret nature of  negotiations रै excluded सिविल समाज समूह , विकासशील देशों और the सामान्य पब्लिक इससे the अनुबंध 's negotiation  process and it has been described as policy laundering by critics including the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers Association .
The signature of the EU and many of its member states  resulted in the इस्तीफा in विरोध of the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट 's नियुक्त मुख्य अन्वेषक  , rapporteur Kader Arif , as well as widespread protests across Europe .
In  2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur , अंग्रेजों mep दाउद मार्टिन , अनुशंसित विरूद्ध the सन्धि , stating : `` the  intended benefits of this international agreement are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties '' .
On 4 July 2012 , the  यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट अस्वीकृत the अनुबंध in plenary सत्र , साथ 478 मतदान  against the treaty , 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining .
FAW  semi-trailer  truck in China
ट्रैक्टर साथ पक्ष डम्प ट्रेलर  semi-trailer
A tractor  साथ an auto-transport  semi-trailer .
Semi-trailer truck  साथ स्लीपर पीछे  the cab .
A  semi-trailer ट्रक is an articulated गाडी कि consists of a towing इंजन , ज्ञात  as a tractor in the United States and truck in many other places , attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight .
It is also known as a transport in Canada , prime mover in Australia , semi , tractor-trailer , truck and trailer , transfer truck , 18-wheeler , mack truck  , बिग रिग in the संयुक्त राज्य , or artic , छोटी लिये articulated लारी  , in Britain and Ireland .
A semi-trailer does not trail completely behind the towing vehicle , but is attached  at a पाइंट कि is बस आगे of the rear-most  axle of the towing unit .
This is done so that a fraction of the weight of  the ट्रेलर is carried by the प्रधान  mover .
This  व्यवस्था अर्थात् कि दोनो ट्रैक्टर और semi-trailer होगा have  a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer .
The Pittsburgh Steelers are a professional  फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in पिट्सबर्ग , पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
The team currently  belongs to the उत्तर प्रभाग of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन  ( AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Founded in , the  स्टीलर्स हैं the oldest मताधिकार in the afc  .
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl  शीर्षक ( छह ) , जीती अधिक afc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( आठ ) और निभाई in ( पंद्रह )  and hosted more ( eleven ) conference championship games than any other AFC or NFC team .
The Steelers share the record for most  सुपर कटोरी दिखावे साथ the डलास cowboys (  eight ) .
The Steelers won their most recent championship ,  सुपर कटोरी xliii , on फ़रवरी 1 ,  2009 .
The Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on July 8 , 1933 , by Art Rooney , taking its original name from the  बेसबॉल टोली of the वही नाम , as थी आम अभ्यास लिये एनएफएल टीमों to do at  the time .
The ownership of the  स्टीलर्स रै remained भीतर the रूनी परिवार  since its founding .
The current owner is Art 's son , Dan Rooney , who has  दिए much कंट्रोल of the मताधिकार to उसके बेटे आर्ट रूनी  II .
Long one of the NFL 's flagship teams , the Steelers enjoy a large  , फैली fanbase nicknamed  Steeler Nation .
The Steelers  फिलहाल खेल उनके घर खेल at हाइन्ज़ फ़ील्ड on पिट्सबर्ग 's उत्तर पक्ष in the  North Shore neighborhood , which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers .
Built in 2001 ,  the स्टेडियम replaced तीन नदियाँ स्टेडियम जिससे hosted  the Steelers for 31 seasons .
Prior to Three Rivers , the Steelers had played  उनके खेल in pitt स्टेडियम और फोर्ब्स  Field .
तीन अलग kinds  of wheat and rye flour
Flour is a  चूर्ण जिससे is बना by पीस खाद्यान्न दाने , or अन्य बीज  or roots ( like Cassava ) .
It is the main ingredient of bread , which is a staple food for many cultures , making the availability of  पर्याप्त आपूर्तियाँ of आटा a प्रमुख आर्थिक और राजनैतिक समस्या  at various times throughout history .
Wheat flour is one of the most important foods in European , North  अमरीकी , मध्य पूर्वी , भारतीय और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों , और is  the defining ingredient in most of their styles of breads and pastries .
While wheat is the most common base for flour ,  मकई आटा रै महरूम महत्वपूर्ण in mesoamerican भोजन  since ancient times , and remains a staple throughout the Americas .
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread in much of central Europe , and rice  can भी be प्रयुक्त in आटा , हालांकि इस is अपेक्षाकृत uncommon  .
Heart rate is the number of  heartbeats प्रति ईकाई of समय , typically expressed as बीट्स  per minute ( bpm ) .
Heart rate can vary as the body 's need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide  परिवर्तन , ऐसे as दौरान शारीरिक कसरत , नींद , बीमारी , or  as a result of ingesting drugs :
सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली stimulants  such as amphetamines increase heart rate .
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases  the दिल रेट ( अलावा इससे कुछ विशेषकर अजीब ones साथ बराबर अजीब प्रभाव , ऐसे as केटामाइन जिससे  can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ) .
There are many ways in which the  दिल रेट speeds up or slows bas  .
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the brain , many of which are those that are  'forced'/'enticed ' आउट by the ingestion और प्रसंस्करण of दवाएँ  .
Due to individuals  having a निरंतर रक्त आवाज़ , एक of the physiological तरीके to उद्धार  more oxygen to an organ is to increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often .
Normal resting  दिल दरों दायरा इससे 60-100 bpm  .
मंदनाड़ी is पारिभाषित as a resting  heart rate below 60 bpm .
However , heart rates from  50 to 60 bpm हैं आम among स्वस्थ लोगों और do नहीं necessarily  require special attention .
Tachycardia is defined as a resting  दिल रेट ऊपर 100 bpm , हालांकि persistent बाकी दरों between 80-100 bpm , मुख्यतः if वे हैं उपस्थित दौरान  sleep , may be signs of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( see below ) .
Catherine II 's carved , painted and  gilded राजतिलक कोच ( hermitage  Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled vehicle for people , usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins )  और सेडान कुर्सियां हैं excluded , चूंकि वे हैं wheelless  vehicles .
The carriage is especially designed for  निजी यात्री उपयोग और लिये सुकून or लालित्य , हालांकि कुछ हैं भी प्रयुक्त  to transport goods .
It may  be लाइट , smart और तेज़ or भारी  , large and comfortable .
Carriages normally have suspension using leaf springs ,  अंडाकार स्रोतों ( in the 19th सदी ) or चमड़े  strapping .
A public passenger vehicle would not usually be called  a carriage – शर्तें लिये ऐसे शामिल stagecoach , charabanc  and omnibus .
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled )  कार्ट share महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the इतिहास of the carriage , as is the  fast ( two-wheeled ) chariot .
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust earthquake  कि occurred at 00:58:53 utc on संडे , 26 दिसम्बर 2004 , साथ an epicentre  off the west coast of Sumatra , Indonesia .
The  भूकंप itself is ज्ञात by the वैज्ञानिक  community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake .
The resulting tsunami was given various names , including the  2004 भारतीय समंदर सुनामी , दक्षिण एशियाई सुनामी , इंडोनेशियाई  tsunami , and the Boxing Day tsunami .
The earthquake was caused by subduction and triggered a series of devastating  tsunamis साथ the coasts of सबसे landmasses bordering the भारतीय समंदर , हत्या over 230,000 लोगों in चौदह  countries , and inundating coastal communities with waves up to high .
It was one of the  deadliest प्राकृतिक आपदाओं  in recorded history .
Indonesia was the hardest-hit country ,  followed by श्री लंका , इण्डिया , और थाईलैंड  .
With a  परिमाण of mw 9.1–9.3 , it is the तीसरा largest  earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph .
The earthquake had the  longest अवधि of faulting कभी  observed , between 8.3 and 10 minutes .
It caused the entire planet to vibrate  as much as और triggered अन्य भूकंप as दूर दूर  as Alaska .
इसके epicentre थी between  Simeulue and mainland Indonesia .
The  दुर्दशा of the प्रभावित लोगों और देशों  prompted a worldwide humanitarian response .
in सब , the विश्वव्यापी जातियाँ दान अधिक than $ 14 अरब  ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid .
Steam rising from the  nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति स्टेशन in आइसलैंड  .
geothermal उर्जा is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न  and stored in the Earth .
Thermal energy is the energy that determines  the तापमान of पदार्थ  .
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the original formation  of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) और इससे रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय of खनिज ( 80 %  ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is the difference in temperature between  the कोर of the ग्रह और इसके सतह , ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल उर्जा in the रूप of ऊष्मा इससे the कोर to  the surface .
The  क्रियाशील geothermal originates इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge  ) , meaning earth , and θερμος ( thermos ) , meaning hot .
at the कोर of the धरती , थर्मल उर्जा is निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय  decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ) .
Heat conducts from the core  to surrounding कूलर चट्टान  .
The high temperature and  दबाव कारण कुछ चट्टान to melt , बनाना मैग्मा संवहन upward चूंकि  it is lighter than the solid rock .
The magma  heats चट्टान और जल in the क्रस्ट , sometimes  up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ) .
From hot  स्रोतों , geothermal उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये स्नान चूंकि paleolithic टाइम्स और  for space heating since ancient Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide , about 10,715  megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal शक्ति is ऑनलाइन  in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating  क्षमता is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग , स्पेस हीटिंग , स्पा  , industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
geothermal शक्ति is लागत प्रभावी , विश्वसनीय , चिरस्थायी , और environmentally  friendly , but has historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable  संसाधन , विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर हीटिंग , खोलने a संभावित लिये फैली  exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep  भीतर the धरती , लकिन ये emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा ईकाई  than those of fossil fuels .
As a result , geothermal power  रै the संभावित to सहायता mitigate वैश्विक वार्मिंग if widely  deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's  geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than  adequate to supply humanity 's energy needs , but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and exploration for deep  संसाधन is बहुत महंगी  .
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend  on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी , उर्जा कीमतें , subsidies , और ब्याज दरों  .
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers  होता be willing to अदा a छोटी अधिक लिये a बेदर्दी उर्जा सोर्स जैसे  geothermal .
But as a result of government assisted research and  उद्योग अनुभव , the लागत of generating geothermal शक्ति रै  decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
In 2001 , geothermal energy cost  between दो और टेन सेंट प्रति सम्पात  .
The term cubic foot  is an इम्पीरियल और us प्रथागत  ( non- metric ) unit of volume , used in the United States and the United Kingdom .
it is पारिभाषित as the आवाज़ of a घन साथ पहलू  of one foot ( 0.3048 m ) in length .
To calculate cubic feet  गुणा लंबाई x चौडाई x ऊँचाई .
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation : , Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 September 1969 ) , born Nguyễn Sinh Cung and also known as Nguyễn Tất  thành और nguyễn ái quốc , थी a वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट क्रांतिकारी नेता जो थी प्रधान मंत्री ( 1945–1955 ) और अध्यक्ष ( 1945–1969 ) of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम  ( North Vietnam ) .
He was a key figure in the foundation of the Democratic  गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945 , as खूब as the people’s फौज of वियतनाम ( pavn ) और the  Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War .
He led the Việt Minh independence movement from 1941 onward ,  establishing the कम्युनिस्ट -नियमd लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945  and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ .
He  officially stepped bas इससे शक्ति in 1955 due to स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं , लकिन remained a अत्यधिक दृश्य figurehead और प्रेरणा लिये those  Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united , communist Vietnam—until his death .
बाद the युद्ध , साइगॉन , पूंजी of the गणतंत्र  of Vietnam , was renamed Hồ Chí Minh City .
All Roads Lead Home is a  विशेषता फिल्मी released on सितंबर  26 , 2008 .
Directed by Dennis Fallon , it stars Peter Boyle , Patton Oswalt , Jason London ,  vivien cardone , वैनेसा शाखा , पीटर कायोटी , स्टीफन मिल्टन , और allan kayser  .
The  फिल्म थी फिल्माया in और around कान्सास  City , Missouri .
The movie made its World  प्रीमियर जनवरी 27 at the सांता बारबरा  International Film Festival .
The film has also recently been in  अनेक फिल्मी त्यौहार , और रै प्राप्त  bad reviews .
Peter Boyle died  पहले the फिल्म 's रिलीज .
It was the  पिछला फिल्म he appeared  in .
Sales taxes in the United States are taxes  लगाई on the बिक्री or पट्टे of goods और सेवाएं in the  United States .
While  no नेशनल सामान्य बिक्री कर exists , the संघीय सरकारी levies अनेक नेशनल चयनात्मक  sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods and services .
Furthermore , forty-five  राज्य , the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और गुआम थोपने सामान्य बिक्री कर कि लागू to the बिक्री or पट्टे of  most goods and some services , and states also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services .
States may also  प्रतिनिधि to लोकल सरकारें the प्राधिकार to थोपने  additional general or selective sales taxes .
Sales tax is  गणना by multiplying the खरीदें दाम by the लागू  tax rate .
Tax rates vary widely by jurisdiction and  दायरा इससे कम than 1 % to over  10 % .
Sales tax is  एकत्रित by the विक्रेता  at the time of sale .
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who  रै नहीं सशुल्क बिक्री कर on a taxable  purchase .
Unlike the value added tax , a sales tax  is imposed तभी एकबार , at the खुदरा स्तर .
However , in cases where  वस्तुएं हैं बेची at खुदरा अधिक than एकबार , ऐसे as प्रयुक्त  cars , the sales tax can be charged on the same item indefinitely .
The definition  of खुदरा बिक्री और कया goods  and services are taxable vary among the states .
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous categories  of goods और सेवाएं कि हैं exempt इससे बिक्री कर  , or taxed at reduced rates .
The purchase  of goods लिये further manufacture or  for resale is uniformly exempt from sales tax .
Most jurisdictions  exempt खाना बेची in किराना स्टोर्स , नुस्खा  medications , and many agricultural supplies .
Sales  कर , सहित those imposed by लोकल सरकारें , हैं  generally administered at the state level .
States imposing sales tax require retail  विक्रेता to collect कर इससे ग्राहक ,  file returns , and remit the tax to the state .
Procedural  नियम vary widely  .
Sellers generally must collect tax from in-state purchasers  जबतक the क्रेता provides an exemption प्रमाणपत्र  .
Most states allow  or आवश्यकता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  remittance .
A central processing unit ( CPU ) ,  भी referred to as a सेंट्रल प्रोसेसर ईकाई , is the हार्डवेयर भीतर a कंप्यूटर कि  carries out the instructions of a computer program by performing the basic arithmetical , logical , and input/output operations of the system .
The term has  महरूम in उपयोग in the कंप्यूटर  industry at least since the early 1960s .
The form , design , and  क्रियान्वयन of cpu have बदला over the कोर्स of उनके इतिहास  , but their fundamental operation remains much the same .
A computer can have more than  एक cpu ; इस is पुकारा  multiprocessing .
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain multiple CPUs on a single chip ;  those ics हैं पुकारा multi-core processors  .
Two typical components of a CPU are  the गणित लॉजिक ईकाई ( alu ) , जिससे performs  arithmetic and logical operations , and the control unit ( CU ) , which extracts instructions from memory and decodes and executes them , calling on the ALU when necessary .
Not all computational systems rely on  a सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण ईकाई  .
An array  प्रोसेसर or वेक्टर प्रोसेसर रै अनेक समानांतर कम्प्यूटिंग तत्व ,  with no one unit considered the `` center '' .
In the distributed computing  मॉडल , समस्याएं हैं हल by a वितरित  interconnected set of processors .
RFID chip  अगला to a अनाज  of rice .
This chip contains a  radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र a coded पहचान  number when queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated in consumer  उत्पाद , और implanted in पालतु , लिये  identification purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is  the बेतार non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा  , for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
the टैग contain  electronically stored information .
कुछ टैग हैं संचालित और पढ़ा at छोटी  ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery , or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM  फ़ील्ड , और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves  or UHF radio waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery  संचालित टैग may operate at सैंकड़ों  of meters .
नापसंद a बार कोड , the टैग करता नहीं necessarily need  to be within line of sight of the reader , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
RFID tags are used in  अनेक उद्योग  .
An RFID tag  संलग्न to an ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान उत्पादन can be  used to track its progress through the assembly line .
दवाएँ can be tracked through  warehouses .
Livestock  और पालतु may have टैग injected , allowing  positive identification of the animal .
Since RFID  टैग can be संलग्न to कपडे , possessions , or भी implanted भीतर लोगों , the सम्भावना of पढना  personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy concerns .
Overtime is the amount  of समय किसी works परे  normal working hours .
सामान्य घंटों may be संकल्पित  in several ways:
by custom (  कया is माना स्वस्थ or उचित  by society ) ,
by practices of  a दिए व्यापार or profession,
by  legislation,
by agreement between  नियोक्ता और मजदूर or उनके प्रतिनिधि  .
Most nations have overtime labor laws  designed to dissuade or prevent नियोक्ता इससे forcing उनके  employees to work excessively long hours .
These laws may take into account  अन्य considerations than the humanitarian , ऐसे as preserving  the health of workers so that they may continue to be productive , or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy .
One common approach to regulating overtime is to require  नियोक्ता to अदा मजदूर at a उच्चतर hourly रेट लिये  overtime work .
Companies may choose to pay workers higher  ओवरटाइम अदा भी if नहीं obliged to do so by विधि , विशेषकर if वे मानना  that they face a backward bending supply curve of labour .
Overtime pay rates can cause workers to  कार्य longer घंटों than वे होता at a चपटा hourly रेट  .
ओवरटाइम कानून , attitudes toward ओवरटाइम और घंटों of कार्य vary greatly  from country to country and between different economic sectors .
कल्पना of कड़ी between पृष्ठों on a विक  using a force-directed layout .
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are a  क्लास of algorithms लिये आरेखण रेखाचित्र in an aesthetically  pleasing way .
Their purpose is to position the nodes of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few crossing edges  as संभावित , by assigning शक्तियां among the नियत of किनारे और the नियत of नोड , आधारित on उनके सापेक्ष स्थितियाँ , और तब using ये शक्तियां either to सिमुलेट the गति of the किनारे और  nodes or to minimize their energy .
While  आलेख आरेखण can be a मुश्किल प्रॉब्लम , force-directed algorithms , होने  physical simulations , usually require no special knowledge about graph theory such as planarity .
Purchasing power (  sometimes retroactively पुकारा समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) is the राशि  of goods or services that can be purchased with a unit of currency .
For example , if you had taken one dollar to a store in the  1950s , तुम होता have महरूम समर्थ to ख़रीदे a वृहद क्रमांक of वस्तुएं than तुम होता आज , indicating कि  you would have had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s .
Currency can be either a  कमोडिटी धन , जैसे सुनहरा or चांदी , or  fiat currency , or free-floating market-valued currency like US dollars .
As Adam Smith noted , having money gives one the ability to `` command ''  अन्य ' मजदूर , so खरीदना शक्ति to कुछ extent is शक्ति over अन्य लोगों , to the extent कि वे हैं willing to व्यापार उनके मजदूर  or goods for money or currency .
If one 's monetary income stays the same , but the price level  increases , the खरीदना शक्ति of कि आय जलप्रपात  .
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's money income since  it may वृद्धि तेज़ than the दाम स्तर .
A higher real income  अर्थात् a उच्चतर खरीदना शक्ति चूंकि रियल आय refers to the  income adjusted for inflation .
For a price index , its value  in the आधार साल is प्रायः सामान्यीकृत  to a value of 100 .
The purchasing power of a unit of currency , say a dollar  , in a दिए साल , expressed in डॉलर of the आधार  year , is 100/P , where P is the price index in that year .
So , by definition  the खरीदना शक्ति of a डालर decreases  as the price level rises .
The purchasing power  in आज 's धन of an राशि c of धन , t सालो into the भविष्य  , can be computed with the formula for the present value :
where in this case i is an assumed  भविष्य सालाना महंगाई  rate .
Education in  दक्षिण कोरियाई is viewed as होने निर्णायक लिये कामयाबी और प्रतियोगिता  is consequently very heated and fierce .
a सेंट्रल प्रशासन oversees the प्रक्रम लिये the शिक्षा  of children from kindergarten to the third and final year of high school .
गणित , विज्ञान , कोरियाई , अंग्रेज़ी , और सोशल अध्ययन हैं generally  considered to be the most important subjects .
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not  recognised , by the generally अकादमिक elitist दक्षिण कोरियाई populace , as शिक्षा और इसलिए अनेक स्कूलों  lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics .
South Korea was the first country  in the संसार to provide high-speed  internet access to all primary , junior , and high schools .
Although South Korean students often rank highly on international comparative assessments when compared to students of most Western education systems , the South Korean education system is  criticised लिये emphasising too much upon passive सीखना और memorisation  .
The South Korean education system is rather notably  सख्त और overly संरचित as compared to इसके counterparts  in most Western societies .
Also , the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ) , which too  emphasise on passive memorisation , as opposed to conceptual समझना , in विद्यार्थी हैं criticised as a प्रमुख  social problem .
The My Lai Massacre ( , ; , , or ) was the Vietnam War mass  हत्या of between 347 और 504 निहत्थे नागरिकों in दक्षिण वियतनाम on कूच 16 , 1968 , by संयुक्त राज्य फौज सैनिको of `` चार्ली '' कम्पनी  of 1st Battalion , 20th Infantry Regiment , 11th Brigade of the Americal Division .
Victims  शामिल महिलाओं , मेन , children  , and infants .
Some of the women were gang-raped and their  लाशें यहूद बाद मिला to be mutilated और अनेक महिलाओं यहूद allegedly  raped prior to the killings .
While 26 U.S. soldiers  यहूद initially चार्ज साथ दण्ड offenses लिये उनके क्रियाएँ at mỹ lai , तभी दूसरी लेफ्टिनेंट  William Calley , a platoon leader in Charlie Company , was convicted .
Found guilty of killing 22  ग्रामीणों , he थी originally  given a life sentence , but only served three and a half years under house arrest .
The  नरसंहार took प्लेस in the hamlets  of My Lai and My Khe of Son My village .
the इवेंट is भी ज्ञात as the बेटे my नरसंहार  , especially in the Vietnamese state media .
The U.S.  सैन्य codeword लिये the `` viet cong stronghold  '' was `` Pinkville '' .
The incident prompted  वैश्विक आक्रोश जब it became पब्लिक ज्ञान  in 1969 .
The massacre also  increased घरेलू विपक्ष to the u.S. भागीदारी  in the Vietnam War .
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre and  protect the wounded यहूद initially denounced by अनेक  U.S . Congressmen as traitors .
They received  नफ़रत मेल और मौत खतरे और  found mutilated animals on their doorsteps .
The three were later widely praised and  सजा by the फौज लिये उनके वीर क्रियाएँ  .
The hijackers in the September 11 attacks were  19 मेन संबद्ध साथ al-qaeda , और 15 of the 19 यहूद नागरिकों  of Saudi Arabia .
Others were  इससे मिश्र , लेबनान ,  and the UAE .
The hijackers were organized into four teams , each led by a  pilot-trained hijacker साथ चार `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' जो यहूद प्रशिक्षित to सहायता  subdue the pilots , passengers , and crew .
The  पहला hijackers to arrive in the संयुक्त राज्य यहूद खालिद al-mihdhar और nawaf al-hazmi  , who settled in the San Diego area in January 2000 .
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots , Mohamed Atta , Marwan al-Shehhi , and Ziad Jarrah early in the  गर्मियाँ of 2000 to undertake उड़ान प्रशिक्षण in दक्षिण  Florida .
The fourth hijacker-pilot , Hani  hanjour , arrived in सैन डिएगो in दिसम्बर 2000  .
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers '' arrived in the spring and  जल्दी गर्मियाँ of 2001 , बस महीने पहले the सितंबर  11 attacks .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 –  circa| 8 जून 632 ) , भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ) , थी a धार्मिक , राजनैतिक  , and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam .
He is believed by Muslims and  bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर और नबी of  God .
मुहम्मद is लगभग universally माना  by Muslims as the last prophet sent by God for mankind .
non-muslims लिहाज़  Muhammad as the founder of Islam .
मुसलमान consider उसे to be the restorer of an अनछुए  original monotheistic faith of Adam , Noah , Abraham , Moses , Jesus , and other prophets .
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city  of मक्का , he थी अनाथ at an जल्दी आयु और brought up अंतर्गत the परवाह of उसके  uncle Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly  as a व्यापारी , as खूब as a गड़रिये , और  was first married by age 25 .
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the  surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ , he बाद reported कि it थी वहीँ  , at age 40 , that he received his first revelation from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations  सरेआम , proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक `` , कि पूरा `` आत्मसमर्पण '' to  Him ( lit .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn  ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर , और कि he खुद थी a नबी  and messenger of God , in the same vein as other Islamic prophets .
Muhammad gained few followers early on , and  थी मिले साथ दुश्मनी इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता यहूद  treated harshly .
To escape persecution , Muhammad sent some of his  अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in मक्का migrated to मदीना (  then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
This event , the Hijra , marks the beginning  of the इस्लामी पंचांग , जिससे is भी ज्ञात as the  Hijri Calendar .
In Medina ,  मुहम्मद संयुक्त the जनजातियों अंतर्गत the संविधान  of Medina .
After eight years of fighting  साथ the meccan जनजातियों , उसके अनुसरणकर्ता , जो by तब था grown to  10,000 , took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca .
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city  और तब भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट सब of the बाकी  pagan temples in Eastern Arabia .
In 632 , a few months after returning to  मदीना इससे the विदाई यात्राएं ,  Muhammad fell ill and died .
by the समय of उसके मौत , सबसे of the arabian प्रायद्वीप  had converted to Islam , and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The  खुलासे ( or ayah  , lit .
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form  the आयतें of the कुरान , regarded  by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based .
Besides the Quran , Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and  परंपराओं ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान  as the sources of sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of Islam with reverence  , adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever उनके  names are mentioned .
While conceptions of  मुहम्मद in मध्यकालीन christendom और premodern टाइम्स  were largely negative , appraisals in modern history have been far less so .
This is a list of tables of the verified  oldest लोगों in the संसार in ordinal रैंक ,  such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a  supercentenarian is माना 'verified ' if उसके or उसके अर्जी रै महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय  body that specifically deals in longevity research , such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented  इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ) , जो died at आयु  122 years , 164 days .
वो मिले विंसेंट वैन gogh  when she was 12 or 13 .
This led to news media  ध्यान in 1985 , बाद  Calment turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found  दस्तावेज़ीकरण लिये calment 's आयु , परे कोई उचित सवाल , in the रिकॉर्ड of उसके देशी  city , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been  उत्पादित than लिये कोई अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये  verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is  कि of jiroemon किमुरा , जो फिलहाल जीवनदान in जापानी और is आयु as of  .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini  of the संयुक्त राज्य , on 17 दिसम्बर 2012 , किमुरा , born 19 अप्रैल 1897 , is the oldest  living person in the world whose age can be documented .
He has also been the oldest living man  चूंकि the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning on 14 अप्रैल 2011  .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013 , the  oldest जीना स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa , भी इससे जापानी , born  on 5 March 1898 .
This is a  समयरेखा of the african-american  Civil Rights Movement .
The Civil Rights movement was a freedom struggle by African Americans  in the 1950s और 1960s to लाभ समता  .
The goals of  the गति यहूद स्वतंत्रता इससे पक्षपात , बराबर अवसर in नियुक्ति  , education and housing , the right to vote and equal access to public facilities .
Heavy metal ( often referred to as metal ) is a genre of rock music that developed in the late 1960s and  जल्दी 1970s , largely in the संयुक्त किंगडम और in  the United States .
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic rock , the bands that created heavy metal developed  a मोटा , विशाल ध्वनि , characterized by अत्यधिक प्रवर्धित distortion , विस्तारित गिटार solos , emphatic  beats , and overall loudness .
Heavy metal lyrics and performance styles are generally  संबद्ध साथ मर्दानगी और machismo  .
The first heavy metal bands such as Led Zeppelin , Deep Purple and Black Sabbath attracted large audiences , though they were often derided  by आलोचकों , a औकात आम throughout the इतिहास  of the genre .
In the mid-1970s Judas  पुजारी helped spur the विधा 's एवोल्यूशन by discarding much of इसके ब्लूज़ influence  ; Motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on speed .
Bands in the New Wave of  अंग्रेजों भारी मेटल ऐसे as आयरन maiden followed  in a similar vein .
Before the end of the decade , heavy metal fans became  ज्ञात as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``  .
During the  1980s , glam मेटल became a वाणिज्यिक  force with groups like Mötley Crüe and Poison .
Underground  दृश्यों उत्पादित an सरणी of अधिक चरम , आक्रामक शैलियाँ : thrash मेटल broke into the मुख्यधारा  with bands such as Metallica , Megadeth , Slayer , and Anthrax , while other styles of the most extreme subgenres of metal like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena .
Since the mid-1990s , popular styles such as nu metal , which often incorporates elements of grunge and hip hop ; and metalcore , which blends extreme  मेटल साथ हार्डकोर पंक , have further विस्तारित the परिभाषा of the विधा  .
The far-right (  भी ज्ञात as the चरम सही ) refers to  the highest degree of rightism in right-wing politics .
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society , and supports  सर्वोच्चता of निश्चित individuals or समूह deemed to be innately श्रेष्ठ or अस्तबलों जो  are to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable .
The far right 's advocacy of supremacism is based on what its  adherents perceive as स्वाभाविक विशेषताएँ of लोगों  that can not be changed .
This stands as a point of difference with  the centre-right 's आरोपण of behaviours , ऐसे as आलस्य or decadence  , as the primary sources of social inequalities .
The centre right—unlike the far  right—claims कि लोगों can समाप्त उनके behavioural हीनता through बदलना  their habits and choices .
The original far right , which  उभरा in फ़्रांस बाद the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति , refused to accept the फ्रेंच गणतंत्र और समर्थित a counter-revolution  to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy .
The far right is commonly associated with persons or groups who hold extreme nationalist ,  xenophobic , जातिवाद , धार्मिक fundamentalist or प्रतिक्रियावादी  views .
the सबसे extreme-right आंदोलनों have धड़ा दमन और नरसंहार  against groups of people on the basis of their alleged inferiority .
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ) , in some older  ग्रन्थ थामस हाब्स of malmsbury , थी an अंग्रेज़ी पारस , बेहतरीन ज्ञात आज लिये उसके कार्य on राजनैतिक  philosophy .
His 1651 book Leviathan established the  न्यास लिये सबसे of पश्चिमी राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र इससे the परिप्रेक्ष्य  of social contract theory .
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign , but he also developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the individual ; the natural equality of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( which  led to the बाद भेद between सिविल समाज और the राज्य ) ; the दृश्य कि सब legitimate राजनैतिक शक्ति जरूर be `` प्रतिनिधि '' और आधारित on the सहमति of the लोगों ; और a उदार निर्वचन of विधि जिससे पत्ते लोगों फ़्री to do whatever the  law does not explicitly forbid .
He was one of the  संस्थापकों of आधुनिक राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र  .
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion , obeying the same  शारीरिक कानून as अन्य पदार्थ और गति , remains influential ; और उसके खाता of इंसान प्रकृति as self-interested सहयोग , और of राजनैतिक समुदायों  as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains one of the major topics of political philosophy .
In addition to political philosophy , Hobbes also contributed to a  विविध सरणी of अन्य फ़ील्ड , सहित इतिहास , भूगोल , the भौतिकी of गैसों , धर्मशास्त्र , आचार  , and general philosophy .
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify , assess , and control  the भाव of oneself , of अन्य , और of  groups .
It can be  विभाजित into क्षमता  EI and trait EI .
Ability EI is usually measured  using अधिकतम प्रदर्शन परीक्षण और रै stronger संबंध साथ परंपरागत प्रज्ञा , whereas trait ei is प्रायः measured using  self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships with personality .
Criticisms have  केन्द्रित on whether ei is a रियल प्रज्ञा और whether it रै वृद्धिशील  validity over IQ and the Big Five personality traits .
Heredity is the passing of  traits to औलाद इससे इसके  parents or ancestor .
This  is the प्रक्रम by जिससे an औलाद कोशिका or सजीव acquires or becomes predisposed  to the characteristics of its parent cell or organism .
Through  आनुवंशिकता , विसंगतियाँ exhibited by individuals can accumulate और कारण  some species to evolve .
The study of heredity  in जीवविज्ञान is पुकारा आनुवंशिकी , जिससे शामिल the फ़ील्ड  of epigenetics .
For United States individual income tax , adjusted gross  आय ( agi ) is कुल सकल आय ऋण विशिष्ट reductions  .
Taxable  आय is समायोजित सकल आय ऋण भत्तों लिये निजी  exemptions and itemized deductions .
For most  व्यक्तिगत कर उद्देश्य , agi is अधिक प्रासंगिक than  gross income .
Gross income is sales price of goods or property  , ऋण लागत of the प्रॉपर्टी बेची , प्लस अन्य  income .
It includes wages ,  ब्याज , dividends , कारोबार आय , rental आय  , and all other types of income .
Adjusted gross income is gross income  कम deductions इससे a कारोबार or rental कार्यकलाप  and 21 other specific items .
Several  deductions ( e.g . चिकित्सा खर्च और विविध  itemized deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of AGI .
Certain phase outs ,  सहित those of निम्नतर कर दरों  and itemized deductions , are based on levels of AGI .
Many states base state income  कर on agi साथ निश्चित  deductions .
`` Lazy Eye '' is the third single  इससे silversun pickups ' डेब्यू  album Carnavas .
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David Letterman ,  the tonight दिखाएँ साथ jay लीनो , बाद साथ jools हॉलैंड , और  Last Call with Carson Daly .
The  सोंग is a playable track on चट्टान बैंड  2 and Guitar Hero : World Tour .
An alternate version of the song , with a length of 7:27 , was  निभाई on xmu पहले the shorter संस्करण थी निभाई on fm और अन्य xm चैनल्स  .
This version was featured on their demo CD ( which  प्रदर्शित जल्दी संस्करण of चार ट्रैक्स  ) .
A  टेलीफोन उपसर्ग is the पहला नियत of अंक of a टेलीफोन  number ; in the North American Numbering Plan countries ( country code 1 ) , it is the first three digits of a seven-digit phone number .
In other  देशों दोनो the उपसर्ग और the क्रमांक may  have different lengths .
It shows which  एक्सचेंज the बाकी  numbers refer to .
A full telephone number is usually made up of country code  ( जरूरी लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय काल्स तभी ) , क्षेत्रफल कोड ( जरूरी लिये काल्स between  telephone areas ) , prefix , and subscriber number .
Some places restrict certain prefixes to fax  संख्याएँ or कोशिका फोन तभी ; in अन्य स्थान ऐसे समर्पित prefixes हैं  not used .
As telephone technology advanced , the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many  स्थान ; 485 in लंदन , uk , थी एकबार the gulliver एक्सचेंज , लकिन अभी 44207485xxxx is बस माना एक of अनेक क्रमांक ब्लॉक  served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another .
metformin ( bp , सुनाया , ; originally बेची as glucophage ) is an मौखिक antidiabetic  drug in the biguanide class .
It is the first-line drug of choice for the treatment of type 2 diabetes , in particular , in  overweight और मोटे लोगों और those साथ सामान्य  kidney function .
Its use in gestational  मधुमेह रै महरूम सीमित by सुरक्षा  concerns .
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome , and has been investigated  लिये अन्य रोगों जहाँ इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध may be  an important factor .
metformin works by suppressing ग्लूकोज  production by the liver .
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug  कि रै महरूम conclusively दिखाया to prevent the cardiovascular  complications of diabetes .
It helps  reduce ldl कोलेस्ट्रॉल और triglyceride स्तर  , and is not associated with weight gain .
, metformin is one of only two oral antidiabetics in the World  स्वास्थ्य संगठन मॉडल सूची of अनिवार्य दवाइयाँ (  the other being glibenclamide ) .
When prescribed appropriately , metformin causes  few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the सबसे आम is जठरांत्र परेशान ) और is संबद्ध साथ a  low risk of hypoglycemia .
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a  गंभीर चिंता in overdose और जब it is विहित to लोगों साथ contraindications  , but otherwise , there is no significant risk .
पहला synthesized और मिला to reduce रक्त शुगर in the 1920s , metformin थी forgotten लिये the  next two decades as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs .
Interest in metformin was rekindled  in the लेट 1940s बाद अनेक रिपोर्ट्स कि it could reduce रक्त शुगर स्तर in लोगों , और in 1957 , फ्रेंच चिकित्सक जां sterne  published the first clinical trial of metformin as a treatment for diabetes .
It was introduced to the United  किंगडम in 1958 , कनाडा in 1972 , और  the United States in 1995 .
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United  राज्य अलोन , अधिक than 48 लाख prescriptions यहूद भर in 2010 लिये इसके जेनेरिक formulations  .
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved into the granite face of  माउंट rushmore निकट keystone , दक्षिण डकोटा , in the संयुक्त  States .
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son , Lincoln Borglum , Mount  rushmore सुविधाएँ sculptures of the heads of चार संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रपतियों : जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , थामस  Jefferson , Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln .
The entire memorial  कवर और is ऊपर समुद्र स्तर  .
The tallest mountain in  the प्रदेश is harney शिखर  ( ) .
South Dakota historian  दोने रॉबिन्सन is credited साथ conceiving the विचार of नक्काशी the likenesses  of famous people into the Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the region .
Robinson 's initial idea was to sculpt the Needles ; however , Gutzon Borglum rejected the Needles  साईट क्युकी of the ग़रीब विशेषता of the ग्रेनाइट और दमदार विपक्ष इससे पर्यावरणविद और देशी  American groups .
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location , which also has the advantage of facing  southeast लिये अधिकतम सूर्य एक्सपोज़र  .
रॉबिन्सन चाही it to विशेषता पश्चिमी नायक जैसे लुईस और क्लार्क , रेड बादल और भैंस विधेयक कोड़ी लकिन borglum decided the मूर्तिकला चाहिए  have a more national focus , and chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain .
After securing  संघीय funding , निर्माण on the मेमोरियल began in 1927 , और the राष्ट्रपतियों  ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939 .
Upon Gutzon  borglum 's मौत in कूच 1941 , उसके बेटे lincoln  Borglum took over construction .
Although the initial  अवधारणा पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक अध्यक्ष to be चित्रित इससे सिर to कमर , कमी of funding  forced construction to end in late October 1941 .
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the memorial in 1933 ,  जबकि it थी स्टिल अंतर्गत निर्माण , और रै प्रबंधित the  memorial to the present day .
It attracts  nearly तीन लाख लोगों  annually .
Charvet dress shirt  इससे the 1930s , norsk folkemuseum  , Oslo .
A shirt , dress shirt , button-front ,  button-front कमीज़ , or button-up कमीज़ is a परिधान साथ a कॉलर , a full-length खोलने at the सामने इससे the  collar to the hem , and sleeves with cuffs .
Shirts  हैं predominantly प्रयुक्त by मेन , चूंकि  women usually wear blouses .
The front opening is fastened using buttons or  studs , और the cuffs बंद साथ बटन or कफ  links .
Shirts are  सामान्यतः बना इससे woven cloth , और हैं प्रायः accompanied by a जैकेट और टाई , लिये उदाहरण साथ a सूट or formalwear  , but shirts are also worn more casually .
In British English ,  पोशाक कमीज़ अर्थात् specifically the अधिक औपचारिक संध्या परिधान worn साथ black-  or white- tie , also discussed below .
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts and  detachable छल्लों संलग्न साथ कॉलर  studs .
the पद `` button-down '' ( जिससे refers a प्रकार of कमीज़ जिससे रै a कॉलर fastened bas by बटन ) is sometimes प्रयुक्त  in error to apply to all shirts ( with or without buttoned down collars ) , being used as a synonym for `` button-up '' or `` button-front '' .
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as  secretaries दिन or एडमिन दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries  , administrative assistants , receptionists , and other administrative support professionals .
In North America , it is celebrated on the Wednesday of  the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 24 in 2013  ) .
In  फ़्रांस it is मनाये on the तीसरा गुरुवार  in April ( April 18 in 2013 ) .
In Australia it is  मनाये on the पहला  Friday in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the leading painter of the  शास्त्रीय फ्रेंच बरॉक स्टाइल , हालांकि he खर्च सबसे of उसके working जीवन  in Rome .
His work is  characterized by स्पष्टता , लॉजिक  , and order , and favors line over color .
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration  लिये ऐसे classically उन्मुख कलाकारों as jacques-louis दाउद , jean-auguste-dominique ingres और  Paul Cézanne .
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and  elsewhere , मगर लिये a छोटी काल जब कार्डिनल रिचलू ordered उसे वापस to फ़्रांस to serve as पहला चित्रकार to the  King .
Most of his works are history paintings of religious  or पौराणिक विषय कि बहुत प्रायः have a विशाल लैंडस्केप  element .

Whitley 's brief career in mainstream country  म्यूज़िक lasted इससे 1984 जबतक उसके मौत in 1989 , लकिन he continues  to influence an entire generation of singers and songwriters .
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard country charts , including five consecutive  क्रमांक ones : `` do n't बंद अपना आँखें `` , `` जब तुम कह nothing at सब `` , `` i 'm no अजनबी to the बरसात ``  , `` I Wonder Do You Think of Me `` and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two posthumously ) .
Statute of Grand  duchy of लिथुआनिया  , written in Polish
a statute is a औपचारिक लिखा enactment  of a legislative authority that governs a state , city , or county .
Typically , statutes command or  prohibit कुछ , or घोषित नीति  .
The word is often used to distinguish law made by legislative bodies from case  विधि , decided by न्यायालयों , और regulations जारी by सरकारी एजेंसियों  .
Statutes are sometimes referred to as  विधान or `` ब्लैक अक्षर  law . ''
As a source of law , statutes are considered primary  प्राधिकार ( as opposed to द्वितीयक प्राधिकार  ) .
ideally सब statutes जरूर be in सामंजस्य  with the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ) .
This word is  प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to the  common law .
Statutes acquire their force from the time of their passage ,  however जबतक  otherwise provided .
Statutes are of several kinds ;  namely , पब्लिक or निजी .
declaratory or remedial  .
अस्थाई or perpetual  .
A temporary  statute is एक जिससे is सीमित in इसके अवधि  at the time of its enactment .
It continues in force until the time of its  limitation रै समाप्त , जबतक sooner repealed  .
A perpetual statute is  एक लिये the फिराकर of जिससे वहीँ is no  limited time , although it may not be expressly declared to be so .
If , however , a statute which did not itself contain any limitation is  to be governed by another जिससे is अस्थाई तभी , the पूर्व होगा भी be अस्थाई और निर्भर upon the अस्तित्व  of the latter .
Before a statute becomes law in some countries , it must be agreed upon by the highest  कार्यपालिका in the सरकारी , और आखिरकार प्रकाशित as भाग of a  code .
In many countries  , statutes हैं व्यवस्थित in topical इंतजाम ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर  publications called codes , such as the United States Code .
In many nations statutory law is  विशिष्ट इससे और अधीनस्थ  to constitutional law .
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate off  the आम iliac धमनियों अग्रवर्ती to the  sacroiliac joint of the pelvis .
They proceed anterior and inferior  साथ the medial किनारा of the psoas प्रमुख  muscles .
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the  वंक्षण स्नायु परिचय एक तीसरा laterally इससे the प्रविष्ट पाइंट of the वंक्षण स्नायु on the जननांग  tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries .
The external iliac artery is usually the artery used  to संलग्न the renal धमनी to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a गुर्दा प्रत्यारोपण  .
Steam is a digital distribution , digital rights management , multiplayer and  संचार मंच विकसित by वाल्व निगम  .
It is used to distribute  खेल और सम्बन्धित मीडिया ऑनलाइन , इससे छोटी स्वतंत्र  developers to larger software houses ; in October 2012 , Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming software .
Steam provides the user with installation and automatic management of  तन्त्र आरपार अनेक कंप्यूटर , जातियाँ सुविधाएँ ऐसे as मित्रों सूचियाँ और समूह , बादल छायांकन , और  in-game voice and chat functionality .
The software provides a freely available  अनुप्रयोग प्रोग्रामिंग इंटरफ़ेस , steamworks , कि डेवलपर can लो लाभ of to integrate अनेक of भाप 's कृत्यों भीतर उनके  software products , including copy protection , networking and matchmaking , in-game achievements and micro-transactions , and support for user-created content through Steam Workshop .
Though initially developed for use  on microsoft खिड़कियाँ , the क्लाएंट रै विस्तारित to शामिल os x और लिनक्स संस्करण , और क्लाइंट साथ सीमित कार्यक्षमता  on the PlayStation 3 console and for both iOS and Android mobile devices .
In addition to being a central hub for  गेमिंग तन्त्र , वाल्व रै निर्मित a संस्करण of भाप साथ altered कार्यक्षमता to be प्रयुक्त in स्कूलों  for educational software , including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons .
, there are nearly 2000 games  उपलब्धियाँ through भाप , और 54 लाख क्रियाशील  user accounts .
As of  जनवरी 2013 , भाप रै देखी over 6.6 लाख संयुक्त  players .
Steam has an estimated 50–70 % share of the  डिजिटल वितरण मार्केट लिये  video games .
The Steam logo is a  stylised left-side fly-crank और लाठी इससे the walschaerts  valve gear of a steam locomotive .
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16 , 1926  ) is an अमरीकी हास्य , कर्ता , सिंगर ,  film producer , screenwriter and film director .
He is known for his  slapstick ह्यूमर in फिल्मी , टेलीविज़न , स्टेज  and radio .
He was originally paired up with Dean Martin in 1946  , forming the famed कॉमेडी टोली of  Martin and Lewis .
In addition to the  duo 's लोकप्रिय nightclub कार्य , वे स्ट्रक्चर in a  successful series of comedy films for Paramount Pictures .
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising  telethons और स्थिति as नेशनल अध्यक्ष लिये the muscular  Dystrophy Association ( MDA ) .
Lewis has won  अनेक पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ इससे the अमरीकी कॉमेडी पुरस्कार , लॉस एंजिल्स फिल्मी आलोचकों संघ , और वेनिस फिल्मी  Festival , and he has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
In 2005 , he received the Governors Award of the Academy of  टेलीविज़न कला & sciences फलक of राज्यपालों , जिससे is the उच्चतम एमी पुरस्कार  presented .
On February 22 , 2009 , the Academy of Motion Picture Arts  और sciences awarded लुईस the जां hersholt humanitarian  Award .
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss  कैण्टन of grisons in the southeastern स्विस ऐल्प्स through जर्मनी और आखिरकार बहती into the उत्तर समुद्र coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the बारहवीं longest  river in Europe , at about , with an average discharge of more than .
The Rhine and the Danube formed most of  the उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of the रोमन साम्राज्य और , चूंकि those दिनों , the राइन रै महरूम a vital और  navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland .
It has also served  as a रक्षात्मक विशेषता और रै महरूम  the basis for regional and international borders .
The many  castles और प्रागैतिहासिक fortifications साथ the  Rhine testify to its importance as a waterway .
River traffic could be stopped at  ये स्थितियाँ , प्रायः लिये the purpose of collecting  tolls , by the state that controlled that portion of the river .
श्री ( सिंहली  )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री , IAST ; Śrī ) , also transliterated as Sree or Shri  or श्री is a शब्द of संस्कृत उत्पत्ति , प्रयुक्त in the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप as विनम्र रूप of पता समतुल्य to the अंग्रेज़ी `` mr. '' in लिखा और बोला भाषा , or as  a title of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ) .
Design of complex  structures जैसे the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन needs in-depth समझना  of Structural Analysis .
Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design , construction , and  मेंटेनेंस of the शारीरिक और naturally निर्मित पर्यावरण , सहित works जैसे सड़कें , पुलों , नहरों  , dams , and buildings .
सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी is the oldest अभियान्त्रिकी अनुशासन  after military engineering , and it was defined to distinguish non-military engineering from military engineering .
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering , geotechnical engineering , geophysics , geodesy , control  अभियान्त्रिकी , संरचनात्मक अभियान्त्रिकी , biomechanics , nanotechnology , परिवहन अभियान्त्रिकी , धरती विज्ञान , वायुमंडलीय sciences , forensic अभियान्त्रिकी , नगरपालिका or शहरी अभियान्त्रिकी  , water resources engineering , materials engineering , coastal engineering , surveying , and construction engineering .
Civil engineering takes  प्लेस on सब स्तर : in the पब्लिक सेक्टर इससे नगरपालिका through to नेशनल सरकारें  , and in the private sector from individual homeowners through to international companies .
