Katherine Dunham ( June 22 , 1909 – May 21 , 2006 ) was an American dancer  , कोरियोग्राफर , लेखक , educator , और सोशल activist  .
Dunham had one of the most successful dance careers in American and  यूरोपीय थिएटर of the 20th सदी , और निर्देशित उसके अपना नृत्य कम्पनी लिये अनेक सालो  .
She  रै महरूम पुकारा the `` matriarch और  queen mother of black dance '' .
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s , Dunham was renowned throughout Europe and Latin America and was widely  लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ the वॉशिंगटन पोस्ट पुकारा उसके `` नर्तकी कैथरीन  the Great '' .
For almost thirty years she maintained the Katherine  dunham नृत्य कम्पनी , the तभी self-supported अमरीकी ब्लैक नृत्य troupe at कि समय , और over उसके  long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances .
Dunham was an innovator in  african-american आधुनिक नृत्य as खूब as a नेता in the फ़ील्ड of नृत्य मानवशास्त्र ,  or ethnochoreology .
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses , commonly  पुकारा peat मॉस due to इसके व्यापकता in गीला habitats जहाँ it contributes to the गठन of peat  bogs and mires .
Sphagnum accumulations can store water , since both living and dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside  उनके कोशिकाएं ; पौधे may थाम इससे 16-26 टाइम्स as much जल as उनके  dry weight depending on the species .
The empty cells help  retain जल in drier शर्तें  .
Hence , as sphagnum moss grows , it can  धीरे स्प्रेड into drier शर्तें , forming larger peatlands ,  both raised bogs and blanket bogs .
These peat accumulations then  provide आवास लिये a चौड़ी सरणी of peatland पौधे , सहित sedges और ericaceous shrubs , as  well as orchids and carnivorous plants .
Sphagnum and the  peat formed इससे it do नहीं क्षय readily क्युकी of the  phenolic compounds embedded in the moss 's cell walls .
In addition , bogs , like  सब वेटलैंड्स , develop अवायवीय मृदा शर्तें , जिससे produces धीमा अवायवीय  decay rather than aerobic microbial action .
Peat moss can also  acidify इसके परिवेश by लेने up cations , ऐसे as कैल्सियम  and magnesium , and releasing hydrogen ions .
Under the right conditions , peat can  accumulate to a गहराई of अनेक  meters .
Different species of Sphagnum have different  सहिष्णुता हद लिये बाढ़ और ph , so कोई एक peatland may have  a number of different Sphagnum species .
Individual peat moss plants consist of a main stem , with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles  प्रायः consisting of दो or तीन spreading शाखाओं और दो to चार फांसी शाखाओं  .
The top of  the संयंत्र , or capitulum , रै कॉम्पैक्ट  clusters of young branches .
Along the stem are scattered leaves of various shapes , named  स्टेम पत्ते ; the आकार varies according  to species .
The leaves consist  of दो kinds of कोशिकाएं ; छोटी , ग्रीन , जीना कोशिकाएं ( chlorophyllose  cells ) , and large , clear , structural , dead cells ( hyaline cells ) .
the latter have  the large water-holding capacity .
The earliest version of the Network Card , issued  हस्तचालित बल्कि than through an aptis यंत्र  .
The first APTIS  संस्करण of the संजाल कार्ड  .
This was used from the start of the APTIS era in 1986/1987 until well into the 1990s , as  स्टॉक्स था to be प्रयुक्त up despite the परिचय of the new-look orange-banded संस्करण in  1991 .
The introduction of the weekday minimum fare  कंडीशन in 2002 resulted in a नाबालिग बदलें : the रेड `` r '' shows कि  this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard .
This version is still in  उपयोग as of  2007 .
The Network Railcard is a  छूट कार्ड introduced in 1986 by अंग्रेजों रेल , upon the सृष्टि of  their Network SouthEast area around London , England .
The card is intended to encourage leisure travel by rail  by offering छूट लिये वयस्कों और accompanying children  on a wide range of off-peak fares .
The range of discounts available  , और the दाम of the कार्ड , have varied चूंकि कि समय , लकिन the कार्ड रै  always been valid for a year 's unlimited use .
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station or  रेल नियुक्त सफर एजेंट , by completing an अनुप्रयोग रूप - no फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  identification or other documentation is needed to buy or use the card .
It is one of a number of concessionary  किराया योजनाएं उपलब्धियाँ on the अंग्रेजों रेल प्रणाली  .
The United Nations ( UN ; French : Organisation des  राष्ट्र unies , onu ) is the संसार 's largest , foremost , और सबसे  prominent international organization .
The stated aims of the United Nations include promoting and facilitating cooperation in international law  , अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा , आर्थिक विकास , सोशल प्रगति , इंसान अधिकारों , सिविल अधिकारों , सिविल लिबर्टीज  , political freedoms , democracy , and the achievement of lasting world peace .
The UN was founded  in 1945 बाद संसार युद्ध ii to बदलें the लीग of राष्ट्र , to रोकें युद्धों between  countries , and to provide a platform for dialogue .
It  contains अनेक subsidiary संगठन  to carry out its missions .
At its founding  , the un था 51 सदस्य राज्य ; as of 2011  , there are 193 .
From its offices around the world , the UN and its specialized agencies decide on substantive and  प्रशासनिक मुद्दे in नियमित बैठक आयोजित throughout  the year .
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting  in promoting अंतरराष्ट्रीय आर्थिक और सोशल सहयोग और विकास ) ; the सचिवालय ( लिये providing अध्ययन , सूचना , और सुविधाएं needed by the un ) ; the अंतरराष्ट्रीय अदालत of इंसाफ ( the प्राथमिक न्यायिक अंग ) ; और the  United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ) .
Other prominent UN System agencies include the World Health Organization ( WHO ) , the  संसार खाना कार्यक्रम ( wfp ) और संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ) .
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the office  of secretary-general जिससे रै महरूम आयोजित by बैन ki-moon  of South Korea since 2007 .
The United Nations Headquarters resides in international territory in New York City ,  साथ further प्रमुख कार्यालयों at जेनेवा , नैरोबी ,  and Vienna .
The organization is financed from assessed and voluntary contributions from  इसके सदस्य राज्य , और रै छह आधिकारिक भाषाएं : अरबी , चाइनीज  , English , French , Russian , and Spanish .
South Beach , also nicknamed  sobe , is a पड़ोस in the नगर of मियामी बीच , फ्लोरिडा , संयुक्त  States , located due east of Miami city proper between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic Ocean .
The area encompasses all of the barrier  आइलैंड्स of मियामी बीच दक्षिण of भारतीय क्रीक  .
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed , starting in the 1910s , thanks to the development efforts of Carl G. Fisher , the Lummus Brothers , and John  S. कॉलिन्स , the latter जिनकी निर्माण of the कॉलिन्स सेतु provided the पहला vital जमीन कड़ी  between mainland Miami and the beaches .
The area has gone through numerous artificial and natural changes over the years , including a booming regional economy ,  increased पर्यटन , और the 1926 hurricane , जिससे नष्ट  much of the area .
as of 2010 , परिचय 39,186 निवासियों सजीव  in South Beach .
The United States presidential election of  1960 थी the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार  , November 8 , 1960 .
The Republican Party  मनोनीत लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन , जबकि the  Democratic Party nominated John F. Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
The incumbent  अध्यक्ष , रिपब्लिकन ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , थी नहीं योग्य लिये re-election  after serving the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy was elected with a lead  of 112,827 मत , or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote , giving उसे  a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College , the closest since 1916 .
This was the first election in which all fifty of the current  संयुक्त राज्य participated  .
A number of factors  बताइये क्यों the चुनाव थी  so close .
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which hurt the incumbent  रिपब्लिकन , और he था the लाभ of 17 लाख अधिक पंजीकृत डेमोक्रेट than  Republicans .
Furthermore , the new votes that Kennedy  gained among catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत निक्सन gained  among Protestants .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills  decisively outmatched निक्सन  's .
In the end , Nixon 's emphasis on his experience carried little weight , and he  wasted उर्जा by campaigning in सब 50 राज्य बजाय of concentrating  on the swing states .
Kennedy used his large , well-funded campaign organization to win the  नामांकन , सुरक्षित समर्थन , और , साथ the सहायता of the पिछला of the big-city  bosses , to get out the vote in the big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson  to थाम the दक्षिण और प्रयुक्त टेलीविज़न effectively  .
This election is  notable as होने the पहला समय in u.S. इतिहास कि दो बैठे u.s . सीनेटरों ( कैनेडी और जॉनसन ) यहूद निर्वाचित as अध्यक्ष और vice-president , a घटना  that has been repeated once , by Barack Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases , the president was the younger , more junior senator ) .
A poster for a  c. 1884 अमरीकी उत्पादन of मैकबेथ  , starring Thomas W. Keene .
Depicted , counter clockwise  इससे top-left , हैं : मैकबेथ और banquo मिलें the witches ; बस बाद the हत्या of डंकन ; banquo 's भुत ; मैकबेथ duels macduff ;  and Macbeth .
मैकबेथ is a खेल लिखा  by William Shakespeare .
It is considered one  of उसके darkest और सबसे  powerful tragedies .
Set in Scotland , the play  dramatizes the corroding मनोवैज्ञानिक और राजनैतिक प्रभाव उत्पादित जब  its protagonist , the Scottish lord Macbeth , chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power .
He commits regicide  to become किंग और तब furthers उसके moral descent साथ  a reign of murderous terror to stay in power , eventually plunging the country into civil war .
In the end , he  loses सबकुछ कि देता अर्थ और purpose to उसके  life before losing his life itself .
The play is believed to have been written  between 1603 और 1607 , और is  most commonly dated 1606 .
The earliest account of a  प्रदर्शन of कया थी संभवतः शेक्सपियर 's खेल is अप्रैल  1611 , when Simon Forman recorded seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre .
It was first published in the Folio  of 1623 , संभवतः इससे a संकेत  book .
It was most likely written during the reign of James I ,  जो था महरूम जेम्स vi of स्कॉटलैंड पहले he succeeded to the  English throne in 1603 .
James was a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company , and of all  the plays शेक्सपियर लिखा दौरान james’s शासनकाल , मैकबेथ सबसे clearly reflects the playwright’s  relationship with the sovereign .
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy , and tells the story of a brave Scottish general named Macbeth who  receives a prophecy इससे a तिकड़ी of witches कि एक दिन  he will become King of Scotland .
Consumed by  महत्वाकांक्षा और spurred to कार्रवाई by उसके बीवी , मैकबेथ हत्याएं किंग डंकन  and takes the throne for himself .
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia , and he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to commit more and more murders  to protect खुद इससे enmity और suspicion  .
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth and Lady Macbeth into  realms of arrogance , दीवानगी , और  death .
शेक्सपियर 's सोर्स लिये the त्रासदी is the खाता of किंग मैकबेथ of स्कॉटलैंड , macduff , और डंकन in holinshed 's क्रॉनिकल्स ( 1587 ) , a इतिहास of इंग्लैण्ड  , Scotland and Ireland familiar to Shakespeare and his contemporaries , although the events in the play differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth .
In the backstage world of theatre , some believe that the play is cursed , and will not mention its title  aloud , referring to it बजाय as `` the स्कॉटिश खेल ``  .
Over the course of many centuries , the play has attracted some of the  सबसे प्रसिद्ध अभिनेताओं to the भूमिकाएँ of मैकबेथ और महिला  Macbeth .
It has been adapted to film ,  टेलीविज़न , ओपेरा , novels , कॉमिक  books , and other media .
The Milton  hershey स्कूल is a निजी परोपकारी ( pre-k  through 12 ) boarding school in Hershey , Pennsylvania .
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School , the institution was founded and funded by chocolate  उद्योगपति मिल्टन snavely hershey और उसके बीवी  , Catherine Sweeney Hershey .
The school was originally established for impoverished , healthy , Caucasian ,  पुरूष अनाथ , जबकि आज it serves विद्यार्थी of विभिन्न पृष्ठभूमि  .
The Milton Hershey School Trust , which funds the school , owns controlling interest in The  hershey कम्पनी और owns the hershey entertainment और रिसॉर्ट कम्पनी ( herco ) जिससे oversees अनेक of the क्षेत्रफल  hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark .
With over six billion dollars in  एसेट , the मिल्टन hershey स्कूल is एक of the wealthiest  schools in the world .
The school is overseen by a  फलक of प्रबंधक  .
The school currently serves 1,818  विद्यार्थी , और योजनाएँ to grow to 2,100 विद्यार्थी by 2013  .
A member of CORE : Coalition  लिये आवासीय शिक्षा , it is the largest  residential education program in the US .

The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of  the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक ड्रग गाली रोकथाम  and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which  the manufacture , importation , कब्ज़ा , उपयोग और वितरण  of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also  परोसा as the नेशनल implementing विधान  for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation  निर्मित पाँच schedules ( classifications ) , साथ varying योग्यता  for a substance to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the  विभिन्न schedules , हालांकि the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग , और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000 , जिससे  placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
second-language अधिग्रहण or second-language सीखना  is the process by which people learn a second language .
second-language अधिग्रहण ( प्रायः abbreviated to sla ) भी  refers to the scientific discipline devoted to studying that process .
Second language refers to any  भाषा सीखे in जोड to a व्यक्ति 's पहला भाषा ; हालांकि the अवधारणा is नामित second-language  acquisition , it can also incorporate the learning of third , fourth , or subsequent languages .
second-language अधिग्रहण  refers to what learners do ; it does not refer to practices in language teaching .
The academic discipline of  second-language अधिग्रहण is a subdiscipline of  applied linguistics .
It is  broad-based और अपेक्षाकृत नई  .
As well as the various branches of linguistics , second-language  अधिग्रहण is भी closely सम्बन्धित to मनोविज्ञान , संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान , और शिक्षा  .
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process  itself , the शर्तें second-language अधिग्रहण शोध , second-language अध्ययन , और second-language  acquisition studies are also used .
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary field , and because  of इस it is मुश्किल to पहचानो a precise starting  date .
However , it does appear  to have विकसित a ग्रेट सौदे चूंकि  the mid-1960s .
The term acquisition was  originally प्रयुक्त to emphasize the अवचेतन प्रकृति of the सीखना प्रक्रम , लकिन in हाल सालो सीखना  and acquisition have become largely synonymous .
Second-language acquisition can incorporate heritage language learning ,  लकिन it करता नहीं प्रायः चरितार्थ  bilingualism .
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of learning a language ,  नहीं the प्रक्रम itself , और देखिए the पद as referring to native-like  fluency .
Writers in fields such as education and psychology , however ,  प्रायः उपयोग bilingualism loosely to refer to सब फ़ॉर्म of बहुभाषिकता  .
Second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign  भाषा ; बल्कि , the सीखना of दूसरी भाषाएं और the सीखना of विदेशी भाषाएं involve the वही आधारभूत  processes in different situations..
There  रै महरूम much बहस परिचय exactly कैसा  language is learned , and many issues are still unresolved .
वहीँ हैं अनेक theories of second-language अधिग्रहण , लकिन none हैं स्वीकृत  as a complete explanation by all SLA researchers .
Due to the interdisciplinary  प्रकृति of the फ़ील्ड of second-language अधिग्रहण ,  this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future .
फोर्ब्स सूची of अरबपतियों is an सालाना रैंकिंग of the संसार 's  wealthiest people , compiled and published by Forbes , an American national business magazine .
The total net worth of each individual on the list is  अनुमानित , in संयुक्त राज्य डॉलर , आधारित on उनके एसेट और  accounting for debt .
The list only represents each person 's  valuation on a सिंगल दिन , due to रोज़ fluctuations among  exchange rates and stock valuations .
The United States Secret Service is a U.S. federal  विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसी कि is भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य  Department of Homeland Security .
The  sworn सदस्यों हैं विभाजित among the खास एजेंटों  and the Uniformed Division .
Until March 1 , 2003 , the Service was part of  the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the  Treasury .
The U.S. Secret Service has two  पृथक क्षेत्रों of responsibility:
Financial Crimes , covering missions such as prevention and  छानबीन of counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी और u.S. राजकोष प्रतिभूति , और छानबीन of प्रमुख धोखाधड़ी  .
Protection , which entails ensuring the safety of  वर्तमान और पूर्व नेशनल नेताओ और उनके परिवारों , ऐसे as the अध्यक्ष , पास्ट राष्ट्रपतियों , वाइस राष्ट्रपतियों , अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार , visiting heads of राज्य  , and foreign embassies ( per an agreement with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ) , etc . )
The Secret Service 's initial  जिम्मेदारी थी to investigate counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी  , which was rampant following the U.S. Civil War .
the एजेंसी तब विकसित into the संयुक्त  States ' first domestic intelligence and counterintelligence agency .
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over  by subsequent एजेंसियों ऐसे as the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ) , ब्यूरो of दारू , तम्बाकू , firearms और विस्फोटक ( atf ) , आव्रजन  and Customs Enforcement ( ICE ) , and Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ) .
`` Me and Bobby McGee '' is a song written by Kris Kristofferson  और फ्रेड फोस्टर , originally performed by रोजर मिलर  .
Others performed the  सोंग बाद , सहित kristofferson खुद , और janis joplin जो अव्वल the u.S. singles चार्ट साथ the सोंग in 1971 बाद उसके मौत , बनाना the सोंग the दूसरी  posthumous number-one single in U.S. chart history after `` ( Sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding .
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his  आद्याक्षर , fdr , थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th सदी  , leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war .
A  प्रबल नेता of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी और the तभी अमरीकी अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित to अधिक than दो शर्तें , he निर्मित a नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी  politics after 1932 , as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are  यहाँ again `` as उसके अभियान थीम , fdr पराजित लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन  Herbert Hoover in November 1932 , at the depth of the Great Depression .
Energized by his personal victory over polio , FDR  's unfailing  optimism and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary  जोसेफ स्टालिन in अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार युद्ध ii , और restoring समृद्धि  to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce  राहत ( सरकारी कार्य लिये the बेरोजगार ) , रिकवरी ( आर्थिक विकास ) , और सुधार ( through विनियमन of वॉल गली , बैंको और परिवहन  ) .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937 , लकिन तब  relapsed into a deep recession .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or  गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब  unemployment diminished during World War II .
सबसे of the regulations on कारोबार यहूद ended परिचय 1975–85 , मगर  for the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission , which still exists .
Along with several smaller programs , major surviving programs include the Federal Deposit Insurance  निगम , जिससे थी निर्मित in 1933 , और सोशल सुरक्षा  , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion of  चीन और the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी , fdr दिया दमदार राजनयिक  and financial support to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral .
His goal was to make America the ``  आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र `` जिससे होता सप्लाई munitions  to the Allies .
In March 1941 ,  रूज़वेल्ट , साथ congressional स्वीकृति , provided lend-lease  aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very  दमदार नेशनल support , he बना युद्ध on जापानी और जर्मनी बाद the जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर  on December 7 , 1941 , calling it a `` date which will live in infamy `` .
He supervised the mobilization of the  u.S. अर्थव्यवस्था to support the अलाइड  war effort .
As an  क्रियाशील सैन्य नेता , रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on  two fronts that ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the  internment of 100,000 जापानी अमरीकी  civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % , relief programs largely ended , and the industrial economy grew rapidly  to नई हाइट्स as लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers , और 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 महिलाओं यहूद  drafted or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the American  राजनैतिक झाँकी नहीं तभी दौरान the बारह सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी  , but also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated the realignment of  मतदाता कि निर्मित the पांचवां पार्टी प्रणाली  .
FDR  's नई सौदे गठबन्धन संयुक्त मजदूर संघ , बिग नगर मशीने  , white ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He also  बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि  of the United Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top three U.S. Presidents ,  साथ साथ अब्राहम lincoln और जार्ज वॉशिंगटन  .
A  उदार डेमोक्रेट , रूज़वेल्ट पारिभाषित उसके वैचारिक  position as `` a little left of center . ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS ,  मारा , और ms-13 ) is a transnational दण्ड गिरोह कि originated in लॉस एंजिल्स और रै स्प्रेड to अन्य  parts of the United States , Canada , Mexico , and Central America .
The majority of the gang is  ethnically रचित of सेंट्रल अमेरिकी  and active in urban and suburban areas .
In the U.S. , the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the San Francisco Bay Area in  उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया ; the वॉशिंगटन , d.C. महानगर क्षेत्रों of फेयरफैक्स काउंटी , वर्जिनिया ,  Montgomery County , Maryland , and Prince George 's County , Maryland ; Long Island , New York ; the Boston , Massachusetts area ; Charlotte , North Carolina ; and Houston , Texas .
There  is भी a उपस्थिति of  MS-13 in Toronto , Ontario , Canada .
Members of MS distinguish  themselves by टैटू covering the देह और भी प्रायः the  face , as well as the use of their own sign language .
They are notorious for their use of violence and a subcultural moral code that  predominantly consists of merciless बदला और बेदर्द retributions  .
This cruelty of the distinguished members of the `` Maras '' or `` Mareros '' earned them a path to be recruited by the  sinaloa कार्टेल battling विरूद्ध लॉस zetas in an जारी ड्रग युद्ध दक्षिण of the संयुक्त  States border .
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and  आव्रजन और कस्टम प्रवर्तन , जो have initiated wide-scale छापे विरूद्ध ज्ञात और  suspected gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the country .
हड्डियों is an अमरीकी अपराधों comedy-drama टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि  premiered on the Fox network in the United States on September 13 , 2005 .
The show is based on forensic anthropology and forensic archaeology , with each episode focusing on an FBI case file  concerning the रहस्य पीछे इंसान remains brought by एफबीआई खास एजेंट seeley बूथ ( दाउद boreanaz ) to the forensic  anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ) .
The rest of the  प्रमुख डाल शामिल michaela conlin , T. J. thyne , eric millegan , tamara  Taylor , Jonathan Adams , and John Francis Daley .
Created by Hart Hanson , the series is very  loosely आधारित on the जीवन और कृतियाँ of उपन्यासकार और forensic anthropologist कैथी reichs , जो भी produces  the show .
Its title  अक्षर , temperance ब्रेनन , is नामित बाद the समर्थक  of Reichs ' crime novel series .
Conversely , Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels  आधारित around a fictional ( in the हड्डियों ब्रह्मांड ) forensic anthropologist नामित  Kathy Reichs .
Bones is a  संयुक्त उत्पादन by जोसेफसन entertainment , दूर  Field Productions and 20th Century Fox Television .
The series has completed airing its  आठवीं ऋतु और रै महरूम नवीनीकृत  for a ninth season .
Super Bowl XXV was an American football  खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन भैंस  Bills and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion New York Giants to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season .
The Giants  पराजित the बिल्स by the स्कोर  of 20–19 , winning their second ever Super Bowl .
it is the तभी सुपर कटोरी  decided by one point .
The game was held at Tampa Stadium in Tampa , Florida , on  जनवरी 27 , 1991 , दौरान the ऊँचाई  of the Gulf War .
It  थी यूँ निभाई अंतर्गत much  patriotic fervor .
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` The  star-spangled ध्वज `` by व्हिटनी ह्यूस्टन  during the pregame ceremonies .
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense were making their first Super Bowl appearance after  finishing the नियमित ऋतु साथ a 13-3 रिकार्ड , और अग्रणी the लीग  in total points scored with 428 .
In advancing to their second Super Bowl , the Giants also posted a 13-3  नियमित ऋतु रिकार्ड , लकिन साथ a ball-control ठोकर और a रक्षा कि अनुमत a लीग कम 211  points .
The game is  बेहतरीन remembered लिये बिल्स placekicker स्कॉट नॉर्वुड 's last-second फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य attempt  which went wide right of the uprights , leading to a Giants victory , and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills .
The Giants  नियत a सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड पकड़कर कब्ज़ा  of the ball for 40 minutes and 33 seconds .
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter  deficit , और बना a 75-yard touchdown ड्राइव कि खपत a सुपर  Bowl record 9:29 off the clock .
Giants running  वापस ottis एंडरसन , जो carried the बॉल 21  times for 102 yards and one touchdown , was named Super Bowl MVP .
He was the first  awardee to प्राप्त the newly नामित `` पीट  Rozelle Trophy '' ( named for the former commissioner ) .
Anderson also recorded  एक रिसेप्शन लिये  seven yards .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm Little  और भी ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz  ( ) , was an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist .
To his admirers , he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks , a man  जो indicted श्वेत अमेरिका in the harshest शर्तें लिये इसके अपराधों विरूद्ध ब्लैक अमेरिकी  .
Detractors accused  उसे of उपदेश जातिवाद , ब्लैक  supremacy , and violence .
He has been called  एक of the महानतम और सबसे influential अफ़्रीकी  Americans in history .
Malcolm X 's father  died—killed by श्वेत supremacists , it थी rumored—when he थी यंग , और at तनिक  one of his uncles was lynched .
When he was 13 , his mother was  लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल , और he थी  placed in a series of foster homes .
In 1946 , at age 20 ,  he गई to थाना लिये तोड़कर  and entering .
In prison , Malcolm X  became a सदस्य of the स्वदेश of islam ; बाद उसके पैरोल in 1952 , he जल्दी रोज़  to become one of its leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public  फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह , लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of islam सिर इलियास मुहम्मद led उसे to छोड़ the स्वदेश  in March 1964 .
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East , he returned to the United States ,  जहाँ he संस्थापित मुस्लिम मस्जिदे , inc. और the संगठन of afro-american  Unity .
In February 1965 , less than a year after leaving  the स्वदेश of islam , he थी assassinated  by three members of the group .
Malcolm X 's expressed  मान्यताओं बदला substantially over  time .
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught  ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated विरह of ब्लैक और श्वेत अमेरिकी —in कंट्रास्ट to the  civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in  1964—saying of उसके संघ साथ it , `` i किया अनेक बाते as a [ ब्लैक ] मुस्लिम कि  I 'm sorry for now .
i थी a प्रेत तब ... pointed in a निश्चित दिशा और बताई to कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम  , he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work with civil rights leaders , he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .
The third season of 90210 , an  अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी , premiered on सोमवार सितंबर 13 , 2010  .
The CW  officially नवीनीकृत the दिखाएँ लिये a तीसरा ऋतु on फ़रवरी 16 , 2010  .
With the reveal of the networks fall 2010 schedule , they announced their decision to  मूव 90210 to सोमवार नाइट्स at 8:00 pm , as  a lead-in to Gossip Girl .
It  premiered on सितंबर 13 , 2010 और थी मिले साथ generally धनात्मक  reviews from critics .
The season picks up at the end of  गर्मियाँ और focuses on the विद्यार्थी  senior year of high school .
It follows Adrianna 's rise to  कीर्ति , a नई संबंध between चांदी और navid और a उलझन टेडी जो decides to खुलासा to उसके  family and friends he is gay .
It also deals with the  aftermath of नाओमी क्लार्क 's उत्पीड़न  .
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes  , ट्रिस्टन wilds , annalynne mccord , रयान eggold , जेसिका stroup , माइकल steger , जेसिका  Lowndes , Matt Lanter , Gillian Zinser , Trevor Donovan and Lori Loughlin .
Rebecca Sinclair continued her role as  कार्यपालिका निर्माता लिये the ऋतु .
The season premiered to 1.96  लाख दर्शक और a 0.9 दरजा in the  adults 18–49 demographic .
Christmas-themed episode `` Holiday Madness '' , hit season highs  in सब कुंजी demos साथ 2.1 in the cw 's निशाना डेमो of महिलाओं  18–34 , a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49 .
It was  भी the सबसे देखी एपीसोड in over  a year with 2.2 million viewers tuning in .
The season finale  aired on may 16 , 2011 .
The  ऋतु averaged 1.75 लाख  live viewers and a 0.9 adults 18–49 rating .
it थी released on dvd in the  United States on August 30 , 2011 .
Elizabeth II  ( एलिज़ाबेथ एलेक्जेंड्रा मरियम ; born 21 अप्रैल 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य  , known as the Commonwealth realms , and their territories and dependencies , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and , in some  of उसके realms , carries the शीर्षक of defender of the आस्था as भाग of  her full title .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became Head of the  राष्ट्रमंडल और महारानी regnant of सात स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम , कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , नई जीलैंड , दक्षिण  Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From  1956 to 1992 , the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied  as territories gained independence and some realms became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four  aforementioned देशों , एलिज़ाबेथ is महारानी of जमैका , बारबाडोस , the बहामा , हरा ,  Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her  शासनकाल of सालो is फिलहाल the दूसरी longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch  ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years .
Elizabeth  थी born in लंदन और शिक्षित  privately at home .
Her father acceded to the  सिंहासन as जार्ज vi in 1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai एडवर्ड viii , इससे जिससे समय वो  was the heir presumptive .
She began to undertake public duties  दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , in जिससे वो परोसा in the  Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947 ,  वो शादीशुदा प्रिंस फिलिप ,  Duke of Edinburgh , with whom she has four children : Charles , Anne , Andrew , and Edward .
Her coronation service took place in 1953 and was  the पहला to be televised  .
The Queen 's many  ऐतिहासिक विज़िट और बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट  to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms , such as  devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम और the patriation of the कनाडाई संविधान  .
Times of personal  significance have शामिल the births और विवाह of उसके children , the births of उसके grandchildren , the प्रतिष्ठापन of the प्रिंस of वेल्स  , and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver , Golden , and Diamond Jubilees in 1977 , 2002 , and 2012 , respectively .
Major  कार्यक्रम in the महारानी 's शासनकाल have शामिल the  Troubles in Northern Ireland , the Falklands War , wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan .
There have been  टाइम्स of निजी विषाद लिये उसके जिससे शामिल the मौत of उसके पिता at 56 , the हत्या of प्रिंस फिलिप 's ताऊ , रब माउंटबेटन , the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis  ) , the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
the महारानी रै occasionally  faced severe press criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments , but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high .
The 2010 United States Senate election in Florida took place on November 2 , 2010 along with other elections to  the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट in अन्य राज्य as खूब as सब चुनावों to the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  and various state and local elections .
Republican Marco Rubio , former Speaker of the Florida House of Representatives ,  पराजित स्वतंत्र चार्ली crist और डेमोक्रेट kendrick नम्र in a three-way रेस .
One term Senator Mel Martinez was elected  in a बहुत बंद रेस विरूद्ध डेमोक्रेट बेट्टी  Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote .
Martinez announced on December 2 , 2008 that he would not seek  re-election to the सीनेट , और होता इस्तीफा prior to the समाप्त of उसके  term .
In August 2009 ,  राज्यपाल चार्ली crist घोषित कि he होता नियुक्त उसके पूर्व मुख्य  of Staff , George LeMieux , a Republican , to the Senate seat being vacated by Martinez .
Governor Crist publicly announced he was  कार्यशील लिये the सीट in mid-2009 .
At the time he received many Republican endorsements , such as  the नेशनल रिपब्लिकन senatorial कमेटी , मार्टिनेज , और the 2008 रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय  nominee John McCain .
His support of the American  रिकवरी और reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 ठेस उसके लोकप्रियता among conservatives  , and candidate Marco Rubio surged .
In April 2010 Crist announced  he होता बूँद आउट of the रिपब्लिकन प्राथमिक  and run as an independent .
The  नेशनल रिपब्लिकन senatorial कमेटी withdrew इसके समर्थन of crist और मांगे a refund of इसके अभियान  funds that it provided for the Crist campaign .
कांग्रेसी kendrick नम्र थी the पहला  Democrat to declare his intention to run .
Alexander Snitker was  the पहला सदस्य of the libertarian पार्टी on the  ballot for senator in Florida 's history .
उपग्रह दृश्य of  Doha
दोहा ( , ' or ' , वस्तुतः : `` the बिग पेड़ '' ) is the पूंजी  city of the state of Qatar .
Located on the coast of  the पारसी गल्फ  ,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008 , and is  भी एक of the municipalities  of Qatar .
Doha is Qatar 's largest city , with over 60 % of the nation 's population  residing in दोहा or इसके surrounding उपनगरों , और is भी the आर्थिक  centre of the country .
Doha also serves as the seat of  सरकारी of क़तर , जिससे is शासित by शेख़ हमद  bin Khalifa Al Thani .
Doha  is घर to the शिक्षा नगर , an  area devoted to research and education .
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level meeting of the  दोहा विकास गोलाकार of संसार व्यापार संगठन  negotiations .
The  नगर of दोहा आयोजित the 2006  Asian Games , which was the largest Asian Games ever held .
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan  अरब खेल और सबसे of the  games at the 2011 AFC Asian Cup .
Doha hosted the UNFCCC Climate Negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012  और होगा मेजबान a विशाल क्रमांक of the venues लिये the 2022 फीफा संसार  Cup .
The World Petroleum Council held the 20th  संसार पेट्रोलियम सम्मेलन  in Doha in December 2011 .
paranasal साइनस हैं a समूह of चार युग्म air-filled स्पेसेस कि घेर the nasal गुहा ( ऊर्ध्वहनु साइनस  ) , above the eyes ( frontal sinuses ) , between the eyes ( ethmoid sinuses ) , and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ) .
The sinuses are  नामित लिये the फेशियल हड्डियों  in which they are located .
Lean manufacturing , lean enterprise , or lean production , often simply , `` Lean , '' is a production  अभ्यास कि considers the व्यय of संसाधन लिये कोई  goal other than the creation of value for the end customer to be wasteful , and thus a target for elimination .
Working  इससे the परिप्रेक्ष्य of the ग्राहक जो consumes a उत्पाद or  service , `` value '' is defined as any action or process that a customer would be willing to pay for .
Essentially , lean is centered on  preserving मान साथ कम कार्य .
Lean manufacturing  is a प्रबन्धन दर्शनशास्त्र निकला ज़्यादातर इससे the टोयोटा उत्पादन  System ( TPS ) ( hence the term Toyotism is also prevalent ) and identified as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s .
TPS is renowned for its focus on reduction of the original  टोयोटा सात wastes to improve overall ग्राहक मान , लकिन वहीँ  are varying perspectives on how this is best achieved .
The steady growth of Toyota , from a small company to  the संसार 's largest automaker , रै केन्द्रित ध्यान on कैसा it रै हासिल इस  success .
iCarly  लोगो
iCarly is an  अमरीकी sitcom कि airs on निकलोडियन  , which premiered on September 8 , 2007 .
Nickelodeon promoted many  एपीसोड so दूर ऐसे as `` ido '' , `` ihire an idiot '' , `` ipity the nevel '' , `` idate sam & फ्रेडी '' , इत्यादि .  as specials , despite their being regular episodes .
Every episode title begins  साथ a निम्नतर मामला i जिससे represents  the internet , as in `` iCarly '' .
The show was  मनोनीत लिये an एमी पुरस्कार  for Outstanding Children 's Program in 2009 .
The series starring Miranda Cosgrove as Carly  शे , a 13-year-old जो becomes an अंतरजाल  star .
The  श्रेणी ended on नवम्बर 23 , 2012  with the one-hour special episode `` iGoodbye '' .
A total of 7  सीज़न और 109 एपीसोड  were broadcast .
The largest audience of the series was 11.2 million viewers , with the  खास एपीसोड `` isaved अपना जीवन '' premiered in जनवरी 2010 .
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy best friend Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition  , tech-savvy फ्रेडी ( नाथन kress ) टेपों it और पोस्ट it ऑनलाइन बगैर telling उन्हें  .
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter , the  ऑनलाइन दर्शक clamors लिये अधिक और the icarly वेबकास्ट  is born .
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence , Carly , Sam , and Freddie find out that they have also become online celebrities as their show – which features talent contests ,  व्यंजनों , problem-solving , और यादृच्छिक नाचना – garners अंतरराष्ट्रीय accolades  .
Carly lives in Seattle , Washington with her 26-year-old brother and guardian  स्पेंसर ( जेरी trainor ) और produces the दिखाएँ in a makeshift third-floor स्टुडियो मचान  in their apartment .
Their  माँ रै never महरूम देखी or उल्लेखित , लकिन उनके पिता , स्टीवन शे ( दाउद  Chisum ) , is a U.S. Air Force officer temporarily stationed on a submarine , and is often mentioned but is only seen in person during the series finale episode , `` iGoodbye '' .
westlife यहूद an आयरिश लड़के बैंड  which formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2012 .
Originally signed by Simon Cowell and managed by Louis Walsh , the group  's फाइनल line-up consisted of nicky byrne , kian  Egan , Mark Feehily and Shane Filan .
Brian McFadden was  a सदस्य इससे 1998 जबतक उसके प्रस्थान  in 2004 .
Westlife sold over 50 million  रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी , a कुल कि शामिल स्टुडियो एल्बम , singles  , video releases , and compilation albums .
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in UK history ) , tying with  चट्टान रिचर्ड और रैंकिंग बस पीछे the बीटल्स और एल्विस  Presley .
They achieved a total  of 26 शीर्ष टेन singles over  their 14-year career .
By 2010 , Westlife was listed in the Guinness  संसार रिकॉर्ड , as the uk 's top-selling एल्बम समूह of  the 21st century .
They also won  the रिकार्ड of the साल ( the तभी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार आधारित on पब्लिक मत in the uk ) a record-breaking चार टाइम्स और in 2012 , the आधिकारिक  Charts Company listed Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history .
Despite their European and Asian success , Westlife never managed to break into the U.S. market ,  achieving तभी एक hit सिंगल in 2000 : `` कसम it  Again `` .
In October 2011 , Westlife announced their intention to  विभाजित in 2012 , following उनके महानतम हिट्स दौरे  and the release of their Greatest Hits album .
The boyband 's final  कॉन्सर्ट यहूद आयोजित on 22 और 23 जून 2012  at Croke Park Stadium in Dublin .
The first farewell concert , offering  85,000 टिकटें , बेची आउट in a record-breaking 5 मिनट्स और the latter  screened live in cinemas worldwide .
Vitamin A is a group of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons , which include  रेटिनॉल , retinal , retinoic एसिड और अनेक provitamin a carotenoids among जिससे  beta-carotene is the most important .
Vitamin A has multiple functions , it is  महत्वपूर्ण लिये विकास और विकास , लिये the मेंटेनेंस  of the immune system and good vision .
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal , which combines with protein opsin to form rhodopsin  the light-absorbing अणु , कि is जरुरी लिये दोनो low-light ( scotopic दृष्टि ) और रंग दृष्टि .
Vitamin A also functions in a very  अलग भूमिका as an irreversibly oxidized रूप of रेटिनॉल ज्ञात as retinoic एसिड , जिससे  is an important hormone-like growth factor for epithelial and other cells .
In foods of animal origin ,  the प्रमुख रूप of विटामिन a is an ester , primarily retinyl palmitate  , which is converted to retinol ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine .
The retinol form functions as a storage form of the vitamin , and can be converted to and  इससे इसके visually क्रियाशील सुव्युद रूप , retinal  .
The associated acid ( retinoic acid ) , a metabolite  कि can be irreversibly synthesized इससे विटामिन a , रै तभी आंशिक विटामिन a कार्यकलाप , और  does not function in the retina for the visual cycle .
retinoic एसिड is प्रयुक्त लिये विकास और  cellular differentiation .
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to  जिससे an isoprenoid कड़ी is संलग्न , पुकारा a retinyl समूह  .
Both  संरचनात्मक सुविधाएँ हैं अनिवार्य  for vitamin activity .
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as two connected retinyl  समूह , जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त in the देह to योगदान to विटामिन  A levels .
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also have a single  retinyl समूह , जिससे दे उन्हें कुछ विटामिन  activity .
None  of the अन्य carotenes have  vitamin activity .
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an  ionone समूह और रै विटामिन कार्यकलाप in  humans .
विटामिन a can be मिला in दो प्रिंसिपल  forms in foods :
Retinol , the form of vitamin A absorbed when eating animal food  स्त्रोत , is a पीला , fat-soluble पदार्थ  .
Since the pure alcohol form is  अस्थिर , the विटामिन is मिला in  tissues in a form of retinyl ester .
It is also commercially produced and  administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl  acetate or palmitate .
The carotenes alpha-carotene , beta-carotene , gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings ) , but no other carotenoids , function as provitamin A in herbivores and  सर्वाहारी पशु , जिससे possess the एंजाइम ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) जिससे cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa और converts  it retinol .
In general , carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids , and  pure carnivores ऐसे as बिल्लियों और ferrets कमी 15-15'-dioxygenase और can नहीं बदलें कोई carotenoids to retinal  ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin A for these species ) .
Selena Marie Gomez ( born  जुलाई 22 , 1992 ) is an अमरीकी  singer and actress .
She made her debut as  a चाइल्ड अभिनेत्री in बार्नी  & Friends .
In 2007 ,  गोमेज़ आए to prominence as a अभिनीत डाल सदस्य in the टेलीविज़न  series Wizards of Waverly Place .
She signed to Hollywood Records the following year , and became the  संस्थापक और सीसे सिंगर of the पॉप बैंड सेलिना  Gomez & the Scene .
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ) , A Year Without Rain ( 2010 ) , and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified  सुनहरा by the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) और have शाखित platinum-certified singles `` naturally `` , `` जो says `` , और `` प्रेम  You like a Love Song `` .
After the release of television films and their  accompanying soundtracks , गोमेज़ बना उसके नाट्य फिल्मी डेब्यू in ramona और beezus in 2010 और स्ट्रक्चर  in Monte Carlo in 2011 .
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly Place and the hiatus of Selena Gomez & the Scene in 2012 , she focused on her film career , serving as a  आवाज़ अभिनेत्री in होटल transylvania और अभिनीत in वसन्त ब्रेकर्स the following  year .
Her debut solo album is  tentatively अनुसूचित to be released in गर्मियाँ 2013 , और is  preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get It `` .
Outside of her work in the entertainment industry , Gomez is involved in philanthropic activities through charity work and  विभिन्न सोशल और पर्यावरणीय कल्याणकारी  .
tracie monique स्पेंसर ( born जुलाई 12 ,  1976 ) is an American R & B and pop singer-songwriter , actress , and model .
sacramento is the पूंजी नगर of the u.S. राज्य  of California and the seat of government of Sacramento County .
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in  the उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive  Central Valley .
With an estimated 2011 population of  477,891 , it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया  and the 35th largest city in the United States .
Sacramento  is the कोर सांस्कृतिक और आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल  seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
इसके महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the चौथी largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया  after the Greater Los Angeles Area , San Francisco Bay Area , and the San Diego metropolitan area , as well as the 25th largest in the United States .
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as  अमेरिका 's सबसे ethnically और racially एकीकृत  city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John Sutter  , sr. , उसके बेटे जॉन sutter , jr. ,  and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew quickly  धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा of sutter 's फोर्ट , जिससे  was established by Sutter in 1839 .
During the California Gold Rush , Sacramento was a major distribution point , a commercial and agricultural  बीच , और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल , stagecoaches , riverboats , the टेलीग्राफ , the टट्टू एक्स्प्रेस , और the पहला transcontinental  Railroad .
California State University , Sacramento , more commonly  ज्ञात as sacramento राज्य or सैक राज्य , is the largest  local university .
It is  एक of the twenty-three campuses  of the California State University system .
Drexel University  sacramento is स्तिथ in शहर , sacramento  .
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge  स्कूल of विधि is स्तिथ in the ओक पार्क  neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California , Davis  is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस , वेस्ट of the पूंजी  .
The UC Davis  चिकित्सा बीच , a world-renowned शोध  hospital , is located in the city of Sacramento .
मेमोरियल दिन is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय  holiday which occurs every year on the final Monday of May .
Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and women who  died जबकि सेवारत in the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद  Forces .
Formerly known as  सजावट दिन , it originated बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध to commemorate  the Union and Confederate soldiers who died in the Civil War .
By the 20th century  मेमोरियल दिन था महरूम विस्तारित to सम्मान सब अमेरिकी  who have died in all wars .
It typically  marks the प्रारंभ of the गर्मियाँ अवकाश  season , while Labor Day marks its end .
Many people visit  कब्रिस्तान और memorials , विशेषकर to सम्मान  those who have died in military service .
Many volunteers place  an अमरीकी ध्वज on प्रत्येक संगीन in नेशनल  cemeteries .
By the early 20th century , Memorial Day was an occasion for more general expressions of memory , as  लोगों visited the क़ब्रों of उनके मृतक रिश्तेदारों in गिरिजाघर कब्रिस्तान ,  whether they had served in the military or not .
It also became a long weekend increasingly devoted to shopping  , परिवार महफिलों , आतिशबाजी , यात्राएँ to the बीच , और नेशनल मीडिया कार्यक्रम  .
Annual Decoration Days  लिये particular कब्रिस्तान हैं आयोजित on a  Sunday in late spring or early summer in some rural areas of the American South , notably in the mountains .
In cases involving a family graveyard where  रिमोट पूर्वजो as खूब as those जो यहूद मृतक अधिक recently हैं दफ्न , इस  may take on the character of an extended family reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles .
People gather on the  designated दिन और put पुष्प on क़ब्रों  and renew contacts with kinfolk and others .
There often is a religious service and a `` dinner on the ground ,  '' the परंपरागत पद लिये a potluck भोजन in जिससे लोगों प्रयुक्त to स्प्रेड the बर्तन  out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass .
It is believed that this practice began before the American Civil War and  यूँ may प्रतिबिंबित the रियल उत्पत्ति of  the `` memorial day '' idea .
Memorial Day is not to be confused with  दिग्गजों दिन ; मेमोरियल दिन is a दिन of remembering the मेन और महिलाओं जो died जबकि सेवारत  , while Veterans Day celebrates the service of all U.S. military veterans , living or dead .
Mt .  zion गिरिजाघर राज्य इतिहास मार्कर  near Philadelphia , Mississippi .
Freedom Summer ( also known as the Mississippi Summer Project ) was a  अभियान in the संयुक्त राज्य शुभारम्भ in जून 1964 to attempt to पंजीकरण as अनेक अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी  voters as possible in Mississippi , which had historically excluded most blacks from voting .
The project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools , Freedom Houses , and community centers  in छोटी कस्बों throughout मिसिसिपी to सहायता  the local black population .
The project was organized by the Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ) , a coalition  of the मिसिसिपी शाखाओं of the चार प्रमुख सिविल अधिकारों संगठन ( sncc  , CORE , NAACP and SCLC ) .
Most of the impetus , leadership ,  और financing लिये the गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट  came from the SNCC .
रॉबर्ट parris मूसा , sncc फ़ील्ड सचिव  and co-director of COFO , directed the summer project .
Blues is the name given to both a musical form and a music genre that originated in communities of primarily the ``  गहन दक्षिण `` of the संयुक्त राज्य around the समाप्त of the 19th सदी इससे spirituals , कार्य गीतों , फ़ील्ड hollers  , shouts and chants , and rhymed simple narrative ballads .
The blues form , ubiquitous in jazz , rhythm and blues , and rock and roll is characterized by  विशिष्ट कॉर्ड progressions , of जिससे the twelve-bar ब्लूज़ कॉर्ड progression  is the most common .
The blue notes that , for expressive purposes are sung or played flattened or  धीरे झुकी ( नाबालिग 3rd to प्रमुख 3rd ) in संबंध to the पिच of the प्रमुख स्केल , हैं भी an महत्वपूर्ण भाग  of the sound .
The blues genre is based on the  ब्लूज़ रूप लकिन possesses अन्य विशेषताएँ ऐसे as विशिष्ट  lyrics , bass lines , and instruments .
Blues  can be subdivided into अनेक subgenres ranging इससे देश to शहरी ब्लूज़ कि यहूद  more or less popular during different periods of the 20th century .
Best known are the Delta ,  piedmont , जम्प , और शिकागो ब्लूज़ शैलियाँ  .
World  युद्ध ii चिह्नित the परिवर्तन इससे ध्वनिक to इलेक्ट्रिक ब्लूज़  and the progressive opening of blues music to a wider audience , especially white listeners .
in the 1960s और 1970s , a संकर रूप  called blues-rock evolved .
The term `` the  ब्लूज़ '' refers to the `` ब्लू शैतानों '' , अर्थ वेदना और उदासी ; an जल्दी उपयोग  of the term in this sense is found in George Colman 's one-act farce Blue Devils ( 1798 ) .
Though the use of the phrase in  african-american म्यूज़िक may be पुरानी , it रै महरूम attested to चूंकि 1912 , जब हार्ट wand 's ``  Dallas Blues `` became the first copyrighted blues composition .
In lyrics the phrase is often used  to describe a उदास  mood .
A quarter  डालर , commonly shortened to क्वार्टर , is a सिक्का  worth 1⁄4 of a United States dollar or 25 cents .
The quarter has  महरूम उत्पादित चूंकि 1796  .
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination , as opposed to 20¢ which is  अधिक आम in अन्य भाग of the संसार , originated साथ the अभ्यास of dividing स्पेनी milled  Dollars into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ) .
At one time `` two bits `` , i.e . two wedges ,  प्रत्येक कील an आठवीं , यूँ a क्वार्टर of the स्पेनी  real , was a common nickname for a quarter .
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican holiday  मनाये throughout मैक्सिको और around the संसार  in other cultures .
The holiday focuses on  महफिलों of परिवार और मित्रों to दुवा लिये और याद मित्रों  and family members who have died .
It is particularly celebrated in Mexico ,  जहाँ it is a नेशनल अवकाश  , and all banks are closed .
The celebration takes place on November  1 और 2 , in कनेक्शन साथ the कैथोलिक छुट्टियाँ of सब संतो ' दिन और सब souls  ' Day .
Traditions connected with  the अवकाश शामिल भवन निजी altars honoring the मृतक using शुगर skulls , marigolds , और the पसंदीदा भोजन और पेय of the  departed and visiting graves with these as gifts .
They also  छोड़  possessions of the deceased .
विद्वानों ट्रेस the origins of the आधुनिक मैक्सिकन अवकाश to स्वदेशी observances डेटिंग  back hundreds of years and to an Aztec festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl .
the अवकाश रै स्प्रेड throughout the संसार : in ब्राज़ील , dia de  Finados is a public holiday that many Brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries and churches .
In Spain , there are  त्यौहार और parades , और , at the समाप्त of the दिन , लोगों एकत्रित at कब्रिस्तान और  pray for their dead loved ones .
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe , and  similarly प्रसंग जश्न appear in अनेक एशियाई और अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों  .
अनीता mk viii .
The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were launched  simultaneously in लेट 1961 as the संसार 's पहला all- इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डेस्कटॉप calculators  .
Designed  और निर्मित by the घंटी  Punch Co .
in Britain , and marketed through its Sumlock Comptometer  प्रभाग , वे प्रयुक्त वैक्यूम tubes और cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके लॉजिक circuits और nixie tubes लिये उनके numerical  displays .
They were  the पहला of a श्रेणी of डेस्कटॉप और hand-held इलेक्ट्रॉनिक calculators कि the कम्पनी  was to develop and sell under the ANITA name into the mid-1970s .
George Washington ( – , 1799 ) was the first President of the United States ( 1789–1797 ) , the  commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज दौरान the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी  War , and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States .
He presided over the convention that drafted the Constitution , which replaced the  आलेख of कनफेडरेशन और  established the position of President .
Washington was elected President as the unanimous choice of  the 69 निर्वाचक in 1788 , और he परोसा  two terms in office .
He oversaw the creation of  a दमदार , well-financed नेशनल सरकारी कि कायम neutrality in the युद्धों raging in यूरोपीय  , suppressed rebellion , and won acceptance among Americans of all types .
His leadership style established many forms and rituals of government that have been  प्रयुक्त चूंकि , ऐसे as using a कैबिनेट प्रणाली  and delivering an inaugural address .
Further , the peaceful transition from his  प्रेसिडेंसी to the प्रेसिडेंसी of जॉन एडम्स स्थापित a परंपरा  that continues into the 21st century .
Washington was hailed as `` father of his  देश `` भी दौरान  his lifetime .
Washington was born into  the प्रांतीय gentry of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया ; उसके धनवान planter  family owned tobacco plantations and slaves .
After both his father and older brother died when he was young , Washington became  personally और professionally संलग्न to the शक्तिशाली विलियम फेयरफैक्स , जो प्रचारित  his career as a surveyor and soldier .
Washington quickly  became a वरिष्ठ अधिकारी in the औपनिवेशिक शक्तियां दौरान the  first stages of the French and Indian War .
Chosen by the Second Continental Congress in 1775 to be  commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति , वॉशिंगटन प्रबंधित to फ़ोर्स  the British out of Boston in 1776 , but was defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City .
After crossing the Delaware River in the dead of winter , he defeated the British in  दो लड़ाइयों , retook नई जर्सी और लौटी आवेग to the patriot  cause .
Because of his strategy , Revolutionary forces captured two major British  सेना at साराटोगा in 1777 और yorktown in 1781  .
इतिहासकारों laud वॉशिंगटन लिये उसके चयन और पर्यवेक्षण of उसके सेनापतियों , प्रोत्साहन of मनोबल  and ability to hold together the army , coordination with the state governors and state militia units , relations with Congress and attention to supplies , logistics , and training .
In battle ,  however , वॉशिंगटन थी repeatedly outmaneuvered  by British generals with larger armies .
After victory had been finalized in 1783 , Washington  resigned as commander-in-chief बल्कि than seize शक्ति , proving उसके विपक्ष  to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism .
Dissatisfied with the weaknesses of the  आलेख of कनफेडरेशन , in 1787 वॉशिंगटन presided  over the Constitutional Convention that drafted the United States Constitution .
निर्वाचित unanimously as the पहला अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in 1789 , he attempted  to bring rival factions together to unify the nation .
He  समर्थित सिकंदर हैमिल्टन 's कार्यक्रम to अदा बंद सब राज्य और नेशनल कर्ज़ , to implement  an effective tax system and to create a national bank ( despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ) .
वॉशिंगटन proclaimed the संयुक्त  States neutral in the wars raging in Europe after 1793 .
He avoided war with Great  ब्रिटेन और गारंटी a दशक of सलाम और लाभप्रद व्यापार by securing the jay सन्धि  in 1795 , despite intense opposition from the Jeffersonians .
Although  never officially joining the federalist पार्टी  , he supported its programs .
Washington  's विदाई पता थी an influential प्राइमर on  republican virtue and a warning against partisanship , sectionalism , and involvement in foreign wars .
He  रिटायर्ड इससे the प्रेसिडेंसी in 1797 और लौटे  to his home , Mount Vernon , and his domestic life where he managed a variety of enterprises .
He  freed सब उसके स्लेव by उसके  final will .
Washington had a vision of a great and powerful nation that would be  निर्मित on रिपब्लिकन लाइनों using संघीय  power .
He  sought to उपयोग the नेशनल सरकारी to बचाना स्वतंत्रता , improve अवसंरचना  , open the western lands , promote commerce , found a permanent capital , reduce regional tensions and promote a spirit of American nationalism .
At his death , Washington was eulogized  as `` पहला in युद्ध , पहला  in peace , and first in the hearts of his countrymen '' by Henry Lee .
The Federalists made him the symbol of  उनके पार्टी लकिन लिये अनेक सालो , the jeffersonians जारी  to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument .
As the leader of the first successful revolution against a colonial empire in  संसार इतिहास , वॉशिंगटन became an  international icon for liberation and nationalism , especially in France and Latin America .
Fiscal Year 2012  u.S. संघीय बिता – नकदी  or Budget Basis .
Fiscal Year 2012  u.S. संघीय रसीदें  .
The Budget of the United States Government often begins  as the अध्यक्ष 's प्रस्ताव to the u.S. कॉंग्रेस  which recommends funding levels for the next fiscal year , beginning October 1 .
However ,  कॉंग्रेस is the देह जरूरी by विधि to pass a बजट  annually and to submit the budget passed by both houses to the President for signature .
Congressional  निर्णय हैं governed by नियम और विधान  regarding the federal budget process .
Budget committees set spending limits for the House and  सीनेट समितियों और लिये appropriations subcommittees , जिससे तब स्वीकृति व्यक्तिगत  appropriations bills to allocate funding to various federal programs .
If  कॉंग्रेस fails to pass an सालाना बजट ( as रै महरूम the मामला चूंकि 2009  ) , a series of Appropriations bills must be passed as `` stop gap '' measures .
After Congress approves an appropriations bill , it is sent to the President , who may sign it into law , or may veto it ( as he would  a बजट जब passed by the कॉंग्रेस  ) .
A vetoed bill is sent back to Congress ,  जिससे can pass it into विधि साथ a two-thirds बहुमत in  each chamber .
Congress  may भी combine सब or  some appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation bill .
In addition , the president may  निवेदन और the कॉंग्रेस may pass supplemental appropriations बिल्स or आपात supplemental appropriations  bills .
अनेक सरकारी एजेंसियों  provide budget data and analysis .
These include the  सरकारी जवाबदेही दफ्तर ( gao ) , congressional बजट दफ्तर , the दफ्तर of प्रबन्धन  and Budget ( OMB ) and the U.S. Treasury Department .
These agencies have  reported कि the संघीय सरकारी  is facing a series of important financing challenges .
In the short-run , tax revenues have declined significantly due to  a कठोर मंदी और कर नीति चुनाव , जबकि expenditures have विस्तारित लिये युद्धों  , unemployment insurance and other safety net spending .
In the long-run , expenditures related to healthcare programs such as Medicare and Medicaid are projected to grow  तेज़ than the अर्थव्यवस्था overall as the जनसांख्यिकी matures  .
New Guinea ( also , Tok Pisin :  niugini , डच : nieuw गिनी , और ; historically : पापुआ ) is the संसार  's second largest island , after Greenland , covering a land area of 786,000 km2 .
Located in  the दक्षिणपश्चिम प्रशांत समंदर , it झूठ geographically to the ईस्ट of the मलय द्वीपसमूह , साथ जिससे it is sometimes  included as part of a greater Indo-Australian Archipelago .
Geologically it  is a भाग of the वही tectonic  plate as Australia .
When world sea levels were low , the two shared shorelines (  जिससे अभी झूठ 100 to 140 मीटर नीचे समुद्र स्तर ) , combining साथ lands अभी inundated into  the tectonic continent of Sahul , also known as Greater Australia .
The two landmasses became separated when the area now known  as the टोरेस जलसन्धि flooded बाद the समाप्त of the पिछला glacial  period .
anthropologically , नई गिनी is माना  part of Melanesia .
Politically , the  पश्चिमी हाफ of the द्वीप comprises दो इंडोनेशियाई प्रांतों  : Papua and West Papua .
The eastern half forms the mainland of the country of  पापुआ नई गिनी .
The  द्वीप रै a जनसांख्यिकी of परिचय 7.5 लाख ,  with a very low population density of only 8 inh/km2 .
New Guinea is differentiated from its drier , flatter , and less fertile southern  बंटवारा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , by इसके much उच्चतर वर्षा और इसके क्रियाशील volcanic भूविज्ञान , साथ इसके उच्चतम पाइंट  , Puncak Jaya , reaching an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ) .
Yet the two land masses share a similar animal fauna , with marsupials ,  सहित wallabies और possums , और the egg-laying monotreme  , the spiny anteater , or echidna .
Other  than bats और कुछ दो दर्जन स्वदेशी कृंतक genera  , there are no pre-human indigenous placental mammals .
Pigs , several additional species of  चूहे , और the पूर्वज of the नई गिनी गायन श्वान यहूद introduced साथ  human colonization .
The human presence on the island dates back at least  40,000 सालो to the oldest इंसान migrations आउट of अफ़्रीकी  .
Research indicates that the highlands were an early and independent center of agriculture , with  प्रमाण of सिंचाई going वापस at तनिक 10,000  years .
Because of the time depth of its inhabitation and its highly fractured landscape , an unusually high number of languages are spoken on the island , with some  1,000 भाषाएं ( a फिगर उच्चतर than कि of सबसे महाद्वीपों ) having महरूम catalogued आउट of an अनुमानित world-wide pre-columbian  total of 6,000 human dialects .
Most are classified as Papuan languages , a generally accepted  भौगोलिक पद जिससे a अल्पसंख्यक of लेखक  hold to be a genetic one .
A number of  ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई भाषाएं हैं बोला on the coast  and on offshore islands .
In the 16th century  स्पेनी explorers खोजा the द्वीप  and called it Nueva Guinea .
in हाल इतिहास पश्चिमी नई गिनी  was included in the Dutch East Indies colony .
The Germans annexed the northern coast of  the पूर्वी हाफ of the द्वीप as जर्मनी नई गिनी in उनके pre–world युद्ध i प्रयत्न to स्थापित  themselves as a colonial power , whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain .
Following the Treaty of Versailles , the German portion was awarded to Australia ( which was  already शासी the अंग्रेजों अर्जी , नामित the territory  of Papua ) as a League of Nations mandate .
The eastern half of the island was granted  स्वतंत्रता इससे ऑस्ट्रेलिया as पापुआ नई गिनी in 1975  .
The western half gained independence from the Dutch in 1961 , but  became भाग of इंडोनेशिया जल्द afterwards in विवादास्पद  circumstances .
`` The Van Buren Boys '' is the 148th episode of the sitcom  seinfeld , और नाम of a fictional नई यॉर्क  street gang .
Their  चिह्न is क्रासिंग the हैंड्स , साथ एक हाथ  with all the fingers 'up ' and spread out .
The  अन्य हाथ रै सब लकिन the अंगूठा और सूचक  finger up , for a total of eight ( 8 ) .
The gang is named  लिये the 8th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , मार्टिन  Van Buren ( who was the first president from New York ) .
इस थी the 14th एपीसोड लिये  the 8th season .
It aired on  फ़रवरी 6  , 1997 .
bevo चिह्न
Bevo was a  non-alcoholic malt पेय , or निकट बियर , brewed in the संयुक्त राज्य by the anheuser-busch  company beginning in the early 20th century .
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success during the time of prohibition , when beer ,  वाइन और आसुत liquors , यहूद बना illegal लिये तेरह सालो .
The Anheuser-Busch company started  brewing bevo जब alcoholic पेय यहूद निषिद्ध in 1916 by the संयुक्त  States armed forces .
Production rose greatly with national prohibition in 1919 , and Bevo was by far  the सबसे लोकप्रिय of the अनेक `` खाद्यान्न पेय '' or `` निकट beers '' of the समय  .
At the peak of  इसके लोकप्रियता in the जल्दी 1920s , अधिक than पाँच  million cases of Bevo were sold annually .
Renard with  a मग of bevo , चित्रित in टेरा cotta on the  interior walls of the Bevo building , St. Louis
Labels on  the बोतलों billed it as  `` Bevo the Beverage '' .
The name `` Bevo '' was coined from the word `` beverage  '' और the स्लावी भाषा शब्द लिये बियर `` pivo '' , और थी सुनाया  `` Bee-vo '' .
Some Bevo advertising featured the character `` Renard the Fox `` ( based on the  समर्थक of a मध्यकालीन फ्रेंच folk-tale ) , और promotional मग साथ इस अक्षर यहूद manufactured  .
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a series of boat-bodied  गाड़ियाँ in इसके st. लुई दुकानें पुकारा the `` bevo नौकाएँ ''  which were used for promotion .
Seven are believed to have been built on  pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis जबकि एक surviving उदाहरण  was based upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8 .
Billboard advertising Bevo  in trenton , नई  Jersey , 1917
A  समकालीन विज्ञापन पढ़ा `` कूलिंग और invigorating  , Bevo the Beverage .
Order by the case  इससे अपना पंसारी , druggist  , or dealer . ''
The paper label on  the वापस of the बोतल  read `` The All-Year-Round Soft Drink .
appetizing - healthful - पौष्टिक  - Refreshing .
मिल्क or जल may contain  bacteria .
bevo never  does . ''
Bevo became part of the popular culture of the time , and is mentioned in various  लोकप्रिय गीतों और vaudeville skits of the  era .
This led  to द्वितीयक कठबोली उपयोग of the शब्द ; लिये उदाहरण , in अमरीकी सैन्य  slang a young and inexperienced officer was called a `` Bevo '' .
the विश्वविद्यालयों of टेक्सास नामित इसके शुभंकर ``  Bevo '' , a name which has stuck to this day .
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink ,  `` तुम ca n't रहो up on bevo '' , in उसके 1917  army revue , Yip Yip Yaphank .
In the late 1920s smuggled bootleg beer  और liquor as खूब as `` homebrew `` , काटें into bevo  's marketshare .
With sales flattening  to 100,000 मामले by 1929 , anheuser-busch  stopped production .
The Bevo Mill  , st. लुई , in  2008
The Bevo building  , साथ the renard अक्षर prominently प्रदर्शित at the किनारे , स्टिल operates  as a bottling facility at their main brewery in St. Louis , Missouri .
The landmark  bevo मिल , constructed by अगस्त  Anheuser Busch , Sr. in 1917 .
It was closed in 2009  , लकिन it reopened in अक्तूबर  2009 under new owners .
Bevo  is भी उल्लेखित in the छोटी स्टोरी `` the हत्यारे `` by अर्नेस्ट हेमिंगवे  ; as well as in Babbitt by Sinclair Lewis .
mylanta is an over the काउंटर दवा प्रयुक्त लिये the उपचार of एसिड reflux , heartburn  , and gastroesophageal reflux disease ( also known as GERD ) .
Foremilk and  hindmilk नमूने of इंसान स्तन  milk
a कांच of pasteurized  cow milk
मिल्क is a श्वेत द्रव उत्पादित  by the mammary glands of mammals .
It is the primary source of nutrition for young mammals  पहले वे हैं समर्थ to  digest other types of food .
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum , which carries the mother 's antibodies  to the baby और can reduce the रिस्क of अनेक रोगों in the baby  .
It  भी contains अनेक  other nutrients .
As an agricultural product , milk is  निकाली इससे स्तनधारियों और प्रयुक्त as  food for humans .
Worldwide ,  दुग्ध खेतो उत्पादित परिचय  730 million tonnes of milk in 2011 .
इण्डिया is the संसार 's largest निर्माता  and consumer of milk , yet neither exports nor imports milk .
New Zealand , the European Union 's  27 सदस्य राज्य , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , और the संयुक्त राज्य हैं the संसार 's largest  exporters of milk and milk products .
China and Russia are the  संसार 's largest importers of मिल्क  and milk products .
Throughout the world ,  वहीँ हैं अधिक than 6 अरब उपभोक्ता of  milk and milk products .
Over 750 million people  सजीव भीतर दुग्ध खेती households  .
Milk  is a कुंजी योगदानकर्ता to improving पोषण और खाना सुरक्षा विशेषकर  in developing countries .
Improvements in livestock and dairy  प्रौद्योगिकी प्रस्ताव significant वादा in reducing गरीबी और कुपोषण in  the world .
Motorcycle speedway , usually  referred to as स्पीडवे , is a मोटरसाइकिल खेल involving चार और sometimes  up to six riders competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit .
Speedway motorcycles use only one gear and have no brakes and racing takes place on a flat  ओवल track प्रायः consisting of मैल or loosely packed  shale .
Competitors  उपयोग इस सतह to स्लाइड उनके मशीने  sideways , powersliding or broadsiding into the bends .
On the straight sections of  the track the  motorcycles reach speeds of up .
The exact origins of the sport are unknown but there is evidence of a type of speedway racing being  practised in the यूएसए पहले the पहला संसार युद्ध और in ऑस्ट्रेलिया in  the late 1910s and early 1920s .
There are now both domestic and international competitions in a  क्रमांक of देशों सहित the स्पीडवे संसार कप whilst the  highest overall scoring individual in the Speedway Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion .
Speedway is popular in central and northern Europe and to a  lesser extent in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और उत्तर अमेरिका  .
A variant of track racing , speedway is administered  internationally by the fédération internationale  de Motocyclisme ( FIM ) .
Domestic  स्पीडवे कार्यक्रम  are regulated by FIM affiliated national motor sport federations .
Vitamin D is a group  of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal अवशोषण  of calcium and phosphate .
In humans , the most  महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन  D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
cholecalciferol ( विटामिन d3 ) और ergocalciferol ( विटामिन d2 ) हैं अद्वितीय as वे constitute कया  we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements .
The body can also  synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence  its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin ,  it is नहीं दरअसल an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव , as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by सबसे  mammals exposed to sunlight .
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize  विटामिन d efficiently और जरूर प्राप्त it  in their diet . )
an सशुल्क रासायनिक यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically  called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly called vitamins , vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find  the dietary पदार्थ कि थी lacking in a बीमारी , namely , rickets , the बाल्यकाल रूप of osteomalacia .
Additionally , like other compounds called vitamins , in the developed world vitamin D  is added to स्टेपल भोजन , ऐसे as मिल्क , to avoid बीमारी due to कमियां  .
Measures of  सीरम स्तर प्रतिबिंबित endogenous संश्लेषण इससे एक्सपोज़र to धूप as खूब as सेवन इससे the आहार  , and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but , because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from  धूप , no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान , यूएसए , लिये the राशि of सूर्य एक्सपोज़र जरूरी  to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs and  कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d is इससे उनके आहार , हालांकि कि  will rarely occur in practice .
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol , which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is  measured in सीरम to determine a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन  D status .
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol , the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood ,  regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream और promoting the स्वस्थ विकास और remodeling  of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes , such as the  अप्रसार , differentiation और apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol भी affects neuromuscular फलन और सूजन  .
Beyond its use to prevent  osteomalacia or rickets , the प्रमाण लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of विटामिन  D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent .
The best evidence of  लाभ is लिये अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी  in mortality in elderly women .
The Duramax is a General  मोटर्स डीज़ल इंजन परिवार लिये light- और मीडियम ड्यूटी ट्रक , designed by  Isuzu .
The  6.6-liter duramax is उत्पादित  by DMAX , a joint venture between GM and Isuzu in Moraine , Ohio .
This engine was initially installed in 2001 model year Chevy and GMC trucks  और रै महरूम an विकल्प चूंकि तब in pickups , वैन , और medium-duty ट्रक  .
In 2006 , production at Moraine was reportedly  सीमित to लगभग 200,000 इंजन प्रति साल  .
On May 9 , 2007 ,  dmax घोषित the उत्पादन of the 1,000,000th duramax v-8  diesel at its Moraine facility .

Balto ( 1919 –  कूच 14 , 1933 ) थी a siberian हस्की sled श्वान जो led उसके टोली on the फाइनल लेग of the 1925 सीरम चलाएं to nome  , in which diphtheria antitoxin was transported from Anchorage , Alaska , to Nenana , Alaska , by train and then to Nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease .
The  चलाएं is commemorated by the सालाना iditarod ट्रेल  Sled Dog Race .
Balto was named after  the सामी एक्सप्लोरर सैमुएल balto  .
balto died at the आयु  of 14 .
