The Nissan Maxima is a mid-size / entry-level luxury car manufactured by  निसान , marketed as the `` four-door खेल car ''  .
The origins of the Maxima began in July  1976 as the डैटसन 810 , an upscale six-cylinder संस्करण of the bluebird , और  was spun into its own line in 1981 , having been made continuously since then .
The `` Maxima '' name was  लागू धीरे , शुरूआत in  1981 .
Most pre-2004 Maximas were built in Oppama , Japan , until the current North  अमरीकी maximas प्रारंभ होने समवेत in smyrna , टेनेसी  .
the `` उच्चिष्ट '' रै भी महरूम लागू to  Cefiros and Laurels in various markets .
Propolis  as छत्ता sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that honey bees  collect इससे पेड़ कलियों , sap बहती , or अन्य वनस्पति  sources .
It  is प्रयुक्त as a sealant लिये अनावश्यक  open spaces in the hive .
propolis is प्रयुक्त लिये छोटी गैप ( लगभग or कम ) , जबकि  larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax .
Its color  varies depending on इसके वनस्पति  source , the most common being dark brown .
Propolis is sticky  at और ऊपर रूम तापमान  , .
At lower temperatures , it  becomes मुश्किल और बहुत भंगुर  .
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26 , 1948 ) is an American singer , songwriter , and multi-instrumentalist , best  ज्ञात as the frontman और सीसे सिंगर of the बोस्टन -आधारd चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ , in जिससे he भी plays  the harmonica , and occasional piano and percussion .
He is known as the  `` राक्षस  of Screamin ' '' due to his high screams and his wide vocal range .
He is  भी ज्ञात लिये उसके on-stage  acrobatics .
During his  high-energy प्रदर्शन , he प्रायः पोशाक in उज्जवल  , colorful outfits with his trademark scarves hanging from his microphone stand .
In the 1970s ,  टायलर रोज़ to prominence as the frontman of एरोस्मिथ , जिससे released ऐसे पड़ाव मुश्किल चट्टान एल्बम  as Toys in the Attic and Rocks .
In the late 1970s and early 1980s ,  टायलर था a भारी ड्रग और दारू व्यसन , और the  band 's popularity waned .
He completed drug  पुनर्वास in 1986 और subsequently कायम गम्भीरता लिये over 20 सालो , लकिन था a  relapse with prescription painkillers in the late 2000s , for which he successfully received treatment in 2009 .
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s  और जल्दी 1990s साथ the एल्बम स्थाई अवकाश , पंप , और मिलेंगी a पकड़ , टायलर became a household नाम  and has remained a relevant rock icon .
As a  परिणाम , he रै चूंकि embarked on अनेक सोलो endeavors सहित अतिथि दिखावे on अन्य कलाकारों ' म्यूज़िक ,  film and TV roles ( including as a judge on American Idol ) , authoring a bestselling book , and solo work ( including a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ) .
However , he  रै जारी to रिकार्ड म्यूज़िक और perform  with Aerosmith , after more than 43 years in the band .
The  बैंड 's नवीनतम एल्बम , म्यूज़िक इससे  Another Dimension !
, was  released on नवम्बर  6 , 2012 .
टायलर is शामिल among रोलिंग पत्थरों 100  Greatest Singers .
He was also  क्रमित 3rd on hit parader  's Top 100 Metal Vocalists of All Time .
In 2001 he was inducted  into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति साथ  Aerosmith , and he was the presenter when AC/DC was inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003 .
In 2013 , Tyler and his songwriting partner Joe Perry will be  प्राप्तकर्ता of the ascap संस्थापकों पुरस्कार और होगा भी be inducted into the songwriters  Hall of Fame .
The liver produces urea in the urea cycle  as a बर्बाद उत्पाद of the पाचन  of protein .
Normal human adult blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg of  यूरिया नाइट्रोजन प्रति 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dl )  of blood .
Individual  laboratories may have अलग सन्दर्भ  ranges , and this is because the procedure may vary .
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2 , 1940 ) is a former American  फ़ुटबॉल कोच और कॉलेज और पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी जो थी  the head coach of the NFL 's Detroit Lions from 1988 to 1996 .
His 67 wins and 71 losses are  प्रत्येक the सबसे लिये a सिर कोच  in team history .
The Jews ( ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ) , also known  as the यहूदी लोगों , हैं a स्वदेश और an ethnoreligious समूह , originating in the israelites or  Hebrews of the Ancient Near East .
The Jewish ethnicity , nationality , and religion are strongly  interrelated , as judaism is the परंपरागत आस्था of the यहूदी  nation .
Converts to  judaism , जिनकी औकात as यहूदियों भीतर the यहूदी  ethnos is equal to those born into it , have been absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the millennia .
In Jewish tradition , Jewish ancestry is traced to the Biblical  patriarchs अब्राहम , इसहाक़ और याक़ूब in the दूसरी मिलेनियम bce  .
The modern State of Israel was  स्थापित as a यहूदी nation-state , और defines itself as ऐसे  in its Basic Laws .
Its Law of Return grants the right of  नागरिकता to कोई jew जो निवेदन  it .
Israel is the only  देश जहाँ यहूदियों  are a majority of the population .
Jews also enjoyed political autonomy  twice पहले in प्राचीन इतिहास  .
The first of these periods lasted from 1350 to 586 BCE , and encompassed the periods of the Judges , the United Monarchy , and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of  इसराईल और यहूदा , समाप्ति साथ the विनाश of the पहला टेम्पल  .
The second was the period of the  hasmonean किंगडम spanning इससे 140 to 37 bce  .
Since the destruction of the First  टेम्पल , सबसे यहूदियों have जिया  in diaspora .
A minority in every country in which they live ( except Israel ) , they have frequently experienced  persecution throughout इतिहास , resulting in a जनसांख्यिकी कि रै fluctuated दोनो in संख्याएँ और वितरण  over the centuries .
The world  यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी पहुँचे a शिखर of 15 लाख prior to the  Second World War , but six million Jews were killed in the Holocaust .
Since then the population has risen again and , was estimated at 13.4 million by the North American Jewish Data Bank , or  कम than 0.2 % of the कुल संसार जनसांख्यिकी ( roughly एक in प्रत्येक 514 लोगों  ) .
According to this report , about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ) ,  और 39.3 % in the संयुक्त राज्य ( 5.3 लाख ) , साथ सबसे of the शेष जीना  in Europe ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ) .
These numbers include all those who consider  themselves यहूदियों , whether or नहीं वे हैं संबद्ध  with a Jewish organization .
The total  संसार यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी , however ,  is difficult to measure .
In addition to issues with census methodology , there are halakhic disputes  regarding जो is a jew और धर्मनिरपेक्ष , राजनैतिक , और ancestral पहचान  factors that may affect the figure considerably .
Corpus Christi  बारात  .
Oil on canvas  by कार्ल एमिल  Doepler .
Corpus  domini redirects  here .
For  अन्य उपयोग देखिए कॉर्पस domini  ( disambiguation )
The Feast of Corpus Christi ( Latin for Body of Christ ) , also known as Corpus Domini , is a Latin Rite liturgical solemnity  celebrating the परंपरा और विश्वास in the देह और रक्त of यीशु मसीह और  his Real Presence in the Eucharist .
It emphasizes the joy of the institution of the Eucharist , which  थी observed on पावन गुरुवार in the somber माहौल  of the nearness of Good Friday .
in the उपस्थित रोमन missal , the feast is designated  the solemnity of The Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ .
It  is भी मनाये in कुछ anglican , लूथरन , और बूढ़ा  Catholic Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence .
The feast is liturgically  मनाये on the गुरुवार बाद ट्रिनिटी संडे or , `` जहाँ the solemnity of the सबसे  Holy Body and Blood of Christ is not a Holy Day of Obligation , it is assigned to the Sunday after the Most Holy Trinity as its proper day '' .
At the end of  पावन द्रव्यमान , वहीँ is प्रायः a बारात of the  Blessed Sacrament , generally displayed in a monstrance .
The procession is followed by  सुनाकर of the धन्य  Sacrament .
A notable Eucharistic  बारात is कि presided over by the पोप प्रत्येक साल in रोम , जहाँ it begins at the archbasilica  of St. John Lateran and makes its way to the Basilica of Saint Mary Major , where it concludes with Benediction .
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood , the levels of which rise in  जवाब to सूजन ( i.e . c-reactive प्रोटीन is an acute-phase  protein ) .
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of dead or dying cells ( and  कुछ प्रकार of जीवाणु ) in अनुक्रम to activate the पूरक प्रणाली  via the C1Q complex .
CRP is synthesized by the liver in  जवाब to कारकों released by macrophages और  fat cells ( adipocytes ) .
It is  a सदस्य of the pentraxin  family of proteins .
It is not  सम्बन्धित to c-peptide or प्रोटीन  C .
C-reactive protein was the first  पैटर्न मान्यता receptor ( prr ) to be पहचाना  .
The  प्रारंभ of the व्यवस्थित यूरोपीय colonization of the americas is typically दिनाँक to 1492 , जब a स्पेनी expedition  headed by Christopher Columbus sailed for India to open trade but inadvertently discovered the Americas .
European conquest , large-scale  खोजी और colonization जल्द  followed .
Seeing that Europe  थी preoccupied साथ अनेक आतंरिक युद्धों और थी धीरे recovering इससे the अनेक मौतों कि the bubonic  plague caused , the rapid expansion at which it grew in wealth and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s .
The first expeditions  occurred साथ the caribbean coasts on the आइलैंड्स of हिस्पानिओला  , Puerto Rico and Cuba , and after 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America .
In 1497 , sailing from the north on  निमित्त of इंग्लैण्ड , जॉन cabot  landed on the North American coast , and a year later , Columbus 's third voyage reached the South American coast .
फ़्रांस संस्थापित colonies in much of पूर्वी उत्तर अमेरिका  , on a number of Caribbean islands , and in South America .
पुर्तगाल colonized ब्राज़ील  .
Eventually , the entire Western Hemisphere  आए अंतर्गत the कंट्रोल of यूरोपीय सरकारें , अग्रणी to profound परिवर्तन to  its landscape , population , and plant and animal life .
In the 19th century alone  over 50 लाख लोगों बाएँ यूरोपीय लिये  the Americas .
The post-1492 era  is ज्ञात as the काल of  the Columbian Exchange .
Keith Richards ( born 18 December 1943  ) is an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार , singer-songwriter और संस्थापक सदस्य  of the English rock band the Rolling Stones .
Rolling Stone magazine said Richards had  निर्मित `` चट्टान 's महानतम सिंगल देह of riffs '' , रैंकिंग  him 4th on its list of 100 best guitarists .
Fourteen songs Richards  लिखा साथ the रोलिंग पत्थरों ' सीसे vocalist मिक  Jagger are listed among Rolling Stone magazine 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time `` .
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part from several drug busts during the late 1960s and 1970s and his candour regarding his  व्यसन to और eventual abstinence इससे हेरोइन  .
Testosterone is a steroid hormone from  the androgen समूह और is मिला in स्तनधारियों , सरीसृपों , पक्षियों , और  other vertebrates .
In mammals , testosterone is primarily secreted in the  अंडकोष of males और the अंडाशय of महिलाओं , हालांकि छोटी  amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands .
It is the  प्रिंसिपल पुरूष sex हार्मोन  and an anabolic steroid .
In men , testosterone plays a key role in the development of male reproductive tissues such as the  testis और प्रोस्टेट as खूब as promoting द्वितीयक यौन विशेषताएँ ऐसे as increased मांसपेशी , अस्थि द्रव्यमान , और the विकास  of body hair .
in जोड , टेस्टोस्टेरोन is अनिवार्य लिये स्वास्थ्य और  well-being as well as the prevention of osteoporosis .
On average , in adult human males , the plasma concentration of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great as the concentration in adult human  महिलाओं ' प्लाज्मा , लकिन as the metabolic खपत of टेस्टोस्टेरोन in males is वृहद , the  daily production is about 20 times greater in men .
Females also are more  संवेदनशील to the हार्मोन  .
Testosterone is  observed in सबसे vertebrates .
Fish make a slightly  अलग रूप पुकारा 11-ketotestosterone  .
Its  बंटवारा in कीट  is ecdysone .
These ubiquitous steroids suggest that  sex हार्मोन have an प्राचीन विकासवादी  history .
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when  `` प्राकृतिक '' लकिन अपेक्षाकृत समरूप groupings हैं evident in a  statistical population .
It is often used in  विपणन शोध  .
In this technique , the total  जनसांख्यिकी is विभाजित into ये समूह ( or क्लस्टर  ) and a simple random sample of the groups is selected .
Then  the जरूरी सूचना is एकत्रित इससे a सरल यादृच्छिक नमूना  of the elements within each selected group .
This may be done for every element in these  समूह or a subsample of तत्व may be चयनित भीतर प्रत्येक  of these groups .
A common motivation for cluster sampling is to  reduce the कुल क्रमांक of साक्षात्कार और लागत दिए the  desired accuracy .
Assuming a fixed sample size , the technique  देता अधिक सटीक परिणाम जब सबसे of the विभिन्नता in the जनसांख्यिकी  is within the groups , not between them .
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County , North Carolina ,  संयुक्त राज्य , और is a उपनगरीय of the  nearby cities of Greensboro and High Point .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 3,382 at the  2010 census .
Natalie Portman ( born Natalie Hershlag ; ;  जून 9 , 1981 ) is an अभिनेत्री और मॉडल साथ डुअल अमरीकी और israeli  citizenship .
Her first role was as an  अनाथ लिया in by a हिटमैन in the 1994 कार्रवाई फिल्मी , लकिन  mainstream success came when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the Star Wars prequel trilogy ( released in 1999 , 2002 and 2005 ) .
In 1999 ,  वो नामांकित at हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों to पढ़ाई मनोविज्ञान  while still working as an actress .
She completed her  स्नातक 's उपाधि in 2003  .
In 2001 , Portman opened in New York City 's Public  थिएटर उत्पादन of एंटोन चेखव 's the सीगल  .
In  2005 , पोर्टमैन प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting  Actress and won the Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress - Motion Picture for the drama Closer .
She won a Constellation Award for  बेहतरीन मादा प्रदर्शन  and a Saturn Award for Best Actress for her starring role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ) .
She  निभाई अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in the ऐतिहासिक dramas गोया 's भूत ( 2006  ) and The Other Boleyn Girl ( 2008 ) .
In May 2008 , she served as the youngest  सदस्य of the 61st सालाना कैन फिल्मी पर्व  jury .
Portman 's directorial debut , Eve ,  खोली the 65th वेनिस अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व 's शॉर्ट्स  competition in 2008 .
Portman  निर्देशित a खण्ड of the सामूहिक  film New York , I Love You .
In 2011 , Portman won the Academy Award , the Golden Globe Award , the BAFTA Award , the  स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार , और the स्वतंत्र स्पिरिट पुरस्कार लिये  her lead performance as Nina Sayers in Black Swan .
Copper is a  रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक cu ( इससे  ) and atomic number 29 .
It is a ductile metal  साथ बहुत ऊँची थर्मल और विद्युत  conductivity .
Pure copper is soft and  malleable ; a freshly उजागर सतह  has a reddish-orange color .
It is used as a conductor of heat and  विद्युत , a भवन सामग्री , और a constituent of विभिन्न मेटल alloys  .
The metal  और इसके alloys have महरूम प्रयुक्त  for thousands of years .
In the Roman era , copper was principally mined on Cyprus , hence the origin of the name  of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल of साइप्रस ) , बाद shortened to сuprum  .
Its compounds are  commonly encountered as तांबे ( ii ) लवण , जिससे प्रायः impart ब्लू or ग्रीन रंगों to खनिज  such as azurite and turquoise and have been widely used historically as pigments .
Architectural structures built with copper corrode  to दे ग्रीन verdigris ( or patina  ) .
Decorative art  prominently सुविधाएँ तांबे , दोनो by itself  and as part of pigments .
Copper  is अनिवार्य to सब जीना जीवों as  a trace dietary mineral because it is a key constituent of the respiratory enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase .
In molluscs and crustacea  तांबे is a constituent of the रक्त रंजक hemocyanin , जिससे  is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish and other vertebrates .
The main areas where copper  is मिला in vertebrates हैं जिगर , मांसपेशी और  bone .
In sufficient concentration , copper compounds are poisonous to higher  जीवों और हैं प्रयुक्त as bacteriostatic substances , fungicides , और  wood preservatives .
The major professional sports  लीग , or बस प्रमुख लीग , in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा हैं the  highest professional competitions of team sports in the two countries .
Although individual sports such as golf , tennis , and auto  रेसिंग हैं भी बहुत लोकप्रिय , the पद is प्रायः  limited to team sports .
The term `` major league  '' थी पहला प्रयुक्त in 1921 in सन्दर्भ to प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ) , the शीर्ष स्तर of  professional American baseball .
Today , the  प्रमुख उत्तरी उत्तर अमेरिका पेशेवर टोली खेल लीग हैं प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ) , the नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ) , the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) , and the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Other notable leagues include Major League Soccer ( MLS ) , the Canadian Football League ( CFL ) , the Arena Football  लीग , प्रमुख लीग lacrosse , the नेशनल lacrosse लीग और the महिलाओं 's नेशनल बास्केट संघ  .
The NFL , MLB , NBA , and NHL are  commonly referred to as the  Big Four .
Each of these is the richest  पेशेवर क्लबों प्रतियोगिता in इसके खेल विश्वव्यापी  .
The best players can become cultural icons in both  देशों और elsewhere in the संसार , क्युकी the लीग आनंद a significant प्लेस in लोकप्रिय  culture in the US and Canada .
The NFL has 32 teams  , और the अन्य have  30 each .
the विशाल बहुमत of प्रमुख लीग टीमों हैं concentrated in the सबसे  populous metropolitan areas of the United States .
Baseball , football , hockey , and soccer have had  पेशेवर लीग लिये over 100 सालो ; जल्दी लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल संघ , ओहियो लीग , और नेशनल हॉकी संघ formed  the basis of the modern MLB , NFL and NHL respectively .
Soccer was first  professionalized in 1894 , लकिन लीग suffered greatly इससे कमी of स्थिरता  and seldom lasted more than a decade .
Soccer 's greatest successes were  in the रूप of the अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ) , the  original North American Soccer League ( 1968-1984 ) , the National Professional Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and , currently , Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ) .
Basketball is a relatively new  विकास ; the एनबीए विकसित इससे the नेशनल बास्केट लीग और  its splinter group the Basketball Association of America , taking on its current form in 1949 .
Every  प्रमुख लीग averages 15,000 प्रशंसक in उपस्थिति  per game or higher as of 2011 .
Meridian Altitude is an astronomical navigation method of calculating  an निरीक्षक 's अक्षांश  .
Earned value management ( EVM ) , or Earned value project/performance management ( EVPM ) is  a प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन तकनीक लिये measuring प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन और प्रगति in  an objective manner .
Because EVM  रै the  ability to combine measurements of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
and  cost,
in a single integrated system , Earned Value Management is able to  provide सटीक forecasts of प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन समस्याएं , जिससे is an महत्वपूर्ण  contribution for project management .
Early EVM research showed that the areas of planning and control are significantly impacted by its use ; and  similarly , using the methodology improves दोनो पैमाना परिभाषा as खूब as the विश्लेषण of overall प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन  .
More recent  शोध अध्ययन have दिखाया कि the सिद्धान्त of evm हैं धनात्मक predictors  of project success .
लोकप्रियता of evm रै grown significantly in हाल सालो परे सरकारी contracting , in जिससे सेक्टर इसके महत्व continues to वृद्धि  ( e.g. , recent new DFAR rules ) , in part because EVM can also surface in and help substantiate contract disputes .
रंगीन वसन्त  garden flowers
Spring is  एक of the चार conventional शीतोष्ण  seasons , following winter and preceding summer .
There are various  तकनीकी परिभाषाएं of वसन्त , लकिन लोकल उपयोग of the पद  varies according to local climate , cultures and customs .
When it  is वसन्त in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध , it  will be autumn in the southern hemisphere .
At the  वसन्त विषुव , दिनों हैं बंद to 12 घंटों long साथ दिन लंबाई increasing  as the season progresses .
वसन्त और `` springtime '' refer to the ऋतु , और भी to विचार of  rebirth , rejuvenation , renewal , resurrection , and regrowth , with festivals such as Carnival , Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time .
jamestown थी a उपनिवेश in the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया , the  first permanent English settlement in the Americas .
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort '' on May 14 , 1607 ( O.S .  , may 24 , 1607 n.s . ) , it followed अनेक  earlier failed attempts , including the Lost Colony of Roanoke .
Jamestown served as  the पूंजी of the उपनिवेश लिये  83 years , from 1616 until 1699 .
The settlement was located within the territory of a  राजनैतिक एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah , the राज्य of the powhatan confederacy , साथ around 14,000 देशी निवासियों , और  specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe .
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing , feasting and  तम्बाकू ceremonies , और वे provided निर्णायक प्रावधानों और support लिये the अस्तित्व of the colonists ,  who were not agriculturally inclined , although relations with the newcomers also soured fairly early on , leading to the total annihilation of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 years .
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding , the Virginia Company  brought पॉलिश और डच colonists to सहायता improve the  settlement .
In 1619 , the first  प्रलेखित africans यहूद brought to jamestown , हालांकि the आधुनिक धारणा of गुलामी in the  future United States did not begin in Virginia until 1660 .
When the colony was subdivided into the  असली आठ shires of वर्जिनिया  in 1634 , the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire .
The London Company 's second settlement , Bermuda , claims to be the site  of the oldest कस्बा in the अंग्रेज़ी नई संसार , as st. जार्ज 's , बरमूडा थी officially स्थापित ( as नई लंदन ) in 1612 , whereas जेम्स फोर्ट , in  Virginia , was not to be converted into James towne until 1619 , and further did not survive into the present day .
In 1699 , the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is today  williamsburg , बाद जिससे jamestown ceased to मौजूद as a उपनिवेश , मौजूदा आज तभी as an पुरातत्व साईट  .
Today ,  jamestown is एक of तीन स्थितियाँ comprising the ऐतिहासिक त्रिभुज  of Colonial Virginia , along with Williamsburg and Yorktown , with two primary heritage sites .
Historic Jamestowne , the  पुरातत्व साईट on jamestown द्वीप , is a सहकारी प्रयत्न by jamestown नेशनल ऐतिहासिक साईट ( भाग of औपनिवेशिक  National Historical Park ) , and Preservation Virginia .
The Jamestown Settlement , a living history interpretive site ,  is संचालित by the jamestown yorktown न्यास in संयोजन साथ  the Commonwealth of Virginia .
James Christopher Frey ( born  सितंबर 12 , 1969 ) is an अमरीकी लेखक .
His books A  लाख छोटी टुकड़े ( 2003 ) और my dost लियोनार्ड ( 2005 ) , as खूब  as Bright Shiny Morning ( 2008 ) , were bestsellers .
He was the subject of a scandal when  जांचकर्ताओं खोजा कि थाना समय और the extent of निश्चित चोटों यहूद अतिरंजित in  A Million Little Pieces , a purportedly autobiographical account of the author 's struggle with addiction .
Deere & Company , most commonly known by  इसके नाम जॉन deere , is an अमरीकी निगम आधारित in moline , इलिनोइस , और एक of the largest निर्माताओं  of agricultural machinery in the world .
In 2012 , it was listed as 97th in the Fortune 500  अमेरिका 's रैंकिंग और 190th in the सौभाग्य  500 Global ranking .
Deere and Company agricultural products , sold  अंतर्गत the जॉन deere नाम , शामिल tractors , combine हार्वेस्टर  , cotton harvesters , balers , planters / seeders , sprayers , and UTVs .
The company is also a manufacturer of construction equipment  और वानिकी उपकरण , as खूब as a प्रदायक of डीज़ल इंजन और drivetrains ( axles , ट्रांसमिशन , gearboxes  ) used in heavy equipment .
additionally , जॉन deere manufactures उपकरण प्रयुक्त in लॉन , grounds  , and turf care , such as walk-behind lawn mowers , zero-turn lawn mowers , lawn tractors , and snowthrowers .
to support the कोर व्यवसायों , जॉन deere भी provides  financial services and other related activities .
The company 's slogan is `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' and has a picture of a  leaping हिरण as a लोगो , a शब्द खेल pun on `` nothing रनों जैसे a हिरण ''  .
कार्ल westby coined the phrase `` nothing  Runs Like a Deere '' for a marketing campaign to sell snowmobiles .
The company 's products are also identifiable  by इसके distinctive शेड of ग्रीन पेंट , प्रायः augmented  by yellow trim .
The  संयुक्त राज्य ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination  of United States currency .
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ) , Alexander  हैमिल्टन , is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक , जबकि the u.S. राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित  on the reverse .
( Hamilton is one of two  non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल  issued U.S. bills .
the अन्य is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन  , on the $ 100 bill .
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to  the उपस्थित ) जो थी नहीं born in the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त राज्य , as  he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade ,  स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस , इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी प्रमाणपत्र  ) .
In addition , Kamehameha I ,  appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य क्वार्टर  . )
All $  10 बिल्स जारी आज  are Federal Reserve Notes .
The Bureau of Engraving  और मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण  is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear .
लगभग 6 % of सब  US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills are delivered by  संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in पीला  straps .
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of  हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट संग्रहण of नई यॉर्क  City Hall .
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000  विधेयक प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of वुडरो विल्सन facing to the बाएँ , लकिन थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये intra-government ट्रांजेक्शन  ) .
Andy Samuel Griffith ( June 1 , 1926 – July 3 ,  2012 ) थी an अमरीकी कर्ता , टेलीविज़न निर्माता , ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning southern-gospel  singer , and writer .
He was a Tony Award nominee for two roles , and gained prominence in the starring role in director Elia Kazan 's film A Face in the Crowd ( 1957 ) before he became  बेहतर ज्ञात लिये उसके टेलीविज़न भूमिकाएँ , playing the सीसे वर्ण in the 1960–1968 हालात कॉमेडी the एंडी ग्रिफ़िथ दिखाएँ और in  the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock .
Theresa Penelope `` Terri ''  इरविन , ( née raines ; born जुलाई 20 , 1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -आधारd , अमरीकी -born naturalist , लेखक , the विधवा of ऑस्ट्रेलियाई naturalist  Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah , Queensland , Australia .
She co-starred  साथ उसके husband on the मगरमच्छ शिकारी , उनके unconventional टेलीविज़न प्रकृति वृत्तचित्र श्रेणी  along with its spin-off series , Croc Files and The Crocodile Hunter Diaries .
She  रै जिया in ऑस्ट्रेलिया चूंकि 1992 , जब वो  married Steve Irwin .
Andreas Cellarius 's illustration of the  copernican प्रणाली , इससे the harmonia  Macrocosmica ( 1660 ) .
Heliocentrism , or heliocentricism , is the  खगोलीय मॉडल in जिससे the धरती और ग्रह revolve around a अपेक्षाकृत stationary सूर्य at  the center of the Solar System .
The  शब्द आता इससे the यूनानी ( helios  `` sun '' and kentron `` center '' ) .
Historically , heliocentrism was opposed to  geocentrism , जिससे लगाई the धरती at  the center .
The notion that the Earth revolves around the Sun had been proposed as early  as the 3rd सदी bc by aristarchus of samos , लकिन aristarchus 's heliocentrism आकर्षित  little attention until Copernicus revived and elaborated it .
Lucio Russo , however , argues that this is a misleading  छाप resulting इससे the घाटा of वैज्ञानिक works of  the Hellenistic Era .
Using indirect evidence he  argues कि a heliocentric दृश्य थी expounded in हिप्पारकस  's work on gravity .
It was not until the 16th century that a fully predictive mathematical model of a heliocentric system was presented , by the  पुनर्जागरण गणितज्ञ , astronomer , और कैथोलिक मौलवी nicolaus कोपरनिकस of कैंडल , अग्रणी to the copernican क्रान्ति  .
In the following century , Johannes Kepler elaborated upon and expanded this model to include elliptical  orbits , और supporting observations बना using a दूरदर्शी यहूद प्रस्तुत by गैलीलियो गैलिली  .
With the observations of William Herschel , Friedrich  bessel , और अन्य , खगोलशास्त्रियों एहसास कि the सूर्य थी नहीं the बीच of the ब्रह्मांड और by the 1920s एडविन हबल था दिखाया कि it थी भाग of a आकाशगंगा ( the  Milky Way ) that was only one of many billions .
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah Jones Shankar ; March 30 , 1979 ) is an American  singer-songwriter , pianist , और  actress .
She is the  बेटी of भारतीय सितार खिलाड़ी रवि शंकर  and Sue Jones .
She is also Anoushka Shankar 's  half-sister  .
In 2002 , she  शुभारम्भ उसके सोलो म्यूज़िक करियर साथ the रिलीज of the commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed एल्बम आइये दूर साथ me  , a fusion of country music and pop with elements of jazz which was certified diamond album , selling over 26 million copies .
The record  अर्जित जोन्स पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , सहित  the Album of the Year , Record of the Year , and Best New Artist .
Her subsequent studio albums , Feels Like Home , released in 2004 , Not Too Late , released in  2007 , the वही साल वो बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in my ब्लूबेरी नाइट्स , और उसके 2009 रिलीज the पतन सब gained प्लेटिनम  status , selling over a million copies and were generally well received by critics .
Jones ' fifth studio album ,  छोटी टूटा दिल , थी released  on April 27 , 2012 .
Jones has won nine  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और थी 60th on बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका 's  artists of the 2000–2009 decade chart .
Throughout her  करियर , जोन्स रै जीती numerous पुरस्कार  and has sold more than 50 million albums worldwide .
Billboard named  उसके the शीर्ष जैज़ कलाकार of the 2000–2009  decade .
Not to be  उलझन साथ आयाम of a शारीरिक मात्रा  .
लिये अन्य उपयोग , देखिए  Dimension ( disambiguation ) .
From left to  सही , the वर्गाकार ,  the cube , and the tesseract .
the वर्गाकार is bounded by 1-dimensional लाइनों , the घन by 2-dimensional  areas , and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes .
A projection of the cube is  दिए चूंकि it is viewed on a two-dimensional  screen .
The same applies to the tesseract , which additionally can  तभी be दिखाया as a प्रक्षेप भी in three-dimensional स्पेस  .
A  आरेख प्रर्दशित the पहला  four spatial dimensions .
In physics and mathematics , the dimension of a space or object  is informally पारिभाषित as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्देशांक needed to बताएँ  any point within it .
Thus a line has a dimension of one because only one  निर्देशांक is needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it ( लिये उदाहरण ,  the point at 5 on a number line ) .
A surface such as a plane or the surface of a cylinder or sphere has a dimension of two because two coordinates are  needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it ( लिये उदाहरण , to locate a पाइंट on the सतह of  a sphere you need both its latitude and its longitude ) .
The  अंदर of a घन , a बेलन or a गोला is three-dimensional  because three coordinates are needed to locate a point within these spaces .
In physical terms , dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume )  और इसके स्थिति in समय ( आभास as a अदिश आयाम साथ the t-axis ) , as खूब as the स्थानिक संविधान of वस्तुएँ within—structures कि correlate साथ  both particle and field conceptions , interact according to relative properties of mass —and are fundamentally mathematical in description .
These , or other axes , may be referenced to uniquely  पहचानो a पाइंट or ढांचा  in its attitude and relationship to other objects and occurrences .
Physical theories that incorporate time , such as  सामान्य आपेक्षिकता , हैं कहा to कार्य in 4-dimensional `` spacetime `` , ( पारिभाषित  as a Minkowski space ) .
आधुनिक theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional  '' including quantum field and string theories .
The state-space of  क्वांटम यांत्रिकी is an infinite-dimensional  function space .
The concept of dimension is  नहीं प्रतिबंधित to शारीरिक वस्तुएँ  .
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics  और the sciences लिये अनेक कारण , अक्सर as विन्यास स्पेसेस ऐसे as in लाग्रांजीय or हेमिल्टोनीय  mechanics ; these are abstract spaces , independent of the physical space we live in .
Fontana ( ) is a city of 200,762  निवासियों in सैन bernardino काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Founded in 1913 , it  remained essentially ग्रामीण जबतक संसार युद्ध ii , जब  entrepreneur Henry J. Kaiser built a large steel mill in the area .
It is now a regional hub of the trucking industry  , साथ अंतरराज्यीय 10 और राज्य रूट 210 transecting the नगर इससे ईस्ट to वेस्ट , और अंतरराज्यीय 15 गुजर  diagonally through its northwestern quadrant .
It is home to the largest of the San Bernardino County system  पुस्तकालयों , a संवर ऐतिहासिक थिएटर , a नगरपालिका पार्क , और the स्वचालित क्लबों स्पीडवे  on the site of the Kaiser Steel Mill .
Fontana also hosts the Fontana  दिनों हाफ मैराथन और 5k चलाएं  .
This race is  the तीव्रतम half-marathon कोर्स  in the world .
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that  fontana 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 200,762 in 2012 , बनाना it the दूसरी सबसे populous नगर in  San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state .
cowboys स्टेडियम is a स्टेडियम  with a retractable roof in Arlington , Texas .
It serves as the home of the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's डलास  Cowboys .
It replaced the  partially covered टेक्सास स्टेडियम , जिससे खोली in 1971  , and served as the Cowboys ' home through the 2008 season .
It was  समाप्त on  May 27 , 2009 .
the स्टेडियम सीटे 85,000 , बनाना it the तीसरा largest  stadium in the NFL by seating capacity .
The maximum capacity of the  स्टेडियम , सहित खड़ा रूम  , is 105,000 .
the पार्टी pass ( खोलें क्षेत्रों ) भाग हैं पीछे  seats in each end zone and on a series of six elevated platforms connected by stairways .
It has the world 's largest column-free interior and the fourth largest high  परिभाषा वीडियो स्क्रीन , जिससे hangs इससे 20 यार्ड लकीर to 20 यार्ड  line .
The facility can also be used for a variety of other activities outside of its main purpose ( professional football ) such as concerts ,  बास्केट खेल , मुक्केबाज़ी मिलान , कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और ऊँची स्कूल फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिताओं , सॉकर  matches , and motocross races .
कनाडाई इतिहासकारों जबतक the 1980s tended to  focus on economic history , including labour history .
In part this is because Canada has had far fewer political or  सैन्य विरोध than अन्य समाजों  .
This was especially true in the first half of the twentieth  सदी जब आर्थिक इतिहास थी overwhelmingly  dominant .
Many of the most prominent English Canadian  इतिहासकारों इससे इस काल यहूद आर्थिक इतिहासकारों , ऐसे as हेरोल्ड innis , डोनाल्ड creighton  and Arthur R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history were heirs to the  परंपराओं कि विकसित in यूरोपीय और the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन frameworks कि worked  well elsewhere often failed in Canada .
The  heavily मार्क्सवादी बहकावे आर्थिक इतिहास कि dominates  Europe has little relevance to most of Canadian history .
A  फ़ोकस on क्लास , शहरी क्षेत्रों , और उद्योग  fails to address Canada 's rural and resource based economy .
Similarly , the monetarist school that is dominant in the  संयुक्त राज्य भी रै महरूम मुश्किल to ट्रांसफ़र  north of the border .
The study of economic history in Canada became highly focused on  आर्थिक भूगोल , और लिये अनेक सालो the प्रबल स्कूल of विचार  has been the staples thesis .
This school of thought  bases the पढ़ाई of the कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था on the  study of natural resources .
This approach has since  भी become प्रयुक्त बाहर of कनाडा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और in  many developing nations .
Before the  आगमन of europeans , the पहला राष्ट्र of कया होता become कनाडा था a  large and vibrant trade network .
Furs , tools  , सजावटी वस्तुएं , और अन्य goods यहूद प्रायः transported हज़ारों of  kilometres , mostly by canoe throughout the many rivers and lakes of the region .
The early European  इतिहास of the कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था is प्रायः पढ़ाई through the स्टेपल्स लेख जिससे argues the कनाडाई  economy developed through the exploitation of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe .
Carbon-14 , 14C , or radiocarbon , is a radioactive  समस्थानिक of कार्बन साथ a केंद्रक containing 6  protons and 8 neutrons .
Its presence in organic materials is the basis  of the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered by willard लिब्बी और सहयोगियों ( 1949 ) to  date archaeological , geological and hydrogeological samples .
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27  फ़रवरी 1940 , by मार्टिन कामेन और sam रूबेन at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया विकिरण प्रयोगशाला in बर्कली  , although its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934 .
There are three naturally  occurring isotopes of कार्बन on धरती : 99 % of the कार्बन is carbon-12 , 1 % is carbon-13 , और carbon-14 occurs in ट्रेस amounts  , i.e. , making up about 1 part per trillion ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere .
The half-life of  carbon-14 is 5,730±40  years .
Carbon-14 decays into  nitrogen-14 through  beta decay .
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on Earth is cosmic ray  कार्रवाई upon नाइट्रोजन in the माहौल , और it is इसलिए a cosmogenic  nuclide .
However , open-air  नाभिकीय परीक्षण between 1955–1980  contributed to this pool .
The different  isotopes of कार्बन do नहीं differ appreciably  in their chemical properties .
This is used in chemical and biological research , in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 atoms can be used to replace nonradioactive carbon , in order to trace  रासायनिक और biochemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ involving कार्बन अणु इससे कोई दिए सशुल्क यौगिक  .
बिजली is a अत्यधिक दृश्य  form of energy transfer
Lightning strikes are electrical discharges on a  विशाल स्केल between the माहौल और  an earth-bound object .
They mostly originate in thunderclouds and  terminate on the मैदान , पुकारा बादल to मैदान  ( CG ) lightning .
However , they  may भी be initiated इससे a बहुत लम्बा grounded ऑब्जेक्ट  and reach into the clouds .
Although `` a lightning strike '' is  commonly प्रयुक्त to describe सब बिजली , it is बल्कि ग़लत और a misnomer , as तभी परिचय 25 % of सब बिजली कार्यक्रम विश्वव्यापी हैं cg , the विशाल बल्क of बिजली कार्यक्रम हैं intracloud  ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( CC ) , where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere .
The scientific name for the complete process of a  सिंगल बिजली इवेंट is a और it is a बहुत जटिल , अनेक  stepped interaction , which is not completely understood .
Most CG flashes only  `` स्ट्राइक '' एक शारीरिक स्थान , referred to  as a termination .
The  प्राथमिक conducting चैनल , the उज्जवल coursing लाइट तुम may देखिए और कॉल a `` स्ट्राइक '' , is  only about 1 inch in diameter , although to our eyes it looks much larger .
They  हैं मील long  , upwards of tens of miles .
And the entire flash , lasts only a few  भिन्नों of a दूसरी , सबसे of जिससे is नहीं दृश्य to इंसान  eyes .
थंडर is सदा  produced by lightning .
Just like  बिजली , कि deceives हमारी आँखें , प्रायः looking larger or करीब than it  really is , the earth 's atmosphere and our brain 's perception of the outside world , ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not .
Lightning can not happen in a vacuum devoid of ions , nor can  थंडर occur बगैर अणुओं to  vibrate .
Thunder is a physical absolute  लिये प्रत्येक सिंगल फ्लैश of बिजली  .
Contrary to popular belief , a lightning  स्ट्राइक itself is प्रायः नहीं जिम्मेदार लिये अनेक मौतों or चोटों इससे a  single event .
It would be impossible given the natural tendencies of a flash , unless people or  पशु यहूद stacked on शीर्ष of प्रत्येक अन्य , or वे यहूद somehow arranged खड़ा और भाग of the फ्लैश चैनल  .
When lightning ignites an available fuel  सोर्स और an विस्फोट occurs , it is the शॉक वेव or  fire causing the injuries , not the strike itself .
मैदान currents , भी पुकारा कदम संभावित , of an धरती  termination is what truly causes most injuries or death to humans and animals .
The near  instantaneous फटाफट of सतह आरोप , induced by the ओवरहेड thundercloud  itself , race to the strike point from hundreds to thousands of feet away during discharge .
इस वर्तमान , caused दौरान प्रत्येक स्ट्रोक , takes the पाथ of तनिक प्रतिरोध , जिससे may be आयन समृद्ध  human or animal legs , over poorly conducting earth .
This is why it is  बेहतरीन to crouch , साथ फीट बंद साथ  , if ever caught in the open during a thunderstorm .
Unfortunately , most reports do not draw a  भेद between the रियल कारण of चोट or मौत ,  be it the strike itself , a resulting explosion or fire , or usually responsible step potential .
पीटर F. kilmartin  ( born 1962 ) is the current Attorney General of Rhode Island .
Kilmartin is also a  रिटायर्ड पुलिस कप्तान और a पूर्व सदस्य  of the Rhode Island House of Representatives .
A couple  following उनके विवाह in the manti यूटा  Temple .
Sealing is an ordinance ( ritual ) performed in Latter  दिन संतो मंदिरों by a व्यक्ति पकड़कर the sealing  authority .
The purpose of this  अध्यादेश is to मुहर परिचित संबंध , बनाना संभावित  the existence of family relationships throughout eternity .
LDS teachings  प्लेस ग्रेट महत्व on the विशिष्ट प्राधिकार  required to perform these sealings .
Church doctrine teaches that this authority ,  पुकारा the priesthood , corresponds to कि दिए to संत पीटर  in .
Sealings are  typically performed as विवाह or as sealing of children  to parents .
They were  performed prior to the मौत of जोसेफ स्मिथ , jr. ( the प्रमुख संस्थापक of the latter  Day Saint movement ) , and are currently performed in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints .
Although some other  denominations , ऐसे as the जातियाँ of मसीह , दृश्य sealing as an centuries of  Smith 's practice of plural marriage , some do still perform them .
the 2000s , सुनाया `` दो हज़ारों '' , थी a दशक कि  began on January 1 , 2000 , and ended on December 31 , 2009 .
वैश्वीकरण , जिससे था त्वरित बाद the  early 1990s fall of communism , continued to be a force in the 2000s .
The growth of the Internet was one of the prime  योगदानकर्ता to वैश्वीकरण दौरान the दशक , बनाना it संभावित लिये लोगों to interact साथ अन्य लोगों , एक्स्प्रेस विचार , introduce अन्य to अलग संस्कृतियों और पृष्ठभूमि  , use goods and services , sell and buy online , research and learn about things , along with experiencing the world without having to leave home .
The institutions , linkages and technologies that  उभरा or यहूद redefined पहले होता subsequently in इस दशक  benefit many countries , in particular China and India .
However , in other parts of the world such progress failed to  पता जारी struggles साथ आधुनिकता , सबसे notably characterized  by the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups .
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the United States , United Kingdom , Spain , Canada and other  राष्ट्र आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान , as खूब as implementing विभिन्न anti-terrorist उपायों at घर और  abroad in what was known as the War on Terror .
The European Union saw further integration  और विस्तार throughout much of यूरोपीय .
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable  पर्यावरणीय consequences , उठाया माँग लिये घटाते उर्जा संसाधन , और थी स्टिल दिखाया to be vulnerable  as demonstrated during the Global Financial Crisis of the late 2000s .
The Gunfight at the O.K . Corral was a gunfight that took place  at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on बुधवार , अक्तूबर 26 , 1881 , in tombstone , एरिज़ोना territory , और is generally  regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West .
The gunfight  , believed to have lasted तभी परिचय तीस सेकेंड , थी लड़ा between the गैरकानूनी cowboys  Billy Claiborne , Ike and Billy Clanton , and Tom and Frank McLaury , and the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp and his brothers Assistant Town Marshal Morgan and temporary lawman Wyatt , aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil .
Ike Clanton and Billy Claiborne ran from the fight unharmed , but Ike 's  bhai बिली clanton थी मारे , साथ साथ दोनो  McLaurys .
Lawmen Virgil and  मॉर्गन earp और दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे यहूद wounded  .
Only Wyatt Earp came through the  लड़ो unharmed  .
The fight has come to represent a time in American history when the frontier was  खोलें दायरा लिये outlaws opposed by विधि प्रवर्तन कि थी स्प्रेड  thin over vast territories , leaving some areas unprotected .
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published  कया रै चूंकि महरूम संकल्पित to be a largely fictionalized जीवनी , व्याट earp : frontier मार्शल , दो सालो बाद earp 's मौत  .
Lake  retold उसके स्टोरी in a 1946 किताब कि निदेशक  John Ford developed into the movie My Darling Clementine .
After the movie Gunfight at the O.K .  corral थी released in 1957 , the गोलीबारी आए  to be known by that name .
Since then , the conflict has been portrayed  साथ varying डिग्री of सटीकता in numerous पश्चिमी films और किताबे  .
Despite its name , the gunfight actually occurred in a  सीमित लॉट छह द्वार वेस्ट of the पश्च प्रवेश to the o.k . corral  on Fremont Street , and also in the street .
the दो opposing पार्टियों  were initially only about apart .
परिचय तीस गोलियाँ यहूद fired  in thirty seconds .
Ike Clanton filed murder  आरोप विरूद्ध the earps और दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे लकिन वे यहूद आखिरकार exonerated by a लोकल न्यायधीश  after a 30-day preliminary hearing and then again by a local grand jury .
On December 28 , 1881 , Virgil Earp was maimed in an assassination attempt by  the गैरकानूनी cowboys , और on कूच 18 , 1882 , वे assassinated मॉर्गन earp  .
The suspects furnished solid alibis , and newly appointed Deputy U.S . Marshal Wyatt Earp took matters into his own hands during the  earp वेंडेट्टा सवारी , ironically धड़ा by काउंटी शेरिफ जॉनी behan साथ वारंट लिये  the Earp 's arrest .
HDMI ( High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface for transferring uncompressed  वीडियो आंकड़ा और compressed/uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो आंकड़ा इससे a hdmi-compliant यंत्र ( `` the सोर्स यंत्र '' ) to a संगत कंप्यूटर मॉनिटर  , video projector , digital television , or digital audio device .
HDMI  is a डिजिटल बदलना लिये मौजूदा एनालॉग  video standards .
There are a number of HDMI-standard cable connectors available , each of which can be used for any uncompressed TV or PC video format , including  मानक , उन्नत , ऊँची परिभाषा , और 3d वीडियो सिग्नल ; up to 8 चैनल्स of संपीडित or uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो ; a cec ( उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कंट्रोल ) कनेक्शन ; और an ईथरनेट आंकड़ा कनेक्शन  .
hdmi implements the eia/cea-861 मानकों , जिससे define वीडियो स्वरुप और waveforms  , transport of compressed , uncompressed , and LPCM audio , auxiliary data , and implementations of the VESA EDID .
The CEC allows HDMI devices to  कंट्रोल प्रत्येक अन्य जब जरुरी और allows  the user to operate multiple devices with one remote control handset .
Because  hdmi is electrically संगत साथ the cea-861 सिग्नल प्रयुक्त by डिजिटल विज़ुअल इंटरफ़ेस ( dvi ) , no सिग्नल  conversion is necessary , nor is there a loss of video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used .
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection , HDMI is  स्वतंत्र of the विभिन्न डिजिटल टेलीविज़न मानकों प्रयुक्त by व्यक्तिगत डिवाइस , ऐसे as atsc और dvb , as ये हैं encapsulations  of compressed MPEG video streams ( which can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ) .
Production of  उपभोक्ता hdmi उत्पाद प्रारंभ in लेट  2003 .
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is included in the HD ready in-store labeling  specification लिये tv सेट लिये hdtv , प्रतिपादित by eicta साथ ses अस्त्र in  2005 .
hdmi began to appear on उपभोक्ता hdtv camcorders  and digital still cameras in 2006 .
As of  जनवरी 8 , 2013 , जिससे is टेन सालो बाद the रिलीज of the पहला hdmi specification  , over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch of the HDMI standard .
ब्री वैन de kamp ( née मेसन ; भी ज्ञात in the श्रेणी as ब्री होज और ब्री वेस्टन ) is a fictional  character and one of the four protagonists on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives .
She is played by actress Marcia Cross ,  जो रै प्राप्त अनेक पुरस्कार और nominations लिये उसके portrayal , सहित an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन ,  three Golden Globe Award nominations , and two Screen Actors Guild Awards .
Cross  's portrayal of ब्री  has been widely praised by critics and fans .
Cross originally auditioned for the role of Mary  ऐलिस यंग , लकिन श्रेणी निर्माता मार्क चेरी विचार वो थी  better suited for the role of Bree .
Dana Delany , who eventually was cast as Katherine Mayfair , was originally chosen  लिये the भूमिका लकिन turned it bas , saying it थी too समान to उसके भूमिका in pasadena  .
Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been her attempts to maintain a perfect life  despite विभिन्न बाधाएं ऐसे as widowhood , तलाक , और alcoholism hindering  her .
She has been married three times ; to Rex Van de Kamp ( Steven Culp ) , Orson  होज ( काइल maclachlan ) और ट्रिप  Weston ( Scott Bakula ) .

See also Algoma (  बहुविकल्पी  ) .
Algoma  is a नगर in kewaunee काउंटी  in the U.S. state of Wisconsin .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 3,167 at the 2010  census .
Algoma is part of the  ग्रीन खाड़ी महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The Hangover Part II is a  2011 अमरीकी कॉमेडी फिल्मी उत्पादित by legendary तस्वीरें  and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures .
It is the sequel  to 2009 's the hangover और  the second film in The Hangover franchise .
Todd Phillips directed the film in addition to  co-authoring the स्क्रिप्ट साथ क्रेग mazin , और scot आर्मस्ट्रांग .
The  फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर  , Ed Helms , Zach Galifianakis , Ken Jeong , Jeffrey Tambor , Justin Bartha and Paul Giamatti .
The Hangover Part II tells the story of Phil , Stu , Alan , and  डग as वे सफर to थाईलैंड लिये stu 's  wedding .
After the  स्नातक पार्टी in लास वेगास , stu takes no संभावना और opts  for a safe , subdued pre-wedding brunch .
however , बाते do नहीं go as नियोजित , resulting in another  bad hangover with no memories of the previous night .
विकास of the hangover भाग ii began in अप्रैल  2009 , two months before The Hangover was released .
The  प्रिंसिपल अभिनेताओं यहूद डाल in कूच 2010  to reprise their roles from the first film .
Production began in October 2010 , in  ओंटारियो , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , पहले चलती  on location in Thailand .
The film was released on May  26 , 2011 और , despite receiving ज़्यादातर ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , it became the  highest-grossing R-rated comedy during its theatrical run .
A third  फिल्मी is नियत लिये on  May 24 , 2013 .

The English Renaissance was a cultural and  कलाकारी गति in इंग्लैण्ड डेटिंग इससे the लेट 15th और जल्दी 16th सदियां to the जल्दी  17th century .
It is  संबद्ध साथ the pan-european पुनर्जागरण कि is प्रायः  regarded as beginning in Italy in the late 14th century .
Like  सबसे of उत्तरी यूरोपीय , इंग्लैण्ड देखी  little of these developments until more than a century later .
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken  , as a convenience , to be 1485 , जब the बैटल of bosworth फ़ील्ड ended the युद्धों of  the Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty .
Renaissance style and ideas , however , were slow in penetrating England , and the  elizabethan era in the दूसरी हाफ of the 16th सदी is प्रायः regarded as the  height of the English Renaissance .
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer  वारेन `` बेट्टी '' घाट ( अप्रैल 8 , 1918 – जुलाई 8 , 2011 ) , थी पहला महिला of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1974 to 1977 दौरान  the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford .
As First Lady , she was active in social policy  और निर्मित precedents as a नीतियां क्रियाशील  presidential wife .
Throughout her husband 's term in office , she maintained high  स्वीकृति दरजा despite विपक्ष इससे कुछ रूढ़िवादी republicans जो objected to उसके अधिक मॉडरेट और उदार स्थितियाँ  on social issues .
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer awareness  following उसके 1974 mastectomy और थी a passionate समर्थक of , और activist लिये  , the Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ) .
Pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the Women 's Movement  , वो gained कीर्ति as एक of the सबसे निष्कपट पहला महिलाओं in इतिहास , commenting on प्रत्येक hot-button समस्या  of the time , including feminism , equal pay , the ERA , sex , drugs , abortion , and gun control .
She also raised awareness of addiction when she  घोषित उसके long-running बैटल साथ alcoholism in the  1970s .
Following  उसके श्वेत हाउस सालो , वो जारी  to lobby for the ERA and remained active in the feminist movement .
She was the founder , and served as the first chair of the board  of निर्देशकों , of the बेट्टी घाट बीच लिये पदार्थ गाली और व्यसन और  is a recipient of the Congressional Gold Medal ( co-presentation with her husband , Gerald R. Ford , October 21 , 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone , presented 1991 , by George H. W. Bush ) .
Platelet endothelial cell adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 ) also known as cluster of differentiation 31 ( CD31 ) is a  प्रोटीन कि in इंसान is एनकोडेड by the pecam1 जीन मिला on chromosome  17 .
PECAM-1 plays a key role in removing  aged neutrophils इससे the  body .

The Miss Florida USA competition is the  pageant कि selects the प्रतिनिधि लिये the राज्य फ्लोरिडा  in the Miss USA pageant .
While Florida has been successful in terms of runners-up , finalists and  semi-finalists , the राज्य रै never जीती the मिस यूएसए pageant , हालांकि चेरिल patton  became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe .
Florida  's बेहतरीन परिणाम यहूद दौरान  the mid-1960s to mid-1970s .
Their most recent finalist was  lissette गार्सिया जो लगाई in the  top 16 in 2011 .
Two former Miss Florida Teen USA titleholders have won this  प्रतियोगिता , और तीन titleholders have भी competed  at Miss America .
The current titleholder is  मिशेल aguirre of hialeah  .
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of the history of the part of Britain that became known as England , lasting from the end of Roman occupation and  स्थापना of anglo-saxon kingdoms in the 5th सदी जबतक the नॉर्मन conquest of इंग्लैण्ड in 1066 by  William the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring to the Germanic peoples who came to  ब्रिटेन दौरान the 5th और 6th सदियां , सहित कोण , saxons  , Frisii , and Jutes .
The term also refers to the language spoken at the time in  इंग्लैण्ड , जिससे is अभी पुकारा बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी , और to the संस्कृति of the era ,  which has long attracted popular and scholarly attention .
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the  heptarchy , the kingdoms of नॉर्थम्ब्रिया , mercia , ईस्ट anglia , एसेक्स , केंट  , Sussex , and Wessex .
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon  paganism दौरान the जल्दी काल , लकिन परिवर्तित to christianity  during the 7th century .
Paganism had  a फाइनल stronghold in a काल of mercian आधिपत्य दौरान the 640s , समाप्ति साथ  the death of Penda of Mercia in 655 .
Facing the threat of Viking invasions , the House of Wessex  became प्रबल दौरान the 9th सदी , अंतर्गत the नियम of अल्फ्रेड  the Great .
During the 10th century , the individual kingdoms unified under the  नियम of wessex into the किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड , जिससे stood opposed to the danelaw , the viking kingdoms स्थापित इससे the 9th सदी in the  north and east of England .
The Kingdom of England fell  in the viking आक्रमण इससे डेनमार्क in 1013 और थी शासित by the हाउस of डेनमार्क जबतक 1042  , when the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored .
The last  anglo-saxon किंग , हेरोल्ड godwinson , थी मारे in 1066 at the  Battle of Hastings .
