Smoked  सामन is a तैयारी  of salmon , typically a fillet that has been cured and hot or cold smoked .
Due to its moderately high  दाम , स्मोक्ड सामन is माना  a delicacy .
Although  the पद lox is sometimes  applied to smoked salmon , they are different products .
View of  defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति और  placement .
Defibrillation is a common treatment  लिये life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias , ventricular  fibrillation , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical  उर्जा to the प्रभावित दिल साथ a यंत्र पुकारा a defibrillator  .
इस depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the दिल मांसपेशी , terminates the dysrhythmia , और allows सामान्य  sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
defibrillators can be बाह्य , transvenous , or implanted  , depending on the type of device used or needed .
Some external units , known as automated external  defibrillators ( aeds ) , automate the निदान of treatable लय , अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ  to use them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
gabrielle `` कोको '' bonheur चैनल ( अगस्त 19 , 1883 – जनवरी  10 , 1971 ) was a French fashion designer and founder of the Chanel brand .
She was  the तभी फ़ैशन पंक्तियां to appear on समय पत्रिका 's सूची of the 100 सबसे influential  people of the 20th century .
Along with Paul Poiret , Chanel was credited with liberating women from the constraints  of the `` corseted silhouette '' और popularizing the स्वीकृति of  a sportive , casual chic as the feminine standard in the post- World War I era .
A prolific  फ़ैशन निर्माता , चैनल 's  influence extended beyond couture clothing .
Her design  aesthetic थी एहसास in आभूषण , हैंडबैग  , and fragrance .
Her signature scent ,  चैनल no . 5 , रै become an  iconic product .
Chanel was known for her lifelong  determination , महत्वाकांक्षा और उर्जा जिससे वो लागू  to her professional and social life .
She achieved both success as a businesswoman and social  prominence धन्यवाद to the कनेक्शन्स वो बना through  her work .
These included many artists and  craftspeople to जिसको वो became a  patron .
However , Chanel 's highly competitive , opportunistic personality led her to make questionable life choices which  have उत्पन्न विवाद around उसके प्रतिष्ठा , विशेषकर उसके आचरण दौरान the  German occupation of France in World War II .
Allied Mills flour mill  on the बैंको of  the Manchester Ship Canal
A gristmill (  भी : grist मिल , मकई मिल or आटा  mill ) grinds grain into flour .
The term can refer to both  the पीस यांत्रिकी और the  building that holds it .
Romania ( ; dated spellings  roumania और rumania ; ) is a देश स्तिथ  at the intersection of Central and Southeastern Europe , bordering on the Black Sea .
Romania shares a border with Hungary and Serbia to the west , Ukraine and  moldova to the पूर्वोत्तर और ईस्ट , और बुल्गारिया to the दक्षिण .
At , Romania is the eighth largest country of the European Union by area , and has the  सातवाँ largest जनसांख्यिकी of the यूरोपीय संघ साथ अधिक than 19 लाख लोगों  .
Its  पूंजी और biggest नगर is बुखारेस्ट  , the 11th largest city in the EU .
The United  principalities उभरा जब the territories of moldavia और wallachia यहूद संयुक्त  under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859 .
In 1866 Prince Karl of  hohenzollern-sigmaringen थी पुकारा to the सिंहासन as the सत्ताधारी प्रिंस of the रोमानियाई principate और in 1881 he  was finally crowned as King Carol I the first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania .
Independence from the Ottoman Empire was declared on 9 May 1877 , and was  internationally पहचाना  the following year .
At the end of World War I , Transylvania , Bukovina and  bessarabia संयुक्त साथ the किंगडम of रोमानिया .
World War II gave cause to the rise of a military dictatorship in Romania under fascist General Ion  antonescu , जो chose to लड़ो on the पक्ष of the अक्ष शक्तियां इससे 1941 to 1944  .
After his removal ,  रोमानिया switched पहलू in 1944 और joined  the Allies .
by the समाप्त of the युद्ध , कुछ formerly रोमानियाई northeastern territories यहूद occupied by  the Soviet Union , with Red Army units stationed on Romanian soil .
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a People 's Republic ( 1947-1965  ) और a सदस्य of the  Warsaw Pact .
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General Secretary of the Romanian Communist  पार्टी , और the हर्ष austerity उपायों , राजनैतिक दमन , और cult of व्यक्तित्व he implemented led to the समाजवादी गणतंत्र  of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc .
Eventually his authoritarian  सरकारी थी toppled in दिसम्बर 1989 दौरान the  Romanian Revolution of 1989 .
With the  पतन of the आयरन पर्दा , रोमानिया began  its transition towards democracy and a capitalist market economy .
After a decade of  post-revolution आर्थिक समस्याएं और living-standards मनाही , extensive  reforms fostered economic recovery .
As of 2010 , Romania is an upper-middle-income  देश साथ a ऊँची इंसान विकास  index .
Romania joined NATO on  29 कूच 2004 , और the यूरोपीय  Union on 1 January 2007 .
It is also a member of the :  लैटिन संघ , francophonie , osce , wto , bsec  , United Nations , etc .
Today , Romania is a unitary  semi-presidential गणतंत्र , in जिससे the कार्यपालिका शाखा consists of the अध्यक्ष  and the Government .
``  प्राचीन '' redirects  here .
For other  उपयोग , देखिए प्राचीनता ( बहुविकल्पी  ) .
The times before  लिखने belong either to protohistory  or to prehistory .
Khafre 's Pyramid ( 4th  राजवंश ) और ग्रेट sphinx of गीज़ा ( c. 2500 bc or शायद  earlier )
प्राचीन इतिहास is the पढ़ाई of the लिखा पास्ट इससे the शुरूआत  of recorded human history to the Early Middle Ages .
The  स्पैन of अंकित इतिहास is roughly 5,000 सालो , साथ cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट , the oldest खोजा  form of coherent writing , from the protoliterate period around the 30th century BC .
This is the beginning of history , as opposed to prehistory , according to  the परिभाषा प्रयुक्त by सबसे इतिहासकारों  .
The term  शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to इतिहास in the बूढ़ा संसार इससे the शुरूआत of अंकित  Greek history in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ) .
This roughly coincides with the  परंपरागत तिथि of the founding of रोम in 753 bc , the शुरूआत of the इतिहास of प्राचीन रोम , और the  beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece .
Although the ending date of  प्राचीन इतिहास is विवादित , कुछ पश्चिमी विद्वानों उपयोग the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in 476 ad , the closure  of the Platonic Academy in 529 AD , the death of the emperor Justinian I , the coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history .
In India , the  काल शामिल the जल्दी काल of the मध्य kingdoms , और , in चीन , the  time up to the Qin Dynasty is included .
Methylcobalamin (  दिखाया ) is a रूप of विटामिन  B12 .
Physically it resembles  the अन्य फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन b12 , occurring as अंधेरा रेड crystals  that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12 , also  पुकारा cobalamin , is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the दिमाग  and nervous system , and for the formation of blood .
It is  एक of the आठ  B vitamins .
It  is सामान्यतः शामिल in the चयापचय of प्रत्येक कोशिका of the इंसान देह , विशेषकर  affecting DNA synthesis and regulation , but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither fungi ,  पौधे , nor पशु हैं सक्षम of producing  vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and  आर्किया have the एंजाइमों  required for its synthesis , although many foods are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis .
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally  जटिल विटामिन और can be उत्पादित industrially तभी through बैक्टीरियल  fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of  chemically सम्बन्धित यौगिकों ( vitamers ) , सब of  which have vitamin activity .
It contains the  biochemically विरल तत्व  cobalt .
जैवसंश्लेषण of the मौलिक ढांचा of the विटामिन is संपन्नता तभी by जीवाणु ( जिससे प्रायः  produce hydroxocobalamin ) , but conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin , cyanocobalamin , does not occur in nature , but is produced from bacterial  hydroxocobalamin और तब प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ और पूरक , और as a खाना योगात्मक , क्युकी of इसके स्थिरता और निम्नतर उत्पादन लागत  .
In  the देह it is परिवर्तित to the इंसान physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin  and adenosylcobalamin , leaving behind the cyanide , albeit in minimal concentration .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin , and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more  महंगी pharmacological उत्पाद और खाना  supplements .
The extra utility of  ये is फिलहाल debated  .
विटामिन b12 थी खोजा इससे इसके संबंध to the बीमारी घातक रक्ताल्पता , जिससे is an असंक्राम्य  disease in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed .
मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर is निर्णायक लिये the सामान्य अवशोषण of b12 , so  a lack of intrinsic factor , as seen in pernicious anemia , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12  कमियां और उनके biochemical प्रभाव have चूंकि महरूम elucidated  .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman  सभ्यता , characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial  holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic , which preceded  it , था महरूम destabilized through  a series of civil wars .
अनेक कार्यक्रम चिह्नित the परिवर्तन इससे गणतंत्र to साम्राज्य , सहित जूलियस सीज़र 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ; the  Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ) .
the पहला दो सदियां of the साम्राज्य यहूद a काल of unprecedented स्थिरता और समृद्धि  known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It  पहुँचे इसके महानतम expanse दौरान  the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ) .
In the 3rd century , the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its  अस्तित्व , लकिन थी reunified और stabilized अंतर्गत the emperors aurelian और diocletian  .
Christians rose to power in the 4th  सदी , दौरान जिससे समय a प्रणाली of डुअल नियम थी  developed in the Latin West and Greek East .
After the  पतन of सेंट्रल सरकारी in the वेस्ट in the 5th  century , the eastern half continued as what would later be known as the Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the development of language , religion , architecture ,  दर्शनशास्त्र , विधि , और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed , विशेषकर यूरोपीय , और by अर्थात् of यूरोपीय expansionism throughout  the modern world .
कुल देह सतह क्षेत्रफल ( tbsa ) is an  assessment measure of burns of the skin .
In adults , the `` rule of nines  '' is प्रयुक्त to determine the कुल प्रतिशत of क्षेत्रफल burned  for each major section of the body .
in कुछ मामले , the burns may कवर अधिक than एक देह भाग , or may नहीं fully कवर ऐसे a भाग ; in ये  cases , burns are measured by using the casualty 's palm as a reference point for 1 % of the body .
For children and infants , the  lund-browder चार्ट is प्रयुक्त to assess the burned  body surface area .
Different percentages are used  क्युकी the अनुपात of the संयुक्त सतह क्षेत्रफल of the सिर और गर्दन to the सतह क्षेत्रफल of the limbs  is typically larger in children than that of an adult .
Typical values for  आम समूह of इंसानो  follow .
( Due to  rounding , मान may नहीं add  to 100 % . )
World infant  मृत्यु दरों by पाँच सालो  averages in 2008 .
This is a list of  देशों by शिशु मृत्यु  rate .
Jonah Kirsten Sorrentino ( born June  26 , 1975 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम kj-52  , is a Christian rapper from Tampa , Florida .
The `` KJ '' part of his name refers to his old rap alias , `` King J. Mac , '' a  नाम जिससे he बाद वर्णित in एक of उसके podcasts as `` horribly घटिया . ''
`` 52 '' , which is pronounced `` five two '' , not `` fifty-two '' , is a reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude with five loaves and two fish , which is also sung  परिचय in उसके सोंग `` धक्का up '' इससे the yearbook और in the `` kj पाँच दो '' on it 's सुनाया 'five  Two .
He was awarded the Rap/Hip Hop Recorded Song of the Year for  `` never dekh दूर '' और rap/hip हॉप एल्बम of the साल at the  GMA Dove Awards of 2007 .
On July 28 , 2009 , KJ-52 released `` End  of my रस्सी '' , जिससे is the पहला सिंगल लिये उसके एल्बम  Five-Two Television .
उसके सोंग `` डिअर पतला '' is आधारित on एमिनेम  's song `` Stan `` and is a sort of personal message from KJ-52 to Eminem .
The degree symbol ( ° ) is a  typographical प्रतीक कि is प्रयुक्त , among अन्य बाते , to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g . in भौगोलिक निर्देशांक प्रणालियों ) , घंटों  ( in the medical field ) , or degrees of temperature .
The  प्रतीक consists of a छोटी उठाया वृत्त  , historically a zero glyph .
in युनिकोड  it is encoded at .
This is a list of roots ,  प्रत्यय , और prefixes प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा शब्दावली  , their meanings , and their etymology .
There are  a few नियम जब using  medical roots .
Firstly , prefixes and suffixes ,  primarily in यूनानी , लकिन भी in लैटिन  , have a droppable -o- .
As a general rule , this -o- almost  सदा अधिनियमों as a joint-stem to कनेक्ट दो consonantal जड़ें , e.g . arthr-  + -o- + logy = arthrology .
But generally , the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g . arthr-  + itis = गठिया , बजाय of arthr-o-itis  .
Secondly , medical roots  generally go साथ according to भाषा  : Greek prefixes go with Greek suffixes and Latin prefixes with Latin suffixes .
Although international scientific vocabulary is not stringent about  segregating combining फ़ॉर्म of अलग भाषाएं , it is advisable जब coining नई  words not to mix different lingual roots .
Stomach cancer , or gastric cancer , refers to cancer  arising इससे कोई भाग of the पेट  .
Stomach cancer causes  परिचय 800,000 मौतों विश्वव्यापी  per year .
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year  अस्तित्व < 5 to 15 % ) क्युकी सबसे मरीजों उपस्थित साथ उन्नत  disease .
Sara Lynn Evans  ( born फ़रवरी 5 , 1971 ) is an अमरीकी  country singer and songwriter .
For her entire  करियर , वो रै महरूम हस्ताक्षरित to आरसीए रिकॉर्ड  Nashville .
Evans ' debut , Three  मदारी और the सच्चाई , किया नहीं उपज  a Top 40 hit on the Hot Country Songs charts .
She followed this up with No Place That Far ( 1998 ) , Born to Fly (  2000 ) , बेचैन ( 2003 ) और रियल ठीक प्लेस ( 2005  ) .
No Place That  दूर प्राप्त a सुनहरा प्रमाणन इससे the रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) , while the other three albums all were certified platinum .
These discs include the number 1 singles `` No Place That Far `` , `` Born to Fly `` , `` Suds in  the बाल्टी `` और `` a रियल ठीक प्लेस to प्रारंभ `` , प्लस the शीर्ष 10 हिट्स ``  I Could Not Ask for More `` ( a cover of the Edwin McCain song ) , `` I Keep Looking `` , `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' `` .
Her 2007 Greatest Hits included the top 15  हिट्स `` तुम 'll सदा be my baby `` और ``  As If `` .
Stronger ( 2011 ) included her fifth number 1 hit , `` A Little Bit  stronger `` , जिससे थी co-written by हिलेरी स्कॉट of महिला  Antebellum .
Evans has also won one award each from  बिलबोर्ड , the अकादमी of देश म्यूज़िक , देश म्यूज़िक संघ , ब्रॉडकास्ट  Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award .
The world 's principal religions and spiritual  परंपराओं may be वर्गीकृत into a छोटी क्रमांक of प्रमुख समूह  , although this is by no means a uniform practice .
This theory began in the  18th सदी साथ the लक्ष्य of recognizing the सापेक्ष स्तर of  civility in societies .
Berliners  watching a c-54 जमीन at tempelhof  Airport ( 1948 )
The Berlin blockade ( 24 June 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) was one of the first major  अंतरराष्ट्रीय crises of the ठंडा युद्ध  .
During the  बहुराष्ट्रीय occupation of post–world युद्ध ii जर्मनी , the सोवियत संघ अवरोधित the पश्चिमी allies  ' railway , road , and canal access to the sectors of Berlin under Allied control .
Their aim was to force the western powers to allow the Soviet zone to start supplying Berlin with food  और ईंधन , thereby giving the soviets व्यावहारिक कंट्रोल over the संपूर्ण  city .
In response , the Western  allies व्यवस्थित the बर्लिन एयरलिफ्ट to  carry supplies to the people in West Berlin .
Aircrews from the United States Air Force , the British Royal Air Force , the Royal Australian Air Force , the Royal Canadian Air Force , the Royal New Zealand Air Force , and the South African Air Force  उड़ाया over 200,000 फ़्लाइट in एक साल , providing up to 4700 टन of रोज़ necessities ऐसे as ईंधन और खाना  to the Berliners .
By the spring of 1949 , the effort was  clearly succeeding और , by अप्रैल , the एयरलिफ्ट थी delivering अधिक कार्गो than था previously  been transported into the city by rail .
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought  शर्मिंदगी to the soviets जो था refused to मानना  it could make a difference .
The  नाकेबंदी थी lifted in may 1949 और resulted in the  creation of two separate German states .
The  संघीय गणतंत्र of जर्मनी ( वेस्ट जर्मनी ) और  the German Democratic Republic ( East Germany ) split up Berlin .
In  स्मरण of the एयरलिफ्ट , तीन एयरपोर्ट in the पूर्व पश्चिमी zones of the  city served as the primary gateways to Germany for another fifty years .
The  यूरोपियन चिह्न ; logotype और  handwritten .
The  यूरोपियन चिह्न is the करेंसी चिह्न प्रयुक्त लिये the यूरोपियन  , the official currency of the Eurozone in the European Union ( EU ) .
the डिज़ाइन थी प्रस्तुत to the पब्लिक by the  European Commission on 12 December 1996 .
The international  three-letter कोड ( according  to ISO standard ISO 4217 ) for the euro is EUR .
In Unicode it  is एनकोडेड at .
In English , the sign  precedes the  value .
In some  styleguides , लकिन नहीं अन्य , the यूरोपियन  sign is unspaced .
Mate ( , ; sometimes also  spelled maté ) , भी ज्ञात as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ) , is a परंपरागत दक्षिण अमरीकी  infused drink , particularly in Argentina , Uruguay , Paraguay and the southern states of Brazil and to a lesser degree in south of Chile , the Bolivian Chaco , Syria and Lebanon .
it is prepared इससे  steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis , known in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water .
Mate is  परोसा साथ a मेटल स्ट्रॉ इससे a साझा  hollow calabash gourd .
The straw is called a  bombilla in कुछ लैटिन अमरीकी देशों , a bomba in पुर्तगाली  , and a bombija or , more generally , a masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic .
The straw is  traditionally बना of  silver .
Modern , commercially available straws are  typically बना of निकल चांदी , पुकारा alpaca ;  stainless steel , or hollow-stemmed cane .
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while  in ब्राज़ील , it रै the विशिष्ट नाम of cuia , or भी cabaça ( the नाम लिये indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of ब्राज़ील  , still used for general food and drink in remote regions ) .
Even if the water is supplied  इससे a आधुनिक thermos , the infusion is traditionally नशे  from mates or cuias .
As with other brewed herbs , yerba mate leaves are dried ,  कटा , और मैदान into a powdery मिश्रण पुकारा yerba  .
The  bombilla अधिनियमों as दोनो  a straw and a sieve .
The submerged end is flared , with  छोटी छेद or स्लॉट कि allow the brewed द्रव in , लकिन ब्लाक the चंकी पदार्थ  that makes up much of the mixture .
A modern bombilla design uses a straight tube  साथ छेद , or वसन्त स्लीव to अधिनियम  as a sieve .
`` Tea-bag  '' प्रकार infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have महरूम on the मार्केट in अर्जेंटीना , पैराग्वे और उरुग्वे लिये अनेक सालो अंतर्गत ऐसे व्यापार names  as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina , `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay , and in Brazil under the name `` Mate Leão '' .
This is considered  a completely अलग  drink .
It is never  नशे इससे cuias or पुकारा chimarrão  , nor is it associated with the gaucho/gaúcho culture .
The automotive industry is a term that covers a wide range of companies and organisations involved in the design ,  विकास , manufacture , विपणन , और selling of मोटर वाहनों , towed वाहनों , मोटरसाइकिल और  mopeds .
It is one  of the संसार 's सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आर्थिक  sectors by revenue .
The term automotive industry usually does not include industries dedicated to  the मेंटेनेंस of ऑटोमोबाइल following डिलीवरी to the end-user , ऐसे as मरम्मत दुकानें और मोटर ईंधन भरना  stations .
The term automotive was created from Greek autos ( self ) , and Latin  motivus ( of गति ) to represent कोई रूप of self-powered  vehicle .
इस पद थी प्रस्तावित  by SAE member Elmer Sperry .
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista , Jr. ( born January 18 , 1969 ) , is an American mixed martial artist , bodybuilder  , कर्ता , और पूर्व पेशेवर पहलवान बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके समय in संसार कुश्ती entertainment  competing under the ring name Batista .
In WWE , he became a six-time world champion , winning the  संसार हेवीवेट चैंपियनशिप चार टाइम्स , और the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई चैंपियनशिप  two times .
He is the longest-reigning World  हेवीवेट चैंपियन in डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई इतिहास  .
In addition to these championships , Batista has  जीती the संसार टैग टोली चैंपियनशिप तीन टाइम्स ( twice साथ ric फ्लेयर और एकबार साथ जॉन सीना )  and the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ) .
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and went on to headline WrestleMania 21  , एक of the शीर्ष पाँच highest-grossing pay-per-view कार्यक्रम in प्रो कुश्ती इतिहास  .
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant , Batista signed a contract with the WWF in 2000 and was sent  to इसके developmental territory , ओहियो घाटी कुश्ती ( ovw ) , जहाँ he जीती the ovw हेवीवेट चैंपियनशिप  .
In August 2012 , Bautista signed  a अनुबंध साथ क्लासिक entertainment & खेल to लड़ो in  mixed martial arts .
He won his MMA debut on October 6 , 2012 , defeating Vince  lucero via tko in  the first round .
Henry T. Thomas  sampson , jr. ( born in जैक्सन , मिसिसिपी in 1934  ) is an African-American inventor .
he ग्रैजुएट इससे ऊँची स्कूल in 1951 इससे lanier  High School in Jackson , Mississippi .
He then attended Morehouse College for a couple of  सालो पहले transferring to purdue विश्वविद्यालयों जहाँ he became a सदस्य of the  Omega Psi Phi fraternity .
He received a Bachelor 's degree in science  इससे purdue विश्वविद्यालयों in 1956  .
He  ग्रैजुएट साथ an ms उपाधि in अभियान्त्रिकी  from the University of California , Los Angeles in 1961 .
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear Engineering from  the विश्वविद्यालयों of इलिनोइस urbana-champaign in 1965 , और उसके phd  in 1967 .
He  is the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to earn a ph.d.in  Nuclear Engineering in the United States .
Some of his  accomplishments शामिल होने a सदस्य of the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी between the सालो 1962 और 1964 और  earning an Atomic Energy Commission honor between 1964 and 1967 .
Later he was awarded the  ब्लैक चित्र पुरस्कार इससे  Aerospace Corporation in 1982 .
He was awarded  the अश्वेतों in अभियान्त्रिकी , लागू विज्ञान पुरस्कार , और पुरस्कार लिये शिक्षा  , by the Los Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983 .
In June 2007 , Sampson  थी शादीशुदा to लौरा howzell  Young in St. Thomas , U.S. Virgin Islands .
Young-Sampson is a professor in the College of Education at  कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों सैन bernardino .
रॉबर्ट लेन गिब्स ( born कूच  29 , 1971 ) is a senior campaign adviser for US President Barack Obama .
Previously , he  थी the 28th श्वेत हाउस दबायें सचिव  .
Gibbs was the  संचार निदेशक लिये then- u.s . सीनेटर ओबामा और उसके  2008 presidential campaign .
Gibbs , who has worked with Obama since 2004 , was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in Senate campaigns , having served as communications director for the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee and for four  व्यक्तिगत सीनेट अभियान , सहित those of ओबामा in 2004 और फ्रिट्ज़ hollings  in 1998 .
गिब्स थी भी the दबायें  secretary of Representative Bob Etheridge .
On November 22 , 2008 , Gibbs was announced as  the दबायें सचिव of the ओबामा प्रशासन  .
He assumed the  भूमिका of दबायें सचिव on जनवरी 20 , 2009 , और दिया उसके  first official briefing on January 22 .
On January 5 , 2011  , गिब्स घोषित कि he होता छोड़ the श्वेत  House to become an outside adviser to the administration .
He left  on फ़रवरी 11  , 2011 .
on फ़रवरी 12 , 2013 , it थी घोषित कि  Gibbs had been hired as a contributor for cable-news channel MSNBC .
His first appearance was on the same  रात्रि prior to the 2013 राज्य of the संघ  Address .
Armando Pérez ( born January 15 ,  1981 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम pitbull  , is an American rapper , songwriter , and record producer .
His first  अंकित प्रदर्शन थी इससे the लील  Jon album Kings of Crunk in 2002 .
In 2004 , he released his debut  एल्बम titled m.i.a.m.i . ( छोटी लिये धन  Is A Major Issue ) under TVT Records .
Since then , he has  released तीन अन्य एल्बम अंतर्गत the लेबल : el  Mariel in 2006 , The Boatlift in 2007 , and Planet Pit in 2011 .
He released  rebelution in 2009 , जिससे शामिल singles  `` I Know You Want Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy `` .
The latter peaked at No . 30 on the Hot 100 and No . 11 on the Hot Rap  ट्रैक्स चार्ट जबकि `` i जान तुम want me '' peaked at no . 2 on the hot 100 और  peaked within the top ten spots of charts in the UK , Canada , Italy , and the Netherlands .
The song reached No . 1 in France and the  यूरोपीय hot 100 on the सप्ताह समाप्ति अगस्त 29 , 2009 according  to Billboard magazine .
He later signed with Polo Grounds Music  through सोनी म्यूज़िक और निर्मित उसके अपना लेबल mr.  305 Inc .
Another single  इससे rebelution थी `` होटल रूम सेवा  `` , which peaked at No . 8 on the Hot 100 .
Rebelution went on to sell  over 7.5 लाख विश्वव्यापी डिजिटल singles और  albums combined .
Nevertheless ,  he dropped a तोड़ पुकारा `` दे me सबकुछ  '' which reached # 1 worldwide , and featured artists Ne-yo , Nayer , and Afrojack .
He has also performed as a featured artist in the remixes of many other hit  गीतों , जैसे tik टोक , चीख & चिल्लाओ , lo hecho esta hecho , ख़राब , papi , ईंट  , How Low , Tonight ( I 'm Lovin ' You ) , Video Phone , Over To You Now and Bumpy Ride .
Pérez is also the host of his own Spanish-language program on the cable  चैनल mun2 titled la esquina ( स्पेनी लिये the कोने  ) .
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy '  combs co-founded ख़राब लड़के लातीनी , a subsidiary of combs '  Bad Boy Records label .
It primarily  focuses on लैटिन हिप हॉप , लैटिन आत्मा , लैटिन पॉप और अन्य  Tropical music , and has offices in New York and Miami , Florida .
साथ साथ co-founding it , pérez फिलहाल heads  the A & R division of the label .
Pérez has become a product endorser , representing alongside Drake , Rihanna , and Trey Songz the “So Kodak” campaign for the  कोडक ब्रांड और embarking on a साझेदारी साथ the नरम पेय दानव dr pepper as भाग of the अभियान “ विदा  23 ” for which he recorded the song specifically featured on his album Armando .
Pitbull also announced he has become the  प्रवक्ता लिये voli वोदका , in जिससे he holds a बहुमत इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी , और budweiser  has chosen Pitbull to promote its Bud Light line of beer .
The commercials  फिलहाल हाइलाइट pitbull नाचना और  gyrating on stage holding up a bottle of Bud Light .
Pitbull has also  खरीदा an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in मियामी subs  Pizza and Grill .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a  संकुचन of `` सब hallows ' संध्या `` ) , भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या , is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31 , the संध्या of the पश्चिमी  Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally  बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय कटाई त्यौहार , और त्यौहार of the मुर्दे साथ संभावित pagan जड़ें  , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars maintain that it  originated independently of samhain और रै solely  Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties  , नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , ठहराना bobbing , visiting haunted आकर्षण , playing  pranks , telling scary stories , and watching horror films .
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions and ideas  using एक 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone  who is willing to receive them .
The  पद स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously , लकिन  includes any act of seeking , receiving and imparting information or ideas , regardless of the medium used .
In practice , the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations , as with libel ,  बदनामी , obscenity , राजद्रोह ( सहित , लिये उदाहरण inciting जातीय द्वेष ) , कापीराइट उल्लंघन , रहस्योद्घाटन of सूचना कि is  classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the Universal  घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों विधि in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression  ; इस सही shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to तलाश , प्राप्त और impart सूचना और विचार of सब kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in लिखने or in छपाई , in the रूप of  art , or through any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities ``  और may `` इसलिए be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य ''  or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom of  वाक may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक विधिक प्रणालियों  and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense , such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
Sydney  harbour इससे the एयर , प्रर्दशित the ओपेरा हाउस , the सीबीडी , गोलाकार quay , the सेतु , the  Parramatta River , North Sydney and Kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch bridge across Sydney Harbour that carries rail , vehicular , bicycle and  पैदल ट्रैफ़िक between the सिडनी सेंट्रल  business district ( CBD ) and the North Shore .
The dramatic view of the  सेतु , the harbour , और the आसपास सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस is an iconic चित्र  of Sydney , New South Wales , and Australia .
The  सेतु is nicknamed `` the  Coathanger '' because of its arch-based design .
Under the directions of Dr  j.j.c . bradfield of the nsw विभाग of पब्लिक works , the सेतु थी designed और निर्मित by अंग्रेजों कड़ dorman long  and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in 1932 .
The bridge 's design was influenced by  the नरक फाटक सेतु in नई  York .
It was the world 's widest  long-span सेतु , at 48.8 मीटर ( 160 फीट ) चौड़ी , जबतक  construction of the new Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver .
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge in the world ,  और it is the tallest स्टील मेहराब सेतु , measuring इससे शीर्ष to जल स्तर  .
Until 1967 the Harbour Bridge  थी सिडनी 's tallest ढांचा  .
The  हवाई हॉटस्पॉट is a volcanic हॉटस्पॉट  located near the namesake Hawaiian Islands , in the northern Pacific Ocean .
One of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world ,  the हवाई plume is जिम्मेदार लिये the सृष्टि of the हवाई – सम्राट seamount कड़ी , an over 5,800 किलोमीटर ( 3,600 mi ) long कड़ी of ज्वालामुखी , चार of जिससे हैं क्रियाशील , दो of जिससे हैं dormant , और अधिक than  123 of which are extinct , many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls .
The chain extends from  दक्षिण of the द्वीप of हवाई to the किनारे  of the Aleutian Trench , near the eastern edge of Russia .
While most volcanoes are created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries , the Hawaii hotspot is located far from nearby plate boundaries ; the classic  हॉटस्पॉट सिद्धान्त , पहला प्रस्तावित in 1963 by जॉन tuzo विल्सन , proposes कि a सिंगल , फिक्स्ड mantle plume builds ज्वालामुखी कि तब , काटें बंद इससे उनके सोर्स by the गति  of the Pacific Plate , become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years .
According to  इस सिद्धान्त , the nearly 60° बेंड separating the सम्राट और हवाई खण्ड  of the chain was caused by a sudden shift in the movement of the Pacific Plate .
In 2003 , fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile hotspot theory , suggesting that hotspots are mobile , not fixed ,  और कि the 47 लाख साल बूढ़ा बेंड थी caused by  a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's .
Ancient Hawaiians were the first to recognize  the increasing आयु और weathered राज्य of the ज्वालामुखी to the उत्तर as वे progressed  on fishing expeditions along the islands .
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their  निरंतर बैटल साथ the समुद्र थी a प्रमुख तत्व  in Hawaiian mythology , embodied in Pele , the deity of volcanoes .
After the arrival of Europeans on the island , in 1880-1881 James  ड्वाइट दाना निर्देशित the पहला औपचारिक geological पढ़ाई of the हॉटस्पॉट 's volcanics , confirming the संबंध  long observed by the natives .
1912 marked the founding of the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory by  volcanologist थामस jaggar , initiating निरन्तर वैज्ञानिक अवलोकन  of the islands .
In the 1970s , a mapping  प्रोजेक्ट थी initiated to लाभ अधिक सूचना परिचय the जटिल  geology of Hawaii 's seafloor .
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged , showing it to be wide and  up to गहन , और ओलीवाइन और गार्नेट -आधारd अध्ययन have दिखाया इसके  magma chamber is approximately .
In  इसके at तनिक 85 लाख सालो of कार्यकलाप the हॉटस्पॉट रै उत्पादित  an estimated of rock .
The chain 's rate of drift has slowly increased over time , causing the amount of time each individual volcano is active to  घटी , इससे 18 लाख सालो लिये the 76 लाख साल बूढ़ा डेट्रॉयट seamount , to बस अंतर्गत 900,000 लिये the एक लाख year-old kohala ;  on the other hand , eruptive volume has increased from per year to about .
Overall , this has caused a trend towards more  क्रियाशील लकिन quickly-silenced , closely spaced volcanoes—whereas ज्वालामुखी on the निकट पक्ष of the हॉटस्पॉट ओवरलैप प्रत्येक अन्य ( forming  such superstructures as Hawaii island and the ancient Maui Nui ) , the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart .
David Palmer , director of the show ,  घोषित कि the ऋतु 4 finale is the श्रेणी finale क्युकी निकलोडियन रद्द  the show .
याचिकाएं हैं होने हस्ताक्षरित  to bring the show for a fifth season .
The show airs on Treehouse  tv कनाडा और उपनाम jr. ( formerly  Noggin ) .

It was  marketed साथ the टैगलाइन  `` Rebel .

Osteonecrosis of the jaw ( ONJ )  is a कठोर अस्थि बीमारी कि affects the maxilla और the mandible  .
Various forms of ONJ have been described over the last 160  सालो , और a क्रमांक of कल्याणकारी have महरूम सुझाया in the साहित्य  .
Osteonecrosis of the jaws associated  साथ bisphosphonate चिकित्सा , जरूरी by कुछ कर्कट उपचार  regimens , has been identified and defined as a pathological entity since 2003 .
The possible risk from lower oral  doses of bisphosphonates , लिया by मरीजों to prevent or दावत  osteoporosis , remains uncertain .
Various  उपचार विकल्प have महरूम छान , however कठोर मामले of onj  still require surgical removal of the affected bone .
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and possible sites of  दंत संक्रमण हैं जरूरी to सहायता prevent the कंडीशन , विशेषकर if bisphosphonate  therapy is considered .
The Boston Red Sox are a professional  बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स , और a सदस्य  of Major League Baseball 's American League Eastern Division .
Founded in as one of the American League 's eight charter franchises  , the रेड sox 's घर ballpark रै महरूम fenway  Park since .
The `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner , John I. Taylor , around , following previous  बोस्टन टीमों कि था महरूम ज्ञात as the `` रेड  Stockings `` .
वे have निभाई in 11 संसार  Series , winning 7 .
Boston was a dominant team in the new league , defeating the Pittsburgh  pirates in the पहला संसार श्रेणी in और जीतना  four more championships by .
However , they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history , called by some the ``  अभिशाप of the bambino `` बाद इसके कथित शुरूआत साथ the रेड sox 's बिक्री of बेब रुथ to the प्रतिद्वंद्वी यांकीज़ दो सालो बाद उनके संसार चैंपियनशिप in 1918 , an 86-year इंतजार पहले the टोली 's छठे  World Championship in .
However , the team 's history during that period was hardly one of futility , but was rather punctuated with some  of the सबसे यादगार पल in संसार श्रेणी इतिहास , सहित enos वध 's `` mad डैश `` in , the  `` Impossible Dream `` of , Carlton Fisk 's home run in , and Bill Buckner 's error in .
Red Sox  इतिहास रै भी महरूम चिह्नित by the टोली 's तीव्र फंसने साथ the नई यॉर्क  Yankees , arguably the fiercest and most historic in North American professional sports .
The Boston Red Sox are owned  by fenway खेल समूह , जो भी अपना लिवरपूल फ़ुटबॉल  Club of the Premier League in England .
The Red Sox are consistently one of the top MLB teams in  औसत सड़क उपस्थिति , जबकि the छोटी क्षमता of fenway पार्क रोकता उन्हें इससे  leading in overall attendance .
From May 15 , 2003 to April 10  , 2013 , the रेड sox बेची आउट प्रत्येक घर game-a कुल of 820 खेल ( 794 नियमित ऋतु ) लिये a प्रमुख पेशेवर  sports record that lasted almost a decade .
mince पाई भर साथ  mincemeat
mincemeat is a मिश्रण of कटा सूखी फल , आसुत आत्माओं और मसाले  , and sometimes beef suet , beef , or venison .
originally , mincemeat  always contained meat .
Many modern  व्यंजनों contain बीफ suet , हालांकि सब्ज़ी shortening  is sometimes used in its place .
Variants of mincemeat  हैं मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ब्रिटनी , कनाडा , उत्तरी  Europe , Ireland , South Africa , the United Kingdom and the United States .
In  कुछ देशों the पद mincemeat  refers to minced or ground meat .
Diana , Princess of Wales ( Diana  frances ; née स्पेंसर ; 1 जुलाई 1961 – 31 अगस्त 1997 ) थी the पहला बीवी of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स  , the eldest son and heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II .
वो थी खूब ज्ञात लिये उसके fund-raising कार्य लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय धर्मार्थ और  as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century .
Her wedding to the Prince of  वेल्स on 29 जुलाई 1981 थी आयोजित at st पॉल 's गिरजाघर और देखी by a वैश्विक  television audience of over 750 million .
While married she bore the titles Princess of Wales , Duchess of Cornwall ,  duchess of rothesay , countess of चेस्टर और बैरोनेस of renfrew  .
The marriage  उत्पादित दो बेटे , the princes विलियम और हैरी , जो became दूसरी  and third in line to the British throne .
Diana was born into an aristocratic  अंग्रेज़ी परिवार साथ royal ancestry  .
She was the fourth child of John Spencer , 8th Earl Spencer and  उसके बीवी frances , बेटी of मौरिस रोश , 4th  Baron Fermoy .
She became a public figure with  the घोषणा of उसके सगाई  .
She also received recognition for her  दान कार्य और लिये उसके support of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय अभियान  to Ban Landmines .
From 1989 , she was the president of the Great Ormond  गली हॉस्पिटल लिये children , in जोड to दर्जनों of अन्य धर्मार्थ  .
Diana remained  the ऑब्जेक्ट of विश्वव्यापी मीडिया scrutiny दौरान और बाद उसके विवाह , जिससे  ended in divorce on 28 August 1996 .
Media attention and public  शोक यहूद considerable following उसके मौत in a car क्रैश  in Paris on 31 August 1997 .
Argentina , officially the Argentine Republic ( ) , is the second largest  देश in दोनो दक्षिण अमेरिका और the लैटिन  America region .
The country is a federation of 23 provinces and the  autonomous नगर of buenos आयर्स , इसके पूंजी और largest  city .
It is the eighth  -largest देश in the संसार by जमीन क्षेत्रफल और the largest among spanish-speaking राष्ट्र by भौगोलिक  area of 2,780,400 km2 and is the fourth by population , with over 41 million people .
Argentina is a founding member of the United  राष्ट्र , mercosur , the संघ of दक्षिण अमरीकी राष्ट्र , the संगठन of ibero-american राज्य , the संसार बैंको  Group and the World Trade Organization , and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies .
Argentina is located in South America , bordered by Chile to the west  और दक्षिण , बोलीविया और पैराग्वे to the उत्तर और ब्राज़ील और उरुग्वे  to the northeast .
अर्जेंटीना दावा प्रभुता over भाग of अंटार्कटिक , the फ़ॉकलैंड आइलैंड्स  ( ) and South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands .
Argentina is the successor state of the Viceroyalty of the Río de la Plata  , an विदेशी उपनिवेश of the स्पेनी साम्राज्य  .
Argentina declared independence during the Argentine War of Independence , which was  followed by the अर्जेंटाइन सिविल युद्धों दौरान सबसे of the  19th century .
The country faced several military coups and political instability during  the 20th सदी , साथ साथ आवधिक आर्थिक संकट कि continue to इस  day .
A recognized Southern Cone power , and middle power , Argentina is Latin America 's  third-largest अर्थव्यवस्था , साथ a `` बहुत ऊँची '' दरजा on the इंसान  development index .
Within Latin America , Argentina has the fifth  उच्चतम नाममात्र जीडीपी प्रति capita और the उच्चतम in खरीदना शक्ति  terms .
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a `` foundation for  भविष्य विकास due to इसके मार्केट आकार , स्तर of विदेशी सीधा निवेश , और प्रतिशत of high-tech  exports as share of total manufactured goods '' , and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy .
Argentina is the Latin American country with the most Nobel  पुरस्कार , लिये a कुल of पाँच , सब प्राप्त दौरान the दूसरी  half of the twentieth century .
The country has three Nobel  पुरस्कार in विज्ञान और दो of सलाम  .
the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण पहलुओं of विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी in अर्जेंटीना हैं चिंतित साथ आयुर्विज्ञान , नाभिकीय भौतिकी , जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  , nanotechnology , space and rocket technology and several fields related to the country 's Main Economic Activities .
The country  भी रै the आचमन प्रदर्शनी बीच of विज्ञान , प्रौद्योगिकी , उद्योग  and art that are Latin America 's largest .
Hickory is a city in Catawba  काउंटी , साथ भाग भी in बुर्के काउंटी और काल्डवेल  County .
The city 's 2010 estimated  जनसांख्यिकी is 40,010  .
Hickory is the principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA  , in जिससे the जनसांख्यिकी at  the 2010 Census was 365,497 .
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ) , commonly abbreviated PET , PETE , or the obsolete PETP or PET-P , is a thermoplastic polymer  राल of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक मछली ; पेय , खाना और अन्य द्रव containers ; thermoforming अनुप्रयोग ; और अभियान्त्रिकी  resins often in combination with glass fiber .
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a source of confusion because this  पदार्थ , पालतु , करता नहीं contain  polyethylene .
Thus , the alternate form , poly ( ethylene  terephthalate ) , is प्रायः प्रयुक्त in scholarly  journals for the sake of accuracy and clarity .
Depending on its processing and thermal history , polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an  amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) और as a semi-crystalline पॉलिमर  .
The  semicrystalline सामग्री might appear पारदर्शी ( कण आकार < 500 nm ) or अपारदर्शी  and white ( particle size up to a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size .
Its monomer  ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification प्रतिक्रिया between terephthalic एसिड और एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल साथ जल as a byproduct  , or by transesterification reaction between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct .
Polymerization is through a polycondensation reaction of the  monomers ( किया तत्काल बाद esterification/transesterification ) साथ जल  as the byproduct .
The majority of the world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers ( in excess of  60 % ) , साथ बोतल उत्पादन हिसाब लिये around 30 % of वैश्विक  demand .
In the context of textile applications , PET is referred to by  इसके आम नाम , `` पॉलिएस्टर , '' whereas the एक्रोनिम `` पालतु '' is generally प्रयुक्त in  relation to packaging .
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world polymer  उत्पादन और is the third-most-produced पॉलिमर ; polyethylene ( pe ) और polypropylene  ( PP ) are first and second , respectively .
PET  consists of polymerized इकाई of the मोनोमर एथिलीन terephthalate  , with repeating C10H8O4 units .
PET  is commonly recycled , और रै the क्रमांक ``  1 '' as its recycling symbol .
Louisiana was admitted to the Union on April 30 , 1812 , and  elects सीनेटरों to वर्ग 2 और क्लास  3 .
Its current senators are Democrat Mary Landrieu and  रिपब्लिकन दाउद vitter  .
Black pudding , blood pudding or blood sausage is a type of sausage  बना by कुकिंग रक्त or सूखी रक्त साथ a फिलर जबतक it is मोटा पर्याप्त to congeal  when cooled .
The dish exists in various  संस्कृतियों इससे एशिया to यूरोपीय और the americas  .
Pig , cattle , sheep , duck , and goat blood can be  प्रयुक्त depending on अलग  countries .
In Europe and the Americas , typical fillers include meat ,  मोटे , suet , ब्रैड , cornmeal , मीठी आलू , प्याज , chestnuts , जौ , और oatmeal  .
In Spain , Portugal  और एशिया , आलू is प्रायः replaced  by rice .
शेयरधारक may refer  to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ) ,  a व्यक्ति , समूह , संगठन , सदस्य or प्रणाली जो affects  or can be affected by an organization 's actions
Stakeholder , an entity that can be affected by the  परिणाम of कि in जिससे वे हैं कहा to be हितधारकों  , i.e. , that in which they have a stake .
Project stakeholder , a  व्यक्ति , समूह or संगठन  with an interest in a project
Stakeholder theory , a theory that identifies and models the  समूह जिससे हैं हितधारकों of a निगम or  project
Stakeholder analysis  , the प्रक्रम of identifying those  affected by a project or event
शेयरधारक ( विधि ) , a तीसरा पार्टी जो temporarily holds धन  or property while its owner is still being determined
Jack Smight ( March 9 ,  1925 - सितंबर 1 , 2003 ) थी an  American theatre and film director .
smight थी born in मिनियापोलिस , मिनेसोटा और गई to स्कूल साथ  future actor Peter Graves .
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner ,  खरगोश , चलाएं , मीत युगल , मिडवे , हार्पर , विमानक्षेत्र 1975 , फटकार alley और the एमी पुरस्कार -winning एडी , as खूब as अनेक एपीसोड  of television series such as The Twilight Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour .
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th Cousin  और रचित the म्यूज़िक लिये the फिल्मी adaption of फेंकें of थंडर  Hear My Cry .
Smight  died इससे कर्कट  in Los Angeles , California .
dmitri ivanovich mendeleev ( ; 8 फ़रवरी 1834 – 2 फ़रवरी 1907 o.s . 27 जनवरी  1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a Russian chemist and inventor .
He formulated the Periodic Law , created  उसके अपना संस्करण of the आवधिक तालिका of तत्व , और प्रयुक्त it to सही the गुण of कुछ already खोजा तत्व  and also to predict the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ) , officially the City of Modesto , is  the काउंटी सीट और largest नगर of stanislaus काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया ,  United States .
With a  जनसांख्यिकी of लगभग 201,165 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , modesto बाँधने as  the 18th largest city in the state of California .
The  modesto जनसांख्यिकी काउंटी प्रभाग , जिससे शामिल  the cities of Ceres and Riverbank , has a population of 312,842 as of 2010 .
Modesto  is स्तिथ in the सेंट्रल घाटी क्षेत्रफल of उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , 90 मील उत्तर of fresno , 92 मील ईस्ट of सैन फ्रांसिस्को , 68 मील  south of the state capital of Sacramento , 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park , and 24 miles south of Stockton .
Modesto , a  29-time पेड़ नगर यूएसए honoree , is घिरी by समृद्ध farmland , lending  to a ranking for the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production .
led by मिल्क , बादाम , मुर्गियों , अखरोट , और मकई साइलेज ,  the county grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011 .
Modesto was immortalized in the 1973  जार्ज लुकास फिल्मी अमरीकी graffiti  .
The award winning  फिल्मी captured the स्पिरिट  of `` cruising '' and friendship on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia that included the TV show Happy Days and the other spin-offs .
Ron Howard , Harrison Ford  और रिचर्ड dreyfuss स्ट्रक्चर in  the film .
the साउंडट्रैक थी a विशाल  success .
Director George Lucas is a native  of modesto , graduating इससे downey ऊँची स्कूल  in 1962 .
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011 , which interviews 1,000 participants daily and asks individuals to assess their jobs , finances ,  शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य , emotional राज्य of दिमाग और समुदायों , क्रमित modesto 126 आउट of the 190 शहरों surveyed  .
In December 2009 , Forbes ranked Modesto  48th आउट of 100 among `` बेहतरीन bang-for-the-buck  Cities '' .
In this  रैंकिंग , modesto क्रमित 8th in आवास affordability और सफर समय  but also ranked 86th in job forecast growth and 99th in foreclosures .
Independence Day , commonly known as the Fourth of July , is a  संघीय अवकाश in the संयुक्त राज्य commemorating the अपनाना of the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता on जुलाई 4 , 1776 , declaring स्वतंत्रता  from the Kingdom of Great Britain .
Independence Day is commonly  संबद्ध साथ आतिशबाजी , parades , barbecues , carnivals , मेलों , picnics , कॉन्सर्ट , बेसबॉल खेल , परिवार reunions  , and political speeches and ceremonies , in addition to various other public and private events celebrating the history , government , and traditions of the United States .
Independence Day is  the नेशनल दिन of the संयुक्त  States .
A gender symbol  denotes the sex of an सजीव or characterizes  an agent by gender .
The two standard  लिंग प्रतीकों denoting पुरूष ♂ और मादा ♀ हैं निकला  from astrological symbols , denoting the classical planets Mars and Venus , respectively .
ये प्रतीकों have महरूम in उपयोग चूंकि the पुनर्जागरण भी  denoting elements in alchemy , specifically the metals iron and copper .
They were first used to denote the effective gender  of पौधे ( i.e . sex of व्यक्तिगत in a दिए crossbreed , चूंकि सबसे पौधे  are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751 .
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a temporary  सही to थाम जमीन or प्रॉपर्टी in जिससे a lessee or a किरायेदार holds अधिकारों of रियल प्रॉपर्टी  by some form of title from a lessor or landlord .
Although a tenant does  थाम अधिकारों to रियल प्रॉपर्टी , a leasehold एस्टेट is typically  considered personal property .
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or property tenure where  एक पार्टी खरीदता the सही to occupy जमीन or a  building for a given length of time .
As lease is a legal estate ,  leasehold एस्टेट can be खरीदा  and sold on the open market .
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright and thereafter held for an  अनिर्धार्य लंबाई of समय , और भी differs इससे a tenancy जहाँ a प्रॉपर्टी is let ( rented ) on a आवधिक आधार  such as weekly or monthly .
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in  दशकों or सदियां ; a 99 साल पट्टे is काफी आम ) the leaseholder  has the right to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner .
Terms of  the अनुबंध हैं contained in a  lease , which has elements of contract and property law intertwined .
The term estate for years  may occasionally  be used .
This refers to a leasehold estate for any specific period of time  ( the शब्द `` सालो '' is भ्रामक  ) .
An estate for years is not  automatically नवीनीकृत  .
Colloquially , `` lease '' and `` leasing `` are often a formalization of a longer , specific period as compared with a ``  rental '' कि निर्मित a tenancy at होगा , terminable or बेदर्दी at the समाप्त of a छोटी काल  .
Olivia (  भी ज्ञात as स्वागत to the संसार of the सुअर ओलिविया ) is a british-american children  's animated television series produced by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books .
It is seen  on उपनाम jr. in the  US , Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK  और आयरलैंड , और डिज़्नी जूनियर in लैटिन अमेरिका और ब्राज़ील  , Treehouse TV in Canada .
The show has won a silver Parents  ' चुनाव पुरस्कार लिये इसके धनात्मक स्टोरी  lines and characters .
Location of Panama  between प्रशांत ( नीचे ) और caribbean (  top ) , with canal at top center
The Panama Canal ( ) is a ship canal in Panama that connects the  अटलांटिक समंदर ( via the caribbean समुद्र ) to the प्रशांत  Ocean .
The canal cuts across the  isthmus of पनामा और is a कुंजी conduit  for international maritime trade .
There are locks at each end to lift ships  up to gatun झील ( ऊपर sea-level  ) .
Gatun Lake was  निर्मित to reduce the राशि of कार्य जरूरी  for the canal .
The  वर्तमान ताले  are wide .
A  तीसरा , wider  lane of locks is being built .
France began work on the canal in 1881 , but had to stop  क्युकी of अभियान्त्रिकी समस्याएं और ऊँची मृत्यु  due to disease .
The United States ( US )  बाद took over the प्रोजेक्ट और took a दशक to पूरा the कनाल in 1914 , enabling जहाजों to avoid the lengthy केप सींग रूट  around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan .
One of  the largest और सबसे मुश्किल अभियान्त्रिकी  projects ever undertaken , the Panama Canal shortcut made it possible for ships to travel between the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans in half the time previously required .
The shorter , faster , safer route to the US West Coast and to  राष्ट्र in और साथ the प्रशांत समंदर अनुमत those स्थान  to become more integrated with the world economy .
During this time , ownership of the territory  कि is अभी the पनामा कनाल थी पहला कोलम्बियाई , तब फ्रेंच  , and then American ; the United States completed the construction .
The  कनाल थी लिया over in 1999 by the panamanian  government , as long planned .
Annual traffic has risen from about  1,000 जहाजों जब the कनाल खोली in 1914 , to 14,702 बरतन in 2008 , the latter measuring a कुल of 309.6  million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons .
By 2008 , more  than 815,000 बरतन था passed through the कनाल , अनेक of उन्हें much larger than the  original planners could have envisioned ; the largest ships that can transit the canal today are called Panamax .
The American Society of Civil Engineers has named the Panama  कनाल एक of the सात चमत्कार of the आधुनिक संसार  .
बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन ( अप्रैल 17 , 1790  ) was one of the Founding Fathers of the United States .
A noted polymath , Franklin was a leading author , printer , political theorist ,  राजनेता , postmaster , वैज्ञानिक , संगीतकार , आविष्कारक , satirist , नागरिक activist , statesman  , and diplomat .
As a scientist , he was a  प्रमुख फिगर in the अमरीकी आत्मज्ञान और the इतिहास of भौतिकी लिये उसके  discoveries and theories regarding electricity .
He  invented the बिजली लाठी , bifocals  , the Franklin stove , a carriage odometer , and the glass 'armonica ' .
He facilitated many  नागरिक संगठन , सहित a आग विभाग  and a university .
Franklin earned the title of `` The First American '' for his early and indefatigable campaigning for colonial unity ; as an  लेखक और प्रवक्ता in लंदन लिये अनेक colonies , तब as the पहला संयुक्त राज्य दूत to  France , he exemplified the emerging American nation .
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a  विवाह of the व्यावहारिक मान of thrift , मुश्किल कार्य , शिक्षा , जातियाँ स्पिरिट , self-governing संस्थानों ,  and opposition to authoritarianism both political and religious , with the scientific and tolerant values of the Enlightenment .
In the words of historian Henry Steele Commager , `` In a Franklin  could be मिलाया the virtues of puritanism बगैर इसके  defects , the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat . ''
To Walter Isaacson , this makes  फ्रैंकलिन `` the सबसे संपन्नता अमरीकी of उसके आयु और  the most influential in inventing the type of society America would become . ''
Franklin , always  गर्व of उसके working क्लास जड़ें , became a कामयाब समाचारपत्र एडिटर और मुद्रक  in Philadelphia , the leading city in the colonies .
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three  of जिसको प्रकाशित the पेन्सिलवेनिया वृत्तान्त , a समाचारपत्र कि थी ज्ञात लिये इसके क्रांतिकारी sentiments  and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies .
He became wealthy publishing Poor  रिचर्ड 's almanack और the पेन्सिलवेनिया  Gazette .
Franklin gained  अंतरराष्ट्रीय renown as a वैज्ञानिक लिये उसके प्रसिद्ध प्रयोग in विद्युत  and for his many inventions , especially the lightning rod .
He played a major role in  establishing the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया और थी  elected the first president of the American Philosophical Society .
Franklin became a national hero in America when he  पथप्रदर्शन the प्रयत्न to have पार्लियामेंट repeal the unpopular  Stamp Act .
an संपन्नता राजनयिक , he थी widely admired among the फ्रेंच as अमरीकी मंत्री  to Paris and was a major figure in the development of positive Franco-American relations .
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies , which enabled  उसे to नियत up the पहला नेशनल संचार संजाल  .
He was active in community affairs ,  औपनिवेशिक और राज्य राजनीती , as खूब as नेशनल और अंतरराष्ट्रीय  affairs .
From 1785 to 1788 ,  he परोसा as राज्यपाल of पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Toward the  समाप्त of उसके जीवन , he freed उसके स्लेव और became एक of the सबसे prominent  abolitionists .
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and political achievement , and status as one of America 's most influential Founding Fathers , have seen Franklin  सम्मानित on coinage और धन ; warships ; the names of अनेक कस्बों , काउंटी , शैक्षणिक संस्थानों , namesakes , और कंपनियाँ ; और अधिक than दो सदियां  after his death , countless cultural references .
Criminal Minds is an American  पुलिस प्रक्रियात्मक टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम कि premiered सितंबर  22 , 2005 , on CBS .
The series  फ़ॉलो a टोली of profilers इससे the एफबीआई 's behavioral  Analysis Unit ( BAU ) based in Quantico , Virginia .
the bau is भाग of the एफबीआई नेशनल  Center for the Analysis of Violent Crime .
The  दिखाएँ differs इससे अनेक प्रक्रियात्मक dramas by focusing on प्रोफाइलिंग  the criminal , rather than the crime itself .
The show is produced by The Mark Gordon Company in association with CBS Television Studios ( originally Paramount  संजाल टेलीविज़न तब सीबीएस सर्वोपरि संजाल टेलीविज़न ) और एबीसी studios ( originally touchstone  Television ) .
CBS announced  in अक्तूबर 2009 कि विरासत इंटरैक्टिव  would develop a video game based on the show .
The game would require players to  जाँचें अपराधों दृश्यों लिये clues to  help solve murder mysteries .
The interactive puzzle game was released in 2012 , but did  नहीं विशेषता कोई of the आवाज़ें of the दिखाएँ 's डाल , nor थी the डाल शामिल साथ  the project .
On March 14  , 2012 , सीबीएस नवीनीकृत दण्ड minds लिये an आठवीं ऋतु , जिससे  premiered on September 26 , 2012 .
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a  सोंग by the अमरीकी grunge बैंड निर्वाण , लिखा  by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain .
The song was released as the first single from the group 's  तीसरा और फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम , in utero , in 1993  .
It was one of two songs from the album mixed  by स्कॉट litt in अनुक्रम to augment the असली उत्पादन by निर्माता स्टीव albini .
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a physical single for sale in  the संयुक्त राज्य , `` heart-shaped बक्सा '' प्राप्त much अमरीकी रेडियो airplay , reaching क्रमांक  one on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart .
The international release of the single reached number  पाँच on the uk singles चार्ट  .
the सोंग 's म्यूज़िक वीडियो , निर्देशित  by Anton Corbijn , garnered critical plaudits .
The orbital speed of a body , generally a planet , a natural  उपग्रह , an कृत्रिम उपग्रह , or a अनेक स्टार , is the गति at जिससे it orbits  around the barycenter of a system , usually around a more massive body .
It can be used to refer to either the mean orbital speed , the average speed as it completes an orbit , or  instantaneous कक्षीय गति , the गति at a particular पाइंट in इसके  orbit .
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be computed from the  अलहदा to the सेंट्रल देह at कि स्थिति , और the विशिष्ट कक्षीय उर्जा , जिससे is स्वतंत्र of स्थिति : the  kinetic energy is the total energy minus the potential energy .
Brown Palace  आंतरिक  and Atrium
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest operating hotel in Denver , Colorado  और is एक of the पहला atrium-style होटल कभी  built .
It is now  संचालित by कोरम होटल और  Resorts .
It was built in 1892 , one year  बाद than the ऑक्सफोर्ड  Hotel .
It was named for its original owner ,  हेनरी C. भूरा , और थी designed साथ इसके विषम triangular आकार by वास्तु फ़्रैंक  Edbrooke .
The hotel is located at 321 17th  st , डेनवर , co between 17th गली , ब्रॉडवे और tremont street/pl in  downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza .
The main  प्रवेश द्वार is on tremont गली  .
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs , and is  फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया , उत्तर अमेरिका , यूरोपीय , और ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Discs using the DVD-Video  specification आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव और an h.262/mpeg-2  Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2  संपीडित वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः multi-channel स्वरुप as वर्णित नीचे  ) .
Typically , the data rate for DVD movies ranges  इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s  , and the bit rate is usually adaptive .
It was first  उपलब्धियाँ लिये खुदरा around  1997 .
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum and can be  प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo लाइसेंसिंग निगम लिये a शुल्क  of $ 5,000 .
The specification is not publicly  उपलब्धियाँ , क्युकी प्रत्येक सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure  agreement .
Certain  सूचना in the dvd किताब is मालिकाना  and confidential .
The nautical mile ( symbol M , NM or nmi )  is a ईकाई of लंबाई कि is परिचय एक मिनट of चाप of  latitude measured along any meridian , or about one minute of arc of longitude at the equator .
By international agreement it has been set at 1,852 metres  exactly ( परिचय 6,076 फीट )  .
It is a  non- si ईकाई ( हालांकि स्वीकृत लिये उपयोग in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of इकाई by the bipm  ) used especially by navigators in the shipping and aviation industries , and also in polar exploration .
It is  commonly प्रयुक्त in अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि और  treaties , especially regarding the limits of territorial waters .
It developed  इससे the समुद्र मील और the सम्बन्धित  geographical mile .
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and air  navigators विश्वव्यापी क्युकी of इसके  convenience when working with charts .
Most nautical charts use the Mercator projection whose  स्केल varies by परिचय a फ़ैक्टर of छह इससे the equator to 80° अक्षांश , so चार्ट  covering large areas can not use a single linear scale .
the nautical मील is nearly बराबर to a मिनट of अक्षांश  on a chart , so a distance measured with a chart divider can be roughly converted to nautical miles using the chart 's latitude scale .
Shippensburg is a borough in  कम्बरलैंड और फ्रैंकलिन काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Settled in 1730 , Shippensburg lies in the  कम्बरलैंड घाटी , 41 मील ( 66 km ) west-southwest of harrisburg , और is भाग of the  Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area .
In 1900 , 3,228 people  जिया वहीँ ; in 1910 , 3,457 ; और in 1940 ,  5,244 people lived there .
The population was 5,492  at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Shippensburg  थी incorporated as a बरो  on January 21 , 1819 .
In the past , there were furniture factories ,  इंजन और पंप works , और अन्य औद्योगिक  works located within the town .
shippensburg is भी the घर of the beistle  Company , the oldest and largest manufacturer of decorations and party goods , which sells its distinctive honeycomb paper decorations worldwide .
It is also  the स्थान of pague और fegan , the oldest लगातार संचालित  hardware store in Pennsylvania .
In May 2012 ,  वोल्वो निर्माण उपकरण began a $ 100 लाख  expansion project to bring its American headquarters to Shippensburg .
shippensburg is भी घर to shippensburg विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया , एक of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों  of the Pennsylvania State System of Higher Education .
Yearly the  पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of जुलाई , the shippensburg  Community Fair is held .
Begun in 1958 , the  मेला बिल्स itself as पेन्सिलवेनिया  's largest bi-county fair .
The fair includes  agricultural दर्शाती , a शिल्प दिखाएँ , खाना विक्रेता  , and carnival rides amongst other things .
Every summer on the last Saturday of August , Shippensburg holds the Corn  पर्व , an इवेंट कि brings क्षेत्रीय शिल्पकार और विक्रेता  to operate stands downtown .
The downtown is closed to traffic  लिये at तनिक 5 ब्लॉक लिये सबसे of the  day .
Average  उपस्थिति at the पर्व is अनुमानित  at 60,000 - 70,000 each year .
Black hairy tongue ( BHT , also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition of the  जीभ जहाँ the filiform papillae elongate साथ ब्लैक or भूरा discoloration , giving a ब्लैक और बालदार रूप  .
The appearance  may be alarming , लकिन it is a हानिरहित  condition .
Predisposing factors include smoking , xerostomia (  शुष्क मुँह ) , नरम आहार , ग़रीब मौखिक hygiene और निश्चित  medications .
Management is by improving oral  hygiene , विशेषकर scraping or brushing  the tongue .
The IEEE 1394 interface is a serial bus interface standard for high-speed  संचार और isochronous real-time आंकड़ा ट्रांसफ़र  .
It was developed in the late  1980s और जल्दी 1990s by ठहराना , जो पुकारा it firewire  .
The 1394 interface is comparable to USB , and often  those दो technologies हैं माना साथ , हालांकि usb रै  more market share .
Apple first included FireWire in some of its 1999 models , and most Apple computers  चूंकि the साल 2000 have शामिल firewire पोर्ट , हालांकि , as of 2013 , nothing  beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ) .
The interface is also  ज्ञात by the ब्रांड i.link ( सोनी ) , और  Lynx ( Texas Instruments ) .
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many applications ,  क्युकी of निम्नतर क्रियान्वयन लागत और a सरलीकृत , अधिक अनुकूलनीय  cabling system .
the 1394 मानक भी defines a backplane  interface , though this is not as widely used .
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video Network  गठबंधन ( हाना ) मानक कनेक्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये a/v ( audio/visual ) घटक  communication and control .
FireWire is also available  in बेतार , रेशा ऑप्टिक , और समाक्षीय  versions using the isochronous protocols .
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3 ,  1954 – अगस्त 27 , 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist , singer-songwriter  , and record producer .
Often referred to by his initials SRV , Vaughan  is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य और नेता of  Double Trouble .
Together with drummer Chris Layton  और bassist टॉमी शैनन , वे ignited  the blues revival of the 1980s .
With a career spanning seven  सालो , vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल consistently  sold out concerts while their albums frequently went gold .
He was born and raised in Dallas  , टेक्सास , और लिये a छोटी काल of समय जिया  in Graham , Texas .
As the younger brother of  jimmie vaughan , vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार at आयु सात और formed  several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs .
At age 17 , he  dropped आउट of ऊँची स्कूल और स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके musical  career , joining groups such as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed  ट्रिपल threat revue , a बैंड कि आखिरकार विकसित  into Double Trouble and regularly performed around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble  performed at the montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड , catching the ध्यान  of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance , while Browne offered the band free use  of उसके निजी स्टुडियो in लॉस एंजिल्स to रिकार्ड  an album .
In March 1983 , Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran  रिकार्ड निर्माता जॉन हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम ,  Texas Flood in June of that year .
After successful touring , the group released the albums , Could n't Stand the  मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ) , the latter  of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career had  progressed सफलतापूर्वक , vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया to  give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band .
In June 1989 , In Step was released and  अर्जित उन्हें a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन  Blues Performance .
On August 27 , 1990 ,  vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following a प्रदर्शन  in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense  स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a किस्में of musical  genres .
He was influenced  by ब्लूज़ संगीतकारों सहित अल्बर्ट किंग , फ्रेडी किंग , ओटिस फटाफट , और muddy waters  , and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His guitar playing  reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और pentatonic  scales .
He has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing , ranking at # 6 on  रोलिंग पत्थरों सूची of `` 100 महानतम guitarists  '' in 2011 .
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in  2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम  Shores park .
Stevie Ray  vaughan is widely माना to be एक of the महानतम संगीतकारों to आइये  from the state of Texas .
GigE  redirects  here .
लिये the कैमरा प्रोटोकॉल  , see GigE vision .
In computer networking , gigabit Ethernet ( GbE or 1 GigE )  is a पद describing विभिन्न technologies लिये transmitting ईथरनेट फ्रेम्स at a रेट of a gigabit प्रति दूसरी ( 1,000,000,000 बिट्स प्रति दूसरी ) , as पारिभाषित by  the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard .
it आए into उपयोग शुरूआत in 1999 , धीरे supplanting तेज़ ईथरनेट in  wired local networks , where it performed considerably faster .
The cables and equipment are very  समान to पिछला मानकों और यहूद बहुत आम और किफायती  by 2010 .
half-duplex gigabit कड़ी कनेक्ट through hubs हैं अनुमत by the specification  , but full-duplex usage with switches is much more common .
