The  प्रमुख components  of a stamp:
1 .  चित्र
2 .  perforations
3  . denomination
4 . देश  name
A postage stamp is a  छोटी टुकड़ा of पेपर कि is खरीदा और प्रदर्शित on an मद  of mail as evidence of payment of postage .
Typically , stamps are made from special paper , with a national  नामांकन और denomination ( दाम ) on the फेस , और a  gum adhesive on the reverse side .
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal  प्रशासन or अन्य प्राधिकृत विक्रेता और हैं प्रयुक्त to अदा लिये the लागत शामिल in चलती मेल as खूब as  other business necessities such as insurance and registration .
The  stamp’s आकार is प्रायः कि of a छोटी आयताकार of varying  proportions , though triangles or other shapes are occasionally used .
The stamp is affixed to an envelope or other postal cover ( i.e.  , पैकेट , बक्सा , mailing बेलन ) कि the ग्राहक  wishes to send .
The item is then processed by the postal system , where a postmark , sometimes known as a cancellation  चिह्नित , is प्रायः लागू over the स्टैम्प और कवर ; इस कार्यविधि marks the स्टैम्प as प्रयुक्त , जिससे रोकता  its reuse .
the postmark indicates the  date and point of origin of the mailing .
The mailed item is then delivered  to the पता कि the ग्राहक रै लागू to the लिफाफा or  cover .
Postage  stamps have facilitated the डिलीवरी  of mail since the 1840s .
Before this time , ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ) , usually made from wood  or कॉर्क , यहूद प्रायः प्रयुक्त to फ़्रैंक the मेल और confirm the भुगतान of postage .
The first adhesive postage stamp , commonly referred to  as the पैनी ब्लैक , थी जारी in the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1840  .
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve  the डाक प्रणाली in the संयुक्त किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड , जिससे in the जल्दी 19th सदी थी in अस्तव्यस्तता और  rife with corruption .
There are varying accounts of  the आविष्कारक or आविष्कारक of the स्टैम्प  .
Before the introduction of postage stamps , mail in the UK was paid for by the recipient , a system that was associated with an irresolvable problem : the costs of delivering mail were not recoverable by the postal service when recipients were unable or  unwilling to अदा लिये वितरित वस्तुएं , और प्रेषकों था no प्रोत्साहन to सीमित the क्रमांक , आकार , or वज़न of वस्तुएं भेजा , whether or नहीं वे होता ultimately  be paid for .
The postage stamp resolved this issue  in a सरल और सुरुचिपूर्ण manner , साथ the अतिरिक्त लाभ  of room for an element of beauty to be introduced .
Later related inventions include postal stationery such as prepaid-postage envelopes , post cards , lettercards ,  aerogrammes और wrappers , postage मीटर , और , अधिक recently , specialty बाक्स और लिफाफे provided  free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing .
The postage stamp afforded convenience for both the mailer and postal officials , more  efficiently बरामद लागत लिये the डाक सेवा , और ultimately resulted in a बेहतर , तेज़ डाक  system .
With the conveniences stamps offered , their use resulted in greatly increased  mailings दौरान the 19th और 20th सदियां  .
Postage stamps during this era  यहूद the सबसे लोकप्रिय रास्ता of paying लिये मेल , लकिन by the समाप्त of the 20th सदी यहूद rapidly होने आत by the उपयोग of metered postage  and bulk mailing by businesses . )
The same result with respect to communications by  निजी पार्टियों occurred over the पिछला दशक of the 20th सदी और  the first decade of the 21st due to declining cost of long distance telephone communications and the development and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had .
As  postage stamps साथ उनके engraved imagery began  to appear on a widespread basis , historians and collectors began to take notice .
The study of postage stamps and their  उपयोग is referred to as philately  .
Stamp collecting can be both a hobby and a form of historical study and reference , as  government-issued postage stamps और उनके mailing प्रणालियों have सदा महरूम  involved with the history of nations .
The University of Alabama at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a  पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों in बर्मिंघम in the u.S. राज्य of अलबामा  .
Developing from an extension center  स्थापित in 1936 , the संस्था became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 और is आज एक of तीन संस्थानों  in the University of Alabama System .
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic divisions leading to bachelor 's , master 's , doctoral , and professional degrees in the social and  behavioral sciences , the उदार कला , कारोबार , शिक्षा , अभियान्त्रिकी , और health-related फ़ील्ड ऐसे as आयुर्विज्ञान , dentistry , optometry  , nursing , and public health .
The school is highly renowned for  इसके चिकित्सा शोध और प्राकृतिक  sciences programs .
The UAB Health System , one of  the largest अकादमिक चिकित्सा centers in the संयुक्त राज्य ,  is affiliated with the university .
uab हॉस्पिटल प्रायोजकों रेसिडेंसी कार्यक्रम in विभिन्न चिकित्सा specialties  , including internal medicine , neurology , surgery , radiology , and anesthesiology .
UAB Hospital is the only ACS verified Level I trauma center in Alabama , as rated  by the अमरीकी कॉलेज of अध्येतावृत्ति आघात कार्यक्रम  .
UAB is the state 's  largest नियोक्ता , साथ अधिक than 18,000 संकाय और स्टाफ और over 53,000 कार्य  at the university and in the health system .
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover  महानगर क्षेत्रफल और 1 in 33 कार्य in the राज्य of  Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों 's overall सालाना आर्थिक  impact was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010 .
In the fall of 2012 , the University of Alabama at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 students from more than  110 देशों , सहित 1,605 freshmen  .
वहीँ हैं योजनाएँ to commence साथ an  `` aggressive '' growth in enrollment at UAB .
The current UAB President is  dr. रे L. watts  .
Tofu , also called bean curd , is a food made by  coagulating सोया रस और तब दबाने the resulting  curds into soft white blocks .
It is a  घटक in अनेक ईस्ट एशियाई और southeast  Asian cuisines .
There are  अनेक अलग किस्में of टोफू , सहित भैस  tofu and tofu that has been processed in some way .
Tofu has a subtle  स्वाद और can be प्रयुक्त in savory और  sweet dishes .
It is often seasoned or  marinated to सूट the डिश  .
टोफू originated in प्राचीन  China some 2,000 years ago .
Chinese legend ascribes its  आविष्कार to प्रिंस लियू an ( चाइनीज : 劉安 liú ān  , 179–122 BC ) .
Tofu and its  उत्पादन तकनीक यहूद introduced into कोरियाई  and then Japan during the Nara period .
It spread into other  भाग of ईस्ट एशिया as खूब  .
This spread likely  coincided साथ the स्प्रेड of buddhism क्युकी it is an  important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism .
Li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty  वर्णित a विधि of बनाना  tofu in Bencao Gangmu .
Tofu  रै a कम कैलोरी गिनती , अपेक्षाकृत  large amounts of protein , and little fat .
It is high in iron and depending on the coagulant used in  निर्माण , may भी be ऊँची in कैल्सियम and/or मैग्नीशियम  .
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee , known for being the one-time pet of American  रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार माइकल जैक्सन , जो खरीदा the primate इससे a टेक्सास शोध सुविधा  in the early 1980s .
The animal was a  बारंबार सफर साथी to the सिंगर , जिनकी अनुलग्नक to the एनिमल led to मीडिया mockery और ,  among other factors , to a public perception of Jackson as an eccentric .
During  the ख़राब संसार दौरे , लिये उदाहरण , जैक्सन brought  Bubbles with him to Japan , where they both drank tea with the mayor of Osaka .
बुलबुले थी initially रखा at the जैक्सन परिवार 's घर in encino ,  Los Angeles , but was moved to Neverland Ranch in 1988 .
There , he  slept in a crib in जैक्सन 's बेडरूम , प्रयुक्त the  singer 's toilet , and ate candy in the Neverland movie theater .
In 2003 the public learned that , like all captive chimpanzees , Bubbles had  matured into a विशाल और आक्रामक वयस्क chimp unsuitable  as a companion animal .
He was sent to a California animal trainer , where he  थी reported to have attempted आत्महत्या .
When the trainer shut down his operation in  2004 , बुलबुले थी स्थानांतरित to the बीच लिये ग्रेट apes , a अभयारण्य in wauchula  , Florida , where he has lived since 2005 .
Muse are an English rock band from  teignmouth , देवों , जिससे formed  in 1994 .
The band consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals , lead guitar , piano ,  keyboards , keytar ) , क्रिस्टोफर wolstenholme ( बास , vocals , keyboards , लय गिटार , हार्मोनिका  ) and Dominic Howard ( drums , percussion , synthesisers , sampling ) .
Since the release of their  2006 एल्बम ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे , keyboardist और percussionist मॉर्गन  Nicholls has performed live with the band .
चिंतन हैं ज्ञात लिये उनके ऊर्जावान और हद सजीव प्रदर्शन  and their fusion of many music genres , including space rock , progressive rock , alternative rock , heavy metal , classical music and electronica .
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ) , Origin of Symmetry ( 2001 ) , Absolution ( 2003 ) ,  ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे ( 2006 ) , the प्रतिरोध ( 2009 ) और the 2nd विधि ( 2012  ) .
They have also issued three live albums , Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ) , which is also a compilation of B-sides , Absolution Tour ( 2005 ) , and  haarp ( 2008 ) , जिससे दस्तावेज़ the बैंड 's प्रदर्शन at वेम्बली स्टेडियम  in 2007 .
Black Holes and Revelations earned  the बैंड a पारा पुरस्कार नामांकन और a तीसरा प्लेस समाप्त in the  NME Albums of the Year list for 2006 .
Muse have also won a collection of music awards throughout their history , including five MTV Europe Music Awards , six Q Awards , eight NME Awards , two Brit Awards  —winning `` बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों सजीव अधिनियम '' twice , an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , चार kerrang  !
Awards and an  अमरीकी म्यूज़िक  Award .
They were also nominated for five Grammy Awards  , of जिससे वे जीती बेहतरीन चट्टान एल्बम , लिये उनके पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम the प्रतिरोध ( 2009  ) .
Muse have sold over  15 लाख एल्बम  worldwide .
Bloemfontein ( , ; Dutch for `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the  पूंजी नगर of the फ़्री राज्य प्रांत of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; और , as the न्यायिक पूंजी of the स्वदेश , एक of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी  's three national capitals – the other two being Cape Town , the legislative capital , and Pretoria , the administrative capital .
Bloemfontein is  popularly और poetically ज्ञात as `` the नगर  of roses `` , owing to the abundance of these flowers and the annual rose festival held there .
The city 's Sesotho name is  mangaung , अर्थ `` प्लेस of cheetahs ``  and it has been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000 .
Bloemfontein is  situated on शुष्क घासभूमि at , at an  altitude of above sea level .
the नगर is घर to 369,568 निवासियों , जबकि the mangaung लोकल नगरपालिका  has a population of 645,455 .
Where Do  we आइये इससे  ?
कया हैं we  ?
जहाँ हैं  We Going ?

The meaning of life is a philosophical question  concerning the significance of जीवन  or existence in general .
It can also be expressed in different forms , such as `` Why are we  यहाँ ? `` , `` कया is जीवन सब परिचय ? `` , और `` कया is the purpose of अस्तित्व ?  ''
It has been the subject of much philosophical ,  वैज्ञानिक , और theological अटकलें throughout इतिहास  .
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these questions from many  अलग सांस्कृतिक और वैचारिक  backgrounds .
The meaning of life is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence , social ties , consciousness , and happiness , and borders on many other issues , such as symbolic meaning , ontology , value , purpose , ethics , good and evil , free  होगा , the अस्तित्व of एक or अनेक देवताओं , conceptions of परमेश्वर , the आत्मा , और the आफ्टरलाइफ  .
Scientific contributions  फ़ोकस primarily on describing सम्बन्धित अनुभवजन्य तथ्य परिचय the ब्रह्मांड , exploring the कॉन्टेक्स्ट और  parameters concerning the 'how ' of life .
Science also studies and  can provide सुझाव लिये  the pursuit of well-being and a related conception of morality .
An alternative ,  humanistic दृष्टिकोण मुद्राएँ the सवाल `` कया  is the meaning of my life ? ''
The value of the question pertaining to the purpose of life  may coincide साथ the उपलब्धि of परम  reality , or a feeling of oneness , or even a feeling of sacredness .
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides  the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin , stewie griffin , ब्रायन griffin , और  Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features five main voice actors ,  और numerous नियमित डाल और पुनरावर्ती अतिथि सितारों  .
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane  , एलेक्स borstein , सेठ ग्रीन , mila kunis ( जो replaced लेसी chabert बाद  the first season ) and Mike Henry and now , the new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam West , John  G. ब्रेनन , निकोल सुलीवान और जेनिफर tilly , और repeat अतिथि सितारों शामिल फिलिस  Diller , Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast  सदस्यों provide आवाज़ें लिये अनेक  characters .
The voice actors  , in portraying the विभिन्न अक्षर personalities  on the show , draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture .
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one actor  , बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ बाएँ the श्रेणी or था conflicting दायित्वों  .
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won an  एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न उत्पादन , हालांकि no अन्य डाल सदस्य रै जीती an पुरस्कार  for their work on the series .
1911 उदाहरण  by Edmund Dulac
`` The Princess and the Pea '' ( ; literal translation : ``  the राजकुमारी on the मटर '' ) is a साहित्यिक परी टेल by hans ईसाई andersen परिचय a यंग स्त्री जिनकी royal पहचान  is established by a test of her physical sensitivity .
The tale was first published with three others by Andersen in an inexpensive  पुस्तिका on 8 may 1835 in कोपेनहेगन by c.a . reitzel  .
Andersen had heard the story as a child , and it likely has its source in folk material , possibly  originating इससे स्वीडन as it is अनजान in the डैनिश मौखिक परंपरा  .
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other tales of 1835  यहूद खूब प्राप्त by डैनिश आलोचकों , जो disliked उनके कैज़ुअल , chatty स्टाइल , और उनके कमी of नैतिकता  .
In 1959 `` The Princess and  the मटर '' थी adapted to the musical स्टेज in a उत्पादन पुकारा  Once Upon a Mattress starring Carol Burnett .
German Americans ( ) are citizens of the United  राज्य जो यहूद either born in जर्मनी or हैं of जर्मनी ancestry  .
They comprise  परिचय 50 लाख लोगों , बनाना उन्हें the largest ancestry समूह ahead of  Irish Americans , African Americans and English Americans .
They comprise about 1/3  of the जर्मनी diaspora सब  over the world .
None of the  जर्मनी राज्य था नई संसार colonies  .
Not until the 1670s did the  पहला significant समूह of जर्मनी आप्रवासियों arrive in the अंग्रेजों  colonies , settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania .
Immigration continued in very large numbers  दौरान the 19th सदी , साथ कुछ  eight million arrivals from Germany .
They were pulled by the attractions of land and religious freedom , and pushed out of Europe by  shortages of जमीन और धार्मिक or राजनैतिक दमन  .
Many arrived seeking religious or political freedom , others for economic  अवसर वृहद than those in यूरोपीय , और अन्य बस लिये  the chance to start fresh in the New World .
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly  किसानो जो sought आउट the सबसे उत्पादक  land , where their intensive farming techniques would pay off .
After 1840 , many  आए to शहरों , जहाँ `` germania '' —german-speaking  districts—soon emerged .
German Americans established the first  kindergartens in the संयुक्त राज्य , introduced the क्रिसमस पेड़ परंपरा , और originated  popular American foods such as hot dogs and hamburgers .
जर्मनी अमरीकी जश्न हैं आयोजित throughout the देश , एक of the सबसे  well-known being the German-American Steuben Parade in New York City , held every third Saturday in September .
There are also major annual events in  शिकागो , सिनसिनाटी , मिल्वौकी , पिट्सबर्ग , st. लुई और  other cities .
Like many other immigrants that came to the United States , an overwhelming number of people  of जर्मनी or आंशिक जर्मनी descent have essentially  become Americanized .
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a brief introductory  बयान of the संविधान 's आधारभूत उद्देश्य और guiding सिद्धान्त  .
It states in general terms , and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of , the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the  संविधान 's अर्थ और कया वे hoped the संविधान होता achieve as it pertains to  all of the people of the United States .
As the phrase , `` we the people '' suggests  कि the नई सरकारी originates इससे the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य और it सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत अधिकारों और समता among सब लोगों ; इस can be देखी सबसे broadly in the  divide between republicanism and social democracy .
The history of the Internet began with the development of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर in the 1950s  .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent  over the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर विज्ञान प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , लॉस एंजिल्स  ( UCLA ) , after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks  ऐसे as arpanet , चिह्नित i at npl in the uk , cyclades , मेरिट संजाल , tymnet , और telenet  , were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for  internetworking , in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could be joined साथ  into a network of networks .
In 1982 , the Internet protocol suite (  tcp/ip ) थी मानकीकृत , और नतीजतन , the अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल of interconnected  TCP/IP networks , called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the  कंप्यूटर विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet ) और again in 1986 जब nsfnet provided अभिगम to महासंगणक साइट in  the United States from research and education organizations .
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to  emerge in the लेट 1980s और जल्दी 1990s  .
The  arpanet थी decommissioned  in 1990 .
The Internet was  commercialized in 1995 जब nsfnet थी decommissioned , निकालना  the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic .
Since the mid-1990s , the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture  और कॉमर्स , सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल , तत्काल messaging , आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '' , two-way  interactive video calls , and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums , blogs , social networking , and online shopping sites .
The research and education community continues to develop and use advanced  संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति रीढ़ संजाल सेवा  ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are  transmitted at उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over रेशा  optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s , 10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the year  1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated सूचना  by 2007 .
Today the Internet continues to grow , driven by ever greater amounts of online  सूचना , कॉमर्स , entertainment , और सोशल  networking .
दक्षिणपश्चिम एयरलाइंस co. ( ) is a प्रमुख u.S. एयरलाइन और the संसार 's  largest low-cost carrier , headquartered in Dallas , Texas .
It  थी स्थापित in 1967 और अपनाया  its current name in 1971 .
The airline has more than 46,000  कर्मचारी और operates अधिक than 3,400 फ़्लाइट  per day .
As of June 5 , 2011 , it carries the most  घरेलू यात्री  of any U.S. airline .
As of April 2013 , Southwest Airlines  रै अनुसूचित सेवा to 84 गंतव्यों in 41 राज्य और प्यूर्टो  Rico .
Southwest Airlines has solely operated Boeing 737s , except for  a few सालो in the 1970s और 1980s , जब it संचालित  Boeing 727s .
As of August 2012 , Southwest is the largest  ऑपरेटर of the 737 विश्वव्यापी साथ over 550  in service , each operating an average of six flights per day .
In May 2011 , the airline acquired AirTran  एयरवेज़ , साथ संयोजन of the वाहक अपेक्षित to be  complete by 2014 .
On March 1  , 2012 , the कम्पनी थी जारी a सिंगल ऑपरेटिंग  certificate , technically becoming one airline .
Rolling Rock is  a 4.6 % abv पाले lager शुभारम्भ in  1939 by the Latrobe Brewing Company .
Although founded as a local beer in Western Pennsylvania , it was marketed  aggressively और आखिरकार became a नेशनल उत्पाद  .
The brand was sold to Anheuser-Busch of  st. लुई , मिसौरी , in मिड 2006 ,  which transferred brewing operations to New Jersey .
बेनेडिक्ट xvi ( , , ; born जोसेफ aloisius ratzinger on 16 अप्रैल  1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the Catholic Church .
He  परोसा as पोप इससे 2005  to 2013 .
In that position  , he थी दोनो the नेता of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और  Sovereign of the Vatican City State .
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a  papal conclave , मनाये उसके papal उद्घाटन द्रव्यमान on 24 अप्रैल 2005 , और took  possession of his cathedral , the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran , on 7 May 2005 .
ordained as a पुजारी in 1951 in उसके देशी बायर्न , ratzinger स्थापित खुद as a अत्यधिक  regarded university theologian by the late 1950s and was appointed a full professor in 1958 .
After a long career as an  अकादमिक , सेवारत as a प्राध्यापक of धर्मशास्त्र at अनेक जर्मनी universities—the पिछला होने the विश्वविद्यालयों of regensburg , जहाँ  he served as Vice President of the university in 1976 and 1977—he was appointed Archbishop of Munich and Freising and cardinal by Pope Paul VI in 1977 , an unusual promotion for someone with little pastoral experience .
In  1981 , he settled in रोम जब he became prefect of the सभा लिये the doctrine of the आस्था  , one of the most important dicasteries of the Roman Curia .
From 2002 until his election as pope , he was also Dean of the  कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स , और as ऐसे , the प्राइमस इंटर pares among the कार्डिनल्स  .
Prior to  बनने पोप , he थी `` a प्रमुख फिगर on the वेटिकन स्टेज लिये a क्वार्टर of a सदी '' as `` एक of the सबसे आदरणीय , influential  and controversial members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an influence `` second to none when it came to setting church priorities and directions '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants .
He was  originally a उदार theologian , लकिन अपनाया  conservative views after 1968 .
His prolific  कृतियाँ बचाव परंपरागत  Catholic doctrine and values .
दौरान उसके papacy , बेनेडिक्ट xvi  advocated a return to fundamental Christian values to counter the increased secularisation of many Western countries .
He views relativism 's denial of objective truth , and  the denial of moral सच्चाई in particular , as the सेंट्रल प्रॉब्लम  of the 21st century .
He taught  the महत्व of दोनो the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और an समझना  of God 's redemptive love .
पोप बेनेडिक्ट भी revived a क्रमांक of परंपराओं सहित  elevating the Tridentine Mass to a more prominent position .
He renewed the relationship between the Catholic Church and art , viewing the use of beauty as a path to the sacred , promoted the use of  लैटिन , और reintroduced परंपरागत papal garments , लिये जिससे कारण he थी पुकारा `` the पोप  of aesthetics '' .
he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` the प्रमुख बौद्धिक  force in the Church '' since the mid-1980s .
अनेक of पोप बेनेडिक्ट 's विद्यार्थी इससे  his academic career are also prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him , notably Christoph Schönborn .
On 11 February 2013 , Pope Benedict announced his  इस्तीफा in a वाक in लैटिन पहले the कार्डिनल्स , citing a `` कमी of शक्ति of दिमाग और देह '' due to उसके  advanced age .
His resignation  became प्रभावी on 28 फ़रवरी 2013  .
He is the first pope to resign since Pope  ग्रेगरी बारहवीं in 1415 , और the पहला to do so on उसके अपना पहल चूंकि पोप celestine  V in 1294 .
As  पोप emeritus , बेनेडिक्ट retains the स्टाइल of उसके पवित्रता , और the शीर्षक of  Pope , and will continue to dress in the papal colour of white .
He was succeeded by Pope Francis on 13  कूच 2013 , और he स्थानांतरित into the newly संवर मेटर  Ecclesiae monastery for his retirement on 2 May 2013..
Pocket  stereoscope साथ असली  test image .
प्रयुक्त by सैन्य to जाँचें stereoscopic  pairs of aerial photographs .
View of Boston , c. 1860 ; an early  stereoscopic कार्ड लिये देखने a झाँकी इससे  nature
Kaiser-Panorama  consisted of a multi-station देखने  apparatus and sets of stereo slides .
Patented by A.  fuhrmann around 1890 .
Company of ladies watching stereoscopic  छायाचित्र , पेंटिंग by याक़ूब  Spoel , before 1868 .
A very early depiction  of लोगों using a stereoscope  .
Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique for  बनाना or बढ़ाना the भ्रम of गहराई in an चित्र by अर्थात् of stereopsis लिये binocular  vision .
The  शब्द stereoscopy गर्भाशयी इससे the यूनानी `` στερεός '' ( stereos ) , `` कड़ , ठोस  '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ) , `` to look '' , `` to see '' .
Most stereoscopic methods present two offset images  separately to the बाएँ और सही नजर  of the viewer .
These two-dimensional  बिंब हैं तब संयुक्त in the दिमाग  to give the perception of 3D depth .
This technique is distinguished from 3D displays that display an image in three full dimensions , allowing  the निरीक्षक to बढ़ाएँ सूचना परिचय the 3-dimensional वस्तुएँ होने प्रदर्शित by सिर और नजर  movements .
John Adams ( October 30 , 1735 ( O.S . October 19 , 1735 ) – July 4 , 1826 ) was the second president of the United States (  1797–1801 ) , having पहले परोसा as the पहला वाइस अध्यक्ष  of the United States .
An American Founding Father , he was a statesman  , राजनयिक , और a अग्रणी एडवोकेट  of American independence from Great Britain .
Well  शिक्षित , he थी an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism  and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas , both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
Adams came to  prominence  in the early stages of the American Revolution .
A lawyer and public  फिगर in बोस्टन , as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स  to the Continental Congress , he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
He assisted Thomas  जेफरसन in drafting the घोषणा  of Independence in 1776 , and was its primary advocate in the Congress .
Later , as a diplomat in Europe , he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty  साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , और थी जिम्मेदार लिये obtaining vital सरकारी लोन इससे एम्सटर्डम  bankers .
A political theorist and historian , Adams largely wrote the  मैसाचुसेट्स संविधान in 1780 , जिससे साथ साथ उसके पहले विचार on सरकारी , बहकावे अमरीकी  political thought .
One of his  महानतम भूमिकाएँ थी as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर : in 1775 , he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief , और 25 सालो बाद मनोनीत जॉन मार्शल  to be Chief Justice of the United States .
Adams '  क्रांतिकारी श्रेय secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस अध्यक्ष और उसके  own election in 1796 as the second president .
During his one term , he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans , as  खूब as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना federalist पार्टी led by उसके कड़वा दुश्मन सिकंदर हैमिल्टन  .
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts , and built up  the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in the फेस of an undeclared नवल युद्ध ( पुकारा the `` quasi-war `` ) साथ फ़्रांस  , 1798–1800 .
The major  accomplishment of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of  the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition .
In 1800 , Adams was  पराजित लिये re-election by थामस जेफरसन और  retired to Massachusetts .
He later resumed  उसके दोस्ती साथ जेफरसन  .
He and his wife , Abigail Adams , founded an  संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता , राजनयिकों , और इतिहासकारों अभी referred to as the एडम्स  political family .
Adams  थी the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स , the  sixth President of the United States .
His achievements have received greater  मान्यता in आधुनिक टाइम्स , हालांकि उसके योगदान यहूद  not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders .
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside  in the भवन कि आखिरकार became  known as the White House .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a  denomination of संयुक्त राज्य करेंसी  .
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury (  1789–95 ) , सिकंदर हैमिल्टन , is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the  obverse of the bill , while the U.S. Treasury Building is featured on the reverse .
(  हैमिल्टन is एक of दो non-presidents  featured on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other is Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन , on the $ 100 विधेयक  .
Hamilton is one of  तभी चार लोगों प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to  the present ) who was not born in the continental United States , as he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George  meade , स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस , इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ;  $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In addition , Kamehameha I  , appears on the 2008 हवाई  state quarter . )
All $ 10 bills  जारी आज हैं संघीय  Reserve Notes .
The Bureau of  नक्काशी और मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक  in circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear .
लगभग 6 % of सब us banknotes मुद्रित  in 2009 were $ 10 bills .
Ten  डालर बिल्स हैं वितरित by संघीय  Reserve Banks in yellow straps .
The source  of the फेस on the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट  of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall .
The $ 10 bill is  the तभी u.S. पेपर करेंसी in परिसंचरण in जिससे the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the बाएँ ( the  $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left , but was used only for intra-government transactions ) .

A jetboat is a boat  propelled by a जेट of जल ejected  from the back of the craft .
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that  उपयोग a propeller in the जल नीचे or पीछे the नाव , a jetboat draws the जल इससे अंतर्गत the नाव into a  pump inside the boat , then expels it through a nozzle at the stern .
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who developed a waterjet in 1954 ) for operation in the  fast-flowing और उथले नदियाँ of नई जीलैंड , specifically to overcome  the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters .
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had very short lifetimes , generally due to  the अकुशल डिज़ाइन of the इकाई और the फैक्ट कि वे offered few लाभ over conventional  propellers .
Unlike these previous waterjet developments ,  ऐसे as campini 's और the hanley hydrojet , हैमिल्टन था a विशिष्ट need  for a propulsion system to operate in very-shallow water , and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution .
From  इस , the लोकप्रियता of the जेट ईकाई  and jetboat increased rapidly .
Through further developments , it  थी मिला the waterjet offered अनेक अन्य लाभ over propellers लिये a चौड़ी दायरा  of vessel types , and as such , waterjets are used widely today for many high-speed vessels , including passenger ferries , rescue craft , patrol boats and offshore supply vessels .
Jetboats  हैं अत्यधिक maneuverable , और अनेक can , इससे पूरा गति , be reversed और brought to  a stop within little more than their own length , in a maneuver known as a `` crash stop '' .
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the boat 's engine throttle is cut , the steering is  turned sharply और the throttle खोली again , causing the नाव to स्पिन जल्दी  around with a large spray of water .
There is no engineering limit to the size of jetboats ,  हालांकि the वैध of उनके उपयोग depends a लॉट on the प्रकार of अनुप्रयोग  .
Classic prop-drives are generally  अधिक कुशल और किफायती at कम speeds , up to परिचय , लकिन as नाव गति increases परे इस , the  extra hull resistance generated by struts , rudders , shafts ( etc . ) means waterjets are more efficient in the 20-50 knot range ( up to ) .
Also , in situations with very  विशाल propellers turning at slow speeds ( ऐसे as tug  boats ) , the equivalent size waterjet would be too big to be practical .
For these reasons , the vast  बहुमत of waterjet इकाई हैं संस्थापित in high-speed बरतन और in particular परिस्थितियों जहाँ उथले draught  , maneuverability , and load flexibility are main concerns .
The  biggest jet-driven बरतन हैं मिला in सैन्य उपयोग  or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry .
South  अफ़्रीकी 's s ( लगभग long  ) are the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far .
Even these German-built  बरतन हैं सक्षम of performing  `` crash stops '' .
uveitis is broadly पारिभाषित as सूजन  of the uvea .
the uvea consists of the मध्य , pigmented , vascular structures  of the eye and includes the iris , ciliary body , and choroid .
Uveitis requires an urgent referral and thorough  परिक्षा by an ophthalmologist or optometrist साथ साथ तात्कालिक उपचार  to control the inflammation .

Murphy is a  fictional अक्षर on the comedy-drama टेलीविज़न  series Entourage .
He is  निभाई by केविन connolly  .
The Shining is a 1980 psychological horror  फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by स्टेनली kubrick , co-written साथ उपन्यासकार डायने जॉनसन , और अभिनीत जोकर निकोल्सन , शेली duvall , scatman  Crothers , and Danny Lloyd .
The film is based on  the स्टीफन किंग अनोखा  The Shining .
A writer ,  जोकर torrance , takes a जॉब as an off-season  caretaker at an isolated hotel .
His young son possesses  मानसिक abilities और is समर्थ to देखिए बाते इससे the पास्ट और भविष्य  , such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel .
Soon after settling in , the family is trapped in the hotel by a snowstorm , and Jack gradually becomes  बहकावे by a अलौकिक उपस्थिति ; he उतरता into दीवानगी और कोशिशें to हत्या उसके  wife and son .
Unlike previous  kubrick films , जिससे विकसित an दर्शक धीरे by भवन  on word-of-mouth , The Shining was released as a mass-market film , opening at first in just two cities on Memorial Day , then nationwide a month later .
Although initial response to the film was mixed , later  नाजुक मूल्यांकन थी अधिक अनुकूल और it is अभी viewed as a क्लासिक of the हॉरर विधा  .
Film director Martin Scorsese ,  लिखने in the रोज़ जानवर , क्रमित it as एक of the 11 scariest  horror movies of all time .
Film critics , film students , and Kubrick 's  निर्माता , जन harlan , have remarked on the  enormous influence the film has had on popular culture .
The initial European release of The Shining  थी 25 मिनट्स shorter than the अमरीकी संस्करण , हासिल by निकालना सबसे of the  scenes taking place outside the environs of the hotel .
आँगन कोला  Bottle
आँगन आहार कोला थी a ब्रांड  of diet soda introduced by Pepsi in 1963 .
It was created in response to  आहार रीति कोला , जिससे थी the पहला आहार  cola on the market .
Fitness  प्रवर्तक डिब्बी ड्रेक थी आँगन आहार कोला 's प्रवक्ता  .
In  1964 , आँगन released नारंगी ,  grape , and root beer flavors .
This  स्वाद लकीर थी नहीं meant to compete साथ ब्रांड्स  like Orange Crush , but rather fill out the line .
Patio sodas were available in the  cold-bottle मार्केट : किराना  and mom-and-pop stores .
विज्ञापन लिये आँगन थी comparatively scarce ; at the समय , bottlers यहूद regionally franchised , और  related advertising was necessarily local .
In 1964 , Patio diet  कोला became आहार पेप्सी  .
The newly branded diet soda was advertised alongside Pepsi with the tagline `` Pepsi  either रास्ता '' , जिससे replaced the स्लोगन `` dances  with flavor '' .
The short  जीवन स्पैन of आँगन आहार  cola makes it a great addition for bottle collectors .
Most of the remaining Patio line of flavors were phased  आउट by the जल्दी 1970s , जबकि a few बच जबतक the  mid 70s
अवसंरचना is मौलिक शारीरिक और organizational structures needed लिये the आपरेशन of a समाज or एंटरप्राइज़  , or the services and facilities necessary for an economy to function .
It can be generally defined as the set of  interconnected संरचनात्मक तत्व कि provide फ्रेमवर्क supporting an संपूर्ण  structure of development .
It is  an महत्वपूर्ण पद लिये judging a देश  or region 's development .
The  पद typically refers to the तकनीकी structures कि support a समाज , ऐसे as सड़कें , पुलों , जल सप्लाई , sewers , विद्युत ग्रिड , दूरसंचार , और so forth , और can be पारिभाषित as `` the  physical components of interrelated systems providing commodities and services essential to enable , sustain , or enhance societal living conditions . ''
Viewed functionally , infrastructure facilitates the production of  goods और सेवाएं , और भी the वितरण of समाप्त उत्पाद to बाज़ार , as खूब as मौलिक सोशल सेवाएं  such as schools and hospitals ; for example , roads enable the transport of raw materials to a factory .
In military parlance , the term refers to the buildings and permanent  संस्थापना जरुरी लिये the support , redeployment , और आपरेशन of  military forces .
To make it simple , infrastructure is anything  कि is needed रोज , an रोज  item .
A graphical representation of  the आदर्श इंसान karyotype
mitochondrial डीएनए  .
Human genetic variation is the genetic differences  दोनो भीतर और among populations  .
There may  be अनेक विसंगतियाँ of कोई दिए जीन  in the human population ( genes ) , leading to polymorphism .
अनेक जीनों हैं नहीं बहुरूपी , अर्थ कि तभी a सिंगल allele is  present in the population : the gene is then said to be fixed .
no दो इंसानो हैं  genetically identical .
Even  monozygotic जुड़वा , जो develop इससे एक zygote , have infrequent जेनेटिक मतभेद due to mutations occurring  during development and gene copy number variation .
Differences between individuals ,  भी closely सम्बन्धित individuals , हैं the कुंजी  to techniques such as genetic fingerprinting .
Alleles occur at different frequencies  in अलग इंसान populations , साथ populations कि हैं अधिक  geographically and ancestrally remote tending to differ more .
कल्याणकारी of मतभेद between individuals शामिल the एक्सचेंज  of genes during meiosis and various mutational events .
There  हैं at तनिक दो कारण क्यों जेनेटिक  variation exists between populations .
Natural selection may  confer an अनुकूली लाभ to individuals in a विशिष्ट पर्यावरण  if an allele provides a competitive advantage .
Alleles under selection are  संभावित to occur तभी in those भौगोलिक regions  where they confer an advantage .
The  दूसरी प्रमुख कारण of जेनेटिक विभिन्नता is due to the ऊँची  degree of neutrality of most mutations .
Most mutations do not appear to  have कोई चयनात्मक  effect one way or the other on the organism .
The main cause is genetic  बहाव , इस is the प्रभाव of यादृच्छिक  changes in the gene pool .
In humans ,  संस्थापक प्रभाव और पास्ट छोटी जनसांख्यिकी आकार ( increasing the likelihood of जेनेटिक  drift ) may have had an important influence in neutral differences between populations .
The theory that  इंसानो recently migrated आउट  of Africa supports this .
The study of human genetic  विभिन्नता रै दोनो विकासवादी significance और  medical applications .
It can help  वैज्ञानिकों समझे प्राचीन इंसान जनसांख्यिकी migrations as खूब  as how different human groups are biologically related to one another .
लिये आयुर्विज्ञान , पढ़ाई of इंसान जेनेटिक विभिन्नता  may be important because some disease-causing alleles occur more often in people from specific geographic regions .
New findings show  कि प्रत्येक इंसान रै on औसत 60 नई  mutations compared to their parents .
Apart from  mutations , अनेक जीनों कि may have  aided humans in ancient times plague humans today .
For example , it is suspected that genes that  allow इंसानो to अधिक efficiently प्रक्रम खाना हैं those कि मेक लोगों susceptible  to obesity and diabetes today .
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol and the  नेशनल मॉल at the करदाताओं कूच on वॉशिंगटन on सितंबर 12  , 2009 .
The Tea Party movement is an American political movement that advocates strict adherence to the United States  संविधान , reducing u.S. सरकारी बिता और कर , और कटौती of the u.S. नेशनल कर्ज़ और संघीय बजट  deficit .
The movement  रै महरूम पुकारा  partly conservative , partly libertarian , and partly populist .
The movement has  प्रायोजित विरोध और समर्थित राजनैतिक उम्मीदवार  since 2009 .
The name of the movement is derived from the Boston  चाय पार्टी of 1773 , an iconic इवेंट in अमरीकी  history .
Anti-tax protesters in the United States have  प्रायः referred to the असली बोस्टन चाय पार्टी  for inspiration .
सन्दर्भ to the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी यहूद भाग of कर  Day protests held throughout the 1990s and earlier .
By 2001 , a custom had developed  among कुछ रूढ़िवादी कार्यकर्ताओं of mailing चाय बैग to विधायक और  other officials as a symbolic act .
The  मुद्राएँ of प्यूर्टो रीको closely follow  the historic development of Puerto Rico .
As a colony of Spain and the United States , Puerto Rico was granted  the उपयोग of दोनो विदेशी और प्रांतीय मुद्राएँ  .
Following the Spanish  colonization in 1502 , प्यूर्टो रीको became an महत्वपूर्ण  port , with its own supply of gold .
however , as the खनिज reserves भागा खाली भीतर the  century , the archipelago 's economy suffered .
The Spanish Crown issued the Situado  mexicano , जिससे meant कि a semi-regular शिपमेंट of सुनहरा इससे the viceroyalty of नई स्पेन होता  be sent to the island , as a way to provide economic support .
Between 1636 and 1637 , Philip IV of Spain imposed a tax  जिससे था to be सशुल्क using a  revenue stamp .
Inspired  by इस , प्यूर्टो रीको began producing banknotes in 1766 , बनने the पहला उपनिवेश to छपाई 8-  real banknotes in the Spanish Empire and which in the Spanish government 's approval of subsequent issues .
the situado थी discontinued दौरान the 19th सदी , बनाना an आर्थिक  crisis , as a result of Mexico gaining its independence from Spain .
Salvador Meléndez Bruna , the colonial  राज्यपाल in दफ्तर , ordered the समस्या of प्रांतीय banknotes  , creating the Puerto Rican peso .
However  , मुद्रण of ये banknotes  ceased after 1815 .
During the following decades ,  विदेशी सिक्के became the फैली करेंसी  .
in the 1860s और  1870s , banknotes reemerged .
On February 1 , 1890 , the Banco Español  de प्यूर्टो रीको थी उदघाटन और began issuing  banknotes .
The bank designed  चार श्रेणी और लगाई तीन in  circulation under Spanish rule .
In 1895 , a Royal  डिक्री ordered the उत्पादन  of provincial peso coins .
On August 13 , 1898 , the Spanish-American War ended with Spain ceding  प्यूर्टो रीको to the संयुक्त राज्य  .
The Banco Español de Puerto Rico was renamed Bank of Porto Rico and  जारी बिल्स समतुल्य to the संयुक्त राज्य डालर , बनाना the प्यूर्टो rican  dollar .
In 1902 , the First  नेशनल बैंको of पोर्टो रीको जारी banknotes in a समानांतर  manner .
Two more  श्रेणी यहूद जारी जबतक  1913 .
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully integrated into the United  राज्य ' आर्थिक और मौद्रिक प्रणाली , the प्यूर्टो rican डॉलर यहूद redeemed लिये those जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य  Treasury .
The peso and dollar have been followed by other contemporary issues , including commemorative banknotes ,  निजी करेंसी , और a क्वार्टर सिक्का designed साथ फोर्ट सैन  Felipe del Morro in the face .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as  पेप्सी , formerly stylized in अपरकेस as पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय  that is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo .
Created and developed in 1893 and  introduced as ब्रैड 's पेय , it थी renamed  as Pepsi-Cola on August 28 , 1898 , then to Pepsi in 1961 .
The Book of Ezekiel is the third of  the latter नबियों in the यहूदी बाइबल ,  following the books of Isaiah and Jeremiah and preceding the Book of the Twelve .
( The order is somewhat  अलग in the ईसाई बूढ़ा  Testament ) .
It derives its name  इससे , और रिकॉर्ड the visions of , the 6th  century BC priest and prophet Ezekiel .
According to the book , the prophet , exiled in Babylon , experienced a series of seven visions during the 22 years from  593 to 571 bc , a काल जिससे spans the फाइनल विनाश of  Jerusalem in 586 .
The visions , and  the किताब , हैं संरचित around तीन विषयवस्तु : ( 1 ) निर्णय on इसराईल ( अध्याय 1-24 ) ; ( 2 )  judgment on the nations ( chapters 25-32 ) ; and future blessings for Israel ( chapters 33-48 ) .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major United States port and the largest  नगर और महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the राज्य of louisiana  .
the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर थी 343,829  as of the 2010 U.S. Census .
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और थी the 46th largest in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined  सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , a larger व्यापार क्षेत्रफल , था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,214,932 .
the नगर is नामित बाद orléans , a नगर स्तिथ on the  Loire River in Centre , France , and is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture , as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage .
New Orleans is also  प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके भोजन , म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़  ) , and its annual celebrations and festivals , most notably Mardi Gras .
The city is often referred to  as the `` सबसे अद्वितीय '' in अमेरिका .
New Orleans is located in  southeastern louisiana , straddling the मिसिसिपी  River .
The  नगर और ऑरलियन्स  Parish ( ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to  the उत्तर , st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट , plaquemines to the दक्षिण और जेफरसन  to the south and west .
Lake Pontchartrain  , भाग of जिससे is शामिल in the नगर हद , झूठ to  the north and Lake Borgne lies to the east .
The National Birth Control  लीग थी a जनम कंट्रोल  organization in the United States .
It was founded in March 1915 by Mary Dennett ,  क्लारा gruening stillman और जेसी एशले .
Its main purpose was to overturn  the कानून जिससे बैन contraceptives इससे the  U.S. mails .
Campaigns were  आरोहित in नई यॉर्क , लकिन in 1919 the लीग  was disbanded and reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League .
Cancer , known medically as a malignant neoplasm , is a broad  समूह of विभिन्न रोगों , सब involving  unregulated cell growth .
In cancer , cells divide and grow uncontrollably , forming malignant  tumors , और invade आसपास भाग of  the body .
The cancer may also spread to more distant parts of the body  through the lymphatic प्रणाली or bloodstream .
Not all  tumors हैं cancerous  .
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably , do not invade  neighboring ऊतकों , और do नहीं स्प्रेड throughout  the body .
There are  over 200 अलग ज्ञात cancers  that afflict humans .
determining कया कल्याणकारी कर्कट  is complex .
Many things are known to increase the  रिस्क of कर्कट , सहित तम्बाकू उपयोग , निश्चित infections , विकिरण , कमी of शारीरिक कार्यकलाप  , obesity , and environmental pollutants .
These can directly damage genes or combine  साथ मौजूदा जेनेटिक त्रुटियां भीतर  cells to cause the disease .
लगभग पाँच to  ten percent of cancers are entirely hereditary .
Cancer can be detected in a number of ways , including the presence of  निश्चित लक्षण और लक्षण , स्क्रीनिंग  tests , or medical imaging .
Once a possible cancer  is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic परिक्षा  of a tissue sample .
Cancer is usually treated with  कीमोथेरेपी , विकिरण चिकित्सा  and surgery .
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type and  स्थान of the कर्कट और the extent of बीमारी at the प्रारंभ of उपचार  .
While  कर्कट can affect लोगों of सब आयु , और a few प्रकार  of cancer are more common in children , the risk of developing cancer generally increases with age .
In 2007 , cancer  caused परिचय 13 % of सब इंसान मौतों विश्वव्यापी  ( 7.9 million ) .
Rates  हैं उठती as अधिक लोगों सजीव to an बूढ़ा आयु और  as mass lifestyle changes occur in the developing world .
Spring ski touring on  hardangervidda , नार्वे
Skiing is a  recreational कार्यकलाप और प्रतिस्पर्धी खेल in जिससे the भागीदार attaches long  runners or skis to boots or shoes on the feet and uses them to travel on top of snow .
Aside from recreation and competition , skiing has been used for military  उद्देश्य और भी यात्राएं in क्षेत्रों कि अनुभव भारी हिमपात  .
Many types of competitive skiing  कार्यक्रम हैं पहचाना by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलम्पिक कमेटी , और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Ski Federation .
John Maynard Keynes , 1st Baron  keynes , cb , fba ( ; 5 जून 1883 – 21 अप्रैल 1946 ) थी a अंग्रेजों अर्थशास्त्री जिनकी विचार have fundamentally प्रभावित the सिद्धान्त और अभ्यास of आधुनिक  macroeconomics , and informed the economic policies of governments .
He built on and greatly refined  पहले कार्य on the कल्याणकारी of कारोबार चक्र , और is widely  considered to be one of the founders of modern macroeconomics and the most influential economist of the 20th century .
His  विचार हैं the आधार लिये the स्कूल of विचार ज्ञात as keynesian  economics , as well as its various offshoots .
In many ways , subsequent  developments in 20th सदी अर्थशास्त्र can be viewed as either भवन on keynes  ' ideas or reacting against them .
In the 1930s , Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic thinking , overturning the older ideas of neoclassical economics that held that free markets  होता , in the छोटी to मीडियम पद , automatically provide पूरा नियुक्ति , as long as मजदूर  were flexible in their wage demands .
Keynes  बजाय argued कि कुल माँग संकल्पित the overall स्तर of  economic activity , and that inadequate aggregate demand could lead to prolonged periods of high unemployment .
He advocated the use  of फिस्कल और मौद्रिक उपायों to mitigate the प्रतिकूल  effects of economic recessions and depressions .
Following the outbreak of the Second World War , Keynes 's  विचार concerning आर्थिक नीति यहूद अपनाया by अग्रणी पश्चिमी economies  .
In 1942 , Keynes was awarded a  खानदानी peerage as सामन्त keynes of tilton in the काउंटी  of Sussex .
Keynes died in 1946 , but during the 1950s and 1960s the success of Keynesian economics resulted in almost all  पूंजीवादी सरकारें adopting  its policy recommendations .
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s , partly as a result of problems that began to afflict the  anglo-american economies इससे the प्रारंभ of the दशक , और partly क्युकी of critiques इससे मिल्टन फ्राइडमैन और अन्य अर्थशास्त्रियों जो यहूद pessimistic परिचय the क्षमता of सरकारें  to regulate the business cycle with fiscal policy .
However , the advent of the  वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट in 2007 caused a पुनरुत्थान  in Keynesian thought .
keynesian अर्थशास्त्र provided the सैद्धांतिक underpinning लिये आर्थिक नीतियों undertaken in जवाब to the संकट  by Presidents George W. Bush and Barack Obama of the United States , Prime Minister Gordon Brown of the United Kingdom , and other heads of governments .
In 1999 , Time magazine included Keynes in their list of  the 100 सबसे महत्वपूर्ण और influential लोगों of the 20th सदी , commenting कि  : `` His radical idea that governments should spend money they do n't have may have saved capitalism . ''
In addition to being an economist ,  keynes थी भी a सिविल नौकर , a निदेशक of the अंग्रेजों eugenics समाज , a निदेशक of the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड , a संरक्षक of the कला और an आर्ट कलेक्टर , a भाग of the bloomsbury  Group of intellectuals , an advisor to several charitable trusts , a writer , a philosopher , a private investor , and a farmer .
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by  jekuthiel sofer emulated the 1675 टेन आयतें at the एम्सटर्डम  Esnoga synagogue .
The Ten Commandments , also known as the Decalogue , are a set of  biblical कानून relating to आचार और  worship , which play a fundamental role in Judaism , Islam and Christianity .
They include instructions to worship only God , to keep the sabbath holy and  prohibitions विरूद्ध idolatry , इनकार , हत्या , चोरी , deception और  adultery .
Different groups follow slightly different traditions for  interpreting और क्रमांकन उन्हें  .
The Ten Commandments appear  twice in the यहूदी बाइबल , in the किताबे  of Exodus and Deuteronomy .
According to the story in Exodus , God inscribed them on two  स्टोन टैबलेट , जिससे he  gave to Moses on Mount Sinai .
Modern scholarship has found likely influences  in hittite और mesopotamian कानून और treaties , लकिन is विभाजित  over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them .
The discography of the English alternative rock band The Smiths consists of four studio albums , one extended play (  ep ) , एक सजीव एल्बम , टेन संकलन एल्बम , बीस singles , एक वीडियो एल्बम और चौदह  music videos on the Rough Trade , Sire and WEA record labels .
The band was formed  in 1982 in मैनचेस्टर by vocalist morrissey , guitarist जॉनी marr , बास  player Andy Rourke and drummer Mike Joyce .
Despite being championed by BBC Radio 1 disc jockey John Peel , the band 's  डेब्यू सिंगल , `` हाथ in दस्ताने `` ( may  1983 ) , failed to chart .
Its follow-up , `` This Charming Man `` ( October 1983 ) , met  साथ नाजुक acclaim और पहुँचे क्रमांक twenty-five on the uk singles  Chart .
The Smiths ' cult status was followed by  मुख्यधारा कामयाबी in 1984 , as वे पहुँचे क्रमांक बारह in the uk साथ the `` कया अंतर करता  It Make ? `` single and reached number two on the UK Albums Chart with their debut album , The Smiths ( 1984 ) .
Their next three singles all reached the top twenty of the charts in the UK ,  helping to consolidate उनके पिछला चार्ट कामयाबी  .
The next studio album ,  मांस is हत्या ( 1985 ) , पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों चार्ट ; however , the तभी सिंगल to be released इससे the एल्बम , `` कि चुटकुला is n't मजेदार anymore `` (  1985 ) , failed to break the UK Top 40 .
Returning to form , The Smiths ' next  छह singles सब पहुँचे the उच्चतर than क्रमांक तीस in the uk और उनके  third album , The Queen Is Dead ( 1986 ) , reached number two in the UK .
Despite the band 's chart success , Marr left the  समूह in अगस्त 1987 due to a strained संबंध साथ morrissey  .
Failing to find  a बदलना , the smiths disbanded by the समय  their final studio album , Strangeways , Here We Come , was released in September that year .
Strangeways ,  यहाँ we आइये पहुँचे क्रमांक दो in the uk और became the बैंड 's highest-charting रिलीज in the  United States when it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200 .
In early 1992 , WEA acquired the entire back catalogue of  the smiths और उत्पादित दो compilations – बेहतरीन  ... I and ... Best II – the first of which reached the top of the UK Albums Chart .
WEA released two further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001 , with  a further संकलन , the ध्वनि of the smiths  , released in November 2008 .
Gone with the  हवा is a अनोखा लिखा by मार्गरेट मिशेल , पहला  published in 1936 .
It is often placed  in the साहित्यिक sub-genre of  the historical romance novel .
However , it has been argued the novel is a `` near  मिस '' और करता नहीं contain सब of the तत्व  of the romance genre , making it simply a historical novel .
The story is set in Clayton County ,  जॉर्जिया , और अटलांटा दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और पुनर्निर्माण  .
It depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara , the spoiled  बेटी of a well-to-do वृक्षारोपण मालिक , जो जरूर उपयोग प्रत्येक अर्थात् at उसके निपटान  to come out of the poverty she finds herself in after Sherman 's `` March to the Sea '' .
Margaret Mitchell began writing Gone with  the हवा in 1926 to pass the समय जबकि recovering इससे  an auto-crash injury that refused to heal .
In April 1935 , Harold Latham of Macmillan , an editor  जो थी looking लिये नई fiction , पढ़ा कया वो था लिखा और देखी कि it  could be a best-seller .
After Latham agreed to publish the book , Mitchell worked for another six months  checking the ऐतिहासिक सन्दर्भ , और rewrote the खोलने  chapter several times .
Mitchell and her husband John Marsh , a copy editor by trade , edited  the फाइनल संस्करण of the अनोखा .
Mitchell wrote the book 's final moments  पहला , और तब लिखा the कार्यक्रम  that led up to it .
As to what became of her lovers , Rhett  और स्कारलेट , बाद the अनोखा ended , मिशेल किया नहीं जान , और कहा ,  `` For all I know , Rhett may have found someone else who was less difficult . ''
मिशेल प्राप्त  the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction for the book in 1937 .
the किताब थी adapted into a  1939 American film .
Gone with the Wind is the only  अनोखा by मिशेल प्रकाशित  during her lifetime .
Endodontics ( from  the यूनानी endo `` अंदर '' ; और odons `` दाँत '' ) is एक of the दंत specialties पहचाना by the अमरीकी दंत संघ , royal कॉलेज of dentists of कनाडा , और royal australasian  College of Dental Surgeons , and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth .
Endodontists perform a variety of procedures including endodontic therapy ( commonly known as ``  रूट कनाल चिकित्सा '' ) , endodontic retreatment , सर्जरी , treating cracked  teeth , and treating dental trauma .
रूट कनाल चिकित्सा is एक of  the most common procedures .
If the pulp ( containing  nerves , arterioles , venules , lymphatic ऊतक , और तंतुमय ऊतक ) becomes  diseased or injured , endodontic treatment is required to save the tooth .
Serial  संलग्न scsi ( sas ) is a point-to-point सीरियल प्रोटोकॉल कि चालें आंकड़ा to और इससे  computer storage devices such as hard drives and tape drives .
SAS replaces the older Parallel  scsi ( सुनाया `` scuzzy '' )  bus technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s .
sas , जैसे इसके पूर्ववर्ती , उपयोग  the standard SCSI command set .
sas offers पिछड़ा संगतता  with second-generation SATA drives .
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be connected to SAS  backplanes , लकिन sas ड्राइव can नहीं कनेक्ट to sata  backplanes .
The T10 technical committee of the International Committee for Information Technology Standards ( INCITS )  develops और maintains the sas प्रोटोकॉल ; the scsi व्यापार संघ ( scsita ) promotes the  technology .

Status as a natural-born citizen of the United  राज्य is एक of the पात्रता आवश्यकताएँ स्थापित in the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution for election to the office of President or Vice President .
This requirement was intended to protect the nation  इससे विदेशी influence  .
The Constitution does not define the phrase natural-born  नागरिक , और विभिन्न राय have महरूम offered  over time regarding its precise meaning .
a 2011 congressional शोध  Service report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several decisions of the United States Supreme Court and lower courts dealing with the question of eligibility for citizenship by birth , but the Supreme Court has never directly  addressed the सवाल of a विशिष्ट अध्यक्षीय or vice-presidential प्रत्याशी 's पात्रता as a natural-born नागरिक  .
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22 , 1971 ) is a former  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी  .
He  निभाई क्वार्टरबैक लिये तीन नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल )  teams : the St. Louis Rams , the New York Giants , and the Arizona Cardinals .
He was originally signed by the Green Bay Packers as  an undrafted फ़्री एजेंट in 1994 बाद playing कॉलेज  football at Northern Iowa .
Warner would go on to be considered the best undrafted player of  सब समय , following a 12-year करियर regarded as एक of the महानतम  stories in NFL history .
Warner first attained stardom  जबकि playing लिये the st. लुई मेढ़ों इससे 1998 to 2003 , जहाँ he जीती दो एनएफएल mvp पुरस्कार in 1999 और 2001 as  well as the Super Bowl MVP award in Super Bowl XXXIV .
He led the 2008 Arizona Cardinals to Super Bowl XLIII ( the franchise 's  पहला सुपर कटोरी berth ) , और owns the तीन उच्चतम single-game गुजर yardage योग in सुपर कटोरी  history .
Warner currently holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of  all-time ( 93.7 ) , और the third-highest करियर पूर्णता प्रतिशत  in NFL history with 65.5 % .
In 13 career playoff games , Warner ranks first all-time in completion percentage ( 66.5 % ) , yards per  attempt ( 8.55 ) , और दूसरी  in passer rating ( 102.8 ) .
He  भी holds the उच्चतम पूर्णता प्रतिशत लिये a सिंगल खेल दौरान the नियमित ऋतु , at 92.3  percent ( 24/26 ) , on September 20 , 2009 , against the Jacksonville Jaguars .
He announced his retirement  on जनवरी 29 , 2010. < संदर्भ name='cnn 2010-01-29  ' >
जेनेट काय ruthven hagan ( ; born may 26 , 1953 ) is the जूनियर संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर  from North Carolina , in office since January 2009 .
Previously she  परोसा in the उत्तर कैरोलिना सीनेट इससे  1999 to 2009 .
She  is a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक  Party and is viewed as a moderate member of her party .
When Hagan defeated Republican incumbent  एलिज़ाबेथ dole in the 2008 संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट चुनाव  , she became the first woman to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate election .
The Heisman Memorial Trophy Award ( usually known colloquially as  the heisman ट्रॉफी or the heisman ) , is awarded annually to the खिलाड़ी deemed the  most outstanding player in collegiate football .
It was created  in 1935 as the शहर एथलेटिक क्लबों ट्रॉफी और renamed in 1936 following the मौत of the क्लबों 's एथलेटिक निदेशक , जॉन heisman ( पूर्व भूरा विश्वविद्यालयों और विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया खिलाड़ी ; सिर  football coach at Oberlin College , Auburn University , Clemson University , Rice University , and the University of Pennsylvania ; and football , basketball , and baseball head coach and athletic director at Georgia Tech ) .
The award is presented by the Heisman Trophy Trust in early  दिसम्बर पहले the postseason कटोरी  games .
It is the oldest of several overall awards in  कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल , सहित the मैक्सवेल पुरस्कार , वाल्टर शिविर  Award , and the AP Player of the Year .
The Heisman and the AP Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most outstanding player  , जबकि the मैक्सवेल पुरस्कार और वाल्टर शिविर पुरस्कार recognize the बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी , और the आर्ची griffin पुरस्कार recognizes the सबसे मूल्यवान  player .
The  संयुक्त राष्ट्र कमांड ( unc ) is the एकीकृत कमांड ढांचा लिये the बहुराष्ट्रीय सैन्य शक्तियां supporting  the Republic of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during and after the Korean War .
After troops of the Democratic People 's Republic of Korea ( North Korea or DPRK ) invaded South Korea on June 25 , 1950 ,  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद अपनाया रेज़ोल्यूशन 82 कॉलिंग on उत्तर कोरियाई to cease hostilities और withdraw  to the 38th parallel .
on जून 27 , 1950 , it अपनाया रेज़ोल्यूशन 83 , recommending कि सदस्यों of the संयुक्त  Nations provide assistance to the Republic of Korea `` to repel the armed attack and to restore international peace and security to the area '' .
Security Council Resolution 84 , adopted on July 7 , 1950 , recommended that  सदस्यों providing सैन्य शक्तियां और अन्य सहायता to दक्षिण कोरियाई ``  make such forces and other assistance available to a unified command under the United States of America '' .
Although the resolutions suggested the forces under the UNC were `` United  राष्ट्र शक्तियां '' , और संयुक्त राष्ट्र itself could be माना a belligerent , in अभ्यास the संयुक्त राष्ट्र exercised no कंट्रोल over  the combat forces , which were controlled by the United States .
Most observers concluded that the forces under the UNC were  नहीं in विधि संयुक्त राष्ट्र सैनिकों , और the अधिनियमों of  the UNC were not the acts of the United Nations .
The UNC can be  regarded as an गठबंधन of नेशनल  armies , operating under the collective right of self-defense .
On August 29 , 1950 , the British  राष्ट्रमंडल 's 27th infantry ब्रिगेड arrived at बुसान to जुड़ें the unc , जिससे  until then included only ROK and U.S. forces .
The 27th  ब्रिगेड स्थानांतरित into the naktong नदी लकीर वेस्ट  of Daegu .
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid  उत्तराधिकार ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया , belgian संयुक्त राष्ट्र कमांड , कनाडा , कोलंबिया , इथियोपिया , फ़्रांस , यूनानियों , ध्वज , the नीदरलैंड्स  , New Zealand , the Philippines , Thailand and Turkey .
The Union of South Africa provided air units which fought  alongside the एयर शक्तियां of अन्य सदस्य राष्ट्र  .
Denmark ,  इण्डिया , नार्वे , और स्वीडन provided  medical units .
Italy provided a hospital ,  भी हालांकि it थी नहीं a un सदस्य  .
The United Nations  कमांड और the chinese-north कोरियाई कमांड हस्ताक्षरित the कोरियाई  Armistice Agreement on 27 July 1953 , ending the heavy fighting .
The armistice agreement established the Military Armistice Commission (  मैक ) , consisting of प्रतिनिधि of the दो signatories , to supervise the क्रियान्वयन of  the armistice terms .
The North Korean-Chinese MAC has been  replaced by panmumjon प्रतिनिधि अंतर्गत विशेष  North Korean management .
Regular meetings have been stopped , although  ड्यूटी अधिकारियों of संयुक्त सुरक्षा क्षेत्रफल , commonly ज्ञात as the युद्धविराम गाँव of  Panmunjom , from each side meet regularly .
Lincoln Heights is an American family drama television series about Eddie Sutton , a Mission  विस्टा पुलिस अधिकारी जो चालें उसके परिवार वापस to उसके बूढ़ा पड़ोस , lincoln हाइट्स , to प्रारंभ a नई जीवन और to सहायता आउट उसके बूढ़ा पड़ोस  .
It is a dangerous place  to उठाएँ a परिवार , और through the अनेक ट्रायल the परिवार goes through  , they soon learn that settling in is not as easy as it seems .
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope with  प्रत्येक दिन जीवन as a गली cop in लॉस एंजिल्स ,  his kids try to fit in at their new schools and with their new neighbors .
the दिखाएँ premiered जनवरी 8 , 2007 on the एबीसी परिवार  network with 13 episodes ordered for the first season .
It  थी स्वीकृत लिये a दूसरी ऋतु  , which premiered September 4 , 2007 .
Vanessa  हजेंस ' सोंग , कह ok था महरूम प्रयुक्त in a वाणिज्यिक  to promote the second season .
To promote the third season , they showed  क्लिप्स of cassie और चार्ल्स 's संबंध to the सोंग , crush by the अमरीकी आइडल  's seventh season runner-up , David Archuleta .
To  प्रचार ऋतु 4 , वे  're using the song , Avalanche by Marie Digby .
The show 's theme song was  लिखा और performed by bassist स्टेनली क्लार्क और singer-songwriter  Blaire Reinhard .
On January 29 , 2010 ,  एबीसी परिवार घोषित the रद्दीकरण of the श्रेणी  after four seasons .
A Christian  denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक देह  under a common name , structure , and doctrine within Christianity .
In the Orthodox tradition , churches are  विभाजित प्रायः साथ जातीय और भाषाई लाइनों  , into separate churches and traditions .
Technically , divisions  between एक समूह और another हैं  defined by doctrine and church authority .
Issues such  as the प्रकृति of यीशु , the प्राधिकार of अपोस्टोलिक उत्तराधिकार , eschatology ,  and papal primacy separate one denomination from another .
The Roman Catholic Church is the largest denomination with over 1.1 billion members , over half of all Christians worldwide , making it the largest denomination for any religion worldwide (  हालांकि the गिरिजाघर करता नहीं दृश्य itself as a denomination , लकिन as the असली pre-denominational गिरिजाघर  ) .
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of  ईसाइयों विश्वव्यापी , और साथ the catholics , protestants , anglicans , और अन्य closely सम्बन्धित denominations  comprise Western Christianity .
The Eastern Orthodox Church , Oriental Orthodox  चर्च और the assyrian गिरिजाघर of the ईस्ट हैं माना  Eastern Christian denominations .
Western Christian denominations prevail in  पश्चिमी यूरोपीय और इसके पूर्व colonies  .
Eastern  ईसाई denominations हैं represented  mostly in Eastern Europe , the Middle East and North Africa .
Christians have various doctrines about the Church , the body of faithful that they believe  थी स्थापित by यीशु मसीह , और कैसा the दैवी  church corresponds to Christian denominations .
Both the Catholics  और the पूर्वी परंपरागत consider प्रत्येक  of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One Holy Catholic and Apostolic Church to the exclusion of the other .
Protestants separated from the Catholic Church because of theologies and  practices कि वे माना to be in उल्लंघन of उनके निर्वचन  .
Generally , members of the various denominations acknowledge each other as Christians , at least to the extent that they have mutually recognized  baptisms और acknowledge historically परंपरागत दृश्य सहित the देवत्व of यीशु और doctrines of सिन और मोक्ष , भी हालांकि doctrinal और ecclesiological बाधाएं रोकते पूरा नियाज़  between churches .
चूंकि the reforms surrounding वेटिकन ii , the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर रै referred to प्रोटोस्टेंट समुदायों as `` denominations '' , जबकि reserving  the term `` church '' for apostolic churches , including the Eastern Orthodox ( see subsistit in and branch theory ) .
There are however some non-denominational  ईसाइयों जो do नहीं follow  any particular branch .
The panda ( Ailuropoda  melanoleuca , lit  .
`` black and white cat-foot '' ) , also  ज्ञात as the दानव पांडा to फर्क it इससे the unrelated रेड पांडा , is a भालू देशी to central-western  and south western China .
It is easily recognized by the large , distinctive  ब्लैक धब्बे around इसके आँखें , over the कानों  , and across its round body .
Though it belongs to the order Carnivora , the  पांडा 's आहार is 99 % बाँसुरी .
Pandas in the  जंगली होगा occasionally खा अन्य grasses , जंगली tubers , or भी मांस  in the form of birds , rodents or carrion .
In captivity ,  वे may प्राप्त मधु , अंडे , मछली , yams  , shrub leaves , oranges , or bananas along with specially prepared food .
The giant panda  जीवनदान in a few पहाड़ सीमाएँ in सेंट्रल चीन , मुख्यतः in सिचुआन प्रांत  , but also in the Shaanxi and Gansu provinces .
As  a परिणाम of खेती , वनों और अन्य विकास , the पांडा रै महरूम  driven out of the lowland areas where it once lived .
The panda is a  संरक्षण reliant endangered प्रजाति  .
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas living in  captivity अंदर चीन और another 27 बाहर the देश  .
Wild population estimates vary ; one estimate shows that there are about 1,590 individuals  जीना in the जंगली , जबकि a 2006 पढ़ाई via डीएनए विश्लेषण अनुमानित कि इस फिगर could  be as high as 2,000 to 3,000 .
Some reports also show that the number of pandas in  the जंगली is on the वृद्धि  .
However , the IUCN  करता नहीं मानना वहीँ is पर्याप्त certainty yet to reclassify  the species from Endangered to Vulnerable .
While the dragon has often served as China 's national emblem , internationally  the पांडा appears at तनिक as commonly .
As such , it is becoming  widely प्रयुक्त भीतर चीन in अंतरराष्ट्रीय contexts , लिये उदाहरण the पाँच  Fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics .
The Kite Runner is a 2007 American drama film directed by Marc Forster based  on the अनोखा of the वही नाम by खालिद hosseini  .
It  tells the स्टोरी of आमिर , a well-to-do लड़के इससे the वज़ीर akbar खान ज़िला  of Kabul , who is tormented by the guilt of abandoning his friend Hassan , the son of his father 's Hazara servant .
the स्टोरी is नियत विरूद्ध a backdrop of उग्र कार्यक्रम , इससे the पतन of the साम्राज्य in अफगानिस्तान through  the Soviet military intervention , the mass exodus of Afghan refugees to Pakistan and the United States , and the Taliban regime .
Though most of the  फिल्मी is नियत in अफगानिस्तान , ये भाग यहूद ज़्यादातर  shot in Kashgar , China , due to the dangers of filming in Afghanistan at the time .
The majority of the film 's  संवाद is in जमींदारी , साथ  the remainder spoken in English .
The child actors are native  अध्यक्षों , लकिन अनेक वयस्क अभिनेताओं  had to learn Dari .
Filming wrapped up on December  21 , 2006 , और the फिल्मी थी अपेक्षित to be released on नवम्बर  2 , 2007 .
However , after concern for the safety of the young actors in the film due to fears of violent reprisals  to the यौन प्रकृति of कुछ दृश्यों in जिससे वे appear , इसके रिलीज तिथि थी धकेल वापस छह  weeks to December 14 , 2007 .
The Kite  धावक थी released on dvd  on March 25 , 2008 .
A HD DVD release was  घोषित लिये the वही तिथि , लकिन थी रद्द following  the format 's demise .
The film was nominated for the Golden Globe Award for Best  विदेशी भाषा फिल्मी in 2007 .
The film 's score by Alberto Iglesias was nominated  लिये बेहतरीन असली स्कोर at the सुनहरी  Globes and the Academy Awards .
the वैधता of कैनबिस varies  from country to country .
कब्ज़ा of कैनबिस is illegal in सबसे देशों और रै महरूम चूंकि the शुरूआत  of widespread cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s .
However , many countries have  decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस , विशेषकर in उत्तर  America , South America and Europe .
Furthermore , possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands , North Korea  और होता be in the u.S. राज्य of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं लिये संघीय  law , which governs persons in all states .
The medicinal use of  कैनबिस is विधिक in a  number of countries , including Canada , the Czech Republic and Israel .
While federal law in  the संयुक्त राज्य bans सब बिक्री और कब्ज़ा of कैनबिस , प्रवर्तन varies widely at the राज्य स्तर और कुछ राज्य have स्थापित औषधीय मारिजुआना  programs in that contradict federal law ; two states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them with a regulatory regime , also contrary to federal statute .
Some  देशों have कानून कि हैं नहीं as vigorously prosecuted as अन्य  but , apart from the countries that offer access to medical marijuana , most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe .
Some infractions are taken more  seriously in कुछ देशों than अन्य in लिहाज़ to the  cultivation , use , possession or transfer of cannabis for recreational use .
A few jurisdictions have lessened  दंड लिये कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस , बनाना it दंडनीय  by confiscation and a fine , rather than imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs for young or frequent users , with freedom  इससे narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य और a few jurisdictions परमिट कैनबिस उपयोग लिये औषधीय उद्देश्य .
There are also changes in a more  प्रतिबंधक दिशा as in कनाडा .
Drug tests to detect cannabis are increasingly common in many  देशों और have resulted in कारावास वाक्य और लोगों  losing their jobs .
However , simple possession can carry long jail sentences in some countries ,  विशेषकर in भाग of ईस्ट एशिया और southeast एशिया जहाँ the बिक्री of कैनबिस may  lead to a sentence of life in prison or even execution .
Loxahatchee is a community  स्तिथ in ताड़ बीच काउंटी , फ्लोरिडा  , United States .
It is located in the areas north of Wellington and west and northwest of Royal  ताड़ बीच , फ्लोरिडा और लगभग वेस्ट of वेस्ट ताड़  Beach .
Loxahatchee is also the name  of the पोस्ट दफ्तर कि serves इस क्षेत्रफल ,  which is under the zip code of 33470 .
the नाम loxahatchee अर्थात्  `` turtle river . ''
Loxahatchee is located within the  भारतीय trails सुधार ज़िला और the loxahatchee  Groves Water Control District .
शेर देश safari , a drive-through safari  park , is located in Loxahatchee .
In 2006 , the state of Florida approved incorporation of part  of loxahatchee as the कस्बा of loxahatchee groves to become the 38th नगरपालिका in ताड़ बीच काउंटी  .
The main reason for incorporating was to better  protect the क्षेत्रफल इससे बुवाई विकास और to बचाना the  rural character of the neighborhood .
Perhaps the most rural area within a close  निकटता to वेस्ट ताड़ बीच , साथ लॉट आकार दायरा इससे  1-20 acres .
Along with The Acreage , it is notable for loose land restrictions and the native and exotic  एनिमल उपस्थिति is काफी notable  .
Seminole Ridge High  स्कूल serves  the area .
The  कनाडाई नागरिकता परीक्षण is a परीक्षण , administered by नागरिकता और आव्रजन कनाडा ( सीआईसी ) , कि is जरूरी लिये सब आवेदकों लिये कनाडाई  citizenship who are aged between 18 and 54 and who meet the basic requirements for citizenship .
The test is available in both  फ्रेंच और अंग्रेज़ी , the आधिकारिक  languages of Canada .
Renaissance Cruises , originally founded in 1989 owned by Fearnley & Eger Rederi in Oslo - Norway , later  खरीदा by एडवर्ड rudner ( संस्थापक of alamo car rental ) as the कम्पनी  faltered during the Gulf War .
They operated year-round cruise itineraries to the  भूमध्यसागरीय , the यूनानी isles , tahiti और the दक्षिण प्रशांत  , Northern Europe and Scandinavia .
The company ceased operations on 25 September 2001  और accommodated up to 220,000  guests in 2000 .
While  the कम्पनी था महरूम in ग़रीब वित्तीय स्वास्थ्य लिये काफी कुछ समय , the आर्थिक मनाही  resulting from the September 11th terrorist attacks are credited with the demise of this cruise line .
The fleet is  सूचीबद्ध अंतर्गत सूची of क्रूज जहाजों  .
It was  headquartered in फोर्ट lauderdale  , Florida .
epithelium is एक of the चार मौलिक प्रकार of एनिमल ऊतक , साथ  with connective tissue , muscle tissue and nervous tissue .
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and surfaces of structures  throughout the देह , और भी रूप अनेक ग्रंथियों  .
Functions of epithelial  कोशिकाएं शामिल स्राव , चयनात्मक अवशोषण , सुरक्षा  , transcellular transport and detection of sensation .
In Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on '' or ``  upon '' , और `` θηλή '' ( ``  thēlē '' ) means `` nipple '' .
Epithelial layers are avascular , so they must receive nourishment via diffusion of substances  इससे the underlying संयोजी ऊतक , through  the basement membrane .
Epithelia can  भी be व्यवस्थित into क्लस्टर of कोशिकाएं कि फलन as  exocrine and endocrine glands .
Kent E. Hovind (  born जनवरी 15 , 1953 ) is an अमरीकी  young Earth creationist .
Hovind has spoken on creation science and has aimed to convince listeners to reject theories of evolution , geophysics ,  और cosmology in एहसान of उसके निर्वचन of the उत्पत्ति सृष्टि कथा इससे the बाइबल .
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and  कुछ of उसके विचार have भी महरूम criticized by यंग धरती creationist संगठन  such as Answers in Genesis .
Hovind  स्थापित the सृष्टि विज्ञान इंजीलवाद in 1991 , और अक्सर spoke on  young Earth creationism at seminars at private schools and churches , debates , and on radio and television broadcasts .
Since January 2007 , Hovind has been serving a ten-year  थाना वाक्य बाद होने convicted of 58 संघीय रिश्तो , सहित 12 कर offenses  , one count of obstructing federal agents , and 45 counts of structuring cash transactions .
He  is incarcerated at the संघीय  Correctional Institution at Berlin , New Hampshire .
Bride with  बिंदी सजा  forehead
A bindi ( , from Sanskrit bindu , meaning `` a drop , small particle , dot '' ) , or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil ,  तेलुगु , और मलयालम ) is a माथे सजावट worn in दक्षिण एशिया ( विशेषकर इण्डिया ,  Bangladesh , Nepal , Sri Lanka and Mauritius ) and Southeast Asia .
traditionally it is a उज्जवल बिन्दु of रेड रंग लागू in the बीच of the माथे बंद to the eyebrows ,  but it can also consist of a sign or piece of jewelry worn at this location .
The New York  gubernatorial चुनाव of 2010 थी आयोजित on मंगलवार , नवम्बर 2 , 2010  , to elect the Governor of New York , to serve a four-year term that began in January 2011 .
Incumbent  लोकतांत्रिक राज्यपाल दाउद paterson , निर्वाचित as लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल in 2006 as the कार्यशील mate of  former Governor Eliot Spitzer , chose not to run for a full-term .
On November 2 , New York  attorney सामान्य और डेमोक्रेट एंड्रयू cuomo  defeated Republican Carl Paladino .
Green Party candidate Howie  हॉकिन्स प्राप्त over 57,000 मत , allowing the नई यॉर्क ग्रीन  Party to be listed on the ballot for the next 4 years .
The  प्रमुख डाल of ड्रैगन बॉल at the  end of the manga .
The Dragon Ball  manga और दुश्मनी श्रेणी सुविधाएँ an extensive डाल of  characters created by Akira Toriyama .
The series takes place in a  fictional ब्रह्मांड , the वही as toriyama 's पिछला श्रेणी dr. slump , और फ़ॉलो the adventures of martial कलाकार बेटे goku इससे  childhood to adulthood as he searches for the seven spheres known as the Dragon Balls , used to summon a wish-granting dragon .
During the course of the story , he encounters allies such as  bulma , yamcha , kuririn और trunks , विरोधियों ऐसे as tenshinhan , piccolo  and Vegeta , and enemies such as Freeza and Cell .
While many of the  वर्ण हैं इंसानो साथ superhuman शक्ति and/or अलौकिक abilities , the डाल भी शामिल  anthropomorphic animals and later , extraterrestrial lifeforms .
The series also includes depictions of the  आफ्टरलाइफ , साथ अनेक वर्ण होने देवताओं कि govern the  universe .
