The  comanche हैं a मैदान भारतीय जनजाति जिनकी ऐतिहासिक territory , ज्ञात as comancheria , consisted  of present day eastern New Mexico , southern Colorado , northeastern Arizona , southern Kansas , all of Oklahoma , and most of northwest Texas .
The Comanche people  हैं नामांकित in the federally पहचाना  Comanche Nation , in Oklahoma .
Historically ,  the comanches यहूद hunter-gatherers साथ a घोड़ा  culture .
वहीँ may have महरूम  as many as 45,000 Comanches in the late 18th century .
Today , the Comanche  स्वदेश comanche जनजातीय नामांकन संख्याएँ 15,191 साथ लगभग  7,763 members residing in the Lawton – Fort Sill and surrounding areas of Southwest Oklahoma .
The  comanche स्वदेश homecoming powwow is आयोजित annually in walters  , Oklahoma in mid-July .
The Comanche spoke the Comanche  भाषा , a numic भाषा of the uto-aztecan परिवार , sometimes वर्गीकृत  as a Shoshone dialect ; however , only about 1 % of Comanches speak it today .
Ethan Frome is a novel published in 1911 by  the पुलित्जर पुरस्कार -winning अमरीकी  author Edith Wharton .
It is set in the  fictitious कस्बा of starkfield  , Massachusetts .
the अनोखा थी adapted  into a film , Ethan Frome , in 1993 .
Times  वर्गाकार studios ( तस ) is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न स्टुडियो स्तिथ  in the Times Square neighborhood of the Manhattan borough of New York City , New York .
The studio is best known as the production  घर of एबीसी न्यूज ' शुभ morning अमेरिका ( जीएमए ) , a morning न्यूज और बात  program and segments for GMA on ABC News Now .
The Las  वेगास स्ट्रिप संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय  in 2003
Coca-Cola is a  कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय बेची in स्टोर्स , रेस्तरां , और वेंडिंग मशीने in  every country except Cuba and North Korea .
It is produced by The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी of अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया , और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क  of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was  invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton , coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs  Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces  concentrate , जिससे is तब बेची to licensed  Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world .
The  bottlers , जो थाम territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी , उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों  from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell , distribute and  merchandise coca-cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स और वेंडिंग मशीने  .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises , which is the  largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और  western Europe .
The Coca-Cola Company also  बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां  and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी रै , on अवसर , introduced अन्य कोला  drinks under the Coke brand name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke , with others including Caffeine-Free  coca-cola , आहार कोक caffeine-free , coca-cola चेरी , coca-cola शून्य , coca-cola वैनिला , और खास  versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand  2011 , coca-cola थी the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान ब्रांड  .
Types of  bar-lines
In  musical संकेतन , a बार ( or माप ) is a खण्ड of समय पारिभाषित by a दिए  number of beats , each of which are assigned a particular note value .
dividing म्यूज़िक into बार provides नियमित सन्दर्भ  points to pin point locations within a piece of music .
It also makes written music easier to  follow , चूंकि प्रत्येक बार of स्टाफ प्रतीकों can be पढ़ा  and played as a batch .
Typically , a piece consists of  अनेक बार of the वही लंबाई , और in आधुनिक musical संकेतन the क्रमांक of बीट्स in प्रत्येक बार is निर्दिष्ट  at the beginning of the score by the top number of a time signature ( such as 3/4 ) , while the bottom number indicates the note value of the beat ( the beat has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ) .
The word bar is more common in British English , and  the शब्द माप is अधिक आम in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी , हालांकि संगीतकारों generally समझे  both usages .
In American English ,  हालांकि the शब्द बार और माप हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably the सही उपयोग of the शब्द 'bar ' refers तभी to the लंबवत लकीर itself , जबकि the शब्द  'measure ' refers to the beats contained between bars .
In international  उपयोग , it is बराबर सही to बोलो of बार  numbers and measure numbers , e.g . ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm . 9–16’ .
Along the same  लाइनों , it is हिकमत to आरक्षित the  abbreviated form ‘bb .
3–4’ इत्यादि . लिये बीट्स तभी ; बार चाहिए be referred  to by name in full .
The first  metrically पूरा माप भीतर a टुकड़ा  of music is called ‘bar 1’ or ‘m . 1’ .
जब the टुकड़ा begins साथ an anacrusis ( an अधूरी माप at  the head of a piece of music ) , ‘bar 1’ or ‘m . 1’ is the following measure .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of  भंडार और can सप्लाई शक्ति 24 घंटों a दिन .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat from the sun ,  रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स using  a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity , solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis , which can make considerable  योगदान to solving कुछ of the सबसे तात्कालिक उर्जा समस्याएं the संसार अभी चेहरों .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or active  सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर , बदलें और वितरित सौर  energy .
Active solar techniques include the use of  photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors to दोहन  the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting  सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing गुण  , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the  विकास of सस्ती , inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term  benefits .
It will increase countries’ energy security  through रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी , inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन , बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता , reduce  pollution , lower the costs of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These  लाभ हैं वैश्विक  .
Hence the additional costs of the  प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; वे जरूर be बुद्धिमानी  spent and need to be widely shared '' .
Primary care may be  provided in जातियाँ स्वास्थ्य केंद्रों  .
Primary care is the  स्वास्थ्य परवाह दिए by a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रदाता  .
Typically  इस प्रदाता अधिनियमों as the प्रिंसिपल पाइंट of परामर्श लिये मरीजों भीतर  a health care system and coordinates other specialists that the patient may need .
Such a professional can be a primary care physician , such as a general practitioner or family physician , or depending on the locality , health system organization , and patient 's discretion , they may see a pharmacist , a physician  सहायक , a नर्स practitioner , a नर्स ( ऐसे as in the संयुक्त किंगडम ) , a नैदानिक अधिकारी ( ऐसे as in भाग of अफ़्रीकी ) , or an आयुर्वेदिक or अन्य परंपरागत आयुर्विज्ञान पेशेवर (  such as in parts of Asia ) .
Depending on the nature of the health  कंडीशन , मरीजों may तब be referred लिये  secondary or tertiary care .
`` Ocean  एवेन्यू '' is a सोंग अंकित by  American pop punk group Yellowcard .
It was released in  फ़रवरी 2004 as the दूसरी सिंगल  from Ocean Avenue and the third track .
It is known for bringing them into the  मुख्यधारा , as it प्राप्त numerous spins on  MTV and increasing radio airplay .
Ocean Avenue is a street in Jacksonville , Florida , the band 's stomping grounds near their  ऊँची स्कूल , डगलस एंडरसन स्कूल of the कला , और another गली उल्लेखित in the सोंग ,  Cherry Street .
The name of  समंदर एवेन्यू in jacksonville is दरअसल  Beach Boulevard .
They left their original base behind when  वे स्थानांतरित to लॉस  Angeles .
The song was featured on the  much म्यूज़िक संकलन एल्बम बिग चमकदार  Tunes 9 .
A psychiatrist is a  चिकित्सक जो specializes  in psychiatry .
A  मनोचिकित्सक specializes  in the treatment of mental disorders .
Psychiatrists are authorized to prescribe medicine , conduct physical examinations , order and interpret laboratory tests , use psychotherapy and may order brain imaging studies such as  computed टोमोग्राफी ( ct/cat स्कैन ) , चुम्बकीय अनुनाद इमेजिंग ( mri ) , और positron उत्सर्जन टोमोग्राफी ( पालतु ) स्कैनिंग  .
Within the framework of the World Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of  स्वास्थ्य as a राज्य of पूरा शारीरिक , दिमागी और सोशल well-being , और नहीं merely the अनुपस्थिति of बीमारी or  infirmity , reproductive health , or sexual health/hygiene , addresses the reproductive processes , functions and system at all stages of life .
Reproductive health , therefore , implies that people are able to have a responsible , satisfying and safer sex life  और कि वे have the काबिलियत to reproduce और the स्वतंत्रता to decide  if , when and how often to do so .
One interpretation of this implies that men and women ought to be informed of and to have access to safe , effective  , सस्ती और स्वीकार्य विधि of जनम कंट्रोल ; भी अभिगम to उचित स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं of यौन , reproductive आयुर्विज्ञान और क्रियान्वयन of स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा कार्यक्रम  to stress the importance of women to go safely through pregnancy and childbirth could provide couples with the best chance of having a healthy infant .
On the  अन्य हाथ individuals do फेस inequalities  in reproductive health services .
Inequalities vary  आधारित on socioeconomic औकात , शिक्षा स्तर , आयु , नस्ल , धर्म  , and resources available in their environment .
It is possible for example , that low income individuals lack the resources  लिये उचित स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं और the ज्ञान to जान कया is उचित लिये maintaining  reproductive health .
According to the WHO , `` Reproductive and sexual ill-health accounts for  20 % of the वैश्विक बोझ of ill-health लिये महिलाओं , और 14 % लिये मेन . ''
Reproductive  स्वास्थ्य is a भाग of यौन और  reproductive health and rights .
This is a list of episodes for the Disney Channel original series The Suite Life on Deck , which  aired लिये तीन सीज़न on डिज़्नी चैनल इससे सितंबर 26 , 2008 to may  6 , 2011 .
Core  2 is a ब्रांड encompassing a दायरा of इंटेल 's उपभोक्ता 64-bit  x86-64 single- , dual- , and quad-core microprocessors based on the Core microarchitecture .
The single- and dual-core models are single- die ,  whereas the quad-core मॉडल comprise दो मरता , प्रत्येक containing दो cores ,  packaged in a multi-chip module .
The introduction of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand  to the mid-range मार्केट , और reunified लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप cpu लाइनों , जिससे previously था महरूम विभाजित into  the Pentium 4 , Pentium D , and Pentium M brands .
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006 , comprising the  सोलो ( single-core ) , duo ( dual-core ) , क्वाड ( quad-core ) , और in 2007 , the चरम ( दुआl- or  quad-core CPUs for enthusiasts ) subbrands .
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro technology ( designed for businesses ) include the  dual-core और quad-core शाखाओं  .
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the National Football League ( NFL ) , the highest level of professional American football in  the संयुक्त राज्य , culminating a ऋतु कि begins in the लेट गर्मियाँ of the पिछला पंचांग साल  .
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to identify each  खेल , बल्कि than the साल in जिससे  it is held .
For example , Super Bowl I was played on January 15 ,  1967 , following the 1966 नियमित ऋतु , जबकि सुपर कटोरी xlvii थी निभाई on फ़रवरी 3 , 2013 , following  the 2012 season .
The game was created as part of a merger agreement between the NFL and its  then-rival लीग , the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल लीग  ( AFL ) .
It was agreed that the two leagues ' champion teams would play  in an afl–nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप  Game until the merger was to officially begin in 1970 .
After the merger  , प्रत्येक लीग थी redesignated as a `` सम्मेलन `` , और the खेल थी तब निभाई  between the conference champions .
Currently ,  the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) लीड  the series with 25 wins to 22 wins for the American Football Conference ( AFC ) .
The day on which the Super  कटोरी is निभाई , अभी माना by कुछ a de facto अमरीकी नेशनल  holiday , is called `` Super Bowl Sunday `` .
it is the second-largest  day for U.S. food consumption , after Thanksgiving Day .
In addition , the Super Bowl has  अक्सर महरूम the सबसे देखी अमरीकी टेलीविज़न ब्रॉडकास्ट  of the year .
Super Bowl XLV , played in 2011 , became  the most-watched अमरीकी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम in इतिहास , आरेखण an औसत दर्शक of 111 लाख दर्शक और लेने over the स्पॉट आयोजित by the पिछला साल 's सुपर कटोरी , जिससे itself  had taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H .
The Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting events in the world , almost all being North American audiences , and is second to association football ’s UEFA  champions लीग फाइनल as the सबसे देखी सालाना sporting इवेंट विश्वव्यापी  .
Because of its high viewership , commercial airtime  दौरान the सुपर कटोरी ब्रॉडकास्ट is the सबसे महंगी of the  year .
Due to the high cost of investing in  विज्ञापन on the सुपर  Bowl , companies regularly develop their most expensive advertisements for this broadcast .
As a result , watching and  discussing the ब्रॉडकास्ट 's commercials रै become a significant  aspect of the event .
in जोड , अनेक लोकप्रिय गायकों और संगीतकारों  have performed during the event 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies because of the exposure .
Fiona is a  feminine दिए नाम .
The name Fiona was invented , and first used , by the  स्कॉटिश कवि जेम्स macpherson ( 1736–96 ) , लेखक of the ossian कविताएं , जिससे he claimed यहूद अनुवाद इससे प्राचीन गैलिक स्त्रोत (  sources , when challenged , he never produced ) .
The name was subsequently used as a  pseudonym by विलियम शार्प ( 1855–1905 ) , जो authored अनेक रोमांटिक works अंतर्गत  the name `` Fiona Macleod '' .
The name has since become  लोकप्रिय in इंग्लैण्ड , स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड  .
The name  is माना to be a latinised रूप of the गैलिक शब्द fionn , अर्थ  `` white '' , `` fair '' .
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation of the  irish-language नाम fíona , हालांकि ये names हैं वरना unrelated  ( as Fíona is derived from an element meaning `` vine '' ) .
There is also a modern tendency to equate the authentic  स्कॉटिश गैलिक feminine नाम fionnghal साथ फिओना  .
The  नाम फिओना is उठती in लोकप्रियता विशेषकर  in German -speaking countries .
फिओना थी the 49th सबसे लोकप्रिय नाम  for baby girls born in 2008 in Germany .
Fiona was tied for third place in the ranking of most  लोकप्रिय names लिये baby लड़कियों born in the छोटा principality of  Liechtenstein in 2008 .
The name was the 347th most popular  नाम लिये लड़कियों born in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 , जहाँ it रै क्रमित  among the top 1,000 most popular names for girls since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999 .
The name Fiona has been particularly  लोकप्रिय लिये लड़कियों of एशियाई or प्रशांत islander descent in नई यॉर्क नगर , जहाँ फिओना क्रमित  as the ninth most popular name for girls from those groups in 2007 .
Many languages are used , or historically have  महरूम प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
The most  commonly प्रयुक्त भाषा is  English .
There are also many languages indigenous to North  अमेरिका or to u.S. राज्य or holdings in the प्रशांत प्रदेश .
Languages brought to the country by colonists or immigrants from  यूरोपीय , एशिया , or अन्य भाग of the संसार मेक up a विशाल portion of the भाषाएं फिलहाल प्रयुक्त ; अनेक  languages , including creoles and sign languages , have also developed in the United States .
Approximately 337 languages are spoken or signed by  the जनसांख्यिकी , of जिससे 176 हैं स्वदेशी to the  area .
Fifty-two  भाषाएं formerly बोला in  the country 's territory are now extinct .
The variety of English spoken in  the संयुक्त राज्य is ज्ञात as अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी  .
English is the de facto national language of the United States , with 80 % of the population  claiming it as a माँ जीभ , और कुछ 95 % claiming to बोलो it `` खूब '' or ``  very well '' .
However , no official  भाषा exists at the संघीय स्तर  .
There  have महरूम अनेक प्रस्ताव to मेक अंग्रेज़ी the नेशनल भाषा in amendments  to immigration reform bills , but none of these bills has become law with the amendment intact .
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels , with some states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official language in a de jure capacity , others adopting  अंग्रेज़ी अलोन , अन्य officially adopting अंग्रेज़ी as खूब as लोकल भाषाएं , और  still others adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism .
Spanish is the second most common  भाषा in the देश , और is बोला by over 12  % of the population .
The United States holds the world 's fifth largest  spanish-speaking जनसांख्यिकी , outnumbered तभी by मैक्सिको , स्पेन , कोलंबिया  , and Argentina .
Throughout the Southwestern United States , long-established  spanish-speaking समुदायों coexist साथ विशाल संख्याएँ of अधिक हाल  Hispanophone immigrants .
Although many new Latin American immigrants are less than fluent in  अंग्रेज़ी , nearly सब second-generation हिस्पैनिक अमेरिकी बोलो अंग्रेज़ी धड़ल्ले , जबकि तभी परिचय  half still speak Spanish .
According to the 2000 US census ,  लोगों of जर्मनी ancestry मेक up the largest सिंगल जातीय समूह in the संयुक्त राज्य  , and the German language ranks fifth .
Italian , Polish , and French are still widely spoken among  populations descending इससे आप्रवासियों इससे those  countries in the early 20th century , but the use of these languages is dwindling as the older generations die .
रूसी is भी बोला by  immigrant populations .
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over one million speakers each  in the संयुक्त राज्य , लगभग entirely भीतर हाल अप्रवासी populations .
Both languages , along with the varieties of the Chinese language , Japanese , and Korean , are now  प्रयुक्त in चुनावों in अलास्का , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , हवाई , इलिनोइस , नई यॉर्क , टेक्सास , और वॉशिंगटन .
Native American languages are spoken in smaller pockets of the country , but  ये populations हैं अवरोहण , और the भाषाएं हैं लगभग never  widely used outside of reservations .
Hawaiian  , हालांकि having few देशी अध्यक्षों , is an आधिकारिक भाषा  along with English at the state level in Hawaii .
The state government of Louisiana offers  सेवाएं और दस्तावेज़ in फ्रेंच , as करता नई मैक्सिको  in Spanish .
Besides English , Spanish , French  , जर्मनी , navajo और अन्य देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं , सब अन्य भाषाएं हैं प्रायः सीखे इससे  immigrant ancestors that came after the time of independence or learned through some form of education .
1990 's Pontiac  ग्रैंड am सेडान फेंडर  and quarter panel
On an automobile , a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is known in British English ) is usually considered the body panel which goes between the rear  द्वार और the ट्रंक और typically wraps around the व्हील खूब ; however , the समान सामने खण्ड फेंडर ( गाडी ) , between the द्वार और the हुड , is sometimes incorrectly  referred to as a quarter panel .
The quarter panel is typically made of Sheet metal , but is sometimes made of fiberglass or  fiber-reinforced प्लास्टिक ; हालांकि , इस varies साथ  different makes and models .
A quarter panel  is typically a welded on  component of the uni-body structure or Monocoque .
बदलना of a चादर मेटल क्वार्टर फलक typically requires it to be काटें बंद the  vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle .
Due to this high amount of specialized labor , a quarter panel may often be repaired  बल्कि than replaced by hammering आउट the क्षति , और a देह फिलर sometimes referred to as bondo to be लागू to finalize  the original surface .
shropshire ( or ; alternatively salop  ; abbreviated , in print only , Shrops ) is a county in the West Midlands region of England .
It borders Wales to the west , Cheshire to the  उत्तर , staffordshire to the ईस्ट , वॉस्टरशायर  to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south .
A unitary authority ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April  2009 , लेने over इससे the पिछला काउंटी परिषद और 5 ज़िला councils  , and covers most of the county .
The borough of  telford और wrekin रै महरूम a पृथक एकात्मक  authority since 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial county .
The county 's population and economy is centred on five towns : the county town of  shrewsbury , जिससे is culturally और historically महत्वपूर्ण और is स्तिथ in the केन्द्र of the काउंटी ; telford , a नई कस्बा in the ईस्ट जिससे थी constructed around a क्रमांक of पुरानी कस्बों , सबसे notably वेलिंगटन , dawley और madeley , जिससे is आज the सबसे  populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west , Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford , and Ludlow in the south .
The county has many further market towns , including  whitchurch in the उत्तर , न्यूपोर्ट बस to the north-east of telford , और मार्केट drayton in the  north-east of the county .
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a UNESCO  संसार विरासत साईट , covering ironbridge ,  Coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley .
There are , additionally , other notable historic industrial sites  स्तिथ around the काउंटी , ऐसे as at shrewsbury , broseley , snailbeach  and Highley as well as the Shropshire Union Canal .
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding  प्राकृतिक सौंदर्य कवर परिचय a क्वार्टर of the  county , mainly in the south .
shropshire is एक of इंग्लैण्ड 's सबसे ग्रामीण और sparsely आबादी काउंटी  , with the population density of the Shropshire Council area being just 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ) .
The Wrekin is one of  the सबसे प्रसिद्ध प्राकृतिक लैंडमार्क in the काउंटी , हालांकि the  highest hills are the Clee Hills , Stiperstones and the Long Mynd .
Wenlock  किनारे is another significant भौगोलिक और  geological landmark .
In the low-lying  उत्तरपश्चिम of the काउंटी ( और अतिव्यापी the किनारा साथ वेल्स ) is the fenn 's , whixall और bettisfield  Mosses National Nature Reserve , one of the most important and best preserved bogs in Britain .
The River Severn , Great  ब्रिटेन 's longest नदी , रनों through the काउंटी , exiting  into Worcestershire via the Severn Valley .
Shropshire is landlocked , and  साथ an क्षेत्रफल of , is इंग्लैण्ड 's largest अंतर्देशीय काउंटी  .
the काउंटी पुष्प is the round-leaved  sundew .
For Eurostat purposes , the  काउंटी ( कम the एकात्मक ज़िला of  Telford and Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region ( code UKG22 ) .
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial county ) , together with the  अधिकारियों covering the ceremonial काउंटी of staffordshire , comprise  the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region .
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con 2009 , from left :  कुणाल नय्यर , साइमन helberg , kaley cuoco , जिम पार्सन्स  , and Johnny Galecki
the अमरीकी sitcom the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त , निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित  by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady , premiered on CBS on September 24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter , two Caltech physicists ; Penny , a waitress and  aspiring अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान आरपार the हॉल ; और लियोनार्ड और शेल्डन 's मित्रों और co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर हावर्ड wolowitz , और astrophysicist  Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1  पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ) , a physicist सहयोगी , और , at अलग टाइम्स , a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ) , a microbiologist , हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी , और पूर्व  part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The  दिखाएँ भी सुविधाएँ numerous supporting वर्ण , प्रत्येक of  whom plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes .
The A-Team is an American action-adventure television series , running from 1983 to 1987 , about a fictional group of ex–  संयुक्त राज्य फौज खास शक्तियां कर्मियों जो कार्य as सैनिको of सौभाग्य , जबकि on the चलाएं इससे the फौज बाद होने ब्रांडेड as  war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit `` .
A feature film  आधारित on the श्रेणी थी released by 20th सदी  Fox on June 11 , 2010 .
A comic  किताब श्रेणी , a-team : shotgun विवाह  , began March 9 , 2010 .
Diana Prince is a  fictional अक्षर appearing  regularly in stories published by DC Comics .
She debuted in Sensation Comics # 1 ( January 1942 ) and serves as the  civilian और रहस्य पहचान of  the superhero Wonder Woman .
The character was  निर्मित by चार्ल्स moulton और हैरी G.  Peter .
Wat  phra kaew ,  Bangkok , Thailand
There is no official  राज्य धर्म in the थाई संविधान , जिससे  guarantees religious freedom for all Thai citizens , though the king is required by law to be Buddhist .
According to the last census (  2000 ) 94.6 % of thais हैं बौद्धों of the थेरवाद परंपरा  .
Muslims are the second largest  धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड  at 4.6 % .
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani , Yala , Narathiwat  और भाग of songkhla chumphon have प्रबल मुस्लिम populations ,  consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay .
The  दक्षिणी टिप of थाईलैंड  is mostly ethnic Malays .
Christians , mainly Catholics ,  represent 0.7 % of the जनसांख्यिकी  .
A small but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some Hindus also  सजीव in the देश 's शहरों , और हैं heavily सगाई in खुदरा  commerce .
वहीँ is भी a छोटी यहूदी जातियाँ  in Thailand , dating back to the 17th century .
Since 2001 , Muslim activists , generally described by the Thai government as terrorists or separatists , have rallied  विरूद्ध the सेंट्रल सरकारी क्युकी of कथित भ्रष्टाचार और जातीय पूर्वाग्रह on the भाग of officials  .
Thailand 's Department of Religion , currently under the Ministry of Culture , is formally  जिम्मेदार लिये the पंजीकरण of धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड url_http जिससे थाम गुण through  legally established foundations .
It has oversight , along with the  आव्रजन पुलिस , over the कार्य permits of प्रचारकों जो हैं `` प्रवासी धार्मिक  workers '' of all religions .
A value added  कर ( vat ) is a रूप of खपत कर  .
From the  परिप्रेक्ष्य of the खरीदार  , it is a tax on the purchase price .
From that of the seller , it is a tax only on the value added to a product ,  सामग्री , or सेवा , इससे an हिसाब पाइंट of दृश्य , by इस स्टेज of इसके  manufacture or distribution .
The  निर्माता remits to the सरकारी the अंतर between ये दो amounts , और retains  the rest for themselves to offset the taxes they had previously paid on the inputs .
The value added to a  उत्पाद by or साथ a कारोबार is the बिक्री दाम चार्ज to इसके  customer , minus the cost of materials and other taxable inputs .
A VAT is like a sales  कर in कि ultimately तभी the समाप्त उपभोक्ता  is taxed .
It differs from the sales  कर in कि , साथ the latter , the कर is एकत्रित और remitted to the सरकारी  only once , at the point of purchase by the end consumer .
With the VAT ,  संग्रहण , remittances to the सरकारी , और क्रेडिट लिये कर already सशुल्क occur प्रत्येक समय a कारोबार in the  supply chain purchases products .
a रेफरी कॉलिंग  a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur when a player intentionally or inadvertently plays with his or her stick above  the ऊँचाई of the कन्धों or ऊपर the क्रॉस बार of a हॉकी  goal .
This can result in a  stoppage of खेल or in a दंड  .
In the rules of the  नेशनल हॉकी लीग , high-sticking  is defined as a penalty in Rule 60 and as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80 .
A stoppage in play  परिणाम if a ऊँची स्टिक आता in सम्पर्क साथ the पक और the टोली  who touched it regains control of the puck .
However , play usually continues if a  खिलाड़ी छू the पक साथ a ऊँची स्टिक और the opposing  team gains control of the puck .
If the puck goes into the opposing  जाल बाद coming into सम्पर्क साथ a ऊँची स्टिक , the  goal is disallowed .
The level at which a stick is  माना too ऊँची लिये a लक्ष्य is  the crossbar of the net .
However , if a player knocks the puck into his own  जाल साथ a ऊँची स्टिक , the लक्ष्य  is allowed .
A penalty is assessed if a  खिलाड़ी हमलों another खिलाड़ी साथ a ऊँची  stick .
The player is given a minor penalty  जबतक उसके ऊँची स्टिक caused an चोट , in जिससे मामला the रेफरी रै the विकल्प to assess a double-minor  , major or match penalty .
It is the referee 's discretion which  दंड to assess : the नियम काल्स लिये a दोगुना नाबालिग लिये an आकस्मिक चोट  , or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ) .
Injury is usually decided by the  ऊँची स्टिक causing bleeding , लकिन the उपस्थिति of रक्त  does not automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded .
Some referees have been  ज्ञात to पुरस्कार an अतिरिक्त दंड बगैर the उपस्थिति of रक्त  if the referee determines that the injury sustained was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty .
ठेठ आधुनिक मेमोरी कार्ड रीडर , संगत साथ  many common formats
A memory card reader is a device , typically  having a usb इंटरफ़ेस , लिये accessing the आंकड़ा on a मेमोरी कार्ड ऐसे as a compactflash (  CF ) , Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ) .
Most card readers also offer write capability , and together with  the कार्ड , इस can फलन as a कलम ड्राइव  .
Some printers and personal  कंप्यूटर have a built-in कार्ड रीडर  .
A multi card  रीडर is प्रयुक्त  for communication with more than one type of flash memory card .
Multi card readers do not have built-in memory capacity , but are  समर्थ to accept अनेक प्रकार और शैलियाँ of मेमोरी ताश .
The number of  संगत मेमोरी ताश varies इससे रीडर to रीडर और can शामिल  more than 20 different types .
The number of  अलग मेमोरी ताश कि a मल्टी कार्ड रीडर can accept  is expressed as x-in-1 , with x being a figure of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted , such as 35-in-1 .
There are three categories of card readers sorted by the  प्रकार और मात्रा of the कार्ड स्लॉट : सिंगल कार्ड रीडर ( e.g . 1x sd-only ) , मल्टी कार्ड  reader ( e.g . 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g . 4x SD only ) .
Some kinds of memory cards with  उनके अपना usb कृत्यों do नहीं need the कार्ड रीडर , ऐसे as the बुद्धिमान स्टिक मेमोरी कार्ड , जिससे can  plug directly into a USB slot .
The USB  यंत्र क्लास प्रयुक्त is 0x08  .
Bullying is detrimental  to विद्यार्थी ' well-being  and development .
Bullying  is the उपयोग of फ़ोर्स or coercion to गाली  or intimidate others .
The behavior can be  habitual और involve an असंतुलन of सोशल  or physical power .
It can include verbal harassment or threat , physical assault or coercion and may  be निर्देशित repeatedly towards particular पीड़ितों , शायद on grounds of रेस , धर्म ,  gender , sexuality , or ability .
If bullying is  किया by a समूह , it  is called mobbing .
The  शिकार of धमकाना is sometimes referred  to as a `` target '' .
Bullying can be  पारिभाषित in अनेक अलग  ways .
The UK currently has no legal definition of  धमकाना , जबकि कुछ u.S. राज्य have कानून विरूद्ध  it .
Bullying  consists of तीन मौलिक प्रकार of  abuse – emotional , verbal , and physical .
It typically involves subtle methods  of coercion ऐसे as intimidation  .
Bullying ranges from simple  one-on-one धमकाना to अधिक जटिल धमकाना in जिससे the बुली may have एक or अधिक `` lieutenants  '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying activities .
Bullying in school and the  कार्यस्थल is भी referred to as  peer abuse .
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed  धमकाना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of rankism .
A  धमकाना संस्कृति can develop in कोई कॉन्टेक्स्ट  in which human beings interact with each other .
This includes school ,  गिरिजाघर , परिवार , the कार्यस्थल , घर , और  neighborhoods .

Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4 , 2007 , in Austin , Texas , after the 8-year-old  introduced mrs. बुश दौरान घोषणा of the भविष्य खोलने of the टेक्सास क्षेत्रीय  Office of the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children .
Rae  leigh थी the पहला चाइल्ड in the u.S. to be बरामद as a परिणाम  of an AMBER Alert when she was 8 weeks old in November 1998 .
An AMBER Alert or a Child Abduction Emergency ( SAME code : CAE )  is a चाइल्ड abduction चेतावनी प्रणाली originating in 1996  , now employed in 9 countries .
AMBER is officially a backronym  लिये अमेरिका 's लापता : प्रसारण आपात जवाब , नामित लिये एम्बर  Hagerman , a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington , Texas in 1996 .
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia , `` Levi 's Call '' ( named after Levi  frady ) ; in हवाई , `` maile एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( बाद maile गिल्बर्ट ) ; और अरकंसास , `` मॉर्गन उपनाम एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( in मेमोरी of मॉर्गन  Chauntel Nick ) .
AMBER Alerts are distributed via  वाणिज्यिक रेडियो स्टेशन , अंतरजाल रेडियो , उपग्रह रेडियो , टेलीविज़न स्टेशन , और केबल tv by the आपात चेतावनी प्रणाली और noaa मौसम रेडियो ( जहाँ  they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ) .
The alerts are also issued via e-mail ,  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक traffic-condition लक्षण , the led billboards जिससे हैं स्तिथ बाहर of नए walgreens स्थितियाँ , साथ साथ the led/lcd  signs of billboard companies such as Clear Channel Outdoor , CBS Outdoor and Lamar , or through wireless device SMS text messages .
AMBER Alert has also teamed up with Google and Facebook to relay information  regarding an एम्बर चेतावनी to an कभी growing जनसांख्यिकी  .
Those  दिलचस्पी in subscribing to प्राप्त एम्बर चेतावनियाँ in उनके क्षेत्रफल  via SMS messages can visit Wireless Amber Alerts , which are offered by law as free messages .
In  कुछ राज्य , the प्रदर्शक  scrollboards in front of lottery terminals are also used .
The decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each police organization ( in  अनेक मामले , the राज्य पुलिस or राजमार्ग पैट्रोल ) जिससे investigates प्रत्येक  of the abductions .
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the name and description  of the abductee , a वर्णन of the suspected abductor , और a वर्णन और अनुज्ञा थाली क्रमांक of the abductor  's vehicle , if available .
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an American woman with  जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an `` improper  relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its  परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग )  became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed  काल्पनिक novels by अमरीकी लेखक P. C. डाल और उसके बेटी  Kristin Cast .
It follows the  adventures of zoey redbird , a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो रै बस  become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is required to attend the House of Night boarding school in Tulsa , Oklahoma .
The series has been on  the नई यॉर्क टाइम्स बेहतरीन विक्रेता सूची लिये 63 सप्ताह  and there are over seven million copies in print in North America alone .
The sixth novel ,  इम्तिहान , जिससे गई on बिक्री on अक्तूबर 27 , 2009 साथ a पहला मुद्रण of a लाख नक़ल  , entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1 .
In January , 2010 , Gezeichnet , a German  अनुवाद of चिह्नित , पहुँचे the # 1 स्पॉट on the der spiegel बेस्टसेलर सूची  .
The series has so far sold  अधिक than टेन लाख किताबे in 39  countries .
Burned was  released on अप्रैल 27 , 2010 , और जैसे इम्तिहान  , it entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1 .
Awakened  , released in जनवरी , 2011 , भी  entered the list at # 1 .
The series , which  is प्रकाशित by st मार्टिन 's दबायें is नियोजित  to include twelve books .
In 2008 , plans for a  फिल्मी अनुकूलन यहूद भी घोषित  .
The tenth  किताब in the श्रेणी , छुपा , थी  released on October 16 , 2012 .
The second book in the novellas ( which  दे पृष्ठभूमि on supporting वर्ण ) , lenobia 's प्रण , थी released  January 31 , 2012 .
Book eleven is currently called Revealed , and the Casts have announced that two more novellas , Neferet’s Curse , planned to  be released फ़रवरी 19 , 2013 , और a प्रीक्वेल अनोखा परिचय kalona , हैं to be released to coincide साथ the eleventh  and twelfth books .
In Greek mythology , the Trojan War was waged against  the नगर of ट्रॉय by the achaeans ( यूनानियों ) बाद पेरिस of  Troy took Helen from her husband Menelaus king of Sparta .
The war is one of the most important events in  यूनानी mythology और रै महरूम narrated through अनेक works of यूनानी साहित्य ,  most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey .
The Iliad relates a part of the last  साल of the घेरा of ट्रॉय ; the ओडिसी describes odysseus 's  journey home .
Other parts of the war are contained in a cycle  of एपिक कविताएं , जिससे have बच through  fragments .
Episodes from the war provided  सामग्री लिये यूनानी त्रासदी और अन्य works of यूनानी साहित्य  , and for Roman poets including Virgil and Ovid .
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena , Hera , and Aphrodite , after  eris , the देवी of संघर्ष और अनबन , दिया उन्हें a सुनहरी ठहराना , sometimes ज्ञात as the ठहराना of अनबन  , marked `` for the fairest '' .
Zeus  भेजा the देवियाँ to पेरिस , जो judged कि  Aphrodite , as the `` fairest '' , should receive the apple .
In exchange , Aphrodite made Helen , the most  खूबसूरत of सब महिलाओं और बीवी of menelaus , पतन in प्रेम साथ पेरिस , जो  took her to Troy .
Agamemnon , king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband Menelaus , led an expedition  of achaean सैनिकों to ट्रॉय और besieged the नगर लिये टेन सालो  because of Paris ' insult .
After the deaths of many  नायक , सहित the achaeans achilles और अजाक्स , और the ट्रोजन्स हेक्टर और  Paris , the city fell to the ruse of the Trojan Horse .
The Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except for some of the women and children whom they kept or sold  as स्लेव ) और desecrated the मंदिरों  , thus earning the gods ' wrath .
Few of the Achaeans returned safely to their  घरों और अनेक संस्थापित colonies in  distant shores .
The Romans later traced their origin to Aeneas , one of the Trojans  , जो थी कहा to have led the surviving ट्रोजन्स to  modern-day Italy .
The ancient Greeks thought that  the trojan युद्ध थी a ऐतिहासिक इवेंट कि था लिया प्लेस in the 13th or  12th century BC , and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles .
By  आधुनिक टाइम्स , दोनो the युद्ध और the नगर  were widely believed to be non-historical .
In 1868  , however , the जर्मनी पुरातत्ववेत्ताओं heinrich schliemann मिले फ़्रैंक calvert , जो कायल schliemann कि ट्रॉय  was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this claim is now accepted by most scholars .
Whether there is any  ऐतिहासिक वास्तविकता पीछे the trojan युद्ध is an खोलें  question .
Many scholars  मानना कि वहीँ is a ऐतिहासिक कोर to the टेल , हालांकि इस may बस औसत कि the homeric  stories are a fusion of various tales of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age .
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a specific historical conflict usually date it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC , often preferring the dates  दिए by इरैटोस्थनिज़ , 1194–1184 bc , जिससे roughly corresponds साथ पुरातत्व प्रमाण of a अनर्थकारी  burning of Troy VIIa .
Anarchists have employed certain  प्रतीकों लिये उनके कारण , सहित सबसे prominently the circle-a  and the black flag , although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement .
Since the revival of anarchism around  the प्रारंभ of the 21st-century संयुक्त साथ the वृद्धि of the anti-globalization गति ,  anarchist cultural symbols are widely present .
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine artery , vein  , और तंत्रिका between the pterygopalatine fossa और the मौखिक गुहा  .
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter and  गर्मियाँ इससे the यूरोपीय केन्द्र लिये medium-range मौसम  Forecasts
The  जलवायु of अंटार्कटिक is the coldest  on the whole of Earth .
Antarctica has the lowest naturally  occurring तापमान कभी अंकित on the मैदान on धरती : −89.2 °c (  −128.6 °F ) at Vostok Station .
It is also extremely dry ( technically a  मरुस्थल ) , averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of वर्षण प्रति  year .
भी so , on सबसे भाग of the महाद्वीप the हिम  rarely melts and is eventually compressed to become the glacial ice that makes up the ice sheet .
Weather fronts rarely  घुस दूर into the महाद्वीप  .
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap climate ( Köppen EF ) with very cold ,  generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम throughout the साल और no माह averaging ऊपर  0 °C ( 32 °F ) .
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET  ) साथ a छोटी गर्मियाँ averaging  above freezing , and much higher precipitation .

The  पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स मताधिकार रै  had 16 head coaches throughout its history .
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in , the  नाम थी बदला to the स्टीलर्स prior to the ऋतु to celebrate  the city 's heritage of producing steel .
Joe Bach served two separate terms as head  कोच और वॉल्ट kiesling परोसा तीन पृथक  terms .
During the and seasons , due to the amount of players who fought in  संसार युद्ध ii , the स्टीलर्स संयुक्त उनके टोली साथ फिलाडेल्फिया और शिकागो , क्रमशः  .
During these seasons , Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared  कोचिंग कर्तव्य साथ चिकनी neale और फिल हैंडलर , जो have नहीं  been included within this list .
Struggling for much of the franchise 's early years ,  the टोली 's पहला ऋतु साथ अधिक विन्स than  losses was coached by Jock Sutherland in .
In  , अंतर्गत sutherland , the स्टीलर्स  played their first playoff game against the Philadelphia Eagles .
Ten of the 16 head coaches spent their entire professional coaching careers with the franchise ,  सहित जॉन mcnally , वॉल्ट kiesling और चक  Noll , who have also been voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame .
One of only four men to  कोच the वही टोली लिये 23 सालो , चक  Noll retired in .
Noll is also  the तभी कोच in नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League history to win four Super Bowls .
Bill Cowher , Noll 's replacement ,  coached the स्टीलर्स to उनके पांचवां  Super Bowl victory , in 2005 .
The  स्टीलर्स छठे सुपर कटोरी जीत आए in सुपर कटोरी xliii  , while head coached by Mike Tomlin , the team 's current head coach .
In criminal law , fraud is  जानबूझकर deception बना लिये निजी लाभ or to क्षति another व्यक्तिगत ; the सम्बन्धित  adjective is fraudulent , and verb is defraud .
Fraud is a crime and a civil  विधि उल्लंघन , हालांकि the विशिष्ट  criminal law definition varies by legal jurisdiction .
Defrauding people  or entities of धन or valuables is a आम  purpose of fraud .
A hoax also involves deception , but without the intention of gain or  of damaging or depriving the  victim .
Fraud is a defense in a  सिविल कार्रवाई लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध or विशिष्ट  performance of a contract .
Fraud is a basis for  निष्पक्ष क्षेत्राधिकार  .
Passover , or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew , Yiddish ) , Tiberian : , Modern Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah , Pesakh , Yiddish : Peysekh , Paysakh ,  paysokh ) is an महत्वपूर्ण biblically -derived यहूदी पर्व  .
Historically ,  साथ साथ shavuot ( `` पेंटेकोस्ट '' ) और sukkot ( `` झोपड़ियों '' ) , passover is एक of the तीन यात्राएं त्यौहार  ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem .
Samaritans still make  इस यात्राएं to माउंट gerizim , लकिन तभी मेन participate in पब्लिक  worship .
Passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan and  lasts लिये either सात दिनों ( in इसराईल ) or आठ दिनों ( in the diaspora  ) .
In Judaism , a day commences at dusk and  lasts जबतक the following संध्या , यूँ the पहला दिन of passover तभी begins बाद संध्या of the 14th of nisan और  ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of Nisan .
The rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence with the  passover seder जब the 15th of nisan  has begun .
In the Northern  गोलार्ध passover takes प्लेस in वसन्त as the तोरा  prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ) .
It is one of the most  widely observed यहूदी छुट्टियाँ  .
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 years ago by God from slavery in ancient  मिश्र कि थी शासित by the pharaohs , और उनके जनम as a स्वदेश अंतर्गत the नेतृत्व of मूसा  .
It commemorates the story of the Exodus as described in the Hebrew Bible especially in the Book  of exodus , in जिससे the israelites यहूद freed इससे गुलामी in  Egypt .
In the narrative of the Exodus , the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon  the प्राचीन उन्होंने पहले the pharaoh होता रिलीज उसके israelite स्लेव ; the दसवाँ और worst  of the plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born .
The Israelites were instructed to mark the doorposts of their homes with the blood of a slaughtered spring lamb and ,  upon देखकर इस , the स्पिरिट of the रब knew to pass over the first-born in ये घरों , hence the नाम  of the holiday .
There is some  बहस over जहाँ the पद  is actually derived from .
When the Pharaoh freed the Israelites , it is said  कि वे बाएँ in ऐसे a hurry कि  they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ) .
In commemoration  , लिये the अवधि of passover no leavened ब्रैड is खाया , लिये जिससे कारण  it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread '' .
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened  ब्रैड ) is खाया दौरान passover और it is a प्रतीक of  the holiday .
हैली 's धूमकेतु or धूमकेतु हैली ( or ) , officially  designated 1P/Halley , is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly  दृश्य to the नग्न नजर इससे धरती , और यूँ the तभी naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear twice in  a human lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and more  spectacular , लकिन होगा appear तभी एकबार in हज़ारों of  years .
हैली 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have  been observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese , Babylonian , and medieval European  chroniclers , लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना as reappearances of the वही ऑब्जेक्ट  at the time .
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by  अंग्रेज़ी astronomer edmond हैली ,  after whom it is now named .
हैली 's धूमकेतु पिछला appeared in the  inner Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition , Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft  , providing the पहला observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of a धूमकेतु केंद्रक और the यांत्रिकी of कोमा और टेल  formation .
These observations supported  a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण , विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` गंदा स्नोबॉल '' मॉडल , जिससे correctly पूर्वानुमानित कि हैली होता be  composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also  provided आंकड़ा जिससे substantially reformed और reconfigured ये विचार ; लिये उदाहरण it is अभी समझा कि हैली 's सतह  is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion of it is icy .
Anti-communism is  विपक्ष to  communism .
Organized anti-communism developed in  प्रतिक्रिया to the वृद्धि of साम्यवादी , विशेषकर बाद the 1917 अक्तूबर क्रान्ति in रूस  and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War .
Most anti-communists  अस्वीकृत the अवधारणा of ऐतिहासिक भौतिकवाद , जिससे is a सेंट्रल  idea in Marxism .
Anti-communists reject the  मार्क्सवादी विश्वास कि पूंजीवाद होगा be followed by समाजवादी और साम्यवादी ,  just as feudalism was followed by capitalism .
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist claim that the socialist state will ``  wither दूर '' जब it becomes अनावश्यक in a सच्चा कम्युनिस्ट  society .
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the early years of Bolshevik rule , while not as extreme as that during Joseph Stalin 's rule , was still severe by reasonable standards , citing examples such as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret police , which  eliminated numerous राजनैतिक प्रतिद्वंद्वियों by extrajudicial executions , और the क्रूर crushing of the kronstadt विद्रोह  and Tambov rebellion .
कुछ anti-communists refer to दोनो साम्यवादी और फासीवाद as सर्वसत्तावाद  , seeing similarity between the actions of communist and fascist governments .
Historian Robert Conquest has argued that Communism was  जिम्मेदार लिये tens of लाखो of मौतों दौरान the  20th century .
Opponents  argue कि कम्युनिस्ट पार्टियों कि  have come to power have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition .
These opponents claim that most Communist countries have shown no signs of advancing from Marx 's  समाजवादी स्टेज of अर्थव्यवस्था to an आदर्श कम्युनिस्ट  stage .
Rather , Communist governments have been accused of creating a new ruling class ( a Nomenklatura ) , with powers and  privileges वृहद than those previously enjoyed by the अपर वर्ग in  the non- communist regimes .
Gil Heron ( 9  अप्रैल 1922 – 27 नवम्बर 2008 ) थी a  Jamaican professional footballer .
He was  the पहला ब्लैक खिलाड़ी to खेल लिये स्कॉटिश क्लबों  Celtic , and was the father of poet and musician Gil Scott-Heron .
He died in  डेट्रॉयट of a दिल आक्रमण on 27 नवम्बर  2008 .
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a  प्रजाति of legume देशी to ईस्ट एशिया , widely grown लिये इसके खाद्य सेम जिससे रै numerous उपयोग  .
The plant is classed as an oilseed rather than a pulse  by the un खाना और agricultural  Organization ( FAO ) .
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and cheap source of  प्रोटीन लिये एनिमल फ़ीड्स और अनेक prepackaged meals ; सोया सब्ज़ी  oil is another product of processing the soybean crop .
For example , soybean products  ऐसे as textured सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन ( tvp ) हैं संघटक in अनेक मांस और दुग्ध analogues  .
Soybeans  उपज significantly अधिक प्रोटीन प्रति एकड़ than  most other uses of land .
Traditional nonfermented  खाना उपयोग of soybeans शामिल सोया मिल्क  , and from the latter tofu and tofu skin .
fermented भोजन शामिल सोया सॉस , fermented सेम paste  , natto , and tempeh , among others .
the आयल is प्रयुक्त in अनेक औद्योगिक  applications .
The main producers of  सोया हैं the संयुक्त राज्य ( 35 % ) , ब्राज़ील ( 27 % ) , अर्जेंटीना ( 19 % ) , चीन ( 6 % )  and India ( 4 % ) .
The beans contain  significant amounts of phytic एसिड , alpha-linolenic  acid , and isoflavones .
हैरिसन घाट ( born जुलाई 13 , 1942  ) is an American film actor and producer .
He is famous for  उसके प्रदर्शन as हान सोलो in the असली स्टार युद्धों त्रयी और the  title character of the Indiana Jones film series .
Ford is also known for his roles  as रिक deckard in ब्लेड धावक , जॉन किताब in गवाह और  Jack Ryan in Patriot Games and Clear and Present Danger .
His career has spanned six decades and includes roles in several  हॉलीवुड blockbusters , सहित presumed निर्दोष  , The Fugitive , Air Force One , and What Lies Beneath .
At one point , four of  the शीर्ष छह box-office हिट्स of सब समय  included one of his roles .
पाँच of उसके films have महरूम inducted  into the National Film Registry .
in 1997 , घाट थी क्रमित no . 1 in साम्राज्य `` the  Top 100 Movie Stars of All Time '' list .
, the United States domestic box office grosses of Ford 's  films कुल over us $ 3.5 अरब , साथ विश्वव्यापी grosses surpassing $ 6 अरब , बनाना घाट the तीसरा उच्चतम grossing  U.S. domestic box-office star .
घाट is the husband of अभिनेत्री  Calista Flockhart .
a ट्यूब of  ChapStick
ChapStick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured  by फाइजर उपभोक्ता healthcare और प्रयुक्त in अनेक देशों  worldwide .
It is  intended to सहायता दावत और prevent chapped होठ  ; hence the name .
Many varieties also  शामिल सनस्क्रीन in अनुक्रम  to prevent sunburn .
Due to its popularity , the  पद रै become a genericized ट्रेडमार्क  .
It popularly refers to any lip balm contained in a  lipstick-style ट्यूब और लागू in the वही manner  as lipstick .
however , the पद is स्टिल a पंजीकृत  trademark , with rights exclusively owned by Pfizer .
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom , the product 's main  प्रतिस्पर्धी is lypsyl ,  made by Novartis Consumer Health , which is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick .
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ) , also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ) , was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose  प्राथमिक उपलब्धि थी the उन्नति of a सिद्धान्त he पुकारा `` immaterialism '' ( बाद referred to as `` subjective आदर्शवाद `` by अन्य  ) .
This theory denies the existence of material substance and instead  contends कि परिचित वस्तुएँ जैसे टेबल और कुर्सियां हैं तभी विचार in the minds  of perceivers , and as a result can not exist without being perceived .
Thus , as Berkeley famously put it  , लिये शारीरिक वस्तुएँ `` esse est percipi '' (  `` to be is to be perceived `` ) .
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction ,  an महत्वपूर्ण आधार in उसके तर्क  for immaterialism .
In 1709 , Berkeley published his first major work , , in  जिससे he discussed the सीमाएं of इंसान दृष्टि और उन्नत the सिद्धान्त कि the उचित वस्तुएँ of sight हैं नहीं सामग्री  objects , but light and colour .
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human  ज्ञान in 1710 जिससे , बाद इसके ग़रीब रिसेप्शन , he rewrote in संवाद रूप और प्रकाशित अंतर्गत the शीर्षक  Three Dialogues between Hylas and Philonous in 1713 .
In this book , Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover  of दिमाग ' ) , जबकि hylas ( यूनानी : 'मैटr ' ) embodies the आयरिश  thinker’s opponents , in particular John Locke .
Berkeley argued against Sir  इसहाक़ न्यूटन 's doctrine of निरपेक्ष स्पेस , समय और गति in de मोटू  ( on Motion ) , published 1721 .
His arguments were a precursor to the  दृश्य of mach और आइंस्टीन  .
In 1732 , he published Alciphron , a Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers , and in 1734 ,  he प्रकाशित the विश्लेषक , an empiricist critique of the मूलाधार  of infinitesimal calculus , which was influential in the development of mathematics .
His last major  philosophical कार्य , siris ( 1744 ) , begins by वकालत the औषधीय उपयोग of तारकोल जल , और तब continues  to discuss a wide range of topics including science , philosophy , and theology .
Interest in  बर्कली 's कार्य increased बाद संसार युद्ध ii , क्युकी he tackled अनेक of the मुद्दे  of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th century such as the problems of perception , the difference between primary and secondary qualities , and the importance of language .
Qingdao ( ) , historically known as Tsingtao , is a major city  in पूर्वी शानदोंग प्रांत , पूर्वी चीन , साथ  a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ) .
Its built up  क्षेत्रफल , बना of 6 शहरी जिले और 4  county-level cities , is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010 .
It  सीमायें yantai to the पूर्वोत्तर , weifang  to the west and Rizhao to the southwest .
Qīng ( ) in Chinese  अर्थात् `` ग्रीन '' or `` रसीले  '' , while dǎo ( ) means `` island '' .
Qingdao is administered at the  sub-provincial  level .
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow Sea ,  चिंगदाओ is a प्रमुख seaport , नवल  base , and industrial centre .
It is also the site of the  tsingtao ब्रेवरी  .
The  संसार 's longest समुद्र सेतु , the चिंगदाओ haiwan सेतु , कड़ी the प्रमुख शहरी क्षेत्रफल  of Qingdao with Huangdao district , straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas .
Qingdao is named  चीन 's सबसे livable  city .
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named Acanthamoeba  polyphaga mimivirus ( apmv ) , or is a समूह of phylogenetically सम्बन्धित विशाल  viruses ( designated usually MimiN ) .
In colloquial speech ,  apmv is अधिक commonly referred  to as just `` mimivirus '' .
Until October 2011 , when a larger  वायरस megavirus chilensis थी वर्णित , it था the largest capsid व्यास  of all known viruses .
mimivirus रै a विशाल और जटिल genome compared साथ  most other viruses .
Mimivirus , short for `` mimicking microbe  '' , is so पुकारा to  reflect its large size and apparent Gram-staining properties .
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed  विरोध between the लोगों of मैक्सिको और the स्पेनी  colonial authorities which started on September 16 , 1810 .
The movement , which became known as  the मैक्सिकन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता , थी led by mexican-born spaniards , mestizos और amerindians  who sought independence from Spain .
It started as an  आदर्शवादी peasants ' विद्रोह विरूद्ध उनके औपनिवेशिक मास्टर्स , लकिन ended as an असंभावित गठबंधन between मैक्सिकन ex-royalists  and Mexican guerrilla insurgents .
Crohn 's disease , also known as Crohn  सिंड्रोम और क्षेत्रीय enteritis , is a प्रकार of जलन bowel बीमारी कि may affect कोई भाग of  the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus , causing a wide variety of symptoms .
It  primarily कल्याणकारी abdominal पीड़ा , अतिसार ( जिससे may be खूनी if सूजन is at इसके worst ) , उल्टी ( can be निरन्तर ) , or वज़न घाटा , लकिन may भी कारण जटिलताओं बाहर the जठरांत्र  tract such as skin rashes , arthritis , inflammation of the eye , tiredness , and lack of concentration .
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between  पर्यावरणीय , immunological और बैक्टीरियल कारकों in genetically  susceptible individuals .
This  परिणाम in a दीर्घकालिक जलन विकार , in जिससे the देह 's प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली  attacks the gastrointestinal tract possibly directed at microbial antigens .
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been  वर्णित as an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in the पास्ट ; हाल जांचकर्ताओं have वर्णित it  as an immune deficiency state .
There is a genetic association with Crohn 's disease , primarily with  विसंगतियाँ of the nod2 जीन और इसके प्रोटीन , जिससे होश बैक्टीरियल कोशिका दीवारें  .
सहोदर of प्रभावित individuals  are at higher risk .
Males and  महिलाओं हैं बराबर  affected .
Smokers are two times more likely to  develop crohn 's बीमारी than nonsmokers  .
Crohn 's  बीमारी affects between 400,000  and 600,000 people in North America .
Prevalence estimates for Northern Europe  have ranged इससे 27–48 प्रति 100,000  .
Crohn 's disease tends  to उपस्थित initially in the किशोर और twenties , साथ another शिखर incidence  in the fifties to seventies , although the disease can occur at any age .
There is no  ज्ञात फार्मास्युटिकल or सर्जिकल इलाज़  for Crohn 's disease .
उपचार विकल्प हैं प्रतिबंधित to controlling  symptoms , maintaining remission , and preventing relapse .
The disease was named after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn , who , in 1932 , together with two other colleagues  at माउंट sinai हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क , वर्णित a श्रेणी of मरीजों साथ सूजन of the टर्मिनल ileum , the क्षेत्रफल सबसे commonly प्रभावित by the बीमारी .
This  is an अधूरी सूची of the tallest  buildings and structures by country .
The list directly includes the tallest buildings and  structures लिये प्रत्येक देश , और जहाँ उचित ,  it also points to more detailed country-specific lists .
Rough and Ready is a census-designated  प्लेस in नेवाडा काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त  States .
it is स्तिथ वेस्ट of ग्रास घाटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , approximately 62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 963 at  the 2010 census .
YouTube is a video-sharing website , created by three  पूर्व paypal कर्मचारी in फ़रवरी 2005 , on जिससे उपयोक्ता can अपलोड , दृश्य  and share videos .
The company is based in San Bruno , California , and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to  प्रदर्शक a चौड़ी किस्में of user-generated वीडियो सामग्री , सहित फिल्म क्लिप्स , tv क्लिप्स , और म्यूज़िक वीडियो , as खूब as amateur सामग्री ऐसे as वीडियो blogging , छोटी  original videos , and educational videos .
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals , although media  corporations सहित सीबीएस , the बीबीसी , vevo , hulu , और अन्य संगठन प्रस्ताव  some of their material via the site , as part of the YouTube partnership program .
Unregistered users can watch videos , while  पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can अपलोड an असीमित क्रमांक  of videos .
Videos considered to  contain potentially अप्रिय सामग्री हैं उपलब्धियाँ तभी to पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता  at least 18 years old .
In November 2006 , YouTube , LLC was  खरीदा by google लिये us $ 1.65 अरब , और operates as a  subsidiary of Google .
Sister Act is a musical written by Cheri Steinkellner and Bill  steinkellner साथ अतिरिक्त किताब सामग्री by डगलस कार्टर beane ,  with lyrics by Glenn Slater and music by Alan Menken .
It is based on  the hit 1992 फिल्मी कॉमेडी of the वही  name .

Goldberg is also a  निर्माता of the 2011 ब्रॉडवे अनुकूलन  .
Microsoft DirectX is a collection of application  प्रोग्रामिंग अंतरफलक ( api ) लिये हैंडलिंग कार्य सम्बन्धित to मल्टीमीडिया , विशेषकर खेल प्रोग्रामिंग  and video , on Microsoft platforms .
Originally , the names of these APIs all began with Direct , such  as direct3d , directdraw , directmusic , directplay , directsound  , and so forth .
The name DirectX was coined as shorthand term for all of these APIs ( the X  खड़ा in लिये the particular api names ) और जल्द became the नाम of the  collection .
When Microsoft later set out to develop a gaming console , the X  थी प्रयुक्त as the आधार of the नाम एक्सबॉक्स to indicate  that the console was based on DirectX technology .
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed  लिये the एक्सबॉक्स ऐसे as xinput और the cross-platform ऑडियो सृष्टि औजार ( xact ) , जबकि the डाइरेक्टएक्स पैटर्न रै महरूम जारी  for Windows APIs such as Direct2D and DirectWrite .
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the development of video  खेल लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ , microsoft एक्सबॉक्स , microsoft एक्सबॉक्स 360 और कुछ  Sega Dreamcast games .
Direct3D is also used by other  तन्त्र अनुप्रयोग लिये कल्पना और ग्राफिक्स कार्य ऐसे  as CAD/CAM engineering .
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of DirectX , it is  आम to देखिए the names `` डाइरेक्टएक्स '' और `` direct3d '' प्रयुक्त interchangeably  .
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of  runtime पुस्तकालयों in redistributable शब्दकोष रूप , साथ साथ accompanying  documentation and headers for use in coding .
Originally , the runtimes were only  संस्थापित by खेल or explicitly  by the user .
Windows 95 did not  लॉन्च साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स , लकिन डाइरेक्टएक्स  was included with Windows 95 OEM Service Release 2 .
Windows 98 and Windows  nt 4.0 दोनो shipped साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स , as रै प्रत्येक संस्करण  of Windows released since .
The SDK is available as  a फ़्री डाउनलोड  .
While the runtimes are  मालिकाना , closed-source तन्त्र , सोर्स कोड is provided लिये  most of the SDK samples .
Starting with the release of Windows 8 Developer Preview , DirectX  sdk रै महरूम एकीकृत into खिड़कियाँ  SDK .
Direct3D 9Ex , Direct3D 10 , and  direct3d 11 हैं तभी उपलब्धियाँ लिये खिड़कियाँ विस्टा और नए क्युकी प्रत्येक of ये नई संस्करण थी निर्मित to निर्भर upon the नई खिड़कियाँ प्रदर्शक ड्राइवर मॉडल कि थी introduced लिये  Windows Vista .
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a new video  मेमोरी मैनेजर supporting आभासीकरण of ग्राफिक्स हार्डवेयर लिये विभिन्न अनुप्रयोग और सेवाएं जैसे  the Desktop Window Manager .
Quetzaltenango ,  भी commonly ज्ञात by इसके स्वदेशी नाम , xelajú , or अधिक  commonly , Xela , is the second largest city of Guatemala .
It is both the capital of Quetzaltenango Department  और the नगरपालिका सीट of quetzaltenango नगरपालिका  .
It has an estimated  जनसांख्यिकी of 224,703 .
The  जनसांख्यिकी is परिचय 61 % स्वदेशी or amerindian  , 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European .
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley at an  उन्नयन of 2,330 मीटर ( 7,655 ft ) ऊपर समुद्र स्तर at  its lowest part .
It may reach  ऊपर 2,400 मीटर भीतर  the city .
The  नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango consists of an  area of .
Municipalities abutting the  नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango शामिल : salcajá , cantel , almolonga , zunil , el palmar , concepción chiquirichapa , सैन mateo  , La Esperanza , Olintepeque , and San Andrés Xecul .
All these  municipalities हैं भाग of the विभाग of quetzaltenango , मगर सैन आन्द्रेस  Xecul which is a part of the Department of Totonicapán .
The Epic  of gilgamesh , an एपिक कविता इससे मेसोपोटामिया , is  amongst the earliest surviving works of literature .
The literary history of  gilgamesh begins साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र sumerian कविताएं परिचय 'bilgamesh  ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ) , king of Uruk .
Four of these  यहूद प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री लिये  a combined epic in Akkadian .
This first combined epic , known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version ,  तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी bc और is titled बाद इसके incipit , shūtur एली sharrī ( `` surpassing सब अन्य  Kings '' ) .
Only  a few fragments  of it have survived .
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th  to the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` he जो देखी the  Deep '' ) .
Fragments of approximately two thirds of  इस longer , twelve-tablet संस्करण have महरूम  recovered .
Some  of the बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा  in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers on a friendship  between gilgamesh और enkidu  .
Enkidu  is a जंगली man निर्मित by the देवताओं as gilgamesh 's बराबर  to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk .
Together , they  यात्रा to the देवदार पहाड़ to शिकस्त humbaba  , its monstrous guardian .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven , which the goddess  इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh लिये spurning उसके अग्रिम  .
As a punishment for these actions , the gods  वाक्य enkidu to मौत  .
The second half of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at  enkidu 's मौत , और उसके क्वेस्ट लिये अमरत्व  .
In order to learn the  रहस्य of अनन्त जीवन , gilgamesh undertakes a long और  perilous journey .
He learns that  `` the जीवन कि तुम हैं seeking तुम होगा  never find .
When the gods created man they allotted to him  मौत , लकिन जीवन वे retained in उनके अपना keeping  . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic  , और तब attributed to the अमर बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim in the अक्कादी  version of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death , because  of उसके ग्रेट भवन प्रोजेक्ट , और उसके खाता of कया utnapishtim  told him happened during the flood .
The story has been translated into many different languages , and  gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted in works of लोकप्रिय fiction  .
There  हैं numerous debates over जो निर्मित the पहला वीडियो खेल  , with the answer depending largely on how video games are defined .
The evolution of video games represents a tangled web of several different industries ,  सहित वैज्ञानिक , कंप्यूटर , आर्केड , और  consumer electronics .
The ``  वीडियो '' in `` वीडियो खेल ``  traditionally refers to a raster display device .
With the popular catch phrase use of the term `` video game ''  , the पद अभी implies सब प्रदर्शक प्रकार  , formats , and platforms .
Historians have also sought to bypass the issue by  बजाय using the अधिक विशिष्ट `` डिजिटल खेल  '' descriptive .
This term leaves out the earlier  analog-based कंप्यूटर खेल  .
This is a list of  best-selling वीडियो खेल franchises कि have बेची  or shipped at least 5 million copies .
Unless otherwise stated , numbers  indicate विश्वव्यापी इकाई बेची , ordered alphabetically  whenever two or more list the same amount .
The exception are the ones specifying  शिपमेंट , जिससे have निम्नतर पूर्वता than अन्य लिस्टिंग  sales .
Franchise sales include  विस्तार पैक भी हालांकि वे हैं नहीं  considered full video games .
For best-selling individual video games , see  सूची of best-selling वीडियो खेल  .

This does not  necessarily लागू लिये श्रेणी कि हैं  not video game-based .
Dorothy Ann Willis Richards ( September 1 , 1933 – September 13 , 2006  ) थी an अमरीकी राजनेता  and the 45th Governor of Texas .
She first came to national attention as the state  कोषाध्यक्ष of टेक्सास , जब वो वितरित the keynote पता at the 1988 लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल  Convention .
रिचर्ड्स परोसा as the 45th राज्यपाल of टेक्सास इससे  1991 to 1995 and was defeated for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush .
Ann Richards was the second  मादा राज्यपाल of टेक्सास  .
Data Execution  रोकथाम ( dep ) is a सुरक्षा विशेषता शामिल in आधुनिक ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों  .
It is known to be available in Linux , Mac OS X , iOS , Microsoft Windows and Android  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों और is intended to prevent an अनुप्रयोग or सेवा इससे निष्पादित कोड इससे a non-executable  memory region .
This helps  prevent निश्चित कारनामे कि स्टोर कोड  via a buffer overflow , for example .
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced DEP for CPUs that can mark memory pages as nonexecutable , and  software-enforced dep साथ सीमित सुरक्षा लिये cpu कि do नहीं have हार्डवेयर  support .
Software-enforced DEP does not protect against execution of code in data pages ,  लकिन बजाय counters seh मिटाकर , another प्रकार  of attack .
DEP was introduced on  लिनक्स in 2004 ( कर्नेल 2.6.8 ) , on खिड़कियाँ in 2004 साथ खिड़कियाँ  XP Service Pack 2 , while Apple introduced DEP when they moved to x86 in 2006 .
Example  उदाहरण of दो आम  futanari variants
, is the Japanese word for  hermaphroditism , जिससे is भी प्रयुक्त in a broader  sense for androgyny .
Beyond Japan the term is used to describe a  commonly pornographic विधा of कंप्यूटर खेल , कॉमिक्स और एनिमेशन , जिससे शामिल वर्ण कि दिखाएँ दोनो  primary sexual characteristics .
But in  आज 's भाषा it refers लगभग  exclusively for characters who have an overall feminine appearance .
In that case the term is also often abbreviated as futa ( s ) , which  is occasionally भी प्रयुक्त as पद लिये the  works itself .
जल्दी captchas ऐसे as ये , उत्पन्न  by the EZ-Gimpy program , were used on Yahoo !
A modern CAPTCHA , rather than attempting to  बनाएँ a distorted पृष्ठभूमि और ऊँची स्तर of warping on the टेक्स्ट , might फ़ोकस on  making segmentation difficult by adding an angled line .
Another way to make segmentation difficult is to crowd symbols together , as  in याहू ! 's वर्तमान captcha स्वरूप .
Some CAPTCHAs  कोशिश to utilize the क्षमता of  people to see three-dimensional objects .
On this  चित्र , प्रतीकों हैं drawn साथ लाइनों of अलग  thickness to make an effect of extrusion .
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type  of challenge-response परीक्षण प्रयुक्त in कम्प्यूटिंग as an attempt to  ensure that the response is generated by a human being .
The process usually involves a computer  पूछे a उपयोक्ता to पूरा a सरल परीक्षण जिससे  the computer is able to grade .
These tests are designed to be easy for a computer to generate but  मुश्किल लिये a कंप्यूटर to solve , लकिन again आसान लिये a इंसान .
If a correct  समाधान is प्राप्त , it can be presumed  to have been entered by a human .
A common  प्रकार of captcha requires the उपयोक्ता to प्रकार अक्षर and/or अंक इससे  a distorted image that appears on the screen .
Such tests are commonly used to prevent  अनावश्यक अंतरजाल बॉट इससे accessing वेबसाइटों , चूंकि a सामान्य इंसान can easily  read a CAPTCHA , while the bot can not process the image letters and therefore , can not answer properly , or at all .
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated , many of them have become difficult even for a human to read , so  चित्र captchas यहूद निर्मित in जिससे a इंसान is दिखाया a सरल परीक्षण to दिखाएँ a चित्र of a निश्चित एनिमल ( दिए few एनिमल तस्वीरें  ) , which is simple for a human being to process , and therefore easy to pick , while a bot can not process and solve the question because although it can analyze the picture , it can not easily guess the animal .
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was coined in 2000 by  लुइस वोन ahn , मैनुएल ब्लम , निकोलस J. हॉपर , और जॉन langford ( सब of  Carnegie Mellon University ) .
It is an acronym based on the  शब्द `` कैप्चर '' और खड़ा लिये `` completely स्वचालित पब्लिक turing  test to tell Computers and Humans Apart '' .
कार्नेगी mellon विश्वविद्यालयों attempted to ट्रेडमार्क the पद on 15 अक्तूबर 2004  , but the trademark application was abandoned on 21 April 2008 .
A CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse Turing test , because it is administered  by a यंत्र और targeted at a इंसान , in कंट्रास्ट to the मानक turing परीक्षण कि is typically administered  by a human and targeted at a machine .
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in English as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer ,  एक्सप्लोरर , conservationist , फिल्मकार , innovator , वैज्ञानिक , फ़ोटोग्राफ़र , लेखक और शोधकर्ता जो पढ़ाई the समुद्र और सब फ़ॉर्म of  life in water .
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung , pioneered marine  संरक्षण और थी a सदस्य of the académie française  .
KFC ( Kentucky Fried Chicken ) is a fast food  रेस्तरां कड़ी headquartered in louisville , केंटकी , संयुक्त राज्य  , which specializes in fried chicken .
An `` American icon '' , it is the world 's second largest  रेस्तरां कड़ी overall ( as measured by बिक्री ) बाद मैकडोनाल्ड 's , साथ over 18,000 आउटलेट in 120  countries and territories .
The company is a  subsidiary of यम !
Brands ,  a रेस्तरां कम्पनी जिससे भी owns पिज़्ज़ा हट और  Taco Bell .
KFC was founded by Harland Sanders , who began selling fried chicken  इससे उसके roadside रेस्तरां in कोर्बिन , केंटकी  during the Great Depression .
Sanders was one of the first people to see the potential of the restaurant  फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग अवधारणा , साथ the पहला `` केंटकी fried मुर्गा '' मताधिकार  opening in Utah in 1952 .
The franchise popularized chicken in the fast food  उद्योग , thereby diversifying the मार्केट और चुनौतीपूर्ण the दबदबा  of the hamburger .
Marketing himself as `` Colonel Sanders '' , he became a legendary figure of  अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक इतिहास , और उसके चित्र  is still prominently used in KFC branding .
the कम्पनी 's रैपिड विस्तार देखी it grow too विशाल लिये सैंडर्स to मैनेज , और in 1964 he बेची  the company to a group of investors led by John Y . Brown , Jr. and Jack Massey .
KFC was one of the first fast food chains to expand internationally , opening  आउटलेट in इंग्लैण्ड , मैक्सिको और प्यूर्टो रीको by the mid-1960s  .
throughout the 1970s और 1980s , केएफसी अनुभवी मिश्रित सौभाग्य domestically , as it गई  through a series of corporate owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant business .
In the early 1970s , KFC was sold to the spirits firm Heublein ,  जो यहूद लिया over by the r.J. रेनॉल्ड्स खाना और तम्बाकू संगुटिका , जो बेची the कड़ी to पेप्सिको  .
The chain continued to  विस्तार विदेशी however , और in 1987 केएफसी became the पहला पश्चिमी  restaurant chain to open in China .
The chain has since expanded rapidly in  चीन , और the देश is अभी  the company 's most profitable market .
PepsiCo spun off its restaurants division as Tricon  वैश्विक रेस्तरां , जिससे बाद बदला इसके  name to Yum !
ब्रांड्स  .
KFC primarily sells fried chicken pieces and variations such as chicken sandwiches and wraps , salads and  पक्ष बर्तन ऐसे as फ्रेंच फ्राइज़ और coleslaw , desserts और नरम पेय  , often supplied by PepsiCo .
Its most famous product is pressure fried chicken pieces ,  seasoned साथ सैंडर्स ' `` असली रेसिपी  '' of 11 herbs and spices .
The exact nature of these ingredients is  अनजान , और represents a notable  trade secret .
Larger portions of fried chicken  हैं परोसा in a distinctive गत्ता `` बाल्टी '' , जिससे रै become  a signature of the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman .
KFC is famous  लिये the स्लोगन `` उंगली lickin ' शुभ '' , जिससे  has since been replaced by `` Nobody does chicken like KFC '' and `` So good '' .
निडारिया ( साथ a मूक c ) or coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 प्रजाति  of animals found exclusively in aquatic and mostly marine environments .
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes ,  specialized कोशिकाएं कि वे उपयोग मुख्यतः लिये capturing शिकार  .
उनके लाशें consist of mesoglea , a non-living jelly-like पदार्थ  , sandwiched between two layers of epithelium that are mostly one cell thick .
They have two basic body forms : swimming medusae and sessile polyps , both of which are  radially सममित साथ mouths घिरी by tentacles कि भालू cnidocytes  .
Both forms have a  सिंगल orifice और देह गुहा कि हैं प्रयुक्त लिये  digestion and respiration .
Many  cnidarian प्रजाति उपज colonies  that are single organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids , or both .
Cnidarians ' activities are  समन्वित by a विकेन्द्रित तंत्रिका  net and simple receptors .
Several  free-swimming cubozoa और scyphozoa possess balance-sensing  statocysts , and some have simple eyes .
नहीं सब cnidarians  reproduce sexually .
Many have complex  lifecycles साथ अलैंगिक polyp चरण और यौन medusae , लकिन  some omit either the polyp or the medusa stage .
Cnidarians were for a long  समय grouped साथ ctenophores in the phylum coelenterata  , but increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla .
Cnidarians are  वर्गीकृत into चार प्रमुख समूह : the लगभग wholly स्थानबद्ध anthozoa ( समुद्र anemones , corals , समुद्र पेन ) ; तैराकी scyphozoa  ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa , a diverse group that includes all the freshwater cnidarians as well as many marine forms , and has both sessile members such as Hydra and colonial swimmers such as the Portuguese Man o ' War .
Staurozoa have recently been recognised  as a क्लास in उनके अपना सही बल्कि than a sub-group of scyphozoa , और वहीँ is बहस परिचय whether  Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more complex animals ) .
Most cnidarians prey on organisms ranging in size from plankton to  पशु अनेक टाइम्स larger than themselves , लकिन अनेक obtain much of उनके पोषण इससे  endosymbiotic algae , and a few are parasites .
अनेक हैं preyed upon by अन्य पशु  including starfish , sea slugs , fish and turtles .
Coral reefs ,  जिनकी polyps हैं समृद्ध in endosymbiotic शैवाल , support कुछ of the संसार 's सबसे उत्पादक ecosystems  , and protect vegetation in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides .
While corals are almost entirely restricted to warm ,  उथले समुद्री waters , अन्य cnidarians सजीव in the गहराइयों , in ध्रुवीय समंदर और  in freshwater .
Fossil cnidarians have been found in rocks formed about , and  अन्य जीवाश्मों दिखाएँ कि corals may have महरूम उपस्थित shortly पहले और diversified  a few million years later .
Fossils of cnidarians that do not build  mineralized structures हैं बहुत  rare .
Scientists currently think that cnidarians , ctenophores and  bilaterians हैं अधिक closely सम्बन्धित to calcareous sponges than ये हैं to अन्य sponges , और कि anthozoans हैं the विकासवादी  `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians , and the most closely related to bilaterians .
Recent analyses have concluded that cnidarians , although  माना अधिक `` आदिम '' than bilaterians , have  a wider range of genes .
