एज़टेक cosmogram in the pre-hispanic  Codex Fejérváry-Mayer - the fire god Xiuhtecuhtli is in the center .
The Aztec people were certain ethnic groups of central Mexico , particularly those groups who spoke the Nahuatl  भाषा और जो वर्चस्व विशाल भाग of मेसोअमेरिका इससे the 14th  to 16th centuries .
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( plural ) mean `` people  इससे aztlan `` , a पौराणिक प्लेस लिये the nahuatl-speaking संस्कृति of the समय ,  and later adopted as the word to define the Mexica people .
Often the term `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the Mexica  लोगों of tenochtitlan ( अभी the स्थान of मैक्सिको नगर ) , situated on an द्वीप in झील texcoco  , who referred to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica .
Sometimes the term also includes the inhabitants of  tenochtitlan 's दो प्रिंसिपल अलाइड city-states , the acolhuas of texcoco और the tepanecs of tlacopan , जो साथ  with the Mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which controlled what is often known as `` the Aztec Empire '' .
In other contexts , Aztec may refer to all the various city states and their peoples , who shared  विशाल भाग of उनके जातीय इतिहास और सांस्कृतिक traits साथ the mexica , acolhua और  Tepanecs , and who often also used the Nahuatl language as a lingua franca .
In this meaning it is possible to talk about an Aztec civilization  सहित सब the particular सांस्कृतिक पैटर्न आम लिये सबसे of the peoples inhabiting सेंट्रल  Mexico in the late postclassic period .
From the 13th century , the Valley of Mexico was  the दिल of एज़टेक सभ्यता : यहाँ the पूंजी of the  Aztec Triple Alliance , the city of Tenochtitlan , was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco .
The Triple Alliance formed a tributary empire expanding its  राजनैतिक आधिपत्य दूर परे the घाटी of मैक्सिको , conquering अन्य नगर राज्य throughout  Mesoamerica .
at इसके शिखर , एज़टेक संस्कृति था समृद्ध और जटिल पौराणिक और धार्मिक परंपराओं , as खूब as reaching  remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments .
In 1521 Hernán Cortés , along with a large number of Nahuatl speaking  स्वदेशी allies , conquered tenochtitlan और पराजित the एज़टेक ट्रिपल गठबंधन अंतर्गत the नेतृत्व  of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II .
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement  of मैक्सिको नगर on the साईट of the ruined एज़टेक पूंजी , इससे जहाँ वे  proceeded with the process of colonizing Central America .
Aztec culture and history is primarily known through archaeological evidence found in excavations such as that of the renowned Templo Mayor in Mexico City ; from indigenous bark paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors such  as hernán cortés और बर्नल díaz डेल कैस्टिलो ; और विशेषकर इससे 16th और 17th सदी descriptions of एज़टेक संस्कृति और इतिहास लिखा by स्पेनी clergymen और साक्षर aztecs in the स्पेनी or नावातल भाषा  , such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants .
एंडरसन hays कूपर ( born जून 3 , 1967 ) is an अमरीकी  journalist , author , and television personality .
He is the primary anchor  of the सीएनएन न्यूज दिखाएँ एंडरसन कूपर 360°  .
The program is  सामान्यतः ब्रॉडकास्ट सजीव इससे a नई यॉर्क नगर स्टुडियो ; however , कूपर प्रायः प्रसारण  live on location for breaking news stories .
As of September 2011 ,  he भी serves as मेजबान of उसके अपना eponymous syndicated दिन बात दिखाएँ  , Anderson Live , which will be cancelled at the end of the second season .
A plot of a normal  वितरण ( or bell-shaped वक्र ) जहाँ प्रत्येक बैंड  has a width of 1 standard deviation – See also : 68-95-99.7 rule
संचयी संभाव्यता of a सामान्य  distribution with expected value 0 and standard deviation 1 .
In statistics and probability theory , standard deviation (  represented by the प्रतीक सिग्मा , σ ) shows कैसा much विभिन्नता or dispersion exists इससे the  average ( mean ) , or expected value .
A low standard deviation indicates that the data points tend to be very close to the mean ; high  मानक विचलन indicates कि the आंकड़ा अंक  are spread out over a large range of values .
The standard deviation of a random variable ,  सांख्यिकीय जनसांख्यिकी , आंकड़ा नियत , or संभाव्यता वितरण is the वर्गाकार रूट of  its variance .
It is algebraically  simpler हालांकि practically  less robust than the average absolute deviation .
A useful property of standard deviation  is कि , नापसंद variance , it is expressed in the वही इकाई  as the data .
Note , however , that for measurements with percentage as unit  , the मानक विचलन होगा have प्रतिशत  points as unit .
In addition to expressing the  variability of a जनसांख्यिकी , मानक विचलन is commonly प्रयुक्त  to measure confidence in statistical conclusions .
For example , the margin of error in polling data is determined by  calculating the अपेक्षित मानक विचलन in the परिणाम if the वही पोल यहूद to be conducted अनेक  times .
The reported margin of error is typically about  twice the मानक विचलन ­– the दायरा of a 95 प्रतिशत विश्वास  interval .
In science , researchers commonly report the standard deviation of  प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा , और तभी प्रभाव कि पतन दूर बाहर the दायरा of मानक विचलन हैं माना statistically  significant – normal random error or variation in the measurements is in this way distinguished from causal variation .
Standard deviation is also  महत्वपूर्ण in वित्त , जहाँ the मानक विचलन on the रेट of वापसी  on an investment is a measure of the volatility of the investment .
When only a sample of data from a population is available , the  मानक विचलन of the जनसांख्यिकी can be अनुमानित by a परिवर्धित मात्रा  called the `` sample standard deviation '' .
When the sample is the entire population , its unmodified standard deviation is  पुकारा the `` जनसांख्यिकी मानक विचलन  '' .
ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( ullucus  tuberosus ) is a plant grown primarily as a root vegetable , secondarily as a leaf vegetable .
The ulluco is one of the most widely grown and economically  महत्वपूर्ण रूट फसलों in the andean प्रदेश of दक्षिण अमेरिका , दूसरी  only to the potato .
It is known there with the common name of papa lisa , but  भी by the क्षेत्रीय names melloco ( इक्वाडोर ) , olluco ( पेरू ) , chugua ( कोलंबिया ) or ruba  ( Venezuela ) , among others .
The leaf and the tuber are edible ,  समान to पालक और the आलू , क्रमशः .
They are  ज्ञात to contain ऊँची स्तर of प्रोटीन  , calcium , and carotene .
Papalisa were used by the Incas  prior to आगमन of europeans  in South America .
Ulluco  tubers हैं marketed as `` धरती  Gems '' in New Zealand , by Halfords Exotic Produce .
Ulluco  tubers in नई  Zealand
An April 24  , 1851 पोस्टर चेतावनी the `` रंगीन  people of Boston '' about policemen acting as slave catchers .
The Fugitive Slave Law or Fugitive Slave Act was passed by the United States Congress on September 18 , 1850 , as part of the Compromise of 1850  between दक्षिणी slave-holding रूचि और उत्तरी free-soilers  .
This was one of the most  विवादास्पद अधिनियमों of the 1850 सुलह और heightened उत्तरी fears of a `` स्लेव  power conspiracy '' .
it घोषित कि सब runaway स्लेव  were , upon capture , to be returned to their masters .
Abolitionists nicknamed it the ``  bloodhound विधि '' लिये the कुत्तो कि यहूद प्रयुक्त to  track down runaway slaves .
Frank Joseph Pallone ,  jr. ( born अक्तूबर 30 , 1951  ) is the U.S. Representative for , serving since 1993 .
He is a  सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक  Party .
He  previously represented  the 3rd district from 1988 to 1993 .
Trin-i-tee 5:7 is a gospel duo from New Orleans ,  louisiana in the संयुक्त  States .
The  समूह थी marketed as a इन्जील वैकल्पिक  to R & B girl groups such as Destiny 's Child and TLC .
Trin-i-tee 5:7 has sold  over 2.5 लाख एल्बम  .
In 1998 , the group released their first  एल्बम हकदार trin-i-tee 5:7 जिससे डेब्यू at # 1 on the शीर्ष  Gospel charts .
The album featured the songs ``  परमेश्वर 's अनुग्रह '' और the कवर सोंग  `` Oh !
मरियम do n't तुम  Weep '' .
the एल्बम बाद became  certified gold .
In 1999 ,  terri भूरा बाएँ the समूह और थी  later replaced by singer Adrian Anderson .
दौरान कि साल , the समूह अंकित और released उनके दूसरी  album , Spiritual Love .
the एल्बम became the समूह  's second # 1 album on the Top Gospel charts .
The album  contained the singles `` put अपना हैंड्स '' और `` my  Body '' .
In 2002 , the  समूह released उनके तीसरा एल्बम the चुंबन जिससे  debuted at # 2 on the Top Gospel charts .
In 2007 , the group left GospoCentric  रिकॉर्ड और हस्ताक्षरित a रिकार्ड सौदे साथ स्पिरिट उठती  Music .
In late 2007 , Trin-i-tee 5:7  released उनके पांचवां एल्बम t57 , जिससे प्रदर्शित the शीर्ष टेन इन्जील  single `` Listen '' .
T57 charted # 2 on the Top Gospel  एल्बम , # 5 on the शीर्ष ईसाई चार्ट  , and # 12 on the Top R & B charts .
The United States federal earned income tax  क्रेडिट or अर्जित आय क्रेडिट ( eitc or eic ) is a refundable कर क्रेडिट लिये low- और medium-income individuals और  couples , primarily for those who have qualifying children .
When the credit exceeds the amount of  कर owed , it परिणाम in a कर refund  to those who claim the credit .
This credit is provided to  ऑफसेट the बोझ of सोशल सुरक्षा कर  and also to promote an incentive to work .
In order for a person or couple to claim one or more persons as  उनके qualifying चाइल्ड ( ren ) , the आयु , संबंध , और साझा रेसिडेंसी आवश्यकताएँ जरूर be मिले  , as well as some other requirements .
U.S. tax forms 1040EZ , 1040A , or 1040 can be used  to अर्जी eic बगैर qualifying children  .
To claim the credit with qualifying children , 1040A or 1040  जरूर be प्रयुक्त , as खूब as attaching अनुसूची  EIC .
EIC phases in slowly ,  रै a medium-length पठार , और तब phases आउट अधिक धीरे than  it phased in .
Since the credit phases out at 21 % ( for two children and for three or more qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( for one qualifying child ) , it  is सदा अस्तबलों to have एक अधिक डालर of वास्तविक सैलरी or मजदूरी ( हालांकि technically , चूंकि the eic तालिका चालें by पचास डालर increments , it 's सदा अस्तबलों  to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ) .
For tax year 2011 , the maximum EIC  लिये a सिंगल व्यक्ति or युगल दाखिल बगैर qualifying  children was $ 464 .
The maximum EIC with one qualifying child was $ 3,094 , with two children was $  5,112 , और साथ तीन or अधिक qualifying children थी $ 5,751  .
These amounts are  indexed annually लिये  inflation .
The earned income tax credit has been part of political debates in the United States  regarding whether उठाने the न्यूनतम मजदूरी or increasing eic होगा बेहतर पता  a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs .
The following is a list of halftime shows held at  the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's चैंपियनशिप खेल , the सुपर  Bowl .
While halftime shows are a tradition during football games at all levels of  प्रतियोगिता , the सुपर कटोरी मध्यांतर दिखाएँ represents a आधारभूत कड़ी to पॉप संस्कृति , जिससे helps broaden  the television audience and nationwide interest .
In most years since the mid-1980s , the halftime  दिखाएँ of the सुपर कटोरी रै प्रदर्शित लोकप्रिय रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों और अन्य well-known हस्तियाँ  .
It  रै measurably increased टेलीविज़न दर्शक दौरान  and after the halftime show .
The performance is regarded one of the most-watched events in  अमरीकी टेलीविज़न annually साथ  over 100 million viewers in the United States alone .
Musical genres over  the सालो have represented a व्यापक दायरा of म्यूज़िक प्रकार , सहित पॉप ,  rock , classic rock , country , hip hop , rap , blues , and soul .
In some years , short skits or  नाटक दृश्यों हैं acted आउट  on a stage .
the प्रदर्शन समूह up साथ लोगों रै performed at the सबसे सुपर  Bowl halftime shows , starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s .
According to Nielsen ratings , Super Bowl XLVI halftime show  headlined by मैडोना in 2012 remains the most-watched मध्यांतर दिखाएँ in इतिहास , साथ 114 लाख  viewers or about 3 million more than the actual game .
Beyonce 's 2013  मध्यांतर दिखाएँ प्रदर्शन  was the second most viewed show in history .
It is listed on the Guinness World Records as the largest TV  दर्शक लिये a सुपर कटोरी half-time प्रदर्शन  .
International  मेन 's दिन ( imd ) is an सालाना अंतरराष्ट्रीय  event celebrated on 19th November .
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad and Tobago , the day and its events find support from a  किस्में of individuals और समूह in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , the caribbean , उत्तर अमेरिका , एशिया , यूरोपीय और अफ़्रीकी  .
Speaking on behalf of UNESCO , Director of  महिलाओं और संस्कृति of सलाम ingeborg breines कहा of imd , `` इस is an बेहतरीन विचार और होता  give some gender balance . ''
She added that  युनेस्को थी looking आगे to cooperating  with the organizers .
The objectives of celebrating an International Men 's Day include focusing on men 's and  लड़कों ' स्वास्थ्य , improving लिंग संबंध , promoting लिंग समता , और highlighting  positive male role models .
It is an  अवसर to हाइलाइट पक्षपात विरूद्ध मेन और लड़कों और to celebrate  their achievements and contributions , in particular for their contributions to community , family , marriage , and child care .
The broader and ultimate aim of the  इवेंट is to प्रचार मौलिक humanitarian  values .
International Men 's Day is celebrated in over 60 countries , including Trinidad and Tobago , Jamaica , Australia , India , China , United States , Romania , Singapore , Malta , United Kingdom ,  दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , तंजानिया , ज़िम्बाब्वे , बोत्सवाना , australia , बुरुंडी , हंगेरियाई , आयरलैंड , आइल of man , घाना , कनाडा , डेनमार्क , नार्वे , ऑस्ट्रिया , बोस्निया और हर्ज़ेगोविना , युक्त , फ़्रांस , इटली , पाकिस्तानी , क्यूबा , अण्टीगुआ और बारबूडा  , St. Kitts and Nevis , St. Lucia , Grenada and Cayman Islands , on 19 November , and global support for the celebration is broad .
Valley  गाँव parkvalley
Village is a district in the San Fernando Valley  प्रदेश of लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
The median age of its population , at  36 , is `` बूढ़ा लिये the नगर of लॉस एंजिल्स  . '' and its average household size of two people is low , compared to other parts of the city .
developmental मनोविज्ञान is  the scientific study of changes that occur in human beings over the course of their life span .
Originally  चिंतित साथ infants और children ,  the field has expanded to include adolescence , adult development , aging , and the entire life span .
This field examines change across a broad range of topics including motor skills and other psycho-physiological processes ; cognitive development involving areas such as problem solving , moral understanding , and  conceptual समझना ; भाषा अधिग्रहण ; सोशल , व्यक्तित्व , और emotional विकास ; और self-concept और पहचान  formation .
Developmental psychology includes issues such as the extent to  जिससे विकास occurs through the क्रमिक accumulation of ज्ञान बनाम stage-like विकास , or the extent to जिससे children हैं born साथ स्वाभाविक  mental structures versus learning through experience .
Many researchers are interested  in the बातचीत between निजी विशेषताएँ , the व्यक्तिगत 's बर्ताव , और पर्यावरणीय कारकों सहित सोशल कॉन्टेक्स्ट ,  and their impact on development ; others take a more narrowly-focused approach .
Developmental  मनोविज्ञान informs अनेक लागू फ़ील्ड , सहित : शैक्षणिक  psychology , child psychopathology , and forensic developmental psychology .
Developmental psychology complements several other basic  शोध फ़ील्ड in मनोविज्ञान सहित सोशल  psychology , cognitive psychology , ecological psychology , and comparative psychology .
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' Stivic is a fictional  अक्षर जो पहला appeared on the 1970s अमरीकी  sitcom All in the Family .
Joey Stivic was the son and only child of  माइक stivic ( निभाई by रोब reiner ) और ग्लोरिया stivic ( निभाई by सैली struthers ) ,  and the grandson of Archie Bunker ( Carroll O'Connor ) and Edith Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ) .
The  अक्षर पहला appeared as a नवजात baby  in a two-part episode of All in the Family which aired in December 1975 .
After many appearances on All in the Family until Reiner and Struthers left the series in 1978 ( by that time , Joey had been played most often by alternating twins Jason and Justin Draeger ) , the Joey  stivic अक्षर अगला appeared on the सब in the परिवार spin-off श्रेणी ( कुछ कॉल it a continuation of the असली ) आर्ची बंकर 's प्लेस in a अतिथि रूप in the नवम्बर 1979 एपीसोड `` थैंक्सगिविंग पुनर्मिलन  . ''
In this instance ,  the अक्षर थी निभाई by चाइल्ड कर्ता  Dick Billingsley and was appropriately pre-school age .
साथ ग्लोरिया अभी अलग इससे माइक , वो लौटे to आर्ची  Bunker 's Place with Joey in the February 1982 episode `` Gloria Comes Home . ''
In this episode , Joey  थी निभाई by क्रिस्टोफर johnston  .
जॉय stivic थी a नियमित अक्षर on  the All in the Family spin-off series Gloria in 1982 and 1983 .
On this series , in which the  now-divorced ग्लोरिया बंकर अक्षर था स्थानांतरित to upstate नई यॉर्क in अनुक्रम to कार्य as an  assistant veterinarian , the part of Joey Stivic was played by ten-year-old actor Christian Jacobs .
After Gloria was canceled in 1983 , Joey Stivic  disappeared इससे प्रधान समय टेलीविज़न लिये 11 सालो , जबतक the अक्षर बना एक पिछला रूप on 704 hauser , a short-lived 1994 श्रेणी परिचय a  black family who had moved into the old Bunker home , years after Bunker had sold it .
In this appearance , the Joey Stivic character was played by Casey Siemaszko , an  कर्ता born in 1961 ( 14 सालो पहले जॉय stivic 's fictional  birth ) .
in 1976 the आदर्श खिलौना कम्पनी released a 14-inch `` जॉय stivic गुड़िया  '' ( called `` Archie Bunker 's Grandson '' ) which was billed as the `` first anatomically correct male doll . ''
The doll inspired mild controversy  at the समय , और is a collectors ' मद आज  .
The 2011  रोज़ कटोरी थी the 97th संस्करण of the सालाना कटोरी  game played on January 1 , 2011 , as part of the 2010 college football season .
Played in Pasadena , California , the TCU Horned Frogs of the Mountain West Conference  पराजित the विस्कॉन्सिन badgers of the बिग टेन सम्मेलन by a स्कोर of 21 –  19 .
The Pasadena  टूर्नामेंट of गुलाब संघ थी the आयोजक  of the game .
Vizio Inc. was the corporate sponsor and  the खेल थी officially नामित `` the रोज़  Bowl Game presented by Vizio '' .
This game marked the first time  a टोली इससे a non-automatic qualifying सम्मेलन  played in , and won , the Rose Bowl in its 97 years .
the प्रतियोगिता थी ब्रॉडकास्ट on केबल टेलीविज़न स्टेशन ईएसपीएन  with a radio broadcast on ESPN Radio and XM Satellite Radio and ESPN3 streaming video over the internet .
Coverage began at 1:30 PM ( PST  ) साथ kickoff at 2:10 pm ( pst  ) .
This marked  the पहला समय कि the खेल थी नहीं ब्रॉडकास्ट nationally `` over-the-air '' ( स्थलीय टेलीविज़न  ) since the games prior to the 1952 Rose Bowl , which was the first nationally televised college football game .
The Rose Bowl  खेल , प्रसंग भवन सपनो , friendships , & यादें , थी a contractual sell-out , साथ 64,500 टिकटें  allocated to the participating teams and conferences .
Ticket prices for  सब सीटे in the रोज़ कटोरी हैं  listed at $ 145 .
The remaining tickets went to the Tournament of Roses members , sponsors , City of Pasadena  निवासियों , और the सामान्य पब्लिक .
The Rose Bowl  स्टेडियम क्षमता is सूचीबद्ध at लगभग 91,000  .
The  घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता is a बयान अपनाया by the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4 , 1776 , जिससे घोषित कि the तेरह  American colonies , then at war with Great Britain , regarded themselves as independent states , and no longer a part of the British Empire .
Instead they now  formed a नई nation—the संयुक्त  States of America .
John Adams was a leader in  pushing लिये स्वतंत्रता , जिससे  was unanimously approved on July 2 .
A committee had already drafted the  औपचारिक घोषणा , to be तैयार जब कॉंग्रेस voted  on independence .
Adams  persuaded the कमेटी to चुनें थामस जेफरसन to लिखें the असली  draft of the document , which congress would edit to produce the final version .
The Declaration was ultimately a formal explanation of why Congress had voted on  जुलाई 2 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , अधिक than a साल बाद the outbreak  of the American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday , the Independence Day  is मनाये on जुलाई 4 , हालांकि एडम्स  wanted July 2 .
After  ratifying the टेक्स्ट on जुलाई 4 , कॉंग्रेस  issued the Declaration of Independence in several forms .
It was initially published as the  मुद्रित डनलप broadside कि थी widely वितरित  and read to the public .
The most famous version of the Declaration , a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the  घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता , is प्रदर्शित at the नेशनल अभिलेख in वॉशिंगटन ,  D.C .
हालांकि the wording of the घोषणा थी स्वीकृत  on July 4 , the date of its signing was August 2 .
The original July 4  संयुक्त राज्य घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता  manuscript was lost while all other copies have been derived from this original document .
The sources and interpretation of the  घोषणा have महरूम the विषय of much scholarly पूछताछ  .
The Declaration  जायज the स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य by लिस्टिंग औपनिवेशिक grievances विरूद्ध किंग जार्ज iii , और  by asserting certain natural and legal rights , including a right of revolution .
having परोसा इसके असली purpose in announcing स्वतंत्रता , the टेक्स्ट of the घोषणा  was initially ignored after the American Revolution .
Since then , it has come to be considered a major  बयान on इंसान अधिकारों , विशेषकर इसके दूसरी  sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident , that all  मेन हैं निर्मित बराबर , कि वे हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable  Rights , that among these are Life , Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness .
This has been called `` one of the best-known sentences in the English language '' , containing `` the  सबसे potent और consequential शब्द in अमरीकी  history . ''
The passage came  to represent a moral मानक to जिससे  the United States should strive .
This view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln , who considered the Declaration to be the foundation of his political philosophy , and argued  कि the घोषणा is a बयान of सिद्धान्त through जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान चाहिए  be interpreted .
It  रै प्रेरित कार्य लिये the अधिकारों of अधिकारहीन  people throughout the world .
Chitty  chitty बंग बंग is a 1968 अंग्रेजों musical फिल्मी  loosely based on Ian Fleming 's novel .
The film 's script is by  roald dahl और केन ह्यूजेस और इसके गीतों by the  Sherman Brothers .
it सितारों लंड वैन dyke as caractacus potts और  Sally Ann Howes as Truly Scrumptious .
The  फिल्मी थी निर्देशित by केन ह्यूजेस और उत्पादित by अल्बर्ट R. ब्रोकोली ( co-producer  of the James Bond series of films , also based on Fleming 's novels ) .
John Stears  पर्यवेक्षित the खास प्रभाव  .
Irwin  kostal पर्यवेक्षित और conducted the म्यूज़िक , जबकि the musical संख्याएँ  were staged by Marc Breaux and Dee Dee Wood .
A region is  arid जब it is characterized by a कठोर कमी of उपलब्धियाँ जल , to the  extent of hindering or preventing the growth and development of plant and animal life .
Environments  विषय to arid climates tend to कमी वनस्पति  and are called xeric or desertic .
Most `` arid '' climates surround the  equator ; ये स्थान शामिल सबसे of अफ़्रीकी और भाग of दक्षिण  America and Central America .
कर्कट ( ♋ ) is an astrological चिह्न , जिससे  is associated with the constellation Cancer .
It spans the 90-120th degree of the zodiac , between 90 and 125.25 degree of celestial longitude ,  जिससे the सूर्य transits इस क्षेत्रफल on औसत between जून 22 to जुलाई 22 प्रत्येक  year .
And under the sidereal zodiac , it  is फिलहाल इससे जुलाई 21 to अगस्त  9 .
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential  चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार , नवम्बर  8 , 1960 .
The Republican Party nominated  लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन , जबकि the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी मनोनीत जॉन F. कैनेडी , सीनेटर  from Massachusetts .
The incumbent President ,  रिपब्लिकन ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , थी नहीं योग्य लिये re-election  after serving the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy was  निर्वाचित साथ a सीसे of 112,827 मत , or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote , giving  him a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College , the closest since 1916 .
This was the first election  in जिससे सब पचास of the वर्तमान  United States participated .
A number of factors explain  क्यों the चुनाव थी so बंद  .
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession  जिससे ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन , और he था the लाभ  of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans .
Furthermore , the new votes that Kennedy gained among  catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत निक्सन gained among  Protestants .
Kennedy 's campaigning  कौशल decisively outmatched  Nixon 's .
In the end , Nixon 's emphasis on his experience carried little weight , and he wasted energy by campaigning  in सब 50 राज्य बजाय of concentrating on the झूले  states .
Kennedy  प्रयुक्त उसके विशाल , well-funded अभियान संगठन to जीत the नामांकन , सुरक्षित समर्थन , और  , with the aid of the last of the big-city bosses , to get out the vote in the big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon B.  जॉनसन to थाम the दक्षिण और प्रयुक्त टेलीविज़न effectively  .
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two  बैठे u.s . सीनेटरों ( कैनेडी और जॉनसन ) यहूद निर्वाचित as अध्यक्ष और vice-president  , a phenomenon that has been repeated once , by Barack Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases , the president was the younger , more junior senator ) .
Sherwood is a city in Washington County  , ऑरेगॉन , संयुक्त राज्य  .
Located in  the southeast कोने of the काउंटी , it is a आवासीय जातियाँ  in the Tualatin Valley southwest of Portland .
The population was 11,791  at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी  .
According to the 2010 census , the  जनसांख्यिकी थी 18,205 निवासियों  .
Indirectly named for the Sherwood Forest in England  , it थी पहला incorporated in 1893 as a कस्बा  .
The USA PATRIOT Act of 2001 is an Act of the U.S. Congress that was signed into law by  अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश on अक्तूबर 26  , 2001 .
The title of the act is a ten letter acronym ( USA PATRIOT ) that stands for Uniting (  और ) strengthening अमेरिका ( by ) providing उचित टूल्स जरूरी  ( to ) Intercept ( and ) Obstruct Terrorism Act of 2001 .
The act , as a response to the terrorist attacks of September 11th , significantly reduced restrictions in law enforcement agencies ' gathering of intelligence within the United States ; expanded the Secretary of  the treasury’s प्राधिकार to विनियमित वित्तीय ट्रांजेक्शन , विशेषकर those involving विदेशी individuals और  entities ; and broadened the discretion of law enforcement and immigration authorities in detaining and deporting immigrants suspected of terrorism-related acts .
The act also expanded the definition of terrorism to include  घरेलू आतंक , यूँ enlarging the क्रमांक of क्रियाएँ to जिससे the यूएसए patriot act’s विस्तारित विधि  enforcement powers can be applied .
On  may 26 , 2011 , अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा प्रयुक्त an autopen to चिह्न the patriot sunsets एक्सटेंशन अधिनियम of 2011 , a four-year एक्सटेंशन of तीन कुंजी प्रावधानों in the यूएसए patriot अधिनियम जबकि he थी in  France : roving wiretaps , searches of business records ( the `` library records provision `` ) , and conducting surveillance of `` lone wolves '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related activities not linked to terrorist groups .
रिपब्लिकन नेताओ questioned if the उपयोग of the autopen मिले the संवैधानिक  requirements for signing a bill into law .
A house  in महारानी ऐनी स्टाइल at  223 Avenue A .
Snohomish is a city in Snohomish County ,  वॉशिंगटन , संयुक्त राज्य  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 9,098 at the  2010 census .
The mayor of Snohomish is Karen Guzak ,  और the नगर मैनेजर is लैरी  Bauman .
Snohomish  prides itself लिये इसके ऐतिहासिक शहर , और थी एकबार ज्ञात लिये इसके अनेक पुरातन दुकानें जब it थी  known as the `` Antique Capital of the Northwest . ''
The  ऐतिहासिक कारोबार और आवासीय बीच of the कस्बा constitutes the snohomish ऐतिहासिक ज़िला ,  which is listed on the National Register of Historic Places .
Many houses bear plaques with the year the house  थी निर्मित और the नाम of the परिवार or व्यक्तिगत जो originally  occupied it .
Once every year , the city gives tours of the historic  घरों ; एक of उन्हें , the blackman हाउस , is a year-round संग्रहालय  .
a सामान्य विमानन एयरफील्ड , घनघोर एयरफील्ड , is कम than एक मील दक्षिणपश्चिम  of Downtown Snohomish .
Dave Matthews Band ( DMB ) is an  अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड कि थी formed in charlottesville  , Virginia , United States , in 1991 .
The founding members were singer-songwriter and  guitarist डेव matthews , bassist stefan lessard , वादक /backing vocalist कार्टर  Beauford and saxophonist LeRoi Moore .
Boyd Tinsley  थी added to the बैंड  as a violinist soon after the band was formed .
Moore died suddenly  in अगस्त 2008 due to जटिलताओं इससे चोटों  sustained in an ATV accident .
GRAMMY Award  -winner जेफ़ ताबूत of béla fleck और the flecktones रै चूंकि भर  Moore 's spot as the band 's saxophonist .
Rashawn Ross and Tim  रेनॉल्ड्स have भी become full-time touring सदस्यों of the  band .
The band 's 2009 album Big Whiskey and  the groogrux किंग ( the पहला एल्बम चूंकि मूर 's मौत ) debuted at क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड  200 , earning the band their fifth consecutive number-one debut— making them the second band behind Metallica to do so .
Their most recent album , Away from the World , was  released in 2012 , और भी debuted at  number one on the Billboard chart .
As of 2010 , the Dave Matthews Band has sold over  30 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी .
The band is known for their annual summer-long  टुर of the संयुक्त राज्य और यूरोपीय , featuring lengthy  improvisational renditions of their songs , accompanied by an elaborate video and lighting show .
This portion of the  दौरे रै become a स्टैम्प of dmb और रै grown साथ the बैंड चूंकि fenton विलियम्स began working  with them in the early 1990s .
बाद बीस लगातार सालो of touring the बैंड  announced that it would take the summer of 2011 off .
Dave Matthews  बैंड रै जीती एक ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , और थी awarded  the NAACP Chairman 's Award .
According to Julian Bond , `` they sell out the largest arenas on  धरती , लकिन अक्सर दे  their music away . ''
अनुभवातीत जंगली जई : a अध्याय इससे an अलिखित रोमांस is a गद्य व्यंग्य लिखा by louisa  May Alcott , about her family 's involvement with the Transcendentalist community Fruitlands in the early 1840s .
the कार्य थी पहला प्रकाशित in a नई  York newspaper in 1873 , and reprinted in 1874 , 1876 , and 1915 and after .
In  उसके खाता , alcott provides the रियल लोगों शामिल  with thin pseudonymous disguises .
Her father Amos Bronson Alcott is `` Abel Lamb , '' while his partner and community co-founder Charles Lane is ``  timon शेर ; '' अबीगैल may alcott , louisa 's माँ और bronson  's wife , is `` Sister Hope . ''
Alcott depicts  उसके पिता as वर्चस्व by उसके अधिक forceful संगी  , and both men as feckless and impractical dreamers .
The men of the community spend  उनके समय in pointless debates जबकि सिस्टर आशा works इससे भोर to संध्या to maintain उनके  existence .
A crisis arises at harvest time , when the  अनाज क्रॉप is threatened by an approaching  storm .
In Alcott  's शब्द , `` परिचय the समय the अनाज थी तैयार to हाउस , कुछ कॉल of the  Oversoul wafted all the men away . ''
सिस्टर आशा organizes the तभी उपलब्धियाँ सहायता , तीन  little girls and a boy , and manages to save the crop .
The little community collapses as soon as the weather turns cold , when it becomes clear that their provisions are  too meager to पिछला the coming  winter .
Timon Lion and his son  abscond to जुड़ें the shakers — हालांकि timon is अप्रसन्न  to learn that life among them is `` all work and no play . ''
Abel is crushed by the failure of the enterprise ; after days of despair he  begins to खा again तभी जब he realizes कि  his family needs him .
Sister Hope  पाता a रास्ता लिये उन्हें to subsist  and persevere .
Alcott 's view of  पुरूष arrogance और मादा शोषण in इस टुकड़ा is paralleled in  her novel , published in the same year as `` Transcendental Wild Oats . ''
`` अनुभवातीत जंगली  Oats '' has been reprinted in several modern editions .
Mount of the Holy Cross  is the northernmost 14,000-foot पहाड़ in the sawatch दायरा  , part of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado .
It  is स्तिथ in the पावन क्रॉस wilderness  near the ghost town of Holy Cross City and in Eagle County .
it थी नामित लिये the distinctive  cross-shaped snowfield on the northeast face .
अंतर्गत यूएसडीए वन सेवा प्रशासन , the पहाड़ थी  proclaimed `` Holy Cross National Monument '' by Herbert Hoover on May 11 , 1929 .
The monument was transferred to the  नेशनल पार्क सेवा in 1933  .
In 1950 , it was returned to the Forest Service and lost its National Monument status—the number of visitors to the  पहाड़ और the आसपास `` pilgrim 's हट '' था waned , और the व्यय of full-time  staff could not be justified .
This mountain has been the subject of painters , photographers and  भी a कविता by हेनरी वाड्सवर्थ लांगफेलो  , ( The Cross of Snow ) .
The first  सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ फोटोग्राफ थी प्रकाशित in नेशनल  Geographic magazine .
Thomas Moran depicted the mountain in an oil painting , which now is part of the  संग्रहण of the संग्रहालय of the अमरीकी वेस्ट , भाग of the autry नेशनल बीच in लॉस एंजिल्स  , California .
It is still much photographed but it is not as well known today as  it थी in the पास्ट  .
Nearby features include  कटोरी of आंसू झील , सीधे अंतर्गत the ईस्ट फेस of the शिखर , tuhare झीलों  , in a cirque that lies south of a significant subpeak , and several other lakes .
Notable  स्थितियाँ भीतर शामिल the dotsero  volcano ( near Interstate 70 ) , Vail and Aspen .
us 24 रनों निकट the शिखर  through Gilman .
Photochrom print  of माउंट of the पावन क्रॉस c.  1900 .
This image is a reversed view  of the पहाड़ compared  to how it actually appears .
the पहला अंकित ascent of पावन क्रॉस थी in 1873 , by F. V. hayden और  photographer W. H. Jackson during one of Hayden 's geographical surveys .
However , the peak may well  have महरूम ascended previously  by miners or American Indians .
The first winter  ascent of the शिखर थी बना in 1943 by russel keene और हावर्ड freedman  of the 10th Mountain Division , then stationed at Camp Hale .
Holy Cross can be climbed by at  तनिक चार अलग रूट , साथ the easiest और सबसे आम रूट  being the North Ridge , which involves of vertical gain over and is rated YDS Class 2 for moderate scrambling .
The Cross  couloir रूट फ़ॉर्म the लंबवत portion of the प्रसिद्ध क्रॉस विशेषता  , and provides an advanced snow climb or extreme ski descent .
Mount of  the पावन क्रॉस रै a इतिहास of  endangering the lives of many hikers .
Primarily , the hikers who require rescue are  unfamiliar साथ the risks of प्रवेश wilderness क्षेत्रों और do नहीं लाओ पर्याप्त  equipment and supplies to respond to emergency conditions .
Although the summit on Mount of the Holy Cross is frequently reached on a long day  hike , unprepared hikers हैं अक्सर stranded or खोया due to बदलना पर्यावरणीय शर्तें और भ्रम regarding the surrounding लैंडस्केप , विशेषकर on the descent  of North Ridge .
Thorough  शोध और उचित नियोजन चाहिए  prevent most tragedies .
Mount of the Holy cross  is accessible इससे tigiwon सड़क ,  south of Minturn , Colorado .
The Half Moon Pass Trail is the standard route to  the समिट of माउंट of the पावन क्रॉस via the उत्तर लकीरें  .
Following  the पतन क्रीक ट्रेल to an ascent of पायदान पहाड़ ट्रेल provides the  best view of the Holy Cross snow feature from Notch Mountain Ridge .
The GSM logo is used to  पहचानो संगत handsets और उपकरण
GSM ( Global System for Mobile Communications , originally ' ) , is a standard set developed by the European  दूरसंचार मानकों संस्थान ( etsi ) to describe प्रोटोकॉल लिये दूसरी पीढी ( 2g ) डिजिटल  cellular networks used by mobile phones .
It became the de facto  वैश्विक मानक लिये मोबाईल संचार  with over 80 % market share .
The GSM standard was  विकसित as a बदलना लिये पहला पीढी ( 1g ) एनालॉग सेल्यूलर संजाल , और originally  described a digital , circuit switched network optimized for full duplex voice telephony .
This was expanded over time to include data communications , first by circuit switched transport , then packet data transport via GPRS  ( सामान्य पैकेट रेडियो सेवाएं ) और किनारे ( उन्नत आंकड़ा दरों लिये जीएसएम एवोल्यूशन or egprs )  .
Further improvements  यहूद बना जब the 3gpp विकसित तीसरा पीढी  ( 3G ) UMTS standards followed by fourth generation ( 4G ) LTE Advanced standards .
`` GSM  '' is a ट्रेडमार्क स्वामित्व  by the GSM Association .
President Franklin  D. रूज़वेल्ट लक्षण the lend-lease विधेयक to दे सहायता  to Britain and China ( 1941 )
The Lend Lease act  थी an अधिनियम जहाँ the संयुक्त  States had supported its allies .
Lend-Lease ( ) was the law that started a  कार्यक्रम अंतर्गत जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका supplied the संयुक्त किंगडम , the ussr , गणतंत्र of चीन , फ़्री  France , and other Allied nations with materiel between 1941 and 1945 .
It was signed into law on March 11  , 1941 , a साल और a हाफ बाद the outbreak  of World War II in Europe in September 1939 .
इस थी नौ महीने पहले the u.S. डाला  the war in December 1941 .
Formally  titled an अधिनियम to further प्रचार the रक्षा of the संयुक्त राज्य , the अधिनियम effectively  ended the United States ' pretense of neutrality .
A total of $ 50 .1 billion ( equivalent to $ today ) worth  of आपूर्तियाँ यहूद shipped : $ 31.4 अरब to ब्रिटेन , $ 11.3 अरब to the सोवियत संघ , $ 3.2 अरब to फ़्रांस  , $ 1.6 billion to China , and smaller sums to other Allies .
Reverse Lend-Lease comprised services such as rent on air bases that went to the  u.S. , और totaled $ 7.8 अरब ; of इस , $ 6.8 अरब  came from the British and the Commonwealth .
the शर्तें of the अनुबंध provided कि  the materiel was to be used until time for their return or destruction .
आपूर्तियाँ बाद the termination तिथि यहूद बेची to ब्रिटेन at  a large discount for £1 .075 billion using long-term loans from the United States .
Canada operated  a समान कार्यक्रम कि भेजा $ 4.7 अरब  in supplies to the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union .
The United States did  नहीं चार्ज लिये सहायता supplied अंतर्गत इस  legislation .
This program  थी a निर्णायक कदम दूर इससे non-interventionist नीति , जिससे था वर्चस्व संयुक्त राज्य विदेशी संबंध  since the end of World War I , towards international involvement .
The Jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus  tuberosus ) , भी पुकारा sunroot , sunchoke , धरती ठहराना or topinambour , is a प्रजाति of  sunflower native to eastern North America , and found from eastern Canada and Maine west to North Dakota , and south to northern Florida and Texas .
It is also cultivated widely across  the शीतोष्ण मण्डल लिये इसके  tuber , which is used as a root vegetable .
Castillo San Felipe del Morro also known as  फोर्ट सैन फेलिप डेल morro or morro किला , is a 16th-century  citadel located in San Juan , Puerto Rico .
Stonehenge is a prehistoric monument in  विल्टशायर , इंग्लैण्ड , परिचय वेस्ट of amesbury और  north of Salisbury .
One of the  सबसे प्रसिद्ध साइट in the संसार , stonehenge is  the remains of a ring of standing stones set within earthworks .
It is in the middle of the  सबसे घना जटिल of पाषाणकालीन और कांस्य आयु स्मारक  in England , including several hundred burial mounds .
Archaeologists believe it  थी निर्मित anywhere इससे 3000 bc to  2000 BC .
Radiocarbon dating in  2008 सुझाया कि the पहला पत्थरों यहूद उठाया between 2400 और 2200 bc , whilst another सिद्धान्त suggests  that bluestones may have been raised at the site as early as 3000 BC .
The  surrounding गोलाकार धरती बैंको और खाई , जिससे constitute the earliest phase of the  monument , have been dated to about 3100 BC .
The site and its surroundings were added to the UNESCO 's  सूची of संसार विरासत साइट in 1986 in  a co-listing with Avebury Henge .
It is a  नेशनल legally सुरक्षित  Scheduled Ancient Monument .
Stonehenge is owned by the Crown and  प्रबंधित by अंग्रेज़ी विरासत , जबकि the surrounding जमीन is स्वामित्व  by the National Trust .
पुरातत्व प्रमाण मिला by the stonehenge riverside प्रोजेक्ट in 2008 indicates कि stonehenge  could have been a burial ground from its earliest beginnings .
The dating of cremated remains found on the site indicate that deposits contain  इंसान अस्थि इससे as जल्दी as 3000 bc , जब the खाई और बैंको यहूद पहला खोदा  .
Such  जमा जारी at stonehenge लिये at तनिक  another 500 years .
The  साईट is a प्लेस of धार्मिक significance  and pilgrimage in Neo-Druidry .
The NCAA Women 's Division I  चैंपियनशिप is an सालाना कॉलेज बास्केट  tournament for women .
Held each April , the Women  's चैंपियनशिप थी उदघाटन in  the 1981–82 season .
The NCAA tournament was preceded by the  aiaw महिलाओं 's बास्केट टूर्नामेंट , जिससे थी आयोजित annually  from 1972 to 1982 .
Basketball was one of twelve women 's sports added to the NCAA championship  कार्यक्रम लिये the 1981-82 स्कूल साल , as the ncaa सगाई in बैटल साथ the संघ लिये intercollegiate  Athletics for Women for sole governance of women 's collegiate sports .
The AIAW continued to conduct its established championship program in the same  बारह ( और अन्य ) खेल ; however , बाद a साल of डुअल महिलाओं 's championships  , the NCAA prevailed , while the AIAW disbanded .
Attendance and interest in the Women 's Division I Championship have grown  over the सालो , विशेषकर चूंकि 2003 , जब the फाइनल चैंपियनशिप खेल थी स्थानांतरित to  the Tuesday following the Monday men 's championship game .
The women 's championship game  is अभी the फाइनल overall खेल of the कॉलेज बास्केट  season .
Before that , the Women 's  फाइनल चार थी प्रायः निभाई on the शुक्रवार पहले the मेन 's फाइनल चार  or the hours before the men played on the final Saturday of the tournament .
the फाइनल थी प्रायः निभाई the संडे दोपहर  following the Men 's Final Four .
The  टूर्नामेंट कोष्ठक is बना up of champions इससे  each Division I conference , which receive automatic bids .
The  बाकी स्लॉट हैं at-large बोलियों , साथ टीमों चुनी by  an NCAA selection committee .
The selection process and  टूर्नामेंट seedings हैं आधारित on अनेक कारकों , सहित टोली rankings ,  win-loss records and Ratings Percentage Index ( RPI ) data .
नापसंद the मेन 's टूर्नामेंट , वहीँ हैं तभी 32 at-large बोलियों (  as of the next tournament in 2014 ) , and no play-in game .
The women 's tournament , like the men 's , is  मंचन in a सिंगल विलोपन स्वरूप , और is भाग of the मीडिया और पब्लिक  frenzy known colloquially as March Madness or The Big Dance .
All 63 games have  महरूम ब्रॉडकास्ट on टेलीविज़न चूंकि  2003 on ESPN and ESPN2 .
Similar to the pre-2011 men 's tournament coverage on CBS , local teams are shown  on प्रत्येक चैनल जब उपलब्धियाँ , साथ `` whip-around '' कवरेज designed to शोकेस the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी  contests in the rest of the country .
The  rosetta स्टोन in the अंग्रेजों  Museum
The Rosetta Stone is an ancient Egyptian granodiorite stele  inscribed साथ a डिक्री जारी at मेम्फिस in 196 bc on निमित्त  of King Ptolemy V .
The decree appears in three scripts : the upper text is  प्राचीन मिश्र चित्रलिपि , the मध्य portion demotic  script , and the lowest Ancient Greek .
Because it presents  essentially the वही टेक्स्ट in सब तीन स्क्रिप्ट ( साथ कुछ नाबालिग मतभेद between उन्हें ) , it provided the कुंजी  to the modern understanding of Egyptian hieroglyphs .
Originally displayed within a temple , the stone was probably moved during the early Christian or medieval period and eventually used as  भवन सामग्री in the निर्माण of फोर्ट जुलिएन निकट the कस्बा of रशीद ( rosetta ) in the nile डेल्टा  .
It was rediscovered there in  1799 by a सिपाही , pierre-françois bouchard , of the  French expedition to Egypt .
As the first Ancient Egyptian bilingual text recovered in modern  टाइम्स , the rosetta स्टोन aroused फैली पब्लिक ब्याज साथ इसके संभावित to decipher इस hitherto untranslated प्राचीन  language .
Lithographic copies and  प्लास्टर casts began circulating  among European museums and scholars .
Meanwhile , British  सैनिकों पराजित the फ्रेंच in मिश्र in 1801 , और the असली स्टोन आए into  British possession under the Capitulation of Alexandria .
Transported to  लंदन , it रै महरूम on पब्लिक प्रदर्शक at the अंग्रेजों  Museum since 1802 .
It is the  most-visited ऑब्जेक्ट  in the British Museum .
Ever since its rediscovery , the stone has been the focus of nationalist rivalries , including its transfer from French to British possession during the Napoleonic Wars , a  long-running विवाद over the सापेक्ष मान of यंग 's और champollion 's योगदान to the decipherment , और चूंकि 2003 , मांगे लिये the स्टोन 's वापसी to  Egypt .
Study of the decree was  already अंतर्गत रास्ता as the पहला पूरा अनुवाद of the यूनानी  text appeared in 1803 .
It was 20 years , however , before the transliteration of the  मिश्र स्क्रिप्ट थी घोषित by jean-françois champollion in पेरिस in 1822 ; it  took longer still before scholars were able to read Ancient Egyptian inscriptions and literature confidently .
Major advances in the decoding were : recognition that the stone offered three versions of the same text ( 1799 ) ; that the demotic text used phonetic characters to spell foreign names ( 1802 ) ; that the hieroglyphic text did so as well , and had pervasive similarities to the demotic ( Thomas Young , 1814 ) ; and that , in  जोड to होने प्रयुक्त लिये विदेशी names , ध्वन्यात्मक वर्ण यहूद भी  used to spell native Egyptian words ( Champollion , 1822–1824 ) .
Two other fragmentary copies of  the वही डिक्री यहूद खोजा बाद , और अनेक समान मिश्र दुभाषिया or trilingual inscriptions हैं अभी ज्ञात , सहित दो थोड़ा पहले ptolemaic डिक्री  ( the Decree of Canopus in 238 BC , and the Memphis decree of Ptolemy IV , ca . 218 BC ) .
The Rosetta Stone  is इसलिए no longer अद्वितीय , लकिन it थी the अनिवार्य  key to modern understanding of Ancient Egyptian literature and civilization .
The term  rosetta स्टोन is अभी प्रयुक्त in अन्य contexts  as the name for the essential clue to a new field of knowledge .
Poison dart frog ( also dart-poison frog , poison frog or formerly poison arrow frog ) is the common name of a group of frogs in the  परिवार dendrobatidae जिससे हैं देशी to सेंट्रल और दक्षिण अमेरिका  .
These species are diurnal and  प्रायः have brightly रंगीन लाशें  .
Although  सब जंगली dendrobatids हैं at तनिक somewhat विषाक्त , स्तर of toxicity vary considerably  from one species to the next and from one population to another .
Many species  हैं threatened  .
These amphibians  हैं प्रायः पुकारा `` डार्ट मेंढक '' due to the  Amerindians ' indigenous use of their to poison the tips of blowdarts .
However , of over 175 species , only four have been documented as being used for this purpose ( curare plants are more commonly used ) , all of  जिससे आइये इससे the phyllobates genus , जिससे is characterized by the अपेक्षाकृत विशाल आकार और ऊँची स्तर  of toxicity of its members .
cajeta is a मैक्सिकन confection  of thickened syrup usually made of sweetened caramelised milk .
According to chef Rick Bayless , the name for  cajeta आए इससे the स्पेनी phrase al punto de cajeta , जिससे अर्थात् `` a द्रव thickened to the पाइंट at जिससे  a spoon drawn through the liquid reveals the bottom of the pot in which it is being cooked '' .
Another hypothesis is that it takes its name  इससे the छोटी लकड़ी बाक्स in जिससे it थी  traditionally packed .
मैक्सिकन cajeta is माना a specialty of the नगर of celaya in the राज्य of guanajuato , हालांकि  it is also produced with the traditional method in several towns of the state of Jalisco , such as Mazamitla , Sayula , and Atotonilco el Alto .
Cajeta is made by simmering goat 's milk , or occasionally a sweetened  द्रव , stirring अक्सर , जबतक it becomes बहुत viscous due to वाष्पीकरण  of water , and caramelized .
While goat milk is  the सबसे usual आधार , अन्य liquids  or juices may be used .
In Celaya , and eventually the rest of  मैक्सिको , the confection of हाफ बकरी 's मिल्क और हाफ गाय 's मिल्क became ज्ञात  by the name cajeta , but elsewhere , the milk candy became known as leche quemada , dulce de leche , etc .
It has cousins in the many Indian milk-based  मिठाई जैसे प्रभा और the मिल्क फ़ज burfi , और in the ओपेरा फ़ज of the u.S. cajeta is खाया on इसके अपना as a मीठी ,  as a spread or filling for breads and pastries , such as churros , and as a topping for ice cream .
Certain  liquors हैं added to खास व्यंजनों  called cajeta envinada .
In addition , cajeta envinada especial is  समृद्ध साथ किशमिश , बादाम , pecans  or nuts .
Often it is used as a  टॉपिंग लिये crêpes , as a मीठी सॉस boiled और softened bas साथ  milk to soak the crepes , resulting in a tasty dessert .
In  मैक्सिको अनेक ब्रांड्स मेक cajeta लकिन the  most common brand is Coronado .
It is also  बहुत आम to प्लेस cajeta between obleas to  make a traditional Mexican dessert .
Prince William , Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ) ,  is the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स , और डायना , राजकुमारी of वेल्स , और third-eldest पोता of महारानी एलिज़ाबेथ  II and Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second in the line of succession , behind his father , to the thrones  of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the संयुक्त किंगडम , कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , New Zealand , Jamaica , Barbados , The Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was educated at four schools in the  संयुक्त किंगडम और प्राप्त a उपाधि इससे  the University of St Andrews .
He  खर्च भाग of a गैप साल in चिली  , Belize , Tanzania , and Kenya where he has lived and holidayed several times .
Prince William has also taken Kiswahili  अध्ययन at विश्वविद्यालयों in कीनिया  and Tanzania .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals  रेजीमेंट of the household प्यादे —serving साथ उसके bhai प्रिंस हैरी —and , दो सालो बाद , अर्जित  his wings by completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell .
In 2009 , he transferred to the Royal Air Force , was promoted  to उड़ान लेफ्टिनेंट और underwent हेलीकाप्टर उड़ती प्रशिक्षण in अनुक्रम to become a full-time पायलट साथ the ढूंढें और बचाव  Force .
In 2010 , he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter training and went on to RAF Valley on No . 22  स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot कर्तव्य on फलक a समुद्र किंग ढूंढें और बचाव हेलीकाप्टर  .
Prince William married his  longtime गर्लफ्रेंड , कैथरीन मिडलटन  , on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey .
Hours prior to his wedding , Prince William was created  ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज , अर्ल of strathearn  , and Baron Carrickfergus .
Mali  is a बहुभाषी  country .
The languages spoken there reflect ancient  उपनिवेश पैटर्न , migrations , और इसके long इतिहास  .
ऍथनोलॉग रिश्तो  50 languages .
Of these , French is the  आधिकारिक भाषा और bambara is the सबसे  widely spoken .
Altogether  13 of the स्वदेशी भाषाएं of माली have the  legal status of national language .

Rogers Building , the headquarters  of रोजर्स संचार
Rogers Communications Inc. is a diversified public Canadian  संचार और मीडिया कम्पनी  .
It is particularly in the field of wireless communications , cable  टेलीविज़न , टेलीफोन , और अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी साथ significant अतिरिक्त दूरसंचार और  mass media assets .
the कम्पनी is headquartered in the रोजर्स  Building in Toronto , Ontario .
The company claims the heritage of the Rogers  वैक्यूम ट्यूब कम्पनी , संस्थापित in 1925 by एडवर्ड रोजर्स , जिससे प्रारंभ  the CFRB radio station in Toronto , which was later acquired by outside interests .
The present enterprise dates  to 1960 , जब रोजर्स ' बेटे , टेड रोजर्स ,  founded Rogers Radio Broadcasting Ltd .
That company acquired CHFI that year , as well as Aldred-Rogers Broadcasting , a  साझेदारी साथ जोएल aldred जिससे helped लॉन्च cfto in  1961 .
Rogers later bought out Aldred and started the current cable and  बेतार परिचालन , ज्ञात as रोजर्स cablesystems  Ltd .
The chief competitor to the company is Bell Canada , which has a  similarly extensive पोर्टफोलियो of रेडियो और टेलीविज़न मीडिया एसेट , as खूब as बेतार , टेलीविज़न वितरण , और टेलीफोन सेवाएं ,  particularly in Eastern and Central Canada ; the two companies are often seen as having a duopoly on communications services in their regions .
however , the कम्पनी भी competes nationally साथ telus लिये बेतार  services , and primarily indirectly with Shaw Communications for television service .
The company also competes with a number  of अन्य मीडिया कंपनियाँ in the प्रसारण उद्योग  .
The Internet is a global system of interconnected  कंप्यूटर संजाल कि उपयोग the मानक अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल  suite ( TCP/IP ) to serve billions of users worldwide .
It is a network  of संजाल कि consists of लाखो of निजी  , public , academic , business , and government networks , of local to global scope , that are linked by a broad array of electronic , wireless and optical networking technologies .
The Internet carries an extensive range of information  संसाधन और सेवाएं , ऐसे as the inter-linked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ of the संसार चौड़ी वेब (  WWW ) and the infrastructure to support email .
Most traditional communications media including telephone , music , film , and  टेलीविज़न हैं होने reshaped or redefined by the अंतरजाल , giving जनम to नई सेवाएं ऐसे as आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल  ( VoIP ) and Internet Protocol television ( IPTV ) .
Newspaper ,  किताब और अन्य छपाई प्रकाशन हैं adapting to वेब साईट  technology , or are reshaped into blogging and web feeds .
The Internet has enabled and accelerated new forms of human interactions  through तत्काल messaging , अंतरजाल forums , और  social networking .
Online shopping  रै boomed दोनो लिये प्रमुख खुदरा आउटलेट  and small artisans and traders .
Business-to-business  और वित्तीय सेवाएं on the अंतरजाल affect सप्लाई  chains across entire industries .
The origins of the Internet reach back to research commissioned by the  संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी in the 1960s to निर्माण मजबूत , fault-tolerant संचार via कंप्यूटर संजाल  .
The funding of a new U.S. backbone by the National Science Foundation in the 1980s , as well as private funding  लिये अन्य वाणिज्यिक backbones , led to विश्वव्यापी भागीदारी in the विकास of  new networking technologies , and the merger of many networks .
The commercialization of what was by the 1990s an international network resulted in its  popularization और incorporation into वस्तुतः प्रत्येक पहलू of आधुनिक इंसान जीवन  .
, more than 2.4 billion people—over a third of the world 's human population —have used the services of the Internet ; approximately 100 times more people than were  using it in 1995 , जब it थी ज़्यादातर प्रयुक्त by tech-savvy मध्य और अपर क्लास लोगों in the संयुक्त राज्य और अनेक अन्य देशों  .
The Internet has no  centralized शासन in either technological क्रियान्वयन or नीतियों लिये अभिगम और उपयोग ; प्रत्येक constituent  network sets its own policies .
Only the overreaching definitions of the two principal name spaces in the  अंतरजाल , the अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल पता स्पेस और the डोमेन नाम प्रणाली , हैं निर्देशित by a maintainer संगठन , the अंतरजाल निगम  for Assigned Names and Numbers ( ICANN ) .
The technical underpinning and standardization of the core protocols ( IPv4 and  ipv6 ) is an कार्यकलाप of the अंतरजाल अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य फ़ोर्स ( ietf ) , a non-profit संगठन  of loosely affiliated international participants that anyone may associate with by contributing technical expertise .
The 2006 Winter Olympics , officially  ज्ञात as the xx ओलम्पिक शीत खेल , थी a शीत multi-sport इवेंट जिससे थी मनाये in टोरीनो , इटली इससे फ़रवरी  10 , 2006 , through February 26 , 2006 .
This marked the second time Italy hosted the Olympic  शीत खेल , the पहला होने the सात ओलम्पिक शीत खेल in  Cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956 .
Italy also hosted the Games  of the xvii ओलंपियाड in  Rome in 1960 .
Turin was selected as the host  नगर लिये the 2006 खेल  in 1999 .
The official logo displayed the name ``  टोरिनो '' , the इतालवी नाम of the नगर ; the नगर is ज्ञात as `` टोरीनो ''  in both English and the local traditional language , Piedmontese .
The Olympic  mascots of टोरिनो 2006 यहूद neve ( `` हिम  '' in Italian ) , a female snowball , and Gliz , a male ice cube .
The official motto of the XX  ओलम्पिक शीत खेल थी `` जुनून जीवनदान  here '' .
`` Help ! '' is a  सोंग by the बीटल्स कि परोसा as the शीर्षक सोंग  for both the 1965 film and its soundtrack album .
It was also released as a single , and was number one for  तीन सप्ताह in दोनो the संयुक्त राज्य और  the United Kingdom .
``  सहायता ! '' थी लिखा primarily by जॉन लेनन  , but credited to Lennon–McCartney .
During an interview  साथ प्लेबॉय in 1984 , पॉल mccartney  stated that the title was `` out of desperation '' .

Siegfried Bing ( 26 February 1838 – 6 September 1905 ) , who usually gave his name as S. Bing , and was thus often referenced erroneously as `` Samuel  bing '' ( सैमुएल ओटो bing , 1850–1905 , थी उसके bhai ) थी a जर्मनी आर्ट डीलर जो जिया in पेरिस as an वयस्क , और जो helped introduce जापानी  art and artworks to the West and was a factor in the development of the Art Nouveau style during the late nineteenth century .
