Kennewick is a city in Benton  काउंटी in the southeastern भाग of the u.S. राज्य of वॉशिंगटन  , near the Hanford nuclear site .
It is the most populous of the  तीन शहरों collectively referred to as the tri-cities ( the अन्य होने  Pasco and Richland ) .
Kennewick  is स्तिथ साथ the दक्षिणपश्चिम बैंको of the कोलंबिया नदी , विपरीत pasco और  just south of the confluence of the Columbia and Yakima rivers .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 73,917 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
April 1 , 2012 estimates from the Washington State Office of Financial Management put  the नगर 's जनसांख्यिकी at  75,160 .
The nearest  वाणिज्यिक विमानक्षेत्र is the tri-cities विमानक्षेत्र in pasco , a क्षेत्रीय  commercial and private airport .
Forbes magazine named Kennewick the # 2 area in the  संयुक्त राज्य लिये जॉब विकास ,  while nearby Yakima was named # 1 .
The article cites the number of scientists  employed by the प्रशांत उत्तरपश्चिम नेशनल प्रयोगशाला  and area farmland for this outlook .
The  prothrombin समय ( pt ) और इसके निकला उपायों of prothrombin अनुपात ( pr ) और अंतरराष्ट्रीय सामान्यीकृत अनुपात  ( INR ) are measures of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation .
This test is  भी पुकारा `` protime inr  '' and `` PT/INR '' .
They are used to determine the clotting tendency of  रक्त , in the माप of warfarin dosage  , liver damage , and vitamin K status .
PT measures  कारकों i ( फाइब्रिनोजेन ) , ii ( prothrombin  ) , V , VII , and X .
It is used in conjunction with the activated  आंशिक thromboplastin समय ( aptt ) जिससे  measures the intrinsic pathway .
`` I 'm in the Mood for Love '' is  a लोकप्रिय सोंग  .
The music was written by Jimmy McHugh ,  the गीत by डोरोथी फ़ील्ड  .
The song  थी प्रकाशित  in 1935 .
It was introduced by  frances langford in the फिल्म प्रत्येक रात्रि  at Eight released that year .
The song was featured in the 1936 Our Gang ( Little Rascals ) short  , the पिंच सिंगर , सुंग by कार्ल `` अल्फाल्फा '' switzer  , and in the 1936 film Palm Springs .
It is  प्रायः ज्ञात to be switzer  's signature song .
James  मूडी 's saxophone सोलो on a  1952 recording of this song inspired the song `` Moody 's Mood for Love `` .
Hip hop artist Prince Paul sampled the song as  the आधार लिये the track `` मनोदशा लिये प्रेम '' on उसके एल्बम a प्रिंस among  Thieves ( 1999 ) , with Don Newkirk singing its original lyrics .
the सोंग 's शीर्षक प्रेरित the अंग्रेज़ी  title of Wong Kar Wai 's movie In the Mood for Love .
Cross-cultural psychology is the scientific study of human  बर्ताव और दिमागी प्रक्रियाओं , सहित दोनो उनके variability और invariance , अंतर्गत विविध सांस्कृतिक  conditions .
Through expanding research methodologies to recognize cultural variance  in बर्ताव , भाषा , और अर्थ it seeks to extend और develop  psychology .
Since psychology as an academic discipline was developed  largely in उत्तर अमेरिका , कुछ psychologists became चिंतित कि constructs स्वीकृत as सार्वभौमिक यहूद नहीं as निश्चर as previously assumed , विशेषकर  since many attempts to replicate notable experiments in other cultures had varying success .
Since there are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes , such as affect , cognition , conceptions of the self , and issues such as psychopathology , anxiety , and depression , may lack external validity when `` exported ''  to अन्य सांस्कृतिक contexts , cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान re-examines उन्हें using methodologies designed to फ़ैक्टर in सांस्कृतिक मतभेद  so as to account for cultural variance .
Although some  आलोचकों have pointed to methodological खामियां in cross-cultural मनोवैज्ञानिक शोध और अर्जी कि गंभीर त्रुटियां in the सैद्धांतिक और methodological bases  used impede rather than help the scientific search for universal principles in psychology , cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to the study of how differences ( variance ) occur , rather than searching for universals in the style of physics or chemistry .
In 1972  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of cross-cultural  Psychology ( IACCP ) was established .
This branch of psychology has  जारी to विस्तार as वहीँ रै महरूम an increasing लोकप्रियता  of incorporating culture and diversity into studies .
cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान is differentiated  from Cultural psychology .
The latter is the branch of psychology that  holds कि इंसान बर्ताव is significantly बहकावे by सांस्कृतिक मतभेद , अर्थ कि मनोवैज्ञानिक  phenomena can only be compared with each other across cultures to a very limited extent .
In contrast , cross-cultural psychology  शामिल a ढूंढें लिये संभावित universals in बर्ताव  and mental processes .
Walter J. Lonner , writing for Eye on  psi ची , रै stated कि `` cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान can be विचार of as a प्रकार शोध methodology , बल्कि than an entirely पृथक  field within psychology ( 2000 ) . ''
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga , from her  दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम born इस रास्ता ( 2011  ) .
It was  released by interscope रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल 15 , 2011 , चार दिनों  ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and produced  by महिला गागा और redone , `` यहूदा '' is a नृत्य और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस  song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her .
It embodies the incidents that have  haunted गागा in the पास्ट , और इसके कोर अर्थ refers to the ऋणात्मक भाग of  her life that she ca n't escape .
गागा रै further समझाया कि the सोंग थी भी परिचय honoring एक  's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the light .
The artwork for the single was  designed by गागा in microsoft  Word .
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups , the song was generally well received by critics , who  likened the सोंग to `` ख़राब रोमांस `` साथ कुछ noting it चाहिए have महरूम the एल्बम 's सीसे सिंगल  .
The song has a similar sound to  गागा 's पिछला redone-produced ट्रैक्स , सहित `` पोकर फेस `` , `` lovegame `` ,  `` Bad Romance '' , and `` Alejandro `` .
It contains three distinct  hooks और a हाउस -influenced  break down .
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the breakdown talk about her as beyond redemption ,  regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य of कया a स्त्री चाहिए be  .
`` Judas '' initially had a strong  बिक्री खोलने , लकिन थी कम कामयाब commercially in तुलना  to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten of the charts  in सबसे प्रमुख म्यूज़िक बाज़ार , और भी पहुँचे  the top of the charts in South Korea .
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011 ,  co-directed by गागा और laurieann गिब्सन और co-starring  Norman Reedus .
It has a Biblical  कथानक जहाँ reedus निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट  and Gaga played Mary Magdalene .
the वीडियो portrays उन्हें  as modern day missionaries going to Jerusalem .
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying  यीशु , और ended साथ गागा as magdalene getting  stoned to death .
Before  इसके रिलीज , the कैथोलिक लीग condemned गागा लिये the  alleged use of religious imagery and her role in the video .
However , critics generally praised the video , not  ढूंढना कोई अप्रिय सामग्री  .
The video was  मनोनीत लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011  MTV Video Music Awards .
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows , including The  ग्राहम नॉर्टन दिखाएँ , शनिवार रात्रि सजीव , शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '' , the  French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show .
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or AVC ( Advanced Video Coding ) is a standard for video compression  , और is फिलहाल एक of the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त स्वरुप लिये the रिकॉर्डिंग ,  compression , and distribution of high definition video .
The final drafting work on the  पहला संस्करण of the मानक थी समाप्त in  May 2003 .
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -based codec standard developed by the  itu-t वीडियो कोडिंग विशेषज्ञ समूह ( vceg ) साथ साथ the iso/iec jtc1 चलती चित्र विशेषज्ञ समूह  ( MPEG ) .
The project partnership  प्रयत्न is ज्ञात as the संयुक्त वीडियो  Team ( JVT ) .
The ITU-T H.264 standard and the ISO/IEC MPEG-4 AVC standard ( formally ,  iso/iec 14496-10 – mpeg-4 भाग 10 , उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) हैं jointly कायम so कि वे have एकसमान  technical content .
H.264 is perhaps best known as being one of the codec  मानकों लिये blu-ray discs ; सब blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी जरूर be समर्थ to डिकोड  H.264 .
It is also widely used by streaming internet sources , such as videos from Vimeo , YouTube , and the iTunes Store , web software such as the Adobe Flash Player and Microsoft  silverlight , और भी विभिन्न hdtv प्रसारण over स्थलीय ( atsc , isdb-t , dvb-t or dvb-t2 ) , केबल ( dvb-c ) और उपग्रह ( dvb-s  and DVB-S2 ) .
Non-binding arbitration is a type of arbitration in which the arbitrator makes a determination of the rights of the parties to the dispute , but this  determination is नहीं बाइंडिंग upon उन्हें , और no enforceable  arbitration award is issued .
The `` award '' is in effect an advisory  राय of the arbitrator 's दृश्य of the संबंधित merits  of the parties cases .
Non-binding arbitration is used  in कनेक्शन साथ कोशिशें to पहुँचें a  negotiated settlement .
The role of an arbitrator in  non-binding मध्यस्थता is , on the सतह ,  similar to that of a mediator in a mediation .
However , the principal distinction is that whereas a mediator will try to help the parties find a middle ground to  सुलह at , the arbitrator remains totally removed इससे the उपनिवेश प्रक्रम और होगा तभी दे  a determination of liability and , if appropriate , an indication of the quantum of damages payable .
Subsequent to  a non-binding मध्यस्थता , the पार्टियों remain फ़्री to pursue उनके दावा either through  the courts , or by way of a binding arbitration , although in practice a settlement is the most common outcome .
The award and  तर्क in a non-binding मध्यस्थता is लगभग invariably inadmissible in कोई subsequent  action in the courts or in another arbitration tribunal .
Non-binding arbitration is  utilised ज़्यादातर in the संयुक्त  States and Canada .
it is largely अनजान in यूरोपीय , हालांकि in the संयुक्त किंगडम वहीँ is a अभ्यास of पार्टियों जो हैं seeking a उपनिवेश to jointly instruct a महारानी  's Counsel for an opinion on the merits and likely quantum of a claim , and then to negotiate on the basis of the views expressed in that opinion .
Augustine Volcano is a Lava Dome Complex on Augustine Island  in southwestern कुक इनलेट in the kenai प्रायद्वीप बरो of southcentral  coastal Alaska , southwest of Anchorage .
The Alaska Volcano Observatory currently rates Mount Augustine as Level of Concern Color Code Green  लिये विमानन और the ज्वालामुखी चेतावनी स्तर is at सामान्य  .
Augustine Island has a land area of , while  वेस्ट द्वीप , बस बंद अगस्टाइन 's पश्चिमी shores  , has .
The  द्वीप is बना up मुख्यतः  of past eruption deposits .
Scientists have been able to  discern कि पास्ट गुम्बद पतन रै resulted  in large avalanches .
A map  of बेलीज़  .
The country of Belize  रै roughly 386 km of तटरेखा , और  has many coral reefs , cays , and islands in the Caribbean Sea .
Most of these form the  बेलीज़ अवरोध रीफ , the longest in the  western hemisphere stemming approximately .
The reef  और इसके आइलैंड्स have महरूम a युनेस्को संसार  Heritage Site since 1996 .
The following is a list of oceanic  आइलैंड्स of बेलीज़ , arranged according to प्रदेश  but all of which are in the Caribbean Sea .
Most of the  आइलैंड्स variate in स्पेलिंग between `` cay '' और  `` caye '' , and also use the Spanish `` cayo '' .
River  आइलैंड्स have  not been listed .
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued commercial packet writing application  लिये the microsoft खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली कि allows ऑप्टिकल डिस्क आंकड़ा भंडार  devices to be used in a manner similar to floppy disks .
DLA is a packet writing technology for CD and DVD media that  उपयोग the udf संचिका प्रणाली .
DLA is not compatible with Windows Vista and  नए , हालांकि a पैच exists to फिक्स इस समस्या अंतर्गत खिड़कियाँ  Vista .
roxio बर्न थी introduced on  April 30 , 2009 .
as a बदलना लिये dla , it remedies  compatibility issues Internet Explorer 8 .
अल्फा रेक्स emmanuel humbard ( अगस्त 13 , 1919 – सितंबर 21 , 2007 ) थी a well-known अमरीकी टेलीविज़न इंजीलवादी  whose Cathedral of Tomorrow show was shown on over 600 stations at the peak of its popularity .
Limitless is a 2011 American thriller film directed by Neil  बर्गर और अभिनीत ब्राडली कूपर , abbie cornish , और रॉबर्ट de  Niro .
It is  आधारित on the 2001 अनोखा the अंधेरा फ़ील्ड  by Alan Glynn with the screenplay by Leslie Dixon .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent , with  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट , the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर , और the प्रशांत समंदर to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण , साथ रूस  further west across the Bering Strait .
अलास्का is the largest राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल  , the 4th least populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States .
Approximately half  of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों  live within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
अलास्का 's अर्थव्यवस्था is वर्चस्व by the आयल , प्राकृतिक गैस  , and fishing industries ; it has these resources in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from Russia  on कूच 30 , 1867 , लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) at लगभग  two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an organized ( or  incorporated ) territory on may 11 , 1912 , और the 49th राज्य of the u.S.  on January 3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period , when it was used only for  the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq , अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or , अधिक वस्तुतः , `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards जिससे the कार्रवाई  of the sea is directed '' .
It is also known as Alyeska , the `` great land '' ,  an aleut शब्द निकला इससे the वही रूट .
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan  विश्वविद्यालयों ( nmmu ) is a दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी tertiary शिक्षा संस्था  with its main administration in the coastal city of Port Elizabeth .
A merging of three  संस्थानों संस्थापित nmmu in जनवरी 2005 लकिन इसके इतिहास तिथियाँ वापस to 1882 साथ the  foundation of Port Elizabeth Art School .
The University draws international  विद्यार्थी इससे सब  over the world .
There are over 3000 international students and  शामिल विद्यार्थी इससे the संयुक्त राज्य , फ़्रांस , चीन , जर्मनी , बेल्जियम , डेनमार्क , फिनलैंड , नीदरलैंड्स  , Norway , Sweden , United Kingdom and many other countries .
NMMU is a comprehensive university  offering पेशेवर और वोकेशनल  training .
The University  रै छह campuses - पाँच in  Port Elizabeth and one in George .
the प्रमुख कैम्पस  is the South Campus .
Students at NMMU can study towards diplomas and degrees up to and  सहित डॉक्टरेट स्तर योग्यता  .
A number  of पाठ्यक्रम शामिल कार्यस्थल अनुभव  as part of the curriculum .
covergirl is an अमरीकी कॉस्मेटिक्स ब्रांड संस्थापित in मेरीलैंड , by the noxzema रासायनिक कम्पनी  ( later called Noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989 .
The Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics line  by allowing `` कवर लड़कियों '' , फ़ैशन मॉडल जो appear on the सामने कवर of महिलाओं 's मैगज़ीन  , to wear its products .
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct  व्यक्तिगत ग्राहक सेवा by providing a चौड़ी किस्में of कॉस्मेटिक्स  available at reasonable prices .
On the Origin  of प्रजाति , प्रकाशित on 24 नवम्बर 1859 , is a कार्य of वैज्ञानिक  literature by Charles Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary biology .
Its full title was On the Origin of Species by Means of Natural  चयन , or the संरक्षण of favoured दौड़ in the संघर्ष लिये जीवन  .
For  the छठे संस्करण of 1872 , the छोटी शीर्षक  was changed to The Origin of Species .
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory  कि populations evolve over the कोर्स of पीढियां through a प्रक्रम  of natural selection .
It presented a body  of प्रमाण कि the विविधता of जीवन arose by आम descent through  a branching pattern of evolution .
Darwin included evidence that he had  gathered on the beagle expedition in the 1830s और उसके subsequent निष्कर्षों इससे शोध , पत्राचार  , and experimentation .
Various  विकासवादी विचार था already महरूम प्रस्तावित to बताइये  new findings in biology .
There was  growing support लिये ऐसे विचार among dissident anatomists और the सामान्य पब्लिक , लकिन दौरान the पहला हाफ of the 19th सदी the  English scientific establishment was closely tied to the Church of England , while science was part of natural theology .
Ideas about the transmutation of  प्रजाति यहूद विवादास्पद as वे विरोधी साथ the मान्यताओं कि प्रजाति यहूद अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed पदानुक्रम  and that humans were unique , unrelated to other animals .
The  राजनैतिक और theological implications यहूद पडती debated  , but transmutation was not accepted by the scientific mainstream .
The book was  लिखा लिये non-specialist पाठक और आकर्षित फैली ब्याज  upon its publication .
As Darwin was an  प्रतिष्ठित वैज्ञानिक , उसके निष्कर्षों यहूद लिया seriously और the प्रमाण he  presented generated scientific , philosophical , and religious discussion .
The  बहस over the किताब contributed to the अभियान by t.h . हक्स्ले और  his fellow members of the X Club to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism .
Within two decades there was widespread scientific agreement  कि एवोल्यूशन , साथ a branching पैटर्न of आम descent , था occurred , लकिन वैज्ञानिकों यहूद slow  to give natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate .
During the ``  ग्रहण of डार्विनवाद `` इससे the 1880s to the 1930s , विभिन्न अन्य mechanisms  of evolution were given more credit .
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s , Darwin 's concept of  विकासवादी अनुकूलन through प्राकृतिक चयन became सेंट्रल to आधुनिक विकासवादी सिद्धान्त , अभी  the unifying concept of the life sciences .
Charles Dillon ``  केसी '' स्टेंगल ( ; जुलाई 30 , 1890 – सितंबर 29 , 1975 ) , nicknamed  `` The Old Perfessor '' , was an American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager .
He was elected to the  बेसबॉल हॉल of  Fame in .
Stengel was born in  कान्सास नगर , मिसौरी , और originally nicknamed `` डच ''  , a common nickname at that time for Americans of German ancestry .
After his major league career began , he acquired the nickname `` Casey '' , which  originally आए इससे the आद्याक्षर of उसके गृहनगर ( `` K. C. '' ) , जिससे विकसित into `` केसी '' , बहकावे by the चौड़ी लोकप्रियता  of the poem Casey at the Bat .
in the 1950s , sportswriters उतावले उसे साथ yet another उपनाम , ``  The Old Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ) , for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on anything baseball -related .
Although his baseball career  spanned a क्रमांक of टीमों और शहरों , he is primarily संबद्ध साथ  clubs in New York City .
Between playing  और मैनेजिंग , he is the तभी man to have worn चार of नई  York 's major league clubs ' uniforms .
He was the first of four men (  through the ऋतु ) to मैनेज दोनो the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ और नई  York Mets ; Yogi Berra , Dallas Green , and Joe Torre are the others .
Like Torre , he also  प्रबंधित the braves और  the Dodgers .
He ended his baseball career as the beloved  मैनेजर लिये the तब विस्तार नई यॉर्क मेट्स , जिससे जीती over the  hearts of New York partly due to the unique character of their veteran leader .
June ( ) is the sixth month of the year in the  जूलियन और gregorian पंचांग और एक of the चार महीने साथ a लंबाई  of 30 days .
Ovid provides two etymologies for June 's name in his poem concerning the  महीने हकदार the fasti  .
The first is that the month is named after the Roman goddess Juno , wife of Jupiter and  समतुल्य to the यूनानी देवी hera ; the दूसरी is कि the नाम आता इससे the लैटिन शब्द iuniores , अर्थ `` younger ones , '' as opposed to maiores  ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ) .
See : Months in various  पंचांग भी पुकारा the ऋतु of the जून is the माह साथ the longest daylight घंटों of  the year in the Northern Hemisphere and the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere .
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal  समतुल्य to दिसम्बर in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध  and vice versa .
In the  उत्तरी गोलार्ध , the शुरूआत of the meteorological  summer is 1 June .
In the  दक्षिणी गोलार्ध , the शुरूआत of the meteorological  winter is 1 June .
At the start  of जून , the सूर्य उदय in the नक्षत्र of वृष ; at the समाप्त of जून , the सूर्य उदय in the  constellation of Gemini .
However , due to the precession of the equinoxes , June begins with the sun  in the astrological चिह्न of मिथुन , और ends साथ the सूर्य in the astrological  sign of Cancer .
June is known for the large  क्रमांक of विवाह कि occur over the कोर्स  of the month .
According to one etymology ,  जून is नामित बाद juno ( hera  ) .
Juno was the goddess of marriage and a married  युगल 's household , so कुछ consider  it good luck to be married in this month .
According to another etymology  provided by the रोमन कवि ओविड , जून is नामित लिये the iuniores , लैटिन लिये `` यंग लोगों '' ( fasti vi.88 ) और कि  the month of May is named for the maiores , Latin for `` elders '' .
In Iceland ,  लोकगीत says कि if तुम bathe नग्न in the morning ओस on the morning  of June 24 , you are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer .
A  संविधान is a नियत of आधारभूत सिद्धान्त or स्थापित precedents according  to which a state or other organization is governed .
These rules together make up , i.e .  constitute , कया the एंटिटी  is .
When these principles are written down into a single document or set of legal documents , those documents may be  कहा to embody a लिखा संविधान ; if वे हैं लिखा bas in a सिंगल व्यापक दस्तावेज़  , it is said to embody a codified constitution .
Constitutions concern different levels of organizations , from sovereign states to  कंपनियाँ और unincorporated एसोसिएशन  .
A treaty which establishes an international  संगठन is भी इसके संविधान , in कि it होता define कैसा  that organization is constituted .
Within states , whether sovereign or federated , a constitution defines the  सिद्धान्त upon जिससे the राज्य is आधारित , the कार्यविधि in जिससे कानून हैं बना  and by whom .
Some constitutions , especially codified constitutions , also act as limiters of state power , by  establishing लाइनों जिससे a राज्य 's शासकों can नहीं क्रॉस , ऐसे as आधारभूत  rights .
George Washington at  संवैधानिक सम्मेलन of 1787 , हस्ताक्षर  of U.S. Constitution .
The  संविधान of इण्डिया is the longest लिखा संविधान of कोई sovereign देश in the संसार , containing 448 आलेख , 12 schedules और 100 amendments , साथ 117,369  words in its English language version , while the United States Constitution is the shortest written constitution , at 7 articles and 27 amendments .
Ron Diftler ( left ) , NASA Robonaut manager assisting in a Robonaut  familiarization प्रशिक्षण सत्र in the स्पेस पर्यावरण सिमुलेशन प्रयोगशाला at नासा 's जॉनसन स्पेस बीच  .
Engineering management  is a specialized रूप of प्रबन्धन कि is चिंतित साथ the अनुप्रयोग  of engineering principles to business practice .
Engineering management is a career that brings together the technological  problem-solving savvy of अभियान्त्रिकी और the organizational , प्रशासनिक , और नियोजन abilities  of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion .
उदाहरण क्षेत्रों of अभियान्त्रिकी हैं उत्पाद विकास , निर्माण , निर्माण , डिज़ाइन अभियान्त्रिकी , औद्योगिक अभियान्त्रिकी , प्रौद्योगिकी  , production , or any other field that employs personnel who perform an engineering function .
कामयाब अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबंधक typically आवश्यकता प्रशिक्षण और अनुभव  in business and engineering .
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by their  तकनीकी टोली , और non-commercial प्रबंधक tend to कमी वाणिज्यिक सूझबूझ to उद्धार  in a market economy .
Largely ,  अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबंधक मैनेज इंजीनियर्स जो हैं चलित by non-entrepreneurial सोच , यूँ आवश्यकता the जरुरी लोगों कौशल to कोच ,  mentor and motivate technical professionals .
Engineering professionals joining  निर्माण कंपनियाँ sometimes become अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबंधक  by default after a period of time .
They are required to learn  कैसा to मैनेज एकबार वे हैं on the जॉब , हालांकि इस is प्रायः  an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities .
In an insurance  नीति , the deductible is the राशि of खर्च कि  must be paid out of pocket before an insurer will pay any expenses .
In general usage , the term deductible may  be प्रयुक्त to describe एक of अनेक प्रकार of clauses  ( see below ) that are used by insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments .
deductibles हैं typically प्रयुक्त to deter the विशाल क्रमांक of नगण्य दावा  that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of .
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant enough to incur large costs , the insurance firm expects to  अदा आउट थोड़ा छोटी amounts much कम अक्सर , रूष्ट much उच्चतर बचत  .
As a result  , बीमे प्रीमियम हैं typically  cheaper when they involve higher deductibles .
Deductibles are  सामान्यतः provided as clauses in an बीमे नीति कि dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered  expense is borne by the policyholder .
They are  सामान्यतः कोटेड as a फिक्स्ड मात्रा और is a भाग  of most policies covering losses to the policy holder .
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable expenses that  exceed इस राशि ( विषय to the अधिकतम योग claimable indicated  in the contract ) .
Depending on the policy , the  deductible may लागू प्रति covered घटना , or प्रति  year .
For policies where  incidences हैं नहीं आसान to delimit ( लिये उदाहरण स्वास्थ्य बीमे ) ,  the deductible is typically applied per year .
Several  deductibles can be नियत by the insurer  based on the cause of the claim .
For example , a single housing insurance policy may contain multiple deductible amounts for loss or  क्षति arising इससे चोरी , आग , प्राकृतिक calamities , निकासी इत्यादि  .
There are also deductible reimbursement  कार्यक्रम कि reimburse a deductible in the इवेंट of an स्वचालित , घर , boat/yacht or स्वास्थ्य  insurance claim .
An invoice or bill  is a वाणिज्यिक दस्तावेज़ जारी by a विक्रेता to a खरीदार  , indicating the products , quantities , and agreed prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer .
An invoice indicates the  बिक्री लेनदेन  only .
Payment  शर्तें हैं स्वतंत्र of the चालान और हैं  negotiated by the buyer and the seller .
Payment terms are  प्रायः शामिल on  the invoice .
The buyer could  have already सशुल्क लिये the उत्पाद or सेवाएं  listed on the invoice .
Buyer can also have a maximum  क्रमांक of दिनों in जिससे to अदा लिये ये goods और is sometimes offered a छूट  if paid before the due date .
In the rental industry , an invoice must include a specific reference  to the अवधि of the समय होने billed , so in जोड to मात्रा , दाम  and discount the invoicing amount is also based on duration .
Generally each line of a rental invoice will refer to the  वास्तविक घंटों , दिनों , सप्ताह , महीने , etc. , होने billed  .
From  the पाइंट of दृश्य of a विक्रेता , an  invoice is a sales invoice .
From the  पाइंट of दृश्य of a खरीदार , an  invoice is a purchase invoice .
The document  indicates the खरीदार और विक्रेता , लकिन the  term invoice indicates money is owed or owing .
In English , the context of the term invoice is usually  प्रयुक्त to clarify इसके अर्थ , ऐसे as `` we भेजा उन्हें an चालान '' ( वे  owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from them '' ( we owe them money ) .
The right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus , or right principal  bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory  system .
It is wider ,  shorter , और अधिक लंबवत  in direction than the left .
It is about 2.5 cm long ,  और enters the सही फेफड़ों nearly विपरीत  the fifth thoracic vertebra .
The azygos vein arches over it from  पीछे ; और the सही pulmonary धमनी झूठ at पहला नीचे और  then in front of it .
About 2 cm from its commencement  it देता बंद a शाखा to the अपर  lobe of the right lung .
This is termed the eparterial  शाखा of the bronchus , क्युकी it  arises above the right pulmonary artery .
The bronchus now passes below the artery , and is known as the hyparterial branch ; it  divides into दो शाखाओं लिये the मध्य और निम्नतर निर्मोक  .
If a foreign body in the airway passes through the trachea , it will most likely enter the right main bronchus instead of the  बाएँ , due to the straighter संरेखण of the सही bronchus to the श्वासनली  .
Squash is a racquet sport played by two ( singles ) or four players (  युगल ) in a four-walled अदालत साथ a छोटी , खोखला  rubber ball .
The players must  वैकल्पिक in striking the बॉल साथ उनके racquet और hit the बॉल onto  the playable surfaces of the four walls of the court .
The game was formerly called squash racquets , a  सन्दर्भ to the `` squashable '' नरम बॉल प्रयुक्त in the खेल ( compared साथ the fatter  ball used in its parent game racquets or rackets ) .
Squash is  पहचाना by the ioc और समर्थक हैं lobbying लिये इसके incorporation  in a future Olympic program .
in 2003 , फोर्ब्स रेटेड स्क्वैश as  the number one healthiest sport to play .
Residual oil is oil found in low  एकाग्रता naturally or in बेहाल आयल फ़ील्ड  .
Often mixed with water , it can not be  बरामद by conventional तकनीकों  .
However , it can be recovered using carbon  dioxide-enhanced आयल रिकवरी ( co2 eor ) जिससे involves injecting कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड into  the well reducing viscosity and enhancing flow of the oil .
The technique is not new but has not been used extensively on residual  आयल zones , low-grade जमा of पेट्रोलियम ऐसे as the 38 वर्गाकार मील  in the Permian Basin of Texas leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr .
The technique  is सीमित by उपलब्धता  of carbon dioxide .
It does not result in sequestration of the carbon  डाइऑक्साइड लकिन the गैस is recycled as much  as possible .
United States  reserves of अवशेष आयल हैं  estimated to be 100 billion barrels .
कलाकार 's रेंडरिंग of the आग , by जॉन R. chapin , originally  printed in Harper 's Weekly ; the view faces northeast across the Randolph Street Bridge .
The Great Chicago Fire was a  conflagration कि burned इससे संडे , अक्तूबर 8 , to जल्दी मंगलवार , अक्तूबर 10 , 1871 , हत्या सैंकड़ों और destroying  about in Chicago , Illinois .
Though the fire was one of  the largest u.S. आपदाओं of the 19th सदी , the पुनर्निर्माण कि began helped develop  Chicago as one of the most populous and economically important American cities .
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 )  थी किंग of इंग्लैण्ड इससे 21 अप्रैल  1509 until his death .
He was lord , and later king , of Ireland , as  खूब as continuing the नाममात्र अर्जी by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs  to the Kingdom of France .
Henry was the second  monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश , succeeding  his father , Henry VII .
Besides his six marriages , Henry VIII is known for his role in the  विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक  Church .
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the  विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal प्राधिकार , the विच्छेद of the monasteries  , and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England .
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological  शिक्षाओं , भी बाद उसके excommunication इससे the रोमन  Catholic Church .
Henry oversaw the  विधिक संघ of इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स साथ the  Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542 .
In 1513 , the new king allied with the Holy Roman  सम्राट , maximillian i , और invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a विशाल , well-equipped फौज ,  but achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
Maximillian , for his part , used the English invasion  to उसके अपना ends , और इस prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's क्षमता to शिकस्त the  French .
This foray would prove the start of  an obsession लिये हेनरी , जो  invaded again in 1544 .
This time , Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne , but again the Holy Roman Emperor , Charles V , supported  हेनरी तभी as long as he needed to और इंग्लैण्ड  , strained by the enormous cost of the war , ransomed the city back for peace .
His contemporaries considered Henry in his prime to be an attractive , educated and accomplished  किंग , और he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` एक of the सबसे charismatic शासकों  to sit on the English throne '' .
Besides ruling  साथ निरपेक्ष शक्ति , he भी सगाई  himself as an author and composer .
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that  existed following the युद्धों of the गुलाब – led to the दो बाते लिये जिससे हेनरी is सबसे remembered  : his six marriages and the English Reformation .
Henry became morbidly  मोटे और उसके स्वास्थ्य suffered , contributing  to his death in 1547 .
he is अक्सर characterised in उसके बाद जीवन  as a lustful , egotistical , harsh , and insecure king .
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela  उत्पादित by the संयुक्त राज्य टेलीविज़न संजाल telemundo , in संयोजन साथ the एंटेना 3 संजाल और rti producciones  .
Based on a novel of the same name by Spanish author Arturo  pérez-reverte , the नाटक depicts the वृद्धि of टेरेसा मेंडोज़ा ( केट डेल कैस्टिलो ) , a यंग स्त्री इससे मैक्सिको जो becomes the सबसे  powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain .
Patricio Wills , the president of  telemundo टेलीविज़न studios , थी the कार्यपालिका निर्माता  .
Though La Reina del Sur was nominated for  novela of the साल , पसंदीदा सीसे अभिनेत्री , और बेहतरीन ख़राब लक वीडियो , it जीती no पुरस्कार  .
With a $ 10 million budget , La  reina डेल सूर थी the सबसे  expensive telenovela ever produced by Telemundo .
the कार्यक्रम 's प्रीमियर on फ़रवरी 28  , 2011 , was the network 's highest rated premiere for a telenovela to date .
The program frequently dominated its time slot  , भी over अंग्रेज़ी भाषा प्रोग्रामिंग on अन्य  major U.S. networks .
La Reina del Sur completed its 63 episode run on Telemundo and its 13  एपीसोड चलाएं on एंटेना 3 simultaneously on may 30 , 2011  .
The final episode was the highest rated broadcast in Telemundo 's 19-year history ( 4.2 million  दर्शक ) , और ताल सब of the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा u.S. टेलीविज़न संजाल to earn the क्रमांक एक स्लॉट in the 18-49 वयस्क जनसांख्यिकी  .
The program 's success  spurred telemundo to लॉन्च इसके पहला अभियान to लाभ the श्रेणी  an Emmy Award nomination .
A one-night special featuring several cast members aired on May 31 , 2011 , and marked  the telemundo डेब्यू of विख्यात latina टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व क्रिस्टीना saralegui  .
La Reina del Sur is broadcast in several other  बाज़ार , सहित सर्बिया , कोलंबिया , चिली , साइप्रस , निकारागुआ , कोस्टा रिका , मैक्सिको , अल्बानियाई  , Hungary , Slovenia , Croatia , Romania , ( among others ) .
An  उदाहरण of रैक आरोहित सर्वर
a वेब होस्टिंग सेवा is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals  and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies  कि provide स्पेस on a सर्वर स्वामित्व or leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट  , as well as providing Internet connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the  अंतरजाल लिये अन्य सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच , पुकारा colocation , भी  known as Housing in Latin America or France .
The scope of web  होस्टिंग सेवाएं varies  greatly .
The most basic is web page and  small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग , जहाँ फाइलें can be अपलोड via संचिका ट्रांसफ़र  Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface .
The  फाइलें हैं प्रायः वितरित to  the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing .
Many Internet service providers (  isps ) प्रस्ताव इस सेवा फ़्री  to subscribers .
individuals और संगठन may भी  obtain Web page hosting from alternative service providers .
Personal web site hosting is typically free ,  advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive  .
Business web site hosting  प्रायः रै a उच्चतर व्यय depending upon the  size and type of the website .
सिंगल पेज होस्टिंग is generally sufficient  for personal web pages .
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides database support and  अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g . पीएचपी , जावा , माणिक्य on rails , coldfusion  , or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow customers to write or install  स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums और सामग्री प्रबन्धन  .
Also , Secure Sockets Layer (  एसएसएल ) is typically प्रयुक्त लिये e-commerce  .
The host may also provide an interface or control panel  लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट , as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल  and service applications like e-mail .
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g .  e-commerce ) , जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger कंपनियाँ कि outsource  network infrastructure .
Madden NFL ( known as John Madden Football before 1993 )  is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल वीडियो खेल श्रेणी विकसित  by Electronic Arts Tiburon for EA Sports .
The game series  is नामित बाद प्रो फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of famer जॉन मैडेन , a well-known पूर्व सुपर  Bowl –winning coach of the Oakland Raiders and color commentator .
The series is  the बेहतरीन selling ea खेल  series .
The games have consistently been a best  विक्रेता , और रै भी शाखित tv shows जहाँ  players compete .
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks and player statistics , and voice  commentary कि allows खिलाड़ी to सुन the खेल as if it यहूद a रियल tv ब्रॉडकास्ट  .
the मैडेन एनएफएल श्रेणी  has been nicknamed the NFL 's 33rd Franchise .
The series  थी originally conceived by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कला संस्थापक ट्रिप हॉकिन्स  , who then approached Madden in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise .
Due to Madden 's insistence that the game be as realistic as  संभावित , the पहला संस्करण of जॉन मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल थी नहीं released  until 1988 .
The second version of the game was released in 1990 ,  साथ सालाना संस्करण चूंकि तब  .
The series ' name  थी बदला to मैडेन एनएफएल in 1993 बाद  EA acquired the rights to use NFL teams and players .
despite मैडेन 's रिटायरमेंट as a प्रसारणकर्ता in 2009  , he continues to lend his name and provide expertise for the game .
Cindy Lee Miller Sheehan ( born July 10 , 1957 ) is  an अमरीकी antiwar activist जिनकी बेटे , u.S. फौज विशेषज्ञ  Casey Sheehan , was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War .
She attracted national and international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar  विरोध at a makeshift शिविर बाहर अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश 's टेक्सास ranch —a स्टैंड कि खींचा दोनो passionate support और एंग्री  criticism .
Sheehan ran  unsuccessfully लिये कॉंग्रेस in  2008 .
She is a vocal critic  of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा 's  foreign policy .
Her memoir , Peace Mom : A Mother 's Journey Through Heartache  to सक्रियता , थी प्रकाशित in 2006  .
Sheehan was  the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the सलाम  and Freedom Party .
Wyclef Jeanelle Jean ( ; ; born October 17 , 1969 ) Wyclef Dumped From  हैती 's अध्यक्षीय बैलट – समय , अगस्त 21 , 2010  .
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he was  कार्यशील लिये अध्यक्ष of हैती , wyclef जां थी स्टिल लिस्टिंग उसके आयु as  only 37 years old .
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate , the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come clean and confirm  कि he थी वाकई 40 . '' is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning haitian-american rapper , singer-songwriter  , musician , record producer , and politician .
at आयु नौ , जां स्थानांतरित to the संयुक्त राज्य  with his family and has spent much of his life in the country .
He first received fame as a member of the  acclaimed नई जर्सी हिप हॉप समूह the  Fugees .
On August 5 ,  2010 , जां दायर लिये उम्मीदवारी in the 2010 haitian अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , हालांकि the चुनावी  Commission subsequently ruled him ineligible to stand as he had not met the requirement to have been resident in Haiti for five years .
Wyclef  जां to अपील विरूद्ध हैती चुनाव  ruling – BBC News , Aug 22 , 2010 .
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr Jean was ineligible to stand as the Haitian constitution requires candidates to  have जिया in the देश लिये पाँच  years prior to an election .
The 40-year-old  सिंगर जीवनदान in the  US .
जां 's प्रयत्न at भूकंप राहत , अत्यधिक publicized in 2010 throughout हैती और the संयुक्त राज्य , यहूद  channeled through his charitable organization , Yéle Haiti .
The  दान , जिससे performed a किस्में of charitable works in हैती between 2005  and 2010 , effectively closed in 2012 .
In law , a set-off  is a statutory रक्षा to the पूरे or to a portion of a  plaintiff 's claim .
It had no existence under the English common law , being  निर्मित by 2 जियो . ii c. 22 लिये the राहत of insolvent कर्जदार , हालांकि set-off थी पहचाना in  equity .
Such a defense could be pleaded only in respect of mutual debts of a definite  अक्षर , और किया नहीं लागू to मामले in जिससे क्षतिपूर्ति यहूद claimed , nor to निष्पक्ष  claims or demands .
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX . r. 3 ) a defendant in an action may set off or set  up कोई सही or अर्जी by रास्ता of counterclaim विरूद्ध the दावा of a अभियोक्ता , और ऐसे  set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action .
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby a person ( `` Party A '' )  जो owed धन to another ( `` पार्टी b '' ) could be भेजा to कर्जदार थाना , despite  the fact that Party B also owed money to Party A .
The  विधि यूँ allows दोनो पार्टियों to टालना  payment until their respective claims have been heard in court .
Upon  निर्णय , दोनो दावा हैं बुझे और replaced by a सिंगल जाल योग owing ( e.g . if पार्टी a owes पार्टी b 100  and Party B owes Party A 105 , the two sums are set off and replaced with a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A ) .
Set-off can also be  incorporated by contractual अनुबंध so कि , जहाँ a पार्टी मूलभूत  , the mutual amounts owing are automatically set off and extinguished .
In certain jurisdictions ( including the  uk ) , set-off takes प्लेस automatically  upon the insolvency of a company .
This means that , for each party which is both a creditor and debtor of the insolvent company , mutual debts are set-off against each other , and then either the bankrupt 's creditor can  अर्जी the संतुलन in the दिवालियापन or the ट्रस्टी in दिवालियापन can पूछो लिये the संतुलन बाकी to be सशुल्क , depending on  which side owed the most .
This has been criticized as an  undeclared सुरक्षा ब्याज कि violates the principle of  pari passu .
The alternative , where a creditor has to pay all its  debts , लकिन प्राप्त तभी a सीमित portion of the leftover moneys कि  other unsecured creditors get , poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies .
The right to set off  is विशेषकर महत्वपूर्ण जब रिपोर्टिंग a बैंको 's विकिरणों  to regulatory authorities .
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a large sum to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed , because there is a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to the loss of the bank 's or its  जमाकर्ताओं ' धन ) is यूँ replaced ( जहाँ the बैंको रै लिया सुरक्षा over साझा or प्रतिभूति of the borrower ) साथ an एक्सपोज़र of the धन lent ऋण the मान of the सुरक्षा लिया  .
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born  फ़रवरी 11 , 1969 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , फिल्मी निदेशक  , and producer .
Aniston gained  विश्वव्यापी मान्यता in the 1990s लिये portraying रेचल ग्रीन on the टेलीविज़न sitcom मित्रों , a  role which earned her an Emmy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award .
Aniston  रै भी enjoyed  a successful Hollywood film career .
She  gained नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the स्वतंत्र films वो 's the एक ( 1996 ) , दफ्तर स्पेस  ( 1999 ) , The Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ) .
She has had her greatest commercial successes  साथ the films ब्रूस सर्वशक्तिमान ( 2003 ) , the break-up ( 2006 ) , मार्ले & me ( 2008  ) , Just Go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ) .
Aniston  प्राप्त a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना  of Fame on February 22 , 2012 .
A  श्वेत बंगाल बाघ at  the Houston Aquarium
(  वीडियो  )
A White  बाघ at tobu चिड़ियाघर , in saitama  , Japan .
The white tiger is a recessive mutant of the  बंगाल बाघ , जिससे थी reported in the जंगली इससे समय to समय in असम , बंगाल ,  Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa .
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism  formed इससे परिधीय घटक इंटरकनेक्ट , भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened to बस पीसीआई )  is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
the पीसीआई बस supports the कृत्यों मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस , लकिन in  a standardized format that is independent of any particular processor .
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly  to the प्रोसेसर बस , और हैं आबंटित पता in the प्रोसेसर  's address space .
Attached devices can take  either the रूप of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड  itself , called a planar device in the PCI specification , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC  compatibles , जहाँ it विस्थापित the संयोजन  of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration .
It has  subsequently महरूम अपनाया लिये अन्य कंप्यूटर  types .
PCI and  pci-x हैं होने replaced by पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस , लकिन , सबसे  motherboards are still made with one or more PCI slots , which are sufficient for many uses .
The  पीसीआई specification कवर the शारीरिक आकार of the बस ( सहित the आकार और अंतरण of the  circuit board edge electrical contacts ) , electrical characteristics , bus timing , and protocols .
The specification  can be खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई खास ब्याज  Group ( PCI-SIG ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs  शामिल : संजाल ताश , ध्वनि ताश , modems  , extra ports such as USB or serial , TV tuner cards and disk controllers .
PCI  वीडियो ताश replaced isa और vesa ताश , जबतक growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ  outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI video cards remain available for  उपयोग साथ बूढ़ा pcs बगैर अगप or पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस स्लॉट  .
Many devices  previously provided on पीसीआई विस्तार ताश हैं अभी commonly  integrated onto motherboards or available in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions .
Caffeine is a bitter , white  crystalline xanthine एल्कलॉएड कि अधिनियमों as a उत्तेजक  drug .
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds , leaves , and  फल of कुछ पौधे , जहाँ it अधिनियमों as a प्राकृतिक कीटनाशक कि paralyzes और मारता निश्चित कीट feeding on the पौधे  , as well as enhancing the reward memory of pollinators .
It is most  commonly खपत by इंसानो in infusions निकाली इससे the बीज of the कॉफी संयंत्र और the  leaves of the tea bush , as well as from various foods and drinks containing products derived from the kola nut .
Other sources include yerba maté , guarana  जामुन , guayusa , और the yaupon होली  .
In humans , caffeine acts as a central nervous system  उत्तेजक , temporarily warding बंद drowsiness और restoring alertness  .
It is the world 's most widely consumed psychoactive drug , but unlike many other  psychoactive substances , it is विधिक और unregulated in nearly सब भाग of the  world .
Beverages containing  कैफीन , ऐसे as कॉफी , चाय , नरम पेय , और  energy drinks , enjoy great popularity .
In North America , 90 % of  वयस्कों consume कैफीन रोज़  .
Part of the reason caffeine is classified by the Food  और ड्रग प्रशासन as ग्रा ( generally पहचाना as सुरक्षित ) is कि विषाक्त doses ( over 10 गामा  ) are much higher than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ) .
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks , even when carried on for  सालो – वहीँ may be a modest सुरक्षात्मक प्रभाव विरूद्ध कुछ रोगों , सहित parkinsons बीमारी  , and certain types of cancer .
Caffeine can  have दोनो धनात्मक और ऋणात्मक प्रभाव  on anxiety disorders .
Some people  अनुभव नींद disruption if वे consume कैफीन , विशेषकर  during the evening hours , but others show little disturbance and the effect of caffeine on sleep is highly variable .
Evidence of a risk to pregnancy is equivocal , but some  अधिकारियों have concluded कि दूरदर्शी सलाह is लिये गर्भवती  women to limit consumption to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less .
The American  कॉंग्रेस of obstetricians और स्त्रीरोग ( acog ) concluded in 2010 कि कैफीन  consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women .
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic effects when administered to people who are not used to it  , लकिन नियमित उपयोक्ता develop a सहिष्णुता to इस प्रभाव , और अध्ययन have generally विफल to support the आम ख़्याल कि ordinary खपत  contributes significantly to dehydration .
With  भारी उपयोग , सहिष्णुता develops rapidly to autonomic प्रभाव ऐसे as elevated दिल रेट  and muscle twitching , but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine .
The degree to which caffeine can produce clinically  significant शारीरिक और दिमागी dependence remains a विषय of विवाद  in the medical literature .

A  longboard is a longer रूपांतर  of a skateboard .
it is commonly प्रयुक्त लिये cruising , downhill रेसिंग , slalom  racing , sliding , and/or transport .

The Coast Ranges of California  स्पैन इससे हम्बोल्ट काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया दक्षिण to  Santa Barbara County .
The other three coastal California mountain ranges are the  अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ , प्रायद्वीपीय सीमाएँ और the klamath kyu  .
Physiographically ,  वे हैं a खण्ड of the larger प्रशांत किनारा प्रांत , जिससे  in turn are part of the larger Pacific Mountain System physiographic division .
UNESCO has included the `` California Coast Ranges  जीवमंडल आरक्षित `` in इसके man और the जीवमंडल कार्यक्रम of संसार संजाल of जीवमंडल reserves  since 1983 .
Vehicles in use per country  इससे 2001 to 2007  .
