संसार मैप of यात्री  cars per 1000 people
An automobile ,  autocar , मोटर car or car is a wheeled मोटर गाडी प्रयुक्त लिये transporting  passengers , which also carries its own engine or motor .
Most definitions of the term specify that automobiles are designed to  चलाएं primarily on सड़कें , to have seating लिये एक to आठ लोगों , to typically have चार पहियों  , and to be constructed principally for the transport of people rather than goods .
The term motorcar has also been used in the context of  electrified रेल प्रणालियों to denote a car जिससे कृत्यों as a छोटी लोकोमोटिव लकिन भी provides  space for passengers and baggage .
These locomotive cars were often used on  suburban रूट by दोनो interurban और intercity  railroad systems .
It was estimated in 2010  कि the क्रमांक of ऑटोमोबाइल था risen to over  1 billion vehicles , up from the 500 million of 1986 .
The numbers are  increasing rapidly , विशेषकर in  China and India .
जॉन fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी ( may 29 , 1917 – नवम्बर 22 , 1963 ) , प्रायः referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर jfk , थी  the 35th President of the United States , serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service as commander of the Motor  torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत , कैनेडी represented  Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
thereafter , he परोसा in the u.S. सीनेट इससे 1953  until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice President  और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड  Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to have been elected to the office , the second-youngest President ( after  थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ) , और the पहला व्यक्ति born in the 20th सदी to serve as अध्यक्ष  .
A Catholic , Kennedy is  the तभी non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष , और is the तभी अध्यक्ष  to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion , the Cuban Missile Crisis , the building of  the बर्लिन वॉल , the स्पेस रेस , the african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति , और जल्दी  stages of the Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy  increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers , खास आपरेशन शक्तियां , और helicopters in an प्रयत्न to  curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic Hamlet Program  जिससे थी implemented by the दक्षिण वियतनामी  government .
It involved certain forced  relocation , गाँव internment , और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the उत्तरी  and southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was  assassinated on नवम्बर 22 , 1963 in डलास ,  Texas .
ली घनघोर ओसवाल्ड थी चार्ज साथ the  crime , but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby two days later , before a trial could take place .
The FBI and the Warren Commission officially  concluded कि ओसवाल्ड थी the लोन हत्यारे  .
However , the United States House Select Committee on Assassinations (  hsca ) concluded कि those investigations यहूद flawed और कि कैनेडी थी संभवतः  assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
However , ABC News in their investigation , The Kennedy Assassination :  परे षड्यंत्र , पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the वारेन आयोग ; having  concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's controversial  विभाग of रक्षा tfx सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional  investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
चूंकि the 1960s सूचना concerning  Kennedy 's private life has come to light .
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled  have become बेहतर ज्ञात , विशेषकर चूंकि  the 1990s .
Although initially kept  रहस्य इससे the सामान्य पब्लिक , रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's philandering  have garnered much press .
Kennedy  बाँधने अत्यधिक in पब्लिक  opinion ratings of U.S. presidents .
A Siemens MXL  आग सचेतक कंट्रोल फलक ( शीर्ष ) और ग्राफिक annunciator  ( bottom ) for Potomac Hall , at James Madison University .
A Vigilant VM-1 fire alarm control unit ( FACU ) / autonomous control  ईकाई ( acu ) साथ एकीकृत आवाज़ निकासी और आग सेनानी टेलीफोन  system .
manufactured by एडवर्ड्स , a  UTC F & S Company
A  आग सचेतक कंट्रोल फलक ( facp ) , or आग  Alarm Control Unit ( FACU ) , is the controlling component of a Fire Alarm System .
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire ,  मॉनीटर उनके operational अखंडता और provides लिये स्वचालित कंट्रोल of उपकरण , और  transmission of information necessary to prepare the facility for fire based on a predetermined sequence .
The panel may also  सप्लाई विद्युत उर्जा to operate  any associated sensor , control , transmitter , or relay .
There are four basic  प्रकार of panels : coded panels  , conventional panels , addressable panels , and multiplex systems .
This  is a सूची of the पहला म्यूज़िक वीडियो ब्रॉडकास्ट  on MTV 's first day , August 1 , 1981 .
MTV 's first day on the air was rebroadcast on VH1 Classic in 2006 and uploaded onto YouTube in 2010 ( although only the  पहला चार घंटों यहूद प्रामाणिक ; the बाकी यहूद संपादित vh1 rebroadcasts  ) .
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake International Airport and  कोलोन अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट सेवारत the नगर of कोलोन , the अन्य is  Ratmalana International Airport .
Mattala Rajapaksa  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र स्तिथ in दक्षिणी नगर of hambantota is  the other international airport in Sri Lanka .
Bandaranaike International  विमानक्षेत्र is स्तिथ in katunayake , 22 मील ( 35 km  ) north of Colombo .
It  is administered by विमानक्षेत्र और विमानन  Services ( Sri Lanka ) Ltd .
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines , the  नेशनल वाहक of श्री लंका , और mihin लंका , the बजट  airline of Sri Lanka .
Black Swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror  फिल्मी निर्देशित by डैरेन aronofsky और अभिनीत नताली पोर्टमैन  , Vincent Cassel , and Mila Kunis .
The plot  घूमती around a उत्पादन of tchaikovsky 's swan झील  ballet by a prestigious New York City company .
The production requires a ballerina to play the innocent  और नाजुक श्वेत swan , लिये जिससे the वचनबद्ध नर्तकी नीना ( पोर्टमैन ) is a पूर्ण अनुरूप , as खूब as the अंधेरा और कामुक  Black Swan , which are qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ) .
Nina is  अभिभूत by a अहसास of immense दबाव जब वो पाता herself स्पर्धा लिये the भाग , causing उसके to खोना उसके tenuous पकड़  on reality and descend into a living nightmare .
Aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting his viewings of a  उत्पादन of swan झील साथ an unrealized पटकथा परिचय understudies और the ख़्याल of होने haunted by a दोगुना  , similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers .
Aronofsky cites Fyodor  दोस्तोयेव्स्की 's `` the दोगुना `` as another  inspiration for the film .
The director also considered Black Swan a companion piece to his 2008 film The Wrestler , with both  films involving demanding प्रदर्शन लिये अलग kinds of आर्ट  .
He and Portman first discussed the project in 2000 , and after a  ब्रैड अनुलग्नक to सार्वभौमिक studios , ब्लैक swan थी उत्पादित in नई यॉर्क नगर in  2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures .
पोर्टमैन और kunis प्रशिक्षित in बैले लिये अनेक महीने prior to फिल्मांकन , और notable  figures from the ballet world helped with film production to shape the ballet presentation .
The film  premiered as the खोलने फिल्मी लिये the  67th Venice International Film Festival on September 1 , 2010 .
It had a limited release in the United  राज्य starting दिसम्बर 3 , 2010 और खोली देशभर on दिसम्बर  17 .
Black Swan received critical praise upon  इसके रिलीज , विशेषकर लिये पोर्टमैन 's प्रदर्शन और aronofsky 's दिशा , और थी a  significant box office success , grossing $ 329 million worldwide .
The film received five Academy Award nominations and  पोर्टमैन जीती the बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार लिये the फिल्मी , as खूब as अनेक अन्य बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार in अनेक  guilds and festivals , while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director .
In  जोड , the फिल्मी itself प्राप्त a नामांकन  for Best Picture .
The world’s first ice-calorimeter , used in the winter of 1782-83 , by Antoine Lavoisier and Pierre-Simon Laplace , to determine the heat involved in  विभिन्न रासायनिक परिवर्तन ; calculations जिससे यहूद आधारित on जोसेफ  Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat .
ये प्रयोग चिह्नित the  foundation of thermochemistry .
A  ऊष्मामापी ( इससे लैटिन calor , अर्थ ऊष्मा ) is an ऑब्जेक्ट प्रयुक्त लिये कैलोरीमिति , or the प्रक्रम  of measuring the heat of chemical reactions or physical changes as well as heat capacity .
Differential scanning  calorimeters , समतापी microcalorimeters , titration calorimeters  and accelerated rate calorimeters are among the most common types .
A simple calorimeter just consists of a  थर्मामीटर संलग्न to a मेटल संग्राहक पूरा of जल निलंबित  above a combustion chamber .
To  ढूँढें the enthalpy बदलें प्रति mole of a पदार्थ a in a  reaction between two substances A and B , the substances are added to a calorimeter and the initial and final temperatures ( before the reaction started and after it has finished ) are noted .
Multiplying the temperature change by the mass and  विशिष्ट ऊष्मा capacities of the substances देता a मान लिये the उर्जा दिए  off or absorbed during the reaction .
Dividing the  उर्जा बदलें by कैसा अनेक औज़ार of a यहूद उपस्थित देता इसके  enthalpy change of reaction .
This method is used  primarily in अकादमिक शिक्षण as it describes  the theory of calorimetry .
It does not account for the heat  घाटा through the संग्राहक or the ऊष्मा क्षमता of the  thermometer and container itself .
In addition , the object placed inside the calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their heat to the calorimeter and into the liquid ,  और the ऊष्मा अवशोषित by the ऊष्मामापी और the द्रव is बराबर to the ऊष्मा दिए बंद by the धातुओं  .
A  जोड़ी of ग्रीन  flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri , thongs , jandals , or a variety of other names  throughout the संसार ) हैं a प्रकार of open-toed चन्दन typically worn in कैज़ुअल परिस्थितियों , ऐसे  as outside or at the beach .
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot  by a y-shaped डोरी कि गुजरता between the पहला और दूसरी toes और around either पक्ष of the  foot .
They may also be held to the  पैर साथ a सिंगल डोरी over the सामने of the  foot rather than a thong .
The name `` flip-flop '' originated  क्युकी of the ध्वनि कि is बना by slapping between the एकमात्र of the पैर और the मंजिल  when walking .
इस स्टाइल of जूते रै महरूम worn by the लोगों of अनेक  cultures throughout the world , originating as early as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 B.C .
The modern flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri , which  became लोकप्रिय बाद संसार युद्ध ii जब सैनिको returning to the संयुक्त  States brought them back .
They became popular in casual settings  दौरान the 1960s , 1990s , और 2000s , और कुछ किस्में have भी मिला उनके  way into more formal attire , despite criticism .
The use of flip-flops can result in many pains and  चोटों , सहित टखने sprains और टूटा हड्डियों  .
Some individuals who walk for  long अवधि रपट पीड़ा in the  feet , ankles , and lower legs .
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often results in over-pronation  चोटों , caused by the पैर घुसते inwards further  than normal .
इस can सीसे  to flat feet and tendonitis .
Other injuries that may result are due to the  जूते 's open-toed प्रकृति , ऐसे as stubbed toes , कटौती , और bruises  .
डॉक्टर सुझाएँ खरीदना pricier चप्पल साथ thick-cushioned सोल्स , as खूब  as those that have a strap that is not canvas and that comes back almost to the ankle .
The owners of Hanjin Osaka , seen here transiting the Panama Canal in 2008 , declared  सामान्य औसत following an विस्फोट in the जलयान 's इंजन  room on .
The law of general average is a legal  principle of मेरीटाइम विधि according to जिससे सब पार्टियों in a समुद्र venture proportionally  share any losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency .
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea , crew members often have precious little time in  जिससे to determine precisely जिनकी कार्गो वे  are jettisoning .
Thus , to avoid quarrelling that could waste valuable time , there arose the equitable practice whereby all the merchants whose cargo landed safely would be called on to  योगदान a portion , आधारित upon a share or प्रतिशत , to the व्यापारी or व्यापारियों जिनकी goods था महरूम tossed overboard to avert  imminent peril .
जबकि सामान्य औसत traces इसके origins in प्राचीन मेरीटाइम विधि , स्टिल it  remains part of the admiralty law of most countries .
The first codification of general  औसत थी the यॉर्क antwerp नियम of 1890  .
American  कंपनियाँ स्वीकृत it  in 1949 .
General average requires three elements which are clearly stated by  mr. इंसाफ grier in बर्नार्ड v. आदमs:
`` 1st  .
A common danger : a danger in which  पोत , कार्गो और क्रू सब participate ; a खतरे निकट और जाहिर 'inevitable , ' मगर by voluntarily  incurring the loss of a portion of the whole to save the remainder . ''
`` 2nd . There must be a voluntary jettison , jactus , or casting away , of some portion of the joint  चिंता लिये the purpose of बचने इस निकट peril , periculi imminentis evitandi causa , or , in अन्य शब्द , a ट्रांसफ़र of the peril इससे  the whole to a particular portion of the whole . ''
``  3rd .
This attempt to avoid the imminent  आम peril जरूर be  successful '' .
Example Polish  कॉल लिये टीकाकरण विरूद्ध डिप्थीरिया  and Tetanus .
A vaccination schedule is a series of vaccinations , including the timing of all doses , which may be either  अनुशंसित or अनिवार्य , depending on the देश  of residence .
A  टीका is an antigenic तैयारी प्रयुक्त to उपज क्रियाशील प्रतिरक्षण to a  disease , in order to prevent or reduce the effects of infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen .
अनेक टीके आवश्यकता अनेक doses लिये अधिकतम प्रभावकारिता  , either to produce sufficient initial immune response or to boost response that fades over time .
For example  , टेटनस टीका boosters हैं प्रायः  recommended every 10 years .
Vaccine schedules are developed by  सरकारी एजेंसियों or physicians समूह to achieve अधिकतम प्रभावकारिता using जरूरी और अनुशंसित  vaccines for a locality while minimizing the number of health care system interactions .
Over the past  दो दशकों , the अनुशंसित टीकाकरण अनुसूची रै grown rapidly और become अधिक जटिल as अनेक नई टीके have महरूम  developed .
Some vaccines are recommended only in  निश्चित क्षेत्रों ( देशों , subnational क्षेत्रों , or at-risk populations ) जहाँ a बीमारी is  common .
लिये उदाहरण , पीला ज्वर टीकाकरण is on the दिनचर्या टीका  schedule of French Guiana , is recommended in certain regions of Brazil but in the United States is only given to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease .
In  विकासशील देशों , टीका सुझाव भी लो into खाता the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य परवाह  access , the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage .
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the World  स्वास्थ्य संगठन दिखाएँ a विकसित देश using a अनुसूची जिससे extends over the पहला पाँच सालो of a चाइल्ड 's जीवन और उपयोग टीके जिससे लागत  over $ 700 including administration costs while a developing country uses a schedule providing vaccines in the first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25 .
This difference is due to the lower cost of health care , the lower cost of many  टीके provided to विकासशील राष्ट्र , और कि अधिक महंगी टीके , प्रायः लिये कम आम रोगों , हैं नहीं  utilized .
In 1900 , the smallpox vaccine was the  तभी एक administered to children  .
By the early 1950s , children routinely  प्राप्त चार टीके , लिये सुरक्षा विरूद्ध ( डिप्थीरिया  , pertussis , tetanus , polio , and smallpox ) , and as many as five shots by two years of age .
Since the  mid-1980s , अनेक टीके have महरूम added  to the schedule .
,  the us centers लिये बीमारी कंट्रोल और रोकथाम  ( CDC ) now recommends vaccination against at least fourteen diseases .
By two years of age , U.S. children  प्राप्त as अनेक as 24 टीका injections , और might प्राप्त up to पाँच गोलियाँ दौरान एक  visit to the doctor .
The use of combination vaccine products means that , , the United Kingdom 's immunization program consists of 10 injections by  the आयु of दो , बल्कि than 25 if टीकाकरण  for each disease was given as a separate injection .
Two revellers dance  in the गलियों  .
The form of  नाचना is पुकारा `` wining  '' ( winding ) pronounced wine-ing
A Music Truck  entertains the भीड on  the streets .
Trucks are an integral  भाग of the गली परेड , featuring सजीव प्रदर्शन  or deejays
The  त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो कार्निवल is an सालाना इवेंट आयोजित on the सोमवार और मंगलवार पहले राख बुधवार , और is खूब  known for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations .
Carnival  in त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो is the सबसे significant इवेंट on the आइलैंड्स ' सांस्कृतिक  and tourism calendar , with numerous cultural events running in the lead up to the street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday .
It is said that if the islanders are not  celebrating it , तब वे हैं तैयारी लिये it , जबकि reminiscing परिचय the  past year 's festival .
the दिल of the musical जश्न रै महरूम कैलिप्सो ; recently सोका रै replaced  calypso as the most celebrated type of music .
Costumes , stickfighting and limbo competitions are also  महत्वपूर्ण components of the पर्व  .
Carnival as it is  मनाये in त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो is भी मनाये in शहरों  worldwide .
These including Toronto 's Caribana ,  मियामी 's मियामी कार्निवल , ह्यूस्टन carifest , लंदन 's नॉटिंग हिल कार्निवल as खूब as नई  York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few .
Carnival was created when West African  स्लेव mimicked उनके फ्रेंच स्वामी जो जहाँ ज्ञात  for their lavish costumes balls .
हराम to partake in ये festivities और confined to उनके quarters , स्लेव  combined elements from their own cultures to their master 's fete .
Hence the creation of characters such as Jab Jab or Jab Molassie ( Devils ) , Midnight Robbers ,  imps , lagahroo , soucouyant , la diablesse और  Demons .
With the abolition  of गुलामी in 1838 , freed africans took उनके संस्करण of कार्निवल to the गलियों through अभिव्यक्ति  of drums , riddim sections like tamboo bamboo and as each new immigrant population entered Trinidad , Carnival evolved into what we know today .
The city of Chicago , Illinois held a nonpartisan mayoral  चुनाव on मंगलवार , फ़रवरी 22 , 2011  .
Incumbent  महापौर रिचर्ड M. डाले , a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी जो था महरूम in दफ्तर चूंकि  1989 , did not seek a seventh term as mayor .
Candidates needed to collect 12,500  याचिका हस्ताक्षर by नवम्बर 22 ,  2010 to qualify for a place on the ballot .
April  5 , 2011 थी अनुसूचित to  be a runoff election date if no candidate received an absolute majority .
rahm emanuel जीती the रेस लिये  mayor with more than 55 % of the vote .
He was  उदघाटन on may 16 ,  2011 .
`` उत्तेजित up kicks '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी  indie pop band Foster the People .
It was released as the group 's debut single in September 2010 , and the following year  थी शामिल on उनके ep फोस्टर the लोगों और उनके डेब्यू एल्बम torches  .
`` Pumped Up Kicks ''  became the समूह 's भेदन  hit and was one of the most popular songs of 2011 .
The song was written and recorded by  frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर जबकि he थी working as a वाणिज्यिक  jingle writer .
Contrasting with the upbeat musical composition  , the गीत describe the homicidal  thoughts of a troubled youth .
The track received considerable  ध्यान बाद it थी posted ऑनलाइन in 2010 as a फ़्री डाउनलोड , और it helped the समूह गार्नर a multi-album  record deal with Columbia Records imprint Startime International .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' proved to be a sleeper hit ; in 2011 , after receiving significant airplay on modern rock stations ,  the सोंग crossed-over onto  contemporary hit radio stations .
The song spent eight consecutive weeks at number three on the Billboard Hot 100 chart  in the संयुक्त राज्य , बनाना it the पहला बिलबोर्ड वैकल्पिक गीतों number-one सिंगल to क्रैक the u.S.  top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009 .
The  सोंग थी widely praised by आलोचकों ,  and it has been licensed for use in a wide range of popular media since its release .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' received a Grammy Award  नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन पॉप duo/group प्रदर्शन .
The  राज्य मेला of वेस्ट वर्जिनिया  is an annual state fair for West Virginia .
It is held annually in mid-August on the State Fairgrounds in  fairlea , निकट lewisburg , वेस्ट वर्जिनिया in the  southeastern part of the state .
The State Fairgrounds consists of a large open field for carnivals  और प्रदर्शनियों , a घोड़ा track , grandstands  , and several exhibition buildings .
Free parking is provided  सटा to the fairgrounds और , जबतक 2006 , फ़्री कैंप  was also available in a large field with running-water toilets and showers , but no hookups .
campers हैं अभी चार्ज  a small fee .
the श्वेत हाउस , the अध्यक्ष 's आधिकारिक  residence and center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution , the President of the United  राज्य is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी  of the United States .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole  , the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य  by influence and recognition .
The  अध्यक्ष is भी the commander-in-chief  of the United States Armed Forces .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives  चाहिए the चुनावी कॉलेज असफल to पुरस्कार an निरपेक्ष बहुमत  of votes to any person ) .
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States  संविधान in 1951 , no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice  , and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death ,  इस्तीफा , or हटाना इससे दफ्तर of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष  , the Vice President assumes the office .
The President must be at least 35  सालो of आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' नागरिक  of the United States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of  the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , जिससे took प्रभाव on कूच  4 , 1789 .
For American leaders before  इस अनुसमर्थन , देखिए अध्यक्ष of the महाद्वीपीय  Congress .
the सूची करता नहीं शामिल कोई एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the  Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as  ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें और is गिने क्रमबद्धता as दोनो the  22nd and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in  दफ्तर of प्राकृतिक कल्याणकारी ( विलियम हेनरी हैरिसन , zachary टेलर , वारेन G. हार्डिंग , और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट  ) , four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln , James A. Garfield , William McKinley , and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , the पहला अध्यक्ष , थी उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a  unanimous vote of the Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841 ,  और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over  twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two  शर्तें , और a संवैधानिक amendment , affecting राष्ट्रपतियों बाद हैरी ट्रूमैन , थी passed to सीमा  the number of times an individual can be elected president .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president , was the first to be elected by men of all  वर्ग in 1828 बाद सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners इससे  voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was the first elected  बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920  .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams , Rutherford B. Hayes ,  बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – जो खोया the लोकप्रिय vote  but assumed office .
John  F. कैनेडी रै महरूम the तभी अध्यक्ष  of Roman Catholic faith , and the current president , Barack Obama , is the first president of African descent .
``  लोम्बार्डी ट्रॉफी '' redirects  here .
For  the पुरस्कार awarded annually to the बेहतरीन  college football lineman or linebacker , see Lombardi Award .
The Vince Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded each year to the  जीतना टोली of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's चैंपियनशिप  game , the Super Bowl .
the ट्रॉफी is नामित in सम्मान  of legendary NFL coach Vince Lombardi .
इस is a सूची of टेबल of the सत्यापित oldest  people in the world in ordinal rank , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her  अर्जी रै महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि specifically सौदे  in longevity research , such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The  longest unambiguously प्रलेखित इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne calment of  France ( 1875–1997 ) , who died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She met Vincent van  gogh जब वो थी 12  or 13 .
This led to news media  ध्यान in 1985 , बाद  Calment turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found  दस्तावेज़ीकरण लिये calment 's आयु , परे  any reasonable question , in the records of her native city , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for  कोई अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये verifying  the ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male  supercentenarians is कि of jiroemon किमुरा , जो फिलहाल जीवनदान  in Japan and is age as of .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States , on 17 December 2012 , Kimura , born 19 April 1897 , is the oldest  जीना व्यक्ति in the संसार जिनकी आयु can be प्रलेखित  .
He has also been the oldest  जीना man चूंकि the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning on 14 अप्रैल  2011 .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013 , the oldest living woman  रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa , भी इससे जापानी , born on 5  March 1898 .
The People 's Court is an American arbitration-based  वास्तविकता अदालत दिखाएँ , फिलहाल presided over by रिटायर्ड फ्लोरिडा राज्य सर्किट अदालत न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian , in  which small claims disputes are handled .
The People 's Court is the  पहला अदालत दिखाएँ to उपयोग बाइंडिंग मध्यस्थता , introducing  the format into the genre in 1981 .
The system has  महरूम duplicated by सबसे of the दिखाएँ 's  successors in the judicial genre .
Moreover , The  लोगों 's अदालत is the पहला लोकप्रिय , long-running  reality in the judicial genre .
It was preceded only by a few short-lived realities in the  विधा ; ये short-lived पूर्ववर्तियों यहूद तभी loosely सम्बन्धित to न्यायिक कार्यवाही , मगर लिये एक : पैरोल ( 1959 ) took  footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings .
Prior to The People 's Court  , the विशाल बहुमत of tv courtroom shows प्रयुक्त अभिनेताओं ,  and recreated or fictional cases ( as did radio before that ) .
among उदाहरण of ये प्रकार of अदालत shows शामिल  Famous Jury Trials and Your Witness .
The People  's अदालत रै था दो चिहृ  lives .
The show 's first life was presided over solely by former Los  एंजिल्स काउंटी श्रेष्ठ अदालत न्यायधीश जोसेफ wapner  .
His tenure lasted from the show 's debut on  सितंबर 14 , 1981 , जबतक may 21 , 1993  , when the show was cancelled due to low ratings .
This left the show with a total of 2,484  1⁄2-hour एपीसोड और 12 सीज़न  .
The show was  taped in लॉस एंजिल्स दौरान इसके पहला  life .
After  होने रद्द , reruns aired जबतक  September 9 , 1994 .
On September 8 , 1997 , after being out of production for four  सालो , the लोगों 's अदालत थी revived लिये a दूसरी जीवन in first-run अनुप्रयोग as  a 60-minute program .
Former lawyer and Mayor of New York Ed Koch was chosen as arbiter , which he maintained for 2 seasons from the 1997–98  ऋतु through the 1998–99 ऋतु ( the उपस्थित जीवन 's 2nd ऋतु और overall दिखाएँ 's 14th )  .
By the 1999–00 season , husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over Judge  जुडी ) और पूर्व नई यॉर्क राज्य परम् अदालत न्यायधीश  Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch .
Sheindlin lasted one and a half seasons as he was  replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2000–01 ऋतु ( उपस्थित  life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ) .
Beginning in spring 2001 , Florida judge Marilyn Milian  took over the लोगों 's अदालत और रै presided over the दिखाएँ कभी  since .
Once Milian  completes the 2012–13 ऋतु , वो होगा have परोसा as longest arbiter over the  series with 12 and a half seasons .
As of the  उपस्थित , however  , her years on the program tie Wapner at 12 seasons .
In the 2009-10 television season , The People 's Courts  2nd/present जीवन outlasted इसके पहला जब it पहुँचे 13  seasons .
While the show taped in New York City for  the पहला 15 सीज़न of इसके दूसरी जीवन , it अभी टेपों in stamford  , Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season .
On September 3 , 2012 , The People 's  अदालत 's 2nd/present जीवन डाला इसके 16th ऋतु ( 28th  overall season ) .
साथ 28 कुल सीज़न , the लोगों 's अदालत बाँधने as the 2nd longest-running courtroom  program behind the ongoing Divorce Court at 33 seasons ( from its 3 combined lives ) .
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho :  wo'tééneihí ' ) is a राज्य in the पश्चिमी  United States .
It  became the 45th राज्य admitted to the  Union on January 4 , 1896 .
Utah is the 13th-largest , the 34th-most populous , and  the 10th-least-densely आबादी of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य  .
लगभग 80 % of यूटा 's 2,817,222 लोगों सजीव साथ the wasatch सामने , centering on नमक झील नगर , leaving विशाल expanses of the राज्य nearly uninhabited और बनाना the जनसांख्यिकी the छठे सबसे urbanized in the u.S.  Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east , Wyoming on the northeast , Idaho on the north , Arizona on the south , and Nevada on the west .
It also touches a  कोने of नई मैक्सिको on the  southeast .
Utah is  the सबसे religiously समरूप  state in the Union .
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ of  latter-day संतो or lds ( mormons ) , जिससे greatly प्रभाव यूटा संस्कृति और रोज़ जीवन  .
The  संसार मुख्यालय of the गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day  Saints ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital .
The state is a center of transportation , education , information  प्रौद्योगिकी और शोध , सरकारी सेवाएं , खनन , और a प्रमुख पर्यटक गंतव्य लिये  outdoor recreation .
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates , Utah is  the पांचवां fastest-growing राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य as of 2012  .
St. George , was the fastest–growing  महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 2000  to 2005 .
A 2012 Gallup national survey found Utah overall to be the `` best state to live in '' based on 13  forward-looking माप सहित विभिन्न आर्थिक ,  lifestyle , and health-related outlook metrics .
Coldwater is a  छोटी कस्बा in टेट काउंटी  , Mississippi .
It is  in the मेम्फिस महानगर  Area .
The population was  1,674 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी  .
The hard palate is a thin  आड़ा बोनी थाली of the कपाल  , located in the roof of the mouth .
it spans the मेहराब formed  by the upper teeth .
It is formed by the palatine process of the  maxilla और आड़ा थाली of palatine अस्थि  .
it फ़ॉर्म a विभाजन  between the nasal passages and the mouth .
Also on the anterior portion of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae which are  the irregular ridges in the श्लेष्मक झिल्ली कि सहायता सुकर the  movement of food backwards towards the pharynx .
This partition is continued  deeper into the मुँह by a मांसल  extension called the soft palate .
पूरा नियत of scrolls , constituting  the entire Tanakh .
The  tanakh ( , or ; भी tenakh , tenak , tanach ) is a नाम  used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
the tanakh is भी ज्ञात as  the Masoretic Text or the Miqra .
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional  subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '' , भी ज्ञात as the पाँच किताबे of मूसा ) , nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) और ketuvim  ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ) , meaning `` that which is read ''  , is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी पद लिये the tanakh .
The books of the  tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying मौखिक परंपरा passed  on by each generation , called the Oral Torah .
गम्भीरता नाका in  Germany
Driving under the influence ( DUI ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI ) , drunken driving , drunk driving , drink driving , operating under the influence , drinking  और ड्राइविंग , or impaired ड्राइविंग is the अपराधों of ड्राइविंग a मोटर गाडी साथ रक्त स्तर of दारू in excess of a विधिक सीमा ( `` रक्त दारू सामग्री '' , or `` bac  '' ) .
Similar regulations  कवर ड्राइविंग or ऑपरेटिंग निश्चित प्रकार of मशीनरी जबकि प्रभावित by पीने दारू or लेने  other drugs , including , but not limited to prescription drugs .
इस is a दण्ड  offense in most nations .
Convictions do not necessarily involve  वास्तविक ड्राइविंग of the गाडी .
In most jurisdictions a  मापन ऐसे as a रक्त दारू सामग्री ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर , ऐसे  as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the offense , with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol .
In some jurisdictions , there is  an क्रोधित श्रेणी of the ठोकर  at a higher level e.g . 0.12 % .
In most countries , anyone who is convicted of injuring or killing someone  जबकि अंतर्गत the influence of दारू or दवाएँ can be heavily fined , as in फ़्रांस , in जोड to होने दिए a  lengthy prison sentence .
कुछ कार्य have उनके अपना नियम और bac हद , लिये उदाहरण वाणिज्यिक पायलट , और  the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % limit for train crew .
Some  jurisdictions have अनेक स्तर of bac ; लिये उदाहरण , the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै  a 0.08 % BAC limit , which is lowered to 0.04 % if the operator holds a commercial driver 's license .
The California BAC limit is 0.01 % for those younger  than 21 सालो of आयु और those on परिवीक्षा लिये a  previous DUI conviction .
Some large corporations have their own rules ; Union Pacific  रेलरोड रै उनके अपना bac सीमा of 0.02 % कि , if violated दौरान a यादृच्छिक परीक्षण or a for-cause परीक्षण — लिये उदाहरण , बाद a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना — can परिणाम  in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire .
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted truth in  sentencing कानून कि enforce सख्त दिशानिर्देश on sentencing , differing इससे पिछला अभ्यास जहाँ थाना  time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued .
Some jurisdictions have  न्यायिक दिशानिर्देश requiring a अनिवार्य  minimum sentence .
Penalties for DUI charges range from expensive  शुल्क to forfetiruree of अपना अनुज्ञा प्लेटों और in कुछ  serious circumstances , your vehicle .
A  नशे ड्राइविंग  simulator in Montréal , Canada
The specific criminal offense may be  पुकारा , depending on the क्षेत्राधिकार , ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the influence [ of दारू or अन्य दवाएँ ] ( dui ) , ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत तीव्र influence ( duii ) , ड्राइविंग  while intoxicated ( DWI ) , operating under the influence ( OUI ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ) , operating a motor vehicle while intoxicated ( OMVI ) , driving under the combined influence of alcohol and/or other drugs , driving under the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ] .
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling , boating , piloting aircraft , use of motile farm equipment such as tractors and combines ,  सवारी घोड़े or ड्राइविंग a horse-drawn गाडी , or bicycling , संभवतः साथ  different BAC level than driving .
In some jurisdictions there are separate charges depending on the vehicle used , such as  bwi ( bicycling जबकि intoxicated ) , जिससे may carry a हल्का  sentence .
in the संयुक्त राज्य , लोकल विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसियों बना 1,467,300 रखवाले देशभर  for driving under the influence of alcohol in 1996 , compared to 1.9 million such arrests during the peak year in 1983 .
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI offenders were in prison or  कारावास , bas इससे 593,000 in 1990 और up इससे 270,100 in  1986 .

Law  प्रवर्तन in the संयुक्त राज्य is एक of तीन प्रमुख components of the दण्ड इंसाफ प्रणाली of the संयुक्त  States , along with courts and corrections .
हालांकि वहीँ exists an अंतर्निहित interrelatedness between the अलग समूह कि  make up the criminal justice system based on their crime deterrence purpose , each component operates independently from one another .
However , the judiciary is vested with the power to make legal  determinations regarding the conduct of the अन्य दो components  .
Apart from maintaining order and service functions  , the purpose of policing is the छानबीन of suspected दण्ड कार्यकलाप और the referral of the परिणाम of investigations और of  suspected criminals to the courts .
Law enforcement , to  varying डिग्री at अलग स्तर of सरकारी और in अलग एजेंसियों , is भी commonly चार्ज साथ the जिम्मेदारियों of deterring दण्ड  activity and of preventing the successful commission of crimes in progress ; the service and enforcement of warrants , writs and other orders of the courts .
Law enforcement agencies are also involved in providing first response to emergencies and other threats to public safety ; the protection of certain public facilities and infrastructure  ; the मेंटेनेंस of पब्लिक अनुक्रम ; the सुरक्षा of पब्लिक officials ; और the आपरेशन of कुछ correctional सुविधाएं  ( usually at the local level ) .
Elmer Figueroa Arce (  born जून 28 , 1968 ) , बेहतरीन ज्ञात अंतर्गत the स्टेज नाम chayanne  , is a Puerto Rican Latin pop singer and actor .
As a solo artist ,  chayanne रै released  21 solo albums and sold over 15 million albums worldwide .
``  संसार युद्ध हल्क '' is a कॉमिक किताब क्रॉसओवर कथानक कि भागा through a स्वः titled सीमित  series and various other titles published by Marvel Comics in 2007 , featuring the Hulk .
The series consists of five main issues titled World War Hulk , with Greg Pak as writer and John Romita , Jr. as penciller , and  तीन अन्य सीमित श्रेणी : संसार युद्ध हल्क : सामने लकीर , संसार युद्ध हल्क : गामा corps , और संसार युद्ध हल्क :  X-Men .
It also ran through  अनेक अन्य आश्चर्य कॉमिक्स  series .
The plot is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into  स्पेस by the illuminati और a जीवन मॉडल decoy of उपनाम फ़्यूरी , the हल्क 's subsequent निर्वासन  seen in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati .
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; May 26 , 1907 – June 11 , 1979 ) , better known by  उसके स्टेज नाम जॉन वेन , थी  an American film actor , director and producer .
An Academy Award -winner ,  वेन थी among the शीर्ष बक्सा दफ्तर draws लिये तीन  decades , and was named the all-time top money-making star .
An enduring American icon , he epitomized  खुरदरा मर्दानगी और is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके demeanor , सहित  his distinctive calm voice , walk , and height .
Wayne was born in Winterset ,  आयोवा लकिन उसके परिवार relocated to the वृहद  Los Angeles area when he was four years old .
He found work at local  फिल्मी studios जब he खोया उसके फ़ुटबॉल स्कॉलरशिप  to USC as a result of a bodysurfing accident .
Initially working for the Fox Film Corporation ,  he ज़्यादातर appeared in छोटी बिट भाग  .
उसके पहला अग्रणी भूमिका आए in the वाइडस्क्रीन एपिक the बिग ट्रेल ( 1930 ) , जिससे led  to leading roles in numerous films throughout the 1930s , many of them in the western genre .
His career rose to  further हाइट्स in 1939 , साथ जॉन घाट 's stagecoach  making him an instant superstar .
Wayne would go on to star in 142 pictures , primarily  typecast in पश्चिमी  films .
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ) , which follows him as an  irish-american boxer और उसके प्रेम affair साथ a fiery spinster निभाई by maureen o'hara ; the searchers ( 1956 ) , in जिससे he plays a सिविल युद्ध दिग्गज जो seeks आउट उसके abducted भांजी ; रिओ ब्रावो ( 1959 ) , playing a शेरिफ  with Dean Martin ; True Grit ( 1969 ) , playing a humorous U.S . Marshal who sets out to avenge a man 's death in the role that won Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ) , his final screen performance in which he plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer .
Wayne moved to Orange County  , कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the 1960s , और थी a prominent रिपब्लिकन in हॉलीवुड  , supporting anti-communist positions .
He  died of पेट कर्कट  in 1979 .
In June 1999 , the American Film Institute  नामित वेन 13th among the महानतम पुरूष स्क्रीन  Legends of All Time .
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February  1564 – 8 जनवरी 1642 ) , थी an इतालवी physicist , गणितज्ञ , astronomer , और पारस जो निभाई a प्रमुख भूमिका  in the Scientific Revolution .
His achievements include improvements to the  दूरदर्शी और consequent खगोलीय observations  and support for Copernicanism .
Galileo has been called the `` father of modern observational astronomy  `` , the `` पिता of आधुनिक भौतिकी `` , the `` पिता of विज्ञान '' , और `` the पिता  of Modern Science '' .
His contributions to observational astronomy include the telescopic  पुष्टि of the phases of शुक्र , the डिस्कवरी of the चार largest satellites of बृहस्पति ( नामित the galilean moons in उसके  honour ) , and the observation and analysis of sunspots .
Galileo also worked  in लागू विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी , inventing  an improved military compass and other instruments .
Galileo 's  championing of heliocentrism थी विवादास्पद भीतर उसके आजीवन , जब सबसे  subscribed to either geocentrism or the Tychonic system .
He met with opposition from astronomers , who  doubted heliocentrism due to the अनुपस्थिति of an observed  stellar parallax .
The matter was investigated by the Roman Inquisition in 1615  , और वे concluded कि it could be समर्थित as तभी a सम्भावना  , not an established fact .
Galileo later defended his views in  संवाद concerning the दो मुख्य संसार प्रणालियों , जिससे appeared to आक्रमण पोप शहरी viii और यूँ alienated उसे और the jesuits  , who had both supported Galileo up until this point .
he थी आजमाया by the inquisition , मिला `` ओजस्वी suspect of heresy ''  , forced to recant , and spent the rest of his life under house arrest .
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he wrote one of his  finest works , दो नई sciences , in जिससे he summarised the कार्य he था किया कुछ चालीस सालो पहले ,  on the two sciences now called kinematics and strength of materials .
