प्रोटोटाइप oled lighting फलक  developed by Lumiotec
Demonstration  of a लचीली oled  device
An OLED ( organic light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode ( LED ) in which the emissive  electroluminescent परत is a फिल्मी of सशुल्क यौगिक जिससे emits लाइट in  response to an electric current .
This  परत of सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर  is situated between two electrodes .
Generally , at  तनिक एक of ये electrodes  is transparent .
oleds हैं प्रयुक्त to बनाएँ डिजिटल प्रदर्शक in डिवाइस ऐसे as टेलीविज़न screens , कंप्यूटर  monitors , portable systems such as mobile phones , handheld games consoles and PDAs .
A major area of research is the  विकास of श्वेत oled डिवाइस लिये उपयोग in solid-state  lighting applications .
There are two  प्रमुख परिवारों of oleds : those आधारित on छोटी अणुओं और those  employing polymers .
Adding mobile ions to an OLED creates a light-emitting  electrochemical कोशिका or लैक , जिससे रै  a slightly different mode of operation .
OLED displays  can उपयोग either passive-matrix (  PMOLED ) or active-matrix addressing schemes .
Active-matrix OLEDs ( AMOLED ) require a  thin-film ट्रांजिस्टर backplane to स्विच प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत  pixel on or off , but allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes .
An OLED display works  बगैर a backlight  .
Thus , it can display deep black levels and  can be thinner और हल्का than a द्रव क्रिस्टल  display ( LCD ) .
In low ambient light conditions such as a dark room an OLED screen can  achieve a उच्चतर कंट्रास्ट अनुपात than an एलसीडी , whether the एलसीडी उपयोग ठंडा कैथोड  fluorescent lamps or LED backlight .
A carton  और a कांच of eggnog इससे मॉन्ट्रियल , कनाडा , प्रर्दशित इसके फ्रेंच मुखाग्र ( अंग्रेज़ी रिवर्स ) और the  French term lait de poule ( literally , `` hen 's milk '' )
Eggnog , or egg nog , is a sweetened dairy -based beverage  traditionally बना साथ मिल्क and/or मलाई , शुगर , और whipped अंडे  ( which gives it a frothy texture ) .
Brandy , rum , whisky , bourbon , vodka , or a combination  of liquors हैं प्रायः added  .
The finished serving is often garnished  साथ a sprinkling of मैदान दालचीनी or जायफल  .
It was also known  as the अंडा मिल्क  punch .
Eggnog is a popular drink throughout  the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा , और is प्रायः संबद्ध  with Christmas .
Eggnog may be  added as a flavoring  to food or drinks such as coffee and tea .
Eggnog as a custard can  भी be प्रयुक्त as an बर्फ  cream base .
A pasty ( , ) , ( sometimes known in Britain as a Cornish pasty , and in the United States as a pastie or  अंग्रेजों pasty ) is a baked पेस्ट्री , a परंपरागत किस्में of जिससे is विशेषकर संबद्ध साथ कॉर्नवॉल , the westernmost  county in England .
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of meat and vegetables , without meat in vegetarian  संस्करण , on a चपटा पेस्ट्री वृत्त और फोल्डिंग it to रैप the भरना , crimping  the edge to form a seal .
After baking , the result is a  उठाया semicircular  comestible .
The traditional Cornish pasty , which has Protected Geographical  indication ( pgi ) औकात in यूरोपीय , is भर साथ बीफ , sliced or diced आलू , swede ( भी ज्ञात as a पीला शलजम or rutabaga – referred to in कॉर्नवॉल as शलजम ) और प्याज  , seasoned with salt and pepper , and is baked .
Today , the pasty is the food most  संबद्ध साथ कॉर्नवॉल , it is regarded as the नेशनल डिश , और  it accounts for 6 % of the Cornish food economy .
Pasties with  अनेक अलग fillings हैं बना ; कुछ दुकानें specialise in selling  all sorts of pasties .
The origins of the pasty are  unclear , हालांकि वहीँ हैं अनेक सन्दर्भ to उन्हें throughout  historical documents and fiction .
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the spread  of cornish खनिक , और विसंगतियाँ can be मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , the संयुक्त राज्य , मैक्सिको  and elsewhere .
The ( ortho- )  सहानुभूतिपूर्ण बेचैन प्रणाली ( sns ) is एक of तीन प्रमुख भाग of the autonomic बेचैन प्रणाली : the अन्य होने the  enteric and parasympathetic systems .
Its general action is to mobilize the body 's nervous system  fight-or-flight जवाब  .
It is ,  however , constantly क्रियाशील at a मौलिक  level to maintain homeostasis .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices , such  as मोबाईल फोन , डिजिटल कैमरे  , GPS navigation devices , and tablet computers .
The Secure Digital  मानक is कायम by the sd कार्ड संघ  ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands  आरपार दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी और अधिक  than 8,000 models .
The Secure Digital format  शामिल चार कार्ड परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in तीन  different form factors .
The four families are the original  standard-capacity ( sdsc ) , the high-capacity ( sdhc ) , the extended-capacity (  SDXC ) , and the SDIO , which combines input/output functions with data storage .
The three form factors are the original size , the ``  मिनी '' आकार , और the `` सूक्ष्म '' आकार ( देखिए उदाहरण  ) .
There are many combinations  of रूप कारकों और यंत्र परिवारों  .
electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी कार्ड  in a host device built to hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the  specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept पुरानी sd ताश ,  but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer  वृहद क्षमता than the मेजबान यंत्र  can handle .
A newer card may  उपयोग a संचिका प्रणाली the मेजबान यंत्र  can not navigate .
Use of an SDIO card requires  the मेजबान यंत्र be designed लिये the input/output  functions the card provides .
The  संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला starting साथ  the SDHC family .
Some  विक्रेता उत्पादित sdsc ताश ऊपर 1 gb पहले the sda था  standardized a method of doing so .
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to  enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ और assure  users of compatibility .
The following  is a सूची of आलोचकों  of the New Deal .
Daniel Lawrence Whitney (  born फ़रवरी 17 , 1963 ) बेहतरीन ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम और अक्षर लैरी the केबल guy , is  an American stand-up comedian , actor , country music artist , voice actor , and former radio personality .
He was one of the members of the Blue Collar Comedy Tour , a comedy troupe which included Bill Engvall , Ron  श्वेत , और जेफ़ foxworthy ( साथ जिसको he रै स्ट्रक्चर on ब्लू कॉलर tv  ) .
Whitney has  released सात कॉमेडी एल्बम , of जिससे तीन have महरूम  certified gold by the RIAA for shipments of 500,000 copies .
In addition , he has starred in three Blue Collar Comedy Tour-related movies , as well as in the films  लैरी the केबल guy : स्वास्थ्य इंस्पेक्टर , डेल्टा तमाशा , और witless सुरक्षा , as खूब as voicing  Mater in the Cars franchise .
Whitney 's catchphrase : ``  git-r-done ! '' is भी the शीर्षक  of his book .
On January 26 , 2010 , the TV channel History announced that it was ordering a series starring Whitney called Only in America with Larry  the केबल guy , in जिससे he होता explore the देश और immerse खुद in अलग  lifestyles , jobs , and hobbies .
The first episode  of the श्रेणी aired on फ़रवरी 8 ,  2011 .
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible for intestinal  अवशोषण of कैल्सियम और  phosphate .
In humans , the most  महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन d हैं  vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 )  हैं अद्वितीय as वे constitute कया we जान as विटामिन d और can  be ingested from the diet and/or supplements .
The body can also  synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त (  hence its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin , it is not actually an  अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव , as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त  amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight .
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize  विटामिन d efficiently और जरूर प्राप्त it in  their diet . )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of  यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient  quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly called vitamins ,  विटामिन d थी खोजा in an प्रयत्न to ढूँढें the dietary पदार्थ कि थी lacking in a बीमारी , namely , rickets , the  childhood form of osteomalacia .
Additionally ,  जैसे अन्य यौगिकों पुकारा विटामिन , in the विकसित संसार विटामिन d is added  to staple foods , such as milk , to avoid disease due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous synthesis from  एक्सपोज़र to धूप as खूब as सेवन इससे the आहार , और it is believed कि संश्लेषण may योगदान  generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but , because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from  धूप , no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान  , USA , for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference  intakes लिये विटामिन d assume कि no संश्लेषण occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन  D is from their diet , although that will rarely occur in practice .
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol , which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol ,  or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( oh ) d ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट विटामिन d metabolite कि is measured in सीरम  to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol , the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood ,  regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream और promoting the स्वस्थ  growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol  बाहर of the गुर्दे लिये अन्य उद्देश्य  , such as the proliferation , differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation .
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets , the evidence  लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of विटामिन d supplementation in the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी  is inconsistent .
The best evidence of  लाभ is लिये अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी in मृत्यु  in elderly women .
मानक रूप of the  periodic table .
The colors represent  अलग श्रेणी of तत्व समझाया नीचे  .
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements ,  व्यवस्थित on the आधार of उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ , इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations , और पुनरावर्ती  chemical properties .
Elements are  प्रस्तुत in अनुक्रम of increasing परमाणु  number ( number of protons ) .
The standard form of  तालिका comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड or प्रमुख देह of तत्व , positioned  above a smaller double row of elements .
The  तालिका can भी be deconstructed into चार आयताकार ब्लॉक : the s-block to the बाएँ , the p-block to the सही , the d-block  in the middle , and the f-block below that .
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s- ,  d- , और p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह , साथ कुछ of ये having names ऐसे as  the halogens or the noble gases .
चूंकि , by परिभाषा , a आवधिक तालिका incorporates पुनरावर्ती रुझान , कोई ऐसे तालिका  can be used to derive relationships between the properties of the elements and predict the properties of new , yet to be discovered or synthesized , elements .
As a  परिणाम , a आवधिक table—whether in the मानक रूप or कुछ अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क  for analyzing chemical behavior , and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
Although precursors exist , Dmitri  mendeleev is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन , in 1869 , of the पहला widely  recognized periodic table .
He  विकसित उसके तालिका to illustrate आवधिक  trends in the properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some  गुण of then-unknown तत्व कि होता be अपेक्षित to भरण  gaps in this table .
Most of his predictions were proved correct when  the तत्व in सवाल यहूद subsequently खोजा .
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and refined with the discovery or synthesis of further new  तत्व और the विकास of नई सैद्धांतिक मॉडल to बताइये रासायनिक बर्ताव  .
All elements  इससे परमाणु संख्याएँ 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium  ) have been discovered or synthesized .
The elements from 1 to  98 ( californium ) have महरूम मिला to मौजूद naturally , हालांकि  some are found only in trace amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories .
The elements after 98 have only  महरूम synthesized in laboratories  .
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued , with  the सवाल of कैसा the आवधिक तालिका may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate कोई ऐसे  additions being a matter of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic  radionuclides of naturally occurring  elements have also been produced in laboratories .
Minimum wage by U.S.  राज्य और u.S. territory ( अमरीकी समोआ , गुआम ,  Puerto Rico , Virgin Islands ) , as of Jan. 1 , 2013 .
in the संयुक्त राज्य , मजदूर हैं  generally entitled to be paid no less than the statutory minimum wage .
The federal government mandates a nationwide minimum wage level of $ 7.25 per  घंटा , जबकि कुछ राज्य और municipalities have नियत न्यूनतम मजदूरी स्तर उच्चतर than the संघीय स्तर , साथ the उच्चतम  state minimum wage being $ 9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013 .
Among those paid by the hour in 2012 , 1.6  लाख यहूद reported as कमाई exactly  the prevailing federal minimum wage .
परिचय 2.0 लाख यहूद reported  as earning wages below the minimum .
Together , these 3.6 million workers with wages at or  नीचे the न्यूनतम बना up 4.7 प्रतिशत of सब hourly-paid मजदूर  .
A selection of  bourbons और टेनेसी whiskeys offered  at a liquor store in Decatur , Georgia
Evan  विलियम्स bourbon  whiskey
Bourbon whiskey is a type of American whiskey –  a barrel-aged आसुत स्पिरिट बना primarily  from corn .
The name of the spirit derives from its historical  संघ साथ an क्षेत्रफल ज्ञात as बूढ़ा bourbon , around कया is अभी bourbon काउंटी , केंटकी ( जिससे , in  turn , was named after the French House of Bourbon royal family ) .
It has been produced  चूंकि the 18th सदी  .
While it may be made anywhere in the United States , it is strongly associated with the  अमरीकी दक्षिण in सामान्य , और केंटकी  in particular .
The Mona Lisa ( La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is a half-length portrait of a woman by the Italian artist Leonardo da Vinci , which has been acclaimed as `` the best known  , the सबसे visited , the सबसे लिखा परिचय , the सबसे सुंग परिचय , the सबसे parodied कार्य of आर्ट in the  world . ''
The painting , thought to be a  पोर्ट्रेट of लिसा gherardini , the बीवी of francesco डेल giocondo , is in आयल  on a poplar panel , and is believed to have been painted between 1503 and 1506 .
It was acquired by King Francis I of  फ़्रांस और is अभी the प्रॉपर्टी of the फ्रेंच गणतंत्र , on स्थाई  display at the Musée du Louvre in Paris since 1797 .
The ambiguity of the subject 's expression , which is frequently described as enigmatic , the monumentality  of the संयोजन , the हल्का मॉडलिंग of फ़ॉर्म और the वायुमंडलीय illusionism यहूद अनोखा qualities कि have contributed to the continuing  fascination and study of the work .
Robert  एलन पामर ( 19 जनवरी 1949 – 26  September 2003 ) , was an English singer-songwriter and musician .
He was known for his distinctive voice and  the eclectic मिक्सर of musical शैलियाँ on उसके एल्बम , combining आत्मा  , jazz , rock , pop , reggae and blues .
He found success both in his solo career and in  the musical अधिनियम the शक्ति स्टेशन , और था शीर्ष 10 गीतों in दोनो the  UK and the US .
उसके iconic म्यूज़िक वीडियो by टेरेंस डोनोवन लिये the हिट्स `` आदी to प्रेम `` और `` बस irresistible ``  featured identically dressed dancing women with pale faces , dark eye makeup and bright red lipstick , which resembled the women in the art of Patrick Nagel , an artist popular in the 1980s .
Sharp-suited , his involvement in  the म्यूज़िक उद्योग commenced in the 1960s , covered  five decades and included a spell with Vinegar Joe .
Palmer received a number of awards throughout his  करियर , सहित दो ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन पुरूष चट्टान गायन प्रदर्शन , an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , और थी twice मनोनीत लिये the ब्रिट  Award for Best British Male .
Computed tomography angiography ( CTA )  is a computed टोमोग्राफी तकनीक प्रयुक्त to visualize arterial  and venous vessels throughout the body .
This ranges from arteries serving the brain to those bringing blood  to the फेफड़े , गुर्दे , बाहें और  legs .
The Champs-Élysées  सजा साथ ध्वज लिये bastille  Day
horseman of the फ्रेंच रिपब्लिकन गार्ड दौरान the 2007  military parade on the Champs-Élysées .
Prise de la  bastille by jean-pierre-louis-laurent  Houel
Bastille Day is the name given in English-speaking countries to the French  नेशनल दिन , जिससे is मनाये on  the 14th of July each year .
in फ़्रांस , it is formally पुकारा la fête nationale ( ; the नेशनल  Celebration ) and commonly Le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ) .
It commemorates the 1790 Fête de la Fédération , held on the first anniversary of the storming of the Bastille on 14 July 1789 ; the  वर्षगांठ of the storming of the bastille fortress-prison थी देखी as a प्रतीक of the uprising of the आधुनिक स्वदेश , और of the reconciliation of सब the फ्रेंच अंदर  the constitutional monarchy which preceded the First Republic , during the French Revolution .
Festivities and official  ceremonies हैं आयोजित सब over फ़्रांस .
The oldest and largest regular military parade in Europe is held on the morning of 14 July , on the Champs-Élysées  एवेन्यू in पेरिस in सामने of the अध्यक्ष of the गणतंत्र , फ्रेंच officials और विदेशी अतिथि  .
The United States of America ( USA or U.S.A. ) , commonly called the United States ( US or U.S. )  or अमेरिका , is a संघीय गणतंत्र consisting of पचास राज्य और a संघीय  district .
The lower forty-eight contiguous states and the federal  ज़िला of वॉशिंगटन , d.C. हैं in सेंट्रल उत्तर  America between Canada and Mexico .
The state of Alaska is west of Canada and east of Russia across the  बेरिंग जलसन्धि , और the राज्य of हवाई is in the mid-north प्रशांत  .
The  देश भी रै पाँच आबादी और नौ unpopulated  territories in the Pacific and the Caribbean .
At 3.79 million square miles (  9.83 लाख km2 ) और साथ around 315 लाख लोगों , the संयुक्त राज्य is the third- or  fourth-largest country by total area and the third-largest by both land area and population .
It is one of the world 's most  ethnically विविध और multicultural राष्ट्र , the उत्पाद of  large-scale immigration from many countries .
the भूगोल और जलवायु of the u.S. is भी अत्यधिक विविध , साथ रेगिस्तान  , plains , forests , and mountains that are home to a wide variety of species .
Paleoindians migrated  इससे एशिया to कया is अभी the संयुक्त राज्य मेनलैंड around  15,000 years ago .
After 1500 , Old  संसार रोगों introduced by europeans greatly  reduced their populations .
European colonization  began around 1600 और आए ज़्यादातर इससे इंग्लैण्ड  .
The United States emerged  इससे तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies स्तिथ साथ the  Atlantic seaboard .
Disputes between Great Britain and the  अमरीकी colonies led to the अमरीकी क्रान्ति  .
On July 4 , 1776 , delegates from the 13 colonies  unanimously जारी the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता , जिससे स्थापित the संयुक्त  States of America .
The American Revolutionary War , which ended with the recognition of independence of the United States from the Kingdom  of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , थी the पहला कामयाब युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता विरूद्ध a यूरोपीय औपनिवेशिक  empire .
The current  संविधान थी अपनाया on सितंबर 17 , 1787 ; twenty-seven amendments  have since been added to the Constitution .
The first ten amendments , collectively named the Bill of Rights ,  यहूद ratified in 1791 और गारंटी अनेक आधारभूत सिविल अधिकारों और freedoms  .
Driven by the doctrine  of manifest नियति , the संयुक्त राज्य embarked on  a vigorous expansion across North America throughout the 19th century .
इस शामिल displacing देशी जनजातियों , acquiring  new territories , and gradually admitting new states .
The  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध ended legalized  slavery in the United States .
by the समाप्त of the उन्नीसवीं सदी , the संयुक्त राज्य विस्तारित  into the Pacific Ocean , and its economy was the world 's largest .
the spanish–american युद्ध और  confirmed the country 's status as a global military power .
The United States emerged from as a  वैश्विक महाशक्ति , the पहला देश साथ नाभिकीय हथियार , और a स्थाई सदस्य  of the United Nations Security Council .
The end of the Cold War and the dissolution of  the सोवियत संघ बाएँ the संयुक्त राज्य as the एकमात्र महाशक्ति  .
The United States is a developed  देश और रै the संसार 's largest नेशनल अर्थव्यवस्था , साथ an अनुमानित 2012 जीडीपी of $ 15.6 खरब  19 % of global GDP at purchasing-power parity , as of 2011 .
The per capita GDP of the U.S. was the  संसार 's sixth-highest as of 2010 , हालांकि अमेरिका 's माल असमानता  was also ranked highest among OECD countries by the World Bank .
The economy is fueled by an abundance of natural resources , a  well-developed अवसंरचना , और ऊँची उत्पादकता ; और जबकि इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is माना post-industrial  it continues to be one of the world 's largest manufacturers .
The country accounts for 39 % of global  सैन्य बिता , और is a अग्रणी आर्थिक , राजनैतिक , और सांस्कृतिक फ़ोर्स in the संसार , as खूब  as a leader in scientific research and technological innovation .
The NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championship is a single-elimination tournament played each spring in the  संयुक्त राज्य , फिलहाल featuring 68 कॉलेज बास्केट टीमों , to determine the नेशनल चैंपियनशिप of the प्रमुख कॉलेज  basketball teams .
The tournament , organized by the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ) , was created during  1939 by the नेशनल संघ of बास्केट कोच , और थी the विचार of  Ohio State University coach Harold Olsen .
Played mostly during March , it is known informally as March Madness or the Big  नृत्य , और रै become एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध सालाना  sporting events in the United States .
The NCAA has  credited bob वाल्श of the सिएटल आयोजन कमेटी लिये  starting the March Madness celebration during 1984 .
The tournament teams include champions from 31 Division I conferences ( which receive automatic bids )  , और 37 टीमों जिससे हैं awarded at-large berths  .
These `` at-large '' teams are chosen by  an ncaa चयन कमेटी , as विस्तृत  below .
The 64 teams are divided into four regions and organized into a single elimination ``  कोष्ठक '' , जिससे predetermines , जब a टोली विन्स a खेल , जिससे टोली  it will face next .
Each  टोली is `` seeded  '' , or ranked , within its region .
After an initial four  खेल between आठ lower-ranked टीमों , the टूर्नामेंट occurs दौरान the कोर्स of  three weekends , at pre-selected neutral sites around the United States .
Lower-ranked teams  हैं लगाई in the कोष्ठक विरूद्ध उच्चतर क्रमित  teams .
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of the teams , from a round of 64 , to a `` Sweet Sixteen '' , and  लिये the पिछला वीकेंड of the टूर्नामेंट a फाइनल चार ; the फाइनल चार is प्रायः निभाई दौरान  the first weekend of April .
These four teams ,  एक इससे प्रत्येक प्रदेश , तब compete in एक स्थान लिये the  national championship .
The tournament has been at least  partially televised चूंकि 1969  .
presently , the खेल हैं reported by सीबीएस , tbs ,  TNT , and truTV by the trade-name NCAA March Madness .
Since 2011 , all games are  उपलब्धियाँ लिये देखने देशभर  .
As television coverage has  grown , so too रै the टूर्नामेंट 's लोकप्रियता  .
Presently , millions of Americans `` fill out a bracket '' ,  predicting विजेता of सब 67 खेल  .
With 11 national titles , UCLA  रै the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे ncaa मेन 's प्रभाग i बास्केट  Championships ; John Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों of केंटकी is दूसरी , साथ 8 नेशनल शीर्षक , जबकि इंडियाना  University and the University of North Carolina are tied for third with 5 national titles .
Duke University ranks fifth  साथ 4 नेशनल शीर्षक  .
A  नमूना of सिंथेटिक  motor oil
Synthetic oil is a  स्नेहक consisting of रासायनिक यौगिकों कि हैं artificially बना  ( synthesized ) .
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically modified petroleum components rather  than पूरे crude आयल , लकिन can भी be synthesized इससे अन्य कच्चा सामग्री  .
Synthetic oil is used as a substitute for lubricant refined from petroleum  जब ऑपरेटिंग in extremes of तापमान , क्युकी  , in general , it provides superior mechanical and chemical properties than those found in traditional mineral oils .
Aircraft jet engines , for example ,  आवश्यकता the उपयोग of सिंथेटिक oils , whereas वायुयान पिस्टन इंजन  do not .
Jackass is an American reality series , originally shown on MTV from 2000 to 2002 , featuring  लोगों performing विभिन्न खतरनाक , crude self-injuring स्टंट  and pranks .
The show served as a launchpad for  the टेलीविज़न और एक्टिंग करियर of bam margera , steve-o , और भी जॉनी knoxville , जो  previously had only a few minor acting roles .
Since 2002 ,  तीन बेवकूफ़ films have महरूम उत्पादित और released by एमटीवी कॉरपोरेट सहोदर  Paramount Pictures , continuing the franchise after its run on television .
The show sparked several  spin-offs सहित चिरायु la bam , wildboyz , homewrecker  , Dr. Steve-O and Blastazoid .
The show placed # 68 on  entertainment साप्ताहिक `` नई tv  Classics '' list .
Roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born November 3 , 1952 ) is an American actress , comedienne ,  लेखक , टेलीविज़न निर्माता , निदेशक , और 2012 अध्यक्षीय  nominee of the California -based Peace and Freedom Party .
Barr  began उसके करियर in stand-up कॉमेडी at क्लब पहले gaining कीर्ति लिये  her role in the sitcom Roseanne .
The show was a  hit और lasted नौ सीज़न  , from 1988 to 1997 .
She won both  an एमी और a सुनहरी ग्लोब  Award for Best Actress for her work on the show .
Barr had crafted a `` fierce working-class domestic goddess ''  persona in the आठ सालो preceding उसके sitcom और चाही to do a यथार्थवादी दिखाएँ परिचय a दमदार  mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism .
The granddaughter of immigrants from Europe and  रूस , barr थी the oldest of चार children in a working-class यहूदी नमक झील नगर परिवार  ; she was also active in the LDS Church .
In  1974 , वो शादीशुदा विधेयक pentland , साथ जिसको वो था तीन children  , before divorcing in 1990 and marrying comedian Tom Arnold for four years .
विवाद arose जब वो संग `` the star-spangled  Banner `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired baseball game , followed by grabbing her crotch and spitting .
After her sitcom ended , she launched her own talk  दिखाएँ , the roseanne दिखाएँ , जिससे aired  from 1998 to 2000 .
In 2005 , she returned to  stand-up कॉमेडी साथ a  world tour .
In 2011 , she starred in an unscripted TV show , Roseanne 's Nuts , that lasted from  जुलाई to सितंबर of कि साल , परिचय उसके जीवन on a हवाई फार्म  .
In early 2012 ,  barr घोषित उसके उम्मीदवारी लिये the अध्यक्षीय  nomination of the Green Party .
Barr lost the  नामांकन to jill  Stein .
She then sought the presidential nomination of the Peace  और स्वतंत्रता पार्टी , जिससे वो जीती on अगस्त 4 , 2012  .
Barr received 61,971 votes in  the सामान्य चुनाव , रखकर  sixth overall .
Francesco Albani 's 17th century  बपतिस्मा of मसीह is a ठेठ चित्रण साथ the आसमान खोलने और the पावन स्पिरिट descending  as a dove .
The baptism of Jesus marks  the शुरूआत of उसके पब्लिक  ministry .
This event is recorded in the canonical  gospels of मैथ्यू , चिह्नित और ल्यूक .
John 's gospel does not describe Jesus '  बपतिस्मा , लकिन जॉन the बैपटिस्ट करता गवाही of  the other things in .
In the New Testament , John the Baptist preached the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ( ) , and  घोषित खुद a forerunner of he कि होता baptize `` साथ the पावन भुत  and with fire '' ( ) .
In so  doing he थी तैयारी the  way for Jesus .
Jesus came to  the जॉर्डन नदी जहाँ he थी  baptized by John .
The baptismal scene includes the heavens opening , a dove-like descent of  the पावन स्पिरिट , और a आवाज़ इससे स्वर्ग saying , `` इस is my beloved  Son , in whom I am well pleased . ''
Most modern scholars view  the फैक्ट कि यीशु थी baptized by जॉन as an ऐतिहासिक इवेंट to  which a high degree of certainty can be assigned .
Along with the crucifixion of Jesus most scholars view it as one of the two historically certain facts  परिचय उसे , और प्रायः उपयोग it as the starting अंक लिये the पढ़ाई of the ऐतिहासिक  Jesus .
The baptism is one of the five major milestones in the gospel  कथा of the जीवन of यीशु , the अन्य होने the बासीलीक ,  Crucifixion , Resurrection , and Ascension .
Most  ईसाई denominations दृश्य the बपतिस्मा of यीशु as an महत्वपूर्ण इवेंट  and a basis for the Christian rite of baptism ( see also ) .
In Eastern Christianity , Jesus ' baptism is  commemorated on 6 जनवरी , the feast of epiphany  .
In the Roman Catholic Church , the Anglican Communion , the  लूथरन चर्च और कुछ अन्य पश्चिमी denominations , it is recalled on a दिन भीतर the following  week , the feast of the baptism of the Lord .
In Roman Catholicism ,  the बपतिस्मा of यीशु is एक of the चमकदार रहस्यों  sometimes added to the Rosary .
It is a Trinitarian feast in the  पूर्वी परंपरागत चर्च  .
Methylcobalamin (  दिखाया ) is a रूप of विटामिन  B12 .
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12 , occurring as  अंधेरा रेड crystals कि freely रूप cherry-colored  transparent solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12 , also called cobalamin , is a water-soluble  विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the दिमाग और बेचैन  system , and for the formation of blood .
It is one of the  आठ b विटामिन .
It is  सामान्यतः शामिल in the चयापचय of प्रत्येक कोशिका of the इंसान देह , विशेषकर affecting  DNA synthesis and regulation , but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither fungi , plants , nor animals are  सक्षम of producing विटामिन b12 .
Only bacteria  और आर्किया have the एंजाइमों जरूरी लिये इसके संश्लेषण , हालांकि अनेक भोजन  are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis .
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally complicated vitamin and can be  उत्पादित industrially तभी through बैक्टीरियल  fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of  chemically सम्बन्धित यौगिकों ( vitamers  ) , all of which have vitamin activity .
It contains the  biochemically विरल तत्व  cobalt .
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by  जीवाणु ( जिससे प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ) , लकिन परिवर्तन between अलग फ़ॉर्म of the विटामिन can be संपन्नता  in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin ,  cyanocobalamin , करता नहीं occur in प्रकृति , लकिन is उत्पादित इससे बैक्टीरियल hydroxocobalamin  and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements , and as a food additive , because of its stability and lower production cost .
In the body it is converted to the human  physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin ,  leaving behind the cyanide , albeit in minimal concentration .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin , and  adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in अधिक महंगी pharmacological उत्पाद और खाना  supplements .
The extra  यूटिलिटी of ये is फिलहाल  debated .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia , which is  an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in जिससे parietal कोशिकाएं of the पेट जिम्मेदार लिये secreting मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर  are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12 , so a lack  of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर , as देखी in घातक रक्ताल्पता , कल्याणकारी a विटामिन  B12 deficiency .
Many other  subtler kinds of विटामिन b12 कमियां  and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated .
Full Metal Jacket is a 1987 war film  उत्पादित  , directed and co-written by Stanley Kubrick .
It is an adaptation of Gustav Hasford 's 1979 novel The Short-Timers and  सितारों मैथ्यू modine , विंसेंट d'onofrio , R. ली ermey  , Arliss Howard , and Adam Baldwin .
The film follows a  प्लाटून of u.S. marines through उनके प्रशिक्षण  and the experiences of two of the platoon 's Marines in the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War .
The film 's  शीर्षक refers to the पूरा मेटल जैकेट गोली  used by infantry riflemen .
The film  प्राप्त नाजुक  acclaim .
it प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन adapted पटकथा  for Kubrick , Michael Herr and Gustav Hasford .
In 2001 , the American Film Institute placed Full Metal  जैकेट at # 95 in उनके `` एएफआई 's 100 सालो ... 100 thrills `` पोल .
TMZ is a celebrity news website  कि debuted on नवम्बर 8 , 2005  .
It was a collaboration  between एओएल और telepictures प्रोडक्शन्स , a प्रभाग of warner भाईs. , जबतक  Time Warner divested AOL in 2009 .
However , it remained affiliated with AOL News and  रै the एओएल न्यूज लोगो affixed in the  upper right corner .
The  नाम tmz स्टैंड लिये the ऐतिहासिक `` स्टुडियो मण्डल `` or 30-mile मण्डल दायरा इससे  the intersection of West Beverly Boulevard and North La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles .
TMZ 's managing editor is Harvey Levin , a  lawyer-turned-journalist जो थी previously a विधिक विशेषज्ञ लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स टेलीविज़न स्टेशन kcbs-tv  .
The site claims that it does not pay for stories or interviews ;  however , levin रै admitted कि tmz करता `` sometimes  pay sources for leads on stories '' .
Levin has stated that `` everything is  शोधकार्य और vetted लिये सटीकता  . ''
A companion TV series ,  tmz on tv , debuted on सितंबर  10 , 2007 .
Scream 3 is a 2000 American slasher film  निर्मित by केविन विलियमसन , निर्देशित by वेस craven और लिखा by ehren  Kruger , starring Neve Campbell , Courteney Cox Arquette and David Arquette .
It was released on February 4 ,  2000 as the तीसरा किश्त in the  Scream film series .
The events of the story are set three years after those of Scream 2 and follows Sidney Prescott (  कैम्पबेल ) जो रै गए into self-imposed अलगाव following the कार्यक्रम of the पिछला दो films लकिन is drawn to हॉलीवुड  after a new Ghostface begins killing the cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 '' .
Scream 3 combines the violence of the slasher genre with comedy and ``  whodunit `` रहस्य जबकि satirizing the cliché of फिल्मी trilogies  .
Unlike the previous Scream films , there was an increased emphasis on comedic elements and the violence and horror was reduced in response to increased public  scrutiny परिचय हिंसा in मीडिया following the columbine ऊँची स्कूल नरसंहार  .
The film was the concluding  अध्याय of the चीख श्रेणी जबतक  it was revived with a sequel , Scream 4 , in 2011 .
विलियमसन provided a five-page रूपरेखा लिये दो सिक्वेल to चीख जब  auctioning his original script , hoping to entice bidders with the potential of buying a franchise .
Williamson 's commitments to other  प्रोजेक्ट meant he थी असमर्थ to develop a पूरा स्क्रिप्ट लिये चीख 3 और लिखने  duties were undertaken by Ehren Kruger who discarded much of Williamson 's notes .
Craven and Marco  beltrami लौटे to सीधा और स्कोर the फिल्मी क्रमशः as वे  had with the previous two series entries .
Production was  troubled साथ स्क्रिप्ट rewrites , साथ पृष्ठों sometimes तभी तैयार on  the day of filming , and scheduling difficulties with the main cast .
Scream 3 performed both financially and critically worse than its preceding films , earning over $ 161 million and  साथ अनेक आलोचकों claiming कि the फिल्मी था become कया चीख originally ``  spoofed `` .
Despite  ऋणात्मक आलोचना the फिल्मी किया प्राप्त तारीफ़ साथ reviewers कॉलिंग it  the perfect end to the Scream trilogy .
As of 2012 , the film is currently  the क्रमांक 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in  North America , following Scream at number 1 and Scream 2 at number 2 .
The film 's soundtrack was  well-received , बिता चौदह सप्ताह on the बिलबोर्ड  200 and reaching a high of # 32 .
Shoulder impingement syndrome , also called painful arc syndrome , supraspinatus syndrome , swimmer 's  कंधे , और thrower 's कंधे , is a नैदानिक सिंड्रोम जिससे occurs जब the tendons of the rotator कफ मांसपेशियां become irritated और inflamed as वे pass through the subacromial स्पेस ,  the passage beneath the acromion .
This can result in pain , weakness and  घाटा of गति at the कंधे  .
JLA was a monthly  कॉमिक किताब प्रकाशित by dc कॉमिक्स इससे जनवरी 1997 to  April 2006 featuring the Justice League .
The  औपनिवेशिक इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कवर the इतिहास of यूरोपीय settlements इससे the  start of colonization of America until their incorporation into the United States .
In the late 16th century , England , France ,  स्पेन और the नीदरलैंड्स शुभारम्भ प्रमुख colonization कार्यक्रम in पूर्वी  North America .
Small early attempts—such as the English Lost Colony of Roanoke —often  disappeared ; everywhere the मौत  rate of the first arrivals was very high .
Nevertheless successful  colonies यहूद स्थापित  .
European settlers came  इससे a किस्में of सोशल और धार्मिक  groups .
No aristocrats settled permanently , but a number of  adventurers , सैनिको , किसानो , और  tradesmen arrived .
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of New Netherland , the Swedes and Finns of New Sweden , the English Quakers of Pennsylvania , the English Puritans of New England , the English settlers  of jamestown , और the `` worthy ग़रीब '' of जॉर्जिया , आए to the नई महाद्वीप और निर्मित colonies साथ distinctive सोशल , धार्मिक , राजनैतिक और आर्थिक शैलियाँ .
occasionally एक उपनिवेश took कंट्रोल of another ( दौरान युद्धों between  their European parents ) .
Only in Nova Scotia ( now part of Canada ) did the conquerors  निकाल the पिछला colonists  .
Instead they all  जिया पक्ष by पक्ष in सलाम  .
There were no major civil wars among the 13 colonies , and the two  मुख्य हथियारबंद विद्रोहों ( in वर्जिनिया in 1676 और in नई यॉर्क in  1689–91 ) were short-lived failures .
Wars between the French and the British—the French and Indian Wars and  पिता rale 's युद्ध —were तूल , और शामिल french-support  for Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers .
By 1760 France was  पराजित और the अंग्रेजों जब्त  its colonies .
The four distinct regions were :  नई इंग्लैण्ड , the मध्य colonies , the chesapeake  Bay Colonies ( Upper South ) and the Lower South .
Some historians add a fifth region , the  frontier , जिससे थी never separately  organized .
By the time European settlers arrived around 1600–1650 , the majority of the Native Americans living in the eastern United States had been decimated by new  रोगों , introduced to उन्हें दशकों पहले by explorers और sailors .

Gloria Laura  वेंडरबिल्ट ( born फ़रवरी 20 , 1924 ) is an अमरीकी कलाकार  , author , actress , heiress , and socialite most noted as an early developer of designer blue jeans .
She is a member of the prominent  वेंडरबिल्ट परिवार of नई यॉर्क और the माँ of सीएनएन 's  Anderson Cooper .
Greece ( Romanization of Greek| ) , officially  the हैलेनिक गणतंत्र ( ' ) ,  is a country in Southeast Europe .
according to the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी  , Greece 's population is around 11 million .
Athens is the  स्वदेश 's पूंजी और largest नगर , इसके शहरी क्षेत्रफल  also including Piraeus .
Greece is  रणनीतिक स्तिथ at the क्रॉसरोड्स of यूरोपीय , एशिया , the मध्य ईस्ट , और अफ़्रीकी , और रै जमीन सीमायें  with Albania , the Republic of Macedonia and Bulgaria to the north , and Turkey to the northeast .
The Aegean Sea lies to the east of mainland Greece ,  the आयोनियन समुद्र to the वेस्ट , और the भूमध्यसागरीय  Sea to the south .
Greece  रै the 11th longest तटरेखा in the संसार at in लंबाई , featuring a विशाल क्रमांक of आइलैंड्स ( लगभग 1,400  , of which 227 are inhabited ) , including Crete , the Dodecanese , the Cyclades , and the Ionian Islands among others .
Eighty percent of Greece consists of  kyu , of जिससे माउंट ओलम्पस is the  highest at .
Modern Greece traces its roots to the civilization of  प्राचीन यूनानियों , generally माना the पालना of  Western civilization .
As such , it is the birthplace of democracy , Western philosophy , the Olympic Games , Western  साहित्य और historiography , राजनैतिक विज्ञान , प्रमुख वैज्ञानिक और गणितीय सिद्धान्त , और पश्चिमी नाटक , सहित दोनो त्रासदी  and comedy .
इस विरासत is partly reflected in the सत्रह युनेस्को संसार विरासत  Sites located in Greece , ranking it 7th in Europe and 13th in the world .
The modern Greek state  थी स्थापित in 1830 , following  the Greek War of Independence .
Greece is a founding member  of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , रै महरूम a सदस्य of कया is अभी the यूरोपीय संघ चूंकि 1981 (  and the eurozone since 2001 ) , and has been a member of NATO since 1952 .
Greece is a developed country with an advanced ,  high-income अर्थव्यवस्था और बहुत ऊँची मानकों of जीना , सहित the  world 's 21st highest quality of life as of 2010 .
Greece 's economy is  भी the largest in the balkans , जहाँ यूनानियों  is an important regional investor .
a प्रधान मध्याह्न is a मध्याह्न , i.e . a लकीर  of longitude , at which longitude is defined to be 0° .
A prime meridian and its opposite in a  360°-system , the 180th मध्याह्न ( at 180°  longitude ) , form a great circle .
This great circle  divides the गोला , e.g . the धरती , into  two hemispheres .
If one uses directions of East and West from a defined  प्रधान मध्याह्न , तब वे can be पुकारा  Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere .
Gerardus Mercator in his  एटलस cosmographicae ( 1595 )  uses a prime meridian somewhere close to 25°W , passing just to the west of Santa Maria Island in the Atlantic .
His 180th  मध्याह्न रनों साथ the जलसन्धि of anián (  Bering Strait )
A prime meridian is  ultimately मनमानी , नापसंद an equator , जिससे is संकल्पित  by the axis of rotation—and various conventions have been used or advocated in different regions and throughout history .
Minka Dumont  केली ( born minka dumont dufay ;  June 24 , 1980 ) is an American actress .
She is perhaps best known for her roles in Charlie 's Angels ,  शुक्रवार रात्रि लाइट्स , और the रूममेट  .
R.O.B . ( Robotic  ऑपरेटिंग दोस्त ) , released in जापानी as the , is an accessory  for the Nintendo Entertainment System ( NES ) .
It was  released in जुलाई 1985 in जापानी  and later that year in North America .
It had a short product lifespan , with support for only  दो खेल जिससे comprised the `` रोबोट श्रेणी  '' ; Gyromite and Stack-Up .
R.O.B . was released with the intention of portraying the Nintendo Entertainment System  as कुछ अनोखा in अनुक्रम to alleviate खुदरा fears following the वीडियो खेल क्रैश  of 1983 .
R.O.B . was available in the Deluxe Set , a configuration for the console that  शामिल , among अन्य बाते , r.o.b .  and Gyromite .
Stack-Up was  खरीदा separately और शामिल इसके अपना शारीरिक खेल  pieces .
The Walking Liberty half dollar was a silver  50-cent टुकड़ा or हाफ डालर सिक्का जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य मिंट इससे 1916 to  1947 ; it was designed by Adolph A. Weinman .
In 1915 , the new Mint Director , Robert W. Woolley , came to  मानना कि he थी नहीं तभी अनुमत लकिन जरूरी by विधि to बदलें सिक्का डिजाइन  that had been in use for 25 years .
He therefore began the process of replacing the Barber coinage : dimes , quarters and half dollars , all bearing  समान डिजाइन by long-time मिंट engraver चार्ल्स E. नाई , और पहला struck  in 1892 .
Woolley had the Commission of Fine  कला conduct a प्रतियोगिता , as a परिणाम of जिससे weinman थी  selected to design the dime and half dollar .
weinman 's डिज़ाइन of स्वतंत्रता striding towards the सूर्य लिये the हाफ डालर proved मुश्किल to  perfect , and Treasury Secretary William G. McAdoo , whose department included the Mint , considered having Barber create his own design .
Mint officials were successful in getting  weinman 's डिज़ाइन into उत्पादन , हालांकि  it never struck very well , which may have been a factor in its replacement by the Franklin half dollar beginning in 1948 .
Nevertheless , art historian Cornelius Vermeule considered the piece to  be among the सबसे खूबसूरत us  coins .
Since 1986 , a modification of Weinman 's  obverse डिज़ाइन रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये the अमरीकी चांदी त्रिभुज  .
The Toyota 4Runner is a mid-size sport utility vehicle ( SUV )  उत्पादित by the जापानी निर्माता टोयोटा और बेची throughout the  world from 1984 to present .
In Japan it was known  as the टोयोटा hilux  Surf .
The original 4Runner was  a कॉम्पैक्ट एसयूवी और छोटी अधिक than a टोयोटा पिकअप ट्रक साथ a fiberglass शेल over the bed , लकिन the मॉडल रै चूंकि undergone significant स्वतंत्र  development into a cross between a compact and a mid-size SUV .
All 4Runners have been built at Toyota 's Tahara plant in Tahara  , aichi , जापानी , or at hino मोटर्स ' hamura , जापानी संयंत्र , और  in Brazil .
इसके mid-size क्रॉसओवर  SUV counterpart is the Toyota Highlander .
This article deals  साथ आयुर्विज्ञान as practiced by प्रशिक्षित पेशेवर  from ancient times to the present .
The ancient Egyptians had a  प्रणाली of आयुर्विज्ञान कि थी बहुत उन्नत लिये इसके  time and influenced later medical traditions .
The  उन्होंने और babylonians दोनो introduced  the concepts of diagnosis , prognosis , and medical examination .
The Greeks went  भी further , और उन्नत  as well medical ethics .
The Hippocratic Oath ,  स्टिल लिया by डॉक्टर आज , थी लिखा in  Greece in the 5th century BCE .
In the medieval era , surgical practices inherited from  the प्राचीन मास्टर्स यहूद improved और तब systematized in rogerius  's The Practice of Surgery .
Universities  began व्यवस्थित प्रशिक्षण of physicians around  the years 1220 in Italy .
During the  पुनर्जागरण , समझना of anatomy  improved , and the microscope was invented .
The germ  सिद्धान्त of बीमारी in the 19th सदी led to  cures for many infectious diseases .
Military  डॉक्टर उन्नत the विधि of आघात  treatment and surgery .
Public health  उपायों यहूद विकसित विशेषकर in the 19th सदी  as the rapid growth of cities required systematic sanitary measures .
उन्नत शोध centers खोली in the जल्दी 20th सदी ,  often connected with major hospitals .
the mid-20th सदी थी characterized  by new biological treatments , such as antibiotics .
These advancements , along  साथ developments in रसायन , आनुवंशिकी , और lab प्रौद्योगिकी  ( such as the x-ray ) led to modern medicine .
Medicine was heavily professionalized in the 20th century , and new  करियर खोली to महिलाओं as नर्स ( इससे the 1870s ) और as physicians ( विशेषकर बाद 1970  ) .
The 21st century is  characterized by बहुत उन्नत शोध involving numerous फ़ील्ड  of science .
The Hippocratic Corpus , is a  संग्रहण of जल्दी चिकित्सा works इससे प्राचीन यूनानियों strongly संबद्ध साथ the  ancient Greek physician Hippocrates and his teachings .
Potassium is a chemical element with symbol K  ( इससे neo-latin kalium ) और परमाणु क्रमांक 19  .
Elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white alkali metal that  oxidizes rapidly in एयर और is बहुत प्रतिक्रिया साथ जल , generating sufficient ऊष्मा to ignite  the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame .
Because  पोटैशियम और सोडियम हैं chemically बहुत समान , उनके  salts were not at first differentiated .
The existence of multiple  तत्व in उनके लवण थी suspected इससे 1702 , और इस थी सिद्ध in 1807 जब पोटैशियम  and sodium were individually isolated from different salts by electrolysis .
Potassium in  प्रकृति occurs तभी  in ionic salts .
As such , it is  मिला dissolved in seawater ( जिससे is 0.04 %  potassium by weight ) , and is part of many minerals .
Most industrial chemical  अनुप्रयोग of पोटैशियम employ the अपेक्षाकृत  high solubility in water of potassium compounds , such as potassium soaps .
Potassium metal has  तभी a few खास अनुप्रयोग , होने replaced  in most chemical reactions with sodium metal .
Potassium  ions हैं जरुरी लिये the  function of all living cells .
Potassium ion  diffusion is a कुंजी यांत्रिकी in तंत्रिका हस्तांतरण , और पोटैशियम depletion in पशु  , including humans , results in various cardiac dysfunctions .
Potassium accumulates in plant cells , and thus fresh fruits  और सब्जियां हैं a शुभ dietary सोर्स  of it .
Conversely , most plants except specialist halophytes are intolerant of salt , and sodium is  उपस्थित in उन्हें तभी in कम विशेषज्ञता  .
This resulted  in पोटैशियम पहला होने पृथक इससे potash , the राख of  plants , giving the element its name .
For the same reason , heavy  क्रॉप उत्पादन rapidly depletes soils of पोटैशियम , और agricultural fertilizers consume  95 % of global potassium chemical production .
The Singapore dollar or dollar ( sign : $ ; code  : sgd ) is the आधिकारिक करेंसी  of Singapore .
It is normally abbreviated with the dollar sign $ , or  alternatively s $ to फर्क it इससे अन्य डालर -denominated  currencies .
It is  विभाजित into 100  cents .
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the Brunei  करेंसी और मौद्रिक फलक स्टिल maintain the ऐतिहासिक exchangeability of उनके दो मुद्राएँ , the  Singaporean dollar and the Brunei dollar , respectively .
The dollar is accepted as `` customary  टेंडर '' in ब्रुनेई according to the करेंसी interchangeability  Agreement .
likewise , the ब्रुनेई डालर is customarily  accepted in Singapore
James Samuel Coleman ( May 12 , 1926 – March 25 , 1995 ) was  an अमरीकी समाजशास्त्री , theorist और अनुभवजन्य शोधकर्ता , आधारित chiefly  at the University of Chicago .
He was  निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष of the अमरीकी  Sociological Association .
कोलमैन पढ़ाई the समाजशास्त्र of शिक्षा , पब्लिक नीति  , and was one of the earliest users of the term `` social capital `` .
His Foundations of Social Theory  बहकावे समाजशास्त्रीय सिद्धान्त  .
His  the adolescent समाज ( 1961 ) और `` कोलमैन रपट  '' ( Equality of Educational Opportunity , 1966 ) were two of the most heavily cited books in educational sociology .
The landmark Coleman Report helped transform educational theory , reshape national education  नीतियों , और बहकावे पब्लिक और scholarly राय regarding the भूमिका of schooling in determining समता और उत्पादकता in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
सुपरमैन ( इससे dc कॉमिक्स ) थी the पहला सुपरहीरो  created , art by Jim Lee .
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or super hero ) is  a प्रकार of भण्डार अक्षर possessing `` असाधारण or superhuman  powers '' and dedicated to protecting the public .
Since the debut of the prototypical superhero Superman in 1938 , stories of superheroes—ranging from brief episodic adventures  to continuing years-long sagas—have वर्चस्व अमरीकी  comic books and crossed over into other media .
The word  itself तिथियाँ to at  least 1917 .
A  मादा सुपरहीरो is sometimes पुकारा a superheroine  ( also rendered super-heroine or super heroine ) .
``  सुपर नायक '' is a ट्रेडमार्क  co-owned by DC Comics and Marvel Comics .
By most  परिभाषाएं , वर्ण do नहीं सख्ती आवश्यकता वास्तविक superhuman शक्तियां to be deemed superheroes , हालांकि शर्तें ऐसे as costumed  crime fighters or masked vigilantes are sometimes used to refer to those such as Batman and Green Arrow without such powers who share other common superhero traits .
Such characters were generally referred to as ``  रहस्य मेन '' in the so-called सुनहरी आयु of कॉमिक किताबे to फर्क  them from characters with super-powers .
Normally , superheroes use their powers to counter day-to-day crime while  भी combating खतरे विरूद्ध मानवता by supervillains , उनके दण्ड counterparts  .
Often , one of these  supervillains होगा be the सुपरहीरो  's archenemy .
As well , some longrunning superheroes , such as Superman , Batman ,  spider-man और आयरन man प्रत्येक रै a rogues दीर्घा  of enemies .
as खूब , superheroes sometimes होगा कॉम्बैट ऐसे irregular खतरे as एलियंस , magical/ काल्पनिक entities , अमरीकी  war enemies such as nazism or communism , and godlike or demonic creatures .
The following is a historical list of  अभिनेताओं और प्राथमिक अक्षर भूमिकाएँ जिससे appear on the अमरीकी साबुन ओपेरा  One Life to Live .
The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American  नाटक फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by फ़्रैंक  Darabont and starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman .
Adapted from the Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption , the film tells the story of Andy Dufresne , a banker who  खर्च nearly दो दशकों in shawshank राज्य थाना लिये the हत्या of उसके बीवी  and her lover despite his claims of innocence .
दौरान उसके समय at the थाना , he befriends a fellow inmate , ellis boyd  `` Red '' Redding , and finds himself protected by the guards after the warden begins using him in his money laundering operation .
Despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget , the film received favorable  समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , अनेक पुरस्कार nominations , और रै चूंकि enjoyed a उल्लेखनीय जीवन on केबल  television , VHS , DVD , and Blu-ray .
It was included in the American Film  संस्थान 's 100 सालो ... 100 फिल्मों 10th वर्षगांठ  Edition .
IT management is the discipline whereby  सब of the प्रौद्योगिकी संसाधन of a कड़ हैं प्रबंधित  in accordance with its needs and priorities .
These  संसाधन may शामिल ठोस निवेश जैसे  computer hardware , software , data , networks and data centre facilities , as well as the staffs who are hired to maintain them .
Managing this responsibility within a company entails many of the basic  प्रबन्धन कृत्यों , जैसे budgeting , स्टॉफ , और आयोजन और controlling , साथ साथ अन्य पहलुओं  that are unique to technology , like change management , software design , network planning , tech support etc .
The Penitentiary of New Mexico Prison  riot , जिससे took प्लेस on फ़रवरी 2 और 3 , 1980 , in the राज्य 's अधिकतम सुरक्षा थाना दक्षिण of सांता fe , थी एक of the सबसे हिंसक थाना दंगे  in the history of the American correctional system : 33 inmates died and more than 200 inmates were treated for injuries .
None of the 12 officers taken hostage were  मारे , लकिन सात यहूद treated लिये चोटों  caused by beatings and rapes .
This was the third major riot at the NM State  penitentiary , the पहला occurring on 19 जुलाई 1922 और  the second on 15 June 1953 .
Author Roger Morris suggests the death toll may have been higher , as a  क्रमांक of लाशें यहूद incinerated or dismembered दौरान the कोर्स of the mayhem  .
