For the plant  erythrina herbacea , देखिए मूँगा  Bean .
The Northern Cardinal ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a North American bird in the genus Cardinalis ; it is  भी ज्ञात colloquially as the redbird or आम कार्डिनल  .
It can be found in southern Canada , through  the पूर्वी संयुक्त राज्य इससे maine to टेक्सास  and south through Mexico .
It is found in woodlands ,  gardens , shrublands ,  and swamps .
The Northern Cardinal is a mid-sized songbird with  a देह लंबाई of 21 सेंटीमीटर (  8.3 inches ) .
It has a  distinctive crest on the सिर और a मुखौटा on the फेस जिससे  is black in the male and gray in the female .
The  पुरूष is a हर्षोल्लास रेड , जबकि the  female is a dull red-brown shade .
The Northern  कार्डिनल is मुख्यतः granivorous , लकिन भी फ़ीड्स  on insects and fruit .
The male behaves  territorially , अंकन आउट उसके  territory with song .
During courtship , the male feeds  बीज to the मादा beak-to-beak  .
A clutch of three  to चार अंडे is रखी  , and two to four clutches are produced each year .
It was once prized as a pet  , लकिन इसके बिक्री as पिंजरा पक्षियों is अभी बैन in the संयुक्त राज्य by the migratory बर्ड  Treaty Act of 1918 .
Surface runoff , also called nonpoint source  प्रदूषण , इससे a फार्म फ़ील्ड in आयोवा दौरान  a rain storm .
topsoil as खूब as फार्म fertilizers और अन्य संभावित  pollutants run off unprotected farm fields when heavy rains occur .
Topsoil  is the अपर , outermost परत  of soil , usually the top to .
It  रै the उच्चतम विशेषज्ञता of सशुल्क पदार्थ और microorganisms  and is where most of the Earth 's biological soil activity occurs .
Musical cryptogram : ``  aschbeg '' नियत in schoenberg 's sechs  kleine Klavierstücke , Op . 19 , no . 1 , m. 5 .
Note that the notes  do नहीं आइये in स्पेलिंग अनुक्रम लकिन हैं सब  adjacent ( not separated by other notes ) .
Sechs  kleine klavierstücke , op . 19 ( or छह छोटी पियानो टुकड़े  ) is a set of pieces for solo piano written by the Austrian composer Arnold Schoenberg , published in 1913 .
McAfee , Inc. ( ) is an American global  कंप्यूटर सुरक्षा तन्त्र कम्पनी headquartered in सांता  Clara , California , and the world 's largest dedicated security technology company .
As of  फ़रवरी 28 , 2011 , मैक्एफ़ी is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary  of Intel .
McAfee 's competitors in the antivirus  उद्योग हैं avira , bitdefender , bullguard , f-secure , frisk  , Kaspersky , Symantec , and Trend Micro to name a few .
Saint Rita of Cascia ( Born Margherita Lotti 1381 - May 22  , 1457 ) थी an इतालवी augustinian नन , विधवा और संत  venerated in the Roman Catholic Church .
Rita was  शादीशुदा at  an early age .
The marriage lasted for 18 years , during which she is remembered for  उसके ईसाई मान as a मॉडल बीवी और माँ जो बना प्रयत्न to बदलें उसके husband इससे  his abusive behavior .
Upon the murder of her husband by another feuding family ,  वो sought to dissuade उसके बेटे  from revenge .
She subsequently joined an Augustinian community of religious sisters , where she was known for  practicing mortification of the flesh , साथ साथ the apparent efficacy of उसके  prayers .
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed to her intercession , and is often portrayed with a bleeding wound on her  माथे , जिससे the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर दावा to have महरूम a आंशिक  stigmata .
The Roman Catholic Church , under the pontificate of Pope Leo XIII officially canonized Rita on May 24 , 1900  , जबकि उसके feast दिन is मनाये प्रत्येक may 22  .
In many pious  कैथोलिक देशों , रीता is ज्ञात to be  a patroness for abused wives and mourning women .
North America is  a महाद्वीप wholly भीतर  the Northern Hemisphere and almost wholly within the Western Hemisphere .
It is also considered a  उत्तरी उपमहाद्वीप  of the Americas .
It is bordered to the north by the Arctic Ocean , to the east by the Atlantic Ocean , to the  वेस्ट और दक्षिण by the प्रशांत समंदर , और to the  southeast by South America and the Caribbean Sea .
North America covers an area of about 24,709,000 square kilometers ( 9,540,000 square miles ) ,  परिचय 4.8 % of the ग्रह 's सतह or परिचय 16.5 % of इसके जमीन क्षेत्रफल  .
As of July 2008 , its population was estimated at  nearly 529 लाख लोगों आरपार 23 स्वतंत्र राज्य  , representing about 7.5 % of the human population .
North America is the third-largest continent in area ,  following एशिया और अफ़्रीकी , और the चौथी in जनसांख्यिकी बाद एशिया  , Africa , and Europe .
The first people to live in North  अमेरिका यहूद paleoindians जो began to arrive दौरान the पिछला glacial काल by  crossing the Bering land bridge .
They  differentiated into a क्रमांक of विविध  cultures and communities across the continent .
The largest and most  उन्नत pre-columbian सभ्यताओं in उत्तर अमेरिका यहूद  the Aztecs in what is now Mexico and the Mayans in Central America .
यूरोपीय colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th और 17th सदियां  , wiping out large numbers of the native populations and beginning an era of European dominance .
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January 28 , 1985 ) , better known  by उसके स्टेज नाम J. कोल , is an अमरीकी hip-hop रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार और रिकार्ड निर्माता  from Fayetteville , North Carolina .
In 2009 , he became the first  कलाकार to चिह्न to jay-z 's  Roc Nation label .
उसके long-awaited डेब्यू एल्बम , हकदार कोल संसार  : The Sideline Story , was released on September 27 , 2011 .
The album debuted  at क्रमांक एक on the us बिलबोर्ड 200 , शीर्ष r & b एल्बम और शीर्ष रैप  Albums chart , selling more than 218,000 in its first week .
He received a nomination for Best New  कलाकार at the 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  .
The two main  वर्ण of the श्रेणी ,  Ratchet ( right ) and Clank ( left ) .
ratchet & clank is a श्रेणी of मंच  video games .
The franchise was created and developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for many different PlayStation consoles , such as PlayStation 2 and  प्लेस्टेशन 3 साथ the exclusion of आकार matters और रहस्य एजेंट clank , जिससे यहूद विकसित by ऊँची प्रभाव खेल लिये the प्लेस्टेशन  Portable .
Every game in the  श्रेणी रै महरूम released लिये प्रत्येक कंसोल  , as the IP is owned by Sony Computer Entertainment .
An animated feature  फिल्मी अनुकूलन उत्पादित by rainmaker entertainment और नाकेबंदी entertainment is अनुसूचित  for a theatrical release sometime in 2015 .
The games take place in  a विज्ञान fiction सेटिंग और follow the adventures of ratchet ( an animalistic human-like अक्षर ज्ञात as a lombax , जो  is a mechanic ) and Clank ( a diminutive , sentient robot ) as they travel through the universe , saving it from evil forces on a regular basis .
The series is noted for the inclusion of many exotic and unique ,  over the शीर्ष हथियार और डिवाइस , a अवधारणा कि insomniac खेल भी  expanded into their other games .
A will or testament is a legal declaration by which a  व्यक्ति , the testator , names एक or अधिक व्यक्तियों to मैनेज his/her एस्टेट  and provides for the transfer of his property at death .
For the  devolution of प्रॉपर्टी नहीं disposed of by होगा  , see inheritance and intestacy .
In the strictest sense , a `` will '' has historically  महरूम सीमित to रियल प्रॉपर्टी जबकि `` वसीयत '' applies तभी to dispositions of निजी प्रॉपर्टी ( यूँ giving वृद्धि to the लोकप्रिय शीर्षक of the दस्तावेज़ as `` पिछला होगा और वसीयत  '' ) , though this distinction is seldom observed today .
A will may also create a  testamentary विश्वास कि is प्रभावी तभी बाद the मौत  of the testator .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage  और can सप्लाई शक्ति 24 घंटों a दिन  .
Solar  उर्जा , रौशन लाइट और ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य , रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो  since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal  विद्युत , सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis , जिससे can मेक considerable योगदान to solving कुछ of  the most urgent energy problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or  क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर , बदलें और वितरित सौर  energy .
Active solar techniques include the use of  photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors  to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a  भवन to the सूर्य , selecting सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing  properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the  विकास of सस्ती , inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा  have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly import-independent resource , enhance  स्थिरता , reduce प्रदूषण , निम्नतर the लागत of mitigating जलवायु बदलें , और रखना चट्टान ईंधन कीमतें निम्नतर than वरना  .
These  लाभ हैं  global .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives  लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश  ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
Sir Thomas More ( ; 7 February 14786 July 1535 ) , known to Roman  catholics as संत थामस अधिक चूंकि 1935 , थी an अंग्रेज़ी वकील , सोशल पारस , लेखक , statesman , और विख्यात पुनर्जागरण  humanist .
He was an important  पार्षद to हेनरी viii of इंग्लैण्ड  and was Lord Chancellor from October 1529 to 16 May 1532 .
He was canonized  by पोप पायस xi in 1935 as एक of the जल्दी शहीदो  of the schism that separated the Church of England from Rome in the 16th century .
In 2000 , Pope John Paul II declared him patron  of कैथोलिक कूटनीतिज्ञों और राजनेता  .
More was an opponent of the Protestant Reformation ,  in particular of मार्टिन लूथर और विलियम  Tyndale .
However , since 1980 , he is also  commemorated by the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड as a reformation  martyr .
More coined  the शब्द `` यूटोपिया `` – a नाम he दिया to the आदर्श और काल्पनिक द्वीप  nation , the political system of which he described in Utopia , published in 1516 .
He opposed the  किंग 's विरह इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और refused to accept उसे as परम् सिर of the गिरिजाघर  of England , a title which had been given by parliament through the Act of Supremacy of 1534 .
He was imprisoned in 1534 for his refusal to take the oath required by  the पहला उत्तराधिकार अधिनियम , क्युकी the अधिनियम disparaged papal प्राधिकार और henry’s  marriage to Catherine of Aragon .
In  1535 , he थी आजमाया लिये देशद्रोह , convicted on perjured  testimony , and beheaded .
More also helped to originate the  phrase `` grasp at लोभी '' to औसत `` शिद्दत trying भी  useless things '' , in his Dialogue of Comfort Against Tribulation .
Intellectuals and statesmen  आरपार यूरोपीय यहूद दंग  by More 's execution .
Erasmus saluted him as one `` whose soul was more pure than  कोई हिम , जिनकी प्रतिभाशाली थी ऐसे कि इंग्लैण्ड never था और never  again will have its like '' .
There was a more controversial side to More 's life , because he advocated  the persecution और निष्पादन of protestants जो refused to  recant their faith .
However , the judgement of history  रै महरूम largely willing to forgive इस in लाइट of the टाइम्स he जिया in और उसके शहादत in  the Roman Catholic cause .
Two centuries later Jonathan Swift said More was  `` the व्यक्ति of the महानतम पुण्य इस किंगडम कभी उत्पादित ''  , a sentiment with which Samuel Johnson agreed .
Historian Hugh Trevor-Roper said in  1977 कि अधिक थी `` the पहला ग्रेट अंग्रेज जिसको we महसूस कि we जान , the सबसे saintly of humanists , the सबसे इंसान  of saints , the universal man of our cool northern renaissance . ''
Captain Nemo , also known as Prince Dakkar , is a fictional character  invented by the फ्रेंच विज्ञान fiction लेखक जूल्स वर्न  .
Nemo appears in two of Verne 's novels , Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea ( 1870 ) and The Mysterious  द्वीप ( 1874 ) , और makes a कैमियो रूप in वर्न 's खेल यात्रा through  the Impossible ( 1882 ) .
Nemo , one of the  सबसे प्रसिद्ध antiheroes in  fiction , is a mysterious figure .
The son of an  भारतीय राजा , he is a वैज्ञानिक प्रतिभाशाली जो roams the गहराइयों of the समुद्र in उसके पनडुब्बी  , the Nautilus , which was built on a deserted island .
Nemo tries to project a stern  , नियंत्रित विश्वास , लकिन he is चलित by a प्यास लिये प्रतिशोध और a  hatred of imperialism ( particularly the British Empire ) .
He is also wracked by  पछतावा over the मौतों of उसके क्रू  members and even by the deaths of enemy sailors .
Nemo has  appeared in विभिन्न adaptations of वर्न 's novels , सहित films , जहाँ he रै महरूम  portrayed by a number of different actors .
He has furthermore been  अपनाया by अन्य लेखक लिये समावेश in उनके novels , सबसे notably in एलन मूर 's the  League of Extraordinary Gentlemen and Philip José Farmer 's The Other Log of Phileas Fogg .
Listed below are the Major League Baseball teams with  the बेहतरीन ऋतु won-lost रिकॉर्ड in इतिहास , as संकल्पित by जीतना प्रतिशत ( .700 or बेहतर  ) , minimum 120 games played .
ध्वनिक coupler  modem
A modem ( modulator-demodulator ) is a  यंत्र कि modulates an एनालॉग वाहक सिग्नल to encode डिजिटल सूचना , और भी demodulates ऐसे a  carrier signal to decode the transmitted information .
The goal is to produce a signal that can be  transmitted easily और decoded to reproduce  the original digital data .
Modems can be used over any means of transmitting analog  सिग्नल , इससे लाइट emitting  diodes to radio .
The most familiar  उदाहरण is a आवाज़ बैंड मॉडेम कि turns the डिजिटल आंकड़ा of a निजी  computer into modulated electrical signals in the voice frequency range of a telephone channel .
These signals can be transmitted over  टेलीफोन लाइनों और demodulated by another मॉडेम at the receiver  side to recover the digital data .
Modems are generally classified by the  राशि of आंकड़ा वे can भेजें in a दिए ईकाई of समय , प्रायः expressed in बिट्स प्रति दूसरी ( bit/s , or  bps ) , or bytes per second ( B/s ) .
Modems can alternatively be  वर्गीकृत by उनके प्रतीक रेट , measured  in baud .
The baud unit denotes symbols per  दूसरी , or the क्रमांक of टाइम्स प्रति दूसरी the  modem sends a new signal .
For example , the ITU V.21 standard used audio  आवृत्ति शिफ़्ट keying साथ दो संभावित बारंबारता सम्बन्धित to दो पृथक प्रतीकों ( or एक बिट  per symbol ) , to carry 300 bits per second using 300 baud .
By contrast , the original ITU V.22 standard , which was able to  संचारण और प्राप्त चार पृथक प्रतीकों ( दो बिट्स प्रति प्रतीक ) , संभाला 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 प्रतीकों  per second ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying .
The Declaration of Independence is a statement  अपनाया by the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4 , 1776 , जिससे घोषित कि the तेरह अमरीकी colonies , तब at युद्ध साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  , regarded themselves as independent states , and no longer a part of the British Empire .
Instead they now formed a new  nation—the संयुक्त राज्य  of America .
John Adams was  a नेता in pushing लिये स्वतंत्रता , जिससे  was unanimously approved on July 2 .
A committee had already drafted the formal declaration , to be  तैयार जब कॉंग्रेस voted on स्वतंत्रता  .
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to  लिखें the असली ड्राफ्ट of the दस्तावेज़ , जिससे कॉंग्रेस होता  edit to produce the final version .
The Declaration was ultimately a formal  स्पष्टीकरण of क्यों कॉंग्रेस था voted on जुलाई 2 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  , more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday , the Independence  दिन is मनाये on जुलाई 4 , हालांकि  Adams wanted July 2 .
After  ratifying the टेक्स्ट on जुलाई 4 , कॉंग्रेस जारी the घोषणा  of Independence in several forms .
It was initially published as the printed Dunlap broadside  कि थी widely वितरित और  read to the public .
The most famous version of the Declaration , a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता , is प्रदर्शित at the नेशनल अभिलेख in वॉशिंगटन ,  D.C .
हालांकि the wording of the घोषणा थी स्वीकृत  on July 4 , the date of its signing was August 2 .
The original July 4 United States Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता पाण्डुलिपि थी खोया जबकि सब अन्य नक़ल have महरूम  derived from this original document .
The sources and interpretation of the  घोषणा have महरूम  the subject of much scholarly inquiry .
the घोषणा जायज the स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य by लिस्टिंग  colonial grievances against King George III , and by asserting certain natural and legal rights , including a right of revolution .
Having served its original purpose in announcing independence , the text of the  घोषणा थी initially उपेक्षित बाद the अमरीकी क्रान्ति  .
Since then  , it रै आइये to be माना a प्रमुख बयान on  human rights , particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident , that all men are  निर्मित बराबर , कि वे हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable अधिकारों , कि among ये  are Life , Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness .
इस रै महरूम पुकारा `` एक of the best-known वाक्य in the अंग्रेज़ी  language '' , containing `` the most potent and consequential words in American history . ''
The passage came to represent a moral  मानक to जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य चाहिए नीयत .
This view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln , who considered the Declaration to be the foundation of his political philosophy , and  argued कि the घोषणा is a बयान of सिद्धान्त through जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान चाहिए be interpreted  .
It has inspired  कार्य लिये the अधिकारों of अधिकारहीन  people throughout the world .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था of ग्रीनलैंड can be characterized as छोटी  , mixed and vulnerable .
The present economy consists of a big public sector and comprehensive foreign trade , which has resulted in an  अर्थव्यवस्था साथ अवधि of दमदार विकास , considerable महंगाई , बेरोजगारी समस्याएं और चरम dependence  on capital inflow from Denmark and use of outside , mainly Danish , skilled labor .
GDP per capita is similar to the average European economies but the economy is critically dependent upon substantial support from  the डैनिश सरकारी , जिससे आपूर्तियाँ परिचय हाफ the revenues of the घर नियम सरकारी जो in फेरे employ परिचय 8,000 greenlanders आउट  of a labor force of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ) .
बेरोजगारी nonetheless remains ऊँची , साथ the बाकी of the अर्थव्यवस्था निर्भर upon माँग  for exports of shrimp and fish .
हाइड्रोजन is a रासायनिक तत्व  with symbol H and atomic number 1 .
With an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ) , hydrogen is the lightest element and its  monatomic रूप ( h1 ) is the सबसे abundant रासायनिक  substance , constituting roughly 75 % of the Universe 's baryonic mass .
Non- remnant stars  हैं मुख्यतः रचित of हाइड्रोजन  in its plasma state .
At standard temperature and  दबाव , हाइड्रोजन is a colorless , गंधहीन , tasteless , non-toxic , nonmetallic , अत्यधिक combustible diatomic गैस साथ  the molecular formula H2 .
सबसे of the हाइड्रोजन on धरती is in अणुओं ऐसे as जल  and organic compounds because hydrogen readily forms covalent compounds with most non-metallic elements .
Hydrogen plays a particularly  महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in acid-base रसायन साथ अनेक प्रतिक्रियाएँ  exchanging protons between soluble molecules .
In ionic compounds , it can take a negative charge  ( an anion ज्ञात as a हाइड्राइड और लिखा as h− ) , or as a positively चार्ज प्रजाति  H+ .
The latter cation is written as though composed of a bare proton , but  in वास्तविकता , हाइड्रोजन cations in ionic यौगिकों सदा occur as अधिक जटिल प्रजाति  .
The most common isotope of  हाइड्रोजन is protium ( नाम rarely प्रयुक्त , प्रतीक 1h ) साथ a सिंगल  proton and no neutrons .
As  the सरलतम अणु ज्ञात , the हाइड्रोजन  atom has been of theoretical use .
For example , as the only neutral atom with an analytic solution to the Schrödinger  समीकरण , the पढ़ाई of the energetics और संबंध of the हाइड्रोजन अणु निभाई a कुंजी भूमिका in the विकास of  quantum mechanics .
Hydrogen gas was first artificially  उत्पादित in the जल्दी 16th सदी  , via the mixing of metals with acids .
In 1766–81 , Henry  कैवेंडिश थी the पहला to recognize कि हाइड्रोजन गैस थी a अलहदा पदार्थ , और कि it produces जल जब burned , a प्रॉपर्टी  which later gave it its name : in Greek , hydrogen means `` water-former '' .
Industrial production is mainly from the steam reforming of  प्राकृतिक गैस , और कम प्रायः इससे अधिक energy-intensive  hydrogen production methods like the electrolysis of water .
Most hydrogen is employed near its production site ,  साथ the दो largest उपयोग होने चट्टान ईंधन प्रसंस्करण ( e.g. , hydrocracking  ) and ammonia production , mostly for the fertilizer market .
Hydrogen is a concern in metallurgy as it can  embrittle अनेक धातुओं , complicating the डिज़ाइन of pipelines  and storage tanks .
Unstoppable is a 2010 American action thriller film directed by  टोनी स्कॉट , लिखा by चिह्नित bomback , और अभिनीत डेंज़ल वॉशिंगटन  and Chris Pine .
The  फिल्मी , loosely आधारित on the real-life csx 8888 घटना , tells the स्टोरी of a runaway  freight train , and the two men ( Washington and Pine ) who manage to stop it .
It  थी स्कॉट 's फाइनल विशेषता फिल्मी पहले  his death in 2012 .
The  फिल्मी थी released in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा on नवम्बर  12 , 2010 , and in the United Kingdom on November 24 , 2010 .
It received  ज़्यादातर अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ इससे फिल्मी आलोचकों ; it garnered a `` certified भैस  '' rating on Rotten Tomatoes based upon aggregated reviews and a rating of `` Generally favorable reviews '' at Metacritic .
The film was nominated for an  अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि संपादन at the 83rd अकादमी  Awards , but lost to Inception .
In photography , bracketing is the general  तकनीक of लेने अनेक गोलियाँ of the वही विषय  using different camera settings .
bracketing is उपयोगी और प्रायः अनुशंसित in परिस्थितियों कि मेक it मुश्किल to obtain a संतोषजनक चित्र साथ a सिंगल शॉट , विशेषकर  when a small variation in exposure parameters has a comparatively large effect on the resulting image .
Autobracketing is automatic  bracketing by using a सेटिंग on the कैमरा to लो अनेक bracketed गोलियाँ  ( in contrast to the photographer altering the settings by hand between each shot ) .
Given the time it  takes to accomplish अनेक गोलियाँ , it is typically , लकिन नहीं सदा  , used for static subjects .
Insulated glazing ( IG ) , more commonly known as double glazing ( or double-pane ,  और increasingly ट्रिपल glazing/pane ) हैं दोगुना or ट्रिपल कांच खिड़की panes अलग by an एयर or अन्य गैस  filled space to reduce heat transfer across a part of the building envelope .
Insulated Glass Units are manufactured with glass in range of thickness from  3 mm to 10 mm or अधिक in खास अनुप्रयोग .
Laminated or tempered  कांच may भी be प्रयुक्त as भाग  of the construction .
सबसे इकाई हैं manufactured साथ the वही मोटाई of कांच प्रयुक्त on दोनो panes लकिन  special applications such as acoustic attenuation or security may require wide ranges of thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit .
A sectioned  आरेख of a फिक्स्ड insulated चमकीले ईकाई ( igu ) , indicating the  numbering convention used in this article .
Surface # 1 is facing outside , Surface # 2 is the inside surface of the exterior  फलक , सतह # 3 is the बाहर सतह of the आंतरिक फलक , और सतह # 4 is the अंदर सतह  of interior pane .
The window  फ़्रेम is labelled # 5 , a spacer is indicated as # 6 , seals हैं दिखाया in रेड  ( # 7 ) , the internal reveal is on the right hand side ( # 8 ) and the exterior windowsill on the left ( # 9 )
To  reduce shear प्रभाव on the sealed ईकाई ( a प्रमुख कारण of असामयिक विफलता ) , निर्माताओं  use a rule of thumb that permits a difference of 1 mm between the thickness of the panes of glass used in the unit and still maintain the warranty for the unit .
For example , a unit may be  ordered साथ a 4 mm फलक on the  exterior and a 3 mm pane on the interior .
These variations are allowed for  architectural और लागत कारण  .
Other combinations can  be निर्दिष्ट और उत्पादित लकिन the निर्माता  may reserve the right to limit the term of the warranty or refuse to warranty the unit altogether .
For ease of description the surfaces of a double paned  ईकाई हैं नामित according to the following सम्मेलन : सतह # 1 ( facing बाहर ) , सतह # 2 ( अंदर  of outside pane ) , Surface # 3 ( outside of inside pane ) and Surface # 4 ( inside surface of inside pane ) .
applying the सम्बन्धित नामकरण  for triple paned units results in surfaces # 1 through # 6 .
the प्रदर्शन of insulating glazing  can be modified through the use of the following:
A typical  संस्थापना of insulated  glazing windows with uPVC window frames .
Selenium  is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक se और  atomic number 34 .
It is a  अधातु साथ गुण कि हैं इंटरमीडिएट  between those of its periodic table column-adjacent chalcogen elements sulfur and tellurium .
It rarely occurs  in इसके elemental राज्य in प्रकृति , or as  pure ore compounds .
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη selene meaning `` Moon ''  ) थी खोजा in 1817 by jöns याक़ूब berzelius , जो विख्यात the समानता of the नई तत्व to  the previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth ) .
सेलेनियम is मिला impurely in मेटल sulfide  ores , where it partially replaces the sulfur .
Commercially , selenium is  उत्पादित as a byproduct in the शोधन of ये ores , सबसे  often during copper production .
खनिज कि हैं pure selenide  or selenate compounds are known , but are rare .
The chief  वाणिज्यिक उपयोग लिये सेलेनियम आज हैं in glassmaking  and in pigments .
Selenium is a  सेमीकंडक्टर और  is used in photocells .
Uses  in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स , एकबार महत्वपूर्ण  , have been mostly supplanted by silicon semiconductor devices .
सेलेनियम continues to be प्रयुक्त in a few प्रकार of dc शक्ति surge  protectors and one type of fluorescent quantum dot .
Selenium salts  हैं विषाक्त in विशाल amounts , लकिन ट्रेस amounts हैं जरुरी लिये  cellular function in many organisms , including all animals .
Selenium is a component of the antioxidant enzymes glutathione peroxidase and thioredoxin reductase (  जिससे indirectly reduce निश्चित oxidized अणुओं in पशु और  some plants ) .
It is also found in three  deiodinase एंजाइमों , जिससे बदलें एक  thyroid hormone to another .
Selenium requirements in plants  differ by प्रजाति , साथ कुछ पौधे requiring अपेक्षाकृत  large amounts , and others apparently requiring none .
The United States presidential election of 2008  थी the 56th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय  election .
It was held on  मंगलवार , नवम्बर 4 , 2008  .
Democrat Barack Obama , then the  जूनियर सीनेटर इससे इलिनोइस , पराजित रिपब्लिकन जॉन मैक्केन  , the senior Senator from Arizona .
As the campaign progressed , the War in Iraq and outgoing Republican President George W. Bush had become increasingly  unpopular , और the major-party उम्मीदवार भागा on a मंच  of change and reform .
Domestic policy  और the अर्थव्यवस्था आखिरकार उभरा as the प्रमुख विषयवस्तु in the पिछला few महीने of the चुनाव अभियान बाद  the onset of the worst recession since the 1930s .
ओबामा होता go on to जीत a निर्णायक विजय over  McCain in both the electoral and popular vote .
Obama received the most votes for a presidential candidate in American  इतिहास , और जीती the लोकप्रिय और चुनावी vote by the largest हाशिया in 12 सालो , as खूब as  the largest percentage of the popular vote for a Democrat in nearly a half-century .
This was the first U.S.  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव in जिससे an अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी थी निर्वाचित , having भी महरूम the पहला in जिससे  an African American won the nomination of either major party .
This election was also notable for being the first time in U.S. history that both major party candidates were sitting U.S .  सीनेटरों , तभी the तीसरा समय ( बाद 1920 और 1960 ) कि कोई बैठे u.s . सीनेटर थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष , और तभी the दूसरी समय कि the जीतना अध्यक्ष और वाइस  President ( Obama and Biden ) were both sitting U.S . Senators .
This was also the first election since 1952 in which neither of the major  पार्टियों ' नामांकित थी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष or वाइस  President .
The Sovereign  प्रिंस or राजकुमारी of मोनाको is the reigning monarch और सिर  of state of the Principality of Monaco .
All princes or princesses have officially taken the name of the  हाउस of grimaldi , लकिन have belonged to विभिन्न अन्य घरों  ( Goyon de Matignon , Polignac ) in male line .
The  reigning प्रिंस is  Albert II .
कल्पना of fragmentation  and then of defragmentation
In the maintenance of  संचिका प्रणालियों , defragmentation is a प्रक्रम कि reduces  the amount of fragmentation .
It does this by physically organizing the contents of the mass  भंडार यंत्र प्रयुक्त to स्टोर फाइलें into the smallest क्रमांक of संलग्न  regions ( fragments ) .
It also attempts to create larger regions of free  स्पेस using compaction to impede the वापसी of fragmentation  .
Some defragmentation utilities try to keep smaller files within a single directory  साथ , as वे हैं प्रायः पहुँचा in अनुक्रम .
Defragmentation is advantageous and relevant to  संचिका प्रणालियों on electromechanical  disk drives .
The  गति of the मुश्किल ड्राइव 's read/write heads over अलग क्षेत्रों of the डिस्क जब accessing fragmented फाइलें  is slower , compared to accessing the entire contents of a non-fragmented file sequentially without moving the read/write heads to seek other fragments .
A service-level agreement ( SLA ) is a part of a  सेवा अनुबंध जहाँ a सेवा is formally पारिभाषित  .
In practice , the term SLA is  sometimes प्रयुक्त to refer to the contracted डिलीवरी समय ( of the सेवा or प्रदर्शन  ) .
As an example , internet service providers will commonly include service level agreements  भीतर the शर्तें of उनके अनुबंध साथ ग्राहक to define the स्तर ( s  ) of service being sold in plain language terms .
In this case the SLA will typically have a technical definition in terms of mean time between failures ( MTBF ) , mean time to repair  or औसत समय to रिकवरी ( mttr ) ; विभिन्न आंकड़ा दरों ; throughput ; जिटर ; or समान measurable विवरण  .
Union Station is a former shopping  मॉल in संघ नगर , जॉर्जिया , in दक्षिणपश्चिम मैट्रो अटलांटा सटा  to Interstate 85 .
After new ownership and renovations in 2006 , the name was changed from  शैनन southpark मॉल in 2007 to संघ स्टेशन मॉल  .
A previous renovation  थी किया in the लेट  1990s .
The mall  रै महरूम बंद चूंकि नवम्बर  2010 .
This map shows the contiguous United States and , in insets at  the निम्नतर बाएँ , the दो राज्य कि हैं नहीं  contiguous .
The  संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य हैं the 48 adjoining u.S. राज्य on the महाद्वीप of उत्तर अमेरिका  that are south of Canada and north of Mexico , plus the District of Columbia .
The term excludes the  राज्य of अलास्का और हवाई , और सब off-shore u.S. territories  and possessions , such as Puerto Rico .
Together , the 48 contiguous states and D.C. occupy a combined area  of , जिससे is 1.58 % of the कुल सतह क्षेत्रफल  of the Earth .
Of this , is land ,  composing 83.65 % of u.S.  land area .
officially , is जल क्षेत्रफल , composing 62.66  % of the nation 's water area .
The 2010 census population was 306,675,006 , composing 99.33 % of the nation 's population ,  और a घनत्व of 103.639 inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2 ) , compared to 87.264/sq  mi ( 33.692/km2 ) for the nation as a whole .
`` Why '' is the  शीर्षक of a सोंग अंकित by  American country band Rascal Flatts .
It is  the तीसरा सिंगल इससे उनके छठे स्टुडियो  album , Unstoppable .
It was released to radio stations on September 29 , 2009 and  debuted at # 44 on the u.s . बिलबोर्ड us बिलबोर्ड hot देश गीतों चार्ट  for the week of October 10 , 2009 .
It was written  by रोब mathes और एलन shamblin  .
Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness , medical need and efficiency of health care services  प्रक्रियाओं और सुविधाएं according to स्थापित मापदण्ड or दिशानिर्देश और अंतर्गत the प्रावधानों  of an applicable health benefits plan .
Typically it includes new  क्रियाएँ or निर्णय आधारित upon the विश्लेषण  of a case .
Utilization management describes proactive  प्रक्रियाओं , सहित निर्वहन नियोजन , संयुक्त नियोजन , pre-certification  and clinical case appeals .
It also covers proactive processes , such as concurrent  नैदानिक समीक्षाएँ और पीर समीक्षाएँ , as खूब as appeals introduced by the प्रदाता , payer  or patient .
As pre-certification and concurrent review of cases grew , utilization  प्रबन्धन spun आउट of utilization पुनर्विलोकन  .
While not synonymous ,  स्वास्थ्य परवाह पेशेवर tend to उपयोग the शर्तें as  interchangeable .
The difference is utilization  प्रबन्धन is और intends to मैनेज स्वास्थ्य परवाह मामले efficiently और लागत effectively पहले और दौरान स्वास्थ्य  care administration .
Utilization review is  अधिक considering whether स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी  appropriately applied after it was administered .
There are four basic techniques in  utilization management:
माँग प्रबन्धन
utilization  Review
Case  प्रबन्धन
बीमारी प्रबन्धन
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age novel by  S. E. hinton , पहला प्रकाशित in 1967  by Viking Press .
Hinton was  15 जब वो प्रारंभ लिखने the अनोखा , लकिन किया सबसे of  the work when she was sixteen and a junior in high school .
Hinton  थी 18 जब the किताब  was published .
The book follows two rival groups , the Greasers and the Socs ( pronounced by the author as , short for  socials ) , जो हैं विभाजित by उनके socioeconomic  status .
The book takes  प्लेस in तुलसा , ओक्लाहोमा  , in 1965 , but it is never stated in the book .
A film adaptation was produced in  1983 , और a little-known short-lived टेलीविज़न श्रेणी appeared in 1990 , picking up जहाँ  the movie left off .
The  संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of  the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ) .
it is अक्सर referred  to as the House .
the अन्य हाउस  is the Senate .
The composition and powers of the House are  स्थापित in आलेख एक of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान  .
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to  by the u.S. अध्यक्ष पहले बनने विधि ( जबतक दोनो the हाउस और सीनेट re-pass the विधान साथ a two-thirds बहुमत in प्रत्येक कक्ष  ) .
The House  रै अनेक विशेष शक्तियां : the शक्ति to initiate आय बिल्स , to impeach  officials , and to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College .
Each U.S.  राज्य is represented in the हाउस in proportion  to its population but is entitled to at least one representative .
The most  populous राज्य , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , फिलहाल रै  53 representatives .
The total  क्रमांक of मतदान प्रतिनिधि  is fixed by law at 435 .
Each  प्रतिनिधि serves लिये a  two-year term .
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives , who presides over the chamber , is elected by the members of the House , and is  इसलिए traditionally the नेता of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the  House Republican Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The House meets in the  दक्षिण wing of the संयुक्त राज्य  Capitol .
A supply chain is  दरअसल a जटिल और डायनेमिक सप्लाई  and demand network .
( cf  . wieland/wallenburg  , 2011 )
A supply chain is a system of  संगठन , लोगों , क्रियाएँ , सूचना , और संसाधन शामिल in चलती  a product or service from supplier to customer .
Supply chain activities transform  प्राकृतिक संसाधन , कच्चा सामग्री , और components into a समाप्त  product that is delivered to the end customer .
In sophisticated  सप्लाई कड़ी प्रणालियों , प्रयुक्त उत्पाद  may re-enter the supply chain at any point where residual value is recyclable .
Supply  जंजीरों कड़ी मान  chains .
`` Purple Haze '' is a song written and recorded by Jimi  हेंड्रिक्स in 1967 , released as the दूसरी सिंगल by the जिमि हेंड्रिक्स अनुभव  in both the United Kingdom and the United States .
It later appeared on the  अमरीकी संस्करण of the बैंड 's  1967 album Are You Experienced .
`` Purple Haze '' has become one of the ``  archetypical साइकेडेलिक ड्रग गीतों of the sixties '' .
`` Purple Haze 's '' guitar virtuosic  तकनीकों होता be emulated by अनेक मेटल guitarists  .
A close up picture of a  गैंडा स्किन  .
Skin is the soft  बाहरी covering of vertebrates  .
Other animal coverings such as  the सन्धिपाद बहि have अलग developmental  origin , structure and chemical composition .
The  क्रियाशील cutaneous अर्थात् `` of the स्किन  '' ( from Latin cutis , skin ) .
In mammals , the  स्किन is the largest अंग of the integumentary प्रणाली बना up of अनेक परतों  of ectodermal tissue , and guards the underlying muscles , bones , ligaments and internal organs .
Skin of a different nature  exists in amphibians , सरीसृपों , और पक्षियों  .
All mammals have some hair on  उनके स्किन , भी समुद्री स्तनधारियों जिससे appear to be hairless  .
the स्किन अंतरफलक साथ the पर्यावरण  and is the first line of defense from external factors .
For example , the skin plays a key role in  protecting the देह विरूद्ध pathogens  and excessive water loss .
Its other functions are insulation , temperature regulation ,  सनसनी , और the उत्पादन of  vitamin D folates .
Severely damaged skin may  चंगा by forming scar  tissue .
This is  sometimes discoloured  and depigmented .
The thickness of skin also  varies इससे स्थान to स्थान on an  organism .
In humans for example , the skin located under the eyes and around the eyelids  is the thinnest स्किन in the देह at 0.5 mm मोटा ,  and is one of the first areas to show signs of aging such as `` crows feet '' and wrinkles .
The skin on the palms and the soles of the feet  is 4 mm मोटा और the thickest स्किन  in the body .
Fur is  घना  hair .
Primarily ,  फर augments the इन्सुलेशन the स्किन provides लकिन can भी serve as  a secondary sexual characteristic or as camouflage .
On some animals , the skin is very  मुश्किल और मोटा , और can be processed  to create leather .
सरीसृपों और मछली have मुश्किल सुरक्षात्मक तराजू on  their skin for protection , and birds have hard feathers , all made of tough β- keratins .
Amphibian skin is not a  दमदार अवरोध to ड्योढ़ी of रसायन और is प्रायः विषय  to osmosis and diffusive forces .
For example , a frog sitting in an anesthetic  समाधान होता be sedated जल्दी , as the रासायनिक diffuses through इसके स्किन  .
थामस स्कॉट
The Rev . Thomas  स्कॉट ( 1747-1821 ) थी an influential उपदेशक और लेखक जो is प्रधानतया ज्ञात  for his best-selling work A Commentary On The Whole Bible and The Force of Truth , and as one of the founders of the Church Missionary Society .
Daniel Radcliffe , who portrays Harry Potter , has been the icon of  the फिल्मी श्रेणी चूंकि the रिलीज of the पहला  film in 2001 .
Some of the most renowned actors of the  संयुक्त किंगडम और आयरलैंड have voiced or portrayed वर्ण appearing  in the Harry Potter film series based on the book series by J. K. Rowling .
डेनियल radcliffe , रुपर्ट grint और एम्मा वाटसन have निभाई  Harry Potter , Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger in all the films .
When they were cast  तभी radcliffe था previously acted  in a film .
Complementing them on screen are such actors as Helena Bonham Carter , Jim Broadbent , John Cleese , Robbie Coltrane , Warwick Davis , Ralph Fiennes , Michael  gambon , ब्रेंडन gleeson , रिचर्ड ग्रीफिथ , रिचर्ड हैरिस , जॉन ठेस , जेसन isaacs , miriam margolyes , हेलेन mccrory , गेरी oldman , एलन rickman , फिओना शॉ , मैगी स्मिथ , टिमोथी spall , imelda staunton , दाउद thewlis , एम्मा  Thompson , and Julie Walters , among others .
Thirteen actors have appeared as the same  अक्षर in सब आठ films of the मताधिकार  .
Some well-known British  अभिनेताओं जो have नहीं appeared in  the series , are asked in jest why they have not been cast .
When David Yates was directing the fifth film , Bill Nighy , who had  previously collaborated साथ येट्स on तीन of उसके टेलीविज़न प्रोजेक्ट , कहा कि he joked साथ येट्स कि संभवतः अभी  he would n't be the only actor in England who had n't been in Harry Potter .
``  लकिन nobody पुकारा '' , nighy  added .
But in 2009 ,  येट्स डाल nighy as मंत्री of जादू rufus scrimgeour in  Deathly Hallows .
Nighy said , `` I am no longer the only English actor not  to be in हैरी कुम्हार और i am बहुत प्रसन्न . ''
Jude Law has  quipped , `` nobody 's पूछा  me .
i थी a बिट too बूढ़ा  for Harry '' .
When a reporter compared potions professor Horace Slughorn 's obsession with famous names to the series ' connection to `` every notable British actor , '' Jim  broadbent , जो plays slughorn कहा , `` खूब , नहीं प्रत्येक कर्ता  gets invited .
I know some  जो हैं स्टिल प्रतीक्षारत  . ''
With the exception of Chris Columbus , each director has had a cameo appearance in his respective film :  अलफोंसो cuarón appears as a जादूगर पकड़कर a मोमबत्ती दौरान a झाँकी at the तीन broomsticks in कैदी of azkaban ; माइक newell is सुना briefly as the रेडियो प्रस्तुतकर्ता  in Frank Bryce 's house in Goblet of Fire ; and David Yates features as a wizard within a magical moving portrait in Order of the Phoenix .
Producer David Heyman also  makes a कैमियो रूप as a जादूगर प्रदर्शित भीतर  a magical moving portrait in the third film , Prisoner of Azkaban .
J. K. रोलिंग दिया a वाक दौरान the संसार प्रीमियर of the फाइनल फिल्मी in the  series— Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2 —on 7 July 2011 in London , England .
She announced that she could never have dreamt of the talented actors  और अभिनेत्रियों जो have appeared in सब the हैरी कुम्हार फिल्मों  .
Rowling also announced that there are seven Harry Potter film series cast members , who she refers to as `` The Big  सात '' , वे हैं डेनियल radcliffe , रुपर्ट grint , एम्मा वाटसन , tom felton , मैथ्यू लुईस  , Evanna Lynch and Bonnie Wright .

( v ) indicates the actor or actress lent  तभी उसके or उसके आवाज़ लिये उसके or उसके फिल्मी अक्षर
