A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual principles , '  आधारित on the स्वीकृत साहित्य ) outlining a कोर्स of कार्रवाई लिये रिकवरी इससे , मजबूरी ,  or other behavioral problems .
Originally proposed by Alcoholics  बेनाम ( aa ) as a विधि of रिकवरी इससे alcoholism , the बारह कदम यहूद पहला प्रकाशित in the किताब alcoholics बेनाम :  The Story of How More Than One Hundred Men Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939 .
The  विधि थी तब adapted और became the  foundation of other twelve-step programs .
As summarized by the  अमरीकी मनोवैज्ञानिक संघ , the प्रक्रम  involves the following:
admitting that  एक can नहीं कंट्रोल एक  's addiction or compulsion ;
recognizing a higher  शक्ति कि can दे शक्ति ;
examining पास्ट त्रुटियाँ साथ the सहायता of a प्रायोजक  ( experienced member ) ;
making  amends लिये ये  errors ;
learning to live  a नई जीवन  with a new code of behavior ;
helping others who  suffer इससे the वही व्यसनों or compulsions  .
Witness impeachment , in the law of evidence of the United States , is the  प्रक्रम of कॉलिंग into सवाल the विश्वसनीयता of an व्यक्तिगत जो is testifying in  a trial .
The Federal Rules of Evidence contain the rules  शासी महाभियोग in संघीय  courts .
Party leaders and whips of the United  राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि हैं निर्वाचित by उनके संबंधित  parties in a closed-door caucus by secret ballot and are also known as floor leaders .
The U.S. House of Representatives  करता नहीं officially उपयोग the पद `` अल्पसंख्यक नेता '' हालांकि the  media frequently do .
The House instead  उपयोग the शर्तें `` रिपब्लिकन नेता  '' or `` Democratic Leader '' depending on which party holds a minority of seats .
The current House Majority Leader is Republican Eric  cantor , जबकि the वर्तमान हाउस अल्पसंख्यक नेता  is Democrat Nancy Pelosi .
The current House Majority  चाबुक is रिपब्लिकन केविन मैकार्थी , जबकि the वर्तमान हाउस  Minority Whip is Democrat Steny Hoyer .
Following the  outbreak of संसार युद्ध i in 1914 , the जर्मनी फौज खोली the पश्चिमी सामने by  first invading Luxembourg and Belgium , then gaining military control of important industrial regions in France .
The tide of the advance was  dramatically turned साथ the बैटल  of the Marne .
Following the race to the sea , both sides dug in along a meandering line of fortified trenches ,  stretching इससे the उत्तर समुद्र to the स्विस frontier  with France .
This line remained  essentially अपरिवर्तित लिये सबसे of the  war .
Between  1915 और 1917 वहीँ यहूद अनेक  major offensives along this front .
The attacks  employed विशाल तोपखाने  bombardments and massed infantry advances .
However , a combination of entrenchments , machine gun nests , barbed wire , and  तोपखाने repeatedly inflicted कठोर  casualties on the attackers and counterattacking defenders .
As a  परिणाम , no significant  advances were made .
Among the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with a combined [ estimated ]  700,000 मुर्दे , the बैटल of the somme साथ अधिक than [ an अनुमानित ] लाख हताहत , और the बैटल of passchendaele साथ  roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties .
In an effort to break the  deadlock , इस सामने देखी the परिचय of नई सैन्य  technology , including poison gas , aircraft and tanks .
But it was only after the adoption of  improved tactics कि कुछ उपाधि of गतिशीलता थी लौटी  .
The German  वसन्त अप्रिय of 1918 थी बना संभावित by the सन्धि of brest-litovsk  that marked the end of the conflict on the Eastern Front .
Using  the recently-introduced घुसपैठ tactics , the जर्मनी सेना उन्नत nearly to the वेस्ट , जिससे  marked the deepest advance by either side since 1914 and very nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough .
In spite of  the generally stagnant प्रकृति of इस  front , this theater would prove decisive .
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies  दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of 1918 persuaded the जर्मनी कमांडरों कि  defeat was inevitable , and the government was forced to sue for conditions of an armistice .
The terms of peace were agreed upon with the signing of  the सन्धि of versailles in 1919  .
The following  is a सूची of पुनरावर्ती और नाबालिग वर्ण in the डिज़्नी चैनल असली  Series The Suite Life of Zack & Cody .
These characters  यहूद regularly घुमाया , प्रायः disappearing लिये long  periods during the series .
The  following सूची of वर्ण रै महरूम sorted  alphabetically , by first name .
Some of the  वर्ण था no पिछला नाम और सबसे यहूद commonly referred to by उनके पहला  name so this appeared to be the most logical method .
In the case of  शेफ़ पाउलो , जो था no ज्ञात पहला नाम  , they have been listed by title .
The First Lady of the United  राज्य ( flotus ) is the होस्टेस of  the White House .
Because this position is traditionally filled by the wife of the  अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , the शीर्षक is सबसे प्रायः लागू to the  wife of a sitting president .
The current First Lady  is मिशेल ओबामा  .
After her husband Barack Obama was re-elected  on नवम्बर 6 , 2012 , वो is अनुसूचित  to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Septic shock is a medical  कंडीशन as a परिणाम of कठोर संक्रमण और सेप्सिस  , though the microbe may be systemic or localized to a particular site .
it can कारण अनेक अंग dysfunction सिंड्रोम  ( formerly known as multiple organ failure ) and death .
Its most common victims are children ,  immunocompromised individuals , और the बुजुर्ग , as उनके प्रतिरक्षा प्रणालियों  can not deal with the infection as effectively as those of healthy adults .
अक्सर , मरीजों कष्ट इससे  septic shock are cared for in intensive care units .
The  मृत्यु रेट इससे सेप्टिक शॉक  is approximately 25–50 % .
Kevin Brereton ( born February  20 , 1972 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम k-os ( ; ``  chaos '' ) , is a Canadian rapper , singer , songwriter and record producer .
His given name may also be  cited as kheaven , a स्पेलिंग  he later adopted .
The alias `` k-os '' , spelled with a lower  मामला `` k '' , थी intended to be कम आक्रामक than the pseudonyms of अन्य rappers  whose names were all upper case , such as KRS-One .
It is an acronym for ``  ज्ञान of स्वः , '' हालांकि in a बाद इंटरव्यू he कहा कि it originally stood लिये `` केविन 's  Original Sound . '' k-os ' music incorporates a wide variety of music genres , including rap , funk , rock , and reggae .
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while at times expressing criticism of  मुख्यधारा हिप हॉप संस्कृति 's obsession साथ धन  , fame and glorification of violence .
A musician as well as a producer  , k-os रै लिखा और उत्पादित nearly प्रत्येक भाग of सब चार  of his albums .
k-os usually performs  साथ a सजीव बैंड , कुछ कि is uncommon  in the hip hop genre .
He  sometimes plays गिटार और कुंजीपटल दोनो दौरान  live performances and in the studio .
k-os received his  पहला musical एक्सपोज़र साथ  the single `` Musical Essence '' , released in 1993 .
After the release of his second single ``  वृद्धि जैसे the सूर्य '' in 1996 , he withdrew इससे the उद्योग क्युकी he थी असंतुष्ट  with his musical style .
He reappeared briefly in 1999 and  released उसके डेब्यू एल्बम  Exit in 2002 .
The album received  धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ लकिन बेची अपेक्षाकृत  few copies .
He released his second album Joyful Rebellion in 2004 , which  प्राप्त प्लेटिनम औकात in कनाडा  .
A third album , , was released in 2006 and  भी गई प्लेटिनम  .
उसके चौथी  album , Yes !
, was  released in 2009  .
His fifth album  ब्लैक on सुनहरे थी released in  2013 .
The official 2007  संस्करण of the  UCC .
Even  the गोपनीय अशिष्ट मसौदा of the ucc यहूद saved  and published as a 10-volume set .
The Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code ) , first published in 1952 , is  एक of a क्रमांक of वर्दी अधिनियमों कि have महरूम promulgated in संयोजन साथ प्रयत्न to harmonize the विधि of बिक्री और अन्य वाणिज्यिक ट्रांजेक्शन in सब 50 राज्य भीतर the संयुक्त  States of America .
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing  रूट साथ एक or अधिक stops at a belay  station .
Each section of actual climbing  between stops at the belay  stations is called a pitch .
The leader ascends the  पिच , रखकर गियर और stopping to लंगर  themselves to the belay station .
The reason for the  stops can be संकल्पित by चुनाव ,  convention or necessity .
लिये example:
the रस्सी is too छोटी to do the संपूर्ण  route in one pitch ( necessity ) .
The leader  रै चलाएं आउट of सुरक्षात्मक गियर  ( necessity ) .
There is a  सुविधाजनक protectable कगार , or फिक्स्ड bolts लगाई by पिछला चढना , at the स्थान लिये a belay  station ( convention ) .
The leader chooses to rest or  एक्सचेंज लीड पहले the अगला खण्ड of the  climb ( choice ) .
The general  purpose of ये stops is to allow the दूसरी to ascend to the पाइंट of the सीसे climber जबकि collecting  the protective gear from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent .
At the belay station , the  सुरक्षात्मक गियर is एकत्रित , संभवतः exchanged to a नई नेता , और the नेता  of the next pitch ascends the route .
A diagram showing an I Formation on  ठोकर और a 4-3 गठन on रक्षा
In  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल ,  each team has eleven players on the field at one time .
the विशिष्ट भूमिका कि a खिलाड़ी  takes on the field is called their position .
अंतर्गत the आधुनिक नियम of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल , टीमों हैं अनुमत असीमित  subsititutions , that is teams may change any number of players after any play .
This has resulted in the  विकास of तीन `` platoons '' of खिलाड़ी , the ठोकर ( the टोली साथ the बॉल , जो is trying to स्कोर  ) , the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring , and to take the ball from them ) , and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons , various  विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on  what the player 's main job is .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA )  थी enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक  Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy  अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture , importation , कब्ज़ा , उपयोग और वितरण  of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation  लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on narcotic  Drugs .
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ) , with  varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ to be शामिल in प्रत्येक  .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute passed by Congress created the  आरंभिक लिस्टिंग , और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000 , जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate  in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a New Jersey Transit park-and-ride station in Wayne  , नई जर्सी साथ the montclair-boonton लकीर कि provides बस सेवा to नई यॉर्क नगर और विभिन्न अन्य अंक in the क्षेत्रफल as खूब as montclair-boonton लकीर ट्रैन सेवा to नई यॉर्क , hoboken , और  intermediate points along the line between Hackettstown and Montclair State University .
It is located off of the southbound lanes of New Jersey Route 23 on West Belt Road , near  the इंटरचेंज जहाँ रूट 23 , अंतरराज्यीय 80 , और u.S. रूट 46 मिलें , आरपार इससे the willowbrook  Mall .
The station opened in January 2008 and  रै 1,000 पार्किंग स्पेसेस  .
New Jersey Transit  intends लिये इस संयुक्त रेल और बस स्टेशन to become an `` interceptor स्टेशन  , '' that will help relieve the habitual congestion at the West Belt Road Interchange , where the three major highways meet .
In addition , the construction of the station was meant to also ease the congestion at what was then Route 23 Park & Ride , a bus depot on Route 23 North that has since been  renamed माँ 's पार्क & सवारी , और the willowbrook मॉल पार्क & सवारी ; the now-mother 's साईट था सीमित पार्किंग जबकि njt थी having ट्रबल  with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook .
The Wayne Township bus  गैरेज is स्तिथ  on the opposite side of Route 23 .
There has been a proposal  to निर्माण a पार्किंग डेक साथ another हजार धब्बे और develop  the land at the station .
In addition to Montclair-Boonton trains , the Transit Center is  परोसा by the following नई जर्सी पारगमन बस लकीरs:
75  to न्यूर्क penn स्टेशन  and Butler
194 to Port Authority  बस टर्मिनल और butler/newfoundland
198 to Port Authority Bus Terminal and  विलियम paterson विश्वविद्यालयों
324 to Port  प्राधिकार और वेन रूट  23
748 to Willowbrook Mall and  paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly called the at symbol , ampersat , apetail or commercial at  in english—and कम commonly a चौड़ी दायरा of  other terms .
The fact that there is no single word in English for the symbol has  prompted कुछ लेखक to उपयोग the फ्रेंच arobase or स्पेनी और पुर्तगाली arroba—or to सिक्का नई शब्द ऐसे  as asperand , ampersat—but none of these has achieved wide currency .
Originally an accounting and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate  of '' ( e.g . 7 विजेट @ $ 2 = $ 14 ) , it थी नहीं शामिल on the कुंजीपटल of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters  , but was on at least one 1889 model and the very successful Underwood models from the `` Underwood No . 5 '' in 1900 onward .
It is now  universally शामिल on कंप्यूटर  keyboards .
In recent years , its meaning has grown to  शामिल the भाव of होने `` स्तिथ at , '' `` और , '' or `` निर्देशित at '' , विशेषकर in ईमेल पता  and social media , particularly Twitter .
the चिह्नित  is encoded at .
The  catcher in the rye  is a 1951 novel by J. D. Salinger .
Originally  प्रकाशित लिये वयस्कों , it रै चूंकि become लोकप्रिय साथ adolescent  readers for its themes of teenage angst and alienation .
It has been translated  into लगभग सब of the संसार  's major languages .
Around 250,000 copies are sold each year with total sales  of अधिक than 65 लाख किताबे .
The novel 's protagonist and  antihero , होल्डन caulfield , रै become an प्रतीक लिये  teenage rebellion .
The novel was included on Times 2005 list of the 100 best  english-language novels लिखा चूंकि 1923 , और it थी नामित by आधुनिक पुस्तकालयों और इसके पाठक as  one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th century .
It has  महरूम अक्सर challenged in the संयुक्त राज्य और अन्य  countries for its liberal use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality .
It also deals with  जटिल मुद्दे of पहचान , belonging  , connection , and alienation .
skeletal मांसपेशियां होमो  sapiens
This is a table of  मांसपेशियां of the इंसान anatomy  .
वहीँ हैं लगभग 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां भीतर the ठेठ इंसान , और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग  of a pair of identical bilateral muscles , found on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently  , e.g . regarding कया is पारिभाषित as अलग भाग of a सिंगल मांसपेशी or  as several muscles .
Examples  दायरा इससे 640 to  850 .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of groups which include muscles  relating to the सिर और गर्दन , मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or ट्रंक , मांसपेशियां of the अपर limbs , और मांसपेशियां of the निम्नतर limbs  .
The action  refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे  the standard anatomical position .
In other positions ,  अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed  .
Bad Girls Club ( BGC ) is an American  वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित by जोनाथन मरे लिये the ऑक्सीजन टेलीविज़न  station .
The show centers on seven feisty and mischievous women with different  पृष्ठभूमि और personalities , जो have a क्रमांक of मनोवैज्ञानिक और behavioral  problems .
They are  introduced to the दिखाएँ बंद उनके घातक बर्ताव  and accomplish specific goals .
The cast , deemed `` bad girls '' , enjoy a luxurious  जीवनशैली in a ठीक mansion लिये तीन महीने , दौरान जिससे वे जरूर obey  specified rules .
Their lives inside – and outside –  of the हाउस हैं chronicled और अंकित by the उत्पादन  team .
The Bad  लड़कियों क्लबों is ब्रॉडकास्ट in पाँच देशों ( संयुक्त राज्य ,  Netherlands , Australia , Hungary , and Sweden ) .
It has received negative reviews from critics , who  मानना the दिखाएँ promotes हिंसा by adolescent दर्शक  .
Furthermore , several cast members made  विवादास्पद remarks जिससे outraged  many viewers .
The format of the show  रै बदला इससे जल्दी सीज़न  .
If a `` bad girl '' breaks a  नियम , वो is evicted इससे the दिखाएँ और , if it is जल्दी  in the season , replaced by a new `` bad girl '' .
There have been nine complete seasons of The  ख़राब लड़कियों क्लबों , साथ the दसवाँ ऋतु फिलहाल airing  .
The fourth season had the highest ratings  in the दिखाएँ 's इतिहास , बनने इसके  `` breakthrough season '' .
There have been  तीन spin-offs of the ख़राब  Girls Club .
One of them , Love Games : Bad  लड़कियों need प्रेम too , जहाँ पास्ट डाल सदस्यों तलाश सच्चा  love , has gained high ratings .
Oxygen has also released  a मोबाईल खेल , कॉमिक स्ट्रिप और merchandise  to promote the show .
Of the 92  प्रतियोगी , केरी harvick ( of ऋतु एक ) थी a कामयाब  country singer before the show .
tanisha थामस ( of ऋतु दो  ) later hosted Oxygen 's OxygenLive !
and the subsequent seasons  of प्रेम खेल : ख़राब लड़कियों  Need Love Too .
Thomas , who has been dubbed the ``  गॉडमदर '' to सब प्रतियोगी , रै  her own television documentary entitled Tanisha Gets Married .
As of  ऋतु 8 वो 's महरूम the मेजबान of  the reunion specials .
The Iowa Senate is the upper house of the  आयोवा सामान्य सभा  .
There are 50 seats in the Iowa Senate ,  representing 50 single-member जिले आरपार the राज्य साथ populations of लगभग 60,927 प्रति  constituency , .
Each Senate district is  रचित of दो हाउस जिले  .
The Senate  meets at the आयोवा राज्य  Capitol in Des Moines .
Unlike the lower house , the Iowa  हाउस of प्रतिनिधि , सीनेटरों serve four-year  terms , with half of the Senate staggered for re-election every two years .
There  हैं no पद हद  for the Senate .
mechanical मरम्मत
Maintenance , repair , and operations ( MRO ) or maintenance , repair , and overhaul involves  फिक्सिंग कोई sort of mechanical , plumbing or विद्युत यंत्र चाहिए it become आउट of अनुक्रम or टूटा ( ज्ञात as मरम्मत , unscheduled or casualty  maintenance ) .
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the device in  working अनुक्रम ( ज्ञात as अनुसूचित मेंटेनेंस ) or prevent ट्रबल इससे arising (  preventive maintenance ) .
MRO may be defined as , `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or  restoring an मद in or to a राज्य  in which it can perform its required function .
The actions include the combination of all technical and  सम्बन्धित प्रशासनिक , managerial , और पर्यवेक्षण क्रियाएँ . ''
MRO operations can  be categorised by whether the उत्पाद remains the प्रॉपर्टी of the ग्राहक , i.e . a सेवा is होने offered , or whether the  product is bought by the reprocessing organisation and sold to any customer wishing to make the purchase ( Guadette , 2002 ) .
In the former case it may be a  backshop आपरेशन भीतर a larger संगठन or छोटी  operation .
The former of these represents a closed loop supply chain and  प्रायः रै the पैमाना of मेंटेनेंस  , repair or of the product .
The latter of the  categorisations is an खोलें लूप सप्लाई कड़ी और is typified  by refurbishment and remanufacture .
The main characteristic of the  बंद लूप प्रणाली is कि the माँग लिये a उत्पाद is matched साथ the सप्लाई  of a used product .
neglecting एसेट write-offs और असाधारण क्रियाएँ the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of the  product between the customer and the service provider remains constant .
Prince William , Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ) , is  the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स , और डायना , राजकुमारी of वेल्स , और third-eldest  grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second in the line of succession , behind his father , to the thrones of sixteen independent  sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the संयुक्त किंगडम , कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , नई जीलैंड , जमैका , बारबाडोस , the बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी , the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स  , Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was educated at four schools in the United  किंगडम और प्राप्त a उपाधि इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों  of St Andrews .
He spent parts of a gap year in  चिली , बेलीज़ , तंजानिया , और कीनिया जहाँ he रै जिया और holidayed  several times .
Prince William has also taken  kiswahili अध्ययन at विश्वविद्यालयों in कीनिया  and Tanzania .
He was  commissioned as a लेफ्टिनेंट in the ब्लूज़ और रॉयल्स रेजीमेंट of the household प्यादे —serving  with his brother Prince Harry —and , two years later , earned his wings by completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell .
In 2009 , he transferred to the Royal Air Force ,  थी प्रचारित to उड़ान लेफ्टिनेंट और underwent हेलीकाप्टर उड़ती प्रशिक्षण  in order to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force .
In 2010 , he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter training and went on  to raf घाटी on no . 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot कर्तव्य on फलक a समुद्र किंग  search and rescue helicopter .
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend ,  कैथरीन मिडलटन , on 29 अप्रैल 2011  at Westminster Abbey .
Hours prior to his wedding ,  प्रिंस विलियम थी निर्मित ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज , अर्ल  of Strathearn , and Baron Carrickfergus .
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born July 28 , 1990 ) , better known by his stage name  soulja लड़के बताना 'em , or बस soulja लड़के , is an अमरीकी rapper , रिकार्ड निर्माता , कर्ता , और  entrepreneur .
In September 2007 , his  सिंगल `` crank कि ( soulja लड़के ) `` पहुँचे क्रमांक  one on the Billboard Hot 100 .
The  सिंगल थी initially self-published on the अंतरजाल , और  it later became a number-one hit in the United States for seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007 .
On August 17 Way was listed at # 18 on the  फोर्ब्स सूची of hip-hop नकदी किंग्स of 2010 कमाई $ 7 लाख लिये कि  year .
Way has currently released three studio albums and one independent album : his debut  स्टुडियो एल्बम souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) थी certified प्लेटिनम  by the RIAA .
However , his next two albums , iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) did not match  the वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू , the latter तभी selling 100,000 नक़ल , despite the कामयाबी of अनेक singles आरपार दोनो एल्बम , ऐसे as `` चुंबन  Me Thru the Phone `` and `` Turn My Swag On `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ) .
This was mainly due to negotiation  समस्याएं साथ interscope रिकॉर्ड जिससे meant a सीमित राशि  of records were made available to the public .
As of 2011 , Way has confirmed he is working on his  चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम , हकदार यूएसए ड्रे , जिससे होगा be released  in 2013 .
The electron transport chain in  the सूत्रकणिका is the साईट of oxidative phosphorylation  in eukaryotes .
The NADH  और succinate उत्पन्न in the साइट्रिक एसिड साईकिल हैं oxidized , providing  energy to power ATP synthase .
photosynthetic इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण  chain of the thylakoid membrane .
An electron transport chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer between an  इलेक्ट्रॉन दाता ( ऐसे as nadh ) और an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ( ऐसे as o2 ) साथ the ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions ( protons  ) across a membrane .
The resulting electrochemical  प्रोटॉन अनुपात is प्रयुक्त to generate रासायनिक उर्जा in the रूप  of adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) .
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms used for extracting energy from sunlight in  photosynthesis और भी इससे रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ , ऐसे as the ऑक्सीकरण of sugars ( श्वसन  ) .
In chloroplasts , light drives the  परिवर्तन of जल to ऑक्सीजन और nadP+ to nadph साथ ट्रांसफ़र  of H+ ions across chloroplast membranes .
In mitochondria , it is the conversion of oxygen to water , NADH to NAD+ and  succinate to fumarate कि हैं जरूरी to generate the प्रोटॉन अनुपात .
Electron  हस्तांतरण जंजीरों हैं प्रमुख साइट of असामयिक इलेक्ट्रॉन  leakage to oxygen , generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress .
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip ,  ryzolt , ultracet , ultram in the यूएसए , ralivia , zytram xl durella { cr-100/200 mg } in कनाडा or adolonta in स्पेन ) is a centrally एक्टिंग सिंथेटिक  analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain .
The drug has a  चौड़ी दायरा of अनुप्रयोग , सहित उपचार of आमवातीय गठिया , बेचैन  legs syndrome , motor neurone disease and fibromyalgia .
It was launched and marketed as Tramal by the German  फार्मास्युटिकल कम्पनी grünenthal gmbh  in 1977 .
Tramadol is a  कमजोर μ-opioid receptor agonist कि भी induces  serotonin release and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine .
tramadol is metabolized to o-desmethyltramadol  , a significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist .
Tramadol and its major metabolite ( s ) are distinguished from  अन्य अधिक potent opioid agonists by सापेक्ष selectivity लिये  μ-opioid receptors .
Bernard Lawrence `` Bernie '' Madoff ( ; born  अप्रैल 29 , 1938 ) is an अमरीकी पूर्व stockbroker , निवेश  advisor , financier , and white collar criminal .
He  is the पूर्व non-executive अध्यक्ष of the नैस्डैक भण्डार मार्केट , और the admitted ऑपरेटर  of a Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest financial fraud in U.S. history .
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm Bernard L. Madoff  निवेश प्रतिभूति llc in 1960 , और थी इसके अध्यक्ष  until his arrest on December 11 , 2008 .
The firm was one of the top market maker businesses on Wall Street , which  bypassed `` विशेषज्ञ '' firms by सीधे निष्पादित आदेश over the काउंटर इससे  retail brokers .
He employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director and Chief Compliance Officer ; Peter has since  महरूम sentenced to 10 सालो in थाना  .
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm  's नियम और अनुपालन अधिकारी और attorney , और उसके बेटे एंड्रयू  and Mark ( Mark committed suicide by hanging exactly two years after his father 's arrest ) .
On December 10 , 2008 ,  madoff 's बेटे बताई अधिकारियों कि उनके पिता था confessed to उन्हें कि the एसेट प्रबन्धन ईकाई of उसके  firm was a massive Ponzi scheme , and quoted him as describing it as `` one big lie . ''
The  following दिन , एफबीआई एजेंटों गिरफ्तार madoff  and charged him with one count of securities fraud .
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) had previously conducted investigations  into madoff 's कारोबार practices , लकिन किया नहीं ख़ोज the विशाल धोखाधड़ी  .
In March 2009 , Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 federal felonies and admitted to turning his wealth  प्रबन्धन कारोबार into a विशाल पेन्शन योजना कि झांसे हज़ारों of निवेशकों of अरबों of डॉलर  .
Madoff said  he began the पेन्शन योजना in the  early 1990s .
However ,  संघीय जांचकर्ताओं मानना the धोखाधड़ी began as जल्दी as the 1970s , और those चार्ज साथ recovering  the missing money believe the investment operation may never have been legitimate .
The amount missing from client accounts , including  fabricated gains , थी लगभग $ 65 अरब  .
The court-appointed trustee estimated  वास्तविक नुकसान to निवेशकों of $ 18 अरब .
On June 29  , 2009 , he थी sentenced to 150 सालो in थाना  , the maximum allowed .
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to  recognize the कार्य of secretaries , प्रशासनिक assistants , receptionists , और अन्य प्रशासनिक  support professionals .
In North America , it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full  सप्ताह of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 24 in 2013  ) .
In France it is celebrated on the  तीसरा गुरुवार in अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 18 in 2013 )  .
In Australia it is  मनाये on the पहला शुक्रवार  in May
A quasi-judicial  देह is an एंटिटी ऐसे as an arbitrator or ट्रिब्यूनल फलक , generally of a पब्लिक प्रशासनिक एजेंसी , जिससे रै  powers and procedures resembling those of a court of law or judge , and which is obligated to objectively determine facts and draw conclusions from them so as to provide the basis of an official action .
Such actions are able to remedy a  हालात or थोपने विधिक दंड , और may affect  the legal rights , duties or privileges of specific parties .
Monument of Tycho Brahe and  योहानेस कॅप्लर in  Prague
Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624 October 1601 ) , born Tyge Ottesen Brahe ,  थी a डैनिश nobleman  known for his accurate and comprehensive astronomical and planetary observations .
He  थी born in स्कैनिया , तब भाग of डेनमार्क  , now part of modern-day Sweden .
Tycho was well known in his  आजीवन as an astronomer और  alchemist .
In his De nova stella ( On the  नई स्टार ) of 1573 , he refuted the aristotelian  belief in an unchanging celestial realm .
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars , '' (  stellae novae , अभी ज्ञात as supernovae ) in particular कि of 1572 , lacked the लंबन अपेक्षित in sub-lunar phenomena  , and were therefore not `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously believed , but were above the atmosphere and moon .
Using similar measurements he showed that comets were also not atmospheric phenomena , as previously  विचार , और जरूर pass through the माना `` अपरिवर्तनीय  '' celestial spheres .
As an astronomer , Tycho worked to combine what he saw as the geometrical benefits of the  copernican प्रणाली साथ the philosophical लाभ of the ptolemaic प्रणाली into उसके अपना  model of the universe , the Tychonic system .
Furthermore , he was the  पिछला of the प्रमुख नग्न नजर खगोलशास्त्रियों , working  without telescopes for his observations .
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the island of  hven और the funding to निर्माण the uraniborg , an जल्दी शोध संस्थान , जहाँ he निर्मित विशाल खगोलीय यंत्र और took अनेक careful माप  , and later Stjerneborg , underground , when he discovered that his instruments in the former were not sufficiently steady .
On the island (  on जिससे he demonstrated निरंकुश अक्षर और बर्ताव toward the निवासियों ) he संस्थापित manufactories  such as paper-making to provide material for printing his results .
After disagreements with the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597  , he थी आमंत्रित by the bohemian किंग और पावन रोमन सम्राट rudolph ii to प्राग , जहाँ he became  the official imperial astronomer .
he निर्मित the नई वेधशाला  at Benátky nad Jizerou .
Here , from 1600 until his death in 1601 , he was assisted by Johannes  कॅप्लर जो बाद प्रयुक्त tycho 's खगोलीय आंकड़ा to develop कॅप्लर 's  laws of planetary motion .
Guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a district of Seoul  , दक्षिण कोरियाई , जिससे थी अलग इससे yeongdeungpo ज़िला  on April 1 , 1980 .
Located in the  southwestern भाग of the नगर , जहाँ besides yangcheon ज़िला और geumcheon ज़िला guro ज़िला रै an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति  as a transport link which contains railroads , land routes from the rest of Seoul to the south of the country .
The  gyeongbu और gyeongin  railway lines connect Seoul to Busan and Incheon .
in जोड , सियोल महानगर सबवे लाइनों 1 ,  2 , and 7 , and major highways intersect in Guro District .
The name Guro originates from the legend that nine ( )  बूढ़ा मेन ( कोरियाई : ro ) enjoyed आयु  in the district .
A digital  औद्योगिक जटिल is स्तिथ  in Guro District .
the guro डिजिटल औद्योगिक जटिल , जिससे निभाई a अग्रणी औद्योगिक भूमिका मुख्यतः साथ वस्त्र निर्माण , dressmaking  and other labour-intensive industries in 1967 , has been rapidly changed into an IT industrial complex .
This complex played a pivotal role in the economic growth  of the दक्षिण कोरियाई 's विकास era , referred to as the `` चमत्कार on the हान नदी `` , और भी contributed 10 प्रतिशत  of national export in the 1970s .
Twenty-one percent of the total area of Guro District is a restricted zone to  be प्रयुक्त as a greenbelt साथ the तभी arboretum  in Seoul .
The zone is  बदलना into a जीवंत ज़िला as विशाल labour-intensive कारखानों  are moving from the area and the council is developing what it terms its four zones .
An `` e-government `` system based on this hosted the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation फ़ोरम on फ़रवरी 7–9 , 2007 , साथ the भागीदारी  of more than thirty-seven countries .
the फ़ोरम थी शुभारम्भ साथ the थीम `` promoting लोकतंत्र और क्षेत्रीय विकास '' और twenty-five mayors सहित आंद्रे santini ( issy-les-moulineaux ,  France ) , Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill , US ) , Apirak Kosayothin ( Bangkok , Thailand ) , Uvais Mohamed Emthiyas ( Colombo , Sri Lanka ) , and world experts such as Dr William H. Dutton ( Director of Oxford Internet Institute at the University of Oxford , UK ) and Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere , Finland ) participated in the forum .
The Guro  घोषणा , अपनाया दौरान the फ़ोरम , aims to नियत up a पोर्टल साईट लिये e-government विकास और to  establish a concrete project in order to bridge the digital divide among the world 's cities .
This practice has been recognised for  providing a नई महत्वपूर्ण कदम in the विकास  of e-democracy .
The  e-participation फ़ोरम थी a कुंजी फ़ैक्टर लिये guro to खेल the अग्रणी भूमिका in bridging the डिजिटल divide among शहरों , to provide i.t . उद्यमों  located in Guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity to launch into the international market , to improve its image and become a global leader to concrete e-democracy .
The international  e-participation फ़ोरम on फ़रवरी 7–9 , 2007
A wonton ( also spelled  wantan , wanton , or wuntun in ट्रांसक्रिप्शन इससे cantonese ; मंदारिन :  húndùn ) is a type of dumpling commonly found in a number of Chinese cuisines .
Many people were  शामिल in the आविष्कार of रेडियो as we अभी जान it .
Several possible  विधि of बेतार संचार यहूद माना , सहित आगमनात्मक और capacitive प्रेरण  and transmission through the ground , however the method used for radio today exclusively involves the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves .
After early speculation on the subject , experimental work on the connection between electricity and magnetism began around 1820 with the work of Hans Christian Ørsted and  जारी साथ the कार्य of andré-marie एम्पीयर , जोसेफ हेनरी , और माइकल फैराडे .
These investigations culminated in the complete theory of  विद्युत्चुम्बकत्व विकसित by जेम्स क्लर्क मैक्सवेल  .
इस सिद्धान्त वर्णित the सैद्धांतिक आधार of  the propagation of electromagnetic waves .
After Maxwell 's theory was published many  लोगों experimented साथ बेतार संचार , कुछ intentionally  using Maxwell 's theory some not .
It is considered likely that the first intentional  हस्तांतरण of a सिग्नल by अर्थात् of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक लहरें थी performed by दाउद  Edward Hughes around 1880 , although this was considered to be induction at the time .
The  पहला व्यवस्थित और unequivocal हस्तांतरण of em लहरें थी performed by heinrich रुडॉल्फ  Hertz and described in papers published in 1887 and 1890 .
हर्ट्ज़ famously माना ये परिणाम as होने  of little practical value .
After Hertz 's  कार्य अनेक लोगों यहूद शामिल in the विकास of components और सिद्धान्त  involved with the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves .
Others , notably Guglielmo  मार्कोनी , यहूद चिंतित साथ व्यावहारिक सुधार और the वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग  of radio to wireless telegraphy .
Later on Reginald A.  fessenden became the पहला to भेजें an ऑडियो सिग्नल by अर्थात्  of electromagnetic waves .
Scurvy is a  बीमारी resulting इससे a कमियां of विटामिन c , जिससे  is required for the synthesis of collagen in humans .
the रासायनिक नाम लिये विटामिन c , एस्कॉर्बिक एसिड , is निकला  from the Latin name of scurvy , scorbutus , which also provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of , characterized by or having to do with scurvy '' ) .
Scurvy often  presents itself initially as लक्षण of malaise और lethargy , followed by गठन of धब्बे on the स्किन ,  spongy gums , and bleeding from the mucous membranes .
Spots are most abundant  on the जांघों और टाँगे , और a व्यक्ति साथ the ailment looks पाले  , feels depressed , and is partially immobilized .
As scurvy advances , there can be  खोलें , suppurating wounds , घाटा of दांत , पीलिया  , fever , neuropathy and death .
Scurvy was at one time common among sailors , pirates and others aboard ships at sea longer than perishable fruits and  सब्जियां could be भंडारित ( subsisting बजाय तभी on cured और salted meats और सूखी दाने ) और by सैनिको similarly वंचित  of these foods for extended periods .
It was described by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c . 380 BC ) , and herbal  cures लिये स्कर्वी have महरूम ज्ञात in अनेक देशी संस्कृतियों  since prehistory .
Scurvy  थी एक of the limiting कारकों of समुद्री सफर  , often killing large numbers of the passengers and crew on long-distance voyages .
This became a significant issue in Europe from the beginning of  the आधुनिक era in the आयु of डिस्कवरी in the 15th सदी , continuing to खेल a significant भूमिका through  World War I in the 20th century .
While today scurvy is known to be caused by a nutritional deficiency , until the isolation of vitamin C and  सीधा प्रमाण of इसके कड़ी to स्कर्वी in 1932 , numerous theories और उपचार  were proposed , often on little or no experimental data .
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of vitamin C as a distinct concept , an inability to reliably link different foods  ( notably उपस्थित in भैस citrus , watercress  , and organ meat ) to scurvy .
An  अतिरिक्त अवधारणा जरूरी to  understand scurvy was the degradation of vitamin C by exposure to air and copper and other transition metal salts such as those of iron , thus changing the links of foods to scurvy over time .
Treatment by fresh food ,  विशेषकर citrus फल , थी periodically implemented  , as it had been since antiquity .
However until the 1930s , treatment was  असंगत , साथ अनेक अप्रभावी उपचार  used into the 20th century .
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy , James Lind who first  proved it could be treated साथ citrus फल in प्रयोग he वर्णित in उसके 1753 किताब , a treatise of the स्कर्वी , हालांकि उसके  advice was not implemented by the Royal Navy for several decades .
In  infants , स्कर्वी is sometimes referred to as barlow 's बीमारी , नामित  after Sir Thomas Barlow , a British physician who described it .
However , Barlow  's बीमारी may भी refer to mitral  valve prolapse .
Other  eponyms लिये स्कर्वी शामिल moeller  's disease and Cheadle 's disease .
Scurvy does  नहीं occur in सबसे पशु क्युकी वे can  synthesize their own vitamin C .
However , humans and other higher primates (  the simians - बंदरों और apes - और tarsiers ) , गिनी सूअर , सबसे or सब bats  , and some species of birds and fish lack an enzyme ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary for such synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their diet .
Vitamin C is widespread in plant tissues , with particularly high concentrations occurring in citrus fruits ( oranges  , नींबू , limes , grapefruits ) , टमाटर , आलू , पत्तागोभी , और ग्रीन  peppers .
Iron is a chemical element with  the प्रतीक fe ( इससे ) और परमाणु क्रमांक  26 .
It is a metal in the  पहला परिवर्तन श्रेणी .
It is the most common element ( by mass ) forming the planet  धरती as a पूरे , forming much of धरती  's outer and inner core .
It is the  चौथी सबसे आम तत्व in the धरती  's crust .
Iron 's very common presence in rocky planets like Earth is due to its abundant production as a result of fusion in high-mass stars ,  जहाँ the उत्पादन of nickel-56 ( जिससे decays to the सबसे आम समस्थानिक of आयरन ) is the पिछला नाभिकीय संलयन प्रतिक्रिया  that is exothermic .
This causes radioactive nickel to become the last element to be produced before collapse of a supernova leads  to the विस्फोटक कार्यक्रम कि scatter इस precursor radionuclide of आयरन  abundantly into space .
Like other group 8 elements , iron exists  in a चौड़ी दायरा of ऑक्सीकरण राज्य , −2  to +6 , although +2 and +3 are the most common .
Elemental  आयरन occurs in meteoroids और अन्य कम  oxygen environments , but is reactive to oxygen and water .
Fresh iron surfaces  appear lustrous silvery-gray , लकिन oxidize in सामान्य एयर to दे  hydrated iron oxides , commonly known as rust .
Unlike many other metals which form passivating oxide layers , iron oxides occupy more volume  than आयरन मेटल , और यूँ आयरन आक्साइड फ्लेक बंद और expose भैस सतहों लिये संक्षारण .
Iron  मेटल रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स , हालांकि तांबे alloys , जिससे have  lower melting temperatures , were used first in history .
Pure iron is soft (  softer than एल्युमिनियम ) , लकिन  is unobtainable by smelting .
The material is significantly hardened  और strengthened by impurities इससे the smelting प्रक्रम ,  such as carbon .
A certain  proportion of कार्बन ( between 0.002 % और 2.1 % ) produces स्टील  , which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure iron .
Crude iron metal is produced in blast furnaces ,  जहाँ अयस्क is घटाया by कोक to सुअर आयरन , जिससे रै a ऊँची कार्बन  content .
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon  सामग्री to the सही proportion to  make steel .
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with  अन्य धातुओं ( मिश्रधातु steels ) हैं by दूर the सबसे आम धातुओं in औद्योगिक उपयोग ,  due to their great range of desirable properties and the abundance of iron .
Iron chemical compounds , which include ferrous and ferric  यौगिकों , have अनेक  uses .
Iron  ऑक्साइड मिश्रित साथ एल्युमिनियम चूर्ण can be ignited to बनाएँ a थर्माइट प्रतिक्रिया  , used in welding and purifying ores .
It forms  शब्दकोष यौगिकों साथ the हैलोजन्स  and the chalcogens .
Among its organometallic compounds is ferrocene , the first  सैंडविच यौगिक खोजा  .
Iron plays an  महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in जीवविज्ञान , forming देवालय साथ आणविक ऑक्सीजन in हीमोग्लोबिन  and myoglobin ; these two compounds are common oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates .
Iron is also the metal used at the active site of many important  रेडॉक्स एंजाइमों dealing साथ सेल्यूलर श्वसन और ऑक्सीकरण और कटौती in  plants and animals .
The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association ( BCBSA ) is a federation  of 38 पृथक स्वास्थ्य बीमे संगठन और कंपनियाँ in  the United States .
Combined , they  सीधे or indirectly provide स्वास्थ्य बीमे to over 99  million Americans .
The history of  ब्लू क्रॉस तिथियाँ वापस to 1929 , जबकि the  history of Blue Shield dates to 1939 .
the ब्लू क्रॉस संघ तिथियाँ वापस to 1960 , जबकि इसके  Blue Shield counterpart was created in 1948 .
The two  संगठन मिलाया in 1982 , forming  the current association .
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American ,  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई , नई जीलैंड , कनाडाई , singaporean , हांग काँग , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी और jamaican अंग्रेज़ी ; as a कुरकुरे in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी  and Hiberno-English , and as either a chip or wafer in Indian English ) is a thin slice of potato that is deep fried or baked until crunchy .
Potato chips are commonly  परोसा as an क्षुधावर्धक , पक्ष डिश  , or snack .
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; additional varieties are manufactured using various  flavorings और संघटक सहित seasonings , herbs , मसाले , cheeses , और कृत्रिम  additives .
`` Crisps '' , however , may also refer to many different types of  savory स्नैक उत्पाद बेची in the संयुक्त किंगडम और आयरलैंड , कुछ बना इससे आलू , लकिन may भी  be made from maize , tapioca or other cereals .
An example of these kinds of savory  स्नैक्स is दानव  Munch .
Potato chips are a predominant part of the snack  खाना मार्केट in english-speaking देशों और numerous अन्य  Western nations .
The global potato  चिप मार्केट उत्पन्न कुल revenues of us  $ 16.4 billion in 2005 .
This accounted for 35.5  % of the कुल savory स्नैक्स मार्केट  in that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ) .
Henry Clay , Sr. ( April 12 , 1777 – June 29 , 1852 ) was a lawyer ,  राजनेता और skilled orator जो represented केंटकी in दोनो the सीनेट और in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  .
He served three different  शर्तें as स्पीकर of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और थी भी सचिव  of State from 1825 to 1829 .
He  खोया उसके अभियान लिये  president in 1824 , 1832 and 1844 .
Clay was a dominant  फिगर in दोनो the पहला और दूसरी  Party systems .
As a leading war hawk in 1812 , he favored war with Britain and  निभाई a significant भूमिका in अग्रणी the  nation to war in the War of 1812 .
In 1824 he ran for  अध्यक्ष और खोया , लकिन फेंका उसके चुनावी मत to जॉन  Quincy Adams , who made him secretary of state as the Jacksonians denounced what they considered a `` corrupt bargain . ''
He ran and lost again in  1832 और 1844 as the प्रत्याशी of the whig पार्टी , जिससे he संस्थापित  and usually dominated .
Clay was the foremost  proponent of the अमरीकी प्रणाली , लड़ लिये an बढ़ाएँ in tariffs to फोस्टर उद्योग in the  United States , the use of federal funding to build and maintain infrastructure , and a strong national bank .
He opposed the  annexation of टेक्सास , fearing it  would inject the slavery issue into politics .
Clay also opposed the Mexican-American War and the `` Manifest Destiny `` policy of  डेमोक्रेट , जिससे लागत उसे मत in the बंद 1844 चुनाव  .
Dubbed the `` Great Pacificator , '' Clay  brokered महत्वपूर्ण compromises  during the Nullification Crisis and on the slavery issue .
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio , '' along with his colleagues Daniel  वेबस्टर और जॉन C. calhoun , he थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in formulating the मिसौरी सुलह of 1820 और the सुलह of 1850  .
He was viewed as the primary  प्रतिनिधि of पश्चिमी रूचि in इस समूह , और थी दिए the names ``  Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star . ''
A plantation owner ,  मिट्टी आयोजित स्लेव दौरान उसके आजीवन लकिन  freed them in his Will .
Abraham Lincoln , the Whig leader in  इलिनोइस , थी a ग्रेट admirer of मिट्टी , saying he थी  `` my ideal of a great man . ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly  समर्थित मिट्टी 's आर्थिक  programs .
In 1957  , a सीनेट कमेटी चयनित मिट्टी as एक of the पाँच महानतम u.s . सीनेटरों  , along with Daniel Webster , John C. Calhoun , Robert La Follette , and Robert Taft .
BJ 's Wholesale Club , Inc. ,  commonly referred to बस as bj 's , is a membership-only गोदाम क्लबों कड़ी ऑपरेटिंग on the संयुक्त  States East Coast , as well as in the state of Ohio .
The company is ranked # 232 on  सौभाग्य पत्रिका 's 2010 लिस्टिंग of अमेरिका  's 500 largest public corporations .
The  जादूगर of oz , ज्ञात दौरान उसके शासनकाल as the ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली oz , is the epithet of ऑस्कर zoroaster  Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkel Emmannuel Ambroise Diggs , a fictional character in the Land of Oz , created by American author L. Frank Baum .
The character was further  popularized by the क्लासिक 1939 फिल्म , wherein  his full name is not mentioned .
Kristinia Jamie  debarge ( ; born कूच 8 , 1990 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर  , songwriter , dancer and actress .
वो पहला appeared on नेशनल टेलीविज़न in  2003 as a contestant on the American Idol spin-off , American Juniors .
In 2009 , DeBarge signed a contract with the Island Records  विभाग sodapop , releasing उसके डेब्यू एल्बम उजागर  in July of the same year .
The  पहला सिंगल , `` अलविदा `` , पहुँचे  the top 20 in the US and Canada .
The lead  सिंगल ( `` क्राई भेड़िया '' ) इससे उसके बेनाम sophomore एल्बम थी released  on September 27 , 2012 .
The Hawaii Warriors football team represents the  विश्वविद्यालयों of hawaiʻi at mānoa in ncaa प्रभाग i fbs कॉलेज  football .
The  टोली is coached by  Norm Chow .
It was part of the Western  एथलेटिक सम्मेलन जबतक जुलाई 2012 , जब the टोली joined the  Mountain West Conference .
The Hawaii Warriors were the third non-AQ team to play in a BCS bowl game ;  खोने to जॉर्जिया 41–10 in the शुगर कटोरी on जनवरी 1 , 2008 in नई ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana .
Marvin  gaye ( अप्रैल 2 , 1939april 1 , 1984 )  , born Marvin Pentz Gay , Jr. , was an American singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It  through the grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम कुएं और tammi terrell , बाद कमाई the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस  of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going  on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक दूर इससे the  reins of its production company .
Gaye 's later recordings  बहकावे अनेक r & b subgenres  such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s , Gaye  released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` यौन healing `` और the मध्यरात्रि प्रेम एल्बम  .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye has been  मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों , सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन  Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .
Location of  chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति  plant
The abandoned city of  pripyat साथ chernobyl संयंत्र in the  distance
Abandoned  आवास ब्लॉक in pripyat
The Chernobyl disaster ( , Chornobylska  katastrofa – chornobyl प्रलय ) थी a अनर्थकारी नाभिकीय दुर्घटना कि occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी  SSR ) , which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union .
An  विस्फोट और आग released विशाल quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the माहौल  , which spread over much of the western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history , and is one of  तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति  in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the  संदूषण और avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000  workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles .
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths  रै महरूम विवादित , और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers और deformities हैं स्टिल  being accounted for .
Mrs.  क्लॉस says अलविदा to उसके husband as  he sets off on his journey in this 1919 postcard
Mrs. Claus is  the बीवी of सांता क्लॉस , the क्रिसमस gift-bringer  in North American and European Christmas tradition .
She is known for making cookies with the elves and  तैयारी खिलौने साथ उसके husband सांता  Claus .
Her first name  is a रहस्य , हालांकि वो रै महरूम referred to as मरियम , जेसिका , layla  , Annette , Heidi , or Martha .
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or HJT ) is an open source enumerating tool  लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ originally निर्मित  by Merijn Bellekom , and later sold to Trend Micro .
The program is notable for  लक्ष्यीकरण browser-hijacking विधि ,  rather than relying on a database of known spyware .
It scans a  उपयोक्ता 's कंप्यूटर जल्दी , और प्रदर्शक ब्राउजर  hijacking locations , showing what entries are there .
HijackThis is  प्रयुक्त primarily लिये निदान of ब्राउजर hijacking , as uninformed उपयोग  of its removal facilities can cause significant software damage to a computer .
HijackThis does not remove or  detect स्पाइवेयर ; it सूचियाँ सबसे आम स्थितियाँ  where browser hijacking activity can occur .
ब्राउजर hijacking can कारण  malware to be installed on a computer .
On February  16 , 2012 , ट्रेंड सूक्ष्म released the  HijackThis source code as open source and it is now available on the SourceForge site .
Saddle Creek Records is an American record label based in  ओमाहा , नेब्रास्का  .
प्रारंभ as a कॉलेज क्लास प्रोजेक्ट on उद्यमिता  , the label was founded by Mike Mogis and Justin Oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack Records ) .
Mogis soon turned over his role in  the कम्पनी to robb nansel  .
The label is named after Saddle Creek Road , a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha , and the beginnings of a scene whose members included Conor  oberst ( तब a सोलो कलाकार , फिलहाल of उज्जवल आँखें , conor oberst और the रहस्यवादी घाटी बैंड , desaparecidos और राक्षस of लोक )  , Tim Kasher ( then of Slowdown Virginia , currently of Cursive and The Good Life ) , and others .
Collectively , they were  ज्ञात unofficially as the ``  Creekers '' .
Saddle Creek first appeared in print on a show  flyer , offering to `` खर्च an संध्या साथ काठी क्रीक '' (  later to be the title of the label 's DVD . )
Saddle Creek  became an incorporated एंटिटी as a परिणाम of a क्लास प्रोजेक्ट on  entrepreneurship .
Distribution is  संभाला by the वैकल्पिक वितरण गठबंधन , जिससे  is under the Warner Music Group umbrella .
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the flagship  लेबल of a स्टाइल of म्यूज़िक पुकारा `` the ओमाहा  Sound `` , characterized by a slight country twang .
इस is increasingly inaccurate , हालांकि , साथ  the rise of more electronic sounds such as those favored by The Faint and Broken Spindles .
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate member  bands is somewhat समझाया by उनके इतिहास ; a क्रमांक of the असली सदस्यों of the लेबल attended  grade school together .
A  `` सिस्टर लेबल '' , of sorts , to काठी क्रीक  is Team Love , started by Conor Oberst in 2004 .
The label opened arms to their first bands  नहीं आधारित in ओमाहा in 2001 साथ रिलीज by अभी it 's ओवरहेड और sorry  About Dresden .
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed , including Los Angeles 's Rilo  kiley , eric bachmann ( formerly नेता of archers of loaf और कुटिल उंगलियाँ इससे उत्तर कैरोलिना ) , georgie जेम्स ( वॉशिंगटन d.C. ) , दो gallants ( सैन  Francisco ) , and most recently Tokyo Police Club ( Toronto ) .
In 2005 , Spend an Evening with Saddle Creek , a  वृत्तचित्र detailing the पहला टेन सालो of the रिकार्ड लेबल 's इतिहास  , was released .
The DVD features extensive  साक्षात्कार साथ the काठी क्रीक  bands , archival footage , and rare live performances .
On  जून 8 , 2007 , the लेबल खोली उनके अपना म्यूज़िक स्थान नामित slowdown ( बाद the  group Slowdown Virginia ) , located in downtown Omaha , Nebraska .
the following is a सूची of एपीसोड  for the television show Full House .
In total , there were 192 episodes filmed for the show over the course of  इसके आठ सीज़न , इससे 1987 to  1995 .
Full House is a situation comedy which  क्रॉनिकल्स a विधवा पिता 's struggles of उठाने उसके तीन यंग बेटियां और the जीवनदान  that they have touched .
The patriarch of the family , Danny ( Bob  saget ) , आमंत्रण उसके brother-in-law जेसी ( जॉन stamos ) और उसके बेहतरीन dost जॉय ( डेव coulier ) , to सहायता उठाएँ उसके children ( candace cameron , jodie sweetin , और मरियम kate/ashley  Olsen ) , after his wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver .
After episodes 88 and 89 , Jesse marries  बेकी ( लोरी loughlin ) , और वे मूव into the अटारी  .
Then , after episodes 104 and 105 , Becky  और जेसी have जुड़वा लड़कों नामित nicky और एलेक्स ( डेनियल और केविन renteria/blake और डिलन tuomy-wilhoit  ) .
The series ends with  एपीसोड 192 , `` मिशेल यात्राएँ again भाग 2 '' , जब मिशेल loses उसके मेमोरी और  the family tries to restore it .
Notice of Stamp  अधिनियम of 1765 in समाचारपत्र
American newspapers reacted to the Stamp Act with anger  और पूर्वानुमान of the निधन of पत्रकारिता  .
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title  कर्तव्य in अमरीकी colonies अधिनियम 1765 ; 5 जार्ज iii , c. 12 ) imposed a सीधा कर by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट specifically  on the colonies of British America , and it required that many printed materials in the colonies be produced on stamped paper produced in London , carrying an embossed revenue stamp .
These printed materials were  विधिक दस्तावेज़ , मैगज़ीन , अखबारों और अनेक अन्य प्रकार of पेपर प्रयुक्त  throughout the colonies .
Like  पिछला कर , the स्टैम्प कर था to be  paid in valid British currency , not in colonial paper money .
The purpose of the tax  थी to सहायता अदा लिये सैनिकों stationed in उत्तर  America after the British victory in the Seven Years ' War .
The British government felt that the colonies were the primary beneficiaries of this  सैन्य उपस्थिति , और चाहिए अदा at तनिक a portion of the व्यय  .
The  स्टैम्प अधिनियम मिले ग्रेट प्रतिरोध  in the colonies .
The colonies sent no representatives to Parliament , and  इसलिए था no influence over कया कर यहूद उठाया , कैसा वे यहूद levied  , or how they would be spent .
Many colonists considered it a violation of their rights as Englishmen to be taxed without their consent  —consent कि तभी the औपनिवेशिक विधानमंडलों could ग्रान्ट .
Colonial assemblies sent  याचिकाएं और विरोध  .
The Stamp Act Congress held in New York City , reflecting the  पहला significant संयुक्त औपनिवेशिक जवाब to कोई अंग्रेजों  measure , also petitioned Parliament and the King .
Local protest groups , led by colonial merchants and landowners , established connections  through पत्राचार कि निर्मित a ढीला गठबन्धन कि  extended from New England to Georgia .
Protests and demonstrations  initiated by the बेटे of स्वतंत्रता प्रायः turned हिंसक और destructive as  the masses became involved .
Very  जल्द सब स्टैम्प कर वितरकों यहूद सहमे into resigning  their commissions , and the tax was never effectively collected .
विपक्ष to the  Stamp Act was not limited to the colonies .
British merchants and manufacturers  , जिनकी निर्यात to the colonies यहूद threatened by औपनिवेशिक आर्थिक  problems exacerbated by the tax , also pressured Parliament .
The Act was repealed on March 18 ,  1766 as a पदार्थ of expedience , लकिन पार्लियामेंट  affirmed its power to legislate for the colonies “in all cases whatsoever” by also passing the Declaratory Act .
There followed a series of new  कर और regulations , likewise opposed by the colonists  .
The episode played a major role in defining the  grievances और enabling the व्यवस्थित औपनिवेशिक प्रतिरोध  that led to the American Revolution in 1775 .
pt-105 underway  .
PT boats were a variety of torpedo-armed fast  आक्रमण शिल्प प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी in  World War II to attack larger surface ships .
`` PT '' is the US hull classification  प्रतीक लिये `` पैट्रोल torpedo '' .
The PT boat  squadrons यहूद nicknamed `` the  mosquito fleet '' .
the जापानी पुकारा  them `` Devil Boats '' .
The  असली pre– संसार युद्ध i torpedo नौकाएँ यहूद  designed with `` displacement '' hulls .
They  विस्थापित up to 300  tons and the top speed was .
The PT boats used in World  युद्ध ii यहूद निर्मित using the planing -type हल  form developed for racing boats .
They were much  छोटी ( 30–75 टन ) और  faster ( 35–40 knots ) .
Both types were designed to strike at larger warships  साथ torpedoes , using अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची गति to मिलेंगी बंद , और छोटी  size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire .
They were much  कम महंगी than विशाल  warships .
PT boats were much  तेज़ , छोटी , और सस्ता than conventional  ( displacement hull ) vessels .
During World War II , American PT boats engaged enemy destroyers and  numerous अन्य सतह शिल्प , ranging  from small boats to large supply ships .
PT boats also operated as gunboats against enemy small  शिल्प , ऐसे as कराया barges प्रयुक्त by the जापानी शक्तियां लिये inter-island  transport .
Good Friday is a religious holiday  observed primarily by ईसाइयों commemorating the crucifixion of यीशु मसीह  and his death at Calvary .
The holiday is observed during Holy Week as part of the Paschal Triduum on the Friday preceding  ईस्टर संडे , और may coincide साथ the यहूदी observance of passover  .
It is also known as Holy Friday , Great  शुक्रवार , ब्लैक शुक्रवार , or ईस्टर शुक्रवार , हालांकि the latter properly refers  to the Friday in Easter week .
Based on  the विवरण of the canonical gospels , the crucifixion of यीशु  was most likely to have been on a Friday ( the day before the Sabbath ) ( ) .
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is AD 33 , by two different groups , and originally as AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the differences between the  biblical और जूलियन पंचांग और the crescent of the चंद्रमा  .
A third method , using a completely different astronomical approach based on a  चंद्र crucifixion अंधेरा और ग्रहण मॉडल ( सतत साथ apostle पीटर  's reference to a `` moon of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ) , points to Friday , 3 April AD 33 .
The  ग्रेट जलाशय is the largest क्षेत्रफल of endorheic  watersheds in North America .
It is noted for both its arid conditions and its Basin and range topography that  varies इससे the उत्तर अमरीकी कम पाइंट at badwater जलाशय to the उच्चतम पाइंट of the संलग्न संयुक्त  States , less than away at the summit of Mount Whitney .
The region spans  अनेक physiographic विभाजन , biomes / ecoregions  , and deserts .
Raster  may refer to:
रास्टर ग्राफिक्स , आलेखीय  techniques using arrays of pixel values
Raster  ग्राफिक्स एडिटर , a कंप्यूटर  program
Raster scan , the pattern of image readout , transmission ,  भंडार , और पुनर्निर्माण in टेलीविज़न और कंप्यूटर  images
Rasterisation , or  rasterization , परिवर्तन of a  vector image to a raster image
Raster image  प्रोसेसर , or rip , a घटक of a मुद्रण  system that performs rasterisation
Raster interrupt , a  कंप्यूटर इन्टरनेट सिग्नल
Raster to  वेक्टर , an चित्र परिवर्तन  process
Raster bar , an effect  प्रयुक्त in कंप्यूटर demos
raster-noton , a  record label
Rastrum , a device  प्रयुक्त in मध्यकालीन म्यूज़िक पांडुलिपियों  to draw staff lines
Raster Document  ऑब्जेक्ट , a संचिका स्वरूप
Beowulf ( ;  बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी : ) is a legendary geatish नायिका और बाद turned किंग in the एपिक कविता नामित बाद  him , one of the oldest surviving pieces of literature in the English language .
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by  the जापानी इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और the बैटल of पर्ल हार्बर ) थी a आश्चर्य सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी  against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ) .
From the standpoint of the  defenders , the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48  a.m. Hawaiian Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive  कार्रवाई in अनुक्रम to रखना the u.S. प्रशांत बेड़े इससे दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन  in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the United Kingdom , the Netherlands , and the United States .
The base was attacked by  353 जापानी सेनानी , बमवर्षक और torpedo planes  in two waves , launched from six aircraft carriers .
All eight U.S. Navy  battleships यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त , साथ चार होने  sunk .
Two of these were later raised  , और साथ the बाकी चार repaired , छह battleships  returned to service later in the war .
The Japanese also sank  or क्षतिग्रस्त तीन cruisers , तीन destroyers , an anti-aircraft  training ship , and one minelayer .
188 U.S. aircraft  यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 अमेरिकी यहूद मारे  and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as the power station , shipyard , maintenance , and fuel and torpedo storage facilities , as well  as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन ( भी घर of the प्रज्ञा  section ) were not attacked .
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and five  midget submarines खोया , और  65 servicemen killed or wounded .
One  जापानी नाविक थी captured  .
The attack  आए as a profound शॉक to the अमरीकी लोगों और led सीधे  to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters .
The  following दिन ( दिसम्बर 8 ) ,  the United States declared war on Japan .
Domestic support for  non-interventionism , जिससे था महरूम दमदार , disappeared  .
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example the Neutrality  पैट्रोल ) थी replaced by क्रियाशील  alliance .
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted  जर्मनी और इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the u.S. on दिसम्बर 11 , जिससे थी  reciprocated by the U.S. the same day .
There were numerous  ऐतिहासिक precedents लिये unannounced सैन्य  action by Japan .
However , the lack of any formal warning , particularly while  negotiations यहूद स्टिल जाहिर जारी , led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim  December 7 , 1941 , `` a date which will live in infamy `` .
U.S. Route 85 ( US  85 ) is a north–south संयुक्त राज्य राजमार्ग कि रनों लिये in the पहाड़  - Northern Plains states of the United States .
The southern  टर्मिनस of the रूट is at the संयुक्त states-mexico  border in El Paso , Texas , connecting with Mexican Federal Highway 45 .
The northern terminus is at the  संयुक्त states-canada किनारा in fortuna , उत्तर डकोटा , जहाँ the रूट  continues north as Saskatchewan Highway 35 .
In  दोनो the संयुक्त राज्य और saskatchewan ,  Canada the route is known as the CanAm Highway .
भाग of us 85 हैं माना भाग of  the Theodore Roosevelt Expressway .
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the  46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार , नवम्बर  5 , 1968 .
The Republican nominee , former Vice-President Richard Nixon , won the  चुनाव over the लोकतांत्रिक nominee , लाज़िम  Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a  अभियान कि promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's शहरों  , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning  चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि  had dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
Coming  चार सालो बाद डेमोक्रेट lyndon B. जॉनसन जीती in a ऐतिहासिक  landslide , the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican elected for the first time in twelve years .
It was a wrenching national experience , conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King , Jr. , and subsequent race riots across the nation , the assasination of  लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. कैनेडी , फैली विपक्ष to the वियतनाम युद्ध आरपार विश्वविद्यालयों campuses , और हिंसक confrontations between पुलिस और  anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
the चुनाव प्रदर्शित the strongest तीसरा पार्टी  effort since 1912 by former Alabama Governor George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end school  पृथक्करण , he carried the गहन दक्षिण और भागा खूब in जातीय औद्योगिक जिले in the  North .
This was the last election in  जिससे नई यॉर्क था the सबसे मत in the चुनावी  college ( 43 votes ) .
बाद the 1970 जनसांख्यिकी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the सबसे चुनावी  votes and has remained the most populous state since then .
This is the latest election  जहाँ a अध्यक्षीय टिकट जीती बगैर carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय  candidate 's home state .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications , processes and CPU usage , commit charge and memory information , network activity  और आंकडे , logged-in उपयोक्ता , और प्रणाली सेवाएं ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ , 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly , e.g , `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर  '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task  मैनेजर can भी be प्रयुक्त to नियत प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं , प्रोसेसर अपनापन , forcibly terminate  processes , and shut down , restart , hibernate or log off from Windows .
Windows Task  मैनेजर थी introduced साथ खिड़कियाँ  NT 4.0 .
Previous  संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य सूची अनुप्रयोग  , which had far fewer features .
The task list was capable of listing currently  कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें  , or creating a new process .
In Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is also  उपस्थित कि allows अभिगम to standby , hibernate , फेरे बंद , restart , log बंद और  Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows (  microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x , खिड़कियाँ 95 , खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य  to display the programs currently running .
This file was  चलाया by कार्यशील the taskman.exe संचिका  from the C : \Windows directory .
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are used in the  आधुनिक जापानी लिखने प्रणाली साथ साथ hiragana ( ひらがな , ) , katakana ( カタカナ , ) , hindu-arabic numerals , और the occasional  use of the Latin alphabet .
The Japanese term kanji ( ) for the Chinese characters literally means `` Han characters ''  और is लिखा using the वही वर्ण as the चाइनीज  hanzi ( ) .
John R Williams ( May 4 , 1782 – October 20 , 1854 ) was an American  सिपाही , व्यापारी , और राजनेता जो is  most well known for serving as the first mayor of Detroit , Michigan .
In total , he served as  डेट्रॉयट 's महापौर लिये पाँच  other terms .
He also was a brigadier general in the  संयुक्त राज्य फौज दौरान the  Black Hawk War .
A simple  शुष्क चुम्बकीय पोर्टेबल  compass .
A smartphone that can  be प्रयुक्त as a कम्पास क्युकी of the magnetometer  inside .
An iPhone that can be  प्रयुक्त as a geological कम्पास क्युकी of the 3-axis teslameter  and 3-axis accelerometer inside it
A military compass  कि थी प्रयुक्त दौरान संसार युद्ध i  .
A compass is a  navigational यंत्र कि shows दिशानिर्देश in a फ़्रेम of  reference that is stationary relative to the surface of the earth .
The frame of reference defines  the चार कार्डिनल दिशानिर्देश ( or अंक ) – उत्तर , दक्षिण , ईस्ट  , and west .
Intermediate  दिशानिर्देश हैं  also defined .
Usually , a diagram called a compass rose , which shows the  दिशानिर्देश ( साथ उनके names प्रायः abbreviated to आद्याक्षर ) , is चिह्नित  on the compass .
When the compass is in use , the rose is aligned with  the रियल दिशानिर्देश in the फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ , so , लिये उदाहरण , the `` n ''  mark on the rose really points to the north .
Frequently , in addition to the rose or  sometimes बजाय of it , कोण markings in डिग्री हैं दिखाया on the  compass .
North corresponds to zero  डिग्री , और the कोण बढ़ाएँ clockwise , so ईस्ट is  90 degrees , south is 180 , and west is 270 .
These numbers allow  the कम्पास to दिखाएँ azimuths or बियरिंग , जिससे  are commonly stated in this notation .
The magnetic compass was first invented as a device for divination as  जल्दी as the चाइनीज हान राजवंश ( चूंकि परिचय  206 BC ) .
The compass was used in Song  राजवंश चीन by the सैन्य लिये navigational orienteering by 1040-1044 ,  and was used for maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117 .
The use of  a कम्पास is अंकित in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय  between 1187 and 1202 , and in Persia in 1232 .
The dry compass  थी invented in यूरोपीय around 1300  .
This was  supplanted in the जल्दी 20th सदी by the liquid-filled  magnetic compass .
The Inca Empire or Inka Empire (  quechua : tawantinsuyu ) थी the largest साम्राज्य  in pre-Columbian America .
The administrative , political and  सैन्य बीच of the साम्राज्य थी स्तिथ  in Cusco in modern-day Peru .
The Inca civilization  arose इससे the हाइलैंड्स of पेरू sometime  in the early 13th century .
From 1438 to 1533 , the Incas used a variety of methods , from conquest to peaceful assimilation , to incorporate a  विशाल portion of पश्चिमी दक्षिण अमेरिका , केन्द्रित on the andean पहाड़ सीमाएँ , सहित , besides पेरू , विशाल भाग of आधुनिक इक्वाडोर , पश्चिमी और दक्षिण सेंट्रल बोलीविया , उत्तरपश्चिम अर्जेंटीना , उत्तर और  central Chile , and southern Colombia into a state comparable to the historical empires of Eurasia .
The  आधिकारिक भाषा of the साम्राज्य थी  Quechua , although hundreds of local languages and dialects of Quechua were spoken .
The Inca referred  to उनके साम्राज्य as tawantinsuyu जिससे can be अनूदित as the चार regions  or The Four United Provinces .
There were many local forms of worship ,  सबसे of उन्हें concerning लोकल पवित्र `` huacas `` , लकिन the इन्का नेतृत्व प्रोत्साहित the इबादत of inti —the  sun god—and imposed its sovereignty above other cults such as that of Pachamama .
The Incas considered  उनके किंग , the sapa इन्का  , to be the `` child of the sun . ''
The kidneys  हैं अंगों कि serve अनेक अनिवार्य नियामक भूमिकाएँ in  most animals , including vertebrates and some invertebrates .
They are  अनिवार्य in the urinary प्रणाली और भी serve homeostatic कृत्यों ऐसे as the विनियमन of इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स , मेंटेनेंस  of acid–base balance , and regulation of blood pressure ( via maintaining salt and water balance ) .
They serve the  देह as a प्राकृतिक फिल्टर of the रक्त , और हटाएँ wastes जिससे हैं  diverted to the urinary bladder .
In producing urine , the kidneys excrete wastes such as urea and  अमोनियम , और वे हैं भी जिम्मेदार लिये the reabsorption of जल , ग्लूकोज  , and amino acids .
The kidneys also produce hormones including calcitriol ,  erythropoietin , और the एंजाइम renin  .
Located at the rear of the abdominal  गुहा in the retroperitoneum , the गुर्दे प्राप्त रक्त इससे the  paired renal arteries , and drain into the paired renal veins .
Each kidney excretes urine into a ureter , itself a  युग्म ढांचा कि empties into the urinary ब्लैडर .
Renal physiology is  the पढ़ाई of गुर्दा फलन , जबकि nephrology is the चिकित्सा  specialty concerned with kidney diseases .
Diseases of the kidney are diverse , but individuals  साथ गुर्दा बीमारी अक्सर प्रदर्शक characteristic  clinical features .
Common clinical conditions involving the kidney include the  nephritic और nephrotic syndromes , renal cysts , अधि गुर्दा चोट , दीर्घकालिक गुर्दा बीमारी , urinary ट्रैक्ट संक्रमण , nephrolithiasis  , and urinary tract obstruction .
Various  cancers of the गुर्दा मौजूद ; the सबसे आम वयस्क  renal cancer is renal cell carcinoma .
Cancers , cysts , and some other renal conditions can be  प्रबंधित साथ हटाना of the गुर्दा , or nephrectomy  .
When renal function , measured by glomerular filtration rate , is persistently poor ,  डायलिसिस और गुर्दा प्रत्यारोपण may be उपचार विकल्प  .
Although they are not severely harmful ,  गुर्दा पत्थरों can be दुखद और a nuisance  .
The removal of kidney stones involves ultrasound treatment  to ब्रेक up the पत्थरों into छोटी टुकड़े , जिससे  are then passed through the urinary tract .
One common symptom of kidney stones is a sharp pain  in the medial/lateral खण्ड of  the lower back .
Lockton Companies Inc. is the  संसार 's largest privately आयोजित बीमे brokerage कड़ , providing बीमे  , risk management and employee benefits solutions .
In addition to  इसके कान्सास नगर , मिसौरी मुख्यालय  , Lockton operates 60 locations in 17 countries .
lockton is फिलहाल घर to अधिक  than 4,450 Associates worldwide .
The company was founded by Jack  lockton in 1966 और रै चूंकि become the world’s 9th largest बीमे  brokerage firm .
Lockton serves a wide array of industries with  सेवाएं कि शामिल रिस्क प्रबन्धन , casualty , surety , पेशेवर indemnity  and more .
For 46 years , Lockton posted  असाधारण सशुल्क विकास , साथ वैश्विक revenues reaching $  915 million in fiscal 2012 .
Lockton Benefits Group : Lockton’s Employee Benefit’s team works closely with insurance carriers  और प्रशासकों to बनाएँ व्यापक और एकीकृत लाभ रणनीति लिये  clients .
The Lockton  लाभ समूह provides सेवाएं सहित अनुपालन , कार्यपालिका लाभ , स्वास्थ्य  and welfare , health risk solutions , retirement and more .
Lockton Affinity : Lockton Affinity , an affiliate of Lockton Companies ,  meets the बीमे needs of अपनापन समूह , franchises , पेशेवर संगठन , और एसोसिएशन  of all sizes .
Lockton Affinity offers  a किस्में of बीमे उत्पाद  options and programs .
Products include : General Liability ,  पेशेवर देयता , प्रॉपर्टी , मजदूर मुआवजे , निर्देशकों & अधिकारियों देयता  , Commercial Auto , Specialty Coverage , Excess , Health Plans and more .
Lockton International : Lockton  अंतरराष्ट्रीय operates कार्यालयों in the uk और आयरलैंड , as खूब as  offices throughout Asia and Latin America .
In Europe ,  lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय is a संगी in eos risq , europe’s अग्रणी  insurance broking and risk management consultancy .
EOS RISQ is an equity-based European partnership of  प्रमुख स्वतंत्र बीमे brokers साथ over 3,500 कर्मचारी आधारित  in more than 30 countries in Europe .
Lockton International provides specialized solutions for personal lines , SME’s and  प्रमुख multi-national क्लाइंट  .
White  चॉकलेट is a चॉकलेट  derivative .
It commonly consists of cocoa butter , sugar , milk solids  और नमक , और is characterized by a पाले पीला  or ivory appearance .
The  melting पाइंट of cocoa मक्खन , इसके प्राथमिक cocoa सेम घटक  , is high enough to keep white chocolate solid at room temperature .
Donald Leon `` Don '' Blankenship ( born March 14 , 1950 )  थी अध्यक्ष और सीईओ of massey उर्जा co. , the छठे largest कोयले  company ( by 2008 production ) in the United States .
He served in  those भूमिकाएँ इससे नवम्बर 30 , 2000 , जबतक  December 31 , 2010 .
Blankenship is an active  वित्तीय backer of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और भागीदार in लोकल और राज्य राजनीती , विशेषकर  in his home state of West Virginia .
He has frequently spoken out  सरेआम परिचय राजनीती , the पर्यावरण , संघ , और कोयले  production .
U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filings show  blankenship थी सशुल्क $ 17.8 लाख in 2009 , the उच्चतम  in the coal industry .
His 2009 pay  represents a $ 6.8 लाख उठाएँ over 2008 और लगभग  double his compensation package in 2007 .
blankenship भी प्राप्त a deferred  compensation package valued at $ 27.2 million in 2009 .
On December 3 , 2010 , Blankenship announced that he  थी retiring as सीईओ at the समाप्त of the साल , और होता be  succeeded by Massey President Baxter F. Phillips Jr .

धनुष wow may भी refer  to:
