Negligence ( Lat . negligentia , from neglegere , to neglect , literally `` not to pick up  कुछ '' ) is a विफलता to कसरत the परवाह कि a reasonably  prudent person would exercise in like circumstances .
The area of tort law known as  लापरवाही involves नुक़सान caused by carelessness , नहीं जानबूझकर  harm .
According  to jay M. feinman of the rutgers विश्वविद्यालयों  School of Law ;
`` The core idea of negligence is that people should exercise reasonable care  जब वे अधिनियम by लेने खाता of the संभावित नुक़सान कि वे might foreseeably  cause harm to other people . ''
`` those who  go personally or लाओ प्रॉपर्टी जहाँ वे जान कि वे or it may आइये into टक्कर साथ the व्यक्तियों or प्रॉपर्टी of  others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision . ''
Fletcher v Rylands (  [ 1866 ] lr 1 ex 265  )
Through civil litigation  , if an घायल व्यक्ति proves कि another व्यक्ति acted negligently to कारण उनके चोट  , they can recover damages to compensate for their harm .
Proving a case for negligence can potentially entitle the injured plaintiff to compensation  लिये नुक़सान to उनके देह , प्रॉपर्टी , दिमागी well-being , वित्तीय औकात , or अंतरंग संबंध  .
However , because negligence cases are  बहुत fact-specific , इस सामान्य परिभाषा करता नहीं fully बताइये the अवधारणा of जब the विधि होगा आवश्यकता एक व्यक्ति to compensate  another for losses caused by accidental injury .
further , the विधि of लापरवाही at आम विधि is  only one aspect of the law of liability .
Although resulting  क्षतिपूर्ति जरूर be सिद्ध in अनुक्रम to रिकवर मुआवजे in a लापरवाही कार्रवाई , the प्रकृति और  extent of those damages are not the primary focus of negligence cases .
A melanocytic nevus ( also known as `` Nevocytic nevus '' ) is a type  of lesion कि contains nevus कोशिकाएं (  a type of melanocyte ) .
Some sources equate the term mole  साथ `` melanocytic nevus  '' .
Other sources reserve the term  `` mole '' लिये अन्य  purposes .
The majority of  औज़ार appear दौरान the पहला दो दशकों of  a person’s life , while about one in every 100 babies is born with moles .
Acquired moles are a form of benign neoplasm , while  जन्मजात औज़ार , or जन्मजात nevi , हैं  considered a minor malformation or hamartoma and may be at a higher risk for melanoma .
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the skin ) or a  pigmented विकास on the स्किन , formed ज़्यादातर of a प्रकार of कोशिका  known as a melanocyte .
The high concentration of the  body’s pigmenting एजेंट , मेलेनिन , is जिम्मेदार  for their dark color .
Moles are a  सदस्य of the परिवार of स्किन  lesions known as nevi .
The  व्यापक metabolic फलक , or रासायनिक स्क्रीन , ( cmp ; cpt  code 80053 ) is a panel of 14 blood tests which serves as an initial broad medical screening tool .
The CMP provides a  अशिष्ट जाँच of गुर्दा फलन , जिगर फलन , और electrolyte और द्रव  balance , but it is far from perfect .
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a result of false positives and thus the CBC  may need to be दोहराया लिये a रोगी ( or replaced  with a more specific test ) .
The CMP is an  विस्तारित संस्करण of the मौलिक metabolic  panel ( BMP ) , which does not include liver tests .
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as part of a routine  शारीरिक परिक्षा , or may be प्रयुक्त to मॉनिटर a रोगी साथ a दीर्घकालिक बीमारी , ऐसे  as diabetes mellitus or hypertension .
Previous names for  the फलक of परीक्षण have महरूम chem  12 , Chemistry panel , Chemistry screen , SMA 12 , SMA 20 and SMAC ( Sequential Multiple Analysis - Computer ) .
The tests  हैं performed on मशीने आधारित  on the AutoAnalyzer invented in 1957 .
प्राकृतिक गैस निष्कर्षण by देशों  in cubic meters per year .
Natural gas is a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture consisting primarily of  मिथेन , लकिन commonly सहित varying amounts of अन्य hydrocarbons , कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड , नाइट्रोजन , और हाइड्रोजन sulfide  .
Natural  गैस is an उर्जा सोर्स प्रायः प्रयुक्त  for heating , cooking , and electricity generation .
It is also used as fuel for vehicles and as a chemical  फर्टिलाइजर in the manufacture of प्लास्टिक और अन्य commercially  important organic chemicals .
Natural gas is found in deep underground natural rock formations or associated  साथ अन्य हाइड्रोकार्बन टंकी in कोयले beds और as मिथेन clathrates  .
Petroleum is also another resource found in  निकटता to और साथ प्राकृतिक  gas .
Most natural gas was created  over समय by दो mechanisms : biogenic  and thermogenic .
biogenic गैस is निर्मित by methanogenic जीवों in marshes  , bogs , landfills , and shallow sediments .
Deeper in the earth , at greater temperature and pressure ,  thermogenic गैस is निर्मित इससे दफ्न सशुल्क सामग्री  .
Before natural gas can be used  as a ईंधन , it जरूर undergo प्रसंस्करण to हटाएँ impurities ,  including water , to meet the specifications of marketable natural gas .
The  by-products of प्रसंस्करण शामिल इथेन , प्रोपेन , butanes , pentanes , और उच्चतर आणविक वज़न  hydrocarbons , hydrogen sulfide ( which may be converted into pure sulfur ) , carbon dioxide , water vapor , and sometimes helium and nitrogen .
प्राकृतिक गैस is प्रायः informally referred to बस  as gas , especially when compared to other energy sources such as oil or coal .
This page is about  the कल्पना  Movers band .
For information about the TV show  अभिनीत the बैंड , देखिए कल्पना मूवर्स (  TV series ) .
कल्पना मूवर्स  is a band formed in New Orleans , Louisiana , in 2003 .
The lineup includes Rich Collins , Scott  durbin , डेव poche , और स्कॉट `` smitty  '' Smith .
Members  of the समूह यहूद longtime  friends and neighbors .
The group started as a television/music  अवधारणा जिससे थी pitched to लोकल pbs  affiliates in New Orleans .
WLAE-TV was the first to take an interest in the group and later  introduced उन्हें to बेथ कोर्टनी , the अध्यक्ष & मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी  at Louisiana Public Broadcasting .
Soon  बाद , lpb began airing one-minute  videos produced by the Imagination Movers themselves .
The Movers built a sizable regional  following by सेटिंग शैक्षणिक गीतों लिये  kids to melodies and rhythms that adults appreciate as well .
They  बेची अधिक than 100,000 नक़ल  of their self-produced CDs and DVDs .
Their three indie CDs : `` Good Ideas , '' `` Calling All Movers , '' and `` Eight  फीट '' साथ साथ उनके ग्रास जड़ें dvd `` हलचल it up '' have , संयुक्त , जीती चौदह नेशनल पुरस्कार , इससे ऐसे समूह as the नेशनल संघ of  Parenting Publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' Choice .
In early 2005 , Disney took  सूचना , और initiated negotiations  to add the Movers to the company 's roster .
These  यहूद बाधित in अगस्त जब the बाढ़ सुरक्षा designed  and built by the Army Corps of Engineers to protect New Orleans failed .
The resulting floodwater claimed the  बैंड 's दफ्तर , as खूब as the घरों of कॉलिन्स , durbin और poche  – but the deal was signed in the spring of 2006 .
In 2008 ,  वॉल्ट डिज़्नी रिकॉर्ड introduced the कल्पना मूवर्स ' म्यूज़िक to the स्वदेश साथ the रिलीज of the मूवर्स ' पहला  nationally-released CD , `` Juice Box Heroes . ''
In September 2008 , a 30-minute show featuring  the समूह began airing on the डिज़्नी चैनल 's प्रीस्कूल प्रोग्रामिंग ब्लाक ज्ञात as playhouse डिज़्नी ,  and currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's replacement , Disney Junior .
The Movers write and  perform सब the गीतों on उनके दिखाएँ  .
Moreover , the Imagination Movers have received critical  kudos लिये उनके सजीव कॉन्सर्ट प्रदर्शन  .
In October 2009 , the Imagination Movers started the `` Live from  the विचार गोदाम कॉन्सर्ट दौरे  2009 '' .
Traveling from  mid-october to mid-december 2009 उनके सजीव प्रदर्शन शामिल लोट of उनके  favorite songs and dancing , as well as video appearances of Warehouse Mouse .
Beginning in early-February 2011  और wrapping up in लेट may 2011 , the कल्पना मूवर्स प्रस्तुत उनके `` in a बिग गोदाम कॉन्सर्ट दौरे , '' playing अधिक than  100 shows in 50+ cities across North America .
From March  to अक्तूबर 2012 , the कल्पना मूवर्स  toured North America on their post-Disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour .
The show maintained several elements of the original TV concept , such as an on-stage `` idea emergency '' and several sets from their older catalogue ;  however , साथ the प्रस्थान of वेन्डी calio वापस to उसके देशी हवाई , the अक्षर `` नीना '' , साथ साथ उसके musical संख्याएँ , is नहीं  present .
The tour promotes the Imagination Movers ' new album/DVD  रिलीज , `` rock-o-matic '' , जिससे सुविधाएँ  all new music from the band .
The  एल्बम itself is उत्पादित independently of डिज़्नी और रै a notably अधिक वयस्क  , contemporary rock-and-roll sound , though still very appropriate for children .
Several performance dates were moved to later in 2012 to benefit from  the increased एक्सपोज़र of the कल्पना मूवर्स tv दिखाएँ अभी playing रोज़ on  Disney Junior .
The platypus (  ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी  Australia , including Tasmania .
Together with the four species of echidna , it is one of the five extant  प्रजाति of monotremes , the तभी स्तनधारियों कि lay अंडे बजाय of giving  birth .
It is the sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae )  और genus ( ornithorhynchus ) , हालांकि a  number of related species have been found in the fossil record .
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck -billed , beaver -tailed ,  otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे पहला encountered it , साथ कुछ considering  it an elaborate fraud .
It  is एक of the few विषैला स्तनधारियों , the पुरूष platypus having  a spur on the hind foot that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans .
The unique features of the  platypus मेक it an महत्वपूर्ण विषय in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable  and iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin .
The platypus is the animal  emblem of the राज्य of नई दक्षिण वेल्स  .
Until the early 20th century , it was hunted  लिये इसके फर , लकिन it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout इसके दायरा  .
Although captive breeding programmes have had only  सीमित कामयाबी और the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of प्रदूषण , it is नहीं  under any immediate threat .
the chupacabra or chupacabras  ( , from chupar `` to suck '' and cabra `` goat '' , literally `` goat sucker '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit parts of the Americas .
It is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly unknown animal in Puerto  रीको ( जहाँ ये sightings यहूद पहला reported ) , मैक्सिको , और the संयुक्त राज्य , विशेषकर in the  latter 's Latin American communities .
The name comes from the animal 's reported habit of attacking  और पीने the रक्त of पशुधन , विशेषकर बकरियों  .
शारीरिक descriptions  of the creature vary .
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico , and  have चूंकि महरूम reported as दूर उत्तर as maine , और as दूर दक्षिण as चिली , और भी  being spotted outside the Americas in countries like Russia and The Philippines .
It is supposedly a heavy  प्राणी , the आकार of a छोटी भालू , साथ a पंक्ति of  spines reaching from the neck to the base of the tail .
Sighting reports of  the chupacabra have महरूम disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking प्रमाण , जबकि सबसे रिपोर्ट्स in उत्तरी मैक्सिको और the दक्षिणी  United States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange .
Biologists and wildlife management  officials दृश्य the chupacabra  as a contemporary legend .
The North American Free Trade  अनुबंध ( nafta ) is an अनुबंध हस्ताक्षरित by कनाडा , मैक्सिको  , and the United States , creating a trilateral trade bloc in North America .
The  अनुबंध आए into फ़ोर्स on  January 1 , 1994 .
It superseded the  canada–united राज्य फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध between  the U.S. , Canada , and Mexico
NAFTA has two  पूरक : the उत्तर अमरीकी अनुबंध on पर्यावरणीय सहयोग ( naaec ) और  the North American Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ) .
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind that expresses satisfaction  साथ the थर्मल पर्यावरण और is assessed by subjective मूल्यांकन ( ansi / ashrae मानक  55 ) .
Maintaining this standard of thermal comfort for occupants of buildings or other enclosures is one of the important goals of  hvac ( हीटिंग , वेंटिलेशन , और एयर कंडीशनिंग ) डिज़ाइन इंजीनियर्स  .
the पूर्वानुमानित औसत vote ( pmv ) मॉडल स्टैंड  among the most recognized thermal comfort models .
It was developed using principles of heat balance  और प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित जलवायु कक्ष अंतर्गत  steady state conditions .
Because the PMV model was derived from data  एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित जलवायु , it is नहीं उपयुक्त लिये अनुप्रयोग in  naturally ventilated spaces which often have high levels of air movement .
This shortcoming motivated the development of a  परिवार of अनुभवजन्य सांख्यिकीय मॉडल of थर्मल सुकून in naturally  ventilated spaces known as adaptive models .
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting with their  पर्यावरण , और controlling उनके थर्मल सुकून  by means of clothing or window-opening and closing .
This  is in कंट्रास्ट to थर्मल सुकून in sealed इमारतें  , in which occupants experience the environment passively .
Thermal comfort is  प्रभावित by ऊष्मा conduction , संवहन , विकिरण  , and evaporative heat loss .
Thermal  सुकून is कायम जब the ऊष्मा उत्पन्न by इंसान चयापचय is  allowed to dissipate , thus maintaining thermal equilibrium with the surroundings .
It has been long recognized that the  सनसनी of अहसास hot or ठंडा is नहीं बस निर्भर on एयर तापमान अलोन  .
Thermal comfort  calculations according to ansi/ashrae मानक  55 can be freely performed with the CBE Thermal Comfort Tool for ASHRAE-55 .
Durante degli Alighieri , simply  referred to as दांते ( , ; ; c. 1265–1321 ) , थी  a major Italian poet of the Middle Ages .
His Divine Comedy , originally called '  और बाद पुकारा ' by boccaccio , is widely माना the महानतम साहित्यिक कार्य रचित in the इतालवी भाषा  and a masterpiece of world literature .
In Italy he is  ज्ञात as ' ( `` the परम् कवि ''  ) or just ' .
He , Petrarch and  boccaccio हैं भी ज्ञात as `` the तीन  fountains '' or `` the three crowns '' .
दांते is भी पुकारा the `` पिता  of the Italian language '' .
मुख्यालय ( कोबे  , Japan )
( ) is a tire and  रबर कम्पनी आधारित in जापानी  .
It is  भाग of the sumitomo  Group .
The company traces its origins to 1909 , when the  sumitomo समूह बना an निवेश in dunlop जापानी , the newly formed  Japanese subsidiary of the British company Dunlop Rubber .
Over the  सालो sumitomo और dunlop विकसित a बंद कारोबार संबंध  , and in 1963 the Sumitomo Group acquired control of Dunlop Japan and renamed it Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd .
In 1985 , when  dunlop रबर थी लिया over by btr पीएलसी , the कम्पनी acquired the ऑटोमोबाइल टायर  assets of Dunlop , including the right to use the Dunlop brand on automobile tires .
The  अधिग्रहण किया नहीं शामिल the us और ऑस्ट्रेलियाई व्यवसायों , जिससे  were separately owned , but in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of the US from its management .
In 1997 , Sumitomo formed a joint venture with Goodyear Tire and Rubber Company , by which Goodyear and  sumitomo सहमत to manufacture टायर लिये प्रत्येक अन्य 's बाज़ार , सहित dunlop  branded tires .
As part of the agreement , Goodyear acquired 75 % interests in  dunlop टायर , the uk कम्पनी जिससे sumitomo था formed , और in  Dunlop Tire Corporation .
Goodyear and  sumitomo भी बना निवेश  in each other .
Today , the company  makes a चौड़ी दायरा of रबर आधारित  products , including automobile tires , golf balls and tennis balls .
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware  एकीकृत विकास environments ( आईडीई ) विकसित by microsoft कि हैं lightweight संस्करण of the microsoft  Visual Studio product line .
Express Editions  यहूद conceived शुरूआत  with Visual Studio 2005 .
The idea of Express editions is to provide streamlined , easy-to-use and  easy-to-learn ides लिये उपयोक्ता अन्य than पेशेवर तन्त्र डेवलपर , ऐसे  as hobbyists and students .
The Alps are one  of the ग्रेट पहाड़ दायरा प्रणालियों of यूरोपीय stretching लगभग आरपार आठ अल्पाइन देशों इससे ऑस्ट्रिया और स्लोवेनियाई in the ईस्ट  , Switzerland , Liechtenstein , Germany , France to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south .
The mountains were formed over  सैंकड़ों of लाखो of सालो as the अफ़्रीकी और यूरेशियाई tectonic  plates collided .
चरम shortening caused by the इवेंट resulted in समुद्री sedimentary रॉक्स उठती  by thrusting and folding into high mountain peaks such as Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn .
Mont Blanc  spans the french–italian किनारा , और at is the  highest mountain in the Alps .
The Alpine region area contains many peaks higher  than , ज्ञात as the `` four-thousanders `` .
The altitude and size of  the दायरा affects the जलवायु in यूरोपीय ; in the kyu वर्षण  levels vary greatly and climatic conditions consist of distinct zones .
वन्यजीव ऐसे as ibex सजीव in the उच्चतर चोटियों to elevations of , और पौधे ऐसे as edelweiss  grow in rocky areas in lower elevations as well as in higher elevations .
Evidence of human habitation in the Alps goes back to  the paleolithic era  .
A mummified man , determined to be 5,000 years old , was discovered on a  हिमानी at the austrian–italian किनारा in 1991  .
by the 6th सदी bc , the  Celtic La Tène culture was well established .
Hannibal may  have crossed the ऐल्प्स साथ  a herd of elephants , and the Romans had settlements in the region .
In 1800 Napoleon crossed one  of the पहाड़ गुजरता साथ an फौज  of 40,000 .
The 18th and 19th centuries saw an influx of naturalists , writers , and artists , in particular  the romantics , followed by the सुनहरी आयु of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the  peaks .
In World War II the Third Reich  invaded the अल्पाइन देशों , साथ the एक्सेप्शन of स्विट्ज़रलैंड और liechtenstein ; एडोल्फ हिटलर रखा a आधार of आपरेशन  in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war .
The Alpine region  रै a दमदार सांस्कृतिक पहचान  .
The traditional culture of farming  , cheesemaking , और woodworking स्टिल exists in अल्पाइन गांवों , हालांकि the पर्यटक उद्योग began to grow जल्दी in the 20th सदी और विस्तारित greatly बाद संसार युद्ध ii  to become the dominant industry by the end of the century .
The Winter Olympic Games have been  hosted in the स्विस , फ्रेंच , इतालवी , आस्ट्रिया  and German Alps .
At present the  प्रदेश is घर to 14 लाख लोगों और रै 120  million annual visitors .
Lois Patrice Griffin ( née  pewterschmidt ) is a अक्षर इससे the एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न  series Family Guy .
She is voiced by writer Alex Borstein and first appeared on television  , साथ साथ the बाकी of the परिवार in the 15-minute छोटी on दिसम्बर  20 , 1998 .
Lois was created and  designed by श्रेणी निर्माता सेठ macfarlane  .
MacFarlane was asked to pitch a pilot to the Fox Broadcasting Company based on Larry and  स्टीव , a छोटी बना by macfarlane जिससे प्रदर्शित a middle-aged अक्षर नामित लैरी और  an intellectual dog , Steve .
After the pilot was given  the ग्रीन लाइट , the griffin परिवार appeared on the  episode `` Death Has a Shadow `` .
Lois is the  माँ of the griffin  family .
With  उसके husband पीटर , वो रै था तीन  children : Meg , Chris , and Stewie .
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother , despite  उसके admitting to होने a ड्रग  user , a recovering meth addict kleptomaniac .
Lois  रै भी था अनेक अफेयर्स , एक of जिससे  allegedly resulted in the conception of Meg .
वो रै appeared in अन्य मीडिया relating to परिवार guy—including a  video game , commercials and books—and inspired an entire line of merchandise .
Lois 's distinctive New York  एक्सेंट originated इससे a अक्षर in a स्टेज दिखाएँ कि एलेक्स borstein  had performed in , which was largely inspired by a relative who grew up on Long Island , New York .
परिवार हस्तांतरण of बास्क भाषा  ( Basque as initial language )
Percentage of students  पंजीकृत in बास्क भाषा स्कूलों  ( 2000–2005 ) .
Location of the  basque-language प्रांतों  within Spain and France
Basque ( endonym : , ) is the ancestral  भाषा of the बास्क लोगों , जो inhabit the बास्क देश , a प्रदेश spanning  an area in northeastern Spain and southwestern France .
It  is बोला by 27 % of basques  in all territories ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ) .
Of these , 663,035 live in the Spanish part of the Basque country and the  बाकी 51,100 सजीव in the  French part .
In  अकादमिक चर्चाएँ of the वितरण of बास्क in स्पेन और फ़्रांस  , it is customary to refer to three ancient provinces in France and four Spanish provinces .
Native speakers are concentrated in a contiguous area including  भाग of the स्पेनी autonomous समुदायों of the बास्क देश और नावारा और in  the western half of the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques .
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the  binational ethnographic बास्क देश incorporating the परंपरागत स्पेनी प्रांतों of biscay ,  Gipuzkoa , and Álava , which retain their existence as politico-administrative divisions .
These provinces and many areas of Navarre  हैं heavily आबादी by जातीय basques , लकिन बास्क थी , at तनिक जबतक the 1990s , नहीं बोला as a देशी भाषा in सबसे of álava , पश्चिमी भाग of biscay और सेंट्रल और दक्षिणी क्षेत्रों of नावारा , either क्युकी  it had been replaced by Spanish along the centuries , in some areas , or because it had never been spoken there , in other areas .
in southwestern फ़्रांस , the प्राचीन basque-populated  provinces were Labourd , Lower Navarre , and Soule .
They and other regions were consolidated into a single  département in 1790 अंतर्गत the नाम basses-pyrénées , a नाम जिससे persisted जबतक 1970  .
A  मानकीकृत रूप of the बास्क भाषा , पुकारा euskara  Batua , was developed by the Basque Language Academy in the late 1960s .
Euskara Batua was created so that Basque language  could be used—and easily समझा by सब बास्क speakers—in औपचारिक परिस्थितियों ( शिक्षा , द्रव्यमान  media , literature ) , and this is its main use today .
The role of this  मानक बास्क भाषा depends on the भाषाई  educational model of each region and each school .
In most areas of the  स्पेनी बास्क देश , the शैक्षणिक मॉडल d , जहाँ सब विषय हैं सिखाया  in Basque , except `` Spanish language and literature '' ( which is taught in Spanish ) is now the predominant model .
In France , the Basque language school Seaska  और the संघ लिये a दुभाषिया ( बास्क और फ्रेंच ) schooling ikasbi मिलें a चौड़ी दायरा of बास्क भाषा  educational needs up to the Sixth Form , while often struggling to surmount financial and administrative constraints .
Apart from this standardized version , there are five  प्रमुख बास्क dialects : bizkaian , gipuzkoan , और अपर navarrese in स्पेन , और navarrese–lapurdian  and Zuberoan ( in France ) .
Although they take their names from the mentioned historic provinces , the dialect  सीमाएँ हैं नहीं congruent साथ प्रांत सीमाएँ  .
The President , Directors and  कम्पनी , of the बैंको of the संयुक्त राज्य , commonly ज्ञात as the पहला बैंको of the संयुक्त राज्य , थी a सेंट्रल बैंको , चार्टर्ड  for a term of twenty years , by the United States Congress on February 25 , 1791 .
Establishment of the Bank was included in a three-part expansion of federal fiscal and monetary power ( along with a federal mint  और excise कर ) championed by सिकंदर हैमिल्टन , पहला सचिव  of the Treasury .
Hamilton  believed a सेंट्रल बैंको थी जरुरी to stabilize और improve the स्वदेश 's क्रेडिट  , and to improve handling of the financial business of the United States government under the newly enacted Constitution .
Officially proposed to the first  सत्र of the पहला कॉंग्रेस in 1790 , हैमिल्टन 's बैंको faced फैली  resistance from opponents of increased federal power .
Secretary of State Thomas Jefferson and James Madison led the opposition , which claimed that the bank was unconstitutional , and that it  benefited व्यापारियों और निवेशकों at the व्यय of the बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी  .
The First Bank building is now a National Historic Landmark located in  फिलाडेल्फिया , पेन्सिलवेनिया भीतर स्वतंत्रता नेशनल ऐतिहासिक पार्क  .
James  वेस्ले marsters ( born अगस्त 20 , 1962 ) is  an American actor and musician .
Marsters first came to the attention of the general public playing the popular character Spike , a platinum-blond yobbish English vampire in the  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी buffy the पिशाच slayer और इसके spin-off श्रेणी , देवदूत  , from 1997 to 2004 .
Since then , he has gone on to play other science fiction roles , such as the alien supervillain  brainiac on the सुपरमैन -inspired श्रेणी smallville , the omnisexual समय मुसाफ़िर कप्तान जॉन हार्ट in अंग्रेजों science-fiction दिखाएँ torchwood और  terrorist Barnabas Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica .
Marsters appeared in a  supporting भूमिका in the 2007 फिल्म  P.S .
I Love You and as the main  विपक्षी , piccolo , in the 2009  fantasy adventure film Dragonball Evolution .
He appeared  as a पुनरावर्ती अक्षर in the  first season of the revival of Hawaii 5-0 .
In molecular biology , human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a  हार्मोन उत्पादित by the निषेचित अंडा बाद  conception .
Later during pregnancy it is made by  the विकासशील placenta , और बाद by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast  .
Some cancerous tumors produce this  हार्मोन ; इसलिए , elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी is  not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis .
However , it is not  ज्ञात whether इस उत्पादन is a  contributing cause or an effect of tumorigenesis .
The pituitary analogue of hCG , known as  luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ) , is उत्पादित in the pituitary ग्रंथि of  males and females of all ages .
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of ``  होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर hcg आहार उत्पाद  and declared them fraudulent and illegal .
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter , known by her stage name Beyoncé ( ;  born सितंबर 4 , 1981 ) , is an अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter  , dancer , and actress .
Born and raised in Houston , Texas , she performed in singing and dancing competitions as a child  पहले forming in 1990 a समूह साथ केली rowland और latavia roberson कि थी  eventually named Destiny 's Child .
Once signed to Columbia  रिकॉर्ड , the लड़कियों subsequently became  one of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all time .
The group was plagued by  आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil और नॉलेस suffered  from depression that lasted for a number of years .
During the group 's hiatus , Knowles released her debut solo album  dangerously in प्रेम ( 2003 ) , जिससे अर्जित उसके पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और रै बेची a कुल of 4.9 लाख  copies in the US alone .
It spawned Billboard number one singles `` Crazy in Love , ''  माना by vh1 to be the `` महानतम सोंग  Of the 00 's , '' and `` Baby Boy . ''
Following  the disbandment of नियति 's चाइल्ड in 2005 , नॉलेस 's दूसरी सोलो  album B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the top five singles `` Déjà Vu `` , `` Irreplaceable `` , and `` Beautiful Liar `` .
Her performance in Dreamgirls  ( 2006 ) अर्जित उसके दो सुनहरी  Globe nominations .
Knowles ' work playing Etta James in  कि फिल्मी प्रेरित उसके subsequent एल्बम  I Am ...
Sasha Fierce (  2008 ) जिससे शाखित हिट्स `` if i यहूद a लड़के `` , `` सिंगल  Ladies ( Put a Ring on It ) `` , `` Halo `` , and `` Sweet Dreams `` .
The album also helped Knowles earn six Grammys in 2010 ,  तोड़कर the रिकार्ड लिये सबसे ग्रैमी पुरस्कार जीती by a मादा  artist in one night .
Her fourth album 4 ( 2011 ) deviated  towards परंपरागत r & b और became उसके चौथी लगातार  number one album on the Billboard 200 .
In January 2012 , Knowles  दिया जनम to बेटी ब्लू आइवी कार्टर , उसके पहला  child with husband Jay-Z .
Knowles has sold over 13 million albums in the US and 118 million records worldwide ( as well as a further 50 million  रिकॉर्ड साथ नियति 's चाइल्ड ) , और is एक of the best-selling म्यूज़िक कलाकारों of सब  time .
The  रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ  of America ( RIAA ) recognized Knowles as the Top Certified Artist of the 2000s .
In 2009 , Billboard named her the  शीर्ष रेडियो गीतों कलाकार of the दशक और क्रमित  her the Top Female Artist and the fourth Artist of the Decade .
Beyoncé Knowles is the most  मनोनीत स्त्री in ग्रैमी पुरस्कार इतिहास , receiving 17 पुरस्कार ; अन्य accolades शामिल 12 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , 7 बिलबोर्ड पुरस्कार सहित  a Millennium Award , and a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child .
`` Angry All the Time '' is  the शीर्षक of a सोंग लिखा by ब्रूस robison और पहला अंकित on उसके 1998 एल्बम  Wrapped .
it थी बाद covered  by Tim McGraw with guest vocalist Faith Hill .
Released in July 2001 , McGraw 's version was the  दूसरी सिंगल इससे mcgraw 's नियत इस सर्कस bas एल्बम  .
The song reached Number  एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot देश singles  & Tracks ( now Hot Country Songs ) charts .
Dear John is a 2010  अमरीकी रोमांटिक नाटक - युद्ध फिल्मी अभिनीत  Amanda Seyfried and Channing Tatum .
It was released  theatrically in उत्तर अमेरिका on फ़रवरी  5 , 2010 .
The film was  निर्देशित by lasse hallström , और it is an अनुकूलन  of Nicholas Sparks 's novel of the same name .
It  फ़ॉलो the जीवन of a सिपाही ( चेनिंग टैटम ) बाद  he falls in love with a young woman ( Amanda Seyfried ) .
वे decide to एक्सचेंज अक्षर to प्रत्येक अन्य  after he is deployed to the war .
The movie was filmed in 2009 in  चार्ल्सटन , दक्षिण कैरोलिना .
Despite receiving negative reviews , the  फिल्मी बना a दमदार बक्सा दफ्तर प्रदर्शन , knocking बंद अवतार बाद सात सप्ताहांत  in first place and grossing a total of $ 114,977,104 worldwide .
The film was released on May 25 ,  2010 on dvd और blu-ray  .
These are  सूचियाँ of the व्यस्ततम एयरपोर्ट  in the United States .
hartsfield–jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र  is the busiest single airport in the United States .
However , all of the New York City metropolitan area 's airports combine to create the largest airport system in the United States , second in the world in  शर्तें of यात्री ट्रैफ़िक , और पहला in the संसार in शर्तें of कुल उड़ान  operations .
Dora the Explorer is an American animated television series created by  क्रिस gifford , वैलेरी वाल्श , और eric weiner  .
Dora the  एक्सप्लोरर became a नियमित  series in 2000 .
The show is carried on the Nickelodeon cable  टेलीविज़न संजाल , सहित the संबद्ध उपनाम jr.  channel .
It  aired on सीबीएस जबतक सितंबर  2006 .
A  spanish-dubbed संस्करण पहला aired as भाग of a उपनाम en español ब्लाक on एनबीसी सार्वभौमिक -owned telemundo through सितंबर  2006 ; since April 2008 , this version of the program has been carried on Univision as part of the Planeta U block .
Santa Fe ( ; ( Tewa : Ogha Po'oge , ) )  is the पूंजी of the u.S. राज्य of नई  Mexico .
It is the  fourth-largest नगर in the राज्य और  is the seat of .
Santa Fe ( meaning  “holy faith” in स्पेनी ) था a जनसांख्यिकी  of 67,947 in the 2010 census .
It is the principal city of a Metropolitan Statistical Area which  encompasses सब of सांता fe काउंटी और is भाग of the larger albuquerque-santa  Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical Area .
The city’s full name when founded was La Villa Real de la Santa Fé de San  फ्रांसिस्को de asís ( “the royal कस्बा of the पावन आस्था of st. फ्रांसिस of assisi” ) .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi , formerly stylized in uppercase as  पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय कि is उत्पादित और manufactured by पेप्सिको  .
Created and developed in 1893  और introduced as ब्रैड 's पेय , it थी renamed as pepsi-cola  on August 28 , 1898 , then to Pepsi in 1961 .
1765 broadside
The Sons of Liberty was a group  consisting of अमरीकी देशप्रेमी कि originated  in the pre-independence North American British colonies .
The group was formed  to protect the अधिकारों of the colonists और to लो to the गलियों विरूद्ध  the taxes by the British government .
They are best known for undertaking the Boston Tea  पार्टी in 1773 , जिससे led to the असहनीय अधिनियमों ( an तीव्र crackdown by  the British government ) , and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots .
ओसाका किला
is a city  in the कन्साई प्रदेश of जापानी 's प्रमुख द्वीप of होन्शू , a designated नगर अंतर्गत the लोकल स्वायत्तता विधि , the पूंजी नगर of ओसाका  Prefecture and also the largest part of the Keihanshin metropolis , which comprises three major cities of Japan , Kyoto , Osaka and Kobe .
Located at the mouth of the Yodo River on Osaka Bay ,  ओसाका is जापानी 's तीसरा largest नगर by जनसांख्यिकी बाद टोकियो  ( special wards ) and Yokohama .
Keihanshin is the second largest metropolitan area in Japan by population and one of the largest metropolitan areas highly ranked in the world ,  साथ nearly 19 लाख लोगों , और by जीडीपी the दूसरी largest क्षेत्रफल in जापानी और the सातवाँ largest क्षेत्रफल  in the world .
historically the वाणिज्यिक बीच of जापानी , ओसाका  functions as one of the command centers for the Japanese economy .
The ratio between daytime and night time population is 141 % , the  उच्चतम in जापानी , highlighting इसके औकात as an आर्थिक  center .
Its  nighttime जनसांख्यिकी is 2.6 लाख , the तीसरा in the देश , लकिन in दिन the जनसांख्यिकी surges to 3.7 लाख , दूसरी तभी बाद  Tokyo ( combining the special wards of Tokyo , which is not a single incorporated city , for statistical purposes ; see the Tokyo article for more information on the definition and makeup of Tokyo ) .
Osaka used to be referred to as the in feudal Edo period because it was  the केन्द्र of व्यापार लिये राइस , बनाना the पहला  modern futures exchange market in the world .
The Little Mermaid is a 1989 American  एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी विशेषता एनिमेशन  and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
Based on the Danish fairy tale by  hans ईसाई andersen , the छोटी मरमेड tells the स्टोरी of a खूबसूरत मरमेड जो  dreams of becoming human .
Written , directed , and produced by Ron Clements and John Musker , with music by Alan Menken and Howard Ashman , the film features the voices  jodi बेंसन , क्रिस्टोफर डेनियल barnes , पैट कैरल , सैमुएल E. राइट , जेसन मारिन , केनेथ  Mars , Buddy Hacket , and Rene Auberjonois .
The 28th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series , The Little Mermaid was released to theaters on November 14 , 1989 to largely  धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ , garnering $ 84 लाख at the बक्सा दफ्तर दौरान इसके आरंभिक रिलीज , और $ 211 लाख in कुल आजीवन सकल  .
After the success of the 1988 Disney / Amblin film Who Framed Roger Rabbit , The Little Mermaid is given credit for  श्वास जीवन वापस into the आर्ट of डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता films बाद a स्ट्रिंग of नाजुक or  commercial failures produced by Disney that dated back to the early 1970s .
It also marked  the प्रारंभ of the era ज्ञात as the डिज़्नी  Renaissance .
A stage adaptation of the  फिल्मी साथ a किताब by डग राइट और अतिरिक्त गीतों by एलन menken और नई गीतों ग्लेन स्लेटर  opened in Denver in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10 , 2008 .
alt=Close-up  फ़ोटो of a मेटल चमचा भर साथ  a viscous , clear purple fluid
Purple drank is a  कठबोली पद लिये a recreational ड्रग लोकप्रिय in the हिप हॉप जातियाँ in  the southern United States , originating in Houston , Texas .
Its main ingredient is prescription  -strength खांसी सिरप containing codeine  and promethazine .
Cough syrup is typically mixed with ingredients  ऐसे as sprite नरम पेय or पहाड़  Dew and pieces of Jolly Rancher candy .
The  purplish वर्ण of जामुनी  drank comes from dyes in the cough syrup .
There are numerous slang terms for purple drank , including  sizzurp , झुकना , सिरप , पिया , barre , जामुनी जेली , टेक्सास  tea , and Tsikuni .
First/given ,  मध्य , और last/family/surname आरेख साथ J.  S. Bach as example .
J. S. Bach shared his given name  साथ छह तात्कालिक परिवार सदस्यों और अनेक विस्तारित परिवार  members .
He  साझा उसके परिवार नाम साथ  most family members .
A given name , in Western  contexts प्रायः referred to as a पहला नाम , is a निजी नाम कि specifies और differentiates between सदस्यों of a समूह of individuals , विशेषकर in a परिवार , सब  of whose members usually share the same family name ( surname ) .
A given  नाम is purposefully दिए , प्रायः by a चाइल्ड 's अभिभावक at  or near birth , in contrast to an inherited one such as a family name .
a दिए नाम is sometimes  legally changed through a name change .
Given names  हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त in a परिचित और दोस्ताना  manner in informal situations .
In more  औपचारिक परिस्थितियों the उपनाम is प्रयुक्त बजाय , जबतक it is जरुरी to  distinguish between people with the same surname .
The  मुहावरा `` on a first-name आधार '' ( or `` on first-name शर्तें '' ) alludes to the अपनेपन  of addressing another by a given name .
The western style of  having दोनो a परिवार नाम ( उपनाम ) और a  given name is far from universal .
In many  देशों it is आम लिये ordinary लोगों  to have only one name ( a mononym ) .
Hydrochloric acid is a clear ,  colourless समाधान of हाइड्रोजन chloride ( h cl  ) in water .
It is a highly corrosive ,  दमदार खनिज एसिड साथ अनेक औद्योगिक  uses .
Hydrochloric acid is found  naturally in gastric एसिड  .
Historically called muriatic acid , and spirits of salt ,  हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड थी उत्पादित इससे vitriol ( sulfuric  acid ) and common salt .
It first appeared during the Renaissance  , और तब it थी प्रयुक्त by chemists ऐसे as glauber  , Priestley and Davy in their scientific research .
With major production starting in the Industrial Revolution , hydrochloric acid is used in the chemical industry as a  रासायनिक अभिकर्मक in the large-scale उत्पादन  of vinyl chloride for PVC plastic , and MDI / TDI for polyurethane .
It has numerous smaller-scale applications ,  सहित household सफ़ाई , उत्पादन of जिलेटिन और अन्य खाना एडिटिव , descaling  , and leather processing .
About 20 million tonnes of  हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड हैं उत्पादित annually  .
Wheat ( Triticum spp .  ) is a खाद्यान्न अनाज , originally इससे the levant प्रदेश of  the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands , but now cultivated worldwide .
In 2010 , world production of wheat was 651 million tons , making it  the तीसरा most-produced खाद्यान्न बाद मक्का ( 844 लाख टन ) और राइस ( 672  million tons ) .
Wheat  थी the दूसरी most-produced खाद्यान्न in 2009 ; संसार उत्पादन in कि साल  was 682 million tons , after maize ( 817 million tons ) , and with rice as a close third ( 679 million tons ) .
This grain is grown  on अधिक जमीन क्षेत्रफल than कोई अन्य  commercial food .
World trade in wheat  is वृहद than लिये सब अन्य  crops combined .
Globally , wheat is the  अग्रणी सोर्स of सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन in इंसान खाना  , having a higher protein content than soybeans or the other major cereals , maize ( corn ) or rice .
In terms of total  उत्पादन tonnages प्रयुक्त लिये खाना , it is फिलहाल दूसरी to राइस as the प्रमुख इंसान खाना क्रॉप और ahead of मक्का  , after allowing for maize 's more extensive use in animal feeds .
Wheat was a key factor enabling the emergence of city-based  समाजों at the प्रारंभ of सभ्यता क्युकी it थी एक of the पहला फसलों कि could be easily cultivated on a विशाल स्केल , और  had the additional advantage of yielding a harvest that provides long-term storage of food .
Wheat contributed to the emergence of  city-states in the fertile crescent , सहित  the Babylonian and Assyrian empires .
Wheat grain is a staple  खाना प्रयुक्त to मेक आटा लिये leavened , चपटा और steamed breads , बिस्कुट , कुकीज़ , cakes , नाश्ता खाद्यान्न ,  pasta , noodles , couscous and for fermentation to make beer , other alcoholic beverages , or biofuel .
Wheat is planted to a limited extent as a  forage क्रॉप लिये पशुधन , और इसके स्ट्रॉ can be प्रयुक्त as a निर्माण सामग्री  for roofing thatch .
The whole grain can be  milled to छोड़ बस the भ्रूणपोष लिये  white flour .
the by-products of इस  are bran and germ .
The whole grain is a  concentrated सोर्स of विटामिन , खनिज , और प्रोटीन , जबकि the  refined grain is mostly starch .
मुद्रण
To publish is to make  सामग्री उपलब्धियाँ to the सामान्य पब्लिक  .
जबकि विशिष्ट उपयोग of the पद may vary among देशों , it is प्रायः लागू to  text , images , or other audio-visual content on any traditional medium , including paper ( newspapers , magazines , catalogs , etc . ) .
The word publication  अर्थात् the अधिनियम of प्रकाशन , और  also refers to any printed copies .
Melissa & Joey is an ABC Family original television series  अभिनीत मेलिसा जोन हार्ट और जॉय लॉरेंस  .
It first  aired on एबीसी परिवार on  August 17 , 2010 .
The  श्रेणी फ़ॉलो लोकल राजनेता mel बुर्के ( मेलिसा जोन हार्ट ) और जो longo ( जॉय लॉरेंस  ) , whom Mel hires to look after her niece and nephew after a Ponzi scheme leaves him broke .
The series was renewed by ABC Family for a second season of fifteen  एपीसोड , जिससे began airing on may 30 , 2012 और ended on अगस्त  29 , 2012 .
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable TV 's # 1 telecast at 8 o'clock  आरपार निशाना ऑडियंस 18–34 , 18–49 और 12–34  demographics .
On August 17 , 2012 , ABC Family  नवीनीकृत मेलिसा & जॉय लिये a  third season , set to premiere in spring 2013 .
The Dharma wheel , often used  to represent the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold पाथ
The Noble Eightfold Path ( , ) is one of the  प्रिंसिपल शिक्षाओं of the बुद्ध , जो वर्णित it as the रास्ता अग्रणी to the cessation of कष्ट ( dukkha ) और the उपलब्धि  of self-awakening .
It is used to  develop इनसाइट into the सच्चा प्रकृति of phenomena  ( or reality ) and to eradicate greed , hatred , and delusion .
The Noble Eightfold Path is the fourth of the Buddha 's Four Noble Truths ; the first element of the  प्रतिष्ठित eightfold पाथ is , in फेरे , an समझना  of the Four Noble Truths .
It is  भी ज्ञात as the मध्य  Path or Middle Way .
All eight elements of the Path begin with the word `` right '' , which  translates the शब्द samyañc ( in संस्कृत ) or sammā (  in Pāli ) .
These denote completion , togetherness , and coherence , and can also  सुझाएँ the होश of `` पूर्ण '' or `` आदर्श  '' .
'Samma ' is also translated as ``  wholesome '' , `` हिकमत '' और `` skillful  '' .
In Buddhist  प्रतीकवाद , the प्रतिष्ठित  Eightfold Path is often represented by means of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra ) , whose eight spokes represent the eight elements of the path .
The Grammy Award for Song of the  साल is an सम्मान प्रस्तुत at the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार ,  a ceremony that was established in 1958 and originally called the Gramophone Awards .
Awards in several categories are distributed annually by the National Academy  of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences of the संयुक्त राज्य to `` सम्मान कलाकारी उपलब्धि , तकनीकी proficiency और overall excellence in the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग , बगैर लिहाज़  to album sales or chart position . ''
अर्थशास्त्र is the सोशल विज्ञान  that analyzes the production , distribution , and consumption of goods and services .
The term economics comes from the Ancient Greek ( ' , `` management of a household ,  प्रशासन '' ) इससे ( ' , `` हाउस '' ) + ( ' , `` कस्टम '' or `` विधि ''  ) , hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) '' .
राजनैतिक अर्थव्यवस्था थी the पहले नाम लिये the विषय , लकिन अर्थशास्त्रियों in the लेट 19th सदी सुझाया `` अर्थशास्त्र '' as a shorter पद लिये `` आर्थिक विज्ञान '' कि भी avoided  a narrow political-interest connotation and as similar in form to `` mathematics `` , `` ethics '' , and so forth .
A focus of the subject is how  आर्थिक एजेंटों व्यवहार or interact  and how economies work .
Consistent with this ,  a प्राथमिक textbook भेद is between microeconomics  and macroeconomics .
Microeconomics examines the behavior of basic elements in the economy , including individual  एजेंटों ( ऐसे as households और firms or as खरीदार और विक्रेता ) और बाज़ार , और उनके  interactions .
Macroeconomics analyzes the entire  अर्थव्यवस्था और मुद्दे affecting it , सहित बेरोजगारी , महंगाई , आर्थिक  growth , and monetary and fiscal policy .
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing `` what is '' ) and normative economics ( advocating `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic theory and applied economics ; between rational and behavioral economics ; and between mainstream economics ( more `` orthodox '' and  dealing साथ the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium नेक्सस '' ) और शास्त अर्थशास्त्र ( अधिक `` कट्टरपंथी '' और dealing साथ the `` institutions-history-social ढांचा नेक्सस  '' ) .
Economic analysis may be applied throughout society , as in business  , वित्त , स्वास्थ्य परवाह , और सरकारी , लकिन भी to ऐसे विविध विषय  as crime , education , the family , law , politics , religion , social institutions , war , and science .
At the turn of the 21st century , the  expanding डोमेन of अर्थशास्त्र in the सोशल sciences रै महरूम वर्णित as  economic imperialism .
An increasing  क्रमांक of अर्थशास्त्रियों have पुकारा लिये increased जोर on पर्यावरणीय  sustainability ; this area of research is known as Ecological economics .
This is a list of Schedule  iv दवाएँ अंतर्गत the नियंत्रित substances अधिनियम लिये the संयुक्त  States .
जरूरी निष्कर्षों लिये  drugs to be placed in this schedule:
The drug or other substance has a low potential for  गाली सापेक्ष to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances in अनुसूची  III .
The drug  or अन्य पदार्थ रै a फिलहाल स्वीकृत चिकित्सा  use in treatment in the United States .
Abuse of the drug or other  पदार्थ may सीसे to सीमित शारीरिक dependence or मनोवैज्ञानिक dependence सापेक्ष to the दवाएँ or  other substances in schedule III .
The complete list of Schedule  iv दवाएँ हैं as फ़ॉलो  .
The  प्रशासनिक नियंत्रित substances  Code Number for each drug is included .
US county  household मध्य आय  2009 .
Median US  household आय , 2001-2011
Household income is a  माप commonly प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य  government and private institutions .
Each household is  measured by the आय of प्रत्येक  resident over the age of 15 .
Income includes wages and  salaries , बेरोजगारी बीमे , विकलांगता भुगतान , चाइल्ड support  payments received , regular rental receipts , as well as any personal business , investment , or other kinds of income received routinely .
While inflation-adjusted (  `` रियल '' ) household आय था महरूम increasing लगभग  every year from 1945 to 1999 , it has since been flat and even decreased recently .
U.S. median household income  गिरी इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to  $ 50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United  राज्य , अर्थ households जीना on कम than $ 2 प्रति दिन पहले सरकारी लाभ , doubled  from 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011 , including 2.8 million children .
The residents of the household do not have to be related to the head  of the household लिये उनके आय to be माना भाग of the household 's  income .
As households tend to share a similar economic context , the  उपयोग of household आय remains among the सबसे widely स्वीकृत  measures of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any  विश्लेषण of fluctuations भीतर or among the household आय श्रेणी , और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between  quintiles difficult or even impossible .
the बीतने रेट is पारिभाषित as the रेट of घटी  with height for an atmospheric variable .
The variable involved is  तापमान जबतक निर्दिष्ट वरना  .
The  शब्दावली arises इससे the शब्द बीतने  in the sense of a decrease or decline .
While most often applied to Earth  's माहौल the अवधारणा can be विस्तारित to कोई gravitationally  supported ball of gas .
Blue Mountain State is an  अमरीकी कॉमेडी श्रेणी कि premiered  on Spike on January 11 , 2010 .
The  श्रेणी निर्माता शामिल क्रिस romano और eric falconer , और it is  produced by Lionsgate Television .
The  श्रेणी is परिचय a fictional विश्वविद्यालयों , ब्लू  Mountain State , and its football team , `` The Mountain Goats . ''
It portrays certain aspects of American university  जीवन , सहित फ़ुटबॉल , sex , binge पीने , दवाएँ ,  wild partying , and hazing .
In February 2012 ,  it थी reported कि ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य होता  not be renewed for a fourth season .
In March 2013 , Ed  marinaro stated कि he is working on  a Blue Mountain State film .
Apple Inc. , formerly Apple Computer , Inc. , is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Cupertino , California that  डिजाइन , develops , और बिकता उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स , कंप्यूटर तन्त्र और निजी  computers .
Its best-known  हार्डवेयर उत्पाद हैं the मैक लकीर of कंप्यूटर , the ipod  music player , the iPhone smartphone , and the iPad tablet computer .
Its software includes the OS X and iOS  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों , the itunes मीडिया ब्राउजर , the safari वेब ब्राउजर  , and the iLife and iWork creativity and production suites .
The company was  संस्थापित on अप्रैल 1 , 1976 , और incorporated  as Apple Computer , Inc. on January 3 , 1977 .
the शब्द `` कंप्यूटर '' थी removed इससे इसके नाम on जनवरी 9 , 2007 , reflecting इसके shifted  focus towards consumer electronics after the introduction of the iPhone .
Apple is the world 's second-largest  सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी कम्पनी by आय बाद samsung इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  , and the world 's third-largest mobile phone maker after Samsung and Nokia .
Fortune magazine named Apple the most admired company in the  संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 , और in  the world from 2008 to 2012 .
however , the कम्पनी रै प्राप्त आलोचना लिये इसके ठेकेदारों ' मजदूर  practices , and for Apple 's own environmental and business practices .
, Apple maintains  394 खुदरा स्टोर्स in चौदह देशों as खूब as the  online Apple Store and iTunes Store .
it is the second-largest सरेआम traded निगम in  the world by market capitalization , with an estimated value of US $ 414 billion as of January 2013 .
, the company  था 72,800 स्थाई full-time कर्मचारी और 3,300 अस्थाई  full-time employees worldwide .
Its  विश्वव्यापी सालाना आय in 2012 totalled  $ 156 billion .
Section 8  आवास in the  South Bronx
Section 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ) , often simply known as Section 8 , as repeatedly amended , authorizes the payment of  rental आवास सहायता to निजी जमींदार on निमित्त of लगभग 3.1 लाख low-income  households .
It operates through several programs , the largest of which , the Housing  चुनाव वाउचर कार्यक्रम , pays a विशाल portion of the rents और उपयोगिताएँ  of about 2.1 million households .
The  us विभाग of आवास और शहरी विकास  manages the Section 8 programs .
The Housing Choice Voucher Program provides `` tenant-based '' rental assistance ,  so a किरायेदार can मूव इससे एक ईकाई of at तनिक न्यूनतम आवास विशेषता  to another .
It also allows individuals to apply their monthly voucher towards the purchase of a home , with  over $ 17 अरब going towards ऐसे purchases प्रत्येक साल ( इससे ncsha.org  analysis ) .
The maximum  अनुमत वाउचर  is $ 2200 a month .
Section 8 also authorizes a variety of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs , under which the owner reserves some or all of the units in a building for low-income tenants ,  in वापसी लिये a संघीय सरकारी गारंटी to मेक up the अंतर between the किरायेदार 's योगदान और the किराया लिये 1 cent in the मालिक 's अनुबंध साथ the सरकारी  .
A tenant who  पत्ते a subsidized प्रोजेक्ट होगा खोना  access to the project-based subsidy .
The United States Department of Housing and Urban Development and United States Department of Veterans  अफेयर्स have a खास खण्ड 8 कार्यक्रम पुकारा vash ( दिग्गजों अफेयर्स supportive आवास ) , or hud-vash , जिससे देता आउट a निश्चित क्रमांक of खण्ड 8 वाउचर to योग्य बेघर और वरना vulnerable  US armed forces veterans .
Restaurants  categorized by प्रकार और सूचना  about these different types .
U.S.  संघीय आरक्षित टीप in  the mid-1990s
the इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य डालर  covers more than 200 years .
